 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam
 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
 dvaipāyanauṣṭhapuṭaniḥsṛtam aprameyaṃ
 puṇyaṃ pavitram atha pāpaharaṃ śivaṃ ca
 yo bhārataṃ samadhigacchati vācyamānaṃ
 kiṃ tasya puṣkarajalair abhiṣecanena
 yo gośataṃ kaṇanakaśṛṅgamayaṃ dadāti
 viprāya vedaviduṣe ca bahuśrutāya
 ekāṃ ca bhāratakathāṃ śṛṇuyāt samagrāṃ
 tulyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati tasya ca tasya ceti
 vyāsaṃ vasiṣṭhanaptāraṃ śakteḥ pautram akalmaṣam
 parāśarātmajaṃ vande śukatātaṃ taponidhim
 vyāsāya viṣṇurūpāya vyāsarūpāya viṣṇave
 namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ
 namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase
 brāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtya dharmān vakṣyāmi śāśvatān
 namo bhagavate tasmai vyāsāyāmitatejase
 yasya prasādād vakṣyāmi nārāyaṇakathām imām
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a kṛtodakās te suhṛdāṃ sarveṣāṃ pāṇḍunandanāḥ
c viduro dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca sarvāś ca bharatastriyaḥ
a tatra te sumahātmāno nyavasan kurunandanāḥ
c śaucaṃ nivartayiṣyanto māsam ekaṃ bahiḥ purāt
a kṛtodakaṃ tu rājānaṃ dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c abhijagmur mahātmānaḥ siddhā brahmarṣisattamāḥ
a dvaipāyano nāradaś ca devalaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
c devasthānaś ca kaṇvaś ca teṣāṃ śiṣyāś ca sattamāḥ
a anye ca vedavidvāṃsaḥ kṛtaprajñā dvijātayaḥ
c gṛhasthāḥ snātakāḥ sarve dadṛśuḥ kurusattamam
a abhigamya mahātmānaḥ pūjitāś ca yathāvidhi
c āsaneṣu mahārheṣu viviśus te maharṣayaḥ
a pratigṛhya tataḥ pūjāṃ tatkālasadṛśīṃ tadā
c paryupāsan yathānyāyaṃ parivārya yudhiṣṭhiram
a puṇye bhāgīrathītīre śokavyākulacetasam
c āśvāsayanto rājānaṃ viprāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
a nāradas tv abravīt kāle dharmātmānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c vicārya munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ tatkālasadṛśaṃ vacaḥ
a bhavato bāhuvīryeṇa prasādān mādhavasya ca
c jiteyam avaniḥ kṛtsnā dharmeṇa ca yudhiṣṭhira
a diṣṭyā muktāḥ stha saṃgrāmād asmāl lokabhayaṃkarāt
c kṣatradharmarataś cāpi kaccin modasi pāṇḍava
a kaccic ca nihatāmitraḥ prīṇāsi suhṛdo nṛpa
c kaccic chriyam imāṃ prāpya na tvāṃ śokaḥ prabādhate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a vijiteyaṃ mahī kṛtsnā kṛṣṇabāhubalāśrayāt
c brāhmaṇānāṃ prasādena bhīmārjunabalena ca
a idaṃ tu me mahad duḥkhaṃ vartate hṛdi nityadā
c kṛtvā jñātikṣayam imaṃ mahāntaṃ lobhakāritam
a saubhadraṃ draupadeyāṃś ca ghātayitvā priyān sutān
c jayo 'yam ajayākāro bhagavan pratibhāti me
a kiṃ nu vakṣyati vārṣṇeyī vadhūr me madhusūdanam
c dvārakāvāsinī kṛṣṇam itaḥ pratigataṃ harim
a draupadī hataputreyaṃ kṛpaṇā hatabāndhavā
c asmatpriyahite yuktā bhūyaḥ pīḍayatīva mām
a idam anyac ca bhagavan yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi nārada
c mantrasaṃvaraṇenāsmi kuntyā duḥkhena yojitaḥ
a yo 'sau nāgāyutabalo loke 'pratiratho raṇe
c siṃhakhelagatir dhīmān ghṛṇī dānto yatavrataḥ
a āśrayo dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ mānī tīkṣṇaparākramaḥ
c amarṣī nityasaṃrambhī kṣeptāsmākaṃ raṇe raṇe
a śīghrāstraś citrayodhī ca kṛtī cādbhutavikramaḥ
c gūḍhotpannaḥ sutaḥ kuntyā bhrātāsmākaṃ ca sodaraḥ
a toyakarmaṇi yaṃ kuntī kathayām āsa sūryajam
c putraṃ sarvaguṇopetam avakīrṇaṃ jale purā
d mañjūṣāyāṃ samādhāya gaṅgāsrotasy amajjayat
a yaṃ sūtaputraṃ loko 'yaṃ rādheyaṃ cāpy amanyata
c sa jyeṣṭhaputraḥ kuntyā vai bhrātāsmākaṃ ca mātṛjaḥ
a ajānatā mayā saṃkhye rājyalubdhena ghātitaḥ
c tan me dahati gātrāṇi tūlarāśim ivānalaḥ
a na hi taṃ veda pārtho 'pi bhrātaraṃ śvetavāhanaḥ
c nāhaṃ na bhīmo na yamau sa tv asmān veda suvrataḥ
a gatā kila pṛthā tasya sakāśam iti naḥ śrutam
c asmākaṃ śamakāmā vai tvaṃ ca putro mamety atha
a pṛthāyā na kṛtaḥ kāmas tena cāpi mahātmanā
c atipaścād idaṃ mātary avocad iti naḥ śrutam
a na hi śakṣyāmy ahaṃ tyaktuṃ nṛpaṃ duryodhanaṃ raṇe
c anāryaṃ ca nṛśaṃsaṃ ca kṛtaghnaṃ ca hi me bhavet
a yudhiṣṭhireṇa saṃdhiṃ ca yadi kuryāṃ mate tava
c bhīto raṇe śvetavāhād iti māṃ maṃsyate janaḥ
a so 'haṃ nirjitya samare vijayaṃ sahakeśavam
c saṃdhāsye dharmaputreṇa paścād iti ca so 'bravīt
a tam avocat kila pṛthā punaḥ pṛthulavakṣasam
c caturṇām abhayaṃ dehi kāmaṃ yudhyasva phalgunam
a so 'bravīn mātaraṃ dhīmān vepamānaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
c prāptān viṣahyāṃś caturo na haniṣyāmi te sutān
a pañcaiva hi sutā mātar bhaviṣyanti hi te dhruvam
c sakarṇā vā hate pārthe sārjunā vā hate mayi
a taṃ putragṛddhinī bhūyo mātā putram athābravīt
c bhrātṝṇāṃ svasti kurvīthā yeṣāṃ svasti cikīrṣasi
a tam evam uktvā tu pṛthā visṛjyopayayau gṛhān
c so 'rjunena hato vīro bhrātā bhrātrā sahodaraḥ
a na caiva vivṛto mantraḥ pṛthāyās tasya vā mune
c atha śūro maheṣvāsaḥ pārthenāsau nipātitaḥ
a ahaṃ tv ajñāsiṣaṃ paścāt svasodaryaṃ dvijottama
c pūrvajaṃ bhrātaraṃ karṇaṃ pṛthāyā vacanāt prabho
a tena me dūyate 'tīva hṛdayaṃ bhrātṛghātinaḥ
c karṇārjunasahāyo 'haṃ jayeyam api vāsavam
a sabhāyāṃ kliśyamānasya dhārtarāṣṭrair durātmabhiḥ
c sahasotpatitaḥ krodhaḥ karṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā praśāmyati
a yadā hy asya giro rūkṣāḥ śṛṇomi kaṭukodayāḥ
c sabhāyāṃ gadato dyūte duryodhanahitaiṣiṇaḥ
a tadā naśyati me krodhaḥ pādau tasya nirīkṣya ha
c kuntyā hi sadṛśau pādau karṇasyeti matir mama
a sādṛśyahetum anvicchan pṛthāyās tava caiva ha
c kāraṇaṃ nādhigacchāmi kathaṃ cid api cintayan
a kathaṃ nu tasya saṃgrāme pṛthivī cakram agrasat
c kathaṃ ca śapto bhrātā me tat tvaṃ vaktum ihārhasi
a śrotum icchāmi bhagavaṃs tvattaḥ sarvaṃ yathātatham
c bhavān hi sarvavid vidvāṃl loke veda kṛtākṛtam
d anāgate vartamāne trailokye nātra saṃśayaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a sa evam uktas tu munir nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ
c kathayām āsa tat sarvaṃ yathā śaptaḥ sa sūtajaḥ
a evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi bhārata
c na karṇārjunayoḥ kiṃ cid aviṣahyaṃ bhaved raṇe
a guhyam etat tu devānāṃ kathayiṣyāmi te nṛpa
c tan nibodha mahārāja yathā vṛttam idaṃ purā
a kṣatraṃ svargaṃ kathaṃ gacchec chastrapūtam iti prabho
c saṃgharṣajananas tasmāt kanyāgarbho vinirmitaḥ
a sa bālas tejasā yuktaḥ sūtaputratvam āgataḥ
c cakārāṅgirasāṃ śreṣṭhe dhanurvedaṃ gurau tava
a sa balaṃ bhīmasenasya phalgunasya ca lāghavam
c buddhiṃ ca tava rājendra yamayor vinayaṃ tathā
a sakhyaṃ ca vāsudevena bālye gāṇḍivadhanvanaḥ
c prajānām anurāgaṃ ca cintayāno vyadahyata
a sa sakhyam agamad bālye rājñā duryodhanena vai
c yuṣmābhir nityasaṃdviṣṭo daivāc cāpi svabhāvataḥ
a vidyādhikam athālakṣya dhanurvede dhanaṃjayam
c droṇaṃ rahasy upāgamya karṇo vacanam abravīt
a brahmāstraṃ vettum icchāmi sarahasyanivartanam
b aho citraṃ mahac citraṃ viparītam idaṃ jagat
b yenāpatrapate sādhur asādhus tena tuṣyati
c arjunena samo yuddhe bhaveyam iti me matiḥ
a samaḥ putreṣu ca snehaḥ śiṣyeṣu ca tava dhruvam
c tvatprasādān na māṃ brūyur akṛtāstraṃ vicakṣaṇāḥ
a droṇas tathoktaḥ karṇena sāpekṣaḥ phalgunaṃ prati
c daurātmyaṃ cāpi karṇasya viditvā tam uvāca ha
a brahmāstraṃ brāhmaṇo vidyād yathāvac caritavrataḥ
c kṣatriyo vā tapasvī yo nānyo vidyāt kathaṃ cana
a ity ukto 'ṅgirasāṃ śreṣṭham āmantrya pratipūjya ca
c jagāma sahasā rāmaṃ mahendraṃ parvataṃ prati
a sa tu rāmam upāgamya śirasābhipraṇamya ca
c brāhmaṇo bhārgavo 'smīti gauraveṇābhyagacchata
a rāmas taṃ pratijagrāha pṛṣṭvā gotrādi sarvaśaḥ
c uṣyatāṃ svāgataṃ ceti prītimāṃś cābhavad bhṛśam
a tatra karṇasya vasato mahendre parvatottame
c gandharvai rākṣasair yakṣair devaiś cāsīt samāgamaḥ
a sa tatreṣv astram akarod bhṛguśreṣṭhād yathāvidhi
c priyaś cābhavad atyarthaṃ devagandharvarakṣasām
a sa kadā cit samudrānte vicarann āśramāntike
c ekaḥ khaḍgadhanuṣpāṇiḥ paricakrāma sūtajaḥ
a so 'gnihotraprasaktasya kasya cid brahmavādinaḥ
c jaghānājñānataḥ pārtha homadhenuṃ yadṛcchayā
a tad ajñānakṛtaṃ matvā brāhmaṇāya nyavedayat
c karṇaḥ prasādayaṃś cainam idam ity abravīd vacaḥ
a abuddhipūrvaṃ bhagavan dhenur eṣā hatā tava
c mayā tatra prasādaṃ me kuruṣveti punaḥ punaḥ
a taṃ sa vipro 'bravīt kruddho vācā nirbhartsayann iva
c durācāra vadhārhas tvaṃ phalaṃ prāpnuhi durmate
a yena vispardhase nityaṃ yadarthaṃ ghaṭase 'niśam
c yudhyatas tena te pāpa bhūmiś cakraṃ grasiṣyati
a tataś cakre mahīgraste mūrdhānaṃ te vicetasaḥ
c pātayiṣyati vikramya śatrur gaccha narādhama
a yatheyaṃ gaur hatā mūḍha pramattena tvayā mama
c pramattasyaivam evānyaḥ śiras te pātayiṣyati
a tataḥ prasādayām āsa punas taṃ dvijasattamam
c gobhir dhanaiś ca ratnaiś ca sa cainaṃ punar abravīt
a nedaṃ madvyāhṛtaṃ kuryāt sarvaloko 'pi vai mṛṣā
c gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā yad vā kāryaṃ te tat samācara
a ity ukto brāhmaṇenātha karṇo dainyād adhomukhaḥ
c rāmam abhyāgamad bhītas tad eva manasā smaran
 nārada uvāca
a karṇasya bāhuvīryeṇa praśrayeṇa damena ca
c tutoṣa bhṛguśārdūlo guruśuśrūṣayā tathā
a tasmai sa vidhivat kṛtsnaṃ brahmāstraṃ sanivartanam
c provācākhilam avyagraṃ tapasvī sutapasvine
a viditāstras tataḥ karṇo ramamāṇo ''śrame bhṛgoḥ
c cakāra vai dhanurvede yatnam adbhutavikramaḥ
a tataḥ kadā cid rāmas tu carann āśramam antikāt
c karṇena sahito dhīmān upavāsena karśitaḥ
a suṣvāpa jāmadagnyo vai visrambhotpannasauhṛdaḥ
c karṇasyotsaṅga ādhāya śiraḥ klāntamanā guruḥ
a atha kṛmiḥ śleṣmamayo māṃsaśoṇitabhojanaḥ
c dāruṇo dāruṇasparśaḥ karṇasyābhyāśam āgamat
a sa tasyorum athāsādya bibheda rudhirāśanaḥ
c na cainam aśakat kṣeptuṃ hantuṃ vāpi guror bhayāt
a saṃdaśyamāno 'pi tathā kṛmiṇā tena bhārata
c guruprabodhaśaṅkī ca tam upaikṣata sūtajaḥ
a karṇas tu vedanāṃ dhairyād asahyāṃ vinigṛhya tām
c akampann avyathaṃś caiva dhārayām āsa bhārgavam
a yadā tu rudhireṇāṅge parispṛṣṭo bhṛgūdvahaḥ
c tadābudhyata tejasvī saṃtaptaś cedam abravīt
a aho 'smy aśucitāṃ prāptaḥ kim idaṃ kriyate tvayā
c kathayasva bhayaṃ tyaktvā yāthātathyam idaṃ mama
a tasya karṇas tadācaṣṭa kṛmiṇā paribhakṣaṇam
c dadarśa rāmas taṃ cāpi kṛmiṃ sūkarasaṃnibham
a aṣṭapādaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraṃ sūcībhir iva saṃvṛtam
c romabhiḥ saṃniruddhāṅgam alarkaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
a sa dṛṣṭamātro rāmeṇa kṛmiḥ prāṇān avāsṛjat
c tasminn evāsṛksaṃklinne tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tato 'ntarikṣe dadṛśe viśvarūpaḥ karālavān
c rākṣaso lohitagrīvaḥ kṛṣṇāṅgo meghavāhanaḥ
a sa rāmaṃ prāñjalir bhūtvā babhāṣe pūrṇamānasaḥ
c svasti te bhṛguśārdūla gamiṣyāmi yathāgatam
a mokṣito narakād asmi bhavatā munisattama
c bhadraṃ ca te 'stu nandiś ca priyaṃ me bhavatā kṛtam
a tam uvāca mahābāhur jāmadagnyaḥ pratāpavān
c kas tvaṃ kasmāc ca narakaṃ pratipanno bravīhi tat
a so 'bravīd aham āsaṃ prāg gṛtso nāma mahāsuraḥ
c purā devayuge tāta bhṛgos tulyavayā iva
a so 'haṃ bhṛgoḥ sudayitāṃ bhāryām apaharaṃ balāt
c maharṣer abhiśāpena kṛmibhūto 'pataṃ bhuvi
a abravīt tu sa māṃ krodhāt tava pūrvapitāmahaḥ
c mūtraśleṣmāśanaḥ pāpa nirayaṃ pratipatsyase
a śāpasyānto bhaved brahmann ity evaṃ tam athābruvam
c bhavitā bhārgave rāma iti mām abravīd bhṛguḥ
a so 'ham etāṃ gatiṃ prāpto yathā nakuśalaṃ tathā
c tvayā sādho samāgamya vimuktaḥ pāpayonitaḥ
a evam uktvā namaskṛtya yayau rāmaṃ mahāsuraḥ
c rāmaḥ karṇaṃ tu sakrodham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a atiduḥkham idaṃ mūḍha na jātu brāhmaṇaḥ sahet
c kṣatriyasyaiva te dhairyaṃ kāmayā satyam ucyatām
a tam uvāca tataḥ karṇaḥ śāpabhītaḥ prasādayan
c brahmakṣatrāntare sūtaṃ jātaṃ māṃ viddhi bhārgava
a rādheyaḥ karṇa iti māṃ pravadanti janā bhuvi
c prasādaṃ kuru me brahmann astralubdhasya bhārgava
a pitā gurur na saṃdeho vedavidyāpradaḥ prabhuḥ
c ato bhārgava ity uktaṃ mayā gotraṃ tavāntike
a tam uvāca bhṛguśreṣṭhaḥ saroṣaḥ prahasann iva
c bhūmau nipatitaṃ dīnaṃ vepamānaṃ kṛtāñjalim
a yasmān mithyopacarito astralobhād iha tvayā
c tasmād etad dhi te mūḍha brahmāstraṃ pratibhāsyati
a anyatra vadhakālāt te sadṛśena sameyuṣaḥ
c abrāhmaṇe na hi brahma dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhet kadā cana
a gacchedānīṃ na te sthānam anṛtasyeha vidyate
c na tvayā sadṛśo yuddhe bhavitā kśatriyo bhuvi
a evam uktas tu rāmeṇa nyāyenopajagāma saḥ
c duryodhanam upāgamya kṛtāstro 'smīti cābravīt
 nārada uvāca
a karṇas tu samavāpyaitad astraṃ bhārgavanandanāt
c duryodhanena sahito mumude bharatarṣabha
a tataḥ kadā cid rājānaḥ samājagmuḥ svayaṃvare
c kaliṅgaviṣaye rājan rājñaś citrāṅgadasya ca
a śrīmadrājapuraṃ nāma nagaraṃ tatra bhārata
c rājānaḥ śataśas tatra kanyārthaṃ samupāgaman
a śrutvā duryodhanas tatra sametān sarvapārthivān
c rathena kāñcanāṅgena karṇena sahito yayau
a tataḥ svayaṃvare tasmin saṃpravṛtte mahotsave
c samāpetur nṛpatayaḥ kanyārthe nṛpasattama
a śiśupālo jarāsaṃdho bhīṣmako vakra eva ca
c kapotaromā nīlaś ca rukmī ca dṛḍhavikramaḥ
a sṛgālaś ca mahārāja strīrājyādhipatiś ca yaḥ
c aśokaḥ śatadhanvā ca bhojo vīraś ca nāmataḥ
a ete cānye ca bahavo dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritāḥ
c mlecchācāryāś ca rājānaḥ prācyodīcyāś ca bhārata
a kāñcanāṅgadinaḥ sarve baddhajāmbūnadasrajaḥ
c sarve bhāsvaradehāś ca vyāghrā iva madotkaṭāḥ
a tataḥ samupaviṣṭeṣu teṣu rājasu bhārata
c viveśa raṅgaṃ sā kanyā dhātrīvarṣadharānvitā
a tataḥ saṃśrāvyamāṇeṣu rājñāṃ nāmasu bhārata
c atyakrāmad dhārtarāṣṭraṃ sā kanyā varavarṇinī
a duryodhanas tu kauravyo nāmarṣayata laṅghanam
c pratyaṣedhac ca tāṃ kanyām asatkṛtya narādhipān
a sa vīryamadamattatvād bhīṣmadroṇāv upāśritaḥ
c ratham āropya tāṃ kanyām ājuhāva narādhipān
a tam anvayād rathī khaḍgī bhaddhagodhāṅgulitravān
c karṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ puruṣarṣabha
a tato vimardaḥ sumahān rājñām āsīd yudhiṣṭhira
c saṃnahyatāṃ tanutrāṇi rathān yojayatām api
a te 'bhyadhāvanta saṃkruddhāḥ karṇaduryodhanāv ubhau
c śaravarṣāṇi muñcanto meghāḥ parvatayor iva
a karṇas teṣām āpatatām ekaikena kṣureṇa ha
c dhanūṃṣi saśarāvāpāny apātayata bhūtale
a tato vidhanuṣaḥ kāṃś cit kāṃś cid udyatakārmukān
c kāṃś cid udvahato bāṇān rathaśaktigadās tathā
a lāghavād ākulīkṛtya karṇaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
c hatasūtāṃś ca bhūyiṣṭhān avajigye narādhipān
a te svayaṃ tvarayanto 'śvān yāhi yāhīti vādinaḥ
c vyapeyus te raṇaṃ hitvā rājāno bhagnamānasāḥ
a duryodhanas tu karṇena pālyamāno 'bhyayāt tadā
c hṛṣṭaḥ kanyām upādāya nagaraṃ nāgasāhvayam
 nārada uvāca
a āviṣkṛtabalaṃ karṇaṃ jñātvā rājā tu māgadhaḥ
c āhvayad dvairathenājau jarāsaṃdho mahīpatiḥ
a tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ divyāstraviduṣor dvayoḥ

a brāhmaṇasyābhiśāpena rāmasya ca mahātmanaḥ
c kuntyāś ca varadānena māyayā ca śatakratoḥ

c kuberadroṇayoś caiva kṛpasya ca mahātmanaḥ

a evaṃ śaptas tava bhrātā bahubhiś cāpi vañcitaḥ
c na śocyaḥ sa naravyāghro yuddhe hi nidhanaṃ gataḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a etāvad uktvā devarṣir virarāma sa nāradaḥ

a taṃ dīnamanasaṃ vīram adhovadanam āturam

 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca

c hatvā no vigato manyuḥ śoko māṃ rundhayaty ayam
a dhanaṃjaya kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ kalyāṇenopahanyate
