c nākalyāṇaṃ na kalyāṇaṃ cintayann ubhayos tayoḥ
a yāḥ kāś cij jīvatā śakyāḥ kartum abhyudayakriyāḥ
c sarvās tāḥ samabhityajya nimeṣādivyavasthitaḥ
a teṣu nityam asaktaś ca tyaktasarvendriyakriyaḥ
c suparityaktasaṃkalpaḥ sunirṇiktātmakalmaṣaḥ
a vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgebhyo vyatītaḥ sarvavāgurāḥ
c na vaśe kasya cit tiṣṭhan sadharmā mātariśvanaḥ
a vītarāgaś carann evaṃ tuṣṭiṃ prāpsyāmi śāśvatīm
c tṛṣṇayā hi mahat pāpam ajñānād asmi kāritaḥ
a kuśalākuśalāny eke kṛtvā karmāṇi mānavāḥ
c kāryakāraṇasaṃśliṣṭaṃ svajanaṃ nāma bibhrati
a āyuṣo 'nte prahāyedaṃ kṣīṇaprāyaṃ kalevaram
c pratigṛhṇāti tat pāpaṃ kartuḥ karmaphalaṃ hi tat
a evaṃ saṃsāracakre 'smin vyāviddhe rathacakravat
c sameti bhūtagrāmo 'yaṃ bhūtagrāmeṇa kāryavān
a janmamṛtyujarāvyādhivedanābhir upadrutam
c asāram imam asvantaṃ saṃsāraṃ tyajataḥ sukham
a divaḥ patatsu deveṣu sthānebhyaś ca maharṣiṣu
c ko hi nāma bhavenārthī bhavet kāraṇatattvavit
a kṛtvā hi vividhaṃ karma tat tad vividhalakṣaṇam
c pārthivair nṛpatiḥ svalpaiḥ kāraṇair eva badhyate
a tasmāt prajñāmṛtam idaṃ cirān māṃ pratyupasthitam
c tat prāpya prārthaye sthānam avyayaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam
a etayā satataṃ vṛttyā carann evaṃprakārayā
c dehaṃ saṃsthāpayiṣyāmi nirbhayaṃ mārgam āsthitaḥ
 bhīma uvāca
a śrotriyasyeva te rājan mandakasyāvipaścitaḥ
c anuvākahatābuddhir naiṣā tattvārthadarśinī
a ālasye kṛtacittasya rājadharmānasūyataḥ
c vināśe dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ kiṃ phalaṃ bharatarṣabha
a kṣamānukampā kāruṇyam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ na vidyate
c kṣātram ācarato mārgam api bandhos tvadantare
a yadīmāṃ bhavato buddhiṃ vidyāma vayam īdṛśīm
c śastraṃ naiva grahīṣyāmo na vadhiṣyāma kaṃ cana
a bhaikṣyam evācariṣyāma śarīrasyā vimokṣaṇāt
c na cedaṃ dāruṇaṃ yuddham abhaviṣyan mahīkṣitām
a prāṇasyānnam idaṃ sarvam iti vai kavayo viduḥ
c sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sarvaṃ prāṇasya bhojanam
a ādadānasya ced rājyaṃ ye ke cit paripanthinaḥ
c hantavyās ta iti prājñāḥ kṣatradharmavido viduḥ
a te sadoṣā hatāsmābhī rājyasya paripanthinaḥ
c tān hatvā bhuṅkṣva dharmeṇa yudhiṣṭhira mahīm imām
a yathā hi puruṣaḥ khātvā kūpam aprāpya codakam
c paṅkadigdho nivarteta karmedaṃ nas tathopamam
a yathāruhya mahāvṛkṣam apahṛtya tato madhu
c aprāśya nidhanaṃ gacchet karmedaṃ nas tathopamam
a yathā mahāntam adhvānam āśayā puruṣaḥ patan
c sa nirāśo nivarteta karmedaṃ nas tathopamam
a yathā śatrūn ghātayitvā puruṣaḥ kurusattama
c ātmānaṃ ghātayet paścāt karmedaṃ nas tathāvidham
a yathānnaṃ kṣudhito labdhvā na bhuñjīta yadṛcchayā
c kāmī ca kāminīṃ labdhvā karmedaṃ nas tathāvidham
a vayam evātra garhyā hi ye vayaṃ mandacetasaḥ
c tvāṃ rājann anugacchāmo jyeṣṭho 'yam iti bhārata
a vayaṃ hi bāhubalinaḥ kṛtavidyā manasvinaḥ
c klībasya vākye tiṣṭhāmo yathaivāśaktayas tathā
a agatīn kāgatīn asmān naṣṭārthān arthasiddhaye
c kathaṃ vai nānupaśyeyur janāḥ paśyanti yādṛśam
a āpatkāle hi saṃnyāsaḥ kartavya iti śiṣyate
c jarayābhiparītena śatrubhir vyaṃsitena ca
a tasmād iha kṛtaprajñās tyāgaṃ na paricakṣate
c dharmavyatikramaṃ cedaṃ manyante sūkṣmadarśinaḥ
a kathaṃ tasmāt samutpannas tanniṣṭhas tad upāśrayaḥ
c tad eva nindann āsīta śraddhā vānyatra gṛhyate
a śriyā vihīnair adhanair nāstikaiḥ saṃpravartitam
c vedavādasya vijñānaṃ satyābhāsam ivānṛtam
a śakyaṃ tu mauṇḍyam āsthāya bibhratātmānam ātmanā
c dharmacchadma samāsthāya āsituṃ na tu jīvitum
a śakyaṃ punar araṇyeṣu sukham ekena jīvitum
c abibhratā putrapautrān devarṣīn atithīn pitṝn
a neme mṛgāḥ svargajito na varāhā na pakṣiṇaḥ
c athaitena prakāreṇa puṇyam āhur na tāñ janāḥ
a yadi saṃnyāsataḥ siddhiṃ rājan kaś cid avāpnuyāt
c parvatāś ca drumāś caiva kṣipraṃ siddhim avāpnuyuḥ
a ete hi nityasaṃnyāsā dṛśyante nirupadravāḥ
c aparigrahavantaś ca satataṃ cātmacāriṇaḥ
a atha ced ātmabhāgyeṣu nānyeṣāṃ siddhim aśnute
c tasmāt karmaiva kartavyaṃ nāsti siddhir akarmaṇaḥ
a audakāḥ sṛṣṭayaś caiva jantavaḥ siddhim āpnuyuḥ
c yeṣām ātmaiva bhartavyo nānyaḥ kaś cana vidyate
d te 'pi vai puruṣā loke parvatānām ihopamāḥ
a avekṣasva yathā svaiḥ svaiḥ karmabhir vyāpṛtaṃ jagat
c tasmāt karmaiva kartavyaṃ nāsti siddhir akarmaṇaḥ
 arjuna uvāca
a atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c tāpasaiḥ saha saṃvādaṃ śakrasya bharatarṣabha
a ke cid gṛhān parityajya vanam abhyagaman dvijāḥ
c ajātaśmaśravo mandāḥ kule jātāḥ pravavrajuḥ
a dharmo 'yam iti manvānā brahmacarye vyavasthitāḥ
c tyaktvā gṛhān pitṝṃś caiva tān indro 'nvakṛpāyata
a tān ābabhāṣe bhagavān pakṣī bhūtvā hiraṇmayaḥ
c suduṣkaraṃ manuṣyaiś ca yat kṛtaṃ vighasāśibhiḥ
a puṇyaṃ ca bata karmaiṣāṃ praśastaṃ caiva jīvitam
c saṃsiddhās te gatiṃ mukhyāṃ prāptā dharmaparāyaṇāḥ
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a aho batāyaṃ śakunir vighasāśān praśaṃsati
c asmān nūnam ayaṃ śāsti vayaṃ ca vighasāśinaḥ
 śakunir uvāca
a nāhaṃ yuṣmān praśaṃsāmi paṅkadigdhān rajasvalān
c ucchiṣṭabhojino mandān anye vai vighasāśinaḥ
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a idaṃ śreyaḥ param iti vayam evābhyupāsmahe
c śakune brūhi yac chreyo bhṛśaṃ vai śraddadhāma te
 śakunir uvāca
a yadi māṃ nābhiśaṅkadhvaṃ vibhajyātmānam ātmanā
c tato 'haṃ vaḥ pravakṣyāmi yāthātathyaṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a śṛṇumas te vacas tāta panthāno viditās tava
c niyoge caiva dharmātman sthātum icchāma śādhi naḥ
 śakunir uvāca
a catuṣpadāṃ gauḥ pravarā lohānāṃ kāñcanaṃ varam
c śabdānāṃ pravaro mantro brāhmaṇo dvipadāṃ varaḥ
a mantro 'yaṃ jātakarmādi brāhmaṇasya vidhīyate
c jīvato yo yathākālaṃ śmaśānanidhanād iti
a karmāṇi vaidikāny asya svargyaḥ panthās tv anuttamaḥ
c atha sarvāṇi karmāṇi mantrasiddhāni cakṣate
a āmnāyadṛḍhavādīni tathā siddhir iheṣyate
c māsārdhamāsā ṛtava ādityaśaśitārakam
a īhante sarvabhūtāni tad ṛtaṃ karmasaṅginām
c siddhikṣetram idaṃ puṇyam ayam evāśramo mahān
a atha ye karma nindanto manuṣyāḥ kāpathaṃ gatāḥ
c mūḍhānām arthahīnānāṃ teṣām enas tu vidyate
a devavaṃśān pitṛvaṃśān brahmavaṃśāṃś ca śāśvatān
c saṃtyajya mūḍhā vartante tato yānty aśrutīpatham
a etad vo 'stu tapo yuktaṃ dadānīty ṛṣicoditam
c tasmāt tad adhyavasatas tapasvi tapa ucyate
a devavaṃśān pitṛvaṃśān brahmavaṃśāṃś ca śāśvatān
c saṃvibhajya guroś caryāṃ tad vai duṣkaram ucyate
a devā vai duṣkaraṃ kṛtvā vibhūtiṃ paramāṃ gatāḥ
c tasmād gārhasthyam udvoḍhuṃ duṣkaraṃ prabravīmi vaḥ
a tapaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ prajānāṃ hi mūlam etan na saṃśayaḥ
c kuṭumbavidhinānena yasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
a etad vidus tapo viprā dvaṃdvātītā vimatsarāḥ
c tasmād vanaṃ madhyamaṃ ca lokeṣu tapa ucyate
a durādharṣaṃ padaṃ caiva gacchanti vighasāśinaḥ
c sāyaṃprātar vibhajyānnaṃ svakuṭumbe yathāvidhi
a dattvātithibhyo devebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svajanasya ca
c avaśiṣṭāni ye 'śnanti tān āhur vighasāśinaḥ
a tasmāt svadharmam āsthāya suvratāḥ satyavādinaḥ
c lokasya guravo bhūtvā te bhavanty anupaskṛtāḥ
a tridivaṃ prāpya śakrasya svargaloke vimatsarāḥ
c vasanti śāśvatīr varṣā janā duṣkarakāriṇaḥ
a tatas te tad vacaḥ śrutvā tasya dharmārthasaṃhitam
c utsṛjya nāstikagatiṃ gārhasthyaṃ dharmam āśritāḥ
a tasmāt tvam api durdharṣa dhairyam ālambya śāśvatam
c praśādhi pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ hatāmitrāṃ narottama
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā nakulo vākyam abravīt
c rājānam abhisaṃprekṣya sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ varam
a anurudhya mahāprājño bhrātuś cittam ariṃdamaḥ
c vyūḍhorasko mahābāhus tāmrāsyo mitabhāṣitā
a viśākhayūpe devānāṃ sarveṣām agnayaś citāḥ
c tasmād viddhi mahārāja devān karmapathi sthitān
a anāstikān āstikānāṃ prāṇadāḥ pitaraś ca ye
c te 'pi karmaiva kurvanti vidhiṃ paśyasva pārthiva
e vedavādāpaviddhāṃs tu tān viddhi bhṛśanāstikān
a na hi vedoktam utsṛjya vipraḥ sarveṣu karmasu
c devayānena nākasya pṛṣṭham āpnoti bhārata
a atyāśramān ayaṃ sarvān ity āhur vedaniścayāḥ
c brāhmaṇāḥ śrutisaṃpannās tān nibodha janādhipa
a vittāni dharmalabdhāni kratumukhyeṣv avāsṛjan
c kṛtātmasu mahārāja sa vai tyāgī smṛto naraḥ
a anavekṣya sukhādānaṃ tathaivordhvaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c ātmatyāgī mahārāja sa tyāgī tāmasaḥ prabho
a aniketaḥ paripatan vṛkṣamūlāśrayo muniḥ
c apācakaḥ sadā yogī sa tyāgī pārtha bhikṣukaḥ
a krodhaharṣāv anādṛtya paiśunyaṃ ca viśāṃ pate
c vipro vedān adhīte yaḥ sa tyāgī gurupūjakaḥ
a āśramāṃs tulayā sarvān dhṛtān āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c ekatas te trayo rājan gṛhasthāśrama ekataḥ
a samīkṣate tu yo 'rthaṃ vai kāmaṃ svargaṃ ca bhārata
c ayaṃ panthā maharṣīṇām iyaṃ lokavidāṃ gatiḥ
a iti yaḥ kurute bhāvaṃ sa tyāgī bharatarṣabha
c na yaḥ parityajya gṛhān vanam eti vimūḍhavat
a yadā kāmān samīkṣeta dharmavaitaṃsiko 'nṛjuḥ
c athainaṃ mṛtyupāśena kaṇṭhe badhnāti mṛtyurāṭ
a abhimānakṛtaṃ karma naitat phalavad ucyate
c tyāgayuktaṃ mahārāja sarvam eva mahāphalam
a śamo damas tapo dānaṃ satyaṃ śaucam athārjavam
c yajño dhṛtiś ca dharmaś ca nityam ārṣo vidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
a pitṛdevātithikṛte samārambho 'tra śasyate
c atraiva hi mahārāja trivargaḥ kevalaṃ phalam
a etasmin vartamānasya vidhau vipraniṣevite
c tyāginaḥ prasṛtasyeha nocchittir vidyate kva cit
a asṛjad dhi prajā rājan prajāpatir akalmaṣaḥ
c māṃ yakṣyantīti śāntātmā yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ
a vīrudhaś caiva vṛkṣāṃś ca yajñārthaṃ ca tathauṣadhīḥ
c paśūṃś caiva tathā medhyān yajñārthāni havīṃṣi ca
a gṛhasthāśramiṇas tac ca yajñakarma virodhakam
c tasmād gārhasthyam eveha duṣkaraṃ durlabhaṃ tathā
a tat saṃprāpya gṛhasthā ye paśudhānyasamanvitāḥ
c na yajante mahārāja śāśvataṃ teṣu kilbiṣam
a svādhyāyayajñā ṛṣayo jñānayajñās tathāpare
c athāpare mahāyajñān manasaiva vitanvate
d idam anyan mahārāja vidvadbhiḥ kathitaṃ mama
d bhūmir agniś ca vāyuś ca na cāpo na divākaraḥ
d nakṣatrāṇi na candraś ca na diśaḥ kāla eva ca
d śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca na gandho na rasaḥ kva cit
d na ca santi pramāṇāni yaiḥ prameyaṃ prasādhyate
d pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca nopamānam athāgamaḥ
d nārthāpattir na caitihyaṃ dṛṣṭānto na ca saṃśayaḥ
d na kva cin nirṇayo rājan nādharmo dharma eva ca
d tiryak ca sthāvaraṃ caiva na devā na ca mānuṣāḥ
d varṇāśramavibhāgaś ca na ca kartā na karmakṛt
d na cārthaś ca vibhūtiś ca na cārthasya viceṣṭitam
d tamobhūtam idaṃ sarvam anālokaṃ jagan nṛpa
d na cātmā vidyamāno 'pi manasā yogam ṛcchati
d acetanaṃ manas tv āsīd ātmā eva sacetanaḥ
d īśvaraś cetanas tv ekas tenedaṃ gahanīkṛtam
d mantrāś ca cetanā rājan na ca dehena yojitāḥ
d te ca viśvasṛjo nāma ṛṣayo mantradevatāḥ
d caitanyam īśvarāt prāpya brahmāṇḍaṃ tair vinirmitam
d iṣṭvā viśvasṛjaṃ yajñaṃ nirmitaḥ prapitāmahaḥ
d sṛṣṭis tena samārabdhā prasādād īśvarasya ca
d caitanyam īśvarasyaitad yenedaṃ cetanaṃ jagat
d yogena ca samāviṣṭaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ ca śaṃbhunā
d dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca ukto mokṣaś ca saṃkṣaye
d brahmaṇaḥ parameśasya īśvareṇa yadṛcchayā
d ajño jantur anīśaś ca bhājanaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
d īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhram eva vā
d pradhānaṃ puruṣaṃ caiva ātmānaṃ sarvadehinām
d manasā viṣayaṃ caiva cetanena pracoditāḥ
d sukhaduḥkhena yujyante karmabhiś ca pracoditāḥ
d varṇāśramavibhāgaś ca īśvareṇa pravartitaḥ
d sadevāsuragandharvaṃ tenedaṃ nirmitaṃ jagat
d tvaṃ cānye ca mahārāja īśvarasya vaśe sthitāḥ
d jīvante ca mriyante ca na svatantrāḥ kathaṃ cana
d hitvā hitvā ca bhūtāni hatvā sarvam idaṃ jagat
d yajate karmaṇā devaṃ na sa pāpena lipyate
d hiṃsātmakāni karmāṇi sarveṣāṃ gṛhamedhinām
d devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca te ca yānti parāṃ gatim
d pātitāḥ śatravaḥ pūrvaṃ sarvatra vasudhādhipaiḥ
d prajānāṃ hitakāmaiś ca ātmanaś ca hitaiṣibhiḥ
d yadi tatra bhavet pāpaṃ kathaṃ te svargam āsthitāḥ
d na prāptā narakaṃ rājan veṣṭitāḥ pāpakarmabhiḥ
a evaṃ dānasamādhānaṃ mārgam ātiṣṭhato nṛpa
c dvijāter brahmabhūtasya spṛhayanti divaukasaḥ
a sa ratnāni vicitrāṇi saṃbhṛtāni tatas tataḥ
c makheṣv anabhisaṃtyajya nāstikyam abhijalpasi
e kuṭumbam āsthite tyāgaṃ na paśyāmi narādhipa
a rājasūyāśvamedheṣu sarvamedheṣu vā punaḥ
c ya cānye kratavas tāta brāhmaṇair abhipūjitāḥ
e tair yajasva mahārāja śakro devapatir yathā
a rājñaḥ pramādadoṣeṇa dasyubhiḥ parimuṣyatām
c aśaraṇyaḥ prajānāṃ yaḥ sa rājā kalir ucyate
a aśvān gāś caiva dāsīś ca kareṇūś ca svalaṃkṛtāḥ
c grāmāñ janapadāṃś caiva kṣetrāṇi ca gṛhāṇi ca
a apradāya dvijātibhyo mātsaryāviṣṭacetasaḥ
c vayaṃ te rājakalayo bhaviṣyāmo viśāṃ pate
a adātāro 'śaraṇyāś ca rājakilbiṣabhāginaḥ
c duḥkhānām eva bhoktāro na sukhānāṃ kadā cana
a aniṣṭvā ca mahāyajñair akṛtvā ca pitṛsvadhām
c tīrtheṣv anabhisaṃtyajya pravrajiṣyasi ced atha
a chinnābhram iva gantāsi vilayaṃ māruteritam
c lokayor ubhayor bhraṣṭo hy antarāle vyavasthitaḥ
a antar bahiś ca yat kiṃ cin manovyāsaṅgakārakam
c parityajya bhavet tyāgī na yo hitvā pratiṣṭhate
a etasmin vartamānasya vidhau vipraniṣevite
c brāhmaṇasya mahārāja nocchittir vidyate kva cit
a nihatya śatrūṃs tarasā samṛddhān
śakro yathā daityabalāni saṃkhye
c kaḥ pārtha śocen nirataḥ svadharme
pūrvaiḥ smṛte pārthiva śiṣṭajuṣṭe
d na cāpi śociti hatāḥ svadharme
d pūrvaiḥ kṛte pārthivamukhyamukhyaiḥ
a kṣātreṇa dharmeṇa parākrameṇa
jitvā mahīṃ mantravidbhyaḥ pradāya
c nākasya pṛṣṭhe 'si narendra gantā
na śocitavyaṃ bhavatādya pārtha
 sahadeva uvāca
a na bāhyaṃ dravyam utsṛjya siddhir bhavati bhārata
c śārīraṃ dravyam utsṛjya siddhir bhavati vā na vā
a bāhyadravyavimuktasya śārīreṣu ca gṛdhyataḥ
c yo dharmo yat sukhaṃ vā syād dviṣatāṃ tat tathāstu naḥ
a śārīraṃ dravyam utsṛjya pṛthivīm anuśāsataḥ
c yo dharmo yat sukhaṃ vā syāt suhṛdāṃ tat tathāstu naḥ
a dvyakṣaras tu bhaven mṛtyus tryakṣaraṃ brahma śāśvatam
c mameti ca bhaven mṛtyur na mameti ca śāśvatam
a brahmamṛtyū ca tau rājann ātmany eva samāśritau
c adṛśyamānau bhūtāni yodhayetām asaṃśayam
a avināśo 'sya sattvasya niyato yadi bhārata
c bhittvā śarīraṃ bhūtānāṃ na hiṃsā pratipatsyate
a athāpi ca sahotpattiḥ sattvasya pralayas tathā
c naṣṭe śarīre naṣṭaṃ syād vṛthā ca syāt kriyāpathaḥ
a tasmād ekāntam utsṛjya pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraiś ca yaḥ
c panthā niṣevitaḥ sadbhiḥ sa niṣevyo vijānatā
d svāyaṃbhuvena manunā tathānyaiś cakravartibhiḥ
d yady ayaṃ hy adhamaḥ panthāḥ kasmāt tais tair niṣevitaḥ
d kṛtatretādiyuktāni guṇavanti ca bhārata
d yugāni bahuśas taiś ca bhukteyam avanir nṛpa
a labdhvāpi pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ sahasthāvarajaṅgamām
c na bhuṅkte yo nṛpaḥ samyaṅ niṣphalaṃ tasya jīvitam
a atha vā vasato rājan vane vanyena jīvataḥ
c dravyeṣu yasya mamatā mṛtyor āsye sa vartate
a bāhyābhyantarabhūtānāṃ svabhāvaṃ paśya bhārata
c ye tu paśyanti tadbhāvaṃ mucyante mahato bhayāt
a bhavān pitā bhavān mātā bhavān bhrātā bhavān guruḥ
c duḥkhapralāpān ārtasya tasmān me kṣantum arhasi
a tathyaṃ vā yadi vātathyaṃ yan mayaitat prabhāṣitam
c tad viddhi pṛthivīpāla bhaktyā bharatasattama
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a avyāharati kaunteye dharmarāje yudhiṣṭhire
c bhrātṝṇāṃ bruvatāṃ tāṃs tān vividhān vedaniścayān
a mahābhijanasaṃpannā śrīmaty āyatalocanā
c abhyabhāṣata rājendraṃ draupadī yoṣitāṃ varā
a āsīnam ṛṣabhaṃ rājñāṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ parivāritam
c siṃhaśārdūlasadṛśair vāraṇair iva yūthapam
a abhimānavatī nityaṃ viśeṣeṇa yudhiṣṭhire
c lālitā satataṃ rājñā dharmajñā dharmadarśinī
a āmantrya vipulaśroṇī sāmnā paramavalgunā
c bhartāram abhisaṃprekṣya tato vacanam abravīt
a ime te bhrātaraḥ pārtha śuṣyanta stokakā iva
c vāvāśyamānās tiṣṭhanti na cainān abhinandase
a nandayaitān mahārāja mattān iva mahādvipān
c upapannena vākyena satataṃ duḥkhabhāginaḥ
a kathaṃ dvaitavane rājan pūrvam uktvā tathā vacaḥ
c bhrātṝn etān sma sahitāñ śītavātātapārditān
a vayaṃ duryodhanaṃ hatvā mṛdhe bhokṣyāma medinīm
c saṃpūrṇāṃ sarvakāmānām āhave vijayaiṣiṇaḥ
a virathāṃś ca rathān kṛtvā nihatya ca mahāgajān
c saṃstīrya ca rathair bhūmiṃ sasādibhir ariṃdamāḥ
a yajatāṃ vividhair yajñaiḥ samṛddhair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ
c vanavāsakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhaviṣyati sukhāya naḥ
a ity etān evam uktvā tvaṃ svayaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
c katham adya punar vīra vinihaṃsi manāṃsy uta
a na klībo vasudhāṃ bhuṅkte na klībo dhanam aśnute
c na klībasya gṛhe putrā matsyāḥ paṅka ivāsate
a nādaṇḍaḥ kṣatriyo bhāti nādaṇḍo bhūtim aśnute
c nādaṇḍasya prajā rājñaḥ sukham edhanti bhārata
d sadevāsuragandharvair apsarobhir vibhūṣitam
d rakṣobhir guhyakair nāgair manuṣyaiś ca vibhūṣitam
d trivargeṇa ca saṃpūrṇaṃ trivargasyāgamena ca
d daṇḍenābhyāhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ jagad bhogāya kalpate
d svayaṃbhuvaṃ mahīpāla āgamaṃ śṛṇu śāśvatam
d viprāṇāṃ viditaś cāyaṃ tava caiva viśāṃ pate
d arājake hi loke 'smin sarvato vidrute bhayāt
d rakṣārtham asya lokasya rājānam asṛjat prabhuḥ
d mahākāyaṃ mahāvīryaṃ pālane jagataḥ kṣamam
d anilāgniyamārkāṇām indrasya varuṇasya ca
d candravitteśayoś caiva mātrā nirhṛtya śāśvatīḥ
d yasmād eṣāṃ surendrāṇāṃ saṃbhavaty aṃśato nṛpaḥ
d tasmād abhibhavaty eṣa sarvabhūtāni tejasā
d tapaty ādityavac caiva cakṣūṃṣi ca manāṃsi ca
d na cainaṃ bhuvi śaknoti kaś cid apy abhivīkṣitum
d so 'gnir bhavati vāyuś ca so 'rkaḥ somaś ca dharmarāṭ
d sa kuberaḥ sa varuṇaḥ sa mahendraḥ pratāpavān
d pitāmahasya devasya viṣṇoḥ śarvasya caiva hi
d ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ tasmiṃs tejaḥ pratiṣṭhitam
d bālo 'pi nāvamantavyo manuṣya iti bhūmipaḥ
d mahatī devatā hy eṣā nararūpeṇa tiṣṭhati
d ekam eva dahaty agnir naraṃ durupasarpiṇam
d kulaṃ dahati rājāgniḥ sapaśudravyasaṃcayam
d dhṛtarāṣṭrakulaṃ dagdhaṃ krodhodbhūtena vahninā
d pratyakṣam etal lokasya saṃśayo na hi vidyate
d kulajo vṛttasaṃpanno dhārmikaś ca mahīpatiḥ
d prajānāṃ pālane yuktaḥ pūjyate daivatair api
d kāryaṃ yo 'vekṣya śaktiṃ ca deśakālau ca tattvataḥ
d kurute dharmasiddhyarthaṃ vaiśvarūpyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
d tasya prasāde padmā śrīr vijayaś ca parākrame
d mṛtyuś ca vasati krodhe sarvatejomayo hi saḥ
d taṃ yas tu dveṣṭi saṃmohāt sa vinaśyati mānavaḥ
d tasya hy āśu vināśāya rājāpi kurute manaḥ
d tasmād dharmaṃ yam iṣṭeṣu sa vyavasyati pārthivaḥ
d aniṣṭaṃ cāpy aniṣṭeṣu tad dharmaṃ na vicālayet
d tasyārthe sarvabhūtānāṃ goptāraṃ dharmam ātmajam
d brahmatejomayaṃ daṇḍam asṛjat pūrvam īśvaraḥ
d tasya sarvāṇi bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
d bhayād bhogāya kalpante dharmān na vicalanti ca
d deśakālau ca śaktiṃ ca kāryaṃ cāvekṣya tattvataḥ
d yathārhataḥ saṃpraṇayen nareṣv anyāyavartiṣu
d sa rājā puruṣo daṇḍaḥ sa netā śāsitā ca saḥ
d varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmaprabhur athāvyayaḥ
d daṇḍaḥ śāsti prajāḥ sarvā daṇḍa evābhirakṣati
d daṇḍaḥ supteṣu jāgarti daṇḍaṃ dharmaṃ vidur budhāḥ
d susamīkṣya dhṛto daṇḍaḥ sarvā rañjayati prajāḥ
d asamīkṣya praṇītas tu vināśayati sarvataḥ
d yadi na praṇayed rājā daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣv atandritaḥ
d śūle matsyān ivādhakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥ
d kāko 'dyāc ca puroḍāśaṃ śvā caivāvalihed dhaviḥ
d svāmitvaṃ na kva cic ca syāt prapadyetādharottaram
d sarvo daṇḍajito loko durlabhas tu śucir naraḥ
d daṇḍasya hi bhayāt sarvaṃ jagad bhogāya kalpate
d devadānavagandharvā rakṣāṃsi patagoragāḥ
d te 'pi bhogāya kalpante daṇḍenaivābhipīḍitāḥ
d dūṣyeyuḥ sarvavarṇāś ca bhidyeran sarvasetavaḥ
d sarvalokaprakopaś ca bhaved daṇḍasya vibhramāt
d yatra śyāmo lohitākṣo daṇḍaś carati pāpahā
d prajās tatra na muhyanti netā cet sādhu paśyati
d āhus tasya praṇetāraṃ rājānaṃ satyavādinam
d samīkṣyakāriṇaṃ prājñaṃ dharmakāmārthakovidam
d taṃ rājā praṇayan samyak svargāyābhipravartate
d kāmātmā viṣayī kṣudro daṇḍenaiva nihanyate
d daṇḍo hi sumahātejā durdharaś cākṛtātmabhiḥ
d dharmād vicalitaṃ hanti nṛpam eva sabāndhavam
d tato durgaṃ ca rāṣṭraṃ ca lokaṃ ca sacarācaram
d antarikṣagatāṃś caiva munīn devāṃś ca hiṃsati
d so 'sahāyena mūḍhena lubdhenākṛtabuddhinā
d aśakyo nyāyato netuṃ viṣayāṃś caiva sevatā
d śucinā satyasaṃdhena nītiśāstrānusāriṇā
d daṇḍaḥ praṇetuṃ śakyo hi susahāyena dhīmatā
d svarāṣṭre nyāyavartī syād bhṛśaṃ daṇḍaś ca śatruṣu
d suhṛt svajihmaḥ snigdheṣu brāhmaṇeṣu kṣamānvitaḥ
d evaṃvṛttasya rājñas tu śiloñchenāpi jīvataḥ
d vistīryeta yaśo loke tailabindhur ivāmbhasi
d atas tu viparītasya nṛpater akṛtātmanaḥ
d saṃkṣipyeta yaśo loke ghṛtabindur ivāmbhasi
d devadevena rudreṇa brahmaṇā ca mahīpate
d viṣṇunā caiva devena śakreṇa ca mahātmanā
d lokapālaiś ca bhūtaiś ca pāṇḍavaiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
d dharmād vicalitā rājan dhārtarāṣṭrā nipātitāḥ
d adhārmikā durācārāḥ sasainyā vinipātitāḥ
d tān nihatya na doṣas te svalpo 'pi jagatīpate
d chalena māyayā vātha kṣatradharmeṇa vā nṛpa
a mitratā sarvabhūteṣu dānam adhyayanaṃ tapaḥ
c brāhmaṇasyaiṣa dharmaḥ syān na rājño rājasattama
a asatāṃ pratiṣedhaś ca satāṃ ca paripālanam
c eṣa rājñāṃ paro dharmaḥ samare cāpalāyanam
a yasmin kṣamā ca krodhaś ca dānādāne bhayābhaye
c nigrahānugrahau cobhau sa vai dharmavid ucyate
a na śrutena na dānena na sāntvena na cejyayā
c tvayeyaṃ pṛthivī labdhā notkocena tathāpy uta
a yat tad balam amitrāṇāṃ tathā vīrasamudyatam
c hastyaśvarathasaṃpannaṃ tribhir aṅgair mahattaram
a rakṣitaṃ droṇakarṇābhyām aśvatthāmnā kṛpeṇa ca
c tat tvayā nihataṃ vīra tasmād bhuṅkṣva vasuṃdharām
a jambūdvīpo mahārāja nānājanapadāyutaḥ
c tvayā puruṣaśārdūla daṇḍena mṛditaḥ prabho
a jambūdvīpena sadṛśaḥ krauñcadvīpo narādhipa
c apareṇa mahāmeror daṇḍena mṛditas tvayā
a krauñcadvīpena sadṛśaḥ śākadvīpo narādhipa
c pūrveṇa tu mahāmeror daṇḍena mṛditas tvayā
a uttareṇa mahāmeroḥ śākadvīpena saṃmitaḥ
c bhadrāśvaḥ puruṣavyāghra daṇḍena mṛditas tvayā
a dvīpāś ca sāntaradvīpā nānājanapadālayāḥ
c vigāhya sāgaraṃ vīra daṇḍena mṛditās tvayā
a etāny apratimāni tvaṃ kṛtvā karmāṇi bhārata
c na prīyase mahārāja pūjyamāno dvijātibhiḥ
a sa tvaṃ bhrātṝn imān dṛṣṭvā pratinandasva bhārata
c ṛṣabhān iva saṃmattān gajendrān ūrjitān iva
a amarapratimāḥ sarve śatrusāhāḥ paraṃtapāḥ
c eko 'pi hi sukhāyaiṣāṃ kṣamaḥ syād iti me matiḥ
a kiṃ punaḥ puruṣavyāghrāḥ patayo me nararṣabhāḥ
c samastānīndriyāṇīva śarīrasya viceṣṭane
a anṛtaṃ mābravīc chvaśrūḥ sarvajñā sarvadarśinī
c yudhiṣṭhiras tvāṃ pāñcāli sukhe dhāsyaty anuttame
a hatvā rājasahasrāṇi bahūny āśuparākramaḥ
c tad vyarthaṃ saṃprapaśyāmi mohāt tava janādhipa
a yeṣām unmattako jyeṣṭhaḥ sarve tasyopacāriṇaḥ
c tavonmādena rājendra sonmādāḥ sarvapāṇḍavāḥ
a yadi hi syur anunmattā bhrātaras te janādhipa
c baddhvā tvāṃ nāstikaiḥ sārdhaṃ praśāseyur vasuṃdharām
a kurute mūḍham evaṃ hi yaḥ śreyo nādhigacchati
c dhūpair añjanayogaiś ca nasyakarmabhir eva ca
e bheṣajaiḥ sa cikitsyaḥ syād ya unmārgeṇa gacchati
f unmattir apanetavyā tava rājan yadṛcchayā
a sāhaṃ sarvādhamā loke strīṇāṃ bharatasattama
c tathā vinikṛtāmitrair yāham icchāmi jīvitum
d dhṛtarāṣṭrasutā rājan nityam utpathagāminaḥ
d tādṛśānāṃ vadhe doṣaṃ nāhaṃ paśyāmi karhi cit
d imāṃś cośanasā gītāñ ślokāñ śṛṇu narādhipa
d ātmahantārthahantā ca bandhuhantā viṣapradaḥ
d ātharvaṇena hantā ca yaś ca bhāryāṃ parāmṛśet
d nirdoṣaṃ vadham eteṣāṃ ṣaṇṇām apy ātatāyinām
d brahmā provāca bhagavān bhārgavāya mahātmane
d brahmakṣatraviśāṃ rājan satpathe vartatām api
d prasahyāgāram āgamya hantāraṃ garadaṃ tathā
d abhakṣyāpeyadātāram agnidaṃ ca niśātayet
d mārga eṣa mahīpānāṃ gobrāhmaṇavadheṣu ca
d keśagrahe ca nārīṇām api yudhyet pitāmaham
d brahmāṇaṃ devadeveśaṃ kiṃ punaḥ pāpakāriṇam
d gobrāhmaṇārthe vyasane ca rājñāṃ
d rāṣṭropamarde svaśarīrahetoḥ
d strīṇāṃ ca vikruṣṭarutāni śrutvā
d vipro 'pi yudhyeta mahāprabhāvaḥ
d dharmād vicalitaṃ vipraṃ nihanyād ātatāyinam
d tasyānyatra vadhaṃ vidvān manasāpi na cintayet
d gobrāhmaṇavadhe vṛttaṃ mantratrāṇārtham eva ca
d na hanyāt kṣatriyo vipraṃ svakuṭumbasya cātyaye
d taskareṇa nṛśaṃsena dharmāt pracalitena ca
d kṣatrabandhuḥ paraṃ śaktyā yudhyed vipreṇa saṃyuge
d ātatāyinam āyāntam api vedāntagaṃ raṇe
d jighāṃsantaṃ jighāṃsīyān na tena bhrūṇahā bhavet
d brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyaḥ śūdro vāpy antyajo 'tha vā
d na hanyād brāhmaṇaṃ śāntaṃ tṛṇenāpi kadā cana
d brāhmaṇāyāvaguryeta spṛṣṭe gurutaraṃ bhavet
d varṣāṇāṃ triśataṃ pāpaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ nādhigacchati
d sahasraṃ tv eva varṣāṇi nihatya narake patet
d tasmān naivāpaguryād dhi naiva śastraṃ nipātayet
d śoṇitaṃ yāvataḥ pāṃsūn gṛhṇātīti hi dhāraṇā
d tāvatīḥ sa samāḥ pāpo narake parivartate
d tvagasthibhedaṃ viprasya yaḥ kuryāt kārayeta vā
d brahmahā sa tu vijñeyaḥ prāyaścittī narādhamaḥ
d śrotriyaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ hatvā tathātreyīṃ ca brāhmaṇīm
d caturviṃśativarṣāṇi cared brahmahaṇo vratam
d dviguṇā brahmahatyeyaṃ sarvaiḥ proktā manīṣibhiḥ
d prāyaścittam akurvāṇaṃ kṛtāṅkaṃ vipravāsayet
d brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaṃ śūdraṃ vā ghātayen nṛpaḥ
d brahmaghnaṃ taskaraṃ caiva mā bhūdevaṃ cariṣyati
d chittvā hastau ca pādau nāsikoṣṭhau ca bhūpatiḥ
d brahmaghnaṃ cottamaṃ pāpaṃ netroddhāreṇa yojayet
d śūdrasyaiṣa smṛto daṇḍas tadvad rājanyavaiśyayoḥ
d prāyaścittam akurvāṇaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tu pravāsayet
d kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaśūdrau vā śastreṇaiva tu ghātayet
d brahmaghnān brāhmaṇān rājā kṛtāṅkān vipravāsayet
d vikalendriyāṃs trivarṇāṃś ca caṇḍālaiḥ saha vāsayet
d taiś ca yaḥ saṃpibet kaś cit sa piban brahmahā bhavet
d pretānāṃ na ca deyāni piṇḍadānāni kena cit
d kṛṣṇavarṇā virūpā ca nirṇītā lambamūrdhajā
d dunoty adṛṣṭā kartāraṃ brahmahatyeti tāṃ viduḥ
d brahmaghnena pibantaś ca viprā deśāḥ purāṇi ca
d acirād eva pīḍyante durbhikṣavyādhitaskaraiḥ
d brāhmaṇaṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ viprāṇām ātatāyinam
d kṣatriyaṃ vaiśyaśūdrau ca netroddhāreṇa yojayet
d durbalānāṃ balaṃ rājā balino ye ca sādhavaḥ
d balināṃ durbalānāṃ ca pāpānāṃ mṛtyur iṣyate
d sadoṣam api yo hanyād aśrāvya jagatīpateḥ
d durbalaṃ balavantaṃ vā sa parājayam arhati
d rājājñāṃ prāḍvivākaṃ ca necched yaś cāpi niṣpatet
d sākṣiṇaṃ sādhuvākyaṃ ca jitaṃ tam api nirdiśet
d bandhanān niṣpated yaś ca pratibhūr na dadāti ca
d kulajaś ca dhanāḍhyaś ca sa parājayam arhati
d rājājñayā samāhūto yo na gacchet sabhāṃ naraḥ
d balavantam upāśritya sāyudhaḥ sa parājitaḥ
d taṃ daṇḍena vinirjitya mahāsāhasikaṃ naram
d viyuktadehasarvasvaṃ paralokaṃ visarjayet
d mṛtasyāpi na deyāni piṇḍadānāni kena cit
d dattvā daṇḍaṃ prayaccheta madhyamaṃ pūrvasāhasam
d kulastrīvyabhicāraṃ ca rāṣṭrasya ca vimardanam
d brahmahatyāṃ ca cauryaṃ ca rājadrohaṃ ca pañcamam
d mahānti pātakāny āhur ṛṣayaḥ pātakāni ha
d yuddhād anyatra hiṃsāyāṃ surāpasya ca kīrtane
d mahāntaṃ gurutalpe ca mitradrohe ca pātakam
d na kathaṃ cid upekṣeta mahāsāhasikaṃ naram
d sarvasvam apahṛtyāśu tataḥ prāṇair viyojayet
d triṣu varṇeṣu yo daṇḍaḥ praṇīto brahmaṇā purā
d mahāsāhasikaṃ vipraṃ kṛtāṅkaṃ vipravāsayet
d sāhasro vā bhaved daṇḍaḥ kāñcano dehaniṣkrayaḥ
d caturṇām eva varṇānām evam āhośanāḥ kaviḥ
d nārīṇāṃ bālavṛddhānāṃ goḥ pāte ca mahāmatiḥ
d pāpānāṃ durvinītānāṃ prāṇāntaṃ ca bṛhaspatiḥ
d daṇḍam āha mahābhāga sarveṣāṃ cātatāyinām
d sarveṣāṃ pāpabuddhīnāṃ pāpaṃ karmeha kurvatām
d dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāṇāṃ daṇḍo nirdoṣa iṣyate
d saubalasya ca durbuddheḥ karṇasya ca durātmanaḥ
d paśyatāṃ caiva śūrāṇāṃ yāhaṃ dyūte sabhāṃ tadā
d rajasvalā samānītā bhavatāṃ paśyatāṃ nṛpa
d vāsasaikena saṃvītā bhavaddoṣeṇa bhūpate
d mā bhūd dharmavilopas te dhṛtarāṣṭrakulakṣayāt
d krodhāgninā tu dagdhaṃ ca sapaśudravyasaṃcayam
d sāham evaṃvidhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃprāptā tava hetunā
d ādityasya prasādena na ca prāṇair viyojitā
d rakṣitā devadevena jagataḥ kālahetunā
d divākareṇa devena vivastrā na kṛtā tadā
a eteṣāṃ yatamānānām utpadyante tu saṃpadaḥ
c tvaṃ tu sarvāṃ mahīṃ labdhvā kuruṣe svayam āpadam
a yathāstāṃ saṃmatau rājñāṃ pṛthivyāṃ rājasattamau
c māndhātā cāmbarīṣaś ca tathā rājan virājase
a praśādhi pṛthivīṃ devīṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
c saparvatavanadvīpāṃ mā rājan vimanā bhava
a yajasva vividhair yajñair juhvann agnīn prayaccha ca
c purāṇi bhogān vāsāṃsi dvijātibhyo nṛpottama
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a yājñasenyā vacaḥ śrutvā punar evārjuno 'bravīt
c anumānya mahābāhuṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram īśvaram
a daṇḍaḥ śāsti prajāḥ sarvā daṇḍa evābhirakṣati
c daṇḍaḥ supteṣu jāgarti daṇḍaṃ dharmaṃ vidur budhāḥ
a dharmaṃ saṃrakṣate daṇḍas tathaivārthaṃ narādhipa
c kāmaṃ saṃrakṣate daṇḍas trivargo daṇḍa ucyate
a daṇḍena rakṣyate dhānyaṃ dhanaṃ daṇḍena rakṣyate
c etad vidvann upādatsva svabhāvaṃ paśya laukikam
a rājadaṇḍabhayād eke pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvate
c yamadaṇḍabhayād eke paralokabhayād api
a parasparabhayād eke pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvate
c evaṃ sāṃsiddhike loke sarvaṃ daṇḍe pratiṣṭhitam
a daṇḍasyaiva bhayād eke na khādanti parasparam
c andhe tamasi majjeyur yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
a yasmād adāntān damayaty aśiṣṭān daṇḍayaty api
c damanād daṇḍanāc caiva tasmād daṇḍaṃ vidur budhāḥ
d paralokabhayād ete pāpāḥ pāpaṃ na kurvate
a vāci daṇḍo brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ bhujārpaṇam
c dānadaṇḍaḥ smṛto vaiśyo nirdaṇḍaḥ śūdra ucyate
a asaṃmohāya martyānām arthasaṃrakṣaṇāya ca
c maryādā sthāpitā loke daṇḍasaṃjñā viśāṃ pate
a yatra śyāmo lohitākṣo daṇḍaś carati sūnṛtaḥ
c prajās tatra na muhyanti netā cet sādhu paśyati
a brahmacārī gṛhasthaś ca vānaprastho 'tha bhikṣukaḥ
c daṇḍasyaiva bhayād ete manuṣyā vartmani sthitāḥ
a nābhīto yajate rājan nābhīto dātum icchati
c nābhītaḥ puruṣaḥ kaś cit samaye sthātum icchati
a nācchittvā paramarmāṇi nākṛtvā karma dāruṇam
c nāhatvā matsyaghātīva prāpnoti mahatīṃ śriyam
a nāghnataḥ kīrtir astīha na vittaṃ na punaḥ prajāḥ
c indro vṛtravadhenaiva mahendraḥ samapadyata
d māhendraṃ ca grahaṃ lebhe lokānāṃ ceśvaro 'bhavat
a ya eva devā hantāras tāṃl loko 'rcayate bhṛśam
c hantā rudras tathā skandaḥ śakro 'gnir varuṇo yamaḥ
a hantā kālas tathā vāyur mṛtyur vaiśravaṇo raviḥ
c vasavo marutaḥ sādhyā viśvedevāś ca bhārata
a etān devān namasyanti pratāpapraṇatā janāḥ
c na brahmāṇaṃ na dhātāraṃ na pūṣāṇaṃ kathaṃ cana
a madhyasthān sarvabhūteṣu dāntāñ śamaparāyaṇān
c yajante mānavāḥ ke cit praśāntāḥ sarvakarmasu
a na hi paśyāmi jīvantaṃ loke kaṃ cid ahiṃsayā
c sattvaiḥ sattvāni jīvanti durbalair balavattarāḥ
a nakulo mūṣakān atti biḍālo nakulaṃ tathā
c biḍālam atti śvā rājañ śvānaṃ vyālamṛgas tathā
a tān atti puruṣaḥ sarvān paśya dharmo yathāgataḥ
c prāṇasyānnam idaṃ sarvaṃ jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ ca yat
a vidhānaṃ devavihitaṃ tatra vidvān na muhyati
c yathā sṛṣṭo 'si rājendra tathā bhavitum arhasi
a vinītakrodhaharṣā hi mandā vanam upāśritāḥ
c vinā vadhaṃ na kurvanti tāpasāḥ prāṇayāpanam
a udake bahavaḥ prāṇāḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca phaleṣu ca
c na ca kaś cin na tān hanti kim anyat prāṇayāpanāt
a sūkṣmayonīni bhūtāni tarkagamyāni kāni cit
c pakṣmaṇo 'pi nipātena yeṣāṃ syāt skandhaparyayaḥ
a grāmān niṣkramya munayo vigatakrodhamatsarāḥ
c vane kuṭumbadharmāṇo dṛśyante parimohitāḥ
a bhūmiṃ bhittvauṣadhīś chittvā vṛkṣādīn aṇḍajān paśūn
c manuṣyās tanvate yajñāṃs te svargaṃ prāpnuvanti ca
a daṇḍanītyāṃ praṇītāyāṃ sarve sidhyanty upakramāḥ
c kaunteya sarvabhūtānāṃ tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
a daṇḍaś cen na bhavel loke vyanaśiṣyann imāḥ prajāḥ
c śūle matsyān ivāpakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥ
a satyaṃ cedaṃ brahmaṇā pūrvam uktaṃ
daṇḍaḥ prajā rakṣati sādhu nītaḥ
c paśyāgnayaś ca pratiśāmyanty abhītāḥ
saṃtarjitā daṇḍabhayāj jvalanti
d yadi na praṇayed rājan daṇḍaṃ daṇḍyeṣv atandritaḥ
a andhaṃ tama ivedaṃ syān na prajñāyeta kiṃ cana
c daṇḍaś cen na bhavel loke vibhajan sādhvasādhunī
a ye 'pi saṃbhinnamaryādā nāstikā vedanindakāḥ
c te 'pi bhogāya kalpante daṇḍenopanipīḍitāḥ
a sarvo daṇḍajito loko durlabho hi śucir naraḥ
c daṇḍasya hi bhayād bhīto bhogāyeha prakalpate
a cāturvarṇyāpramohāya sunītanayanāya ca
c daṇḍo vidhātrā vihito dharmārthāv abhirakṣitum
a yadi daṇḍān na bibhyeyur vayāṃsi śvāpadāni ca
c adyuḥ paśūn manuṣyāṃś ca yajñārthāni havīṃṣi ca
a na brahmacāry adhīyīta kalyāṇī gaur na duhyate
c na kanyodvahanaṃ gacched yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
a viśvalopaḥ pravarteta bhidyeran sarvasetavaḥ
c mamatvaṃ na prajānīyur yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
a na saṃvatsarasatrāṇi tiṣṭheyur akutobhayāḥ
c vidhivad dakṣiṇāvanti yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
a careyur nāśrame dharmaṃ yathoktaṃ vidhim āśritāḥ
c na vidyāṃ prāpnuyāt kaś cid yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
a na coṣṭrā na balīvardā nāśvāśvataragardabhāḥ
c yuktā vaheyur yānāni yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
a na preṣyā vacanaṃ kuryur na bālo jātu karhi cit
c tiṣṭhet pitṛmate dharme yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
a daṇḍe sthitāḥ prajāḥ sarvā bhayaṃ daṇḍaṃ vidur budhāḥ
c daṇḍe svargo manuṣyāṇāṃ loko 'yaṃ ca pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a na tatra kūṭaṃ pāpaṃ vā vañcanā vāpi dṛṣyate
c yatra daṇḍaḥ suvihitaś caraty arivināśanaḥ
a haviḥ śvā prapibed dhṛṣṭo daṇḍaś cen nodyato bhavet
c haret kākaḥ puroḍāśaṃ yadi daṇḍo na pālayet
a yad idaṃ dharmato rājyaṃ vihitaṃ yady adharmataḥ
c kāryas tatra na śoko vai bhuṅkṣva bhogān yajasva ca
a sukhena dharmaṃ śrīmantaś caranti śucivāsasaḥ
c saṃvasantaḥ priyair dārair bhuñjānāś cānnam uttamam
a arthe sarve samārambhāḥ samāyattā na saṃśayaḥ
c sa ca daṇḍe samāyattaḥ paśya daṇḍasya gauravam
a lokayātrārtham eveha dharmapravacanaṃ kṛtam
c ahiṃsā sādhuhiṃseti śreyān dharmaparigrahaḥ
a nātyantaguṇavān kaś cin na cāpy atyantanirguṇaḥ
c ubhayaṃ sarvakāryeṣu dṛśyate sādhv asādhu ca
a paśūnāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ chittvā tato bhindanti nastakān
c kṛṣanti bahavo bhārān badhnanti damayanti ca
a evaṃ paryākule loke vipathe jarjarīkṛte
c tais tair nyāyair mahārāja purāṇaṃ dharmam ācara
a yaja dehi prajā rakṣa dharmaṃ samanupālaya
c amitrāñ jahi kaunteya mitrāṇi paripālaya
a mā ca te nighnataḥ śatrūn manyur bhavatu bhārata
c na tatra kilbiṣaṃ kiṃ cit kartur bhavati bhārata
a ātatāyī hi yo hanyād ātatāyinam āgatam
c na tena bhrūṇahā sa syān manyus taṃ manyum ṛcchati
a avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānām antarātmā na saṃśayaḥ
c avadhye cātmani kathaṃ vadhyo bhavati kena cit
a yathā hi puruṣaḥ śālāṃ punaḥ saṃpraviśen navām
c evaṃ jīvaḥ śarīrāṇi tāni tāni prapadyate
a dehān purāṇān utsṛjya navān saṃpratipadyate
c evaṃ mṛtyumukhaṃ prāhur ye janās tattvadarśinaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a arjunasya vacaḥ śrutvā bhīmaseno 'tyamarṣaṇaḥ
c dhairyam āsthāya tejasvī jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram abravīt
a rājan viditadharmo 'si na te 'sty aviditaṃ bhuvi
c upaśikṣāma te vṛttaṃ sadaiva na ca śaknumaḥ
a na vakṣyāmi na vakṣyāmīty evaṃ me manasi sthitam
c atiduḥkhāt tu vakṣyāmi tan nibodha janādhipa
a bhavatas tu pramohena sarvaṃ saṃśayitaṃ kṛtam
c viklavatvaṃ ca naḥ prāptam abalatvaṃ tathaiva ca
a kathaṃ hi rājā lokasya sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ
c moham āpadyate dainyād yathā kupuruṣas tathā
a āgatiś ca gatiś caiva lokasya viditā tava
c āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca na te 'sty aviditaṃ prabho
a evaṃ gate mahārāja rājyaṃ prati janādhipa
c hetum atra pravakṣyāmi tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
a dvividho jāyate vyādhiḥ śārīro mānasas tathā
c parasparaṃ tayor janma nirdvaṃdvaṃ nopalabhyate
a śārīrāj jāyate vyādhir mānaso nātra saṃśayaḥ
c mānasāj jāyate vyādhiḥ śārīra iti niścayaḥ
a śārīramānase duḥkhe yo 'tīte anuśocati
c duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ dvāv anarthau prapadyate
a śītoṣṇe caiva vāyuś ca trayaḥ śārīrajā guṇāḥ
c teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sāmyaṃ ca tad āhuḥ svasthalakṣaṇam
a teṣām anyatamotseke vidhānam upadiṣyate
c uṣṇena bādhyate śītaṃ śītenoṣṇaṃ prabādhyate
d ubhābhyāṃ vadhyate vāyur vidhānam idam ucyate
a sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva mānasāḥ syus trayo guṇāḥ
b rajasā śāmyate sattvaṃ rajaḥ sattvena śāmyati
c harṣeṇa bādhyate śoko harṣaḥ śokena bādhyate
a kaś cit sukhe vartamāno duḥkhasya smartum icchati
c kaś cid duḥkhe vartamānaḥ sukhasya smartum icchati
a sa tvaṃ na duḥkhī duḥkhasya na sukhī ca sukhasya ca
c na duḥkhī sukhajātasya na sukhī duḥkhajasya vā
a smartum arhasi kauravya diṣṭaṃ tu balavattaram
c atha vā te svabhāvo 'yaṃ yena pārthiva kṛṣyase
a dṛṣṭvā sabhāgatāṃ kṛṣṇām ekavastrāṃ rajasvalām
c miṣatāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ na tasya smartum arhasi
a pravrājanaṃ ca nagarād ajinaiś ca nivāsanam
c mahāraṇyanivāsaś ca na tasya smartum arhasi
a jaṭāsurāt parikleśaṃ citrasenena cāhavam
c saindhavāc ca parikleśaṃ kathaṃ vismṛtavān asi
e punar ajñātacaryāyāṃ kīcakena padā vadham
f draupadyā rājaputryāś ca kathaṃ vismṛtavān asi
f balavanto vayaṃ rājan devair api sudurjayāḥ
f kathaṃ bhṛtyatvam āpannā virāṭanagare smara
a yac ca te droṇabhīṣmābhyāṃ yuddham āsīd ariṃdama
c manasaikena te yuddham idaṃ ghoram upasthitam
a yatra nāsti śaraiḥ kāryaṃ na mitrair na ca bandhubhiḥ
c ātmanaikena yoddhavyaṃ tat te yuddham upasthitam
a tasminn anirjite yuddhe prāṇān yadi ha mokṣyase
c anyaṃ dehaṃ samāsthāya punas tenaiva yotsyase
d yo hy anāḍhyaḥ sa patitas tad ucchiṣṭaṃ yad alpakam
d bahv apathyaṃ balavato na kiṃ cit trāyate dhanam
a tasmād adyaiva gantavyaṃ yuddhasya bharatarṣabha
b pāram avyaktarūpasya vyaktaṃ tyaktvā svakarmabhiḥ
b tasminn anirjite yuddhe kām avasthāṃ gamiṣyasi
c etaj jitvā mahārāja kṛtakṛtyo bhaviṣyasi
a etāṃ buddhiṃ viniścitya bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
c pitṛpaitāmahe vṛtte śādhi rājyaṃ yathocitam
a diṣṭyā duryodhanaḥ pāpo nihataḥ sānugo yudhi
c draupadyāḥ keśapakṣasya diṣṭyā tvaṃ padavīṃ gataḥ
a yajasva vājimedhena vidhivad dakṣiṇāvatā
c vayaṃ te kiṃkarāḥ pārtha vāsudevaś ca vīryavān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a asaṃtoṣaḥ pramādaś ca mado rāgo 'praśāntatā
c balaṃ moho 'bhimānaś ca udvegaś cāpi sarvaśaḥ
a ebhiḥ pāpmabhir āviṣṭo rājyaṃ tvam abhikāṅkṣasi
c nirāmiṣo vinirmuktaḥ praśāntaḥ susukhī bhava
a ya imām akhilāṃ bhūmiṃ śiṣyād eko mahīpatiḥ
c tasyāpy udaram evaikaṃ kim idaṃ tvaṃ praśaṃsasi
a nāhnā pūrayituṃ śakyā na māsena nararṣabha
c apūryāṃ pūrayann icchām āyuṣāpi na śaknuyāt
a yatheddhaḥ prajvalaty agnir asamiddhaḥ praśāmyati
c alpāhāratayā tv agniṃ śamayaudaryam utthitam
d ātmodarakṛte 'thājñaḥ karoti vighasaṃ bahu
e jayodaraṃ pṛthivyā te śreyo nirjitayā jitam
a mānuṣān kāmabhogāṃs tvam aiśvaryaṃ ca praśaṃsasi
c abhogino 'balāś caiva yānti sthānam anuttamam
a yogakṣemau ca rāṣṭrasya dharmādharmau tvayi sthitau
c mucyasva mahato bhārāt tyāgam evābhisaṃśraya
a ekodarakṛte vyāghraḥ karoti vighasaṃ bahu
c tam anye 'py upajīvanti mandavegaṃcarā mṛgāḥ
a viṣayān pratisaṃhṛtya saṃnyāsaṃ kurute yatiḥ
c na ca tuṣyanti rājānaḥ paśya buddhyantaraṃ yathā
a patrāhārair aśmakuṭṭair dantolūkhalikais tathā
c abbhakṣair vāyubhakṣaiś ca tair ayaṃ narako jitaḥ
a yaś cemāṃ vasudhāṃ kṛtsnāṃ praśāsed akhilāṃ nṛpaḥ
c tulyāśmakāñcano yaś ca sa kṛtārtho na pārthivaḥ
a saṃkalpeṣu nirārambho nirāśo nirmamo bhava
c viśokaṃ sthānam ātiṣṭha iha cāmutra cāvyayam
a nirāmiṣā na śocanti śocasi tvaṃ kim āmiṣam
c parityajyāmiṣaṃ sarvaṃ mṛṣāvādāt pramokṣyase
a panthānau pitṛyānaś ca devayānaś ca viśrutau
c ījānāḥ pitṛyānena devayānena mokṣiṇaḥ
a tapasā brahmacaryeṇa svādhyāyena ca pāvitāḥ
c vimucya dehān vai bhānti mṛtyor aviṣayaṃ gatāḥ
a āmiṣaṃ bandhanaṃ loke karmehoktaṃ tathāmiṣam
c tābhyāṃ vimuktaḥ pāśābhyāṃ padam āpnoti tatparam
a api gāthām imāṃ gītāṃ janakena vadanty uta
c nirdvaṃdvena vimuktena mokṣaṃ samanupaśyatā
a anantaṃ bata me vittaṃ yasya me nāsti kiṃ cana
c mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃ cana
a prajñāprāsādam āruhya naśocyāñ śocato janān
c jagatīsthān ivādristho mandabuddhīn avekṣate
a dṛśyaṃ paśyati yaḥ paśyan sa cakṣuṣmān sa buddhimān
c ajñātānāṃ ca vijñānāt saṃbodhād buddhir ucyate
a yas tu vācaṃ vijānāti bahumānam iyāt sa vai
c brahmabhāvaprasūtānāṃ vaidyānāṃ bhāvitātmanām
a yadā bhūtapṛthagbhāvam ekastham anupaśyati
c tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a te janās tāṃ gatiṃ yānti nāvidvāṃso 'lpacetasaḥ
c nābuddhayo nātapasaḥ sarvaṃ buddhau pratiṣṭhitam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tūṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ tu rājānaṃ punar evārjuno 'bravīt
c saṃtaptaḥ śokaduḥkhābhyāṃ rājño vākśalyapīḍitaḥ
a kathayanti purāvṛttam itihāsam imaṃ janāḥ
c videharājñaḥ saṃvādaṃ bhāryayā saha bhārata
a utsṛjya rājyaṃ bhaikṣārthaṃ kṛtabuddhiṃ janeśvaram
c videharājaṃ mahiṣī duḥkhitā pratyabhāṣata
a dhanāny apatyaṃ mitrāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca
c panthānaṃ pāvanaṃ hitvā janako mauṇḍyam āsthitaḥ
a taṃ dadarśa priyā bhāryā bhaikṣyavṛttim akiṃcanam
c dhānāmuṣṭim upāsīnaṃ nirīhaṃ gatamatsaram
a tam uvāca samāgamya bhartāram akutobhayam
c kruddhā manasvinī bhāryā vivikte hetumad vacaḥ
a katham utsṛjya rājyaṃ svaṃ dhanadhānyasamācitam
c kāpālīṃ vṛttim āsthāya dhānāmuṣṭir vane 'caraḥ
a pratijñā te 'nyathā rājan viceṣṭā cānyathā tava
c yad rājyaṃ mahad utsṛjya svalpe tuṣyasi pārthiva
a naitenātithayo rājan devarṣipitaras tathā
c śakyam adya tvayā bhartuṃ moghas te 'yaṃ pariśramaḥ
a devatātithibhiś caiva pitṛbhiś caiva pārthiva
c sarvair etaiḥ parityaktaḥ parivrajasi niṣkriyaḥ
a yas tvaṃ traividyavṛddhānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ sahasraśaḥ
c bhartā bhūtvā ca lokasya so 'dyānyair bhṛtim icchasi
a śriyaṃ hitvā pradīptāṃ tvaṃ śvavat saṃprati vīkṣyase
c aputrā jananī te 'dya kausalyā cāpatis tvayā
a aśītir dharmakāmās tvāṃ kṣatriyāḥ paryupāsate
c tvadāśām abhikāṅkṣantyaḥ kṛpaṇāḥ phalahetukāḥ
a tāś ca tvaṃ viphalāḥ kurvan kāṃl lokān nu gamiṣyasi
c rājan saṃśayite mokṣe paratantreṣu dehiṣu
a naiva te 'sti paro loko nāparaḥ pāpakarmaṇaḥ
c dharmyān dārān parityajya yas tvam icchasi jīvitum
a srajo gandhān alaṃkārān vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca
c kimartham abhisaṃtyajya parivrajasi niṣkriyaḥ
a nipānaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ bhūtvā tvaṃ pāvanaṃ mahat
c āḍhyo vanaspatir bhūtvā so 'dyānyān paryupāsase
a khādanti hastinaṃ nyāse kravyādā bahavo 'py uta
c bahavaḥ kṛmayaś caiva kiṃ punas tvām anarthakam
a ya imāṃ kuṇḍikāṃ bhindyāt triviṣṭabdhaṃ ca te haret
c vāsaś cāpaharet tasmin kathaṃ te mānasaṃ bhavet
a yas tv ayaṃ sarvam utsṛjya dhānāmuṣṭiparigrahaḥ
c yadānena samaṃ sarvaṃ kim idaṃ mama dīyate
e dhānāmuṣṭir ihārthaś cet pratijñā te vinaśyati
a kā vāhaṃ tava ko me tvaṃ ko 'dya te mayy anugrahaḥ
c praśādhi pṛthivīṃ rājan yatra te 'nugraho bhavet
e prāsādaṃ śayanaṃ yānaṃ vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
a śriyā nirāśair adhanais tyaktamitrair akiṃcanaiḥ
c saukhikaiḥ saṃbhṛtān arthān yaḥ saṃtyajasi kiṃ nu tat
a yo 'tyantaṃ pratigṛhṇīyād yaś ca dadyāt sadaiva hi
c tayos tvam antaraṃ viddhi śreyāṃs tābhyāṃ ka ucyate
a sadaiva yācamāneṣu satsu dambhavivarjiṣu
c eteṣu dakṣiṇā dattā dāvāgnāv iva durhutam
a jātavedā yathā rājann ādagdhvaivopaśāmyati
c sadaiva yācamāno vai tathā śāmyati na dvijaḥ
a satāṃ ca vedā annaṃ ca loke 'smin prakṛtir dhruvā
c na ced dātā bhaved dātā kutaḥ syur mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
a annād gṛhasthā loke 'smin bhikṣavas tata eva ca
c annāt prāṇaḥ prabhavati annadaḥ prāṇado bhavet
a gṛhasthebhyo 'bhinirvṛttā gṛhasthān eva saṃśritāḥ
c prabhavaṃ ca pratiṣṭhāṃ ca dāntā nindanta āsate
a tyāgān na bhikṣukaṃ vidyān na mauṇḍyān na ca yācanāt
c ṛjus tu yo 'rthaṃ tyajati taṃ sukhaṃ viddhi bhikṣukam
a asaktaḥ saktavad gacchan niḥsaṅgo muktabandhanaḥ
c samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca sa vai mukto mahīpate
a parivrajanti dānārthaṃ muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyavāsasaḥ
c sitā bahuvidhaiḥ pāśaiḥ saṃcinvanto vṛthāmiṣam
a trayīṃ ca nāma vārtāṃ ca tyaktvā putrāṃs tyajanti ye
c triviṣṭabdhaṃ ca vāsaś ca pratigṛhṇanty abuddhayaḥ
a aniṣkaṣāye kāṣāyam īhārtham iti viddhi tat
c dharmadhvajānāṃ muṇḍānāṃ vṛttyartham iti me matiḥ
a kāṣāyair ajinaiś cīrair nagnān muṇḍāñ jaṭādharān
c bibhrat sādhūn mahārāja jaya lokāñ jitendriyaḥ
a agnyādheyāni gurvarthān kratūn sapaśudakṣiṇān
c dadāty aharahaḥ pūrvaṃ ko nu dharmataras tataḥ
a tattvajño janako rājā loke 'sminn iti gīyate
c so 'py āsīn mohasaṃpanno mā mohavaśam anvagāḥ
a evaṃ dharmam anukrāntaṃ sadā dānaparair naraiḥ
c ānṛśaṃsyaguṇopetaiḥ kāmakrodhavivarjitāḥ
a pālayantaḥ prajāś caiva dānam uttamam āsthitāḥ
c iṣṭāṃl lokān avāpsyāmo brahmaṇyāḥ satyavādinaḥ
c   guruvṛddhopacāyinaḥ
c devatātithibhṛtyānāṃ nirvapanto yathāvidhi
c sthānam iṣṭam avāpsyāmo
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a vedāhaṃ tāta śāstrāṇi aparāṇi parāṇi ca
c ubhayaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca
a ākulāni ca śāstrāṇi hetubhiś citritāni ca
c niścayaś caiva yanmātro vedāhaṃ taṃ yathāvidhi
a tvaṃ tu kevalam astrajño vīravratam anuṣṭhitaḥ
c śāstrārthaṃ tattvato gantuṃ na samarthaḥ kathaṃ cana
a śāstrārthasūkṣmadarśī yo dharmaniścayakovidaḥ
c tenāpy evaṃ na vācyo 'haṃ yadi dharmaṃ prapaśyasi
a bhrātṛsauhṛdam āsthāya yad uktaṃ vacanaṃ tvayā
c nyāyyaṃ yuktaṃ ca kaunteya prīto 'haṃ tena te 'rjuna
d mameśvarasamaṃ sattvaṃ brahmaṇā caiva yat samam
d vāsudevasamaṃ caiva na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
d tathā tvaṃ yaudhamukhyeṣu sattvaṃ paramam ucyate
d balam indre ca vāyau ca balaṃ yac ca janārdane
d tad balaṃ bhīmasene ca tvayi cārjuna vidyate
d tvatsamaś citrayodhī ca dūrapātī ca pāṇḍava
d divyāstreṇa ca saṃpannaḥ ko vānyas tvatsamo naraḥ
a yuddhadharmeṣu sarveṣu kriyāṇāṃ naipuṇeṣu ca
c na tvayā sadṛśaḥ kaś cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
d dhārmikaṃ dharmayuktaṃ ca niḥśeṣaṃ jñāyate mayā
a dharmasūkṣmaṃ tu yad vākyaṃ tatra duṣprataraṃ tvayā
c dhanaṃjaya na me buddhim abhiśaṅkitum arhasi
a yuddhaśāstravid eva tvaṃ na vṛddhāḥ sevitās tvayā
c samāsavistaravidāṃ na teṣāṃ vetsi niścayam
a tapas tyāgo vidhir iti niścayas tāta dhīmatām
c paraṃ paraṃ jyāya eṣāṃ saiṣā naiḥśreyasī gatiḥ
a na tv etan manyase pārtha na jyāyo 'sti dhanād iti
c atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā naitat pradhānataḥ
a tapaḥsvādhyāyaśīlā hi dṛśyante dhārmikā janāḥ
c ṛṣayas tapasā yuktā yeṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
a ajātaśmaśravo dhīrās tathānye vanavāsinaḥ
c anantā adhanā eva svādhyāyena divaṃ gatāḥ
a uttareṇa tu panthānam āryā viṣayanigrahāt
c abuddhijaṃ tamas tyaktvā lokāṃs tyāgavatāṃ gatāḥ
a dakṣiṇena tu panthānaṃ yaṃ bhāsvantaṃ prapaśyasi
c ete kriyāvatāṃ lokā ye śmaśānāni bhejire
a anirdeśyā gatiḥ sā tu yāṃ prapaśyanti mokṣiṇaḥ
c tasmāt tyāgaḥ pradhāneṣṭaḥ sa tu duḥkhaḥ praveditum
a anusṛtya tu śāstrāṇi kavayaḥ samavasthitāḥ
c apīha syād apīha syāt sārāsāradidṛkṣayā
a vedavādān atikramya śāstrāṇy āraṇyakāni ca
c vipāṭya kadalīskandhaṃ sāraṃ dadṛśire na te
a athaikāntavyudāsena śarīre pañcabhautike
c icchādveṣasamāyuktam ātmānaṃ prāhur iṅgitaiḥ
a agrāhyaś cakṣuṣā so 'pi anirdeśyaṃ ca tad girā
c karmahetupuraskāraṃ bhūteṣu parivartate
a kalyāṇagocaraṃ kṛtvā manas tṛṣṇāṃ nigṛhya ca
c karmasaṃtatim utsṛjya syān nirālambanaḥ sukhī
a asminn evaṃ sūkṣmagamye mārge sadbhir niṣevite
c katham artham anarthāḍhyam arjuna tvaṃ praśaṃsasi
a pūrvaśāstravido hy evaṃ janāḥ paśyanti bhārata
c kriyāsu niratā nityaṃ dāne yajñe ca karmaṇi
a bhavanti sudurāvartā hetumanto 'pi paṇḍitāḥ
c dṛḍhapūrvaśrutā mūḍhā naitad astīti vādinaḥ
a amṛtasyāvamantāro vaktāro janasaṃsadi
c caranti vasudhāṃ kṛtsnāṃ vāvadūkā bahuśrutāḥ
a yān vayaṃ nābhijānīmaḥ kas tāñ jñātum ihārhati
c evaṃ prājñān sataś cāpi mahataḥ śāstravittamān
a tapasā mahad āpnoti buddhyā vai vindate mahat
c tyāgena sukham āpnoti sadā kaunteya dharmavit
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tasmin vākyāntare vaktā devasthāno mahātapāḥ
c abhinītataraṃ vākyam ity uvāca yudhiṣṭhiram
a yad vacaḥ phalgunenoktaṃ na jyāyo 'sti dhanād iti
c atra te vartayiṣyāmi tad ekāgramanāḥ śṛṇu
a ajātaśatro dharmeṇa kṛtsnā te vasudhā jitā
c tāṃ jitvā na vṛthā rājaṃs tvaṃ parityaktum arhasi
a catuṣpadī hi niḥśreṇī karmaṇy eṣā pratiṣṭhitā
c tāṃ krameṇa mahābāho yathāvaj jaya pārthiva
a tasmāt pārtha mahāyajñair yajasva bahudakṣiṇaiḥ
c svādhyāyayajñā ṛṣayo jñānayajñās tathāpare
a karmaniṣṭhāṃs tu budhyethās taponiṣṭhāṃś ca bhārata
c vaikhānasānāṃ rājendra vacanaṃ śrūyate yathā
a īhate dhanahetor yas tasyānīhā garīyasī
c bhūyān doṣaḥ pravardheta yas taṃ dhanam apāśrayet
a kṛcchrāc ca dravyasaṃhāraṃ kurvanti dhanakāraṇāt
c dhanena tṛṣito 'buddhyā bhrūṇahatyāṃ na budhyate
a anarhate yad dadāti na dadāti yad arhate
c anarhārhāparijñānād dānadharmo 'pi duṣkaraḥ
a yajñāya sṛṣṭāni dhanāni dhātrā
yaṣṭādiṣṭaḥ puruṣo rakṣitā ca
c tasmāt sarvaṃ yajña evopayojyaṃ
dhanaṃ tato 'nantara eva kāmaḥ
a yajñair indro vividhair annavadbhir
devān sarvān abhyayān mahaujāḥ
c tenendratvaṃ prāpya vibhrājate 'sau
tasmād yajñe sarvam evopayojyam
a mahādevaḥ sarvamedhe mahātmā
hutvātmānaṃ devadevo vibhūtaḥ
c viśvāṃl lokān vyāpya viṣṭabhya kīrtyā
virocate dyutimān kṛttivāsāḥ
a āvikṣitaḥ pārthivo vai maruttaḥ
svṛddhyā martyo yo 'jayad devarājam
c yajñe yasya śrīḥ svayaṃ saṃniviṣṭā
yasmin bhāṇḍaṃ kāñcanaṃ sarvam āsīt
a hariścandraḥ pārthivendraḥ śrutas te
yajñair iṣṭvā puṇyakṛd vītaśokaḥ
c ṛddhyā śakraṃ yo 'jayan mānuṣaḥ saṃs
tasmād yajñe sarvam evopayojyam
 devasthāna uvāca
a atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c indreṇa samaye pṛṣṭo yad uvāca bṛhaspatiḥ
a saṃtoṣo vai svargatamaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham
c tuṣṭer na kiṃ cit parataḥ susamyak paritiṣṭhati
a yadā saṃharate kāmān kūrmo 'ṅgānīva sarvaśaḥ
c tadātmajyotir ātmaiva svātmanaiva prasīdati
a na bibheti yadā cāyaṃ yadā cāsmān na bibhyati
c kāmadveṣau ca jayati tadātmānaṃ prapaśyati
a yadāsau sarvabhūtānāṃ na krudhyati na duṣyati
c karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a evaṃ kaunteya bhūtāni taṃ taṃ dharmaṃ tathā tathā
c tadā tadā prapaśyanti tasmād budhyasva bhārata
a anye śamaṃ praśaṃsanti vyāyāmam apare tathā
c naikaṃ na cāparaṃ ke cid ubhayaṃ ca tathāpare
a yajñam eke praśaṃsanti saṃnyāsam apare janāḥ
c dānam eke praśaṃsanti ke cid eva pratigraham
e ke cit sarvaṃ parityajya tūṣṇīṃ dhyāyanta āsate
a rājyam eke praśaṃsanti sarveṣāṃ paripālanam
c hatvā bhittvā ca chittvā ca ke cid ekāntaśīlinaḥ
a etat sarvaṃ samālokya budhānām eṣa niścayaḥ
c adroheṇaiva bhūtānāṃ yo dharmaḥ sa satāṃ mataḥ
a adrohaḥ satyavacanaṃ saṃvibhāgo dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
c prajanaḥ sveṣu dāreṣu mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
a dhanaṃ dharmapradhāneṣṭaṃ manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo 'bravīt
c tasmād evaṃ prayatnena kaunteya paripālaya
a yo hi rājye sthitaḥ śaśvad vaśī tulyapriyāpriyaḥ
c kṣatriyo yajñaśiṣṭāśī rājaśāstrārthatattvavit
a asādhunigraharataḥ sādhūnāṃ pragrahe rataḥ
c dharme vartmani saṃsthāpya prajā varteta dharmavit
a putrasaṃkrāmitaśrīs tu vane vanyena vartayan
c vidhinā śrāmaṇenaiva kuryāt kālam atandritaḥ
a ya evaṃ vartate rājā rājadharmaviniścitaḥ
c tasyāyaṃ ca paraś caiva lokaḥ syāt saphalo nṛpa
e nirvāṇaṃ tu suduṣpāraṃ bahuvighnaṃ ca me matam
a evaṃ dharmam anukrāntāḥ satyadānatapaḥparāḥ
c ānṛśaṃsyaguṇair yuktāḥ kāmakrodhavivarjitāḥ
a prajānāṃ pālane yuktā damam uttamam āsthitāḥ
c gobrāhmaṇārthaṃ yuddhena saṃprāptā gatim uttamām
a evaṃ rudrāḥ savasavas tathādityāḥ paraṃtapa
c sādhyā rājarṣisaṃghāś ca dharmam etaṃ samāśritāḥ
e apramattās tataḥ svargaṃ prāptāḥ puṇyaiḥ svakarmabhiḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tasmin vākyāntare vākyaṃ punar evārjuno 'bravīt
c viṣaṇṇamanasaṃ jyeṣṭham idaṃ bhrātaram īśvaram
a kṣatradharmeṇa dharmajña prāpya rājyam anuttamam
c jitvā cārīn naraśreṣṭha tapyate kiṃ bhavān bhṛśam
a kṣatriyāṇāṃ mahārāja saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ smṛtam
c viśiṣṭaṃ bahubhir yajñaiḥ kṣatradharmam anusmara
a brāhmaṇānāṃ tapas tyāgaḥ pretyadharmavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
c kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca vihitaṃ saṃgrāme nidhanaṃ vibho
a kṣatradharmo mahāraudraḥ śastranitya iti smṛtaḥ
c vadhaś ca bharataśreṣṭha kāle śastreṇa saṃyuge
a brāhmaṇasyāpi ced rājan kṣatradharmeṇa tiṣṭhataḥ
c praśastaṃ jīvitaṃ loke kṣatraṃ hi brahmasaṃsthitam
a na tyāgo na punar yācñā na tapo manujeśvara
c kṣatriyasya vidhīyante na parasvopajīvanam
a sa bhavān sarvadharmajñaḥ sarvātmā bharatarṣabha
c rājā manīṣī nipuṇo loke dṛṣṭaparāvaraḥ
a tyaktvā saṃtāpajaṃ śokaṃ daṃśito bhava karmaṇi
c kṣatriyasya viśeṣeṇa hṛdayaṃ vajrasaṃhatam
a jitvārīn kṣatradharmeṇa prāpya rājyam akaṇṭakam
c vijitātmā manuṣyendra yajñadānaparo bhava
a indro vai brahmaṇaḥ putraḥ karmaṇā kṣatriyo 'bhavat
c jñātīnāṃ pāpavṛttīnāṃ jaghāna navatīr nava
a tac cāsya karma pūjyaṃ hi praśasyaṃ ca viśāṃ pate
c tena cendratvam āpede devānām iti naḥ śrutam
a sa tvaṃ yajñair mahārāja yajasva bahudakṣiṇaiḥ
c yathaivendro manuṣyendra cirāya vigatajvaraḥ
a mā tvam evaṃgate kiṃ cit kṣatriyarṣabha śocithāḥ
c gatās te kṣatradharmeṇa śastrapūtāḥ parāṃ gatim
a bhavitavyaṃ tathā tac ca yad vṛttaṃ bharatarṣabha
c diṣṭaṃ hi rājaśārdūla na śakyam ativartitum
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktas tu kaunteyo guḍākeśena bhārata
c novāca kiṃ cit kauravyas tato dvaipāyano 'bravīt
a bībhatsor vacanaṃ samyak satyam etad yudhiṣṭhira
c śāstradṛṣṭaḥ paro dharmaḥ smṛto gārhasthya āśramaḥ
a svadharmaṃ cara dharmajña yathāśāstraṃ yathāvidhi
c na hi gārhasthyam utsṛjya tavāraṇyaṃ vidhīyate
a gṛhasthaṃ hi sadā devāḥ pitara ṛṣayas tathā
c bhṛtyāś caivopajīvanti tān bhajasva mahīpate
a vayāṃsi paśavaś caiva bhūtāni ca mahīpate
c gṛhasthair eva dhāryante tasmāj jyeṣṭhāśramo gṛhī
a so 'yaṃ caturṇām eteṣām āśramāṇāṃ durācaraḥ
c taṃ carāvimanāḥ pārtha duścaraṃ durbalendriyaiḥ
a vedajñānaṃ ca te kṛtsnaṃ tapaś ca caritaṃ mahat
c pitṛpaitāmahe rājye dhuram udvoḍhum arhasi
a tapo yajñas tathā vidyā bhaikṣam indriyanigrahaḥ
c dhyānam ekāntaśīlatvaṃ tuṣṭir dānaṃ ca śaktitaḥ
a brāhmaṇānāṃ mahārāja ceṣṭāḥ saṃsiddhikārikāḥ
c kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca vakṣyāmi tavāpi viditaṃ punaḥ
a yajño vidyā samutthānam asaṃtoṣaḥ śriyaṃ prati
c daṇḍadhāraṇam atyugraṃ prajānāṃ paripālanam
a vedajñānaṃ tathā kṛtsnaṃ tapaḥ sucaritaṃ tathā
c draviṇopārjanaṃ bhūri pātreṣu pratipādanam
a etāni rājñāṃ karmāṇi sukṛtāni viśāṃ pate
c imaṃ lokam amuṃ lokaṃ sādhayantīti naḥ śrutam
a teṣāṃ jyāyas tu kaunteya daṇḍadhāraṇam ucyate
c balaṃ hi kṣatriye nityaṃ bale daṇḍaḥ samāhitaḥ
a etāś ceṣṭāḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ rājan saṃsiddhikārikāḥ
c api gāthām imāṃ cāpi bṛhaspatir abhāṣata
a bhūmir etau nigirati sarpo bilaśayān iva
c rājānaṃ cāviroddhāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ cāpravāsinam
a sudyumnaś cāpi rājarṣiḥ śrūyate daṇḍadhāraṇāt
c prāptavān paramāṃ siddhiṃ dakṣaḥ prācetaso yathā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a bhagavan karmaṇā kena sudyumno vasudhādhipaḥ
c saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ prāptaḥ śrotum icchāmi taṃ nṛpam
 vyāsa uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c śaṅkhaś ca likhitaś cāstāṃ bhrātarau saṃyatavratau
a tayor āvasathāv āstāṃ ramaṇīyau pṛthak pṛthak
c nityapuṣpaphalair vṛkṣair upetau bāhudām anu
a tataḥ kadā cil likhitaḥ śaṅkhasyāśramam āgamat
c yadṛcchayāpi śaṅkho 'tha niṣkrānto 'bhavad āśramāt
a so 'bhigamyāśramaṃ bhrātuḥ śaṅkhasya likhitas tadā
c phalāni śātayām āsa samyak pariṇatāny uta
a tāny upādāya visrabdho bhakṣayām āsa sa dvijaḥ
c tasmiṃś ca bhakṣayaty eva śaṅkho 'py āśramam āgamat
a bhakṣayantaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā śaṅkho bhrātaram abravīt
c kutaḥ phalāny avāptāni hetunā kena khādasi
a so 'bravīd bhrātaraṃ jyeṣṭham upaspṛśyābhivādya ca
c ita eva gṛhītāni mayeti prahasann iva
a tam abravīt tadā śaṅkhas tīvrakopasamanvitaḥ
c steyaṃ tvayā kṛtam idaṃ phalāny ādadatā svayam
e gaccha rājānam āsādya svakarma prathayasva vai
f likhito 'tha tadā gatvā bhrātur vākyena coditaḥ
f sudyumnaviṣayaṃ rājann uvācedaṃ suduḥkhitaḥ
a adattādānam evedaṃ kṛtaṃ pārthivasattama
c stenaṃ māṃ tvaṃ viditvā ca svadharmam anupālaya
e śīghraṃ dhāraya caurasya mama daṇḍaṃ narādhipa
a ity uktas tasya vacanāt sudyumnaṃ vasudhādhipam
c abhyagacchan mahābāho likhitaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
a sudyumnas tv antapālebhyaḥ śrutvā likhitam āgatam
c abhyagacchat sahāmātyaḥ padbhyām eva nareśvaraḥ
a tam abravīt samāgatya sa rājā brahmavittamam
c kim āgamanam ācakṣva bhagavan kṛtam eva tat
a evam uktaḥ sa viprarṣiḥ sudyumnam idam abravīt
c pratiśrauṣi kariṣyeti śrutvā tat kartum arhasi
a anisṛṣṭāni guruṇā phalāni puruṣarṣabha
c bhakṣitāni mayā rājaṃs tatra māṃ śādhi māciram
 sudyumna uvāca
a pramāṇaṃ cen mato rājā bhavato daṇḍadhāraṇe
c anujñāyām api tathā hetuḥ syād brāhmaṇarṣabha
a sa bhavān abhyanujñātaḥ śucikarmā mahāvrataḥ
c brūhi kāmān ato 'nyāṃs tvaṃ kariṣyāmi hi te vacaḥ
 vyāsa uvāca
a chandyamāno 'pi brahmarṣiḥ pārthivena mahātmanā
c nānyaṃ vai varayām āsa tasmād daṇḍād ṛte varam
a tataḥ sa pṛthivīpālo likhitasya mahātmanaḥ
c karau pracchedayām āsa dhṛtadaṇḍo jagāma saḥ
a sa gatvā bhrātaraṃ śaṅkham ārtarūpo 'bravīd idam
c dhṛtadaṇḍasya durbhuddher bhagavan kṣantum arhasi
 śaṅkha uvāca
a na kupye tava dharmajña na ca dūṣayase mama
b sunirmalaṃ kulaṃ brahmann asmiñ jagati viśrutam
c dharmas tu te vyatikrāntas tatas te niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtā
a sa gatvā bāhudāṃ śīghraṃ tarpayasva yathāvidhi
c devān pitṝn ṛṣīṃś caiva mā cādharme manaḥ kṛthāḥ
d brahmahatyāṃ surāpānaṃ steyaṃ gurvaṅganāgamam
d mahānti pātakāny āhuḥ saṃyogaṃ caiva taiḥ saha
d na steyasadṛśaṃ brahman mahāpātakam asty uta
d jagaty asmin mahābhāga brahmahatyāsamaṃ hi tat
d sarvapātakināṃ brahman daṇḍaḥ śārīra ucyate
d taskarasya viśeṣeṇa nānyo daṇḍo vidhīyate
d brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vāpi vaiśyaḥ śūdro 'tha vā dvijaḥ
d sarve kāmakṛte pāpe hantavyā na vicāraṇā
d rājabhir dhṛtadaṇḍā vai kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ
d nirmalāḥ svargam āyānti santaḥ sukṛtino yathā
d uddhṛtaṃ naḥ kulaṃ brahman rājñā daṇḍe dhṛte tvayi
 vyāsa uvāca
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā śaṅkhasya likhitas tadā
c avagāhyāpagāṃ puṇyām udakārthaṃ pracakrame
a prādurāstāṃ tatas tasya karau jalajasaṃnibhau
c tataḥ sa vismito bhrātur darśayām āsa tau karau
a tatas tam abravīc chaṅkhas tapasedaṃ kṛtaṃ mayā
c mā ca te 'tra viśaṅkā bhūd daivam eva vidhīyate
 likhita uvāca
a kiṃ nu nāhaṃ tvayā pūtaḥ pūrvam eva mahādyute
c yasya te tapaso vīryam īdṛśaṃ dvijasattama
 śaṅkha uvāca
a evam etan mayā kāryaṃ nāhaṃ daṇḍadharas tava
c sa ca pūto narapatis tvaṃ cāpi pitṛbhiḥ saha
 vyāsa uvāca
a sa rājā pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha śreṣṭho vai tena karmaṇā
c prāptavān paramāṃ siddhiṃ dakṣaḥ prācetaso yathā
a eṣa dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ prajānāṃ paripālanam
c utpathe 'smin mahārāja mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
a bhrātur asya hitaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇu dharmajñasattama
c daṇḍa eva hi rājendra kṣatradharmo na muṇḍanam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a punar eva maharṣis taṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'bravīt
c ajātaśatruṃ kaunteyam idaṃ vacanam arthavat
a araṇye vasatāṃ tāta bhrātṝṇāṃ te tapasvinām
c manorathā mahārāja ye tatrāsan yudhiṣṭhira
a tān ime bharataśreṣṭha prāpnuvantu mahārathāḥ
c praśādhi pṛthivīṃ pārtha yayātir iva nāhuṣaḥ
a araṇye duḥkhavasatir anubhūtā tapasvibhiḥ
c duḥkhasyānte naravyāghrāḥ sukhaṃ tv anubhavantv ime
a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca bhrātṛbhiḥ saha bhārata
c anubhūya tataḥ paścāt prasthātāsi viśāṃ pate
a atithīnāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca bhārata
c ānṛṇyaṃ gaccha kaunteya tataḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyasi
a sarvamedhāśvamedhābhyāṃ yajasva kurunandana
c tataḥ paścān mahārāja gamiṣyasi parāṃ gatim
a bhrātṝṃś ca sarvān kratubhiḥ saṃyojya bahudakṣiṇaiḥ
c saṃprāptaḥ kīrtim atulāṃ pāṇḍaveya bhaviṣyasi
a vidma te puruṣavyāghra vacanaṃ kurunandana
c śṛṇu mac ca yathā kurvan dharmān na cyavate nṛpaḥ
a ādadānasya ca dhanaṃ nigrahaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
c samānaṃ dharmakuśalāḥ sthāpayanti nareśvara
d pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca upamānaṃ tathāgamaḥ
d arthāpattis tathaitihyaṃ saṃśayo nirṇayas tathā
d ākāro hīṅgitaś caiva gatiś ceṣṭā ca bhārata
d pratijñā caiva hetuś ca dṛṣṭāntopanayas tathā
d uktir nigamanaṃ teṣāṃ prameyaṃ ca prayojanam
d etāni sādhanāny āhur bahuvargaprasiddhaye
d pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yonir iṣyate
d pramāṇajño hi śaknoti daṇḍayonau vicakṣaṇaḥ
d apramāṇavatā nīto daṇḍo hanyān mahīpatim
a deśakālapratīkṣe yo dasyor darśayate nṛpaḥ
c śāstrajāṃ buddhim āsthāya nainasā sa hi yujyate
a ādāya baliṣaḍbhāgaṃ yo rāṣṭraṃ nābhirakṣati
c pratigṛhṇāti tat pāpaṃ caturthāṃśena pārthivaḥ
a nibodha ca yathātiṣṭhan dharmān na cyavate nṛpaḥ
c nigrahād dharmaśāstrāṇām anurudhyann apetabhīḥ
e kāmakrodhāv anādṛtya piteva samadarśanaḥ
a daivenopahate rājā karmakāle mahādyute
c pramādayati tat karma na tatrāhur atikramam
a tarasā buddhipūrvaṃ vā nigrāhyā eva śatravaḥ
c pāpaiḥ saha na saṃdadhyād rāṣṭraṃ paṇyaṃ na kārayet
a śūrāś cāryāś ca satkāryā vidvāṃsaś ca yudhiṣṭhira
c gomato dhaninaś caiva paripālyā viśeṣataḥ
a vyavahāreṣu dharmyeṣu niyojyāś ca bahuśrutāḥ
b pramāṇajñā mahīpāla nyāyaśāstrāvalambinaḥ
b vedārthatattvavid rājaṃs tarkaśāstrabahuśrutaḥ
b mantre ca vyavahāre ca niyoktavyo vijānatā
b tarkaśāstrakṛtā buddhir dharmaśāstrakṛtā ca yā
b daṇḍanītikṛtā caiva trailokyam api sādhayet
b niyojyā vedatattvajñā yajñakarmasu pārthiva
b vedajñā ye ca śāstrajñās te ca rājan subuddhayaḥ
b ānvīkṣikītrayīvārtādaṇḍanītiṣu pāragāḥ
b te tu sarvatra yoktavyās te ca buddheḥ parāṃ gatāḥ
c guṇayukte 'pi naikasmin viśvasyāc ca vicakṣaṇaḥ
a arakṣitā durvinīto mānī stabdho 'bhyasūyakaḥ
c enasā yujyate rājā durdānta iti cocyate
a ye 'rakṣyamāṇā hīyante daivenopahate nṛpe
c taskaraiś cāpi hanyante sarvaṃ tad rājakilbiṣam
a sumantrite sunīte ca vidhivac copapādite
c pauruṣe karmaṇi kṛte nāsty adharmo yudhiṣṭhira
a vipadyante samārambhāḥ sidhyanty api ca daivataḥ
c kṛte puruṣakāre tu nainaḥ spṛśati pārthivam
a atra te rājaśārdūla vartayiṣye kathām imām
c yad vṛttaṃ pūrvarājarṣer hayagrīvasya pārthiva
a śatrūn hatvā hatasyājau śūrasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
c asahāyasya dhīrasya nirjitasya yudhiṣṭhira
a yat karma vai nigrahe śātravāṇāṃ
yogaś cāgryaḥ pālane mānavānām
c kṛtvā karma prāpya kīrtiṃ suyuddhe
vājigrīvo modate devaloke
a saṃtyaktātmā samareṣv ātatāyī
śastraiś chinno dasyubhir ardyamānaḥ
c aśvagrīvaḥ karmaśīlo mahātmā
saṃsiddhātmā modate devaloke
a dhanur yūpo raśanā jyā śaraḥ sruk
sruvaḥ khaḍgo rudhiraṃ yatra cājyam
c ratho vedī kāmago yuddham agniś
cāturhotraṃ caturo vājimukhyāḥ
a hutvā tasmin yajñavahnāv athārīn
pāpān mukto rājasiṃhas tarasvī
c prāṇān hutvā cāvabhṛthe raṇe sa
vājigrīvo modate devaloke
a rāṣṭraṃ rakṣan buddhipūrvaṃ nayena
saṃtyaktātmā yajñaśīlo mahātmā
c sarvāṃl lokān vyāpya kīrtyā manasvī
vājigrīvo modate devaloke
a daivīṃ siddhiṃ mānuṣīṃ daṇḍanītiṃ
yoganyāyaiḥ pālayitvā mahīṃ ca
c tasmād rājā dharmaśīlo mahātmā
hayagrīvo modate svargaloke
a vidvāṃs tyāgī śraddadhānaḥ kṛtajñas
tyaktvā lokaṃ mānuṣaṃ karma kṛtvā
c medhāvināṃ viduṣāṃ saṃmatānāṃ
tanutyajāṃ lokam ākramya rājā
a samyag vedān prāpya śāstrāṇy adhītya
samyag rāṣṭraṃ pālayitvā mahātmā
c cāturvarṇyaṃ sthāpayitvā svadharme
vājigrīvo modate devaloke
a jitvā saṃgrāmān pālayitvā prajāś ca
somaṃ pītvā tarpayitvā dvijāgryān
c yuktyā daṇḍaṃ dhārayitvā prajānāṃ
yuddhe kṣīṇo modate devaloke
a vṛttaṃ yasya ślāghanīyaṃ manuṣyāḥ
santo vidvāṃsaś cārhayanty arhaṇīyāḥ
c svargaṃ jitvā vīralokāṃś ca gatvā
siddhiṃ prāptaḥ puṇyakīrtir mahātmā
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a dvaipāyanavacaḥ śrutvā kupite ca dhanaṃjaye
c vyāsam āmantrya kaunteyaḥ pratyuvāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a na pārthivam idaṃ rājyaṃ na ca bhogāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
c prīṇayanti mano me 'dya śoko māṃ nardayaty ayam
a śrutvā ca vīrahīnānām aputrāṇāṃ ca yoṣitām
c paridevayamānānāṃ śāntiṃ nopalabhe mune
a ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ vyāso yogavidāṃ varaḥ
c yudhiṣṭhiraṃ mahāprājñaṃ dharmajño vedapāragaḥ
a na karmaṇā labhyate cintayā vā
nāpy asya dātā puruṣasya kaś cit
c paryāyayogād vihitaṃ vidhātrā
kālena sarvaṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ
a na buddhiśāstrādhyayanena śakyaṃ
prāptuṃ viśeṣair manujair akāle
c mūrkho 'pi prāpnoti kadā cid arthān
kālo hi kāryaṃ prati nirviśeṣaḥ
a nābhūtikāle ca phalaṃ dadāti
śilpaṃ na mantrāś ca tathauṣadhāni
c tāny eva kālena samāhitāni
sidhyanti cedhyanti ca bhūtikāle
a kālena śīghrāḥ pravivānti vātāḥ
kālena vṛṣṭir jaladān upaiti
c kālena padmotpalavaj jalaṃ ca
kālena puṣyanti nagā vaneṣu
a kālena kṛṣṇāś ca sitāś ca rātryaḥ
kālena candraḥ paripūrṇabimbaḥ
c nākālataḥ puṣpaphalaṃ nagānāṃ
nākālavegāḥ sarito vahanti
a nākālamattāḥ khagapannagāś ca
mṛgadvipāḥ śailamahāgrahāś ca
c nākālataḥ strīṣu bhavanti garbhā
nāyānty akāle śiśiroṣṇavarṣāḥ
a nākālato mriyate jāyate vā
nākālato vyāharate ca bālaḥ
c nākālato yauvanam abhyupaiti
nākālato rohati bījam uptam
a nākālato bhānur upaiti yogaṃ
nākālato 'staṃ girim abhyupaiti
c nākālato vardhate hīyate ca
candraḥ samudraś ca mahormimālī
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c gītaṃ rājñā senajitā duḥkhārtena yudhiṣṭhira
a sarvān evaiṣa paryāyo martyān spṛśati dustaraḥ
c kālena paripakvā hi mriyante sarvamānavāḥ
a ghnanti cānyān narā rājaṃs tān apy anye narās tathā
c saṃjñaiṣā laukikī rājan na hinasti na hanyate
a hantīti manyate kaś cin na hantīty api cāpare
c svabhāvatas tu niyatau bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayau
a naṣṭe dhane vā dāre vā putre pitari vā mṛte
c aho kaṣṭam iti dhyāyañ śokasyāpacitiṃ caret
a sa kiṃ śocasi mūḍhaḥ sañ śocyaḥ kim anuśocasi
c paśya duḥkheṣu duḥkhāni bhayeṣu ca bhayāny api
a ātmāpi cāyaṃ na mama sarvāpi pṛthivī mama
c yathā mama tathānyeṣām iti paśyan na muhyati
a śokasthānasahasrāṇi harṣasthānaśatāni ca
c divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
a evam etāni kālena priyadveṣyāṇi bhāgaśaḥ
c jīveṣu parivartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
a duḥkham evāsti na sukhaṃ tasmāt tad upalabhyate
c tṛṣṇārtiprabhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhārtiprabhavaṃ sukham
a sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasyānantaraṃ sukham
c na nityaṃ labhate duḥkhaṃ na nityaṃ labhate sukham
a sukham ante hi duḥkhānāṃ duḥkham ante sukhasya ca
b sukham eva hi duḥkhāntaṃ kadā cid duḥkhataḥ sukham
c tasmād etad dvayaṃ jahyād ya icchec chāśvataṃ sukham
d sukhāntaprabhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhāntaprabhavaṃ sukham
a yan nimittaṃ bhavec chokas tāpo vā duḥkhamūrchitaḥ
c āyāso vāpi yan mūlas tad ekāṅgam api tyajet
a sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ priyaṃ vā yadi vāpriyam
c prāptaṃ prāptam upāsīta hṛdayenāparājitaḥ
a īṣad apy aṅga dārāṇāṃ putrāṇāṃ vā carāpriyam
c tato jñāsyasi kaḥ kasya kena vā katham eva vā
a ye ca mūḍhatamā loke ye ca buddheḥ paraṃ gatāḥ
c ta eva sukham edhante madhyaḥ kleśena yujyate
a ity abravīn mahāprājño yudhiṣṭhira sa senajit
c parāvarajño lokasya dharmavit sukhaduḥkhavit
a sukhī parasya yo duḥkhe na jātu sa sukhī bhavet
c duḥkhānāṃ hi kṣayo nāsti jāyate hy aparāt param
a sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca bhavābhavau ca
lābhālābhau maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ ca
c paryāyaśaḥ sarvam iha spṛśanti
tasmād dhīro naiva hṛṣyen na kupyet
a dīkṣāṃ yajñe pālanaṃ yuddham āhur
yogaṃ rāṣṭre daṇḍanītyā ca samyak
c vittatyāgaṃ dakṣiṇānāṃ ca yajñe
samyag jñānaṃ pāvanānīti vidyāt
a rakṣan rāṣṭraṃ buddhipūrvaṃ nayena
saṃtyaktātmā yajñaśīlo mahātmā
c sarvāṃl lokān dharmamūrtyā caraṃś cāpy
ūrdhvaṃ dehān modate devaloke
a jitvā saṃgrāmān pālayitvā ca rāṣṭraṃ
somaṃ pītvā vardhayitvā prajāś ca
c yuktyā daṇḍaṃ dhārayitvā prajānāṃ
yuddhe kṣīṇo modate devaloke
d yajanti yajñān vijayanti rājyaṃ
d rakṣanti rāṣṭrāṇi priyāṇi caiṣām
a samyag vedān prāpya śāstrāṇy adhītya
samyag rāṣṭraṃ pālayitvā ca rājā
c cāturvarṇyaṃ sthāpayitvā svadharme
pūtātmā vai modate devaloke
a yasya vṛttaṃ namasyanti svargasthasyāpi mānavāḥ
c paurajānapadāmātyāḥ sa rājā rājasattamaḥ
d asminn eva prakaraṇe dhanaṃjayam udāradhīḥ
d abhinītataraṃ vākyam ity uvāca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
d yad etan manyase pārtha na jyāyo 'sti dhanād iti
d na svargo na sukhaṃ na śrīr nirdhanasyeti tan mṛṣā
d svādhyāyayajñasaṃsiddhā dṛśyante bahavo janāḥ
d taporatāś ca munayo yeṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
d ṛṣīṇāṃ samayaṃ śaśvad ye rakṣanti dhanaṃjaya
d āśritāḥ sarvadharmajñās tān devā brāhmaṇān viduḥ
d svādhyāyaniṣṭhāṃś ca munīñ jñānaniṣṭhāṃs tathāparān
d budhyethāḥ saṃtataṃ cāpi karmaniṣṭhān dhanaṃjaya
d jñānaniṣṭheṣu kāryāṇi pratiṣṭhāpyāni pāṇḍava
d vaikhānasānāṃ vacanaṃ yathā no viditaṃ purā
d ajāś ca pṛśnayaś caiva sikatāś caiva bhārata
d aruṇāḥ ketavaś caiva svādhyāyena divaṃ gatāḥ
d avāpyaitāni karmāṇi vedoktāni dhanaṃjaya
d dānam adhyayanaṃ yajño nigrahaś caiva durgrahaḥ
d dakṣiṇena ca panthānam aryamṇo ye divaṃ gatāḥ
d etān kriyāvatāṃ lokān uktavān pūrvam apy aham
d uttareṇa tu panthānaṃ niyamādyaṃ prapaśyasi
d ete tyāgavatāṃ lokā bhānti pārtha sanātanāḥ
d tatrottarāṃ gatiṃ pārtha praśaṃsanti purāvidaḥ
d saṃtoṣāt svargagamanaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ paramaṃ sukham
d tuṣṭer na kiṃ cit parataḥ sā samyak pratitiṣṭhati
d vinītakrodhaharṣasya satataṃ siddhir uttamā
d atrāpy udāharantīmā gāthā gītā yayātinā
d yābhiḥ pratyāharet kāmān kūrmo 'ṅgānīva sarvaśaḥ
d yadā cāyaṃ na bibheti yadā cāsmān na bibhyati
d yadā necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate tadā
d yadā na bhāvaṃ kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
d karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
d vinītamānamohasya bahusaṅgavivarjinaḥ
d tadātmajyotiṣaḥ sādhor nirvāṇam upapadyate
d idaṃ tu śṛṇu me pārtha bruvataḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
d dharmam anye vṛttam anye dhanam īhanti cāpare
d dhanahetor ya īheta tasyānīhā garīyasī
d bhūyān doṣo hi vitteṣu yaś ca dharmas tadāśrayaḥ
d pratyakṣam anupaśyāmas tvam api draṣṭum arhasi
d varjanaṃ varjanīyānām īhamānena duṣkaram
d ye vittam abhipadyante samyak teṣu sudurlabham
d druhyataḥ praiti tat prāhuḥ pratikūlaṃ yathātatham
d yas tu saṃbhinnavṛttaḥ syād vītaśokabhayo naraḥ
d alpena tṛṣito druhyan bhrūṇahatyāṃ na budhyate
d duṣyanty ādadato bhṛtyā nityaṃ dasyubhayād iva
d durlabhaṃ ca dhanaṃ prāpya bhṛśaṃ dattvānutapyate
d adhanaḥ kasya kiṃ vācyo vimuktaḥ sarvataḥ sukhī
d devasvam upagṛhyaiva dhanena na sukhī bhavet
d atra gāthāṃ yajñagītāṃ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
d trayīm upāśritāṃ loke yajñasaṃstarakārikām
d yajñāya sṛṣṭāni dhanāni dhātrā
d yajñāya sṛṣṭaḥ puruṣo rakṣitā ca
d tasmāt sarvaṃ yajña evopayojyaṃ
d dhanaṃ na kāmāya hitaṃ praśastam
d etasyārthe ca kaunteya dhanaṃ dhanavatāṃ vara
d dhātā dadāti martyebhyo yajñārtham iti viddhi tat
d tasmād budhyanti puruṣā na hi tat kasya cid dhruvam
d śraddadhānas tato loke dadyāc caiva yajeta ca
d labdhasya tyāgam evāhur na bhogaṃ na ca saṃkṣayam
d tasya kiṃ saṃcayenārthaḥ kārye jyāyasi tiṣṭhati
d ye svadharmād apetebhyaḥ prayacchanty alpabuddhayaḥ
d śataṃ varṣāṇi te pretya purīṣaṃ bhuñjate janāḥ
d anarhate yad dadāti na dadāti yad arhate
d arhānarhāparijñānād dānadharmo 'pi duṣkaraḥ
d labdhānāṃ dravyajātānāṃ boddhavyau dvāv atikramau
d apātre pratipattiś ca pātre cāpratipādanam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a abhimanyau hate bāle draupadyās tanayeṣu ca
c dhṛṣṭadyumne virāṭe ca drupade ca mahīpatau
a vasuṣeṇe ca dharmajñe dhṛṣṭaketau ca pārthive
c tathānyeṣu narendreṣu nānādeśyeṣu saṃyuge
a na vimuñcati māṃ śoko jñātighātinam āturam
c rājyakāmukam aty ugraṃ svavaṃśocchedakārakam
a yasyāṅke krīḍamānena mayā vai parivartitam
c sa mayā rājyalubdhena gāṅgeyo vinipātitaḥ
a yadā hy enaṃ vighūrṇantam apaśyaṃ pārthasāyakaiḥ
c kampamānaṃ yathā vajraiḥ prekṣamāṇaṃ śikhaṇḍinam
a jīrṇaṃ siṃham iva prāṃśuṃ narasiṃhaṃ pitāmaham
c kīryamāṇaṃ śarais tīkṣṇair dṛṣṭvā me vyathitaṃ manaḥ
a prāṅmukhaṃ sīdamānaṃ ca rathād apacyutaṃ śaraiḥ
c ghūrṇamānaṃ yathā śailaṃ tadā me kaśmalo 'bhavat
a yaḥ sa bāṇadhanuṣpāṇir yodhayām āsa bhārgavam
c bahūny ahāni kauravyaḥ kurukṣetre mahāmṛdhe
a sametaṃ pārthivaṃ kṣatraṃ vārāṇasyāṃ nadīsutaḥ
c kanyārtham āhvayad vīro rathenaikena saṃyuge
a yena cogrāyudho rājā cakravartī durāsadaḥ
c dagdhaḥ śastrapratāpena sa mayā yudhi ghātitaḥ
a svayaṃ mṛtyuṃ rakṣamāṇaḥ pāñcālyaṃ yaḥ śikhaṇḍinam
c na bāṇaiḥ pātayām āsa so 'rjunena nipātitaḥ
a yadainaṃ patitaṃ bhūmāv apaśyaṃ rudhirokṣitam
c tadaivāviśad aty ugro jvaro me munisattama
e yena saṃvardhitā bālā yena sma parirakṣitāḥ
a sa mayā rājyalubdhena pāpena gurughātinā
c alpakālasya rājyasya kṛte mūḍhena ghātitaḥ
a ācāryaś ca maheṣvāsaḥ sarvapārthivapūjitaḥ
c abhigamya raṇe mithyā pāpenoktaḥ sutaṃ prati
a tan me dahati gātrāṇi yan māṃ gurur abhāṣata
c satyavākyo hi rājaṃs tvaṃ yadi jīvati me sutaḥ
e satyaṃ mā marśayan vipro mayi tat paripṛṣṭavān
a kuñjaraṃ cāntaraṃ kṛtvā mithyopacaritaṃ mayā
c subhṛśaṃ rājyalubdhena pāpena gurughātinā
a satyakañcukam āsthāya mayokto gurur āhave
c aśvatthāmā hata iti kuñjare vinipātite
e kān nu lokān gamiṣyāmi kṛtvā tat karma dāruṇam
a aghātayaṃ ca yat karṇaṃ samareṣv apalāyinam
c jyeṣṭhaṃ bhrātaram aty ugraṃ ko mattaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ
a abhimanyuṃ ca yad bālaṃ jātaṃ siṃham ivādriṣu
c prāveśayam ahaṃ lubdho vāhinīṃ droṇapālitām
a tadāprabhṛti bībhatsuṃ na śaknomi nirīkṣitum
c kṛṣṇaṃ ca puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ kilbiṣī bhrūṇahā yathā
a draupadīṃ cāpy aduḥkhārhāṃ pañcaputravinākṛtām
c śocāmi pṛthivīṃ hīnāṃ pañcabhiḥ parvatair iva
a so 'ham āgaskaraḥ pāpaḥ pṛthivīnāśakārakaḥ
c āsīna evam evedaṃ śoṣayiṣye kalevaram
a prāyopaviṣṭaṃ jānīdhvam adya māṃ gurughātinam
c jātiṣv anyāsv api yathā na bhaveyaṃ kulāntakṛt
d nopabhokṣye varān bhogān rājyaṃ tatparicchadān
a na bhokṣye na ca pānīyam upayokṣye kathaṃ cana
c śoṣayiṣye priyān prāṇān ihastho 'haṃ tapodhana
a yatheṣṭaṃ gamyatāṃ kāmam anujāne prasādya vaḥ
c sarve mām anujānīta tyakṣyāmīdaṃ kalevaram
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tam evaṃvādinaṃ pārthaṃ bandhuśokena vihvalam
c maivam ity abravīd vyāso nigṛhya munisattamaḥ
a ativelaṃ mahārāja na śokaṃ kartum arhasi
c punar uktaṃ pravakṣyāmi diṣṭam etad iti prabho
a saṃyogā viprayogāś ca jātānāṃ prāṇināṃ dhruvam
c budbudā iva toyeṣu bhavanti na bhavanti ca
a sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ
c saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam
a sukhaṃ duḥkhāntam ālasyaṃ dākṣyaṃ duḥkhaṃ sukhodayam
c bhūtiḥ śrīr hrīr dhṛtiḥ siddhir nādakṣe nivasanty uta
a nālaṃ sukhāya suhṛdo nālaṃ duḥkhāya durhṛdaḥ
c na ca prajñālam arthebhyo na sukhebhyo 'py alaṃ dhanam
a yathā sṛṣṭo 'si kaunteya dhātrā karmasu tat kuru
c ata eva hi siddhis te neśas tvam ātmanā nṛpa
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a jñātiśokābhitaptasya prāṇān abhyutsisṛkṣataḥ
c jyeṣṭhasya pāṇḍuputrasya vyāsaḥ śokam apānudat
 vyāsa uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c aśmagītaṃ naravyāghra tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a aśmānaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ prājñaṃ vaideho janako nṛpaḥ
c saṃśayaṃ paripapraccha duḥkhaśokapariplutaḥ
 janaka uvāca
a āgame yadi vāpāye jñātīnāṃ draviṇasya ca
c nareṇa pratipattavyaṃ kalyāṇaṃ katham icchatā
 aśmovāca
a utpannam imam ātmānaṃ narasyānantaraṃ tataḥ
c tāni tāny abhivartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
a teṣām anyatarāpattau yad yad evopasevate
c tat tad dhi cetanām asya haraty abhram ivānilaḥ
a abhijāto 'smi siddho 'smi nāsmi kevalamānuṣaḥ
c ity evaṃ hetubhis tasya tribhiś cittaṃ prasicyati
a sa prasiktamanā bhogān visṛjya pitṛsaṃcitān
c parikṣīṇaḥ parasvānām ādānaṃ sādhu manyate
a tam atikrāntamaryādam ādadānam asāṃpratam
c pratiṣedhanti rājāno lubdhā mṛgam iveṣubhiḥ
a ye ca viṃśativarṣā vā triṃśadvarṣāś ca mānavāḥ
c pareṇa te varṣaśatān na bhaviṣyanti pārthiva
a teṣāṃ paramaduḥkhānāṃ buddhyā bheṣajam ādiśet
c sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ vṛttaṃ prekṣamāṇas tatas tataḥ
a mānasānāṃ punar yonir duḥkhānāṃ cittavibhramaḥ
c aniṣṭopanipāto vā tṛtīyaṃ nopapadyate
a evam etāni duḥkhāni tāni tānīha mānavam
c vividhāny upavartante tathā sāṃsparśakāni ca
a jarāmṛtyū ha bhūtāni khāditārau vṛkāv iva
c balināṃ durbalānāṃ ca hrasvānāṃ mahatām api
a na kaś cij jātv atikrāmej jarāmṛtyū ha mānavaḥ
c api sāgaraparyantāṃ vijityemāṃ vasuṃdharām
a sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ bhūtānāṃ paryupasthitam
c prāptavyam avaśaiḥ sarvaṃ parihāro na vidyate
a pūrve vayasi madhye vāpy uttame vā narādhipa
c avarjanīyās te 'rthā vai kāṅkṣitāś ca tato 'nyathā
a supriyair viprayogaś ca saṃprayogas tathāpriyaiḥ
c arthānarthau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vidhānam anuvartate
a prādurbhāvaś ca bhūtānāṃ dehanyāsas tathaiva ca
c prāptivyāyāmayogaś ca sarvam etat pratiṣṭhitam
a gandhavarṇarasasparśā nivartante svabhāvataḥ
c tathaiva sukhaduḥkhāni vidhānam anuvartate
a āsanaṃ śayanaṃ yānam utthānaṃ pānabhojanam
c niyataṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ kālenaiva bhavanty uta
a vaidyāś cāpy āturāḥ santi balavantaḥ sudurbalāḥ
c strīmantaś ca tathā ṣaṇḍhā vicitraḥ kālaparyayaḥ
a kule janma tathā vīryam ārogyaṃ dhairyam eva ca
c saubhāgyam upabhogaś ca bhavitavyena labhyate
a santi putrāḥ subahavo daridrāṇām anicchatām
c bahūnām icchatāṃ nāsti samṛddhānāṃ viceṣṭatām
a vyādhir agnir jalaṃ śastraṃ bubhukṣā śvāpadaṃ viṣam
c rajjvā ca maraṇaṃ jantor uccācca patanaṃ tathā
a niryāṇaṃ yasya yad diṣṭaṃ tena gacchati hetunā
c dṛśyate nābhyatikrāmann atikrānto na vā punaḥ
a dṛśyate hi yuvaiveha vinaśyan vasumān naraḥ
c daridraś ca parikliṣṭaḥ śatavarṣo janādhipa
a akiṃcanāś ca dṛśyante puruṣāś cirajīvinaḥ
c samṛddhe ca kule jātā vinaśyanti pataṃgavat
a prāyeṇa śrīmatāṃ loke bhoktuṃ śaktir na vidyate
c kāṣṭhāny api hi jīryante daridrāṇāṃ narādhipa
a aham etat karomīti manyate kālacoditaḥ
c yad yad iṣṭam asaṃtoṣād durātmā pāpam ācaran
a striyo 'kṣā mṛgayā pānaṃ prasaṅgān ninditā budhaiḥ
c dṛśyante cāpi bahavaḥ saṃprasaktā bahuśrutāḥ
a iti kālena sarvārthānīpsitānīpsitāni ca
c spṛśanti sarvabhūtāni nimittaṃ nopalabhyate
a vāyum ākāśam agniṃ ca candrādityāv ahaḥkṣape
c jyotīṃṣi saritaḥ śailān kaḥ karoti bibharti vā
a śītam uṣṇaṃ tathā varṣaṃ kālena parivartate
c evam eva manuṣyāṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhe nararṣabha
a nauṣadhāni na śāstrāṇi na homā na punar japāḥ
c trāyante mṛtyunopetaṃ jarayā vāpi mānavam
a yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahodadhau
c sametya ca vyatīyātāṃ tadvad bhūtasamāgamaḥ
a ye cāpi puruṣaiḥ strībhir gītavādyair upasthitāḥ
c ye cānāthāḥ parānnādāḥ kālas teṣu samakriyaḥ
a mātṛpitṛsahasrāṇi putradāraśatāni ca
c saṃsāreṣv anubhūtāni kasya te kasya vā vayam
a naivāsya kaś cid bhavitā nāyaṃ bhavati kasya cit
c pathi saṃgatam evedaṃ dārabandhusuhṛdgaṇaiḥ
a kvāsaṃ kvāsmi gamiṣyāmi ko nv ahaṃ kim ihāsthitaḥ
c kasmāt kam anuśoceyam ity evaṃ sthāpayen manaḥ
e anitye priyasaṃvāse saṃsāre cakravad gatau
f pathi saṃgatam evaitad bhrātā mātā pitā sakhā
a na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ paralokaṃ vidur budhāḥ
c āgamāṃs tv anatikramya śraddhātavyaṃ bubhūṣatā
a kurvīta pitṛdaivatyaṃ dharmāṇi ca samācaret
c yajec ca vidvān vidhivat trivargaṃ cāpy anuvrajet
a saṃnimajjaj jagad idaṃ gambhīre kālasāgare
c jarāmṛtyumahāgrāhe na kaś cid avabudhyate
a āyurvedam adhīyānāḥ kevalaṃ saparigraham
c dṛśyante bahavo vaidyā vyādhibhiḥ samabhiplutāḥ
a te pibantaḥ kaṣāyāṃś ca sarpīṃṣi vividhāni ca
c na mṛtyum ativartante velām iva mahodadhiḥ
a rasāyanavidaś caiva suprayuktarasāyanāḥ
c dṛśyante jarayā bhagnā nagā nāgair ivottamaiḥ
a tathaiva tapasopetāḥ svādhyāyābhyasane ratāḥ
c dātāro yajñaśīlāś ca na taranti jarāntakau
a na hy ahāni nivartante na māsā na punaḥ samāḥ
c jātānāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ na pakṣā na punaḥ kṣapāḥ
a so 'yaṃ vipulam adhvānaṃ kālena dhruvam adhruvaḥ
c naro 'vaśaḥ samabhyeti sarvabhūtaniṣevitam
a deho vā jīvato 'bhyeti jīvo vābhyeti dehataḥ
c pathi saṃgatam evedaṃ dārair anyaiś ca bandhubhiḥ
a nāyam atyantasaṃvāso labhyate jātu kena cit
c api svena śarīreṇa kim utānyena kena cit
a kva nu te 'dya pitā rājan kva nu te 'dya pitāmahaḥ
c na tvaṃ paśyasi tān adya na tvāṃ paśyanti te 'pi ca
a na hy eva puruṣo draṣṭā svargasya narakasya vā
c āgamas tu satāṃ cakṣur nṛpate tam ihācara
a caritabrahmacaryo hi prajāyeta yajeta ca
c pitṛdevamaharṣīṇām ānṛṇyāyānasūyakaḥ
a sa yajñaśīlaḥ prajane niviṣṭaḥ
prāg brahmacārī pravibhaktapakṣaḥ
c ārādhayan svargam imaṃ ca lokaṃ
paraṃ ca muktvā hṛdayavyalīkam
a samyag ghi dharmaṃ carato nṛpasya
dravyāṇi cāpy āharato yathāvat
c pravṛttacakrasya yaśo 'bhivardhate
sarveṣu lokeṣu carācareṣu
 vyāsa uvāca
a ity evam ājñāya videharājo
vākyaṃ samagraṃ paripūrṇahetuḥ
c aśmānam āmantrya viśuddhabuddhir
yayau gṛhaṃ svaṃ prati śāntaśokaḥ
a tathā tvam apy acyuta muñca śokam
uttiṣṭha śakropama harṣam ehi
c kṣātreṇa dharmeṇa mahī jitā te
tāṃ bhuṅkṣva kuntīsuta mā viṣādīḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a avyāharati kaunteye dharmaputre yudhiṣṭhire
c guḍākeśo hṛṣīkeśam abhyabhāṣata pāṇḍavaḥ
 śokadāvānalajala śokakūpaprapūraka
 śokavallīkuṭhārādya śokanāśanakīrtana
a jñātiśokābhisaṃtapto dharmarājaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
c eṣa śokārṇave magnas tam āśvāsaya mādhava
a sarve sma te saṃśayitāḥ punar eva janārdana
c asya śokaṃ mahābāho praṇāśayitum arhasi
a evam uktas tu govindo vijayena mahātmanā
c paryavartata rājānaṃ puṇḍarīkekṣaṇo 'cyutaḥ
a anatikramaṇīyo hi dharmarājasya keśavaḥ
c bālyāt prabhṛti govindaḥ prītyā cābhyadhiko 'rjunāt
a saṃpragṛhya mahābāhur bhujaṃ candanabhūṣitam
c śailastambhopamaṃ śaurir uvācābhivinodayan
a śuśubhe vadanaṃ tasya sudaṃṣṭraṃ cārulocanam
c vyākośam iva vispaṣṭaṃ padmaṃ sūryavibodhitam
a mā kṛthāḥ puruṣavyāghra śokaṃ tvaṃ gātraśoṣaṇam
c na hi te sulabhā bhūyo ye hatāsmin raṇājire
a svapnalabdhā yathā lābhā vitathāḥ pratibodhane
c evaṃ te kṣatriyā rājan ye vyatītā mahāraṇe
a sarve hy abhimukhāḥ śūrā vigatā raṇaśobhinaḥ
c naiṣāṃ kaś cit pṛṣṭhato vā palāyan vāpi pātitaḥ
a sarve tyaktvātmanaḥ prāṇān yuddhvā vīrā mahāhave
c śastrapūtā divaṃ prāptā na tāñ śocitum arhasi
d kṣatradharmaratāḥ śūrā vedavedāṅgapāragāḥ
d prāptā vīragatiṃ puṇyāṃ na tāñ śocitum arhasi
a atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c sṛñjayaṃ putraśokārtaṃ yathāyaṃ prāha nāradaḥ
a sukhaduḥkhair ahaṃ tvaṃ ca prajāḥ sarvāś ca sṛñjaya
c avimuktaṃ cariṣyāmas tatra kā paridevanā
a mahābhāgyaṃ paraṃ rājñāṃ kīrtyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu
c gacchāvadhānaṃ nṛpate tato duḥkhaṃ prahāsyasi
a mṛtān mahānubhāvāṃs tvaṃ śrutvaiva tu mahīpatīn
c śrutvāpanaya saṃtāpaṃ śṛṇu vistaraśaś ca me
d krūragrahābhiśamanam āyurvardhanam uttamam
d agrimāṇāṃ kṣitibhujām upādānaṃ manoharam
a āvikṣitaṃ maruttaṃ me mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruhi
c yasya sendrāḥ savaruṇā bṛhaspatipurogamāḥ
e devā viśvasṛjo rājño yajñam īyur mahātmanaḥ
a yaḥ spardhām anayac chakraṃ devarājaṃ śatakratum
c śakrapriyaiṣī yaṃ vidvān pratyācaṣṭa bṛhaspatiḥ
e saṃvarto yājayām āsa yaṃ pīḍārthaṃ bṛhaspateḥ
a yasmin praśāsati satāṃ nṛpatau nṛpasattama
c akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī vibabhau caityamālinī
a āvikṣitasya vai satre viśve devāḥ sabhāsadaḥ
c marutaḥ pariveṣṭāraḥ sādhyāś cāsan mahātmanaḥ
a marudgaṇā maruttasya yat somam apibanta te
c devān manuṣyān gandharvān atyaricyanta dakṣiṇāḥ
a sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
c putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
d ayajvānam adakṣiṇyam adhiśvaityety upāharat
a suhotraṃ ced vaitithinaṃ mṛtaṃ sṛñjaya śuśruma
c yasmai hiraṇyaṃ vavṛṣe magahvān parivatsaram
a satyanāmā vasumatī yaṃ prāpyāsīj janādhipa
c hiraṇyam avahan nadyas tasmiñ janapadeśvare
a kūrmān karkaṭakān nakrān makarāñ śiṃśukān api
c nadīṣv apātayad rājan maghavā lokapūjitaḥ
a hairaṇyān patitān dṛṣṭvā matsyān makarakacchapān
c sahasraśo 'tha śataśas tato 'smayata vaitithiḥ
a tad dhiraṇyam aparyantam āvṛttaṃ kurujāṅgale
c ījāno vitate yajñe brāhmaṇebhyaḥ samāhitaḥ
a sa cen mamāra sṛñjaya caturbhadrataras tvayā
c putrāt puṇyataraś caiva mā putram anutapyathāḥ
e adakṣiṇam ayajvānaṃ śvaitya saṃśāmya mā śucaḥ
a aṅgaṃ bṛhadrathaṃ caiva mṛtaṃ śuśruma sṛñjaya
c yaḥ sahasraṃ sahasrāṇāṃ śvetān aśvān avāsṛjat
a sahasraṃ ca sahasrāṇāṃ kanyā hemavibhūṣitāḥ
