c yathā śuklasya pakṣasya pravṛttāv uḍurāṭ chanaiḥ
a na ca taṃ bhāgineyāya parvatāya mahātmane
c śaśaṃsa manmathaṃ tīvraṃ vrīḍamānaḥ sa dharmavit
a tapasā ceṅgitenātha parvato 'tha bubodha tat
c kāmārtaṃ nāradaṃ kruddhaḥ śaśāpainaṃ tato bhṛśam
a kṛtvā samayam avyagro bhavān vai sahito mayā
c yo bhaved dhṛdi saṃkalpaḥ śubho vā yadi vāśubhaḥ
a anyonyasya sa ākhyeya iti tad vai mṛṣā kṛtam
c bhavatā vacanaṃ brahmaṃs tasmād etad vadāmy aham
a na hi kāmaṃ pravartantaṃ bhavān ācaṣṭa me purā
c sukumāryāṃ kumāryāṃ te tasmād eṣa śapāmy aham
a brahmavādī gurur yasmāt tapasvī brāhmaṇaś ca san
c akārṣīḥ samayabhraṃśam āvābhyāṃ yaḥ kṛto mithaḥ
a śapsye tasmāt susaṃkruddho bhavantaṃ taṃ nibodha me
c sukumārī ca te bhāryā bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
a vānaraṃ caiva kanyā tvāṃ vivāhāt prabhṛti prabho
c saṃdrakṣyanti narāś cānye svarūpeṇa vinākṛtam
a sa tad vākyaṃ tu vijñāya nāradaḥ parvatāt tadā
c aśapat tam api krodhād bhāgineyaṃ sa mātulaḥ
a tapasā brahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca
c yukto 'pi dharmanityaś ca na svargavāsam āpsyasi
a tau tu śaptvā bhṛśaṃ kruddhau parasparam amarṣaṇau
c pratijagmatur anyonyaṃ kruddhāv iva gajottamau
a parvataḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ vicacāra mahāmuniḥ
c pūjyamāno yathānyāyaṃ tejasā svena bhārata
a atha tām alabhat kanyāṃ nāradaḥ sṛñjayātmajām
c dharmeṇa dharmapravaraḥ sukumārīm aninditām
a sā tu kanyā yathāśāpaṃ nāradaṃ taṃ dadarśa ha
c pāṇigrahaṇamantrāṇāṃ prayogād eva vānaram
a sukumārī ca devarṣiṃ vānarapratimānanam
c naivāvamanyata tadā prītimaty eva cābhavat
a upatasthe ca bhartāraṃ na cānyaṃ manasāpy agāt
c devaṃ muniṃ vā yakṣaṃ vā patitve pativatsalā
a tataḥ kadā cid bhagavān parvato 'nusasāra ha
c vanaṃ virahitaṃ kiṃ cit tatrāpaśyat sa nāradam
a tato 'bhivādya provāca nāradaṃ parvatas tadā
c bhavān prasādaṃ kurutāṃ svargādeśāya me prabho
a tam uvāca tato dṛṣṭvā parvataṃ nāradas tadā
c kṛtāñjalim upāsīnaṃ dīnaṃ dīnataraḥ svayam
a tvayāhaṃ prathamaṃ śapto vānaras tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
c ity uktena mayā paścāc chaptas tvam api matsarāt
e adyaprabhṛti vai vāsaṃ svarge nāvāpsyasīti ha
a tava naitad dhi sadṛśaṃ putrasthāne hi me bhavān
c nivartayetāṃ tau śāpam anyo 'nyena tadā munī
a śrīsamṛddhaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā nāradaṃ devarūpiṇam
c sukumārī pradudrāva parapaty abhiśaṅkayā
a tāṃ parvatas tato dṛṣṭvā pradravantīm aninditām
c abravīt tava bhartaiṣa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
a ṛṣiḥ paramadharmātmā nārado bhagavān prabhuḥ
c tavaivābhedyahṛdayo mā te bhūd atra saṃśayaḥ
a sānunītā bahuvidhaṃ parvatena mahātmanā
c śāpadoṣaṃ ca taṃ bhartuḥ śrutvā svāṃ prakṛtiṃ gatā
e parvato 'tha yayau svargaṃ nārado 'tha yayau gṛhān
a pratyakṣakarmā sarvasya nārado 'yaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
c eṣa vakṣyati vai pṛṣṭo yathā vṛttaṃ narottama
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato rājā pāṇḍusuto nāradaṃ pratyabhāṣata
c bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi suvarṇaṣṭhīvisaṃbhavam
a evam uktaḥ sa ca munir dharmarājena nāradaḥ
c ācacakṣe yathā vṛttaṃ suvarṇaṣṭhīvinaṃ prati
a evam etan mahārāja yathāyaṃ keśavo 'bravīt
c kāryasyāsya tu yac cheṣaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi pṛcchataḥ
a ahaṃ ca parvataś caiva svasrīyo me mahāmuniḥ
c vastukāmāv abhigatau sṛñjayaṃ jayatāṃ varam
a tatra saṃpūjitau tena vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
c sarvakāmaiḥ suvihitau nivasāvo 'sya veśmani
a vyatikrāntāsu varṣāsu samaye gamanasya ca
c parvato mām uvācedaṃ kāle vacanam arthavat
a āvām asya narendrasya gṛhe paramapūjitau
c uṣitau samaye brahmaṃś cintyatām atra sāṃpratam
a tato 'ham abruvaṃ rājan parvataṃ śubhadarśanam
c sarvam etat tvayi vibho bhāgineyopapadyate
a vareṇa chandyatāṃ rājā labhatāṃ yad yad icchati
c āvayos tapasā siddhiṃ prāpnotu yadi manyase
a tata āhūya rājānaṃ sṛñjayaṃ śubhadarśanam
c parvato 'numataṃ vākyam uvāca munipuṃgavaḥ
a prītau svo nṛpa satkārais tava hy ārjavasaṃbhṛtaiḥ
c āvābhyām abhyanujñāto varaṃ nṛvara cintaya
a devānām avihiṃsāyāṃ yad bhaven mānuṣakṣamam
c tad gṛhāṇa mahārāja pūjārho nau mato bhavān
 sṛñjaya uvāca
a prītau bhavantau yadi me kṛtam etāvatā mama
c eṣa eva paro lābho nirvṛtto me mahāphalaḥ
 nārada uvāca
a tam evaṃvādinaṃ bhūyaḥ parvataḥ pratyabhāṣata
c vṛṇīṣva rājan saṃkalpo yas te hṛdi ciraṃ sthitaḥ
 sṛñjaya uvāca
a abhīpsāmi sutaṃ vīraṃ vīryavantaṃ dṛḍhavratam
c āyuṣmantaṃ mahābhāgaṃ devarājasamadyutim
 parvata uvāca
a bhaviṣyaty eṣa te kāmo na tv āyuṣmān bhaviṣyati
c devarājābhibhūtyarthaṃ saṃkalpo hy eṣa te hṛdi
a suvarṇaṣṭhīvanāc caiva svarṇaṣṭhīvī bhaviṣyati
c rakṣyaś ca devarājāt sa devarājasamadyutiḥ
 nārada uvāca
a tac chrutvā sṛñjayo vākyaṃ parvatasya mahātmanaḥ
c prasādayām āsa tadā naitad evaṃ bhaved iti
a āyuṣmān me bhavet putro bhavatas tapasā mune
c na ca taṃ parvataḥ kiṃ cid uvācendravyapekṣayā
a tam ahaṃ nṛpatiṃ dīnam abruvaṃ punar eva tu
c smartavyo 'haṃ mahārāja darśayiṣyāmi te smṛtaḥ
a ahaṃ te dayitaṃ putraṃ pretarājavaśaṃ gatam
c punar dāsyāmi tad rūpaṃ mā śucaḥ pṛthivīpate
a evam uktvā tu nṛpatiṃ prayātau svo yathepsitam
c sṛñjayaś ca yathākāmaṃ praviveśa svamandiram
a sṛñjayasyātha rājarṣeḥ kasmiṃś cit kālaparyaye
c jajñe putro mahāvīryas tejasā prajvalann iva
a vavṛdhe sa yathākālaṃ sarasīva mahotpalam
c babhūva kāñcanaṣṭhīvī yathārthaṃ nāma tasya tat
a tad adbhutatamaṃ loke paprathe kurusattama
c bubudhe tac ca devendro varadānaṃ mahātmanoḥ
a tatas tv abhibhavād bhīto bṛhaspatimate sthitaḥ
c kumārasyāntaraprekṣī babhūva balavṛtrahā
a codayām āsa vajraṃ sa divyāstraṃ mūrtisaṃsthitam
c vyāghro bhūtvā jahīmaṃ tvaṃ rājaputram iti prabho
a vivṛddhaḥ kila vīryeṇa mām eṣo 'bhibhaviṣyati
c sṛñjayasya suto vajra yathainaṃ parvato dadau
a evam uktas tu śakreṇa vajraḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ
c kumārasyāntaraprekṣī nityam evānvapadyata
a sṛñjayo 'pi sutaṃ prāpya devarājasamadyutim
c hṛṣṭaḥ sāntaḥpuro rājā vananityo 'bhavat tadā
a tato bhāgīrathītīre kadā cid vananirjhare
c dhātrīdvitīyo bālaḥ sa krīḍārthaṃ paryadhāvata
a pañcavarṣakadeśīyo bālo nāgendravikramaḥ
c sahasotpatitaṃ vyāghram āsasāda mahābalaḥ
a tena caiva viniṣpiṣṭo vepamāno nṛpātmajaḥ
c vyasuḥ papāta medinyāṃ tato dhātrī vicukruśe
a hatvā tu rājaputraṃ sa tatraivāntaradhīyata
c śārdūlo devarājasya māyayāntarhitas tadā
a dhātryās tu ninadaṃ śrutvā rudatyāḥ paramārtavat
c abhyadhāvata taṃ deśaṃ svayam eva mahīpatiḥ
a sa dadarśa gatāsuṃ taṃ śayānaṃ pītaśoṇitam
c kumāraṃ vigatānandaṃ niśākaram iva cyutam
a sa tam utsaṅgam āropya paripīḍitavakṣasam
c putraṃ rudhirasaṃsiktaṃ paryadevayad āturaḥ
a tatas tā mātaras tasya rudantyaḥ śokakarśitāḥ
c abhyadhāvanta taṃ deśaṃ yatra rājā sa sṛñjayaḥ
a tataḥ sa rājā sasmāra mām antargatamānasaḥ
c tac cāhaṃ cintitaṃ jñātvā gatavāṃs tasya darśanam
a sa mayaitāni vākyāni śrāvitaḥ śokalālasaḥ
c yāni te yaduvīreṇa kathitāni mahīpate
a saṃjīvitaś cāpi mayā vāsavānumate tadā
c bhavitavyaṃ tathā tac ca na tac chakyam ato 'nyathā
a ata ūrdhvaṃ kumāraḥ sa svarṇaṣṭhīvī mahāyaśāḥ
c cittaṃ prasādayām āsa pitur mātuś ca vīryavān
a kārayām āsa rājyaṃ sa pitari svargate vibhuḥ
c varṣāṇām ekaśatavat sahasraṃ bhīmavikramaḥ
a tata iṣṭvā mahāyajñair bahubhir bhūridakṣiṇaiḥ
c tarpayām āsa devāṃś ca pitṝṃś caiva mahādyutiḥ
a utpādya ca bahūn putrān kulasaṃtānakāriṇaḥ
c kālena mahatā rājan kāladharmam upeyivān
a sa tvaṃ rājendra saṃjātaṃ śokam etan nivartaya
c yathā tvāṃ keśavaḥ prāha vyāsaś ca sumahātapāḥ
a pitṛpaitāmahaṃ rājyam āsthāya duram udvaha
c iṣṭvā puṇyair mahāyajñair iṣṭāṃl lokān avāpsyasi
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tūṣṇīṃbhūtaṃ tu rājānaṃ śocamānaṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c tapasvī dharmatattvajñaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'bravīt
a prajānāṃ pālanaṃ dharmo rājñāṃ rājīvalocana
c dharmaḥ pramāṇaṃ lokasya nityaṃ dharmānuvartanam
a anutiṣṭhasva vai rājan pitṛpaitāmahaṃ padam
c brāhmaṇeṣu ca yo dharmaḥ sa nityo vedaniścitaḥ
a tat pramāṇaṃ pramāṇānāṃ śāśvataṃ bharatarṣabha
c tasya dharmasya kṛtsnasya kṣatriyaḥ parirakṣitā
a tathā yaḥ pratihanty asya śāsanaṃ viṣaye naraḥ
c sa bāhubhyāṃ vinigrāhyo lokayātrāvighātakaḥ
a pramāṇam apramāṇaṃ yaḥ kuryān mohavaśaṃ gataḥ
c bhṛtyo vā yadi vā putras tapasvī vāpi kaś cana
e pāpān sarvair upāyais tān niyacched ghātayeta vā
a ato 'nyathā vartamāno rājā prāpnoti kilbiṣam
c dharmaṃ vinaśyamānaṃ hi yo na rakṣet sa dharmahā
a te tvayā dharmahantāro nihatāḥ sapadānugāḥ
c svadharme vartamānas tvaṃ kiṃ nu śocasi pāṇḍava
e rājā hi hanyād dadyāc ca prajā rakṣec ca dharmataḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a na te 'bhiśaṅke vacanaṃ yad bravīṣi tapodhana
c aparokṣo hi te dharmaḥ sarvadharmabhṛtāṃ vara
a mayā hy avadhyā bahavo ghātitā rājyakāraṇāt
c tāny akāryāṇi me brahman dahanti ca tapanti ca
 vyāsa uvāca
a īśvaro vā bhavet kartā puruṣo vāpi bhārata
c haṭho vā vartate loke karmajaṃ vā phalaṃ smṛtam
a īśvareṇa niyuktā hi sādhv asādhu ca pārthiva
c kurvanti puruṣāḥ karma phalam īśvaragāmi tat
a yathā hi puruṣaś chindyād vṛkṣaṃ paraśunā vane
c chettur eva bhavet pāpaṃ paraśor na kathaṃ cana
a atha vā tad upādānāt prāpnuyuḥ karmaṇaḥ phalam
c daṇḍaśastrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ puruṣe tan na vidyate
a na caitad iṣṭaṃ kaunteya yad anyena phalaṃ kṛtam
c prāpnuyād iti tasmāc ca īśvare tan niveśaya
a atha vā puruṣaḥ kartā karmaṇoḥ śubhapāpayoḥ
c na paraṃ vidyate tasmād evam anyac chubhaṃ kuru
a na hi kaś cit kva cid rājan diṣṭāt pratinivartate
c daṇḍaśastrakṛtaṃ pāpaṃ puruṣe tan na vidyate
a yadi vā manyase rājan haṭhe lokaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
c evam apy aśubhaṃ karma na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
a athābhipattir lokasya kartavyā śubhapāpayoḥ
c abhipannatamaṃ loke rājñām udyatadaṇḍanam
a athāpi loke karmāṇi samāvartanta bhārata
c śubhāśubhaphalaṃ ceme prāpnuvantīti me matiḥ
a evaṃ satyaṃ śubhādeśaṃ karmaṇas tat phalaṃ dhruvam
c tyaja tad rājaśārdūla maivaṃ śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
a svadharme vartamānasya sāpavāde 'pi bhārata
c evam ātmaparityāgas tava rājan na śobhanaḥ
a vihitānīha kaunteya prāyaścittāni karmiṇām
c śarīravāṃs tāni kuryād aśarīraḥ parābhavet
a tad rājañ jīvamānas tvaṃ prāyaścittaṃ cariṣyasi
c prāyaścittam akṛtvā tu pretya taptāsi bhārata
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a hatāḥ putrāś ca pautrāś ca bhrātaraḥ pitaras tathā
c śvaśurā guravaś caiva mātulāḥ sapitāmahāḥ
a kṣatriyāś ca mahātmānaḥ saṃbandhisuhṛdas tathā
c vayasyā jñātayaś caiva bhrātaraś ca pitāmaha
a bahavaś ca manuṣyendrā nānādeśasamāgatāḥ
c ghātitā rājyalubdhena mayaikena pitāmaha
a tāṃs tādṛśān ahaṃ hatvā dharmanityān mahīkṣitaḥ
c asakṛt somapān vīrān kiṃ prāpsyāmi tapodhana
a dahyāmy aniśam adyāhaṃ cintayānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
c hīnāṃ pārthivasiṃhais taiḥ śrīmadbhiḥ pṛthivīm imām
a dṛṣṭvā jñātivadhaṃ ghoraṃ hatāṃś ca śataśaḥ parān
c koṭiśaś ca narān anyān paritapye pitāmaha
a kā nu tāsāṃ varastrīṇām avasthādya bhaviṣyati
c vihīnānāṃ svatanayaiḥ patibhir bhrātṛbhis tathā
a asmān antakarān ghorān pāṇḍavān vṛṣṇisaṃhitān
c ākrośantyaḥ kṛśā dīnā nipatantyaś ca bhūtale
a apaśyantyaḥ pitṝn bhrātṝn patīn putrāṃś ca yoṣitaḥ
c tyaktvā prāṇān priyān sarvā gamiṣyanti yamakṣayam
a vatsalatvād dvijaśreṣṭha tatra me nāsti saṃśayaḥ
c vyaktaṃ saukṣmyāc ca dharmasya prāpsyāmaḥ strīvadhaṃ vayam
a te vayaṃ suhṛdo hatvā kṛtvā pāpam anantakam
c narake nipatiṣyāmo hy adhaḥśirasa eva ca
a śarīrāṇi vimokṣyāmas tapasogreṇa sattama
c āśramāṃś ca viśeṣāṃs tvaṃ mamācakṣva pitāmaha
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a yudhiṣṭhirasya tad vākyaṃ śrutvā dvaipāyanas tadā
c samīkṣya nipuṇaṃ buddhyā ṛṣiḥ provāca pāṇḍavam
a mā viṣādaṃ kṛthā rājan kṣatradharmam anusmara
c svadharmeṇa hatā hy ete kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabha
a kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ śriyaṃ kṛtsnāṃ pṛthivyāṃ ca mahad yaśaḥ
c kṛtāntavidhisaṃyuktāḥ kālena nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
a na tvaṃ hantā na bhīmo 'pi nārjuno na yamāv api
c kālaḥ paryāyadharmeṇa prāṇān ādatta dehinām
a na yasya mātāpitarau nānugrāhyo 'sti kaś cana
c karmasākṣī prajānāṃ yas tena kālena saṃhṛtāḥ
a hetumātram idaṃ tasya kālasya puruṣarṣabha
c yad dhanti bhūtair bhūtāni tad asmai rūpam aiśvaram
a karmamūrtyātmakaṃ viddhi sākṣiṇaṃ śubhapāpayoḥ
c sukhaduḥkhaguṇodarkaṃ kālaṃ kālaphalapradam
a teṣām api mahābāho karmāṇi paricintaya
c vināśahetukāritve yais te kālavaśaṃ gatāḥ
a ātmanaś ca vijānīhi niyamavrataśīlatām
c yadā tvam īdṛśaṃ karma vidhinākramya kāritaḥ
a tvaṣṭreva vihitaṃ yantraṃ yathā sthāpayitur vaśe
c karmaṇā kālayuktena tathedaṃ bhrāmyate jagat
a puruṣasya hi dṛṣṭvemām utpattim animittataḥ
c yadṛcchayā vināśaṃ ca śokaharṣāv anarthakau
a vyalīkaṃ cāpi yat tv atra cittavaitaṃsikaṃ tava
c tadartham iṣyate rājan prāyaścittaṃ tad ācara
a idaṃ ca śrūyate pārtha yuddhe devāsure purā
c asurā bhrātaro jyeṣṭhā devāś cāpi yavīyasaḥ
a teṣām api śrīnimittaṃ mahān āsīt samucchrayaḥ
c yuddhaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi dvātriṃśad abhavat kila
a ekārṇavāṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā rudhireṇa pariplutām
c jaghnur daityāṃs tadā devās tridivaṃ caiva lebhire
a tathaiva pṛthivīṃ labdhvā brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
c saṃśritā dānavānāṃ vai sāhyārthe darpamohitāḥ
a śālāvṛkā iti khyātās triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
c aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi te cāpi vibudhair hatāḥ
a dharmavyucchittim icchanto ye 'dharmasya pravartakāḥ
c hantavyās te durātmāno devair daityā ivolbaṇāḥ
a ekaṃ hatvā yadi kule śiṣṭānāṃ syād anāmayam
c kulaṃ hatvātha rāṣṭraṃ vā na tad vṛttopaghātakam
a adharmarūpo dharmo hi kaś cid asti narādhipa
c dharmaś cādharmarūpo 'sti tac ca jñeyaṃ vipaścitā
a tasmāt saṃstambhayātmānaṃ śrutavān asi pāṇḍava
c devaiḥ pūrvagataṃ mārgam anuyāto 'si bhārata
a na hīdṛśā gamiṣyanti narakaṃ pāṇḍavarṣabha
c bhrātṝn āśvāsayaitāṃs tvaṃ suhṛdaś ca paraṃtapa
a yo hi pāpasamārambhe kārye tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ
c kurvann api tathaiva syāt kṛtvā ca nirapatrapaḥ
a tasmiṃs tat kaluṣaṃ sarvaṃ samāptam iti śabditam
c prāyaścittaṃ na tasyāsti hrāso vā pāpakarmaṇaḥ
a tvaṃ tu śuklābhijātīyaḥ paradoṣeṇa kāritaḥ
c anicchamānaḥ karmedaṃ kṛtvā ca paritapyase
a aśvamedho mahāyajñaḥ prāyaścittam udāhṛtam
c tam āhara mahārāja vipāpmaivaṃ bhaviṣyasi
a marudbhiḥ saha jitvārīn maghavān pākaśāsanaḥ
c ekaikaṃ kratum āhṛtya śatakṛtvaḥ śatakratuḥ
a pūtapāpmā jitasvargo lokān prāpya sukhodayān
c marudgaṇavṛtaḥ śakraḥ śuśubhe bhāsayan diśaḥ
a svargaloke mahīyantam apsarobhiḥ śacīpatim
c ṛṣayaḥ paryupāsante devāś ca vibudheśvaram
a so 'yaṃ tvam iha saṃkrānto vikrameṇa vasuṃdharām
c nirjitāś ca mahīpālā vikrameṇa tvayānagha
a teṣāṃ purāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi gatvā rājan suhṛdvṛtaḥ
c bhrātṝn putrāṃś ca pautrāṃś ca sve sve rājye 'bhiṣecaya
a bālān api ca garbhasthān sāntvāni samudācaran
c rañjayan prakṛtīḥ sarvāḥ paripāhi vasuṃdharām
a kumāro nāsti yeṣāṃ ca kanyās tatrābhiṣecaya
c kāmāśayo hi strīvargaḥ śokam evaṃ prahāsyati
a evam āśvāsanaṃ kṛtvā sarvarāṣṭreṣu bhārata
c yajasva vājimedhena yathendro vijayī purā
a aśocyās te mahātmānaḥ kṣatriyāḥ kṣatriyarṣabha
c svakarmabhir gatā nāśaṃ kṛtāntabalamohitāḥ
a avāptaḥ kṣatradharmas te rājyaṃ prāptam akalmaṣam
c carasva dharmaṃ kaunteya śreyān yaḥ pretya bhāvikaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kāni kṛtveha karmāṇi prāyaścittīyate naraḥ
c kiṃ kṛtvā caiva mucyeta tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 vyāsa uvāca
a akurvan vihitaṃ karma pratiṣiddhāni cācaran
c prāyaścittīyate hy evaṃ naro mithyā ca vartayan
a sūryeṇābhyudito yaś ca brahmacārī bhavaty uta
c tathā sūryābhinirmuktaḥ kunakhī śyāvadann api
a parivittiḥ parivettā brahmojjho yaś ca kutsakaḥ
c didhiṣūpatis tathā yaḥ syād agredidhiṣur eva ca
a avakīrṇī bhaved yaś ca dvijātivadhakas tathā
c atīrthe brahmaṇas tyāgī tīrthe cāpratipādakaḥ
a grāmayājī ca kaunteya rājñaś ca parivikrayī
c śūdrastrīvadhako yaś ca pūrvaḥ pūrvas tu garhitaḥ
a vṛthāpaśusamālambhī vanadāhasya kārakaḥ
c anṛtenopacartā ca pratiroddhā guros tathā
a yaś cāgnīn apavidhyeta tathaiva brahmavikrayī
c etāny enāṃsi sarvāṇi vyutkrāntasamayaś ca yaḥ
a akāryāṇy api vakṣyāmi yāni tāni nibodha me
c lokavedaviruddhāni tāny ekāgramanāḥ śṛṇu
a svadharmasya parityāgaḥ paradharmasya ca kriyā
c ayājyayājanaṃ caiva tathābhakṣyasya bhakṣaṇam
a śaraṇāgatasaṃtyāgo bhṛtyasyābharaṇaṃ tathā
c rasānāṃ vikrayaś cāpi tiryagyonivadhas tathā
a ādhānādīni karmāṇi śaktimān na karoti yaḥ
c aprayacchaṃś ca sarvāṇi nityaṃ deyāni bhārata
a dakṣiṇānām adānaṃ ca brāhmaṇasvābhimarśanam
c sarvāṇy etāny akāryāṇi prāhur dharmavido janāḥ
a pitrā vibhajate putro yaś ca syād gurutalpagaḥ
c aprajāyann adharmeṇa bhavaty ādharmiko janaḥ
a uktāny etāni karmāṇi vistareṇetareṇa ca
c yāni kurvann akurvaṃś ca prāyaścittīyate janaḥ
a etāny eva tu karmāṇi kriyamāṇāni mānavān
c yeṣu yeṣu nimitteṣu na limpanty atha tac chṛṇu
a pragṛhya śastram āyāntam api vedāntagaṃ raṇe
c jighāṃsantaṃ nihatyājau na tena brahmahā bhavet
a api cāpy atra kaunteya mantro vedeṣu paṭhyate
c vedapramāṇavihitaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ prabravīmi te
a apetaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vṛttād yo hanyād ātatāyinam
c na tena brahmahā sa syān manyus taṃ manyum ṛcchati
a prāṇātyaye tathājñānād ācaran madirām api
c acodito dharmaparaḥ punaḥ saṃskāram arhati
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kaunteyābhakṣyabhakṣaṇam
c prāyaścittavidhānena sarvam etena śudhyati
a gurutalpaṃ hi gurvarthe na dūṣayati mānavam
c uddālakaḥ śvetaketuṃ janayām āsa śiṣyataḥ
a steyaṃ kurvaṃs tu gurvartham āpatsu na nibadhyate
c bahuśaḥ kāmakāreṇa na ced yaḥ saṃpravartate
a anyatra brāhmaṇasvebhya ādadāno na duṣyati
c svayam aprāśitā yaś ca na sa pāpena lipyate
a prāṇatrāṇe 'nṛtaṃ vācyam ātmano vā parasya vā
c gurvarthe strīṣu caiva syād vivāhakaraṇeṣu ca
a nāvartate vrataṃ svapne śukramokṣe kathaṃ cana
c ājyahomaḥ samiddhe 'gnau prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate
a pārivittyaṃ ca patite nāsti pravrajite tathā
c bhikṣite pāradāryaṃ ca na tad dharmasya dūṣakam
a vṛthāpaśusamālambhaṃ naiva kuryān na kārayet
c anugrahaḥ paśūṇāṃ hi saṃskāro vidhicoditaḥ
a anarhe brāhmaṇe dattam ajñānāt tan na dūṣakam
c sakāraṇaṃ tathā tīrthe 'tīrthe vā pratipādanam
a striyas tathāpacāriṇyo niṣkṛtiḥ syād adūṣikā
c api sā pūyate tena na tu bhartā praduṣyate
a tattvaṃ jñātvā tu somasya vikrayaḥ syād adūṣakaḥ
c asamarthasya bhṛtyasya visargaḥ syād adoṣavān
e vanadāho gavām arthe kriyamāṇo na dūṣakaḥ
a uktāny etāni karmāṇi yāni kurvan na duṣyati
c prāyaścittāni vakṣyāmi vistareṇaiva bhārata
d yāni kṛtvā naraḥ pūto bhaviṣyati narādhipa
 vyāsa uvāca
a tapasā karmabhiś caiva pradānena ca bhārata
c punāti pāpaṃ puruṣaḥ pūtaś cen na pravartate
a ekakālaṃ tu bhuñjānaś caran bhaikṣaṃ svakarmakṛt
c kapālapāṇiḥ khaṭvāṅgī brahmacārī sadotthitaḥ
a anasūyur adhaḥśāyī karma loke prakāśayan
c pūrṇair dvādaśabhir varṣair brahmahā vipramucyate
d lakṣyaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ vā syād viduṣām icchayātmanaḥ
d prāsyed ātmānam agnau vā samiddhe trir avākśirāḥ
d japan vānyatamaṃ vedaṃ yojanānāṃ śataṃ vrajet
d sarvasvaṃ vā vedavide brāhmaṇāyopapādayet
d dhanaṃ vā jīvanāyālaṃ gṛhaṃ vā saparicchadam
d mucyate brahmahatyāyā goptā gobrāhmaṇasya ca
a ṣaḍbhir varṣaiḥ kṛcchrabhojī brahmahā pūyate naraḥ
c māse māse samaśnaṃs tu tribhir varṣaiḥ pramucyate
a saṃvatsareṇa māsāśī pūyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
c tathaivoparaman rājan svalpenāpi pramucyate
a kratunā cāśvamedhena pūyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
c ya cāsyāvabhṛthe snānti ke cid evaṃvidhā narāḥ
a te sarve pūtapāpmāno bhavantīti parā śrutiḥ
c brāhmaṇārthe hato yuddhe mucyate brahmahatyayā
a gavāṃ śatasahasraṃ tu pātrebhyaḥ pratipādayan
c brahmahā vipramucyeta sarvapāpebhya eva ca
a kapilānāṃ sahasrāṇi yo dadyāt pañcaviṃśatim
c dogdhrīṇāṃ sa ca pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vipramucyate
a gosahasraṃ savatsānāṃ dogdhrīṇāṃ prāṇasaṃśaye
c sādhubhyo vai daridrebhyo dattvā mucyeta kilbiṣāt
a śataṃ tai yas tu kāmbojān brāhmaṇebhyaḥ prayacchati
c niyatebhyo mahīpāla sa ca pāpāt pramucyate
a manorathaṃ tu yo dadyād ekasmā api bhārata
c na kīrtayeta dattvā yaḥ sa ca pāpāt pramucyate
a surāpānaṃ sakṛt pītvā yo 'gnivarṇāṃ pibed dvijaḥ
c sa pāvayaty athātmānam iha loke paratra ca
a meruprapātaṃ prapatañ jvalanaṃ vā samāviśan
c mahāprasthānam ātiṣṭhan mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
a bṛhaspatisaveneṣṭvā surāpo brāhmaṇaḥ punaḥ
c samitiṃ brāhmaṇair gacched iti vai brāhmaṇī śrutiḥ
a bhūmipradānaṃ kuryād yaḥ surāṃ pītvā vimatsaraḥ
c punar na ca pibed rājan saṃskṛtaḥ śudhyate naraḥ
a gurutalpī śilāṃ taptām āyasīm adhisaṃviśet
c pāṇāv ādhāya vā śephaṃ pravrajed ūrdhvadarśanaḥ
a śarīrasya vimokṣeṇa mucyate karmaṇo 'śubhāt
c karmabhyo vipramucyante yattāḥ saṃvatsaraṃ striyaḥ
a mahāvrataṃ cared yas tu dadyāt sarvasvam eva tu
c gurvarthe vā hato yuddhe sa mucyet karmaṇo 'śubhāt
a anṛtenopacartā ca pratiroddhā guros tathā
c upahṛtya priyaṃ tasmai tasmāt pāpāt pramucyate
a avakīrṇinimittaṃ tu brahmahatyāvrataṃ caret
c kharacarmavāsāḥ ṣaṇmāsaṃ tathā mucyeta kilbiṣāt
a paradārāpahārī ca parasyāpaharan vasu
c saṃvatsaraṃ vratī bhūtvā tathā mucyeta kilbiṣāt
a steyaṃ tu yasyāpaharet tasmai dadyāt samaṃ vasu
c vividhenābhyupāyena tena mucyeta kilbiṣāt
a kṛcchrād dvādaśarātreṇa svabhyastena daśāvaram
c parivettā bhavet pūtaḥ parivittiś ca bhārata
a niveśyaṃ tu bhavet tena sadā tārayitā pitṝn
c na tu striyā bhaved doṣo na tu sā tena lipyate
a bhajane hy ṛtunā śuddhaṃ cāturmāsyaṃ vidhīyate
c striyas tena viśudhyanti iti dharmavido viduḥ
a striyas tv āśaṅkitāḥ pāpair nopagamyā hi jānatā
c rajasā tā viśudhyante bhasmanā bhājanaṃ yathā
d pādajocchiṣṭakāṃsyaṃ ca gavāghrātam athāpi vā
d gaṇḍūṣocchiṣṭam api vā viśuddhyed daśabhis tu tat
a catuṣpāt sakalo dharmo brāhmaṇānāṃ vidhīyate
c pādāvakṛṣṭo rājanye tathā dharmo vidhīyate
a tathā vaiśye ca śūdre ca pādaḥ pādo vidhīyate
c vidyād evaṃvidhenaiṣāṃ gurulāghavaniścayam
a tiryagyonivadhaṃ kṛtvā drumāṃś chittvetarān bahūn
c trirātraṃ vāyubhakṣaḥ syāt karma ca prathayen naraḥ
a agamyāgamane rājan prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate
c ārdravastreṇa ṣaṇmāsaṃ vihāryaṃ bhasmaśāyinā
a eṣa eva tu sarveṣām akāryāṇāṃ vidhir bhavet
c brāhmaṇoktena vidhinā dṛṣṭāntāgamahetubhiḥ
a sāvitrīm apy adhīyānaḥ śucau deśe mitāśanaḥ
c ahiṃsro 'mandako 'jalpan mucyate sarvakilbiṣaiḥ
a ahaḥsu satataṃ tiṣṭhed abhyākāśaṃ niśi svapet
c trir ahnas trir niśāyāś ca savāsā jalam āviśet
a strīśūdrapatitāṃś cāpi nābhibhāṣed vratānvitaḥ
c pāpāny ajñānataḥ kṛtvā mucyed evaṃvrato dvijaḥ
a śubhāśubhaphalaṃ pretya labhate bhūtasākṣikaḥ
c atiricyet tayor yat tu tat kartā labhate phalam
a tasmād dānena tapasā karmaṇā ca śubhaṃ phalam
c vardhayed aśubhaṃ kṛtvā yathā syād atirekavān
a kuryāc chubhāni karmāṇi nimitte pāpakarmaṇām
c dadyān nityaṃ ca vittāni tathā mucyeta kilbiṣāt
a anurūpaṃ hi pāpasya prāyaścittam udāhṛtam
c mahāpātakavarjaṃ tu prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate
a bhakṣyābhakṣyeṣu sarveṣu vācyāvācye tathaiva ca
c ajñānajñānayo rājan vihitāny anujānate
a jānatā tu kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ guru sarvaṃ bhavaty uta
c ajñānāt skhalite doṣe prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate
a śakyate vidhinā pāpaṃ yathoktena vyapohitum
c āstike śraddadhāne tu vidhir eṣa vidhīyate
a nāstikāśraddadhāneṣu puruṣeṣu kadā cana
c dambhadoṣapradhāneṣu vidhir eṣa na dṛśyate
a śiṣṭācāraś ca śiṣṭaś ca dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
c sevitavyo naravyāghra pretya ceha sukhārthinā
a sa rājan mokṣyase pāpāt tena pūrveṇa hetunā
c trāṇārthaṃ vā vadhenaiṣām atha vā nṛpakarmaṇā
a atha vā te ghṛṇā kā cit prāyaścittaṃ cariṣyasi
c mā tv evānāryajuṣṭena karmaṇā nidhanaṃ gamaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam ukto bhagavatā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c cintayitvā muhūrtaṃ tu pratyuvāca tapodhanam
a kiṃ bhakṣyaṃ kim abhakṣyaṃ ca kiṃ ca deyaṃ praśasyate
c kiṃ ca pātram apātraṃ vā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 vyāsa uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c siddhānāṃ caiva saṃvādaṃ manoś caiva prajāpateḥ
a siddhās tapovrataparāḥ samāgamya purā vibhum
c dharmaṃ papracchur āsīnam ādikāle prajāpatim
a katham annaṃ kathaṃ dānaṃ katham adhyayanaṃ tapaḥ
c kāryākāryaṃ ca naḥ sarvaṃ śaṃsa vai tvaṃ prajāpate
a tair evam ukto bhagavān manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo 'bravīt
c śuśrūṣadhvaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ dharmaṃ vyāsasamāsataḥ
d anādeśe japo homa upavāsas tathaiva ca
d ātmajñānaṃ puṇyanadyo yatra prāyaś ca tatparāḥ
d anādiṣṭaṃ tathaitāni puṇyāni dharaṇībhṛtaḥ
d suvarṇaprāśanam api ratnādisnānam eva ca
d devasthānābhigamanam ājyaprāśanam eva ca
d etāni medhyaṃ puruṣaṃ kurvanty āśu na saṃśayaḥ
d na garveṇa bhavet prājñaḥ kadā cid api mānavaḥ
d dīrgham āyur athecchan hi trirātraṃ coṣṇapo bhavet
a adattasyānupādānaṃ dānam adhyayanaṃ tapaḥ
c ahiṃsā satyam akrodhaḥ kṣamejyā dharmalakṣaṇam
a ya eva dharmaḥ so 'dharmo 'deśe 'kāle pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c ādānam anṛtaṃ hiṃsā dharmo vyāvasthikaḥ smṛtaḥ
a dvividhau cāpy ubhāv etau dharmādharmau vijānatām
c apravṛttiḥ pravṛttiś ca dvaividhyaṃ lokavedayoḥ
a apravṛtter amartyatvaṃ martyatvaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
c aśubhasyāśubhaṃ vidyāc chubhasya śubham eva ca
a etayoś cobhayoḥ syātāṃ śubhāśubhatayā tathā
c daivaṃ ca daivayuktaṃ ca prāṇaś ca pralayaś ca ha
a aprekṣāpūrvakaraṇād aśubhānāṃ śubhaṃ phalam
c ūrdhvaṃ bhavati saṃdehād iha dṛṣṭārtham eva vā
e aprekṣāpūrvakaraṇāt prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate
a krodhamohakṛte caiva dṛṣṭāntāgamahetubhiḥ
c śarīrāṇām upakleśo manasaś ca priyāpriye
e tad auṣadhaiś ca mantraiś ca prāyaścittaiś ca śāmyati
f upavāsam ekarātraṃ daṇḍotsarge narādhipaḥ
f viśudhyed ātmaśuddhyarthaṃ trirātraṃ tu purohitaḥ
f kṣayaṃ śokaṃ prakurvāṇo na mriyeta yadā naraḥ
f śastrādibhir upāviṣṭās trirātraṃ tatra nirdiśet
a jātiśreṇyadhivāsānāṃ kuladharmāṃś ca sarvataḥ
c varjayen na hi taṃ dharmaṃ yeṣāṃ dharmo na vidyate
a daśa vā vedaśāstrajñās trayo vā dharmapāṭhakāḥ
c yad brūyuḥ kārya utpanne sa dharmo dharmasaṃśaye
a aruṇā mṛttikā caiva tathā caiva pipīlakāḥ
c śleṣmātakas tathā viprair abhakṣyaṃ viṣam eva ca
a abhakṣyā brāhmaṇair matsyāḥ śakalair ye vivarjitāḥ
c catuṣpāt kacchapād anyo maṇḍūkā jalajāś ca ye
a bhāsā haṃsāḥ suparṇāś ca cakravākā bakāḥ plavāḥ
c kaṅko madguś ca gṛdhrāś ca kākolūkaṃ tathaiva ca
a kravyādāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ sarve catuṣpādāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
c yeṣāṃ cobhayato dantāś caturdaṃṣṭrāś ca sarvaśaḥ
a eḍakāśvakharoṣṭrīṇāṃ sūtikānāṃ gavām api
c mānuṣīṇāṃ mṛgīṇāṃ ca na pibed brāhmaṇaḥ payaḥ
a pretānnaṃ sūtikānnaṃ ca yac ca kiṃ cid anirdaśam
c abhojyaṃ cāpy apeyaṃ ca dhenvā dugdham anirdaśam
d rājānnaṃ teja ādatte śūdrānnaṃ brahmavarcasam
d āyuḥ suvarṇakārānnam avīrāyāś ca yoṣitaḥ
d viṣṭhā vārdhuṣikasyānnaṃ gaṇikānnam athendriyam
d mṛṣyanti ye copapatiṃ strījitānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
d dīkṣitasya kadaryasya kratuvikrayikasya ca
a takṣṇaś carmāvakartuś ca puṃś calyā rajakasya ca
c cikitsakasya yac cānnam abhojyaṃ rakṣiṇas tathā
a gaṇagrāmābhiśastānāṃ raṅgastrījīvinaś ca ye
c parivittinapuṃṣāṃ ca bandidyūtavidāṃ tathā
a vāryamāṇāhṛtaṃ cānnaṃ śuktaṃ paryuṣitaṃ ca yat
c surānugatam ucchiṣṭam abhojyaṃ śeṣitaṃ ca yat
a piṣṭamāṃsekṣuśākānāṃ vikārāḥ payasas tathā
c saktudhānākarambhāś ca nopabhojyāś cirasthitāḥ
a pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ māṃsam apūpāś ca vṛthā kṛtāḥ
c abhojyāś cāpy abhakṣyāś ca brāhmaṇair gṛhamedhibhiḥ
a devān pitṝn manuṣyāṃś ca munīn gṛhyāś ca devatāḥ
c pūjayitvā tataḥ paścād gṛhastho bhoktum arhati
a yathā pravrajito bhikṣur gṛhasthaḥ svagṛhe vaset
c evaṃvṛttaḥ priyair dāraiḥ saṃvasan dharmam āpnuyāt
a na dadyād yaśase dānaṃ na bhayān nopakāriṇe
c na nṛttagītaśīleṣu hāsakeṣu ca dhārmikaḥ
a na matte naiva conmatte na stene na cikitsake
c na vāgghīne vivarṇe vā nāṅgahīne na vāmane
a na durjane dauṣkule vā vratair vā yo na saṃskṛtaḥ
c aśrotriye mṛtaṃ dānaṃ brāhmaṇe 'brahmavādini
a asamyak caiva yad dattam asamyak ca pratigrahaḥ
c ubhayoḥ syād anarthāya dātur ādātur eva ca
a yathā khadiram ālambya śilāṃ vāpy arṇavaṃ taran
c majjate majjate tadvad dātā yaś ca pratīcchakaḥ
a kāṣṭhair ārdrair yathā vahnir upastīrṇo na dīpyate
c tapaḥsvādhyāyacāritrair evaṃ hīnaḥ pratigrahī
a kapāle yadvad āpaḥ syuḥ śvadṛtau vā yathā payaḥ
c āśrayasthānadoṣeṇa vṛttahīne tathā śrutam
a nirmantro nirvrato yaḥ syād aśāstrajño 'nasūyakaḥ
c anukrośāt pradātavyaṃ dīneṣv evaṃ nareṣv api
a na vai deyam anukrośād dīnāyāpy apakāriṇe
c āptācaritam ity eva dharma ity eva vā punaḥ
a niṣkāraṇaṃ sma tad dattaṃ brāhmaṇe dharmavarjite
c bhaved apātradoṣeṇa na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
a yathā dārumayo hastī yathā carmamayo mṛgaḥ
c brāhmaṇaś cānadhīyānas trayas te nāmadhārakāḥ
a yathā ṣaṇḍho 'phalaḥ strīṣu yathā gaur gavi cāphalā
c śakunir vāpy apakṣaḥ syān nirmantro brāhmaṇas tathā
a grāmadhānyaṃ yathā śūnyaṃ yathā kūpaś ca nirjalaḥ
c yathā hutam anagnau ca tathaiva syān nirākṛtau
a devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ ca havyakavyavināśanaḥ
c śatrur arthaharo mūrkho na lokān prāptum arhati
a etat te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ yathā vṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c samāsena mahad dhy etac chrotavyaṃ bharatarṣabha
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śrotum icchāmi bhagavan vistareṇa mahāmune
c rājadharmān dvijaśreṣṭha cāturvarṇyasya cākhilān
a āpatsu ca yathā nītir vidhātavyā mahīkṣitā
c dharmyam ālambya panthānaṃ vijayeyaṃ kathaṃ mahīm
a prāyaścittakathā hy eṣā bhakṣyābhakṣyavivardhitā
c kautūhalānupravaṇā harṣaṃ janayatīva me
a dharmacaryā ca rājyaṃ ca nityam eva virudhyate
c yena muhyati me cetaś cintayānasya nityaśaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tam uvāca mahātejā vyāso vedavidāṃ varaḥ
c nāradaṃ samabhiprekṣya sarvaṃ jānan purātanam
a śrotum icchasi ced dharmān akhilena yudhiṣṭhira
c praihi bhīṣmaṃ mahābāho vṛddhaṃ kurupitāmaham
a sa te sarvarahasyeṣu saṃśayān manasi sthitān
c chettā bhāgīrathīputraḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvadharmavit
a janayām āsa yaṃ devī divyā tripathagā nadī
c sākṣād dadarśa yo devān sarvāñ śakrapurogamān
a bṛhaspatipurogāṃś ca devarṣīn asakṛt prabhuḥ
c toṣayitvopacāreṇa rājanītim adhītavān
a uśanā veda yac chāstraṃ devāsuragurur dvijaḥ
c tac ca sarvaṃ savaiyākhyaṃ prāptavān kurusattamaḥ
a bhārgavāc cyavanāc cāpi vedān aṅgopabṛṃhitān
c pratipede mahābuddhir vasiṣṭhāc ca yatavratāt
a pitāmahasutaṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ kumāraṃ dīptatejasam
c adhyātmagatitattvajñam upāśikṣata yaḥ purā
a mārkaṇḍeyamukhāt kṛtsnaṃ yatidharmam avāptavān
c rāmād astrāṇi śakrāc ca prāptavān bharatarṣabha
a mṛtyur ātmecchayā yasya jātasya manujeṣv api
c tathānapatyasya sataḥ puṇyalokā divi śrutāḥ
a yasya brahmarṣayaḥ puṇyā nityam āsan sabhāsadaḥ
c yasya nāviditaṃ kiṃ cij jñānajñeyeṣu vidyate
a sa te vakṣyati dharmajñaḥ sūkṣmadharmārthatattvavit
c tam abhyehi purā prāṇān sa vimuñcati dharmavit
a evam uktas tu kaunteyo dīrghaprajño mahādyutiḥ
c uvāca vadatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vyāsaṃ satyavatīsutam
a vaiśasaṃ sumahat kṛtvā jñātīnāṃ lomaharṣaṇam
c āgaskṛt sarvalokasya pṛthivīnāśakārakaḥ
a ghātayitvā tam evājau chalenājihmayodhinam
c upasaṃpraṣṭum arhāmi tam ahaṃ kena hetunā
a tatas taṃ nṛpatiśreṣṭhaṃ cāturvarṇyahitepsayā
c punar āha mahābāhur yaduśreṣṭho mahādyutiḥ
a nedānīm atinirbandhaṃ śoke kartum ihārhasi
c yad āha bhagavān vyāsas tat kuruṣva nṛpottama
a brāhmaṇās tvāṃ mahābāho bhrātaraś ca mahaujasaḥ
c parjanyam iva gharmārtā āśaṃsānā upāsate
a hataśiṣṭāś ca rājānaḥ kṛtsnaṃ caiva samāgatam
c cāturvarṇyaṃ mahārāja rāṣṭraṃ te kurujāṅgalam
a priyārtham api caiteṣāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ mahātmanām
c niyogād asya ca guror vyāsasyāmitatejasaḥ
a suhṛdāṃ cāsmad ādīnāṃ draupadyāś ca paraṃtapa
c kuru priyam amitraghna lokasya ca hitaṃ kuru
a evam uktas tu kṛṣṇena rājā rājīvalocanaḥ
c hitārthaṃ sarvalokasya samuttasthau mahātapāḥ
a so 'nunīto naravyāghro viṣṭaraśravasā svayam
c dvaipāyanena ca tathā devasthānena jiṣṇunā
a etaiś cānyaiś ca bahubhir anunīto yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c vyajahān mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃtāpaṃ ca mahāmanāḥ
a śrutavākyaḥ śrutanidhiḥ śrutaśravyaviśāradaḥ
c vyavasya manasaḥ śāntim agacchat pāṇḍunandanaḥ
a sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ
c dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ puraskṛtya svapuraṃ praviveśa ha
a pravivikṣuḥ sa dharmajñaḥ kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c arcayām āsa devāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
a tato rathaṃ navaṃ śubhraṃ kambalājinasaṃvṛtam
c yuktaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir gobhiḥ pāṇḍuraiḥ śubhalakṣaṇaiḥ
a mantrair abhyarcitaḥ puṇyaiḥ stūyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
c āruroha yathā devaḥ somo 'mṛtamayaṃ ratham
a jagrāha raśmīn kaunteyo bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ
c arjunaḥ pāṇḍuraṃ chatraṃ dhārayām āsa bhānumat
a dhriyamāṇaṃ tu tac chatraṃ pāṇḍuraṃ tasya mūrdhani
c śuśubhe tārakārājasitam abhram ivāmbare
a cāmaravyajane cāsya vīrau jagṛhatus tadā
c candraraśmiprabhe śubhre mādrīputrāv alaṃkṛte
a te pañca ratham āsthāya bhrātaraḥ samalaṃkṛtāḥ
c bhūtānīva samastāni rājan dadṛśire tadā
a āsthāya tu rathaṃ śubhraṃ yuktam aśvair mahājavaiḥ
c anvayāt pṛṣṭhato rājan yuyutsuḥ pāṇḍavāgrajam
a rathaṃ hemamayaṃ śubhraṃ sainyasugrīvayojitam
c saha sātyakinā kṛṣṇaḥ samāsthāyānvayāt kurūn
a narayānena tu jyeṣṭhaḥ pitā pārthasya bhārata
c agrato dharmarājasya gāndhārīsahito yayau
a kurustriyaś ca tāḥ sarvāḥ kuntī kṛṣṇā ca draupadī
c yānair uccāvacair jagmur vidureṇa puraskṛtāḥ
a tato rathāś ca bahulā nāgāś ca samalaṃkṛtāḥ
c pādātāś ca hayāś caiva pṛṣṭhataḥ samanuvrajan
a tato vaitālikaiḥ sūtair māgadhaiś ca subhāṣitaiḥ
c stūyamāno yayau rājā nagaraṃ nāgasāhvayam
a tat prayāṇaṃ mahābāhor babhūvāpratimaṃ bhuvi
c ākulākulam utsṛṣṭaṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanānvitam
a abhiyāne tu pārthasya narair nagaravāsibhiḥ
c nagaraṃ rājamārgaś ca yathāvat samalaṃkṛtam
a pāṇḍureṇa ca mālyena patākābhiś ca vedibhiḥ
c saṃvṛto rājamārgaś ca dhūpanaiś ca sudhūpitaḥ
a atha cūrṇaiś ca gandhānāṃ nānāpuṣpaiḥ priyaṅgubhiḥ
c mālyadāmabhir āsaktai rājaveśmābhisaṃvṛtam
a kumbhāś ca nagaradvāri vāripūrṇā dṛḍhā navāḥ
c kanyāḥ sumanasaś chāgāḥ sthāpitās tatra tatra ha
a tathā svalaṃkṛtadvāraṃ nagaraṃ pāṇḍunandanaḥ
c stūyamānaḥ śubhair vākyaiḥ praviveśa suhṛdvṛtaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a praveśane tu pārthānāṃ janasya puravāsinaḥ
c didṛkṣūṇāṃ sahasrāṇi samājagmur bahūny atha
a sa rājamārgaḥ śuśubhe samalaṃkṛtacatvaraḥ
c yathā candrodaye rājan vardhamāno mahodadhiḥ
a gṛhāṇi rājamārge tu ratnavanti bṛhanti ca
c prākampanteva bhāreṇa strīṇāṃ pūrṇāni bhārata
a tāḥ śanair iva savrīḍaṃ praśaśaṃsur yudhiṣṭhiram
c bhīmasenārjunau caiva mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
a dhanyā tvam asi pāñcāli yā tvaṃ puruṣasattamān
c upatiṣṭhasi kalyāṇi maharṣīn iva gautamī
a tava karmāṇy amoghāni vratacaryā ca bhāmini
c iti kṛṣṇāṃ mahārāja praśaśaṃsus tadā striyaḥ
a praśaṃsāvacanais tāsāṃ mithaḥśabdaiś ca bhārata
c prītijaiś ca tadā śabdaiḥ puram āsīt samākulam
a tam atītya yathāyuktaṃ rājamārgaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c alaṃkṛtaṃ śobhamānam upāyād rājaveśma ha
a tataḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvāḥ paurajānapadās tathā
c ūcuḥ kathāḥ karṇasukhāḥ samupetya tatas tataḥ
a diṣṭyā jayasi rājendra śatrūñ śatrunisūdana
c diṣṭyā rājyaṃ punaḥ prāptaṃ dharmeṇa ca balena ca
a bhava nas tvaṃ mahārāja rājeha śaradāṃ śatam
c prajāḥ pālaya dharmeṇa yathendras tridivaṃ nṛpa
a evaṃ rājakuladvāri maṅgalair abhipūjitaḥ
c āśīrvādān dvijair uktān pratigṛhya samantataḥ
a praviśya bhavanaṃ rājā devarājagṛhopamam
c śrutvā vijayasaṃyuktaṃ rathāt paścād avātarat
a praviśyābhyantaraṃ śrīmān daivatāny abhigamya ca
c pūjayām āsa ratnaiś ca gandhair mālyaiś ca sarvaśaḥ
a niścakrāma tataḥ śrīmān punar eva mahāyaśāḥ
c dadarśa brāhmaṇāṃś caiva so 'bhirūpān upasthitān
a sa saṃvṛtas tadā viprair āśīrvādavivakṣubhiḥ
c śuśubhe vimalaś candras tārāgaṇavṛto yathā
a tān sa saṃpūjayām āsa kaunteyo vidhivad dvijān
c dhaumyaṃ guruṃ puraskṛtya jyeṣṭhaṃ pitaram eva ca
d praviveśa sabhāṃ rājā sudharmāṃ vāsavo yathā
a sumanomodakai ratnair hiraṇyena ca bhūriṇā
c gobhir vastraiś ca rājendra vividhaiś ca kim icchakaiḥ
a tataḥ puṇyāhaghoṣo 'bhūd divaṃ stabdhveva bhārata
c suhṛdāṃ harṣajananaḥ puṇyaḥ śrutisukhāvahaḥ
a haṃsavan neduṣāṃ rājan dvijānāṃ tatra bhāratī
c śuśruve vedaviduṣāṃ puṣkalārthapadākṣarā
a tato dundubhinirghoṣaḥ śaṅkhānāṃ ca manoramaḥ
c jayaṃ pravadatāṃ tatra svanaḥ prādurabhūn nṛpa
a niḥśabde ca sthite tatra tato viprajane punaḥ
c rājānaṃ brāhmaṇacchadmā cārvāko rākṣaso 'bravīt
a tatra duryodhanasakhā bhikṣurūpeṇa saṃvṛtaḥ
c sāṃkhyaḥ śikhī tridaṇḍī ca dhṛṣṭo vigatasādhvasaḥ
a vṛtaḥ sarvais tadā viprair āśīrvādavivakṣubhiḥ
c paraṃsahasrai rājendra taponiyamasaṃsthitaiḥ
a sa duṣṭaḥ pāpam āśaṃsan pāṇḍavānāṃ mahātmanām
c anāmantryaiva tān viprāṃs tam uvāca mahīpatim
a ime prāhur dvijāḥ sarve samāropya vaco mayi
c dhig bhavantaṃ kunṛpatiṃ jñātighātinam astu vai
a kiṃ te rājyena kaunteya kṛtvemaṃ jñātisaṃkṣayam
c ghātayitvā gurūṃś caiva mṛtaṃ śreyo na jīvitam
a iti te vai dvijāḥ śrutvā tasya ghorasya rakṣasaḥ
c vivyathuś cukruśuś caiva tasya vākyapradharṣitāḥ
a tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve sa ca rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c vrīḍitāḥ paramodvignās tūṣṇīm āsan viśāṃ pate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a prasīdantu bhavanto me praṇatasyābhiyācataḥ
c pratyāpannaṃ vyasaninaṃ na māṃ dhikkartum arhatha
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato rājan brāhmaṇās te sarva eva viśāṃ pate
c ūcur naitad vaco 'smākaṃ śrīr astu tava pārthiva
a jajñuś caiva mahātmānas tatas taṃ jñānacakṣuṣā
c brāhmaṇā vedavidvāṃsas tapobhir vimalīkṛtāḥ
 brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ
a eṣa duryodhanasakhā cārvāko nāma rākṣasaḥ
c parivrājakarūpeṇa hitaṃ tasya cikīrṣati
a na vayaṃ brūma dharmātman vyetu te bhayam īdṛśam
c upatiṣṭhatu kalyāṇaṃ bhavantaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tatas te brāhmaṇāḥ sarve huṃkāraiḥ krodhamūrchitāḥ
c nirbhartsayantaḥ śucayo nijaghnuḥ pāparākṣasam
a sa papāta vinirdagdhas tejasā brahmavādinām
c mahendrāśaninirdagdhaḥ pādapo 'ṅkuravān iva
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
 tatas tatra tu rājānaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
 uvāca devakīputraḥ sarvadarśī janārdanaḥ
a pūjitāś ca yayur viprā rājānam abhinandya tam
c rājā ca harṣam āpede pāṇḍavaḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
 vāsudeva uvāca
a brāhmaṇās tāta loke 'sminn arcanīyāḥ sadā mama
c ete bhūmicarā devā vāgviṣāḥ suprasādakāḥ
a purā kṛtayuge tāta cārvāko nāma rākṣasaḥ
c tapas tepe mahābāho badaryāṃ bahuvatsaram
a chandyamāno vareṇātha brahmaṇā sa punaḥ punaḥ
c abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo varayām āsa bhārata
a dvijāvamānād anyatra prādād varam anuttamam
c abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyas tatas tasmai jagatprabhuḥ
a sa tu labdhavaraḥ pāpo devān amitavikramaḥ
c rākṣasas tāpayām āsa tīvrakarmā mahābalaḥ
a tato devāḥ sametyātha brahmāṇam idam abruvan
c vadhāya rakṣasas tasya balaviprakṛtās tadā
a tān uvācāvyayo devo vihitaṃ tatra vai mayā
c yathāsya bhavitā mṛtyur acireṇaiva bhārata
a rājā duryodhano nāma sakhāsya bhavitā nṛpa
c tasya snehāvabaddho 'sau brāhmaṇān avamaṃsyate
a tatrainaṃ ruṣitā viprā viprakārapradharṣitāḥ
c dhakṣyanti vāgbalāḥ pāpaṃ tato nāśaṃ gamiṣyati
a sa eṣa nihataḥ śete brahmadaṇḍena rākṣasaḥ
c cārvāko nṛpatiśreṣṭha mā śuco bharatarṣabha
a hatās te kṣatradharmeṇa jñātayas tava pārthiva
c svargatāś ca mahātmāno vīrāḥ kṣatriyapuṃgavāḥ
a sa tvam ātiṣṭha kalyāṇaṃ mā te bhūd glānir acyuta
c śatrūñ jahi prajā rakṣa dvijāṃś ca pratipālaya
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tataḥ kuntīsuto rājā gatamanyur gatajvaraḥ
c kāñcane prāṅmukho hṛṣṭo nyaṣīdat paramāsane
a tam evābhimukhau pīṭhe sevyāstaraṇasaṃvṛte
c sātyakir vāsudevaś ca niṣīdatur ariṃdamau
a madhye kṛtvā tu rājānaṃ bhīmasenārjunāv ubhau
c niṣīdatur mahātmānau ślakṣṇayor maṇipīṭhayoḥ
a dānte śayyāsane śubhre jāmbūnadavibhūṣite
c pṛthāpi sahadevena sahāste nakulena ca
a sudharmā viduro dhaumyo dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca kauravaḥ
c niṣedur jvalanākāreṣv āsaneṣu pṛthak pṛthak
a yuyutsuḥ saṃjayaś caiva gāndhārī ca yaśasvinī
c dhṛtarāṣṭro yato rājā tataḥ sarva upāviśan
a tatropaviṣṭo dharmātmā śvetāḥ sumanaso 'spṛśat
c svastikān akṣatān bhūmiṃ suvarṇaṃ rajataṃ maṇīn
a tataḥ prakṛtayaḥ sarvāḥ puraskṛtya purohitam
c dadṛśur dharmarājānam ādāya bahu maṅgalam
a pṛthivīṃ ca suvarṇaṃ ca ratnāni vividhāni ca
c ābhiṣecanikaṃ bhāṇḍaṃ sarvasaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtam
a kāñcanaudumbarās tatra rājatāḥ pṛthivīmayāḥ
c pūrṇakumbhāḥ sumanaso lājā barhīṃṣi gorasāḥ
a śamīpalāśapuṃnāgāḥ samidho madhusarpiṣī
c sruva audumbaraḥ śaṅkhās tathā hemavibhūṣitāḥ
d audumbaraṃ ratnapīṭhaṃ vyāghracarmottaracchadam
a dāśārheṇābhyanujñātas tatra dhaumyaḥ purohitaḥ
c prāgudakpravaṇāṃ vedīṃ lakṣaṇenopalipya ha
a vyāghracarmottare ślakṣṇe sarvatobhadra āsane
c dṛḍhapādapratiṣṭhāne hutāśanasamatviṣi
a upaveśya mahātmānaṃ kṛṣṇāṃ ca drupadātmajām
c juhāva pāvakaṃ dhīmān vidhimantrapuraskṛtam
d tata utthāya dāśārhaḥ śaṅkham ādāya pūjitam
a abhyaṣiñcat patiṃ pṛthvyāḥ kuntīputraṃ yudhiṣṭhiram
c dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca rājarṣiḥ sarvāḥ prakṛtayas tathā
d samanujñāya kṛṣṇena bhrātṛbhiḥ saha pāṇḍavaḥ
d pāñcajanyābhiṣiktaś ca rājāmṛtamukho 'bhavat
a tato 'nuvādayām āsuḥ paṇavānakadundubhīḥ
c dharmarājo 'pi tat sarvaṃ pratijagrāha dharmataḥ
a pūjayām āsa tāṃś cāpi vidhivad bhūridakṣiṇaḥ
c tato niṣkasahasreṇa brāhmaṇān svasti vācayat
e vedādhyayanasaṃpannāñ śīlavṛttasamanvitān
a te prītā brāhmaṇā rājan svasty ūcur jayam eva ca
c haṃsā iva ca nardantaḥ praśaśaṃsur yudhiṣṭhiram
a yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho diṣṭyā jayasi pāṇḍava
c diṣṭyā svadharmaṃ prāpto 'si vikrameṇa mahādyute
a diṣṭyā gāṇḍīvadhanvā ca bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
c tvaṃ cāpi kuśalī rājan mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
d rathaiḥ kuśalibhiḥ sarvair bhrātṛbhiḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
d lokanāthasya kṛṣṇasya prasādād bharatarṣabha
d vijitya śatrūn akhilān prajā dharmeṇa rañjayan
d śāśvataṃ savanadvīpāṃ paripālaya medinīm
a muktā vīrakṣayād asmāt saṃgrāmān nihatadviṣaḥ
c kṣipram uttarakālāni kuru kāryāṇi pāṇḍava
a tataḥ pratyarcitaḥ sadbhir dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c pratipede mahad rājyaṃ suhṛdbhiḥ saha bhārata

 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a prakṛtīnāṃ tu tad vākyaṃ deśakālopasaṃhitam
c śrutvā yudhiṣṭhiro rājāthottaraṃ pratyabhāṣata

c tathyān vāpy atha vātathyān guṇān āhuḥ samāgatāḥ
a anugrāhyā vayaṃ nūnaṃ bhavatām iti me matiḥ

a dvijānāṃ vedakāryeṣu kāryeṣv anyeṣu caiva hi
c dhaumyaṃ purodhasāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vyādideśa paraṃtapaḥ
a sahadevaṃ samīpasthaṃ nityam eva samādiśat
c tena gopyo hi nṛpatiḥ sarvāvastho viśāṃ pate
a yān yān amanyad yogyāṃś ca yeṣu yeṣv iha karmasu

c rājānaṃ samanujñāpya tāni kāryāṇi dharmataḥ

a tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā jñātīnāṃ ye hatā mṛdhe

c ānṛśaṃsyaparo rājā cakārānugrahaṃ prabhuḥ
a sa vijitya mahīṃ kṛtsnām ānṛṇyaṃ prāpya vairiṣu
c niḥsapatnaḥ sukhī rājā vijahāra yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a abhiṣikto mahāprājño rājyaṃ prāpya yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c dāśārhaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣam uvāca prāñjaliḥ śuciḥ
a tava kṛṣṇa prasādena nayena ca balena ca

a vāciṣṭha ugraḥ senānīḥ satyo vājasanir guhaḥ

c sindhukṣid ūrmis trikakut tridhāmā trivṛd acyutaḥ
a samrāḍ virāṭ svarāṭ caiva surarāḍ dharmado bhavaḥ
c vibhur bhūr abhibhūḥ kṛṣṇaḥ kṛṣṇavartmā tvam eva ca
a sviṣṭakṛd bhiṣagāvartaḥ kapilas tvaṃ ca vāmanaḥ
c yajño dhruvaḥ pataṃgaś ca jayatsenas tvam ucyase
a śikhaṇḍī nahuṣo babhrur divaspṛk tvaṃ punarvasuḥ
c subabhrur ukṣo rukmas tvaṃ suṣeṇo dundubhis tathā
a gabhastinemiḥ śrīpadmaṃ puṣkaraṃ puṣpadhāraṇaḥ

a ambhonidhis tvaṃ brahmā tvaṃ pavitraṃ dhāma dhanva ca
c hiraṇyagarbhaṃ tvām āhuḥ svadhā svāhā ca keśava
a yonis tvam asya pralayaś ca kṛṣṇa

c viśvaṃ cedaṃ tvadvaśe viśvayone

a evaṃ stuto dharmarājena kṛṣṇaḥ

c tam abhyanandad bhārataṃ puṣkalābhir

d etan nāmaśataṃ viṣṇor dharmarājena kīrtitam
d yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād vāpi sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato visarjayām āsa sarvāḥ prakṛtayo nṛpaḥ

 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca

c śrutaṃ mayā kathayatāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ mahātmanām

vibhūṣitaṃ hemapinaddhacakram
a divākarāṃśuprabham āśugāminaṃ
vicitranānāmaṇiratnabhūṣitam
c navoditaṃ sūryam iva pratāpinaṃ
vicitratārkṣyadhvajinaṃ patākinam
a sugrīvasainyapramukhair varāśvair
manojavaiḥ kāñcanabhūṣitāṅgaiḥ
c suyuktam āvedayad acyutāya
kṛtāñjalir dāruko rājasiṃha
 janamejaya uvāca
a śaratalpe śayānas tu bharatānāṃ pitāmahaḥ
c katham utsṛṣṭavān dehaṃ kaṃ ca yogam adhārayat
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājañ śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ
c bhīṣmasya kuruśārdūla dehotsargaṃ mahātmanaḥ
d śuklapakṣasya cāṣṭamyāṃ māghamāsasya pārthiva
d prājāpatye ca nakṣatre madhyaṃ prāpte divākare
a nivṛttamātre tv ayana uttare vai divākare
c samāveśayad ātmānam ātmany eva samāhitaḥ
a vikīrṇāṃśur ivādityo bhīṣmaḥ śaraśataiś citaḥ
c śiśye paramayā lakṣmyā vṛto brāhmaṇasattamaiḥ
a vyāsena vedaśravasā nāradena surarṣiṇā
c devasthānena vātsyena tathāśmakasumantunā
d tathā jaimininā caiva pailena ca mahātmanā
d śāṇḍilyadevalābhyāṃ ca maitreyeṇa ca dhīmatā
d asitena vasiṣṭhena kauśikena mahātmanā
d hārītalomaśābhyāṃ ca tathātreyeṇa dhīmatā
d bṛhaspatiś ca śukraś ca cyavanaś ca mahāmuniḥ
d sanatkumāraḥ kapilo vālmīkis tumburuḥ kuruḥ
d maudgalyo bhārgavo rāmas tṛṇabindur mahāmuniḥ
d pippalādaś ca vāyuś ca saṃvartaḥ pulahaḥ kacaḥ
d kāśyapaś ca pulastyaś ca kratur dakṣaḥ parāśaraḥ
d marīcir aṅgirāḥ kāśyo gautamo gālavo muniḥ
d dhaumyo vibhāṇḍo māṇḍavyo dhaumraḥ kṛṣṇānubhautikaḥ
d ulūkaḥ paramo vipro mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmuniḥ
d bhāskariḥ pūraṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sūtaḥ paramadhārmikaḥ
d taṃ bāhyamuninā caiva gālavena mahātmanā
d śrīmatā yājñavalkyena śaṅkhena pulahena ca
a etaiś cānyair munigaṇair mahābhāgair mahātmabhiḥ
c śraddhādamapuraskārair vṛtaś candra iva grahaiḥ
d tathānyair munibhiś caiva pulastyena mahātmanā
a bhīṣmas tu puruṣavyāghraḥ karmaṇā manasā girā
c śaratalpagataḥ kṛṣṇaṃ pradadhyau prāñjaliḥ sthitaḥ
a svareṇa puṣṭanādena tuṣṭāva madhusūdanam
c yogeśvaraṃ padmanābhaṃ viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ jagatpatim
d anādinidhanaṃ jiṣṇum ātmayoniṃ sanātanam
a kṛtāñjaliḥ śucir bhūtvā vāgvidāṃ pravaraḥ prabhum
c bhīṣmaḥ paramadharmātmā vāsudevam athāstuvat
a ārirādhayiṣuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vācaṃ jigamiṣāmi yām
c tayā vyāsasamāsinyā prīyatāṃ puruṣottamaḥ
a śuciḥ śuciṣadaṃ haṃsaṃ tatparaḥ parameṣṭhinam
c yuktvā sarvātmanātmānaṃ taṃ prapadye prajāpatim
d anādyantaṃ paraṃ brahma na devā narṣayo viduḥ
d eko 'yaṃ veda bhagavān dhātā nārāyaṇo hariḥ
d nārāyaṇād ṛṣigaṇās tathā siddhamahoragāḥ
d devā devarṣayaś caiva yaṃ viduḥ param avyayam
d devadānavagandharvā yakṣarākṣasapannagāḥ
d yaṃ na jānanti ko hy eṣa kuto vā bhagavān iti
a yasmin viśvāni bhūtāni tiṣṭhanti ca viśanti ca
c guṇabhūtāni bhūteśe sūtre maṇigaṇā iva
a yasmin nitye tate tantau dṛḍhe srag iva tiṣṭhati
c sadasadgrathitaṃ viśvaṃ viśvāṅge viśvakarmaṇi
a hariṃ sahasraśirasaṃ sahasracaraṇekṣaṇam
b sahasrabāhumukuṭaṃ sahasravadanojjvalam
c prāhur nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ yaṃ viśvasya parāyaṇam
a aṇīyasām aṇīyāṃsaṃ sthaviṣṭhaṃ ca sthavīyasām
c garīyasāṃ gariṣṭhaṃ ca śreṣṭhaṃ ca śreyasām api
a yaṃ vākeṣv anuvākeṣu niṣatsūpaniṣatsu ca
c gṛṇanti satyakarmāṇaṃ satyaṃ satyeṣu sāmasu
a caturbhiś caturātmānaṃ sattvasthaṃ sātvatāṃ patim
c yaṃ divyair devam arcanti guhyaiḥ paramanāmabhiḥ
d yasmin nityaṃ tapas taptaṃ yad aṅgeṣv anutiṣṭhati
d sarvātmā sarvavit sarvaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ
a yaṃ devaṃ devakī devī vasudevād ajījanat
c bhaumasya brahmaṇo guptyai dīptam agnim ivāraṇiḥ
a yam ananyo vyapetāśīr ātmānaṃ vītakalmaṣam
c iṣṭvānantyāya govindaṃ paśyaty ātmany avasthitam
a purāṇe puruṣaḥ prokto brahmā prokto yugādiṣu
c kṣaye saṃkarṣaṇaḥ proktas tam upāsyam upāsmahe
d yam ekaṃ bahudhātmānaṃ prādurbhūtam adhokṣajam
d nānyabhaktāḥ kriyāvanto yajante sarvakāmadam
d yam āhur jagataḥ kośaṃ yasmin saṃnihitāḥ prajāḥ
d yasmiṃl lokāḥ sphurantīme jale śakunayo yathā
d ṛtam ekākṣaraṃ brahma yat tat sadasataḥ param
d anādimadhyaparyantaṃ na devā narṣayo viduḥ
d yaṃ surāsuragandharvāḥ sasiddharṣimahoragāḥ
d prayatā nityam arcanti paramaṃ duḥkhabheṣajam
d anādinidhanaṃ devam ātmayoniṃ sanātanam
d apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
a ativāyvindrakarmāṇam atisūryāgnitejasam
c atibuddhīndriyātmānaṃ taṃ prapadye prajāpatim
a yaṃ vai viśvasya kartāraṃ jagatas tasthuṣāṃ patim
c vadanti jagato 'dhyakṣam akṣaraṃ paramaṃ padam
a hiraṇyavarṇaṃ yaṃ garbham aditir daityanāśanam
c ekaṃ dvādaśadhā jajñe tasmai sūryātmane namaḥ
a śukle devān pitṝn kṛṣṇe tarpayaty amṛtena yaḥ
c yaś ca rājā dvijātīnāṃ tasmai somātmane namaḥ
d hutāśanamukhair devair dhyāyate sakalaṃ jagat
d haviḥ prathamabhoktā ca tasmai hotrātmane namaḥ
a mahatas tamasaḥ pāre puruṣaṃ jvalanadyutim
c yaṃ jñātvā mṛtyum atyeti tasmai jñeyātmane namaḥ
a yaṃ bṛhantaṃ bṛhaty ukthe yam agnau yaṃ mahādhvare
c yaṃ viprasaṃghā gāyanti tasmai vedātmane namaḥ
a ṛgyajuḥsāmadhāmānaṃ daśārdhahavirākṛtim
c yaṃ saptatantuṃ tanvanti tasmai yajñātmane namaḥ
d caturbhiś ca caturbhiś ca dvābhyāṃ pañcabhir eva ca
d hūyate ca punar dvābhyāṃ tasmai homātmane namaḥ
a yaḥ suparṇo yajur nāma chandogātras trivṛcchirāḥ
c rathaṃtarabṛhatyakṣas tasmai stotrātmane namaḥ
a yaḥ sahasrasave satre jajñe viśvasṛjām ṛṣiḥ
c hiraṇyavarṇaḥ śakunis tasmai haṃsātmane namaḥ
a padāṅgaṃ saṃdhiparvāṇaṃ svaravyañjanalakṣaṇam
c yam āhur akṣaraṃ nityaṃ tasmai vāgātmane namaḥ
d yajñāṅgo yo varāho vai bhūtvā gām ujjahāra ha
d lokatrayahitārthāya tasmai vīryātmane namaḥ
d yaḥ śete yogam āsthāya paryaṅke nāgabhūṣite
d phaṇāsahasraracite tasmai nidrātmane namaḥ
d viśve ca marutaś caiva rudrādityāśvināv api
d vasavaḥ siddhasādhyāś ca tasmai devātmane namaḥ
d avyaktaṃ buddhyahaṃkāro mano buddhīndriyāṇi ca
d tanmātrāṇi viśeṣāś ca tasmai tattvātmane namaḥ
d bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca bhūtādiprabhavāpyayaḥ
d yo 'grajaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tasmai bhūtātmane namaḥ
d yasya yajñe varāhasya viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ
d praṇāmaṃ ye prakurvanti teṣām api namo namaḥ
d yaṃ hi sūkṣmaṃ vicinvanti paraṃ sūkṣmavido janāḥ
d sūkṣmāsūkṣmaṃ ca yad brahma tasmai sūkṣmātmane namaḥ
d matsyo bhūtvā viriñcāya yena vedāḥ samāhṛtāḥ
d rasātalagatāḥ śīghraṃ tasmai matsyātmane namaḥ
d mandarādrir dhṛto yena prāpte hy amṛtamanthane
d atikarkaśadehāya tasmai kūrmātmane namaḥ
d vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthāya mahīṃ savanaparvatām
d uddharaty ekadaṃṣṭreṇa tasmai kroḍātmane namaḥ
d nārasiṃhavapuḥ kṛtvā sarvalokabhayaṃkaram
d hiraṇyakaśipuṃ jaghne tasmai siṃhātmane namaḥ
d piṅgekṣaṇasaṭaṃ yasya rūpaṃ daṃṣṭranakhair yutam
d dānavendrāntakaraṇaṃ tasmai dṛptātmane namaḥ
d vāmanaṃ rūpam āsthāya baliṃ saṃyamya māyayā
d trailokyaṃ krāntavān yas tu tasmai krāntātmane namaḥ
d jamadagnisuto bhūtvā rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
d mahīṃ niḥkṣatriyāṃ cakre tasmai rāmātmane namaḥ
d triḥsaptakṛtvo yaś caiko dharmavyutkrāntigauravāt
d jaghāna kṣatriyān saṃghe tasmai krodhātmane namaḥ
d rāmo dāśarathir bhūtvā pulastyakulanandanam
d jaghāna rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye tasmai kṣatrātmane namaḥ
d yo halī musalī śrīmān nīlāmbaradharaḥ sthitaḥ
d rāmāya rauhiṇeyāya tasmai bhogātmane namaḥ
d śaṅkhine cakriṇe nityaṃ śārṅgiṇe pītavāsase
d vanamālādharāyaiva tasmai kṛṣṇātmane namaḥ
d vasudevasutaḥ śrīmān krīḍito nandagokule
d kaṃsasya nidhanārthāya tasmai krīḍātmane namaḥ
d vasudevatvam āgamya yador vaṃśasamudbhavaḥ
d bhūbhāraharaṇaṃ cakre tasmai kṛṣṇātmane namaḥ
d sārathyam arjunasyājau kurvan gītāmṛtaṃ dadau
d lokatrayopakārāya tasmai brahmātmane namaḥ
d dānavāṃs tu vaśe kṛtvā punar buddhatvam āgataḥ
d sargasya rakṣaṇārthāya tasmai śuddhātmane namaḥ
d haniṣyati kalau prāpte mlecchāṃs turagavāhanaḥ
d dharmasaṃsthāpako yas tu tasmai kalkyātmane namaḥ
d kṣatriyāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca
d yo 'vadhīd bhārate yuddhe tasmai krīḍātmane namaḥ
d tārānvaye kālanemiṃ hatvā dānavapuṃgavam
d dadau rājyaṃ mahendrāya tasmai mukhyātmane namaḥ
d yaḥ sarvaprāṇināṃ dehe sākṣībhūto vyavasthitaḥ
d akṣarakṣaramāṇānāṃ tasmai sākṣyātmane namaḥ
d namo 'stu te mahādeva namas te bhaktavatsala
d subrahmaṇya namas te 'stu prasīda parameśvara
d avyaktavyaktarūpeṇa vyāptaṃ sarvaṃ tvayā vibho
d nārāyaṇaṃ sahasrākṣaṃ sarvalokamaheśvaram
d hiraṇyanābhaṃ yajñāṅgam amṛtaṃ viśvatomukham
d sarvadā sarvakāryeṣu nāsti teṣām amaṅgalam
d yeṣāṃ hṛdistho deveśo maṅgalāyatanaṃ hariḥ
d maṅgalaṃ bhagavān viṣṇur maṅgalaṃ madhusūdanaḥ
d maṅgalaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo maṅgalaṃ garuḍadhvajaḥ
a yaś cinoti satāṃ setum ṛtenāmṛtayoninā
c dharmārthavyavahārāṅgais tasmai satyātmane namaḥ
a yaṃ pṛthagdharmacaraṇāḥ pṛthagdharmaphalaiṣiṇaḥ
c pṛthagdharmaiḥ samarcanti tasmai dharmātmane namaḥ
d yataḥ sarve prasūyante hy anaṅgātmāṅgadehinaḥ
d unmādaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tasmai kāmātmane namaḥ
a yaṃ taṃ vyaktastham avyaktaṃ vicinvanti maharṣayaḥ
c kṣetre kṣetrajñam āsīnaṃ tasmai kṣetrātmane namaḥ
a yaṃ dṛgātmānam ātmasthaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ
c prāhuḥ saptadaśaṃ sāṃkhyās tasmai sāṃkhyātmane namaḥ
a yaṃ vinidrā jitaśvāsāḥ sattvasthāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ
c jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānās tasmai yogātmane namaḥ
a apuṇyapuṇyoparame yaṃ punarbhavanirbhayāḥ
c śāntāḥ saṃnyāsino yānti tasmai mokṣātmane namaḥ
a yo 'sau yugasahasrānte pradīptārcir vibhāvasuḥ
c saṃbhakṣayati bhūtāni tasmai ghorātmane namaḥ
a saṃbhakṣya sarvabhūtāni kṛtvā caikārṇavaṃ jagat
c bālaḥ svapiti yaś caikas tasmai māyātmane namaḥ
a sahasraśirase tasmai puruṣāyāmitātmane
c catuḥsamudraparyāyayoganidrātmane namaḥ
a ajasya nābhāv adhyekaṃ yasmin viśvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
c puṣkaraṃ puṣkarākṣasya tasmai padmātmane namaḥ
a yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasaṃdhiṣu
c kukṣau samudrāś catvāras tasmai toyātmane namaḥ
d yasmāt sarvāḥ prasūyante sargapralayavikriyāḥ
d yasmiṃś caiva pralīyante tasmai hetvātmane namaḥ
d yo niṣaṇṇo bhaved rātrau divā bhavati viṣṭhitaḥ
d iṣṭāniṣṭasya ca draṣṭā tasmai draṣṭātmane namaḥ
d akuṇṭhaṃ sarvakāryeṣu dharmakāryārtham udyatam
d vaikuṇṭhasya hi tad rūpaṃ tasmai kāryātmane namaḥ
d triḥsaptakṛtvo yaḥ kṣatraṃ dharmavyutkrāntagauravam
d kruddho nijaghne samare tasmai krauryātmane namaḥ
d vibhajya paṃcadhātmānaṃ vāyur bhūtvā śarīragaḥ
d yaś ceṣṭayati bhūtāni tasmai vāyvātmane namaḥ
a yugeṣv āvartate yo 'ṃśair dinartvanayahāyanaiḥ
c sargapralayayoḥ kartā tasmai kālātmane namaḥ
a brahma vaktraṃ bhujau kṣatraṃ kṛtsnam ūrūdaraṃ viśaḥ
c pādau yasyāśritāḥ śūdrās tasmai varṇātmane namaḥ
a yasyāgnir āsyaṃ dyaur mūrdhā khaṃ nābhiś caraṇau kṣitiḥ
c sūryaś cakṣur diśaḥ śrotre tasmai lokātmane namaḥ
a viṣaye vartamānānāṃ yaṃ taṃ vaiśeṣikair guṇaiḥ
c prāhur viṣayagoptāraṃ tasmai goptrātmane namaḥ
a annapānendhanamayo rasaprāṇavivardhanaḥ
c yo dhārayati bhūtāni tasmai prāṇātmane namaḥ
d prāṇānāṃ dhāraṇārthāya yo 'nnaṃ bhuṅkte caturvidham
d antarbhūtaḥ pacaty agnis tasmai pākātmane namaḥ
d piṅgekṣaṇasaṭaṃ yasya rūpaṃ daṃṣṭrānakhāyudham
d dānavendrāntakaraṇaṃ tasmai dṛptātmane namaḥ
d rasātalagataḥ śrīmān ananto bhagavān vibhuḥ
d jagad dhārayate kṛtsnaṃ tasmai vīryātmane namaḥ
d viṣaye vartamānānāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ ca yaḥ prabhuḥ
d vedate sarvaviṣayāṃs tasmai citrātmane namaḥ
d yaṃ na devā na gandharvā na daityā na ca dānavāḥ
d tattvato hi vijānanti tasmai sūkṣmātmane namaḥ
d jvalanārkendutārāṇāṃ jyotiṣāṃ divyamūrtinām
d yas tejayati tejāṃsi tasmai tejātmane namaḥ
a paraḥ kālāt paro yajñāt paraḥ sadasatoś ca yaḥ
c anādir ādir viśvasya tasmai viśvātmane namaḥ
d vaidyuto jāṭharaś caiva pāvakaḥ śucir eva ca
d dahanaḥ sarvabhakṣāṇāṃ tasmai vahnyātmane namaḥ
d sutale talamadhyastho hatvā tu madhukaiṭabhau
d uddhṛtā yena vai vedās tasmai matsyātmane namaḥ
d sasāgaranagāṃ bibhratsaptadvīpāṃ vasuṃdharām
d yo dhārayati pṛṣṭhena tasmai kūrmātmane namaḥ
d ekārṇave mahīṃ magnāṃ vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
d uddadhāra mahīṃ yo 'sau tasmai kroḍātmane namaḥ
d nārasiṃhaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā yas trailokyabhayaṃkaram
d hiraṇyakaśipuṃ jaghne tasmai siṃhātmane namaḥ
d vāmanaṃ rūpam āsthāya baliṃ saṃyamya māyayā
d ime krāntās trayo lokās tasmai krāntātmane namaḥ
d jamadagnisuto bhūtvā rāmaḥ paraśudhṛk prabhuḥ
d sahasrārjunahantā yas tasmā ugrātmane namaḥ
d rāmo dāśarathir bhūtvā paulastyakulanandanam
d jaghāna rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye tasmai kṣatrātmane namaḥ
d vasudevasutaḥ śrīmān vāsudevo jagatpatiḥ
d jahāra vasudhābhāraṃ tasmai kṛṣṇātmane namaḥ
d buddharūpaṃ samāsthāya sarvadharmaparāyaṇaḥ
d mohayan sarvabhūtāni tasmai mohātmane namaḥ
d haniṣyati kaler ante mlecchāṃs turagavāhanaḥ
d dharmasaṃsthāpanārthāya tasmai kālātmane namaḥ
d anādir ādir viśvasya tasmai viśvātmane namaḥ
a yo mohayati bhūtāni sneharāgānubandhanaiḥ
c sargasya rakṣaṇārthāya tasmai mohātmane namaḥ
d caitanyaṃ sarvato nityaṃ sarvaprāṇihṛdi sthitam
d sarvātītataraṃ sūkṣmaṃ tasmai sūkṣmātmane namaḥ
a ātmajñānam idaṃ jñānaṃ jñātvā pañcasv avasthitam
c yaṃ jñānino 'dhigacchanti tasmai jñānātmane namaḥ
d sāṃkhyair yogair viniścitya sādhyaiś ca paramarṣibhiḥ
d yasya na jñāyate tattvaṃ tasmai guhyātmane namaḥ
a aprameyaśarīrāya sarvato 'nantacakṣuṣe
c apāraparimeyāya tasmai cintyātmane namaḥ
a jaṭine daṇḍine nityaṃ lambodaraśarīriṇe
c kamaṇḍaluniṣaṅgāya tasmai brahmātmane namaḥ
d yo jāto vasudevena devakyāṃ yadunandanaḥ
d śaṅkhacakragadāpāṇir vāsudevātmane namaḥ
a śūline tridaśeśāya tryambakāya mahātmane
c bhasmadigdhordhvaliṅgāya tasmai rudrātmane namaḥ
d śiraḥkapālamālāya vyāghracarmanivāsine
d bhasmadigdhaśarīrāya tasmai rudrātmane namaḥ
d candrārdhakṛtaśīrṣāya vyālayajñopavītine
d pinākaśūlahastāya tasmā ugrātmane namaḥ

a tataḥ sa ca hṛṣīkeśaḥ sa ca rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

a rathais te nagarākāraiḥ patākādhvajaśobhitaiḥ

a triḥsaptakṛtvo vasudhāṃ kṛtvā niḥkṣatriyāṃ prabhuḥ

 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca

c kathaṃ bhūyaḥ samutpattiḥ kṣatrasyāmitavikrama
a mahātmanā bhagavatā rāmeṇa yadupuṃgava
c katham utsāditaṃ kṣatraṃ kathaṃ vṛddhiṃ punar gatam
a mahābhāratayuddhe hi koṭiśaḥ kṣatriyā hatāḥ
c tathābhūc ca mahī kīrṇā kṣatriyair vadatāṃ vara
d kimarthaṃ bhārgaveṇedaṃ kṣatram utsāditaṃ purā
d rāmeṇa yaduśārdūla kurukṣetre mahātmanā

 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato vrajann eva gadāgrajaḥ prabhuḥ

 vāsudeva uvāca

c kuśiko nāma dharmajñas tasya putro mahīpatiḥ

a tam ugratapasaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasrākṣaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
c samarthaḥ putrajanane svayam evaitya bhārata
a putratvam agamad rājaṃs tasya lokeśvareśvaraḥ
c gādhir nāmābhavat putraḥ kauśikaḥ pākaśāsanaḥ
a tasya kanyābhavad rājan nāmnā satyavatī prabho

a āhūya cāha tāṃ bhāryām ṛcīko bhārgavas tadā
c upayojyaś carur ayaṃ tvayā mātrāpy ayaṃ tava

a etasminn eva kāle tu tīrthayātrāparo nṛpaḥ

d vrātyatāṃ samanuprāptā bahavo hi dvijātayaḥ
d adharottarāpacāreṇa mlecchabhūtāś ca sarvaśaḥ
a tataḥ kālena pṛthivī praviveśa rasātalam
a   pīḍyamānā durātmabhiḥ
a viparyayeṇa tenāśu
c arakṣyamāṇā vidhivat kṣatriyair dharmarakṣibhiḥ
d tāṃ dṛṣṭvā dravatīṃ tatra saṃbhrāntaḥ sa mahāmanāḥ
a ūruṇā dhārayām āsa kaśyapaḥ pṛthivīṃ tataḥ
c nimajjantīṃ tadā rājaṃs tenorvīti mahī smṛtā
a rakṣiṇaś ca samuddiśya prāyācat pṛthivī tadā
c prasādya kaśyapaṃ devī kṣatriyān bāhuśālinaḥ

c haihayānāṃ kule jātās te saṃrakṣantu māṃ mune

a tathānukampamānena yajvanāthāmitaujasā

c vane saṃrakṣito gobhiḥ so 'bhirakṣatu māṃ mune

a dadhivāhanapautras tu putro divirathasya ha

a maruttasyānvavāye tu kṣatriyās turvasos trayaḥ

a ete kṣatriyadāyādās tatra tatra pariśrutāḥ
b vyokārahemakārādijātiṃ nityam apāśritāḥ
c samyaṅ mām abhirakṣantu tataḥ sthāsyāmi niścalā
a eteṣāṃ pitaraś caiva tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ
c madarthaṃ nihatā yuddhe rāmeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā
a teṣām apacitiś caiva mayā kāryā na saṃśayaḥ
c na hy ahaṃ kāmaye nityam avikrāntena rakṣaṇam
d vartamānena varteyaṃ tat kṣipraṃ saṃvidhīyatām
a tataḥ pṛthivyā nirdiṣṭāṃs tān samānīya kaśyapaḥ
c abhyaṣiñcan mahīpālān kṣatriyān vīryasaṃmatān
a teṣāṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca yeṣāṃ vaṃśāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
c evam etat purā vṛttaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi pāṇḍava
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evaṃ bruvann eva yadupravīro

d kiṃ punaś cātmano lokān uttamān uttamair guṇaiḥ
a tad asya tapyamānasya jñātīnāṃ saṃkṣayeṇa vai
c jyeṣṭhasya pāṇḍuputrasya śokaṃ bhīṣma vyapānuda

c cāturāśramyasaṃsṛṣṭās te sarve viditās tava
a cāturvedye ca ye proktāś cāturhotre ca bhārata
c sāṃkhye yoge ca niyatā ye ca dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ
a cāturvarṇyena yaś caiko dharmo na sma virudhyate
c sevyamānaḥ sa caivādyo gāṅgeya viditas tava
d pratilomaprasūtānāṃ mlecchānāṃ caiva yaḥ smṛtaḥ

d vedokto yaś ca śiṣṭoktaḥ sa caiva viditas tava
d pravṛttaś ca nivṛttaś ca sa cāpi viditas tava

 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ bhīṣmo vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ
