a āgacchatsv atha kṛṣṇo 'pi pāṇḍaveṣu mahātmasu
c śaineyasahito dhīmān ratham evānvapadyata
a rathasthāḥ saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā sukhāṃ pṛṣṭvā ca śarvarīm
c meghaghoṣai rathavaraiḥ prayayus te mahārathāḥ
a meghapuṣpaṃ balāhaṃ ca sainyaṃ sugrīvam eva ca
c dārukaś codayām āsa vāsudevasya vājinaḥ
a te hayā vāsudevasya dārukeṇa pracoditāḥ
c gāṃ khurāgrais tathā rājaṃl likhantaḥ prayayus tadā
a te grasanta ivākāśaṃ vegavanto mahābalāḥ
c kṣetraṃ dharmasya kṛtsnasya kurukṣetram avātaran
a tato yayur yatra bhīṣmaḥ śaratalpagataḥ prabhuḥ
c āste brahmarṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmā devagaṇair yathā
a tato 'vatīrya govindo rathāt sa ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c bhīmo gāṇḍīvadhanvā ca yamau sātyakir eva ca
e ṛṣīn abhyarcayām āsuḥ karān udyamya dakṣiṇān
a sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā nakṣatrair iva candramāḥ
c abhyājagāma gāṅgeyaṃ brahmāṇam iva vāsavaḥ
a śaratalpe śayānaṃ tam ādityaṃ patitaṃ yathā
c dadarśa sa mahābāhur bhayād āgatasādhvasaḥ
 janamejaya uvāca
a dharmātmani mahāsattve satyasaṃdhe jitātmani
c devavrate mahābhāge śaratalpagate 'cyute
a śayāne vīraśayane bhīṣme śaṃtanunandane
c gāṅgeye puruṣavyāghre pāṇḍavaiḥ paryupasthite
a kāḥ kathāḥ samavartanta tasmin vīrasamāgame
c hateṣu sarvasainyeṣu tan me śaṃsa mahāmune
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śaratalpagate bhīṣme kauravāṇāṃ dhuraṃdhare
c ājagmur ṛṣayaḥ siddhā nāradapramukhā nṛpa
a hataśiṣṭāś ca rājāno yudhiṣṭhirapurogamāḥ
c dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca kṛṣṇaś ca bhīmārjunayamās tathā
a te 'bhigamya mahātmāno bharatānāṃ pitāmaham
c anvaśocanta gāṅgeyam ādityaṃ patitaṃ yathā
a muhūrtam iva ca dhyātvā nārado devadarśanaḥ
c uvāca pāṇḍavān sarvān hataśiṣṭāṃś ca pārthivān
a prāptakālaṃ ca ācakṣe bhīṣmo 'yam anuyujyatām
c astam eti hi gāṅgeyo bhānumān iva bhārata
a ayaṃ prāṇān utsisṛkṣus taṃ sarve 'bhyetya pṛcchata
c kṛtsnān hi vividhān dharmāṃś cāturvarṇyasya vetty ayam
a eṣa vṛddhaḥ purā lokān saṃprāpnoti tanutyajām
c taṃ śīghram anuyuñjadhvaṃ saṃśayān manasi sthitān
a evam uktā nāradena bhīṣmam īyur narādhipāḥ
c praṣṭuṃ cāśaknuvantas te vīkṣāṃ cakruḥ parasparam
a athovāca hṛṣīkeśaṃ pāṇḍuputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c nānyas tvad devakīputra śaktaḥ praṣṭuṃ pitāmaham
a pravyāhāraya durdharṣa tvam agre madhusūdana
c tvaṃ hi nas tāta sarveṣāṃ sarvadharmavid uttamaḥ
a evam uktaḥ pāṇḍavena bhagavān keśavas tadā
c abhigamya durādharṣaṃ pravyāhārayad acyutaḥ
 vāsudeva uvāca
a kaccit sukhena rajanī vyuṣṭā te rājasattama
c vispaṣṭalakṣaṇā buddhiḥ kaccic copasthitā tava
a kaccij jñānāni sarvāṇi pratibhānti ca te 'nagha
c na glāyate ca hṛdayaṃ na ca te vyākulaṃ manaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a dāho mohaḥ śramaś caiva klamo glānis tathā rujā
c tava prasādād govinda sadyo vyapagatānagha
a yac ca bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca bhavac ca paramadyute
c tat sarvam anupaśyāmi pāṇau phalam ivāhitam
a vedoktāś caiva ye dharmā vedāntanihitāś ca ye
c tān sarvān saṃprapaśyāmi varadānāt tavācyuta
a śiṣṭaiś ca dharmo yaḥ proktaḥ sa ca me hṛdi vartate
c deśajātikulānāṃ ca dharmajño 'smi janārdana
a caturṣv āśramadharmeṣu yo 'rthaḥ sa ca hṛdi sthitaḥ
c rājadharmāṃś ca sakalān avagacchāmi keśava
d sarvadharmeṣu yo hy arthaḥ sa ca me hṛdi saṃsthitaḥ
a yatra yatra ca vaktavyaṃ tad vakṣyāmi janārdana
c tava prasādād dhi śubhā mano me buddhir āviśat
a yuveva cāsmi saṃvṛttas tvadanudhyānabṛṃhitaḥ
c vaktuṃ śreyaḥ samartho 'smi tvatprasādāj janārdana
a svayaṃ kimarthaṃ tu bhavāñ śreyo na prāha pāṇḍavam
c kiṃ te vivakṣitaṃ cātra tad āśu vada mādhava
 vāsudeva uvāca
a yaśasaḥ śreyasaś caiva mūlaṃ māṃ viddhi kaurava
c mattaḥ sarve 'bhinirvṛttā bhāvāḥ sadasadātmakāḥ
a śītāṃśuś candra ity ukte ko loke vismayiṣyati
c tathaiva yaśasā pūrṇe mayi ko vismayiṣyati
a ādheyaṃ tu mayā bhūyo yaśas tava mahādyute
c tato me vipulā buddhis tvayi bhīṣma samāhitā
a yāvad dhi pṛthivīpāla pṛthivī sthāsyate dhruvā
c tāvat tavākṣayā kīrtir lokān anu cariṣyati
a yac ca tvaṃ vakṣyase bhīṣma pāṇḍavāyānupṛcchate
c vedapravādā iva te sthāsyanti vasudhātale
a yaś caitena pramāṇena yokṣyaty ātmānam ātmanā
c sa phalaṃ sarvapuṇyānāṃ pretya cānubhaviṣyati
a etasmāt kāraṇād bhīṣma matir divyā mayā hi te
c dattā yaśo vipratheta kathaṃ bhūyas taveti ha
a yāvad dhi prathate loke puruṣasya yaśo bhuvi
c tāvat tasyākṣayaṃ sthānaṃ bhavatīti viniścitam
a rājāno hataśiṣṭās tvāṃ rājann abhita āsate
c dharmān anuyuyukṣantas tebhyaḥ prabrūhi bhārata
a bhavān hi vayasā vṛddhaḥ śrutācārasamanvitaḥ
c kuśalo rājadharmāṇāṃ pūrveṣām aparāś ca ye
a janmaprabhṛti te kaś cid vṛjinaṃ na dadarśa ha
c jñātāram anudharmāṇāṃ tvāṃ viduḥ sarvapārthivāḥ
a tebhyaḥ piteva putrebhyo rājan brūhi paraṃ nayam
c ṛṣayaś ca hi devāś ca tvayā nityam upāsitāḥ
a tasmād vaktavyam eveha tvayā paśyāmy aśeṣataḥ
c dharmāñ śuśrūṣamāṇebhyaḥ pṛṣṭena ca satā punaḥ
a vaktavyaṃ viduṣā ceti dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c apratibruvataḥ kaṣṭo doṣo hi bhavati prabho
a tasmāt putraiś ca pautraiś ca dharmān pṛṣṭaḥ sanātanān
c vidvāñ jijñāsamānais tvaṃ prabrūhi bharatarṣabha
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a athābravīn mahātejā vākyaṃ kauravanandanaḥ
c hanta dharmān pravakṣyāmi dṛḍhe vāṅmanasī mama
e tava prasādād govinda bhūtātmā hy asi śāśvataḥ
a yudhiṣṭhiras tu māṃ rājā dharmān samanupṛcchatu
c evaṃ prīto bhaviṣyāmi dharmān vakṣyāmi cānagha
a yasmin rājarṣabhe jāte dharmātmani mahātmani
c ahṛṣyann ṛṣayaḥ sarve sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
a sarveṣāṃ dīptayaśasāṃ kurūṇāṃ dharmacāriṇām
c yasya nāsti samaḥ kaś cit sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
a dhṛtir damo brahmacaryaṃ kṣamā dharmaś ca nityadā
c yasminn ojaś ca tejaś ca sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
a satyaṃ dānaṃ tapaḥ śaucaṃ śāntir dākṣyam asaṃbhramaḥ
c yasminn etāni sarvāṇi sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
a yo na kāmān na saṃrambhān na bhayān nārthakāraṇāt
c kuryād adharmaṃ dharmātmā sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
a saṃbandhino 'tithīn bhṛtyān saṃśritopāśritāṃś ca yaḥ
c saṃmānayati satkṛtya sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
a satyanityaḥ kṣamānityo jñānanityo 'tithipriyaḥ
c yo dadāti satāṃ nityaṃ sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
a ijyādhyayananityaś ca dharme ca nirataḥ sadā
c śāntaḥ śrutarahasyaś ca sa māṃ pṛcchatu pāṇḍavaḥ
 vāsudeva uvāca
a lajjayā parayopeto dharmātmā sa yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c abhiśāpabhayād bhīto bhavantaṃ nopasarpati
a lokasya kadanaṃ kṛtvā lokanātho viśāṃ pate
c abhiśāpabhayād bhīto bhavantaṃ nopasarpati
a pūjyān mānyāṃś ca bhaktāṃś ca gurūn saṃbandhibāndhavān
c arghyārhān iṣubhir hatvā bhavantaṃ nopasarpati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a brāhmaṇānāṃ yathā dharmo dānam adhyayanaṃ tapaḥ
c kṣatriyāṇāṃ tathā kṛṣṇa samare dehapātanam
a pitṝn pitāmahān putrān gurūn saṃbandhibāndhavān
c mithyāpravṛttān yaḥ saṃkhye nihanyād dharma eva saḥ
a samayatyāgino lubdhān gurūn api ca keśava
c nihanti samare pāpān kṣatriyo yaḥ sa dharmavit
d yo lobhān na samīkṣeta dharmasetuṃ sanātanam
d nihanti yas taṃ samare kṣatriyo vai sa dharmavit
d lohitodāṃ keśatṛṇāṃ gajaśailāṃ dhvajadrumām
d mahīṃ karoti yuddheṣu kṣatriyo yaḥ sa dharmavit
a āhūtena raṇe nityaṃ yoddhavyaṃ kṣatrabandhunā
c dharmyaṃ svargyaṃ ca lokyaṃ ca yuddhaṃ hi manur abravīt
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a evam uktas tu bhīṣmeṇa dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c vinītavad upāgamya tasthau saṃdarśane 'grataḥ
a athāsya pādau jagrāha bhīṣmaś cābhinananda tam
c mūrdhni cainam upāghrāya niṣīdety abravīt tadā
a tam uvācātha gāṅgeya ṛṣabhaḥ sarvadhanvinām
c pṛccha māṃ tāta visrabdhaṃ mā bhais tvaṃ kurusattama
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a praṇipatya hṛṣīkeśam abhivādya pitāmaham
c anumānya gurūn sarvān paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a rājyaṃ vai paramo dharma iti dharmavido viduḥ
c mahāntam etaṃ bhāraṃ ca manye tad brūhi pārthiva
a rājadharmān viśeṣeṇa kathayasva pitāmaha
c sarvasya jīvalokasya rājadharmāḥ parāyaṇam
a trivargo 'tra samāsakto rājadharmeṣu kaurava
c mokṣadharmaś ca vispaṣṭaḥ sakalo 'tra samāhitaḥ
a yathā hi raśmayo 'śvasya dviradasyāṅkuśo yathā
c narendradharmo lokasya tathā pragrahaṇaṃ smṛtam
a atra vai saṃpramūḍhe tu dharme rājarṣisevite
c lokasya saṃsthā na bhavet sarvaṃ ca vyākulaṃ bhavet
a udayan hi yathā sūryo nāśayaty āsuraṃ tamaḥ
c rājadharmās tathālokyām ākṣipanty aśubhāṃ gatim
a tad agre rājadharmāṇām arthatattvaṃ pitāmaha
c prabrūhi bharataśreṣṭha tvaṃ hi buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
a āgamaś ca paras tvattaḥ sarveṣāṃ naḥ paraṃtapa
c bhavantaṃ hi paraṃ buddhau vāsudevo 'bhimanyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase
c brāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtya dharmān vakṣyāmi śāśvatān
a śṛṇu kārtsnyena mattas tvaṃ rājadharmān yudhiṣṭhira
c nirucyamānān niyato yac cānyad abhivāñchasi
a ādāv eva kuruśreṣṭha rājñā rañjanakāmyayā
c devatānāṃ dvijānāṃ ca vartitavyaṃ yathāvidhi
a daivatāny arcayitvā hi brāhmaṇāṃś ca kurūdvaha
c ānṛṇyaṃ yāti dharmasya lokena ca sa mānyate
a utthāne ca sadā putra prayatethā yudhiṣṭhira
c na hy utthānam ṛte daivaṃ rājñām arthaprasiddhaye
a sādhāraṇaṃ dvayaṃ hy etad daivam utthānam eva ca
c pauruṣaṃ hi paraṃ manye daivaṃ niścityam ucyate
a vipanne ca samārambhe saṃtāpaṃ mā sma vai kṛthāḥ
c ghaṭate vinayas tāta rājñām eṣa nayaḥ paraḥ
a na hi satyād ṛte kiṃ cid rājñāṃ vai siddhikāraṇam
c satye hi rājā nirataḥ pretya ceha ca nandati
a ṛṣīṇām api rājendra satyam eva paraṃ dhanam
c tathā rājñaḥ paraṃ satyān nānyad viśvāsakāraṇam
a guṇavāñ śīlavān dānto mṛdur dharmyo jitendriyaḥ
c sudarśaḥ sthūlalakṣyaś ca na bhraśyeta sadā śriyaḥ
a ārjavaṃ sarvakāryeṣu śrayethāḥ kurunandana
b ārjavena samāyuktā modante ṛṣayo divi
c punar nayavicāreṇa trayīsaṃvaraṇena ca
a mṛdur hi rājā satataṃ laṅghyo bhavati sarvaśaḥ
c tīkṣṇāc codvijate lokas tasmād ubhayam ācara
a adaṇḍyāś caiva te nityaṃ viprāḥ syur dadatāṃ vara
c bhūtam etat paraṃ loke brāhmaṇā nāma bhārata
a manunā cāpi rājendra gītau ślokau mahātmanā
c dharmeṣu sveṣu kauravya hṛdi tau kartum arhasi
a adbhyo 'gnir brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmano loham utthitam
c teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu śāmyati
a ayo hanti yadāśmānam agniś cāpo 'bhipadyate
c brahma ca kṣatriyo dveṣṭi tadā sīdanti te trayaḥ
a etaj jñātvā mahārāja namasyā eva te dvijāḥ
c bhaumaṃ brahma dvijaśreṣṭhā dhārayanti śamānvitāḥ
a evaṃ caiva naravyāghra lokatantravighātakāḥ
c nigrāhyā eva satataṃ bāhubhyāṃ ye syur īdṛśāḥ
a ślokau cośanasā gītau purā tāta maharṣiṇā
c tau nibodha mahāprājña tvam ekāgramanā nṛpa
a udyamya śastram āyāntam api vedāntagaṃ raṇe
c nigṛhṇīyāt svadharmeṇa dharmāpekṣī nareśvaraḥ
a vinaśyamānaṃ dharmaṃ hi yo rakṣati sa dharmavit
c na tena bhrūṇahā sa syān manyus taṃ manum ṛcchati
a evaṃ caiva naraśreṣṭha rakṣyā eva dvijātayaḥ
c svaparāddhān api hi tān viṣayānte samutsṛjet
a abhiśastam api hy eṣāṃ kṛpāyīta viśāṃ pate
c brahmaghne gurutalpe ca bhrūṇahatye tathaiva ca
a rājadviṣṭe ca viprasya viṣayānte visarjanam
b vapanaṃ draviṇādānaṃ svapuryāś ca visarjanam
c vidhīyate na śārīraṃ bhayam eṣāṃ kadā cana
a dayitāś ca narās te syur nityaṃ puruṣasattama
c na kośaḥ paramo hy anyo rājñāṃ puruṣasaṃcayāt
a durgeṣu ca mahārāja ṣaṭsu ye śāstraniścitāḥ
c sarveṣu teṣu manyante naradurgaṃ sudustaram
a tasmān nityaṃ dayā kāryā cāturvarṇye vipaścitā
c dharmātmā satyavāk caiva rājā rañjayati prajāḥ
a na ca kṣāntena te bhāvyaṃ nityaṃ puruṣasattama
c adharmyo hi mṛdū rājā kṣamāvān iva kuñjaraḥ
a bārhaspatye ca śāstre vai ślokā viniyatāḥ purā
c asminn arthe mahārāja tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
a kṣamamāṇaṃ nṛpaṃ nityaṃ nīcaḥ paribhavej janaḥ
c hastiyantā gajasyeva śira evārurukṣati
a tasmān naiva mṛdur nityaṃ tīkṣṇo vāpi bhaven nṛpaḥ
c vasante 'rka iva śrīmān na śīto na ca gharmadaḥ
a pratyakṣeṇānumānena tathaupamyopadeśataḥ
c parīkṣyās te mahārāja sve pare caiva sarvadā
a vyasanāni ca sarvāṇi tyajethā bhūridakṣiṇa
c na caiva na prayuñjīta saṅgaṃ tu parivarjayet
a nityaṃ hi vyasanī loke paribhūto bhavaty uta
c udvejayati lokaṃ cāpy atidveṣī mahīpatiḥ
a bhavitavyaṃ sadā rājñā garbhiṇīsahadharmiṇā
c kāraṇaṃ ca mahārāja śṛṇu yenedam iṣyate
a yathā hi garbhiṇī hitvā svaṃ priyaṃ manaso 'nugam
c garbhasya hitam ādhatte tathā rājñāpy asaṃśayam
a vartitavyaṃ kuruśreṣṭha nityaṃ dharmānuvartinā
c svaṃ priyaṃ samabhityajya yad yal lokahitaṃ bhavet
a na saṃtyājyaṃ ca te dhairyaṃ kadā cid api pāṇḍava
c dhīrasya spaṣṭadaṇḍasya na hy ājñā pratihanyate
a parihāsaś ca bhṛtyais te na nityaṃ vadatāṃ vara
c kartavyo rājaśārdūla doṣam atra hi me śṛṇu
a avamanyanti bhartāraṃ saṃharṣād upajīvinaḥ
c sve sthāne na ca tiṣṭhanti laṅghayanti hi tad vacaḥ
a preṣyamāṇā vikalpante guhyaṃ cāpy anuyuñjate
c ayācyaṃ caiva yācante 'bhojyāny āhārayanti ca
a krudhyanti paridīpyanti bhūmim adhyāsate 'sya ca
c utkocair vañcanābhiś ca kāryāṇy anuvihanti ca
a jarjaraṃ cāsya viṣayaṃ kurvanti pratirūpakaiḥ
c strīr akṣibhiś ca sajjante tulyaveṣā bhavanti ca
a vātaṃ ca ṣṭhīvanaṃ caiva kurvate cāsya saṃnidhau
c nirlajjā naraśārdūla vyāharanti ca tadvacaḥ
a hayaṃ vā dantinaṃ vāpi rathaṃ nṛpatisaṃmatam
c adhirohanty anādṛtya harṣule pārthive mṛdau
a idaṃ te duṣkaraṃ rājann idaṃ te durviceṣṭitam
c ity evaṃ suhṛdo nāma bruvanti pariṣadgatāḥ
a kruddhe cāsmin hasanty eva na ca hṛṣyanti pūjitāḥ
c saṃgharṣaśīlāś ca sadā bhavanty anyonyakāraṇāt
a visraṃsayanti mantraṃ ca vivṛṇvanti ca duṣkṛtam
c līlayā caiva kurvanti sāvajñās tasya śāsanam
e alaṃkaraṇabhojyaṃ ca tathā snānānulepanam
a helamānā naravyāghra svasthās tasyopaśṛṇvate
c nindanti svān adhīkārān saṃtyajanti ca bhārata
a na vṛttyā parituṣyanti rājadeyaṃ haranti ca
c krīḍituṃ tena cecchanti sasūtreṇeva pakṣiṇā
e asmatpraṇeyo rājeti loke caiva vadanty uta
a ete caivāpare caiva doṣāḥ prādurbhavanty uta
c nṛpatau mārdavopete harṣule ca yudhiṣṭhira
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nityodyuktena vai rājñā bhavitavyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c praśāmyate ca rājā hi nārīvodyamavarjitaḥ
a bhagavān uśanā cāha ślokam atra viśāṃ pate
c tam ihaikamanā rājan gadatas tvaṃ nibodha me
a dvāv etau grasate bhūmiḥ sarpo bilaśayān iva
c rājānaṃ cāviroddhāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ cāpravāsinam
a tad etan naraśārdūla hṛdi tvaṃ kartum arhasi
c saṃdheyān api saṃdhatsva virodhyāṃś ca virodhaya
d svāmyamātyasuhṛtkośarāṣṭradurgabalāni ca
a saptāṅge yaś ca te rājye vaiparītyaṃ samācaret
c gurur vā yadi vā mitraṃ pratihantavya eva saḥ
a maruttena hi rājñāyaṃ gītaḥ ślokaḥ purātanaḥ
c rājyādhikāre rājendra bṛhaspatimataḥ purā
a guror apy avaliptasya kāryākāryam ajānataḥ
c utpathapratipannasya parityāgo vidhīyate
a bāhoḥ putreṇa rājñā ca sagareṇeha dhīmatā
c asamañjāḥ suto jyeṣṭhas tyaktaḥ paurahitaiṣiṇā
a asamañjāḥ sarayvāṃ prāk paurāṇāṃ bālakān nṛpa
c nyamajjayad ataḥ pitrā nirbhartsya sa vivāsitaḥ
a ṛṣiṇoddālakenāpi śvetaketur mahātapāḥ
c mithyā viprān upacaran saṃtyakto dayitaḥ sutaḥ
a lokarañjanam evātra rājñāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c satyasya rakṣaṇaṃ caiva vyavahārasya cārjavam
a na hiṃsyāt paravittāni deyaṃ kāle ca dāpayet
c vikrāntaḥ satyavāk kṣānto nṛpo na calate pathaḥ
a guptamantro jitakrodho śāstrārthagataniścayaḥ
c dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca satataṃ rataḥ
a trayyā saṃvṛtarandhraś ca rājā bhavitum arhati
c vṛjinasya narendrāṇāṃ nānyat saṃvaraṇāt param
a cāturvarṇyasya dharmāś ca rakṣitavyā mahīkṣitā
c dharmasaṃkararakṣā hi rājñāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a na viśvasec ca nṛpatir na cātyarthaṃ na viśvaset
c ṣāḍguṇyaguṇadoṣāṃś ca nityaṃ buddhyāvalokayet
a dviṭchidradarśī nṛpatir nityam eva praśasyate
c trivargaviditārthaś ca yuktacāropadhiś ca yaḥ
a kośasyopārjanaratir yamavaiśravaṇopamaḥ
c vettā ca daśavargasya sthānavṛddhikṣayātmanaḥ
a abhṛtānāṃ bhaved bhartā bhṛtānāṃ cānvavekṣakaḥ
c nṛpatiḥ sumukhaś ca syāt smitapūrvābhibhāṣitā
a upāsitā ca vṛddhānāṃ jitatandrīr alolupaḥ
c satāṃ vṛtte sthitamatiḥ santo hy ācāradarśinaḥ
a na cādadīta vittāni satāṃ hastāt kadā cana
c asadbhyas tu samādadyāt sadbhyaḥ saṃpratipādayet
a svayaṃ prahartādātā ca vaśyātmā vaśyasādhanaḥ
c kāle dātā ca bhoktā ca śuddhācāras tathaiva ca
a śūrān bhaktān asaṃhāryān kule jātān arogiṇaḥ
c śiṣṭāñ śiṣṭābhisaṃbandhān mānino nāvamāninaḥ
a vidyāvido lokavidaḥ paralokānvavekṣakān
c dharmeṣu niratān sādhūn acalān acalān iva
a sahāyān satataṃ kuryād rājā bhūtipuraskṛtaḥ
c tais tulyaś ca bhaved bhogaiś chatramātrājñayādhikaḥ
a pratyakṣā ca parokṣā ca vṛttiś cāsya bhavet sadā
c evaṃ kṛtvā narendro hi na khedam iha vindati
a sarvātiśaṅkī nṛpatir yaś ca sarvaharo bhavet
c sa kṣipram anṛjur lubdhaḥ svajanenaiva bādhyate
a śucis tu pṛthivīpālo lokacittagrahe rataḥ
c na pataty aribhir grastaḥ patitaś cāvatiṣṭhate
a akrodhano 'thāvyasanī mṛdudaṇḍo jitendriyaḥ
c rājā bhavati bhūtānāṃ viśvāsyo himavān iva
a prājño nyāyaguṇopetaḥ pararandhreṣu tatparaḥ
c sudarśaḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ nayāpanayavit tathā
a kṣiprakārī jitakrodhaḥ suprasādo mahāmanāḥ
c arogaprakṛtir yuktaḥ kriyāvān avikatthanaḥ
a ārabdhāny eva kāryāṇi na paryavasitāni ca
c yasya rājñaḥ pradṛśyante sa rājā rājasattamaḥ
a putrā iva pitur gehe viṣaye yasya mānavāḥ
c nirbhayā vicariṣyanti sa rājā rājasattamaḥ
a agūḍhavibhavā yasya paurā rāṣṭranivāsinaḥ
c nayāpanayavettāraḥ sa rājā rājasattamaḥ
a svakarmaniratā yasya janā viṣayavāsinaḥ
c asaṃghātaratā dāntāḥ pālyamānā yathāvidhi
a vaśyā neyā vinītāś ca na ca saṃgharṣaśīlinaḥ
c viṣaye dānarucayo narā yasya sa pārthivaḥ
a na yasya kūṭakapaṭaṃ na māyā na ca matsaraḥ
c viṣaye bhūmipālasya tasya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a yaḥ satkaroti jñānāni neyaḥ paurahite rataḥ
c satāṃ dharmānugas tyāgī sa rājā rājyam arhati
a yasya cāraś ca mantraś ca nityaṃ caiva kṛtākṛte
c na jñāyate hi ripubhiḥ sa rājā rājyam arhati
a ślokaś cāyaṃ purā gīto bhārgaveṇa mahātmanā
c ākhyāte rāmacarite nṛpatiṃ prati bhārata
a rājānaṃ prathamaṃ vindet tato bhāryāṃ tato dhanam
c rājany asati lokasya kuto bhāryā kuto dhanam
a tad rājan rājasiṃhānāṃ nānyo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c ṛte rakṣāṃ suvispaṣṭāṃ rakṣā lokasya dhāraṇam
a prācetasena manunā ślokau cemāv udāhṛtau
c rājadharmeṣu rājendra tāv ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
a ṣaḍ etān puruṣo jahyād bhinnāṃ nāvam ivārṇave
c apravaktāram ācāryam anadhīyānam ṛtvijam
a arakṣitāraṃ rājānaṃ bhāryāṃ cāpriyavādinīm
c grāmakāmaṃ ca gopālaṃ vanakāmaṃ ca nāpitam
 śrīvaiśaṃpāyanaḥ
 etāvad uktvā bhūyo 'pi bhīṣmaḥ kurupitāmahaḥ
 uvāca vacanaṃ dhīmān sarvataḥ sārasaṃgraham
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etat te rājadharmāṇāṃ navanītaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c bṛhaspatir hi bhagavān nānyaṃ dharmaṃ praśaṃsati
a viśālākṣaś ca bhagavān kāvyaś caiva mahātapāḥ
c sahasrākṣo mahendraś ca tathā prācetaso manuḥ
a bharadvājaś ca bhagavāṃs tathā gauraśirā muniḥ
c rājaśāstrapraṇetāro brahmaṇyā brahmavādinaḥ
a rakṣām eva praśaṃsanti dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
c rājñāṃ rājīvatāmrākṣa sādhanaṃ cātra vai śṛṇu
a cāraś ca praṇidhiś caiva kāle dānam amatsaraḥ
c yuktyādānaṃ na cādānam ayogena yudhiṣṭhira
a satāṃ saṃgrahaṇaṃ śauryaṃ dākṣyaṃ satyaṃ prajāhitam
c anārjavair ārjavaiś ca śatrupakṣasya bhedanam
a sādhūnām aparityāgaḥ kulīnānāṃ ca dhāraṇam
c nicayaś ca niceyānāṃ sevā buddhimatām api
a balānāṃ harṣaṇaṃ nityaṃ prajānām anvavekṣaṇam
c kāryeṣv akhedaḥ kośasya tathaiva ca vivardhanam
a puraguptir aviśvāsaḥ paurasaṃghātabhedanam
c ketanānāṃ ca jīrṇānām avekṣā caiva sīdatām
a dvividhasya ca daṇḍasya prayogaḥ kālacoditaḥ
c arimadhyasthamitrāṇāṃ yathāvac cānvavekṣaṇam
a upajāpaś ca bhṛtyānām ātmanaḥ paradarśanāt
c aviśvāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva parasyāśvāsanaṃ tathā
a nītidharmānusaraṇaṃ nityam utthānam eva ca
c ripūṇām anavajñānaṃ nityaṃ cānāryavarjanam
a utthānaṃ hi narendrāṇāṃ bṛhaspatir abhāṣata
c rājadharmasya yan mūlaṃ ślokāṃś cātra nibodha me
a utthānenāmṛtaṃ labdham utthānenāsurā hatāḥ
c utthānena mahendreṇa śraiṣṭhyaṃ prāptaṃ divīha ca
a utthānadhīraḥ puruṣo vāgdhīrān adhitiṣṭhati
c utthānadhīraṃ vāgdhīrā ramayanta upāsate
a utthānahīno rājā hi buddhimān api nityaśaḥ
c dharṣaṇīyo ripūṇāṃ syād bhujaṃga iva nirviṣaḥ
a na ca śatrur avajñeyo durbalo 'pi balīyasā
c alpo 'pi hi dahaty agnir viṣam alpaṃ hinasti ca
a ekāśvenāpi saṃbhūtaḥ śatrur durgasamāśritaḥ
c taṃ taṃ tāpayate deśam api rājñaḥ samṛddhinaḥ
a rājño rahasyaṃ yad vākyaṃ jayārthaṃ lokasaṃgrahaḥ
c hṛdi yac cāsya jihmaṃ syāt kāraṇārthaṃ ca yad bhavet
a yac cāsya kāryaṃ vṛjinam ārjavenaiva dhāryate
c dambhanārthāya lokasya dharmiṣṭhām ācaret kriyām
a rājyaṃ hi sumahat tantraṃ durdhāryam akṛtātmabhiḥ
c na śakyaṃ mṛdunā voḍhum āghātasthānam uttamam
a rājyaṃ sarvāmiṣaṃ nityam ārjaveneha dhāryate
c tasmān miśreṇa satataṃ vartitavyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a yady apy asya vipattiḥ syād rakṣamāṇasya vai prajāḥ
c so 'py asya vipulo dharma evaṃvṛttā hi bhūmipāḥ
a eṣa te rājadharmāṇāṃ leśaḥ samanuvarṇitaḥ
c bhūyas te yatra saṃdehas tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tato vyāsaś ca bhagavān devasthāno 'śmanā saha
c vāsudevaḥ kṛpaś caiva sātyakiḥ saṃjayas tathā
a sādhu sādhv iti saṃhṛṣṭāḥ puṣyamāṇair ivānanaiḥ
c astuvaṃs te naravyāghraṃ bhīṣmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
a tato dīnamanā bhīṣmam uvāca kurusattamaḥ
c netrābhyām aśrupūrṇābhyāṃ pādau tasya śanaiḥ spṛśan
a śva idānīṃ svasaṃdehaṃ prakṣyāmi tvaṃ pitāmaha
c upaiti savitāpy astaṃ rasam āpīya pārthivam
a tato dvijātīn abhivādya keśavaḥ
kṛpaś ca te caiva yudhiṣṭhirādayaḥ
c pradakṣiṇīkṛtya mahānadīsutaṃ
tato rathān āruruhur mudā yutāḥ
a dṛṣadvatīṃ cāpy avagāhya suvratāḥ
kṛtodakāryāḥ kṛtajapyamaṅgalāḥ
c upāsya saṃdhyāṃ vidhivat paraṃtapās
tataḥ puraṃ te viviśur gajāhvayam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tataḥ kālyaṃ samutthāya kṛtapaurvāhṇikakriyāḥ
c yayus te nagarākārai rathaiḥ pāṇḍavayādavāḥ
a prapadya ca kurukṣetraṃ bhīṣmam āsādya cānagham
c sukhāṃ ca rajanīṃ pṛṣṭvā gāṅgeyaṃ rathināṃ varam
a vyāsādīn abhivādyarṣīn sarvais taiś cābhinanditāḥ
c niṣedur abhito bhīṣmaṃ parivārya samantataḥ
a tato rājā mahātejā dharmarājo yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c abravīt prāñjalir bhīṣmaṃ pratipūjyābhivādya ca
a ya eṣa rājārājeti śabdaś carati bhārata
c katham eṣa samutpannas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a tulyapāṇiśirogrīvas tulyabuddhīndriyātmakaḥ
c tulyaduḥkhasukhātmā ca tulyapṛṣṭhabhujodaraḥ
a tulyaśukrāsthimajjaś ca tulyamāṃsāsṛg eva ca
c niḥśvāsocchvāsatulyaś ca tulyaprāṇaśarīravān
a samānajanmamaraṇaḥ samaḥ sarvaguṇair nṛṇām
c viśiṣṭabuddhīñ śūrāṃś ca katham eko 'dhitiṣṭhati
a katham eko mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ vīraśūrāryasaṃkulām
c rakṣaty api ca loko 'sya prasādam abhivāñchati
a ekasya ca prasādena kṛtsno lokaḥ prasīdati
c vyākulenākulaḥ sarvo bhavatīti viniścayaḥ
a etad icchāmy ahaṃ sarvaṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
c śrotuṃ tan me yathātattvaṃ prabrūhi vadatāṃ vara
a naitat kāraṇam alpaṃ hi bhaviṣyati viśāṃ pate
c yad ekasmiñ jagat sarvaṃ devavad yāti saṃnatim
 bhīṣma uvāca
a niyatas tvaṃ naraśreṣṭha śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣataḥ
c yathā rājyaṃ samutpannam ādau kṛtayuge 'bhavat
a naiva rājyaṃ na rājāsīn na daṇḍo na ca dāṇḍikaḥ
c dharmeṇaiva prajāḥ sarvā rakṣanti ca parasparam
a pālayānās tathānyonyaṃ narā dharmeṇa bhārata
c khedaṃ paramam ājagmus tatas tān moha āviśat
a te mohavaśam āpannā mānavā manujarṣabha
c pratipattivimohāc ca dharmas teṣām anīnaśat
a naṣṭāyāṃ pratipattau tu mohavaśyā narās tadā
c lobhasya vaśam āpannāḥ sarve bhāratasattama
a aprāptasyābhimarśaṃ tu kurvanto manujās tataḥ
c kāmo nāmāparas tatra samapadyata vai prabho
a tāṃs tu kāmavaśaṃ prāptān rāgo nāma samaspṛśat
c raktāś ca nābhyajānanta kāryākāryaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a agamyāgamanaṃ caiva vācyāvācyaṃ tathaiva ca
c bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ ca rājendra doṣādoṣaṃ ca nātyajan
a viplute naraloke 'smiṃs tato brahma nanāśa ha
c nāśāc ca brahmaṇo rājan dharmo nāśam athāgamat
a naṣṭe brahmaṇi dharme ca devās trāsam athāgaman
c te trastā naraśārdūla brahmāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ yayuḥ
a prapadya bhagavantaṃ te devā lokapitāmaham
c ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve duḥkhaśokabhayārditāḥ
a bhagavan naralokasthaṃ naṣṭaṃ brahma sanātanam
c lobhamohādibhir bhāvais tato no bhayam āviśat
a brahmaṇaś ca praṇāśena dharmo 'py anaśad īśvara
c tataḥ sma samatāṃ yātā martyais tribhuvaneśvara
a adho hi varṣam asmākaṃ martyās tūrdhvapravarṣiṇaḥ
c kriyāvyuparamāt teṣāṃ tato 'gacchāma saṃśayam
a atra niḥśreyasaṃ yan nas tad dhyāyasva pitāmaha
c tvatprabhāvasamuttho 'sau prabhāvo no vinaśyati
a tān uvāca surān sarvān svayaṃbhūr bhagavāṃs tataḥ
c śreyo 'haṃ cintayiṣyāmi vyetu vo bhīḥ surarṣabhāḥ
a tato 'dhyāyasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ cakre svabuddhijam
c yatra dharmas tathaivārthaḥ kāmaś caivānuvarṇitaḥ
a trivarga iti vikhyāto gaṇa eṣa svayaṃbhuvā
c caturtho mokṣa ity eva pṛthagarthaḥ pṛthaggaṇaḥ
a mokṣasyāpi trivargo 'nyaḥ proktaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tamaḥ
c sthānaṃ vṛddhiḥ kṣayaś caiva trivargaś caiva daṇḍajaḥ
a ātmā deśaś ca kālaś cāpy upāyāḥ kṛtyam eva ca
c sahāyāḥ kāraṇaṃ caiva ṣaḍvargo nītijaḥ smṛtaḥ
a trayī cānvīkṣikī caiva vārtā ca bharatarṣabha
c daṇḍanītiś ca vipulā vidyās tatra nidarśitāḥ
a amātyarakṣāpraṇidhī rājaputrasya rakṣaṇam
c cāraś ca vividhopāyaḥ praṇidhiś ca pṛthagvidhaḥ
a sāma copapradānaṃ ca bhedo daṇḍaś ca pāṇḍava
c upekṣā pañcamī cātra kārtsnyena samudāhṛtā
a mantraś ca varṇitaḥ kṛtsnas tathā bhedārtha eva ca
c vibhraṃśaś caiva mantrasya siddhyasiddhyoś ca yat phalam
a saṃdhiś ca vividhābhikhyo hīno madhyas tathottamaḥ
c bhayasatkāravittākhyaḥ kārtsnyena parivarṇitaḥ
a yātrākālāś ca catvāras trivargasya ca vistaraḥ
c vijayo dharmayuktaś ca tathārthavijayaś ca ha
a āsuraś caiva vijayas tathā kārtsnyena varṇitaḥ
c lakṣaṇaṃ pañcavargasya trividhaṃ cātra varṇitam
a prakāśaś cāprakāśaś ca daṇḍo 'tha pariśabditaḥ
c prakāśo 'ṣṭavidhas tatra guhyas tu bahuvistaraḥ
a rathā nāgā hayāś caiva pādātāś caiva pāṇḍava
c viṣṭir nāvaś carāś caiva deśikāḥ pathi cāṣṭakam
a aṅgāny etāni kauravya prakāśāni balasya tu
c jaṅgamājaṅgamāś coktāś cūrṇayogā viṣādayaḥ
a sparśe cābhyavahārye cāpy upāṃśur vividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
b krīḍāpūrve raṇe dyūte visrambheṇa samanvitam
b uktaṃ kaitavyam ity etad upāyo navamo budhaiḥ
b upekṣā sarvakāryeṣu karmaṇāṃ karaṇeṣu ca
b aniṣṭānāṃ samutthāne trivargo naśyate yayā
b indrajālādikā māyā vāgjīvanakuśīlavaiḥ
b sunimittair durnimittair utpātaiś ca samanvitam
b ḍambho liṅgaṃ samāśritya śatruvarge prayujyate
b śāṭhyaṃ niśceṣṭatā proktā cittadoṣapradūṣikā
c arir mitram udāsīna ity ete 'py anuvarṇitāḥ
a kṛtsnā mārgaguṇāś caiva tathā bhūmiguṇāś ca ha
c ātmarakṣaṇam āśvāsaḥ spaśānāṃ cānvavekṣaṇam
a kalpanā vividhāś cāpi nṛnāgarathavājinām
c vyūhāś ca vividhābhikhyā vicitraṃ yuddhakauśalam
a utpātāś ca nipātāś ca suyuddhaṃ supalāyanam
c śastrāṇāṃ pāyanajñānaṃ tathaiva bharatarṣabha
a balavyasanamuktaṃ ca tathaiva balaharṣaṇam
c pīḍanāskandakālaś ca bhayakālaś ca pāṇḍava
a tathā khātavidhānaṃ ca yogasaṃcāra eva ca
c caurāṭavyabalaiś cograiḥ pararāṣṭrasya pīḍanam
a agnidair garadaiś caiva pratirūpakacārakaiḥ
c śreṇimukhyopajāpena vīrudhaś chedanena ca
a dūṣaṇena ca nāgānām āśaṅkājananena ca
c ārodhanena bhaktasya pathaś copārjanena ca
a saptāṅgasya ca rājyasya hrāsavṛddhisamañjasam
c dūtasāmarthyayogaś ca rāṣṭrasya ca vivardhanam
a arimadhyasthamitrāṇāṃ samyak coktaṃ prapañcanam
c avamardaḥ pratīghātas tathaiva ca balīyasām
a vyavahāraḥ susūkṣmaś ca tathā kaṇṭakaśodhanam
c śamo vyāyāmayogaś ca yogo dravyasya saṃcayaḥ
a abhṛtānāṃ ca bharaṇaṃ bhṛtānāṃ cānvavekṣaṇam
c arthakāle pradānaṃ ca vyasaneṣv aprasaṅgitā
a tathā rājaguṇāś caiva senāpatiguṇāś ca ye
c kāraṇasya ca kartuś ca guṇadoṣās tathaiva ca
a duṣṭeṅgitaṃ ca vividhaṃ vṛttiś caivānujīvinām
c śaṅkitatvaṃ ca sarvasya pramādasya ca varjanam
a alabdhalipsā labdhasya tathaiva ca vivardhanam
c pradānaṃ ca vivṛddhasya pātrebhyo vidhivat tathā
a visargo 'rthasya dharmārtham arthārthaṃ kāmahetunā
c caturtho vyasanāghāte tathaivātrānuvarṇitaḥ
a krodhajāni tathogrāṇi kāmajāni tathaiva ca
c daśoktāni kuruśreṣṭha vyasanāny atra caiva ha
a mṛgayākṣās tathā pānaṃ striyaś ca bharatarṣabha
c kāmajāny āhur ācāryāḥ proktānīha svayaṃbhuvā
a vākpāruṣyaṃ tathogratvaṃ daṇḍapāruṣyam eva ca
c ātmano nigrahas tyāgo 'thārthadūṣaṇam eva ca
a yantrāṇi vividhāny eva kriyās teṣāṃ ca varṇitāḥ
c avamardaḥ pratīghātaḥ ketanānāṃ ca bhañjanam
a caityadrumāṇām āmardo rodhaḥkarmāntanāśanam
c apaskaro 'tha gamanaṃ tathopāsyā ca varṇitā
a paṇavānakaśaṅkhānāṃ bherīṇāṃ ca yudhāṃ vara
c upārjanaṃ ca dravyāṇāṃ paramarma ca tāni ṣaṭ
a labdhasya ca praśamanaṃ satāṃ caiva hi pūjanam
c vidvadbhir ekībhāvaś ca prātarhomavidhijñatā
a maṅgalālambhanaṃ caiva śarīrasya pratikriyā
c āhārayojanaṃ caiva nityam āstikyam eva ca
a ekena ca yathottheyaṃ satyatvaṃ madhurā giraḥ
c utsavānāṃ samājānāṃ kriyāḥ ketanajās tathā
a pratyakṣā ca parokṣā ca sarvādhikaraṇeṣu ca
c vṛttir bharataśārdūla nityaṃ caivānvavekṣaṇam
a adaṇḍyatvaṃ ca viprāṇāṃ yuktyā daṇḍanipātanam
c anujīvisvajātibhyo guṇeṣu parirakṣaṇam
a rakṣaṇaṃ caiva paurāṇāṃ svarāṣṭrasya vivardhanam
c maṇḍalasthā ca yā cintā rājan dvādaśarājikā
a dvāsaptatimatiś caiva proktā yā ca svayaṃbhuvā
c deśajātikulānāṃ ca dharmāḥ samanuvarṇitāḥ
a dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca mokṣaś cātrānuvarṇitaḥ
c upāyaś cārthalipsā ca vividhā bhūridakṣiṇāḥ
a mūlakarmakriyā cātra māyā yogaś ca varṇitaḥ
c dūṣaṇaṃ srotasām atra varṇitaṃ ca sthirāmbhasām
a yair yair upāyair lokaś ca na caled āryavartmanaḥ
c tat sarvaṃ rājaśārdūla nītiśāstre 'nuvarṇitam
a etat kṛtvā śubhaṃ śāstraṃ tataḥ sa bhagavān prabhuḥ
c devān uvāca saṃhṛṣṭaḥ sarvāñ śakrapurogamān
a upakārāya lokasya trivargasthāpanāya ca
c navanītaṃ sarasvatyā buddhir eṣā prabhāvitā
a daṇḍena sahitā hy eṣā lokarakṣaṇakārikā
c nigrahānugraharatā lokān anu cariṣyati
a daṇḍena nīyate ceyaṃ daṇḍaṃ nayati cāpy uta
c daṇḍanītir iti proktā trīṃl lokān anuvartate
a ṣāḍguṇyaguṇasāraiṣā sthāsyaty agre mahātmasu
c mahattvāt tasya daṇḍasya nītir vispaṣṭalakṣaṇā
a nayacāraś ca vipulo yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
c āgamaś ca purāṇānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca saṃbhavaḥ
a tīrthavaṃśaś ca vaṃśaś ca nakṣatrāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c sakalaṃ cāturāśramyaṃ cāturhotraṃ tathaiva ca
a cāturvarṇyaṃ tathaivātra cāturvedyaṃ ca varṇitam
c itihāsopavedāś ca nyāyaḥ kṛtsnaś ca varṇitaḥ
a tapo jñānam ahiṃsā ca satyāsatye nayaḥ paraḥ
c vṛddhopasevā dānaṃ ca śaucam utthānam eva ca
a sarvabhūtānukampā ca sarvam atropavarṇitam
c bhuvi vācogataṃ yac ca tac ca sarvaṃ samarpitam
a tasmin paitāmahe śāstre pāṇḍavaitad asaṃśayam
c dharmārthakāmamokṣāś ca sakalā hy atra śabditāḥ
a tatas tāṃ bhagavān nītiṃ pūrvaṃ jagrāha śaṃkaraḥ
c bahurūpo viśālākṣaḥ śivaḥ sthāṇur umāpatiḥ
d anādinidhano devaś caitanyādisamanvitaḥ
d jñānāni ca vaśe yasya tārakādīny aśeṣataḥ
d aṇimādiguṇopetam aiśvaryaṃ na ca kṛtrimam
d tuṣṭyarthaṃ brahmaṇaḥ putro lalāṭād utthitaḥ prabhuḥ
d arudat sasvanaṃ ghoraṃ jagataḥ prabhur avyayaḥ
d jāyamānaḥ pitā putre putraḥ pitari caiva hi
d buddhiṃ viśvasṛje dattvā brahmāṇḍaṃ yena nirmitam
d yasmin hiraṇmayo haṃsaḥ śakuniḥ samapadyata
d kartā sarvasya lokasya brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
d sa devaḥ sarvabhūtātmā mahādevaḥ sanātanaḥ
d asaṃkhyātasahasrāṇāṃ rudrāṇāṃ sthānam avyayam
a yugānām āyuṣo hrāsaṃ vijñāya bhagavāñ śivaḥ
c saṃcikṣepa tataḥ śāstraṃ mahārthaṃ brahmaṇā kṛtam
a vaiśālākṣam iti proktaṃ tad indraḥ pratyapadyata
c daśādhyāyasahasrāṇi subrahmaṇyo mahātapāḥ
a bhagavān api tac chāstraṃ saṃcikṣepa puraṃdaraḥ
a   devāt prāpya maheśvarāt
a prajānāṃ hitam anvicchan
c sahasraiḥ pañcabhis tāta yad uktaṃ bāhudantakam
a adhyāyānāṃ sahasrais tu tribhir eva bṛhaspatiḥ
c saṃcikṣepeśvaro buddhyā bārhaspatyaṃ tad ucyate
a adhyāyānāṃ sahasreṇa kāvyaḥ saṃkṣepam abravīt
c tac chāstram amitaprajño yogācāryo mahātapāḥ
a evaṃ lokānurodhena śāstram etan maharṣibhiḥ
c saṃkṣiptam āyur vijñāya martyānāṃ hrāsi pāṇḍava
a atha devāḥ samāgamya viṣṇum ūcuḥ prajāpatim
c eko yo 'rhati martyebhyaḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ taṃ vai samādiśa
a tataḥ saṃcintya bhagavān devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
c taijasaṃ vai virajasaṃ so 'sṛjan mānasaṃ sutam
a virajās tu mahābhāga vibhutvaṃ bhuvi naicchata
c nyāsāyaivābhavad buddhiḥ praṇītā tasya pāṇḍava
a kīrtimāṃs tasya putro 'bhūt so 'pi pañcātigo 'bhavat
c kardamas tasya ca sutaḥ so 'py atapyan mahat tapaḥ
a prajāpateḥ kardamasya anaṅgo nāma vai sutaḥ
c prajānāṃ rakṣitā sādhur daṇḍanītiviśāradaḥ
a anaṅgaputro 'tibalo nītimān adhigamya vai
c abhipede mahīrājyam athendriyavaśo 'bhavat
d prāpya nārīṃ mahābhāgāṃ rūpiṇīṃ kāmamohitaḥ
d saubhāgyena ca saṃpannāṃ guṇaiś cānuttamāṃ satīm
a mṛtyos tu duhitā rājan sunīthā nāma mānasī
c prakhyātā triṣu lokeṣu yā sā venam ajījanat
a taṃ prajāsu vidharmāṇaṃ rāgadveṣavaśānugam
c mantrapūtaiḥ kuśair jaghnur ṛṣayo brahmavādinaḥ
a mamanthur dakṣiṇaṃ corum ṛṣayas tasya mantrataḥ
c tato 'sya vikṛto jajñe hrasvāṅgaḥ puruṣo bhuvi
a dagdhasthāṇupratīkāśo raktākṣaḥ kṛṣṇamūrdhajaḥ
c niṣīdety evam ūcus tam ṛṣayo brahmavādinaḥ
a tasmān niṣādāḥ saṃbhūtāḥ krūrāḥ śailavanāśrayāḥ
c ye cānye vindhyanilayā mlecchāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ
a bhūyo 'sya dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ mamanthus te maharṣayaḥ
c tataḥ puruṣa utpanno rūpeṇendra ivāparaḥ
a kavacī baddhanistriṃśaḥ saśaraḥ saśarāsanaḥ
c vedavedāṅgavic caiva dhanurvede ca pāragaḥ
a taṃ daṇḍanītiḥ sakalā śritā rājan narottamam
c tataḥ sa prāñjalir vainyo maharṣīṃs tān uvāca ha
a susūkṣmā me samutpannā buddhir dharmārthadarśinī
c anayā kiṃ mayā kāryaṃ tan me tattvena śaṃsata
a yan māṃ bhavanto vakṣyanti kāryam arthasamanvitam
c tad ahaṃ vai kariṣyāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā
a tam ūcur atha devās te te caiva paramarṣayaḥ
c niyato yatra dharmo vai tam aśaṅkaḥ samācara
a priyāpriye parityajya samaḥ sarveṣu jantuṣu
c kāmakrodhau ca lobhaṃ ca mānaṃ cotsṛjya dūrataḥ
a yaś ca dharmāt pravicalel loke kaś cana mānavaḥ
c nigrāhyas te sa bāhubhyāṃ śaśvad dharmam avekṣataḥ
a pratijñāṃ cādhirohasva manasā karmaṇā girā
c pālayiṣyāmy ahaṃ bhaumaṃ brahma ity eva cāsakṛt
a yaś cātra dharmanīty ukto daṇḍanītivyapāśrayaḥ
c tam aśaṅkaḥ kariṣyāmi svavaśo na kadā cana
a adaṇḍyā me dvijāś ceti pratijānīṣva cābhibho
c lokaṃ ca saṃkarāt kṛtsnāt trātāsmīti paraṃtapa
a vainyas tatas tān uvāca devān ṛṣipurogamān
c brāhmaṇā me sahāyāś ced evam astu surarṣabhāḥ
a evam astv iti vainyas tu tair ukto brahmavādibhiḥ
c purodhāś cābhavat tasya śukro brahmamayo nidhiḥ
a mantriṇo vālakhilyās tu sārasvatyo gaṇo hy abhūt
c maharṣir bhagavān gargas tasya sāṃvatsaro 'bhavat
a ātmanāṣṭama ity eva śrutir eṣā parā nṛṣu
c utpannau bandinau cāsya tatpūrvau sūtamāgadhau
d tayoḥ prīto dadau rājā pṛthur vainyaḥ pratāpavān
d anūpadeśaṃ sūtāya magadhaṃ māgadhāya ca
d atrir mahātmā bhagavāṃs tasyāsīd vedakārakaḥ
d nāradaś cetihāsādīni nityam eva samādadhat
a samatāṃ vasudhāyāś ca sa samyag upapādayat
c vaiṣamyaṃ hi paraṃ bhūmer āsīd iti ha naḥ śrutam
d manvantareṣu sarveṣu viṣamā jāyate mahī
d ujjahāra tato vainyaḥ śilājālān samantataḥ
d dhanuṣkoṭyā mahārāja tena śailā vivardhitāḥ
a sa viṣṇunā ca devena śakreṇa vibudhaiḥ saha
c ṛṣibhiś ca prajāpālye brahmaṇā cābhiṣecitaḥ
a taṃ sākṣāt pṛthivī bheje ratnāny ādāya pāṇḍava
c sāgaraḥ saritāṃ bhartā himavāṃś cācalottamaḥ
a śakraś ca dhanam akṣayyaṃ prādāt tasya yudhiṣṭhira
c rukmaṃ cāpi mahāmeruḥ svayaṃ kanakaparvataḥ
a yakṣarākṣasabhartā ca bhagavān naravāhanaḥ
c dharme cārthe ca kāme ca samarthaṃ pradadau dhanam
a hayā rathāś ca nāgāś ca koṭiśaḥ puruṣās tathā
c prādurbabhūvur vainyasya cintanād eva pāṇḍava
e na jarā na ca durbhikṣaṃ nādhayo vyādhayas tathā
a sarīsṛpebhyaḥ stenebhyo na cānyonyāt kadā cana
c bhayam utpadyate tatra tasya rājño 'bhirakṣaṇāt
d āpas tastambhire cāsya samudram abhiyāsyataḥ
d parvatāś ca dadur mārgaṃ dhvajabhaṅgaś ca nābhavat
a teneyaṃ pṛthivī dugdhā sasyāni daśa sapta ca
c yakṣarākṣasanāgaiś cāpīpsitaṃ yasya yasya yat
a tena dharmottaraś cāyaṃ kṛto loko mahātmanā
c rañjitāś ca prajāḥ sarvās tena rājeti śabdyate
a brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatatrāṇāt tataḥ kṣatriya ucyate
c prathitā dhanataś ceyaṃ pṛthivī sādhubhiḥ smṛtā
a sthāpanaṃ cākarod viṣṇuḥ svayam eva sanātanaḥ
c nātivartiṣyate kaś cid rājaṃs tvām iti pārthiva
a tapasā bhagavān viṣṇur āviveśa ca bhūmipam
c devavan naradevānāṃ namate yaj jagan nṛpa
a daṇḍanītyā ca satataṃ rakṣitaṃ taṃ nareśvara
c nādharṣayat tataḥ kaś cic cāranityāc ca darśanāt
a ātmanā karaṇaiś caiva samasyeha mahīkṣitaḥ
c ko hetur yad vaśe tiṣṭhel loko daivād ṛte guṇāt
a viṣṇor lalāṭāt kamalaṃ sauvarṇam abhavat tadā
c śrīḥ saṃbhūtā yato devī patnī dharmasya dhīmataḥ
a śriyaḥ sakāśād arthaś ca jāto dharmeṇa pāṇḍava
c atha dharmas tathaivārthaḥ śrīś ca rājye pratiṣṭhitā
a sukṛtasya kṣayāc caiva svarlokād etya medinīm
c pārthivo jāyate tāta daṇḍanītivaśānugaḥ
a mahattvena ca saṃyukto vaiṣṇavena naro bhuvi
c buddhyā bhavati saṃyukto māhātmyaṃ cādhigacchati
a sthāpanām atha devānāṃ na kaś cid ativartate
c tiṣṭhaty ekasya ca vaśe taṃ ced anuvidhīyate
a śubhaṃ hi karma rājendra śubhatvāyopakalpate
c tulyasyaikasya yasyāyaṃ loko vacasi tiṣṭhati
a yo hy asya mukham adrākṣīt somya so 'sya vaśānugaḥ
c subhagaṃ cārthavantaṃ ca rūpavantaṃ ca paśyati
a tato jagati rājendra satataṃ śabditaṃ budhaiḥ
c devāś ca naradevāś ca tulyā iti viśāṃ pate
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ mahattvaṃ prati rājasu
c kārtsnyena bharataśreṣṭha kim anyad iha vartatām
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a tataḥ punaḥ sa gāṅgeyam abhivādya pitāmaham
c prāñjalir niyato bhūtvā paryapṛcchad yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a ke dharmāḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ cāturvarṇyasya ke pṛthak
c caturṇām āśramāṇāṃ ca rājadharmāś ca ke matāḥ
a kena svid vardhate rāṣṭraṃ rājā kena vivardhate
c kena paurāś ca bhṛtyāś ca vardhante bharatarṣabha
a kośaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca durgaṃ ca sahāyān mantriṇas tathā
c ṛtvikpurohitācāryān kīdṛśān varjayen nṛpaḥ
a keṣu viśvasitavyaṃ syād rājñāṃ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
c kuto vātmā dṛḍho rakṣyas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d dvaidhībhāve ca bhūtānāṃ śapathaḥ kīdṛśo bhavet
d adharmasya phalaṃ yac ca śapathasya vilaṅghane
d sarvam etad yathātattvaṃ vyavahāraṃ ca tādṛśam
d samāsavyāsayogena kathayasva pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a namo dharmāya mahate namaḥ kṛṣṇāya vedhase
c brāhmaṇebhyo namaskṛtvā dharmān vakṣyāmi śāśvatān
a akrodhaḥ satyavacanaṃ saṃvibhāgaḥ kṣamā tathā
c prajanaḥ sveṣu dāreṣu śaucam adroha eva ca
a ārjavaṃ bhṛtyabharaṇaṃ navaite sārvavarṇikāḥ
c brāhmaṇasya tu yo dharmas taṃ te vakṣyāmi kevalam
a damam eva mahārāja dharmam āhuḥ purātanam
c svādhyāyo 'dhyāpanaṃ caiva tatra karma samāpyate
a taṃ ced vittam upāgacched vartamānaṃ svakarmaṇi
c akurvāṇaṃ vikarmāṇi śāntaṃ prajñānatarpitam
a kurvītāpatyasaṃtānam atho dadyād yajeta ca
c saṃvibhajya hi bhoktavyaṃ dhanaṃ sadbhir itīṣyate
a pariniṣṭhitakāryas tu svādhyāyenaiva brāhmaṇaḥ
c kuryād anyan na vā kuryān maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate
a kṣatriyasyāpi yo dharmas taṃ te vakṣyāmi bhārata
c dadyād rājā na yāceta yajeta na tu yājayet
a nādhyāpayed adhīyīta prajāś ca paripālayet
c nityodyukto dasyuvadhe raṇe kuryāt parākramam
a ye ca kratubhir ījānāḥ śrutavantaś ca bhūmipāḥ
c ya evāhavajetāras ta eṣāṃ lokajittamāḥ
a avikṣatena dehena samarād yo nivartate
c kṣatriyo nāsya tat karma praśaṃsanti purāvidaḥ
a vadhaṃ hi kṣatrabandhūnāṃ dharmam āhuḥ pradhānataḥ
c nāsya kṛtyatamaṃ kiṃ cid anyad dasyunibarhaṇāt
a dānam adhyayanaṃ yajño yogaḥ kṣemo vidhīyate
c tasmād rājñā viśeṣeṇa yoddhavyaṃ dharmam īpsatā
a sveṣu dharmeṣv avasthāpya prajāḥ sarvā mahīpatiḥ
c dharmeṇa sarvakṛtyāni samaniṣṭhāni kārayet
a pariniṣṭhitakāryaḥ syān nṛpatiḥ paripālanāt
c kuryād anyan na vā kuryād aindro rājanya ucyate
a vaiśyasyāpīha yo dharmas taṃ te vakṣyāmi bhārata
c dānam adhyayanaṃ yajñaḥ śaucena dhanasaṃcayaḥ
a pitṛvat pālayed vaiśyo yuktaḥ sarvapaśūn iha
c vikarma tad bhaved anyat karma yad yat samācaret
e rakṣayā sa hi teṣāṃ vai mahat sukham avāpnuyāt
a prajāpatir hi vaiśyāya sṛṣṭvā paridade paśūn
c brāhmaṇāya ca rājñe ca sarvāḥ paridade prajāḥ
a tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi yac ca tasyopajīvanam
b avaśyabharaṇīyo hi vaiśyo rājñā janādhipa
c ṣaṇṇām ekāṃ pibed dhenuṃ śatāc ca mithunaṃ haret
a laye ca saptamo bhāgas tathā śṛṅge kalā khure
c sasyasya sarvabījānām eṣā sāṃvatsarī bhṛtiḥ
a na ca vaiśyasya kāmaḥ syān na rakṣeyaṃ paśūn iti
c vaiśye cecchati nānyena rakṣitavyāḥ kathaṃ cana
a śūdrasyāpi hi yo dharmas taṃ te vakṣyāmi bhārata
c prajāpatir hi varṇānāṃ dāsaṃ śūdram akalpayat
a tasmāc chūdrasya varṇānāṃ paricaryā vidhīyate
c teṣāṃ śuśrūṣaṇāc caiva mahat sukham avāpnuyāt
a śūdra etān paricaret trīn varṇān anasūyakaḥ
c saṃcayāṃś ca na kurvīta jātu śūdraḥ kathaṃ cana
a pāpīyān hi dhanaṃ labdhvā vaśe kuryād garīyasaḥ
c rājñā vā samanujñātaḥ kāmaṃ kurvīta dhārmikaḥ
a tasya vṛttiṃ pravakṣyāmi yac ca tasyopajīvanam
c avaśyabharaṇīyo hi varṇānāṃ śūdra ucyate
a chatraṃ veṣṭanam auśīram upānad vyajanāni ca
c yātayāmāni deyāni śūdrāya paricāriṇe
a adhāryāṇi viśīrṇāni vasanāni dvijātibhiḥ
c śūdrāyaiva vidheyāni tasya dharmadhanaṃ hi tat
a yaś ca kaś cid dvijātīnāṃ śūdraḥ śuśrūṣur āvrajet
c kalpyāṃ tasya tu tenāhur vṛttiṃ dharmavido janāḥ
e deyaḥ piṇḍo 'napetāya bhartavyau vṛddhadurbalau
a śūdreṇa ca na hātavyo bhartā kasyāṃ cid āpadi
c atirekeṇa bhartavyo bhartā dravyaparikṣaye
e na hi svam asti śūdrasya bhartṛhāryadhano hy asau
a uktas trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ yajñas trayyaiva bhārata
c svāhākāranamaskārau mantraḥ śūdre vidhīyate
a tābhyāṃ śūdraḥ pākayajñair yajeta vratavān svayam
c pūrṇapātramayīm āhuḥ pākayajñasya dakṣiṇām
a śūdraḥ paijavano nāma sahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ dadau
c aindrāgnena vidhānena dakṣiṇām iti naḥ śrutam
a ato hi sarvavarṇānāṃ śraddhāyajño vidhīyate
a   yajñas tasyaiva bhārata
a agre sarveṣu yajñeṣu

a daivataṃ paramaṃ viprāḥ svena svena parasparam
c ayajann iha satrais te tais taiḥ kāmaiḥ sanātanaiḥ
a saṃsṛṣṭā brāhmaṇair eva triṣu varṇeṣu sṛṣṭayaḥ
c devānām api ye devā yad brūyus te paraṃ hi tat
e tasmād varṇaiḥ sarvayajñāḥ saṃsṛjyante na kāmyayā
a ṛgyajuḥsāmavit pūjyo nityaṃ syād devavad dvijaḥ
c anṛgyajur asāmā tu prājāpatya upadravaḥ
a yajño manīṣayā tāta sarvavarṇeṣu bhārata

a svaṃ daivataṃ brāhmaṇāḥ svena nityaṃ
parān varṇān ayajann evam āsīt
c ārocitā naḥ sumahān sa dharmaḥ
sṛṣṭo brahmaṇā triṣu varṇeṣu dṛṣṭaḥ
d saṃpūjyo vai brāhmaṇas triṣu varṇeṣu hṛṣṭaḥ
a tasmād varṇā ṛjavo jātidharmāḥ
saṃsṛjyante tasya vipāka eṣaḥ
b tasmād varṇas tatato vai jātidharmaḥ
b saṃsṛjyate tasya vai kopa eṣaḥ
c ekaṃ sāma yajur ekam ṛg ekā

a atra gāthā yajñagītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
c vaikhānasānāṃ rājendra munīnāṃ yaṣṭum icchatām
a udite 'nudite vāpi śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ
c vahniṃ juhoti dharmeṇa śraddhā vai kāraṇaṃ mahat
a yat skannam asya tat pūrvaṃ yad askannaṃ tad uttaram
c bahūni yajñarūpāṇi nānākarmaphalāni ca
a tāni yaḥ saṃvijānāti jñānaniścayaniścitaḥ
c dvijātiḥ śraddhayopetaḥ sa yaṣṭuṃ puruṣo 'rhati
a steno vā yadi vā pāpo yadi vā pāpakṛttamaḥ
c yaṣṭum icchati yajñaṃ yaḥ sādhum eva vadanti tam
a ṛṣayas taṃ praśaṃsanti sādhu caitad asaṃśayam
c sarvathā sarvavarṇair hi yaṣṭavyam iti niścayaḥ
e na hi yajñasamaṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
a tasmād yaṣṭavyam ity āhuḥ puruṣeṇānasūyatā
c śraddhāpavitram āśritya yathāśakti prayacchatā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a āśramāṇāṃ mahābāho śṛṇu satyaparākrama
c caturṇām iha varṇānāṃ karmāṇi ca yudhiṣṭhira
a vānaprasthaṃ bhaikṣacaryāṃ gārhasthyaṃ ca mahāśramam
c brahmacaryāśramaṃ prāhuś caturthaṃ brāhmaṇair vṛtam
a jaṭākaraṇasaṃskāraṃ dvijātitvam avāpya ca
c ādhānādīni karmāṇi prāpya vedam adhītya ca
a sadāro vāpy adāro vā ātmavān saṃyatendriyaḥ
c vānaprasthāśramaṃ gacchet kṛtakṛtyo gṛhāśramāt

c ūrdhvaretāḥ prajāyitvā gacchaty akṣarasātmatām

c kartavyānīha vipreṇa rājann ādau vipaścitā
a caritabrahmacaryasya brāhmaṇasya viśāṃ pate

a khādann eko japann ekaḥ sarpann eko yudhiṣṭhira

c ṣaṭkarmasv anivṛttaś ca napravṛttaś ca sarvaśaḥ

a śivān sukhān mahodarkān ahiṃsrāṃl lokasaṃmatān
c brūhi dharmān sukhopāyān madvidhānāṃ sukhāvahān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a brāhmaṇasyeha catvāra āśramā vihitāḥ prabho

a uktāni karmāṇi bahūni rājan

c nirāśiṣo vadānyasya lokā hy akṣarasaṃjñitāḥ

c tādṛśaṃ tādṛśenaiva sa guṇaṃ pratipadyate
a vṛddhyā kṛṣivaṇiktvena jīvasaṃjīvanena ca

a kālasaṃcoditaḥ kālaḥ kālaparyāyaniścitaḥ
c uttamādhamamadhyāni karmāṇi kurute 'vaśaḥ
a antavanti pradānāni purā śreyaskarāṇi ca

 bhīṣma uvāca
a jyākarṣaṇaṃ śatrunibarhaṇaṃ ca

c śuśrūṣaṇaṃ cāpi tathārthahetor

c vṛṣalīpatiḥ piśuno nartakaś ca

d vṛttād apeto yo bhaven mandacetāḥ
a japan vedān ajapaṃś cāpi rājan
samaḥ śūdrair dāsavac cāpi bhojyaḥ

a nirmaryāde cāśane krūravṛttau
hiṃsātmake tyaktadharmasvavṛtte

damaḥ śaucaṃ cārjavaṃ cāpi rājan
c tathā viprasyāśramāḥ sarva eva
purā rājan brahmaṇā vai nisṛṣṭāḥ
a yaḥ syād dāntaḥ somapa āryaśīlaḥ
sānukrośaḥ sarvasaho nirāśīḥ
c ṛjur mṛdur anṛśaṃsaḥ kṣamāvān

a sarve dharmā rājadharmapradhānāḥ

b sarve dharmā rājadharmeṣu dṛṣṭāḥ

c sarvatyāgo rājadharmeṣu rājaṃs

d sarvodyogā rājadharmeṣu rājan
d sthānaṃ cāhū rājadharme purāṇam
a majjet trayī daṇḍanītau hatāyāṃ
sarve dharmā na bhaveyur viruddhāḥ
c sarve dharmāś cāśramāṇāṃ gatāḥ syuḥ
kṣātre tyakte rājadharme purāṇe
a sarve tyāgā rājadharmeṣu dṛṣṭāḥ

c sarve yogā rājadharmeṣu coktāḥ

d tasmād dharmo rājadharmād viśiṣṭo
d nānyo loke vidyate 'jātaśatro

 bhīṣma uvāca
a cāturāśramyadharmāś ca jātidharmāś ca pāṇḍava

 indra uvāca

 indra uvāca
a evaṃvīryaḥ sarvadharmopapannaḥ

viparyaye syād abhāvaḥ prajānām
a bhuvaḥ saṃskāraṃ rājasaṃskārayogam
abhaikṣacaryāṃ pālanaṃ ca prajānām
c vidyād rājā sarvabhūtānukampāṃ
dehatyāgaṃ cāhave dharmam agryam
a tyāgaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ munayo vai vadanti
sarvaśreṣṭho yaḥ śarīraṃ tyajeta
c nityaṃ tyaktaṃ rājadharmeṣu sarvaṃ
pratyakṣaṃ te bhūmipālāḥ sadaite
a bahuśrutyā guruśuśrūṣayā vā
parasya vā saṃhananād vadanti
c nityaṃ dharmaṃ kṣatriyo brahmacārī
cared eko hy āśramaṃ dharmakāmaḥ
a sāmānyārthe vyavahāre pravṛtte
priyāpriye varjayann eva yatnāt
c cāturvarṇyasthāpanāt pālanāc ca
tais tair yogair niyamair aurasaiś ca
a sarvodyogair āśramaṃ dharmam āhuḥ
kṣātraṃ jyeṣṭhaṃ sarvadharmopapannam
c svaṃ svaṃ dharmaṃ ye na caranti varṇās
tāṃs tān dharmān ayathāvad vadanti
a nirmaryāde nityam arthe vinaṣṭān
āhus tān vai paśubhūtān manuṣyān
c yathā nītiṃ gamayaty arthalobhāc
chreyāṃs tasmād āśramaḥ kṣatradharmaḥ
a traividyānāṃ yā gatir brāhmaṇānāṃ
yaś caivokto 'thāśramo brāhmaṇānām
c etat karma brāhmaṇasyāhur agryam
anyat kurvañ śūdravac chastravadhyaḥ
a cāturāśramyadharmāś ca vedadharmāś ca pārthiva
c brāhmaṇenānugantavyā nānyo vidyāt kathaṃ cana
a anyathā vartamānasya na sā vṛttiḥ prakalpyate
c karmaṇā vyajyate dharmo yathaiva śvā tathaiva saḥ
a yo vikarmasthito vipro na sa sanmānam arhati
c karmasv anupayuñjānam aviśvāsyaṃ hi taṃ viduḥ
a ete dharmāḥ sarvavarṇāś ca vīrair
utkraṣṭavyāḥ kṣatriyair eṣa dharmaḥ
c tasmāj jyeṣṭhā rājadharmā na cānye
vīryajyeṣṭhā vīradharmā matā me
 māndhātovāca
a yavanāḥ kirātā gāndhārāś cīnāḥ śabarabarbarāḥ
b bāhlīkāś ca turuṣkāś ca pāñcālāś ca tathā smṛtāḥ
c śakās tuṣārāḥ kahvāś ca pahlavāś cāndhramadrakāḥ
a oḍrāḥ pulindā ramaṭhāḥ kācā mlecchāś ca sarvaśaḥ
c brahmakṣatraprasūtāś ca vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca mānavāḥ
a kathaṃ dharmaṃ careyus te sarve viṣayavāsinaḥ
c madvidhaiś ca kathaṃ sthāpyāḥ sarve te dasyujīvinaḥ
a etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ bhagavaṃs tad bravīhi me
c tvaṃ bandhubhūto hy asmākaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ sureśvara
 indra uvāca
a mātāpitror hi kartavyā śuśrūṣā sarvadasyubhiḥ
c ācāryaguruśuśrūṣā tathaivāśramavāsinām
a bhūmipālānāṃ ca śuśrūṣā kartavyā sarvadasyubhiḥ
c vedadharmakriyāś caiva teṣāṃ dharmo vidhīyate
a pitṛyajñās tathā kūpāḥ prapāś ca śayanāni ca
c dānāni ca yathākālaṃ dvijeṣu dadyur eva te
a ahiṃsā satyam akrodho vṛttidāyānupālanam
c bharaṇaṃ putradārāṇāṃ śaucam adroha eva ca
a dakṣiṇā sarvayajñānāṃ dātavyā bhūtim icchatā
c pākayajñā mahārhāś ca kartavyāḥ sarvadasyubhiḥ
a etāny evaṃprakārāṇi vihitāni purānagha
c sarvalokasya karmāṇi kartavyānīha pārthiva
 māndhātovāca
a dṛśyante mānavā loke sarvavarṇeṣu dasyavaḥ
c liṅgāntare vartamānā āśrameṣu caturṣv api
 indra uvāca
a vinaṣṭāyāṃ daṇḍanītau rājadharme nirākṛte
c saṃpramuhyanti bhūtāni rājadaurātmyato nṛpa
a asaṃkhyātā bhaviṣyanti bhikṣavo liṅginas tathā
c āśramāṇāṃ vikalpāś ca nivṛtte 'smin kṛte yuge
a aśṛṇvānāḥ purāṇānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pravarā gatīḥ
c utpathaṃ pratipatsyante kāmamanyusamīritāḥ
a yadā nivartyate pāpo daṇḍanītyā mahātmabhiḥ
c tadā dharmo na calate sadbhūtaḥ śāśvataḥ paraḥ
a paralokaguruṃ caiva rājānaṃ yo 'vamanyate
c na tasya dattaṃ na hutaṃ na śrāddhaṃ phalati kva cit
a mānuṣāṇām adhipatiṃ devabhūtaṃ sanātanam
c devāś ca bahu manyante dharmakāmaṃ nareśvaram
a prajāpatir hi bhagavān yaḥ sarvam asṛjaj jagat
c sa pravṛttinivṛttyarthaṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṣatram icchati
a pravṛttasya hi dharmasya buddhyā yaḥ smarate gatim
c sa me mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca tatra kṣatraṃ pratiṣṭhitam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktvā sa bhagavān marudgaṇavṛtaḥ prabhuḥ
c jagāma bhavanaṃ viṣṇur akṣaraṃ paramaṃ padam
a evaṃ pravartite dharme purā sucarite 'nagha
c kaḥ kṣatram avamanyeta cetanāvān bahuśrutaḥ
a anyāyena pravṛttāni nivṛttāni tathaiva ca
c antarā vilayaṃ yānti yathā pathi vicakṣuṣaḥ
a ādau pravartite cakre tathaivādiparāyaṇe
c vartasva puruṣavyāghra saṃvijānāmi te 'nagha
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śrutā me kathitāḥ pūrvaiś catvāro mānavāśramāḥ
c vyākhyānam eṣām ācakṣva pṛcchato me pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a viditāḥ sarva eveha dharmās tava yudhiṣṭhira
c yathā mama mahābāho viditāḥ sādhusaṃmatāḥ
a yat tu liṅgāntaragataṃ pṛcchase māṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha tan nibodha narādhipa
a sarvāṇy etāni kaunteya vidyante manujarṣabha
c sādhvācārapravṛttānāṃ cāturāśramyakarmaṇām
a akāmadveṣayuktasya daṇḍanītyā yudhiṣṭhira
c samekṣiṇaś ca bhūteṣu bhaikṣāśramapadaṃ bhavet
a vetty ādānavisargaṃ yo nigrahānugrahau tathā
c yathoktavṛtter vīrasya kṣemāśramapadaṃ bhavet
d arhān pūjayato nityaṃ saṃvibhāgena pāṇḍava
d sarvatas tasya kaunteya bhaikṣyāśramapadaṃ bhavet
a jñātisaṃbandhimitrāṇi vyāpannāni yudhiṣṭhira
c samabhyuddharamāṇasya dīkṣāśramapadaṃ bhavet
d lokamukhyeṣu satkāraṃ liṅgimukhyeṣu cāsakṛt
d kurvatas tasya kaunteya vanyāśramapadaṃ bhavet
a āhnikaṃ bhūtayajñāṃś ca pitṛyajñāṃś ca mānuṣān
c kurvataḥ pārtha vipulān vanyāśramapadaṃ bhavet
d saṃvibhāgena bhūtānām atithīnāṃ tathārcanāt
d devayajñaiś ca rājendra vanyāśramapadaṃ bhavet
d mardanaṃ pararāṣṭrāṇāṃ śiṣṭārthaṃ satyavikrama
d kurvataḥ puruṣavyāghra vanyāśramapadaṃ bhavet
a pālanāt sarvabhūtānāṃ svarāṣṭraparipālanāt
c dīkṣā bahuvidhā rājño vanyāśramapadaṃ bhavet
a vedādhyayananityatvaṃ kṣamāthācāryapūjanam
c tathopādhyāyaśuśrūṣā brahmāśramapadaṃ bhavet
d āhnikaṃ japamānasya devān pūjayataḥ sadā
d dharmeṇa puruṣavyāghra dharmāśramapadaṃ bhavet
d mṛtyur vā rakṣaṇaṃ veti yasya rājño viniścayaḥ
d prāṇadyūte tatas tasya brahmāśramapadaṃ bhavet
a ajihmam aśaṭhaṃ mārgaṃ sevamānasya bhārata
c sarvadā sarvabhūteṣu brahmāśramapadaṃ bhavet
a vānaprastheṣu vipreṣu traividyeṣu ca bhārata
c prayacchato 'rthān vipulān vanyāśramapadaṃ bhavet
a sarvabhūteṣv anukrośaṃ kurvatas tasya bhārata
c ānṛśaṃsyapravṛttasya sarvāvasthaṃ padaṃ bhavet
a bālavṛddheṣu kauravya sarvāvasthaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c anukrośaṃ vidadhataḥ sarvāvasthaṃ padaṃ bhavet
a balātkṛteṣu bhūteṣu paritrāṇaṃ kurūdvaha
c śaraṇāgateṣu kauravya kurvan gārhasthyam āvaset
a carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ rakṣām api ca sarvaśaḥ
c yathārhapūjāṃ ca sadā kurvan gārhasthyam āvaset
a jyeṣṭhānujyeṣṭhapatnīnāṃ bhrātṝṇāṃ putranaptṛṇām
c nigrahānugrahau pārtha gārhasthyam iti tat tapaḥ
a sādhūnām arcanīyānāṃ prajāsu viditātmanām
c pālanaṃ puruṣavyāghra gṛhāśramapadaṃ bhavet
a āśramasthāni sarvāṇi yas tu veśmani bhārata
c ādadīteha bhojyena tad gārhasthyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a yaḥ sthitaḥ puruṣo dharme dhātrā sṛṣṭe yathārthavat
c āśramāṇāṃ sa sarveṣāṃ phalaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
a yasmin na naśyanti guṇāḥ kaunteya puruṣe sadā
c āśramasthaṃ tam apy āhur naraśreṣṭhaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a sthānamānaṃ vayomānaṃ kulamānaṃ tathaiva ca
c kurvan vasati sarveṣu hy āśrameṣu yudhiṣṭhira
a deśadharmāṃś ca kaunteya kuladharmāṃs tathaiva ca
c pālayan puruṣavyāghra rājā sarvāśramī bhavet
a kāle vibhūtiṃ bhūtānām upahārāṃs tathaiva ca
c arhayan puruṣavyāghra sādhūnām āśrame vaset
a daśadharmagataś cāpi yo dharmaṃ pratyavekṣate
c sarvalokasya kaunteya rājā bhavati so ''śramī
a ye dharmakuśalā loke dharmaṃ kurvanti sādhavaḥ
c pālitā yasya viṣaye pādo 'ṃśas tasya bhūpateḥ
a dharmārāmān dharmaparān ye na rakṣanti mānavān
c pārthivāḥ puruṣavyāghra teṣāṃ pāpaṃ haranti te
a ye ca rakṣāsahāyāḥ syuḥ pārthivānāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c te caivāṃśaharāḥ sarve dharme parakṛte 'nagha
a sarvāśramapade hy āhur gārhasthyaṃ dīptanirṇayam
c pāvanaṃ puruṣavyāghra yaṃ vayaṃ paryupāsmahe
a ātmopamas tu bhūteṣu yo vai bhavati mānavaḥ
c nyastadaṇḍo jitakrodhaḥ sa pretya labhate sukham
a dharmotthitā sattvavīryā dharmasetuvaṭākarā
c tyāgavātādhvagā śīghrā naus tvā saṃtārayiṣyati
a yadā nivṛttaḥ sarvasmāt kāmo yo 'sya hṛdi sthitaḥ
c tadā bhavati sattvasthas tato brahma samaśnute
a suprasannas tu bhāvena yogena ca narādhipa
c dharmaṃ puruṣaśārdūla prāpsyase pālane rataḥ
a vedādhyayanaśīlānāṃ viprāṇāṃ sādhukarmaṇām
c pālane yatnam ātiṣṭha sarvalokasya cānagha
a vane carati yo dharmam āśrameṣu ca bhārata
c rakṣayā tac chataguṇaṃ dharmaṃ prāpnoti pārthivaḥ
a eṣa te vividho dharmaḥ pāṇḍavaśreṣṭha kīrtitaḥ
c anutiṣṭha tvam enaṃ vai pūrvair dṛṣṭaṃ sanātanam
a cāturāśramyam ekāgraḥ cāturvarṇyaṃ ca pāṇḍava
c dharmaṃ puruṣaśārdūla prāpsyase pālane rataḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a cāturāśramya ukto 'tra cāturvarṇyas tathaiva ca
c rāṣṭrasya yat kṛtyatamaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a rāṣṭrasyaitat kṛtyatamaṃ rājña evābhiṣecanam
c anindram abalaṃ rāṣṭraṃ dasyavo 'bhibhavanti ca
a arājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu dharmo na vyavatiṣṭhate
c parasparaṃ ca khādanti sarvathā dhig arājakam
a indram enaṃ pravṛṇute yad rājānam iti śrutiḥ
c yathaivendras tathā rājā saṃpūjyo bhūtim icchatā
a nārājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu vastavyam iti vaidikam
c nārājakeṣu rāṣṭreṣu havyam agnir vahaty api
a atha ced abhivarteta rājyārthī balavattaraḥ
c arājakāni rāṣṭrāṇi hatarājāni vā punaḥ
a pratyudgamyābhipūjyaḥ syād etad atra sumantritam
c na hi pāpāt pāpataram asti kiṃ cid arājakāt
a sa cet samanupaśyeta samagraṃ kuśalaṃ bhavet
c balavān hi prakupitaḥ kuryān niḥśeṣatām api
d yo durbalo na namati sa mahatkleśabhāg bhavet
a bhūyāṃsaṃ labhate kleśaṃ yā gaur bhavati durduhā
c suduhā yā tu bhavati naiva tāṃ kleśayanty uta
a yad ataptaṃ praṇamati na tat saṃtāpayanty uta
c yac ca svayaṃ nataṃ dāru na tat saṃnāmayanty api
a etayopamayā dhīraḥ saṃnameta balīyase
c indrāya sa praṇamate namate yo balīyase
a tasmād rājaiva kartavyaḥ satataṃ bhūtim icchatā
c na dhanārtho na dārārthas teṣāṃ yeṣām arājakam
a prīyate hi haran pāpaḥ paravittam arājake
c yadāsya uddharanty anye tadā rājānam icchati
a pāpā api tadā kṣemaṃ na labhante kadā cana
c ekasya hi dvau harato dvayoś ca bahavo 'pare
a adāsaḥ kriyate dāso hriyante ca balāt striyaḥ
a   vivayomānaṃ tathaiva ca sic
c etasmāt kāraṇād devāḥ prajāpālān pracakrire
a rājā cen na bhavel loke pṛthivyāṃ daṇḍadhārakaḥ
c śūle matsyān ivāpakṣyan durbalān balavattarāḥ
a arājakāḥ prajāḥ pūrvaṃ vineśur iti naḥ śrutam
c parasparaṃ bhakṣayanto matsyā iva jale kṛśān
a tāḥ sametya tataś cakruḥ samayān iti naḥ śrutam
c vākkrūro daṇḍapuruṣo yaś ca syāt pāradārikaḥ
e yaś ca na svam athādadyāt tyājyā nas tādṛśā iti
a viśvāsanārthaṃ varṇānāṃ sarveṣām aviśeṣataḥ
c tās tathā samayaṃ kṛtvā samaye nāvatasthire
a sahitās tās tadā jagmur asukhārtāḥ pitāmaham
c anīśvarā vinaśyāmo bhagavann īśvaraṃ diśa
a yaṃ pūjayema saṃbhūya yaś ca naḥ paripālayet
c tābhyo manuṃ vyādideśa manur nābhinananda tāḥ
 manur uvāca
a bibhemi karmaṇaḥ krūrād rājyaṃ hi bhṛśaduṣkaram
c viśeṣato manuṣyeṣu mithyāvṛttiṣu nityadā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tam abruvan prajā mā bhaiḥ karmaṇaino gamiṣyati
c paśūnām adhipañcāśad dhiraṇyasya tathaiva ca
e dhānyasya daśamaṃ bhāgaṃ dāsyāmaḥ kośavardhanam
f kanyāṃ śulke cārurūpāṃ vivāheṣūdyatāsu ca
a mukhyena śastrapatreṇa ye manuṣyāḥ pradhānataḥ
c bhavantaṃ te 'nuyāsyanti mahendram iva devatāḥ
a sa tvaṃ jātabalo rājan duṣpradharṣaḥ pratāpavān
c sukhe dhāsyasi naḥ sarvān kubera iva nairṛtān
a yaṃ ca dharmaṃ cariṣyanti prajā rājñā surakṣitāḥ
c caturthaṃ tasya dharmasya tvatsaṃsthaṃ no bhaviṣyati
a tena dharmeṇa mahatā sukhalabdhena bhāvitaḥ
c pāhy asmān sarvato rājan devān iva śatakratuḥ
a vijayāyāśu niryāhi pratapan raśmimān iva
c mānaṃ vidhama śatrūṇāṃ dharmo jayatu naḥ sadā
a sa niryayau mahātejā balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
c mahābhijanasaṃpannas tejasā prajvalann iva
a tasya tāṃ mahimāṃ dṛṣṭvā mahendrasyeva devatāḥ
c apatatrasire sarve svadharme ca dadhur manaḥ
d varṇinaś cāśramāś caiva mlecchāḥ sarve ca dasyavaḥ
a tato mahīṃ pariyayau parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān
c śamayan sarvataḥ pāpān svakarmasu ca yojayan
a evaṃ ye bhūtim iccheyuḥ pṛthivyāṃ mānavāḥ kva cit
c kuryū rājānam evāgre prajānugrahakāraṇāt
a namasyeyuś ca taṃ bhaktyā śiṣyā iva guruṃ sadā
c devā iva sahasrākṣaṃ prajā rājānam antike
a satkṛtaṃ svajaneneha paro 'pi bahu manyate
c svajanena tv avajñātaṃ pare paribhavanty uta
a rājñaḥ paraiḥ paribhavaḥ sarveṣām asukhāvahaḥ
c tasmāc chatraṃ ca patraṃ ca vāsāṃsy ābharaṇāni ca
a bhojanāny atha pānāni rājñe dadyur gṛhāṇi ca
c āsanāni ca śayyāś ca sarvopakaraṇāni ca
a guptātmā syād durādharṣaḥ smitapūrvābhibhāṣitā
c ābhāṣitaś ca madhuraṃ pratibhāṣeta mānavān
a kṛtajño dṛḍhabhaktiḥ syāt saṃvibhāgī jitendriyaḥ
c īkṣitaḥ prativīkṣeta mṛdu carju ca valgu ca
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kim āhur daivataṃ viprā rājānaṃ bharatarṣabha
c manuṣyāṇām adhipatiṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c bṛhaspatiṃ vasumanā yathā papraccha bhārata
a rājā vasumanā nāma kausalyo dhīmatāṃ varaḥ
c maharṣiṃ paripapraccha kṛtaprajño bṛhaspatim
a sarvaṃ vainayikaṃ kṛtvā vinayajño bṛhaspateḥ
c dakṣiṇānantaro bhūtvā praṇamya vidhipūrvakam
a vidhiṃ papraccha rājyasya sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
c prajānāṃ hitam anvicchan dharmamūlaṃ viśāṃ pate
a kena bhūtāni vardhante kṣayaṃ gacchanti kena ca
c kam arcanto mahāprājña sukham atyantam āpnuyuḥ
d etan me śaṃsa devarṣe dharmakāmārthasaṃśayam
a iti pṛṣṭo mahārājñā kausalyenāmitaujasā
c rājasatkāram avyagraḥ śaśaṃsāsmai bṛhaspatiḥ
c   rājyasya ca vivecanam
c daṇḍanītiṃ samāśritya
a rājamūlo mahārāja dharmo lokasya lakṣyate
c prajā rājabhayād eva na khādanti parasparam
a rājā hy evākhilaṃ lokaṃ samudīrṇaṃ samutsukam
c prasādayati dharmeṇa prasādya ca virājate
a yathā hy anudaye rājan bhūtāni śaśisūryayoḥ
c andhe tamasi majjeyur apaśyantaḥ parasparam
a yathā hy anudake matsyā nirākrande vihaṃgamāḥ
c vihareyur yathākāmam abhisṛtya punaḥ punaḥ
a vimathyātikrameraṃś ca viṣahyāpi parasparam
c abhāvam acireṇaiva gaccheyur nātra saṃśayaḥ
a evam eva vinā rājñā vinaśyeyur imāḥ prajāḥ
c andhe tamasi majjeyur agopāḥ paśavo yathā
a hareyur balavanto hi durbalānāṃ parigrahān
c hanyur vyāyacchamānāṃś ca yadi rājā na pālayet
a yānaṃ vastram alaṃkārān ratnāni vividhāni ca
c hareyuḥ sahasā pāpā yadi rājā na pālayet
a mamedam iti loke 'smin na bhavet saṃparigrahaḥ
b na dārā na ca putraḥ syān na dhanaṃ na parigrahaḥ
c viśvalopaḥ pravarteta yadi rājā na pālayet
a mātaraṃ pitaraṃ vṛddham ācāryam atithiṃ gurum
c kliśnīyur api hiṃsyur vā yadi rājā na pālayet
a pated bahuvidhaṃ śastraṃ bahudhā dharmacāriṣu
c adharmaḥ pragṛhītaḥ syād yadi rājā na pālayet
a vadhabandhaparikleśo nityam arthavatāṃ bhavet
c mamatvaṃ ca na vindeyur yadi rājā na pālayet
a antaś cākāśam eva syāl loko 'yaṃ dasyusād bhavet
c patec ca narakaṃ ghoraṃ yadi rājā na pālayet
a na yonipoṣo varteta na kṛṣir na vaṇikpathaḥ
c majjed dharmas trayī na syād yadi rājā na pālayet
a na yajñāḥ saṃpravarteran vidhivat svāptadakṣiṇāḥ
c na vivāhāḥ samājā vā yadi rājā na pālayet
a na vṛṣāḥ saṃpravarteran na mathyeraṃś ca gargarāḥ
c ghoṣāḥ praṇāśaṃ gaccheyur yadi rājā na pālayet
a trastam udvignahṛdayaṃ hāhābhūtam acetanam
c kṣaṇena vinaśet sarvaṃ yadi rājā na pālayet
a na saṃvatsarasatrāṇi tiṣṭheyur akutobhayāḥ
c vidhivad dakṣiṇāvanti yadi rājā na pālayet
a brāhmaṇāś caturo vedān nādhīyeraṃs tapasvinaḥ
c vidyāsnātās tapaḥsnātā yadi rājā na pālayet
a hasto hastaṃ sa muṣṇīyād bhidyeran sarvasetavaḥ
c bhayārtaṃ vidravet sarvaṃ yadi rājā na pālayet
a na labhed dharmasaṃśleṣaṃ hataviprahato janaḥ
c kartā svecchendriyo gacched yadi rājā na pālayet
a anayāḥ saṃpravarteran bhaved vai varṇasaṃkaraḥ
c durbhikṣam āviśed rāṣṭraṃ yadi rājā na pālayet
a vivṛtya hi yathākāmaṃ gṛhadvārāṇi śerate
c manuṣyā rakṣitā rājñā samantād akutobhayāḥ
a nākruṣṭaṃ sahate kaś cit kuto hastasya laṅghanam
c yadi rājā manuṣyeṣu trātā bhavati dhārmikaḥ
a striyaś cāpuruṣā mārgaṃ sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāḥ
c nirbhayāḥ pratipadyante yadā rakṣati bhūmipaḥ
a dharmam eva prapadyante na hiṃsanti parasparam
c anugṛhṇanti cānyonyaṃ yadā rakṣati bhūmipaḥ
a yajante ca trayo varṇā mahāyajñaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ
c yuktāś cādhīyate śāstraṃ yadā rakṣati bhūmipaḥ
a vārtāmūlo hy ayaṃ lokas trayyā vai dhāryate sadā
c tat sarvaṃ vartate samyag yadā rakṣati bhūmipaḥ
a yadā rājā dhuraṃ śreṣṭhām ādāya vahati prajāḥ
c mahatā balayogena tadā lokaḥ prasīdati
a yasyābhāve ca bhūtānām abhāvaḥ syāt samantataḥ
c bhāve ca bhāvo nityaḥ syāt kas taṃ na pratipūjayet
a tasya yo vahate bhāraṃ sarvalokasukhāvaham
c tiṣṭhet priyahite rājña ubhau lokau hi yo jayet
a yas tasya puruṣaḥ pāpaṃ manasāpy anucintayet
c asaṃśayam iha kliṣṭaḥ pretyāpi narakaṃ patet
a na hi jātv avamantavyo manuṣya iti bhūmipaḥ
c mahatī devatā hy eṣā nararūpeṇa tiṣṭhati
a kurute pañca rūpāṇi kālayuktāni yaḥ sadā
c bhavaty agnis tathādityo mṛtyur vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ
a yadā hy āsīd ataḥ pāpān dahaty ugreṇa tejasā
c mithyopacarito rājā tadā bhavati pāvakaḥ
a yadā paśyati cāreṇa sarvabhūtāni bhūmipaḥ
c kṣemaṃ ca kṛtvā vrajati tadā bhavati bhāskaraḥ
a aśucīṃś ca yadā kruddhaḥ kṣiṇoti śataśo narān
c saputrapautrān sāmātyāṃs tadā bhavati so 'ntakaḥ
a yadā tv adhārmikān sarvāṃs tīkṣṇair daṇḍair niyacchati
c dhārmikāṃś cānugṛhṇāti bhavaty atha yamas tadā
a yadā tu dhanadhārābhis tarpayaty upakāriṇaḥ
c ācchinatti ca ratnāni vividhāny apakāriṇām
a śriyaṃ dadāti kasmai cit kasmāc cid apakarṣati
c tadā vaiśravaṇo rājaṃl loke bhavati bhūmipaḥ
a nāsyāpavāde sthātavyaṃ dakṣeṇākliṣṭakarmaṇā
c dharmyam ākāṅkṣatā lābham īśvarasyānasūyatā
a na hi rājñaḥ pratīpāni kurvan sukham avāpnuyāt
c putro bhrātā vayasyo vā yady apy ātmasamo bhavet
a kuryāt kṛṣṇagatiḥ śeṣaṃ jvalito 'nilasārathiḥ
c na tu rājñābhipannasya śeṣaṃ kva cana vidyate
a tasya sarvāṇi rakṣyāṇi dūrataḥ parivarjayet
c mṛtyor iva jugupseta rājasvaharaṇān naraḥ
a naśyed abhimṛśan sadyo mṛgaḥ kūṭam iva spṛśan
c ātmasvam iva saṃrakṣed rājasvam iha buddhimān
a mahāntaṃ narakaṃ ghoram apratiṣṭham acetasaḥ
c patanti cirarātrāya rājavittāpahāriṇaḥ
a rājā bhojo virāṭ samrāṭ kṣatriyo bhūpatir nṛpaḥ
c ya evaṃ stūyate śabdaiḥ kas taṃ nārcitum icchati
a tasmād bubhūṣur niyato jitātmā saṃyatendriyaḥ
c medhāvī smṛtimān dakṣaḥ saṃśrayeta mahīpatim
a kṛtajñaṃ prājñam akṣudraṃ dṛḍhabhaktiṃ jitendriyam
c dharmanityaṃ sthitaṃ sthityāṃ mantriṇaṃ pūjayen nṛpaḥ
a dṛḍhabhaktiṃ kṛtaprajñaṃ dharmajñaṃ saṃyatendriyam
c śūram akṣudrakarmāṇaṃ niṣiddhajanam āśrayet
a rājā pragalbhaṃ puruṣaṃ karoti
rājā kṛśaṃ bṛṃhayate manuṣyam
c rājābhipannasya kutaḥ sukhāni
rājābhyupetaṃ sukhinaṃ karoti
d rājā prajānāṃ prathamaṃ śarīraṃ
d prajāś ca rājño 'pratimaṃ śarīram
d rājñā vihīnā na bhavanti deśā
d deśair vihīnā na nṛpā bhavanti
a rājā prajānāṃ hṛdayaṃ garīyo
gatiḥ pratiṣṭhā sukham uttamaṃ ca
c yam āśritā lokam imaṃ paraṃ ca
jayanti samyak puruṣā narendram
a narādhipaś cāpy anuśiṣya medinīṃ
damena satyena ca sauhṛdena
c mahadbhir iṣṭvā kratubhir mahāyaśās
triviṣṭape sthānam upaiti satkṛtam
a sa evam ukto guruṇā kausalyo rājasattamaḥ
c prayatnāt kṛtavān vīraḥ prajānāṃ paripālanam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pārthivena viśeṣeṇa kiṃ kāryam avaśiṣyate
c kathaṃ rakṣyo janapadaḥ kathaṃ rakṣyāś ca śatravaḥ
a kathaṃ cāraṃ prayuñjīta varṇān viśvāsayet katham
c kathaṃ bhṛtyān kathaṃ dārān kathaṃ putrāṃś ca bhārata
 bhīṣma uvāca
a rājavṛttaṃ mahārāja śṛṇuṣvāvahito 'khilam
c yat kāryaṃ pārthivenādau pārthivaprakṛtena vā
a ātmā jeyaḥ sadā rājñā tato jeyāś ca śatravaḥ
c ajitātmā narapatir vijayeta kathaṃ ripūn
a etāvān ātmavijayaḥ pañcavargavinigrahaḥ
c jitendriyo narapatir bādhituṃ śaknuyād arīn
a nyaseta gulmān durgeṣu saṃdhau ca kurunandana
c nagaropavane caiva purodyāneṣu caiva ha
a saṃsthāneṣu ca sarveṣu pureṣu nagarasya ca
c madhye ca naraśārdūla tathā rājaniveśane
a praṇidhīṃś ca tataḥ kuryāj jaḍāndhabadhirākṛtīn
c puṃsaḥ parīkṣitān prājñān kṣutpipāsātapakṣamān
a amātyeṣu ca sarveṣu mitreṣu trividheṣu ca
c putreṣu ca mahārāja praṇidadhyāt samāhitaḥ
a pure janapade caiva tathā sāmantarājasu
c yathā na vidyur anyonyaṃ praṇidheyās tathā hi te
a cārāṃś ca vidyāt prahitān pareṇa bharatarṣabha
c āpaṇeṣu vihāreṣu samavāyeṣu bhikṣuṣu
a ārāmeṣu tathodyāne paṇḍitānāṃ samāgame
c veśeṣu catvare caiva sabhāsv āvasatheṣu ca
a evaṃ vihanyāc cāreṇa paracāraṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
c cāreṇa vihataṃ sarvaṃ hataṃ bhavati pāṇḍava
a yadā tu hīnaṃ nṛpatir vidyād ātmānam ātmanā
c amātyaiḥ saha saṃmantrya kuryāt saṃdhiṃ balīyasā
d vidvāṃsaḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā brāhmaṇāś ca bahuśrutāḥ
d daṇḍanītau tu niṣpannā mantriṇaḥ pṛthivīpateḥ
d praṣṭavyo brāhmaṇaḥ pūrvaṃ nītiśāstrārthatattvavit
d paścāt pṛccheta bhūpālaḥ kṣatriyaṃ nītikovidam
d vaiśyaśūdrau tathā bhūyaḥ śāstrajñau hitakāriṇau
a ajñāyamāno hīnatve kuryāt saṃdhiṃ pareṇa vai
c lipsur vā kaṃ cid evārthaṃ tvaramāṇo vicakṣaṇaḥ
a guṇavanto mahotsāhā dharmajñāḥ sādhavaś ca ye
c saṃdadhīta nṛpas taiś ca rāṣṭraṃ dharmeṇa pālayan
a ucchidyamānam ātmānaṃ jñātvā rājā mahāmatiḥ
c pūrvāpakāriṇo hanyāl lokadviṣṭāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
a yo nopakartuṃ śaknoti nāpakartuṃ mahīpatiḥ
c aśakyarūpaś coddhartum upekṣyas tādṛśo bhavet
a yātrāṃ yāyād avijñātam anākrandam anantaram
c vyāsaktaṃ ca pramattaṃ ca durbalaṃ ca vicakṣaṇaḥ
a yātrām ājñāpayed vīraḥ kalyapuṣṭabalaḥ sukhī
c pūrvaṃ kṛtvā vidhānaṃ ca yātrāyāṃ nagare tathā
d antaḥpure ca rāṣṭre ca adhyakṣeṣu ca sarvaśaḥ
a na ca vaśyo bhaved asya nṛpo yady api vīryavān
c hīnaś ca balavīryābhyāṃ karśayaṃs taṃ parāvaset
a rāṣṭraṃ ca pīḍayet tasya śastrāgniviṣamūrchanaiḥ
c amātyavallabhānāṃ ca vivādāṃs tasya kārayet
e varjanīyaṃ sadā yuddhaṃ rājyakāmena dhīmatā
a upāyais tribhir ādānam arthasyāha bṛhaspatiḥ
c sāntvenānupradānena bhedena ca narādhipa
e yam arthaṃ śaknuyāt prāptuṃ tena tuṣyed dhi paṇḍitaḥ
a ādadīta baliṃ caiva prajābhyaḥ kurunandana
c ṣaḍbhāgam amitaprajñas tāsām evābhiguptaye
a daśadharmagatebhyo yad vasu bahv alpam eva ca
c tan nādadīta sahasā paurāṇāṃ rakṣaṇāya vai
a yathā putrās tathā paurā draṣṭavyās te na saṃśayaḥ
c bhaktiś caiṣāṃ prakartavyā vyavahāre pradarśite
a sutaṃ ca sthāpayed rājā prājñaṃ sarvārthadarśinam
c vyavahāreṣu satataṃ tatra rājyaṃ vyavasthitam
a ākare lavaṇe śulke tare nāgavane tathā
c nyased amātyān nṛpatiḥ svāptān vā puruṣān hitān
a samyag daṇḍadharo nityaṃ rājā dharmam avāpnuyāt
c nṛpasya satataṃ daṇḍaḥ samyag dharme praśasyate
a vedavedāṅgavit prājñaḥ sutapasvī nṛpo bhavet
c dānaśīlaś ca satataṃ yajñaśīlaś ca bhārata
a ete guṇāḥ samastāḥ syur nṛpasya satataṃ sthirāḥ
c kriyālope tu nṛpateḥ kutaḥ svargaḥ kuto yaśaḥ
a yadā tu pīḍito rājā bhaved rājñā balīyasā
b tadābhisaṃśrayed durgaṃ buddhimān pṛthivīpatiḥ
b guptāś caiva dadurgāś ca deśās teṣu praveśayet sic
c tridhā tv ākrandya mitrāṇi vidhānam upakalpayet
d sāmabhedān virodhārthaṃ vidhānam upakalpayet
a ghoṣān nyaseta mārgeṣu grāmān utthāpayed api
c praveśayec ca tān sarvāñ śākhānagarakeṣv api
a ye guptāś caiva durgāś ca deśās teṣu praveśayet
c dhanino balamukhyāṃś ca sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ
a sasyābhihāraṃ kuryāc ca svayam eva narādhipaḥ
c asaṃbhave praveśasya dāhayed agninā bhṛśam
a kṣetrastheṣu ca sasyeṣu śatror upajapen narān
c vināśayed vā sarvasvaṃ balenātha svakena vai
a nadīṣu mārgeṣu sadā saṃkramān avasādayet
c jalaṃ nisrāvayet sarvam anisrāvyaṃ ca dūṣayet
a tadātvenāyatībhiś ca vivadan bhūmyanantaram
c pratīghātaḥ parasyājau mitrakāle 'py upasthite
a durgāṇāṃ cābhito rājā mūlacchedaṃ prakārayet
c sarveṣāṃ kṣudravṛkṣāṇāṃ caityavṛkṣān vivarjayet
a pravṛddhānāṃ ca vṛkṣāṇāṃ śākhāḥ pracchedayet tathā
c caityānāṃ sarvathā varjyam api patrasya pātanam
d daivānām āśrayāś caityā yakṣarākṣasabhoginām
d piśācapannagānāṃ ca gandharvāpsarasām api
d raudrāṇāṃ caiva bhūtānāṃ tasmāt tān parivarjayet
d śrūyate hi nikumbhena saudāsasya balaṃ hatam
d maheśvaragaṇeśena vārāṇasyāṃ narādhipa
a prakaṇṭhīḥ kārayet samyag ākāśajananīs tathā
c āpūrayec ca parikhāḥ sthāṇunakrajhaṣākulāḥ
a kaḍaṅgadvārakāṇi syur ucchvāsārthe purasya ha
c teṣāṃ ca dvāravad guptiḥ kāryā sarvātmanā bhavet
a dvāreṣu ca gurūṇy eva yantrāṇi sthāpayet sadā
c āropayec chataghnīś ca svādhīnāni ca kārayet
a kāṣṭhāni cābhihāryāṇi tathā kūpāṃś ca khānayet
c saṃśodhayet tathā kūpān kṛtān pūrvaṃ payorthibhiḥ
a tṛṇacchannāni veśmāni paṅkenāpi pralepayet
c nirharec ca tṛṇaṃ māse caitre vahnibhayāt puraḥ
a naktam eva ca bhaktāni pācayeta narādhipaḥ
c na divāgnir jvaled gehe varjayitvāgnihotrikam
d yathāsaṃbhavaśailāni ceṣṭakāni ca kārayet
d mṛṇmayāni ca kurvīta jñātvā deśe balābalam
a karmārāriṣṭaśālāsu jvaled agniḥ samāhitaḥ
c gṛhāṇi ca praviśyātha vidheyaḥ syād dhutāśanaḥ
a mahādaṇḍaś ca tasya syād yasyāgnir vai divā bhavet
c praghoṣayed athaivaṃ ca rakṣaṇārthaṃ purasya vai
a bhikṣukāṃś cākrikāṃś caiva kṣībonmattān kuśīlavān
c bāhyān kuryān naraśreṣṭha doṣāya syur hi te 'nyathā
a catvareṣu ca tīrtheṣu sabhāsv āvasatheṣu ca
c yathārhavarṇaṃ praṇidhiṃ kuryāt sarvatra pārthivaḥ
a viśālān rājamārgāṃś ca kārayeta narādhipaḥ
c prapāś ca vipaṇīś caiva yathoddeśaṃ samādiśet
a bhāṇḍāgārāyudhāgārān dhānyāgārāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
c aśvāgārān gajāgārān balādhikaraṇāni ca
a parikhāś caiva kauravya pratolīḥ saṃkaṭāni ca
c na jātu kaś cit paśyet tu guhyam etad yudhiṣṭhira
a atha saṃnicayaṃ kuryād rājā parabalārditaḥ
c tailaṃ madhu ghṛtaṃ sasyam auṣadhāni ca sarvaśaḥ
a aṅgārakuśamuñjānāṃ palāśaśaraparṇinām
c yavasendhanadigdhānāṃ kārayeta ca saṃcayān
a āyudhānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śaktyṛṣṭiprāsavarmaṇām
c saṃcayān evamādīnāṃ kārayeta narādhipaḥ
a auṣadhāni ca sarvāṇi mūlāni ca phalāni ca
c caturvidhāṃś ca vaidyān vai saṃgṛhṇīyād viśeṣataḥ
a naṭāś ca nartakāś caiva mallā māyāvinas tathā
c śobhayeyuḥ puravaraṃ modayeyuś ca sarvaśaḥ
a yataḥ śaṅkā bhavec cāpi bhṛtyato vāpi mantritaḥ
c paurebhyo nṛpater vāpi svādhīnān kārayeta tān
a kṛte karmaṇi rājendra pūjayed dhanasaṃcayaiḥ
c mānena ca yathārheṇa sāntvena vividhena ca
a nirvedayitvā tu paraṃ hatvā vā kurunandana
c gatānṛṇyo bhaved rājā yathā śāstreṣu darśitam
a rājñā saptaiva rakṣyāṇi tāni cāpi nibodha me
c ātmāmātyaś ca kośaś ca daṇḍo mitrāṇi caiva hi
a tathā janapadaś caiva puraṃ ca kurunandana
c etat saptātmakaṃ rājyaṃ paripālyaṃ prayatnataḥ
a ṣāḍguṇyaṃ ca trivargaṃ ca trivargam aparaṃ tathā
c yo vetti puruṣavyāghra sa bhunakti mahīm imām
a ṣāḍguṇyam iti yat proktaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
c saṃdhāyāsanam ity eva yātrāsaṃdhānam eva ca
a vigṛhyāsanam ity eva yātrāṃ saṃparigṛhya ca
c dvaidhībhāvas tathānyeṣāṃ saṃśrayo 'tha parasya ca
a trivargaś cāpi yaḥ proktas tam ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
a   tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a vadiṣyāmi mahābāho
c kṣayaḥ sthānaṃ ca vṛddhiś ca trivargam aparaṃ tathā
d dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca trivargo vai sanātanaḥ
d mantraś caiva prabhāvaś ca utsāhaś caiva tāntrikaḥ
d śaktitrayaṃ samākhyātaṃ trivargasya ca tatparam
d kāryaṃ ca kāraṇaṃ caiva kartā ca parikīrtitaḥ
d etat parataraṃ vidyāt trivargād api bhārata
d sarveṣāṃ ca kṣaye rājan yas trivargaḥ sanātanaḥ
d sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva trivargaḥ kāraṇaṃ smṛtam
d tenātyantavimuktaś ca muktaḥ puruṣa ucyate
d kāryasya sarvathā nāśo mokṣa ity abhidhīyate
d tena mokṣaparaś caiva devadevaḥ pitāmahaḥ
d tuṣṭyarthasya trivargasya rakṣām āha narādhipa
d jagato laukikī yātrā yatra nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitā
a dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca sevitavyo 'tha kālataḥ
b sevā dharmasya kartavyā satataṃ bhūtitatparaiḥ
b puruṣair naraśārdūla tanmūlāḥ sarvathā kriyāḥ
c dharmeṇa hi mahīpālaś ciraṃ pālayate mahīm
d yaḥ kaś cid dhārmiko rājā sa vipanno 'pi bhūpatiḥ
d arthakāmavihīno 'pi ciraṃ pālayate mahīm
a asminn arthe ca yau ślokau gītāv aṅgirasā svayam
c yādavīputra bhadraṃ te śrotum arhasi tāv api
a kṛtvā sarvāṇi kāryāṇi samyak saṃpālya medinīm
c pālayitvā tathā paurān paratra sukham edhate
a kiṃ tasya tapasā rājñaḥ kiṃ ca tasyādhvarair api
c apālitāḥ prajā yasya sarvā dharmavinākṛtāḥ
d ślokāś cośanasā gītās tān nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
d daṇḍanīteś ca yan mūlaṃ trivargasya ca bhūpate
d bhārgavāṅgirasaṃ karma ṣoḍaśāṅgaṃ ca yad balam
d viṣaṃ māyāś ca daivaṃ ca pauruṣaṃ cārthasiddhaye
d prāgudakpravaṇaṃ durgaṃ samāsādya mahīpatiḥ
d trivargatrayasaṃpūrṇam upādāya tam udvahet
d ṣaṭ pañca ca vinirjitya daśa cāṣṭau ca bhūpatiḥ
d trivargair daśabhir yuktaḥ surair api na jīyate
d na buddhiṃ parigṛhṇīta strīṇāṃ mūrkhajanasya ca
d daivopahatabuddhīnāṃ ye ca vedair vivarjitāḥ
d na teṣāṃ śṛṇuyād rājā buddhis teṣāṃ parāṅmukhī
d strīpradhānāni rājyāni vidvadbhir varjitāni ca
d mūrkhāmātyaprataptāni śuṣyante jalabinduvat
d vidvāṃsaḥ prathitā ye ca ye cāptāḥ sarvakarmasu
d yuddheṣu dṛṣṭakarmāṇas teṣāṃ ca śṛṇuyān nṛpaḥ
d daivaṃ puruṣakāraṃ ca trivargaṃ ca samāśritaḥ
d daivatāni ca viprāṃś ca praṇamya vijayī bhavet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a daṇḍanītiś ca rājā ca samastau tāv ubhāv api
c kasya kiṃ kurvataḥ siddhyai tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a mahābhāgyaṃ daṇḍanītyāḥ siddhaiḥ śabdaiḥ sahetukaiḥ
c śṛṇu me śaṃsato rājan yathāvad iha bhārata
a daṇḍanītiḥ svadharmebhyaś cāturvarṇyaṃ niyacchati
c prayuktā svāminā samyag adharmebhyaś ca yacchati
a cāturvarṇye svadharmasthe maryādānām asaṃkare
c daṇḍanītikṛte kṣeme prajānām akutobhaye
a some prayatnaṃ kurvanti trayo varṇā yathāvidhi
c tasmād devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sukhaṃ viddhi samāhitam
a kālo vā kāraṇaṃ rājño rājā vā kālakāraṇam
c iti te saṃśayo mā bhūd rājā kālasya kāraṇam
a daṇḍanītyā yadā rājā samyak kārtsnyena vartate
c tadā kṛtayugaṃ nāma kālaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pravartate
a bhavet kṛtayuge dharmo nādharmo vidyate kva cit
c sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ nādharme ramate manaḥ
a yogakṣemāḥ pravartante prajānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
c vaidikāni ca karmāṇi bhavanty aviguṇāny uta
a ṛtavaś ca sukhāḥ sarve bhavanty uta nirāmayāḥ
c prasīdanti narāṇāṃ ca svaravarṇamanāṃsi ca
a vyādhayo na bhavanty atra nālpāyur dṛśyate naraḥ
c vidhavā na bhavanty atra nṛśaṃso nābhijāyate
a akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī bhavanty oṣadhayas tathā
c tvakpatraphalamūlāni vīryavanti bhavanti ca
a nādharmo vidyate tatra dharma eva tu kevalaḥ
c iti kārtayugān etān guṇān viddhi yudhiṣṭhira
a daṇḍanītyā yadā rājā trīn aṃśān anuvartate
c caturtham aṃśam utsṛjya tadā tretā pravartate
a aśubhasya caturthāṃśas trīn aṃśān anuvartate
c kṛṣṭapacyaiva pṛthivī bhavanty oṣadhayas tathā
a ardhaṃ tyaktvā yadā rājā nītyardham anuvartate
c tatas tu dvāparaṃ nāma sa kālaḥ saṃpravartate
a aśubhasya tadā ardhaṃ dvāv aṃśāv anuvartate
c kṛṣṭapacyaiva pṛthivī bhavaty alpaphalā tathā
a daṇḍanītiṃ parityajya yadā kārtsnyena bhūmipaḥ
c prajāḥ kliśnāty ayogena praviśyati tadā kaliḥ
a kalāv adharmo bhūyiṣṭhaṃ dharmo bhavati tu kva cit
c sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ svadharmāc cyavate manaḥ
a śūdrā bhaikṣeṇa jīvanti brāhmaṇāḥ paricaryayā
c yogakṣemasya nāśaś ca vartate varṇasaṃkaraḥ
a vaidikāni ca karmāṇi bhavanti viguṇāny uta
c ṛtavo nasukhāḥ sarve bhavanty āmayinas tathā
a hrasanti ca manuṣyāṇāṃ svaravarṇamanāṃsy uta
c vyādhayaś ca bhavanty atra mriyante cāgatāyuṣaḥ
a vidhavāś ca bhavanty atra nṛśaṃsā jāyate prajā
c kva cid varṣati parjanyaḥ kva cit sasyaṃ prarohati
a rasāḥ sarve kṣayaṃ yānti yadā necchati bhūmipaḥ
c prajāḥ saṃrakṣituṃ samyag daṇḍanītisamāhitaḥ
a rājā kṛtayugasraṣṭā tretāyā dvāparasya ca
c yugasya ca caturthasya rājā bhavati kāraṇam
a kṛtasya karaṇād rājā svargam atyantam aśnute
c tretāyāḥ karaṇād rājā svargaṃ nātyantam aśnute
a pravartanād dvāparasya yathābhāgam upāśnute
c kaleḥ pravartanād rājā pāpam atyantam aśnute
a tato vasati duṣkarmā narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
c prajānāṃ kalmaṣe magno 'kīrtiṃ pāpaṃ ca vindati
d daṇḍanītiṃ puraskṛtya yadā rājā praśāsti
d yogakṣemāḥ pravartante prajānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
a daṇḍanītiṃ puraskṛtya vijānan kṣatriyaḥ sadā
b paripālyāḥ prajāḥ samyag iha pretya ca kāmadāḥ
c anavāptaṃ ca lipseta labdhaṃ ca paripālayet
d   kṣatriyeṇa vijānatā
d lipsitavyam alabdhaṃ ca labdhaṃ rakṣyaṃ ca bhārata
a lokasya sīmantakarī maryādā lokabhāvanī
c samyaṅ nītā daṇḍanītir yathā mātā yathā pitā
a yasyāṃ bhavanti bhūtāni tad viddhi bharatarṣabha
c eṣa eva paro dharmo yad rājā daṇḍanītimān
a tasmāt kauravya dharmeṇa prajāḥ pālaya nītimān
c evaṃvṛttaḥ prajā rakṣan svargaṃ jetāsi durjayam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kena vṛttena vṛttajña vartamāno mahīpatiḥ
c sukhenārthān sukhodarkān iha ca pretya cāpnuyāt
 bhīṣma uvāca
a iyaṃ guṇānāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat ṣaṭtriṃśad guṇasaṃyutā
c yān guṇāṃs tu guṇopetaḥ kurvan guṇam avāpnuyāt
a cared dharmān akaṭuko muñcet snehaṃ na nāstikaḥ
c anṛśaṃsaś cared arthaṃ caret kāmam anuddhataḥ
a priyaṃ brūyād akṛpaṇaḥ śūraḥ syād avikatthanaḥ
c dātā nāpātravarṣī syāt pragalbhaḥ syād aniṣṭhuraḥ
a saṃdadhīta na cānāryair vigṛhṇīyān na bandhubhiḥ
c nānāptaiḥ kārayec cāraṃ kuryāt kāryam apīḍayā
a arthān brūyān na cāsatsu guṇān brūyān na cātmanaḥ
c ādadyān na ca sādhubhyo nāsatpuruṣam āśrayet
a nāparīkṣya nayed daṇḍaṃ na ca mantraṃ prakāśayet
c visṛjen na ca lubdhebhyo viśvasen nāpakāriṣu
a anīrṣur guptadāraḥ syāc cokṣaḥ syād aghṛṇī nṛpaḥ
c striyaṃ seveta nātyarthaṃ mṛṣṭaṃ bhuñjīta nāhitam
a astabdhaḥ pūjayen mānyān gurūn seved amāyayā
c arced devān na dambhena śriyam icched akutsitām
a seveta praṇayaṃ hitvā dakṣaḥ syān na tv akālavit
c sāntvayen na ca bhogārtham anugṛhṇan na cākṣipet
a praharen na tv avijñāya hatvā śatrūn na śeṣayet
c krodhaṃ kuryān na cākasmān mṛduḥ syān nāpakāriṣu
a evaṃ carasva rājyastho yadi śreya ihecchasi
c ato 'nyathā narapatir bhayam ṛcchaty anuttamam
a iti sarvān guṇān etān yathoktān yo 'nuvartate
c anubhūyeha bhadrāṇi pretya svarge mahīyate
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a idaṃ vacaḥ śāṃtanavasya śuśruvān
yudhiṣṭhiraḥ pāṇḍavamukhyasaṃvṛtaḥ
c tadā vavande ca pitāmahaṃ nṛpo
yathoktam etac ca cakāra buddhimān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ rājā prajā rakṣan nādhibandhena yujyate
c dharme ca nāparādhnoti tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a samāsenaiva te tāta dharmān vakṣyāmi niścitān
c vistareṇa hi dharmāṇāṃ na jātv antam avāpnuyāt
a dharmaniṣṭhāñ śrutavato vedavratasamāhitān
c arcitān vāsayethās tvaṃ gṛhe guṇavato dvijān
a pratyutthāyopasaṃgṛhya caraṇāv abhivādya ca
c atha sarvāṇi kurvīthāḥ kāryāṇi sapurohitaḥ
a dharmakāryāṇi nirvartya maṅgalāni prayujya ca
c brāhmaṇān vācayethās tvam arthasiddhijayāśiṣaḥ
a ārjavena ca saṃpanno dhṛtyā buddhyā ca bhārata
c arthārthaṃ parigṛhṇīyāt kāmakrodhau ca varjayet
a kāmakrodhau puraskṛtya yo 'rthaṃ rājānutiṣṭhati
c na sa dharmaṃ na cāpy arthaṃ parigṛhṇāti bāliśaḥ
a mā sma lubdhāṃś ca mūrkhāṃś ca kāme cārtheṣu yūyujaḥ
c alubdhān buddhisaṃpannān sarvakarmasu yojayet
a mūrkho hy adhikṛto 'rtheṣu kāryāṇām aviśāradaḥ
c prajāḥ kliśnāty ayogena kāmadveṣasamanvitaḥ
a baliṣaṣṭhena śulkena daṇḍenāthāparādhinām
c śāstranītena lipsethā vetanena dhanāgamam
a dāpayitvā karaṃ dharmyaṃ rāṣṭraṃ nityaṃ yathāvidhi
c aśeṣān kalpayed rājā yogakṣemān atandritaḥ
a gopāyitāraṃ dātāraṃ dharmanityam atandritam
c akāmadveṣasaṃyuktam anurajyanti mānavāḥ
a mā smādharmeṇa lābhena lipsethās tvaṃ dhanāgamam
c dharmārthāv adhruvau tasya yo 'paśāstraparo bhavet
a apaśāstraparo rājā saṃcayān nādhigacchati
c asthāne cāsya tad vittaṃ sarvam eva vinaśyati
a arthamūlo 'pahiṃsāṃ ca kurute svayam ātmanaḥ
c karair aśāstradṛṣṭair hi mohāt saṃpīḍayan prajāḥ
a ūdhaś chindyād dhi yo dhenvāḥ kṣīrārthī na labhet payaḥ
b yo hi pakvaṃ drumaṃ chidya labhate na punaḥ phalam
c evaṃ rāṣṭram ayogena pīḍitaṃ na vivardhate
d yavasodakam ādāya sāntvena vinayena ca
a yo hi dogdhrīm upāste tu sa nityaṃ labhate payaḥ
c evaṃ rāṣṭram upāyena bhuñjāno labhate phalam
a atha rāṣṭram upāyena bhujyamānaṃ surakṣitam
c janayaty atulāṃ nityaṃ kośavṛddhiṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a dogdhi dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca prajā rājñi surakṣitā
c nityaṃ svebhyaḥ parebhyaś ca tṛptā mātā yathā payaḥ
a mālākāropamo rājan bhava māṅgārikopamaḥ
c tathā yuktaś ciraṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhoktuṃ śakyasi pālayan
a paracakrābhiyānena yadi te syād dhanakṣayaḥ
c atha sāmnaiva lipsethā dhanam abrāhmaṇeṣu yat
a mā sma te brāhmaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhanasthaṃ pracalen manaḥ
c antyāyām apy avasthāyāṃ kim u sphītasya bhārata
a dhanāni tebhyo dadyās tvaṃ yathāśakti yathārhataḥ
c sāntvayan parirakṣaṃś ca svargam āpsyasi durjayam
a evaṃ dharmeṇa vṛttena prajās tvaṃ paripālayan
c svantaṃ puṇyaṃ yaśovantaṃ prāpsyase kurunandana
a dharmeṇa vyavahāreṇa prajāḥ pālaya pāṇḍava
c yudhiṣṭhira tathā yukto nādhibandhena yokṣyase
a eṣa eva paro dharmo yad rājā rakṣate prajāḥ
c bhūtānāṃ hi yathā dharme rakṣaṇaṃ ca parā dayā
d iha loke sukhaṃ prāpya paratra ca mahītale
d evaṃ tebhyaḥ paracceto sic
brāhmaṇebhyo yathāvidhi
d sattvena paribhogāya svargaṃ jeṣyasi durjayam
a tasmād evaṃ paraṃ dharmaṃ manyante dharmakovidāḥ
c yad rājā rakṣaṇe yukto bhūteṣu kurute dayām
a yad ahnā kurute pāpam arakṣan bhayataḥ prajāḥ
c rājā varṣasahasreṇa tasyāntam adhigacchati
a yad ahnā kurute puṇyaṃ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
c daśa varṣasahasrāṇi tasya bhuṅkte phalaṃ divi
d yadā na kurute dharmaṃ rājā bhūtāni pālayan
d prajāpuṇyaṃ caturbhāgaṃ tadā na prāpnuyān nṛpaḥ
a sviṣṭiḥ svadhītiḥ sutapā lokāñ jayati yāvataḥ
c kṣaṇena tān avāpnoti prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
a evaṃ dharmaṃ prayatnena kaunteya paripālayan
c iha puṇyaphalaṃ labdhvā nādhibandhena yokṣyase
a svargaloke ca mahatīṃ śriyaṃ prāpsyasi pāṇḍava
c asaṃbhavaś ca dharmāṇām īdṛśānām arājasu
e tasmād rājaiva nānyo 'sti yo mahat phalam āpnuyāt
a sa rājyam ṛddhimat prāpya dharmeṇa paripālayan
c indraṃ tarpaya somena kāmaiś ca suhṛdo janān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ya eva tu sato rakṣed asataś ca nibarhayet
c sa eva rājñā kartavyo rājan rājapurohitaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d kīdṛśo brāhmaṇo rājñāṃ kāryākāryavicāraṇe
d kṣamaḥ kartuṃ samartho vā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c purūravasa ailasya saṃvādaṃ mātariśvanaḥ
 aila uvāca
a kutaḥ svid brāhmaṇo jāto varṇāś cāpi kutas trayaḥ
c kasmāc ca bhavati śreyān etad vāyo vicakṣva me
 vāyur uvāca
a brahmaṇo mukhataḥ sṛṣṭo brāhmaṇo rājasattama
c bāhubhyāṃ kṣatriyaḥ sṛṣṭa ūrubhyāṃ vaiśya ucyate
a varṇānāṃ paricaryārthaṃ trayāṇāṃ puruṣarṣabha
c varṇaś caturthaḥ paścāt tu padbhyāṃ śūdro vinirmitaḥ
a brāhmaṇo jātamātras tu pṛthivīm anvajāyata
c īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmakośasya guptaye
d sarvasvaṃ brāhmaṇasyedaṃ yat kiṃ cid iha dṛśyate
d dharmayuktaṃ praśastaṃ ca jagaty asmin nṛpātmaja
a tataḥ pṛthivyā goptāraṃ kṣatriyaṃ daṇḍadhāriṇam
c dvitīyaṃ varṇam akarot prajānām anuguptaye
a vaiśyas tu dhanadhānyena trīn varṇān bibhṛyād imān
