c śūdro hy enān paricared iti brahmānuśāsanam
 aila uvāca
a dvijasya kṣatrabandhor vā kasyeyaṃ pṛthivī bhavet
c dharmataḥ saha vittena samyag vāyo pracakṣva me
 vāyur uvāca
a viprasya sarvam evaitad yat kiṃ cij jagatīgatam
b dhanaṃ dhānyaṃ hiraṇyaṃ ca striyo ratnāni vāhanam
b maṅgalaṃ ca praśastaṃ ca yac cānyad api vidyate
c jyeṣṭhenābhijaneneha tad dharmakuśalā viduḥ
a svam eva brāhmaṇo bhuṅkte svaṃ vaste svaṃ dadāti ca
c gurur hi sarvavarṇānāṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca vai dvijaḥ
a patyabhāve yathā strī hi devaraṃ kurute patim
c ānantaryāt tathā kṣatraṃ pṛthivī kurute patim
a eṣa te prathamaḥ kalpa āpady anyo bhaved ataḥ
c yadi svarge paraṃ sthānaṃ dharmataḥ parimārgasi
a yaḥ kaś cid vijayed bhūmiṃ brāhmaṇāya nivedayet
c śrutavṛttopapannāya dharmajñāya tapasvine
a svadharmaparitṛptāya yo na vittaparo bhavet
c yo rājānaṃ nayed buddhyā sarvataḥ paripūrṇayā
a brāhmaṇo hi kule jātaḥ kṛtaprajño vinītavāk
c śreyo nayati rājānaṃ bruvaṃś citrāṃ sarasvatīm
a rājā carati yaṃ dharmaṃ brāhmaṇena nidarśitam
c śuśrūṣur anahaṃvādī kṣatradharmavrate sthitaḥ
a tāvatā sa kṛtaprajñaś ciraṃ yaśasi tiṣṭhati
c tasya dharmasya sarvasya bhāgī rājapurohitaḥ
a evam eva prajāḥ sarvā rājānam abhisaṃśritāḥ
b brāhmaṇaṃ ca suvidvāṃsaṃ rājaśāstravipaścitam
c samyagvṛttāḥ svadharmasthā na kutaś cid bhayānvitāḥ
a rāṣṭre caranti yaṃ dharmaṃ rājñā sādhv abhirakṣitāḥ
c caturthaṃ tasya dharmasya rājā bhāgaṃ sa vindati
a devā manuṣyāḥ pitaro gandharvoragarākṣasāḥ
c yajñam evopajīvanti nāsti ceṣṭam arājake
a ito dattena jīvanti devatāḥ pitaras tathā
c rājany evāsya dharmasya yogakṣemaḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a chāyāyām apsu vāyau ca sukham uṣṇe 'dhigacchati
c agnau vāsasi sūrye ca sukhaṃ śīte 'dhigacchati
a śabde sparśe rase rūpe gandhe ca ramate manaḥ
c teṣu bhogeṣu sarveṣu nabhīto labhate sukham
a abhayasyaiva yo dātā tasyaiva sumahat phalam
c na hi prāṇasamaṃ dānaṃ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
a indro rājā yamo rājā dharmo rājā tathaiva ca
c rājā bibharti rūpāṇi rājñā sarvam idaṃ dhṛtam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
 rājñā purohitaḥ kāryaḥ kīdṛśo varṇato bhavet
 bhīṣma uvāca
 purodhā yādṛśaḥ kāryaḥ kathayasva pitāmaha
 gauro vā lohito vāpi śyāmo vā nīrujaḥ sukhī
 akrodhano nacapalaḥ sarvataś ca jitendriyaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a rājñā purohitaḥ kāryo bhaved vidvān bahuśrutaḥ
c ubhau samīkṣya dharmārthāv aprameyāv anantaram
a dharmātmā dharmavid yeṣāṃ rājñāṃ rājan purohitaḥ
b teṣām arthaś ca kāmaś ca dharmaś ceti viniścayaḥ
b ślokāṃś cośanasā gītāṃs tān nibodha yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
b ucchiṣṭaḥ sa bhaved rājā yasya nāsti purohitaḥ
b rakṣasām asurāṇāṃ ca piśācoragapakṣiṇām
b śatrūṇāṃ ca bhaved vadhyo yasya nāsti purohitaḥ
b brahmatvaṃ sarvayajñeṣu kurvītātharvaṇo dvijaḥ
b rājñaś cātharvavedena sarvakarmāṇi kārayet
b brūyād garhyāṇi satataṃ mahotpātāny aghāni ca
b iṣṭamaṅgalayuktāni tathāntaḥpurakāṇi ca
b gītanṛttādhikāreṣu saṃmateṣu mahīpateḥ
b kartavyaṃ karaṇīyāni vaiśvadevabalī tathā
b pakṣasaṃdhiṣu kurvīta mahāśāntiṃ purohitaḥ
b raudrahomasahasraṃ ca svasya rājñaḥ priyaṃ hitam
b rājñaḥ pāpamalāḥ sapta yān ṛcchati purohitaḥ
b amātyāś ca kukarmāṇo mantriṇaś cāpy upekṣakāḥ
b cauryam avyavahāraṃ ca vyavahāropasevinām
b adaṇḍyadaṇḍanaṃ caiva daṇḍyānāṃ cāpy adaṇḍanam
b hiṃsā cānyatra saṃgrāmād yajñāc ca mala ucyate
b kubhṛtyais tu prajānāśaḥ saptamas tu mahāmalaḥ
b raudrair homair mahāśāntyā ghṛtakambalakarmaṇā
b bhṛgvaṅgiro vidhijño vai purodhā nirṇuden malān
b etān hitvā divaṃ yāti rājā sapta mahāmalān
b sāmātyaḥ sapurodhāś ca prajānāṃ pālane rataḥ
b etasminn eva kauravya paurohitye mahāmate
b ślokān āha surendrasya gurur devo bṛhaspatiḥ
b tān nibodha mahābhāga mahīpālahitāñ śubhān
b ṛgvede sāmavede ca yajurvede ca vājinām
b na nirdiṣṭāni karmāṇi triṣu sthāneṣu bhūbhṛtām
b śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ caiva aniṣṭānāṃ ca śātanam
b śaptās te yājñavalkyena yajñānāṃ hitam īhatā
b brahmiṣṭhānāṃ variṣṭhena brahmaṇaḥ saṃmate vibhoḥ
b bahvṛcaṃ sāmagaṃ caiva vājinaṃ ca vivarjayet
b bahvṛco rāṣṭranāśāya rājanāśāya sāmagaḥ
b adhvaryur balanāśāya prokto vājasaneyakaḥ
b abrāhmaṇeṣu varṇeṣu mantrān vājasaneyakān
b śāntike pauṣṭike caiva nityaṃ karmaṇi varjayet
b brāhmaṇasya mahīpasya sarvathā na virodhinaḥ
b vedāś catvāra ity ete brāhmaṇā ye ca tad viduḥ
b paurohitye pramāṇaṃ tu brāhmaṇaś ca mahīpate
b jātyā na kṣatriyaḥ proktaḥ kṣatatrāṇaṃ karoti yaḥ
b cāturvarṇyabahiṣṭho 'pi sa eva kṣatriyaḥ smṛtaḥ
b bhārgavāṅgirasair mantrais teṣāṃ karma vidhīyate
b vaitānaṃ karma yac caiva gṛhyakarma ca yat smṛtam
b dvijātīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ tu sarvakarma vidhīyate
b rājadharmapravṛttānāṃ hitārthaṃ trīṇi kārayet
b śāntikaṃ pauṣṭikaṃ caiva tathābhicaraṇaṃ ca yat
b agniṣṭomamukhair yajñair dūṣitā bhūpakarmabhiḥ
b na samyak phalam icchanti ye yajanti dvijātayaḥ
b paurohityaṃ hi kurvāṇā nāśaṃ yāsyanti bhūbhṛtām
b yajñakarmāṇi kurvāṇā ṛtvijas tu virodhinaḥ
b brahmakṣatraviśaḥ sarve paurohitye vivarjitāḥ
b tadabhāve ca pārakyaṃ nirdiṣṭaṃ rājakarmasu
b ṛṣiṇā yājñavalkyena tat tathā na tad anyathā
b bhārgavāṅgirasāṃ vede kṛtavidyaḥ ṣaḍaṅgavit
b yajñakarmavidhijñaś ca vidhijñaḥ pauṣṭikeṣu ca
b aṣṭādaśavikalpānāṃ vidhijñaḥ śāntikarmaṇām
b sarvarogavihīnaś ca saṃyataḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ
b śvitrakuṣṭhakṣayakṣīṇair grahāpasmāradūṣitaiḥ
b aśastair vātaduṣṭaiś ca dūrasthaiḥ saṃvaden nṛpaḥ
b rogiṇaṃ tv ṛtvijaṃ caiva varjayec ca purohitam
b na cānyasya kṛtaṃ yena paurohityaṃ kadā cana
b yasya yājyo mṛtaś caiva bhraṣṭaḥ pravrajito 'tha vā
b yuddhe parājitaś caiva sarvāṃs tān varjayen nṛpaḥ
b nakṣatrasyānukūlyena yaḥ saṃjāto nareśvaraḥ
b rājaśāstravinītaś ca śreyān rājñaḥ purohitaḥ
b adhanyānāṃ nimittānām utpātānām athārthavit
b śatrupakṣakṣayajñaś ca śreyān rājñaḥ purohitaḥ
b vājinaṃ tadabhāve ca carakādhvaryavān atha
b bahvṛcaṃ sāmagaṃ caiva nītiśāstrakṛtaśramān
b kṛtino 'tharvaṇe vede sthāpayet tu purohitān
b hiṃsāliṅgā hi nirdiṣṭā mantrā vaitānikair dvijaiḥ
b na tān uccārayet prājñaḥ kṣātradharmavirodhinaḥ
b prajāguṇaḥ purodhāś ca purohitaguṇāḥ prajāḥ
c rājā caivaṃ guṇo yeṣāṃ kuśalaṃ teṣu sarvaśaḥ
a ubhau prajā vardhayato devān pūrvān parān pitṝn
c yau sameyāsthitau dharme śraddheyau sutapasvinau
a parasparasya suhṛdau saṃmatau samacetasau
c brahmakṣatrasya saṃmānāt prajāḥ sukham avāpnuyuḥ
a vimānanāt tayor eva prajā naśyeyur eva ha
c brahmakṣatraṃ hi sarveṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ mūlam ucyate
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c ailakaśyapasaṃvādaṃ taṃ nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
 aila uvāca
a yadā hi brahma prajahāti kṣatraṃ
kṣatraṃ yadā vā prajahāti brahma
c anvag balaṃ katame 'smin bhajante
tathābalyaṃ katame 'smin viyanti
 kaśyapa uvāca
a vyṛddhaṃ rāṣṭraṃ bhavati kṣatriyasya
brahma kṣatraṃ yatra virudhyate ha
c anvag balaṃ dasyavas tad bhajante
'balyaṃ tathā tatra viyanti santaḥ
a naiṣām ukṣā vardhate nota usrā
na gargaro mathyate no yajante
c naiṣāṃ putrā vedam adhīyate ca
yadā brahma kṣatriyāḥ saṃtyajanti
a naiṣām ukṣā vardhate jātu gehe
nādhīyate saprajā no yajante
c apadhvastā dasyubhūtā bhavanti
ye brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyān saṃtyajanti
a etau hi nityasaṃyuktāv itaretaradhāraṇe
c kṣatraṃ hi brahmaṇo yonir yoniḥ kṣatrasya ca dvijāḥ
a ubhāv etau nityam abhiprapannau
saṃprāpatur mahatīṃ śrīpratiṣṭhām
c tayoḥ saṃdhir bhidyate cet purāṇas
tataḥ sarvaṃ bhavati hi saṃpramūḍham
a nātra plavaṃ labhate pāragāmī
mahāgādhe naur iva saṃpraṇunnā
c cāturvarṇyaṃ bhavati ca saṃpramūḍhaṃ
tataḥ prajāḥ kṣayasaṃsthā bhavanti
a brahmavṛkṣo rakṣyamāṇo madhu hema ca varṣati
c arakṣyamāṇaḥ satatam aśru pāpaṃ ca varṣati
a abrahmacārī caraṇād apeto
yadā brahmā brahmaṇi trāṇam icchet
c āścaryaśo varṣati tatra devas
tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ duḥsahāś cāviśanti
a striyaṃ hatvā brāhmaṇaṃ vāpi pāpaḥ
sabhāyāṃ yatra labhate 'nuvādam
c rājñaḥ sakāśe na bibheti cāpi
tato bhayaṃ jāyate kṣatriyasya
a pāpaiḥ pāpe kriyamāṇe 'tivelaṃ
tato rudro jāyate deva eṣaḥ
c pāpaiḥ pāpāḥ saṃjanayanti rudraṃ
tataḥ sarvān sādhvasādhūn hinasti
 aila uvāca
a kuto rudraḥ kīdṛśo vāpi rudraḥ
sattvaiḥ sattvaṃ dṛśyate vadhyamānam
c etad vidvan kaśyapa me pracakṣva
yato rudro jāyate deva eṣaḥ
 kaśyapa uvāca
a ātmā rudro hṛdaye mānavānāṃ
svaṃ svaṃ dehaṃ paradehaṃ ca hanti
c vātotpātaiḥ sadṛśaṃ rudram āhur
dāvair jīmūtaiḥ sadṛśaṃ rūpam asya
 aila uvāca
a na vai vātaṃ parivṛnoti kaś cin
na jīmūto varṣati naiva dāvaḥ
c tathāyukto dṛśyate mānaveṣu
kāmadveṣād badhyate mucyate ca
 kaśyapa uvāca
a yathaikagehe jātavedāḥ pradīptaḥ
kṛtsnaṃ grāmaṃ pradahet sa tvarāvān
c vimohanaṃ kurute deva eṣa
tataḥ sarvaṃ spṛśyate puṇyapāpaiḥ
 aila uvāca
a yadi daṇḍaḥ spṛśate puṇyabhājaṃ
pāpaiḥ pāpe kriyamāṇe 'viśeṣāt
c kasya hetoḥ sukṛtaṃ nāma kuryād
duṣkṛtaṃ vā kasya hetor na kuryāt
 kaśyapa uvāca
a asaṃtyāgāt pāpakṛtām apāpāṃs
tulyo daṇḍaḥ spṛśate miśrabhāvāt
c śuṣkeṇārdraṃ dahyate miśrabhāvān
na miśraḥ syāt pāpakṛdbhiḥ kathaṃ cit
 aila uvāca
a sādhvasādhūn dhārayatīha bhūmiḥ
sādhvasādhūṃs tāpayatīha sūryaḥ
c sādhvasādhūn vātayatīha vāyur
āpas tathā sādhvasādhūn vahanti
 kaśyapa uvāca
a evam asmin vartate loka eva
nāmutraivaṃ vartate rājaputra
c pretyaitayor antaravān viśeṣo
yo vai puṇyaṃ carate yaś ca pāpam
a puṇyasya loko madhumān ghṛtārcir
hiraṇyajyotir amṛtasya nābhiḥ
c tatra pretya modate brahmacārī
na tatra mṛtyur na jarā nota duḥkham
a pāpasya loko nirayo 'prakāśo
nityaṃ duḥkhaḥ śokabhūyiṣṭha eva
c tatrātmānaṃ śocate pāpakarmā
bahvīḥ samāḥ prapatann apratiṣṭhaḥ
a mitho bhedād brāhmaṇakṣatriyāṇāṃ
prajā duḥkhaṃ duḥsahaṃ cāviśanti
c evaṃ jñātvā kārya eveha vidvān
purohito naikavidyo nṛpeṇa
a taṃ caivānvabhiṣicyeta tathā dharmo vidhīyate
c agryo hi brāhmaṇaḥ proktaḥ sarvasyaiveha dharmataḥ
a pūrvaṃ hi brāhmaṇāḥ sṛṣṭā iti dharmavido viduḥ
c jyeṣṭhenābhijanenāsya prāptaṃ sarvaṃ yad uttaram
a tasmān mānyaś ca pūjyaś ca brāhmaṇaḥ prasṛtāgrabhuk
c sarvaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ variṣṭhaṃ ca nivedyaṃ tasya dharmataḥ
a avaśyam etat kartavyaṃ rājñā balavatāpi hi
c brahma vardhayati kṣatraṃ kṣatrato brahma vardhate
d evaṃ rājñā viśeṣeṇa pūjyā vai brāhmaṇāḥ sadā
d rājñaḥ sarvasya cānyasya svāmī rājapurohitaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yogakṣemo hi rāṣṭrasya rājanyāyatta ucyate
c yogakṣemaś ca rājño 'pi samāyattaḥ purohite
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d brahmakṣatrasya sāmarthyaṃ kathitaṃ te pitāmaha
d purohitaprabhāvaś ca lakṣaṇaṃ ca purodhasaḥ
d idānīṃ śrotum icchāmi brahmakṣatravinirṇayam
d brahmakṣatraṃ hi sarvasya kāraṇaṃ jagataḥ param
d yogakṣemo hi rāṣṭrasya tābhyām āyatta eva hi
a yatādṛṣṭaṃ bhayaṃ brahma prajānāṃ śamayaty uta
c dṛṣṭaṃ ca rājā bāhubhyāṃ tad rāṣṭraṃ sukham edhate
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c mucukundasya saṃvādaṃ rājño vaiśravaṇasya ca
a mucukundo vijityemāṃ pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ
c jijñāsamānaḥ svabalam abhyayād alakādhipam
a tato vaiśravaṇo rājā rakṣāṃsi samavāsṛjat
c te balāny avamṛdnantaḥ prācaraṃs tasya nairṛtāḥ
a sa hanyamāne sainye sve mucukundo narādhipaḥ
c garhayām āsa vidvāṃsaṃ purohitam ariṃdamaḥ
a tata ugraṃ tapas taptvā vasiṣṭho brahmavittamaḥ
c rakṣāṃsy apāvadhīt tatra panthānaṃ cāpy avindata
a tato vaiśravaṇo rājā mucukundam adarśayat
c vadhyamāneṣu sainyeṣu vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
a tvatto hi balinaḥ pūrve rājānaḥ sapurohitāḥ
c na caivaṃ samavartaṃs te yathā tvam iha vartase
a te khalv api kṛtāstrāś ca balavantaś ca bhūmipāḥ
c āgamya paryupāsante mām īśaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
a yady asti bāhuvīryaṃ te tad darśayitum arhasi
c kiṃ brāhmaṇabalena tvam atimātraṃ pravartase
a mucukundas tataḥ kruddhaḥ pratyuvāca dhaneśvaram
c nyāyapūrvam asaṃrabdham asaṃbhrāntam idaṃ vacaḥ
a brahmakṣatram idaṃ sṛṣṭam ekayoni svayaṃbhuvā
c pṛthag balavidhānaṃ ca tal lokaṃ parirakṣati
a tapomantrabalaṃ nityaṃ brāhmaṇeṣu pratiṣṭhitam
c astrabāhubalaṃ nityaṃ kṣatriyeṣu pratiṣṭhitam
a tābhyāṃ saṃbhūya kartavyaṃ prajānāṃ paripālanam
c tathā ca māṃ pravartantaṃ garhayasy alakādhipa
a tato 'bravīd vaiśravaṇo rājānaṃ sapurohitam
c nāhaṃ rājyam anirdiṣṭaṃ kasmai cid vidadhāmy uta
a nācchinde cāpi nirdiṣṭam iti jānīhi pārthiva
c praśādhi pṛthivīṃ vīra maddattām akhilām imām
d evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca mucukundo mahīpatiḥ
 mucukunda uvāca
a nāhaṃ rājyaṃ bhavaddattaṃ bhoktum icchāmi pārthiva
c bāhuvīryārjitaṃ rājyam aśnīyām iti kāmaye
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato vaiśravaṇo rājā vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayau
c kṣatradharme sthitaṃ dṛṣṭvā mucukundam asaṃbhramam
a tato rājā mucukundaḥ so 'nvaśāsad vasuṃdharām
c bāhuvīryārjitāṃ samyak kṣatradharmam anuvrataḥ
a evaṃ yo brahmavid rājā brahmapūrvaṃ pravartate
c jayaty avijitām urvīṃ yaśaś ca mahad aśnute
a nityodako brāhmaṇaḥ syān nityaśastraś ca kṣatriyaḥ
c tayor hi sarvam āyattaṃ yat kiṃ cij jagatīgatam
d yaśaś ca tejaś ca mahīṃ ca kṛtsnāṃ
d prāpnoti rājan vipulāṃ ca kīrtim
d pradhānadharmaṃ nṛpate niyaccha
d tathā ca dharmasya caturtham aṃśam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yayā vṛttyā mahīpālo vivardhayati mānavān
c puṇyāṃś ca lokāñ jayati tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a dānaśīlo bhaved rājā yajñaśīlaś ca bhārata
c upavāsatapaḥśīlaḥ prajānāṃ pālane rataḥ
a sarvāś caiva prajā nityaṃ rājā dharmeṇa pālayet
c utthānenāpramādena pūjayec caiva dhārmikān
a rājñā hi pūjito dharmas tataḥ sarvatra pūjyate
c yad yad ācarate rājā tat prajānāṃ hi rocate
a nityam udyatadaṇḍaś ca bhaven mṛtyur ivāriṣu
c nihanyāt sarvato dasyūn na kāmāt kasya cit kṣamet
a yaṃ hi dharmaṃ carantīha prajā rājñā surakṣitāḥ
c caturthaṃ tasya dharmasya rājā bhārata vindati
a yad adhīte yad yajate yad dadāti yad arcati
c rājā caturthabhāk tasya prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
a yad rāṣṭre 'kuśalaṃ kiṃ cid rājño 'rakṣayataḥ prajāḥ
c caturthaṃ tasya pāpasya rājā bhārata vindati
a apy āhuḥ sarvam eveti bhūyo 'rdham iti niścayaḥ
c karmaṇaḥ pṛthivīpāla nṛśaṃso 'nṛtavāg api
e tādṛśāt kilbiṣād rājā śṛṇu yena pramucyate
a pratyāhartum aśakyaṃ syād dhanaṃ corair hṛtaṃ yadi
c svakośāt tat pradeyaṃ syād aśaktenopajīvatā
a sarvavarṇaiḥ sadā rakṣyaṃ brahmasvaṃ brāhmaṇās tathā
c na stheyaṃ viṣaye teṣu yo 'pakuryād dvijātiṣu
a brahmasve rakṣyamāṇe hi sarvaṃ bhavati rakṣitam
c teṣāṃ prasāde nirvṛtte kṛtakṛtyo bhaven nṛpaḥ
a parjanyam iva bhūtāni mahādrumam iva dvijāḥ
c narās tam upajīvanti nṛpaṃ sarvārthasādhakam
a na hi kāmātmanā rājñā satataṃ śaṭhabuddhinā
c nṛśaṃsenātilubdhena śakyāḥ pālayituṃ prajāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a nāhaṃ rājyasukhānveṣī rājyam icchāmy api kṣaṇam
c dharmārthaṃ rocaye rājyaṃ dharmaś cātra na vidyate
a tad alaṃ mama rājyena yatra dharmo na vidyate
c vanam eva gamiṣyāmi tasmād dharmacikīrṣayā
a tatra medhyeṣv araṇyeṣu nyastadaṇḍo jitendriyaḥ
c dharmam ārādhayiṣyāmi munir mūlaphalāśanaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vedāhaṃ tava yā buddhir ānṛśaṃsyaguṇaiva sā
c na ca śuddhānṛśaṃsyena śakyaṃ mahad upāsitum
a api tu tvā mṛduṃ dāntam atyāryam atidhārmikam
c klībaṃ dharmaghṛṇāyuktaṃ na loko bahu manyate
a rājadharmān avekṣasva pitṛpaitāmahocitān
c naitad rājñām atho vṛttaṃ yathā tvaṃ sthātum icchasi
a na hi vaiklavyasaṃsṛṣṭam ānṛśaṃsyam ihāsthitaḥ
c prajāpālanasaṃbhūtaṃ prāptā dharmaphalaṃ hy asi
a na hy etām āśiṣaṃ pāṇḍur na ca kunty anvayācata
b vicitravīryo dharmātmā citravīryo na pārthivaḥ
b śaṃtanuś ca mahīpālaḥ sarvakṣatrasya pūjitaḥ
c na caitāṃ prājñatāṃ tāta yayā carasi medhayā
a śauryaṃ balaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca pitā tava sadābravīt
c māhātmyaṃ balam audāryaṃ tava kunty anvayācata
a nityaṃ svāhā svadhā nityam ubhe mānuṣadaivate
c putreṣv āśāsate nityaṃ pitaro daivatāni ca
a dānam adhyayanaṃ yajñaḥ prajānāṃ paripālanam
c dharmam etam adharmaṃ vā janmanaivābhyajāyithāḥ
a kāle dhuri niyuktānāṃ vahatāṃ bhāra āhite
c sīdatām api kaunteya na kīrtir avasīdati
a samantato viniyato vahaty askhalito hi yaḥ
c nirdoṣakarmavacanāt siddhiḥ karmaṇa eva sā
a naikāntavinipātena vicacāreha kaś cana
c dharmī gṛhī vā rājā vā brahmacāry atha vā punaḥ
a alpaṃ tu sādhubhūyiṣṭhaṃ yat karmodāram eva tat
c kṛtam evākṛtāc chreyo na pāpīyo 'sty akarmaṇaḥ
a yadā kulīno dharmajñaḥ prāpnoty aiśvaryam uttamam
c yogakṣemas tadā rājan kuśalāyaiva kalpate
a dānenānyaṃ balenānyam anyaṃ sūnṛtayā girā
c sarvataḥ parigṛhṇīyād rājyaṃ prāpyeha dhārmikaḥ
a yaṃ hi vaidyāḥ kule jātā avṛttibhayapīḍitāḥ
c prāpya tṛptāḥ pratiṣṭhanti dharmaḥ ko 'bhyadhikas tataḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃ nv ataḥ paramaṃ svargyaṃ kā nv ataḥ prītir uttamā
c kiṃ nv ataḥ paramaiśvaryaṃ brūhi me yadi manyase
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yasmin pratiṣṭhitāḥ samyak kṣemaṃ vindanti tatkṣaṇam
c sa svargajittamo 'smākaṃ satyam etad bravīmi te
a tvam eva prītimāṃs tasmāt kurūṇāṃ kurusattama
c bhava rājā jaya svargaṃ sato rakṣāsato jahi
a anu tvā tāta jīvantu suhṛdaḥ sādhubhiḥ saha
c parjanyam iva bhūtāni svādudrumam ivāṇḍajāḥ
a dhṛṣṭaṃ śūraṃ prahartāram anṛśaṃsaṃ jitendriyam
c vatsalaṃ saṃvibhaktāram anu jīvantu tvāṃ janāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a svakarmaṇy apare yuktās tathaivānye vikarmaṇi
c teṣāṃ viśeṣam ācakṣva brāhmaṇānāṃ pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vidyālakṣaṇasaṃpannāḥ sarvatrāmnāyadarśinaḥ
c ete brahmasamā rājan brāhmaṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
a ṛtvigācāryasaṃpannāḥ sveṣu karmasv avasthitāḥ
c ete devasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty uta
a ṛtvik purohito mantrī dūto 'thārthānuśāsakaḥ
c ete kṣatrasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty uta
d gojāvimahiṣāṇāṃ ca vaḍavānāṃ ca poṣakāḥ
d vṛttyartham abhipadyante tān vaiśyān saṃpracakṣate
d aiśvaryakāmā ye cāpi sāmiṣārthāś ca bhārata
d nigrahānugraharatāṃs tān dvijān kṣatriyān viduḥ
a aśvārohā gajārohā rathino 'tha padātayaḥ
c ete vaiśyasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty uta
d mlecchadeśās tu ye ke cit pāpair adhyuṣitā naraiḥ
d gatvā tu brāhmaṇas tāṃś ca caṇḍālaḥ pretya ceha ca
d vrātyān mlecchāṃś ca śūdrāṃś ca yājayitvā dvijādhamaḥ
d akīrtim iha saṃprāpya narakaṃ pratipadyate
d mahāvṛndasamudrābhyāṃ paryāyeṇaikaviṃśatim
d brāhmaṇo ṛgyajuḥsāmnāṃ mūḍhaḥ kṛtvā tu viplavam
d kalpam ekaṃ kṛmiḥ so 'tha nānāviṣṭhāsu jāyate
d vrātye mlecche tathā śūdre taskare patite 'śucau
d kudeśe ca surāpe ca brahmaghne vṛṣalīpatau
d anadhītiṣu sarvatra bhuñjāne yatra tatra vā
d bālastrīvṛddhahantuś ca mātāpitror guros tathā
d mitradruhi kṛtaghne ca goghne caiva kathaṃ cana
d putraghātini śatrau ca na mantrān yojayed dvijaḥ
d sa teṣāṃ viplavaḥ prokto mantravidbhiḥ sanātanaiḥ
d yadi vipro videśasthas tīrthayātrāṃ gato 'tha vā
d yadi bhītaḥ prapanno vā kudeśaṃ śaucavarjitam
d susaṃyataḥ śucir bhūtvā mantrān uccārayed dvijaḥ
d ārtaś coccārayen mantram ārtatrāṇaparo 'tha vā
d hīneṣv api prayuñjāno nāsau viplāvakaḥ smṛtaḥ
d krūrakarmā sukarmā vā karmabhir vañcito 'tha vā
d tattvavittarate pāpaṃ śīlavān saṃyatendriyaḥ
a janmakarmavihīnā ye kadaryā brahmabandhavaḥ
c ete śūdrasamā rājan brāhmaṇānāṃ bhavanty uta
a aśrotriyāḥ sarva eva sarve cānāhitāgnayaḥ
c tān sarvān dhārmiko rājā baliṃ viṣṭiṃ ca kārayet
a āhvāyakā devalakā nakṣatragrāmayājakāḥ
c ete brāhmaṇacaṇḍālā mahāpathikapañcamāḥ
a etebhyo balim ādadyād dhīnakośo mahīpatiḥ
c ṛte brahmasamebhyaś ca devakalpebhya eva ca
a abrāhmaṇānāṃ vittasya svāmī rājeti vaidikam
c brāhmaṇānāṃ ca ye ke cid vikarmasthā bhavanty uta
d prāg uktāṃś cāpy anuktāṃś ca sarvāṃs tān dāpayet karān
a vikarmasthās tu nopekṣyā jātu rājñā kathaṃ cana
c niyamyāḥ saṃvibhajyāś ca dharmānugrahakāmyayā
a yasya sma viṣaye rājñaḥ steno bhavati vai dvijaḥ
c rājña evāparādhaṃ taṃ manyante tadvido janāḥ
a avṛttyā yo bhavet steno vedavit snātakas tathā
c rājan sa rājñā bhartavya iti dharmavido viduḥ
a sa cen no parivarteta kṛtavṛttiḥ paraṃtapa
c tato nirvāsanīyaḥ syāt tasmād deśāt sabāndhavaḥ
d yajñaḥ śrutam apaiśunyam ahiṃsātithipūjanam
d damaḥ satyaṃ tapo dānam etad brāhmaṇalakṣaṇam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a keṣāṃ rājā prabhavati vittasya bharatarṣabha
c kayā ca vṛttyā varteta tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a abrāhmaṇānāṃ vittasya svāmī rājeti vaidikam
c brāhmaṇānāṃ ca ye ke cid vikarmasthā bhavanty uta
a vikarmasthāś ca nopekṣyā viprā rājñā kathaṃ cana
c iti rājñāṃ purāvṛttam abhijalpanti sādhavaḥ
a yasya sma viṣaye rājñaḥ steno bhavati vai dvijaḥ
c rājña evāparādhaṃ taṃ manyante kilbiṣaṃ nṛpa
a abhiśastam ivātmānaṃ manyante tena karmaṇā
c tasmād rājarṣayaḥ sarve brāhmaṇān anvapālayan
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c gītaṃ kekayarājena hriyamāṇena rakṣasā
a kekayānām adhipatiṃ rakṣo jagrāha dāruṇam
c svādhyāyenānvitaṃ rājann araṇye saṃśitavratam
 rājovāca
a na me steno janapade na kadaryo na madyapaḥ
c nānāhitāgnir nāyajvā māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a na ca me brāhmaṇo 'vidvān nāvratī nāpy asomapaḥ
c nānāhitāgnir viṣaye māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a nānāptadakṣiṇair yajñair yajante viṣaye mama
c adhīte nāvratī kaś cin māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a adhīyate 'dhyāpayanti yajante yājayanti ca
c dadati pratigṛhṇanti ṣaṭsu karmasv avasthitāḥ
a pūjitāḥ saṃvibhaktāś ca mṛdavaḥ satyavādinaḥ
c brāhmaṇā me svakarmasthā māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a na yācante prayacchanti satyadharmaviśāradāḥ
c nādhyāpayanty adhīyante yajante na ca yājakāḥ
a brāhmaṇān parirakṣanti saṃgrāmeṣv apalāyinaḥ
c kṣatriyā me svakarmasthā māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a kṛṣigorakṣavāṇijyam upajīvanty amāyayā
c apramattāḥ kriyāvantaḥ suvratāḥ satyavādinaḥ
a saṃvibhāgaṃ damaṃ śaucaṃ sauhṛdaṃ ca vyapāśritāḥ
c mama vaiśyāḥ svakarmasthā māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a trīn varṇān anutiṣṭhanti yathāvad anasūyakāḥ
c mama śūdrāḥ svakarmasthā māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a kṛpaṇānāthavṛddhānāṃ durbalāturayoṣitām
c saṃvibhaktāsmi sarveṣāṃ māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a kuladeśādidharmāṇāṃ prathitānāṃ yathāvidhi
c avyucchettāsmi sarveṣāṃ māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a tapasvino me viṣaye pūjitāḥ paripālitāḥ
c saṃvibhaktāś ca satkṛtya māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a nāsaṃvibhajya bhoktāsmi na viśāmi parastriyam
c svatantro jātu na krīḍe māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a nābrahmacārī bhikṣāvān bhikṣur vābrahmacārikaḥ
c anṛtvijaṃ hutaṃ nāsti māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
d kṛtaṃ rājyaṃ mayā sarvaṃ rājyasthenāpi kāryavat
d nāhaṃ vyutkrāmitaḥ satyān māmakāntaram ābibhaḥ
a nāvajānāmy ahaṃ vṛddhān na vaidyān na tapasvinaḥ
c rāṣṭre svapati jāgarmi māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
d śuklakarmāsmi sarvatra na durgatibhayaṃ mama
d dharmacārī gṛhasthaś ca māmakāntaram ābibhaḥ
a vedādhyayanasaṃpannas tapasvī sarvadharmavit
c svāmī sarvasya rājyasya śrīmān mama purohitaḥ
a dānena divyān abhivāñchāmi lokān
satyenātho brāhmaṇānāṃ ca guptyā
c śuśrūṣayā cāpi gurūn upaimi
na me bhayaṃ vidyate rākṣasebhyaḥ
a na me rāṣṭre vidhavā brahmabandhur
na brāhmaṇaḥ kṛpaṇo nota coraḥ
c na pārajāyī na ca pāpakarmā
na me bhayaṃ vidyate rākṣasebhyaḥ
a na me śastrair anirbhinnam aṅge dvyaṅgulam antaram
c dharmārthaṃ yudhyamānasya māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
a gobrāhmaṇe ca yajñe ca nityaṃ svastyayanaṃ mama
c āśāsate janā rāṣṭre māmakāntaram āviśaḥ
 rākṣasa uvāca
 nārīṇāṃ vyabhicārāc ca anyāyāc ca mahīkṣitām
 viprāṇāṃ karmadoṣāc ca prajānāṃ jāyate bhayam
 avṛṣṭir mārako rogaḥ satataṃ kṣudbhayāni ca
 vigrahaś ca sadā tasmin deśe bhavati dāruṇaḥ
 yakṣarakṣaḥpiśācebhyo nāsurebhyaḥ kathaṃ cana
 bhayam utpadyate tatra yatra viprāḥ susaṃyatāḥ
 gandharvāpsarasaḥsiddhāḥ pannagāś ca sarīsṛpāḥ
 mānavān na jighāṃsanti yatra nāryaḥ pativratāḥ
 brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyā yatra śūdrāś ca dhārmikāḥ
 nānāvṛṣṭibhayaṃ tatra na durbhikṣaṃ na vibhramaḥ
 dhārmiko yatra bhūpālo na tatrāsti parābhavaḥ
 utpātā na ca dṛśyante na divyā na ca mānuṣāḥ
a yasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu dharmam evānvavekṣase
c tasmāt prāpnuhi kaikeya gṛhān svasti vrajāmy aham
a yeṣāṃ gobrāhmaṇā rakṣyāḥ prajā rakṣyāś ca kekaya
c na rakṣobhyo bhayaṃ teṣāṃ kuta eva tu mānuṣāt
a yeṣāṃ purogamā viprā yeṣāṃ brahmabalaṃ balam
c priyātithyās tathā dārās te vai svargajito narāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tasmād dvijātīn rakṣeta te hi rakṣanti rakṣitāḥ
c āśīr eṣāṃ bhaved rājñāṃ rāṣṭraṃ samyak pravardhate
a tasmād rājñā viśeṣeṇa vikarmasthā dvijātayaḥ
c niyamyāḥ saṃvibhajyāś ca prajānugrahakāraṇāt
a ya evaṃ vartate rājā paurajānapadeṣv iha
c anubhūyeha bhadrāṇi prāpnotīndrasalokatām
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a vyākhyātā kṣatradharmeṇa vṛttir āpatsu bhārata
c kathaṃ cid vaiśyadharmeṇa jīved vā brāhmaṇo na vā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a aśaktaḥ kṣatradharmeṇa vaiśyadharmeṇa vartayet
c kṛṣigorakṣam āsthāya vyasane vṛttisaṃkṣaye
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kāni paṇyāni vikrīṇan svargalokān na hīyate
c brāhmaṇo vaiśyadharmeṇa vartayan bharatarṣabha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a surā lavaṇam ity eva tilān kesariṇaḥ paśūn
c ṛṣabhān madhu māṃsaṃ ca kṛtānnaṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
a sarvāsv avasthāsv etāni brāhmaṇaḥ parivarjayet
c eteṣāṃ vikrayāt tāta brāhmaṇo narakaṃ vrajet
a ajo 'gnir varuṇo meṣaḥ sūryo 'śvaḥ pṛthivī virāṭ
c dhenur yajñaś ca somaś ca na vikreyāḥ kathaṃ cana
a pakvenāmasya nimayaṃ na praśaṃsanti sādhavaḥ
c nimayet pakvam āmena bhojanārthāya bhārata
a vayaṃ siddham aśiṣyāmo bhavān sādhayatām idam
c evaṃ samīkṣya nimayan nādharmo 'sti kadā cana
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā dharmaḥ purātanaḥ
c vyavahārapravṛttānāṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a bhavate 'haṃ dadānīdaṃ bhavān etat prayacchatu
c rucite vartate dharmo na balāt saṃpravartate
a ity evaṃ saṃpravartanta vyavahārāḥ purātanāḥ
c ṛṣīṇām itareṣāṃ ca sādhu cedam asaṃśayam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a atha tāta yadā sarvāḥ śastram ādadate prajāḥ
c vyutkrāmanti svadharmebhyaḥ kṣatrasya kṣīyate balam
a rājā trātā na loke syāt kiṃ tadā syāt parāyaṇam
c etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi vistareṇa pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a dānena tapasā yajñair adroheṇa damena ca
c brāhmaṇapramukhā varṇāḥ kṣemam iccheyur ātmanaḥ
a teṣāṃ ye vedabalinas ta utthāya samantataḥ
c rājño balaṃ vardhayeyur mahendrasyeva devatāḥ
a rājño hi kṣīyamāṇasya brahmaivāhuḥ parāyaṇam
c tasmād brahmabalenaiva samuttheyaṃ vijānatā
a yadā tu vijayī rājā kṣemaṃ rāṣṭre 'bhisaṃdadhet
c tadā varṇā yathādharmam āviśeyuḥ svakarmasu
a unmaryāde pravṛtte tu dasyubhiḥ saṃkare kṛte
c sarve varṇā na duṣyeyuḥ śastravanto yudhiṣṭhira
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a atha cet sarvataḥ kṣatraṃ praduṣyed brāhmaṇān prati
c kas tasya brāhmaṇas trātā ko dharmaḥ kiṃ parāyaṇam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tapasā brahmacaryeṇa śastreṇa ca balena ca
c amāyayā māyayā ca niyantavyaṃ tadā bhavet
a kṣatrasyābhipravṛddhasya brāhmaṇeṣu viśeṣataḥ
c brahmaiva saṃniyantṛ syāt kṣatraṃ hi brahmasaṃbhavam
a adbhyo 'gnir brahmataḥ kṣatram aśmano loham utthitam
c teṣāṃ sarvatragaṃ tejaḥ svāsu yoniṣu śāmyati
a yadā chinatty ayo 'śmānam agniś cāpo 'bhipadyate
c kṣatraṃ ca brāhmaṇaṃ dveṣṭi tadā śāmyanti te trayaḥ
a tasmād brahmaṇi śāmyanti kṣatriyāṇāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c samudīrṇāny ajeyāni tejāṃsi ca balāni ca
a brahmavīrye mṛdūbhūte kṣatravīrye ca durbale
c duṣṭeṣu sarvavarṇeṣu brāhmaṇān prati sarvaśaḥ
a ye tatra yuddhaṃ kurvanti tyaktvā jīvitam ātmanaḥ
b brāhmaṇān parirakṣanti teṣāṃ lokā bhavanti ke
c brāhmaṇān parirakṣanto dharmam ātmānam eva ca
a manasvino manyumantaḥ puṇyalokā bhavanti te
c brāhmaṇārthaṃ hi sarveṣāṃ śastragrahaṇam iṣyate
a ati sviṣṭasvadhītānāṃ lokān ati tapasvinām
c anāśakāgnyor viśatāṃ śūrā yānti parāṃ gatim
e evam evātmanas tyāgān nānyaṃ dharmaṃ vidur janāḥ
a tebhyo namaś ca bhadraṃ ca ye śarīrāṇi juhvati
c brahmadviṣo niyacchantas teṣāṃ no 'stu salokatā
e brahmalokajitaḥ svargyān vīrāṃs tān manur abravīt
a yathāśvamedhāvabhṛthe snātāḥ pūtā bhavanty uta
c duṣkṛtaḥ sukṛtaś caiva tathā śastrahatā raṇe
a bhavaty adharmo dharmo hi dharmādharmāv ubhāv api
c kāraṇād deśakālasya deśakālaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ
a maitrāḥ krūrāṇi kurvanto jayanti svargam uttamam
c dharmyāḥ pāpāni kurvanto gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
a brāhmaṇas triṣu kāleṣu śastraṃ gṛhṇan na duṣyati
b ātmatrāṇaṃ ca kurvāṇaḥ parān dasyubhya eva ca
c ātmatrāṇe varṇadoṣe durgasya niyameṣu ca
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a abhyutthite dasyubale kṣatrārthe varṇasaṃkare
c saṃpramūḍheṣu varṇeṣu yady anyo 'bhibhaved balī
a brāhmaṇo yadi vā vaiśyaḥ śūdro vā rājasattama
c dasyubhyo 'tha prajā rakṣed daṇḍaṃ dharmeṇa dhārayan
a kāryaṃ kuryān na vā kuryāt saṃvāryo vā bhaven na vā
c na sma śastraṃ grahītavyam anyatra kṣatrabandhutaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a apāre yo bhavet pāram aplave yaḥ plavo bhavet
c śūdro vā yadi vāpy anyaḥ sarvathā mānam arhati
a yam āśritya narā rājan vartayeyur yathāsukham
c anāthāḥ pālyamānā vai dasyubhiḥ paripīḍitāḥ
a tam eva pūjayeraṃs te prītyā svam iva bāndhavam
c mahad dhy abhīkṣṇaṃ kauravya kartā sanmānam arhati
a kim ukṣṇāvahatā kṛtyaṃ kiṃ dhenvā cāpy adugdhayā
c vandhyayā bhāryayā ko 'rthaḥ ko 'rtho rājñāpy arakṣatā
a yathā dārumayo hastī yathā carmamayo mṛgaḥ
c yathā hy anetraḥ śakaṭaḥ pathi kṣetraṃ yathoṣaram
a evaṃ brahmānadhīyānaṃ rājā yaś ca na rakṣitā
c na varṣati ca yo meghaḥ sarva ete nirarthakāḥ
a nityaṃ yas tu sato rakṣed asataś ca nibarhayet
c sa eva rājā kartavyas tena sarvam idaṃ dhṛtam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kvasamutthāḥ kathaṃśīlā ṛtvijaḥ syuḥ pitāmaha
c kathaṃvidhāś ca rājendra tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
 bhīṣma uvāca
a pratikarma purācāra ṛtvijāṃ sma vidhīyate
c ādau chandāṃsi vijñāya dvijānāṃ śrutam eva ca
a ye tv ekaratayo nityaṃ dhīrā nāpriyavādinaḥ
c parasparasya suhṛdaḥ saṃmatāḥ samadarśinaḥ
a yeṣv ānṛśaṃsyaṃ satyaṃ cāpy ahiṃsā tapa ārjavam
c adroho nābhimānaś ca hrīs titikṣā damaḥ śamaḥ
d etair eva guṇair yuktāḥ kāryās te ṛtvijaḥ prabho
d yasminn etāni dṛśyante sa purohita ucyate
a hrīmān satyadhṛtir dānto bhūtānām avihiṃsakaḥ
c akāmadveṣasaṃyuktas tribhiḥ śuklaiḥ samanvitaḥ
a ahiṃsako jñānatṛptaḥ sa brahmāsanam arhati
c ete mahartvijas tāta sarve mānyā yathātatham
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ dakṣiṇāsu vidhīyate
c idaṃ deyam idaṃ deyaṃ na kva cid vyavatiṣṭhate
a nedaṃ prati dhanaṃ śāstram āpaddharmam aśāstrataḥ
c ājñā śāstrasya ghoreyaṃ na śaktiṃ samavekṣate
a śraddhām ārabhya yaṣṭavyam ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ
c mithyopetasya yajñasya kim u śraddhā kariṣyati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a na vedānāṃ paribhavān na śāṭhyena na māyayā
c kaś cin mahad avāpnoti mā te bhūd buddhir īdṛśī
a yajñāṅgaṃ dakṣiṇās tāta vedānāṃ paribṛṃhaṇam
c na mantrā dakṣiṇāhīnās tārayanti kathaṃ cana
a śaktis tu pūrṇapātreṇa saṃmitānavamā bhavet
c avaśyaṃ tāta yaṣṭavyaṃ tribhir varṇair yathāvidhi
a somo rājā brāhmaṇānām ity eṣā vaidikī śrutiḥ
c taṃ ca vikretum icchanti na vṛthā vṛttir iṣyate
e tena krītena dharmeṇa tato yajñaḥ pratāyate
a ity evaṃ dharmataḥ khyātam ṛṣibhir dharmavādibhiḥ
c pumān yajñaś ca somaś ca nyāyavṛtto yathā bhavet
e anyāyavṛttaḥ puruṣo na parasya na cātmanaḥ
a śarīraṃ yajñapātrāṇi ity eṣā śrūyate śrutiḥ
c tāni samyak praṇītāni brāhmaṇānāṃ mahātmanām
a tapo yajñād api śreṣṭham ity eṣā paramā śrutiḥ
c tat te tapaḥ pravakṣyāmi vidvaṃs tad api me śṛṇu
a ahiṃsā satyavacanam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ damo ghṛṇā
c etat tapo vidur dhīrā na śarīrasya śoṣaṇam
a aprāmāṇyaṃ ca vedānāṃ śāstrāṇāṃ cātilaṅghanam
c avyavasthā ca sarvatra tad vai nāśanam ātmanaḥ
a nibodha daśahotṝṇāṃ vidhānaṃ pārtha yādṛśam
c cittiḥ sruk cittam ājyaṃ ca pavitraṃ jñānam uttamam
d na śāṭhyaṃ na ca jihmatvaṃ kālo deśaś ca te daśa
a sarvaṃ jihmaṃ mṛtyupadam ārjavaṃ brahmaṇaḥ padam
c etāvāñ jñānaviṣayaḥ kiṃ pralāpaḥ kariṣyati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yad apy alpataraṃ karma tad apy ekena duṣkaram
c puruṣeṇāsahāyena kim u rājyaṃ pitāmaha
a kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāro rājño 'rthasacivo bhavet
c kīdṛśe viśvased rājā kīdṛśe nāpi viśvaset
 bhīṣma uvāca
a caturvidhāni mitrāṇi rājñāṃ rājan bhavanty uta
c sahārtho bhajamānaś ca sahajaḥ kṛtrimas tathā
a dharmātmā pañcamaṃ mitraṃ sa tu naikasya na dvayoḥ
c yato dharmas tato vā syān madhyastho vā tato bhavet
a yas tasyārtho na roceta na taṃ tasya prakāśayet
b mitrāṇāṃ prakṛtir nāsti tv amitrāṇāṃ ca bhārata
b upakārād bhaven mitram apakārād bhaved ariḥ
b yasyaiva hi manuṣyasya naro maraṇam icchati
b tasya paryāgate kāle punar jīvitam icchati
c dharmādharmeṇa rājānaś caranti vijigīṣavaḥ
a caturṇāṃ madhyamau śreṣṭhau nityaṃ śaṅkyau tathāparau
c sarve nityaṃ śaṅkitavyāḥ pratyakṣaṃ kāryam ātmanaḥ
a na hi rājñā pramādo vai kartavyo mitrarakṣaṇe
c pramādinaṃ hi rājānaṃ lokāḥ paribhavanty uta
a asādhuḥ sādhutām eti sādhur bhavati dāruṇaḥ
c ariś ca mitraṃ bhavati mitraṃ cāpi praduṣyati
a anityacittaḥ puruṣas tasmin ko jātu viśvaset
c tasmāt pradhānaṃ yat kāryaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tat samācaret
a ekāntena hi viśvāsaḥ kṛtsno dharmārthanāśakaḥ
c aviśvāsaś ca sarvatra mṛtyunā na viśiṣyate
a akālamṛtyur viśvāso viśvasan hi vipadyate
c yasmin karoti viśvāsam icchatas tasya jīvati
a tasmād viśvasitavyaṃ ca śaṅkitavyaṃ ca keṣu cit
c eṣā nītigatis tāta lakṣmīś caiva sanātanī
a yaṃ manyeta mamābhāvād imam arthāgamaḥ spṛśet
c nityaṃ tasmāc chaṅkitavyam amitraṃ taṃ vidur budhāḥ
a yasya kṣetrād apy udakaṃ kṣetram anyasya gacchati
c na tatrānicchatas tasya bhidyeran sarvasetavaḥ
a tathaivāty udakād bhītas tasya bhedanam icchati
c yam evaṃlakṣaṇaṃ vidyāt tam amitraṃ vinirdiśet
a yaḥ samṛddhyā na tuṣyeta kṣaye dīnataro bhavet
c etad uttamamitrasya nimittam abhicakṣate
a yaṃ manyeta mamābhāvād asyābhāvo bhaved iti
c tasmin kurvīta viśvāsaṃ yathā pitari vai tathā
a taṃ śaktyā vardhamānaś ca sarvataḥ paribṛṃhayet
c nityaṃ kṣatād vārayati yo dharmeṣv api karmasu
a kṣatād bhītaṃ vijānīyād uttamaṃ mitralakṣaṇam
c ye tasya kṣatam icchanti te tasya ripavaḥ smṛtāḥ
a vyasanān nityabhīto 'sau samṛddhyām eva tṛpyate
c yat syād evaṃvidhaṃ mitraṃ tad ātmasamam ucyate
a rūpavarṇasvaropetas titikṣur anasūyakaḥ
c kulīnaḥ śīlasaṃpannaḥ sa te syāt pratyanantaraḥ
a medhāvī smṛtimān dakṣaḥ prakṛtyā cānṛśaṃsavān
c yo mānito 'mānito vā na saṃdūṣyet kadā cana
a ṛtvig vā yadi vācāryaḥ sakhā vātyantasaṃstutaḥ
c gṛhe vased amātyas te yaḥ syāt paramapūjitaḥ
a sa te vidyāt paraṃ mantraṃ prakṛtiṃ cārthadharmayoḥ
c viśvāsas te bhavet tatra yathā pitari vai tathā
a naiva dvau na trayaḥ kāryā na mṛṣyeran parasparam
c ekārthād eva bhūtānāṃ bhedo bhavati sarvadā
a kīrtipradhāno yaś ca syād yaś ca syāt samaye sthitaḥ
c samarthān yaś ca na dveṣṭi samarthān kurute ca yaḥ
a yo na kāmād bhayāl lobhāt krodhād vā dharmam utsṛjet
c dakṣaḥ paryāptavacanaḥ sa te syāt pratyanantaraḥ
a śūraś cāryaś ca vidvāṃś ca pratipattiviśāradaḥ
c kulīnaḥ śīlasaṃpannas titikṣur anasūyakaḥ
a ete hy amātyāḥ kartavyāḥ sarvakarmasv avasthitāḥ
c pūjitāḥ saṃvibhaktāś ca susahāyāḥ svanuṣṭhitāḥ
a kṛtsnam ete vinikṣiptāḥ pratirūpeṣu karmasu
c yuktā mahatsu kāryeṣu śreyāṃsy utpādayanti ca
a ete karmāṇi kurvanti spardhamānā mithaḥ sadā
c anutiṣṭhanti caivārthān ācakṣāṇāḥ parasparam
a jñātibhyaś caiva bibhyethā mṛtyor iva yataḥ sadā
c uparājeva rājardhiṃ jñātir na sahate sadā
a ṛjor mṛdor vadānyasya hrīmataḥ satyavādinaḥ
c nānyo jñāter mahābāho vināśam abhinandati
a ajñātitā nātisukhā nāvajñeyās tv ataḥ param
c ajñātimantaṃ puruṣaṃ pare paribhavanty uta
a nikṛtasya narair anyair jñātir eva parāyaṇam
c nānyair nikāraṃ sahate jñāter jñātiḥ kadā cana
a ātmānam eva jānāti nikṛtaṃ bāndhavair api
c teṣu santi guṇāś caiva nairguṇyaṃ teṣu lakṣyate
a nājñātir anugṛhṇāti nājñātir digdham asyati
c ubhayaṃ jñātilokeṣu dṛśyate sādhv asādhu ca
a tān mānayet pūjayec ca nityaṃ vācā ca karmaṇā
c kuryāc ca priyam etebhyo nāpriyaṃ kiṃ cid ācaret
a viśvastavad aviśvastas teṣu varteta sarvadā
c na hi doṣo guṇo veti nispṛktas teṣu dṛśyate
a tasyaivaṃ vartamānasya puruṣasyāpramādinaḥ
c amitrāḥ saṃprasīdanti tathā mitrībhavanty api
a ya evaṃ vartate nityaṃ jñātisaṃbandhimaṇḍale
c mitreṣv amitreṣv aiśvarye ciraṃ yaśasi tiṣṭhati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a evam agrāhyake tasmiñ jñātisaṃbandhimaṇḍale
c mitreṣv amitreṣv api ca kathaṃ bhāvo vibhāvyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c vāsudevasya saṃvādaṃ surarṣer nāradasya ca
 vāsudeva uvāca
a nāsuhṛt paramaṃ mantraṃ nāradārhati veditum
c apaṇḍito vāpi suhṛt paṇḍito vāpi nātmavān
a sa te sauhṛdam āsthāya kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi nārada
c kṛtsnāṃ ca buddhiṃ saṃprekṣya saṃpṛcche tridivaṃgama
a dāsyam aiśvaryavādena jñātīnāṃ vai karomy aham
c ardhabhoktāsmi bhogānāṃ vāgduruktāni ca kṣame
a araṇīm agnikāmo vā mathnāti hṛdayaṃ mama
c vācā duruktaṃ devarṣe tan me dahati nityadā
a balaṃ saṃkarṣaṇe nityaṃ saukumāryaṃ punar gade
c rūpeṇa mattaḥ pradyumnaḥ so 'sahāyo 'smi nārada
a anye hi sumahābhāgā balavanto durāsadāḥ
c nityotthānena saṃpannā nāradāndhakavṛṣṇayaḥ
a yasya na syur na vai sa syād yasya syuḥ kṛcchram eva tat
c dvābhyāṃ nivārito nityaṃ vṛṇomy ekataraṃ na ca
a syātāṃ yasyāhukākrūrau kiṃ nu duḥkhataraṃ tataḥ
c yasya vāpi na tau syātāṃ kiṃ nu duḥkhataraṃ tataḥ
a so 'haṃ kitavamāteva dvayor api mahāmune
c ekasya jayam āśaṃse dvitīyasyāparājayam
a mamaivaṃ kliśyamānasya nāradobhayataḥ sadā
c vaktum arhasi yac chreyo jñātīnām ātmanas tathā
 nārada uvāca
a āpado dvividhāḥ kṛṣṇa bāhyāś cābhyantarāś ca ha
c prādurbhavanti vārṣṇeya svakṛtā yadi vānyataḥ
a seyam ābhyantarā tubhyam āpat kṛcchrā svakarmajā
c akrūrabhojaprabhavāḥ sarve hy ete tadanvayāḥ
a arthahetor hi kāmād vādvārā bībhatsayāpi vā
c ātmanā prāptam aiśvaryam anyatra pratipāditam
a kṛtamūlam idānīṃ taj jātaśabdaṃ sahāyavat
c na śakyaṃ punar ādātuṃ vāntam annam iva tvayā
a babhrūgrasenayo rājyaṃ nāptuṃ śakyaṃ kathaṃ cana
c jñātibhedabhayāt kṛṣṇa tvayā cāpi viśeṣataḥ
a tac cet sidhyet prayatnena kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram
c mahākṣayavyayaṃ vā syād vināśo vā punar bhavet
a anāyasena śastreṇa mṛdunā hṛdayacchidā
c jihvām uddhara sarveṣāṃ parimṛjyānumṛjya ca
 vāsudeva uvāca
a anāyasaṃ mune śastraṃ mṛdu vidyām ahaṃ katham
c yenaiṣām uddhare jihvāṃ parimṛjyānumṛjya ca
 nārada uvāca
a śaktyānnadānaṃ satataṃ titikṣā dama ārjavam
c yathārhapratipūjā ca śastram etad anāyasam
a jñātīnāṃ vaktukāmānāṃ kaṭūni ca laghūni ca
c girā tvaṃ hṛdayaṃ vācaṃ śamayasva manāṃsi ca
a nāmahāpuruṣaḥ kaś cin nānātmā nāsahāyavān
c mahatīṃ dhuram ādatte tām udyamyorasā vaha
a sarva eva guruṃ bhāram anaḍvān vahate same
c durge pratīkaḥ sugavo bhāraṃ vahati durvaham
a bhedād vināśaḥ saṃghānāṃ saṃghamukhyo 'si keśava
c yathā tvāṃ prāpya notsīded ayaṃ saṃghas tathā kuru
a nānyatra buddhikṣāntibhyāṃ nānyatrendriyanigrahāt
c nānyatra dhanasaṃtyāgād gaṇaḥ prājñe 'vatiṣṭhate
a dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ svapakṣodbhāvanaṃ śubham
c jñātīnām avināśaḥ syād yathā kṛṣṇa tathā kuru
a āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca na te 'sty aviditaṃ prabho
c ṣāḍguṇyasya vidhānena yātrāyānavidhau tathā
a mādhavāḥ kukurā bhojāḥ sarve cāndhakavṛṣṇayaḥ
c tvayy āsaktā mahābāho lokā lokeśvarāś ca ye
a upāsate hi tvadbuddhim ṛṣayaś cāpi mādhava
c tvaṃ guruḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ jānīṣe tvaṃ gatāgatam
e tvām āsādya yaduśreṣṭham edhante jñātinaḥ sukham
 bhīṣma uvāca
a eṣā prathamato vṛttir dvitīyāṃ śṛṇu bhārata
c yaḥ kaś cij janayed arthaṃ rājñā rakṣyaḥ sa mānavaḥ
a hriyamāṇam amātyena bhṛto vā yadi vābhṛtaḥ
c yo rājakośaṃ naśyantam ācakṣīta yudhiṣṭhira
a śrotavyaṃ tasya ca raho rakṣyaś cāmātyato bhavet
c amātyā hy upahantāraṃ bhūyiṣṭhaṃ ghnanti bhārata
a rājakośasya goptāraṃ rājakośavilopakāḥ
c sametya sarve bādhante sa vinaśyaty arakṣitaḥ
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c muniḥ kālakavṛkṣīyaḥ kausalyaṃ yad uvāca ha
a kosalānām ādhipatyaṃ saṃprāpte kṣemadarśini
c muniḥ kālakavṛkṣīya ājagāmeti naḥ śrutam
a sa kākaṃ pañjare baddhvā viṣayaṃ kṣemadarśinaḥ
c pūrvaṃ paryacarad yuktaḥ pravṛttyarthī punaḥ punaḥ
a adhīye vāyasīṃ vidyāṃ śaṃsanti mama vāyasāḥ
c anāgatam atītaṃ ca yac ca saṃprati vartate
a iti rāṣṭre paripatan bahuśaḥ puruṣaiḥ saha
c sarveṣāṃ rājayuktānāṃ duṣkṛtaṃ paripṛṣṭavān
a sa buddhvā tasya rāṣṭrasya vyavasāyaṃ hi sarvaśaḥ
c rājayuktāpacārāṃś ca sarvān buddhvā tatas tataḥ
a tam eva kākam ādāya rājānaṃ draṣṭum āgamat
c sarvajño 'smīti vacanaṃ bruvāṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
a sa sma kausalyam āgamya rājāmātyam alaṃkṛtam
c prāha kākasya vacanād amutredaṃ tvayā kṛtam
a asau cāsau ca jānīte rājakośas tvayā hṛtaḥ
c evam ākhyāti kāko 'yaṃ tac chīghram anugamyatām
a tathānyān api sa prāha rājakośaharān sadā
c na cāsya vacanaṃ kiṃ cid akṛtaṃ śrūyate kva cit
a tena viprakṛtāḥ sarve rājayuktāḥ kurūdvaha
c tam atikramya suptasya niśi kākam apothayan
a vāyasaṃ tu vinirbhinnaṃ dṛṣṭvā bāṇena pañjare
c pūrvāhṇe brāhmaṇo vākyaṃ kṣemadarśinam abravīt
a rājaṃs tvām abhayaṃ yāce prabhuṃ prāṇadhaneśvaram
c anujñātas tvayā brūyāṃ vacanaṃ tvatpuro hitam
a mitrārtham abhisaṃtapto bhaktyā sarvātmanā gataḥ
c ayaṃ tavārthaṃ harate yo brūyād akṣamānvitaḥ
d hriyate hi mahārthaś ca puruṣe vikramaty api
a saṃbubodhayiṣur mitraṃ sadaśvam iva sārathiḥ
c atimanyuprasakto hi prasajya hitakāraṇam
a tathāvidhasya suhṛdaḥ kṣantavyaṃ saṃvijānatā
c aiśvaryam icchatā nityaṃ puruṣeṇa bubhūṣatā
a taṃ rājā pratyuvācedaṃ yan mā kiṃ cid bhavān vadet
c kasmād ahaṃ na kṣameyam ākāṅkṣann ātmano hitam
a brāhmaṇa pratijānīhi prabrūhi yadi cecchasi
c kariṣyāmi hi te vākyaṃ yad yan māṃ vipra vakṣyasi
 munir uvāca
a jñātvā nayān apāyāṃś ca bhṛtyatas te bhayāni ca
c bhaktyā vṛttiṃ samākhyātuṃ bhavato 'ntikam āgamam
a prāg evoktaś ca doṣo 'yam ācāryair nṛpasevinām
c agatīkagatir hy eṣā yā rājñā saha jīvikā
a āśīviṣaiś ca tasyāhuḥ saṃgataṃ yasya rājabhiḥ
c bahumitrāś ca rājāno bahvamitrās tathaiva ca
a tebhyaḥ sarvebhya evāhur bhayaṃ rājopasevinām
c athaiṣām ekato rājan muhūrtād eva bhīr bhavet
a naikāntenāpramādo hi kartuṃ śakyo mahīpatau
c na tu pramādaḥ kartavyaḥ kathaṃ cid bhūtim icchatā
a pramādād dhi skhaled rājā skhalite nāsti jīvitam
c agniṃ dīptam ivāsīded rājānam upaśikṣitaḥ
a āśīviṣam iva kruddhaṃ prabhuṃ prāṇadhaneśvaram
c yatnenopacaren nityaṃ nāham asmīti mānavaḥ
a durvyāhṛtāc chaṅkamāno duṣkṛtād duradhiṣṭhitāt
c durāsitād durvrajitād iṅgitād aṅgaceṣṭitāt
a devateva hi sarvārthān kuryād rājā prasāditaḥ
c vaiśvānara iva kruddhaḥ samūlam api nirdahet
e iti rājan mayaḥ prāha vartate ca tathaiva tat
a atha bhūyāṃsam evārthaṃ kariṣyāmi punaḥ punaḥ
c dadāty asmadvidho 'mātyo buddhisāhāyyam āpadi
a vāyasaś caiva me rājann antakāyābhisaṃhitaḥ
c na ca me 'tra bhavān garhyo na ca yeṣāṃ bhavān priyaḥ
e hitāhitāṃs tu budhyethā mā parokṣamatir bhava
a ye tv ādānaparā eva vasanti bhavato gṛhe
c abhūtikāmā bhūtānāṃ tādṛśair me 'bhisaṃhitam
a ye vā bhavadvināśena rājyam icchanty anantaram
c antarair abhisaṃdhāya rājan sidhyanti nānyathā
a teṣām ahaṃ bhayād rājan gamiṣyāmy anyam āśramam
c tair hi me saṃdhito bāṇaḥ kāke nipatitaḥ prabho
a chadmanā mama kākaś ca gamito yamasādanam
c dṛṣṭaṃ hy etan mayā rājaṃs tapodīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā
a bahunakrajhaṣagrāhāṃ timiṃgilagaṇāyutām
c kākena baḍiśenemām atārṣaṃ tvām ahaṃ nadīm
a sthāṇvaśmakaṇṭakavatīṃ vyāghrasiṃhagajākulām
c durāsadāṃ duṣpraveśāṃ guhāṃ haimavatīm iva
a agninā tāmasaṃ durgaṃ naubhir āpyaṃ ca gamyate
c rājadurgāvataraṇe nopāyaṃ paṇḍitā viduḥ
a gahanaṃ bhavato rājyam andhakāratamovṛtam
c neha viśvasituṃ śakyaṃ bhavatāpi kuto mayā
a ato nāyaṃ śubho vāsas tulye sadasatī iha
c vadho hy evātra sukṛte duṣkṛte na ca saṃśayaḥ
a nyāyato duṣkṛte ghātaḥ sukṛte syāt kathaṃ vadhaḥ
c neha yuktaṃ ciraṃ sthātuṃ javenāto vrajed budhaḥ
a sītā nāma nadī rājan plavo yasyāṃ nimajjati
c tathopamām imāṃ manye vāgurāṃ sarvaghātinīm
a madhuprapāto hi bhavān bhojanaṃ viṣasaṃyutam
c asatām iva te bhāvo vartate na satām iva
e āśīviṣaiḥ parivṛtaḥ kūpas tvam iva pārthiva
f kriyāvṛttiḥ parivṛtaḥ kva vā gacchati duḥkhitaḥ
f tathāhaṃ kākaghātena kṛtas tvam asi pārthiva
a durgatīrthā bṛhatkūlā karīrīvetrasaṃyutā
c nadī madhurapānīyā yathā rājaṃs tathā bhavān
e śvagṛdhragomāyuyuto rājahaṃsasamo hy asi
a yathāśritya mahāvṛkṣaṃ kakṣaḥ saṃvardhate mahān
c tatas taṃ saṃvṛṇoty eva tam atītya ca vardhate
a tenaivopendhano nūnaṃ dāvo dahati dāruṇaḥ
c tathopamā hy amātyās te rājaṃs tān pariśodhaya
a bhavataiva kṛtā rājan bhavatā paripālitāḥ
c bhavantaṃ paryavajñāya jighāṃsanti bhavatpriyam
a uṣitaṃ śaṅkamānena pramādaṃ parirakṣatā
c antaḥsarpa ivāgāre vīrapatnyā ivālaye
e śīlaṃ jijñāsamānena rājñaś ca sahajīvinā
a kaccij jitendriyo rājā kaccid abhyantarā jitāḥ
c kaccid eṣāṃ priyo rājā kaccid rājñaḥ priyāḥ prajāḥ
a jijñāsur iha saṃprāptas tavāhaṃ rājasattama
c tasya me rocase rājan kṣudhitasyeva bhojanam
a amātyā me na rocante vitṛṣṇasya yathodakam
c bhavato 'rthakṛd ity eva mayi doṣo hi taiḥ kṛtaḥ
e vidyate kāraṇaṃ nānyad iti me nātra saṃśayaḥ
a na hi teṣām ahaṃ drugdhas tat teṣāṃ doṣavad gatam
c arer hi durhatād bheyaṃ bhagnapṛṣṭhād ivoragāt
 rājovāca
a bhūyasā paribarheṇa satkāreṇa ca bhūyasā
c pūjito brāhmaṇaśreṣṭha bhūyo vasa gṛhe mama
a ye tvāṃ brāhmaṇa necchanti na te vatsyanti me gṛhe
c bhavataiva hi taj jñeyaṃ yad idānīm anantaram
a yathā syād duṣkṛto daṇḍo yathā ca sukṛtaṃ kṛtam
c tathā samīkṣya bhagavañ śreyase viniyuṅkṣva mām
 munir uvāca
a adarśayann imaṃ doṣam ekaikaṃ durbalaṃ kuru
c tataḥ kāraṇam ājñāya puruṣaṃ puruṣaṃ jahi
a ekadoṣā hi bahavo mṛdnīyur api kaṇṭakān
b arthe sarvaṃ jagad baddham arthena ca nibadhyate
b arthe darpo manuṣyāṇāṃ tasmād arthaṃ virocaya
b ekenaikasya doṣeṇa tad viruddhaṃ pracodaya
b sa tasya doṣān udbhāvya tasyārthaṃ grāhayiṣyati
b sāmapūrvaṃ ca keṣāṃ cid bhedena ca parasparam
b vairaṃ kāraya bhūpāla paścād daṇḍaṃ prayojaya
b bilvena ca yathā bilvam ākāraṃ chādya buddhimān
b aśuddhaṃ sacivaṃ rājann aśuddhenaiva nāśaya
c mantrabhedabhayād rājaṃs tasmād etad bravīmi te
a vayaṃ tu brāhmaṇā nāma mṛdudaṇḍāḥ kṛpālavaḥ
c svasti cecchāmi bhavataḥ pareṣāṃ ca yathātmanaḥ
a rājann ātmānam ācakṣe saṃbandhī bhavato hy aham
c muniḥ kālakavṛkṣīya ity evam abhisaṃjñitaḥ
a pituḥ sakhā ca bhavataḥ saṃmataḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
c vyāpanne bhavato rājye rājan pitari saṃsthite
a sarvakāmān parityajya tapas taptaṃ tadā mayā
c snehāt tvāṃ prabravīmy etan mā bhūyo vibhramed iti
a ubhe dṛṣṭvā duḥkhasukhe rājyaṃ prāpya yadṛcchayā
c rājyenāmātyasaṃsthena kathaṃ rājan pramādyasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato rājakule nāndī saṃjajñe bhūyasī punaḥ
c purohitakule caiva saṃprāpte brāhmaṇarṣabhe
a ekacchatrāṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā kausalyāya yaśasvine
c muniḥ kālakavṛkṣīya īje kratubhir uttamaiḥ
a hitaṃ tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kausalyo 'nvaśiṣan mahīm
c tathā ca kṛtavān rājā yathoktaṃ tena bhārata
 bhīṣma uvāca
a hrīniṣedhāḥ sadā santaḥ satyārjavasamanvitāḥ
c śaktāḥ kathayituṃ samyak te tava syuḥ sabhāsadaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d sabhāsadaḥ sahāyāś ca suhṛdaś ca viśāṃ pate
d paricchadās tathāmātyāḥ kīdṛśāḥ syuḥ pitāmaha
a atyāḍhyāṃś cātiśūrāṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś ca bahuśrutān
c susaṃtuṣṭāṃś ca kaunteya mahotsāhāṃś ca karmasu
a etān sahāyāṃl lipsethāḥ sarvāsv āpatsu bhārata
c kulīnaḥ pūjito nityaṃ na hi śaktiṃ nigūhati
a prasannaṃ hy aprasannaṃ vā pīḍitaṃ hṛtam eva vā
c āvartayati bhūyiṣṭhaṃ tad eko hy anupālitaḥ
a kulīnā deśajāḥ prājñā rūpavanto bahuśrutāḥ
c pragalbhāś cānuraktāś ca te tava syuḥ paricchadāḥ
a dauṣkuleyāś ca lubdhāś ca nṛśaṃsā nirapatrapāḥ
c te tvāṃ tāta niṣeveyur yāvad ārdrakapāṇayaḥ
a arthamānārghyasatkārair bhogair uccāvacaiḥ priyān
c yān arthabhājo manyethās te te syuḥ sukhabhāginaḥ
a abhinnavṛttā vidvāṃsaḥ sadvṛttāś caritavratāḥ
c na tvāṃ nityārthino jahyur akṣudrāḥ satyavādinaḥ
a anāryā ye na jānanti samayaṃ mandacetasaḥ
b paricchadās tathāmātyā nedṛśāḥ syuḥ kathaṃ cana
c tebhyaḥ pratijugupsethā jānīyāḥ samayacyutān
a naikam icched gaṇaṃ hitvā syāc ced anyataragrahaḥ
c yas tv eko bahubhiḥ śreyān kāmaṃ tena gaṇaṃ tyajet
a śreyaso lakṣaṇaṃ hy etad vikramo yasya dṛśyate
c kīrtipradhāno yaś ca syāt samaye yaś ca tiṣṭhati
a samarthān pūjayed yaś ca nāspardhyaiḥ spardhate ca yaḥ
c na ca kāmād bhayāt krodhāl lobhād vā dharmam utsṛjet
a amānī satyavāk śakto jitātmā mānyamānitā
c sa te mantrasahāyaḥ syāt sarvāvasthaṃ parīkṣitaḥ
a kulīnaḥ satyasaṃpannas titikṣur dakṣa ātmavān
c śūraḥ kṛtajñaḥ satyaś ca śreyasaḥ pārtha lakṣaṇam
a tasyaivaṃ vartamānasya puruṣasya vijānataḥ
c amitrāḥ saṃprasīdanti tato mitrībhavanty api
a ata ūrdhvam amātyānāṃ parīkṣeta guṇāguṇān
c saṃyatātmā kṛtaprajño bhūtikāmaś ca bhūmipaḥ
a saṃbaddhāḥ puruṣair āptair abhijātaiḥ svadeśajaiḥ
c ahāryair avyabhīcāraiḥ sarvataḥ suparīkṣitaiḥ
a yodhāḥ srauvās tathā maulās tathaivānye 'py avaskṛtāḥ
c kartavyā bhūtikāmena puruṣeṇa bubhūṣatā
a yeṣāṃ vainayikī buddhiḥ prakṛtā caiva śobhanā
c tejo dhairyaṃ kṣamā śaucam anurāga sthitir dhṛtiḥ
a parīkṣitaguṇān nityaṃ prauḍhabhāvān dhuraṃdharān
c pañcopadhāvyatītāṃś ca kuryād rājārthakāriṇaḥ
a paryāptavacanān vīrān pratipattiviśāradān
c kulīnān satyasaṃpannān iṅgitajñān aniṣṭhurān
a deśakālavidhānajñān bhartṛkāryahitaiṣiṇaḥ
c nityam artheṣu sarveṣu rājā kurvīta mantriṇaḥ
a hīnatejā hy asaṃhṛṣṭo naiva jātu vyavasyati
c avaśyaṃ janayaty eva sarvakarmasu saṃśayān
a evam alpaśruto mantrī kalyāṇābhijano 'py uta
c dharmārthakāmayukto 'pi nālaṃ mantraṃ parīkṣitum
a tathaivānabhijāto 'pi kāmam astu bahuśrutaḥ
c anāyaka ivācakṣur muhyaty ūhyeṣu karmasu
a yo vā hy asthirasaṃkalpo buddhimān āgatāgamaḥ
c upāyajño 'pi nālaṃ sa karma yāpayituṃ ciram
a kevalāt punar ācārāt karmaṇo nopapadyate
c parimarśo viśeṣāṇām aśrutasyeha durmateḥ
a mantriṇy ananurakte tu viśvāso na hi vidyate
c tasmād ananuraktāya naiva mantraṃ prakāśayet
a vyathayed dhi sa rājānaṃ mantribhiḥ sahito 'nṛjuḥ
c mārutopahatacchidraiḥ praviśyāgnir iva drumam
a saṃkrudhyaty ekadā svāmī sthānāc caivāpakarṣati
c vācā kṣipati saṃrabdhas tataḥ paścāt prasīdati
a tāni tāny anuraktena śakyāny anutitikṣitum
c mantriṇāṃ ca bhavet krodho visphūrjitam ivāśaneḥ
a yas tu saṃharate tāni bhartuḥ priyacikīrṣayā
c samānasukhaduḥkhaṃ taṃ pṛcched artheṣu mānavam
a anṛjus tv anurakto 'pi saṃpannaś cetarair guṇaiḥ
c rājñaḥ prajñānayukto 'pi na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
a yo 'mitraiḥ saha saṃbaddho na paurān bahu manyate
c sa suhṛt tādṛśo rājño na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
a avidvān aśuciḥ stabdhaḥ śatrusevī vikatthanaḥ
c sa suhṛt krodhano lubdho na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
a āgantuś cānurakto 'pi kāmam astu bahuśrutaḥ
c satkṛtaḥ saṃvibhakto vā na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
d vidharmato viprakṛtaḥ pitā yasyābhavat purā
d satkṛtaḥ sthāpitaḥ so 'pi na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
a yas tv alpenāpi kāryeṇa sakṛd ākṣārito bhavet
c punar anyair guṇair yukto na mantraṃ śrotum arhati
a kṛtaprajñaś ca medhāvī budho jānapadaḥ śuciḥ
c sarvakarmasu yaḥ śuddhaḥ sa mantraṃ śrotum arhati
a jñānavijñānasaṃpannaḥ prakṛtijñaḥ parātmanoḥ
c suhṛd ātmasamo rājñaḥ sa mantraṃ śrotum arhati
a satyavāk śīlasaṃpanno gambhīraḥ satrapo mṛduḥ
c pitṛpaitāmaho yaḥ syāt sa mantraṃ śrotum arhati
a saṃtuṣṭaḥ saṃmataḥ satyaḥ śauṭīro dveṣyapāpakaḥ
c mantravit kālavic chūraḥ sa mantraṃ śrotum arhati
a sarvalokaṃ samaṃ śaktaḥ sāntvena kurute vaśe
c tasmai mantraḥ prayoktavyo daṇḍam ādhitsatā nṛpa
a paurajānapadā yasmin viśvāsaṃ dharmato gatāḥ
c yoddhā nayavipaścic ca sa mantraṃ śrotum arhati
a tasmāt sarvair guṇair etair upapannāḥ supūjitāḥ
c mantriṇaḥ prakṛtijñāḥ syus tryavarā mahad īpsavaḥ
a svāsu prakṛtiṣu chidraṃ lakṣayeran parasya ca
c mantriṇo mantramūlaṃ hi rājño rāṣṭraṃ vivardhate
a nāsya chidraṃ paraḥ paśyec chidreṣu param anviyāt
c gūhet kūrma ivāṅgāni rakṣed vivaram ātmanaḥ
a mantragrāhā hi rājyasya mantriṇo ye manīṣiṇaḥ
c mantrasaṃhanano rājā mantrāṅgānītaro janaḥ
a rājyaṃ praṇidhimūlaṃ hi mantrasāraṃ pracakṣate
c svāminaṃ tv anuvartanti vṛttyartham iha mantriṇaḥ
a sa vinīya madakrodhau mānam īrṣyāṃ ca nirvṛtaḥ
c nityaṃ pañcopadhātītair mantrayet saha mantribhiḥ
a teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ vividhaṃ vimarśaṃ
budhyeta cittaṃ viniveśya tatra
c svaniścayaṃ taṃ paraniścayaṃ ca
nivedayed uttaramantrakāle
a dharmārthakāmajñam upetya pṛcched
yukto guruṃ brāhmaṇam uttamārtham
c niṣṭhā kṛtā tena yadā saha syāt
taṃ tatra mārgaṃ praṇayed asaktam
a evaṃ sadā mantrayitavyam āhur
ye mantratattvārthaviniścayajñāḥ
c tasmāt tvam evaṃ praṇayeḥ sadaiva
mantraṃ prajāsaṃgrahaṇe samartham
a na vāmanāḥ kubjakṛśā na khañjā
nāndhā jaḍāḥ strī na napuṃsakaṃ ca
c na cātra tiryaṅ na puro na paścān
nordhvaṃ na cādhaḥ pracareta kaś cit
a āruhya vātāyanam eva śūnyaṃ
sthalaṃ prakāśaṃ kuśakāśahīnam
c vāgaṅgadoṣān parihṛtya mantraṃ
saṃmantrayet kāryam ahīnakālam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c bṛhaspateś ca saṃvādaṃ śakrasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
 śakra uvāca
a kiṃ svid ekapadaṃ brahman puruṣaḥ samyag ācaran
c pramāṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaśaś caivāpnuyān mahat
 bṛhaspatir uvāca
a sāntvam ekapadaṃ śakra puruṣaḥ samyag ācaran
c pramāṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaśaś caivāpnuyān mahat
a etad ekapadaṃ śakra sarvalokasukhāvaham
c ācaran sarvabhūteṣu priyo bhavati sarvadā
a yo hi nābhāṣate kiṃ cit satataṃ bhrukuṭīmukhaḥ
c dveṣyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ sa sāntvam iha nācaran
a yas tu pūrvam abhiprekṣya pūrvam evābhibhāṣate
c smitapūrvābhibhāṣī ca tasya lokaḥ prasīdati
a dānam eva hi sarvatra sāntvenānabhijalpitam
c na prīṇayati bhūtāni nirvyañjanam ivāśanam
a adātā hy api bhūtānāṃ madhurām īrayan giram
c sarvalokam imaṃ śakra sāntvena kurute vaśe
a tasmāt sāntvaṃ prakartavyaṃ daṇḍam ādhitsatām iha
c phalaṃ ca janayaty evaṃ na cāsyodvijate janaḥ
a sukṛtasya hi sāntvasya ślakṣṇasya madhurasya ca
c samyag āsevyamānasya tulyaṃ jātu na vidyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ kṛtavān sarvaṃ tathā śakraḥ purodhasā
c tathā tvam api kaunteya samyag etat samācara
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ svid iha rājendra pālayan pārthivaḥ prajāḥ
c prati dharmaṃ viśeṣeṇa kīrtim āpnoti śāśvatīm
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vyavahāreṇa śuddhena prajāpālanatatparaḥ
c prāpya dharmaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca lokāv āpnoty ubhau śuciḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kīdṛśaṃ vyavahāraṃ tu kaiś ca vyavaharen nṛpaḥ
c etat pṛṣṭo mahāprājña yathāvad vaktum arhasi
a ye caite pūrvakathitā guṇās te puruṣaṃ prati
c naikasmin puruṣe hy ete vidyanta iti me matiḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam etan mahāprājña yathā vadasi buddhimān
c durlabhaḥ puruṣaḥ kaś cid ebhir guṇaguṇair yutaḥ
a kiṃ tu saṃkṣepataḥ śīlaṃ prayatne neha durlabham
c vakṣyāmi tu yathāmātyān yādṛśāṃś ca kariṣyasi
a caturo brāhmaṇān vaidyān pragalbhān sāttvikāñ śucīn
b kṣatriyān daśa vāṣṭau vā balinaḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ
b vaiśyān vittena saṃpannān ekaviṃśatisaṃkhyayā
c trīṃś ca śūdrān vinītāṃś ca śucīn karmaṇi pūrvake
a aṣṭābhiś ca guṇair yuktaṃ sūtaṃ paurāṇikaṃ caret
c pañcāśadvarṣavayasaṃ pragalbham anasūyakam
a matismṛtisamāyuktaṃ vinītaṃ samadarśanam
c kārye vivadamānānāṃ śaktam artheṣv alolupam
a vivarjitānāṃ vyasanaiḥ sughoraiḥ saptabhir bhṛśam
c aṣṭānāṃ mantriṇāṃ madhye mantraṃ rājopadhārayet
a tataḥ saṃpreṣayed rāṣṭre rāṣṭrāyātha ca darśayet
c anena vyavahāreṇa draṣṭavyās te prajāḥ sadā
a na cāpi gūḍhaṃ kāryaṃ te grāhyaṃ kāryopaghātakam
c kārye khalu vipanne tvāṃ so 'dharmas tāṃś ca pīḍayet
a vidravec caiva rāṣṭraṃ te śyenāt pakṣigaṇā iva
c parisravec ca satataṃ naur viśīrṇeva sāgare
a prajāḥ pālayato 'samyag adharmeṇeha bhūpateḥ
c hārdaṃ bhayaṃ saṃbhavati svargaś cāsya virudhyate
a atha yo 'dharmataḥ pāti rājāmātyo 'tha vātmajaḥ
c dharmāsane niyuktaḥ san dharmamūlaṃ nararṣabha
d svargaṃ yāti mahīpālo niyuktaiḥ sacivaiḥ saha
a kāryeṣv adhikṛtāḥ samyag akurvanto nṛpānugāḥ
c ātmānaṃ purataḥ kṛtvā yānty adhaḥ sahapārthivāḥ
a balātkṛtānāṃ balibhiḥ kṛpaṇaṃ bahu jalpatām
c nātho vai bhūmipo nityam anāthānāṃ nṛṇāṃ bhavet
a tataḥ sākṣibalaṃ sādhu dvaidhe vādakṛtaṃ bhavet
c asākṣikam anāthaṃ vā parīkṣyaṃ tad viśeṣataḥ
a aparādhānurūpaṃ ca daṇḍaṃ pāpeṣu pātayet
c udvejayed dhanair ṛddhān daridrān vadhabandhanaiḥ
a vinayair api durvṛttān prahārair api pārthivaḥ
c sāntvenopapradānena śiṣṭāṃś ca paripālayet
a rājño vadhaṃ cikīrṣed yas tasya citro vadho bhavet
c ājīvakasya stenasya varṇasaṃkarakasya ca
a samyak praṇayato daṇḍaṃ bhūmipasya viśāṃ pate
c yuktasya vā nāsty adharmo dharma eveha śāśvataḥ
a kāmakāreṇa daṇḍaṃ tu yaḥ kuryād avicakṣaṇaḥ
c sa ihākīrtisaṃyukto mṛto narakam āpnuyāt
a na parasya śravād eva pareṣāṃ daṇḍam arpayet
c āgamānugamaṃ kṛtvā badhnīyān mokṣayeta vā
a na tu hanyān nṛpo jātu dūtaṃ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
c dūtasya hantā nirayam āviśet sacivaiḥ saha
a yathoktavādinaṃ dūtaṃ kṣatradharmarato nṛpaḥ
c yo hanyāt pitaras tasya bhrūṇahatyām avāpnuyuḥ
a kulīnaḥ śīlasaṃpanno vāgmī dakṣaḥ priyaṃvadaḥ
c yathoktavādī smṛtimān dūtaḥ syāt saptabhir guṇaiḥ
a etair eva guṇair yuktaḥ pratīhāro 'sya rakṣitā
c śirorakṣaś ca bhavati guṇair etaiḥ samanvitaḥ
a dharmārthaśāstratattvajñaḥ saṃdhivigrahako bhavet
c matimān dhṛtimān dhīmān rahasyavinigūhitā
a kulīnaḥ satyasaṃpannaḥ śakto 'mātyaḥ praśaṃsitaḥ
c etair eva guṇair yuktas tathā senāpatir bhavet
a vyūhayantrāyudhīyānāṃ tattvajño vikramānvitaḥ
c varṣaśītoṣṇavātānāṃ sahiṣṇuḥ pararandhravit
a viśvāsayet parāṃś caiva viśvasen na tu kasya cit
c putreṣv api hi rājendra viśvāso na praśasyate
a etac chāstrārthatattvaṃ tu tavākhyātaṃ mayānagha
c aviśvāso narendrāṇāṃ guhyaṃ paramam ucyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃvidhaṃ puraṃ rājā svayam āvastum arhati
c kṛtaṃ vā kārayitvā vā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yatra kaunteya vastavyaṃ saputrabhrātṛbandhunā
c nyāyyaṃ tatra paripraṣṭuṃ guptiṃ vṛttiṃ ca bhārata
a tasmāt te vartayiṣyāmi durgakarma viśeṣataḥ
c śrutvā tathā vidhātavyam anuṣṭheyaṃ ca yatnataḥ
a ṣaḍvidhaṃ durgam āsthāya purāṇy atha niveśayet
c sarvasaṃpatpradhānaṃ yad bāhulyaṃ vāpi saṃbhavet
a dhanvadurgaṃ mahīdurgaṃ giridurgaṃ tathaiva ca
c manuṣyadurgam abdurgaṃ vanadurgaṃ ca tāni ṣaṭ
a yat puraṃ durgasaṃpannaṃ dhānyāyudhasamanvitam
c dṛḍhaprākāraparikhaṃ hastyaśvarathasaṃkulam
a vidvāṃsaḥ śilpino yatra nicayāś ca susaṃcitāḥ
c dhārmikaś ca jano yatra dākṣyam uttamam āsthitaḥ
a ūrjasvinaranāgāśvaṃ catvarāpaṇaśobhitam
c prasiddhavyavahāraṃ ca praśāntam akutobhayam
a suprabhaṃ sānunādaṃ ca supraśastaniveśanam
c śūrāḍhyajanasaṃpannaṃ brahmaghoṣānunāditam

a tatra kośaṃ balaṃ mitraṃ vyavahāraṃ ca vardhayet

c carma snāyu tathā vetraṃ muñjabalbajadhanvanān
a āśayāś codapānāś ca prabhūtasalilā varāḥ
c niroddhavyāḥ sadā rājñā kṣīriṇaś ca mahīruhāḥ
a satkṛtāś ca prayatnena ācāryartvikpurohitāḥ
c maheṣvāsāḥ sthapatayaḥ sāṃvatsaracikitsakāḥ
a prājñā medhāvino dāntā dakṣāḥ śūrā bahuśrutāḥ
c kulīnāḥ sattvasaṃpannā yuktāḥ sarveṣu karmasu
a pūjayed dhārmikān rājā nigṛhṇīyād adhārmikān
c niyuñjyāc ca prayatnena sarvavarṇān svakarmasu
a bāhyam ābhyantaraṃ caiva paurajānapadaṃ janam
c cāraiḥ suviditaṃ kṛtvā tataḥ karma prayojayet
a cārān mantraṃ ca kośaṃ ca mantraṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ
c anutiṣṭhet svayaṃ rājā sarvaṃ hy atra pratiṣṭhitam
a udāsīnārimitrāṇāṃ sarvam eva cikīrṣitam
c pure janapade caiva jñātavyaṃ cāracakṣuṣā
a tatas tathā vidhātavyaṃ sarvam evāpramādataḥ
c bhaktān pujayatā nityaṃ dviṣataś ca nigṛhṇatā
a yaṣṭavyaṃ kratubhir nityaṃ dātavyaṃ cāpy apīḍayā
c prajānāṃ rakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ karma garhitam
a kṛpaṇānāthavṛddhānāṃ vidhavānāṃ ca yoṣitām
c yogakṣemaṃ ca vṛttiṃ ca nityam eva prakalpayet
a āśrameṣu yathākālaṃ celabhājanabhojanam
c sadaivopahared rājā satkṛtyānavamanya ca
a ātmānaṃ sarvakāryāṇi tāpase rājyam eva ca
c nivedayet prayatnena tiṣṭhet prahvaś ca sarvadā
a sarvārthatyāginaṃ rājā kule jātaṃ bahuśrutam
c pūjayet tādṛśaṃ dṛṣṭvā śayanāsanabhojanaiḥ
a tasmin kurvīta viśvāsaṃ rājā kasyāṃ cid āpadi
c tāpaseṣu hi viśvāsam api kurvanti dasyavaḥ
a tasmin nidhīn ādadhīta prajñāṃ paryādadīta ca
c na cāpy abhīkṣṇaṃ seveta bhṛśaṃ vā pratipūjayet
a anyaḥ kāryaḥ svarāṣṭreṣu pararāṣṭreṣu cāparaḥ
c aṭavīṣv aparaḥ kāryaḥ sāmantanagareṣu ca
a teṣu satkārasaṃskārān saṃvibhāgāṃś ca kārayet
c pararāṣṭrāṭavīstheṣu yathā svaviṣaye tathā
a te kasyāṃ cid avasthāyāṃ śaraṇaṃ śaraṇārthine
c rājñe dadyur yathākāmaṃ tāpasāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
a eṣa te lakṣaṇoddeśaḥ saṃkṣepeṇa prakīrtitaḥ
c yādṛśaṃ nagaraṃ rājā svayam āvastum arhati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a rāṣṭraguptiṃ ca me rājan rāṣṭrasyaiva ca saṃgraham
c samyag jijñāsamānāya prabrūhi bharatarṣabha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a rāṣṭraguptiṃ ca te samyag rāṣṭrasyaiva ca saṃgraham
c hanta sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi tattvam ekamanāḥ śṛṇu
a grāmasyādhipatiḥ kāryo daśagrāmyas tathāparaḥ
c dviguṇāyāḥ śatasyaivaṃ sahasrasya ca kārayet

c tān brūyād daśapāyāsau sa tu viṃśatipāya vai

a śākhānagaram arhas tu sahasrapatir uttamam

a nagare nagare ca syād ekaḥ sarvārthacintakaḥ
c uccaiḥsthāne ghorarūpo nakṣatrāṇām iva grahaḥ
e bhavet sa tān parikrāmet sarvān eva sadā svayam
f teṣāṃ vṛttaṃ pariṇayet kaś cid rāṣṭreṣu taccaraḥ
f jighāṃsavaḥ pāpakāmāḥ parasvādāyinaḥ śaṭhāḥ
f rakṣābhyadhikṛtā nāma tebhyo rakṣed imāḥ prajāḥ
a vikrayaṃ krayam adhvānaṃ bhaktaṃ ca saparivyayam
c yogakṣemaṃ ca saṃprekṣya vaṇijaḥ kārayet karān
a utpattiṃ dānavṛttiṃ ca śilpaṃ saṃprekṣya cāsakṛt
c śilpapratikarān eva śilpinaḥ prati kārayet
a uccāvacakarā nyāyyāḥ pūrvarājñāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c yathā yathā na hīyeraṃs tathā kuryān mahīpatiḥ
a phalaṃ karma ca saṃprekṣya tataḥ sarvaṃ prakalpayet
c phalaṃ karma ca nirhetu na kaś cit saṃpravartayet
a yathā rājā ca kartā ca syātāṃ karmaṇi bhāginau
c samavekṣya tathā rājñā praṇeyāḥ satataṃ karāḥ
a nocchindyād ātmano mūlaṃ pareṣāṃ vāpi tṛṣṇayā
c īhādvārāṇi saṃrudhya rājā saṃprītidarśanaḥ
a pradviṣanti parikhyātaṃ rājānam atikhādinam
c pradviṣṭasya kutaḥ śreyaḥ saṃpriyo labhate priyam
a vatsaupamyena dogdhavyaṃ rāṣṭram akṣīṇabuddhinā
c bhṛto vatso jātabalaḥ pīḍāṃ sahati bhārata
a na karma kurute vatso bhṛśaṃ dugdho yudhiṣṭhira
c rāṣṭram apy atidugdhaṃ hi na karma kurute mahat
a yo rāṣṭram anugṛhṇāti parigṛhya svayaṃ nṛpaḥ
c saṃjātam upajīvan sa labhate sumahat phalam
a āpadarthaṃ hi nicayān rājāna iha cinvate
c rāṣṭraṃ ca kośabhūtaṃ syāt kośo veśmagatas tathā
a paurajānapadān sarvān saṃśritopāśritāṃs tathā
c yathāśakty anukampeta sarvān abhyantarān api
a bāhyaṃ janaṃ bhedayitvā bhoktavyo madhyamaḥ sukham
c evaṃ na saṃprakupyante janāḥ sukhitaduḥkhitāḥ
a prāg eva tu karādānam anubhāṣya punaḥ punaḥ
c saṃnipatya svaviṣaye bhayaṃ rāṣṭre pradarśayet
a iyam āpat samutpannā paracakrabhayaṃ mahat
c api nāntāya kalpeta veṇor iva phalāgamaḥ
a arayo me samutthāya bahubhir dasyubhiḥ saha
c idam ātmavadhāyaiva rāṣṭram icchanti bādhitum
a asyām āpadi ghorāyāṃ saṃprāpte dāruṇe bhaye
c paritrāṇāya bhavatāṃ prārthayiṣye dhanāni vaḥ
a pratidāsye ca bhavatāṃ sarvaṃ cāhaṃ bhayakṣaye
c nārayaḥ pratidāsyanti yad dhareyur balād itaḥ
a kalatram āditaḥ kṛtvā naśyet svaṃ svayam eva hi
c api cet putradārārtham arthasaṃcaya iṣyate
a nandāmi vaḥ prabhāvena putrāṇām iva codaye
c yathāśakty anugṛhṇāmi rāṣṭrasyāpīḍayā ca vaḥ
a āpatsv eva ca voḍhavyaṃ bhavadbhiḥ sadgavair iva
c na vaḥ priyataraṃ kāryaṃ dhanaṃ kasyāṃ cid āpadi
a iti vācā madhurayā ślakṣṇayā sopacārayā
c svaraśmīn abhyavasṛjed yugam ādāya kālavit
a pracāraṃ bhṛtyabharaṇaṃ vyayaṃ gogrāmato bhayam
c yogakṣemaṃ ca saṃprekṣya gominaḥ kārayet karān
a upekṣitā hi naśyeyur gomino 'raṇyavāsinaḥ
c tasmāt teṣu viśeṣeṇa mṛdupūrvaṃ samācaret
a sāntvanaṃ rakṣaṇaṃ dānam avasthā cāpy abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
c gomināṃ pārtha kartavyaṃ saṃvibhāgāḥ priyāṇi ca
a ajasram upayoktavyaṃ phalaṃ gomiṣu sarvataḥ
c prabhāvayati rāṣṭraṃ ca vyavahāraṃ kṛṣiṃ tathā
a tasmād gomiṣu yatnena prītiṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ
c dayāvān apramattaś ca karān saṃpraṇayan mṛdūn
a sarvatra kṣemacaraṇaṃ sulabhaṃ tāta gomibhiḥ
c na hy ataḥ sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cid dhanam asti yudhiṣṭhira
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yadā rājā samartho 'pi kośārthī syān mahāmate
c kathaṃ pravarteta tadā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yathādeśaṃ yathākālam api caiva yathābalam
c anuśiṣyāt prajā rājā dharmārthī taddhite rataḥ
a yathā tāsāṃ ca manyeta śreya ātmana eva ca
c tathā dharmyāṇi sarvāṇi rājā rāṣṭre pravartayet
a madhudohaṃ duhed rāṣṭraṃ bhramarān na vipātayet
c vatsāpekṣī duhec caiva stanāṃś ca na vikuṭṭayet
a jalaukāvat pibed rāṣṭraṃ mṛdunaiva narādhipa
c vyāghrīva ca haret putram adaṣṭvā mā pated iti
d yathā śalyakavān ākhuḥ padaṃ dhūnayate sadā
d atīkṣṇenābhyupāyena tathā rāṣṭraṃ samāpibet
a alpenālpena deyena vardhamānaṃ pradāpayet
c tato bhūyas tato bhūyaḥ kāmaṃ vṛddhiṃ samācaret
a damayann iva damyānāṃ śaśvad bhāraṃ pravardhayet
c mṛdupūrvaṃ prayatnena pāśān abhyavahārayet
a sakṛt pāśāvakīrṇās te na bhaviṣyanti durdamāḥ
c ucitenaiva bhoktavyās te bhaviṣyanti yatnataḥ
a tasmāt sarvasamārambho durlabhaḥ puruṣavrajaḥ
c yathāmukhyān sāntvayitvā bhoktavya itaro janaḥ
a tatas tān bhedayitvātha parasparavivakṣitān
c bhuñjīta sāntvayitvaiva yathāsukham ayatnataḥ
a na cāsthāne na cākāle karān ebhyo 'nupātayet
c ānupūrvyeṇa sāntvena yathākālaṃ yathāvidhi
a upāyān prabravīmy etān na me māyā vivakṣitā
c anupāyena damayan prakopayati vājinaḥ
a pānāgārāṇi veśāś ca veśaprāpaṇikās tathā
c kuśīlavāḥ sakitavā ye cānye ke cid īdṛśāḥ
a niyamyāḥ sarva evaite ye rāṣṭrasyopaghātakāḥ
c ete rāṣṭre hi tiṣṭhanto bādhante bhadrikāḥ prajāḥ
a na kena cid yācitavyaḥ kaś cit kiṃ cid anāpadi
c iti vyavasthā bhūtānāṃ purastān manunā kṛtā
a sarve tathā na jīveyur na kuryuḥ karma ced iha
c sarva eva trayo lokā na bhaveyur asaṃśayam
a prabhur niyamane rājā ya etān na niyacchati
c bhuṅkte sa tasya pāpasya caturbhāgam iti śrutiḥ
d bhoktā tasya tu pāpasya sukṛtasya yathā tathā
d niyantavyā sadā rājñā pāpā ye syur narādhipa
d kṛtapāpas tv asau rājā ya etān na niyacchati
e tathā kṛtasya dharmasya caturbhāgam upāśnute
a sthānāny etāni saṃgamya prasaṅge bhūtināśanaḥ
c kāmaprasaktaḥ puruṣaḥ kim akāryaṃ vivarjayet
d madyamāṃsaparasvāni tathā dārā dhanāni ca
d āhared rāgavaśagas tathā śāstraṃ pradarśayet
a āpady eva tu yāceran yeṣāṃ nāsti parigrahaḥ
c dātavyaṃ dharmatas tebhyas tv anukrośād dayārthinā
a mā te rāṣṭre yācanakā mā te bhūyuś ca dasyavaḥ
c iṣṭādātāra evaite naite bhūtasya bhāvakāḥ
a ye bhūtāny anugṛhṇanti vardhayanti ca ye prajāḥ
c te te rāṣṭre pravartantāṃ mā bhūtānām abhāvakāḥ
a daṇḍyās te ca mahārāja dhanādānaprayojanāḥ
c prayogaṃ kārayeyus tān yathā balikarāṃs tathā
a kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyaṃ yac cānyat kiṃ cid īdṛśam
c puruṣaiḥ kārayet karma bahubhiḥ saha karmibhiḥ
a naraś cet kṛṣigorakṣyaṃ vāṇijyaṃ cāpy anuṣṭhitaḥ
c saṃśayaṃ labhate kiṃ cit tena rājā vigarhyate
a dhaninaḥ pūjayen nityaṃ yānācchādanabhojanaiḥ
c vaktavyāś cānugṛhṇīdhvaṃ pūjāḥ saha mayeti ha
a aṅgam etan mahad rājñāṃ dhanino nāma bhārata

a prājñaḥ śūro dhanasthaś ca svām dhārmika eva ca
c tapasvī satyavādī ca buddhimāṃś cābhirakṣati
a tasmād eteṣu sarveṣu prītimān bhava pārthiva
c satyam ārjavam akrodham ānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca pālaya
a evaṃ daṇḍaṃ ca kośaṃ ca mitraṃ bhūmiṃ ca lapsyase
c satyārjavaparo rājan mitrakośasamanvitaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vanaspatīn bhakṣyaphalān na chindyur viṣaye tava
c brāhmaṇānāṃ mūlaphalaṃ dharmyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a brāhmaṇebhyo 'tiriktaṃ ca bhuñjīrann itare janāḥ
c na brāhmaṇoparodhena hared anyaḥ kathaṃ cana
a vipraś cet tyāgam ātiṣṭhed ākhyāyāvṛttikarśitaḥ

a asaṃśayaṃ nivarteta na ced vakṣyaty ataḥ param

c nimantryaś ca bhaved bhogair avṛttyā cet tadācaret
a kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyaṃ lokānām iha jīvanam
c ūrdhvaṃ caiva trayī vidyā sā bhūtān bhāvayaty uta
a tasyāṃ prayatamānāyāṃ ye syus tatparipanthinaḥ
c dasyavas tadvadhāyeha brahmā kṣatram athāsṛjat
a śatrūñ jahi prajā rakṣa yajasva kratubhir nṛpa
c yudhyasva samare vīro bhūtvā kauravanandana

c ye ke cit tān na rakṣanti tair artho nāsti kaś cana
a sadaiva rājñā boddhavyaṃ sarvalokād yudhiṣṭhira
c tasmād dhetor hi bhuñjīta manuṣyān eva mānavaḥ

a ātmānaṃ sarvato rakṣan rājā rakṣeta medinīm

a kiṃ chidraṃ ko 'nuṣaṅgo me kiṃ vāsty avinipātitam
c kuto mām āsraved doṣa iti nityaṃ vicintayet
d atītadivase vṛttaṃ praśaṃsanti na vā punaḥ
a guptaiś cārair anumataiḥ pṛthivīm anucārayet
c sunītaṃ yadi me vṛttaṃ praśaṃsanti na vā punaḥ
e kaccid rocej janapade kaccid rāṣṭre ca me yaśaḥ
a dharmajñānāṃ dhṛtimatāṃ saṃgrāmeṣv apalāyinām
c rāṣṭraṃ ca ye 'nujīvanti ye ca rājño 'nujīvinaḥ
a amātyānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ madhyasthānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
c ye ca tvābhipraśaṃseyur nindeyur atha vā punaḥ
e sarvān supariṇītāṃs tān kārayeta yudhiṣṭhira
a ekāntena hi sarveṣāṃ na śakyaṃ tāta rocitum
c mitrāmitram atho madhyaṃ sarvabhūteṣu bhārata
a tulyabāhubalānāṃ ca guṇair api niṣevinām
c kathaṃ syād adhikaḥ kaś cit sa tu bhuñjīta mānavān
a ye carā hy acarān adyur adaṃṣṭrān daṃṣṭriṇas tathā
c āśīviṣā iva kruddhā bhujagā bhujagān iva
a etebhyaś cāpramattaḥ syāt sadā yatto yudhiṣṭhira
c bhāruṇḍasadṛśā hy ete nipatanti pramādyataḥ
a kaccit te vaṇijo rāṣṭre nodvijante karārditāḥ
c krīṇanto bahu vālpena kāntārakṛtaniśramāḥ
a kaccit kṛṣikarā rāṣṭraṃ na jahaty atipīḍitāḥ
c ye vahanti dhuraṃ rājñāṃ saṃbharantītarān api
a ito dattena jīvanti devāḥ pitṛgaṇās tathā
c manuṣyoragarakṣāṃsi vayāṃsi paśavas tathā
a eṣā te rāṣṭravṛttiś ca rāṣṭraguptiś ca bhārata
c etam evārtham āśritya bhūyo vakṣyāmi pāṇḍava
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yān aṅgirāḥ kṣatradharmān utathyo brahmavittamaḥ
c māndhātre yauvanāśvāya prītimān abhyabhāṣata
a sa yathānuśaśāsainam utathyo brahmavittamaḥ
c tat te sarvaṃ pravakṣyāmi nikhilena yudhiṣṭhira
 utathya uvāca
a dharmāya rājā bhavati na kāmakaraṇāya tu
c māndhātar evaṃ jānīhi rājā lokasya rakṣitā
a rājā carati vai dharmaṃ devatvāyaiva gacchati

a dharme tiṣṭhanti bhūtāni dharmo rājani tiṣṭhati
