a rājā paramadharmātmā lakṣmīvān pāpa ucyate
c devāś ca garhāṃ gacchanti dharmo nāstīti cocyate
a adharme vartamānānām arthasiddhiḥ pradṛśyate
c tad eva maṅgalaṃ sarvaṃ lokaḥ samanuvartate
a ucchidyate dharmavṛttam adharmo vartate mahān
c bhayam āhur divārātraṃ yadā pāpo na vāryate
d mamedam iti nedaṃ ca sādhūnāṃ tāta dharmataḥ
d naiva vyavasthā bhavati yadā pāpo na vāryate
d naiva bhāryā na paśavo na kṣetraṃ na niveśanam
d saṃdṛśyeta manuṣyāṇāṃ yadā pāpabalaṃ bhavet
d devāḥ pūjāṃ na jānanti na svadhāṃ pitaras tathā
d na pūjyante hy atithayo yadā pāpo na vāryate
a na vedān anuvartanti vratavanto dvijātayaḥ
c na yajñāṃs tanvate viprā yadā pāpo na vāryate
a vadhyānām iva sarveṣāṃ mano bhavati vihvalam
c manuṣyāṇāṃ mahārāja yadā pāpo na vāryate
a ubhau lokāv abhiprekṣya rājānam ṛṣayaḥ svayam
c asṛjan sumahad bhūtam ayaṃ dharmo bhaviṣyati
a yasmin dharmo virājeta taṃ rājānaṃ pracakṣate
c yasmin vilīyate dharmas taṃ devā vṛṣalaṃ viduḥ
a vṛṣo hi bhagavān dharmo yas tasya kurute hy alam
c vṛṣalaṃ taṃ vidur devās tasmād dharmaṃ na lopayet
a dharme vardhati vardhanti sarvabhūtāni sarvadā
c tasmin hrasati hīyante tasmād dharmaṃ pravardhayet
a dhanāt sravati dharmo hi dhāraṇād veti niścayaḥ
c akāryāṇāṃ manuṣyendra sa sīmāntakaraḥ smṛtaḥ
a prabhavārthaṃ hi bhūtānāṃ dharmaḥ sṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
c tasmāt pravardhayed dharmaṃ prajānugrahakāraṇāt
a tasmād dhi rājaśārdūla dharmaḥ śreṣṭha iti smṛtaḥ
c sa rājā yaḥ prajāḥ śāsti sādhukṛt puruṣarṣabhaḥ
a kāmakrodhāv anādṛtya dharmam evānupālayet
c dharmaḥ śreyaskaratamo rājñāṃ bharatasattama
a dharmasya brāhmaṇā yonis tasmāt tān pūjayet sadā
c brāhmaṇānāṃ ca māndhātaḥ kāmān kuryād amatsarī
a teṣāṃ hy akāmakaraṇād rājñaḥ saṃjāyate bhayam
c mitrāṇi ca na vardhante tathāmitrībhavanty api
d śatravo hy api mitrāṇi tadā mitraṃ bhavanty api
a brāhmaṇān vai tadāsūyād yadā vairocano baliḥ
c athāsmāc chrīr apākrāmad yāsminn āsīt pratāpinī
a tatas tasmād apakramya sāgacchat pākaśāsanam
c atha so 'nvatapat paścāc chriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā puraṃdare
a etat phalam asūyāyā abhimānasya cābhibho
c tasmād budhyasva māndhātar mā tvā jahyāt pratāpinī
a darpo nāma śriyaḥ putro jajñe 'dharmād iti śrutiḥ
c tena devāsurā rājan nītāḥ subahuśo vaśam
a rājarṣayaś ca bahavas tasmād budhyasva pārthiva
c rājā bhavati taṃ jitvā dāsas tena parājitaḥ
a sa yathā darpasahitam adharmaṃ nānusevase
c tathā vartasva māndhātaś ciraṃ cet sthātum icchasi
a mattāt pramattāt pogaṇḍād unmattāc ca viśeṣataḥ
c tadabhyāsād upāvartād ahitānāṃ ca sevanāt
a nigṛhītād amātyāc ca strībhyaś caiva viśeṣataḥ
c parvatād viṣamād durgād dhastino 'śvāt sarīsṛpāt
a etebhyo nityayattaḥ syān naktaṃcaryāṃ ca varjayet
c atyāyaṃ cātimānaṃ ca dambhaṃ krodhaṃ ca varjayet
a avijñātāsu ca strīṣu klībāsu svairiṇīṣu ca
c parabhāryāsu kanyāsu nācaren maithunaṃ nṛpaḥ
a kuleṣu pāparakṣāṃsi jāyante varṇasaṃkarāt
c apumāṃso 'ṅgahīnāś ca sthūlajihvā vicetasaḥ
a ete cānye ca jāyante yadā rājā pramādyati
c tasmād rājñā viśeṣeṇa vartitavyaṃ prajāhite
a kṣatriyasya pramattasya doṣaḥ saṃjāyate mahān
c adharmāḥ saṃpravartante prajāsaṃkarakārakāḥ
a aśīte vidyate śītaṃ śīte śītaṃ na vidyate
c avṛṣṭir ativṛṣṭiś ca vyādhiś cāviśati prajāḥ
a nakṣatrāṇy upatiṣṭhanti grahā ghorās tathāpare
c utpātāś cātra dṛśyante bahavo rājanāśanāḥ
a arakṣitātmā yo rājā prajāś cāpi na rakṣati
c prajāś ca tasya kṣīyante tāś ca so 'nu vinaśyati
a dvāv ādadāte hy ekasya dvayoś ca bahavo 'pare
c kumāryaḥ saṃpralupyante tadāhur nṛpadūṣaṇam
a mamaitad iti naikasya manuṣyeṣv avatiṣṭhate
c tyaktvā dharmaṃ yadā rājā pramādam anutiṣṭhati
 utathya uvāca
a kālavarṣī ca parjanyo dharmacārī ca pārthivaḥ
c saṃpad yadaiṣā bhavati sā bibharti sukhaṃ prajāḥ
a yo na jānāti nirhantuṃ vastrāṇāṃ rajako malam
c raktāni vā śodhayituṃ yathā nāsti tathaiva saḥ
a evam eva dvijendrāṇāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśām api
c śūdrāś caturṇāṃ varṇānāṃ nānākarmasv avasthitāḥ
a karma śūdre kṛṣir vaiśye daṇḍanītiś ca rājani
c brahmacaryaṃ tapo mantrāḥ satyaṃ cāpi dvijātiṣu
a teṣāṃ yaḥ kṣatriyo veda vastrāṇām iva śodhanam
c śīladoṣān vinirhantuṃ sa pitā sa prajāpatiḥ
a kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliś ca bharatarṣabha
c rājavṛttāni sarvāṇi rājaiva yugam ucyate
a cāturvarṇyaṃ tathā vedāś cāturāśramyam eva ca
c sarvaṃ pramuhyate hy etad yadā rājā pramādyati
d agnitretā trayī vidyā yajñāś ca sahadakṣiṇāḥ
d sarva eva pramādyanti yadā rājā pramādyati
a rājaiva kartā bhūtānāṃ rājaiva ca vināśakaḥ
c dharmātmā yaḥ sa kartā syād adharmātmā vināśakaḥ
a rājño bhāryāś ca putrāś ca bāndhavāḥ suhṛdas tathā
c sametya sarve śocanti yadā rājā pramādyati
a hastino 'śvāś ca gāvaś cāpy uṣṭrāśvataragardabhāḥ
c adharmavṛtte nṛpatau sarve sīdanti pārthiva
a durbalārthaṃ balaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ dhātrā māndhātar ucyate
c abalaṃ tan mahad bhūtaṃ yasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
a yac ca bhūtaṃ sa bhajate bhūtā ye ca tadanvayāḥ
c adharmasthe hi nṛpatau sarve sīdanti pārthiva
a durbalasya hi yac cakṣur muner āśīviṣasya ca
c aviṣahyatamaṃ manye mā sma durbalam āsadaḥ
a durbalāṃs tāta budhyethā nityam evāvimānitān
c mā tvāṃ durbalacakṣūṃṣi pradaheyuḥ sabāndhavam
a na hi durbaladagdhasya kule kiṃ cit prarohati
c āmūlaṃ nirdahaty eva mā sma durbalam āsadaḥ
a abalaṃ vai balāc chreyo yac cātibalavad balam
c balasyābaladagdhasya na kiṃ cid avaśiṣyate
a vimānito hatotkruṣṭas trātāraṃ cen na vindati
c amānuṣakṛtas tatra daṇḍo hanti narādhipam
a mā sma tāta bale stheyā bādhiṣṭhā māpi durbalam
c mā tvā durbalacakṣūṃṣi dhakṣyanty agnir ivāśrayam
a yāni mithyābhiśastānāṃ patanty aśrūṇi rodatām
c tāni putrān paśūn ghnanti teṣāṃ mithyābhiśāsatām
a yadi nātmani putreṣu na cet pautreṣu naptṛṣu
c na hi pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ karma sadyaḥ phalati gaur iva
a yatrābalo vadhyamānas trātāraṃ nādhigacchati
c mahān daivakṛtas tatra daṇḍaḥ patati dāruṇaḥ
a yuktā yadā jānapadā bhikṣante brāhmaṇā iva
c abhīkṣṇaṃ bhikṣudoṣeṇa rājānaṃ ghnanti tādṛśāḥ
a rājño yadā janapade bahavo rājapūruṣāḥ
c anayenopavartante tad rājñaḥ kilbiṣaṃ mahat
a yadā yuktā nayanty arthān kāmād arthavaśena vā
c kṛpaṇaṃ yācamānānāṃ tad rājño vaiśasaṃ mahat
a mahāvṛkṣo jāyate vardhate ca
taṃ caiva bhūtāni samāśrayanti
c yadā vṛkṣaś chidyate dahyate vā
tadāśrayā aniketā bhavanti
a yadā rāṣṭre dharmam agryaṃ caranti
saṃskāraṃ vā rājaguṇaṃ bruvāṇāḥ
c tair evādharmaś carito dharmamohāt
tūrṇaṃ jahyāt sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca
a yatra pāpā jñāyamānāś caranti
satāṃ kalir vindati tatra rājñaḥ
c yadā rājā śāsti narān naśiṣyān
na tad rājyaṃ vardhate bhūmipāla
a yaś cāmātyaṃ mānayitvā yathārhaṃ
mantre ca yuddhe ca nṛpo niyuñjyāt
c pravardhate tasya rāṣṭraṃ nṛpasya
bhuṅkte mahīṃ cāpy akhilāṃ cirāya
a atrāpi sukṛtaṃ karma vācaṃ caiva subhāṣitām
c samīkṣya pūjayan rājā dharmaṃ prāpnoty anuttamam
a saṃvibhajya yadā bhuṅkte na cānyān avamanyate
c nihanti balinaṃ dṛptaṃ sa rājño dharma ucyate
a trāyate hi yadā sarvaṃ vācā kāyena karmaṇā
c putrasyāpi na mṛṣyec ca sa rājño dharma ucyate
d saṃvibhajya yadā bhuṅkte nṛpatir durbalān narān
d tadā bhavanti balinaḥ sa rājño dharma ucyate
d yadā rakṣati rāṣṭrāṇi yadā dasyūn apohati
d yadā jayati saṃgrāme sa rājño dharma ucyate
d pāpam ācarato yatra karmaṇā vyāhṛtena vā
d priyasyāpi na mṛṣyeta sa rājño dharma ucyate
a yadā śāraṇikān rājā putravat parirakṣati
c bhinatti na ca maryādāṃ sa rājño dharma ucyate
a yadāptadakṣiṇair yajñair yajate śraddhayānvitaḥ
c kāmadveṣāv anādṛtya sa rājño dharma ucyate
a kṛpaṇānāthavṛddhānāṃ yadāśru vyapamārṣṭi vai
c harṣaṃ saṃjanayan nṝṇāṃ sa rājño dharma ucyate
a vivardhayati mitrāṇi tathārīṃś cāpakarṣati
c saṃpūjayati sādhūṃś ca sa rājño dharma ucyate
a satyaṃ pālayati prāptyā nityaṃ bhūmiṃ prayacchati
c pūjayaty atithīn bhṛtyān sa rājño dharma ucyate
a nigrahānugrahau cobhau yatra syātāṃ pratiṣṭhitau
c asmiṃl loke pare caiva rājā tat prāpnute phalam
a yamo rājā dhārmikāṇāṃ māndhātaḥ parameśvaraḥ
c saṃyacchan bhavati prāṇān nasaṃyacchaṃs tu pāpakaḥ
a ṛtvikpurohitācāryān satkṛtyānavamanya ca
c yadā samyak pragṛhṇāti sa rājño dharma ucyate
a yamo yacchati bhūtāni sarvāṇy evāviśeṣataḥ
c tasya rājñānukartavyaṃ yantavyā vidhivat prajāḥ
a sahasrākṣeṇa rājā hi sarva evopamīyate
c sa paśyati hi yaṃ dharmaṃ sa dharmaḥ puruṣarṣabha
a apramādena śikṣethāḥ kṣamāṃ buddhiṃ dhṛtiṃ matim
c bhūtānāṃ sattvajijñāsāṃ sādhv asādhu ca sarvadā
a saṃgrahaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dānaṃ ca madhurā ca vāk
c paurajānapadāś caiva goptavyāḥ svā yathā prajāḥ
a na jātv adakṣo nṛpatiḥ prajāḥ śaknoti rakṣitum
c bhāro hi sumahāṃs tāta rājyaṃ nāma suduṣkaram
a tad daṇḍavin nṛpaḥ prājñaḥ śūraḥ śaknoti rakṣitum
c na hi śakyam adaṇḍena klībenābuddhināpi vā
a abhirūpaiḥ kule jātair dakṣair bhaktair bahuśrutaiḥ
c sarvā buddhīḥ parīkṣethās tāpasāśramiṇām api
a tatas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmaṃ vetsyasi vai param
c svadeśe paradeśe vā na te dharmo vinaśyati
a dharmaś cārthaś ca kāmaś ca dharma evottaro bhavet
c asmiṃl loke pare caiva dharmavit sukham edhate
a tyajanti dārān prāṇāṃś ca manuṣyāḥ pratipūjitāḥ
c saṃgrahaś caiva bhūtānāṃ dānaṃ ca madhurā ca vāk
a apramādaś ca śaucaṃ ca tāta bhūtikaraṃ mahat
c etebhyaś caiva māndhātaḥ satataṃ mā pramādithāḥ
a apramatto bhaved rājā chidradarśī parātmanoḥ
c nāsya chidraṃ paraḥ paśyec chidreṣu param anviyāt
a etad vṛttaṃ vāsavasya yamasya varuṇasya ca
c rājarṣīṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ tat tvam apy anupālaya
a tat kuruṣva mahārāja vṛttaṃ rājarṣisevitam
c ātiṣṭha divyaṃ panthānam ahnāya bharatarṣabha
a dharmavṛttaṃ hi rājānaṃ pretya ceha ca bhārata
c devarṣipitṛgandharvāḥ kīrtayanty amitaujasaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa evam ukto māndhātā tenotathyena bhārata
c kṛtavān aviśaṅkas tad ekaḥ prāpa ca medinīm
a bhavān api tathā samyaṅ māndhāteva mahīpatiḥ
c dharmaṃ kṛtvā mahīṃ rakṣan svarge sthānam avāpsyasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ dharme sthātum icchan rājā varteta dhārmikaḥ
c pṛcchāmi tvā kuruśreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c gītaṃ dṛṣṭārthatattvena vāmadevena dhīmatā
a rājā vasumanā nāma kausalyo balavāñ śuciḥ
c maharṣiṃ paripapraccha vāmadevaṃ yaśasvinam
a dharmārthasahitaṃ vākyaṃ bhagavann anuśādhi mām
c yena vṛttena vai tiṣṭhan na cyaveyaṃ svadharmataḥ
a tam abravīd vāmadevas tapasvī japatāṃ varaḥ
c hemavarṇam upāsīnaṃ yayātim iva nāhuṣam
a dharmam evānuvartasva na dharmād vidyate param
c dharme sthitā hi rājāno jayanti pṛthivīm imām
a arthasiddheḥ paraṃ dharmaṃ manyate yo mahīpatiḥ
c ṛtāṃ ca kurute buddhiṃ sa dharmeṇa virocate
a adharmadarśī yo rājā balād eva pravartate
c kṣipram evāpayāto 'smād ubhau prathamamadhyamau
a asatpāpiṣṭhasacivo vadhyo lokasya dharmahā
c sahaiva parivāreṇa kṣipram evāvasīdati
a arthānām ananuṣṭhātā kāmacārī vikatthanaḥ
c api sarvāṃ mahīṃ labdhvā kṣipram eva vinaśyati
a athādadānaḥ kalyāṇam anasūyur jitendriyaḥ
c vardhate matimān rājā srotobhir iva sāgaraḥ
a na pūrṇo 'smīti manyeta dharmataḥ kāmato 'rthataḥ
c buddhito mitrataś cāpi satataṃ vasudhādhipaḥ
a eteṣv eva hi sarveṣu lokayātrā pratiṣṭhitā
c etāni śṛṇvaṃl labhate yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ śriyaḥ prajāḥ
a evaṃ yo dharmasaṃrambhī dharmārthaparicintakaḥ
c arthān samīkṣyārabhate sa dhruvaṃ mahad aśnute
a adātā hy anatisneho daṇḍenāvartayan prajāḥ
c sāhasaprakṛtī rājā kṣipram eva vinaśyati
a atha pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ buddhyā na ca paśyaty abuddhimān
c akīrtyāpi samāyukto mṛto narakam aśnute
a atha mānayitur dātuḥ śuklasya rasavedinaḥ
c vyasanaṃ svam ivotpannaṃ vijighāṃsanti mānavāḥ
a yasya nāsti gurur dharme na cānyān anupṛcchati
c sukhatantro 'rthalābheṣu na ciraṃ mahad aśnute
a gurupradhāno dharmeṣu svayam arthānvavekṣitā
c dharmapradhāno lokeṣu suciraṃ mahad aśnute
 vāmadeva uvāca
a yatrādharmaṃ praṇayate durbale balavattaraḥ
c tāṃ vṛttim upajīvanti ye bhavanti tadanvayāḥ
a rājānam anuvartante taṃ pāpābhipravartakam
c avinītamanuṣyaṃ tat kṣipraṃ rāṣṭraṃ vinaśyati
a yad vṛttim upajīvanti prakṛtisthasya mānavāḥ
c tad eva viṣamasthasya svajano 'pi na mṛṣyate
a sāhasaprakṛtir yatra kurute kiṃ cid ulbaṇam
c aśāstralakṣaṇo rājā kṣipram eva vinaśyati
a yo 'tyantācaritāṃ vṛttiṃ kṣatriyo nānuvartate
c jitānām ajitānāṃ ca kṣatradharmād apaiti saḥ
a dviṣantaṃ kṛtakarmāṇaṃ gṛhītvā nṛpatī raṇe
c yo na mānayate dveṣāt kṣatradharmād apaiti saḥ
a śaktaḥ syāt sumukho rājā kuryāt kāruṇyam āpadi
c priyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ na ca vibhraśyate śriyaḥ
a apriyaṃ yasya kurvīta bhūyas tasya priyaṃ caret
c nacireṇa priyaḥ sa syād yo 'priyaḥ priyam ācaret
a mṛṣāvādaṃ pariharet kuryāt priyam ayācitaḥ
b śreyaso lakṣaṇaṃ caitad vikramo yatra dṛśyate
b kīrtipradhāno yaś ca syāt samaye yaś ca tiṣṭhati
b samarthān pūjayed yaś ca na spardheta ca yaś ca taiḥ
c na ca kāmān na saṃrambhān na dveṣād dharmam utsṛjet
d amāyayaiva varteta na ca satyaṃ tyajed budhaḥ
d damaṃ dharmaṃ ca śīlaṃ ca kṣatradharmaṃ prajāhitam
a nāpatrapeta praśneṣu nābhibhavyāṃ giraṃ sṛjet
c na tvareta na cāsūyet tathā saṃgṛhyate paraḥ
a priye nātibhṛśaṃ hṛṣyed apriye na ca saṃjvaret
c na muhyed arthakṛcchreṣu prajāhitam anusmaran
a yaḥ priyaṃ kurute nityaṃ guṇato vasudhādhipaḥ
c tasya karmāṇi sidhyanti na ca saṃtyajyate śriyā
a nivṛttaṃ pratikūlebhyo vartamānam anupriye
c bhaktaṃ bhajeta nṛpatis tad vai vṛttaṃ satām iha
a aprakīrṇendriyaṃ prājñam atyantānugataṃ śucim
c śaktaṃ caivānuraktaṃ ca yuñjyān mahati karmaṇi
a evam eva guṇair yukto yo na rajyati bhūmipam
c bhartur artheṣv asūyantaṃ na taṃ yuñjīta karmaṇi
a mūḍham aindriyakaṃ lubdham anāryacaritaṃ śaṭham
c anatītopadhaṃ hiṃsraṃ durbuddhim abahuśrutam
a tyaktopāttaṃ madyarataṃ dyūtastrīmṛgayāparam
c kārye mahati yo yuñjyād dhīyate sa nṛpaḥ śriyaḥ
a rakṣitātmā tu yo rājā rakṣyān yaś cānurakṣati
c prajāś ca tasya vardhante dhruvaṃ ca mahad aśnute
a ye ke cid bhūmipatayas tān sarvān anvavekṣayet
c suhṛdbhir anabhikhyātais tena rājā na riṣyate
a apakṛtya balasthasya dūrastho 'smīti nāśvaset
c śyenānucaritair hy ete nipatanti pramādyataḥ
a dṛḍhamūlas tv aduṣṭātmā viditvā balam ātmanaḥ
c abalān abhiyuñjīta na tu ye balavattarāḥ
a vikrameṇa mahīṃ labdhvā prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
c āhave nidhanaṃ kuryād rājā dharmaparāyaṇaḥ
a maraṇāntam idaṃ sarvaṃ neha kiṃ cid anāmayam
c tasmād dharme sthito rājā prajā dharmeṇa pālayet
a rakṣādhikaraṇaṃ yuddhaṃ tathā dharmānuśāsanam
c mantracintyaṃ sukhaṃ kāle pañcabhir vardhate mahī
a etāni yasya guptāni sa rājā rājasattama
c satataṃ vartamāno 'tra rājā bhuṅkte mahīm imām
a naitāny ekena śakyāni sātatyenānvavekṣitum
c eteṣv āptān pratiṣṭhāpya rājā bhuṅkte mahīṃ ciram
a dātāraṃ saṃvibhaktāraṃ mārdavopagataṃ śucim
c asaṃtyaktamanuṣyaṃ ca taṃ janāḥ kurvate priyam
a yas tu niḥśreyasaṃ jñātvā jñānaṃ tat pratipadyate
c ātmano matam utsṛjya taṃ loko 'nuvidhīyate
a yo 'rthakāmasya vacanaṃ prātikūlyān na mṛṣyate
c śṛṇoti pratikūlāni vimanā nacirād iva
a agrāmyacaritāṃ buddhim atyantaṃ yo na budhyate
c jitānām ajitānāṃ ca kṣatradharmād apaiti saḥ
a mukhyān amātyān yo hitvā nihīnān kurute priyān
c sa vai vyasanam āsādya gādham ārto na vindati
a yaḥ kalyāṇaguṇāñ jñātīn dveṣān naivābhimanyate
c adṛḍhātmā dṛḍhakrodho nāsyārtho ramate 'ntike
a atha yo guṇasaṃpannān hṛdayasyāpriyān api
c priyeṇa kurute vaśyāṃś ciraṃ yaśasi tiṣṭhati
a nākāle praṇayed arthān nāpriye jātu saṃjvaret
c priye nātibhṛśaṃ hṛṣyed yujyetārogyakarmaṇi
a ke mānuraktā rājānaḥ ke bhayāt samupāśritāḥ
c madhyasthadoṣāḥ ke caiṣām iti nityaṃ vicintayet
a na jātu balavān bhūtvā durbale viśvaset kva cit
c bhāruṇḍasadṛśā hy ete nipatanti pramādyataḥ
a api sarvair guṇair yuktaṃ bhartāraṃ priyavādinam
c abhidruhyati pāpātmā tasmād dhi vibhiṣej janāt
a etāṃ rājopaniṣadaṃ yayātiḥ smāha nāhuṣaḥ
c manuṣyavijaye yukto hanti śatrūn anuttamān
 vāmadeva uvāca
a ayuddhenaiva vijayaṃ vardhayed vasudhādhipaḥ
c jaghanyam āhur vijayaṃ yo yuddhena narādhipa
a na cāpy alabdhaṃ lipseta mūle nātidṛḍhe sati
c na hi durbalamūlasya rājño lābho vidhīyate
a yasya sphīto janapadaḥ saṃpannaḥ priyarājakaḥ
c saṃtuṣṭapuṣṭasacivo dṛḍhamūlaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
a yasya yodhāḥ susaṃtuṣṭāḥ sāntvitāḥ sūpadhāsthitāḥ
c alpenāpi sa daṇḍena mahīṃ jayati bhūmipaḥ
d daṇḍo hi balavān yatra tatra sāma prayujyate
d pradānaṃ sāmapūrvaṃ ca bhedamūlaṃ praśasyate
d trayāṇāṃ viphalaṃ karma yadā paśyeta bhūmipaḥ
d randhraṃ jñātvā tato daṇḍaṃ prayuñjītāvicārayan
d abhibhūto yadā śatruḥ śatrubhir balavattaraiḥ
d upekṣā tatra kartavyā vadhyatāṃ balināṃ balam
d durbalo hi mahīpālo yadā bhavati bhārata
d upekṣā tatra kartavyā caturṇām avirodhinī
d upāyaḥ pañcamaḥ so 'pi sarveṣāṃ balavattaraḥ
d bhārgaveṇa ca gītānāṃ ślokānāṃ kausalādhipa
d vijñāya tattvaṃ tattvajña tattvatas tat kariṣyasi
d yadi rakṣaḥ piśācena hanyate yatra kutra cit
d upekṣā tatra kartavyā vadhyatāṃ balināṃ baliḥ
d durbalo hi mahīpālaḥ śatrūṇāṃ śatrum uddharet
d pādalagnaṃ karasthena kaṇṭakenaiva kaṇṭakam
d śaṭhānāṃ sacivānāṃ ca mlecchānāṃ ca mahīpate
d eṣa ukta upāyānām upekṣā balavattamā
d aśmanā nāśayel lohaṃ lohenāśmānam eva ca
d bilvānīvāparair bilvair mlecchān mlecchaiḥ prasādayet
d dāsānāṃ ca pradṛptānām etad eveha kārayet
d caṇḍālamlecchajātīnāṃ daṇḍena ca nivāraṇam
d śaṭhānāṃ durvinītaiś ca pūrvam uktaṃ samācaret
d anyāḥ śaṭhāś ca sacivās tathā kubrāhmaṇādayaḥ
d upāyaiḥ pañcabhiḥ sādhyāś caturvargavirodhinaḥ
a paurajānapadā yasya svanuraktāḥ supūjitāḥ
b rāṣṭrakarmakarā hy ete rāṣṭrasya ca virodhinaḥ
b durvinītā vinītāś ca sarve sādhyāḥ prayatnataḥ
b caṇḍālamlecchajātyāś ca pāṣaṇḍāś ca vikarmiṇaḥ
b balinaś cāśramāś caiva tathā gāyakanartakāḥ
c sadhanā dhānyavantaś ca dṛḍhamūlaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
d yasya rāṣṭre vasanty ete dhānyopacayakāriṇaḥ
d āyavṛddhau sahāyāś ca dṛḍhamūlaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
a prabhāvakālāv adhikau yadā manyeta cātmanaḥ
c tadā lipseta medhāvī parabhūmiṃ dhanāny uta
a bhogeṣv adayamānasya bhūteṣu ca dayāvataḥ
c vardhate tvaramāṇasya viṣayo rakṣitātmanaḥ
a takṣaty ātmānam evaiṣa vanaṃ paraśunā yathā
c yaḥ samyag vartamāneṣu sveṣu mithyā pravartate
a na vai dviṣantaḥ kṣīyante rājño nityam api ghnataḥ
c krodhaṃ niyantuṃ yo veda tasya dveṣṭā na vidyate
a yad āryajanavidviṣṭaṃ karma tan nācared budhaḥ
c yat kalyāṇam abhidhyāyet tatrātmānaṃ niyojayet
a nainam anye 'vajānanti nātmanā paritapyate
c kṛtyaśeṣeṇa yo rājā sukhāny anububhūṣati
a idaṃvṛttaṃ manuṣyeṣu vartate yo mahīpatiḥ
c ubhau lokau vinirjitya vijaye saṃpratiṣṭhate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity ukto vāmadevena sarvaṃ tat kṛtavān nṛpaḥ
c tathā kurvaṃs tvam apy etau lokau jetā na saṃśayaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a atha yo vijigīṣeta kṣatriyaḥ kṣatriyaṃ yudhi
c kas tasya dharmyo vijaya etat pṛṣṭo bravīhi me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sasahāyo 'sahāyo vā rāṣṭram āgamya bhūmipaḥ
c brūyād ahaṃ vo rājeti rakṣiṣyāmi ca vaḥ sadā
a mama dharmyaṃ baliṃ datta kiṃ vā māṃ pratipatsyatha
c te cet tam āgataṃ tatra vṛṇuyuḥ kuśalaṃ bhavet
d brūyād yuddhaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ śṛṇu naḥ kuśalaṃ bhavet
a te ced akṣatriyāḥ santo virudhyeyuḥ kathaṃ cana
c sarvopāyair niyantavyā vikarmasthā narādhipa
a aśaktaṃ kṣatriyaṃ matvā śastraṃ gṛhṇāty athāparaḥ
c trāṇāyāpy asamarthaṃ taṃ manyamānam atīva ca
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a atha yaḥ kṣatriyo rājā kṣatriyaṃ pratyupāvrajet
c kathaṃ sa pratiyoddhavyas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nāsaṃnaddho nākavaco yoddhavyaḥ kṣatriyo raṇe
c eka ekena vācyaś ca visṛjasva kṣipāmi ca
a sa cet saṃnaddha āgacchet saṃnaddhavyaṃ tato bhavet
c sa cet sasainya āgacchet sasainyas tam athāhvayet
a sa cen nikṛtyā yudhyeta nikṛtyā taṃ prayodhayet
c atha ced dharmato yudhyed dharmeṇaiva nivārayet
a nāśvena rathinaṃ yāyād udiyād rathinaṃ rathī
c vyasane na prahartavyaṃ na bhītāya jitāya ca
a neṣur lipto na karṇī syād asatām etad āyudham
c jayārtham eva yoddhavyaṃ na krudhyed ajighāṃsataḥ
d nāsty ekasya gajo yuddhe gajaś caikasya vidyate
d na padātir gajaṃ yudhyen na gajena padātinam
d hastinā yodhayen nāgaṃ kadā cic chikṣito hayaḥ
d divyāstrabalasaṃpannaḥ kāmaṃ yudhyeta sarvadā
d nāge bhūmau same caiva rathenāśvena vā punaḥ
d rāmarāvaṇayor yuddhe harayo vai padātayaḥ
d lakṣmaṇaś ca mahābhāgas tathā rājan vibhīṣaṇaḥ
d rāvaṇasyāntakāle ca rathenaindreṇa rāghavaḥ
d nijaghāna durācāraṃ rāvaṇaṃ pāpakāriṇam
d divyāstrabalasaṃpanne sarvam etad vidhīyate
d devāsureṣu yuddheṣu dṛṣṭam etat purātanaiḥ
a sādhūnāṃ tu mithobhedāt sādhuś ced vyasanī bhavet
c savraṇo nābhihantavyo nānapatyaḥ kathaṃ cana
a bhagnaśastro vipannāśvaś chinnajyo hatavāhanaḥ
c cikitsyaḥ syāt svaviṣaye prāpyo vā svagṛhān bhavet
e nirvraṇo 'pi ca moktavya eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a tasmād dharmeṇa yoddhavyaṃ manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo 'bravīt
c satsu nityaṃ satāṃ dharmas tam āsthāya na nāśayet
a yo vai jayaty adharmeṇa kṣatriyo vardhamānakaḥ
c ātmānam ātmanā hanti pāpo nikṛtijīvanaḥ
a karma caitad asādhūnām asādhuṃ sādhunā jayet
c dharmeṇa nidhanaṃ śreyo na jayaḥ pāpakarmaṇā
a nādharmaś carito rājan sadyaḥ phalati gaur iva
c mūlāny asya praśākhāś ca dahan samanugacchati
a pāpena karmaṇā vittaṃ labdhvā pāpaḥ prahṛṣyati
c sa vardhamānaḥ steyena pāpaḥ pāpe prasajjati
a na dharmo 'stīti manvānaḥ śucīn avahasann iva
c aśraddadhānabhāvāc ca vināśam upagacchati
a sa baddho vāruṇaiḥ pāśair amartya iva manyate
c mahādṛtir ivādhmātaḥ svakṛtena vivardhate
a tataḥ samūlo hriyate nadīkūlād iva drumaḥ
c athainam abhinindanti bhinnaṃ kumbham ivāśmani
e tasmād dharmeṇa vijayaṃ kāmaṃ lipseta bhūmipaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nādharmeṇa mahīṃ jetuṃ lipseta jagatīpatiḥ
c adharmavijayaṃ labdhvā ko 'numanyeta bhūmipaḥ
a adharmayukto vijayo hy adhruvo 'svargya eva ca
c sādayaty eṣa rājānaṃ mahīṃ ca bharatarṣabha
a viśīrṇakavacaṃ caiva tavāsmīti ca vādinam
c kṛtāñjaliṃ nyastaśastraṃ gṛhītvā na vihiṃsayet
a balenāvajito yaś ca na taṃ yudhyeta bhūmipaḥ
c saṃvatsaraṃ vipraṇayet tasmāj jātaḥ punar bhavet
a nārvāk saṃvatsarāt kanyā spraṣṭavyā vikramāhṛtā
c evam eva dhanaṃ sarvaṃ yac cānyat sahasāhṛtam
a na tu vandhyaṃ dhanaṃ tiṣṭhet pibeyur brāhmaṇāḥ payaḥ
c yuñjīran vāpy anaḍuhaḥ kṣantavyaṃ vā tadā bhavet
a rājñā rājaiva yoddhavyas tathā dharmo vidhīyate
c nānyo rājānam abhyased arājanyaḥ kathaṃ cana
a anīkayoḥ saṃhatayor yadīyād brāhmaṇo 'ntarā
c śāntim icchann ubhayato na yoddhavyaṃ tadā bhavet
e maryādāṃ śāśvatīṃ bhindyād brāhmaṇaṃ yo 'bhilaṅghayet
a atha cel laṅghayed enāṃ maryādāṃ kṣatriyabruvaḥ
c apraśasyas tad ūrdhvaṃ syād anādeyaś ca saṃsadi
a yā tu dharmavilopena maryādābhedanena ca
c tāṃ vṛttiṃ nānuvarteta vijigīṣur mahīpatiḥ
e dharmalabdhād dhi vijayāt ko lābho 'bhyadhiko bhavet
a sahasā nāmya bhūtāni kṣipram eva prasādayet
c sāntvena bhogadānena sa rājñāṃ paramo nayaḥ
a bhujyamānā hy ayogena svarāṣṭrād abhitāpitāḥ
c amitrān paryupāsīran vyasanaughapratīkṣiṇaḥ
a amitropagrahaṃ cāsya te kuryuḥ kṣipram āpadi
c saṃduṣṭāḥ sarvato rājan rājavyasanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
a nāmitro vinikartavyo nāticchedyaḥ kathaṃ cana
c jīvitaṃ hy apy aticchinnaḥ saṃtyajaty ekadā naraḥ
a alpenāpi hi saṃyuktas tuṣyaty evāparādhikaḥ
c śuddhaṃ jīvitam evāpi tādṛśo bahu manyate
a yasya sphīto janapadaḥ saṃpannaḥ priyarājakaḥ
c saṃtuṣṭabhṛtyasacivo dṛḍhamūlaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
a ṛtvikpurohitācāryā ye cānye śrutasaṃmatāḥ
c pūjārhāḥ pūjitā yasya sa vai lokajid ucyate
a etenaiva ca vṛttena mahīṃ prāpa surottamaḥ
c anv eva caindraṃ vijayaṃ vyajigīṣanta pārthivāḥ
a bhūmivarjaṃ puraṃ rājā jitvā rājānam āhave
c amṛtāś cauṣadhīḥ śaśvad ājahāra pratardanaḥ
a agnihotrāṇy agniśeṣaṃ havir bhājanam eva ca
c ājahāra divodāsas tato viprakṛto 'bhavat
a sarājakāni rāṣṭrāṇi nābhāgo dakṣiṇāṃ dadau
c anyatra śrotriyasvāc ca tāpasasvāc ca bhārata
a uccāvacāni vṛttāni dharmajñānāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c āsan rājñāṃ purāṇānāṃ sarvaṃ tan mama rocate
a sarvavidyātirekād vā jayam icchen mahīpatiḥ
c na māyayā na dambhena ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kṣatradharmān na pāpīyān dharmo 'sti bharatarṣabha
c abhiyāne ca yuddhe ca rājā hanti mahājanam
a atha sma karmaṇā yena lokāñ jayati pārthivaḥ
c vidvañ jijñāsamānāya prabrūhi bharatarṣabha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nigraheṇa ca pāpānāṃ sādhūnāṃ pragraheṇa ca
c yajñair dānaiś ca rājāno bhavanti śucayo 'malāḥ
a uparundhanti rājāno bhūtāni vijayārthinaḥ
c ta eva vijayaṃ prāpya vardhayanti punaḥ prajāḥ
a apavidhyanti pāpāni dānayajñatapobalaiḥ
c anugraheṇa bhūtānāṃ puṇyam eṣāṃ pravardhate
a yathaiva kṣetranirdātā nirdan vai kṣetram ekadā
c hinasti kakṣaṃ dhānyaṃ ca na ca dhānyaṃ vinaśyati
a evaṃ śastrāṇi muñcanto ghnanti vadhyān athaikadā
c tasyaiṣā niṣkṛtiḥ kṛtsnā bhūtānāṃ bhāvanaṃ punaḥ
a yo bhūtāni dhanajyānād vadhāt kleśāc ca rakṣati
c dasyubhyaḥ prāṇadānāt sa dhanadaḥ sukhado virāṭ
a sa sarvayajñair ījāno rājāthābhayadakṣiṇaiḥ
c anubhūyeha bhadrāṇi prāpnotīndrasalokatām
a brāhmaṇārthe samutpanne yo 'bhiniḥsṛtya yudhyate
c ātmānaṃ yūpam ucchritya sa yajño 'nantadakṣiṇaḥ
a abhīto vikirañ śatrūn pratigṛhṇañ śarāṃs tathā
c na tasmāt tridaśāḥ śreyo bhuvi paśyanti kiṃ cana
a tasya yāvanti śastrāṇi tvacaṃ bhindanti saṃyuge
c tāvataḥ so 'śnute lokān sarvakāmaduho 'kṣayān
a na tasya rudhiraṃ gātrād āvedhebhyaḥ pravartate
c sa ha tenaiva raktena sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
a yāni duḥkhāni sahate vraṇānām abhitāpane
c na tato 'sti tapo bhūya iti dharmavido viduḥ
a pṛṣṭhato bhīravaḥ saṃkhye vartante 'dhamapūruṣāḥ
c śūrāc charaṇam icchantaḥ parjanyād iva jīvanam
a yadi śūras tathā kṣeme pratirakṣet tathā bhaye
c pratirūpaṃ janāḥ kuryur na ca tad vartate tathā
a yadi te kṛtam ājñāya namaskuryuḥ sadaiva tam
c yuktaṃ nyāyyaṃ ca kuryus te na ca tad vartate tathā
a puruṣāṇāṃ samānānāṃ dṛśyate mahad antaram
c saṃgrāme 'nīkavelāyām utkruṣṭe 'bhipatatsu ca
a pataty abhimukhaḥ śūraḥ parān bhīruḥ palāyate
c āsthāyāsvargyam adhvānaṃ sahāyān viṣame tyajan
a mā sma tāṃs tādṛśāṃs tāta janiṣṭhāḥ puruṣādhamān
c ye sahāyān raṇe hitvā svastimanto gṛhān yayuḥ
a asvasti tebhyaḥ kurvanti devā indrapurogamāḥ
c tyāgena yaḥ sahāyānāṃ svān prāṇāṃs trātum icchati
a taṃ hanyuḥ kāṣṭhaloṣṭair vā daheyur vā kaṭāgninā
c paśuvan mārayeyur vā kṣatriyā ye syur īdṛśāḥ
a adharmaḥ kṣatriyasyaiṣa yac chayyāmaraṇaṃ bhavet
c visṛjañ śleṣmapittāni kṛpaṇaṃ paridevayan
a avikṣatena dehena pralayaṃ yo 'dhigacchati
c kṣatriyo nāsya tat karma praśaṃsanti purāvidaḥ
a na gṛhe maraṇaṃ tāta kṣatriyāṇāṃ praśasyate
c śauṭīrāṇām aśauṭīram adharmyaṃ kṛpaṇaṃ ca tat
a idaṃ duḥkham aho kaṣṭaṃ pāpīya iti niṣṭanan
c pratidhvastamukhaḥ pūtir amātyān bahu śocayan
a arogāṇāṃ spṛhayate muhur mṛtyum apīcchati
c vīro dṛpto 'bhimānī ca nedṛśaṃ mṛtyum arhati
a raṇeṣu kadanaṃ kṛtvā jñātibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
c tīkṣṇaiḥ śastraiḥ suvikliṣṭaḥ kṣatriyo mṛtyum arhati
a śūro hi satyamanyubhyām āviṣṭo yudhyate bhṛśam
c kṛtyamānāni gātrāṇi parair naivāvabudhyate
a sa saṃkhye nidhanaṃ prāpya praśastaṃ lokapūjitam
c svadharmaṃ vipulaṃ prāpya śakrasyaiti salokatām
a sarvo yodhaḥ paraṃ tyaktum āviṣṭas tyaktajīvitaḥ
c prāpnotīndrasya sālokyaṃ śūraḥ pṛṣṭham adarśayan
d yatra yatra hataḥ śūraḥ śatrubhiḥ parivāritaḥ
d akṣayāṃl labhate lokān yadi dainyaṃ na sevate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ke lokā yudhyamānānāṃ śūrāṇām anivartinām
c bhavanti nidhanaṃ prāpya tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c ambarīṣasya saṃvādam indrasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
a ambarīṣo hi nābhāgaḥ svargaṃ gatvā sudurlabham
c dadarśa suralokasthaṃ śakreṇa sacivaṃ saha
a sarvatejomayaṃ divyaṃ vimānavaram āsthitam
c upary upari gacchantaṃ svaṃ vai senāpatiṃ prabhum
a sa dṛṣṭvopari gacchantaṃ senāpatim udāradhīḥ
b śūrasthānam anuprāptaṃ sudevaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
c ṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā sudevasya vismitaḥ prāha vāsavam
a sāgarāntāṃ mahīṃ kṛtsnām anuśiṣya yathāvidhi
c cāturvarṇye yathāśāstraṃ pravṛtto dharmakāmyayā
a brahmacaryeṇa ghoreṇa ācāryakulasevayā
c vedān adhītya dharmeṇa rājaśāstraṃ ca kevalam
a atithīn annapānena pitṝṃś ca svadhayā tathā
c ṛṣīn svādhyāyadīkṣābhir devān yajñair anuttamaiḥ
a kṣatradharme sthito bhūtvā yathāśāstraṃ yathāvidhi
c udīkṣamāṇaḥ pṛtanāṃ jayāmi yudhi vāsava
d tena puṇyavipākena prāpto 'haṃ tava saṃnidhim
a devarāja sudevo 'yaṃ mama senāpatiḥ purā
c āsīd yodhaḥ praśāntātmā so 'yaṃ kasmād atīva mām
d vimānaṃ sūryasaṃkāśam āsthito modate divi
d śakra uvāca
d aiśvaryam īdṛśaṃ prāptaḥ sarvadevaiḥ sudurlabham
d yad anena kṛtaṃ karma pratyakṣaṃ te mahīpate
d purā pālayataḥ samyak pṛthivīṃ dharmato nṛpa
d śatravo nirjitāḥ sarve ye tavāhitakāriṇaḥ
d saṃdhamo vidhamaś caiva sudhamaś ca mahābalaḥ
d rākṣasā durjayā loke trayas te yuddhadurmadāḥ
d putrās te śataśṛṅgasya rākṣasasya mahīpateḥ
d atha tasmiñ śubhe kāle tava yajñaṃ vitanvataḥ
d aśvamedhaṃ mahāyāgaṃ devānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d tasya te khalu vighnārtham āgatā rākṣasās trayaḥ
d koṭīśataparīvārāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahācamūm
d parigṛhya tataḥ sarvāḥ prajā bandīkṛtās tava
d vihvalāś ca prajāḥ sarvāḥ sarve ca tava sainikāḥ
d nirākṛtas tvayā cāsīt sudevaḥ sainyanāyakaḥ
d tatrāmātyavacaḥ śrutvā nirastaḥ sarvakarmasu
d śrutvā teṣāṃ vaco bhūyaḥ sopadhaṃ vasudhādhipa
d sarvasainyasamāyuktaḥ sudevaḥ preritas tvayā
d rākṣasānāṃ vadhārthāya durjayānāṃ narādhipa
d nājitvā rākṣasīṃ senāṃ punarāgamanaṃ tava
d bandīmokṣam akṛtvā ca na cāgamanam iṣyate
d sudevas tad vacaḥ śrutvā prasthānam akaron nṛpa
d saṃprāptaś ca sa taṃ deśaṃ yatra bandīkṛtāḥ prajāḥ
d paśyati sma mahāghorāṃ rākṣasānāṃ mahācamūm
d dṛṣṭvā saṃcintayām āsa sudevo vāhinīpatiḥ
d neyaṃ śakyā camūr jetum api sendraiḥ surāsuraiḥ
d nāmbarīṣaḥ kalām ekām eṣāṃ kṣapayituṃ kṣamaḥ
d divyāstrabalabhūyiṣṭhaḥ kim ahaṃ punar īdṛśaḥ
d tataḥ senāṃ punaḥ sarvāṃ preṣayām āsa pārthiva
d yatra tvaṃ sahitaḥ sarvair mantribhiḥ sopadhair nṛpa
d tato rudraṃ mahādevaṃ prapanno jagataḥ patim
d śmaśānanilayaṃ devaṃ tuṣṭāva vṛṣabhadhvajam
d stutvā śastraṃ samādāya svaśiraś chettum udyataḥ
d kāruṇyād devadevena gṛhītas tasya dakṣiṇaḥ
d sa pāṇiḥ saha śastreṇa dṛṣṭvā cedam uvāca ha
d kim idaṃ sāhasaṃ putra kartukāmo vadasva me
d sa uvāca mahādevaṃ śirasā tv avanīṃ gataḥ
d bhagavan vāhinīm enāṃ rākṣasānāṃ sureśvara
d aśakto 'haṃ raṇe jetuṃ tasmāt tyakṣyāmi jīvitam
d gatir bhava mahādeva mamārtasya jagatpate
d nāgantavyam ajitvā ca mām āha jagatīpatiḥ
d ambarīṣo mahādeva kṣāritaḥ sacivaiḥ saha
d tam uvāca mahādevaḥ sudevaṃ patitaṃ kṣitau
d adhomukhaṃ mahātmānaṃ sattvānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d dhanurvedaṃ samāhūya sagaṇaṃ sahavigraham
d rathanāgāśvakalilaṃ divyāstrasamalaṃkṛtam
d rathaṃ ca sumahābhāgaṃ yena tat tripuraṃ hatam
d dhanuḥ pinākaṃ khaḍgaṃ ca raudram astraṃ ca śaṃkaraḥ
d nijaghānāsurān sarvān yena devas triyambakaḥ
d uvāca ca mahādevaḥ sudevaṃ vāhinīpatim
d rathād asmāt sudeva tvaṃ durjayas tu surāsuraiḥ
d māyayā mohito bhūmau na padaṃ kartum arhasi
d atrasthas tridaśān sarvāñ jeṣyase sarvadānavān
d rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca na śaktā draṣṭum īdṛśam
d rathaṃ sūryasahasrābhaṃ kim u yoddhuṃ tvayā saha
d sa jitvā rākṣasān sarvān kṛtvā bandīvimokṣaṇam
d ghātayitvā ca tān sarvān bāhuyuddhe tv ayaṃ hataḥ
d vidhamaṃ prāpya bhūpāla vidhamaś ca nipātitaḥ
a nānena kratubhir mukhyair iṣṭaṃ naiva dvijātayaḥ
c tarpitā vidhivac chakra so 'yaṃ kasmād atīva mām
 indra uvāca
a etasya vitatas tāta sudevasya babhūva ha
c saṃgrāmayajñaḥ sumahān yaś cānyo yudhyate naraḥ
a saṃnaddho dīkṣitaḥ sarvo yodhaḥ prāpya camūmukham
c yuddhayajñādhikārastho bhavatīti viniścayaḥ
 ambarīṣa uvāca
a kāni yajñe havīṃṣy atra kim ājyaṃ kā ca dakṣiṇā
c ṛtvijaś cātra ke proktās tan me brūhi śatakrato
 indra uvāca
a ṛtvijaḥ kuñjarās tatra vājino 'dhvaryavas tathā
c havīṃṣi paramāṃsāni rudhiraṃ tv ājyam eva ca
a sṛgālagṛdhrakākolāḥ sadasyās tatra satriṇaḥ
c ājyaśeṣaṃ pibanty ete haviḥ prāśnanti cādhvare
a prāsatomarasaṃghātāḥ khaḍgaśaktiparaśvadhāḥ
c jvalanto niśitāḥ pītāḥ srucas tasyātha satriṇaḥ
a cāpavegāyatas tīkṣṇaḥ parakāyāvadāraṇaḥ
c ṛjuḥ suniśitaḥ pītaḥ sāyako 'sya sruvo mahān
a dvīpicarmāvanaddhaś ca nāgadantakṛtatsaruḥ
c hastihastagataḥ khaḍgaḥ sphyo bhavet tasya saṃyuge
a jvalitair niśitaiḥ pītaiḥ prāsaśaktiparaśvadhaiḥ
c śaikyāyasamayais tīkṣṇair abhighāto bhaved vasu
d saṃkhyāsamayavistīrṇam abhijātodbhavaṃ bahu
a āvegād yat tu rudhiraṃ saṃgrāme syandate bhuvi
c sāsya pūrṇāhutir hotre samṛddhā sarvakāmadhuk
a chindhi bhindhīti yasyaitac chrūyate vāhinīmukhe
c sāmāni sāmagās tasya gāyanti yamasādane
a havirdhānaṃ tu tasyāhuḥ pareṣāṃ vāhinīmukham
c kuñjarāṇāṃ hayānāṃ ca varmiṇāṃ ca samuccayaḥ
e agniḥ śyenacito nāma tasya yajñe vidhīyate
a uttiṣṭhati kabandho 'tra sahasre nihate tu yaḥ
c sa yūpas tasya śūrasya khādiro 'ṣṭāśrir ucyate
a iḍopahūtaṃ krośanti kuñjarā aṅkuśeritāḥ
c vyāghuṣṭatalanādena vaṣaṭkāreṇa pārthiva
e udgātā tatra saṃgrāme trisāmā dundubhiḥ smṛtaḥ
a brahmasve hriyamāṇe yaḥ priyāṃ yuddhe tanuṃ tyajet
c ātmānaṃ yūpam ucchritya sa yajño 'nantadakṣiṇaḥ
a bhartur arthe tu yaḥ śūro vikramed vāhinīmukhe
c bhayān na ca nivarteta tasya lokā yathā mama
a nīlacandrākṛtaiḥ khaḍgair bāhubhiḥ parighopamaiḥ
c yasya vedir upastīrṇā tasya lokā yathā mama
a yas tu nāvekṣate kaṃ cit sahāyaṃ vijaye sthitaḥ
c vigāhya vāhinīmadhyaṃ tasya lokā yathā mama
a yasya tomarasaṃghāṭā bherīmaṇḍūkakacchapā
c vīrāsthiśarkarā durgā māṃsaśoṇitakardamā
a asicarmaplavā sindhuḥ keśaśaivalaśādvalā
c aśvanāgarathaiś caiva saṃbhinnaiḥ kṛtasaṃkramā
a patākādhvajavānīrā hatavāhanavāhinī
c śoṇitodā susaṃpūrṇā dustarā pāragair naraiḥ
a hatanāgamahānakrā paralokavahāśivā
c ṛṣṭikhaḍgadhvajānūkā gṛdhrakaṅkavaḍaplavā
a puruṣādānucaritā bhīrūṇāṃ kaśmalāvahā
c nadī yodhamahāyajñe tad asyāvabhṛthaṃ smṛtam
a vedī yasya tv amitrāṇāṃ śirobhir avakīryate
c aśvaskandhair gajaskandhais tasya lokā yathā mama
a patnīśālā kṛtā yasya pareṣāṃ vāhinīmukham
c havirdhānaṃ svavāhinyas tad asyāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a sadaś cāntarayodhāgnir āgnīdhraś cottarāṃ diśam
c śatrusenākalatrasya sarvalokān adūrataḥ
a yadā tūbhayato vyūho bhavaty ākāśam agrataḥ
c sāsya vedī tathā yajñe nityaṃ vedās trayo 'gnayaḥ
a yas tu yodhaḥ parāvṛttaḥ saṃtrasto hanyate paraiḥ
c apratiṣṭhaṃ sa narakaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
a yasya śoṇitavegena nadī syāt samabhiplutā
c keśamāṃsāsthisaṃkīrṇā sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim
a yas tu senāpatiṃ hatvā tadyānam adhirohati
c sa viṣṇuvikramakrāmī bṛhaspatisamaḥ kratuḥ
a nāyakaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ vā yo vā syāt tatra pūjitaḥ
c jīvagrāhaṃ nigṛhṇāti tasya lokā yathā mama
a āhave nihataṃ śūraṃ na śoceta kadā cana
c aśocyo hi hataḥ śūraḥ svargaloke mahīyate
a na hy annaṃ nodakaṃ tasya na snānaṃ nāpy aśaucakam
c hatasya kartum icchanti tasya lokāñ śṛṇuṣva me
a varāpsaraḥsahasrāṇi śūram āyodhane hatam
c tvaramāṇā hi dhāvanti mama bhartā bhaved iti
a etat tapaś ca puṇyaṃ ca dharmaś caiva sanātanaḥ
c catvāraś cāśramās tasya yo yuddhe na palāyate
a vṛddhaṃ balaṃ na hantavyaṃ naiva strī na ca vai dvijaḥ
c tṛṇapūrṇamukhaś caiva tavāsmīti ca yo vadet
a ahaṃ vṛtraṃ balaṃ pākaṃ śatamāyaṃ virocanam
c durāvāryaṃ ca namuciṃ naikamāyaṃ ca śambaram
a vipracittiṃ ca daiteyaṃ danoḥ putrāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
c prahrādaṃ ca nihatyājau tato devādhipo 'bhavam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity etac chakravacanaṃ niśamya pratigṛhya ca
c yodhānām ātmanaḥ siddhim ambarīṣo 'bhipannavān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c pratardano maithilaś ca saṃgrāmaṃ yatra cakratuḥ
a yajñopavītī saṃgrāme janako maithilo yathā
c yodhān uddharṣayām āsa tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a janako maithilo rājā mahātmā sarvatattvavit
c yodhān svān darśayām āsa svargaṃ narakam eva ca
a abhītānām ime lokā bhāsvanto hanta paśyata
c pūrṇā gandharvakanyābhiḥ sarvakāmaduho 'kṣayāḥ
a ime palāyamānānāṃ narakāḥ pratyupasthitāḥ
c akīrtiḥ śāśvatī caiva patitavyam anantaram
a tān dṛṣṭvārīn vijayato bhūtvā saṃtyāgabuddhayaḥ
c narakasyāpratiṣṭhasya mā bhūta vaśavartinaḥ
a tyāgamūlaṃ hi śūrāṇāṃ svargadvāram anuttamam
c ity uktās te nṛpatinā yodhāḥ parapuraṃjaya
a vyajayanta raṇe śatrūn harṣayanto janeśvaram
c tasmād ātmavatā nityaṃ sthātavyaṃ raṇamūrdhani
a gajānāṃ rathino madhye rathānām anu sādinaḥ
c sādinām antarā sthāpyaṃ pādātam iha daṃśitam
a ya evaṃ vyūhate rājā sa nityaṃ jayate dviṣaḥ
c tasmād evaṃ vidhātavyaṃ nityam eva yudhiṣṭhira
a sarve sukṛtam icchantaḥ suyuddhenātimanyavaḥ
c kṣobhayeyur anīkāni sāgaraṃ makarā iva
a harṣayeyur viṣaṇṇāṃś ca vyavasthāpya parasparam
c jitāṃ ca bhūmiṃ rakṣeta bhagnān nātyanusārayet
a punarāvartamānānāṃ nirāśānāṃ ca jīvite
c na vegaḥ susaho rājaṃs tasmān nātyanusārayet
a na hi prahartum icchanti śūrāḥ prādravatāṃ bhayāt
c tasmāt palāyamānānāṃ kuryān nātyanusāraṇam
a carāṇām acarā hy annam adaṃṣṭrā daṃṣṭriṇām api
c apāṇayaḥ pāṇimatām annaṃ śūrasya kātarāḥ
a samānapṛṣṭhodarapāṇipādāḥ
paścāc chūraṃ bhīravo 'nuvrajanti
c ato bhayārtāḥ praṇipatya bhūyaḥ
kṛtvāñjalīn upatiṣṭhanti śūrān
a śūrabāhuṣu loko 'yaṃ lambate putravat sadā
c tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu śūraḥ saṃmānam arhati
a na hi śauryāt paraṃ kiṃ cit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate
c śūraḥ sarvaṃ pālayati sarvaṃ śūre pratiṣṭhitam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yathā jayārthinaḥ senāṃ nayanti bharatarṣabha
c īṣad dharmaṃ prapīḍyāpi tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a satyena hi sthitā dharmā upapattyā tathāpare
c sādhvācāratayā ke cit tathaivaupayikā api
e upāyadharmān vakṣyāmi siddhārthān arthadharmayoḥ
a nirmaryādā dasyavas tu bhavanti paripanthinaḥ
c teṣāṃ prativighātārthaṃ pravakṣyāmy atha naigamam
e kāryāṇāṃ saṃprasiddhyarthaṃ tān upāyān nibodha me
a ubhe prajñe veditavye ṛjvī vakrā ca bhārata
c jānan vakrāṃ na seveta pratibādheta cāgatām
a amitrā eva rājānaṃ bhedenopacaranty uta
c tāṃ rājā nikṛtiṃ jānan yathāmitrān prabādhate
a gajānāṃ pārśvacarmāṇi govṛṣājagarāṇi ca
c śalyakaṅkaṭalohāni tanutrāṇi matāni ca
a śitapītāni śastrāṇi saṃnāhāḥ pītalohitāḥ
c nānārañjanaraktāḥ syuḥ patākāḥ ketavaś ca te
a ṛṣṭayas tomarāḥ khaḍgā niśitāś ca paraśvadhāḥ
c phalakāny atha carmāṇi pratikalpyāny anekaśaḥ
e abhinītāni śastrāṇi yodhāś ca kṛtaniśramāḥ
a caitryāṃ vā mārgaśīrṣyāṃ vā senāyogaḥ praśasyate
c pakvasasyā hi pṛthivī bhavaty ambumatī tathā
a naivātiśīto nātyuṣṇaḥ kālo bhavati bhārata
c tasmāt tadā yojayeta pareṣāṃ vyasaneṣu vā
e eteṣu yogāḥ senāyāḥ praśastāḥ parabādhane
a jalavāṃs tṛṇavān mārgaḥ samo gamyaḥ praśasyate
c cārair hi vihitābhyāsaḥ kuśalair vanagocaraiḥ
a navyāraṇyair na śakyeta gantuṃ mṛgagaṇair iva
c tasmāt sarvāsu senāsu yojayanti jayārthinaḥ
d agrataḥ puruṣānīkaṃ śaktaṃ bhaktaṃ kulodgatam
a āvāsas toyavān durgaḥ paryākāśaḥ praśasyate
c pareṣām upasarpāṇāṃ pratiṣedhas tathā bhavet
a ākāśaṃ tu vanābhyāśe manyante guṇavattaram
c bahubhir guṇajātais tu ye yuddhakuśalā janāḥ
d upanyāso bhavet tatra balānāṃ nātidūrataḥ
a upanyāso 'pasarpāṇāṃ padātīnāṃ ca gūhanam
c atha śatrupratīghātam āpadarthaṃ parāyaṇam
a saptarṣīn pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā yudhyerann acalā iva
c anena vidhinā rājañ jigīṣetāpi durjayān
a yato vāyur yataḥ sūryo yataḥ śukras tato jayaḥ
c pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ jyāya eṣāṃ saṃnipāte yudhiṣṭhira
a akardamām anudakām amaryādām aloṣṭakām
c aśvabhūmiṃ praśaṃsanti ye yuddhakuśalā janāḥ
a samā nirudakākāśā rathabhūmiḥ praśasyate
c nīcadrumā mahākakṣā sodakā hastiyodhinām
a bahudurgā mahāvṛkṣā vetraveṇubhir āstṛtā
c padātīnāṃ kṣamā bhūmiḥ parvatopavanāni ca
a padātibahulā senā dṛḍhā bhavati bhārata
c rathāśvabahulā senā sudineṣu praśasyate
a padātināgabahulā prāvṛṭkāle praśasyate
c guṇān etān prasaṃkhyāya deśakālau prayojayet
a evaṃ saṃcintya yo yāti tithinakṣatrapūjitaḥ
c vijayaṃ labhate nityaṃ senāṃ samyak prayojayan
a prasuptāṃs tṛṣitāñ śrāntān prakīrṇān nābhighātayet
c mokṣe prayāṇe calane pānabhojanakālayoḥ
a atikṣiptān vyatikṣiptān vihatān pratanūkṛtān
c suvisrambhān kṛtārambhān upanyāsapratāpitān
e bahiścarān upanyāsān kṛtvā veśmānusāriṇaḥ
a pāraṃparyāgate dvāre ye ke cid anuvartinaḥ
c paricaryāvaroddhāro ye ca ke cana valginaḥ
a anīkaṃ ye prabhindanti bhinnaṃ ye sthagayanti ca
c samānāśanapānās te kāryā dviguṇavetanāḥ
d jātigotraṃ ca vijñāya karma cānuttamaṃ śubham
d samānadeharakṣārthe kāryā dviguṇavetanāḥ
d triguṇaṃ caturguṇaṃ caiva vetanaṃ teṣu kārayet
a daśādhipatayaḥ kāryāḥ śatādhipatayas tathā
c teṣāṃ sahasrādhipatiṃ kuryāc chūram atandritam
a yathāmukhyaṃ saṃnipātya vaktavyāḥ sma śapāmahe
c yathā jayārthaṃ saṃgrāme na jahyāma parasparam
a ihaiva te nivartantāṃ ye naḥ ke cana bhīravaḥ
c na ghātayeyuḥ pradaraṃ kurvāṇās tumule sati
d na saṃnipāte pradaraṃ vadhaṃ vā kuryur īdṛśāḥ
a ātmānaṃ ca svapakṣaṃ ca palāyan hanti saṃyuge
c dravyanāśo vadho 'kīrtir ayaśaś ca palāyane
a amanojñāsukhā vācaḥ puruṣasya palāyataḥ
c pratispandauṣṭhadantasya nyastasarvāyudhasya ca
a hitvā palāyamānasya sahāyān prāṇasaṃśaye
c amitrair anubaddhasya dviṣatām astu nas tathā
a manuṣyāpasadā hy ete ye bhavanti parāṅmukhāḥ
c rāśivardhanamātrās te naiva te pretya no iha
a amitrā hṛṣṭamanasaḥ pratyudyānti palāyinam
c jayinaṃ suhṛdas tāta vandanair maṅgalena ca
a yasya sma vyasane rājann anumodanti śatravaḥ
c tad asahyataraṃ duḥkham ahaṃ manye vadhād api
a śriyaṃ jānīta dharmasya mūlaṃ sarvasukhasya ca
c sā bhīrūṇāṃ parān yāti śūras tām adhigacchati
a te vayaṃ svargam icchantaḥ saṃgrāme tyaktajīvitāḥ
c jayanto vadhyamānā vā prāptum arhāma sadgatim
a evaṃ saṃśaptaśapathāḥ samabhityaktajīvitāḥ
c amitravāhinīṃ vīrāḥ saṃpragāhanty abhīravaḥ
a agrataḥ puruṣānīkam asicarmavatāṃ bhavet
c pṛṣṭhataḥ śakaṭānīkaṃ kalatraṃ madhyatas tathā
a pareṣāṃ pratighātārthaṃ padātīnāṃ ca gūhanam
c api hy asmin pare gṛddhā bhaveyur ye purogamāḥ
a ye purastād abhimatāḥ sattvavanto manasvinaḥ

e taṃ papracchopasaṃgṛhya kṛcchrām āpadam āsthitaḥ
a artheṣu bhāgī puruṣa īhamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
c alabdhvā madvidho rājyaṃ brahman kiṃ kartum arhati
a anyatra maraṇāt steyād anyatra parasaṃśrayāt
c kṣudrād anyatra cācārāt tan mamācakṣva sattama
a vyādhinā cābhipannasya mānasenetareṇa vā
c bahuśrutaḥ kṛtaprajñas tvadvidhaḥ śaraṇaṃ bhavet
a nirvidya hi naraḥ kāmān niyamya sukham edhate
c tyaktvā prītiṃ ca śokaṃ ca labdhvāprītimayaṃ vasu
a sukham arthāśrayaṃ yeṣām anuśocāmi tān aham
c mama hy arthāḥ subahavo naṣṭāḥ svapna ivāgatāḥ
a duṣkaraṃ bata kurvanti mahato 'rthāṃs tyajanti ye
c vayaṃ tv enān parityaktum asato 'pi na śaknumaḥ
a imām avasthāṃ saṃprāptaṃ dīnam ārtaṃ śriyaś cyutam
c yad anyat sukham astīha tad brahmann anuśādhi mām
a kausalyenaivam uktas tu rājaputreṇa dhīmatā
c muniḥ kālakavṛkṣīyaḥ pratyuvāca mahādyutiḥ
a purastād eva te buddhir iyaṃ kāryā vijānataḥ
c anityaṃ sarvam evedam ahaṃ ca mama cāsti yat
a yat kiṃ cin manyase 'stīti sarvaṃ nāstīti viddhi tat
c evaṃ na vyathate prājñaḥ kṛcchrām apy āpadaṃ gataḥ
a yad dhi bhūtaṃ bhaviṣyac ca dhruvaṃ tan na bhaviṣyati
c evaṃ viditavedyas tvam adharmebhyaḥ pramokṣyase
a yac ca pūrve samāhāre yac ca pūrvatare pare
c sarvaṃ tan nāsti tac caiva taj jñātvā ko 'nusaṃjvaret
a bhūtvā ca na bhavaty etad abhūtvā ca bhavaty api
c śoke na hy asti sāmarthyaṃ śokaṃ kuryāt kathaṃ naraḥ
a kva nu te 'dya pitā rājan kva nu te 'dya pitāmahaḥ
c na tvaṃ paśyasi tān adya na tvā paśyanti te 'pi ca
a ātmano 'dhruvatāṃ paśyaṃs tāṃs tvaṃ kim anuśocasi
c buddhyā caivānubudhyasva dhruvaṃ hi na bhaviṣyasi
a ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca nṛpate śatravaḥ suhṛdaś ca te
c avaśyaṃ na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvaṃ ca na bhaviṣyati
a ye tu viṃśativarṣā vai triṃśadvarṣāś ca mānavāḥ
c arvāg eva hi te sarve mariṣyanti śaracchatāt
a api cen mahato vittād vipramucyeta pūruṣaḥ
c naitan mameti tan matvā kurvīta priyam ātmanaḥ
a anāgataṃ yan na mameti vidyād
atikrāntaṃ yan na mameti vidyāt
c diṣṭaṃ balīya iti manyamānās
te paṇḍitās tat satāṃ sthānam āhuḥ
a anāḍhyāś cāpi jīvanti rājyaṃ cāpy anuśāsate
c buddhipauruṣasaṃpannās tvayā tulyādhikā janāḥ
a na ca tvam iva śocanti tasmāt tvam api mā śucaḥ
c kiṃ nu tvaṃ tair na vai śreyāṃs tulyo vā buddhipauruṣaiḥ
 rājaputra uvāca
a yādṛcchikaṃ mamāsīt tad rājyam ity eva cintaye
c hriyate sarvam evedaṃ kālena mahatā dvija
a tasyaivaṃ hriyamāṇasya srotaseva tapodhana
c phalam etat prapaśyāmi yathālabdhena vartaye
 munir uvāca
a anāgatam atītaṃ ca yathā tathyaviniścayāt
c nānuśocasi kausalya sarvārtheṣu tathā bhava
a avāpyān kāmayasvārthān nānavāpyān kadā cana
c pratyutpannān anubhavan mā śucas tvam anāgatān
a yathā labdhopapannārthas tathā kausalya raṃsyase
c kaccic chuddhasvabhāvena śriyā hīno na śocasi
a purastād bhūtapūrvatvād dhīnabhāgyo hi durmatiḥ
c dhātāraṃ garhate nityaṃ labdhārthāṃś ca na mṛṣyate
a anarhān api caivānyān manyate śrīmato janān
c etasmāt kāraṇād etad duḥkhaṃ bhūyo 'nuvartate
a īrṣyāticchedasaṃpannā rājan puruṣamāninaḥ
c kaccit tvaṃ na tathā prājña matsarī kosalādhipa
a sahasva śriyam anyeṣāṃ yady api tvayi nāsti sā
c anyatrāpi satīṃ lakṣmīṃ kuśalā bhuñjate janāḥ
e abhiviṣyandate śrīr hi saty api dviṣato janāt
a śriyaṃ ca putrapautraṃ ca manuṣyā dharmacāriṇaḥ
c tyāgadharmavido vīrāḥ svayam eva tyajanty uta
d tyaktaṃ svāyaṃbhuve vaṃśe śubhena bharatena ca
d nānāratnasamākīrṇaṃ rājyaṃ sphītam iti śrutiḥ
d tathānyair bhūmipālaiś ca tyaktaṃ rājyaṃ mahodayam
d tyaktvā rājyāni te sarve vane vanyaphalāśinaḥ
d gatāś ca tapasaḥ pāraṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ ca bhūmipāḥ
a bahu saṃkasukaṃ dṛṣṭvā vivitsāsādhanena ca
c tathānye saṃtyajanty enaṃ matvā paramadurlabham
a tvaṃ punaḥ prājñarūpaḥ san kṛpaṇaṃ paritapyase
c akāmyān kāmayāno 'rthān parācīnān upadrutān
a tāṃ buddhim upajijñāsus tvam evainān parityaja
c anarthāṃś cārtharūpeṇa arthāṃś cānartharūpataḥ
a arthāyaiva hi keṣāṃ cid dhananāśo bhavaty uta
c anantyaṃ taṃ sukhaṃ matvā śriyam anyaḥ parīkṣate
a ramamāṇaḥ śriyā kaś cin nānyac chreyo 'bhimanyate
c tathā tasyehamānasya samārambho vinaśyati
a kṛcchrāl labdham abhipretaṃ yadā kausalya naśyati
c tadā nirvidyate so 'rthāt paribhagnakramo naraḥ
d anityāṃ tāṃ śriyaṃ matvā śriyaṃ vā kaḥ parīpsati
a dharmam eke 'bhipadyante kalyāṇābhijanā narāḥ
c paratra sukham icchanto nirvidyeyuś ca laukikāt
a jīvitaṃ saṃtyajanty eke dhanalobhaparā narāḥ
c na jīvitārthaṃ manyante puruṣā hi dhanād ṛte
a paśya teṣāṃ kṛpaṇatāṃ paśya teṣām abuddhitām
c adhruve jīvite mohād arthatṛṣṇām upāśritāḥ
a saṃcaye ca vināśānte maraṇānte ca jīvite
c saṃyoge viprayogānte ko nu vipraṇayen manaḥ
a dhanaṃ vā puruṣaṃ rājan puruṣo vā punar dhanam
c avaśyaṃ prajahāty etat tad vidvān ko 'nusaṃjvaret
d anyatropanatā hy āpat puruṣaṃ toṣayaty uta
d tena śāntiṃ na labhate nāham eveti kāraṇāt
a anyeṣām api naśyanti suhṛdaś ca dhanāni ca
c paśya buddhyā manuṣyāṇāṃ rājann āpadam ātmanaḥ
e niyaccha yaccha saṃyaccha indriyāṇi mano giram
a pratiṣiddhān avāpyeṣu durlabheṣv ahiteṣu ca
c pratikṛṣṭeṣu bhāveṣu vyatikṛṣṭeṣv asaṃbhave
e prajñānatṛpto vikrāntas tvadvidho nānuśocati
a alpam icchann acapalo mṛdur dāntaḥ susaṃśitaḥ
c brahmacaryopapannaś ca tvadvidho naiva muhyati
a na tv eva jālmīṃ kāpālīṃ vṛttim eṣitum arhasi
c nṛśaṃsavṛttiṃ pāpiṣṭhāṃ duḥkhāṃ kāpuruṣocitām
a api mūlaphalājīvo ramasvaiko mahāvane
c vāgyataḥ saṃgṛhītātmā sarvabhūtadayānvitaḥ
a sadṛśaṃ paṇḍitasyaitad īṣādantena dantinā
c yad eko ramate 'raṇye yac cāpy alpena tuṣyati
a mahāhradaḥ saṃkṣubhita ātmanaiva prasīdati
b itthaṃ naro 'py ātmanaiva kṛtaprajñaḥ prasīdati
c etad evaṃgatasyāhaṃ sukhaṃ paśyāmi kevalam
a asaṃbhave śriyo rājan hīnasya sacivādibhiḥ
c daive pratiniviṣṭe ca kiṃ śreyo manyate bhavān
 munir uvāca
a atha cet pauruṣaṃ kiṃ cit kṣatriyātmani paśyasi
c bravīmi hanta te nītiṃ rājyasya pratipattaye
a tāṃ cec chakṣyasy anuṣṭhātuṃ karma caiva kariṣyasi
c śṛṇu sarvam aśeṣeṇa yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi tattvataḥ
a ācariṣyasi cet karma mahato 'rthān avāpsyasi
c rājyaṃ rājyasya mantraṃ vā mahatīṃ vā punaḥ śriyam
e yady etad rocate rājan punar brūhi bravīmi te
 rājaputra uvāca
a bravītu bhagavān nītim upapanno 'smy ahaṃ prabho
c amogham idam adyāstu tvayā saha samāgatam
 munir uvāca
a hitvā stambhaṃ ca mānaṃ ca krodhaharṣau bhayaṃ tathā
c praty amitraṃ niṣevasva praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ
a tam uttamena śaucena karmaṇā cābhirādhaya
c dātum arhati te vṛttiṃ vaidehaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
a pramāṇaṃ sarvabhūteṣu pragrahaṃ ca gamiṣyasi
c tataḥ sahāyān sotsāhāṃl lapsyase 'vyasanāñ śucīn
a vartamānaḥ svaśāstre vai saṃyatātmā jitendriyaḥ
c abhyuddharati cātmānaṃ prasādayati ca prajāḥ
a tenaiva tvaṃ dhṛtimatā śrīmatā cābhisatkṛtaḥ
c pramāṇaṃ sarvabhūteṣu gatvā pragrahaṇaṃ mahat
a tataḥ suhṛdbalaṃ labdhvā mantrayitvā sumantritam
c antarair bhedayitvārīn bilvaṃ bilvena śātaya
e parair vā saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā balam apy asya ghātaya
a alabhyā ye śubhā bhāvāḥ striyaś cācchādanāni ca
c śayyāsanāni yānāni mahārhāṇi gṛhāṇi ca
a pakṣiṇo mṛgajātāni rasā gandhāḥ phalāni ca
c teṣv eva sajjayethās tvaṃ yathā naśyet svayaṃ paraḥ
a yady eva pratiṣeddhavyo yady upekṣaṇam arhati
b sadaiva rājaśārdūla viduṣā hitam icchatā
c na jātu vivṛtaḥ kāryaḥ śatrur vinayam icchatā
a vasasva paramāmitraviṣaye prājñasaṃmate
c bhajasva śvetakākīyair mitrādhamam anarthakaiḥ
a ārambhāṃś cāsya mahato duṣkarāṃs tvaṃ prayojaya
c nadībandhavirodhāṃś ca balavadbhir virudhyatām
a udyānāni mahārhāṇi śayanāny āsanāni ca
c pratibhogasukhenaiva kośam asya virecaya
a yajñadānapraśaṃsāsmai brāhmaṇeṣv anuvarṇyatām
c te tvatpriyaṃ kariṣyanti taṃ ceṣyanti vṛkā iva
a asaṃśayaṃ puṇyaśīlaḥ prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim
c triviṣṭape puṇyatamaṃ sthānaṃ prāpnoti pārthivaḥ
e kośakṣaye tv amitrāṇāṃ vaśaṃ kausalya gacchati
a ubhayatra prasaktasya dharme cādharma eva ca
c balārthamūlaṃ vyucchidyet tena nandanti śatravaḥ
a nindyāsya mānuṣaṃ karma daivam asyopavarṇaya
c asaṃśayaṃ daivaparaḥ kṣipram eva vinaśyati
a yājayainaṃ viśvajitā sarvasvena viyujyatām
c tato gacchatv asiddhārthaḥ pīḍyamāno mahājanam
a tyāgadharmavidaṃ muṇḍaṃ kaṃ cid asyopavarṇaya
c api tyāgaṃ bubhūṣeta kaccid gacched anāmayam
a siddhenauṣadhayogena sarvaśatruvināśinā
c nāgān aśvān manuṣyāṃś ca kṛtakair upaghātaya
a ete cānye ca bahavo dambhayogāḥ suniścitāḥ
c śakyā viṣahatā kartuṃ naklībena nṛpātmaja
 rājaputra uvāca
a na nikṛtyā na dambhena brahmann icchāmi jīvitum
c nādharmayuktān iccheyam arthān sumahato 'py aham
a purastād eva bhagavan mayaitad apavarjitam
c yena māṃ nābhiśaṅketa yad vā kṛtsnaṃ hitaṃ bhavet
a ānṛśaṃsyena dharmeṇa loke hy asmiñ jijīviṣuḥ
c nāham etad alaṃ kartuṃ naitan mayy upapadyate
 munir uvāca
a upapannas tvam etena yathā kṣatriya bhāṣase
c prakṛtyā hy upapanno 'si buddhyā cādbhutadarśana
a ubhayor eva vām arthe yatiṣye tava tasya ca
c saṃśleṣaṃ vā kariṣyāmi śāśvataṃ hy anapāyinam
a tvādṛśaṃ hi kule jātam anṛśaṃsaṃ bahuśrutam
c amātyaṃ ko na kurvīta rājyapraṇayakovidam
a yas tvaṃ pravrajito rājyād vyasanaṃ cottamaṃ gataḥ
c ānṛśaṃsyena vṛttena kṣatriyecchasi jīvitum
a āgantā madgṛhaṃ tāta vaidehaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
c yathāhaṃ taṃ niyokṣyāmi tat kariṣyaty asaṃśayam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tata āhūya vaidehaṃ munir vacanam abravīt
c ayaṃ rājakule jāto viditābhyantaro mama
a ādarśa iva śuddhātmā śāradaś candramā iva
c nāsmin paśyāmi vṛjinaṃ sarvato me parīkṣitaḥ
a tena te saṃdhir evāstu viśvasāsmin yathā mayi
c na rājyam anamātyena śakyaṃ śāstum amitrahan
a amātyaḥ śūra eva syād buddhisaṃpanna eva ca
c tābhyāṃ caiva bhayaṃ rājñaḥ paśya rājyasya yojanam
e dharmātmanāṃ kva cil loke nānyāsti gatir īdṛśī
a kṛtātmā rājaputro 'yaṃ satāṃ mārgam anuṣṭhitaḥ
c susaṃgṛhītas tv evaiṣa tvayā dharmapurogamaḥ
e saṃsevyamānaḥ śatrūṃs te gṛhṇīyān mahato gaṇān
a yady ayaṃ pratiyudhyet tvāṃ svakarma kṣatriyasya tat
c jigīṣamāṇas tvāṃ yuddhe pitṛpaitāmahe pade
a tvaṃ cāpi pratiyudhyethā vijigīṣuvrate sthitaḥ
c ayuddhvaiva niyogān me vaśe vaideha te sthitaḥ
a sa tvaṃ dharmam avekṣasva tyaktvādharmam asāṃpratam
c na hi kāmān na ca drohāt svadharmaṃ hātum arhasi
a naiva nityaṃ jayas tāta naiva nityaṃ parājayaḥ
c tasmād bhojayitavyaś ca bhoktavyaś ca paro janaḥ
a ātmany eva hi saṃdṛśyāv ubhau jayaparājayau
c niḥśeṣakāriṇāṃ tāta niḥśeṣakaraṇād bhayam
a ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ vacanaṃ brāhmaṇarṣabham
c abhipūjyābhisatkṛtya pūjārham anumānya ca
a yathā brūyān mahāprājño yathā brūyād bahuśrutaḥ
c śreyaskāmo yathā brūyād ubhayor yat kṣamaṃ bhavet
a tathā vacanam ukto 'smi kariṣyāmi ca tat tathā
c etad dhi paramaṃ śreyo na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
a tataḥ kauśalyam āhūya vaideho vākyam abravīt
c dharmato nītitaś caiva balena ca jito mayā
a so 'haṃ tvayā tv ātmaguṇair jitaḥ pārthivasattama
c ātmānam anavajñāya jitavad vartatāṃ bhavān
a nāvamanye ca te buddhiṃ nāvamanye ca pauruṣam
c nāvamanye jayāmīti jitavad vartatāṃ bhavān
a yathāvat pūjito rājan gṛhaṃ gantāsi me gṛhāt
c tataḥ saṃpūjya tau vipraṃ viśvastau jagmatur gṛhān
a vaidehas tv atha kausalyaṃ praveśya gṛham añjasā
c pādyārghyamadhuparkais taṃ pūjārhaṃ pratyapūjayat
a dadau duhitaraṃ cāsmai ratnāni vividhāni ca
c eṣa rājñāṃ paro dharmaḥ sahyau jayaparājayau
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ ca paraṃtapa
c dharmo vṛttaṃ ca vṛttiś ca vṛttyupāyaphalāni ca
a rājñāṃ vṛttaṃ ca kośaś ca kośasaṃjananaṃ mahat
c amātyaguṇavṛddhiś ca prakṛtīnāṃ ca vardhanam
a ṣāḍguṇyaguṇakalpaś ca senānītis tathaiva ca
c duṣṭasya ca parijñānam aduṣṭasya ca lakṣaṇam
a samahīnādhikānāṃ ca yathāval lakṣaṇoccayaḥ
c madhyamasya ca tuṣṭyarthaṃ yathā stheyaṃ vivardhatā
a kṣīṇasaṃgrahavṛttiś ca yathāvat saṃprakīrtitā
c laghunādeśarūpeṇa granthayogena bhārata
a vijigīṣos tathāvṛttam uktaṃ caiva tathaiva te
c gaṇānāṃ vṛttim icchāmi śrotuṃ matimatāṃ vara
a yathā gaṇāḥ pravardhante na bhidyante ca bhārata
c arīn hi vijigīṣante suhṛdaḥ prāpnuvanti ca
a bhedamūlo vināśo hi gaṇānām upalabhyate
c mantrasaṃvaraṇaṃ duḥkhaṃ bahūnām iti me matiḥ
a etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ nikhilena paraṃtapa
c yathā ca te na bhidyeraṃs tac ca me brūhi pārthiva
 bhīṣma uvāca
a gaṇānāṃ ca kulānāṃ ca rājñāṃ ca bharatarṣabha
c vairasaṃdīpanāv etau lobhāmarṣau janādhipa
a lobham eko hi vṛṇute tato 'marṣam anantaram
c tau kṣayavyayasaṃyuktāv anyonyajanitāśrayau
a cāramantrabalādānaiḥ sāmadānavibhedanaiḥ
c kṣayavyayabhayopāyaiḥ karśayantītaretaram
a tatra dānena bhidyante gaṇāḥ saṃghātavṛttayaḥ
c bhinnā vimanasaḥ sarve gacchanty arivaśaṃ bhayāt
a bhedād gaṇā vinaśyanti bhinnāḥ sūpajapāḥ paraiḥ
c tasmāt saṃghātayogeṣu prayateran gaṇāḥ sadā
a arthā hy evādhigamyante saṃghātabalapauruṣāt
c bāhyāś ca maitrīṃ kurvanti teṣu saṃghātavṛttiṣu
a jñānavṛddhān praśaṃsantaḥ śuśrūṣantaḥ parasparam
c vinivṛttābhisaṃdhānāḥ sukham edhanti sarvaśaḥ
a dharmiṣṭhān vyavahārāṃś ca sthāpayantaś ca śāstrataḥ
c yathāvat saṃpravartanto vivardhante gaṇottamāḥ
a putrān bhrātṝn nigṛhṇanto vinaye ca sadā ratāḥ
c vinītāṃś ca pragṛhṇanto vivardhante gaṇottamāḥ
a cāramantravidhāneṣu kośasaṃnicayeṣu ca
c nityayuktā mahābāho vardhante sarvato gaṇāḥ
a prājñāñ śūrān maheṣvāsān karmasu sthirapauruṣān
c mānayantaḥ sadā yuktā vivardhante gaṇā nṛpa
a dravyavantaś ca śūrāś ca śastrajñāḥ śāstrapāragāḥ
c kṛcchrāsv āpatsu saṃmūḍhān gaṇān uttārayanti te
a krodho bhedo bhayo daṇḍaḥ karśanaṃ nigraho vadhaḥ
c nayanty arivaśaṃ sadyo gaṇān bharatasattama
a tasmān mānayitavyās te gaṇamukhyāḥ pradhānataḥ
c lokayātrā samāyattā bhūyasī teṣu pārthiva
a mantraguptiḥ pradhāneṣu cāraś cāmitrakarśana
c na gaṇāḥ kṛtsnaśo mantraṃ śrotum arhanti bhārata
a gaṇamukhyais tu saṃbhūya kāryaṃ gaṇahitaṃ mithaḥ
c pṛthag gaṇasya bhinnasya vimatasya tato 'nyathā
e arthāḥ pratyavasīdanti tathānarthā bhavanti ca
a teṣām anyonyabhinnānāṃ svaśaktim anutiṣṭhatām
c nigrahaḥ paṇḍitaiḥ kāryaḥ kṣipram eva pradhānataḥ
a kuleṣu kalahā jātāḥ kulavṛddhair upekṣitāḥ
c gotrasya rājan kurvanti gaṇasaṃbhedakārikām
a ābhyantaraṃ bhayaṃ rakṣyaṃ surakṣyaṃ bāhyato bhayam
c abhyantarād bhayaṃ jātaṃ sadyo mūlaṃ nikṛntati
a akasmāt krodhalobhād vā mohād vāpi svabhāvajāt
c anyonyaṃ nābhibhāṣante tat parābhavalakṣaṇam
a jātyā ca sadṛśāḥ sarve kulena sadṛśās tathā
c na tu śauryeṇa buddhyā vā rūpadravyeṇa vā punaḥ
a bhedāc caiva pramādāc ca nāmyante ripubhir gaṇāḥ
c tasmāt saṃghātam evāhur gaṇānāṃ śaraṇaṃ mahat
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a mahān ayaṃ dharmapatho bahuśākhaś ca bhārata
c kiṃ svid eveha dharmāṇām anuṣṭheyatamaṃ matam
a kiṃ kāryaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ garīyo bhavato matam
c yathāyaṃ puruṣo dharmam iha ca pretya cāpnuyāt
 bhīṣma uvāca
a mātāpitror gurūṇāṃ ca pūjā bahumatā mama
c atra yukto naro lokān yaśaś ca mahad aśnute
a yad ete hy abhijānīyuḥ karma tāta supūjitāḥ
c dharmyaṃ dharmaviruddhaṃ vā tat kartavyaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a na tair anabhyanujñāto dharmam anyaṃ prakalpayet
c yam ete 'bhyanujānīyuḥ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
a eta eva trayo lokā eta evāśramās trayaḥ
c eta eva trayo vedā eta eva trayo 'gnayaḥ
a pitā hy agnir gārhapatyo mātāgnir dakṣiṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
c gurur āhavanīyas tu sāgnitretā garīyasī
a triṣv apramādyann eteṣu trīṃl lokān avajeṣyasi
c pitṛvṛttyā tv imaṃ lokaṃ mātṛvṛttyā tathāparam
e brahmalokaṃ guror vṛttyā nityam eva cariṣyasi
a samyag eteṣu vartasva triṣu lokeṣu bhārata
c yaśaḥ prāpsyasi bhadraṃ te dharmaṃ ca sumahāphalam
a naitān atiśayej jātu nātyaśnīyān na dūṣayet
c nityaṃ paricarec caiva tad vai sukṛtam uttamam
e kīrtiṃ puṇyaṃ yaśo lokān prāpsyase ca janādhipa
a sarve tasyādṛtā lokā yasyaite traya ādṛtāḥ
c anādṛtās tu yasyaite sarvās tasyāphalāḥ kriyāḥ
a naivāyaṃ na paro lokas tasya caiva paraṃtapa
c amānitā nityam eva yasyaite guravas trayaḥ
a na cāsmin na pare loke yaśas tasya prakāśate
c na cānyad api kalyāṇaṃ pāratraṃ samudāhṛtam
a tebhya eva tu tat sarvaṃ kṛtyayā visṛjāmy aham
c tad āsīn me śataguṇaṃ sahasraguṇam eva ca
e tasmān me saṃprakāśante trayo lokā yudhiṣṭhira
a daśaiva tu sadācāryaḥ śrotriyān atiricyate
c daśācāryān upādhyāya upādhyāyān pitā daśa
a pitṝn daśa tu mātaikā sarvāṃ vā pṛthivīm api
c gurutvenābhibhavati nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ
e gurur garīyān pitṛto mātṛtaś ceti me matiḥ
a ubhau hi mātāpitarau janmani vyupayujyataḥ
c śarīram etau sṛjataḥ pitā mātā ca bhārata
e ācāryaśiṣṭā yā jātiḥ sā divyā sājarāmarā
a avadhyā hi sadā mātā pitā cāpy apakāriṇau
c na saṃduṣyati tat kṛtvā na ca te dūṣayanti tam
e dharmāya yatamānānāṃ vidur devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
a ya āvṛṇoty avitathena karṇāv
ṛtaṃ bruvann amṛtaṃ saṃprayacchan
c taṃ vai manye pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
tasmai na druhyet kṛtam asya jānan
a vidyāṃ śrutvā ye guruṃ nādriyante
pratyāsannaṃ manasā karmaṇā vā
b teṣāṃ pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃ
b na cāsya tad brahmaphalaṃ dadāti
c yathaiva te gurubhir bhāvanīyās
tathā teṣāṃ guravo 'py arcanīyāḥ
a tasmāt pūjayitavyāś ca saṃvibhajyāś ca yatnataḥ
c guravo 'rcayitavyāś ca purāṇaṃ dharmam icchatā
a yena prītāś ca pitaras tena prītaḥ pitāmahaḥ
c prīṇāti mātaraṃ yena pṛthivī tena pūjitā
a yena prīṇāty upādhyāyaṃ tena syād brahma pūjitam
c mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaś caiva tasmāt pūjyatamo guruḥ
e ṛṣayaś ca hi devāś ca prīyante pitṛbhiḥ saha
f pūjyamāneṣu guruṣu tasmāt pūjyatamo guruḥ
a na kena cana vṛttena hy avajñeyo gurur bhavet
c na ca mātā na ca pitā tādṛśo yādṛśo guruḥ
a na te 'vamānam arhanti na ca te dūṣayanti tam
c gurūṇām eva satkāraṃ vidur devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
a upādhyāyaṃ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
ye 'bhidruhyanti manasā karmaṇā vā
c teṣāṃ pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃ
tasmān nānyaḥ pāpakṛd asti loke
d bhṛto vṛddho yo na bibharti putraḥ
d svayonijaḥ pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
d tad vai pāpaṃ bhrūṇahatyāviśiṣṭaṃ
d tasmān nānyaḥ pāpakṛd asti loke
a mitradruhaḥ kṛtaghnasya strīghnasya piśunasya ca
c caturṇāṃ vayam eteṣāṃ niṣkṛtiṃ nānuśuśrumaḥ
a etat sarvam atideśena sṛṣṭaṃ
yat kartavyaṃ puruṣeṇeha loke
c etac chreyo nānyad asmād viśiṣṭaṃ
sarvān dharmān anusṛtyaitad uktam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ dharme sthātum icchan naro varteta bhārata
c vidvañ jijñāsamānāya prabrūhi bharatarṣabha
a satyaṃ caivānṛtaṃ cobhe lokān āvṛtya tiṣṭhataḥ
c tayoḥ kim ācared rājan puruṣo dharmaniścitaḥ
a kiṃ svit satyaṃ kim anṛtaṃ kiṃ svid dharmyaṃ sanātanam
c kasmin kāle vadet satyaṃ kasmin kāle 'nṛtaṃ vadet
 bhīṣma uvāca
a satyasya vacanaṃ sādhu na satyād vidyate param
c yad bhūloke sudurjñātaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi bhārata
a bhavet satyaṃ na vaktavyaṃ vaktavyam anṛtaṃ bhavet
c yatrānṛtaṃ bhavet satyaṃ satyaṃ vāpy anṛtaṃ bhavet
a tādṛśe muhyate bālo yatra satyam aniṣṭhitam
c satyānṛte viniścitya tato bhavati dharmavit
a apy anāryo 'kṛtaprajñaḥ puruṣo 'pi sudāruṇaḥ
c sumahat prāpnuyāt puṇyaṃ balāko 'ndhavadhād iva
a kim āścaryaṃ ca yan mūḍho dharmakāmo 'py adharmavit
c sumahat prāpnuyāt pāpaṃ gaṅgāyām iva kauśikaḥ
a tādṛśo 'yam anupraśno yatra dharmaḥ sudurvacaḥ
c duṣkaraḥ pratisaṃkhyātuṃ tarkeṇātra vyavasyati
a prabhāvārthāya bhūtānāṃ dharmapravacanaṃ kṛtam
c yat syād ahiṃsāsaṃyuktaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
d ahiṃsārthāya bhūtānāṃ dharmapravacanaṃ kṛtam
d yat syād ahiṃsāsaṃyuktaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
d ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tapo dānaṃ damo matiḥ
d anasūyāpy amātsaryam anīrṣyā śīlam eva ca
d eṣa dharmaḥ kuruśreṣṭha kathitaḥ parameṣṭhinā
d brahmaṇā devadevena ayaṃ caiva sanātanaḥ
d asmin dharme sthito rājan naro bhadrāṇi paśyati
d śrauto vadhātmako dharma ahiṃsā paramārthikaḥ
a dhāraṇād dharma ity āhur dharmeṇa vidhṛtāḥ prajāḥ
c yat syād dhāraṇasaṃyuktaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
d hitaṃ syād yatra bhūtānāṃ patitānāṃ susaṃkaṭe
a śrutidharma iti hy eke nety āhur apare janāḥ
c na tu tat pratyasūyāmo na hi sarvaṃ vidhīyate
a ye 'nyāyena jihīrṣanto dhanam icchanti karhi cit
c tebhyas tan na tad ākhyeyaṃ sa dharma iti niścayaḥ
a akūjanena cen mokṣo nātra kūjet kathaṃ cana
c avaśyaṃ kūjitavyaṃ vā śaṅkeran vāpy akūjanāt
d ye 'nye cāpy anṛtaṃ kuryuḥ kuryād eva vicāraṇam
a śreyas tatrānṛtaṃ vaktuṃ satyād iti vicāritam
b akṣayebhyo vadhaṃ rājan kuryād evāvicārayan
b abuddhānuśaye doṣaṃ śreyas tatrānṛtaṃ bhavet
b na stenaiḥ saha saṃbandhān mucyate śapathād api
b śreyas tatrānṛtaṃ vaktuṃ satyād iti hi dhāraṇā
c yaḥ pāpaiḥ saha saṃbandhān mucyate śapathād iti
a na ca tebhyo dhanaṃ deyaṃ śakye sati kathaṃ cana
c pāpebhyo hi dhanaṃ dattaṃ dātāram api pīḍayet
a svaśarīroparodhena varam ādātum icchataḥ
c satyasaṃpratipattyarthaṃ ye brūyuḥ sākṣiṇaḥ kva cit
e anuktvā tatra tad vācyaṃ sarve te 'nṛtavādinaḥ
a prāṇātyaye vivāhe ca vaktavyam anṛtaṃ bhavet
c arthasya rakṣaṇārthāya pareṣāṃ dharmakāraṇāt
e pareṣāṃ dharmam ākāṅkṣan nīcaḥ syād dharmabhikṣukaḥ
a pratiśrutya tu dātavyaṃ śvaḥkāryas tu balātkṛtaḥ
c yaḥ kaś cid dharmasamayāt pracyuto 'dharmam āsthitaḥ
d dambhenaiva sa hantavyas taṃ panthānaṃ samāśritaḥ
d cyutaḥ sadaiva dharmebhyo 'mānavaṃ dharmam āsthitaḥ
a śaṭhaḥ svadharmam utsṛjya tam icched upajīvitum
c sarvopāyair nihantavyaḥ pāpo nikṛtijīvanaḥ
a dhanam ity eva pāpānāṃ sarveṣām iha niścayaḥ
c ye 'viṣahyā hy asaṃbhojyā nikṛtyā patanaṃ gatāḥ
a cyutā devamanuṣyebhyo yathā pretās tathaiva te
b niryajñās tapasā hīnā mā sma taiḥ saha saṃgamaḥ
c dhanādānād duḥkhataraṃ jīvitād viprayojanam
a ayaṃ vo rocatāṃ dharma iti vācyaḥ prayatnataḥ
c na kaś cid asti pāpānāṃ dharma ity eṣa niścayaḥ
a tathāgataṃ ca yo hanyān nāsau pāpena lipyate
c svakarmaṇā hataṃ hanti hata eva sa hanyate
e teṣu yaḥ samayaṃ kaś cit kurvīta hatabuddhiṣu
a yathā kākaś ca gṛdhraś ca tathaivopadhijīvinaḥ
c ūrdhvaṃ dehavimokṣānte bhavanty etāsu yoniṣu
a yasmin yathā vartate yo manuṣyas
tasmiṃs tathā vartitavyaṃ sa dharmaḥ
c māyācāro māyayā vartitavyaḥ
sādhvācāraḥ sādhunā pratyudeyaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kliśyamāneṣu bhūteṣu tais tair bhāvais tatas tataḥ
c durgāṇy atitared yena tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a āśrameṣu yathokteṣu yathoktaṃ ye dvijātayaḥ
c vartante saṃyatātmāno durgāṇy atitaranti te
a ye dambhān na japanti sma yeṣāṃ vṛttiś ca saṃvṛtā
c viṣayāṃś ca nigṛhṇanti durgāṇy atitaranti te
d pratyāhur nocyamānā ye na hiṃsanti ca hiṃsitāḥ
d prayacchanti na yācante durgāṇy atitaranti te
a vāsayanty atithīn nityaṃ nityaṃ ye cānasūyakāḥ
c nityaṃ svādhyāyaśīlāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
a mātāpitroś ca ye vṛttiṃ vartante dharmakovidāḥ
c varjayanti divāsvapnaṃ durgāṇy atitaranti te
a sveṣu dāreṣu vartante nyāyavṛtteṣv ṛtāv ṛtau
c agnihotraparāḥ santo durgāṇy atitaranti te
a ye na lobhān nayanty arthān rājāno rajasāvṛtāḥ
c viṣayān parirakṣanto durgāṇy atitaranti te
a āhaveṣu ca ye śūrās tyaktvā maraṇajaṃ bhayam
c dharmeṇa jayam icchanto durgāṇy atitaranti te
a ye pāpāni na kurvanti karmaṇā manasā girā
c nikṣiptadaṇḍā bhūteṣu durgāṇy atitaranti te
a ye vadantīha satyāni prāṇatyāge 'py upasthite
c pramāṇabhūtā bhūtānāṃ durgāṇy atitaranti te
a anadhyāyeṣu ye viprāḥ svādhyāyaṃ naiva kurvate
c taponityāḥ sutapaso durgāṇy atitaranti te
a karmāṇy akuhakārthāni yeṣāṃ vācaś ca sūnṛtāḥ
c yeṣām arthāś ca sādhvarthā durgāṇy atitaranti te
a ye tapaś ca tapasyanti kaumārabrahmacāriṇaḥ
c vidyāvedavratasnātā durgāṇy atitaranti te
a ye ca saṃśāntarajasaḥ saṃśāntatamasaś ca ye
c satye sthitā mahātmāno durgāṇy atitaranti te
a yeṣāṃ na kaś cit trasati trasanti na ca kasya cit
c yeṣām ātmasamo loko durgāṇy atitaranti te
a paraśriyā na tapyante ye santaḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
c grāmyād annān nivṛttāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
a sarvān devān namasyanti sarvān dharmāṃś ca śṛṇvate
c ye śraddadhānā dāntāś ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
a ye na mānitam icchanti mānayanti ca ye param
c mānyamānā na manyante durgāṇy atitaranti te
a ye śrāddhāni ca kurvanti tithyāṃ tithyāṃ prajārthinaḥ
c suviśuddhena manasā durgāṇy atitaranti te
a ye krodhaṃ naiva kurvanti kruddhān saṃśamayanti ca
c na ca kupyanti bhṛtyebhyo durgāṇy atitaranti te
a madhu māṃsaṃ ca ye nityaṃ varjayantīha mānavāḥ
c janmaprabhṛti madyaṃ ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
a yātrārthaṃ bhojanaṃ yeṣāṃ saṃtānārthaṃ ca maithunam
c vāk satyavacanārthāya durgāṇy atitaranti te
a īśvaraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jagataḥ prabhavāpyayam
c bhaktā nārāyaṇaṃ ye ca durgāṇy atitaranti te
a ya eṣa raktapadmākṣaḥ pītavāsā mahābhujaḥ
c suhṛd bhrātā ca mitraṃ ca saṃbandhī ca tavācyutaḥ
a ya imān sakalāṃl lokāṃś carmavat pariveṣṭayet
c icchan prabhur acintyātmā govindaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
a sthitaḥ priyahite jiṣṇoḥ sa eṣa puruṣarṣabha
c rājaṃs tava ca durdharṣo vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
a ya enaṃ saṃśrayantīha bhaktyā nārāyaṇaṃ harim
c te tarantīha durgāṇi na me 'trāsti vicāraṇā
d asminn arpitakarmāṇaḥ sarvabhāvena bhārata
d kṛṣṇe kamalapatrākṣe durgāṇy atitaranti te
d lokarakṣārtham utpannam adityāṃ kaśyapātmajam
d devam indraṃ namasyanti durgāṇy atitaranti te
d brahmāṇaṃ lokakartāraṃ ye namasyanti satpatim
d yaṣṭavyaṃ kratubhir devaṃ durgāṇy atitaranti te
d yaṃ viṣṇur indraḥ śaṃbhuś ca brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
d stuvanti vividhaiḥ stotrair devadevaṃ maheśvaram
d tam arcayanti ye śaśvad durgāṇy atitaranti te
a durgātitaraṇaṃ ye ca paṭhanti śrāvayanti ca
c pāṭhayanti ca viprebhyo durgāṇy atitaranti te
a iti kṛtyasamuddeśaḥ kīrtitas te mayānagha
c saṃtared yena durgāṇi paratreha ca mānavaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a asaumyāḥ saumyarūpeṇa saumyāś cāsaumyadarśinaḥ
c īdṛśān puruṣāṃs tāta kathaṃ vidyāmahe vayam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c vyāghragomāyusaṃvādaṃ taṃ nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a purikāyāṃ puri purā śrīmatyāṃ pauriko nṛpaḥ
c parahiṃsāruciḥ krūro babhūva puruṣādhamaḥ
a sa tv āyuṣi parikṣīṇe jagāmānīpsitāṃ gatim
c gomāyutvaṃ ca saṃprāpto dūṣitaḥ pūrvakarmaṇā
a saṃsmṛtya pūrvajātiṃ sa nirvedaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
c na bhakṣayati māṃsāni parair upahṛtāny api
a ahiṃsraḥ sarvabhūteṣu satyavāk sudṛḍhavrataḥ
c cakāra ca yathākāmam āhāraṃ patitaiḥ phalaiḥ
d parṇāhāraḥ kadā cic ca niyamavratavān api
d kadā cid udakenāpi vartayann anuyantritaḥ
a śmaśāne tasya cāvāso gomāyoḥ saṃmato 'bhavat
c janmabhūmyanurodhāc ca nānyad vāsam arocayat
a tasya śaucam amṛṣyantaḥ sarve te sahajātayaḥ
c cālayanti sma tāṃ buddhiṃ vacanaiḥ praśrayottaraiḥ
a vasan pitṛvane raudre śaucaṃ lapsitum icchasi
c iyaṃ vipratipattis te yadā tvaṃ piśitāśanaḥ
a tatsamo vā bhavāsmābhir bhakṣyān dāsyāmahe vayam
c bhuṅkṣva śaucaṃ parityajya yad dhi bhuktaṃ tad asti te
a iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā pratyuvāca samāhitaḥ
c madhuraiḥ praśritair vākyair hetumadbhir aniṣṭhuraiḥ
a apramāṇaṃ prasūtir me śīlataḥ kriyate kulam
c prārthayiṣye tu tat karma yena vistīryate yaśaḥ
a śmaśāne yadi vāso me samādhir me niśāmyatām
c ātmā phalati karmāṇi nāśramo dharmalakṣaṇam
a āśrame yo dvijaṃ hanyād gāṃ vā dadyād anāśrame
c kiṃ nu tat pātakaṃ na syāt tad vā dattaṃ vṛthā bhavet
a bhavantaḥ sarvalobhena kevalaṃ bhakṣaṇe ratāḥ
c anubandhe tu ye doṣās tān na paśyanti mohitāḥ
a apratyayakṛtāṃ garhyām arthāpanayadūṣitām
c iha cāmutra cāniṣṭāṃ tasmād vṛttiṃ na rocaye
a taṃ śuciṃ paṇḍitaṃ matvā śārdūlaḥ khyātavikramaḥ
c kṛtvātmasadṛśāṃ pūjāṃ sācivye 'vardhayat svayam
a saumya vijñātarūpas tvaṃ gaccha yātrāṃ mayā saha
c vriyantām īpsitā bhogāḥ parihāryāś ca puṣkalāḥ
a tīkṣṇā vayam iti khyātā bhavato jñāpayāmahe
c mṛdupūrvaṃ ghātinas te śreyaś cādhigamiṣyati
a atha saṃpūjya tad vākyaṃ mṛgendrasya mahātmanaḥ
c gomāyuḥ praśritaṃ vākyaṃ babhāṣe kiṃ cid ānataḥ
a sadṛśaṃ mṛgarājaitat tava vākyaṃ madantare
c yat sahāyān mṛgayase dharmārthakuśalāñ śucīn
a na śakyam anamātyena mahattvam anuśāsitum
c duṣṭāmātyena vā vīra śarīraparipanthinā
a sahāyān anuraktāṃs tu yatetānupasaṃhitān
c parasparam asaṃghuṣṭān vijigīṣūn alolupān
a tān atītopadhān prājñān hite yuktān manasvinaḥ
c pūjayethā mahābhāgān yathācāryān yathā pitṝn
a na tv evaṃ mama saṃtoṣād rocate 'nyan mṛgādhipa
c na kāmaye sukhān bhogān aiśvaryaṃ vā tvadāśrayam
a na yokṣyati hi me śīlaṃ tava bhṛtyaiḥ purātanaiḥ

a asatyāḥ satyasaṃkāśāḥ satyāś cāsatyadarśinaḥ

a svasaṃtuṣṭāś cyutāḥ sthānān mānāt pratyavaropitāḥ
c svayaṃ copahṛtā bhṛtyā ye cāpy upahṛtāḥ paraiḥ
a parikṣīṇāś ca lubdhāś ca krūrāḥ kārābhitāpitāḥ

a saṃtāpitāś ca ye ke cid vyasanaughapratīkṣiṇaḥ
c antarhitāḥ sopahitāḥ sarve te parasādhanāḥ
a avamānena yuktasya sthāpitasya ca me punaḥ

a śaṅkitas tvam ahaṃ bhītaḥ pare chidrānudarśinaḥ
c asnigdhāś caiva dustoṣāḥ karma caitad bahucchalam

a duḥkhena śleṣyate bhinnaṃ śliṣṭaṃ duḥkhena bhidyate

c kāryāpekṣā hi vartante bhāvāḥ snigdhās tu durlabhāḥ
a suduḥkhaṃ puruṣajñānaṃ cittaṃ hy eṣāṃ calācalam

 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c saritāṃ caiva saṃvādaṃ sāgarasya ca bhārata

 bhīṣma uvāca
a śrūyatāṃ pṛthivīpāla yathaiṣo 'rtho 'nugīyate

c vāg evārtho bhavet tasya na hy evārtho jighāṃsataḥ

a yasyāvācyaṃ na loke 'sti nākāryaṃ vāpi kiṃ cana
c vācaṃ tena na saṃdadhyāc chuciḥ saṃkliṣṭakarmaṇā
a pratyakṣaṃ guṇavādī yaḥ parokṣaṃ tu vinindakaḥ
c sa mānavaḥ śvaval loke naṣṭalokaparāyaṇaḥ
a tādṛg janaśatasyāpi yad dadāti juhoti ca
c parokṣeṇāpavādena tan nāśayati sa kṣaṇāt
a tasmāt prājño naraḥ sadyas tādṛśaṃ pāpacetasam
c varjayet sādhubhir varjyaṃ sārameyāmiṣaṃ yathā
a parivādaṃ bruvāṇo hi durātmā vai mahātmane
c prakāśayati doṣān svān sarpaḥ phaṇam ivocchritam
a taṃ svakarmāṇi kurvāṇaṃ pratikartuṃ ya icchati

a manuṣyaśālāvṛkam apraśāntaṃ

c mātaṅgam unmattam ivonnadantaṃ

a adhīrajuṣṭe pathi vartamānaṃ

c arivrataṃ nityam abhūtikāmaṃ
dhig astu taṃ pāpamatiṃ manuṣyam
a pratyucyamānas tu hi bhūya ebhir

c uccasya nīcena hi saṃprayogaṃ
vigarhayanti sthirabuddhayo ye
a kruddho daśārdhena hi tāḍayed vā
sa pāṃsubhir vāpakiret tuṣair vā
c vivṛtya dantāṃś ca vibhīṣayed vā

a vigarhaṇāṃ paramadurātmanā kṛtāṃ
saheta yaḥ saṃsadi durjanān naraḥ
c paṭhed idaṃ cāpi nidarśanaṃ sadā
