 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pitāmaha mahāprājña saṃśayo me mahān ayam
c sa cchettavyas tvayā rājan bhavān kulakaro hi naḥ
a puruṣāṇām ayaṃ tāta durvṛttānāṃ durātmanām
c kathito vākyasaṃcāras tato vijñāpayāmi te
a yad dhitaṃ rājyatantrasya kulasya ca sukhodayam
c āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca kṣemavṛddhikaraṃ ca yat
a putrapautrābhirāmaṃ ca rāṣṭravṛddhikaraṃ ca yat
c annapāne śarīre ca hitaṃ yat tad bravīhi me
a abhiṣikto hi yo rājā rājyastho mitrasaṃvṛtaḥ
c asuhṛt samupeto vā sa kathaṃ rañjayet prajāḥ
a yo hy asatpragraharatiḥ sneharāgabalātkṛtaḥ
c indriyāṇām anīśatvād asajjanabubhūṣakaḥ
a tasya bhṛtyā viguṇatāṃ yānti sarve kulodgatāḥ
c na ca bhṛtyaphalair arthaiḥ sa rājā saṃprayujyate
a etān me saṃśayasthasya rājadharmān sudurlabhān
c bṛhaspatisamo buddhyā bhavāñ śaṃsitum arhati
a śaṃsitā puruṣavyāghra tvaṃ naḥ kulahite rataḥ
c kṣattā caiva paṭuprajño yo naḥ śaṃsati sarvadā
a tvattaḥ kulahitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā rājyahitodayam
c amṛtasyāvyayasyeva tṛptaḥ svapsyāmy ahaṃ sukham
a kīdṛṣāḥ saṃnikarṣasthā bhṛtyāḥ syur vā guṇānvitāḥ
c kīdṛśaiḥ kiṃkulīnair vā saha yātrā vidhīyate
a na hy eko bhṛtyarahito rājā bhavati rakṣitā
c rājyaṃ cedaṃ janaḥ sarvas tat kulīno 'bhiśaṃsati
a na hi praśāstuṃ rājyaṃ hi śakyam ekena bhārata
c asahāyavatā tāta naivārthāḥ ke cid apy uta
e labdhuṃ labdhvā cāpi sadā rakṣituṃ bharatarṣabha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yasya bhṛtyajanaḥ sarvo jñānavijñānakovidaḥ
c hitaiṣī kulajaḥ snigdhaḥ sa rājyaphalam aśnute
a mantriṇo yasya kulajā asaṃhāryāḥ sahoṣitāḥ
c nṛpater matidāḥ santi saṃbandhajñānakovidāḥ
a anāgatavidhātāraḥ kālajñānaviśāradāḥ
c atikrāntam aśocantaḥ sa rājyaphalam aśnute
a samaduḥkhasukhā yasya sahāyāḥ satyakāriṇaḥ
c arthacintāparā yasya sa rājyaphalam aśnute
a yasya nārto janapadaḥ saṃnikarṣagataḥ sadā
c akṣudraḥ satpathālambī sa rājyaphalabhāg bhavet
a kośākṣapaṭalaṃ yasya kośavṛddhikarair janaiḥ
c āptais tuṣṭaiś ca satataṃ dhāryate sa nṛpottamaḥ
a koṣṭhāgāram asaṃhāryair āptaiḥ saṃcayatatparaiḥ
c pātrabhūtair alubdhaiś ca pālyamānaṃ guṇībhavet
a vyavahāraś ca nagare yasya karmaphalodayaḥ
c dṛśyate śaṅkhalikhitaḥ sa dharmaphalabhāg bhavet
a saṃgṛhītamanuṣyaś ca yo rājā rājadharmavit
c ṣaḍvargaṃ pratigṛhṇan sa dharmāt phalam upāśnute
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
 na santi kulajā yatra sahāyāḥ pārthivasya tu
 akulīnāś ca kartavyā na vā bharatasattama
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c nidarśanakaraṃ loke sajjanācaritaṃ sadā
a asyaivārthasya sadṛśaṃ yac chrutaṃ me tapovane
c jāmadagnyasya rāmasya yad uktam ṛṣisattamaiḥ
a vane mahati kasmiṃś cid amanuṣyaniṣevite
c ṛṣir mūlaphalāhāro niyato niyatendriyaḥ
a dīkṣādamaparaḥ śāntaḥ svādhyāyaparamaḥ śuciḥ
c upavāsaviśuddhātmā satataṃ satpathe sthitaḥ
a tasya saṃdṛśya sadbhāvam upaviṣṭasya dhīmataḥ
c sarvasattvāḥ samīpasthā bhavanti vanacāriṇaḥ
a siṃhavyāghrāḥ saśarabhā mattāś caiva mahāgajāḥ
c dvīpinaḥ khaḍgabhallūkā ye cānye bhīmadarśanāḥ
a te sukhapraśnadāḥ sarve bhavanti kṣatajāśanāḥ
c tasyarṣeḥ śiṣyavac caiva nyagbhūtāḥ priyakāriṇaḥ
a dattvā ca te sukhapraśnaṃ sarve yānti yathāgatam
c grāmyas tv ekaḥ paśus tatra nājahāc chvā mahāmunim
a bhakto 'nuraktaḥ satatam upavāsakṛśo 'balaḥ
c phalamūlotkarāhāraḥ śāntaḥ śiṣṭākṛtir yathā
a tasyarṣer upaviṣṭasya pādamūle mahāmuneḥ
c manuṣyavad gato bhāvaḥ snehabaddho 'bhavad bhṛśam
a tato 'bhyayān mahāvīryo dvīpī kṣatajabhojanaḥ
c śvārtham atyantasaṃduṣṭaḥ krūraḥ kāla ivāntakaḥ
a lelihyamānas tṛṣitaḥ pucchāsphoṭanatatparaḥ
c vyāditāsyaḥ kṣudhābhagnaḥ prārthayānas tadāmiṣam
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā krūram āyāntaṃ jīvitārthī narādhipa
c provāca śvā muniṃ tatra yat tac chṛṇu mahāmate
a śvaśatrur bhagavann atra dvīpī māṃ hantum icchati
c tvatprasādād bhayaṃ na syāt tasmān mama mahāmune
d tathā kuru mahābāho sarvajñas tvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d sa munis tasya vijñāya bhāvajño bhayakāraṇam
d rutajñaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ tam aiśvaryasamanvitaḥ
 munir uvāca
a na bhayaṃ dvīpinaḥ kāryaṃ mṛtyutas te kathaṃ cana
c eṣa śvarūparahito dvīpī bhavasi putraka
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ śvā dvīpitāṃ nīto jāmbūnadanibhākṛtiḥ
c citrāṅgo visphuran hṛṣṭo vane vasati nirbhayaḥ
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā sa punar dvīpī ātmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ śubham
d aviruddhas tatas tasya kṣaṇena samapadyata
a tato 'bhyayān mahāraudro vyāditāsyaḥ kṣudhānvitaḥ
c dvīpinaṃ lelihad vaktro vyāghro rudhiralālasaḥ
a vyāghraṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣudhābhagnaṃ daṃṣṭriṇaṃ vanagocaram
c dvīpī jīvitarakṣārtham ṛṣiṃ śaraṇam eyivān
a tataḥ saṃvāsajaṃ sneham ṛṣiṇā kurvatā sadā
c sa dvīpī vyāghratāṃ nīto ripubhir balavattaraḥ
e tato dṛṣṭvā sa śārdūlo nābhyahaṃs taṃ viśāṃ pate
a sa tu śvā vyāghratāṃ prāpya balavān piśitāśanaḥ
c na mūlaphalabhogeṣu spṛhām apy akarot tadā
a yathā mṛgapatir nityaṃ prakāṅkṣati vanaukasaḥ
c tathaiva sa mahārāja vyāghraḥ samabhavat tadā
a vyāghras tūṭajamūlasthas tṛptaḥ supto hatair mṛgaiḥ
c nāgaś cāgāt tam uddeśaṃ matto megha ivotthitaḥ
a prabhinnakaraṭaḥ prāṃśuḥ padmī vitatamastakaḥ
c suviṣāṇo mahākāyo meghagambhīranisvanaḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā kuñjaraṃ mattam āyāntaṃ madagarvitam
c vyāghro hastibhayāt trastas tam ṛṣiṃ śaraṇaṃ yayau
a tato 'nayat kuñjaratāṃ taṃ vyāghram ṛṣisattamaḥ
c mahāmeghopamaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ sa bhīto 'bhavad gajaḥ
a tataḥ kamalaṣaṇḍāni śallakīgahanāni ca
c vyacarat sa mudā yuktaḥ padmareṇuvibhūṣitaḥ
a kadā cid ramamāṇasya hastinaḥ sumukhaṃ tadā
c ṛṣes tasyoṭajasthasya kālo 'gacchan niśāniśam
a athājagāma taṃ deśaṃ kesarī kesarāruṇaḥ
c girikandarajo bhīmaḥ siṃho nāgakulāntakaḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā siṃham āyāntaṃ nāgaḥ siṃhabhayākulaḥ
c ṛṣiṃ śaraṇam āpede vepamāno bhayāturaḥ
a tataḥ sa siṃhatāṃ nīto nāgendro muninā tadā
c vanyaṃ nāgaṇayat siṃhaṃ tulyajātisamanvayāt
a dṛṣṭvā ca so 'naśat siṃho vanyo bhīsannavāgbalaḥ
c sa cāśrame 'vasat siṃhas tasminn eva vane sukhī
a na tv anye kṣudrapaśavas tapovananivāsinaḥ
c vyadṛśyanta bhayatrastā jīvitākāṅkṣiṇaḥ sadā
a kadā cit kālayogena sarvaprāṇivihiṃsakaḥ
c balavān kṣatajāhāro nānāsattvabhayaṃkaraḥ
a aṣṭapād ūrdhvacaraṇaḥ śarabho vanagocaraḥ
c taṃ siṃhaṃ hantum āgacchan munes tasya niveśanam
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā śarabhaṃ yāntaṃ siṃhaḥ parabhayāturaḥ
d ṛṣiṃ śaraṇam āpede vepamānaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ
a taṃ muniḥ śarabhaṃ cakre balotkaṭam ariṃdama
c tataḥ sa śarabho vanyo muneḥ śarabham agrataḥ
e dṛṣṭvā balinam atyugraṃ drutaṃ saṃprādravad bhayāt
a sa evaṃ śarabhasthāne nyasto vai muninā tadā
c muneḥ pārśvagato nityaṃ śārabhyaṃ sukham āptavān
a tataḥ śarabhasaṃtrastāḥ sarve mṛgagaṇā vanāt
c diśaḥ saṃprādravan rājan bhayāj jīvitakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
a śarabho 'py atisaṃduṣṭo nityaṃ prāṇivadhe rataḥ
c phalamūlāśanaṃ śāntaṃ naicchat sa piśitāśanaḥ
a tato rudhiratarṣeṇa balinā śarabho 'nvitaḥ
c iyeṣa taṃ muniṃ hantum akṛtajñaḥ śvayonijaḥ
d cintayām āsa ca tadā śarabhaḥ śvānapūrvakaḥ
d asya prabhāvāt saṃprāpto vāṅmātreṇa tu kevalam
d śarabhatvaṃ suduṣprāpaṃ sarvabhūtabhayaṃkaram
d anye 'py atra bhayatrastāḥ santi sattvā bhayārditāḥ
d munim āśritya jīvanto mṛgāḥ pakṣigaṇās tathā
d teṣām api kadā cic ca śarabhatvaṃ prayacchati
d sarvasattvottamaṃ loke balaṃ yatra pratiṣṭhitam
d pakṣiṇām apy ayaṃ dadyāt kadā cid gāruḍaṃ balam
d yāvad anyatra saṃprītaḥ kāruṇyaṃ tu samāśritaḥ
d na dadāti balaṃ tuṣṭaḥ sattvasyānyasya kasya cit
d tāvad enam ahaṃ vipraṃ vadhiṣyāmi ca śīghrataḥ
d sthātuṃ mayā śakyam iha munighātān na saṃśayaḥ
a tatas tena tapaḥśaktyā vidito jñānacakṣuṣā
c vijñāya ca mahāprājño muniḥ śvānaṃ tam uktavān
d munir uvāca
d aham agniprabho nāma munir bhṛgukulānvayaḥ
d manasā nirdahe sarvaṃ jagat saṃdhārayāmi ca
d mama vaśyaṃ jagat sarvaṃ devān varjya carācaram
d santi devāś ca me bhītāḥ svadharmaṃ na tyajanti ye
d svadharmāc calitān sarvān vāṅmātreṇaiva nirdahe
d kim aṅga tvaṃ mayā nītaḥ śarabhatvam anāmayam
d krūraḥ sa sarvabhūteṣu hīnaś cāśucir eva ca
a śvā tvaṃ dvīpitvam āpanno dvīpī vyāghratvam āgataḥ
c vyāghro nāgo madapaṭur nāgaḥ siṃhatvam āptavān
a siṃho 'tibalasaṃyukto bhūyaḥ śarabhatāṃ gataḥ
c mayā snehaparītena na vimṛṣṭaḥ kulānvayaḥ
a yasmād evam apāpaṃ māṃ pāpa hiṃsitum icchasi
c tasmāt svayonim āpannaḥ śvaiva tvaṃ hi bhaviṣyasi
d śvā pūrvaṃ dvīpy asi vyāghraḥ gajaḥ siṃhas tathāśvaṣṭapāt
d nijena ca svabhāvena punaḥ śvāno bhaviṣyasi
a tato munijanadveṣād duṣṭātmā śvākṛto 'budhaḥ
c ṛṣiṇā śarabhaḥ śaptaḥ svaṃ rūpaṃ punar āptavān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa śvā prakṛtim āpannaḥ paraṃ dainyam upāgamat
c ṛṣiṇā huṃkṛtaḥ pāpas tapovanabahiṣkṛtaḥ
a evaṃ rājñā matimatā viditvā śīlaśaucatām
c ārjavaṃ prakṛtiṃ sattvaṃ kulaṃ vṛttaṃ śrutaṃ damam
a anukrośaṃ balaṃ vīryaṃ bhāvaṃ saṃpraśamaṃ kṣamām
c bhṛtyā ye yatra yogyāḥ syus tatra sthāpyāḥ suśikṣitāḥ
a nāparīkṣya mahīpālaḥ prakartuṃ bhṛtyam arhati
c akulīnanarākīrṇo na rājā sukham edhate
a kulajaḥ prakṛto rājñā tatkulīnatayā sadā
c na pāpe kurute buddhiṃ nindyamāno 'py anāgasi
a akulīnas tu puruṣaḥ prakṛtaḥ sādhusaṃkṣayāt
c durlabhaiśvaryatāṃ prāpto ninditaḥ śatrutāṃ vrajet
d kākaḥ śvāno 'kulīnaś ca biḍālaḥ sarpa eva ca
d akulīnā ca yā nārī tulyās te parikīrtitāḥ
d lokapālāḥ sadodvignāḥ paśyanty akulajān yathā
d nārīṃ vā puruṣaṃ vātha śīlaṃ tatrāpi kāraṇam
d duṣkulīnā ca yā strī syād duṣkulīnaś ca yaḥ pumān
d ahiṃsāśīlasaṃyogād dharmāc ca kulatāṃ vrajet
d dharmaṃ prati mahārāja ślokān āha bṛhaspatiḥ
d śṛṇu sarvān mahīpāla hṛdi tāṃś ca kariṣyasi
d asitaṃ sitakarmāṇaṃ yathā dāntaṃ tapasvinam
d vṛttastham api caṇḍālaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
d yadi ghātayate kaś cit pāpasattvaṃ prajāhite
d sarvasattvahitārthāya na tenāsau vihiṃsakaḥ
d dvīpinaṃ śarabhaṃ siṃhaṃ vyāghraṃ kuñjaram eva ca
d mahiṣaṃ ca varāhaṃ ca sūkaraśvānapannagān
d gobrāhmaṇahitārthāya bālastrīrakṣaṇāya ca
d vṛddhāturaparitrāṇe yo hinasti sa dharmavit
d brāhmaṇaḥ pāpakarmā ca mleccho vā dhārmikaḥ śuciḥ
d śreyāṃs tatra bhaven mleccho brāhmaṇaḥ pāpakṛn na ca
d duṣkulīnaḥ kulīno vā yaḥ kaś cic chīlavān naraḥ
d prakṛtiṃ tasya vijñāya sthirāṃ vā yadi vāsthirām
d śīlavān uttamaṃ karma kuryād rājā samāhitaḥ
d niyuñjīta mahīpālo durvṛttaṃ pāpakarmasu
a kulīnaṃ śikṣitaṃ prājñaṃ jñānavijñānakovidam
c sarvaśāstrārthatattvajñaṃ sahiṣṇuṃ deśajaṃ tathā
a kṛtajñaṃ balavantaṃ ca kṣāntaṃ dāntaṃ jitendriyam
c alubdhaṃ labdhasaṃtuṣṭaṃ svāmimitrabubhūṣakam
a sacivaṃ deśakālajñaṃ sarvasaṃgrahaṇe ratam
c satkṛtaṃ yuktamanasaṃ hitaiṣiṇam atandritam
a yuktācāraṃ svaviṣaye saṃdhivigrahakovidam
c rājñas trivargavettāraṃ paurajānapadapriyam
a khātakavyūhatattvajñaṃ balaharṣaṇakovidam
c iṅgitākāratattvajñaṃ yātrāyānaviśāradam
d bhinnānāṃ rājasaṃghātaṃ saṃhatānāṃ ca bhedati
d ekaḥ kruddho raṇe kuryāt kuñjaraḥ sādhunoditaḥ
d madaklinnakapolasya kiṃ cid añcitacakṣuṣaḥ
d svidyadābhogagaṇḍasya kaḥ śobhāṃ varṇituṃ kṣamaḥ
d vegenādhāvamānasya prasāritakarasya ca
d kaḥ samarthaḥ puraḥ sthātuṃ stabdhakarṇasya dantinaḥ
d   diśo daśa
d tat sainyaṃ kuñjarā yatra sa nṛpo yasya kuñjarāḥ
d mūrtimān vijayo rājan kuñjarā madadarpitāḥ
a hastiśikṣāsu tattvajñam ahaṃkāravivarjitam
c pragalbhaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ dāntaṃ balinaṃ yuktakāriṇam
a cokṣaṃ cokṣajanākīrṇaṃ suveṣaṃ sukhadarśanam
c nāyakaṃ nītikuśalaṃ guṇaṣaṣṭyā samanvitam
a astabdhaṃ praśritaṃ śaktaṃ mṛduvādinam eva ca
c dhīraṃ ślakṣṇaṃ maharddhiṃ ca deśakālopapādakam
a sacivaṃ yaḥ prakurute na cainam avamanyate
c tasya vistīryate rājyaṃ jyotsnā grahapater iva
a etair eva guṇair yukto rājā śāstraviśāradaḥ
c eṣṭavyo dharmaparamaḥ prajāpālanatatparaḥ
a dhīro marṣī śuciḥ śīghraḥ kāle puruṣakāravit
c śuśrūṣuḥ śrutavāñ śrotā ūhāpohaviśāradaḥ
a medhāvī dhāraṇāyukto yathānyāyopapādakaḥ
c dāntaḥ sadā priyābhāṣī kṣamāvāṃś ca viparyaye
a dānācchede svayaṃkārī sudvāraḥ sukhadarśanaḥ
c ārtahastaprado nityam āptaṃmanyo naye rataḥ
a nāhaṃvādī na nirdvaṃdvo na yatkiṃcanakārakaḥ
c kṛte karmaṇy amoghānāṃ kartā bhṛtyajanapriyaḥ
a saṃgṛhītajano 'stabdhaḥ prasannavadanaḥ sadā
c dātā bhṛtyajanāvekṣī na krodhī sumahāmanāḥ
a yuktadaṇḍo na nirdaṇḍo dharmakāryānuśāsakaḥ
c cāranetraḥ parāvekṣī dharmārthakuśalaḥ sadā
a rājā guṇaśatākīrṇa eṣṭavyas tādṛśo bhavet
c yodhāś caiva manuṣyendra sarvair guṇaguṇair vṛtāḥ
a anveṣṭavyāḥ supuruṣāḥ sahāyā rājyadhāraṇāḥ
c na vimānayitavyāś ca rājñā vṛddhim abhīpsatā
a yodhāḥ samaraśauṭīrāḥ kṛtajñāḥ śastrakovidāḥ
c dharmaśāstrasamāyuktāḥ padātijanasaṃyutāḥ
a arthamānavivṛddhāś ca rathacaryāviśāradāḥ
c iṣvastrakuśalā yasya tasyeyaṃ nṛpater mahī
d jñātīnām anavajñānaṃ bhṛtyeṣv aśaṭhatā sadā
d naipuṇyaṃ cārthacaryāsu yasyaite tasya sā mahī
d ālasyaṃ caiva nidrā ca vyasanāny atihāsyatā
d yasyaitāni na vidyante tasyeyaṃ suciraṃ mahī
d vṛddhasevī mahotsāho varṇānāṃ caiva rakṣitā
d dharmacaryā sadā yasya tasyeyaṃ suciraṃ mahī
d nītivartmānusaraṇaṃ nityam utthānam eva ca
d ripūṇām anavajñānaṃ tasyeyaṃ suciraṃ mahī
d utthānaṃ caiva daivaṃ ca tayor nānātvam eva ca
d manunā varṇitaṃ pūrvaṃ vakṣye śṛṇu tad eva hi
d utthānaṃ hi narendrāṇāṃ bṛhaspatir abhāṣata
d nayānayavidhānajñaḥ sadā bhava kurūdvaha
d durhṛdāṃ chidradarśī yaḥ suhṛdām upakāravān
d viśeṣavic ca bhṛtyānāṃ sa rājyaphalam aśnute
a sarvasaṃgrahaṇe yukto nṛpo bhavati yaḥ sadā
c utthānaśīlo mitrāḍhyaḥ sa rājā rājasattamaḥ
a śakyā aśvasahasreṇa vīrāroheṇa bhārata
c saṃgṛhītamanuṣyeṇa kṛtsnā jetuṃ vasuṃdharā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evaṃ śunāsamān bhṛtyān svasthāne yo narādhipaḥ
c niyojayati kṛtyeṣu sa rājyaphalam aśnute
a na śvā svasthānam utkramya pramāṇam abhi satkṛtaḥ
c āropyaḥ śvā svakāt sthānād utkramyānyat prapadyate
a svajātikulasaṃpannāḥ sveṣu karmasv avasthitāḥ
c prakartavyā budhā bhṛtyā nāsthāne prakriyā kṣamā
a anurūpāṇi karmāṇi bhṛtyebhyo yaḥ prayacchati
c sa bhṛtyaguṇasaṃpannaṃ rājā phalam upāśnute
a śarabhaḥ śarabhasthāne siṃhaḥ siṃha ivorjitaḥ
c vyāghro vyāghra iva sthāpyo dvīpī dvīpī yathā tathā
a karmasv ihānurūpeṣu nyasyā bhṛtyā yathāvidhi
c pratilomaṃ na bhṛtyās te sthāpyāḥ karmaphalaiṣiṇā
a yaḥ pramāṇam atikramya pratilomaṃ narādhipaḥ
c bhṛtyān sthāpayate 'buddhir na sa rañjayate prajāḥ
a na bāliśā na ca kṣudrā na cāpratimitendriyāḥ
c nākulīnā narāḥ pārśve sthāpyā rājñā hitaiṣiṇā
a sādhavaḥ kuśalāḥ śūrā jñānavanto 'nasūyakāḥ
c akṣudrāḥ śucayo dakṣā narāḥ syuḥ pāripārśvakāḥ
a nyagbhūtās tatparāḥ kṣāntāś caukṣāḥ prakṛtijāḥ śubhāḥ
c sve sve sthāne 'parikruṣṭās te syū rājño bahiścarāḥ
a siṃhasya satataṃ pārśve siṃha eva jano bhavet
c asiṃhaḥ siṃhasahitaḥ siṃhaval labhate phalam
a yas tu siṃhaḥ śvabhiḥ kīrṇaḥ siṃhakarmaphale rataḥ
c na sa siṃhaphalaṃ bhoktuṃ śaktaḥ śvabhir upāsitaḥ
a evam etair manuṣyendra śūraiḥ prājñair bahuśrutaiḥ
c kulīnaiḥ saha śakyeta kṛtsnāṃ jetuṃ vasuṃdharām
a nāvaidyo nānṛjuḥ pārśve nāvidyo nāmahādhanaḥ
c saṃgrāhyo vasudhāpālair bhṛtyo bhṛtyavatāṃ vara
a bāṇavad visṛtā yānti svāmikāryaparā janāḥ
c ye bhṛtyāḥ pārthivahitās teṣāṃ sāntvaṃ prayojayet
a kośaś ca satataṃ rakṣyo yatnam āsthāya rājabhiḥ
c kośamūlā hi rājānaḥ kośamūlakaro bhava
a koṣṭhāgāraṃ ca te nityaṃ sphītaṃ dhānyaiḥ susaṃcitam
c sadāstu satsu saṃnyastaṃ dhanadhānyaparo bhava
a nityayuktāś ca te bhṛtyā bhavantu raṇakovidāḥ
c vājināṃ ca prayogeṣu vaiśāradyam iheṣyate
a jñātibandhujanāvekṣī mitrasaṃbandhisaṃvṛtaḥ
c paurakāryahitānveṣī bhava kauravanandana
a eṣā te naiṣṭhikī buddhiḥ prajñā cābhihitā mayā
c śvā te nidarśanaṃ tāta kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a rājavṛttāny anekāni tvayā proktāni bhārata
c pūrvaiḥ pūrvaniyuktāni rājadharmārthavedibhiḥ
a tad eva vistareṇoktaṃ pūrvair dṛṣṭaṃ satāṃ matam
c praṇayaṃ rājadharmāṇāṃ prabrūhi bharatarṣabha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a rakṣaṇaṃ sarvabhūtānām iti kṣatre paraṃ matam
c tad yathā rakṣaṇaṃ kuryāt tathā śṛṇu mahīpate
a yathā barhāṇi citrāṇi bibharti bhujagāśanaḥ
c tathā bahuvidhaṃ rājā rūpaṃ kurvīta dharmavit
a taikṣṇyaṃ jihmatvam ādāntyaṃ satyam ārjavam eva ca
c madhyasthaḥ sattvam ātiṣṭhaṃs tathā vai sukham ṛcchati
a yasminn arthe hitaṃ yat syāt tad varṇaṃ rūpam āviśet
c bahurūpasya rājño hi sūkṣmo 'py artho na sīdati
a nityaṃ rakṣitamantraḥ syād yathā mūkaḥ śaracchikhī
c ślakṣṇākṣaratanuḥ śrīmān bhavec chāstraviśāradaḥ
a āpaddvāreṣu yattaḥ syāj jalaprasravaṇeṣv iva
c śailavarṣodakānīva dvijān siddhān samāśrayet
a arthakāmaḥ śikhāṃ rājā kuryād dharmadhvajopamām
c nityam udyatadaṇḍaḥ syād ācarec cāpramādataḥ
e loke cāyavyayau dṛṣṭvā vṛkṣād vṛkṣam ivāplavan
a mṛjāvān syāt svayūthyeṣu bhāvāni caraṇaiḥ kṣipet
c jātapakṣaḥ parispanded rakṣed vaikalyam ātmanaḥ
a doṣān vivṛṇuyāc chatroḥ parapakṣān vidhūnayet
c kānaneṣv iva puṣpāṇi barhīvārthān samācaret
a ucchritān āśrayet sphītān narendrān acalopamān
c śrayec chāyām avijñātāṃ guptaṃ śaraṇam āśrayet
a prāvṛṣīvāsitagrīvo majjeta niśi nirjane
c māyūreṇa guṇenaiva strībhiś cālakṣitaś caret

a cārabhūmiṣv abhigamān pāśāṃś ca parivarjayet
c pīḍayec cāpi tāṃ bhūmiṃ praṇaśyed gahane punaḥ
d evaṃ mayūradharmeṇa vartayan satataṃ naraḥ
a hanyāt kruddhān ativiṣān ye jihmagatayo 'hitān
c nāśrayed bālabarhāṇi sannivāsāni vāsayet
a sadā barhinibhaḥ kāmaṃ prasaktikṛtam ācaret
c sarvataś cādadet prajñāṃ pataṃgān gahaneṣv iva
e evaṃ mayūravad rājā svarāṣṭraṃ paripālayet
a ātmavṛddhikarīṃ nītiṃ vidadhīta vicakṣaṇaḥ
c ātmasaṃyamanaṃ buddhyā parabuddhyāvatāraṇam
e buddhyā cātmaguṇaprāptir etac chāstranidarśanam
a paraṃ cāśvāsayet sāmnā svaśaktiṃ copalakṣayet
c ātmanaḥ parimarśena buddhiṃ buddhyā vicārayet
e sāntvayogamatiḥ prājñaḥ kāryākāryavicārakaḥ
a nigūḍhabuddhir dhīraḥ syād vaktavye vakṣyate tathā
c saṃnikṛṣṭāṃ kathāṃ prājño yadi buddhyā bṛhaspatiḥ
e svabhāvam eṣyate taptaṃ kṛṣṇāyasam ivodake
a anuyuñjīta kṛtyāni sarvāṇy eva mahīpatiḥ
c āgamair upadiṣṭāni svasya caiva parasya ca
a kṣudraṃ krūraṃ tathā prājñaṃ śūraṃ cārthaviśāradam
c svakarmaṇi niyuñjīta ye cānye vacanādhikāḥ
a apy adṛṣṭvā niyuktāni anurūpeṣu karmasu
c sarvāṃs tān anuvarteta svarāṃs tantrīr ivāyatā
a dharmāṇām avirodhena sarveṣāṃ priyam ācaret
c mamāyam iti rājā yaḥ sa parvata ivācalaḥ
a vyavasāyaṃ samādhāya sūryo raśmim ivāyatām
c dharmam evābhirakṣeta kṛtvā tulye priyāpriye
a kulaprakṛtideśānāṃ dharmajñān mṛdubhāṣiṇaḥ
c madhye vayasi nirdoṣān hite yuktāñ jitendriyān
a alubdhāñ śikṣitān dāntān dharmeṣu pariniṣṭhitān
c sthāpayet sarvakāryeṣu rājā dharmārtharakṣiṇaḥ
a etenaiva prakāreṇa kṛtyānām āgatiṃ gatim
c yuktaḥ samanutiṣṭheta tuṣṭaś cārair upaskṛtaḥ
a amoghakrodhaharṣasya svayaṃ kṛtyānvavekṣiṇaḥ
c ātmapratyayakośasya vasudhaiva vasuṃdharā
a vyaktaś cānugraho yasya yathārthaś cāpi nigrahaḥ
c guptātmā guptarāṣṭraś ca sa rājā rājadharmavit
a nityaṃ rāṣṭram avekṣeta gobhiḥ sūrya ivotpatan
c cārāṃś ca nacarān vidyāt tathā buddhyā na saṃjvaret
a kālaprāptam upādadyān nārthaṃ rājā prasūcayet
c ahany ahani saṃduhyān mahīṃ gām iva buddhimān
a yathā krameṇa puṣpebhyaś cinoti madhu ṣaṭpadaḥ
c tathā dravyam upādāya rājā kurvīta saṃcayam
a yad dhi guptāvaśiṣṭaṃ syāt tad dhitaṃ dharmakāmayoḥ
c saṃcayānuvisargī syād rājā śāstravid ātmavān
a nālpam arthaṃ paribhaven nāvamanyeta śātravān
c buddhyāvabudhyed ātmānaṃ na cābuddhiṣu viśvaset
a dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ saṃyamo buddhir agryā
dhairyaṃ śauryaṃ deśakālo 'pramādaḥ
c svalpasya vā mahato vāpi vṛddhau
dhanasyaitāny aṣṭa samindhanāni
a agnistoko vardhate hy ājyasikto
bījaṃ caikaṃ bahusāhasram eti
c kṣayodayau vipulau saṃniśāmya
tasmād alpaṃ nāvamanyeta vidvān
a bālo 'bālaḥ sthaviro vā ripur yaḥ
sadā pramattaṃ puruṣaṃ nihanyāt
c kālenānyas tasya mūlaṃ hareta
kālajñātā pārthivānāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
a haret kīrtiṃ dharmam asyoparundhyād
arthe dīrghaṃ vīryam asyopahanyāt
c ripur dveṣṭā durbalo vā balī vā
tasmāc chatrau naiva heḍed yatātmā
a kṣayaṃ śatroḥ saṃcayaṃ pālanaṃ cāpy
ubhau cārthau sahitau dharmakāmau
c ataś cānyan matimān saṃdadhīta
tasmād rājā buddhimantaṃ śrayeta
a buddhir dīptā balavantaṃ hinasti
balaṃ buddhyā vardhate pālyamānam
c śatrur buddhyā sīdate vardhamāno
buddheḥ paścāt karma yat tat praśastam
a sarvān kāmān kāmayāno hi dhīraḥ
sattvenālpenāplute hīnadehaḥ
c yathātmānaṃ prārthayate 'rthamānaiḥ
śreyaḥpātraṃ pūrayate hy analpam
a tasmād rājā pragṛhītaḥ pareṣu
mūlaṃ lakṣmyāḥ sarvato 'bhyādadīta
c dīrghaṃ kālam api saṃpīḍyamāno
vidyutsaṃpātam iva mānorjitaḥ syāt
a vidyā tapo vā vipulaṃ dhanaṃ vā
sarvam etad vyavasāyena śakyam
c brahma yattaṃ nivasati dehavatsu
tasmād vidyād vyavasāyaṃ prabhūtam
a yatrāsate matimanto manasvinaḥ
śakro viṣṇur yatra sarasvatī ca
c vasanti bhūtāni ca yatra nityaṃ
tasmād vidvān nāvamanyeta deham
a lubdhaṃ hanyāt saṃpradānena nityaṃ
lubdhas tṛptiṃ paravittasya naiti
c sarvo lubdhaḥ karmaguṇopabhoge
yo 'rthair hīno dharmakāmau jahāti
a dhanaṃ bhojyaṃ putradāraṃ samṛddhiṃ
sarvo lubdhaḥ prārthayate pareṣām
c lubdhe doṣāḥ saṃbhavantīha sarve
tasmād rājā na pragṛhṇīta lubdhān
a saṃdarśane satpuruṣaṃ jaghanyam api codayet
c ārambhān dviṣatāṃ prājñaḥ sarvān arthāṃs tu sūdayet
a dharmānviteṣu vijñāto mantrī guptaś ca pāṇḍava
c āpto rājan kulīnaś ca paryāpto rājyasaṃgrahe
a vidhipravṛttān naradevadharmān
uktān samāsena nibodha buddhyā
c imān vidadhyād vyanusṛtya yo vai
rājā mahīṃ pālayituṃ sa śaktaḥ
a anītijaṃ yady avidhānajaṃ sukhaṃ
haṭhapraṇītaṃ vividhaṃ pradṛśyate
c na vidyate tasya gatir mahīpater
na vidyate rāṣṭrajam uttamaṃ sukham
a dhanair viśiṣṭān matiśīlapūjitān
guṇopapannān yudhi dṛṣṭavikramān
c guṇeṣu dṛṣṭān acirād ihātmavān
sato 'bhisaṃdhāya nihanti śātravān
a paśyed upāyān vividhaiḥ kriyāpathair
na cānupāyena matiṃ niveśayet
c śriyaṃ viśiṣṭāṃ vipulaṃ yaśo dhanaṃ
na doṣadarśī puruṣaḥ samaśnute
a prītipravṛttau vinivartane tathā
suhṛtsu vijñāya nivṛtya cobhayoḥ
c yad eva mitraṃ gurubhāram āvahet
tad eva susnigdham udāhared budhaḥ
a etān mayoktāṃs tava rājadharmān
nṛṇāṃ ca guptau matim ādadhatsva
c avāpsyase puṇyaphalaṃ sukhena
sarvo hi lokottamadharmamūlaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ayaṃ pitāmahenokto rājadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c īśvaraś ca mahādaṇḍo daṇḍe sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
a devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
c yakṣarakṣaḥpiśācānāṃ martyānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
a sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ loke tiryakṣv api nivāsinām
c sarvavyāpī mahātejā daṇḍaḥ śreyān iti prabho
a ity etad uktaṃ bhavatā sarvaṃ daṇḍyaṃ carācaram
c dṛśyate lokam āsaktaṃ sasurāsuramānuṣam
a etad icchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
c ko daṇḍaḥ kīdṛśo daṇḍaḥ kiṃrūpaḥ kiṃparāyaṇaḥ
a kimātmakaḥ kathaṃbhūtaḥ katimūrtiḥ kathaṃprabhuḥ
c jāgarti sa kathaṃ daṇḍaḥ prajāsv avahitātmakaḥ
a kaś ca pūrvāparam idaṃ jāgarti paripālayan
c kaś ca vijñāyate pūrvaṃ ko 'paro daṇḍasaṃjñitaḥ
e kiṃsaṃsthaś ca bhaved daṇḍaḥ kā cāsya gatir iṣyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇu kauravya yo daṇḍo vyavahāryo yathā ca saḥ
c yasmin hi sarvam āyattaṃ sa daṇḍa iha kevalaḥ
a dharmasyākhyā mahārāja vyavahāra itīṣyate
c tasya lopaḥ kathaṃ na syāl lokeṣv avahitātmanaḥ
e ity arthaṃ vyavahārasya vyavahāratvam iṣyate
a api caitat purā rājan manunā proktam āditaḥ
c supraṇītena daṇḍena priyāpriyasamātmanā
e prajā rakṣati yaḥ samyag dharma eva sa kevalaḥ
a athoktam etad vacanaṃ prāg eva manunā purā
c janma coktaṃ vasiṣṭhena brahmaṇo vacanaṃ mahat
a prāg idaṃ vacanaṃ proktam ataḥ prāgvacanaṃ viduḥ
c vyavahārasya cākhyānād vyavahāra ihocyate
a daṇḍāt trivargaḥ satataṃ supraṇītāt pravartate
c daivaṃ hi paramo daṇḍo rūpato 'gnir ivocchikhaḥ
a nīlotpaladalaśyāmaś caturdaṃṣṭraś caturbhujaḥ
c aṣṭapān naikanayanaḥ śaṅkukarṇordhvaromavān
a jaṭī dvijihvas tāmrāsyo mṛgarājatanucchadaḥ
c etad rūpaṃ bibharty ugraṃ daṇḍo nityaṃ durāvaraḥ
a asir gadā dhanuḥ śaktis triśūlaṃ mudgaraḥ śaraḥ
c musalaṃ paraśuś cakraṃ prāso daṇḍarṣṭitomarāḥ
a sarvapraharaṇīyāni santi yānīha kāni cit
c daṇḍa eva hi sarvātmā loke carati mūrtimān
a bhindaṃś chindan rujan kṛntan dārayan pāṭayaṃs tathā
c ghātayann abhidhāvaṃś ca daṇḍa eva caraty uta
a asir viśasano dharmas tīkṣṇavartmā durāsadaḥ
c śrīgarbho vijayaḥ śāstā vyavahāraḥ prajāgaraḥ
a śāstraṃ brāhmaṇamantraś ca śāstā prāgvacanaṃ gataḥ
c dharmapālo 'kṣaro devaḥ satyago nityago grahaḥ
a asaṅgo rudratanayo manujyeṣṭhaḥ śivaṃkaraḥ
c nāmāny etāni daṇḍasya kīrtitāni yudhiṣṭhira
a daṇḍo hi bhagavān viṣṇur yajño nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
c śaśvad rūpaṃ mahad bibhran mahāpuruṣa ucyate
a yathoktā brahmakanyeti lakṣmīr nītiḥ sarasvatī
c daṇḍanītir jagaddhātrī daṇḍo hi bahuvigrahaḥ
a arthānarthau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ dharmādharmau balābale
c daurbhāgyaṃ bhāgadheyaṃ ca puṇyāpuṇye guṇāguṇau
a kāmākāmāv ṛtur māsaḥ śarvarī divasaḥ kṣaṇaḥ
c aprasādaḥ prasādaś ca harṣaḥ krodhaḥ śamo damaḥ
a daivaṃ puruṣakāraś ca mokṣāmokṣau bhayābhaye
c hiṃsāhiṃse tapo yajñaḥ saṃyamo 'tha viṣāviṣam
a antaś cādiś ca madhyaṃ ca kṛtyānāṃ ca prapañcanam
c madaḥ pramādo darpaś ca dambho dhairyaṃ nayānayau
a aśaktiḥ śaktir ity eva mānastambhau vyayāvyayau
c vinayaś ca visargaś ca kālākālau ca bhārata
a anṛtaṃ jñājñatā satyaṃ śraddhāśraddhe tathaiva ca
c klībatā vyavasāyaś ca lābhālābhau jayājayau
a tīkṣṇatā mṛdutā mṛtyur āgamānāgamau tathā
c virāddhiś caiva rāddhiś ca kāryākārye balābale
a asūyā cānasūyā ca dharmādharmau tathaiva ca
c apatrapānapatrape hrīś ca saṃpad vipac ca ha
a tejaḥ karmaṇi pāṇḍityaṃ vākśaktis tattvabuddhitā
c evaṃ daṇḍasya kauravya loke 'smin bahurūpatā
a na syād yadīha daṇḍo vai pramatheyuḥ parasparam
c bhayād daṇḍasya cānyonyaṃ ghnanti naiva yudhiṣṭhira
a daṇḍena rakṣyamāṇā hi rājann aharahaḥ prajāḥ
c rājānaṃ vardhayantīha tasmād daṇḍaḥ parāyaṇam
a vyavasthāpayati kṣipram imaṃ lokaṃ nareśvara
c satye vyavasthito dharmo brāhmaṇeṣv avatiṣṭhate
a dharmayuktā dvijāḥ śreṣṭhā vedayuktā bhavanti ca
c babhūva yajño vedebhyo yajñaḥ prīṇāti devatāḥ
a prītāś ca devatā nityam indre paridadaty uta
c annaṃ dadāti śakraś cāpy anugṛhṇann imāḥ prajāḥ
a prāṇāś ca sarvabhūtānāṃ nityam anne pratiṣṭhitāḥ
c tasmāt prajāḥ pratiṣṭhante daṇḍo jāgarti tāsu ca
a evaṃprayojanaś caiva daṇḍaḥ kṣatriyatāṃ gataḥ
c rakṣan prajāḥ prajāgarti nityaṃ suvihito 'kṣaraḥ
a īśvaraḥ puruṣaḥ prāṇaḥ sattvaṃ vittaṃ prajāpatiḥ
c bhūtātmā jīva ity eva nāmabhiḥ procyate 'ṣṭabhiḥ
a adadad daṇḍa evāsmai dhruvam aiśvaryam eva ca
c bale nayaś ca saṃyuktaḥ sadā pañcavidhātmakaḥ
a kulabāhudhanāmātyāḥ prajñā coktā balāni ca
c āhāryaṃ cāṣṭakair dravyair balam anyad yudhiṣṭhira
a hastino 'śvā rathāḥ pattir nāvo viṣṭis tathaiva ca
c daiśikāś cārakāś caiva tad aṣṭāṅgaṃ balaṃ smṛtam
a aṣṭāṅgasya tu yuktasya hastino hastiyāyinaḥ
c aśvārohāḥ padātāś ca mantriṇo rasadāś ca ye
a bhikṣukāḥ prāḍvivākāś ca mauhūrtā daivacintakāḥ
c kośo mitrāṇi dhānyaṃ ca sarvopakaraṇāni ca
a saptaprakṛti cāṣṭāṅgaṃ śarīram iha yad viduḥ
c rājyasya daṇḍa evāṅgaṃ daṇḍaḥ prabhava eva ca
a īśvareṇa prayatnena dhāraṇe kṣatriyasya hi
c daṇḍo dattaḥ samānātmā daṇḍo hīdaṃ sanātanam
e rājñāṃ pūjyatamo nānyo yathādharmapradarśanaḥ
a brahmaṇā lokarakṣārthaṃ svadharmasthāpanāya ca
c bhartṛpratyaya utpanno vyavahāras tathāparaḥ
e tasmād yaḥ sahito dṛṣṭo bhartṛpratyayalakṣaṇaḥ
a vyavahāras tu vedātmā vedapratyaya ucyate
c maulaś ca naraśārdūla śāstroktaś ca tathāparaḥ
a ukto yaś cāpi daṇḍo 'sau bhartṛpratyayalakṣaṇaḥ
c jñeyo na sa narendrastho daṇḍapratyaya eva ca
a daṇḍapratyayadṛṣṭo 'pi vyavahārātmakaḥ smṛtaḥ
c vyavahāraḥ smṛto yaś ca sa vedaviṣayātmakaḥ
a yaś ca vedaprasūtātmā sa dharmo guṇadarśakaḥ
c dharmapratyaya utpanno yathādharmaḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
a vyavahāraḥ prajāgoptā brahmadiṣṭo yudhiṣṭhira
c trīn dhārayati lokān vai satyātmā bhūtivardhanaḥ
a yaś ca daṇḍaḥ sa dṛṣṭo no vyavahāraḥ sanātanaḥ
c vyavahāraś ca yo dṛṣṭaḥ sa dharma iti naḥ śrutaḥ
e yaś ca vedaḥ sa vai dharmo yaś ca dharmaḥ sa satpathaḥ
a brahmā prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ babhūvātha pitāmahaḥ
c lokānāṃ sa hi sarveṣāṃ sasurāsurarakṣasām
e samanuṣyoragavatāṃ kartā caiva sa bhūtakṛt
a tato no vyavahāro 'yaṃ bhartṛpratyayalakṣaṇaḥ
c tasmād idam avocāma vyavahāranidarśanam
a mātā pitā ca bhrātā ca bhāryā cātha purohitaḥ
c nādaṇḍyo vidyate rājñāṃ yaḥ svadharme na tiṣṭhati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c aṅgeṣu rājā dyutimān vasuhoma iti śrutaḥ
a sa rājā dharmanityaḥ san saha patnyā mahātapāḥ
c muñjapṛṣṭhaṃ jagāmātha devarṣigaṇapūjitam
a tatra śṛṅge himavato merau kanakaparvate
c yatra muñjavaṭe rāmo jaṭāharaṇam ādiśat
a tadāprabhṛti rājendra ṛṣibhiḥ saṃśitavrataiḥ
c muñjapṛṣṭha iti proktaḥ sa deśo rudrasevitaḥ
a sa tatra bahubhir yuktaḥ sadā śrutimayair guṇaiḥ
c brāhmaṇānām anumato devarṣisadṛśo 'bhavat
a taṃ kadā cid adīnātmā sakhā śakrasya mānitaḥ
c abhyāgacchan mahīpālo māndhātā śatrukarśanaḥ
a so 'bhisṛtya tu māndhātā vasuhomaṃ narādhipam
c dṛṣṭvā prakṛṣṭaṃ tapasā vinayenābhyatiṣṭhata
a vasuhomo 'pi rājño vai gām arghyaṃ ca nyavedayat
c aṣṭāṅgasya ca rājyasya papraccha kuśalaṃ tadā
a sadbhir ācaritaṃ pūrvaṃ yathāvad anuyāyinam
c apṛcchad vasuhomas taṃ rājan kiṃ karavāṇi te
a so 'bravīt paramaprīto māndhātā rājasattamam
c vasuhomaṃ mahāprājñam āsīnaṃ kurunandana
a bṛhaspater mataṃ rājann adhītaṃ sakalaṃ tvayā
c tathaivauśanasaṃ śāstraṃ vijñātaṃ te narādhipa
a tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi daṇḍa utpadyate katham
c kiṃ vāpi pūrvaṃ jāgarti kiṃ vā paramam ucyate
a kathaṃ kṣatriyasaṃsthaś ca daṇḍaḥ saṃpraty avasthitaḥ
c brūhi me sumahāprājña dadāmy ācāryavetanam
 vasuhoma uvāca
a śṛṇu rājan yathā daṇḍaḥ saṃbhūto lokasaṃgrahaḥ
c prajāvinayarakṣārthaṃ dharmasyātmā sanātanaḥ
a brahmā yiyakṣur bhagavān sarvalokapitāmahaḥ
c ṛtvijaṃ nātmanā tulyaṃ dadarśeti hi naḥ śrutam
a sa garbhaṃ śirasā devo varṣapūgān adhārayat
c pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu sa garbhaḥ kṣuvato 'patat
a sa kṣupo nāma saṃbhūtaḥ prajāpatir ariṃdama
c ṛtvig āsīt tadā rājan yajñe tasya mahātmanaḥ
a tasmin pravṛtte satre tu brahmaṇaḥ pārthivarṣabha
c hṛṣṭarūpapracāratvād daṇḍaḥ so 'ntarhito 'bhavat
a tasminn antarhite cātha prajānāṃ saṃkaro 'bhavat
c naiva kāryaṃ na cākāryaṃ bhojyābhojyaṃ na vidyate
a peyāpeyaṃ kutaḥ siddhir hiṃsanti ca parasparam
c gamyāgamyaṃ tadā nāsīt parasvaṃ svaṃ ca vai samam
a parasparaṃ vilumpante sārameyā ivāmiṣam
c abalaṃ balino jaghnur nirmaryādam avartata
a tataḥ pitāmaho viṣṇuṃ bhagavantaṃ sanātanam
c saṃpūjya varadaṃ devaṃ mahādevam athābravīt
a atra sādhv anukampāṃ vai kartum arhasi kevalam
b ayaṃ viṣṇuḥ sakhā tubhyaṃ dharmasya parirakṣaṇe
b tvaṃ hi sarvavidhānajñaḥ sattvānāṃ tvaṃ gatiḥ parā
c saṃkaro na bhaved atra yathā vai tad vidhīyatām
a tataḥ sa bhagavān dhyātvā ciraṃ śūlajaṭādharaḥ
b devadevo mahādevaḥ kāraṇaṃ jagataḥ param
b brahmaviṣṇvindrasahitaḥ sarvaiś ca sa surāsuraiḥ
b lokasaṃdhāraṇārthaṃ ca lokasaṃkaranāśanam
c ātmānam ātmanā daṇḍam asṛjad devasattamaḥ
a tasmāc ca dharmacaraṇāṃ nītiṃ devīṃ sarasvatīm
c asṛjad daṇḍanītiḥ sā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutā
d yayāsau nīyate daṇḍaḥ satataṃ pāpakāriṣu
d daṇḍasya nayanāt sā hi daṇḍanītir ihocyate
d bhūyaḥ sa bhagavān dhyātvā ciraṃ śūladharaḥ prabhuḥ
d asṛjat sarvaśāstrāṇi mahādevo maheśvaraḥ
d daṇḍanīteḥ prayogārthaṃ pramāṇāni ca sarvaśaḥ
d vidyāś catasraḥ kūṭasthās tāsāṃ bhedavikalpanāḥ
d aṅgāni vedāś catvāro mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ
d purāṇaṃ dharmaśāstraṃ ca vidyā hy etāś caturdaśa
d āyurvedo dhanurvedo gāndharvaś ceti te trayaḥ
d arthaśāstraṃ caturthaṃ tu vidyā hy aṣṭādaśaiva tu
d daśa cāṣṭau ca vikhyātā etā dharmasya saṃhitāḥ
d etāsām eva vidyānāṃ vyāsam āha maheśvaraḥ
d śatāni trīṇi śāstrāṇām āha tantrāṇi saptatim
d vyāsa eva tu vidyānāṃ mahādevena kīrtitaḥ
d tantraṃ pāśupataṃ nāma pāñcarātraṃ ca viśrutam
d yogaśāstraṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ ca tantraṃ lokāyataṃ tathā
d tantraṃ brahmatulā nāma tarkavidyā divaukasām
d sukhaduḥkhārthajijñāsā kārakaṃ ceti viśrutam
d tarkavidyās tathā cāṣṭau sa cokto nyāyavistaraḥ
d daśa cāṣṭau ca vijñeyāḥ paurāṇā yajñasaṃhitāḥ
d purāṇāś ca praṇītāś ca tāvad eva hi saṃhitāḥ
d dharmaśāstrāṇi tadvac ca ekārthānīti nānyathā
d ekārthāni purāṇāni vedāś caikārthasaṃhitāḥ
d nānārthāni ca sarvāṇi tarkaśāstrāṇi śaṃkaraḥ
d provāca bhagavān devaḥ kālajñānāni yāni ca
d catuḥṣaṣṭipramāṇāni āyurvedaṃ ca sottaram
d aṣṭādaśa vikalpāntāṃ daṇḍanītiṃ ca śāśvatīm
d gāndharvam itihāsaṃ ca nānāvistaram uktavān
d ity etāḥ śaṃkaraproktā vidyāḥ śabdārthasaṃyutāḥ
d punar bhedasahasraṃ ca tāsām eva tu vistaraḥ
d ṛṣibhir devagandharvaiḥ savikalpaḥ savistaraḥ
d śaśvad abhyasyate loke veda eva ca sarvaśaḥ
d vidyāś catasraḥ saṃkṣiptā vedavādāś ca te smṛtāḥ
d etāsāṃ pārago yaś ca sa cokto vedapāragaḥ
d vedānāṃ pārago rudro viṣṇur indro bṛhaspatiḥ
d śukraḥ svāyaṃbhuvaś caiva manuḥ paramadharmavit
d brahmā ca paramo devaḥ sadā sarvaiḥ surāsuraiḥ
d śarvasyānugrahāc caiva vyāso vai vedapāragaḥ
d ahaṃ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmaḥ prasādān mādhavasya ca
d śaṃkarasya prasādāc ca brahmaṇaś ca kurūdvaha
d vedapāraga ity ukto yājñavalkyaś ca sarvaśaḥ
d kalpe kalpe mahābhāgair ṛṣibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ
d ṛṣiputrair ṛṣīkaiś ca bhidyante miśrakair api
d śivena brahmaṇā caiva viṣṇunā ca vikalpitaḥ
d ādikalpe punaś caiva bhidyante sādhubhiḥ punaḥ
d idānīm api vidvadbhir bhidyante ca vikalpakaiḥ
d pūrvajanmānusāreṇa bahudheyaṃ sarasvatī
a bhūyaḥ sa bhagavān dhyātvā ciraṃ śūlavarāyudhaḥ
c tasya tasya nikāyasya cakāraikaikam īśaram
a devānām īśvaraṃ cakre devaṃ daśaśatekṣaṇam
c yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ cāpi pitṝṇām akarot patim
a dhanānāṃ rakṣasāṃ cāpi kuberam api ceśvaram
c parvatānāṃ patiṃ meruṃ saritāṃ ca mahodadhim
a apāṃ rājye surāṇāṃ ca vidadhe varuṇaṃ prabhum
c mṛtyuṃ prāṇeśvaram atho tejasāṃ ca hutāśanam
a rudrāṇām api ceśānaṃ goptāraṃ vidadhe prabhuḥ
c mahātmānaṃ mahādevaṃ viśālākṣaṃ sanātanam
d daśa caikaṃ ca ye rudrās tasyaite mūrtisaṃbhavāḥ
d nānārūpadharo devaḥ sa eva bhagavāñ śivaḥ
a vasiṣṭham īśaṃ viprāṇāṃ vasūnāṃ jātavedasam
c tejasāṃ bhāskaraṃ cakre nakṣatrāṇāṃ niśākaram
a vīrudhām aṃśumantaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ca prabhuṃ varam
c kumāraṃ dvādaśabhujaṃ skandaṃ rājānam ādiśat
a kālaṃ sarveśam akarot saṃhāravinayātmakam
c mṛtyoś caturvibhāgasya duḥkhasya ca sukhasya ca
a īśvaraḥ sarvadehas tu rājarājo dhanādhipaḥ
c sarveṣām eva rudrāṇāṃ śūlapāṇir iti śrutiḥ
d īśvaraś cetanaḥ kartā puruṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ śivaḥ
d viṣṇur brahmā śaśī sūryaḥ śakro devāś ca sānvayāḥ
d jñānātmakaḥ śivo hy eva eteṣām api kāraṇam
d sṛjate grasate caiva tamobhūtam idaṃ yathā
d aprajñātaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tadā hy eko maheśvaraḥ
a tam ekaṃ brahmaṇaḥ putram anujātaṃ kṣupaṃ dadau
c prajānām adhipaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvadharmabhṛtām api
a mahādevas tatas tasmin vṛtte yajñe yathāvidhi
c daṇḍaṃ dharmasya goptāraṃ viṣṇave satkṛtaṃ dadau
a viṣṇur aṅgirase prādād aṅgirā munisattamaḥ
c prādād indramarīcibhyāṃ marīcir bhṛgave dadau
a bhṛgur dadāv ṛṣibhyas tu taṃ daṇḍaṃ dharmasaṃhitam
c ṛṣayo lokapālebhyo lokapālāḥ kṣupāya ca
a kṣupas tu manave prādād ādityatanayāya ca
c putrebhyaḥ śrāddhadevas tu sūkṣmadharmārthakāraṇāt
e taṃ dadau sūryaputras tu manur vai rakṣaṇātmakam
a vibhajya daṇḍaḥ kartavyo dharmeṇa na yadṛcchayā
c durvācā nigraho bandho hiraṇyaṃ bāhyataḥkriyā
a vyaṅgatvaṃ ca śarīrasya vadho vā nālpakāraṇāt
c śarīrapīḍās tās tās tu dehatyāgo vivāsanam
a ānupūrvyā ca daṇḍo 'sau prajā jāgarti pālayan
c indro jāgarti bhagavān indrād agnir vibhāvasuḥ
a agner jāgarti varuṇo varuṇāc ca prajāpatiḥ
c prajāpates tato dharmo jāgarti vinayātmakaḥ
a dharmāc ca brahmaṇaḥ putro vyavasāyaḥ sanātanaḥ
c vyavasāyāt tatas tejo jāgarti paripālayan
a oṣadhyas tejasas tasmād oṣadhibhyaś ca parvatāḥ
c parvatebhyaś ca jāgarti raso rasaguṇāt tathā
a jāgarti nirṛtir devī jyotīṃṣi nirṛter api
c vedāḥ pratiṣṭhā jyotirbhyas tato hayaśirāḥ prabhuḥ
a brahmā pitāmahas tasmāj jāgarti prabhur avyayaḥ
c pitāmahān mahādevo jāgarti bhagavāñ śivaḥ
a viśvedevāḥ śivāc cāpi viśvebhyaś ca tatharṣayaḥ
c ṛṣibhyo bhagavān somaḥ somād devāḥ sanātanāḥ
a devebhyo brāhmaṇā loke jāgratīty upadhāraya
c brāhmaṇebhyaś ca rājanyā lokān rakṣanti dharmataḥ
e sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva kṣatriyebhyaḥ sanātanam
a prajā jāgrati loke 'smin daṇḍo jāgarti tāsu ca
c sarvasaṃkṣepako daṇḍaḥ pitāmahasamaḥ prabhuḥ
a jāgarti kālaḥ pūrvaṃ ca madhye cānte ca bhārata
c īśvaraḥ sarvalokasya mahādevaḥ prajāpatiḥ
a devadevaḥ śivaḥ śarvo jāgarti satataṃ prabhuḥ
c kapardī śaṃkaro rudro bhavaḥ sthāṇur umāpatiḥ
a ity eṣa daṇḍo vikhyāta ādau madhye tathāvare
c bhūmipālo yathānyāyaṃ vartetānena dharmavit
 bhīṣma uvāca
a itīdaṃ vasuhomasya śṛṇuyād yo mataṃ naraḥ
c śrutvā ca samyag varteta sa kāmān āpnuyān nṛpaḥ
a iti te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yo daṇḍo manujarṣabha
c niyantā sarvalokasya dharmākrāntasya bhārata
d vasuhomāc chrutaṃ rājñā māndhātrā bhūbhṛtā purā
d mayāpi kathitaṃ puṇyam ākhyānaṃ prathitaṃ tathā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a tāta dharmārthakāmānāṃ śrotum icchāmi niścayam
c lokayātrā hi kārtsnyena triṣv eteṣu pratiṣṭhitā
a dharmārthakāmāḥ kiṃmūlās trayāṇāṃ prabhavaś ca kaḥ
c anyonyaṃ cānuṣajjante vartante ca pṛthak pṛthak
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yadā te syuḥ sumanaso lokasaṃsthārthaniścaye
c kālaprabhavasaṃsthāsu sajjante ca trayas tadā
a dharmamūlas tu deho 'rthaḥ kāmo 'rthaphalam ucyate
c saṃkalpamūlās te sarve saṃkalpo viṣayātmakaḥ
a viṣayāś caiva kārtsnyena sarva āhārasiddhaye
c mūlam etat trivargasya nivṛttir mokṣa ucyate
a dharmaḥ śarīrasaṃguptir dharmārthaṃ cārtha iṣyate
c kāmo ratiphalaś cātra sarve caite rajasvalāḥ
a saṃnikṛṣṭāṃś cared enān na cainān manasā tyajet
c vimuktas tamasā sarvān dharmādīn kāmanaiṣṭhikān
a śreṣṭhabuddhis trivargasya yad ayaṃ prāpnuyāt kṣaṇāt
b karmaṇā buddhipūrveṇa bhavaty artho na vā punaḥ
b arthārtham anyad bhavati viparītam athāparam
b anarthārtham avāpyārtham anyatrādyopakārakam
c buddhyā budhyed ihārthe na tad ahnā tu nikṛṣṭayā
a apadhyānamalo dharmo malo 'rthasya nigūhanam
c saṃpramodamalaḥ kāmo bhūyaḥ svaguṇavartitaḥ
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c kāmandasya ca saṃvādam aṅgāriṣṭhasya cobhayoḥ
a kāmandam ṛṣim āsīnam abhivādya narādhipaḥ
c aṅgāriṣṭho 'tha papraccha kṛtvā samayaparyayam
a yaḥ pāpaṃ kurute rājā kāmamohabalātkṛtaḥ
c pratyāsannasya tasyarṣe kiṃ syāt pāpapraṇāśanam
a adharmo dharma iti ha yo 'jñānād ācared iha
c taṃ cāpi prathitaṃ loke kathaṃ rājā nivartayet
 kāmanda uvāca
a yo dharmārthau samutsṛjya kāmam evānuvartate
c sa dharmārthaparityāgāt prajñānāśam ihārchati
a prajñāpraṇāśako mohas tathā dharmārthanāśakaḥ
c tasmān nāstikatā caiva durācāraś ca jāyate
a durācārān yadā rājā praduṣṭān na niyacchati
c tasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva
a taṃ prajā nānuvartante brāhmaṇā na ca sādhavaḥ
c tataḥ saṃkṣayam āpnoti tathā vadhyatvam eti ca
a apadhvastas tv avamato duḥkhaṃ jīvati jīvitam
c jīvec ca yad apadhvastas tac chuddhaṃ maraṇaṃ bhavet
a atraitad āhur ācāryāḥ pāpasya ca nibarhaṇam
c sevitavyā trayī vidyā satkāro brāhmaṇeṣu ca
a mahāmanā bhaved dharme vivahec ca mahākule
c brāhmaṇāṃś cāpi seveta kṣamāyuktān manasvinaḥ
a japed udakaśīlaḥ syāt sumukho nānyad āsthitaḥ
c dharmānvitān saṃpraviśed bahiḥ kṛtvaiva duṣkṛtīn
a prasādayen madhuraya vācāpy atha ca karmaṇā
c ity asmīti vaden nityaṃ pareṣāṃ kīrtayan guṇān
a apāpo hy evam ācāraḥ kṣipraṃ bahumato bhavet
c pāpāny api ca kṛcchrāṇi śamayen nātra saṃśayaḥ
a guravo 'pi paraṃ dharmaṃ yad brūyus tat tathā kuru
c gurūṇāṃ hi prasādād dhi śreyaḥ param avāpsyasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ime janā naraśreṣṭha praśaṃsanti sadā bhuvi
c dharmasya śīlam evādau tato me saṃśayo mahān
a yadi tac chakyam asmābhir jñātuṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
c śrotum icchāmi tat sarvaṃ yathaitad upalabhyate
a kathaṃ nu prāpyate śīlaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
c kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ ca tat proktaṃ brūhi me vadatāṃ vara
 bhīṣma uvāca
a purā duryodhaneneha dhṛtarāṣṭrāya mānada
c ākhyātaṃ tapyamānena śriyaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgatām
a indraprasthe mahārāja tava sabhrātṛkasya ha
c sabhāyāṃ cāvahasanaṃ tat sarvaṃ śṛṇu bhārata
a bhavatas tāṃ sabhāṃ dṛṣṭvā samṛddhiṃ cāpy anuttamām
c duryodhanas tadāsīnaḥ sarvaṃ pitre nyavedayat
a śrutvā ca dhṛtarāṣṭro 'pi duryodhanavacas tadā
c abravīt karṇasahitaṃ duryodhanam idaṃ vacaḥ
a kimarthaṃ tapyase putra śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
c śrutvā tvām anuneṣyāmi yadi samyag bhaviṣyasi
a yathā tvaṃ mahad aiśvaryaṃ prāptaḥ parapuraṃjaya
c kiṃkarā bhrātaraḥ sarve mitrāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā
a ācchādayasi prāvārān aśnāsi piśitodanam
c ājāneyā vahanti tvāṃ kasmāc chocasi putraka
 duryodhana uvāca
a daśa tāni sahasrāṇi snātakānāṃ mahātmanām
c bhuñjate rukmapātrīṣu yudhiṣṭhiraniveśane
a dṛṣṭvā ca tāṃ sabhāṃ divyāṃ divyapuṣpaphalānvitām
c aśvāṃs tittirakalmāṣān ratnāni vividhāni ca
a dṛṣṭvā tāṃ pāṇḍaveyānām ṛddhim indropamāṃ śubhām
c amitrāṇāṃ sumahatīm anuśocāmi mānada
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a yadīcchasi śriyaṃ tāta yādṛśīṃ tāṃ yudhiṣṭhire
c viśiṣṭāṃ vā naravyāghra śīlavān bhava putraka
a śīlena hi trayo lokāḥ śakyā jetuṃ na saṃśayaḥ
c na hi kiṃ cid asādhyaṃ vai loke śīlavatāṃ bhavet
a ekarātreṇa māndhātā tryaheṇa janamejayaḥ
c saptarātreṇa nābhāgaḥ pṛthivīṃ pratipedivān
a ete hi pārthivāḥ sarve śīlavanto damānvitāḥ
c atas teṣāṃ guṇakrītā vasudhā svayam āgamat
d duryodhana uvāca
d kathaṃ tat prāpyate śīlaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
d yena śīlena saṃprāptāḥ kṣipram ete vasuṃdharām
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c nāradena purā proktaṃ śīlam āśritya bhārata
a prahrādena hṛtaṃ rājyaṃ mahendrasya mahātmanaḥ
c śīlam āśritya daityena trailokyaṃ ca vaśīkṛtam
a tato bṛhaspatiṃ śakraḥ prāñjaliḥ samupasthitaḥ
c uvāca ca mahāprājñaḥ śreya icchāmi veditum
a tato bṛhaspatis tasmai jñānaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ param
c kathayām āsa bhagavān devendrāya kurūdvaha
a etāvac chreya ity eva bṛhaspatir abhāṣata
c indras tu bhūyaḥ papraccha kva viśeṣo bhaved iti
 bṛhaspatir uvāca
a viśeṣo 'sti mahāṃs tāta bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ
c tatrāgamaya bhadraṃ te bhūya eva puraṃdara
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a ātmanas tu tataḥ śreyo bhārgavāt sumahāyaśāḥ
c jñānam āgamayat prītyā punaḥ sa paramadyutiḥ
a tenāpi samanujñāto bhārgaveṇa mahātmanā
c śreyo 'stīti punar bhūyaḥ śukram āha śatakratuḥ
a bhārgavas tv āha dharmajñaḥ prahrādasya mahātmanaḥ
c jñānam asti viśeṣeṇa tato hṛṣṭaś ca so 'bhavat
a sa tato brāhmaṇo bhūtvā prahrādaṃ pākaśāsanaḥ
c sṛtvā provāca medhāvī śreya icchāmi veditum
a prahrādas tv abravīd vipraṃ kṣaṇo nāsti dvijarṣabha
c trailokyarājye saktasya tato nopadiśāmi te
a brāhmaṇas tv abravīd vākyaṃ kasmin kāle kṣaṇo bhavet
c tatopadiṣṭam icchāmi yad yat kāryāntaraṃ bhavet
a tataḥ prīto 'bhavad rājā prahrādo brahmavādine
c tathety uktvā śubhe kāle jñānatattvaṃ dadau tadā
a brāhmaṇo 'pi yathānyāyaṃ guruvṛttim anuttamām
c cakāra sarvabhāvena yadvat sa manasecchati
a pṛṣṭaś ca tena bahuśaḥ prāptaṃ katham ariṃdama
c trailokyarājyaṃ dharmajña kāraṇaṃ tad bravīhi me
d prahlādo 'pi mahārāja brāhmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
 prahrāda uvāca
a nāsūyāmi dvijaśreṣṭha rājāsmīti kadā cana
c kavyāni vadatāṃ tāta saṃyacchāmi vahāmi ca
a te visrabdhāḥ prabhāṣante saṃyacchanti ca māṃ sadā
c te mā kavyapade saktaṃ śuśrūṣum anasūyakam
a dharmātmānaṃ jitakrodhaṃ saṃyataṃ saṃyatendriyam
c samācinvanti śāstāraḥ kṣaudraṃ madhv iva makṣikāḥ
a so 'haṃ vāgagrapiṣṭānāṃ rasānām avalehitā
c svajātyān adhitiṣṭhāmi nakṣatrāṇīva candramāḥ
a etat pṛthivyām amṛtam etac cakṣur anuttamam
c yad brāhmaṇamukhe kavyam etac chrutvā pravartate
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a etāvac chreya ity āha prahrādo brahmavādinam
c śuśrūṣitas tena tadā daityendro vākyam abravīt
a yathāvad guruvṛttyā te prīto 'smi dvijasattama
c varaṃ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṃ te pradātāsmi na saṃśayaḥ
a kṛtam ity eva daityendram uvāca sa ca vai dvijaḥ
c prahrādas tv abravīt prīto gṛhyatāṃ vara ity uta
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a yadi rājan prasannas tvaṃ mama cecchasi ced dhitam
c bhavataḥ śīlam icchāmi prāptum eṣa varo mama
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a tataḥ prītaś ca daityendro bhayaṃ cāsyābhavan mahat
c vare pradiṣṭe vipreṇa nālpatejāyam ity uta
a evam astv iti taṃ prāha prahrādo vismitas tadā
c upākṛtya tu viprāya varaṃ duḥkhānvito 'bhavat
a datte vare gate vipre cintāsīn mahatī tataḥ
c prahrādasya mahārāja niścayaṃ na ca jagmivān
a tasya cintayatas tāta chāyābhūtaṃ mahādyute
c tejo vigrahavat tāta śarīram ajahāt tadā
a tam apṛcchan mahākāyaṃ prahrādaḥ ko bhavān iti
c pratyāha nanu śīlo 'smi tyakto gacchāmy ahaṃ tvayā
a tasmin dvijavare rājan vatsyāmy aham aninditam
c yo 'sau śiṣyatvam āgamya tvayi nityaṃ samāhitaḥ
e ity uktvāntarhitaṃ tad vai śakraṃ cānvaviśat prabho
a tasmiṃs tejasi yāte tu tādṛgrūpas tato 'paraḥ
c śarīrān niḥsṛtas tasya ko bhavān iti cābravīt
a dharmaṃ prahrāda māṃ viddhi yatrāsau dvijasattamaḥ
c tatra yāsyāmi daityendra yataḥ śīlaṃ tato hy aham
a tato 'paro mahārāja prajvalann iva tejasā
c śarīrān niḥsṛtas tasya prahrādasya mahātmanaḥ
a ko bhavān iti pṛṣṭaś ca tam āha sa mahādyutiḥ
c satyam asmy asurendrāgrya yāsye 'haṃ dharmam anv iha
a tasminn anugate dharmaṃ puruṣe puruṣo 'paraḥ
c niścakrāma tatas tasmāt pṛṣṭaś cāha mahātmanā
e vṛttaṃ prahrāda māṃ viddhi yataḥ satyaṃ tato hy aham
a tasmin gate mahāśvetaḥ śarīrāt tasya niryayau
c pṛṣṭaś cāha balaṃ viddhi yato vṛttam ahaṃ tataḥ
e ity uktvā ca yayau tatra yato vṛttaṃ narādhipa
a tataḥ prabhāmayī devī śarīrāt tasya niryayau
c tām apṛcchat sa daityendraḥ sā śrīr ity evam abravīt
a uṣitāsmi sukhaṃ vīra tvayi satyaparākrame
c tvayā tyaktā gamiṣyāmi balaṃ yatra tato hy aham
a tato bhayaṃ prādurāsīt prahrādasya mahātmanaḥ
c apṛcchata ca tāṃ bhūyaḥ kva yāsi kamalālaye
a tvaṃ hi satyavratā devī lokasya parameśvarī
c kaś cāsau brāhmaṇaśreṣṭhas tattvam icchāmi veditum
 śrīr uvāca
a sa śakro brahmacārī ca yas tvayā copaśikṣitaḥ
c trailokye te yad aiśvaryaṃ tat tenāpahṛtaṃ prabho
a śīlena hi tvayā lokāḥ sarve dharmajña nirjitāḥ
c tad vijñāya mahendreṇa tava śīlaṃ hṛtaṃ prabho
a dharmaḥ satyaṃ tathā vṛttaṃ balaṃ caiva tathā hy aham
c śīlamūlā mahāprājña sadā nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktvā gatā tu śrīs te ca sarve yudhiṣṭhira
c duryodhanas tu pitaraṃ bhūya evābravīd idam
a śīlasya tattvam icchāmi vettuṃ kauravanandana
c prāpyate ca yathā śīlaṃ tam upāyaṃ vadasva me
 dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
a sopāyaṃ pūrvam uddiṣṭaṃ prahrādena mahātmanā
c saṃkṣepatas tu śīlasya śṛṇu prāptiṃ narādhipa
a adrohaḥ sarvabhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girā
c anugrahaś ca dānaṃ ca śīlam etat praśasyate
a yad anyeṣāṃ hitaṃ na syād ātmanaḥ karma pauruṣam
c apatrapeta vā yena na tat kuryāt kathaṃ cana
a tat tu karma tathā kuryād yena ślāgheta saṃsadi
c etac chīlaṃ samāsena kathitaṃ kurusattama
a yady apy aśīlā nṛpate prāpnuvanti kva cic chriyam
c na bhuñjate ciraṃ tāta samūlāś ca patanti te
a etad viditvā tattvena śīlavān bhava putraka
c yadīcchasi śriyaṃ tāta suviśiṣṭāṃ yudhiṣṭhirāt
d jitā sabhā śāstravatā samāsā
masyā gomatā jitā
d adhvā jito yānavatā sarvaṃ śīlavatā jitam
d adhikāṃ vāpi rājendra tatas tvaṃ śīlavān bhava
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etat kathitavān putre dhṛtarāṣṭro narādhipa
c etat kuruṣva kaunteya tataḥ prāpsyasi tat phalam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śīlaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣe kathitaṃ te pitāmaha
c katham āśā samutpannā yā ca sā tad vadasva me
a saṃśayo me mahān eṣa samutpannaḥ pitāmaha
c chettā ca tasya nānyo 'sti tvattaḥ parapuraṃjaya
a pitāmahāśā mahatī mamāsīd dhi suyodhane
c prāpte yuddhe tu yad yuktaṃ tat kartāyam iti prabho
a sarvasyāśā sumahatī puruṣasyopajāyate
c tasyāṃ vihanyamānāyāṃ duḥkho mṛtyur asaṃśayam
a so 'haṃ hatāśo durbuddhiḥ kṛtas tena durātmanā
c dhārtarāṣṭreṇa rājendra paśya mandātmatāṃ mama
a āśāṃ mahattarāṃ manye parvatād api sadrumāt
c ākāśād api vā rājann aprameyaiva vā punaḥ
a eṣā caiva kuruśreṣṭha durvicintyā sudurlabhā
c durlabhatvāc ca paśyāmi kim anyad durlabhaṃ tataḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi yudhiṣṭhira nibodha tat
c itihāsaṃ sumitrasya nirvṛttam ṛṣabhasya ca
a sumitro nāma rājarṣir haihayo mṛgayāṃ gataḥ
c sasāra sa mṛgaṃ viddhvā bāṇena nataparvaṇā
a sa mṛgo bāṇam ādāya yayāv amitavikramaḥ
c sa ca rājā balī tūrṇaṃ sasāra mṛgam antikāt
a tato nimnaṃ sthalaṃ caiva sa mṛgo 'dravad āśugaḥ
c muhūrtam eva rājendra samena sa pathāgamat
a tataḥ sa rājā tāruṇyād aurasena balena ca
c sasāra bāṇāsanabhṛt sakhaḍgo haṃsavat tadā
a tīrtvā nadān nadīś caiva palvalāni vanāni ca
c atikramyābhyatikramya sasāraiva vane caran
a sa tu kāmān mṛgo rājann āsādyāsādya taṃ nṛpam
c punar abhyeti javano javena mahatā tataḥ
a sa tasya bāṇair bahubhiḥ samabhyasto vanecaraḥ
c prakrīḍann iva rājendra punar abhyeti cāntikam
a punaś ca javam āsthāya javano mṛgayūthapaḥ
c atītyātītya rājendra punar abhyeti cāntikam
a tasya marmacchidaṃ ghoraṃ sumitro 'mitrakarśanaḥ
c samādāya śaraśreṣṭhaṃ kārmukān niravāsṛjat
a tato gavyūtimātreṇa mṛgayūthapayūthapaḥ
c tasya bāṇapathaṃ tyaktvā tasthivān prahasann iva
a tasmin nipatite bāṇe bhūmau prajvalite tataḥ
c praviveśa mahāraṇyaṃ mṛgo rājāpy athādravat
a praviśya tu mahāraṇyaṃ tāpasānām athāśramam
c āsasāda tato rājā śrāntaś copāviśat punaḥ
a taṃ kārmukadharaṃ dṛṣṭvā śramārtaṃ kṣudhitaṃ tadā
c sametya ṛṣayas tasmin pūjāṃ cakrur yathāvidhi
d sa pūjām ṛṣibhir dattāṃ pratigṛhya narādhipaḥ
d apṛcchat tāpasān sarvāṃs tapaso vṛddhim uttamām
d te tasya rājño vacanaṃ pratigṛhya tapodhanāḥ
a ṛṣayo rājaśārdūlam apṛcchan svaṃ prayojanam
c kena bhadramukhārthena saṃprāpto 'si tapovanam
a padātir baddhanistriṃśo dhanvī bāṇī nareśvara
c etad icchāma vijñātuṃ kutaḥ prāpto 'si mānada
e kasmin kule hi jātas tvaṃ kiṃnāmāsi bravīhi naḥ
a tataḥ sa rājā sarvebhyo dvijebhyaḥ puruṣarṣabha
c ācakhyau tad yathānyāyaṃ paricaryāṃ ca bhārata
a haihayānāṃ kule jātaḥ sumitro mitranandanaḥ
c carāmi mṛgayūthāni nighnan bāṇaiḥ sahasraśaḥ
e balena mahatā guptaḥ sāmātyaḥ sāvarodhanaḥ
a mṛgas tu viddho bāṇena mayā sarati śalyavān
c taṃ dravantam anu prāpto vanam etad yadṛcchayā
e bhavatsakāśe naṣṭaśrīr hatāśaḥ śramakarśitaḥ
a kiṃ nu duḥkham ato 'nyad vai yad ahaṃ śramakarśitaḥ
c bhavatām āśramaṃ prāpto hatāśo naṣṭalakṣaṇaḥ
a na rājalakṣaṇatyāgo na purasya tapodhanāḥ
c duḥkhaṃ karoti tat tīvraṃ yathāśā vihatā mama
a himavān vā mahāśailaḥ samudro vā mahodadhiḥ
c mahattvān nānvapadyetāṃ rodasyor antaraṃ yathā
e āśāyās tapasi śreṣṭhās tathā nāntam ahaṃ gataḥ
a bhavatāṃ viditaṃ sarvaṃ sarvajñā hi tapodhanāḥ
c bhavantaḥ sumahābhāgās tasmāt prakṣyāmi saṃśayam
a āśāvān puruṣo yaḥ syād antarikṣam athāpi vā
c kiṃ nu jyāyastaraṃ loke mahattvāt pratibhāti vaḥ
e etad icchāmi tattvena śrotuṃ kim iha durlabham
a yadi guhyaṃ taponityā na vo brūteha māciram
c na hi guhyam ataḥ śrotum icchāmi dvijapuṃgavāḥ
a bhavattapovighāto vā yena syād virame tataḥ
c yadi vāsti kathāyogo yo 'yaṃ praśno mayeritaḥ
a etat kāraṇasāmagryaṃ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
c bhavanto hi taponityā brūyur etat samāhitāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tatas teṣāṃ samastānām ṛṣīṇām ṛṣisattamaḥ
c ṛṣabho nāma viprarṣiḥ smayann iva tato 'bravīt
a purāhaṃ rājaśārdūla tīrthāny anucaran prabho
c samāsāditavān divyaṃ naranārāyaṇāśramam
a yatra sā badarī ramyā hrado vaihāyasas tathā
c yatra cāśvaśirā rājan vedān paṭhati śāśvatān
a tasmin sarasi kṛtvāhaṃ vidhivat tarpaṇaṃ purā
c pitṝṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca tato ''śramam iyāṃ tadā
a remāte yatra tau nityaṃ naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
c adūrād āśramaṃ kaṃ cid vāsārtham agamaṃ tataḥ
a tataś cīrājinadharaṃ kṛśam uccam atīva ca
c adrākṣam ṛṣim āyāntaṃ tanuṃ nāma taponidhim
a anyair narair mahābāho vapuṣāṣṭaguṇānvitam
c kṛśatā cāpi rājarṣe na dṛṣṭā tādṛśī kva cit
a śarīram api rājendra tasya kāniṣṭhikāsamam
c grīvā bāhū tathā pādau keśāś cādbhutadarśanāḥ
a śiraḥ kāyānurūpaṃ ca karṇau netre tathaiva ca
c tasya vāk caiva ceṣṭā ca sāmānye rājasattama
a dṛṣṭvāhaṃ taṃ kṛśaṃ vipraṃ bhītaḥ paramadurmanāḥ
c pādau tasyābhivādyātha sthitaḥ prāñjalir agrataḥ
a nivedya nāma gotraṃ ca pitaraṃ ca nararṣabha
c pradiṣṭe cāsane tena śanair aham upāviśam
a tataḥ sa kathayām āsa kathā dharmārthasaṃhitāḥ
c ṛṣimadhye mahārāja tatra dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
a tasmiṃs tu kathayaty eva rājā rājīvalocanaḥ
c upāyāj javanair aśvaiḥ sabalaḥ sāvarodhanaḥ
a smaran putram araṇye vai naṣṭaṃ paramadurmanāḥ
c bhūridyumnapitā dhīmān raghuśreṣṭho mahāyaśāḥ
a iha drakṣyāmi taṃ putraṃ drakṣyāmīheti pārthivaḥ
c evam āśākṛto rājaṃś caran vanam idaṃ purā
a durlabhaḥ sa mayā draṣṭuṃ nūnaṃ paramadhārmikaḥ
c ekaḥ putro mahāraṇye naṣṭa ity asakṛt tadā
a durlabhaḥ sa mayā draṣṭum āśā ca mahatī mama
c tayā parītagātro 'haṃ mumūrṣur nātra saṃśayaḥ
a etac chrutvā sa bhagavāṃs tanur munivarottamaḥ
c avākśirā dhyānaparo muhūrtam iva tasthivān
a tam anudhyāntam ālakṣya rājā paramadurmanāḥ
c uvāca vākyaṃ dīnātmā mandaṃ mandam ivāsakṛt
a durlabhaṃ kiṃ nu viprarṣe āśāyāś caiva kiṃ bhavet
c bravītu bhagavān etad yadi guhyaṃ na tan mayi
a maharṣir bhagavāṃs tena pūrvam āsīd vimānitaḥ
c bāliśāṃ buddhim āsthāya mandabhāgyatayātmanaḥ
a arthayan kalaśaṃ rājan kāñcanaṃ valkalāni ca
b avajñāpūrvakenāpi na saṃpāditavāṃs tataḥ
c nirviṇṇaḥ sa tu viprarṣir nirāśaḥ samapadyata
a evam uktvābhivādyātha tam ṛṣiṃ lokapūjitam
c śrānto nyaṣīdad dharmātmā yathā tvaṃ narasattama
a arghyaṃ tataḥ samānīya pādyaṃ caiva mahān ṛṣiḥ
c āraṇyakena vidhinā rājñe sarvaṃ nyavedayat
a tatas te munayaḥ sarve parivārya nararṣabham
c upāviśan puraskṛtya saptarṣaya iva dhruvam
a apṛcchaṃś caiva te tatra rājānam aparājitam
c prayojanam idaṃ sarvam āśramasya praveśanam
 rājovāca
a vīradyumna iti khyāto rājāhaṃ dikṣu viśrutaḥ
c bhūridyumnaṃ sutaṃ naṣṭam anveṣṭuṃ vanam āgataḥ
a ekaputraḥ sa viprāgrya bāla eva ca so 'nagha
c na dṛśyate vane cāsmiṃs tam anveṣṭuṃ carāmy aham
 ṛṣabha uvāca
a evam ukte tu vacane rājñā munir adhomukhaḥ
c tūṣṇīm evābhavat tatra na ca pratyuktavān nṛpam
a sa hi tena purā vipro rājñā nātyarthamānitaḥ
c āśākṛśaṃ ca rājendra tapo dīrghaṃ samāsthitaḥ
a pratigraham ahaṃ rājñāṃ na kariṣye kathaṃ cana
c anyeṣāṃ caiva varṇānām iti kṛtvā dhiyaṃ tadā
a āśā hi puruṣaṃ bālaṃ lālāpayati tasthuṣī
c tām ahaṃ vyapaneṣyāmi iti kṛtvā vyavasthitaḥ
d vīradyumnas tu taṃ bhūyaḥ papraccha munisattamam
 rājovāca
a āśāyāḥ kiṃ kṛśatvaṃ ca kiṃ ceha bhuvi durlabham
c bravītu bhagavān etat tvaṃ hi dharmārthadarśivān
 ṛṣabha uvāca
a tataḥ saṃsmṛtya tat sarvaṃ smārayiṣyann ivābravīt
c rājānaṃ bhagavān vipras tataḥ kṛśatanus tanuḥ
a kṛśatve na samaṃ rājann āśāyā vidyate nṛpa
c tasyā vai durlabhatvāt tu prārthitāḥ pārthivā mayā
 rājovāca
a kṛśākṛśe mayā brahman gṛhīte vacanāt tava
c durlabhatvaṃ ca tasyaiva vedavākyam iva dvija
a saṃśayas tu mahāprājña saṃjāto hṛdaye mama
c tan me sattama tattvena vaktum arhasi pṛcchataḥ
a tvattaḥ kṛśataraṃ kiṃ nu bravītu bhagavān idam
c yadi guhyaṃ na te vipra loke 'smin kiṃ nu durlabham
 kṛśatanur uvāca
a durlabho 'py atha vā nāsti yo 'rthī dhṛtim ivāpnuyāt
c sudurlabhataras tāta yo 'rthinaṃ nāvamanyate
a saṃśrutya nopakriyate paraṃ śaktyā yathārhataḥ
c saktā yā sarvabhūteṣu sāśā kṛśatarī mayā
d kṛtaghneṣu ca yā saktā nṛśaṃseṣv alaseṣu ca
d apakāriṣu yā saktā sāśā kṛśatarī mayā
a ekaputraḥ pitā putre naṣṭe vā proṣite tathā
c pravṛttiṃ yo na jānāti sāśā kṛśatarī mayā
a prasave caiva nārīṇāṃ vṛddhānāṃ putrakāritā
c tathā narendra dhaninām āśā kṛśatarī mayā
d pradānakāṅkṣiṇīnāṃ ca kanyānāṃ vayasi sthite
d śrutvā kathās tathāyuktāḥ sāśā kṛśatarī mayā
 ṛṣabha uvāca
a etac chrutvā tato rājan sa rājā sāvarodhanaḥ
c saṃspṛśya pādau śirasā nipapāta dvijarṣabhe
 rājovāca
a prasādaye tvā bhagavan putreṇecchāmi saṃgatim
b yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā saṃprati dvijasattama
c vṛṇīṣva ca varaṃ vipra yam icchasi yathāvidhi
 ṛṣabha uvāca
a abravīc ca hi taṃ vākyaṃ rājā rājīvalocanaḥ
c satyam etad yathā vipra tvayoktaṃ nāsty ato mṛṣā
a tataḥ prahasya bhagavāṃs tanur dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c putram asyānayat kṣipraṃ tapasā ca śrutena ca
a taṃ samānāyya putraṃ tu tadopālabhya pārthivam
c ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
a saṃdarśayitvā cātmānaṃ divyam adbhutadarśanam
c vipāpmā vigatakrodhaś cacāra vanam antikāt
a etad dṛṣṭaṃ mayā rājaṃs tataś ca vacanaṃ śrutam
c āśām apanayasvāśu tataḥ kṛśatarīm imām
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa tatrokto mahārāja ṛṣabheṇa mahātmanā
c sumitro 'panayat kṣipram āśāṃ kṛśatarīṃ tadā
a evaṃ tvam api kaunteya śrutvā vāṇīm imāṃ mama
c sthiro bhava yathā rājan himavān acalottamaḥ
a tvaṃ hi draṣṭā ca śrotā ca kṛcchreṣv arthakṛteṣv iha
c śrutvā mama mahārāja na saṃtaptum ihārhasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a nāmṛtasyeva paryāptir mamāsti bruvati tvayi
b yady api syāt parāvṛttis tathātṛpto 'smi bhārata
c tasmāt kathaya bhūyas tvaṃ dharmam eva pitāmaha
d na hi tṛptiṃ parāṃ yāmi dharme kautūhalaṃ hi me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c gautamasya ca saṃvādaṃ yamasya ca mahātmanaḥ
a pāriyātragiriṃ prāpya gautamasyāśramo mahān
c uvāsa gautamo yatra kālaṃ tad api me śṛṇu
a ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi so 'tapyad gautamas tapaḥ
c tam ugratapasaṃ yuktaṃ tapasā bhāvitaṃ munim
a upayāto naravyāghra lokapālo yamas tadā
c tam apaśyat sutapasam ṛṣiṃ vai gautamaṃ munim
a sa taṃ viditvā brahmarṣir yamam āgatam ojasā
c prāñjaliḥ prayato bhūtvā upasṛptas tapodhanaḥ
a taṃ dharmarājo dṛṣṭvaiva namaskṛtya nararṣabham
c nyamantrayata dharmeṇa kriyatāṃ kim iti bruvan
 gautama uvāca
a mātāpitṛbhyām ānṛṇyaṃ kiṃ kṛtvā samavāpnuyāt
c kathaṃ ca lokān aśnāti puruṣo durlabhāñ śubhān
 yama uvāca
 nānyat tīrthaṃ na devo 'nyo dharmo 'nyo na kathaṃ cana
 naraṃ tāvad ajānantaṃ pāvayanti mahīpatim
 tasmāt pāpaṃ parityajya bhaktim āsthāya śāśvatīm
 karmaṇā manasā vācāto bhajann anṛṇo bhavet
a tapaḥśaucavatā nityaṃ satyadharmaratena ca
c mātāpitror aharahaḥ pūjanaṃ kāryam añjasā
a aśvamedhaiś ca yaṣṭavyaṃ bahubhiḥ svāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
c tena lokān upāśnāti puruṣo 'dbhutadarśanān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a mitraiḥ prahīyamāṇasya bahvamitrasya kā gatiḥ
c rājñaḥ saṃkṣīṇakośasya balahīnasya bhārata
a duṣṭāmātyasahāyasya srutamantrasya sarvataḥ
c rājyāt pracyavamānasya gatim anyām apaśyataḥ
a paracakrābhiyātasya durbalasya balīyasā
a   pararāṣṭrāṇi mṛdnataḥ
a vigrahe vartamānasya
c asaṃvihitarāṣṭrasya deśakālāvajānataḥ
a aprāpyaṃ ca bhavet sāntvaṃ bhedo vāpy atipīḍanāt
c jīvitaṃ cārthahetor vā tatra kiṃ sukṛtaṃ bhavet
 bhīṣma uvāca
a guhyaṃ mā dharmam aprākṣīr atīva bharatarṣabha
c apṛṣṭo notsahe vaktuṃ dharmam enaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a dharmo hy aṇīyān vacanād buddheś ca bharatarṣabha
c śrutvopāsya sadācāraiḥ sādhur bhavati sa kva cit
a karmaṇā buddhipūrveṇa bhavaty āḍhyo na vā punaḥ
c tādṛśo 'yam anupraśnaḥ sa vyavasyas tvayā dhiyā
a upāyaṃ dharmabahulaṃ yātrārthaṃ śṛṇu bhārata
c nāham etādṛśaṃ dharmaṃ bubhūṣe dharmakāraṇāt
e duḥkhādāna ihāḍhyeṣu syāt tu paścāt kṣamo mataḥ
a anugamya gatīnāṃ ca sarvāsām eva niścayam
c yathā yathā hi puruṣo nityaṃ śāstram avekṣate
e tathā tathā vijānāti vijñānaṃ cāsya rocate
a avijñānād ayogaś ca puruṣasyopajāyate
c avijñānād ayogo hi yogo bhūtikaraḥ punaḥ
a aśaṅkamāno vacanam anasūyur idaṃ śṛṇu
c rājñaḥ kośakṣayād eva jāyate balasaṃkṣayaḥ
a kośaṃ saṃjanayed rājā nirjalebhyo yathā jalam
c kālaṃ prāpyānugṛhṇīyād eṣa dharmo 'tra sāṃpratam
a upāyadharmaṃ prāpyainaṃ pūrvair ācaritaṃ janaiḥ
c anyo dharmaḥ samarthānām āpatsv anyaś ca bhārata
a prākkośaḥ procyate dharmo buddhir dharmād garīyasī
c dharmaṃ prāpya nyāyavṛttim abalīyān na vindati
a yasmād dhanasyopapattir ekāntena na vidyate
c tasmād āpady adharmo 'pi śrūyate dharmalakṣaṇaḥ
a adharmo jāyate yasminn iti vai kavayo viduḥ
c anantaraḥ kṣatriyasya iti vai vicikitsase
a yathāsya dharmo na glāyen neyāc chatruvaśaṃ yathā
c tat kartavyam ihety āhur nātmānam avasādayet
a sannātmā naiva dharmasya na parasya na cātmanaḥ
c sarvopāyair ujjihīrṣed ātmānam iti niścayaḥ
a tatra dharmavidāṃ tāta niścayo dharmanaipuṇe
c udyamo jīvanaṃ kṣatre bāhuvīryād iti śrutiḥ
a kṣatriyo vṛttisaṃrodhe kasya nādātum arhati
c anyatra tāpasasvāc ca brāhmaṇasvāc ca bhārata
a yathā vai brāhmaṇaḥ sīdann ayājyam api yājayet
c abhojyānnāni cāśnīyāt tathedaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
a pīḍitasya kim advāram utpatho nidhṛtasya vā
c advārataḥ pradravati yadā bhavati pīḍitaḥ
a tasya kośabalajyānyā sarvalokaparābhavaḥ
c bhaikṣacaryā na vihitā na ca viṭśūdrajīvikā
a svadharmānantarā vṛttir yānyān anupajīvataḥ
c vahataḥ prathamaṃ kalpam anukalpena jīvanam
a āpadgatena dharmāṇām anyāyenopajīvanam
c api hy etad brāhmaṇeṣu dṛṣṭaṃ vṛttiparikṣaye
a kṣatriye saṃśayaḥ kaḥ syād ity etan niścitaṃ sadā
c ādadīta viśiṣṭebhyo nāvasīdet kathaṃ cana
a hantāraṃ rakṣitāraṃ ca prajānāṃ kṣatriyaṃ viduḥ
c tasmāt saṃrakṣatā kāryam ādānaṃ kṣatrabandhunā
a anyatra rājan hiṃsāyā vṛttir nehāsti kasya cit
c apy araṇyasamutthasya ekasya carato muneḥ
a na śaṅkhalikhitāṃ vṛttiṃ śakyam āsthāya jīvitum
c viśeṣataḥ kuruśreṣṭha prajāpālanam īpsatā
a parasparābhisaṃrakṣā rājñā rāṣṭreṇa cāpadi
c nityam eveha kartavyā eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a rājā rāṣṭraṃ yathāpatsu dravyaughaiḥ parirakṣati
c rāṣṭreṇa rājā vyasane parirakṣyas tathā bhavet
a kośaṃ daṇḍaṃ balaṃ mitraṃ yad anyad api saṃcitam
c na kurvītāntaraṃ rāṣṭre rājā parigate kṣudhā
a bījaṃ bhaktena saṃpādyam iti dharmavido viduḥ
c atraitac chambarasyāhur mahāmāyasya darśanam
a dhik tasya jīvitaṃ rājño rāṣṭre yasyāvasīdati
c avṛttyāntyamanuṣyo 'pi yo vai veda śiber vacaḥ
a rājñaḥ kośabalaṃ mūlaṃ kośamūlaṃ punar balam
c tan mūlaṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmamūlāḥ punaḥ prajāḥ
a nānyān apīḍayitveha kośaḥ śakyaḥ kuto balam
c tadarthaṃ pīḍayitvā ca doṣaṃ na prāptum arhati
a akāryam api yajñārthaṃ kriyate yajñakarmasu
c etasmāt kāraṇād rājā na doṣaṃ prāptum arhati
a arthārtham anyad bhavati viparītam athāparam
c anarthārtham athāpy anyat tat sarvaṃ hy arthalakṣaṇam
e evaṃ buddhyā saṃprapaśyen medhāvī kāryaniścayam
a yajñārtham anyad bhavati yajñe nārthas tathāparaḥ
c yajñasyārthārtham evānyat tat sarvaṃ yajñasādhanam
a upamām atra vakṣyāmi dharmatattvaprakāśinīm
c yūpaṃ chindanti yajñārthaṃ tatra ye paripanthinaḥ
a drumāḥ ke cana sāmantā dhruvaṃ chindanti tān api
c te cāpi nipatanto 'nyān nighnanti ca vanaspatīn
a evaṃ kośasya mahato ye narāḥ paripanthinaḥ
c tān ahatvā na paśyāmi siddhim atra paraṃtapa
a dhanena jayate lokāv ubhau param imaṃ tathā
c satyaṃ ca dharmavacanaṃ yathā nāsty adhanas tathā
a sarvopāyair ādadīta dhanaṃ yajñaprayojanam
c na tulyadoṣaḥ syād evaṃ kāryākāryeṣu bhārata
a naitau saṃbhavato rājan kathaṃ cid api bhārata
c na hy araṇyeṣu paśyāmi dhanavṛddhān ahaṃ kva cit
a yad idaṃ dṛśyate vittaṃ pṛthivyām iha kiṃ cana
c mamedaṃ syān mamedaṃ syād ity ayaṃ kāṅkṣate janaḥ
a na ca rājyasamo dharmaḥ kaś cid asti paraṃtapa
c dharmaṃ śaṃsanti te rājñām āpadartham ito 'nyathā
a dānena karmaṇā cānye tapasānye tapasvinaḥ
c buddhyā dākṣyeṇa cāpy anye cinvanti dhanasaṃcayān
a adhanaṃ durbalaṃ prāhur dhanena balavān bhavet
c sarvaṃ dhanavataḥ prāpyaṃ sarvaṃ tarati kośavān
e kośād dharmaś ca kāmaś ca paro lokas tathāpy ayam
f taṃ ca dharmeṇa lipseta nādharmeṇa kadā cana
f nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam
f devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kṣīṇasya dīrghasūtrasya sānukrośasya bandhuṣu
c viraktapaurarāṣṭrasya nirdravyanicayasya ca
a pariśaṅkitamukhyasya srutamantrasya bhārata
c asaṃbhāvitamitrasya bhinnāmātyasya sarvaśaḥ
a paracakrābhiyātasya durbalasya balīyasā
c āpannacetaso brūhi kiṃ kāryam avaśiṣyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a bāhyaś ced vijigīṣuḥ syād dharmārthakuśalaḥ śuciḥ
c javena saṃdhiṃ kurvīta pūrvān pūrvān vimokṣayan
a adharmavijigīṣuś ced balavān pāpaniścayaḥ
c ātmanaḥ saṃnirodhena saṃdhiṃ tenābhiyojayet
a apāsya rājadhānīṃ vā tared anyena vāpadam
c tadbhāvabhāve dravyāṇi jīvan punar upārjayet
a yās tu syuḥ kevalatyāgāc chakyās taritum āpadaḥ
c kas tatrādhikam ātmānaṃ saṃtyajed arthadharmavit
a avarodhāj jugupseta kā sapatnadhane dayā
c na tv evātmā pradātavyaḥ śakye sati kathaṃ cana
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ābhyantare prakupite bāhye copanipīḍite
c kṣīṇe kośe srute mantre kiṃ kāryam avaśiṣyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a kṣipraṃ vā saṃdhikāmaḥ syāt kṣipraṃ vā tīkṣṇavikramaḥ
c padāpanayanaṃ kṣipram etāvat sāṃparāyikam
a anuraktena puṣṭena hṛṣṭena jagatīpate
c alpenāpi hi sainyena mahīṃ jayati pārthivaḥ
a hato vā divam ārohed vijayī kṣitim āvaset
c yuddhe tu saṃtyajan prāṇāñ śakrasyaiti salokatām
a sarvalokāgamaṃ kṛtvā mṛdutvaṃ gantum eva ca
c viśvāsād vinayaṃ kuryād vyavasyed vāpy upānahau
a apakramitum icched vā yathākāmaṃ tu sāntvayet
c viliṅgamitvā mitreṇa tataḥ svayam upakramet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a hīne paramake dharme sarvalokātilaṅghini
c sarvasmin dasyusād bhūte pṛthivyām upajīvane
a kenāsmin brāhmaṇo jīvej jaghanye kāla āgate
c asaṃtyajan putrapautrān anukrośāt pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vijñānabalam āsthāya jīvitavyaṃ tathāgate
c sarvaṃ sādhvartham evedam asādhvarthaṃ na kiṃ cana
a asādhubhyo nirādāya sādhubhyo yaḥ prayacchati
c ātmānaṃ saṃkramaṃ kṛtvā kṛtsnadharmavid eva saḥ
a suroṣeṇātmano rājan rājye sthitim akopayan
c adattam apy ādadīta dātur vittaṃ mameti vā
a vijñānabalapūto yo vartate ninditeṣv api
c vṛttavijñānavān dhīraḥ kas taṃ kiṃ vaktum arhati
a yeṣāṃ balakṛtā vṛttir naiṣām anyābhirocate
c tejasābhipravardhante balavanto yudhiṣṭhira
a yad eva prakṛtaṃ śāstram aviśeṣeṇa vindati
c tad eva madhyāḥ sevante medhāvī cāpy athottaram
a ṛtvikpurohitācāryān satkṛtair abhipūjitān
c na brāhmaṇān yātayeta doṣān prāpnoti yātayan
a etat pramāṇaṃ lokasya cakṣur etat sanātanam
c tat pramāṇo 'vagāheta tena tat sādhv asādhu vā
a bahūni grāmavāstavyā roṣād brūyuḥ parasparam
c na teṣāṃ vacanād rājā satkuryād yātayeta vā
a na vācyaḥ parivādo vai na śrotavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
c karṇāv eva pidhātavyau prastheyaṃ vā tato 'nyataḥ
a na vai satāṃ vṛttam etat parivādo na paiśunam
c guṇānām eva vaktāraḥ santaḥ satsu yudhiṣṭhira
a yathā samadhurau damyau sudāntau sādhuvāhinau
c dhuram udyamya vahatas tathā varteta vai nṛpaḥ
e yathā yathāsya vahataḥ sahāyāḥ syus tathāpare
a ācāram eva manyante garīyo dharmalakṣaṇam
c apare naivam icchanti ye śaṅkhalikhitapriyāḥ
e mārdavād atha lobhād vā te brūyur vākyam īdṛśam
a ārṣam apy atra paśyanti vikarmasthasya yāpanam
c na cārṣāt sadṛśaṃ kiṃ cit pramāṇaṃ vidyate kva cit
a devā api vikarmasthaṃ yātayanti narādhamam
c vyājena vindan vittaṃ hi dharmāt tu parihīyate
a sarvataḥ satkṛtaḥ sadbhir bhūtiprabhavakāraṇaiḥ
c hṛdayenābhyanujñāto yo dharmas taṃ vyavasyati
a yaś caturguṇasaṃpannaṃ dharmaṃ veda sa dharmavit
c aher iva hi dharmasya padaṃ duḥkhaṃ gaveṣitum
a yathā mṛgasya viddhasya mṛgavyādhaḥ padaṃ nayet
c kakṣe rudhirapātena tathā dharmapadaṃ nayet
a evaṃ sadbhir vinītena pathā gantavyam acyuta
c rājarṣīṇāṃ vṛttam etad avagaccha yudhiṣṭhira
 bhīṣma uvāca
a svarāṣṭrāt pararāṣṭrāc ca kośaṃ saṃjanayen nṛpaḥ
c kośād dhi dharmaḥ kaunteya rājyamūlaḥ pravartate
a tasmāt saṃjanayet kośaṃ saṃhṛtya paripālayet
c paripālyānugṛhṇīyād eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a na kośaḥ śuddhaśaucena na nṛśaṃsena jāyate
c padaṃ madhyamam āsthāya kośasaṃgrahaṇaṃ caret
a abalasya kutaḥ kośo hy akośasya kuto balam
c abalasya kuto rājyam arājñaḥ śrīḥ kuto bhavet
a uccair vṛtteḥ śriyo hānir yathaiva maraṇaṃ tathā
c tasmāt kośaṃ balaṃ mitrāṇy atha rājā vivardhayet
a hīnakośaṃ hi rājānam avajānanti mānavāḥ
c na cāsyālpena tuṣyanti kāryam abhyutsahanti ca
a śriyo hi kāraṇād rājā satkriyāṃ labhate parām
c sāsya gūhati pāpāni vāso guhyam iva striyāḥ
a ṛddhim asyānuvartante purā viprakṛtā janāḥ
c śālāvṛkā ivājasraṃ jighāṃsūn iva vindati
e īdṛśasya kuto rājñaḥ sukhaṃ bharatasattama
a udyacched eva na glāyed udyamo hy eva pauruṣam
c apy aparvaṇi bhajyeta na nameteha kasya cit
a apy araṇyaṃ samāśritya cared dasyugaṇaiḥ saha
c na tv evoddhṛtamaryādair dasyubhiḥ sahitaś caret
e dasyūnāṃ sulabhā senā raudrakarmasu bhārata
a ekāntena hy amaryādāt sarvo 'py udvijate janaḥ
c dasyavo 'py upaśaṅkante niranukrośakāriṇaḥ
a sthāpayed eva maryādāṃ janacittaprasādinīm
c alpāpy atheha maryādā loke bhavati pūjitā
a nāyaṃ loko 'sti na para iti vyavasito janaḥ
c nālaṃ gantuṃ ca viśvāsaṃ nāstike bhayaśaṅkini
a yathā sadbhiḥ parādānam ahiṃsā dasyubhis tathā
c anurajyanti bhūtāni samaryādeṣu dasyuṣu
a ayudhyamānasya vadho dārāmarśaḥ kṛtaghnatā
c brahmavittasya cādānaṃ niḥśeṣakaraṇaṃ tathā
e striyā moṣaḥ paristhānaṃ dasyuṣv etad vigarhitam
a sa eṣa eva bhavati dasyur etāni varjayan
c abhisaṃdadhate ye na vināśāyāsya bhārata
e naśeṣam evopālabhya na kurvantīti niścayaḥ
a tasmāt saśeṣaṃ kartavyaṃ svādhīnam api dasyubhiḥ
c na balastho 'ham asmīti nṛśaṃsāni samācaret
a saśeṣakāriṇas tāta śeṣaṃ paśyanti sarvataḥ
c niḥśeṣakāriṇo nityam aśeṣakaraṇād bhayam
 bhīṣma uvāca
 atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
a atra karmāntavacanaṃ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
c pratyakṣāv eva dharmārthau kṣatriyasya vijānataḥ
e tatra na vyavadhātavyaṃ parokṣā dharmayāpanā
a adharmo dharma ity etad yathā vṛkapadaṃ tathā
c dharmādharmaphale jātu na dadarśeha kaś cana
a bubhūṣed balavān eva sarvaṃ balavato vaśe
c śriyaṃ balam amātyāṃś ca balavān iha vindati
a yo hy anāḍhyaḥ sa patitas tad ucchiṣṭaṃ yad alpakam
c bahv apathyaṃ balavati na kiṃ cit trāyate bhayāt
a ubhau satyādhikārau tau trāyete mahato bhayāt
c ati dharmād balaṃ manye balād dharmaḥ pravartate
a bale pratiṣṭhito dharmo dharaṇyām iva jaṅgamaḥ
c dhūmo vāyor iva vaśaṃ balaṃ dharmo 'nuvartate
a anīśvare balaṃ dharmo drumaṃ vallīva saṃśritā
c vaśyo balavatāṃ dharmaḥ sukhaṃ bhogavatām iva
e nāsty asādhyaṃ balavatāṃ sarvaṃ balavatāṃ śuci
a durācāraḥ kṣīṇabalaḥ parimāṇaṃ niyacchati
c atha tasmād udvijate sarvo loko vṛkād iva
a apadhvasto hy avamato duḥkhaṃ jīvati jīvitam
c jīvitaṃ yad avakṣiptaṃ yathaiva maraṇaṃ tathā
a yad enam āhuḥ pāpena cāritreṇa vinikṣatam
c sa bhṛśaṃ tapyate 'nena vākśalyena parikṣataḥ
a atraitad āhur ācāryāḥ pāpasya parimokṣaṇe
c trayīṃ vidyāṃ niṣeveta tathopāsīta sa dvijān
a prasādayen madhurayā vācāpy atha ca karmaṇā
c mahāmanāś caiva bhaved vivahec ca mahākule
a ity asmīti vaded evaṃ pareṣāṃ kīrtayan guṇān
c japed udakaśīlaḥ syāt peśalo nātijalpanaḥ
a brahmakṣatraṃ saṃpraviśed bahu kṛtvā suduṣkaram
c ucyamāno 'pi lokena bahu tat tad acintayan
a apāpo hy evam ācāraḥ kṣipraṃ bahumato bhavet
c sukhaṃ vittaṃ ca bhuñjīta vṛttenaitena gopayet
d api tebhyo mṛgān hatvā nayec ca satataṃ vane
d yasmin na pratigṛhṇanti dasyubhojanaśaṅkayā
e loke ca labhate pūjāṃ paratra ca mahat phalam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c yathā dasyuḥ samaryādaḥ pretyabhāve na naśyati
a prahartā matimāñ śūraḥ śrutavān anṛśaṃsavān
c rakṣann akṣayiṇaṃ dharmaṃ brahmaṇyo gurupūjakaḥ
a niṣādyāṃ kṣatriyāj jātaḥ kṣatradharmānupālakaḥ
c kāpavyo nāma naiṣādir dasyutvāt siddhim āptavān
a araṇye sāyapūrvāhṇe mṛgayūthaprakopitā
b asti kāpalyasa iti mṛgayur dharmakovidaḥ
c vidhijño mṛgajātīnāṃ nipānānāṃ ca kovidaḥ
a sarvakānanadeśajñaḥ pāriyātracaraḥ sadā
c dharmajñaḥ sarvabhūtānām amogheṣur dṛḍhāyudhaḥ
a apy anekaśatāḥ senā eka eva jigāya saḥ
c sa vṛddhāv andhapitarau mahāraṇye 'bhyapūjayat
a madhumāṃsair mūlaphalair annair uccāvacair api
c satkṛtya bhojayām āsa samyak paricacāra ca
a āraṇyakān pravrajitān brāhmaṇān paripālayan
c api tebhyo mṛgān hatvā nināya ca mahāvane
a ye sma na pratigṛhṇanti dasyubhojanaśaṅkayā
c teṣām āsajya geheṣu kālya eva sa gacchati
a taṃ bahūni sahasrāṇi grāmaṇitve 'bhivavrire
c nirmaryādāni dasyūnāṃ niranukrośakāriṇām
 dasyava ūcuḥ
a muhūrtadeśakālajña prājña śīladṛḍhāyudha
c grāmaṇīr bhava no mukhyaḥ sarveṣām eva saṃmataḥ
a yathā yathā vakṣyasi naḥ kariṣyāmas tathā tathā
c pālayāsmān yathānyāyaṃ yathā mātā yathā pitā
 kāpavya uvāca
a mā vadhīs tvaṃ striyaṃ bhīruṃ mā śiśuṃ mā tapasvinam
c nāyudhyamāno hantavyo na ca grāhyā balāt striyaḥ
a sarvathā strī na hantavyā sarvasattveṣu yudhyatā
c nityaṃ gobrāhmaṇe svasti yoddhavyaṃ ca tadarthataḥ
a sasyaṃ ca nāpahantavyaṃ sīravighnaṃ ca mā kṛthāḥ
b pitaro devatā viprāḥ śapanty atra nivārite
c pūjyante yatra devāś ca pitaro 'tithayas tathā
a sarvabhūteṣv api ca vai brāhmaṇo mokṣam arhati
c kāryā cāpacitis teṣāṃ sarvasvenāpi yā bhavet
a yasya hy ete saṃpraruṣṭā mantrayanti parābhavam
c na tasya triṣu lokeṣu trātā bhavati kaś cana
a yo brāhmaṇān paribhaved vināśaṃ vāpi rocayet
c sūryodaya ivāvaśyaṃ dhruvaṃ tasya parābhavaḥ
a ihaiva phalam āsīnaḥ pratyākāṅkṣati śaktitaḥ
c ye ye no na pradāsyanti tāṃs tān senābhiyāsyati
a śiṣṭyarthaṃ vihito daṇḍo na vadhārthaṃ viniścayaḥ
c ye ca śiṣṭān prabādhante dharmas teṣāṃ vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ
a ye hi rāṣṭroparodhena vṛttiṃ kurvanti ke cana
c tad eva te 'nu mīyante kuṇapaṃ kṛmayo yathā
a ye punar dharmaśāstreṇa varterann iha dasyavaḥ
c api te dasyavo bhūtvā kṣipraṃ siddhim avāpnuyuḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tat sarvam upacakrus te kāpavyasyānuśāsanam
c vṛttiṃ ca lebhire sarve pāpebhyaś cāpy upāraman
a kāpavyaḥ karmaṇā tena mahatīṃ siddhim āptavān
c sādhūnām ācaran kṣemaṃ dasyūn pāpān nivartayan
a idaṃ kāpavyacaritaṃ yo nityam anukīrtayet
c nāraṇyebhyaḥ sa bhūtebhyo bhayam ārchet kadā cana
a bhayaṃ tasya na martyebhyo nāmartyebhyaḥ kathaṃ cana
c na sato nāsato rājan sa hy araṇyeṣu gopatiḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra gāthā brahmagītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
c yena mārgeṇa rājānaḥ kośaṃ saṃjanayanti ca
a na dhanaṃ yajñaśīlānāṃ hāryaṃ devasvam eva tat
c dasyūnāṃ niṣkriyāṇāṃ ca kṣatriyo hartum arhati
a imāḥ prajāḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ rakṣyāś cādyāś ca bhārata
c dhanaṃ hi kṣatriyasyeha dvitīyasya na vidyate
a tad asya syād balārthaṃ vā dhanaṃ yajñārtham eva vā
c abhogyā hy oṣadhīś chittvā bhogyā eva pacanty uta
a yo vai na devān na pitṝn na martyān haviṣārcati
c ānantikāṃ tāṃ dhanitām āhur vedavido janāḥ
a haret tad draviṇaṃ rājan dhārmikaḥ pṛthivīpatiḥ
c na hi tat prīṇayel lokān na kośaṃ tadvidhaṃ nṛpaḥ
a asādhubhyo nirādāya sādhubhyo yaḥ prayacchati
c ātmānaṃ saṃkramaṃ kṛtvā manye dharmavid eva saḥ
d tathā tathā jayel lokāñ śaktyā caiva yathā tathā
a audbhijjā jantavaḥ ke cid yuktavāco yathā tathā
c aniṣṭataḥ saṃbhavanti tathāyajñaḥ pratāyate
a yathaiva daṃśamaśakaṃ yathā cāṇḍapipīlikam
c saiva vṛttir ayajñeṣu tathā dharmo vidhīyate
a yathā hy akasmād bhavati bhūmau pāṃsutṛṇolapam
c tathaiveha bhaved dharmaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sūkṣmataro 'pi ca
 bhīṣma uvāca
 anāgatavidhātā ca pratyutpannamatiś ca yaḥ
 dvāv eva sukham edhete dīrghasūtrī vinaśyati
a atraiva cedam avyagraḥ śṛṇvākhyānam anuttamam
c dīrghasūtraṃ samāśritya kāryākāryaviniścaye
a nātigādhe jalasthāye suhṛdaḥ śakulās trayaḥ
c prabhūtamatsye kaunteya babhūvuḥ sahacāriṇaḥ
a atraikaḥ prāptakālajño dīrghadarśī tathāparaḥ
c dīrghasūtraś ca tatraikas trayāṇāṃ jalacāriṇām
a kadā cit taj jalasthāyaṃ matsyabandhāḥ samantataḥ
c niḥsrāvayām āsur atho nimneṣu vividhair mukhaiḥ
a prakṣīyamāṇaṃ taṃ buddhvā jalasthāyaṃ bhayāgame
c abravīd dīrghadarśī tu tāv ubhau suhṛdau tadā
a iyam āpat samutpannā sarveṣāṃ salilaukasām
c śīghram anyatra gacchāmaḥ panthā yāvan na duṣyati
a anāgatam anarthaṃ hi sunayair yaḥ prabādhate
c na sa saṃśayam āpnoti rocatāṃ vāṃ vrajāmahe
a dīrghasūtras tu yas tatra so 'bravīt samyag ucyate
c na tu kāryā tvarā yāvad iti me niścitā matiḥ
a atha saṃpratipattijñaḥ prābravīd dīrghadarśinam
c prāpte kāle na me kiṃ cin nyāyataḥ parihāsyate
a evam ukto nirākrāmad dīrghadarśī mahāmatiḥ
c jagāma srotasaikena gambhīrasalilāśayam
a tataḥ prasrutatoyaṃ taṃ samīkṣya salilāśayam
c babandhur vividhair yogair matsyān matsyopajīvinaḥ
a viloḍyamāne tasmiṃs tu srutatoye jalāśaye
c agacchad grahaṇaṃ tatra dīrghasūtraḥ sahāparaiḥ
a uddānaṃ kriyamāṇaṃ ca matsyānāṃ vīkṣya rajjubhiḥ
c praviśyāntaram anyeṣām agrasat pratipattimān
a grastam eva tad uddānaṃ gṛhītvāsta tathaiva saḥ
c sarvān eva tu tāṃs tatra te vidur grathitā iti
a tataḥ prakṣālyamāneṣu matsyeṣu vimale jale
c tyaktvā rajjuṃ vimukto 'bhūc chīghraṃ saṃpratipattimān
a dīrghasūtras tu mandātmā hīnabuddhir acetanaḥ
c maraṇaṃ prāptavān mūḍho yathaivopahatendriyaḥ
a evaṃ prāptatamaṃ kālaṃ yo mohān nāvabudhyate
c sa vinaśyati vai kṣipraṃ dīrghasūtro yathā jhaṣaḥ
a ādau na kurute śreyaḥ kuśalo 'smīti yaḥ pumān
c sa saṃśayam avāpnoti yathā saṃpratipattimān
a anāgatavidhānaṃ tu yo naraḥ kurute kṣamam
c śreyaḥ prāpnoti so 'tyarthaṃ dīrghadarśī yathā hy asau
a kalāḥ kāṣṭhā muhūrtāś ca dinā nāḍyaḥ kṣaṇā lavāḥ
c pakṣā māsāś ca ṛtavas tulyāḥ saṃvatsarāṇi ca
a pṛthivī deśa ity uktaḥ kālaḥ sa ca na dṛśyate
c abhipretārthasiddhyarthaṃ nyāyato yac ca tat tathā
a etau dharmārthaśāstreṣu mokṣaśāstreṣu carṣibhiḥ
c pradhānāv iti nirdiṣṭau kāmeśābhimatau nṛṇām
a parīkṣyakārī yuktas tu samyak samupapādayet
c deśakālāv abhipretau tābhyāṃ phalam avāpnuyāt
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a sarvatra buddhiḥ kathitā śreṣṭhā te bharatarṣabha
c anāgatā tathotpannā dīrghasūtrā vināśinī
a tad icchāmi parāṃ buddhiṃ śrotuṃ bharatasattama
c yathā rājan na muhyeta śatrubhiḥ parivāritaḥ
a dharmārthakuśala prājña sarvaśāstraviśārada
c pṛcchāmi tvā kuruśreṣṭha tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
a śatrubhir bahubhir grasto yathā varteta pārthivaḥ
c etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ sarvam eva yathāvidhi
a viṣamasthaṃ hi rājānaṃ śatravaḥ paripanthinaḥ
c bahavo 'py ekam uddhartuṃ yatante pūrvatāpitāḥ
a sarvataḥ prārthyamānena durbalena mahābalaiḥ
c ekenaivāsahāyena śakyaṃ sthātuṃ kathaṃ bhavet
a kathaṃ mitram ariṃ caiva vindeta bharatarṣabha
c ceṣṭitavyaṃ kathaṃ cātra śatror mitrasya cāntare
a prajñātalakṣaṇe rājann amitre mitratāṃ gate
c kathaṃ nu puruṣaḥ kuryāt kiṃ vā kṛtvā sukhī bhavet
a vigrahaṃ kena vā kuryāt saṃdhiṃ vā kena yojayet
c kathaṃ vā śatrumadhyastho vartetābalavān iti
a etad vai sarvakṛtyānāṃ paraṃ kṛtyaṃ paraṃtapa
c naitasya kaś cid vaktāsti śrotā cāpi sudurlabhaḥ
a ṛte śāṃtanavād bhīṣmāt satyasaṃdhāj jitendriyāt
c tad anviṣya mahābāho sarvam etad vadasva me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tvadyukto 'yam anupraśno yudhiṣṭhira guṇodayaḥ
c śṛṇu me putra kārtsnyena guhyam āpatsu bhārata
a amitro mitratāṃ yāti mitraṃ cāpi praduṣyati
c sāmarthyayogāt kāryāṇāṃ tadgatyā hi sadā gatiḥ
a tasmād viśvasitavyaṃ ca vigrahaṃ ca samācaret
c deśaṃ kālaṃ ca vijñāya kāryākāryaviniścaye
a saṃdhātavyaṃ budhair nityaṃ vyavasyaṃ ca hitārthibhiḥ
c amitrair api saṃdheyaṃ prāṇā rakṣyāś ca bhārata
a yo hy amitrair naro nityaṃ na saṃdadhyād apaṇḍitaḥ
c na so 'rtham āpnuyāt kiṃ cit phalāny api ca bhārata
a yas tv amitreṇa saṃdhatte mitreṇa ca virudhyate
c arthayuktiṃ samālokya sumahad vindate phalam
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c mārjārasya ca saṃvādaṃ nyagrodhe mūṣakasya ca
a vane mahati kasmiṃś cin nyagrodhaḥ sumahān abhūt
c latājālaparicchanno nānādvijagaṇāyutaḥ
a skandhavān meghasaṃkāśaḥ śītacchāyo manoramaḥ
c vairantyam abhito jātas tarur vyālamṛgākulaḥ
a tasya mūlaṃ samāśritya kṛtvā śatamukhaṃ bilam
c vasati sma mahāprājñaḥ palito nāma mūṣakaḥ
a śākhāś ca tasya saṃśritya vasati sma sukhaṃ puraḥ
c lomaśo nāma mārjāraḥ pakṣisattvāvasādakaḥ
a tatra cāgatya caṇḍālo vairantyakṛtaketanaḥ
c ayojayat tam unmāthaṃ nityam astaṃ gate ravau
a tatra snāyumayān pāśān yathāvat saṃnidhāya saḥ
c gṛhaṃ gatvā sukhaṃ śete prabhātām eti śarvarīm
a tatra sma nityaṃ badhyante naktaṃ bahuvidhā mṛgāḥ
c kadā cit tatra mārjāras tv apramatto 'py abadhyata
a tasmin baddhe mahāprājñaḥ śatrau nityātatāyini
c taṃ kālaṃ palito jñātvā vicacāra sunirbhayaḥ
a tenānucaratā tasmin vane viśvastacāriṇā
c bhakṣaṃ vicaramāṇena nacirād dṛṣṭam āmiṣam
a sa tam unmātham āruhya tad āmiṣam abhakṣayat
c tasyopari sapatnasya baddhasya manasā hasan
a āmiṣe tu prasaktaḥ sa kadā cid avalokayan
c apaśyad aparaṃ ghoram ātmanaḥ śatrum āgatam
a śaraprasūnasaṃkāśaṃ mahīvivaraśāyinam
c nakulaṃ harikaṃ nāma capalaṃ tāmralocanam
a tena mūṣakagandhena tvaramāṇam upāgatam
c bhakṣārthaṃ lelihad vaktraṃ bhūmāv ūrdhvamukhaṃ sthitam
a śākhāgatam ariṃ cānyad apaśyat koṭarālayam
c ulūkaṃ candrakaṃ nāma tīkṣṇatuṇḍaṃ kṣapācaram
a gatasya viṣayaṃ tasya nakulolūkayos tadā
c athāsyāsīd iyaṃ cintā tat prāpya sumahad bhayam
a āpady asyāṃ sukaṣṭāyāṃ maraṇe samupasthite
c samantād bhaya utpanne kathaṃ kāryaṃ hitaiṣiṇā
a sa tathā sarvato ruddhaḥ sarvatra samadarśanaḥ
c abhavad bhayasaṃtaptaś cakre cemāṃ parāṃ gatim
a āpad vināśabhūyiṣṭhā śataikīyaṃ ca jīvitam
c samantasaṃśayā ceyam asmān āpad upasthitā
a gataṃ hi sahasā bhūmiṃ nakulo māṃ samāpnuyāt
b ulūke mūrdhni saṃnaddhe bhujagārāv avāksthite
b mārjāre pāśasaṃbaddhe kiṃ kartavyaṃ mayā bhavet
b kaccid rājaguṇaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ saptopāyās tathānagha
c ulūkaś ceha tiṣṭhantaṃ mārjāraḥ pāśasaṃkṣayāt
a na tv evāsmadvidhaḥ prājñaḥ saṃmohaṃ gantum arhati
c kariṣye jīvite yatnaṃ yāvad ucchvāsanigraham
a na hi buddhyānvitāḥ prājñā nītiśāstraviśāradāḥ
c saṃbhramanty āpadaṃ prāpya mahato 'rthān avāpya ca
a na tv anyām iha mārjārād gatiṃ paśyāmi sāṃpratam
c viṣamastho hy ayaṃ jantuḥ kṛtyaṃ cāsya mahan mayā
a jīvitārthī kathaṃ tv adya prārthitaḥ śatrubhis tribhiḥ
c tasmād imam ahaṃ śatruṃ mārjāraṃ saṃśrayāmi vai
a kṣatravidyāṃ samāśritya hitam asyopadhāraye
c yenemaṃ śatrusaṃghātaṃ matipūrveṇa vañcaye
a ayam atyantaśatrur me vaiṣamyaṃ paramaṃ gataḥ
c mūḍho grāhayituṃ svārthaṃ saṃgatyā yadi śakyate
a kadā cid vyasanaṃ prāpya saṃdhiṃ kuryān mayā saha
c balinā saṃniviṣṭasya śatror api parigrahaḥ
e kārya ity āhur ācāryā viṣame jīvitārthinā
a śreyān hi paṇḍitaḥ śatrur na ca mitram apaṇḍitam
c mama hy amitre mārjāre jīvitaṃ saṃpratiṣṭhitam
a hantainaṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi hetum ātmābhirakṣaṇe
c apīdānīm ayaṃ śatruḥ saṃgatyā paṇḍito bhavet
d evaṃ vicintayām āsa mūṣakaḥ śatruceṣṭitam
a tato 'rthagatitattvajñaḥ saṃdhivigrahakālavit
c sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vākyaṃ mārjāraṃ mūṣako 'bravīt
a sauhṛdenābhibhāṣe tvā kaccin mārjāra jīvasi
c jīvitaṃ hi tavecchāmi śreyaḥ sādhāraṇaṃ hi nau
a na te saumya viṣattavyaṃ jīviṣyasi yathā purā
c ahaṃ tvām uddhariṣyāmi prāṇāñ jahyāṃ hi te kṛte
a asti kaś cid upāyo 'tra puṣkalaḥ pratibhāti mām
c yena śakyas tvayā mokṣaḥ prāptuṃ śreyo yathā mayā
a mayā hy upāyo dṛṣṭo 'yaṃ vicārya matim ātmanaḥ
c ātmārthaṃ ca tvadarthaṃ ca śreyaḥ sādhāraṇaṃ hi nau
a idaṃ hi nakulolūkaṃ pāpabuddhy abhitaḥ sthitam
c na dharṣayati mārjāra tena me svasti sāṃpratam
a kūjaṃś capalanetro 'yaṃ kauśiko māṃ nirīkṣate
c nagaśākhāgrahas tiṣṭhaṃs tasyāhaṃ bhṛśam udvije
a satāṃ sāptapadaṃ sakhyaṃ savāso me 'si paṇḍitaḥ
c sāṃvāsyakaṃ kariṣyāmi nāsti te mṛtyuto bhayam
a na hi śaknoṣi mārjāra pāśaṃ chettuṃ vinā mayā
c ahaṃ chetsyāmi te pāśaṃ yadi māṃ tvaṃ na hiṃsasi
a tvam āśrito nagasyāgraṃ mūlaṃ tv aham upāśritaḥ
c ciroṣitāv ihāvāṃ vai vṛkṣe 'smin viditaṃ hi te
a yasminn āśvasate kaś cid yaś ca nāśvasate kva cit
c na tau dhīrāḥ praśaṃsanti nityam udvignacetasau
a tasmād vivardhatāṃ prītiḥ satyā saṃgatir astu nau
c kālātītam apārthaṃ hi na praśaṃsanti paṇḍitāḥ
a arthayuktim imāṃ tāvad yathābhūtāṃ niśāmaya
c tava jīvitam icchāmi tvaṃ mamecchasi jīvitam
a kaś cit tarati kāṣṭhena sugambhīrāṃ mahānadīm
c sa tārayati tat kāṣṭhaṃ sa ca kāṣṭhena tāryate
a īdṛśo nau samāyogo bhaviṣyati sunistaraḥ
c ahaṃ tvāṃ tārayiṣyāmi tvaṃ ca māṃ tārayiṣyasi
a evam uktvā tu palitas tadartham ubhayor hitam
c hetumad grahaṇīyaṃ ca kālākāṅkṣī vyapaikṣata
a atha suvyāhṛtaṃ tasya śrutvā śatrur vicakṣaṇaḥ
c hetumad grahaṇīyārthaṃ mārjāro vākyam abravīt
a buddhimān vākyasaṃpannas tad vākyam anuvarṇayan
c tām avasthām avekṣyāntyāṃ sāmnaiva pratyapūjayat
a tatas tīkṣṇāgradaśano vaiḍūryamaṇilocanaḥ
