c mūṣakaṃ mandam udvīkṣya mārjāro lomaśo 'bravīt
a nandāmi saumya bhadraṃ te yo māṃ jīvantam icchasi
c śreyaś ca yadi jānīṣe kriyatāṃ mā vicāraya
a ahaṃ hi dṛḍham āpannas tvam āpannataro mayā
c dvayor āpannayoḥ saṃdhiḥ kriyatāṃ mā vicāraya
a vidhatsva prāptakālaṃ yat kāryaṃ sidhyatu cāvayoḥ
c mayi kṛcchrād vinirmukte na vinaṅkṣyati te kṛtam
a nyastamāno 'smi bhakto 'smi śiṣyas tvaddhitakṛt tathā
c nideśavaśavartī ca bhavantaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
a ity evam uktaḥ palito mārjāraṃ vaśam āgatam
c vākyaṃ hitam uvācedam abhinītārtham arthavat
a udāraṃ yad bhavān āha naitac citraṃ bhavadvidhe
c vidito yas tu mārgo me hitārthaṃ śṛṇu taṃ mama
a ahaṃ tvānupravekṣyāmi nakulān me mahad bhayam
c trāyasva māṃ mā vadhīś ca śakto 'smi tava mokṣaṇe
a ulūkāc caiva māṃ rakṣa kṣudraḥ prārthayate hi mām
c ahaṃ chetsyāmi te pāśān sakhe satyena te śape
a tad vacaḥ saṃgataṃ śrutvā lomaśo yuktam arthavat
c harṣād udvīkṣya palitaṃ svāgatenābhyapūjayat
a sa taṃ saṃpūjya palitaṃ mārjāraḥ sauhṛde sthitaḥ
c suvicintyābravīd dhīraḥ prītas tvarita eva hi
a kṣipram āgaccha bhadraṃ te tvaṃ me prāṇasamaḥ sakhā
c tava prājña prasādād dhi kṣipraṃ prāpsyāmi jīvitam
a yad yad evaṃgatenādya śakyaṃ kartuṃ mayā tava
c tad ājñāpaya kartāhaṃ saṃdhir evāstu nau sakhe
a asmāt te saṃśayān muktaḥ samitragaṇabāndhavaḥ
c sarvakāryāṇi kartāhaṃ priyāṇi ca hitāni ca
a muktaś ca vyasanād asmāt saumyāham api nāma te
c prītim utpādayeyaṃ ca pratikartuṃ ca śaknuyām
d pratyapakurvan bahv api na bhāti pūrvopakāriṇā tulyaḥ
d ekaḥ karoti hi kṛte niṣkāraṇam eva kurute 'nyaḥ
a grāhayitvā tu taṃ svārthaṃ mārjāraṃ mūṣakas tadā
c praviveśa suvisrabdhaḥ samyag arthāṃś cacāra ha
a evam āśvāsito vidvān mārjāreṇa sa mūṣakaḥ
c mārjārorasi visrabdhaḥ suṣvāpa pitṛmātṛvat
a līnaṃ tu tasya gātreṣu mārjārasyātha mūṣakam
c tau dṛṣṭvā nakulolūkau nirāśau jagmatur gṛhān
d tathaiva tau susaṃtrastau dṛḍham āgatatandritau
d dṛṣṭvā tayoḥ parāṃ prītiṃ vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatau
d balinau matimantau ca suvṛttau cāpy upāsitau
d aśaktau tu nayāt tasmāt saṃpradharṣayituṃ balāt
d kāryārthakṛtasaṃdhī tau dṛṣṭvā mārjāramūṣikau
d ulūkanakulau tūrṇaṃ jagmatus tau svam ālayam
a līnas tu tasya gātreṣu palito deśakālavit
c ciccheda pāśān nṛpate kālākāṅkṣī śanaiḥ śanaiḥ
a atha bandhaparikliṣṭo mārjāro vīkṣya mūṣakam
c chindantaṃ vai tadā pāśān atvarantaṃ tvarānvitaḥ
a tam atvarantaṃ palitaṃ pāśānāṃ chedane tadā
c saṃcodayitum ārebhe mārjāro mūṣakaṃ tadā
a kiṃ saumya nābhitvarase kiṃ kṛtārtho 'vamanyase
c chindhi pāśān amitraghna purā śvapaca eti saḥ
a ity uktas tvaratā tena matimān palito 'bravīt
c mārjāram akṛtaprajñaṃ vaśyam ātmahitaṃ vacaḥ
a tūṣṇīṃ bhava na te saumya tvarā kāryā na saṃbhramaḥ
c vayam evātra kālajñā na kālaḥ parihāsyate
a akāle kṛtyam ārabdhaṃ kartuṃ nārthāya kalpate
c tad eva kāla ārabdhaṃ mahate 'rthāya kalpate
a akālavipramuktān me tvatta eva bhayaṃ bhavet
c tasmāt kālaṃ pratīkṣasva kim iti tvarase sakhe
a yāvat paśyāmi caṇḍālam āyāntaṃ śastrapāṇinam
c tataś chetsyāmi te pāśaṃ prāpte sādhāraṇe bhaye
a tasmin kāle pramuktas tvaṃ tarum evādhirohasi
c na hi te jīvitād anyat kiṃ cit kṛtyaṃ bhaviṣyati
a tato bhavaty atikrānte traste bhīte ca lomaśa
c ahaṃ bilaṃ pravekṣyāmi bhavāñ śākhāṃ gamiṣyati
a evam uktas tu mārjāro mūṣakeṇātmano hitam
c vacanaṃ vākyatattvajño jīvitārthī mahāmatiḥ
a athātmakṛtyatvaritaḥ samyak praśrayam ācaran
c uvāca lomaśo vākyaṃ mūṣakaṃ cirakāriṇam
a na hy evaṃ mitrakāryāṇi prītyā kurvanti sādhavaḥ
c yathā tvaṃ mokṣitaḥ kṛcchrāt tvaramāṇena vai mayā
a tathaiva tvaramāṇena tvayā kāryaṃ hitaṃ mama
c yatnaṃ kuru mahāprājña yathā svasty āvayor bhavet
a atha vā pūrvavairaṃ tvaṃ smaran kālaṃ vikarṣasi
c paśya duṣkṛtakarmatvaṃ vyaktam āyuḥkṣayo mama
a yac ca kiṃ cin mayājñānāt purastād vipriyaṃ kṛtam
c na tan manasi kartavyaṃ kṣamaye tvāṃ prasīda me
a tam evaṃvādinaṃ prājñaḥ śāstravid buddhisaṃmataḥ
c uvācedaṃ vacaḥ śreṣṭhaṃ mārjāraṃ mūṣakas tadā
a śrutaṃ me tava mārjāra svam arthaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ
c mamāpi tvaṃ vijānīhi svam arthaṃ parigṛhṇataḥ
a yan mitraṃ bhītavat sādhyaṃ yan mitraṃ bhayasaṃhitam
c surakṣitaṃ tataḥ kāryaṃ pāṇiḥ sarpamukhād iva
a kṛtvā balavatā saṃdhim ātmānaṃ yo na rakṣati
c apathyam iva tad bhuktaṃ tasyānarthāya kalpate
a na kaś cit kasya cin mitraṃ na kaś cit kasya cit suhṛt
b arthatas tu nibadhyante mitrāṇi ripavas tathā
c arthair arthā nibadhyante gajair vanagajā iva
a na hi kaś cit kṛte kārye kartāraṃ samavekṣate
c tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi sāvaśeṣāṇi kārayet
a tasmin kāle 'pi ca bhavān divākīrtibhayānvitaḥ
c mama na grahaṇe śaktaḥ palāyanaparāyaṇaḥ
a chinnaṃ tu tantubāhulyaṃ tantur eko 'vaśeṣitaḥ
c chetsyāmy ahaṃ tad apy āśu nirvṛto bhava lomaśa
a tayoḥ saṃvadator evaṃ tathaivāpannayor dvayoḥ
c kṣayaṃ jagāma sā rātrir lomaśaṃ cāviśad bhayam
a tataḥ prabhātasamaye vikṛtaḥ kṛṣṇapiṅgalaḥ
c sthūlasphig vikaco rūkṣaḥ śvacakraparivāritaḥ
a śaṅkukarṇo mahāvaktraḥ palito ghoradarśanaḥ
c parigho nāma caṇḍālaḥ śastrapāṇir adṛśyata
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā yamadūtābhaṃ mārjāras trastacetanaḥ
c uvāca palitaṃ bhītaḥ kim idānīṃ kariṣyasi
a atha cāpi susaṃtrastau taṃ dṛṣṭvā ghoradarśanam
c kṣaṇena nakulolūkau nairāśyaṃ jagmatus tadā
a balinau matimantau ca saṃghātaṃ cāpy upāgatau
c aśakyau sunayāt tasmāt saṃpradharṣayituṃ balāt
a kāryārthaṃ kṛtasaṃdhī tau dṛṣṭvā mārjāramūṣakau
c ulūkanakulau tūrṇaṃ jagmatuḥ svaṃ svam ālayam
a tataś ciccheda taṃ tantuṃ mārjārasya sa mūṣakaḥ
c vipramukto 'tha mārjāras tam evābhyapatad drumam
a sa ca tasmād bhayān mukto mukto ghoreṇa śatruṇā
c bilaṃ viveśa palitaḥ śākhāṃ bheje ca lomaśaḥ
a unmātham apy athādāya caṇḍālo vīkṣya sarvaśaḥ
c vihatāśaḥ kṣaṇenātha tasmād deśād apākramat
e jagāma ca svabhavanaṃ caṇḍālo bharatarṣabha
a tatas tasmād bhayān mukto durlabhaṃ prāpya jīvitam
c bilasthaṃ pādapāgrasthaḥ palitaṃ lomaśo 'bravīt
a akṛtvā saṃvidaṃ kāṃ cit sahasāham upaplutaḥ
c kṛtajñaṃ kṛtakalyāṇaṃ kaccin māṃ nābhiśaṅkase
a gatvā ca mama viśvāsaṃ dattvā ca mama jīvitam
c mitropabhogasamaye kiṃ tvaṃ naivopasarpasi
a kṛtvā hi pūrvaṃ mitrāṇi yaḥ paścān nānutiṣṭhati
c na sa mitrāṇi labhate kṛcchrāsv āpatsu durmatiḥ
a tat kṛto 'haṃ tvayā mitraṃ sāmarthyād ātmanaḥ sakhe
c sa māṃ mitratvam āpannam upabhoktuṃ tvam arhasi
a yāni me santi mitrāṇi ye ca me santi bāndhavāḥ
c sarve tvāṃ pūjayiṣyanti śiṣyā gurum iva priyam
a ahaṃ ca pūjayiṣye tvāṃ samitragaṇabāndhavam
c jīvitasya pradātāraṃ kṛtajñaḥ ko na pūjayet
a īśvaro me bhavān astu śarīrasya gṛhasya ca
c arthānāṃ caiva sarveṣām anuśāstā ca me bhava
a amātyo me bhava prājña piteva hi praśādhi mām
c na te 'sti bhayam asmatto jīvitenātmanaḥ śape
a buddhyā tvam uśanāḥ sākṣād bale tv adhikṛtā vayam
c tvanmantrabalayukto hi vindeta jayam eva ha
a evam uktaḥ paraṃ sāntvaṃ mārjāreṇa sa mūṣakaḥ
c uvāca paramārthajñaḥ ślakṣṇam ātmahitaṃ vacaḥ
a yad bhavān āha tat sarvaṃ mayā te lomaśa śrutam
c mamāpi tāvad bruvataḥ śṛṇu yat pratibhāti mām
a veditavyāni mitrāṇi boddhavyāś cāpi śatravaḥ
c etat susūkṣmaṃ loke 'smin dṛśyate prājñasaṃmatam
a śatrurūpāś ca suhṛdo mitrarūpāś ca śatravaḥ
b eṣāṃ saumyāni mitrāṇi krodhanāś caiva śatravaḥ
b sāntvitās te na budhyante rāgalobhavaśaṃ gatāḥ
c sāntvitās te na budhyante rāgalobhavaśaṃ gatāḥ
a nāsti jātyā ripur nāma mitraṃ nāma na vidyate
c sāmarthyayogāj jāyante mitrāṇi ripavas tathā
a yo yasmiñ jīvati svārthaṃ paśyet tāvat sa jīvati
c sa tasya tāvan mitraṃ syād yāvan na syād viparyayaḥ
a nāsti maitrī sthirā nāma na ca dhruvam asauhṛdam
c arthayuktyā hi jāyante mitrāṇi ripavas tathā
a mitraṃ ca śatrutām eti kasmiṃś cit kālaparyaye
c śatruś ca mitratām eti svārtho hi balavattaraḥ
a yo viśvasati mitreṣu na cāśvasati śatruṣu
c arthayuktim avijñāya calitaṃ tasya jīvitam
a arthayuktim avijñāya yaḥ śubhe kurute matim
c mitre vā yadi vā śatrau tasyāpi calitā matiḥ
a na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste 'pi na viśvaset
c viśvāsād bhayam utpannaṃ mūlāny api nikṛntati
a arthayuktyā hi dṛśyante pitā mātā sutās tathā
c mātulā bhāgineyāś ca tathā saṃbandhibāndhavāḥ
a putraṃ hi mātāpitaru tyajataḥ patitaṃ priyam
c loko rakṣati cātmānaṃ paśya svārthasya sāratām
a taṃ manye nikṛtiprajñaṃ yo mokṣaṃ pratyanantaram
c kṛtyaṃ mṛgayase kartuṃ sukhopāyam asaṃśayam
a asmin nilaya eva tvaṃ nyagrodhād avatāritaḥ
c pūrvaṃ niviṣṭam unmāthaṃ capalatvān na buddhavān
a ātmanaś capalo nāsti kuto 'nyeṣāṃ bhaviṣyati
c tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi capalo hanty asaṃśayam
a bravīti madhuraṃ kaṃ cit priyo me ha bhavān iti
c tan mithyākaraṇaṃ sarvaṃ vistareṇāpi me śṛṇu
a kāraṇāt priyatām eti dveṣyo bhavati kāraṇāt
c arthārthī jīvaloko 'yaṃ na kaś cit kasya cit priyaḥ
a sakhyaṃ sodarayor bhrātror daṃpatyor vā parasparam
c kasya cin nābhijānāmi prītiṃ niṣkāraṇām iha
a yady api bhrātaraḥ kruddhā bhāryā vā kāraṇāntare
c svabhāvatas te prīyante netaraḥ prīyate janaḥ
a priyo bhavati dānena priyavādena cāparaḥ
c mantrahomajapair anyaḥ kāryārthaṃ prīyate janaḥ
a utpanne kāraṇe prītir nāsti nau kāraṇāntare
c pradhvaste kāraṇasthāne sā prītir vinivartate
a kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ manye yenāhaṃ bhavataḥ priyaḥ
c anyatrābhyavahārārthāt tatrāpi ca budhā vayam
a kālo hetuṃ vikurute svārthas tam anuvartate
c svārthaṃ prājño 'bhijānāti prājñaṃ loko 'nuvartate
a na tv īdṛśaṃ tvayā vācyaṃ viduṣi svārthapaṇḍite
c akāle 'viṣamasthasya svārthahetur ayaṃ tava
a tasmān nāhaṃ cale svārthāt susthitaḥ saṃdhivigrahe
c abhrāṇām iva rūpāṇi vikurvanti kṣaṇe kṣaṇe
a adyaiva hi ripur bhūtvā punar adyaiva sauhṛdam
c punaś ca ripur adyaiva yuktīnāṃ paśya cāpalam
a āsīt tāvat tu maitrī nau yāvad dhetur abhūt purā
c sā gatā saha tenaiva kālayuktena hetunā
a tvaṃ hi me 'tyantataḥ śatruḥ sāmarthyān mitratāṃ gataḥ
c tat kṛtyam abhinirvṛttaṃ prakṛtiḥ śatrutāṃ gatā
a so 'ham evaṃ praṇītāni jñātvā śāstrāṇi tattvataḥ
c praviśeyaṃ kathaṃ pāśaṃ tvatkṛtaṃ tad vadasva me
a tvadvīryeṇa vimukto 'haṃ madvīryeṇa tathā bhavān
c anyonyānugrahe vṛtte nāsti bhūyaḥ samāgamaḥ
a tvaṃ hi saumya kṛtārtho 'dya nirvṛttārthās tathā vayam
c na te 'sty anyan mayā kṛtyaṃ kiṃ cid anyatra bhakṣaṇāt
a aham annaṃ bhavān bhoktā durbalo 'haṃ bhavān balī
c nāvayor vidyate saṃdhir niyukte viṣame bale
a saṃmanye 'haṃ tava prajñāṃ yan mokṣāt pratyanantaram
c bhakṣyaṃ mṛgayase nūnaṃ sukhopāyam asaṃśayam
a bhakṣyārtham eva baddhas tvaṃ sa muktaḥ prasṛtaḥ kṣudhā
c śāstrajñam abhisaṃdhāya nūnaṃ bhakṣayitādya mām
a jānāmi kṣudhitaṃ hi tvām āhārasamayaś ca te
c sa tvaṃ mām abhisaṃdhāya bhakṣyaṃ mṛgayase punaḥ
a yac cāpi putradāraṃ svaṃ tat saṃnisṛjase mayi
c śuśrūṣāṃ nāma me kartuṃ sakhe mama na tatkṣamam
a tvayā māṃ sahitaṃ dṛṣṭvā priyā bhāryā sutāś ca ye
c kasmān māṃ te na khādeyur hṛṣṭāḥ praṇayinas tvayi
a nāhaṃ tvayā sameṣyāmi vṛtto hetuḥ samāgame
c śivaṃ dhyāyasva me 'trasthaḥ sukṛtaṃ smaryate yadi
a śatror annādyabhūtaḥ san kliṣṭasya kṣudhitasya ca
c bhakṣyaṃ mṛgayamāṇasya kaḥ prājño viṣayaṃ vrajet
a svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi dūrād api tavodvije
c nāhaṃ tvayā sameṣyāmi nirvṛto bhava lomaśa
d yadi tvaṃ sukṛtaṃ vetsi tatsakhyam anusāraya
d viśvastaṃ vā pramattaṃ vā etad eva kṛtaṃ bhavet
a balavat saṃnikarṣo hi na kadā cit praśasyate
c praśāntād api me prājña bhetavyaṃ balinaḥ sadā
a yadi tv arthena me kāryaṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
c kāmaṃ sarvaṃ pradāsyāmi na tv ātmānaṃ kadā cana
a ātmārthe saṃtatis tyājyā rājyaṃ ratnaṃ dhanaṃ tathā
c api sarvasvam utsṛjya rakṣed ātmānam ātmanā
a aiśvaryadhanaratnānāṃ pratyamitre 'pi tiṣṭhatām
c dṛṣṭā hi punar āvṛttir jīvatām iti naḥ śrutam
a na tv ātmanaḥ saṃpradānaṃ dhanaratnavad iṣyate
c ātmā tu sarvato rakṣyo dārair api dhanair api
a ātmarakṣitatantrāṇāṃ suparīkṣitakāriṇām
c āpado nopapadyante puruṣāṇāṃ svadoṣajāḥ
a śatrūn samyag vijānanti durbalā ye balīyasaḥ
b śaṅkanīyaḥ sa sarvatra priyam apy ācaran sadā
b kulajānāṃ sumitrāṇāṃ dhārmikāṇāṃ mahātmanām
c teṣāṃ na cālyate buddhir ātmārthaṃ kṛtaniścayā
a ity abhivyaktam evāsau palitenāvabhartsitaḥ
c mārjāro vrīḍito bhūtvā mūṣakaṃ vākyam abravīt
d lomaśa uvāca
d satyaṃ śape tvayāhaṃ vai mitradroho vigarhitaḥ
d satāṃ saptapadaṃ mitraṃ kathaṃ tvaṃ māṃ na viśvaseḥ
a saṃmanye 'haṃ tava prajñāṃ yas tvaṃ mama hite rataḥ
c uktavān arthatattvena mayā saṃbhinnadarśanaḥ
a na tu mām anyathā sādho tvaṃ vijñātum ihārhasi
c prāṇapradānajaṃ tvatto mama sauhṛdam āgatam
a dharmajño 'smi guṇajño 'smi kṛtajño 'smi viśeṣataḥ
c mitreṣu vatsalaś cāsmi tvadvidheṣu viśeṣataḥ
a tan mām evaṃgate sādho na yāvayitum arhasi
c tvayā hi yāvyamāno 'haṃ prāṇāñ jahyāṃ sabāndhavaḥ
a dhik śabdo hi budhair dṛṣṭo madvidheṣu manasviṣu
c maraṇaṃ dharmatattvajña na māṃ śaṅkitum arhasi
a iti saṃstūyamāno hi mārjāreṇa sa mūṣakaḥ
c manasā bhāvagambhīraṃ mārjāraṃ vākyam abravīt
a sādhur bhavāñ śrutārtho 'smi prīyate na ca viśvase
c saṃstavair vā dhanaughair vā nāhaṃ śakyaḥ punas tvayā
a na hy amitravaśaṃ yānti prājñā niṣkāraṇaṃ sakhe
c asminn arthe ca gāthe dve nibodhośanasā kṛte
a śatrusādhāraṇe kṛtye kṛtvā saṃdhiṃ balīyasā
c samāhitaś cared yuktyā kṛtārthaś ca na viśvaset
d na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste nātiviśvaset
d nityaṃ viśvāsayed anyān pareṣāṃ tu na viśvaset
a tasmāt sarvāsv avasthāsu rakṣej jīvitam ātmanaḥ
c dravyāṇi saṃtatiś caiva sarvaṃ bhavati jīvataḥ
a saṃkṣepo nītiśāstrāṇām aviśvāsaḥ paro mataḥ
c nṛṣu tasmād aviśvāsaḥ puṣkalaṃ hitam ātmanaḥ
a vadhyante na hy aviśvastāḥ śatrubhir durbalā api
c viśvastās tv āśu vadhyante balavanto 'pi durbalaiḥ
a tvadvidhebhyo mayā hy ātmā rakṣyo mārjāra sarvadā
c rakṣa tvam api cātmānaṃ caṇḍālāj jātikilbiṣāt
a sa tasya bruvatas tv evaṃ saṃtrāsāj jātasādhvasaḥ
c svabilaṃ hi javenāśu mārjāraḥ prayayau tataḥ
a tataḥ śāstrārthatattvajño buddhisāmarthyam ātmanaḥ
c viśrāvya palitaḥ prājño bilam anyaj jagāma ha
a evaṃ prajñāvatā buddhyā durbalena mahābalāḥ
c ekena bahavo 'mitrāḥ palitenābhisaṃdhitāḥ
a ariṇāpi samarthena saṃdhiṃ kurvīta paṇḍitaḥ
c mūṣakaś ca biḍālaś ca muktāv anyonyasaṃśrayāt
a ity eṣa kṣatradharmasya mayā mārgo 'nudarśitaḥ
c vistareṇa mahīpāla saṃkṣepeṇa punaḥ śṛṇu
a anyonyakṛtavairau tu cakratuḥ prītim uttamām
c anyonyam abhisaṃdhātum abhūc caiva tayor matiḥ
a tatra prājño 'bhisaṃdhatte samyag buddhibalāśrayāt
c abhisaṃdhīyate prājñaḥ pramādād api cābudhaiḥ
a tasmād abhītavad bhīto viśvastavad aviśvasan
c na hy apramattaś calati calito vā vinaśyati
a kālena ripuṇā saṃdhiḥ kāle mitreṇa vigrahaḥ
c kārya ity eva tattvajñāḥ prāhur nityaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a evaṃ matvā mahārāja śāstrārtham abhigamya ca
c abhiyukto 'pramattaś ca prāg bhayād bhītavac caret
a bhītavat saṃvidhiḥ kāryaḥ pratisaṃdhis tathaiva ca
c bhayād utpadyate buddhir apramattābhiyogajā
a na bhayaṃ vidyate rājan bhītasyānāgate bhaye
c abhītasya tu visrambhāt sumahaj jāyate bhayam
a na bhīrur iti cātyantaṃ mantro 'deyaḥ kathaṃ cana
c avijñānād dhi vijñāte gacched āspadadarśiṣu
a tasmād abhītavad bhīto viśvastavad aviśvasan
c kāryāṇāṃ gurutāṃ buddhvā nānṛtaṃ kiṃ cid ācaret
a evam etan mayā proktam itihāsaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c śrutvā tvaṃ suhṛdāṃ madhye yathāvat samupācara
a upalabhya matiṃ cāgryām arimitrāntaraṃ tathā
c saṃdhivigrahakālaṃ ca mokṣopāyaṃ tathāpadi
a śatrusādhāraṇe kṛtye kṛtvā saṃdhiṃ balīyasā
c samāgamaṃ cared yuktyā kṛtārtho na ca viśvaset
a aviruddhāṃ trivargeṇa nītim etāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c abhyuttiṣṭha śrutād asmād bhūyas tvaṃ rañjayan prajāḥ
a brāhmaṇaiś cāpi te sārdhaṃ yātrā bhavatu pāṇḍava
c brāhmaṇā hi paraṃ śreyo divi ceha ca bhārata
a ete dharmasya vettāraḥ kṛtajñāḥ satataṃ prabho
c pūjitāḥ śubhakarmāṇaḥ pūrvajityā narādhipa
a rājyaṃ śreyaḥ paraṃ rājan yaśaḥ kīrtiṃ ca lapsyase
c kulasya saṃtatiṃ caiva yathānyāyaṃ yathākramam
a dvayor imaṃ bhārata saṃdhivigrahaṃ
subhāṣitaṃ buddhiviśeṣakāritam
c tathānvavekṣya kṣitipena sarvadā
niṣevitavyaṃ nṛpa śatrumaṇḍale
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ukto mantro mahābāho na viśvāso 'sti śatruṣu
c kathaṃ hi rājā varteta yadi sarvatra nāśvaset
a viśvāsād dhi paraṃ rājño rājann utpadyate bhayam
c kathaṃ vai nāśvasan rājā śatrūñ jayati pārthiva
a etan me saṃśayaṃ chindhi mano me saṃpramuhyati
c aviśvāsakathām etām upaśrutya pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇu kaunteya yo vṛtto brahmadattaniveśane
c pūjanyā saha saṃvādo brahmadattasya pārthiva
a kāmpilye brahmadattasya antaḥpuranivāsinī
c pūjanī nāma śakunī dīrghakālaṃ sahoṣitā
a rutajñā sarvabhūtānāṃ yathā vai jīvajīvakaḥ
c sarvajñā sarvadharmajñā tiryagyonigatāpi sā
a abhiprajātā sā tatra putram ekaṃ suvarcasam
c samakālaṃ ca rājño 'pi devyāḥ putro vyajāyata
d tayor arthe kṛtajñā sā khecarī pūjanī sadā
a samudratīraṃ gatvā sā tv ājahāra phaladvayam
c puṣṭyarthaṃ ca svaputrasya rājaputrasya caiva ha
a phalam ekaṃ sutāyādād rājaputrāya cāparam
c amṛtāsvādasadṛśaṃ balatejovivardhanam
d ādāyādāya saivāśu tayoḥ prādāt punaḥ punaḥ
e tatrāgacchat parāṃ vṛddhiṃ rājaputraḥ phalāśanāt
f tataḥ sa dhātryā kakṣeṇa uhyamāno nṛpātmajaḥ
f dadarśa taṃ pakṣisutaṃ bālyād āgatya bālakaḥ
a dhātryā hastagataś cāpi tenākrīḍata pakṣiṇā
c śūnye tu tam upādāya pakṣiṇaṃ samajātakam
e hatvā tataḥ sa rājendra dhātryā hastam upāgamat
a atha sā śakunī rājann āgamat phalahārikā
c apaśyan nihataṃ putraṃ tena bālena bhūtale
a bāṣpapūrṇamukhī dīnā dṛṣṭvā sā tu hataṃ sutam
c pūjanī duḥkhasaṃtaptā rudatī vākyam abravīt
a kṣatriye saṃgataṃ nāsti na prītir na ca sauhṛdam
c kāraṇe saṃbhajantīha kṛtārthāḥ saṃtyajanti ca
a kṣatriyeṣu na viśvāsaḥ kāryaḥ sarvopaghātiṣu
c apakṛtyāpi satataṃ sāntvayanti nirarthakam
a aham asya karomy adya sadṛśīṃ vairayātanām
c kṛtaghnasya nṛśaṃsasya bhṛśaṃ viśvāsaghātinaḥ
a sahasaṃjātavṛddhasya tathaiva sahabhojinaḥ
c śaraṇāgatasya ca vadhas trividhaṃ hy asya kilbiṣam
a ity uktvā caraṇābhyāṃ tu netre nṛpasutasya sā
c bhittvā svasthā tata idaṃ pūjanī vākyam abravīt
a icchayaiva kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ sadya evopasarpati
c kṛtapratikriyaṃ teṣāṃ na naśyati śubhāśubham
a pāpaṃ karma kṛtaṃ kiṃ cin na tasmin yadi vidyate
c nipātyate 'sya putreṣu na cet pautreṣu naptṛṣu
d brahmadattaḥ sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pūjanyā hṛtalocanam
d kṛte pratikṛtaṃ matvā pūjanīm idam abravīt
 brahmadatta uvāca
a asti vai kṛtam asmābhir asti pratikṛtaṃ tvayā
c ubhayaṃ tat samībhūtaṃ vasa pūjani mā gamaḥ
 pūjany uvāca
a sakṛt kṛtāparādhasya tatraiva parilambataḥ
c na tad budhāḥ praśaṃsanti śreyas tatrāpasarpaṇam
a sāntve prayukte nṛpate kṛtavaire na viśvaset
c kṣipraṃ prabadhyate mūḍho na hi vairaṃ praśāmyati
a anyonyaṃ kṛtavairāṇāṃ putrapautraṃ nigacchati
c putrapautre vinaṣṭe tu paralokaṃ nigacchati
a sarveṣāṃ kṛtavairāṇām aviśvāsaḥ sukhāvahaḥ
c ekāntato na viśvāsaḥ kāryo viśvāsaghātakaḥ
a na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste 'pi na viśvaset
b viśvāsād bhayam utpannam api mūlaṃ nikṛntati
c kāmaṃ viśvāsayed anyān pareṣāṃ tu na viśvaset
d aviśvāsāt paraṃ hanti viśvāsād vadhyate paraiḥ
a mātā pitā bāndhavānāṃ variṣṭhau
bhāryā jarā bījamātraṃ tu putraḥ
c bhrātā śatruḥ klinnapāṇir vayasya
ātmā hy ekaḥ sukhaduḥkhasya vettā
a anyonyakṛtavairāṇāṃ na saṃdhir upapadyate
c sa ca hetur atikrānto yadartham aham āvasam
a pūjitasyārthamānābhyāṃ jantoḥ pūrvāpakāriṇaḥ
c ceto bhavaty aviśvastaṃ pūrvaṃ trāsayate balāt
a pūrvaṃ saṃmānanā yatra paścāc caiva vimānanā
c jahyāt taṃ sattvavān vāsaṃ saṃmānitavimānitaḥ
a uṣitāsmi tavāgāre dīrghakālam ahiṃsitā
c tad idaṃ vairam utpannaṃ sukham āssva vrajāmy aham
 brahmadatta uvāca
a yatkṛte pratikuryād vai na sa tatrāparādhnuyāt
c anṛṇas tena bhavati vasa pūjani mā gamaḥ
 pūjany uvāca
a na kṛtasya na kartuś ca sakhyaṃ saṃdhīyate punaḥ
c hṛdayaṃ tatra jānāti kartuś caiva kṛtasya ca
 brahmadatta uvāca
a kṛtasya caiva kartuś ca sakhyaṃ saṃdhīyate punaḥ
c vairasyopaśamo dṛṣṭaḥ pāpaṃ nopāśnute punaḥ
 pūjany uvāca
a nāsti vairam upakrāntaṃ sāntvito 'smīti nāśvaset
c viśvāsād badhyate bālas tasmāc chreyo hy adarśanam
a tarasā ye na śakyante śastraiḥ suniśitair api
c sāmnā te vinigṛhyante gajā iva kareṇubhiḥ
 brahmadatta uvāca
a saṃvāsāj jāyate sneho jīvitāntakareṣv api
c anyonyasya ca viśvāsaḥ śvapacena śuno yathā
a anyonyakṛtavairāṇāṃ saṃvāsān mṛdutāṃ gatam
c naiva tiṣṭhati tad vairaṃ puṣkarastham ivodakam
 pūjany uvāca
a vairaṃ pañcasamutthānaṃ tac ca budhyanti paṇḍitāḥ
c strīkṛtaṃ vāstujaṃ vāgjaṃ sasapatnāparādhajam
a tatra dātā nihantavyaḥ kṣatriyeṇa viśeṣataḥ
c prakāśaṃ vāprakāśaṃ vā buddhvā deśabalādikam
a kṛtavaire na viśvāsaḥ kāryas tv iha suhṛdy api
c channaṃ saṃtiṣṭhate vairaṃ gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu
a na vittena na pāruṣyair na sāntvena na ca śrutaiḥ
c vairāgniḥ śāmyate rājann aurvāgnir iva sāgare
a na hi vairāgnir udbhūtaḥ karma vāpy aparādhajam
c śāmyaty adagdhvā nṛpate vinā hy ekatarakṣayāt
a satkṛtasyārthamānābhyāṃ syāt tu pūrvāpakāriṇaḥ
c naiva śāntir na viśvāsaḥ karma trāsayate balāt
a naivāpakāre kasmiṃś cid ahaṃ tvayi tathā bhavān
c viśvāsād uṣitā pūrvaṃ nedānīṃ viśvasāmy aham
 brahmadatta uvāca
a kālena kriyate kāryaṃ tathaiva vividhāḥ kriyāḥ
c kālenaiva pravartante kaḥ kasyehāparādhyati
a tulyaṃ cobhe pravartete maraṇaṃ janma caiva ha
c kāryate caiva kālena tannimittaṃ hi jīvati
a badhyante yugapat ke cid ekaikasya na cāpare
c kālo dahati bhūtāni saṃprāpyāgnir ivendhanam
a nāhaṃ pramāṇaṃ naiva tvam anyonyakaraṇe śubhe
c kālo nityam upādhatte sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca dehinām
a evaṃ vaseha sasnehā yathākālam ahiṃsitā
c yat kṛtaṃ tac ca me kṣāntaṃ tvaṃ caiva kṣama pūjani
 pūjany uvāca
a yadi kālaḥ pramāṇaṃ te na vairaṃ kasya cid bhavet
c kasmāt tv apacitiṃ yānti bāndhavā bāndhave hate
a kasmād devāsurāḥ pūrvam anyonyam abhijaghnire
c yadi kālena niryāṇaṃ sukhaduḥkhe bhavābhavau
a bhiṣajo bheṣajaṃ kartuṃ kasmād icchanti rogiṇe
c yadi kālena pacyante bheṣajaiḥ kiṃ prayojanam
a pralāpaḥ kriyate kasmāt sumahāñ śokamūrchitaiḥ
c yadi kālaḥ pramāṇaṃ te kasmād dharmo 'sti kartṛṣu
a tava putro mamāpatyaṃ hatavān hiṃsito mayā
c anantaraṃ tvayā cāhaṃ bandhanīyā mahīpate
a ahaṃ hi putraśokena kṛtapāpā tavātmaje
c tathā tvayā prahartavyaṃ mayi tattvaṃ ca me śṛṇu
a bhakṣārthaṃ krīḍanārthaṃ vā narā vāñchanti pakṣiṇaḥ
c tṛtīyo nāsti saṃyogo vadhabandhād ṛte kṣamaḥ
a vadhabandhabhayād eke mokṣatantram upāgatāḥ
c maraṇotpātajaṃ duḥkham āhur dharmavido janāḥ
a sarvasya dayitāḥ prāṇāḥ sarvasya dayitāḥ sutāḥ
c duḥkhād udvijate sarvaḥ sarvasya sukham īpsitam
a duḥkhaṃ jarā brahmadatta duḥkham arthaviparyayaḥ
c duḥkhaṃ cāniṣṭasaṃvāso duḥkham iṣṭaviyogajam
a vairabandhakṛtaṃ duḥkhaṃ hiṃsājaṃ strīkṛtaṃ tathā
c duḥkhaṃ sukhena satataṃ janād viparivartate
a na duḥkhaṃ paraduḥkhe vai ke cid āhur abuddhayaḥ
c yo duḥkhaṃ nābhijānāti sa jalpati mahājane
a yas tu śocati duḥkhārtaḥ sa kathaṃ vaktum utsahet
b bhinnāḥ śliṣṭā na śakyante śastraiḥ suniśitair api
b sāmnā te 'pi nigṛhyante gajā iva kareṇubhiḥ
c rasajñaḥ sarvaduḥkhasya yathātmani tathā pare
a yat kṛtaṃ te mayā rājaṃs tvayā ca mama yat kṛtam
c na tad varṣaśataiḥ śakyaṃ vyapohitum ariṃdama
a āvayoḥ kṛtam anyonyaṃ tatra saṃdhir na vidyate
c smṛtvā smṛtvā hi te putraṃ navaṃ vairaṃ bhaviṣyati
a vairam antikam āsajya yaḥ prītiṃ kartum icchati
c mṛnmayasyeva bhagnasya tasya saṃdhir na vidyate
a niścitaś cārthaśāstrajñair aviśvāsaḥ sukhodayaḥ
c uśanāś cātha gāthe dve prahrādāyābravīt purā
a ye vairiṇaḥ śraddadhate satye satyetare 'pi vā
c te śraddadhānā vadhyante madhu śuṣkatṛṇair yathā
a na hi vairāṇi śāmyanti kuleṣv ā daśamād yugāt
c ākhyātāraś ca vidyante kule ced vidyate pumān
a upaguhya hi vairāṇi sāntvayanti narādhipāḥ
c athainaṃ pratipiṃṣanti pūrṇaṃ ghaṭam ivāśmani
a sadā na viśvased rājan pāpaṃ kṛtveha kasya cit
c apakṛtya pareṣāṃ hi viśvāsād duḥkham aśnute
 brahmadatta uvāca
a nāviśvāsāc cinvate 'rthān nehante cāpi kiṃ cana
c bhayād ekatarān nityaṃ mṛtakalpā bhavanti ca
 pūjany uvāca
a yasyeha vraṇinau pādau padbhyāṃ ca parisarpati
c kṣaṇyete tasya tau pādau suguptam abhidhāvataḥ
a netrābhyāṃ sarujābhyāṃ yaḥ prativātam udīkṣate
c tasya vāyurujātyarthaṃ netrayor bhavati dhruvam
a duṣṭaṃ panthānam āśritya yo mohād abhipadyate
c ātmano balam ajñātvā tad antaṃ tasya jīvitam
a yas tu varṣam avijñāya kṣetraṃ kṛṣati mānavaḥ
c hīnaṃ puruṣakāreṇa sasyaṃ naivāpnute punaḥ
a yaś ca tiktaṃ kaṣāyaṃ vāpy āsvādavidhuraṃ hitam
c āhāraṃ kurute nityaṃ so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate
a pathyaṃ bhuktvā naro lobhād yo 'nyad aśnāti bhojanam
c pariṇāmam avijñāya tad antaṃ tasya jīvitam
a daivaṃ puruṣakāraś ca sthitāv anyonyasaṃśrayāt
c udāttānāṃ karma tantraṃ daivaṃ klībā upāsate
a karma cātmahitaṃ kāryaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ vā yadi vā mṛdu
c grasyate 'karmaśīlas tu sadānarthair akiṃcanaḥ
a tasmāt saṃśayite 'py arthe kārya eva parākramaḥ
c sarvasvam api saṃtyajya kāryam ātmahitaṃ naraiḥ
a vidyā śauryaṃ ca dākṣyaṃ ca balaṃ dhairyaṃ ca pañcamam
c mitrāṇi sahajāny āhur vartayantīha yair budhāḥ
a niveśanaṃ ca kupyaṃ ca kṣetraṃ bhāryā suhṛjjanaḥ
c etāny upacitāny āhuḥ sarvatra labhate pumān
a sarvatra ramate prājñaḥ sarvatra ca virocate
c na vibhīṣayate kaṃ cid bhīṣito na bibheti ca
a nityaṃ buddhimato hy arthaḥ svalpako 'pi vivardhate
c dākṣyeṇa kurute karma saṃyamāt pratitiṣṭhati
a gṛhasnehāvabaddhānāṃ narāṇām alpamedhasām
c kustrī khādati māṃsāni māghamā segavām iva
a gṛhaṃ kṣetrāṇi mitrāṇi svadeśa iti cāpare
c ity evam avasīdanti narā buddhiviparyaye
a utpatet sarujād deśād vyādhidurbhikṣapīḍitāt
c anyatra vastuṃ gacched vā vased vā nityamānitaḥ
a tasmād anyatra yāsyāmi vastuṃ nāham ihotsahe
c kṛtam etad anāhāryaṃ tava putreṇa pārthiva
a kubhāryāṃ ca kuputraṃ ca kurājānaṃ kusauhṛdam
c kusaṃbandhaṃ kudeśaṃ ca dūrataḥ parivarjayet
a kumitre nāsti viśvāsaḥ kubhāryāyāṃ kuto ratiḥ
c kurājye nirvṛtir nāsti kudeśe na prajīvyate
a kumitre saṃgataṃ nāsti nityam asthirasauhṛde
c avamānaḥ kusaṃbandhe bhavaty arthaviparyaye
a sā bhāryā yā priyaṃ brūte sa putro yatra nirvṛtiḥ
c tan mitraṃ yatra viśvāsaḥ sa deśo yatra jīvyate
a yatra nāsti balātkāraḥ sa rājā tīvraśāsanaḥ
c na caiva hy abhisaṃbandho daridraṃ yo bubhūṣati
a bhāryā deśo 'tha mitrāṇi putrasaṃbandhibāndhavāḥ
c etat sarvaṃ guṇavati dharmanetre mahīpatau
a adharmajñasya vilayaṃ prajā gacchanty anigrahāt
c rājā mūlaṃ trivargasya apramatto 'nupālayan
a baliṣaḍbhāgam uddhṛtya baliṃ tam upayojayet
c na rakṣati prajāḥ samyag yaḥ sa pārthivataskaraḥ
a dattvābhayaṃ yaḥ svayam eva rājā
na tat pramāṇaṃ kurute yathāvat
c sa sarvalokād upalabhya pāpam
adharmabuddhir nirayaṃ prayāti
a dattvābhayaṃ yaḥ sma rājā pramāṇaṃ kurute sadā
c sa sarvasukhakṛj jñeyaḥ prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
a pitā mātā gurur goptā vahnir vaiśravaṇo yamaḥ
c sapta rājño guṇān etān manur āha prajāpatiḥ
a pitā hi rājā rāṣṭrasya prajānāṃ yo 'nukampakaḥ
c tasmin mithyāpraṇīte hi tiryag gacchati mānavaḥ
a saṃbhāvayati māteva dīnam abhyavapadyate
c dahaty agnir ivāniṣṭān yamayan bhavate yamaḥ
a iṣṭeṣu visṛjaty arthān kubera iva kāmadaḥ
c gurur dharmopadeśena goptā ca paripālanāt
a yas tu rañjayate rājā paurajānapadān guṇaiḥ
c na tasya bhraśyate rājyaṃ guṇadharmānupālanāt
a svayaṃ samupajānan hi paurajānapadakriyāḥ
c sa sukhaṃ modate bhūpa iha loke paratra ca
a nityodvignāḥ prajā yasya karabhāraprapīḍitāḥ
c anarthair vipralupyante sa gacchati parābhavam
a prajā yasya vivardhante sarasīva mahotpalam
c sa sarvayajñaphalabhāg rājā loke mahīyate
a balinā vigraho rājan na kathaṃ cit praśasyate
c balinā vigṛhītasya kuto rājyaṃ kutaḥ sukham
 bhīṣma uvāca
a saivam uktvā śakunikā brahmadattaṃ narādhipam
c rājānaṃ samanujñāpya jagāmāthepsitāṃ diśam
a etat te brahmadattasya pūjanyā saha bhāṣitam
c mayoktaṃ bharataśreṣṭha kim anyac chrotum icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yugakṣayāt parikṣīṇe dharme loke ca bhārata
c dasyubhiḥ pīḍyamāne ca kathaṃ stheyaṃ pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi nītim āpatsu bhārata
c utsṛjyāpi ghṛṇāṃ kāle yathā varteta bhūmipaḥ
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c bharadvājasya saṃvādaṃ rājñaḥ śatruṃtapasya ca
a rājā śatruṃtapo nāma sauvīrāṇāṃ mahārathaḥ
c kaṇiṅkam upasaṃgamya papracchārthaviniścayam
a alabdhasya kathaṃ lipsā labdhaṃ kena vivardhate
c vardhitaṃ pālayet kena pālitaṃ praṇayet katham
a tasmai viniścayārthaṃ sa paripṛṣṭārthaniścayaḥ
c uvāca brāhmaṇo vākyam idaṃ hetumad uttaram
a nityam udyatadaṇḍaḥ syān nityaṃ vivṛtapauruṣaḥ
c acchidraś chidradarśī ca pareṣāṃ vivarānugaḥ
a nityam udyatadaṇḍasya bhṛśam udvijate janaḥ
c tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni daṇḍenaiva prarodhayet
a evam eva praśaṃsanti paṇḍitās tattvadarśinaḥ
c tasmāc catuṣṭaye tasmin pradhāno daṇḍa ucyate
a chinnamūle hy adhiṣṭhāne sarve tajjīvino hatāḥ
c kathaṃ hi śākhās tiṣṭheyuś chinnamūle vanaspatau
a mūlam evāditaś chindyāt parapakṣasya paṇḍitaḥ
c tataḥ sahāyān pakṣaṃ ca sarvam evānusārayet
a sumantritaṃ suvikrāntaṃ suyuddhaṃ supalāyitam
c āpadāṃ padakāleṣu kurvīta na vicārayet
a vāṅmātreṇa vinītaḥ syād dhṛdayena yathā kṣuraḥ
c ślakṣṇapūrvābhibhāṣī ca kāmakrodhau vivarjayet
a sapatnasahite kārye kṛtvā saṃdhiṃ na viśvaset
c apakrāmet tataḥ kṣipraṃ kṛtakāryo vicakṣaṇaḥ
a śatruṃ ca mitrarūpeṇa sāntvenaivābhisāntvayet
c nityaśaś codvijet tasmāt sarpād veśmagatād iva
a yasya buddhiṃ paribhavet tam atītena sāntvayet
c anāgatena duṣprajñaṃ pratyutpannena paṇḍitam
a añjaliṃ śapathaṃ sāntvaṃ praṇamya śirasā vadet
c aśruprapātanaṃ caiva kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
a vahed amitraṃ skandhena yāvat kālaviparyayaḥ
c athainam āgate kāle bhindyād ghaṭam ivāśmani
a muhūrtam api rājendra tindukālātavaj jvalet
c na tuṣāgnir ivānarcir dhūmāyeta naraś ciram
a nānarthakenārthavattvaṃ kṛtaghnena samācaret
c arthe tu śakyate bhoktuṃ kṛtakāryo 'vamanyate
e tasmāt sarvāṇi kāryāṇi sāvaśeṣāṇi kārayet
a kokilasya varāhasya meroḥ śūnyasya veśmanaḥ
c vyāḍasya bhakticitrasya yac chreṣṭhaṃ tat samācaret
a utthāyotthāya gacchec ca nityayukto ripor gṛhān
c kuśalaṃ cāpi pṛccheta yady apy akuśalaṃ bhavet
a nālasāḥ prāpnuvanty arthān na klībā na ca māninaḥ
c na ca lokaravād bhītā na ca śaśvat pratīkṣiṇaḥ
a nāsya chidraṃ paro vidyād vidyāc chidraṃ parasya tu
c gūhet kūrma ivāṅgāni rakṣed vivaram ātmanaḥ
a bakavac cintayed arthān siṃhavac ca parākramet
c vṛkavac cāvalumpeta śaśavac ca viniṣpatet
a pānam akṣās tathā nāryo mṛgayā gītavāditam
c etāni yuktyā seveta prasaṅgo hy atra doṣavān
a kuryāt tṛṇamayaṃ cāpaṃ śayīta mṛgaśāyikām
c andhaḥ syād andhavelāyāṃ bādhiryam api saṃśrayet
a deśaṃ kālaṃ samāsādya vikrameta vicakṣaṇaḥ
c deśakālābhyatīto hi vikramo niṣphalo bhavet
a kālākālau saṃpradhārya balābalam athātmanaḥ
c parasparabalaṃ jñātvā tathātmānaṃ niyojayet
a daṇḍenopanataṃ śatruṃ yo rājā na niyacchati
c sa mṛtyum upagūhyās te garbham aśvatarī yathā
a supuṣpitaḥ syād aphalaḥ phalavān syād durāruhaḥ
c āmaḥ syāt pakvasaṃkāśo na ca śīryeta kasya cit
d ādātavyaṃ na dātavyaṃ priyaṃ brūyān nirarthakam
a āśāṃ kālavatīṃ kuryāt tāṃ ca vighnena yojayet
c vighnaṃ nimittato brūyān nimittaṃ cāpi hetutaḥ
a bhītavat saṃvidhātavyaṃ yāvad bhayam anāgatam
c āgataṃ tu bhayaṃ dṛṣṭvā prahartavyam abhītavat
a na saṃśayam anāruhya naro bhadrāṇi paśyati
c saṃśayaṃ punar āruhya yadi jīvati paśyati
a anāgataṃ vijānīyād yacched bhayam upasthitam
c punar vṛddhikṣayāt kiṃ cid abhivṛttaṃ niśāmayet
a pratyupasthitakālasya sukhasya parivarjanam
c anāgatasukhāśā ca naiṣa buddhimatāṃ nayaḥ
a yo 'riṇā saha saṃdhāya sukhaṃ svapiti viśvasan
c sa vṛkṣāgraprasupto vā patitaḥ pratibudhyate
a karmaṇā yena teneha mṛdunā dāruṇena vā
c uddhared dīnam ātmānaṃ samartho dharmam ācaret
a ye sapatnāḥ sapatnānāṃ sarvāṃs tān apavatsayet
c ātmanaś cāpi boddhavyāś cārāḥ praṇihitāḥ paraiḥ
a cāraḥ suvihitaḥ kārya ātmano 'tha parasya ca
c pāṣaṇḍāṃs tāpasādīṃś ca pararāṣṭraṃ praveśayet
d pāṣaṇḍādyair avijñātair viditvāriṃ vaśaṃ nayet
a udyāneṣu vihāreṣu prapāsv āvasatheṣu ca
c pānāgāreṣu veśeṣu tīrtheṣu ca sabhāsu ca
a dharmābhicāriṇaḥ pāpāś cārā lokasya kaṇṭakāḥ
c samāgacchanti tān buddhvā niyacchec chamayed api
a na viśvased aviśvaste viśvaste nāpi viśvaset
c viśvastaṃ bhayam anveti nāparīkṣya ca viśvaset
a viśvāsayitvā tu paraṃ tattvabhūtena hetunā
c athāsya praharet kāle kiṃ cid vicalite pade
a aśaṅkyam api śaṅketa nityaṃ śaṅketa śaṅkitāt
c bhayaṃ hi śaṅkitāj jātaṃ samūlam api kṛntati
a avadhānena maunena kāṣāyeṇa jaṭājinaiḥ
c viśvāsayitvā dveṣṭāram avalumped yathā vṛkaḥ
a putro vā yadi vā bhrātā pitā vā yadi vā suhṛt
c arthasya vighnaṃ kurvāṇā hantavyā bhūtivardhanāḥ
a guror apy avaliptasya kāryākāryam ajānataḥ
c utpathapratipannasya daṇḍo bhavati śāsanam
a pratyutthānābhivādābhyāṃ saṃpradānena kasya cit
c pratipuṣkalaghātī syāt tīkṣṇatuṇḍa iva dvijaḥ
a nācchittvā paramarmāṇi nākṛtvā karma dāruṇam
b nāvicārya ciraṃ kāle naro bhadrāṇi paśyati
c nāhatvā matsyaghātīva prāpnoti paramāṃ śriyam
a nāsti jātyā ripur nāma mitraṃ nāma na vidyate
c sāmarthyayogāj jāyante mitrāṇi ripavas tathā
a amitraṃ naiva muñceta bruvantaṃ karuṇāny api
c duḥkhaṃ tatra na kurvīta hanyāt pūrvāpakāriṇam
a saṃgrahānugrahe yatnaḥ sadā kāryo 'nasūyatā
c nigrahaś cāpi yatnena kartavyo bhūtim icchatā
a prahariṣyan priyaṃ brūyāt prahṛtyāpi priyottaram
c api cāsya śiraś chittvā rudyāc choced athāpi vā
a nimantrayeta sāntvena saṃmānena titikṣayā
c āśākāraṇam ity etat kartavyaṃ bhūtim icchatā
a na śuṣkavairaṃ kurvīta na bāhubhyāṃ nadīṃ taret
c apārthakam anāyuṣyaṃ goviṣāṇasya bhakṣaṇam
e dantāś ca parighṛṣyante rasaś cāpi na labhyate
a trivarge trividhā pīḍānubandhās traya eva ca
c anubandhavadhau jñātvā pīḍāṃ hi parivarjayet
a ṛṇaśeṣo 'gniśeṣaś ca śatruśeṣas tathaiva ca
c punaḥ punar vivardheta svalpo 'py anivāritaḥ
a vardhamānam ṛṇaṃ tiṣṭhat paribhūtāś ca śatravaḥ
c āvahanty anayaṃ tīvraṃ vyādhayaś cāpy upekṣitāḥ
a nāsamyak kṛtakārī syād apramattaḥ sadā bhavet
c kaṇṭako 'pi hi duśchinno vikāraṃ kurute ciram
a vadhena ca manuṣyāṇāṃ mārgāṇāṃ dūṣaṇena ca
c ākarāṇāṃ vināśaiś ca pararāṣṭraṃ vināśayet
a gṛdhradṛṣṭir bakālīnaḥ śvaceṣṭaḥ siṃhavikramaḥ
c anudvignaḥ kākaśaṅkī bhujaṃgacaritaṃ caret
d śūram añjalipātena bhīruṃ bhedena bhedayet
d lubdham arthapradānena samaṃ tulyena vigrahaḥ
a śreṇimukhyopajāpeṣu vallabhānunayeṣu ca
c amātyān parirakṣeta bhedasaṃghātayor api
a mṛdur ity avamanyante tīkṣṇa ity udvijanti ca
c tīkṣṇakāle ca tīkṣṇaḥ syān mṛdukāle mṛdur bhavet
a mṛdunā sumṛduṃ hanti mṛdunā hanti dāruṇam
c nāsādhyaṃ mṛdunā kiṃ cit tasmāt tīkṣṇataraṃ mṛdu
a kāle mṛdur yo bhavati kāle bhavati dāruṇaḥ
c sa sādhayati kṛtyāni śatrūṃś caivādhitiṣṭhati
a paṇḍitena viruddhaḥ san dūre 'smīti na viśvaset
c dīrghau buddhimato bāhū yābhyāṃ hiṃsati hiṃsitaḥ
a na tat tared yasya na pāram uttaren
na tad dhared yat punar āharet paraḥ
c na tat khaned yasya na mūlam utkhanen
na taṃ hanyād yasya śiro na pātayet
a itīdam uktaṃ vṛjinābhisaṃhitaṃ
na caitad evaṃ puruṣaḥ samācaret
c paraprayuktaṃ tu kathaṃ niśāmayed
ato mayoktaṃ bhavato hitārthinā
a yathāvad uktaṃ vacanaṃ hitaṃ tadā
niśamya vipreṇa suvīrarāṣṭriyaḥ
c tathākarod vākyam adīnacetanaḥ
śriyaṃ ca dīptāṃ bubhuje sabāndhavaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a hīne paramake dharme sarvalokātilaṅghini
c adharme dharmatāṃ nīte dharme cādharmatāṃ gate
a maryādāsu prabhinnāsu kṣubhite dharmaniścaye
c rājabhiḥ pīḍite loke corair vāpi viśāṃ pate
a sarvāśrameṣu mūḍheṣu karmasūpahateṣu ca
c kāmān mohāc ca lobhāc ca bhayaṃ paśyatsu bhārata
a aviśvasteṣu sarveṣu nityabhīteṣu pārthiva
c nikṛtyā hanyamāneṣu vañcayatsu parasparam
a saṃpradīpteṣu deśeṣu brāhmaṇye cābhipīḍite
c avarṣati ca parjanye mitho bhede samutthite
a sarvasmin dasyusād bhūte pṛthivyām upajīvane
c kena svid brāhmaṇo jīvej jaghanye kāla āgate
a atityakṣuḥ putrapautrān anukrośān narādhipa
c katham āpatsu varteta tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a kathaṃ ca rājā varteta loke kaluṣatāṃ gate
c katham arthāc ca dharmāc ca na hīyeta paraṃtapa
 bhīṣma uvāca
a rājamūlā mahārāja yogakṣemasuvṛṣṭayaḥ
c prajāsu vyādhayaś caiva maraṇaṃ ca bhayāni ca
a kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaś ca kaliś ca bharatarṣabha
c rājamūlāni sarvāṇi mama nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
a tasmiṃs tv abhyāgate kāle prajānāṃ doṣakārake
c vijñānabalam āsthāya jīvitavyaṃ tadā bhavet
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c viśvāmitrasya saṃvādaṃ caṇḍālasya ca pakkaṇe
a tretādvāparayoḥ saṃdhau purā daivavidhikramāt
c anāvṛṣṭir abhūd ghorā rājan dvādaśavārṣikī
a prajānām abhivṛddhānāṃ yugānte paryupasthite
c tretānirmokṣasamaye dvāparapratipādane
a na vavarṣa sahasrākṣaḥ pratilomo 'bhavad guruḥ
c jagāma dakṣiṇaṃ mārgaṃ somo vyāvṛttalakṣaṇaḥ
a nāvaśyāyo 'pi rātryante kuta evābhrarājayaḥ
c nadyaḥ saṃkṣiptatoyaughāḥ kva cid antargatābhavan
a sarāṃsi saritaś caiva kūpāḥ prasravaṇāni ca
c hatatviṭkāny alakṣyanta nisargād daivakāritāt
a upaśuṣkajalasthāyā vinivṛttasabhāprapā
c nivṛttayajñasvādhyāyā nirvaṣaṭkāramaṅgalā
a utsannakṛṣigorakṣyā nivṛttavipaṇāpaṇā
c nivṛttapūgasamayā saṃpranaṣṭamahotsavā
a asthikaṅkālasaṃkīrṇā hāhābhūtajanākulā
c śūnyabhūyiṣṭhanagarā dagdhagrāmaniveśanā
a kva cic coraiḥ kva cic chastraiḥ kva cid rājabhir āturaiḥ
c parasparabhayāc caiva śūnyabhūyiṣṭhanirjanā
a gatadaivatasaṃkalpā vṛddhabālavinākṛtā
c gojāvimahiṣair hīnā parasparaharāharā
a hataviprā hatārakṣā pranaṣṭauṣadhisaṃcayā
c śyāvabhūtanaraprāyā babhūva vasudhā tadā
a tasmin pratibhaye kāle kṣīṇe dharme yudhiṣṭhira
c babhramuḥ kṣudhitā martyāḥ khādantaḥ sma parasparam
a ṛṣayo niyamāṃs tyaktvā parityaktāgnidaivatāḥ
c āśramān saṃparityajya paryadhāvann itas tataḥ
a viśvāmitro 'tha bhagavān maharṣir aniketanaḥ
c kṣudhā parigato dhīmān samantāt paryadhāvata
d tyaktvā dārāṃś ca putrāṃś ca kasmiṃś cij janasaṃsadi
d bhakṣyābhakṣyasamo bhūtvā niragnir aniketanaḥ
a sa kadā cit paripatañ śvapacānāṃ niveśanam
c hiṃsrāṇāṃ prāṇihantṝṇām āsasāda vane kva cit
a vibhinnakalaśākīrṇaṃ śvacarmācchādanāyutam
c varāhakharabhagnāsthikapālaghaṭasaṃkulam
a mṛtacelaparistīrṇaṃ nirmālyakṛtabhūṣaṇam
c sarpanirmokamālābhiḥ kṛtacihnakuṭīmaṭham
d kukkuṭārāvabahulaṃ gardabhadhvanināditam
d tad yoṣidbhiḥ kharair vākyaiḥ kalahadbhiḥ parasparam
a ulūkapakṣadhvajibhir devatāyatanair vṛtam
c lohaghaṇṭāpariṣkāraṃ śvayūthaparivāritam
a tat praviśya kṣudhāviṣṭo gādheḥ putro mahān ṛṣiḥ
c āhārānveṣaṇe yuktaḥ paraṃ yatnaṃ samāsthitaḥ
a na ca kva cid avindat sa bhikṣamāṇo 'pi kauśikaḥ
c māṃsam annaṃ mūlaphalam anyad vā tatra kiṃ cana
a aho kṛcchraṃ mayā prāptam iti niścitya kauśikaḥ
c papāta bhūmau daurbalyāt tasmiṃś caṇḍālapakkaṇe
a cintayām āsa sa muniḥ kiṃ nu me sukṛtaṃ bhavet
c kathaṃ vṛthā na mṛtyuḥ syād iti pārthivasattama
a sa dadarśa śvamāṃsasya kutantīṃ vitatāṃ muniḥ
c caṇḍālasya gṛhe rājan sadyaḥ śastrahatasya ca
a sa cintayām āsa tadā steyaṃ kāryam ito mayā
c na hīdānīm upāyo 'nyo vidyate prāṇadhāraṇe
a āpatsu vihitaṃ steyaṃ viśiṣṭasamahīnataḥ
c paraṃ paraṃ bhavet pūrvam asteyam iti niścayaḥ
a hīnād ādeyam ādau syāt samānāt tadanantaram
c asaṃbhavād ādadīta viśiṣṭād api dhārmikāt
a so 'ham antāvasānānāṃ haramāṇaḥ parigrahāt
c na steyadoṣaṃ paśyāmi hariṣyāmy etad āmiṣam
a etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya viśvāmitro mahāmuniḥ
c tasmin deśe prasuṣvāpa patito yatra bhārata
a sa vigāḍhāṃ niśāṃ dṛṣṭvā supte caṇḍālapakkaṇe
c śanair utthāya bhagavān praviveśa kuṭīmaṭham
a sa supta eva caṇḍālaḥ śleṣmāpihitalocanaḥ
c paribhinnasvaro rūkṣa uvācāpriyadarśanaḥ
a kaḥ kutantīṃ ghaṭṭayati supte caṇḍālapakkaṇe
c jāgarmi nāvasupto 'smi hato 'sīti ca dāruṇaḥ
a viśvāmitro 'ham ity eva sahasā tam uvāca saḥ
c sahasābhyāgatabhayaḥ sodvegas tena karmaṇā
d viśvāmitro 'ham āyuṣmann āgato 'haṃ bubhukṣitaḥ
d mā vadhīr mama sadbuddher yadi samyak prapaśyasi
a caṇḍālas tad vacaḥ śrutvā maharṣer bhāvitātmanaḥ
c śayanād upasaṃbhrānta iyeṣotpatituṃ tataḥ
a sa visṛjyāśru netrābhyāṃ bahumānāt kṛtāñjaliḥ
c uvāca kauśikaṃ rātrau brahman kiṃ te cikīrṣitam
a viśvāmitras tu mātaṅgam uvāca parisāntvayan
c kṣudhito 'haṃ gataprāṇo hariṣyāmi śvajāghanīm
a avasīdanti me prāṇāḥ smṛtir me naśyati kṣudhā
a   tṛṣitaḥ param asmy aham
b durbalo naṣṭasaṃjñaś ca bhakṣyābhakṣyavivarjitaḥ
c svadharmaṃ budhyamāno 'pi hariṣyāmi śvajāghanīm
a aṭan bhaikṣaṃ na vindāmi yadā yuṣmākam ālaye
c tadā buddhiḥ kṛtā pāpe hariṣyāmi śvajāghanīm
a tṛṣitaḥ kaluṣaṃ pātā nāsti hrīr aśanārthinaḥ
c kṣud dharmaṃ dūṣayaty atra hariṣyāmi śvajāghanīm
a agnir mukhaṃ purodhāś ca devānāṃ śucipād vibhuḥ
c yathā sa sarvabhug brahmā tathā māṃ viddhi dharmataḥ
a tam uvāca sa caṇḍālo maharṣe śṛṇu me vacaḥ
c śrutvā tathā samātiṣṭha yathā dharmān na hīyase
d dharmaṃ tavāpi viprarṣe śṛṇu yat te bravīmy aham
a mṛgāṇām adhamaṃ śvānaṃ pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
c tasyāpy adhama uddeśaḥ śarīrasyorujāghanī
a nedaṃ samyag vyavasitaṃ maharṣe karma vaikṛtam
c caṇḍālasvasya haraṇam abhakṣyasya viśeṣataḥ
a sādhv anyam anupaśya tvam upāyaṃ prāṇadhāraṇe
c na māṃsalobhāt tapaso nāśas te syān mahāmune
a jānato 'vihito mārgo na kāryo dharmasaṃkaraḥ
c mā sma dharmaṃ parityākṣīs tvaṃ hi dharmavid uttamaḥ
a viśvāmitras tato rājann ity ukto bharatarṣabha
c kṣudhārtaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ punar eva mahāmuniḥ
a nirāhārasya sumahān mama kālo 'bhidhāvataḥ
c na vidyate 'bhyupāyaś ca kaś cin me prāṇadhāraṇe
a yena tena viśeṣeṇa karmaṇā yena kena cit
c abhyujjīvet sīdamānaḥ samartho dharmam ācaret
a aindro dharmaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ brāhmaṇānām athāgnikaḥ
c brahmavahnir mama balaṃ bhakṣyāmi samayaṃ kṣudhā
a yathā yathā vai jīved dhi tat kartavyam apīḍayā
c jīvitaṃ maraṇāc chreyo jīvan dharmam avāpnuyāt
a so 'haṃ jīvitam ākāṅkṣann abhakṣasyāpi bhakṣaṇam
c vyavasye buddhipūrvaṃ vai tad bhavān anumanyatām
a jīvan dharmaṃ cariṣyāmi praṇotsyāmy aśubhāni ca
c tapobhir vidyayā caiva jyotīṃṣīva mahat tamaḥ
 śvapaca uvāca
a naitat khādan prāpsyase prāṇam anyaṃ
nāyur dīrghaṃ nāmṛtasyeva tṛptim
c bhikṣām anyāṃ bhikṣa mā te mano 'stu
śvabhakṣaṇe śvā hy abhakṣo dvijānām
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a na durbhikṣe sulabhaṃ māṃsam anyac
chvapāka nānnaṃ na ca me 'sti vittam
c kṣudhārtaś cāham agatir nirāśaḥ
śvamāṃse cāsmin ṣaḍrasān sādhu manye
 śvapaca uvāca
a pañca pañcanakhā bhakṣyā brahmakṣatrasya vai dvija
b śalyakaḥ śvāvidho godhāḥ śaśaḥ kūrmaś ca pañcamaḥ
c yadi śāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ te mābhakṣye mānasaṃ kṛthāḥ
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a agastyenāsuro jagdho vātāpiḥ kṣudhitena vai
c aham āpadgataḥ kṣubdho bhakṣayiṣye śvajāghanīm
 śvapaca uvāca
a bhikṣām anyām āhareti na caitat kartum arhasi
c na nūnaṃ kāryam etad vai hara kāmaṃ śvajāghanīm
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a śiṣṭā vai kāraṇaṃ dharme tadvṛttam anuvartaye
c parāṃ medhyāśanād etāṃ bhakṣyāṃ manye śvajāghanīm
 śvapaca uvāca
a asatā yat samācīrṇaṃ na sa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c nāvṛttam anukāryaṃ vai mā chalenānṛtaṃ kṛthāḥ
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a na pātakaṃ nāvamatam ṛṣiḥ san kartum arhasi
c samau ca śvamṛgau manye tasmād bhakṣyā śvajāghanī
 śvapaca uvāca
a yad brāhmaṇārthe kṛtam arthitena
tenarṣiṇā tac ca bhakṣyādhikāram
c sa vai dharmo yatra na pāpam asti
sarvair upāyair hi sa rakṣitavyaḥ
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a mitraṃ ca me brāhmaṇaś cāyam ātmā
priyaś ca me pūjyatamaś ca loke
c taṃ bhartukāmo 'ham imāṃ hariṣye
nṛśaṃsānām īdṛśānāṃ na bibhye
 śvapaca uvāca
a kāmaṃ narā jīvitaṃ saṃtyajanti

c sarvān kāmān prāpnuvantīha vidvan
priyasva kāmaṃ sahitaḥ kṣudhā vai
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a sthāne tāvat saṃśayaḥ pretyabhāve
niḥsaṃśayaṃ karmaṇāṃ vā vināśaḥ
c ahaṃ punar varta ity āśayātmā
mūlaṃ rakṣan bhakṣayiṣyāmy abhakṣyam
d   mūlartuṃlastrittipuṇyaṃ sic
d mohātmake yatra yathā svabhakṣe
a buddhyātmake vyastam astīti tuṣṭo

b yathā cakṣuḥ śabdatattvaṃ na budhyed
b rūpaṃ paśyec cakṣur evaṃ tathaiva
c yady apy enaḥ saṃśayād ācarāmi
nāhaṃ bhaviṣyāmi yathā tvam eva
 śvapaca uvāca
a patanīyam idaṃ duḥkham iti me vartate matiḥ
c duṣkṛtī brāhmaṇaṃ santaṃ yas tvām aham upālabhe
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a pibanty evodakaṃ gāvo maṇḍūkeṣu ruvatsv api
c na te 'dhikāro dharme 'sti mā bhūr ātmapraśaṃsakaḥ
 śvapaca uvāca
a suhṛd bhūtvānuśāsmi tvā kṛpā hi tvayi me dvija
c tad evaṃ śreya ādhatsva mā lobhāc chvānam ādithāḥ
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a suhṛn me tvaṃ sukhepsuś ced āpado māṃ samuddhara
c jāne 'haṃ dharmato ''tmānaṃ śvānīm utsṛja jāghanīm
 śvapaca uvāca
a naivotsahe bhavate dātum etāṃ
nopekṣituṃ hriyamāṇaṃ svam annam
c ubhau syāvaḥ svamalenāvaliptau
dātāhaṃ ca tvaṃ ca vipra pratīcchan
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a adyāham etad vṛjinaṃ karma kṛtvā
jīvaṃś cariṣyāmi mahāpavitram
c prapūtātmā dharmam evābhipatsye
yad etayor guru tad vai bravīhi
 śvapaca uvāca
a ātmaiva sākṣī kila lokakṛtye
tvam eva jānāsi yad atra duṣṭam
c yo hy ādriyed bhakṣyam iti śvamāṃsaṃ
manye na tasyāsti vivarjanīyam
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a upādāne khādane vāsya doṣaḥ
kāryo nyāyair nityam atrāpavādaḥ
c yasmin na hiṃsā nānṛte vākyaleśo
bhakṣyakriyā tatra na tad garīyaḥ
 śvapaca uvāca
a yady eṣa hetus tava khādanasya
na te vedaḥ kāraṇaṃ nānyadharmaḥ
c tasmād abhakṣye bhakṣaṇād vā dvijendra
doṣaṃ na paśyāmi yathedam āttha
 viśvāmitra uvāca
a na pātakaṃ bhakṣaṇam asya dṛṣṭaṃ
surāṃ pītvā patatītīha śabdaḥ
c anyonyakarmāṇi tathā tathaiva
na leśamātreṇa kṛtyaṃ hinasti
 śvapaca uvāca
a asthānato hīnataḥ kutsitād vā

c sthānaṃ punar yo labhate niṣaṅgāt
tenāpi daṇḍaḥ sahitavya eva
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktvā nivavṛte mātaṅgaḥ kauśikaṃ tadā
c viśvāmitro jahāraiva kṛtabuddhiḥ śvajāghanīm
a tato jagrāha pañcāṅgīṃ jīvitārthī mahāmuniḥ
c sadāras tām upākṛtya vane yāto mahāmuniḥ
d tathāsya buddhir abhavad vidhināhaṃ śvajāghanīm
d bhakṣayāmi yathākāmaṃ pūrvaṃ saṃtarpya devatāḥ
d tato 'gnim upasaṃhṛtya brāhmeṇa vidhinā muniḥ
d aindrāgneyena vidhinā caruṃ śrapayata svayam
d tataḥ samārabhat karma daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca bhārata
d āhūya devān indrādīn bhāgaṃ bhāgaṃ vidhikramāt
a etasminn eva kāle tu pravavarṣātha vāsavaḥ
c saṃjīvayan prajāḥ sarvā janayām āsa cauṣadhīḥ
a viśvāmitro 'pi bhagavāṃs tapasā dagdhakilbiṣaḥ
c kālena mahatā siddhim avāpa paramādbhutām
d sa saṃhṛtya ca tat karma anāsvādya ca tad dhaviḥ
d toṣayām āsa devāṃś ca pitṝṃś ca dvijasattamaḥ
a evaṃ vidvān adīnātmā vyasanastho jijīviṣuḥ
c sarvopāyair upāyajño dīnam ātmānam uddharet
a etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya jīvitavyaṃ sadā bhavet
c jīvan puṇyam avāpnoti naro bhadrāṇi paśyati
a tasmāt kaunteya viduṣā dharmādharmaviniścaye
c buddhim āsthāya loke 'smin vartitavyaṃ yatātmanā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yad idaṃ ghoram uddiṣṭam aśraddheyam ivānṛtam
c asti svid dasyumaryādā yām ahaṃ parivarjaye
a saṃmuhyāmi viṣīdāmi dharmo me śithilīkṛtaḥ
c udyamaṃ nādhigacchāmi kutaś cit paricintayan
 bhīṣma uvāca
a naitac chuddhāgamād eva tava dharmānuśāsanam
c prajñāsamavatāro 'yaṃ kavibhiḥ saṃbhṛtaṃ madhu
a bahvyaḥ pratividhātavyāḥ prajñā rājñā tatas tataḥ
c naikaśākhena dharmeṇa yātraiṣā saṃpravartate
a buddhisaṃjananaṃ rājñāṃ dharmam ācaratāṃ sadā
c jayo bhavati kauravya tadā tad viddhi me vacaḥ
a buddhiśreṣṭhā hi rājāno jayanti vijayaiṣiṇaḥ
c dharmaḥ pratividhātavyo buddhyā rājñā tatas tataḥ
a naikaśākhena dharmeṇa rājñāṃ dharmo vidhīyate
c durbalasya kutaḥ prajñā purastād anudāhṛtā
a advaidhajñaḥ pathi dvaidhe saṃśayaṃ prāptum arhati
c buddhidvaidhaṃ veditavyaṃ purastād eva bhārata
a pārśvataḥkaraṇaṃ prajñā viṣūcī tv āpagā iva
c janas tūccāritaṃ dharmaṃ vijānāty anyathānyathā
a samyag vijñāninaḥ ke cin mithyāvijñānino 'pare
c tad vai yathātathaṃ buddhvā jñānam ādadate satām
a parimuṣṇanti śāstrāṇi dharmasya paripanthinaḥ
c vaiṣamyam arthavidyānāṃ nairarthyāt khyāpayanti te
a ājijīviṣavo vidyāṃ yaśaskāmāḥ samantataḥ
c te sarve narapāpiṣṭhā dharmasya paripanthinaḥ
a apakvamatayo mandā na jānanti yathātatham
c sadā hy aśāstrakuśalāḥ sarvatrāpariniṣṭhitāḥ
a parimuṣṇanti śāstrāṇi śāstradoṣānudarśinaḥ
c vijñānam atha vidyānāṃ na samyag iti vartate
a nindayā paravidyānāṃ svāṃ vidyāṃ khyāpayanti ye
c vāgastrā vākchurīmattvā dugdhavidyāphalā iva
e tān vidyāvaṇijo viddhi rākṣasān iva bhārata
a vyājena kṛtsno vidito dharmas te parihāsyate
c na dharmavacanaṃ vācā na buddhyā ceti naḥ śrutam
a iti bārhaspataṃ jñānaṃ provāca maghavā svayam
c na tv eva vacanaṃ kiṃ cid animittād ihocyate
a svavinītena śāstreṇa vyavasyanti tathāpare
c lokayātrām ihaike tu dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a samuddiṣṭaṃ satāṃ dharmaṃ svayam ūhen na paṇḍitaḥ
c amarṣāc chāstrasaṃmohād avijñānāc ca bhārata
a śāstraṃ prājñasya vadataḥ samūhe yāty adarśanam
c āgatāgamayā buddhyā vacanena praśasyate
a ajñānāj jñānahetutvād vacanaṃ sādhu manyate
c anapāhatam evedaṃ nedaṃ śāstram apārthakam
a daiteyān uśanāḥ prāha saṃśayacchedane purā
c jñānam avyapadeśyaṃ hi yathā nāsti tathaiva tat
a tena tvaṃ chinnamūlena kaṃ toṣayitum arhasi
c atathyavihitaṃ yo vā nedaṃ vākyam upāśnuyāt
a ugrāyaiva hi sṛṣṭo 'si karmaṇe na tv avekṣase
c aṅgemām anvavekṣasva rājanītiṃ bubhūṣitum
e yayā pramucyate tv anyo yadarthaṃ ca pramodate
a ajo 'śvaḥ kṣatram ity etat sadṛśaṃ brahmaṇā kṛtam
c tasmān natīkṣṇabhūtānāṃ yātrā kā cit prasidhyati
a yas tv avadhyavadhe doṣaḥ sa vadhyasyāvadhe smṛtaḥ
c eṣaiva khalu maryādā yām ayaṃ parivarjayet
a tasmāt tīkṣṇaḥ prajā rājā svadharme sthāpayed uta
c anyonyaṃ bhakṣayanto hi pracareyur vṛkā iva
a yasya dasyugaṇā rāṣṭre dhvāṅkṣā matsyāñ jalād iva
c viharanti parasvāni sa vai kṣatriyapāṃsanaḥ
a kulīnān sacivān kṛtvā vedavidyāsamanvitān
c praśādhi pṛthivīṃ rājan prajā dharmeṇa pālayan
d vedavedāṅgatattvajño japahomaparāyaṇaḥ
d āśīrvādaparo nityam eṣa rājā purohitaḥ
a vihīnajam akarmāṇaṃ yaḥ pragṛhṇāti bhūmipaḥ
c ubhayasyāviśeṣajñas tad vai kṣatraṃ napuṃsakam
a naivograṃ naiva cānugraṃ dharmeṇeha praśasyate
c ubhayaṃ na vyatikrāmed ugro bhūtvā mṛdur bhava
a kaṣṭaḥ kṣatriyadharmo 'yaṃ sauhṛdaṃ tvayi yat sthitam
c ugre karmaṇi sṛṣṭo 'si tasmād rājyaṃ praśādhi vai
d aruṣṭaḥ kasya cid rājann evam eva samācara
a aśiṣṭanigraho nityaṃ śiṣṭasya paripālanam
c iti śakro 'bravīd dhīmān āpatsu bharatarṣabha
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a asti svid dasyumaryādā yām anyo nātilaṅghayet
c pṛcchāmi tvāṃ satāṃ śreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a brāhmaṇān eva seveta vidyāvṛddhāṃs tapasvinaḥ
c śrutacāritravṛttāḍhyān pavitraṃ hy etad uttamam

a teṣāṃ prītyā yaśo mukhyam aprītyā tu viparyayaḥ
c prītyā hy amṛtavad viprāḥ kruddhāś caiva yathā viṣam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca

a mahān dharmo mahārāja śaraṇāgatapālane

c svamāṃsair bhojitaḥ kāṃ ca gatiṃ lebhe sa bhārata
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇu rājan kathāṃ divyāṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśinīm
c nṛpater mucukundasya kathitāṃ bhārgaveṇa ha
a imam arthaṃ purā pārtha mucukundo narādhipaḥ

a dharmaniścayasaṃyuktāṃ kāmārthasahitāṃ kathām
c śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan gadato me mahābhuja
a kaś cit kṣudrasamācāraḥ pṛthivyāṃ kālasaṃmataḥ
c cacāra pṛthivīṃ pāpo ghoraḥ śakunilubdhakaḥ
a kākola iva kṛṣṇāṅgo rūkṣaḥ pāpasamāhitaḥ
c yavamadhyaḥ kṛśagrīvo hrasvapādo mahāhanuḥ
a naiva tasya suhṛt kaś cin na saṃbandhī na bāndhavaḥ
c sa hi taiḥ saṃparityaktas tena ghoreṇa karmaṇā
d naraḥ pāpasamācāras tyaktavyo dūrato budhaiḥ
d ātmānaṃ yo 'bhisaṃdhatte so 'nyasya syāt kathaṃ hitaḥ
d ye nṛśaṃsā durātmānaḥ prāṇiprāṇaharā narāḥ
d udvejanīyā bhūtānāṃ vyālā iva bhavanti te
a sa vai kṣārakam ādāya dvijān hatvā vane sadā
c cakāra vikrayaṃ teṣāṃ pataṃgānāṃ narādhipa
a evaṃ tu vartamānasya tasya vṛttiṃ durātmanaḥ
c agamat sumahān kālo na cādharmam abudhyata
a tasya bhāryāsahāyasya ramamāṇasya śāśvatam
c daivayogavimūḍhasya nānyā vṛttir arocata
a tataḥ kadā cit tasyātha vanasthasya samudgataḥ
c pātayann iva vṛkṣāṃs tān sumahān vātasaṃbhramaḥ
a meghasaṃkulam ākāśaṃ vidyunmaṇḍalamaṇḍitam
c saṃchannaṃ sumuhūrtena nausthāneneva sāgaraḥ
a vāridhārāsamūhaiś ca saṃprahṛṣṭaḥ śatakratuḥ
c kṣaṇena pūrayām āsa salilena vasuṃdharām
a tato dhārākule loke saṃbhraman naṣṭacetanaḥ
c śītārtas tad vanaṃ sarvam ākulenāntarātmanā
a naiva nimnaṃ sthalaṃ vāpi so 'vindata vihaṃgahā
c pūrito hi jalaughena mārgas tasya vanasya vai
a pakṣiṇo vātavegena hatā līnās tadābhavan
c mṛgāḥ siṃhā varāhāś ca sthalāny āśritya tasthire
a mahatā vātavarṣeṇa trāsitās te vanaukasaḥ
c bhayārtāś ca kṣudhārtāś ca babhramuḥ sahitā vane
a sa tu śītahatair gātrair jagāmaiva na tasthivān
b dadarśa patitāṃ bhūmau kapotīṃ śītavihvalām
b dṛṣṭvārto 'pi hi pāpātmā sa tāṃ pañjarake 'kṣipat
b svayaṃ duḥkhābhibhūto 'pi duḥkham evākarot pare
b pāpātmā pāpakāritvāt pāpam eva cakāra saḥ
c so 'paśyad vanaṣaṇḍeṣu meghanīlaṃ vanaspatim
d sevyamānaṃ vihaṃgaughaiś chāyāvāsaphalārthibhiḥ
d dhātrā paropakārāya sa sādhur iva nirmitaḥ
d athābhavat kṣaṇenaiva viyad vimalatārakam
d mahat sara ivotphullaṃ kumudacchuritodakam
a tārāḍhyaṃ kumudākāram ākāśaṃ nirmalaṃ ca ha
c meghair muktaṃ nabho dṛṣṭvā lubdhakaḥ śītavihvalaḥ
a diśo 'valokayām āsa velāṃ caiva durātmavān
c dūre grāmaniveśaś ca tasmād deśād iti prabho
e kṛtabuddhir vane tasmin vastuṃ tāṃ rajanīṃ tadā
a so 'ñjaliṃ prayataḥ kṛtvā vākyam āha vanaspatim
c śaraṇaṃ yāmi yāny asmin daivatānīha bhārata
a sa śilāyāṃ śiraḥ kṛtvā parṇāny āstīrya bhūtale
c duḥkhena mahatāviṣṭas tataḥ suṣvāpa pakṣihā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atha vṛkṣasya śākhāyāṃ vihaṃgaḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
c dīrghakāloṣito rājaṃs tatra citratanūruhaḥ
a tasya kālyaṃ gatā bhāryā carituṃ nābhyavartata
c prāptāṃ ca rajanīṃ dṛṣṭvā sa pakṣī paryatapyata
a vātavarṣaṃ mahac cāsīn na cāgacchati me priyā
c kiṃ nu tat kāraṇaṃ yena sādyāpi na nivartate
a api svasti bhavet tasyāḥ priyāyā mama kānane
c tayā virahitaṃ hīdaṃ śūnyam adya gṛhaṃ mama
d putrapautravadhūbhṛtyair ākīrṇam api sarvataḥ
d bhāryāhīnaṃ gṛhasthasya śūnyam eva gṛhaṃ bhavet
d na gṛhaṃ gṛham ity āhur gṛhiṇī gṛham ucyate
d gṛhaṃ tu gṛhiṇīhīnam araṇyasadṛśaṃ matam
a yadi sā raktanetrāntā citrāṅgī madhurasvarā
c adya nābhyeti me kāntā na kāryaṃ jīvitena me
d na bhuṅkte mayy abhukte yā nāsnāte snāti suvratā
d nātiṣṭhaty upatiṣṭheta śete ca śayite mayi
d hṛṣṭe bhavati sā hṛṣṭā duḥkhite mayi duḥkhitā
d proṣite dīnavadanā kruddhe ca priyavādinī
a patidharmaratā sādhvī prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī
c sā hi śrāntaṃ kṣudhārtaṃ ca jānīte māṃ tapasvinī
a anuraktā hitā caiva snigdhā caiva pativratā
c yasya vai tādṛśī bhāryā dhanyaḥ sa manujo bhuvi
d vṛkṣamūle 'pi dayitā yasya tiṣṭhati tad gṛham
d prāsādo 'pi tayā hīnaḥ kāntāra iti niścitam
d dharmārthakāmakāleṣu bhāryā puṃsaḥ sahāyinī
d videśagamane cāsya saiva viśvāsakārikā
d yasya bhāryā sadā raktā tathā chandānuvartinī
d vibhave 'pi hi saṃtoṣas tasya svarga ihaiva hi
d sā bhāryā yā gṛhe dakṣā sā bhāryā yā pativratā
d sā bhāryā yā priyaṃ brūte sā bhāryā yā manoramā
d yasya bhāryā guṇajñā ca bhartāram anugāminī
d yā cātīva hi saṃhṛṣṭā sā śrīḥ sākṣān na vai dhanam
a bhāryā hi paramo nāthaḥ puruṣasyeha paṭhyate
c asahāyasya loke 'smiṃl lokayātrāsahāyinī
a tathā rogābhibhūtasya nityaṃ kṛcchragatasya ca
c nāsti bhāryāsamaṃ kiṃ cin narasyārtasya bheṣajam
a nāsti bhāryāsamo bandhur nāsti bhāryāsamā gatiḥ
c nāsti bhāryāsamo loke sahāyo dharmasādhanaḥ
d yasya bhāryā gṛhe nāsti sādhvī ca priyavādinī
d araṇyaṃ tena gantavyaṃ yathāraṇyaṃ tathā gṛham
d aho mama vinā vahniṃ dahyate gātrasaṃcayam
d pativratadharā sādhvī prāṇebhyo 'pi garīyasī
a evaṃ vilapatas tasya dvijasyārtasya tatra vai
c gṛhītā śakunaghnena bhāryā śuśrāva bhāratīm
d kapoty uvāca
d aho 'tīva subhāgyāhaṃ yasyā me dayitaḥ patiḥ
d asato vā sato vāpi guṇān evaṃ prabhāṣate
a na sā strīty abhibhāṣā syād yasyā bhartā na tuṣyati
b tuṣṭe bhartari nārīṇāṃ tuṣṭāḥ syuḥ sarvadevatāḥ
c agnisākṣikam apy etad bhartā hi śaraṇaṃ striyaḥ
d dāvāgnineva nirdagdhā sapuṣpastabakā latā
d bhasmībhavatu sā nārī yasyā bhartā na tuṣyati
a iti saṃcintya duḥkhārtā bhartāraṃ duḥkhitaṃ tadā
c kapotī lubdhakenātha yattā vacanam abravīt
a hanta vakṣyāmi te śreyaḥ śrutvā ca kuru tat tathā
c śaraṇāgatasaṃtrātā bhava kānta viśeṣataḥ
a eṣa śākunikaḥ śete tava vāsaṃ samāśritaḥ
c śītārtaś ca kṣudhārtaś ca pūjām asmai prayojaya
a yo hi kaś cid dvijaṃ hanyād gāṃ vā lokasya mātaram
c śaraṇāgataṃ ca yo hanyāt tulyaṃ teṣāṃ ca pātakam
a yāsmākaṃ vihitā vṛttiḥ kāpotī jātidharmataḥ
c sā nyāyyātmavatā nityaṃ tvadvidhenābhivartitum
a yas tu dharmaṃ yathāśakti gṛhastho hy anuvartate
c sa pretya labhate lokān akṣayān iti śuśruma
a sa tvaṃ saṃtānavān adya putravān api ca dvija
c tat svadehe dayāṃ tyaktvā dharmārthau parigṛhya vai
e pūjām asmai prayuṅkṣva tvaṃ prīyetāsya mano yathā
f matkṛte mā ca saṃtāpaṃ kurvīthās tvaṃ vihaṃgama
f śarīrayātrākṛtyartham anyān dārān upaiṣyasi
a iti sā śakunī vākyaṃ kṣārakasthā tapasvinī
c atiduḥkhānvitā procya bhartāraṃ samudaikṣata
a sa patnyā vacanaṃ śrutvā dharmayuktisamanvitam
c harṣeṇa mahatā yukto bāṣpavyākulalocanaḥ
a taṃ vai śākunikaṃ dṛṣṭvā vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
c pūjayām āsa yatnena sa pakṣī pakṣijīvinam
a uvāca ca svāgataṃ te brūhi kiṃ karavāṇy aham
c saṃtāpaś ca na kartavyaḥ svagṛhe vartate bhavān
a tad bravītu bhavān kṣipraṃ kiṃ karomi kim icchasi
c praṇayena bravīmi tvāṃ tvaṃ hi naḥ śaraṇāgataḥ
d arāv apy ucitaṃ kāryam ātithyaṃ gṛham āgate
d chettum apy āgate chāyāṃ nopasaṃharate drumaḥ
a śaraṇāgatasya kartavyam ātithyam iha yatnataḥ
c pañcayajñapravṛttena gṛhasthena viśeṣataḥ
a pañcayajñāṃs tu yo mohān na karoti gṛhāśramī
c tasya nāyaṃ na ca paro loko bhavati dharmataḥ
a tad brūhi tvaṃ suvisrabdho yat tvaṃ vācā vadiṣyasi
c tat kariṣyāmy ahaṃ sarvaṃ mā tvaṃ śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā śakuner lubdhako 'bravīt
c bādhate khalu mā śītaṃ himatrāṇaṃ vidhīyatām
a evam uktas tataḥ pakṣī parṇāny āstīrya bhūtale
c yathāśuṣkāṇi yatnena jvalanārthaṃ drutaṃ yayau
a sa gatvāṅgārakarmāntaṃ gṛhītvāgnim athāgamat
c tataḥ śuṣkeṣu parṇeṣu pāvakaṃ so 'bhyadīdipat
a susaṃdīptaṃ mahat kṛtvā tam āha śaraṇāgatam
c pratāpaya suvisrabdhaṃ svagātrāṇy akutobhayaḥ
a sa tathoktas tathety uktvā lubdho gātrāṇy atāpayat
c agnipratyāgataprāṇas tataḥ prāha vihaṃgamam
d harṣeṇa mahatāviṣṭo vākyaṃ vyākulalocanaḥ
d tathemaṃ śakuniṃ dṛṣṭvā vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā
a dattam āhāram icchāmi tvayā kṣud bādhate hi mām
c tad vacaḥ sa pratiśrutya vākyam āha vihaṃgamaḥ
a na me 'sti vibhavo yena nāśayāmi tava kṣudhām
c utpannena hi jīvāmo vayaṃ nityaṃ vanaukasaḥ
a saṃcayo nāsti cāsmākaṃ munīnām iva kānane
c ity uktvā sa tadā tatra vivarṇavadano 'bhavat
a kathaṃ nu khalu kartavyam iti cintāparaḥ sadā
c babhūva bharataśreṣṭha garhayan vṛttim ātmanaḥ
a muhūrtāl labdhasaṃjñas tu sa pakṣī pakṣighātakam
c uvāca tarpayiṣye tvāṃ muhūrtaṃ pratipālaya
a ity uktvā śuṣkaparṇaiḥ sa saṃprajvālya hutāśanam
c harṣeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ kapotaḥ punar abravīt
a devānāṃ ca munīnāṃ ca pitṝṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
c śrutapūrvo mayā dharmo mahān atithipūjane
a kuruṣvānugrahaṃ me 'dya satyam etad bravīmi te
c niścitā khalu me buddhir atithipratipūjane
a tataḥ satyapratijño vai sa pakṣī prahasann iva
c tam agniṃ triḥ parikramya praviveśa mahīpate
a agnimadhyaṃ praviṣṭaṃ taṃ lubdho dṛṣṭvātha pakṣiṇam
c cintayām āsa manasā kim idaṃ nu kṛtaṃ mayā
a aho mama nṛśaṃsasya garhitasya svakarmaṇā
c adharmaḥ sumahān ghoro bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
a evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ bhūri vilalāpa sa lubdhakaḥ
c garhayan svāni karmāṇi dvijaṃ dṛṣṭvā tathāgatam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tatas taṃ lubdhakaḥ paśyan kṛpayābhipariplutaḥ
c kapotam agnau patitaṃ vākyaṃ punar uvāca ha
a kim īdṛśaṃ nṛśaṃsena mayā kṛtam abuddhinā
c bhaviṣyati hi me nityaṃ pātakaṃ hṛdi jīvataḥ
a sa vinindann athātmānaṃ punaḥ punar uvāca ha
c dhiṅ mām astu sudurbuddhiṃ sadā nikṛtiniścayam
e śubhaṃ karma parityajya yo 'haṃ śakunilubdhakaḥ
a nṛśaṃsasya mamādyāyaṃ pratyādeśo na saṃśayaḥ
c dattaḥ svamāṃsaṃ dadatā kapotena mahātmanā
a so 'haṃ tyakṣye priyān prāṇān putradāraṃ visṛjya ca
c upadiṣṭo hi me dharmaḥ kapotenātidharmiṇā
a adya prabhṛti dehaṃ svaṃ sarvabhogair vivarjitam
c yathā svalpaṃ jalaṃ grīṣme śoṣayiṣyāmy ahaṃ tathā
a kṣutpipāsātapasahaḥ kṛśo dhamanisaṃtataḥ
c upavāsair bahuvidhaiś cariṣye pāralaukikam
a aho dehapradānena darśitātithipūjanā
c tasmād dharmaṃ cariṣyāmi dharmo hi paramā gatiḥ
e dṛṣṭo hi dharmo dharmiṣṭhair yādṛśo vihagottame
a evam uktvā viniścitya raudrakarmā sa lubdhakaḥ
c mahāprasthānam āśritya prayayau saṃśitavrataḥ
a tato yaṣṭiṃ śalākāś ca kṣārakaṃ pañjaraṃ tathā
c tāṃś ca baddhā kapotān sa saṃpramucyotsasarja ha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato gate śākunike kapotī prāha duḥkhitā
c saṃsmṛtya bhartāram atho rudatī śokamūrchitā
a nāhaṃ te vipriyaṃ kānta kadā cid api saṃsmare
c sarvā vai vidhavā nārī bahuputrāpi khecara
e śocyā bhavati bandhūnāṃ patihīnā manasvinī
a lālitāhaṃ tvayā nityaṃ bahumānāc ca sāntvitā
c vacanair madhuraiḥ snigdhair asakṛt sumanoharaiḥ
a kandareṣu ca śailānāṃ nadīnāṃ nirjhareṣu ca
c drumāgreṣu ca ramyeṣu ramitāhaṃ tvayā priya
a ākāśagamane caiva sukhitāhaṃ tvayā sukham
c vihṛtāsmi tvayā kānta tan me nādyāsti kiṃ cana
a mitaṃ dadāti hi pitā mitaṃ mātā mitaṃ sutaḥ
c amitasya tu dātāraṃ bhartāraṃ kā na pūjayet
a nāsti bhartṛsamo nātho na ca bhartṛsamaṃ sukham
c visṛjya dhanasarvasvaṃ bhartā vai śaraṇaṃ striyāḥ
a na kāryam iha me nātha jīvitena tvayā vinā
c patihīnāpi kā nārī satī jīvitum utsahet
a evaṃ vilapya bahudhā karuṇaṃ sā suduḥkhitā
c pativratā saṃpradīptaṃ praviveśa hutāśanam
a tataś citrāmbaradharaṃ bhartāraṃ sānvapaśyata
c vimānasthaṃ sukṛtibhiḥ pūjyamānaṃ mahātmabhiḥ
a citramālyāmbaradharaṃ sarvābharaṇabhūṣitam
c vimānaśatakoṭībhir āvṛtaṃ puṇyakīrtibhiḥ
d kapoto 'pi ca tāṃ dṛṣṭvā kapotīṃ ca surūpiṇīm
d harṣeṇa mahatā yuktaḥ pariṣvajyedam abravīt
d aho mām anugacchantyā kṛtaṃ sādhu śubhaṃ tvayā
d kṣaṇamātreṇa duḥkhena sukhaṃ tena samārjitam
d tisraḥ koṭyardhakoṭī ca yāni lomāni mānave
d tāvat kālaṃ vaset svarge bhartāraṃ yānugacchati
d vyālagrāhī yathā vyālaṃ bilād uddharate balāt
d tadvad bhartāram uddhṛtya tenaiva saha modate
a tataḥ svargagataḥ pakṣī bhāryayā saha saṃgataḥ
c karmaṇā pūjitas tena reme tatra sa bhāryayā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vimānasthau tu tau rājaṃl lubdhako vai dadarśa ha
c dṛṣṭvā tau daṃpatī duḥkhād acintayata sadgatim
a kīdṛśeneha tapasā gaccheyaṃ paramāṃ gatim
c iti buddhyā viniścitya gamanāyopacakrame
a mahāprasthānam āśritya lubdhakaḥ pakṣijīvanaḥ
c niśceṣṭo mārutāhāro nirmamaḥ svargakāṅkṣayā
a tato 'paśyat suvistīrṇaṃ hṛdyaṃ padmavibhūṣitam
c nānādvijagaṇākīrṇaṃ saraḥ śītajalaṃ śubham
e pipāsārto 'pi tad dṛṣṭvā tṛptaḥ syān nātra saṃśayaḥ
a upavāsakṛśo 'tyarthaṃ sa tu pārthiva lubdhakaḥ
c upasarpata saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śvāpadādhyuṣitaṃ vanam
a mahāntaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā lubdhakaḥ praviveśa ha
c praviśann eva ca vanaṃ nigṛhītaḥ sa kaṇṭakaiḥ
a sa kaṇṭakavibhugnāṅgo lohitārdrīkṛtacchaviḥ
c babhrāma tasmin vijane nānāmṛgasamākule
a tato drumāṇāṃ mahatāṃ pavanena vane tadā
c udatiṣṭhata saṃgharṣāt sumahān havyavāhanaḥ
a tad vanaṃ vṛkṣasaṃkīrṇaṃ latāviṭapasaṃkulam
c dadāha pāvakaḥ kruddho yugāntāgnisamaprabhaḥ
a sajvālaiḥ pavanoddhūtair visphuliṅgaiḥ samanvitaḥ
c dadāha tad vanaṃ ghoraṃ mṛgapakṣisamākulam
a tataḥ sa dehamokṣārthaṃ saṃprahṛṣṭena cetasā
c abhyadhāvata saṃvṛddhaṃ pāvakaṃ lubdhakas tadā
a tatas tenāgninā dagdho lubdhako naṣṭakilbiṣaḥ
c jagāma paramāṃ siddhiṃ tadā bharatasattama
a tataḥ svargastham ātmānaṃ so 'paśyad vigatajvaraḥ
c yakṣagandharvasiddhānāṃ madhye bhrājantam indravat
a evaṃ khalu kapotaś ca kapotī ca pativratā
c lubdhakena saha svargaṃ gatāḥ puṇyena karmaṇā
a yāpi caivaṃvidhā nārī bhartāram anuvartate
c virājate hi sā kṣipraṃ kapotīva divi sthitā
a evam etat purā vṛttaṃ lubdhakasya mahātmanaḥ
c kapotasya ca dharmiṣṭhā gatiḥ puṇyena karmaṇā
a yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yaś cedaṃ parikīrtayet
c nāśubhaṃ vidyate tasya manasāpi pramādyataḥ
a yudhiṣṭhira mahān eṣa dharmo dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
c goghneṣv api bhaved asmin niṣkṛtiḥ pāpakarmaṇaḥ
e niṣkṛtir na bhavet tasmin yo hanyāc charaṇāgatam
f itihāsam imaṃ putra śrutvā pāpavināśanam
f na durgatim avāpnoti svargalokaṃ ca gacchati
f ārtā gṛhāgatāḥ pūjyās tathaiva śaraṇāgatāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a abuddhipūrvaṃ yaḥ pāpaṃ kuryād bharatasattama
c mucyate sa kathaṃ tasmād enasas tad vadasva me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te varṇayiṣye 'ham itihāsaṃ purātanam
c indrotaḥ śaunako vipro yad āha janamejayam
a āsīd rājā mahāvīryaḥ pārikṣij janamejayaḥ
c abuddhipūrvaṃ brahmahatyā tam āgacchan mahīpatim
a taṃ brāhmaṇāḥ sarva eva tatyajuḥ sapurohitāḥ
c jagāma sa vanaṃ rājā dahyamāno divāniśam
a sa prajābhiḥ parityaktaś cakāra kuśalaṃ mahat
c ativelaṃ tapas tepe dahyamānaḥ sa manyunā
d brahmahatyāpanodārtham apṛcchad brāhmaṇān bahūn
d paryaṭan pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ deśe deśe narādhipaḥ
a tatretihāsaṃ vakṣyāmi dharmasyāsyopabṛṃhaṇam
c dahyamānaḥ pāpakṛtyā jagāma janamejayaḥ
a variṣyamāṇa indrotaṃ śaunakaṃ saṃśitavratam
c samāsādyopajagrāha pādayoḥ paripīḍayan
a tato bhīto mahāprājño jagarhe subhṛśaṃ tadā
c kartā pāpasya mahato bhrūṇahā kim ihāgataḥ
a kiṃ tavāsmāsu kartavyaṃ mā mā sprākṣīḥ kathaṃ cana
c gaccha gaccha na te sthānaṃ prīṇāty asmān iha dhruvam
a rudhirasyeva te gandhaḥ śavasyeva ca darśanam
c aśivaḥ śivasaṃkāśo mṛto jīvann ivāṭasi
a antarmṛtyur aśuddhātmā pāpam evānucintayan
c prabudhyase prasvapiṣi vartase carase sukhī
a moghaṃ te jīvitaṃ rājan parikliṣṭaṃ ca jīvasi
c pāpāyeva ca sṛṣṭo 'si karmaṇe ha yavīyase
a bahu kalyāṇam icchanta īhante pitaraḥ sutān
c tapasā devatejyābhir vandanena titikṣayā
a pitṛvaṃśam imaṃ paśya tvatkṛte narakaṃ gatam
c nirarthāḥ sarva evaiṣām āśābandhās tvadāśrayāḥ
a yān pūjayanto vindanti svargam āyur yaśaḥ sukham
c teṣu te satataṃ dveṣo brāhmaṇeṣu nirarthakaḥ
a imaṃ lokaṃ vimucya tvam avāṅmūrdhā patiṣyasi
c aśāśvatīḥ śāśvatīś ca samāḥ pāpena karmaṇā
a adyamāno jantugṛdhraiḥ śitikaṇṭhair ayomukhaiḥ
c tato 'pi punar āvṛttaḥ pāpayoniṃ gamiṣyasi
a yad idaṃ manyase rājan nāyam asti paraḥ kutaḥ
c pratismārayitāras tvāṃ yamadūtā yamakṣaye
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktaḥ pratyuvāca taṃ muniṃ janamejayaḥ
c garhyaṃ bhavān garhayati nindyaṃ nindati mā bhavān
a dhikkāryaṃ mā dhikkurute tasmāt tvāhaṃ prasādaye
c sarvaṃ hīdaṃ svakṛtaṃ me jvalāmy agnāv ivāhitaḥ
a svakarmāṇy abhisaṃdhāya nābhinandati me manaḥ
c prāptaṃ nūnaṃ mayā ghoraṃ bhayaṃ vaivasvatād api
a tat tu śalyam anirhṛtya kathaṃ śakṣyāmi jīvitum
c sarvamanyūn vinīya tvam abhi mā vada śaunaka
a mahānasaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ bhaviṣyāmy arthavān punaḥ
c astu śeṣaṃ kulasyāsya mā parābhūd idaṃ kulam
a na hi no brahmaśaptānāṃ śeṣo bhavitum arhati
c śrutīr alabhamānānāṃ saṃvidaṃ vedaniścayāt
a nirvidyamānaḥ subhṛśaṃ bhūyo vakṣyāmi sāṃpratam
c bhūyaś caivābhinaṅkṣanti nirdharmā nirjapā iva
a arvāk ca pratitiṣṭhanti pulindaśabarā iva
c na hy ayajñā amuṃ lokaṃ prāpnuvanti kathaṃ cana
a avijñāyaiva me prajñāṃ bālasyeva supaṇḍitaḥ
c brahman piteva putrebhyaḥ prati māṃ vāñcha śaunaka
 śaunaka uvāca
a kim āścaryaṃ yataḥ prājño bahu kuryād dhi sāṃpratam
c iti vai paṇḍito bhūtvā bhūtānāṃ nopatapyati
a prajñāprāsādam āruhya aśocyaḥ śocate janān
c jagatīsthān ivādristhaḥ prajñayā pratipaśyati
a na copalabhate tatra na ca kāryāṇi paśyati
c nirviṇṇātmā parokṣo vā dhikkṛtaḥ sarvasādhuṣu
a viditvobhayato vīryaṃ māhātmyaṃ veda āgame
c kuruṣveha mahāśāntiṃ brahmā śaraṇam astu te
a tad vai pāratrikaṃ cāru brāhmaṇānām akupyatām
c atha cet tapyase pāpair dharmaṃ ced anupaśyasi
 janamejaya uvāca
a anutapye ca pāpena na cādharmaṃ carāmy aham
c bubhūṣuṃ bhajamānaṃ ca prativāñchāmi śaunaka
 śaunaka uvāca
a chittvā stambhaṃ ca mānaṃ ca prītim icchāmi te nṛpa
c sarvabhūtahite tiṣṭha dharmaṃ caiva pratismara
a na bhayān na ca kārpaṇyān na lobhāt tvām upāhvaye
c tāṃ me devā giraṃ satyāṃ śṛṇvantu brāhmaṇaiḥ saha
a so 'haṃ na kena cic cārthī tvāṃ ca dharmam upāhvaye
c krośatāṃ sarvabhūtānām aho dhig iti kurvatām
a vakṣyanti mām adharmajñā vakṣyanty asuhṛdo janāḥ
c vācas tāḥ suhṛdaḥ śrutvā saṃjvariṣyanti me bhṛśam
a ke cid eva mahāprājñāḥ parijñāsyanti kāryatām
c jānīhi me kṛtaṃ tāta brāhmaṇān prati bhārata
a yathā te matkṛte kṣemaṃ labheraṃs tat tathā kuru
c pratijānīhi cādrohaṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ narādhipa
 janamejaya uvāca
a naiva vācā na manasā na punar jātu karmaṇā
c drogdhāsmi brāhmaṇān vipra caraṇāv eva te spṛśe
 śaunaka uvāca
a tasmāt te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi dharmam āvṛttacetase
c śrīmān mahābalas tuṣṭo yas tvaṃ dharmam avekṣase
e purastād dāruṇo bhūtvā sucitrataram eva tat
a anugṛhṇanti bhūtāni svena vṛttena pārthiva
c kṛtsne nūnaṃ sadasatī iti loko vyavasyati
e yatra tvaṃ tādṛśo bhūtvā dharmam adyānupaśyasi
a hitvā suruciraṃ bhakṣyaṃ bhogāṃś ca tapa āsthitaḥ
c ity etad api bhūtānām adbhutaṃ janamejaya
a yo durbalo bhaved dātā kṛpaṇo vā tapodhanaḥ
c anāścaryaṃ tad ity āhur nātidūre hi vartate
a etad eva hi kārpaṇyaṃ samagram asamīkṣitam
c tasmāt samīkṣayaiva syād bhavet tasmiṃs tato guṇaḥ
a yajño dānaṃ dayā vedāḥ satyaṃ ca pṛthivīpate
c pañcaitāni pavitrāṇi ṣaṣṭhaṃ sucaritaṃ tapaḥ
a tad eva rājñāṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ janamejaya
c tena samyag gṛhītena śreyāṃsaṃ dharmam āpsyasi
a puṇyadeśābhigamanaṃ pavitraṃ paramaṃ smṛtam
c api hy udāharantīmā gāthā gītā yayātinā
a yo martyaḥ pratipadyeta āyur jīveta vā punaḥ
c yajñam ekāntataḥ kṛtvā tat saṃnyasya tapaś caret
a puṇyam āhuḥ kurukṣetraṃ sarasvatyāṃ pṛthūdakam
a   kurukṣetrāt sarasvatīm
a sarasvatyāś ca tīrthāni
c yatrāvagāhya pītvā vā naivaṃ śvomaraṇaṃ tapet
a mahāsaraḥ puṣkarāṇi prabhāsottaramānase
c kālodaṃ tv eva gantāsi labdhāyur jīvite punaḥ
a sarasvatīdṛṣadvatyau sevamāno 'nusaṃcareḥ
c svādhyāyaśīlaḥ sthāneṣu sarveṣu samupaspṛśeḥ
a tyāgadharmaṃ pavitrāṇāṃ saṃnyāsaṃ param abravīt
c atrāpy udāharantīmā gāthāḥ satyavatā kṛtāḥ
a yathā kumāraḥ satyo vai na puṇyo na ca pāpakṛt
c na hy asti sarvabhūteṣu duḥkham asmin kutaḥ sukham
a evaṃ prakṛtibhūtānāṃ sarvasaṃsargayāyinām
c tyajatāṃ jīvitaṃ prāyo vivṛte puṇyapātake
a yat tv eva rājño jyāyo vai kāryāṇāṃ tad vadāmi te
c balena saṃvibhāgaiś ca jaya svargaṃ punīṣva ca
a yasyaivaṃ balam ojaś ca sa dharmasya prabhur naraḥ
c brāhmaṇānāṃ sukhārthaṃ tvaṃ paryehi pṛthivīm imām
a yathaivainān purākṣaipsīs tathaivainān prasādaya
c api dhikkriyamāṇo 'pi tyajyamāno 'py anekadhā
a ātmano darśanaṃ vidvan nāhantāsmīti mā krudhaḥ
c ghaṭamānaḥ svakāryeṣu kuru naiḥśreyasaṃ param
a himāgnighorasadṛśo rājā bhavati kaś cana
c lāṅgalāśanikalpo vā bhavaty anyaḥ paraṃtapa
a na niḥśeṣeṇa mantavyam acikitsyena vā punaḥ
c na jātu nāham asmīti prasaktavyam asādhuṣu
a vikarmaṇā tapyamānaḥ pādāt pāpasya mucyate
c naitat kāryaṃ punar iti dvitīyāt parimucyate
e cariṣye dharmam eveti tṛtīyāt parimucyate
f śucis tīrthāny anucaraṃś caturthāt parimucyate
a kalyāṇam anumantavyaṃ puruṣeṇa bubhūṣatā
c ye sugandhīni sevante tathāgandhā bhavanti te
e ye durgandhīni sevante tathāgandhā bhavanti te
a tapaścaryāparaḥ sadyaḥ pāpād dhi parimucyate
c saṃvatsaram upāsyāgnim abhiśastaḥ pramucyate
e trīṇi varṣāṇy upāsyāgniṃ bhrūṇahā vipramucyate
f abhyetya yojanaśataṃ bhrūṇahā vipramucyate
a yāvataḥ prāṇino hanyāt tajjātīyān svabhāvataḥ
c pramīyamāṇān unmocya bhrūṇahā vipramucyate
a api vāpsu nimajjeta trir japann aghamarṣaṇam
c yathāśvamedhāvabhṛthas tathā tan manur abravīt
a kṣipraṃ praṇudate pāpaṃ satkāraṃ labhate tathā
c api cainaṃ prasīdanti bhūtāni jaḍamūkavat
a bṛhaspatiṃ devaguruṃ surāsurāḥ
sametya sarve nṛpate 'nvayuñjan
c dharme phalaṃ vettha kṛte maharṣe
tathetarasmin narake pāpaloke
a ubhe tu yasya sukṛte bhavetāṃ
kiṃ svit tayos tatra jayottaraṃ syāt
c ācakṣva naḥ karmaphalaṃ maharṣe
kathaṃ pāpaṃ nudate puṇyaśīlaḥ
 bṛhaspatir uvāca
a kṛtvā pāpaṃ pūrvam abuddhipūrvaṃ
puṇyāni yaḥ kurute buddhipūrvam
c sa tat pāpaṃ nudate puṇyaśīlo
vāso yathā malinaṃ kṣārayuktyā
a pāpaṃ kṛtvā na manyeta nāham asmīti pūruṣaḥ
c cikīrṣed eva kalyāṇaṃ śraddadhāno 'nasūyakaḥ
a chidrāṇi vasanasyeva sādhunā vivṛṇoti yaḥ
c yaḥ pāpaṃ puruṣaḥ kṛtvā kalyāṇam abhipadyate
a yathādityaḥ punar udyaṃs tamaḥ sarvaṃ vyapohati
c kalyāṇam ācarann evaṃ sarvaṃ pāpaṃ vyapohati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktvā sa rājānam indroto janamejayam
c yājayām āsa vidhivad vājimedhena śaunakaḥ
a tataḥ sa rājā vyapanītakalmaṣaḥ
śriyā yutaḥ prajvalitāgnirūpayā
c viveśa rājyaṃ svam amitrakarśano
divaṃ yathā pūrṇavapur niśākaraḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
 kaccit pitāmahenāsīc chrutaṃ vā dṛṣṭam eva vā
 kaccin martyo mṛto rājan punar ujjīvito bhavet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
 yad eva śrūyate rājann abhiyogam anujjhatām
 kadāpy aghaṭamāno 'pi ghaṭetārtho mahān api
 tad etaṃ saṃśayaṃ chindhi mahāntaṃ hy api me sthitam
 ṛte pitāmahād bhīṣmāc chettā naivāsya vidyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇu pārtha yathāvṛttam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c gṛdhrajambukasaṃvādaṃ yo vṛtto vaidiśe purā
d kasya cid brāhmaṇasyāsīd duḥkhalabdhaḥ suto mṛtaḥ
d bāla eva viśālākṣo bālagrahanipīḍitaḥ
a duḥkhitāḥ ke cid ādāya bālam aprāptayauvanam
c kulasarvasvabhūtaṃ vai rudantaḥ śokavihvalāḥ
a bālaṃ mṛtaṃ gṛhītvātha śmaśānābhimukhāḥ sthitāḥ
c aṅkenāṅkaṃ ca saṃkramya rurudur bhūtale tadā
d śocantas tasya pūrvoktān bhāṣitāṃś cāsakṛt punaḥ
d taṃ bālaṃ bhūtale kṣipya pratigantuṃ na śaknuyuḥ
a teṣāṃ ruditaśabdena gṛdhro 'bhyetya vaco 'bravīt
c ekātmakam imaṃ loke tyaktvā gacchata māciram
a iha puṃsāṃ sahasrāṇi strīsahasrāṇi caiva hi
c samānītāni kālena kiṃ te vai jātv abāndhavāḥ
a saṃpaśyata jagat sarvaṃ sukhaduḥkhair adhiṣṭhitam
c saṃyogo viprayogaś ca paryāyeṇopalabhyate
a gṛhītvā ye ca gacchanti ye 'nuyānti ca tān mṛtān
c te 'py āyuṣaḥ pramāṇena svena gacchanti jantavaḥ
a alaṃ sthitvā śmaśāne 'smin gṛdhragomāyusaṃkule
c kaṅkālabahule ghore sarvaprāṇibhayaṃkare
a na punar jīvitaḥ kaś cit kāladharmam upāgataḥ
c priyo vā yadi vā dveṣyaḥ prāṇināṃ gatir īdṛśī
a sarveṇa khalu martavyaṃ martyaloke prasūyatā
c kṛtāntavihite mārge ko mṛtaṃ jīvayiṣyati
a karmāntavihite loke cāstaṃ gacchati bhāskare
c gamyatāṃ svam adhiṣṭhānaṃ sutasnehaṃ visṛjya vai
a tato gṛdhravacaḥ śrutvā vikrośantas tadā nṛpa
c bāndhavās te 'bhyagacchanta putram utsṛjya bhūtale
d niścitārthāś ca te sarve gamanaṃ prati bhārata
a viniścityātha ca tataḥ saṃtyajantaḥ svam ātmajam
a   vikrośantas tatas tataḥ
a mṛtam ity eva gacchanto nirāśās tasya darśane
a nivartane kṛtadhiyaḥ
c nirāśā jīvite tasya mārgam āruhya dhiṣṭhitāḥ
a dhvāṅkṣābhrasamavarṇas tu bilān niḥsṛtya jambukaḥ
c gacchamānān sma tān āha nirghṛṇāḥ khalu mānavāḥ
a ādityo 'yaṃ sthito mūḍhāḥ snehaṃ kuruta mā bhayam
c bahurūpo muhūrtaś ca jīvetāpi kadā cana
a yūyaṃ bhūmau vinikṣipya putrasnehavinākṛtāḥ
c śmaśāne putram utsṛjya kasmād gacchatha nirghṛṇāḥ
a na vo 'sty asmin sute sneho bāle madhurabhāṣiṇi
c yasya bhāṣitamātreṇa prasādam upagacchatha
a na paśyatha sutasnehaṃ yādṛśaḥ paśupakṣiṇām
c na yeṣāṃ dhārayitvā tān kaś cid asti phalāgamaḥ
a catuṣpāt pakṣikīṭānāṃ prāṇināṃ snehasaṅginām
c paralokagatisthānāṃ muniyajñakriyā iva
a teṣāṃ putrābhirāmāṇām iha loke paratra ca
c na guṇo dṛśyate kaś cit prajāḥ saṃdhārayanti ca
a apaśyatāṃ priyān putrān naiṣāṃ śoko 'nutiṣṭhati
c na ca puṣṇanti saṃvṛddhās te mātāpitarau kva cit
a mānuṣāṇāṃ kutaḥ sneho yeṣāṃ śoko bhaviṣyati
c imaṃ kulakaraṃ putraṃ kathaṃ tyaktvā gamiṣyatha
a ciraṃ muñcata bāṣpaṃ ca ciraṃ snehena paśyata
c evaṃvidhāni hīṣṭāni dustyajāni viśeṣataḥ
a kṣīṇasyāthābhiyuktasya śmaśānābhimukhasya ca
c bāndhavā yatra tiṣṭhanti tatrānyo nāvatiṣṭhate
a sarvasya dayitāḥ prāṇāḥ sarvaḥ snehaṃ ca vindati
c tiryagyoniṣv api satāṃ snehaṃ paśyata yādṛśam
a tyaktvā kathaṃ gacchethemaṃ padmalolāyatākṣakam
c yathā navodvāhakṛtaṃ snānamālyavibhūṣitam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a jambukasya vacaḥ śrutvā kṛpaṇaṃ paridevataḥ
c nyavartanta tadā sarve śavārthaṃ te sma mānuṣāḥ
 gṛdhra uvāca
a aho dhik sunṛśaṃsena jambukenālpamedhasā
c kṣudreṇoktā hīnasattvā mānuṣāḥ kiṃ nivartatha
a pañcabhūtaparityaktaṃ śūnyaṃ kāṣṭhatvam āgatam
c kasmāc chocatha niśceṣṭam ātmānaṃ kiṃ na śocatha
a tapaḥ kuruta vai tīvraṃ mucyadhvaṃ yena kilbiṣāt
c tapasā labhyate sarvaṃ vilāpaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
a aniṣṭāni ca bhāgyāni jānīta saha mūrtibhiḥ
c yena gacchati loko 'yaṃ dattvā śokam anantakam
a dhanaṃ gāś ca suvarṇaṃ ca maṇiratnam athāpi ca
c apatyaṃ ca tapomūlaṃ tapoyogāc ca labhyate
a yathākṛtā ca bhūteṣu prāpyate sukhaduḥkhatā
c gṛhītvā jāyate jantur duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
a na karmaṇā pituḥ putraḥ pitā vā putrakarmaṇā
c mārgeṇānyena gacchanti tyaktvā sukṛtaduṣkṛte
a dharmaṃ carata yatnena tathādharmān nivartata
c vartadhvaṃ ca yathākālaṃ daivateṣu dvijeṣu ca
a śokaṃ tyajata dainyaṃ ca sutasnehān nivartata
c tyajyatām ayam ākāśe tataḥ śīghraṃ nivartata
a yat karoti śubhaṃ karma tathādharmaṃ sudāruṇam
c tat kartaiva samaśnāti bāndhavānāṃ kim atra hi
a iha tyaktvā na tiṣṭhanti bāndhavā bāndhavaṃ priyam
c sneham utsṛjya gacchanti bāṣpapūrṇāvilekṣaṇāḥ
a prājño vā yadi vā mūrkhaḥ sadhano nirdhano 'pi vā
c sarvaḥ kālavaśaṃ yāti śubhāśubhasamanvitaḥ
a kiṃ kariṣyatha śocitvā mṛtaṃ kim anuśocatha
c sarvasya hi prabhuḥ kālo dharmataḥ samadarśanaḥ
a yauvanasthāṃś ca bālāṃś ca vṛddhān garbhagatān api
c sarvān āviśate mṛtyur evaṃbhūtam idaṃ jagat
 jambuka uvāca
a aho mandīkṛtaḥ sneho gṛdhreṇehālpamedhasā
c putrasnehābhibhūtānāṃ yuṣmākaṃ śocatāṃ bhṛśam
a samaiḥ samyak prayuktaiś ca vacanaiḥ praśrayottaraiḥ
b sarvam etat prapadyāśu kurutāṃ mā vicāraya
c yad gacchatha jalasthāyaṃ sneham utsṛjya dustyajam
a aho putraviyogena mṛtaśūnyopasevanāt
c krośatāṃ vai bhṛśaṃ duḥkhaṃ vivatsānāṃ gavām iva
a adya śokaṃ vijānāmi mānuṣāṇāṃ mahītale
c snehaṃ hi karuṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā mamāpy aśrūṇy athāgaman
a yatno hi satataṃ kāryaḥ kṛto daivena sidhyati
c daivaṃ puruṣakāraś ca kṛtāntenopapadyate
a anirvedaḥ sadā kāryo nirvedād dhi kutaḥ sukham
c prayatnāt prāpyate hy arthaḥ kasmād gacchatha nirdayāḥ
a ātmamāṃsopavṛttaṃ ca śarīrārdhamayīṃ tanum
c pitṝṇāṃ vaṃśakartāraṃ vane tyaktvā kva yāsyatha
a atha vāstaṃ gate sūrye saṃdhyākāla upasthite
c tato neṣyatha vā putram ihasthā vā bhaviṣyatha
d śrībhīṣmaḥ
d jambukasya vacaḥ śrutvā gṛdhro rājan yad abravīt
d tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tvam ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
 gṛdhra uvāca
a adya varṣasahasraṃ me sāgraṃ jātasya mānuṣāḥ
c na ca paśyāmi jīvantaṃ mṛtaṃ strīpuṃnapuṃsakam
a mṛtā garbheṣu jāyante mriyante jātamātrakāḥ
c vikramanto mriyante ca yauvanasthās tathāpare
a anityānīha bhāgyāni catuṣpāt pakṣiṇām api
c jaṅgamājaṅgamānāṃ cāpy āyur agre 'vatiṣṭhate
a iṣṭadāraviyuktāś ca putraśokānvitās tathā
c dahyamānāḥ sma śokena gṛhaṃ gacchanti nityadā
a aniṣṭānāṃ sahasrāṇi tatheṣṭānāṃ śatāni ca
c utsṛjyeha prayātā vai bāndhavā bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥ
a tyajyatām eṣa nistejāḥ śūnyaḥ kāṣṭhatvam āgataḥ
c anyadehaviṣakto hi śāvaṃ kāṣṭham upāsate
a bhrāntajīvasya vai bāṣpaṃ kasmād dhitvā na gacchatha
c nirarthako hy ayaṃ sneho nirarthaś ca parigrahaḥ
a na cakṣurbhyāṃ na karṇābhyāṃ saṃśṛṇoti samīkṣate
c tasmād enaṃ samutsṛjya svagṛhān gacchatāśu vai
a mokṣadharmāśritair vākyair hetumadbhir aniṣṭhuraiḥ
c mayoktā gacchata kṣipraṃ svaṃ svam eva niveśanam
a prajñāvijñānayuktena buddhisaṃjñāpradāyinā
c vacanaṃ śrāvitā rūkṣaṃ mānuṣāḥ saṃnivartata
d śoko dviguṇatāṃ yāti dṛṣṭvā smṛtvā ca ceṣṭitam
d ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā saṃnivṛttās tu mānuṣāḥ
d apaśyat taṃ tadā suptaṃ drutam āgatya jambukaḥ
d gṛdhrasya vacanaṃ śrutvā jambuko vākyam abravīt
 jambuka uvāca
a imaṃ kanakavarṇābhaṃ bhūṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtam
c gṛdhravākyāt kathaṃ putraṃ tyajadhvaṃ pitṛpiṇḍadam
a na snehasya virodho 'sti vilāparuditasya vai
c mṛtasyāsya parityāgāt tāpo vai bhavitā dhruvam
a śrūyate śambuke śūdre hate brāhmaṇadārakaḥ
c jīvito dharmam āsādya rāmāt satyaparākramāt
a tathā śvetasya rājarṣer bālo diṣṭāntam āgataḥ
c śvo 'bhūte dharmanityena mṛtaḥ saṃjīvitaḥ punaḥ
a tathā kaś cid bhavet siddho munir vā devatāpi vā
c kṛpaṇānām anukrośaṃ kuryād vo rudatām iha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktāḥ saṃnyavartanta śokārtāḥ putravatsalāḥ
c aṅke śiraḥ samādhāya rurudur bahuvistaram
d teṣāṃ ruditaśabdena gṛdhro 'bhyetya vaco 'bravīt
 gṛdhra uvāca
a aśrupātapariklinnaḥ pāṇisparśanapīḍitaḥ
c dharmarājaprayogāc ca dīrghāṃ nidrāṃ praveśitaḥ
a tapasāpi hi saṃyukto na kāle nopahanyate
c sarvasnehāvasānaṃ tad idaṃ tat pretapattanam
a bālavṛddhasahasrāṇi sadā saṃtyajya bāndhavāḥ
c dināni caiva rātrīś ca duḥkhaṃ tiṣṭhanti bhūtale
a alaṃ nirbandham āgamya śokasya parivāraṇam
c apratyayaṃ kuto hy asya punar adyeha jīvitam
a naiṣa jambukavākyena punaḥ prāpsyati jīvitam
c mṛtasyotsṛṣṭadehasya punar deho na vidyate
a na vai mūrtipradānena na jambukaśatair api
c śakyo jīvayituṃ hy eṣa bālo varṣaśatair api
a api rudraḥ kumāro vā brahmā vā viṣṇur eva vā
c varam asmai prayaccheyus tato jīved ayaṃ śiśuḥ
a na ca bāṣpavimokṣeṇa na cāśvāsakṛtena vai
c na dīrgharuditeneha punarjīvo bhaviṣyati
a ahaṃ ca kroṣṭukaś caiva yūyaṃ caivāsya bāndhavāḥ
c dharmādharmau gṛhītveha sarve vartāmahe 'dhvani
d yadi jīved ayaṃ bhūyo yāvad evaṃ karomy aham
a apriyaṃ paruṣaṃ cāpi paradrohaṃ parastriyam
c adharmam anṛtaṃ caiva dūrāt prājño nivartayet
a satyaṃ dharmaṃ śubhaṃ nyāyyaṃ prāṇināṃ mahatīṃ dayām
c ajihmatvam aśāṭhyaṃ ca yatnataḥ parimārgata
a mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva bāndhavān suhṛdas tathā
c jīvato ye na paśyanti teṣāṃ dharmaviparyayaḥ
a yo na paśyati cakṣurbhyāṃ neṅgate ca kathaṃ cana
c tasya niṣṭhāvasānānte rudantaḥ kiṃ kariṣyatha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktās taṃ sutaṃ tyaktvā bhūmau śokapariplutāḥ
c dahyamānāḥ sutasnehāt prayayur bāndhavā gṛhān
 jambuka uvāca
a dāruṇo martyaloko 'yaṃ sarvaprāṇivināśanaḥ
c iṣṭabandhuviyogaś ca tathaivālpaṃ ca jīvitam
a bahv alīkam asatyaṃ ca prativādāpriyaṃvadam
c imaṃ prekṣya punarbhāvaṃ duḥkhaśokābhivardhanam
a na me mānuṣaloko 'yaṃ muhūrtam api rocate
c aho dhig gṛdhravākyena saṃnivartatha mānuṣāḥ
a pradīptāḥ putraśokena yathaivābuddhayas tathā
c kathaṃ gacchatha sasnehāḥ sutasnehaṃ visṛjya ca
e śrutvā gṛdhrasya vacanaṃ pāpasyehākṛtātmanaḥ
a sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasyānantaraṃ sukham
c sukhaduḥkhānvite loke nehāsty ekam anantakam
a imaṃ kṣititale nyasya bālaṃ rūpasamanvitam
c kulaśokākaraṃ mūḍhāḥ putraṃ tyaktvā kva yāsyatha
a rūpayauvanasaṃpannaṃ dyotamānam iva śriyā
c jīvantam enaṃ paśyāmi manasā nātra saṃśayaḥ
a vināśaś cāpy anarho 'sya sukhaṃ prāpsyatha mānuṣāḥ
c putraśokāgnidagdhānāṃ mṛtam apy adya vaḥ kṣamam
a duḥkhasaṃbhāvanāṃ kṛtvā dhārayitvā svayaṃ sukham
c tyaktvā gamiṣyatha kvādya samutsṛjyālpabuddhivat
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tathā dharmavirodhena priyamithyābhidhyāyinā
c śmaśānavāsinā nityaṃ rātriṃ mṛgayatā tadā
a tato madhyasthatāṃ nītā vacanair amṛtopamaiḥ
c jambukena svakāryārthaṃ bāndhavās tasya dhiṣṭhitāḥ
 gṛdhra uvāca
a ayaṃ pretasamākīrṇo yakṣarākṣasasevitaḥ
c dāruṇaḥ kānanoddeśaḥ kauśikair abhināditaḥ
a bhīmaḥ sughoraś ca tathā nīlameghasamaprabhaḥ
c asmiñ śavaṃ parityajya pretakāryāṇy upāsata
a bhānur yāvan na yāty astaṃ yāvac ca vimalā diśaḥ
c tāvad enaṃ parityajya pretakāryāṇy upāsata
a nadanti paruṣaṃ śyenāḥ śivāḥ krośanti dāruṇāḥ
c mṛgendrāḥ pratinandanti ravir astaṃ ca gacchati
a citādhūmena nīlena saṃrajyante ca pādapāḥ
c śmaśāne ca nirāhārāḥ pratinandanti dehinaḥ
a sarve vikrāntavīryāś ca asmin deśe sudāruṇāḥ
c yuṣmān pradharṣayiṣyanti vikṛtā māṃsabhojanāḥ
a dūrāc cāyaṃ vanoddeśo bhayam atra bhaviṣyati
c tyajyatāṃ kāṣṭhabhūto 'yaṃ mṛṣyatāṃ jāmbukaṃ vacaḥ
a yadi jambukavākyāni niṣphalāny anṛtāni ca
