c śroṣyatha bhraṣṭavijñānās tataḥ sarve vinaṅkṣyatha
 jambuka uvāca
a sthīyatāṃ neha bhetavyaṃ yāvat tapati bhāskaraḥ
c tāvad asmin sutasnehād anirvedena vartata
dA taskarāṇāṃ virāṭānāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ caiva mānuṣāḥ
dA bhayaṃ nāsmin vanoddeśe tathaiva hatabuddhinām
a svairaṃ rudata visrabdhāḥ svairaṃ snehena paśyata
b dāruṇe 'smin vanoddeśe bhayaṃ vo na bhaviṣyati
b ayaṃ saumyo vanoddeśaḥ pitṝṇāṃ nidhanākaraḥ
c sthīyatāṃ yāvad ādityaḥ kiṃ vaḥ kravyādabhāṣitaiḥ
a yadi gṛdhrasya vākyāni tīvrāṇi rabhasāni ca
c gṛhṇīta mohitātmānaḥ suto vo na bhaviṣyati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a gṛdhro 'nastamite tv āha gate 'stam iti jambukaḥ
c mṛtasya taṃ parijanam ūcatus tau kṣudhānvitau
a svakāryadakṣiṇau rājan gṛdhro jambuka eva ca
c kṣutpipāsāpariśrāntau śāstram ālambya jalpataḥ
a tayor vijñānaviduṣor dvayor jambukapatriṇoḥ
c vākyair amṛtakalpair hi prātiṣṭhanta vrajanti ca
a śokadainyasamāviṣṭā rudantas tasthire tadā
c svakāryakuśalābhyāṃ te saṃbhrāmyante ha naipuṇāt
a tathā tayor vivadator vijñānaviduṣor dvayoḥ
c bāndhavānāṃ sthitānāṃ ca upātiṣṭhata śaṃkaraḥ
d devyā praṇodito devaḥ kāruṇyārdrīkṛtekṣaṇaḥ
a tatas tān āha manujān varado 'smīti śūlabhṛt
c te pratyūcur idaṃ vākyaṃ duḥkhitāḥ praṇatāḥ sthitāḥ
a ekaputravihīnānāṃ sarveṣāṃ jīvitārthinām
c putrasya no jīvadānāj jīvitaṃ dātum arhasi
a evam uktaḥ sa bhagavān vāripūrṇena pāṇinā
c jīvaṃ tasmai kumārāya prādād varṣaśatāya vai
a tathā gomāyugṛdhrābhyām adadat kṣudvināśanam
c varaṃ pinākī bhagavān sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
a tataḥ praṇamya taṃ devaṃ śreyoharṣasamanvitāḥ
c kṛtakṛtyāḥ sukhaṃ hṛṣṭāḥ prātiṣṭhanta tadā vibho
a anirvedena dīrgheṇa niścayena dhruveṇa ca
c devadevaprasādāc ca kṣipraṃ phalam avāpyate
a paśya devasya saṃyogaṃ bāndhavānāṃ ca niścayam
c kṛpaṇānāṃ hi rudatāṃ kṛtam aśrupramārjanam
a paśya cālpena kālena niścayānveṣaṇena ca
c prasādaṃ śaṃkarāt prāpya duḥkhitāḥ sukham āpnuvan
a te vismitāḥ prahṛṣṭāś ca putrasaṃjīvanāt punaḥ
c babhūvur bharataśreṣṭha prasādāc chaṃkarasya vai
a tatas te tvaritā rājañ śrutvā śokam aghodbhavam
c viviśuḥ putram ādāya nagaraṃ hṛṣṭamānasāḥ
e eṣā buddhiḥ samastānāṃ cāturvarṇye nidarśitā
a dharmārthamokṣasaṃyuktam itihāsam imaṃ śubham
c śrutvā manuṣyaḥ satatam iha pretya ca modate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
 balinaḥ pratyamitrasya nityam āsannavartinaḥ
 upakārāpakārābhyāṃ samarthasyodyatasya ca
 mohād vikatthanāmātrair asāro 'lpabalo laghuḥ
 vāgbhir apratirūpābhir abhidruhya pitāmaha
 ātmano balam āsthāya kathaṃ varteta mānavaḥ
 āgacchato 'tikruddhasya tasyoddharaṇakāmyayā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c saṃvādaṃ bharataśreṣṭha śalmaleḥ pavanasya ca
a himavantaṃ samāsādya mahān āsīd vanaspatiḥ
c varṣapūgābhisaṃvṛddhaḥ śākhāskandhapalāśavān
a tatra sma mattā mātaṅgā dharmārtāḥ śramakarśitāḥ
b yā varāhamṛgaśārdūlapatatrigaṇasaṃkulāḥ
c viśramanti mahābāho tathānyā mṛgajātayaḥ
a nalvamātraparīṇāho ghanacchāyo vanaspatiḥ
c śukaśārikasaṃghuṣṭaḥ phalavān puṣpavān api
d taṃ kadā cin munir dṛṣṭvā nārado vismito 'bravīt
d dhanyas tvam eka evāsi śālmale vāyuvallabhaḥ
a sārthikā vaṇijaś cāpi tāpasāś ca vanaukasaḥ
c vasanti vāsān mārgasthāḥ suramye tarusattame
a tasyā tā vipulāḥ śākhā dṛṣṭvā skandhāṃś ca sarvataḥ
c abhigamyābravīd enaṃ nārado bharatarṣabha
a aho nu ramaṇīyas tvam aho cāsi manoramaḥ
c prīyāmahe tvayā nityaṃ tarupravara śalmale
a sadaiva śakunās tāta mṛgāś cādhas tathā gajāḥ
c vasanti tava saṃhṛṣṭā manoharatarās tathā
a tava śākhā mahāśākha skandhaṃ ca vipulaṃ tathā
c na vai prabhagnān paśyāmi mārutena kathaṃ cana
d sarvāvāsasya sadbhāvāt sauhṛdāc cābhirakṣati
a kiṃ nu te mārutas tāta prītimān atha vā suhṛt
c tvāṃ rakṣati sadā yena vane 'smin pavano dhruvam
a vivān hi pavanaḥ sthānād vṛkṣān uccāvacān api
c parvatānāṃ ca śikharāṇy ācālayati vegavān
a śoṣayaty eva pātālaṃ vivān gandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
c hradāṃś ca saritaś caiva sāgarāṃś ca tathaiva ha
a tvāṃ saṃrakṣeta pavanaḥ sakhitvena na saṃśayaḥ
c tasmād bahalaśākho 'si parṇavān puṣpavān api
a idaṃ ca ramaṇīyaṃ te pratibhāti vanaspate
c yad ime vihagās tāta ramante muditās tvayi
a eṣāṃ pṛthak samastānāṃ śrūyate madhuraḥ svaraḥ
c puṣpasaṃmodane kāle vāśatāṃ sumanoharam
a tatheme muditā nāgāḥ svayūthakulaśobhinaḥ
c gharmārtās tvāṃ samāsādya sukhaṃ vindanti śalmale
a tathaiva mṛgajātībhir anyābhir upaśobhase
c tathā sārthādhivāsaiś ca śobhase meruvad druma
a brāhmaṇaiś ca tapaḥsiddhais tāpasaiḥ śramaṇair api
c triviṣṭapasamaṃ manye tavāyatanam eva ha
a bandhutvād atha vā sakhyāc chalmale nātra saṃśayaḥ
c pālayaty eva satataṃ bhīmaḥ sarvatrago 'nilaḥ
a nyagbhāvaṃ paramaṃ vāyoḥ śalmale tvam upāgataḥ
c tavāham asmīti sadā yena rakṣati mārutaḥ
a na taṃ paśyāmy ahaṃ vṛkṣaṃ parvataṃ vāpi taṃ dṛḍham
c yo na vāyubalād bhagnaḥ pṛthivyām iti me matiḥ
a tvaṃ punaḥ kāraṇair nūnaṃ śalmale rakṣyase sadā
c vāyunā saparīvāras tena tiṣṭhasy asaṃśayam
 śalmalir uvāca
a na me vāyuḥ sakhā brahman na bandhur na ca me suhṛt
c parameṣṭhī tathā naiva yena rakṣati mānilaḥ
a mama tejobalaṃ vāyor bhīmam api hi nārada
c kalām aṣṭādaśīṃ prāṇair na me prāpnoti mārutaḥ
a āgacchan paramo vāyur mayā viṣṭambhito balāt
c rujan drumān parvatāṃś ca yac cānyad api kiṃ cana
a sa mayā bahuśo bhagnaḥ prabhañjan vai prabhañjanaḥ
c tasmān na bibhye devarṣe kruddhād api samīraṇāt
 nārada uvāca
a śalmale viparītaṃ te darśanaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
c na hi vāyor balenāsti bhūtaṃ tulyabalaṃ kva cit
a indro yamo vaiśravaṇo varuṇaś ca jaleśvaraḥ
c na te 'pi tulyā marutaḥ kiṃ punas tvaṃ vanaspate
a yad dhi kiṃ cid iha prāṇi śalmale ceṣṭate bhuvi
c sarvatra bhagavān vāyuś ceṣṭāprāṇakaraḥ prabhuḥ
a eṣa ceṣṭayate samyak prāṇinaḥ samyag āyataḥ
c asamyag āyato bhūyaś ceṣṭate vikṛto nṛṣu
a sa tvam evaṃvidhaṃ vāyuṃ sarvasattvabhṛtāṃ varam
c na pūjayasi pūjyaṃ taṃ kim anyad buddhilāghavāt
a asāraś cāsi durbuddhe kevalaṃ bahu bhāṣase
c krodhādibhir avacchanno mithyā vadasi śalmale
a mama roṣaḥ samutpannas tvayy evaṃ saṃprabhāṣati
c bravīmy eṣa svayaṃ vāyos tava durbhāṣitaṃ bahu
a candanaiḥ spandanaiḥ śālaiḥ saralair devadārubhiḥ
c vetasair bandhanaiś cāpi ye cānye balavattarāḥ
a taiś cāpi naivaṃ durbuddhe kṣipto vāyuḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
c te hi jānanti vāyoś ca balam ātmana eva ca
a tasmāt te vai namasyanti śvasanaṃ drumasattamāḥ
c tvaṃ tu mohān na jānīṣe vāyor balam anantakam
d eṣa tasmād gamiṣyāmi sakāśaṃ mātariśvanaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktvā tu rājendra śalmaliṃ brahmavittamaḥ
c nāradaḥ pavane sarvaṃ śalmaler vākyam abravīt
a himavatpṛṣṭhajaḥ kaś cic chalmaliḥ parivāravān
c bṛhanmūlo bṛhacchākhaḥ sa tvāṃ vāyo 'vamanyate
a bahūny ākṣepayuktāni tvām āha vacanāni saḥ
c na yuktāni mayā vāyo tāni vaktuṃ tvayi prabho
a jānāmi tvām ahaṃ vāyo sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ varam
c variṣṭhaṃ ca gariṣṭhaṃ ca krodhe vaivasvataṃ yathā
a evaṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradasya samīraṇaḥ
c śalmaliṃ tam upāgamya kruddho vacanam abravīt
a śalmale nārade yat tat tvayoktaṃ madvigarhaṇam
c ahaṃ vāyuḥ prabhāvaṃ te darśayāmy ātmano balam
a nāhaṃ tvā nābhijānāmi viditaś cāsi me druma
c pitāmahaḥ prajāsarge tvayi viśrāntavān prabhuḥ
a tasya viśramaṇād eva prasādo yaḥ kṛtas tava
c rakṣyase tena durbuddhe nātmavīryād drumādhama
a yan mā tvam avajānīṣe yathānyaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā
c darśayāmy eṣa ātmānaṃ yathā mām avabhotsyase
a evam uktas tataḥ prāha śalmaliḥ prahasann iva
c pavana tvaṃ vane kruddho darśayātmānam ātmanā
a mayi vai tyajyatāṃ krodhaḥ kiṃ me kruddhaḥ kariṣyasi
c na te bibhemi pavana yady api tvaṃ svayaṃprabhuḥ
d balādhiko 'haṃ tvattaś ca na bhīḥ kāryā mayā tava
d ye tu buddhyā hi balinas te bhavanti balīyasaḥ
d prāṇamātrabalā ye vai naiva te balino matāḥ
a ity evam uktaḥ pavanaḥ śva ity evābravīd vacaḥ
c darśayiṣyāmi te tejas tato rātrir upāgamat
a atha niścitya manasā śalmalir vātakāritam
c paśyamānas tadātmānam asamaṃ mātariśvanaḥ
a nārade yan mayā proktaṃ pavanaṃ prati tan mṛṣā
c asamartho hy ahaṃ vāyor balena balavān hi saḥ
a māruto balavān nityaṃ yathainaṃ nārado 'bravīt
c ahaṃ hi durbalo 'nyebhyo vṛkṣebhyo nātra saṃśayaḥ
a kiṃ tu buddhyā samo nāsti mama kaś cid vanaspatiḥ
c tad ahaṃ buddhim āsthāya bhayaṃ mokṣye samīraṇāt
a yadi tāṃ buddhim āsthāya careyuḥ parṇino vane
c ariṣṭāḥ syuḥ sadā kruddhāt pavanān nātra saṃśayaḥ
a te 'tra bālā na jānanti yathā nainān samīraṇaḥ
c samīrayeta saṃkruddho yathā jānāmy ahaṃ tathā
a tato niścitya manasā śalmaliḥ kṣubhitas tadā
c śākhāḥ skandhān praśākhāś ca svayam eva vyaśātayat
a sa parityajya śākhāś ca patrāṇi kusumāni ca
c prabhāte vāyum āyāntaṃ pratyaikṣata vanaspatiḥ
a tataḥ kruddhaḥ śvasan vāyuḥ pātayan vai mahādrumān
c ājagāmātha taṃ deśaṃ sthito yatra sa śalmaliḥ
a taṃ hīnaparṇaṃ patitāgraśākhaṃ
viśīrṇapuṣpaṃ prasamīkṣya vāyuḥ
c uvāca vākyaṃ smayamāna enaṃ
mudā yutaṃ śalmaliṃ rugṇaśākham
a aham apy evam eva tvāṃ kurvāṇaḥ śalmale ruṣā
c ātmanā yat kṛtaṃ kṛtsnaṃ śākhānām apakarṣaṇam
a hīnapuṣpāgraśākhas tvaṃ śīrṇāṅkurapalāśavān
c ātmadurmantriteneha madvīryavaśago 'bhavaḥ
a etac chrutvā vaco vāyoḥ śalmalir vrīḍitas tadā
c atapyata vacaḥ smṛtvā nārado yat tadābravīt
a evaṃ yo rājaśārdūla durbalaḥ san balīyasā
c vairam āsajjate bālas tapyate śalmalir yathā
a tasmād vairaṃ na kurvīta durbalo balavattaraiḥ
c śoced dhi vairaṃ kurvāṇo yathā vai śalmalis tathā
a na hi vairaṃ mahātmāno vivṛṇvanty apakāriṣu
c śanaiḥ śanair mahārāja darśayanti sma te balam
a vairaṃ na kurvīta naro durbuddhir buddhijīvinā
c buddhir buddhimato yāti tūleṣv iva hutāśanaḥ
a na hi buddhyā samaṃ kiṃ cid vidyate puruṣe nṛpa
c tathā balena rājendra na samo 'stīti cintayet
a tasmāt kṣameta bālāya jaḍāya badhirāya ca
c balādhikāya rājendra tad dṛṣṭaṃ tvayi śatruhan
a akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca sapta caiva mahādyute
c balena na samā rājann arjunasya mahātmanaḥ
a hatās tāś caiva bhagnāś ca pāṇḍavena yaśasvinā
c caratā balam āsthāya pākaśāsaninā mṛdhe
a uktās te rājadharmāś ca āpaddharmāś ca bhārata
c vistareṇa mahārāja kiṃ bhūyaḥ prabravīmi te
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pāpasya yad adhiṣṭhānaṃ yataḥ pāpaṃ pravartate
c etad icchāmy ahaṃ jñātuṃ tattvena bharatarṣabha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a pāpasya yad adhiṣṭhānaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva narādhipa
c eko lobho mahāgrāho lobhāt pāpaṃ pravartate
a ataḥ pāpam adharmaś ca tathā duḥkham anuttamam
c nikṛtyā mūlam etad dhi yena pāpakṛto janāḥ
a lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati lobhāt kāmaḥ pravartate
c lobhān mohaś ca māyā ca mānastambhaḥ parāsutā
a akṣamā hrīparityāgaḥ śrīnāśo dharmasaṃkṣayaḥ
c abhidhyāprajñatā caiva sarvaṃ lobhāt pravartate
a anyāyaś cāvitarkaś ca vikarmasu ca yāḥ kriyāḥ
c kūṭavidyādayaś caiva rūpaiśvaryamadas tathā
a sarvabhūteṣv aviśvāsaḥ sarvabhūteṣv anārjavam
c sarvabhūteṣv abhidrohaḥ sarvabhūteṣv ayuktatā
e haraṇaṃ paravittānāṃ paradārābhimarśanam
a vāgvego mānaso vego nindāvegas tathaiva ca
c upasthodarayor vego mṛtyuvegaś ca dāruṇaḥ
a īrṣyāvegaś ca balavān mithyāvegaś ca dustyajaḥ
c rasavegaś ca durvāraḥ śrotravegaś ca duḥsahaḥ
a kutsā vikatthā mātsaryaṃ pāpaṃ duṣkarakāritā
c sāhasānāṃ ca sarveṣām akāryāṇāṃ kriyās tathā
a jātau bālye 'tha kaumāre yauvane cāpi mānavaḥ
c na saṃtyajaty ātmakarma yan na jīryati jīryataḥ
a yo na pūrayituṃ śakyo lobhaḥ prāptyā kurūdvaha
c nityaṃ gambhīratoyābhir āpagābhir ivodadhiḥ
e na prahṛṣyati lābhair yo yaś ca kāmair na tṛpyati
a yo na devair na gandharvair nāsurair na mahoragaiḥ
c jñāyate nṛpa tattvena sarvair bhūtagaṇais tathā
e sa lobhaḥ saha mohena vijetavyo jitātmanā
a dambho drohaś ca nindā ca paiśunyaṃ matsaras tathā
c bhavanty etāni kauravya lubdhānām akṛtātmanām
a sumahānty api śāstrāṇi dhārayanti bahuśrutāḥ
c chettāraḥ saṃśayānāṃ ca kliśyantīhālpabuddhayaḥ
a dveṣakrodhaprasaktāś ca śiṣṭācārabahiṣkṛtāḥ
c antaḥkṣurā vāṅmadhurāḥ kūpāś channās tṛṇair iva
e dharmavaitaṃsikāḥ kṣudrā muṣṇanti dhvajino jagat
a kurvate ca bahūn mārgāṃs tāṃs tān hetubalāśritāḥ
c sarvaṃ mārgaṃ vilumpanti lobhājñāneṣu niṣṭhitāḥ
a dharmasyāhriyamāṇasya lobhagrastair durātmabhiḥ
c yā yā vikriyate saṃsthā tataḥ sābhiprapadyate
a darpaḥ krodho madaḥ svapno harṣaḥ śoko 'timānitā
c tata eva hi kauravya dṛśyante lubdhabuddhiṣu
e etān aśiṣṭān budhyasva nityaṃ lobhasamanvitān
a śiṣṭāṃs tu paripṛcchethā yān vakṣyāmi śucivratān
c yeṣu vṛttibhayaṃ nāsti paralokabhayaṃ na ca
a nāmiṣeṣu prasaṅgo 'sti na priyeṣv apriyeṣu ca
c śiṣṭācāraḥ priyo yeṣu damo yeṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ paraṃ yeṣāṃ satyaṃ yeṣāṃ parāyaṇam
c dātāro na gṛhītāro dayāvantas tathaiva ca
a pitṛdevātitheyāś ca nityodyuktās tathaiva ca
c sarvopakāriṇo dhīrāḥ sarvadharmānupālakāḥ
a sarvabhūtahitāś caiva sarvadeyāś ca bhārata
c na te cālayituṃ śakyā dharmavyāpārapāragāḥ
a na teṣāṃ bhidyate vṛttaṃ yat purā sādhubhiḥ kṛtam
c na trāsino na capalā na raudrāḥ satpathe sthitāḥ
a te sevyāḥ sādhubhir nityaṃ yeṣv ahiṃsā pratiṣṭhitā
c kāmakrodhavyapetā ye nirmamā nirahaṃkṛtāḥ
e suvratāḥ sthiramaryādās tān upāssva ca pṛccha ca
a na gavārthaṃ yaśorthaṃ vā dharmas teṣāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c avaśyakārya ity eva śarīrasya kriyās tathā
a na bhayaṃ krodhacāpalyaṃ na śokas teṣu vidyate
c na dharmadhvajinaś caiva na guhyaṃ kiṃ cid āsthitāḥ
a yeṣv alobhas tathāmoho ye ca satyārjave ratāḥ
c teṣu kaunteya rajyethā yeṣv atandrīkṛtaṃ manaḥ
a ye na hṛṣyanti lābheṣu nālābheṣu vyathanti ca
c nirmamā nirahaṃkārāḥ sattvasthāḥ samadarśinaḥ
a lābhālābhau sukhaduḥkhe ca tāta
priyāpriye maraṇaṃ jīvitaṃ ca
c samāni yeṣāṃ sthiravikramāṇāṃ
buddhātmanāṃ sattvam avasthitānām
a sukhapriyais tān sumahāpratāpān
yatto 'pramattaś ca samarthayethāḥ
c daivāt sarve guṇavanto bhavanti
śubhāśubhā vākpralāpā yathaiva
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a anarthānām adhiṣṭhānam ukto lobhaḥ pitāmaha
c ajñānam api vai tāta śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a karoti pāpaṃ yo 'jñānān nātmano vetti ca kṣamam
c pradveṣṭi sādhuvṛttāṃś ca sa lokasyaiti vācyatām
a ajñānān nirayaṃ yāti tathājñānena durgatim
c ajñānāt kleśam āpnoti tathāpatsu nimajjati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ajñānasya pravṛttiṃ ca sthānaṃ vṛddhiṃ kṣayodayau
c mūlaṃ yogaṃ gatiṃ kālaṃ kāraṇaṃ hetum eva ca
a śrotum icchāmi tattvena yathāvad iha pārthiva
c ajñānaprabhavaṃ hīdaṃ yad duḥkham upalabhyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a rāgo dveṣas tathā moho harṣaḥ śoko 'bhimānitā
c kāmaḥ krodhaś ca darpaś ca tandrīr ālasyam eva ca
a icchā dveṣas tathā tāpaḥ paravṛddhyupatāpitā
c ajñānam etan nirdiṣṭaṃ pāpānāṃ caiva yāḥ kriyāḥ
a etayā yā pravṛttiś ca vṛddhyādīn yāṃś ca pṛcchasi
c vistareṇa mahābāho śṛṇu tac ca viśāṃ pate
a ubhāv etau samaphalau samadoṣau ca bhārata
c ajñānaṃ cātilobhaś cāpy ekaṃ jānīhi pārthiva
a lobhaprabhavam ajñānaṃ vṛddhaṃ bhūyaḥ pravardhate
c sthāne sthānaṃ kṣaye kṣaiṇyam upaiti vividhāṃ gatim
a mūlaṃ lobhasya mahataḥ kālātmagatir eva ca
c chinne 'cchinne tathā lobhe kāraṇaṃ kāla eva hi
a tasyājñānāt tu lobho hi lobhād ajñānam eva ca
c sarve doṣās tathā lobhāt tasmāl lobhaṃ vivarjayet
a janako yuvanāśvaś ca vṛṣādarbhiḥ prasenajit
c lobhakṣayād divaṃ prāptās tathaivānye janādhipāḥ
a pratyakṣaṃ tu kuruśreṣṭha tyaja lobham ihātmanā
c tyaktvā lobhaṃ sukhaṃ loke pretya cānucariṣyasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a svādhyāyakṛtayatnasya brāhmaṇasya pitāmaha
c dharmakāmasya dharmātman kiṃ nu śreya ihocyate
a bahudhādarśane loke śreyo yad iha manyase
c asmiṃl loke pare caiva tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a mahān ayaṃ dharmapatho bahuśākhaś ca bhārata
c kiṃ svid eveha dharmāṇām anuṣṭheyatamaṃ matam
a dharmasya mahato rājan bahuśākhasya tattvataḥ
c yan mūlaṃ paramaṃ tāta tat sarvaṃ brūhy atandritaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yena śreyaḥ prapatsyase
c pītvāmṛtam iva prājño jñānatṛpto bhaviṣyasi
a dharmasya vidhayo naike te te proktā maharṣibhiḥ
c svaṃ svaṃ vijñānam āśritya damas teṣāṃ parāyaṇam
a damaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ prāhur vṛddhā niścayadarśinaḥ
c brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa damo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a nādāntasya kriyāsiddhir yathāvad upalabhyate
c damo dānaṃ tathā yajñān adhītaṃ cātivartate
a damas tejo vardhayati pavitraṃ ca damaḥ param
c vipāpmā tejasā yuktaḥ puruṣo vindate mahat
a damena sadṛśaṃ dharmaṃ nānyaṃ lokeṣu śuśruma
c damo hi paramo loke praśastaḥ sarvadharmiṇām
a pretya cāpi manuṣyendra paramaṃ vindate sukham
c damena hi samāyukto mahāntaṃ dharmam aśnute
a sukhaṃ dāntaḥ prasvapiti sukhaṃ ca pratibudhyate
c sukhaṃ paryeti lokāṃś ca manaś cāsya prasīdati
a adāntaḥ puruṣaḥ kleśam abhīkṣṇaṃ pratipadyate
c anarthāṃś ca bahūn anyān prasṛjaty ātmadoṣajān
a āśrameṣu caturṣv āhur damam evottamaṃ vratam
c tasya liṅgāni vakṣyāmi yeṣāṃ samudayo damaḥ
a kṣamā dhṛtir ahiṃsā ca samatā satyam ārjavam
c indriyāvajayo dākṣyaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
a akārpaṇyam asaṃrambhaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditā
c avivitsānasūyā cāpy eṣāṃ samudayo damaḥ
a gurupūjā ca kauravya dayā bhūteṣv apaiśunam
c janavādo 'mṛṣāvādaḥ stutinindāvivarjanam
a kāmaḥ krodhaś ca lobhaś ca darpaḥ stambho vikatthanam
c moha īrṣyāvamānaś cety etad dānto na sevate
a anindito hy akāmātmāthālpeccho 'thānasūyakaḥ
c samudrakalpaḥ sa naro na kadā cana pūryate
a ahaṃ tvayi mama tvaṃ ca mayi te teṣu cāpy aham
c pūrvasaṃbandhisaṃyogān naitad dānto niṣevate
a sarvā grāmyās tathāraṇyā yāś ca loke pravṛttayaḥ
c nindāṃ caiva praśaṃsāṃ ca yo nāśrayati mucyate
a maitro 'tha śīlasaṃpannaḥ susahāyaparaś ca yaḥ
c muktaś ca vividhaiḥ saṅgais tasya pretya mahat phalam
a suvṛttaḥ śīlasaṃpannaḥ prasannātmātmavid budhaḥ
c prāpyeha loke satkāraṃ sugatiṃ pratipadyate
a karma yac chubham eveha sadbhir ācaritaṃ ca yat
c tad eva jñānayuktasya muner dharmo na hīyate
a niṣkramya vanam āsthāya jñānayukto jitendriyaḥ
c kālākāṅkṣī carann evaṃ brahmabhūyāya kalpate
a abhayaṃ yasya bhūtebhyo bhūtānām abhayaṃ yataḥ
c tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ nāsti kutaś cana
a avācinoti karmāṇi na ca saṃpracinoti ha
c samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu maitrāyaṇagatiś caret
a śakunīnām ivākāśe jale vāricarasya vā
c yathā gatir na dṛśyeta tathā tasya na saṃśayaḥ
a gṛhān utsṛjya yo rājan mokṣam evābhipadyate
c lokās tejomayās tasya kalpante śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
a saṃnyasya sarvakarmāṇi saṃnyasya vidhivat tapaḥ
c saṃnyasya vividhā vidyāḥ sarvaṃ saṃnyasya caiva ha
a kāmeṣu cāpy anāvṛttaḥ prasannātmātmavic chuciḥ
c prāpyeha loke satkāraṃ svargaṃ samabhipadyate
a yac ca paitāmahaṃ sthānaṃ brahmarāśisamudbhavam
c guhāyāṃ pihitaṃ nityaṃ tad damenābhipadyate
a jñānārāmasya buddhasya sarvabhūtāvirodhinaḥ
c nāvṛttibhayam astīha paraloke bhayaṃ kutaḥ
a eka eva dame doṣo dvitīyo nopapadyate
c yad enaṃ kṣamayā yuktam aśaktaṃ manyate janaḥ
a etasya tu mahāprājña doṣasya sumahān guṇaḥ
c kṣamāyāṃ vipulā lokāḥ sulabhā hi sahiṣṇunā
a dāntasya kim araṇyena tathādāntasya bhārata
c yatraiva hi vased dāntas tad araṇyaṃ sa āśramaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a etad bhīṣmasya vacanaṃ śrutvā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c amṛteneva saṃtṛptaḥ prahṛṣṭaḥ samapadyata
a punaś ca paripapraccha bhīṣmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ varam
c tapaḥ prati sa covāca tasmai sarvaṃ kurūdvaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sarvam etat tapomūlaṃ kavayaḥ paricakṣate
c na hy ataptatapā mūḍhaḥ kriyāphalam avāpyate
a prajāpatir idaṃ sarvaṃ tapasaivāsṛjat prabhuḥ
c tathaiva vedān ṛṣayas tapasā pratipedire
a tapaso hy ānupūrvyeṇa phalamūlānilāśanāḥ
c trīṃl lokāṃs tapasā siddhāḥ paśyanti susamāhitāḥ
a auṣadhāny agadādīni tisro vidyāś ca saṃskṛtāḥ
c tapasaiva hi sidhyanti tapomūlaṃ hi sādhanam
a yad durāpaṃ durāmnāyaṃ durādharṣaṃ durutsaham
c sarvaṃ tat tapasā śakyaṃ tapo hi duratikramam
a surāpo 'saṃmatādāyī bhrūṇahā gurutalpagaḥ
c tapasaiva sutaptena naraḥ pāpād vimucyate
a tapaso bahurūpasya tais tair dvāraiḥ pravartataḥ
c nivṛttyā vartamānasya tapo nānaśanāt param
a ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ dānam indriyanigrahaḥ
c etebhyo hi mahārāja tapo nānaśanāt param
a na duṣkarataraṃ dānān nātimātaram āśramaḥ
c traividyebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti saṃnyāsaḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ
a indriyāṇīha rakṣanti dhanadhānyābhiguptaye
c tasmād arthe ca dharme ca tapo nānaśanāt param
a ṛṣayaḥ pitaro devā manuṣyā mṛgasattamāḥ
c yāni cānyāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
d sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni carāṇy anyāni yāni ca
a tapaḥparāyaṇāḥ sarve sidhyanti tapasā ca te
c ity evaṃ tapasā devā mahattvaṃ cāpy avāpnuvan
a imānīṣṭavibhāgāni phalāni tapasā sadā
c tapasā śakyate prāptuṃ devatvam api niścayāt
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a satyaṃ dharme praśaṃsanti viprarṣipitṛdevatāḥ
c satyam icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a satyaṃ kiṃlakṣaṇaṃ rājan kathaṃ vā tad avāpyate
c satyaṃ prāpya bhavet kiṃ ca kathaṃ caiva tad ucyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a cāturvarṇyasya dharmāṇāṃ saṃkaro na praśasyate
c avikāritamaṃ satyaṃ sarvavarṇeṣu bhārata
d tasmāc chreṣṭhatamaṃ satyaṃ sarvavarṇeṣu bhārata
a satyaṃ satsu sadā dharmaḥ satyaṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c satyam eva namasyeta satyaṃ hi paramā gatiḥ
a satyaṃ dharmas tapo yogaḥ satyaṃ brahma sanātanam
c satyaṃ yajñaḥ paraḥ proktaḥ satye sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
a ācārān iha satyasya yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ
c lakṣaṇaṃ ca pravakṣyāmi satyasyeha yathākramam
a prāpyate hi yathā satyaṃ tac ca śrotuṃ tvam arhasi
c satyaṃ trayodaśavidhaṃ sarvalokeṣu bhārata
a satyaṃ ca samatā caiva damaś caiva na saṃśayaḥ
c amātsaryaṃ kṣamā caiva hrīs titikṣānasūyatā
a tyāgo dhyānam athāryatvaṃ dhṛtiś ca satataṃ sthirā
c ahiṃsā caiva rājendra satyākārās trayodaśa
a satyaṃ nāmāvyayaṃ nityam avikāri tathaiva ca
c sarvadharmāviruddhaṃ ca yogenaitad avāpyate
a ātmanīṣṭe tathāniṣṭe ripau ca samatā tathā
c icchādveṣakṣayaṃ prāpya kāmakrodhakṣayaṃ tathā
a damo nānyaspṛhā nityaṃ dhairyaṃ gāmbhīryam eva ca
c abhayaṃ krodhaśamanaṃ jñānenaitad avāpyate
a amātsaryaṃ budhāḥ prāhur dānaṃ dharme ca saṃyamam
c avasthitena nityaṃ ca satyenāmatsarī bhavet
a akṣamāyāḥ kṣamāyāś ca priyāṇīhāpriyāṇi ca
c kṣamate sarvataḥ sādhuḥ sādhv āpnoti ca satyavān
a kalyāṇaṃ kurute gāḍhaṃ hrīmān na ślāghate kva cit
c praśāntavāṅmanā nityaṃ hrīs tu dharmād avāpyate
a dharmārthahetoḥ kṣamate titikṣā kṣāntir ucyate
c lokasaṃgrahaṇārthaṃ tu sā tu dhairyeṇa labhyate
d anasūyā tu gāmbhīryaṃ dānenaitad avāpyate
a tyāgaḥ snehasya yas tyāgo viṣayāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
c rāgadveṣaprahīṇasya tyāgo bhavati nānyathā
d dhyānaṃ cāśāṭhyam ity uktaṃ maunenaitad avāpyate
a āryatā nāma bhūtānāṃ yaḥ karoti prayatnataḥ
c śubhaṃ karma nirākāro vītarāgatvam eva ca
a dhṛtir nāma sukhe duḥkhe yathā nāpnoti vikriyām
c tāṃ bhajeta sadā prājño ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ
a sarvathā kṣamiṇā bhāvyaṃ tathā satyapareṇa ca
c vītaharṣabhayakrodho dhṛtim āpnoti paṇḍitaḥ
a adrohaḥ sarvabhūteṣu karmaṇā manasā girā
c anugrahaś ca dānaṃ ca satāṃ dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a ete trayodaśākārāḥ pṛthak satyaikalakṣaṇāḥ
c bhajante satyam eveha bṛṃhayanti ca bhārata
a nāntaḥ śakyo guṇānāṃ hi vaktuṃ satyasya bhārata
c ataḥ satyaṃ praśaṃsanti viprāḥ sapitṛdevatāḥ
a nāsti satyāt paro dharmo nānṛtāt pātakaṃ param
c sthitir hi satyaṃ dharmasya tasmāt satyaṃ na lopayet
a upaiti satyād dānaṃ hi tathā yajñāḥ sadakṣiṇāḥ
c vratāgnihotraṃ vedāś ca ye cānye dharmaniścayāḥ
a aśvamedhasahasraṃ ca satyaṃ ca tulayā dhṛtam
c aśvamedhasahasrād dhi satyam evātiricyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yataḥ prabhavati krodhaḥ kāmaś ca bharatarṣabha
c śokamohau vivitsā ca parāsutvaṃ tathā madaḥ
a lobho mātsaryam īrṣyā ca kutsāsūyā kṛpā tathā
c etat sarvaṃ mahāprājña yāthātathyena me vada
 bhīṣma uvāca
a trayodaśaite 'tibalāḥ śatravaḥ prāṇināṃ smṛtāḥ
b śatravaḥ prāṇināṃ sarve smṛtās te tu trayodaśa
c upāsate mahārāja samastāḥ puruṣān iha
d prāṇināṃ lobhayuktānām ete vai śatravaḥ smṛtāḥ
a ete pramattaṃ puruṣam apramattā nudanti hi
c vṛkā iva vilumpanti dṛṣṭvaiva puruṣetarān
a ebhyaḥ pravartate duḥkham ebhyaḥ pāpaṃ pravartate
c iti martyo vijānīyāt satataṃ bharatarṣabha
a eteṣām udayaṃ sthānaṃ kṣayaṃ ca puruṣottama
c hanta te vartayiṣyāmi tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
c   krodhasyotpattim āditaḥ
c yathātattvaṃ kṣitipate
a lobhāt krodhaḥ prabhavati paradoṣair udīryate
c kṣamayā tiṣṭhate rājañ śrīmāṃś ca vinivartate
a saṃkalpāj jāyate kāmaḥ sevyamāno vivardhate
b yadā prājño viramate tadā sadyaḥ praṇaśyati
b parāsūyā krodhalobhāv antarā pratimucyate
b dayayā sarvabhūtānāṃ nirvedād vinivartate
c avadyadarśanād vyeti tattvajñānāc ca dhīmatām
a viruddhāni hi śāstrāṇi paśyantīhālpabuddhayaḥ
c vivitsā jāyate tatra tattvajñānān nivartate
a prīteḥ śokaḥ prabhavati viyogāt tasya dehinaḥ
c yadā nirarthakaṃ vetti tadā sadyaḥ praṇaśyati
d ajñānaprabhavo mohaḥ pāpābhyāsāt pravartate
d yadā prājñeṣu ramate tadā sadyaḥ praṇaśyati
a parāsutā krodhalobhād abhyāsāc ca pravartate
c dayayā sarvabhūtānāṃ nirvedāt sā nivartate
a sattvatyāgāt tu mātsaryam ahitāni ca sevate
c etat tu kṣīyate tāta sādhūnām upasevanāt
a kulāj jñānāt tathaiśvaryān mado bhavati dehinām
c ebhir eva tu vijñātair madaḥ sadyaḥ praṇaśyati
a īrṣyā kāmāt prabhavati saṃgharṣāc caiva bhārata
c itareṣāṃ tu martyānāṃ prajñayā sā praṇaśyati
a vibhramāl lokabāhyānāṃ dveṣyair vākyair asaṃgataiḥ
c kutsā saṃjāyate rājann upekṣābhiḥ praśāmyati
a pratikartum aśakyāya balasthāyāpakāriṇe
c asūyā jāyate tīvrā kāruṇyād vinivartate
a kṛpaṇān satataṃ dṛṣṭvā tataḥ saṃjāyate kṛpā
b ajñānaprabhavo lobho bhūtānāṃ dṛśyate sadā
b asthiratvaṃ ca bhogānāṃ dṛṣṭvā jñātvā nivartate
c dharmaniṣṭhāṃ yadā vetti tadā śāmyati sā kṛpā
a etāny eva jitāny āhuḥ praśamāc ca trayodaśa
c ete hi dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ sarve doṣās trayodaśa
e tvayā sarvātmanā nityaṃ vijitā jeṣyase ca tān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ānṛśaṃsyaṃ vijānāmi darśanena satāṃ sadā
c nṛśaṃsān na vijānāmi teṣāṃ karma ca bhārata
a kaṇṭakān kūpam agniṃ ca varjayanti yathā narāḥ
c tathā nṛśaṃsakarmāṇaṃ varjayanti narā naram
a nṛśaṃso hy adhamo nityaṃ pretya ceha ca bhārata
c tasmād bravīhi kauravya tasya dharmaviniścayam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a spṛhāsyāntarhitā caiva viditārthā ca karmaṇā
c ākroṣṭā kruśyate caiva bandhitā badhyate ca yaḥ
a dattānukīrtir viṣamaḥ kṣudro naikṛtikaḥ śaṭhaḥ
c asaṃbhogī ca mānī ca tathā saṅgī vikatthanaḥ
a sarvātiśaṅkī paruṣo bāliśaḥ kṛpaṇas tathā
c vargapraśaṃsī satatam āśramadveṣasaṃkarī
a hiṃsāvihārī satatam aviśeṣaguṇāguṇaḥ
c bahvalīko manasvī ca lubdho 'tyarthaṃ nṛśaṃsakṛt
a dharmaśīlaṃ guṇopetaṃ pāpa ity avagacchati
c ātmaśīlānumānena na viśvasiti kasya cit
a pareṣāṃ yatra doṣaḥ syāt tad guhyaṃ saṃprakāśayet
c samāneṣv eva doṣeṣu vṛttyartham upaghātayet
a tathopakāriṇaṃ caiva manyate vañcitaṃ param
c dattvāpi ca dhanaṃ kāle saṃtapaty upakāriṇe
a bhakṣyaṃ bhojyam atho lehyaṃ yac cānyat sādhu bhojanam
c prekṣamāṇeṣu yo 'śnīyān nṛśaṃsa iti taṃ viduḥ
a brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pradāyāgraṃ yaḥ suhṛdbhiḥ sahāśnute
c sa pretya labhate svargam iha cānantyam aśnute
a eṣa te bharataśreṣṭha nṛśaṃsaḥ parikīrtitaḥ
c sadā vivarjanīyo vai puruṣeṇa bubhūṣatā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a kṛtārtho yakṣyamāṇaś ca sarvavedāntagaś ca yaḥ
c ācāryapitṛbhāryārthaṃ svādhyāyārtham athāpi vā
a ete vai sādhavo dṛṣṭā brāhmaṇā dharmabhikṣavaḥ
c asvebhyo deyam etebhyo dānaṃ vidyāviśeṣataḥ
a anyatra dakṣiṇā yā tu deyā bharatasattama
c anyebhyo hi bahirvedyāṃ nākṛtānnaṃ vidhīyate
a sarvaratnāni rājā ca yathārhaṃ pratipādayet
c brāhmaṇāś caiva yajñāś ca sahānnāḥ sahadakṣiṇāḥ
d anyonyaspardhino rājan yajante guṇataḥ sadā
a yasya traivārṣikaṃ bhaktaṃ paryāptaṃ bhṛtyavṛttaye
c adhikaṃ vāpi vidyeta sa somaṃ pātum arhati
a yajñaś cet pratividdhaḥ syād aṅgenaikena yajvanaḥ
c brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa dhārmike sati rājani
a yo vaiśyaḥ syād bahupaśur hīnakratur asomapaḥ
c kuṭumbāt tasya tad dravyaṃ yajñārthaṃ pārthivo haret
a āhared veśmataḥ kiṃ cit kāmaṃ śūdrasya dravyataḥ
c na hi veśmani śūdrasya kaś cid asti parigrahaḥ
a yo 'nāhitāgniḥ śatagur ayajvā ca sahasraguḥ
c tayor api kuṭumbābhyām āhared avicārayan
a adātṛbhyo haren nityaṃ vyākhyāpya nṛpatiḥ prabho
c tathā hy ācarato dharmo nṛpateḥ syād athākhilaḥ
a tathaiva saptame bhakte bhaktāni ṣaḍ anaśnatā
c aśvastanavidhānena hartavyaṃ hīnakarmaṇaḥ
e khalāt kṣetrāt tathāgārād yato vāpy upapadyate
a ākhyātavyaṃ nṛpasyaitat pṛcchato 'pṛcchato 'pi vā
c na tasmai dhārayed daṇḍaṃ rājā dharmeṇa dharmavit
a kṣatriyasya hi bāliśyād brāhmaṇaḥ kliśyate kṣudhā
c śrutaśīle samājñāya vṛttim asya prakalpayet
e athainaṃ parirakṣeta pitā putram ivaurasam
a iṣṭiṃ vaiśvānarīṃ nityaṃ nirvaped abdaparyaye
c avikalpaḥ purādharmo dharmavādais tu kevalam
a viśvais tu devaiḥ sādhyaiś ca brāhmaṇaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ
c āpatsu maraṇād bhītair liṅgapratinidhiḥ kṛtaḥ
a prabhuḥ prathamakalpasya yo 'nukalpena vartate
c na sāṃparāyikaṃ tasya durmater vidyate phalam
a na brāhmaṇān vedayeta kaś cid rājani mānavaḥ
c avīryo vedanād vidyāt suvīryo vīryavattaram
a tasmād rājñā sadā tejo duḥsahaṃ brahmavādinām
c mantā śāstā vidhātā ca brāhmaṇo deva ucyate
e tasmin nākuśalaṃ brūyān na śuktām īrayed giram
a kṣatriyo bāhuvīryeṇa taraty āpadam ātmanaḥ
c dhanena vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ca mantrair homaiś ca vai dvijaḥ
a na vai kanyā na yuvatir nāmantro na ca bāliśaḥ
c pariveṣṭāgnihotrasya bhaven nāsaṃskṛtas tathā
e narake nipatanty ete juhvānāḥ sa ca yasya tat
f tasmād vaitānakuśalo hotā syād vedapāragaḥ
a prājāpatyam adattvāśvam agnyādheyasya dakṣiṇām
c anāhitāgnir iti sa procyate dharmadarśibhiḥ
a puṇyāny anyāni kurvīta śraddadhāno jitendriyaḥ
c anāptadakṣiṇair yajñair na yajeta kathaṃ cana
a prajāḥ paśūṃś ca svargaṃ ca hanti yajño hy adakṣiṇaḥ
c indriyāṇi yaśaḥ kīrtim āyuś cāsyopakṛntati
a udakyā hy āsate ye ca ye ca ke cid anagnayaḥ
c kulaṃ cāśrotriyaṃ yeṣāṃ sarve te śūdradharmiṇaḥ
a udapānodake grāme brāhmaṇo vṛṣalīpatiḥ
c uṣitvā dvādaśa samāḥ śūdrakarmeha gacchati
a anāryāṃ śayane bibhrad ujjhan bibhrac ca yo dvijām
c abrāhmaṇo manyamānas tṛṇeṣv āsīta pṛṣṭhataḥ
e tathā sa śudhyate rājañ śṛṇu cātra vaco mama
a yad ekarātreṇa karoti pāpaṃ
kṛṣṇaṃ varṇaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ sevamānaḥ
c sthānāsanābhyāṃ vicaran vratī saṃs
tribhir varṣaiḥ śamayed ātmapāpam
a na narmayuktaṃ vacanaṃ hinasti
na strīṣu rājan na vivāhakāle
c na gurvarthe nātmano jīvitārthe
pañcānṛtāny āhur apātakāni
a śraddadhānaḥ śubhāṃ vidyāṃ hīnād api samācaret
c suvarṇam api cāmedhyād ādadīteti dhāraṇā
a strīratnaṃ duṣkulāc cāpi viṣād apy amṛtaṃ pibet
c aduṣṭā hi striyo ratnam āpa ity eva dharmataḥ
a gobrāhmaṇahitārthaṃ ca varṇānāṃ saṃkareṣu ca
c gṛhṇīyāt tu dhanur vaiśyaḥ paritrāṇāya cātmanaḥ
a surāpānaṃ brahmahatyā gurutalpam athāpi vā
c anirdeśyāni manyante prāṇāntānīti dhāraṇā
a suvarṇaharaṇaṃ stainyaṃ viprāsaṅgaś ca pātakam
c viharan madyapānaṃ cāpy agamyāgamanaṃ tathā
a patitaiḥ saṃprayogāc ca brāhmaṇair yonitas tathā
c acireṇa mahārāja tādṛśo vai bhavaty uta
a saṃvatsareṇa patati patitena sahācaran
c yājanādhyāpanād yaunān na tu yānāsanāśanāt
a etāni ca tato 'nyāni nirdeśyānīti dhāraṇā
c nirdeśyakena vidhinā kālenāvyasanī bhavet
a annaṃ tiryaṅ na hotavyaṃ pretakarmaṇy apātite
c triṣu tv eteṣu pūrveṣu na kurvīta vicāraṇām
a amātyān vā gurūn vāpi jahyād dharmeṇa dhārmikaḥ
c prāyaścittam akurvāṇair naitair arhati saṃvidam
a adharmakārī dharmeṇa tapasā hanti kilbiṣam
c bruvan stena iti stenaṃ tāvat prāpnoti kilbiṣam
e astenaṃ stena ity uktvā dviguṇaṃ pāpam āpnuyāt
f stenam astena ity uktvā tāvad āpnoti kilbiṣam
a tribhāgaṃ brahmahatyāyāḥ kanyā prāpnoti duṣyatī
c yas tu dūṣayitā tasyāḥ śeṣaṃ prāpnoti kilbiṣam
a brāhmaṇāyāvagūryeha spṛṣṭvā gurutaraṃ bhavet
c varṣāṇāṃ hi śataṃ pāpaḥ pratiṣṭhāṃ nādhigacchati
a sahasraṃ tv eva varṣāṇāṃ nipātya narake vaset
c tasmān naivāvagūryād dhi naiva jātu nipātayet
a śoṇitaṃ yāvataḥ pāṃsūn saṃgṛhṇīyād dvijakṣatāt
c tāvatīḥ sa samā rājan narake parivartate
a bhrūṇahāhavamadhye tu śudhyate śastrapātitaḥ
c ātmānaṃ juhuyād vahnau samiddhe tena śudhyati
a surāpo vāruṇīm uṣṇāṃ pītvā pāpād vimucyate
c tayā sa kāye nirdagdhe mṛtyunā pretya śudhyati
e lokāṃś ca labhate vipro nānyathā labhate hi saḥ
a gurutalpam adhiṣṭhāya durātmā pāpacetanaḥ
c sūrmīṃ jvalantīm āśliṣya mṛtyunā sa viśudhyati
a atha vā śiśnavṛṣaṇāv ādāyāñjalinā svayam
c nairṛtīṃ diśam āsthāya nipatet sa tv ajihmagaḥ
a brāhmaṇārthe 'pi vā prāṇān saṃtyajet tena śudhyati
c aśvamedhena vāpīṣṭvā gomedhenāpi vā punaḥ
e agniṣṭomena vā samyag iha pretya ca pūyate
a tathaiva dvādaśa samāḥ kapālī brahmahā bhavet
c brahmacārī cared bhaikṣaṃ svakarmodāharan muniḥ
a evaṃ vā tapasā yukto brahmahā savanī bhavet
c evaṃ vā garbham ajñātā cātreyīṃ yo 'bhigacchati
e dviguṇā brahmahatyā vai ātreyīvyasane bhavet
a surāpo niyatāhāro brahmacārī kṣamācaraḥ
c ūrdhvaṃ tribhyo 'tha varṣebhyo yajetāgniṣṭutā param
e ṛṣabhaikasahasraṃ gā dattvā śubham avāpnuyāt
f dīkṣābhiṣekanirmukte kṣatriye ṣaṭ samācaret
a vaiśyaṃ hatvā tu varṣe dve ṛṣabhaikaśatāś ca gāḥ
c śūdraṃ hatvābdam evaikam ṛṣabhaikādaśāś ca gāḥ
a śvabarbarakharān hatvā śaudram eva vrataṃ caret
c mārjāracāṣamaṇḍūkān kākaṃ bhāsaṃ ca mūṣakam
a uktaḥ paśusamo dharmo rājan prāṇinipātanāt
c prāyaścittāny athānyāni pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ
a talpe cānyasya caurye ca pṛthak saṃvatsaraṃ caret
c trīṇi śrotriyabhāryāyāṃ paradāre tu dve smṛte
a kāle caturthe bhuñjāno brahmacārī vratī bhavet
c sthānāsanābhyāṃ viharet trir ahno 'bhyuditād apaḥ
d evam eva caran rājaṃs tasmāt pāpāt pramucyate
e evam eva nirācānto yaś cāgnīn apavidhyati
a tyajaty akāraṇe yaś ca pitaraṃ mātaraṃ tathā
c patitaḥ syāt sa kauravya tathā dharmeṣu niścayaḥ
a grāsācchādanam atyarthaṃ dadyād iti nidarśanam
b brahmacārī dvijebhyaś ca dattvā pāpāt pramucyate
c bhāryāyāṃ vyabhicāriṇyāṃ niruddhāyāṃ viśeṣataḥ
e yat puṃsāṃ paradāreṣu tac caināṃ cārayed vratam
a śreyāṃsaṃ śayane hitvā yā pāpīyāṃsam ṛcchati
c śvabhis tāṃ khādayed rājā saṃsthāne bahusaṃvṛte
a pumāṃsaṃ bandhayet prājñaḥ śayane tapta āyase
c apy ādadhīta dārūṇi tatra dahyeta pāpakṛt
a eṣa daṇḍo mahārāja strīṇāṃ bhartṛvyatikrame
c saṃvatsarābhiśastasya duṣṭasya dviguṇo bhavet
a dve tasya trīṇi varṣāṇi catvāri sahasevinaḥ
c kucaraḥ pañca varṣāṇi cared bhaikṣaṃ munivrataḥ
a parivittiḥ parivettā yayā ca parividyate
c pāṇigrāhaś ca dharmeṇa sarve te patitāḥ smṛtāḥ
a careyuḥ sarva evaite vīrahā yad vrataṃ caret
c cāndrāyaṇaṃ caren māsaṃ kṛcchraṃ vā pāpaśuddhaye
a parivettā prayaccheta parivittāya tāṃ snuṣām
c jyeṣṭhena tv abhyanujñāto yavīyān pratyanantaram
e enaso mokṣam āpnoti sā ca tau caiva dharmataḥ
a amānuṣīṣu govarjam anāvṛṣṭir na duṣyati
c adhiṣṭhātāram attāraṃ paśūnāṃ puruṣaṃ viduḥ
a paridhāyordhvavālaṃ tu pātram ādāya mṛnmayam
c caret sapta gṛhān bhaikṣaṃ svakarma parikīrtayan
a tatraiva labdhabhojī syād dvādaśāhāt sa śudhyati
c caret saṃvatsaraṃ cāpi tad vrataṃ yan nirākṛti
a bhavet tu mānuṣeṣv evaṃ prāyaścittam anuttamam
c dānaṃ vādānasakteṣu sarvam eva prakalpayet
e anāstikeṣu gomātraṃ prāṇam ekaṃ pracakṣate
a śvavarāhamanuṣyāṇāṃ kukkuṭasya kharasya ca
c māṃsaṃ mūtrapurīṣaṃ ca prāśya saṃskāram arhati
a brāhmaṇasya surāpasya gandham āghrāya somapaḥ
c apas tryahaṃ pibed uṣṇās tryaham uṣṇaṃ payaḥ pibet
e tryaham uṣṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ pītvā vāyubhakṣo bhavet tryaham
a evam etat samuddiṣṭaṃ prāyaścittaṃ sanātanam
c brāhmaṇasya viśeṣeṇa tattvajñānena jāyate
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a kathāntaram athāsādya khaḍgayuddhaviśāradaḥ
c nakulaḥ śaratalpastham idam āha pitāmaham
a dhanuḥ praharaṇaṃ śreṣṭham iti vādaḥ pitāmaha
c matas tu mama dharmajña khaḍga eva susaṃśitaḥ
a viśīrṇe kārmuke rājan prakṣīṇeṣu ca vājiṣu
c khaḍgena śakyate yuddhe sādhv ātmā parirakṣitum
a śarāsanadharāṃś caiva gadāśaktidharāṃs tathā
c ekaḥ khaḍgadharo vīraḥ samarthaḥ pratibādhitum
a atra me saṃśayaś caiva kautūhalam atīva ca
c kiṃ svit praharaṇaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sarvayuddheṣu pārthiva
a kathaṃ cotpāditaḥ khaḍgaḥ kasyārthāya ca kena vā
c pūrvācāryaṃ ca khaḍgasya prabrūhi prapitāmaha
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā mādrīputrasya dhīmataḥ
c sarvakauśalasaṃyuktaṃ sūkṣmacitrārthavac chubham
a tatas tasyottaraṃ vākyaṃ svaravarṇopapāditam
c śikṣānyāyopasaṃpannaṃ droṇaśiṣyāya pṛcchate
a uvāca sarvadharmajño dhanurvedasya pāragaḥ
c śaratalpagato bhīṣmo nakulāya mahātmane
a tattvaṃ śṛṇuṣva mādreya yad etat paripṛcchasi
c prabodhito 'smi bhavatā dhātumān iva parvataḥ
a salilaikārṇavaṃ tāta purā sarvam abhūd idam
c niṣprakampam anākāśam anirdeśyamahītalam
a tamaḥsaṃvṛtam asparśam atigambhīradarśanam
c niḥśabdaṃ cāprameyaṃ ca tatra jajñe pitāmahaḥ
d avyakteva guṇātīte karmavyāpāravarjite
d prādurbabhūva jalajaṃ tato jajñe pitāmahaḥ
a so 'sṛjad vāyum agniṃ ca bhāskaraṃ cāpi vīryavān
c ākāśam asṛjac cordhvam adho bhūmiṃ ca nairṛtim
a nabhaḥ sacandratāraṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi grahāṃs tathā
c saṃvatsarān ahorātrān ṛtūn atha lavān kṣaṇān
a tataḥ śarīraṃ lokasthaṃ sthāpayitvā pitāmahaḥ
c janayām āsa bhagavān putrān uttamatejasaḥ
a marīcim ṛṣim atriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum
c vasiṣṭhāṅgirasau cobhau rudraṃ ca prabhum īśvaram
a prācetasas tathā dakṣaḥ kanyāḥ ṣaṣṭim ajījanat
c tā vai brahmarṣayaḥ sarvāḥ prajārthaṃ pratipedire
a tābhyo viśvāni bhūtāni devāḥ pitṛgaṇās tathā
c gandharvāpsarasaś caiva rakṣāṃsi vividhāni ca
a patatrimṛgamīnāś ca plavaṃgāś ca mahoragāḥ
c nānākṛtibalāś cānye jalakṣitivicāriṇaḥ
a audbhidāḥ svedajāś caiva aṇḍajāś ca jarāyujāḥ
c jajñe tāta tathā sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
a bhūtasargam imaṃ kṛtvā sarvalokapitāmahaḥ
c śāśvataṃ vedapaṭhitaṃ dharmaṃ ca yuyuje punaḥ
a tasmin dharme sthitā devāḥ sahācāryapurohitāḥ
c ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sasādhyā marudaśvinaḥ
a bhṛgvatryaṅgirasaḥ siddhāḥ kāśyapaś ca tapodhanaḥ
c vasiṣṭhagautamāgastyās tathā nāradaparvatau
a ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca prabhāsāḥ sikatās tathā
c ghṛtācāḥ somavāyavyā vaikhānasamarīcipāḥ
a akṛṣṭāś caiva haṃsāś ca ṛṣayo 'thāgniyonijāḥ
c vānaprasthāḥ pṛśnayaś ca sthitā brahmānuśāsane
a dānavendrās tv atikramya tat pitāmahaśāsanam
c dharmasyāpacayaṃ cakruḥ krodhalobhasamanvitāḥ
a hiraṇyakaśipuś caiva hiraṇyākṣo virocanaḥ
c śambaro vipracittiś ca prahrādo namucir baliḥ
a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ sagaṇā daityadānavāḥ
c dharmasetum atikramya remire 'dharmaniścayāḥ
a sarve sma tulyajātīyā yathā devās tathā vayam
c ity evaṃ hetum āsthāya spardhamānāḥ surarṣibhiḥ
a na priyaṃ nāpy anukrośaṃ cakrur bhūteṣu bhārata
c trīn upāyān atikramya daṇḍena rurudhuḥ prajāḥ
e na jagmuḥ saṃvidaṃ taiś ca darpād asurasattamāḥ
a atha vai bhagavān brahmā brahmarṣibhir upasthitaḥ
c tadā himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe suramye padmatārake
a śatayojanavistāre maṇimuktācayācite
c tasmin girivare putra puṣpitadrumakānane
e tasthau sa vibudhaśreṣṭho brahmā lokārthasiddhaye
a tato varṣasahasrānte vitānam akarot prabhuḥ
c vidhinā kalpadṛṣṭena yathoktenopapāditam
a ṛṣibhir yajñapaṭubhir yathāvat karmakartṛbhiḥ
c marudbhiḥ parisaṃstīrṇaṃ dīpyamānaiś ca pāvakaiḥ
a kāñcanair yajñabhāṇḍaiś ca bhrājiṣṇubhir alaṃkṛtam
c vṛtaṃ devagaṇaiś caiva prababhau yajñamaṇḍalam
a tathā brahmarṣibhiś caiva sadasyair upaśobhitam
c tatra ghoratamaṃ vṛttam ṛṣīṇāṃ me pariśrutam
a candramā vimalaṃ vyoma yathābhyuditatārakam
c vidāryāgniṃ tathā bhūtam utthitaṃ śrūyate tataḥ
a nīlotpalasavarṇābhaṃ tīkṣṇadaṃṣṭraṃ kṛśodaram
c prāṃśu durdarśanaṃ caivāpy atitejas tathaiva ca
a tasminn utpatamāne ca pracacāla vasuṃdharā
c tatrormikalilāvartaś cukṣubhe ca mahārṇavaḥ
a petur ulkā mahotpātāḥ śākhāś ca mumucur drumāḥ
c aprasannā diśaḥ sarvāḥ pavanaś cāśivo vavau
e muhur muhuś ca bhūtāni prāvyathanta bhayāt tathā
a tataḥ sutumulaṃ dṛṣṭvā tad adbhutam upasthitam
c maharṣisuragandharvān uvācedaṃ pitāmahaḥ
a mayaitac cintitaṃ bhūtam asir nāmaiṣa vīryavān
c rakṣaṇārthāya lokasya vadhāya ca suradviṣām
a tatas tad rūpam utsṛjya babhau nistriṃśa eva saḥ
c vimalas tīkṣṇadhāraś ca kālāntaka ivodyataḥ
a tatas taṃ śitikaṇṭhāya rudrāyarṣabhaketave
c brahmā dadāv asiṃ dīptam adharmaprativāraṇam
a tataḥ sa bhagavān rudro brahmarṣigaṇasaṃstutaḥ
c pragṛhyāsim ameyātmā rūpam anyac cakāra ha
a caturbāhuḥ spṛśan mūrdhnā bhūsthito 'pi nabhastalam
c ūrdhvadṛṣṭir mahāliṅgo mukhāj jvālāḥ samutsṛjan
e vikurvan bahudhā varṇān nīlapāṇḍuralohitān
a bibhrat kṛṣṇājinaṃ vāso hemapravaratārakam
c netraṃ caikaṃ lalāṭena bhāskarapratimaṃ mahat
e śuśubhāte ca vimale dve netre kṛṣṇapiṅgale
a tato devo mahādevaḥ śūlapāṇir bhagākṣihā
c saṃpragṛhya tu nistriṃśaṃ kālārkānalasaṃnibham
a trikūṭaṃ carma codyamya savidyutam ivāmbudam
c cacāra vividhān mārgān mahābalaparākramaḥ
e vidhunvann asim ākāśe dānavāntacikīrṣayā
a tasya nādaṃ vinadato mahāhāsaṃ ca muñcataḥ
c babhau pratibhayaṃ rūpaṃ tadā rudrasya bhārata
a tad rūpadhāriṇaṃ rudraṃ raudrakarma cikīrṣavaḥ
c niśamya dānavāḥ sarve hṛṣṭāḥ samabhidudruvuḥ
a aśmabhiś cāpy avarṣanta pradīptaiś ca tatholmukaiḥ
c ghoraiḥ praharaṇaiś cānyaiḥ śitadhārair ayomukhaiḥ
a tatas tad dānavānīkaṃ saṃpraṇetāram acyutam
c rudrakhaḍgabaloddhūtaṃ pracacāla mumoha ca
a citraṃ śīghrataratvāc ca carantam asidhāriṇam
c tam ekam asurāḥ sarve sahasram iti menire
a chindan bhindan rujan kṛntan dārayan pramathann api
c acarad daityasaṃgheṣu rudro 'gnir iva kakṣagaḥ
a asivegaprarugṇās te chinnabāhūruvakṣasaḥ
c saṃprakṛttottamāṅgāś ca petur urvyāṃ mahāsurāḥ
a apare dānavā bhagnā rudraghātāvapīḍitāḥ
c anyonyam abhinardanto diśaḥ saṃpratipedire
a bhūmiṃ ke cit praviviśuḥ parvatān apare tathā
c apare jagmur ākāśam apare 'mbhaḥ samāviśan
a tasmin mahati saṃvṛtte samare bhṛśadāruṇe
c babhau bhūmiḥ pratibhayā tadā rudhirakardamā
a dānavānāṃ śarīraiś ca mahadbhiḥ śoṇitokṣitaiḥ
c samākīrṇā mahābāho śailair iva sakiṃśukaiḥ
a rudhireṇa pariklinnā prababhau vasudhā tadā
c raktārdravasanā śyāmā nārīva madavihvalā
a sa rudro dānavān hatvā kṛtvā dharmottaraṃ jagat
c raudraṃ rūpaṃ vihāyāśu cakre rūpaṃ śivaṃ śivaḥ
a tato maharṣayaḥ sarve sarve devagaṇās tathā
c jayenādbhutakalpena devadevam athārcayan
a tataḥ sa bhagavān rudro dānavakṣatajokṣitam
c asiṃ dharmasya goptāraṃ dadau satkṛtya viṣṇave
a viṣṇur marīcaye prādān marīcir bhagavāṃś ca tam
c maharṣibhyo dadau khaḍgam ṛṣayo vāsavāya tu
a mahendro lokapālebhyo lokapālās tu putraka
c manave sūryaputrāya daduḥ khaḍgaṃ suvistaram
a ūcuś cainaṃ tathaivādyaṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ tvam īśvaraḥ
c asinā dharmagarbheṇa pālayasva prajā iti
a dharmasetum atikrāntāḥ sūkṣmasthūlārthakāraṇāt
c vibhajya daṇḍaṃ rakṣyāḥ syur dharmato na yadṛcchayā
a durvācā nigraho daṇḍo hiraṇyabahulas tathā
c vyaṅganaṃ ca śarīrasya vadho vānalpakāraṇāt
a aser etāni rūpāṇi durvācādīni nirdiśet
c aser eva pramāṇāni parimāṇavyatikramāt
a adhisṛjyātha putraṃ svaṃ prajānām adhipaṃ tataḥ
c manuḥ prajānāṃ rakṣārthaṃ kṣupāya pradadāv asim
a kṣupāj jagrāha cekṣvākur ikṣvākoś ca purūravāḥ
c āyuś ca tasmāl lebhe taṃ nahuṣaś ca tato bhuvi
a yayātir nahuṣāc cāpi pūrus tasmāc ca labdhavān
c āmūrtarayasas tasmāt tato bhūmiśayo nṛpaḥ
c   gayāya pratyapādayat
c gayāc ca labdhavān rājā
a bharataś cāpi dauḥṣantir lebhe bhūmiśayād asim
c tasmāc ca lebhe dharmajño rājann aiḍabiḍas tathā
a tataś caiḍabiḍāl lebhe dhundhumāro janeśvaraḥ
c dhundhumārāc ca kāmbojo mucukundas tato 'labhat
a mucukundān maruttaś ca maruttād api raivataḥ
c raivatād yuvanāśvaś ca yuvanāśvāt tato raghuḥ
a ikṣvākuvaṃśajas tasmād dhariṇāśvaḥ pratāpavān
c hariṇāśvād asiṃ lebhe śunakaḥ śunakād api
a uśīnaro vai dharmātmā tasmād bhojāḥ sayādavāḥ
c yadubhyaś ca śibir lebhe śibeś cāpi pratardanaḥ
a pratardanād aṣṭakaś ca ruśadaśvo 'ṣṭakād api
c ruśadaśvād bharadvājo droṇas tasmāt kṛpas tataḥ
e tatas tvaṃ bhrātṛbhiḥ sārdhaṃ paramāsim avāptavān
a kṛttikāś cāsya nakṣatram aser agniś ca daivatam
c rohiṇyo gotram asyātha rudraś ca gurur uttamaḥ
a aser aṣṭau ca nāmāni rahasyāni nibodha me
c pāṇḍaveya sadā yāni kīrtayaṃl labhate jayam
a asir viśasanaḥ khaḍgas tīkṣṇavartmā durāsadaḥ
c śrīgarbho vijayaś caiva dharmapālas tathaiva ca
a agryaḥ praharaṇānāṃ ca khaḍgo mādravatīsuta
c maheśvarapraṇītaś ca purāṇe niścayaṃ gataḥ
d etāni caiva nāmāni purāṇe niścitāni vai
a pṛthus tūtpādayām āsa dhanur ādyam ariṃdama
b teneyaṃ pṛthivī dugdhā sasyāni subahūny api
b dharmeṇa ca yathā pūrvaṃ
c teneyaṃ pṛthivī pūrvaṃ vainyena parirakṣitā
a tad etad ārṣaṃ mādreya pramāṇaṃ kartum arhasi
c aseś ca pūjā kartavyā sadā yuddhaviśāradaiḥ
a ity eṣa prathamaḥ kalpo vyākhyātas te suvistaraḥ
c aser utpattisaṃsargo yathāvad bharatarṣabha
a sarvathaitad iha śrutvā khaḍgasādhanam uttamam
c labhate puruṣaḥ kīrtiṃ pretya cānantyam aśnute
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a ity uktavati bhīṣme tu tūṣṇīṃbhūte yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
c papracchāvasaraṃ gatvā bhrātṝn vidurapañcamān
a dharme cārthe ca kāme ca lokavṛttiḥ samāhitā
c teṣāṃ garīyān katamo madhyamaḥ ko laghuś ca kaḥ
a kasmiṃś cātmā niyantavyas trivargavijayāya vai
c saṃtuṣṭā naiṣṭhikaṃ vākyaṃ yathāvad vaktum arhatha
a tato 'rthagatitattvajñaḥ prathamaṃ pratibhānavān
c jagāda viduro vākyaṃ dharmaśāstram anusmaran
a bāhuśrutyaṃ tapas tyāgaḥ śraddhā yajñakriyā kṣamā
c bhāvaśuddhir dayā satyaṃ saṃyamaś cātmasaṃpadaḥ
a etad evābhipadyasva mā te bhūc calitaṃ manaḥ
c etan mūlau hi dharmārthāv etad ekapadaṃ hitam
a dharmeṇaivarṣayas tīrṇā dharme lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
c dharmeṇa devā divigā dharme cārthaḥ samāhitaḥ
a dharmo rājan guṇaśreṣṭho madhyamo hy artha ucyate
c kāmo yavīyān iti ca pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
e tasmād dharmapradhānena bhavitavyaṃ yatātmanā
f tathā ca sarvabhūteṣu vartitavyaṃ yathātmani
a samāptavacane tasminn arthaśāstraviśāradaḥ
c pārtho vākyārthatattvajño jagau vākyam atandritaḥ
a karmabhūmir iyaṃ rājann iha vārttā praśasyate
c kṛṣivāṇijyagorakṣyaṃ śilpāni vividhāni ca
a artha ity eva sarveṣāṃ karmaṇām avyatikramaḥ
c na ṛte 'rthena vartete dharmakāmāv iti śrutiḥ
a vijayī hy arthavān dharmam ārādhayitum uttamam
c kāmaṃ ca carituṃ śakto duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ
a arthasyāvayavāv etau dharmakāmāv iti śrutiḥ
c arthasiddhyā hi nirvṛttāv ubhāv etau bhaviṣyataḥ
a udbhūtārthaṃ hi puruṣaṃ viśiṣṭatarayonayaḥ
c brahmāṇam iva bhūtāni satataṃ paryupāsate
a jaṭājinadharā dāntāḥ paṅkadigdhā jitendriyāḥ
c muṇḍā nistantavaś cāpi vasanty arthārthinaḥ pṛthak
a kāṣāyavasanāś cānye śmaśrulā hrīsusaṃvṛtāḥ
c vidvāṃsaś caiva śāntāś ca muktāḥ sarvaparigrahaiḥ
d arthārthinaḥ santi nityaṃ paritapyanti karmabhiḥ
a arthārthinaḥ santi ke cid apare svargakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
c kulapratyāgamāś caike svaṃ svaṃ mārgam anuṣṭhitāḥ
a āstikā nāstikāś caiva niyatāḥ saṃyame pare
c aprajñānaṃ tamobhūtaṃ prajñānaṃ tu prakāśatā
a bhṛtyān bhogair dviṣo daṇḍair yo yojayati so 'rthavān
c etan matimatāṃ śreṣṭha mataṃ mama yathātatham
e anayos tu nibodha tvaṃ vacanaṃ vākyakaṇṭhayoḥ
a tato dharmārthakuśalau mādrīputrāv anantaram
c nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca vākyaṃ jagadatuḥ param
a āsīnaś ca śayānaś ca vicarann api ca sthitaḥ
c arthayogaṃ dṛḍhaṃ kuryād yogair uccāvacair api
a asmiṃs tu vai susaṃvṛtte durlabhe paramapriye
c iha kāmān avāpnoti pratyakṣaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
a yo 'rtho dharmeṇa saṃyukto dharmo yaś cārthasaṃyutaḥ
c madhv ivāmṛtasaṃyuktaṃ tasmād etau matāv iha
a anarthasya na kāmo 'sti tathārtho 'dharmiṇaḥ kutaḥ
c tasmād udvijate loko dharmārthād yo bahiṣkṛtaḥ
a tasmād dharmapradhānena sādhyo 'rthaḥ saṃyatātmanā
c viśvasteṣu ca bhūteṣu kalpate sarva eva hi
a dharmaṃ samācaret pūrvaṃ tathārthaṃ dharmasaṃyutam
c tataḥ kāmaṃ caret paścāt siddhārthasya hi tat phalam
a virematus tu tad vākyam uktvā tāv aśvinoḥ sutau
c bhīmasenas tadā vākyam idaṃ vaktuṃ pracakrame
a nākāmaḥ kāmayaty arthaṃ nākāmo dharmam icchati
c nākāmaḥ kāmayāno 'sti tasmāt kāmo viśiṣyate
a kāmena yuktā ṛṣayas tapasy eva samāhitāḥ
c palāśaphalamūlāśā vāyubhakṣāḥ susaṃyatāḥ
a vedopavādeṣv apare yuktāḥ svādhyāyapāragāḥ
c śrāddhayajñakriyāyāṃ ca tathā dānapratigrahe
a vaṇijaḥ karṣakā gopāḥ kāravaḥ śilpinas tathā
c daivakarmakṛtaś caiva yuktāḥ kāmena karmasu
a samudraṃ cāviśanty anye narāḥ kāmena saṃyutāḥ
c kāmo hi vividhākāraḥ sarvaṃ kāmena saṃtatam
a nāsti nāsīn nābhaviṣyad bhūtaṃ kāmātmakāt param
c etat sāraṃ mahārāja dharmārthāv atra saṃśritau
a navanītaṃ yathā dadhnas tathā kāmo 'rthadharmataḥ
c śreyas tailaṃ ca piṇyākād dhṛtaṃ śreya udaśvitaḥ
a śreyaḥ puṣpaphalaṃ kāṣṭhāt kāmo dharmārthayor varaḥ
c puṣpato madhv iva rasaḥ kāmāt saṃjāyate sukham
d kāmo dharmārthayor yoniḥ kāmaś cātha tadātmakaḥ
d nākāmato brāhmaṇāḥ svannam arthān
d nākāmato dadati brāhmaṇebhyaḥ
d nākāmato vividhā lokaceṣṭā
d tasmāt kāmaḥ prāk trivargasya dṛṣṭaḥ
a sucāruveṣābhir alaṃkṛtābhir
madotkaṭābhiḥ priyavādinībhiḥ
c ramasva yoṣābhir upetya kāmaṃ
kāmo hi rājaṃs tarasābhipātī
a buddhir mamaiṣā pariṣat sthitasya
mā bhūd vicāras tava dharmaputra
c syāt saṃhitaṃ sadbhir aphalgusāraṃ
sametya vākyaṃ param ānṛśaṃsyam
a dharmārthakāmāḥ samam eva sevyā
yas tv ekasevī sa naro jaghanyaḥ
b trayos tu nityaṃ tv aviśeṣito hi
c dvayos tu dakṣaṃ pravadanti madhyaṃ
sa uttamo yo niratas trivarge
d vibhajya kālaṃ parisevyamānaḥ
a prājñaḥ suhṛc candanasāralipto
vicitramālyābharaṇair upetaḥ
c tato vacaḥ saṃgrahavigraheṇa
proktvā yavīyān virarāma bhīmaḥ
a tato muhūrtād atha dharmarājo
vākyāni teṣām anucintya samyak
c uvāca vācāvitathaṃ smayan vai
bahuśruto dharmabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
a niḥsaṃśayaṃ niścitadharmaśāstrāḥ
sarve bhavanto viditapramāṇāḥ
c vijñātukāmasya mameha vākyam
uktaṃ yad vai naiṣṭhikaṃ tac chrutaṃ me
e iha tv avaśyaṃ gadato mamāpi
vākyaṃ nibodhadhvam ananyabhāvāḥ
a yo vai na pāpe nirato na puṇye
nārthe na dharme manujo na kāme
c vimuktadoṣaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcanaḥ
sa mucyate duḥkhasukhārthasiddheḥ
a bhūtāni jātīmaraṇānvitāni
jarāvikāraiś ca samanvitāni
c bhūyaś ca tais taiḥ pratibodhitāni
mokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti na taṃ ca vidmaḥ
a snehe nabaddhasya na santi tānīty
evaṃ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān uvāca
c budhāś ca nirvāṇaparā vadanti
tasmān na kuryāt priyam apriyaṃ ca
a etat pradhānaṃ na tu kāmakāro
yathā niyukto 'smi tathā carāmi
c bhūtāni sarvāṇi vidhir niyuṅkte
vidhir balīyān iti vitta sarve
a na karmaṇāpnoty anavāpyam arthaṃ
yad bhāvi sarvaṃ bhavatīti vitta
c trivargahīno 'pi hi vindate 'rthaṃ
tasmād idaṃ lokahitāya guhyam
d uktaṃ hi karmaiva phalasya hetuḥ
a tatas tad agryaṃ vacanaṃ manonugaṃ
samastam ājñāya tato 'tihetumat
c tadā praṇeduś ca jaharṣire ca te
kurupravīrāya ca cakrur añjalīn
a sucāruvarṇākṣaraśabdabhūṣitāṃ
manonugāṃ nirdhutavākyakaṇṭakām
c niśamya tāṃ pārthiva pārthabhāṣitāṃ
giraṃ narendrāḥ praśaśaṃsur eva te
d sa cāpi tān dharmasuto mahāmanās
d tadā pratītān praśaśaṃsa vīryavān
e punaś ca papraccha saridvarāsutaṃ
tataḥ paraṃ dharmam ahīnasattvaḥ
e dharmārthakāmeṣu viniścayajñam
f yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kauravavaṃśagoptā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pitāmaha mahāprājña kurūṇāṃ kīrtivardhana
c praśnaṃ kaṃ cit pravakṣyāmi tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
a kīdṛśā mānavāḥ saumyāḥ kaiḥ prītiḥ paramā bhavet
c āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca ke kṣamās tān vadasva me
a na hi tatra dhanaṃ sphītaṃ na ca saṃbandhibāndhavāḥ
c tiṣṭhanti yatra suhṛdas tiṣṭhantīti matir mama
a durlabho hi suhṛc chrotā durlabhaś ca hitaḥ suhṛt
c etad dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha sarvaṃ vyākhyātum arhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a saṃdheyān puruṣān rājann asaṃdheyāṃś ca tattvataḥ
c vadato me nibodha tvaṃ nikhilena yudhiṣṭhira
a lubdhaḥ krūras tyaktadharmā nikṛtaḥ śaṭha eva ca
c kṣudraḥ pāpasamācāraḥ sarvaśaṅkī tathālasaḥ
a dīrghasūtro 'nṛjuḥ kaṣṭo gurudārapradharṣakaḥ
c vyasane yaḥ parityāgī durātmā nirapatrapaḥ
a sarvataḥ pāpadarśī ca nāstiko vedanindakaḥ
c saṃprakīrṇendriyo loke yaḥ kāmanirataś caret
a asatyo lokavidviṣṭaḥ samaye cānavasthitaḥ
c piśuno 'thākṛtaprajño matsarī pāpaniścayaḥ
a duḥśīlo 'thākṛtātmā ca nṛśaṃsaḥ kitavas tathā
c mitrair arthakṛtī nityam icchaty arthaparaś ca yaḥ
a vahataś ca yathāśakti yo na tuṣyati mandadhīḥ
c amitram iva yo bhuṅkte sadā mitraṃ nararṣabha
a asthānakrodhano yaś ca akasmāc ca virajyate
c suhṛdaś caiva kalyāṇān āśu tyajati kilbiṣī
a alpe 'py apakṛte mūḍhas tathājñānāt kṛte 'pi ca
c kāryopasevī mitreṣu mitradveṣī narādhipa
a śatrur mitramukho yaś ca jihmaprekṣī vilobhanaḥ
c na rajyati ca kalyāṇe yas tyajet tādṛśaṃ naram
a pānapo dveṣaṇaḥ krūro nirghṛṇaḥ paruṣas tathā
c paropatāpī mitradhruk tathā prāṇivadhe rataḥ
a kṛtaghnaś cādhamo loke na saṃdheyaḥ kathaṃ cana
c chidrānveṣī na saṃdheyaḥ saṃdheyān api me śṛṇu
a kulīnā vākyasaṃpannā jñānavijñānakovidāḥ
c mitrajñāś ca kṛtajñāś ca sarvajñāḥ śokavarjitāḥ
a mādhuryaguṇasaṃpannāḥ satyasaṃdhā jitendriyāḥ
