a tato 'nyasmin gate cāhni virūpākṣo 'bravīt sutam
c na prekṣe rājadharmāṇam adya putra khagottamam
a sa pūrvasaṃdhyāṃ brahmāṇaṃ vandituṃ yāti sarvadā
b aparāṃ caiva māṃ draṣṭum āyāti sa vihaṃgarāṭ
c māṃ cādṛṣṭvā kadā cit sa na gacchati gṛhān khagaḥ
a ubhe dvirātraṃ saṃdhye vai nābhyagāt sa mamālayam
c tasmān na śudhyate bhāvo mama sa jñāyatāṃ suhṛt
a svādhyāyena viyukto hi brahmavarcasavarjitaḥ
c taṃ gatas tatra me śaṅkā hanyāt taṃ sa dvijādhamaḥ
a durācāras tu durbuddhir iṅgitair lakṣito mayā
c niṣkriyo dāruṇākāraḥ kṛṣṇo dasyur ivādhamaḥ
a gautamaḥ sa gatas tatra tenodvignaṃ mano mama
c putra śīghram ito gatvā rājadharmaniveśanam
e jñāyatāṃ sa viśuddhātmā yadi jīvati māciram
a sa evam uktas tvarito rakṣobhiḥ sahito yayau
c nyagrodhaṃ tatra cāpaśyat kaṅkālaṃ rājadharmaṇaḥ
a sa rudann agamat putro rākṣasendrasya dhīmataḥ
c tvaramāṇaḥ paraṃ śaktyā gautamagrahaṇāya vai
a tato 'vidūre jagṛhur gautamaṃ rākṣasās tadā
c rājadharmaśarīraṃ ca pakṣāsthicaraṇojjhitam
a tam ādāyātha rakṣāṃsi drutaṃ meruvrajaṃ yayuḥ
c rājñaś ca darśayām āsuḥ śarīraṃ rājadharmaṇaḥ
e kṛtaghnaṃ puruṣaṃ taṃ ca gautamaṃ pāpacetasam
a ruroda rājā taṃ dṛṣṭvā sāmātyaḥ sapurohitaḥ
c ārtanādaś ca sumahān abhūt tasya niveśane
a sastrīkumāraṃ ca puraṃ babhūvāsvasthamānasam
c athābravīn nṛpaḥ putraṃ pāpo 'yaṃ vadhyatām iti
a asya māṃsair ime sarve viharantu yatheṣṭataḥ
c pāpācāraḥ pāpakarmā pāpātmā pāpaniścayaḥ
e hantavyo 'yaṃ mama matir bhavadbhir iti rākṣasāḥ
a ity uktā rākṣasendreṇa rākṣasā ghoravikramāḥ
c naicchanta taṃ bhakṣayituṃ pāpakarmāyam ity uta
a dasyūnāṃ dīyatām eṣa sādhv adya puruṣādhamaḥ
c ity ūcus taṃ mahārāja rākṣasendraṃ niśācarāḥ
a śirobhiś ca gatā bhūmim ūcū rakṣogaṇādhipam
c na dātum arhasi tvaṃ no bhakṣaṇāyāsya kilbiṣam
a evam astv iti tān āha rākṣasendro niśācarān
c dasyūnāṃ dīyatām eṣa kṛtaghno 'dyaiva rākṣasāḥ
a ity ukte tasya te dāsāḥ śūlamudgarapāṇayaḥ
c chittvā taṃ khaṇḍaśaḥ pāpaṃ dasyubhyaḥ pradadus tadā
a dasyavaś cāpi naicchanta tam attuṃ pāpakāriṇam
c kravyādā api rājendra kṛtaghnaṃ nopabhuñjate
a brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā
c niṣkṛtir vihitā rājan kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
a mitradrohī nṛśaṃsaś ca kṛtaghnaś ca narādhamaḥ
c kravyādaiḥ kṛmibhiś cānyair na bhujyante hi tādṛśāḥ
d nyagrodhe rājadharmāṇam apaśyan nihataṃ tataḥ
d ruditvā bahu tat tad vai vilapya ca sa rākṣasaḥ
d gato roṣasamāviṣṭo gautamagrahaṇāya vai
d gṛhīto gautamaḥ pāpo rakṣobhiḥ krodhamūrchitaiḥ
d rājadharmaśarīrasya kaṅkālaṃ cāpy atho dhṛtam
d merupṛṣṭhe ca nagaraṃ yātudhānās tato gatāḥ
d krodharaktekṣaṇā ghorā gautamasya vadhe dhṛtāḥ
d pārthivasyāgrato nyastaḥ kaṅkālo rājadharmaṇaḥ
d taṃ dṛṣṭvā vimanā rājā sāmātyaḥ sagaṇo 'bhavat
d ārtanādo mahān āsīd gṛhe tasya mahātmanaḥ
d strīsaṃghasya tadā rājan nihate kāśyapātmaje
d rākṣasā ūcuḥ
d rājā caivābravīt putraṃ pāpo 'yaṃ vadhyatām iti
d asya māṃsaṃ vayaṃ sarve khādiṣyāmaḥ samāgatāḥ
d pāpakṛt pāpakarmā ca pāpātmā pāpam āsthitaḥ
d virūpākṣa uvāca
d hantavya eva pāpātmā kṛtaghno nātra saṃśayaḥ
d kṛtaghnaṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ na bhakṣayitum utsahe
d dāsebhyo dīyatām eṣa mitradhruk puruṣādhamaḥ
d bhīṣma uvāca
d dāsāḥ sarve samāhūtā yātudhānās tathāpare
d necchanti sma kṛtaghnaṃ taṃ khādituṃ puruṣottama
d śirobhiś ca gatā bhūmiṃ mahārāja tato balāt
d mā nārthaṃ jātanirbandhaṃ kilbiṣaṃ dātum arhasi
d yātudhānā nṛpeṇoktāḥ pāpakarmā viśasyatām
d bhakṣyatāṃ tyajyatāṃ vāyaṃ darśanān me 'panīyatām
d tatas te ruṣitā dāsāḥ śūlapaṭṭasapāṇayaḥ
d khaṇḍaśo vikṛtaṃ hatvā kravyādbhyo hy adadus tadā
d kravyādās tv api rājendra necchanti piśitāśanāḥ
d mṛtān api hi kravyādāḥ kṛtaghnān nopabhuñjate
d brahmasvaharaṇe core brahmaghne gurutalpage
d niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
d mitradruhaṃ kṛtaghnaṃ ca nṛśaṃsaṃ ca narādhamam
d kravyādāḥ krimayaś caiva nopabhuñjanti vai sadā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataś citāṃ bakapateḥ kārayām āsa rākṣasaḥ
c ratnair gandhaiś ca bahubhir vastraiś ca samalaṃkṛtām
a tatra prajvālya nṛpate bakarājaṃ pratāpavān
c pretakāryāṇi vidhivad rākṣasendraś cakāra ha
a tasmin kāle 'tha surabhir devī dākṣāyaṇī śubhā
c upariṣṭāt tatas tasya sā babhūva payasvinī
a tasyā vaktrāc cyutaḥ phenaḥ kṣīramiśras tadānagha
c so 'patad vai tatas tasyāṃ citāyāṃ rājadharmaṇaḥ
a tataḥ saṃjīvitas tena bakarājas tadānagha
c utpatya ca sameyāya virūpākṣaṃ bakādhipaḥ
a tato 'bhyayād devarājo virūpākṣapuraṃ tadā
c prāha cedaṃ virūpākṣaṃ diṣṭyāyaṃ jīvatīty uta
a śrāvayām āsa cendras taṃ virūpākṣaṃ purātanam
c yathā śāpaḥ purā datto brahmaṇā rājadharmaṇaḥ
a yadā bakapatī rājan brahmāṇaṃ nopasarpati
c tato roṣād idaṃ prāha bakendrāya pitāmahaḥ
a yasmān mūḍho mama sado nāgato 'sau bakādhamaḥ
c tasmād vadhaṃ sa duṣṭātmā nacirāt samavāpsyati
a tadāyaṃ tasya vacanān nihato gautamena vai
c tenaivāmṛtasiktaś ca punaḥ saṃjīvito bakaḥ
a rājadharmā tataḥ prāha praṇipatya puraṃdaram
c yadi te 'nugrahakṛtā mayi buddhiḥ puraṃdara
e sakhāyaṃ me sudayitaṃ gautamaṃ jīvayety uta
a tasya vākyaṃ samājñāya vāsavaḥ puruṣarṣabha
c saṃjīvayitvā sakhye vai prādāt taṃ gautamaṃ tadā
a sabhāṇḍopaskaraṃ rājaṃs tam āsādya bakādhipaḥ
c saṃpariṣvajya suhṛdaṃ prītyā paramayā yutaḥ
a atha taṃ pāpakarmāṇaṃ rājadharmā bakādhipaḥ
c visarjayitvā sadhanaṃ praviveśa svam ālayam
a yathocitaṃ ca sa bako yayau brahmasadas tadā
b brahmātha svasabhāprāptaṃ bakaṃ dharmaparāyaṇam
c brahmā ca taṃ mahātmānam ātithyenābhyapūjayat
a gautamaś cāpi saṃprāpya punas taṃ śabarālayam
c śūdrāyāṃ janayām āsa putrān duṣkṛtakāriṇaḥ
a śāpaś ca sumahāṃs tasya dattaḥ suragaṇais tadā
c kukṣau punarbhvāṃ bhāryāyāṃ janayitvā cirāt sutān
e nirayaṃ prāpsyati mahat kṛtaghno 'yam iti prabho
a etat prāha purā sarvaṃ nārado mama bhārata
c saṃsmṛtya cāpi sumahad ākhyānaṃ puruṣarṣabha
e mayāpi bhavate sarvaṃ yathāvad upavarṇitam
a kutaḥ kṛtaghnasya yaśaḥ kutaḥ sthānaṃ kutaḥ sukham
c aśraddheyaḥ kṛtaghno hi kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
a mitradroho na kartavyaḥ puruṣeṇa viśeṣataḥ
c mitradhruṅ nirayaṃ ghoram anantaṃ pratipadyate
a kṛtajñena sadā bhāvyaṃ mitrakāmena cānagha
c mitrāt prabhavate satyaṃ mitrāt prabhavate balam
d mitrād bhogāṃś ca bhuñjīta mitreṇāpatsu mucyate
e satkārair uttamair mitraṃ pūjayeta vicakṣaṇaḥ
f bhīṣma uvāca
f vidvān saṃskārayām āsa pārthivo rājadharmaṇaḥ
f gandhair bahubhir avyagro dāhayām āsa taṃ dvijam
f tasya devasya vacanād indrasya bakarāḍ iha
f tenaivāmṛtasiktaś ca punaḥ saṃjīvito bakaḥ
f rājadharmāpi taṃ prāha sahasrākṣam ariṃdamam
f gautamo brāhmaṇaḥ kvāsau mucyatāṃ matpriyaḥ sakhā
f tasya vākyaṃ samājñāya kauśikaḥ surasattamaḥ
f gautamaṃ hy abhyanujñāpya prīto 'tha gamanotsukaḥ
f pratītaḥ sa gataḥ saumyo rājadharmā svam ālayam
f nṛśaṃso gautamo mukto mitradhruk puruṣādhamaḥ
f sabhāṇḍopaskaro yātaḥ sa tadā śabarālayam
f tatrāsau śabarīdehe prasūto nirayopame
f eṣa śāpo mahāṃs tatra muktaḥ suragaṇais tathā
f dagdho rākṣasarājena khagarājaḥ pratāpavān
f citāyāḥ pārśvato dogdhrī surabhir jīvayac ca tam
f tasyā vaktrāc cyutaḥ pheno dugdhamātraṃ tadānagha
f samīraṇāhṛto yātaś citāṃ tāṃ rājadharmaṇaḥ
f devarājas tataḥ prāpto virūpākṣapuraṃ tadā
f virūpākṣo 'pi taṃ prāptaṃ devarājaṃ samāgamat
f kāśyapasya suto deva bhrātā me jīvatām iti
f kauśikas tv abravīt sarvaṃ prīyamāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
f brahmaṇā vyāhṛto roṣād rājadharmā kadā cana
f yasmāt tvaṃ nāgato draṣṭuṃ mama nityam imāṃ sabhām
f tasmād bako bhavān bhāvī dharmaśīlaḥ purāṇavit
f āgamiṣyati te vāsaṃ kadā cit pāpakarmakṛt
f śabarāvāsago vipraḥ kṛtaghno vṛṣalīpatiḥ
f yadā nihantā mokṣas te tadā bhāvīty uvāca tam
f tasmād eva gato lokaṃ brahmaṇaḥ parameṣṭhinaḥ
f sa cāpi nirayaṃ prāpto duṣkṛtiḥ kulapāṃsanaḥ
f etac chrutvā mahad vākyaṃ sanmadhye nāraderitam
f mayāpi tava rājendra yathāvad anuvarṇitam
f brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhraṣṭavrate tathā
f niṣkṛtir vihitā rājan kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
f kutaḥ kṛtaghnasya yaśaḥ kutaḥ sthānaṃ kutaḥ sukham
f aśraddheyaḥ kṛtaghno hi kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
f mitradroho na kartavyaḥ puruṣeṇa viśeṣataḥ
f mitradhruṅ nirayaṃ ghoraṃ narakaṃ pratipadyate
f kṛtajñena sadā bhāvyaṃ mitrabhāvena cānagha
f mitrāt prabhavate sarvaṃ mitraṃ dhanyam iti smṛtam
f arthād vā mitralābhād vā mitralābho viśiṣyate
f sulabhā mitrato 'rthās tu mitreṇa yatituṃ kṣamam
f mitraṃ cābhimataṃ snigdhaṃ phalaṃ cāpi satāṃ phalam
f satkāraiḥ svajanopetaiḥ pūjayeta vicakṣaṇaḥ
f abhraśyāmaḥ piṅgajaṭābaddhakalāpaḥ
f prāṃśur daṇḍī kṛṣṇamṛgatvakparidhānaḥ
f sākṣāl lokān pāvayamānaḥ kavimukhyaḥ
f pārāśaryaḥ parvasu rūpaṃ vivṛṇotu
f tayaiva jīvitaṃ pāpaṃ svadeśagamanotsukam
f śaśāpa śabarīdehe prasūto 'yaṃ bhavatv iti
f kukṣau punarbhuvā pāpaḥ sutān ajanayat tathā
f tasmād bakaṃ gṛhe hantā brāhmaṇaḥ pāpabandhanaḥ
f bandho bhavatu ghoraiś ca pāśair nāgamayair bhṛśam
f virūpākṣo 'tha saṃvṛttaṃ śrutvā vākyam apūjayat
f śakraṃ ca brahmaṇaḥ pārśvaṃ tayā tena sahāvrajat
f gautamo nirayaṃ prāptas tatsaṃbandhād bakas tathā
f duḥkhaṃ rākṣasarājñaś ca dravyadānāc chramānvitaḥ
f etac chrutvā tato vākyaṃ bhīṣmeṇoktaṃ mahātmanā
f yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prītamanā bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sadā
a parityājyo budhaiḥ pāpaḥ kṛtaghno nirapatrapaḥ
c mitradrohī kulāṅgāraḥ pāpakarmā narādhamaḥ
a eṣa dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha proktaḥ pāpo mayā tava
c mitradrohī kṛtaghno vai kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a etac chrutvā tadā vākyaṃ bhīṣmeṇoktaṃ mahātmanā
c yudhiṣṭhiraḥ prītamanā babhūva janamejaya
 nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam
 devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
 śuklāmbaradharaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaśivarṇaṃ caturbhujam
 prasannavadanaṃ dhyāyet sarvavighnopaśāntaye
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dharmāḥ pitāmahenoktā rājadharmāśritāḥ śubhāḥ
c dharmam āśramiṇāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vaktum arhasi pārthiva
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sarvatra vihito dharmaḥ svargyaḥ satyaphalaṃ tapaḥ
c bahudvārasya dharmasya nehāsti viphalā kriyā
a yasmin yasmiṃs tu vinaye yo yo yāti viniścayam
c sa tam evābhijānāti nānyaṃ bharatasattama
a yathā yathā ca paryeti lokatantram asāravat
c tathā tathā virāgo 'tra jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ
a evaṃ vyavasite loke bahudoṣe yudhiṣṭhira
c ātmamokṣanimittaṃ vai yateta matimān naraḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a naṣṭe dhane vā dāre vā putre pitari vā mṛte
c yayā buddhyā nudec chokaṃ tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a naṣṭe dhane vā dāre vā putre pitari vā mṛte
c aho duḥkham iti dhyāyañ śokasyāpacitiṃ caret
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c yathā senajitaṃ vipraḥ kaś cid ity abravīd vacaḥ
a putraśokābhisaṃtaptaṃ rājānaṃ śokavihvalam
c viṣaṇṇavadanaṃ dṛṣṭvā vipro vacanam abravīt
a kiṃ nu khalv asi mūḍhas tvaṃ śocyaḥ kim anuśocasi
c yadā tvām api śocantaḥ śocyā yāsyanti tāṃ gatim
a tvaṃ caivāhaṃ ca ye cānye tvāṃ rājan paryupāsate
c sarve tatra gamiṣyāmo yata evāgatā vayam
 senajid uvāca
a kā buddhiḥ kiṃ tapo vipra kaḥ samādhis tapodhana
c kiṃ jñānaṃ kiṃ śrutaṃ vā te yat prāpya na viṣīdasi
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
 hṛṣyantam avasīdantaṃ sukhaduḥkhaviparyaye
 ātmānam anuśocāmi yo mamaiṣa hṛdi sthitaḥ
a paśya bhūtāni duḥkhena vyatiṣaktāni sarvaśaḥ
b uttamādhamamadhyāni teṣu teṣv iha karmasu
b aham eko na me kaś cin nāham anyasya kasya cit
b na taṃ paśyāmi yasyāhaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi yo mama
c ātmāpi cāyaṃ na mama sarvā vā pṛthivī mama
a yathā mama tathānyeṣām iti buddhyā na me vyathā
c etāṃ buddhim ahaṃ prāpya na prahṛṣye na ca vyathe
a yathā kāṣṭhaṃ ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca sameyātāṃ mahodadhau
c sametya ca vyapeyātāṃ tadvad bhūtasamāgamaḥ
a evaṃ putrāś ca pautrāś ca jñātayo bāndhavās tathā
c teṣu sneho na kartavyo viprayogo hi tair dhruvam
a adarśanād āpatitaḥ punaś cādarśanaṃ gataḥ
c na tvāsau veda na tvaṃ taṃ kaḥ san kam anuśocasi
a tṛṣṇārtiprabhavaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhārtiprabhavaṃ sukham
c sukhāt saṃjāyate duḥkham evam etat punaḥ punaḥ
e sukhasyānantaraṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhasyānantaraṃ sukham
f sukhaduḥkhe manuṣyāṇāṃ cakravat parivartataḥ
a sukhāt tvaṃ duḥkham āpannaḥ punar āpatsyase sukham
c na nityaṃ labhate duḥkhaṃ na nityaṃ labhate sukham
d śarīram evāyatanaṃ sukhasya
d duḥkhasya cāpy āyatanaṃ śarīram
d yad yac charīreṇa karoti karma
d tenaiva dehī samupāśnute tat
d jīvitaṃ ca śarīraṃ ca jātyaiva saha jāyate
d ubhe saha vivardhete ubhe saha vinaśyataḥ
d snehapāśair bahuvidhair āviṣṭaviṣayā janāḥ
d akṛtārthāś ca sīdante jalaiḥ saikatasetavaḥ
d snehena tilavat sarvaṃ sargacakre nipīḍyate
d tilapīḍair ivākramya kleśair ajñānasaṃbhavaiḥ
d saṃcinoty aśubhaṃ karma kalatrāpekṣayā naraḥ
d ekaḥ kleśān avāpnoti paratreha ca mānavaḥ
d putradārakuṭumbeṣu prasaktāḥ sarvamānavāḥ
d śokapaṅkārṇave magnā jīrṇā vanagajā iva
d putranāśe vittanāśe jñātisaṃbandhinām api
d prāpyate sumahad duḥkhaṃ dāvāgnipratimaṃ vibho
d daivāyattam idaṃ sarvaṃ sukhaduḥkhe bhavābhavau
d asuhṛt sasuhṛc cāpi saśatrur mitravān api
d saprajñaḥ prajñayā hīno daivena labhate sukham
a nālaṃ sukhāya suhṛdo nālaṃ duḥkhāya śatravaḥ
c na ca prajñālam arthānāṃ na sukhānām alaṃ dhanam
a na buddhir dhanalābhāya na jāḍyam asamṛddhaye
c lokaparyāyavṛttāntaṃ prājño jānāti netaraḥ
a buddhimantaṃ ca mūḍhaṃ ca śūraṃ bhīruṃ jaḍaṃ kavim
c durbalaṃ balavantaṃ ca bhāginaṃ bhajate sukham
a dhenur vatsasya gopasya svāminas taskarasya ca
c payaḥ pibati yas tasyā dhenus tasyeti niścayaḥ
a ye ca mūḍhatamā loke ye ca buddheḥ paraṃ gatāḥ
c te narāḥ sukham edhante kliśyaty antarito janaḥ
a antyeṣu remire dhīrā na te madhyeṣu remire
c antyaprāptiṃ sukhām āhur duḥkham antaram antayoḥ
d sukhaṃ svapiti durmedhāḥ svāni karmāṇy acintayan
d avijñānena mahatā kambaleneva saṃvṛtaḥ
a ye tu buddhisukhaṃ prāptā dvaṃdvātītā vimatsarāḥ
c tān naivārthā na cānarthā vyathayanti kadā cana
a atha ye buddhim aprāptā vyatikrāntāś ca mūḍhatām
c te 'tivelaṃ prahṛṣyanti saṃtāpam upayānti ca
a nityapramuditā mūḍhā divi devagaṇā iva
c avalepena mahatā paridṛbdhā vicetasaḥ
a sukhaṃ duḥkhāntam ālasyaṃ duḥkhaṃ dākṣyaṃ sukhodayam
c bhūtiś caiva śriyā sārdhaṃ dakṣe vasati nālase
a sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ dveṣyaṃ vā yadi vā priyam
c prāptaṃ prāptam upāsīta hṛdayenāparājitaḥ
a śokasthānasahasrāṇi harṣasthānaśatāni ca
c divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
a buddhimantaṃ kṛtaprajñaṃ śuśrūṣum anasūyakam
c dāntaṃ jitendriyaṃ cāpi śoko na spṛśate naram
a etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya guptacittaś cared budhaḥ
b śuklakṛṣṇagatijñaṃ taṃ devāsuravinirgamam
c udayāstamayajñaṃ hi na śokaḥ spraṣṭum arhati
a yannimittaṃ bhavec chokas trāso vā duḥkham eva vā
c āyāso vā yatomūlas tad ekāṅgam api tyajet
a yad yat tyajati kāmānāṃ tat sukhasyābhipūryate
c kāmānusārī puruṣaḥ kāmān anu vinaśyati
a yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham
c tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṃ kalām
a pūrvadehakṛtaṃ karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
c prājñaṃ mūḍhaṃ tathā śūraṃ bhajate yādṛśaṃ kṛtam
a evam eva kilaitāni priyāṇy evāpriyāṇi ca
c jīveṣu parivartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
a tad evaṃ buddhim āsthāya sukhaṃ jīved guṇānvitaḥ
c sarvān kāmāñ jugupseta saṅgān kurvīta pṛṣṭhataḥ
e vṛtta eṣa hṛdi prauḍho mṛtyur eṣa manomayaḥ
f krodho nāma śarīrastho dehināṃ procyate budhaiḥ
a yadā saṃharate kāmān kūrmo 'ṅgānīva sarvaśaḥ
c tadātmajyotir ātmā ca ātmany eva prasīdati
a kiṃ cid eva mamatvena yadā bhavati kalpitam
c tad eva paritāpārthaṃ sarvaṃ saṃpadyate tadā
a na bibheti yadā cāyaṃ yadā cāsmān na bibhyati
c yadā necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā śokānandau bhayābhaye
c priyāpriye parityajya praśāntātmā bhaviṣyasi
a yadā na kurute dhīraḥ sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
c karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
c yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
a atra piṅgalayā gītā gāthāḥ śrūyanti pārthiva
c yathā sā kṛcchrakāle 'pi lebhe dharmaṃ sanātanam
a saṃkete piṅgalā veśyā kāntenāsīd vinākṛtā
c atha kṛcchragatā śāntāṃ buddhim āsthāpayat tadā
 piṅgalovāca
a unmattāham anunmattaṃ kāntam anvavasaṃ ciram
c antike ramaṇaṃ santaṃ nainam adhyagamaṃ purā
a ekasthūṇaṃ navadvāram apidhāsyāmy agārakam
c kā hi kāntam ihāyāntam ayaṃ kānteti maṃsyate
a akāmāḥ kāmarūpeṇa dhūrtā narakarūpiṇaḥ
c na punar vañcayiṣyanti pratibuddhāsmi jāgṛmi
a anartho 'pi bhavaty artho daivāt pūrvakṛtena vā
c saṃbuddhāhaṃ nirākārā nāham adyājitendriyā
a sukhaṃ nirāśaḥ svapiti nairāśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham
c āśām anāśāṃ kṛtvā hi sukhaṃ svapiti piṅgalā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etaiś cānyaiś ca viprasya hetumadbhiḥ prabhāṣitaiḥ
c paryavasthāpito rājā senajin mumude sukham
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a atikrāmati kāle 'smin sarvabhūtakṣayāvahe
c kiṃ śreyaḥ pratipadyeta tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c pituḥ putreṇa saṃvādaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a dvijāteḥ kasya cit pārtha svādhyāyaniratasya vai
c babhūva putro medhāvī medhāvī nāma nāmataḥ
a so 'bravīt pitaraṃ putraḥ svādhyāyakaraṇe ratam
c mokṣadharmārthakuśalo lokatattvavicakṣaṇaḥ
a dhīraḥ kiṃ svit tāta kuryāt prajānan
kṣipraṃ hy āyur bhraśyate mānavānām
c pitas tad ācakṣva yathārthayogaṃ
mamānupūrvyā yena dharmaṃ careyam
 pitovāca
a vedān adhītya brahmacaryeṇa putra
putrān icchet pāvanārthaṃ pitṝṇām
c agnīn ādhāya vidhivac ceṣṭayajño
vanaṃ praviśyātha munir bubhūṣet
 putra uvāca
a evam abhyāhate loke samantāt parivārite
c amoghāsu patantīṣu kiṃ dhīra iva bhāṣase
 pitovāca
a katham abhyāhato lokaḥ kena vā parivāritaḥ
c amoghāḥ kāḥ patantīha kiṃ nu bhīṣayasīva mām
 putra uvāca
a mṛtyunābhyāhato loko jarayā parivāritaḥ
c ahorātrāḥ patanty ete nanu kasmān na budhyase
d amoghā rātrayaś cāpi nityam āyānti yānti ca
a yadāham etaj jānāmi na mṛtyus tiṣṭhatīti ha
c so 'haṃ kathaṃ pratīkṣiṣye jālenāpihitaś caran
a rātryāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyām āyur alpataraṃ yadā
c gādhodake matsya iva sukhaṃ vindeta kas tadā
d yām eva rātriṃ prathamāṃ garbho bhajati mātaram
d tām eva rātriṃ prasthāti maraṇāya nivartakaḥ
d yasyāṃ rātryāṃ vyatītāyāṃ na kiṃ cic chubham ācaret
e tad eva vandhyaṃ divasam iti vidyād vicakṣaṇaḥ
a anavāpteṣu kāmeṣu mṛtyur abhyeti mānavam
c śaṣpāṇīva vicinvantam anyatragatamānasam
e vṛkīvoraṇam āsādya mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
a adyaiva kuru yac chreyo mā tvā kālo 'tyagād ayam
c akṛteṣv eva kāryeṣu mṛtyur vai saṃprakarṣati
a śvaḥkāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikam
c na hi pratīkṣate mṛtyuḥ kṛtaṃ vāsya na vā kṛtam
d niyato dehināṃ mṛtyur animittaṃ hi jīvitam
e ko hi jānāti kasyādya mṛtyusenā nivekṣyate
f na mṛtyur āmantrayate hartukāmo jagatprabhuḥ
f abuddha evākramate mīnān mīnagraho yathā
a yuvaiva dharmaśīlaḥ syād animittaṃ hi jīvitam
c kṛte dharme bhavet kīrtir iha pretya ca vai sukham
a mohena hi samāviṣṭaḥ putradārārtham udyataḥ
c kṛtvā kāryam akāryaṃ vā puṣṭim eṣāṃ prayacchati
a taṃ putrapaśusaṃmattaṃ vyāsaktamanasaṃ naram
c suptaṃ vyāghraṃ mahaugho vā mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
a saṃcinvānakam evaikaṃ kāmānām avitṛptakam
c vyāghraḥ paśum ivādāya mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
a idaṃ kṛtam idaṃ kāryam idam anyat kṛtākṛtam
c evam īhāsukhāsaktaṃ kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśe
a kṛtānāṃ phalam aprāptaṃ karmaṇāṃ phalasaṅginam
c kṣetrāpaṇagṛhāsaktaṃ mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
d durbalaṃ balavantaṃ ca śūraṃ bhīruṃ jaḍaṃ kavim
d aprāptasarvakāmārthaṃ mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
d idaṃ me syād idaṃ me syād ity evaṃmanaso narān
d anavāpteṣu kāmeṣu kṛtāntaḥ kurute vaśe
a mṛtyur jarā ca vyādhiś ca duḥkhaṃ cānekakāraṇam
c anuṣaktaṃ yadā dehe kiṃ svastha iva tiṣṭhasi
a jātam evāntako 'ntāya jarā cānveti dehinam
c anuṣaktā dvayenaite bhāvāḥ sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ
a mṛtyor vā gṛham evaitad yā grāme vasato ratiḥ
c devānām eṣa vai goṣṭho yad araṇyam iti śrutiḥ
a nibandhanī rajjur eṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥ
c chittvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥ
a na hiṃsayati yaḥ prāṇān manovākkāyahetubhiḥ
c jīvitārthāpanayanaiḥ karmabhir na sa badhyate
a na mṛtyusenām āyāntīṃ jātu kaś cit prabādhate
c ṛte satyam asaṃtyājyaṃ satye hy amṛtam āśritam
a tasmāt satyavratācāraḥ satyayogaparāyaṇaḥ
c satyārāmaḥ samo dāntaḥ satyenaivāntakaṃ jayet
a amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuś ca dvayaṃ dehe pratiṣṭhitam
c mṛtyum āpadyate mohāt satyenāpadyate 'mṛtam
a so 'haṃ hy ahiṃsraḥ satyārthī kāmakrodhabahiṣkṛtaḥ
c samaduḥkhasukhaḥ kṣemī mṛtyuṃ hāsyāmy amartyavat
a śāntiyajñarato dānto brahmayajñe sthito muniḥ
c vāṅmanaḥkarmayajñaś ca bhaviṣyāmy udagāyane
a paśuyajñaiḥ kathaṃ hiṃsrair mādṛśo yaṣṭum arhati
c antavadbhir uta prājñaḥ kṣatrayajñaiḥ piśācavat
a yasya vāṅmanasī syātāṃ samyak praṇihite sadā
c tapas tyāgaś ca yogaś ca sa vai sarvam avāpnuyāt
a nāsti vidyāsamaṃ cakṣur nāsti vidyāsamaṃ balam
c nāsti rāgasamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukham
a ātmany evātmanā jāta ātmaniṣṭho 'prajo 'pi vā
c ātmany eva bhaviṣyāmi na māṃ tārayati prajā
a naitādṛśaṃ brāhmaṇasyāsti vittaṃ
yathaikatā samatā satyatā ca
c śīle sthitir daṇḍanidhānam ārjavaṃ
tatas tataś coparamaḥ kriyābhyaḥ
a kiṃ te dhanair bāndhavair vāpi kiṃ te
kiṃ te dārair brāhmaṇa yo mariṣyasi
c ātmānam anviccha guhāṃ praviṣṭaṃ
pitāmahas te kva gataḥ pitā ca
 bhīṣma uvāca
a putrasyaitad vacaḥ śrutvā tathākārṣīt pitā nṛpa
c tathā tvam api vartasva satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dhanino vādhanā ye ca vartayanti svatantriṇaḥ
c sukhaduḥkhāgamas teṣāṃ kaḥ kathaṃ vā pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c śamyākena vimuktena gītaṃ śāntigatena ha
a abravīn māṃ purā kaś cid brāhmaṇas tyāgam āsthitaḥ
c kliśyamānaḥ kudāreṇa kucailena bubhukṣayā
a utpannam iha loke vai janmaprabhṛti mānavam
c vividhāny upavartante duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
a tayor ekatare mārge yady enam abhisaṃnayet
c na sukhaṃ prāpya saṃhṛṣyen na duḥkhaṃ prāpya saṃjvaret
a na vai carasi yac chreya ātmano vā yad īhase
c akāmātmāpi hi sadā dhuram udyamya caiva hi
a akiṃcanaḥ paripatan sukham āsvādayiṣyasi
c akiṃcanaḥ sukhaṃ śete samuttiṣṭhati caiva hi
a ākiṃcanyaṃ sukhaṃ loke pathyaṃ śivam anāmayam
c anamitram atho hy etad durlabhaṃ sulabhaṃ satām
a akiṃcanasya śuddhasya upapannasya sarvaśaḥ
c avekṣamāṇas trīṃl lokān na tulyam upalakṣaye
a ākiṃcanyaṃ ca rājyaṃ ca tulayā samatolayam
c atyaricyata dāridryaṃ rājyād api guṇādhikam
a ākiṃcanye ca rājye ca viśeṣaḥ sumahān ayam
c nityodvigno hi dhanavān mṛtyor āsyagato yathā
a naivāsyāgnir na cādityo na mṛtyur na ca dasyavaḥ
c prabhavanti dhanajyāninirmuktasya nirāśiṣaḥ
a taṃ vai sadā kāmacaram anupastīrṇaśāyinam
c bāhūpadhānaṃ śāmyantaṃ praśaṃsanti divaukasaḥ
a dhanavān krodhalobhābhyām āviṣṭo naṣṭacetanaḥ
c tiryagīkṣaḥ śuṣkamukhaḥ pāpako bhrukuṭīmukhaḥ
a nirdaśaṃś cādharoṣṭhaṃ ca kruddho dāruṇabhāṣitā
c kas tam icchet paridraṣṭuṃ dātum icchati cen mahīm
a śriyā hy abhīkṣṇaṃ saṃvāso mohayaty avicakṣaṇam
c sā tasya cittaṃ harati śāradābhram ivānilaḥ
a athainaṃ rūpamānaś ca dhanamānaś ca vindati
c abhijāto 'smi siddho 'smi nāsmi kevalamānuṣaḥ
e ity ebhiḥ kāraṇais tasya tribhiś cittaṃ prasicyate
a sa prasiktamanā bhogān visṛjya pitṛsaṃcitān
c parikṣīṇaḥ parasvānām ādānaṃ sādhu manyate
a tam atikrāntamaryādam ādadānaṃ tatas tataḥ
c pratiṣedhanti rājāno lubdhā mṛgam iveṣubhiḥ
a evam etāni duḥkhāni tāni tānīha mānavam
c vividhāny upavartante gātrasaṃsparśajāni ca
a teṣāṃ paramaduḥkhānāṃ buddhyā bhaiṣajyam ācaret
c lokadharmaṃ samājñāya dhruvāṇām adhruvaiḥ saha
a nātyaktvā sukham āpnoti nātyaktvā vindate param
c nātyaktvā cābhayaḥ śete tyaktvā sarvaṃ sukhī bhava
a ity etad dhāstinapure brāhmaṇenopavarṇitam
c śamyākena purā mahyaṃ tasmāt tyāgaḥ paro mataḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a īhamānaḥ samārambhān yadi nāsādayed dhanam
c dhanatṛṣṇābhibhūtaś ca kiṃ kurvan sukham āpnuyāt
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sarvasāmyam anāyāsaḥ satyavākyaṃ ca bhārata
c nirvedaś cāvivitsā ca yasya syāt sa sukhī naraḥ
a etāny eva padāny āhuḥ pañca vṛddhāḥ praśāntaye
c eṣa svargaś ca dharmaś ca sukhaṃ cānuttamaṃ satām
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c nirvedān maṅkinā gītaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a īhamāno dhanaṃ maṅkir bhagnehaś ca punaḥ punaḥ
c kena cid dhanaśeṣeṇa krītavān damyagoyugam
a susaṃbaddhau tu tau damyau damanāyābhiniḥsṛtau
c āsīnam uṣṭraṃ madhyena sahasaivābhyadhāvatām
a tayoḥ saṃprāptayor uṣṭraḥ skandhadeśam amarṣaṇaḥ
c utthāyotkṣipya tau damyau prasasāra mahājavaḥ
a hriyamāṇau tu tau damyau tenoṣṭreṇa pramāthinā
c mriyamāṇau ca saṃprekṣya maṅkis tatrābravīd idam
a na caivāvihitaṃ śakyaṃ dakṣeṇāpīhituṃ dhanam
c yuktena śraddhayā samyag īhāṃ samanutiṣṭhatā
a kṛtasya pūrvaṃ cānarthair yuktasyāpy anutiṣṭhataḥ
c imaṃ paśyata saṃgatyā mama daivam upaplavam
a udyamyodyamya me damyau viṣameṇeva gacchati
c utkṣipya kākatālīyam unmātheneva jambukaḥ
d utpathenaiva dhāvantam utpathenaiva dhāvataḥ
a maṇī voṣṭrasya lambete priyau vatsatarau mama
c śuddhaṃ hi daivam evedam ato naivāsti pauruṣam
a yadi vāpy upapadyeta pauruṣaṃ nāma karhi cit
c anviṣyamāṇaṃ tad api daivam evāvatiṣṭhate
a tasmān nirveda eveha gantavyaḥ sukham īpsatā
c sukhaṃ svapiti nirviṇṇo nirāśaś cārthasādhane
a aho samyak śukenoktaṃ sarvataḥ parimucyatā
c pratiṣṭhatā mahāraṇyaṃ janakasya niveśanāt
a yaḥ kāmān prāpnuyāt sarvān yaś cainān kevalāṃs tyajet
c prāpaṇāt sarvakāmānāṃ parityāgo viśiṣyate
a nāntaṃ sarvavivitsānāṃ gatapūrvo 'sti kaś cana
c śarīre jīvite caiva tṛṣṇā mandasya vardhate
a nivartasva vivitsābhyaḥ śāmya nirvidya māmaka
c asakṛc cāsi nikṛto na ca nirvidyase tano
a yadi nāhaṃ vināśyas te yady evaṃ ramase mayā
c mā māṃ yojaya lobhena vṛthā tvaṃ vittakāmuka
a saṃcitaṃ saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ naṣṭaṃ tava punaḥ punaḥ
c kadā vimokṣyase mūḍha dhanehāṃ dhanakāmuka
d paripanthika sarvasya śreyasaḥ pāpasaṃśraya
a aho nu mama bāliśyaṃ yo 'haṃ krīḍanakas tava
b kleśair nānāvidhair nityaṃ saṃyojayasi nirghṛṇa
c kiṃ naiva jātu puruṣaḥ pareṣāṃ preṣyatām iyāt
a na pūrve nāpare jātu kāmānām antam āpnuvan
c tyaktvā sarvasamārambhān pratibuddho 'smi jāgṛmi
a nūnaṃ te hṛdayaṃ kāma vajrasāramayaṃ dṛdham
c yad anarthaśatāviṣṭaṃ śatadhā na vidīryate
a tyajāmi kāma tvāṃ caiva yac ca kiṃ cit priyaṃ tava
c tavāhaṃ sukham anvicchann ātmany upalabhe sukham
a kāma jānāmi te mūlaṃ saṃkalpāt kila jāyase
c na tvāṃ saṃkalpayiṣyāmi samūlo na bhaviṣyasi
a īhā dhanasya na sukhā labdhvā cintā ca bhūyasī
c labdhanāśo yathā mṛtyur labdhaṃ bhavati vā na vā
a paretya yo na labhate tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim
c na ca tuṣyati labdhena bhūya eva ca mārgati
a anutarṣula evārthaḥ svādu gāṅgam ivodakam
c madvilāpanam etat tu pratibuddho 'smi saṃtyaja
a ya imaṃ māmakaṃ dehaṃ bhūtagrāmaḥ samāśritaḥ
c sa yātv ito yathākāmaṃ vasatāṃ vā yathāsukham
a na yuṣmāsv iha me prītiḥ kāmalobhānusāriṣu
c tasmād utsṛjya sarvān vaḥ satyam evāśrayāmy aham
a sarvabhūtāny ahaṃ dehe paśyan manasi cātmanaḥ
c yoge buddhiṃ śrute sattvaṃ mano brahmaṇi dhārayan
a vihariṣyāmy anāsaktaḥ sukhī lokān nirāmayaḥ
c yathā mā tvaṃ punar naivaṃ duḥkheṣu praṇidhāsyasi
a tvayā hi me praṇunnasya gatir anyā na vidyate
c tṛṣṇāśokaśramāṇāṃ hi tvaṃ kāma prabhavaḥ sadā
a dhananāśo 'dhikaṃ duḥkhaṃ manye sarvamahattaram
c jñātayo hy avamanyante mitrāṇi ca dhanacyutam
a avajñānasahasrais tu doṣāḥ kaṣṭatarādhane
c dhane sukhakalā yā ca sāpi duḥkhair vidhīyate
a dhanam asyeti puruṣaṃ purā nighnanti dasyavaḥ
c kliśyanti vividhair daṇḍair nityam udvejayanti ca
a mandalolupatā duḥkham iti buddhaṃ cirān mayā
c yad yad ālambase kāma tat tad evānurudhyase
a atattvajño 'si bālaś ca dustoṣo 'pūraṇo 'nalaḥ
c naiva tvaṃ vettha sulabhaṃ naiva tvaṃ vettha durlabham
a pātālam iva duṣpūro māṃ duḥkhair yoktum icchasi
c nāham adya samāveṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ kāma punas tvayā
a nirvedam aham āsādya dravyanāśād yadṛcchayā
c nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ prāpya nādya kāmān vicintaye
a atikleśān sahāmīha nāhaṃ budhyāmy abuddhimān
c nikṛto dhananāśena śaye sarvāṅgavijvaraḥ
a parityajāmi kāma tvāṃ hitvā sarvamanogatīḥ
c na tvaṃ mayā punaḥ kāma nasyoteneva raṃsyase
a kṣamiṣye 'kṣamamāṇānāṃ na hiṃsiṣye ca hiṃsitaḥ
c dveṣyamuktaḥ priyaṃ vakṣyāmy anādṛtya tad apriyam
a tṛptaḥ svasthendriyo nityaṃ yathālabdhena vartayan
c na sakāmaṃ kariṣyāmi tvām ahaṃ śatrum ātmanaḥ
a nirvedaṃ nirvṛtiṃ tṛptiṃ śāntiṃ satyaṃ damaṃ kṣamām
c sarvabhūtadayāṃ caiva viddhi māṃ śaraṇāgatam
a tasmāt kāmaś ca lobhaś ca tṛṣṇā kārpaṇyam eva ca
c tyajantu māṃ pratiṣṭhantaṃ sattvastho hy asmi sāṃpratam
a prahāya kāmaṃ lobhaṃ ca krodhaṃ pāruṣyam eva ca
c nādya lobhavaśaṃ prāpto duḥkhaṃ prāpsyāmy anātmavān
a yad yat tyajati kāmānāṃ tat sukhasyābhipūryate
c kāmasya vaśago nityaṃ duḥkham eva prapadyate
a kāmān vyudasya dhunute yat kiṃ cit puruṣo rajaḥ
c kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ duḥkham ahrīr aratir eva ca
a eṣa brahmapraviṣṭo 'haṃ grīṣme śītam iva hradam
c śāmyāmi parinirvāmi sukham āse ca kevalam
a yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham
c tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṃ kalām
a ātmanā saptamaṃ kāmaṃ hatvā śatrum ivottamam
c prāpyāvadhyaṃ brahmapuraṃ rājeva syām ahaṃ sukhī
a etāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthāya maṅkir nirvedam āgataḥ
c sarvān kāmān parityajya prāpya brahma mahat sukham
a damyanāśakṛte maṅkir amaratvaṃ kilāgamat
c acchinat kāmamūlaṃ sa tena prāpa mahat sukham
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
b asminn arthe purā gītaṃ śṛṇu rājan mahātmanā
c gītaṃ videharājena janakena praśāmyatā
a anantaṃ bata me vittaṃ yasya me nāsti kiṃ cana
c mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃ cana
a atraivodāharantīmaṃ bodhyasya padasaṃcayam
c nirvedaṃ prati vinyastaṃ pratibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a bodhyaṃ dāntam ṛṣiṃ rājā nahuṣaḥ paryapṛcchata
c nirvedāc chāntim āpannaṃ śāntaṃ prajñānatarpitam
a upadeśaṃ mahāprājña śamasyopadiśasva me
c kāṃ buddhiṃ samanudhyāya śāntaś carasi nirvṛtaḥ
 bodhya uvāca
a upadeśena vartāmi nānuśāsmīha kaṃ cana
c lakṣaṇaṃ tasya vakṣye 'haṃ tat svayaṃ pravimṛśyatām
a piṅgalā kuraraḥ sarpaḥ sāraṅgānveṣaṇaṃ vane
c iṣukāraḥ kumārī ca ṣaḍ ete guravo mama
d bhīṣma uvāca
d āśā balavatī kaṣṭā nairāśyaṃ paramaṃ sukham
d āśāṃ nirāśāṃ kṛtvā tu sukhaṃ svapiti piṅgalā
d sāmiṣaṃ kuraraṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhyamānaṃ nirāmiṣaiḥ
d āmiṣasya parityāgāt kuraraḥ sukham edhate
d gṛhārambho hi duḥkhāya na sukhāya kadā cana
d sarpaḥ parakṛtaṃ veśma praviśya sukham edhate
d sukhaṃ jīvanti munayo bhaikṣyavṛttiṃ samāśritāḥ
d adroheṇaiva bhūtānāṃ sāraṅgā iva pakṣiṇaḥ
d iṣukāro naraḥ kaś cid iṣāv āhitamānasaḥ
d samīpenāpi gacchantaṃ rājānaṃ nāvabuddhavān
d bahūnāṃ kalaho nityaṃ dvayoḥ saṃgharṣaṇaṃ dhruvam
d ekākī vicariṣyāmi kumārīśaṅkhako yathā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kena vṛttena vṛttajña vītaśokaś caren mahīm
c kiṃ ca kurvan naro loke prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c prahrādasya ca saṃvādaṃ muner ājagarasya ca
a carantaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ kaṃ cit kalyacittam anāmayam
c papraccha rājan prahrādo buddhimān prājñasaṃmataḥ
a svasthaḥ śakto mṛdur dānto nirvivitso 'nasūyakaḥ
c suvāg bahumato loke prājñaś carasi bālavat
a naiva prārthayase lābhaṃ nālābheṣv anuśocasi
c nityatṛpta iva brahman na kiṃ cid avamanyase
a srotasā hriyamāṇāsu prajāsv avimanā iva
c dharmakāmārthakāryeṣu kūṭastha iva lakṣyase
a nānutiṣṭhasi dharmārthau na kāme cāpi vartase
c indriyārthān anādṛtya muktaś carasi sākṣivat
a kā nu prajñā śrutaṃ vā kiṃ vṛttir vā kā nu te mune
c kṣipram ācakṣva me brahmañ śreyo yad iha manyase
a anuyuktaḥ sa medhāvī lokadharmavidhānavit
c uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā prahrādam anapārthayā
a paśyan prahrāda bhūtānām utpattim animittataḥ
c hrāsaṃ vṛddhiṃ vināśaṃ ca na prahṛṣye na ca vyathe
a svabhāvād eva saṃdṛśya vartamānāḥ pravṛttayaḥ
c svabhāvaniratāḥ sarvāḥ paritapye na kena cit
a paśyan prahrāda saṃyogān viprayogaparāyaṇān
c saṃcayāṃś ca vināśāntān na kva cid vidadhe manaḥ
a antavanti ca bhūtāni guṇayuktāni paśyataḥ
c utpattinidhanajñasya kiṃ kāryam avaśiṣyate
a jalajānām api hy antaṃ paryāyeṇopalakṣaye
c mahatām api kāyānāṃ sūkṣmāṇāṃ ca mahodadhau
a jaṅgamasthāvarāṇāṃ ca bhūtānām asurādhipa
c pārthivānām api vyaktaṃ mṛtyuṃ paśyāmi sarvaśaḥ
a antarikṣacarāṇāṃ ca dānavottama pakṣiṇām
c uttiṣṭhati yathākālaṃ mṛtyur balavatām api
a divi saṃcaramāṇāni hrasvāni ca mahānti ca
c jyotīṃṣi ca yathākālaṃ patamānāni lakṣaye
a iti bhūtāni saṃpaśyann anuṣaktāni mṛtyunā
c sarvasāmānyato vidvān kṛtakṛtyaḥ sukhaṃ svape
a sumahāntam api grāsaṃ grase labdhaṃ yadṛcchayā
c śaye punar abhuñjāno divasāni bahūny api
a āsravaty api mām annaṃ punar bahuguṇaṃ bahu
c punar alpaguṇaṃ stokaṃ punar naivopapadyate
a kaṇān kadā cit khādāmi piṇyākam api ca grase
c bhakṣaye śālimāṃsāni bhakṣāṃś coccāvacān punaḥ
a śaye kadā cit paryaṅke bhūmāv api punaḥ śaye
c prāsāde 'pi ca me śayyā kadā cid upapadyate
a dhārayāmi ca cīrāṇi śāṇīṃ kṣaumājināni ca
c mahārhāṇi ca vāsāṃsi dhārayāmy aham ekadā
a na saṃnipatitaṃ dharmyam upabhogaṃ yadṛcchayā
c pratyācakṣe na cāpy enam anurudhye sudurlabham
a acalam anidhanaṃ śivaṃ viśokaṃ
śucim atulaṃ viduṣāṃ mate niviṣṭam
c anabhimatam asevitaṃ ca mūḍhair
vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
a acalitamatir acyutaḥ svadharmāt
parimitasaṃsaraṇaḥ parāvarajñaḥ
c vigatabhayakaṣāyalobhamoho
vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
a aniyataphalabhakṣyabhojyapeyaṃ
vidhipariṇāmavibhaktadeśakālam
c hṛdayasukham asevitaṃ kadaryair
vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
a idam idam iti tṛṣṇayābhibhūtaṃ
janam anavāptadhanaṃ viṣīdamānam
c nipuṇam anuniśāmya tattvabuddhyā
vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
a bahuvidham anudṛśya cārthahetoḥ
kṛpaṇam ihāryam anāryam āśrayantam
c upaśamarucir ātmavān praśānto
vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
a sukham asukham anartham arthalābhaṃ

c vidhiniyatam avekṣya tattvato 'haṃ
vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
a apagatabhayarāgamohadarpo
dhṛtimatibuddhisamanvitaḥ praśāntaḥ
c upagataphalabhogino niśāmya
vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
a aniyataśayanāsanaḥ prakṛtyā
damaniyamavratasatyaśaucayuktaḥ
c apagataphalasaṃcayaḥ prahṛṣṭo
vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
a abhigatam asukhārtham īhanārthair
upagatabuddhir avekṣya cātmasaṃsthaḥ
c tṛṣitam aniyataṃ mano niyantuṃ
vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
a na hṛdayam anurudhyate mano vā
priyasukhadurlabhatām anityatāṃ ca
c tad ubhayam upalakṣayann ivāhaṃ
vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
d asulabham upalabhya cārthalābhaṃ
d dhṛtimatibuddhiparākramair upetam
d budhamanujaniṣevitaṃ samarthair
d vratam idam ājagaraṃ śuciś carāmi
a bahu kathitam idaṃ hi buddhimadbhiḥ
kavibhir abhiprathayadbhir ātmakīrtim
c idam idam iti tatra tatra tat tat
svaparamatair gahanaṃ pratarkayadbhiḥ
a tad aham anuniśāmya viprayātaṃ
pṛthag abhipannam ihābudhair manuṣyaiḥ
c anavasitam anantadoṣapāraṃ
nṛṣu viharāmi vinītaroṣatṛṣṇaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ajagaracaritaṃ vrataṃ mahātmā
ya iha naro 'nucared vinītarāgaḥ
c apagatabhayamanyulobhamohaḥ
sa khalu sukhī vihared imaṃ vihāram
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a bāndhavāḥ karma vittaṃ vā prajñā veha pitāmaha
c narasya kā pratiṣṭhā syād etat pṛṣṭo vadasva me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a prajñā pratiṣṭhā bhūtānāṃ prajñā lābhaḥ paro mataḥ
c prajñā naiḥśreyasī loke prajñā svargo mataḥ satām
a prajñayā prāpitārtho hi balir aiśvaryasaṃkṣaye
c prahrādo namucir maṅkis tasyāḥ kiṃ vidyate param
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam

a ārtaḥ sa patitaḥ kruddhas tyaktvātmānam athābravīt

a sarve lābhāḥ sābhimānā iti satyā bata śrutiḥ

a na pāṇilābhād adhiko lābhaḥ kaś cana vidyate
c apāṇitvād vayaṃ brahman kaṇṭakān noddharāmahe
d jantūn uccāvacān aṅge daśato na kaṣāma ca
a atha yeṣāṃ punaḥ pāṇī devadattau daśāṅgulī
c uddharanti kṛmīn aṅgād daśamānān kaṣanti ca
a himavarṣātapānāṃ ca paritrāṇāni kurvate
c celam annaṃ sukhaṃ śayyāṃ nivātaṃ copabhuñjate
a adhiṣṭhāya ca gāṃ loke bhuñjate vāhayanti ca
c upāyair bahubhiś caiva vaśyān ātmani kurvate
a ye khalv ajihvāḥ kṛpaṇā alpaprāṇā apāṇayaḥ
c sahante tāni duḥkhāni diṣṭyā tvaṃ na tathā mune
a diṣṭyā tvaṃ na sṛgālo vai na kṛmir na ca mūṣakaḥ
c na sarpo na ca maṇḍūko na cānyaḥ pāpayonijaḥ
a etāvatāpi lābhena toṣṭum arhasi kāśyapa
c kiṃ punar yo 'si sattvānāṃ sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇottamaḥ
a ime māṃ kṛmayo 'danti teṣām uddharaṇāya me
c nāsti śaktir apāṇitvāt paśyāvasthām imāṃ mama
a akāryam iti caivemaṃ nātmānaṃ saṃtyajāmy aham
c netaḥ pāpīyasīṃ yoniṃ pateyam aparām iti
a madhye vai pāpayonīnāṃ sārgālī yām ahaṃ gataḥ
c pāpīyasyo bahutarā ito 'nyāḥ pāpayonayaḥ
a jātyaivaike sukhatarāḥ santy anye bhṛśaduḥkhitāḥ
c naikāntasukham eveha kva cit paśyāmi kasya cit

c rājyād devatvam icchanti devatvād indratām api
a bhaves tvaṃ yady api tv āḍhyo na rājā na ca daivatam
c devatvaṃ prāpya cendratvaṃ naiva tuṣyes tathā sati
a na tṛptiḥ priyalābhe 'sti tṛṣṇā nādbhiḥ praśāmyati
c saṃprajvalati sā bhūyaḥ samidbhir iva pāvakaḥ
a asty eva tvayi śoko vai harṣaś cāsti tathā tvayi
c sukhaduḥkhe tathā cobhe tatra kā paridevanā
a paricchidyaiva kāmānāṃ sarveṣāṃ caiva karmaṇām
c mūlaṃ rundhīndriyagrāmaṃ śakuntān iva pañjare
d na dvitīyasya śirasaś chedanaṃ vidyate kva cit
d na ca pāṇes tṛtīyasya yan nāsti na tato bhayam

c saṃsparśād darśanād vāpi śravaṇād vāpi jāyate
a na tvaṃ smarasi vāruṇyā laṭvākānāṃ ca pakṣiṇām
c tābhyāṃ cābhyadhiko bhakṣyo na kaś cid vidyate kva cit
a yāni cānyāni dūreṣu bhakṣyabhojyāni kāśyapa
c yeṣām abhuktapūrvaṃ te teṣām asmṛtir eva ca

c puruṣasyaiṣa niyamo manye śreyo na saṃśayaḥ
a pāṇimanto dhanair yuktā balavanto na saṃśayaḥ
c manuṣyā mānuṣair eva dāsatvam upapāditāḥ

a apare bāhubalinaḥ kṛtavidyā manasvinaḥ

c svakarmaṇā tu niyataṃ bhavitavyaṃ tu tat tathā
a na pulkaso na caṇḍāla ātmānaṃ tyaktum icchati
c asaṃtuṣṭaḥ svayā yonyā māyāṃ paśyasva yādṛśīm
a dṛṣṭvā kuṇīn pakṣahatān manuṣyān āmayāvinaḥ
c susaṃpūrṇaḥ svayā yonyā labdhalābho 'si kāśyapa
a yadi brāhmaṇa dehas te nirātaṅko nirāmayaḥ
c aṅgāni ca samagrāṇi na ca lokeṣu dhikkṛtaḥ
a na kena cit pravādena satyenaivāpahāriṇā
c dharmāyottiṣṭha viprarṣe nātmānaṃ tyaktum arhasi
a yadi brahmañ śṛṇoṣy etac chraddadhāsi ca me vacaḥ
c vedoktasya ca dharmasya phalaṃ mukhyam avāpsyasi
a svādhyāyam agnisaṃskāram apramatto 'nupālaya
c satyaṃ damaṃ ca dānaṃ ca spardhiṣṭhā mā ca kena cit
a ye ke cana svadhyayanāḥ prāptā yajanayājanam
c kathaṃ te jātu śoceyur dhyāyeyur vāpy aśobhanam
a icchantas te vihārāya sukhaṃ mahad avāpnuyuḥ
c uta jātāḥ sunakṣatre sutīrthāḥ sumuhūrtajāḥ
d yajñadānaprajehāyāṃ yatante śaktipūrvakam
a nakṣatreṣv āsureṣv anye dustīrthā durmuhūrtajāḥ
c saṃpatanty āsurīṃ yoniṃ yajñaprasavavarjitām

c ānvīkṣikīṃ tarkavidyām anurakto nirarthikām

c ākroṣṭā cābhivaktā ca brahmayajñeṣu vai dvijān
a nāstikaḥ sarvaśaṅkī ca mūrkhaḥ paṇḍitamānikaḥ
c tasyeyaṃ phalanirvṛttiḥ sṛgālatvaṃ mama dvija

a saṃtuṣṭaś cāpramattaś ca yajñadānataporatiḥ
c jñeyajñātā bhaveyaṃ vai varjyavarjayitā tathā
a tataḥ sa munir utthāya kāśyapas tam uvāca ha
c aho batāsi kuśalo buddhimān iti vismitaḥ
a samavaikṣata taṃ vipro jñānadīrgheṇa cakṣuṣā
c dadarśa cainaṃ devānām indraṃ devaṃ śacīpatim
a tataḥ saṃpūjayām āsa kāśyapo harivāhanam
c anujñātaś ca tenātha praviveśa svam āśramam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yady asti dattam iṣṭaṃ vā tapas taptaṃ tathaiva ca
c gurūṇāṃ cāpi śuśrūṣā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d yathāsmiṃś ca tathā tatra jānīyāṃ nṛpasattama
d duṣkartāro yathā loke yat kurvanti tathā śṛṇu
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ātmanānarthayuktena pāpe niviśate manaḥ
c sa karma kaluṣaṃ kṛtvā kleśe mahati dhīyate
a durbhikṣād eva durbhikṣaṃ kleśāt kleśaṃ bhayād bhayam
c mṛtebhyaḥ pramṛtaṃ yānti daridrāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ
a utsavād utsavaṃ yānti svargāt svargaṃ sukhāt sukham
c śraddadhānāś ca dāntāś ca dhanāḍhyāḥ śubhakāriṇaḥ
a vyālakuñjaradurgeṣu sarpacorabhayeṣu ca
c hastāvāpena gacchanti nāstikāḥ kim ataḥ param
a priyadevātitheyāś ca vadānyāḥ priyasādhavaḥ
c kṣemyam ātmavatāṃ mārgam āsthitā hastadakṣiṇam
a pulākā iva dhānyeṣu puttikā iva pakṣiṣu
c tadvidhās te manuṣyeṣu yeṣāṃ dharmo na kāraṇam
a suśīghram api dhāvantaṃ vidhānam anudhāvati
c śete saha śayānena yena yena yathā kṛtam
a upatiṣṭhati tiṣṭhantaṃ gacchantam anugacchati
c karoti kurvataḥ karma chāyevānuvidhīyate
a yena yena yathā yad yat purā karma samācitam
c tat tad eva naro bhuṅkte nityaṃ vihitam ātmanā
a svakarmaphalavikṣiptaṃ vidhānaparirakṣitam
c bhūtagrāmam imaṃ kālaḥ samantāt parikarṣati
a acodyamānāni yathā puṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca
c svakālaṃ nātivartante tathā karma purākṛtam
a saṃmānaś cāvamānaś ca lābhālābhau kṣayodayau
c pravṛttā vinivartante vidhānānte punaḥ punaḥ
a ātmanā vihitaṃ duḥkham ātmanā vihitaṃ sukham
c garbhaśayyām upādāya bhujyate paurvadehikam
a bālo yuvā ca vṛddhaś ca yat karoti śubhāśubham
c tasyāṃ tasyām avasthāyāṃ bhuṅkte janmani janmani
a yathā dhenusahasreṣu vatso vindati mātaram
c tathā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma kartāram anugacchati
a samunnam agrato vastraṃ paścāc chudhyati karmaṇā
b duṣkarmāpi tathā paścāt pūyate puṇyakarmaṇā
b tapasā tapyate dehas tapasā vindate mahat
c upavāsaiḥ prataptānāṃ dīrghaṃ sukham anantakam
a dīrghakālena tapasā sevitena tapovane
c dharmanirdhūtapāpānāṃ saṃsidhyante manorathāḥ
a śakunīnām ivākāśe matsyānām iva codake
c padaṃ yathā na dṛśyeta tathā jñānavidāṃ gatiḥ
a alam anyair upālambhaiḥ kīrtitaiś ca vyatikramaiḥ
c peśalaṃ cānurūpaṃ ca kartavyaṃ hitam ātmanaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
c pralaye ca kam abhyeti tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a sasāgaraḥ sagaganaḥ saśailaḥ sabalāhakaḥ
c sabhūmiḥ sāgnipavano loko 'yaṃ kena nirmitaḥ
a kathaṃ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni kathaṃ varṇavibhaktayaḥ
c śaucāśaucaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ dharmādharmāv atho katham
a kīdṛśo jīvatāṃ jīvaḥ kva vā gacchanti ye mṛtāḥ
c asmāl lokād amuṃ lokaṃ sarvaṃ śaṃsatu no bhavān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c bhṛguṇābhihitaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bharadvājāya pṛcchate
a kailāsaśikhare dṛṣṭvā dīpyamānam ivaujasā
c bhṛguṃ maharṣim āsīnaṃ bharadvājo 'nvapṛcchata
a sasāgaraḥ sagaganaḥ saśailaḥ sabalāhakaḥ
c sabhūmiḥ sāgnipavano loko 'yaṃ kena nirmitaḥ
a kathaṃ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni kathaṃ varṇavibhaktayaḥ
c śaucāśaucaṃ kathaṃ teṣāṃ dharmādharmāv atho katham
a kīdṛśo jīvatāṃ jīvaḥ kva vā gacchanti ye mṛtāḥ
c paralokam imaṃ cāpi sarvaṃ śaṃsatu no bhavān
a evaṃ sa bhagavān pṛṣṭo bharadvājena saṃśayam
c maharṣir brahmasaṃkāśaḥ sarvaṃ tasmai tato 'bravīt
d bhṛgur uvāca
d nārāyaṇābhidhānasya kūṭasthasyākṣarātmanaḥ
d avyaktasyāprameyasya prakṛtoparatasya ca
d evaṃbhūtaḥ sa vai devaḥ puruṣaṃ cāsṛjad dvidhā
d bhṛgur uvāca
d nārāyaṇo jaganmūrtir antarātmā sanātanaḥ
d kūṭastho 'kṣara avyakto nirlepo vyāpakaḥ prabhuḥ
d prakṛteḥ parato nityam indriyair apy agocaraḥ
d sa sisṛkṣuḥ sahasrāṃśād asṛjat puruṣaṃ prabhuḥ
a mānaso nāma vikhyātaḥ śrutapūrvo maharṣibhiḥ
c anādinidhano devas tathābhedyo 'jarāmaraḥ
a avyakta iti vikhyātaḥ śāśvato 'thākṣaro 'vyayaḥ
c yataḥ sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni jāyante ca mriyanti ca
a so 'sṛjat prathamaṃ devo mahāntaṃ nāma nāmataḥ
b mahān sasarjāhaṃkāraṃ sa cāpi bhagavān atha
c ākāśam iti vikhyātaṃ sarvabhūtadharaḥ prabhuḥ
a ākāśād abhavad vāri salilād agnimārutau
c agnimārutasaṃyogāt tataḥ samabhavan mahī
a tatas tejomayaṃ divyaṃ padmaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ svayaṃbhuvā
c tasmāt padmāt samabhavad brahmā vedamayo nidhiḥ
a ahaṃkāra iti khyātaḥ sarvabhūtātmabhūtakṛt
c brahmā vai sumahātejā ya ete pañca dhātavaḥ
a śailās tasyāsthisaṃjñās tu medo māṃsaṃ ca medinī
c samudrās tasya rudhiram ākāśam udaraṃ tathā
a pavanaś caiva niḥśvāsas tejo 'gnir nimnagāḥ sirāḥ
c agnīṣomau tu candrārkau nayane tasya viśrute
a nabhaś cordhvaṃ śiras tasya kṣitiḥ pādau diśo bhujau
c durvijñeyo hy anantatvāt siddhair api na saṃśayaḥ
a sa eva bhagavān viṣṇur ananta iti viśrutaḥ
c sarvabhūtātmabhūtastho durvijñeyo 'kṛtātmabhiḥ
a ahaṃkārasya yaḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtabhavāya vai
c yataḥ samabhavad viśvaṃ pṛṣṭo 'haṃ yad iha tvayā
 bharadvāja uvāca
a gaganasya diśāṃ caiva bhūtalasyānilasya ca
c kāny atra parimāṇāni saṃśayaṃ chindhi me 'rthataḥ
 bhṛgur uvāca
a anantam etad ākāśaṃ siddhacāraṇasevitam
c ramyaṃ nānāśrayākīrṇaṃ yasyānto nādhigamyate
a ūrdhvaṃ gater adhastāt tu candrādityau na dṛśyataḥ
c tatra devāḥ svayaṃ dīptā bhāsvarāś cāgnivarcasaḥ
a te cāpy antaṃ na paśyanti nabhasaḥ prathitaujasaḥ
c durgamatvād anantatvād iti me viddhi mānada
a upariṣṭopariṣṭāt tu prajvaladbhiḥ svayaṃprabhaiḥ
c niruddham etad ākāśam aprameyaṃ surair api
a pṛthivyante samudrās tu samudrānte tamaḥ smṛtam
c tamaso 'nte jalaṃ prāhur jalasyānte 'gnir eva ca
a rasātalānte salilaṃ jalānte pannagādhipaḥ
c tadante punar ākāśam ākāśānte punar jalam
a evam antaṃ bhagavataḥ pramāṇaṃ salilasya ca
c agnimārutatoyebhyo durjñeyaṃ daivatair api
a agnimārutatoyānāṃ varṇāḥ kṣititalasya ca
c ākāśasadṛśā hy ete bhidyante tattvadarśanāt
a paṭhanti caiva munayaḥ śāstreṣu vividheṣu ca
c trailokye sāgare caiva pramāṇaṃ vihitaṃ yathā
e adṛśyāya tv agamyāya kaḥ pramāṇam udāharet
a siddhānāṃ devatānāṃ ca yadā parimitā gatiḥ
c tadā gauṇam anantasya nāmānanteti viśrutam
e nāmadheyānurūpasya mānasasya mahātmanaḥ
a yadā tu divyaṃ tadrūpaṃ hrasate vardhate punaḥ
c ko 'nyas tad vedituṃ śakto yo 'pi syāt tadvidho 'paraḥ
a tataḥ puṣkarataḥ sṛṣṭaḥ sarvajño mūrtimān prabhuḥ
c brahmā dharmamayaḥ pūrvaḥ prajāpatir anuttamaḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a puṣkarād yadi saṃbhūto jyeṣṭhaṃ bhavati puṣkaram
c brahmāṇaṃ pūrvajaṃ cāha bhavān saṃdeha eva me
 bhṛgur uvāca
a mānasasyeha yā mūrtir brahmatvaṃ samupāgatā
c tasyāsanavidhānārthaṃ pṛthivī padmam ucyate
a karṇikā tasya padmasya merur gaganam ucchritaḥ
c tasya madhye sthito lokān sṛjate jagataḥ prabhuḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a prajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ kathaṃ sa sṛjate prabhuḥ
c merumadhye sthito brahmā tad brūhi dvijasattama
d merumadhye sthito brahmā kathaṃ sa sasṛje prajāḥ
d etan me sarvam ācakṣva yāthātathyena pṛcchataḥ
 bhṛgur uvāca
a prajāvisargaṃ vividhaṃ mānaso manasāsṛjat
c saṃdhukṣaṇārthaṃ bhūtānāṃ sṛṣṭaṃ prathamato jalam
a yat prāṇāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vardhante yena ca prajāḥ
c parityaktāś ca naśyanti tenedaṃ sarvam āvṛtam
a pṛthivī parvatā meghā mūrtimantaś ca ye pare
c sarvaṃ tad vāruṇaṃ jñeyam āpas tastambhire punaḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a kathaṃ salilam utpannaṃ kathaṃ caivāgnimārutau
c kathaṃ ca medinī sṛṣṭety atra me saṃśayo mahān
 bhṛgur uvāca
a brahmakalpe purā brahman brahmarṣīṇāṃ samāgame
c lokasaṃbhavasaṃdehaḥ samutpanno mahātmanām
a te 'tiṣṭhan dhyānam ālambya maunam āsthāya niścalāḥ
c tyaktāhārāḥ pavanapā divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ dvijāḥ
a teṣāṃ dharmamayī vāṇī sarveṣāṃ śrotram āgamat
c divyā sarasvatī tatra saṃbabhūva nabhastalāt
a purā stimitaniḥśabdam ākāśam acalopamam
c naṣṭacandrārkapavanaṃ prasuptam iva saṃbabhau
a tataḥ salilam utpannaṃ tamasīvāparaṃ tamaḥ
c tasmāc ca salilotpīḍād udatiṣṭhata mārutaḥ
a yathā bhājanam acchidraṃ niḥśabdam iva lakṣyate
c tac cāmbhasā pūryamāṇaṃ saśabdaṃ kurute 'nilaḥ
a tathā salilasaṃruddhe nabhaso 'nte nirantare
c bhittvārṇavatalaṃ vāyuḥ samutpatati ghoṣavān
a sa eṣa carate vāyur arṇavotpīḍasaṃbhavaḥ
c ākāśasthānam āsādya praśāntiṃ nādhigacchati
a tasmin vāyvambusaṃgharṣe dīptatejā mahābalaḥ
c prādurbhavaty ūrdhvaśikhaḥ kṛtvā vitimiraṃ nabhaḥ
a agniḥ pavanasaṃyuktaḥ khāt samutpatate jalam
c so 'gnir mārutasaṃyogād ghanatvam upapadyate
a tasyākāśe nipatitaḥ snehas tiṣṭhati yo 'paraḥ
c sa saṃghātatvam āpanno bhūmitvam upagacchati
a rasānāṃ sarvagandhānāṃ snehānāṃ prāṇināṃ tathā
c bhūmir yonir iha jñeyā yasyāṃ sarvaṃ prasūyate
 bharadvāja uvāca
a ete te dhātavaḥ pañca brahmā yān asṛjat purā
c āvṛtā yair ime lokā mahābhūtābhisaṃjñitaiḥ
a yad āsṛjat sahasrāṇi bhūtānāṃ sa mahāmatiḥ
c pañcānām eva bhūtatvaṃ kathaṃ samupapadyate
 bhṛgur uvāca
a amitānāṃ mahāśabdo yānti bhūtāni saṃbhavam
c tatas teṣāṃ mahābhūtaśabdo 'yam upapadyate
a ceṣṭā vayūḥ kham ākāśam ūṣmāgniḥ salilaṃ dravaḥ
c pṛthivī cātra saṃghātaḥ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikam
a ity etaiḥ pañcabhir bhūtair yuktaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
c śrotraṃ ghrāṇaṃ rasaḥ sparśo dṛṣṭiś cendriyasaṃjñitāḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a pañcabhir yadi bhūtais tu yuktāḥ sthāvarajaṅgamāḥ
c sthāvarāṇāṃ na dṛśyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ
a anūṣmaṇām aceṣṭānāṃ ghanānāṃ caiva tattvataḥ
c vṛkṣāṇāṃ nopalabhyante śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ
a na śṛṇvanti na paśyanti na gandharasavedinaḥ
c na ca sparśaṃ vijānanti te kathaṃ pāñcabhautikāḥ
a adravatvād anagnitvād abhaumatvād avāyutaḥ
c ākāśasyāprameyatvād vṛkṣāṇāṃ nāsti bhautikam
 bhṛgur uvāca
a ghanānām api vṛkṣāṇām ākāśo 'sti na saṃśayaḥ
c teṣāṃ puṣpaphale vyaktir nityaṃ samupalabhyate
a ūṣmato glānaparṇānāṃ tvak phalaṃ puṣpam eva ca
c mlāyate caiva śīte na sparśas tenātra vidyate
a vāyvagnyaśaniniṣpeṣaiḥ phalapuṣpaṃ viśīryate
c śrotreṇa gṛhyate śabdas tasmāc chṛṇvanti pādapāḥ
a vallī veṣṭayate vṛkṣaṃ sarvataś caiva gacchati
c na hy adṛṣṭeś ca mārgo 'sti tasmāt paśyanti pādapāḥ
a puṇyāpuṇyais tathā gandhair dhūpaiś ca vividhair api
c arogāḥ puṣpitāḥ santi tasmāj jighranti pādapāḥ
a pādaiḥ salilapānaṃ ca vyādhīnām api darśanam
c vyādhipratikriyatvāc ca vidyate rasanaṃ drume
a vaktreṇotpalanālena yathordhvaṃ jalam ādadet
c tathā pavanasaṃyuktaḥ pādaiḥ pibati pādapaḥ
a grahaṇāt sukhaduḥkhasya chinnasya ca virohaṇāt
c jīvaṃ paśyāmi vṛkṣāṇām acaitanyaṃ na vidyate
a tena taj jalam ādattaṃ jarayaty agnimārutau
c āhārapariṇāmāc ca sneho vṛddhiś ca jāyate
a jaṅgamānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ
c pratyekaśaḥ prabhidyante yaiḥ śarīraṃ viceṣṭate
a tvak ca māṃsaṃ tathāsthīni majjā snāyu ca pañcamam
c ity etad iha saṃkhyātaṃ śarīre pṛthivīmayam
a tejo 'gniś ca tathā krodhaś cakṣur ūṣmā tathaiva ca
c agnir jarayate cāpi pañcāgneyāḥ śarīriṇaḥ
a śrotraṃ ghrāṇam athāsyaṃ ca hṛdayaṃ koṣṭham eva ca
c ākāśāt prāṇinām ete śarīre pañca dhātavaḥ
a śleṣmā pittam atha svedo vasā śoṇitam eva ca
c ity āpaḥ pañcadhā dehe bhavanti prāṇināṃ sadā
a prāṇāt praṇīyate prāṇī vyānād vyāyacchate tathā
c gacchaty apāno 'vāk caiva samāno hṛdy avasthitaḥ
a udānād ucchvasiti ca pratibhedāc ca bhāṣate
c ity ete vāyavaḥ pañca ceṣṭayantīha dehinam
a bhūmer gandhaguṇān vetti rasaṃ cādbhyaḥ śarīravān
c jyotiḥ paśyati cakṣurbhyāṃ sparśaṃ vetti ca vāyunā
d gandhaḥ sparśo raso rūpaṃ śabdaś cātra guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
d śabdaṃ śṛṇoti ca tathā ākāśāt tu śarīravān
d śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca bhūguṇaḥ
a tasya gandhasya vakṣyāmi vistarābhihitān guṇān
c iṣṭaś cāniṣṭagandhaś ca madhuraḥ kaṭur eva ca
a nirhārī saṃhataḥ snigdho rūkṣo viśada eva ca
c evaṃ navavidho jñeyaḥ pārthivo gandhavistaraḥ
a śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca rasaś cāpāṃ guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
c rasajñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
a raso bahuvidhaḥ proktaḥ sūribhiḥ prathitātmabhiḥ
c madhuro lavaṇas tiktaḥ kaṣāyo 'mlaḥ kaṭus tathā
e eṣa ṣaḍvidhavistāro raso vārimayaḥ smṛtaḥ
a śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca triguṇaṃ jyotir ucyate
c jyotiḥ paśyati rūpāṇi rūpaṃ ca bahudhā smṛtam
a hrasvo dīrghas tathā sthūlaś caturasro 'ṇu vṛttavān
c śuklaḥ kṛṣṇas tathā rakto nīlaḥ pīto 'ruṇas tathā
e evaṃ dvādaśavistāro jyotīrūpaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
a śabdasparśau tu vijñeyau dviguṇo vāyur ucyate
c vāyavyas tu guṇaḥ sparśaḥ sparśaś ca bahudhā smṛtaḥ
a kaṭhinaś cikkaṇaḥ ślakṣṇaḥ picchalo mṛdudāruṇaḥ
c uṣṇaḥ śītaḥ sukho duḥkhaḥ snigdho viśada eva ca
d tathā kharo mṛduḥ ślakṣṇo laghur gurutaro 'pi ca
e evaṃ dvādaśavistāro vāyavyo guṇa ucyate
a tatraikaguṇam ākāśaṃ śabda ity eva tat smṛtam
c tasya śabdasya vakṣyāmi vistaraṃ vividhātmakam
d śānto ghoraś ca mūḍhaś ca tān asaṃgharṣajas tathā
a ṣaḍja ṛṣabhagāndhārau madhyamaḥ pañcamas tathā
c dhaivataś cāpi vijñeyas tathā cāpi niṣādakaḥ
a eṣa saptavidhaḥ prokto guṇa ākāśalakṣaṇaḥ
c traisvaryeṇa tu sarvatra sthito 'pi paṭahādiṣu
d mṛdaṅgabherīśaṅkhānāṃ stanayitno rathasya ca
d yaḥ kaś cic chrūyate śabdaḥ prāṇino 'prāṇino 'pi vā
d eteṣām eva sarveṣāṃ viṣaye saṃprakīrtitaḥ
d evaṃ bahuvidhākāraḥ śabda ākāśasaṃbhavaḥ
a ākāśajaṃ śabdam āhur ebhir vāyuguṇaiḥ saha
c avyāhataiś cetayate na vetti viṣamāgataiḥ
a āpyāyante ca te nityaṃ dhātavas tais tu dhātubhiḥ
c āpo 'gnir mārutaś caiva nityaṃ jāgrati dehiṣu
d mūlam ete śarīrasya vyāpya prāṇān iha sthitāḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a pārthivaṃ dhātum āśritya śārīro 'gniḥ kathaṃ bhavet
c avakāśaviśeṣeṇa kathaṃ vartayate 'nilaḥ
 bhṛgur uvāca
a vāyor gatim ahaṃ brahman kīrtayiṣyāmi te 'nagha
c prāṇinām anilo dehān yathā ceṣṭayate balī
a śrito mūrdhānam agnis tu śarīraṃ paripālayan
c prāṇo mūrdhani cāgnau ca vartamāno viceṣṭate
a sa jantuḥ sarvabhūtātmā puruṣaḥ sa sanātanaḥ
c mano buddhir ahaṃkāro bhūtāni viṣayāś ca saḥ
a evaṃ tv iha sa sarvatra prāṇena paripālyate
c pṛṣṭhataś ca samānena svāṃ svāṃ gatim upāśritaḥ
a vastimūlaṃ gudaṃ caiva pāvakaṃ ca samāśritaḥ
c vahan mūtraṃ purīṣaṃ cāpy apānaḥ parivartate
a prayatne karmaṇi bale ya ekas triṣu vartate
c udāna iti taṃ prāhur adhyātmaviduṣo janāḥ
a saṃdhiṣv api ca sarveṣu saṃniviṣṭas tathānilaḥ
c śarīreṣu manuṣyāṇāṃ vyāna ity upadiśyate
a dhātuṣv agnis tu vitataḥ samānena samīritaḥ
c rasān dhātūṃś ca doṣāṃś ca vartayann avatiṣṭhati
a apānaprāṇayor madhye prāṇāpānasamāhitaḥ
c samanvitaḥ svadhiṣṭhānaḥ samyak pacati pāvakaḥ
a āsyaṃ hi pāyusaṃyuktam ante syād gudasaṃjñitam
c srotas tasmāt prajāyante sarvasrotāṃsi dehinām
a prāṇānāṃ saṃnipātāc ca saṃnipātaḥ prajāyate
c ūṣmā cāgnir iti jñeyo yo 'nnaṃ pacati dehinām
a agnivegavahaḥ prāṇo gudānte pratihanyate
c sa ūrdhvam āgamya punaḥ samutkṣipati pāvakam
a pakvāśayas tv adho nābher ūrdhvam āmāśayaḥ sthitaḥ
c nābhimadhye śarīrasya sarve prāṇāḥ samāhitāḥ
a prasṛtā hṛdayāt sarve tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā
c vahanty annarasān nāḍyo daśa prāṇapracoditāḥ
a eṣa mārgo 'tha yogānāṃ yena gacchanti tat padam
c jitaklamāsanā dhīrā mūrdhany ātmānam ādadhuḥ
a evaṃ sarveṣu vihitaḥ prāṇāpāneṣu dehinām
c tasmin sthito nityam agniḥ sthālyām iva samāhitaḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a yadi prāṇāyate vāyur vāyur eva viceṣṭate
c śvasity ābhāṣate caiva tasmāj jīvo nirarthakaḥ
a yady ūṣmabhāva āgneyo vahninā pacyate yadi
c agnir jarayate caiva tasmāj jīvo nirarthakaḥ
a jantoḥ pramīyamāṇasya jīvo naivopalabhyate
c vāyur eva jahāty enam ūṣmabhāvaś ca naśyati
a yadi vātopamo jīvaḥ saṃśleṣo yadi vāyunā
c vāyumaṇḍalavad dṛśyo gacchet saha marudgaṇaiḥ
a śleṣo yadi ca vātena yadi tasmāt praṇaśyati
c mahārṇavavimuktatvād anyat salilabhājanam
a kūpe vā salilaṃ dadyāt pradīpaṃ vā hutāśane
c prakṣiptaṃ naśyati kṣipraṃ yathā naśyaty asau tathā
d tan naśyaty ubhayaṃ tadvaj jīvo vātānalātmakaḥ
a pañcasādhāraṇe hy asmiñ śarīre jīvitaṃ kutaḥ
c yeṣām anyataratyāgāc caturṇāṃ nāsti saṃgrahaḥ
a naśyanty āpo hy anāhārād vāyur ucchvāsanigrahāt
c naśyate koṣṭhabhedāt kham agnir naśyaty abhojanāt
a vyādhivraṇaparikleśair medinī caiva śīryate
c pīḍite 'nyatare hy eṣāṃ saṃghāto yāti pañcadhā
a tasmin pañcatvam āpanne jīvaḥ kim anudhāvati
c kiṃ vedayati vā jīvaḥ kiṃ śṛṇoti bravīti vā
a eṣā gauḥ paralokasthaṃ tārayiṣyati mām iti
c yo dattvā mriyate jantuḥ sā gauḥ kaṃ tārayiṣyati
a gauś ca pratigrahītā ca dātā caiva samaṃ yadā
c ihaiva vilayaṃ yānti kutas teṣāṃ samāgamaḥ
a vihagair upayuktasya śailāgrāt patitasya vā
c agninā copayuktasya kutaḥ saṃjīvanaṃ punaḥ
a chinnasya yadi vṛkṣasya na mūlaṃ pratirohati
c bījāny asya pravartante mṛtaḥ kva punar eṣyati
a bījamātraṃ purā sṛṣṭaṃ yad etat parivartate
c mṛtā mṛtāḥ praṇaśyanti bījād bījaṃ pravartate
 bhṛgur uvāca
a na praṇāśo 'sti jīvānāṃ dattasya ca kṛtasya ca
c yāti dehāntaraṃ prāṇī śarīraṃ tu viśīryate
a na śarīrāśrito jīvas tasmin naṣṭe praṇaśyati
c yathā samitsu dagdhāsu na praṇaśyati pāvakaḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a agner yathā tathā tasya yadi nāśo na vidyate
c indhanasyopayogānte sa cāgnir nopalabhyate
a naśyatīty eva jānāmi śāntam agnim anindhanam
c gatir yasya pramāṇaṃ vā saṃsthānaṃ vā na dṛśyate
 bhṛgur uvāca
 jīvasya cendhanāgneś ca sadā nāśo na vidyate
a samidhām upayogānte sann evāgnir na dṛśyate
c ākāśānugatatvād dhi durgrahaḥ sa nirāśrayaḥ
a tathā śarīrasaṃtyāge jīvo hy ākāśavat sthitaḥ
c na gṛhyate susūkṣmatvād yathā jyotir na saṃśayaḥ
a prāṇān dhārayate hy agniḥ sa jīva upadhāryatām
c vāyusaṃdhāraṇo hy agnir naśyaty ucchvāsanigrahāt
a tasmin naṣṭe śarīrāgnau śarīraṃ tad acetanam
c patitaṃ yāti bhūmitvam ayanaṃ tasya hi kṣitiḥ
a jaṅgamānāṃ hi sarveṣāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ tathaiva ca
c ākāśaṃ pavano 'bhyeti jyotis tam anugacchati
e tatra trayāṇām ekatvaṃ dvayaṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhitam
a yatra khaṃ tatra pavanas tatrāgnir yatra mārutaḥ
c amūrtayas te vijñeyā āpo mūrtās tathā kṣitiḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a yady agnimārutau bhūmiḥ kham āpaś ca śarīriṣu
c jīvaḥ kiṃlakṣaṇas tatrety etad ācakṣva me 'nagha
a pañcātmake pañcaratau pañcavijñānasaṃyute
c śarīre prāṇināṃ jīvaṃ jñātum icchāmi yādṛśam
a māṃsaśoṇitasaṃghāte medaḥsnāyvasthisaṃcaye
c bhidyamāne śarīre tu jīvo naivopalabhyate
a yady ajīvaṃ śarīraṃ tu pañcabhūtasamanvitam
c śārīre mānase duḥkhe kas tāṃ vedayate rujam
a śṛṇoti kathitaṃ jīvaḥ karṇābhyāṃ na śṛṇoti tat
c maharṣe manasi vyagre tasmāj jīvo nirarthakaḥ
a sarvaṃ paśyati yad dṛśyaṃ manoyuktena cakṣuṣā
c manasi vyākule tad dhi paśyann api na paśyati
a na paśyati na ca brūte na śṛṇoti na jighrati
c na ca sparśarasau vetti nidrāvaśagataḥ punaḥ
a hṛṣyati krudhyati ca kaḥ śocaty udvijate ca kaḥ
c icchati dhyāyati dveṣṭi vācam īrayate ca kaḥ
 bhṛgur uvāca
a na pañcasādhāraṇam atra kiṃ cic
charīram eko vahate 'ntarātmā
c sa vetti gandhāṃś ca rasāñ śrutiṃ ca
sparśaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca guṇāś ca ye 'nye
a pañcātmake pañcaguṇapradarśī
sa sarvagātrānugato 'ntarātmā
c sa vetti duḥkhāni sukhāni cātra
tadviprayogāt tu na vetti dehaḥ
a yadā na rūpaṃ na sparśo noṣmabhāvaś ca pāvake
c tadā śānte śarīrāgnau dehaṃ tyaktvā sa naśyati
a ammayaṃ sarvam evedam āpo mūrtiḥ śarīriṇām
c tatrātmā mānaso brahmā sarvabhūteṣu lokakṛt
d ātmā kṣetrajña ity uktaḥ saṃyuktaḥ prākṛtair guṇaiḥ
d tair eva tu vinirmuktaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ
a ātmānaṃ taṃ vijānīhi sarvalokahitātmakam
c tasmin yaḥ saṃśrito dehe hy abbindur iva puṣkare
a kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīhi nityaṃ lokahitātmakam
c tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇān imān
d jīvam ātmaguṇaṃ vindyād ātmānaṃ paramātmanaḥ
a sacetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti
sa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvam
c tataḥ paraṃ kṣetravidaṃ vadanti
prāvartayad yo bhuvanāni sapta
a na jīvanāśo 'sti hi dehabhede
mithyaitad āhur mṛta ity abuddhāḥ
c jīvas tu dehāntaritaḥ prayāti
daśārdhataivāsya śarīrabhedaḥ
a evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhaś carati saṃvṛtaḥ
c dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā tattvadarśibhiḥ
a taṃ pūrvāpararātreṣu yuñjānaḥ satataṃ budhaḥ
c laghvāhāro viśuddhātmā paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
a cittasya hi prasādena hitvā karma śubhāśubham
c prasannātmātmani sthitvā sukham akṣayam aśnute
a mānaso 'gniḥ śarīreṣu jīva ity abhidhīyate
c sṛṣṭiḥ prajāpater eṣā bhūtādhyātmaviniścaye
 bhṛgur uvāca
a asṛjad brāhmaṇān eva pūrvaṃ brahmā prajāpatiḥ
c ātmatejobhinirvṛttān bhāskarāgnisamaprabhān
a tataḥ satyaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca tapo brahma ca śāśvatam
c ācāraṃ caiva śaucaṃ ca svargāya vidadhe prabhuḥ
a devadānavagandharvadaityāsuramahoragāḥ
c yakṣarākṣasanāgāś ca piśācā manujās tathā
a brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca dvijasattama
c ye cānye bhūtasaṃghānāṃ saṃghās tāṃś cāpi nirmame
a brāhmaṇānāṃ sito varṇaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ tu lohitaḥ
c vaiśyānāṃ pītako varṇaḥ śūdrāṇām asitas tathā
 bharadvāja uvāca
a cāturvarṇyasya varṇena yadi varṇo vibhajyate
c sarveṣāṃ khalu varṇānāṃ dṛśyate varṇasaṃkaraḥ
a kāmaḥ krodho bhayaṃ lobhaḥ śokaś cintā kṣudhā śramaḥ
c sarveṣāṃ naḥ prabhavati kasmād varṇo vibhajyate
a svedamūtrapurīṣāṇi śleṣmā pittaṃ saśoṇitam
c tanuḥ kṣarati sarveṣāṃ kasmād varṇo vibhajyate
a jaṅgamānām asaṃkhyeyāḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca jātayaḥ
c teṣāṃ vividhavarṇānāṃ kuto varṇaviniścayaḥ
 bhṛgur uvāca
a na viśeṣo 'sti varṇānāṃ sarvaṃ brāhmam idaṃ jagat
c brahmaṇā pūrvasṛṣṭaṃ hi karmabhir varṇatāṃ gatam
a kāmabhogapriyās tīkṣṇāḥ krodhanāḥ priyasāhasāḥ
c tyaktasvadharmā raktāṅgās te dvijāḥ kṣatratāṃ gatāḥ
a goṣu vṛttiṃ samādhāya pītāḥ kṛṣyupajīvinaḥ
c svadharmaṃ nānutiṣṭhanti te dvijā vaiśyatāṃ gatāḥ
a hiṃsānṛtapriyā lubdhāḥ sarvakarmopajīvinaḥ
c kṛṣṇāḥ śaucaparibhraṣṭās te dvijāḥ śūdratāṃ gatāḥ
a ity etaiḥ karmabhir vyastā dvijā varṇāntaraṃ gatāḥ
c dharmo yajñakriyā caiṣāṃ nityaṃ na pratiṣidhyate
a varṇāś catvāra ete hi yeṣāṃ brāhmī sarasvatī
c vihitā brahmaṇā pūrvaṃ lobhāt tv ajñānatāṃ gatāḥ
a brāhmaṇā dharmatantrasthās tapas teṣāṃ na naśyati
c brahma dhārayatāṃ nityaṃ vratāni niyamāṃs tathā
a brahma caitat purā sṛṣṭaṃ ye na jānanty atadvidaḥ
c teṣāṃ bahuvidhās tv anyās tatra tatra hi jātayaḥ
a piśācā rākṣasāḥ pretā bahudhā mlecchajātayaḥ
c pranaṣṭajñānavijñānāḥ svacchandācāraceṣṭitāḥ
a prajā brāhmaṇasaṃskārāḥ svadharmakṛtaniścayāḥ
c ṛṣibhiḥ svena tapasā sṛjyante cāpare paraiḥ
a ādidevasamudbhūtā brahmamūlākṣayāvyayā
c sā sṛṣṭir mānasī nāma dharmatantraparāyaṇā
 bharadvāja uvāca
a brāhmaṇaḥ kena bhavati kṣatriyo vā dvijottama
c vaiśyaḥ śūdraś ca viprarṣe tad brūhi vadatāṃ vara
 bhṛgur uvāca
a jātakarmādibhir yas tu saṃskāraiḥ saṃskṛtaḥ śuciḥ
c vedādhyayanasaṃpannaḥ ṣaṭsu karmasv avasthitaḥ
a śaucācārasthitaḥ samyag vighasāśī gurupriyaḥ
c nityavratī satyaparaḥ sa vai brāhmaṇa ucyate
a satyaṃ dānaṃ damo 'droha ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kṣamā ghṛṇā
c tapaś ca dṛśyate yatra sa brāhmaṇa iti smṛtaḥ
a kṣatrajaṃ sevate karma vedādhyayanasaṃmataḥ
c dānādānaratir yaś ca sa vai kṣatriya ucyate
a kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyaṃ yo viśaty aniśaṃ śuciḥ
c vedādhyayanasaṃpannaḥ sa vaiśya iti saṃjñitaḥ
a sarvabhakṣaratir nityaṃ sarvakarmakaro 'śuciḥ
c tyaktavedas tv anācāraḥ sa vai śūdra iti smṛtaḥ
a śūdre caitad bhavel lakṣyaṃ dvije caitan na vidyate
c na vai śūdro bhavec chūdro brāhmaṇo na ca brāhmaṇaḥ
a sarvopāyais tu lobhasya krodhasya ca vinigrahaḥ
c etat pavitraṃ jñātavyaṃ tathā caivātmasaṃyamaḥ
d vāryau sarvātmanā tau hi śreyoghātārtham utthitau
a nityaṃ krodhāt tapo rakṣec chriyaṃ rakṣeta matsarāt
c vidyāṃ mānāvamānābhyām ātmānaṃ tu pramādataḥ
a yasya sarve samārambhā nirāśīrbandhanās tv iha
c tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān
a ahiṃsraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ maitrāyaṇagataś caret
c avisrambhe na gantavyaṃ visrambhe dhārayen manaḥ
a parigrahān parityajya bhaved buddhyā jitendriyaḥ
c aśokaṃ sthānam ātiṣṭhed iha cāmutra cābhayam
a taponityena dāntena muninā saṃyatātmanā
c ajitaṃ jetukāmena bhāvyaṃ saṅgeṣv asaṅginā
a indriyair gṛhyate yad yat tat tad vyaktam iti sthitiḥ
c avyaktam iti vijñeyaṃ liṅgagrāhyam atīndriyam
a manaḥ prāṇe nigṛhṇīyāt prāṇaṃ brahmaṇi dhārayet
c nirvāṇād eva nirvāṇo na ca kiṃ cid vicintayet
e sukhaṃ vai brāhmaṇo brahma sa vai tenādhigacchati
a śaucena satataṃ yuktas tathācārasamanvitaḥ
c sānukrośaś ca bhūteṣu tad dvijātiṣu lakṣaṇam
 bhṛgur uvāca
a satyaṃ brahma tapaḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ sṛjati ca prajāḥ
c satyena dhāryate lokaḥ svargaṃ satyena gacchati
a anṛtaṃ tamaso rūpaṃ tamasā nīyate hy adhaḥ
c tamograstā na paśyanti prakāśaṃ tamasāvṛtam
a svargaḥ prakāśa ity āhur narakaṃ tama eva ca
c satyānṛtāt tad ubhayaṃ prāpyate jagatīcaraiḥ
a tatra tv evaṃvidhā vṛttir loke satyānṛtā bhavet
c dharmādharmau prakāśaś ca tamo duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ tathā
A tatra yat satyaṃ sa dharmo yo dharmaḥ sa prakāśo yaḥ prakāśas tat sukham iti
B tatra yad anṛtaṃ so 'dharmo yo 'dharmas tat tamo yat tamas tad duḥkham iti
a śārīrair mānasair duḥkhaiḥ sukhaiś cāpy asukhodayaiḥ
A atrocyate
c lokasṛṣṭiṃ prapaśyanto na muhyanti vicakṣaṇāḥ
a tatra duḥkhavimokṣārthaṃ prayateta vicakṣaṇaḥ
c sukhaṃ hy anityaṃ bhūtānām iha loke paratra ca
a rāhugrastasya somasya yathā jyotsnā na bhāsate
c tathā tamobhibhūtānāṃ bhūtānāṃ bhraśyate sukham
A tat khalu dvividhaṃ sukham ucyate śārīraṃ mānasaṃ ca
B iha khalv amuṣmiṃś ca loke sarvārambhapravṛttayaḥ sukhārthā abhidhīyante
C na hy atas trivargaphalaṃ viśiṣṭataram asti
D sa eṣa kāmyo guṇaviśeṣo dharmārthayor ārambhas taddhetur asyotpattiḥ sukhaprayojanā
 bharadvāja uvāca
A yad etad bhavatābhihitaṃ sukhānāṃ paramāḥ striya iti tan na gṛhṇīmaḥ
B na hy eṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ mahati sthitānām aprāpya eṣa guṇaviśeṣo na cainam abhilaṣanti
C śrūyate ca bhagavāṃs trilokakṛd brahmā prabhur ekākī tiṣṭhati
D brahmacārī na kāmasukheṣv ātmānam avadadhāti
E api ca bhagavān viśveśvara umāpatiḥ kāmam abhivartamānam anaṅgatvena śamam anayat
F tasmād brūmo na mahātmabhir ayaṃ pratigṛhīto na tv eṣa tāvad viśiṣṭo guṇa iti naitad bhagavataḥ pratyemi
G bhagavatā tūktaṃ sukhānāṃ paramāḥ striya iti
H lokapravādo 'pi ca bhavati dvividhaḥ phalodayaḥ sukṛtāt sukham avāpyate duṣkṛtād duḥkham iti
I atrocyatām
 bhṛgur uvāca
A anṛtāt khalu tamaḥ prādurbhūtaṃ tamograstā adharmam evānuvartante na dharmam
B krodhalobhamohamānānṛtādibhir avacchannā na khalv asmiṃl loke na cāmutra sukham āpnuvanti
C vividhavyādhigaṇopatāpair avakīryante
D vadhabandharogaparikleśādibhiś ca kṣutpipāsāśramakṛtair upatāpair upatapyante
E caṇḍavātātyuṣṇātiśītakṛtaiś ca pratibhayaiḥ śārīrair duḥkhair upatapyante
F bandhudhanavināśaviprayogakṛtaiś ca mānasaiḥ śokair abhibhūyante jarāmṛtyukṛtaiś cānyair iti
A yas tv etaiḥ śārīrair mānasair duḥkhair na spṛśyate sa sukhaṃ veda
B na caite doṣāḥ svarge prādurbhavanti
C tatra bhavati khalu
a susukhaḥ pavanaḥ svarge gandhaś ca surabhis tathā
c kṣutpipāsāśramo nāsti na jarā na ca pāpakam
a nityam eva sukhaṃ svarge sukhaṃ duḥkham ihobhayam
c narake duḥkham evāhuḥ samaṃ tu paramaṃ padam
a pṛthivī sarvabhūtānāṃ janitrī tadvidhāḥ striyaḥ
c pumān prajāpatis tatra śukraṃ tejomayaṃ viduḥ
a ity etal lokanirmāṇaṃ brahmaṇā vihitaṃ purā
c prajā viparivartante svaiḥ svaiḥ karmabhir āvṛtāḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a dānasya kiṃ phalaṃ prāhur dharmasya caritasya ca
c tapasaś ca sutaptasya svādhyāyasya hutasya ca
 bhṛgur uvāca
a hutena śāmyate pāpaṃ svādhyāye śāntir uttamā
c dānena bhoga ity āhus tapasā sarvam āpnuyāt
a dānaṃ tu dvividhaṃ prāhuḥ paratrārtham ihaiva ca
c sadbhyo yad dīyate kiṃ cit tat paratropatiṣṭhati
a asatsu dīyate yat tu tad dānam iha bhujyate
c yādṛśaṃ dīyate dānaṃ tādṛśaṃ phalam āpyate
 bharadvāja uvāca
a kiṃ kasya dharmacaraṇaṃ kiṃ vā dharmasya lakṣaṇam
c dharmaḥ katividho vāpi tad bhavān vaktum arhati
 bhṛgur uvāca
a svadharmacaraṇe yuktā ye bhavanti manīṣiṇaḥ
c teṣāṃ dharmaphalāvāptir yo 'nyathā sa vimuhyati
 bharadvāja uvāca
a yad etac cāturāśramyaṃ brahmarṣivihitaṃ purā
c teṣāṃ sve sve ya ācārās tān me vaktum ihārhasi
 bhṛgur uvāca
A pūrvam eva bhagavatā lokahitam anutiṣṭhatā dharmasaṃrakṣaṇārtham āśramāś catvāro 'bhinirdiṣṭāḥ
B tatra gurukulavāsam eva tāvat prathamam āśramam udāharanti
C samyag atra śaucasaṃskāravinayaniyamapraṇīto vinītātmā ubhe saṃdhye bhāskarāgnidaivatāny
upasthāya vihāya tandrālasye guror abhivādanavedābhyāsaśravaṇapavitrīkṛtāntarātmā
triṣavaṇam upaspṛśya brahmacaryāgniparicaraṇaguruśuśrūṣānityo bhaikṣādisarvaniveditāntarātmā
guruvacananirdeśānuṣṭhānāpratikūlo guruprasādalabdhasvādhyāyatatparaḥ syāt
a guruṃ yas tu samārādhya dvijo vedam avāpnuyāt
A bhavati cātra ślokaḥ
c tasya svargaphalāvāptiḥ sidhyate cāsya mānasam
A gārhasthyaṃ khalu dvitīyam āśramaṃ vadanti
B tasya samudācāralakṣaṇaṃ sarvam anuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ
C samāvṛttānāṃ sadārāṇāṃ sahadharmacaryāphalārthināṃ gṛhāśramo vidhīyate
D dharmārthakāmāvāptir hy atra trivargasādhanam avekṣyāgarhitena karmaṇā
dhanāny ādāya svādhyāyaprakarṣopalabdhena brahmarṣinirmitena vā adrisāragatena vā
havyaniyamābhyāsadaivataprasādopalabdhena vā dhanena gṛhastho gārhasthyaṃ pravartayet
E tad dhi sarvāśramāṇāṃ mūlam udāharanti
F gurukulavāsinaḥ parivrājakā ye cānye saṃkalpitavrataniyamadharmānuṣṭhāyinas teṣām apy ata eva bhikṣābalisaṃvibhāgāḥ pravartante
 A vānaprasthānāṃ dravyopaskāra iti prāyaśaḥ khalv ete sādhavaḥ sādhupathyadarśanāḥ svādhyāyaprasaṅginas tīrthābhigamanadeśadarśanārthaṃ  
pṛthivīṃ paryaṭanti 
B teṣāṃ pratyutthānābhivādanānasūyāvākpradānasaumukhyaśaktyāsanaśayanābhyavahārasatkriyāś ceti
a atithir yasya bhagnāśo gṛhāt pratinivartate
A bhavati cātra ślokaḥ
c sa dattvā duṣkṛtaṃ tasmai puṇyam ādāya gacchati
A api cātra yajñakriyābhir devatāḥ prīyante nivāpena pitaro vedābhyāsaśravaṇadhāraṇena ṛṣayaḥ
B apatyotpādanena prajāpatir iti
a vatsalāḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vācyāḥ śrotrasukhā giraḥ
A ślokau cātra bhavataḥ
c parivādopaghātau ca pāruṣyaṃ cātra garhitam
a avajñānam ahaṃkāro dambhaś caiva vigarhitaḥ
c ahiṃsā satyam akrodhaḥ sarvāśramagataṃ tapaḥ
A api cātra mālyābharaṇavastrābhyaṅgagandhopabhoganṛttagītavāditraśrutisukhanayanābhirāmasaṃdarśanānāṃ
prāptir bhakṣyabhojyapeyalehyacoṣyāṇām abhyavahāryāṇāṃ vividhānām upabhogaḥ svadāravihārasaṃtoṣaḥ kāmasukhāvāptir iti
a trivargaguṇanirvṛttir yasya nityaṃ gṛhāśrame
c sa sukhāny anubhūyeha śiṣṭānāṃ gatim āpnuyāt
a uñchavṛttir gṛhastho yaḥ svadharmacaraṇe rataḥ
c tyaktakāmasukhārambhas tasya svargo na durlabhaḥ
 bhṛgur uvāca
 A vānaprasthāḥ khalu ṛṣidharmam anusarantaḥ puṇyāni tīrthāni nadīprasravaṇāni suvivikteṣv araṇyeṣu mṛgamahiṣavarāhasṛmaragajākīrṇeṣu  
tapasyanto 'nusaṃcaranti 
B tyaktagrāmyavastrāhāropabhogā vanyauṣadhimūlaphalaparṇaparimitavicitraniyatāhārāḥ
sthānāsanino bhūmipāṣāṇasikatāśarkarāvālukābhasmaśāyinaḥ kāśakuśacarmavalkalasaṃvṛtāṅgāḥ
keśaśmaśrunakharomadhāriṇo niyatakālopasparśanā askannahomabalikālānuṣṭhāyinaḥ samitkuśakusumopahārahomārjanalabdhaviśrāmāḥ
śītoṣṇapavananiṣṭaptavibhinnasarvatvaco vividhaniyamayogacaryāvihitadharmānuṣṭhānahṛtamāṃsaśoṇitās
tvagasthibhūtā dhṛtiparāḥ sattvayogāc charīrāṇy udvahanti
a yas tv etāṃ niyataś caryāṃ brahmarṣivihitāṃ caret
c sa dahed agnivad doṣāñ jayel lokāṃś ca durjayān
A parivrājakānāṃ punar ācāras tad yathā
B vimucyāgnidhanakalatraparibarhasaṅgān ātmanaḥ snehapāśān avadhūya parivrajanti
samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanās trivargapravṛtteṣv ārambheṣv asaktabuddhayo 'rimitrodāsīneṣu
tulyavṛttayaḥ sthāvarajarāyujāṇḍajasvedajodbhijjānāṃ bhūtānāṃ vāṅmanaḥkarmabhir anabhidrohiṇo
'niketāḥ parvatapulinavṛkṣamūladevatāyatanāny anucaranto vāsārtham upeyur nagaraṃ
grāmaṃ vā nagare pañcarātrikā grāmaikarātrikāḥ
C praviśya ca prāṇadhāraṇamātrārthaṃ dvijātīnāṃ bhavanāny asaṃkīrṇakarmaṇām
upatiṣṭheyuḥ pātrapatitāyācitabhaikṣāḥ kāmakrodhadarpamohalobhakārpaṇyadambhaparivādābhimānahiṃsānivṛttā iti
a abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dattvā carati yo muniḥ
A bhavati cātra ślokaḥ
c na tasya sarvabhūtebhyo bhayam utpadyate kva cit
a kṛtvāgnihotraṃ svaśarīrasaṃsthaṃ
śārīram agniṃ svamukhe juhoti
c yo bhaikṣacaryopagatair havirbhiś
citāgnināṃ sa vyatiyāti lokān
a mokṣāśramaṃ yaḥ kurute yathoktaṃ
śuciḥ susaṃkalpitabuddhiyuktaḥ
c anindhanaṃ jyotir iva praśāntaṃ
sa brahmalokaṃ śrayate dvijātiḥ
 bharadvāja uvāca
a asmāl lokāt paro lokaḥ śrūyate nopalabhyate
c tam ahaṃ jñātum icchāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati
 bhṛgur uvāca
a uttare himavatpārśve puṇye sarvaguṇānvite
c puṇyaḥ kṣemyaś ca kāmyaś ca sa varo loka ucyate
a tatra hy apāpakarmāṇaḥ śucayo 'tyantanirmalāḥ
c lobhamohaparityaktā mānavā nirupadravāḥ
a sa svargasadṛśo deśas tatra hy uktāḥ śubhā guṇāḥ
c kāle mṛtyuḥ prabhavati spṛśanti vyādhayo na ca
a na lobhaḥ paradāreṣu svadāranirato janaḥ
c na cānyonyavadhas tatra dravyeṣu na ca vismayaḥ
e parokṣadharmo naivāsti saṃdeho nāpi jāyate
a kṛtasya tu phalaṃ tatra pratyakṣam upalabhyate
c śayyāyānāsanopetāḥ prāsādabhavanāśrayāḥ
e sarvakāmair vṛtāḥ ke cid dhemābharaṇabhūṣitāḥ
a prāṇadhāraṇamātraṃ tu keṣāṃ cid upapadyate
c śrameṇa mahatā ke cit kurvanti prāṇadhāraṇam
a iha dharmaparāḥ ke cit ke cin naikṛtikā narāḥ
c sukhitā duḥkhitāḥ ke cin nirdhanā dhanino 'pare
a iha śramo bhayaṃ mohaḥ kṣudhā tīvrā ca jāyate
c lobhaś cārthakṛto nṝṇāṃ yena muhyanti paṇḍitāḥ
a iha cintā bahuvidhā dharmādharmasya karmaṇaḥ
c yas tad vedobhayaṃ prājñaḥ pāpmanā na sa lipyate
a sopadhaṃ nikṛtiḥ steyaṃ parivādo 'bhyasūyatā
c paropaghāto hiṃsā ca paiśunyam anṛtaṃ tathā
a etān āsevate yas tu tapas tasya prahīyate
c yas tv etān nācared vidvāṃs tapas tasyābhivardhate
a karmabhūmir iyaṃ loka iha kṛtvā śubhāśubham
c śubhaiḥ śubham avāpnoti kṛtvāśubham ato 'nyathā
a iha prajāpatiḥ pūrvaṃ devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathā
c iṣṭveṣṭatapasaḥ pūtā brahmalokam upāśritāḥ
a uttaraḥ pṛthivībhāgaḥ sarvapuṇyatamaḥ śubhaḥ
c ihatyās tatra jāyante ye vai puṇyakṛto janāḥ
a asatkarmāṇi kurvantas tiryagyoniṣu cāpare
c kṣīṇāyuṣas tathaivānye naśyanti pṛthivītale
a anyonyabhakṣaṇe saktā lobhamohasamanvitāḥ
c ihaiva parivartante na te yānty uttarāṃ diśam
a ye gurūn upasevante niyatā brahmacāriṇaḥ
c panthānaṃ sarvalokānāṃ te jānanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a ity ukto 'yaṃ mayā dharmaḥ saṃkṣepād brahmanirmitaḥ
c dharmādharmau hi lokasya yo vai vetti sa buddhimān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity ukto bhṛguṇā rājan bharadvājaḥ pratāpavān
c bhṛguṃ paramadharmātmā vismitaḥ pratyapūjayat
a eṣa te prabhavo rājañ jagataḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ
c nikhilena mahāprājña kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ācārasya vidhiṃ tāta procyamānaṃ tvayānagha
c śrotum icchāmi dharmajña sarvajño hy asi me mataḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a durācārā durviceṣṭā duṣprajñāḥ priyasāhasāḥ
c asanto hy abhivikhyātāḥ santaś cācāralakṣaṇāḥ
a purīṣaṃ yadi vā mūtraṃ ye na kurvanti mānavāḥ
c rājamārge gavāṃ madhye dhānyamadhye ca te śubhāḥ
d agnyāgāre tathā tīre ye na kurvanti te śubhāḥ
a śaucam āvaśyakaṃ kṛtvā devatānāṃ ca tarpaṇam
c dharmam āhur manuṣyāṇām upaspṛśya nadīṃ taret
a sūryaṃ sadopatiṣṭheta na svapyād bhāskarodaye
c sāyaṃ prātar japan saṃdhyāṃ tiṣṭhet pūrvāṃ tathāparām
a pañcārdro bhojanaṃ kuryāt prāṅmukho maunam āsthitaḥ
c na ninded annabhakṣyāṃś ca svādv asvādu ca bhakṣayet
a nārdrapāṇiḥ samuttiṣṭhen nārdrapādaḥ svapen niśi
c devarṣināradaproktam etad ācāralakṣaṇam
a śucikāmam anaḍvāhaṃ devagoṣṭhaṃ catuṣpatham
c brāhmaṇaṃ dhārmikaṃ caiva nityaṃ kuryāt pradakṣiṇam
a atithīnāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ preṣyāṇāṃ svajanasya ca
c sāmānyaṃ bhojanaṃ bhṛtyaiḥ puruṣasya praśasyate
a sāyaṃ prātar manuṣyāṇām aśanaṃ devanirmitam
c nāntarā bhojanaṃ dṛṣṭam upavāsī tathā bhavet
a homakāle tathā juhvann ṛtukāle tathā vrajan
c ananyastrījanaḥ prājño brahmacārī tathā bhavet
a amṛtaṃ brāhmaṇocchiṣṭaṃ jananyā hṛdayaṃ kṛtam
c upāsīta janaḥ satyaṃ satyaṃ santa upāsate
d loṣṭhamardī tṛṇacchedī nakhakhādī tu yo naraḥ
d nityocchiṣṭaḥ śaṅkuśuko nehāyur vindate mahat
a yajuṣā saṃskṛtaṃ māṃsaṃ nivṛtto māṃsabhakṣaṇāt
c na bhakṣayed vṛthāmāṃsaṃ pṛṣṭhamāṃsaṃ ca varjayet
a svadeśe paradeśe vā atithiṃ nopavāsayet
c kāmyaṃ karmaphalaṃ labdhvā gurūṇām upapādayet
a gurubhya āsanaṃ deyaṃ kartavyaṃ cābhivādanam
c gurūn abhyarcya yujyante āyuṣā yaśasā śriyā
a nekṣetādityam udyantaṃ na ca nagnāṃ parastriyam
c maithunaṃ samaye dharmyaṃ guhyaṃ caiva samācaret
a tīrthānāṃ hṛdayaṃ tīrthaṃ śucīnāṃ hṛdayaṃ śuciḥ
c sarvam āryakṛtaṃ śaucaṃ vālasaṃsparśanāni ca
a darśane darśane nityaṃ sukhapraśnam udāharet
c sāyaṃ prātaś ca viprāṇāṃ pradiṣṭam abhivādanam
a devagoṣṭhe gavāṃ madhye brāhmaṇānāṃ kriyāpathe
c svādhyāye bhojane caiva dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇim uddharet
d sāyaṃprātaś ca viprāṇāṃ pūjanaṃ ca yathāvidhi
a paṇyānāṃ śobhanaṃ paṇyaṃ kṛṣīṇāṃ bādyate kṛṣiḥ
c bahukāraṃ ca sasyānāṃ vāhye vāhyaṃ tathā gavām
a saṃpannaṃ bhojane nityaṃ pānīye tarpaṇaṃ tathā
c suśṛtaṃ pāyase brūyād yavāgvāṃ kṛsare tathā
a śmaśrukarmaṇi saṃprāpte kṣute snāne 'tha bhojane
c vyādhitānāṃ ca sarveṣām āyuṣyam abhinandanam
a pratyādityaṃ na meheta na paśyed ātmanaḥ śakṛt
c sutastriyā ca śayanaṃ sahabhojyaṃ ca varjayet
a tvaṃkāraṃ nāmadheyaṃ ca jyeṣṭhānāṃ parivarjayet
c avarāṇāṃ samānānām ubhayeṣāṃ na duṣyati
a hṛdayaṃ pāpavṛttānāṃ pāpam ākhyāti vaikṛtam
c jñānapūrvaṃ vinaśyanti gūhamānā mahājane
a jñānapūrvaṃ kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ chādayanty abahuśrutāḥ
c nainaṃ manuṣyāḥ paśyanti paśyanti tridivaukasaḥ
a pāpena hi kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ pāpam evānuvartate
b dharmeṇāpihito dharmo dharmam evānuvartate
c dhārmikeṇa kṛto dharmaḥ kartāram anuvartate
d pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ na sphurate yathāghair
d vipācyamānaṃ punar eti kartuḥ
a pāpaṃ kṛtaṃ na smaratīha mūḍho
vivartamānasya tad eti kartuḥ
c rāhur yathā candram upaiti cāpi
tathābudhaṃ pāpam upaiti karma
a āśayā saṃcitaṃ dravyaṃ yat kāle neha bhujyate
c tad budhā na praśaṃsanti maraṇaṃ na pratīkṣate
a mānasaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c tasmāt sarveṣu bhūteṣu manasā śivam ācaret
a eka eva cared dharmaṃ nāsti dharme sahāyatā
c kevalaṃ vidhim āsādya sahāyaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
a devā yonir manuṣyāṇāṃ devānām amṛtaṃ divi
c pretyabhāve sukhaṃ dharmāc chaśvat tair upabhujyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a adhyātmaṃ nāma yad idaṃ puruṣasyeha cintyate
c yad adhyātmaṃ yataś caitat tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
d pralaye ca kam abhyeti tan me vaktum ihārhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a adhyātmam iti māṃ pārtha yad etad anupṛcchasi
c tad vyākhyāsyāmi te tāta śreyaskarataraṃ sukham
d sṛṣṭipralayasaṃyuktam ācāryaiḥ paridarśitam
a yaj jñātvā puruṣo loke prītiṃ saukhyaṃ ca vindati
c phalalābhaś ca sadyaḥ syāt sarvabhūtahitaṃ ca tat
d ātmānam amalaṃ rājann āvṛtyaivaṃ vyavasthitam
d tasmin prakāśate nityaṃ tamaḥ somo yathaiva tat
d tad vidvān naṣṭapāpmaiṣa brahmabhūyāya kalpate
d aṇḍāvaraṇabhūtānāṃ paryantaṃ hi yathā tamaḥ
a pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
c mahābhūtāni bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayau
a tataḥ sṛṣṭāni tatraiva tāni yānti punaḥ punaḥ
c mahābhūtāni bhūteṣu sāgarasyormayo yathā
a prasārya ca yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥ
c tadvad bhūtāni bhūtātmā sṛṣṭvā saṃharate punaḥ
d sa teṣāṃ guṇasaṃghātaḥ śarīre bharatarṣabha
d satataṃ pravilīyante guṇās te prabhavanti ca
d yad vinā naiva śṛṇute na paśyati na dīpyate
d yad adhīnaṃ yatas tasmād adhyātmam iti kathyate
d jñānaṃ tad ekarūpākhyaṃ nānāprajñānvitaṃ tadā
d na te vācānurūpaṃ syād yayāthā rārasavivarjitam
d ākāśāt khalu yājyeṣu bhavanti sumahāguṇāḥ
d iti tanmayam evaitat sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
d pralaye ca tam abhyeti tasmād utsṛjyate punaḥ
d mahābhūteṣu bhūtātmā sṛṣṭvā saṃharate punaḥ
a mahābhūtāni pañcaiva sarvabhūteṣu bhūtakṛt
c akarot teṣu vaiṣamyaṃ tat tu jīvo 'nu paśyati
a śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśayonijam
c vāyos tvaksparśaceṣṭāś ca vāg ity etac catuṣṭayam
a rūpaṃ cakṣus tathā paktis trividhaṃ teja ucyate
c rasaḥ kledaś ca jihvā ca trayo jalaguṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
a ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca te tu bhūmiguṇās trayaḥ
c mahābhūtāni pañcaiva ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu mana ucyate
a indriyāṇi manaś caiva vijñānāny asya bhārata
c saptamī buddhir ity āhuḥ kṣetrajñaḥ punar aṣṭamaḥ
a cakṣur ālokanāyaiva saṃśayaṃ kurute manaḥ
c buddhir adhyavasāyāya kṣetrajñaḥ sākṣivat sthitaḥ
d cicchaktyādhiṣṭhitā buddhiś cetanety abhiviśrutā
d cetanānantaro jīvas tad āvetti ca lakṣyate
d notsṛjan visṛjaṃś caiva śarīraṃ dṛśyate yadā
d tasmiṃś cetopalabdhiḥ syāt tamo vācchādayaty uta
a ūrdhvaṃ pādatalābhyāṃ yad arvāg ūrdhvaṃ ca paśyati
c etena sarvam evedaṃ viddhy abhivyāptam antaram
a puruṣe cendriyāṇīha veditavyāni kṛtsnaśaḥ
c tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi bhāvāṃs tadāśrayān
a etāṃ buddhvā naro buddhyā bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
c samavekṣya śanaiś caiva labhate śamam uttamam
a guṇān nenīyate buddhir buddhir evendriyāṇy api
c manaḥṣaṣṭhāni sarvāṇi buddhyabhāve kuto guṇāḥ
d yena saṃkalpayaty arthaṃ kiṃ cid bhavati tanmanaḥ
a iti tanmayam evaitat sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
c pralīyate codbhavati tasmān nirdiśyate tathā
a yena paśyati tac cakṣuḥ śṛṇoti śrotram ucyate
c jighrati ghrāṇam ity āhū rasaṃ jānāti jihvayā
a tvacā spṛśati ca sparśān buddhir vikriyate 'sakṛt
c yena saṃkalpayaty arthaṃ kiṃ cid bhavati tan manaḥ
a adhiṣṭhānāni buddher hi pṛthag arthāni pañcadhā
c pañcendriyāṇi yāny āhus tāny adṛśyo 'dhitiṣṭhati
a puruṣādhiṣṭhitā buddhis triṣu bhāveṣu vartate
c kadā cil labhate prītiṃ kadā cid anuśocati
a na sukhena na duḥkhena kadā cid api vartate
c evaṃ narāṇāṃ manasi triṣu bhāveṣv avasthitā
a seyaṃ bhāvātmikā bhāvāṃs trīn etān nātivartate
c saritāṃ sāgaro bhartā mahāvelām ivormimān
a atibhāvagatā buddhir bhāve manasi vartate
c pravartamānaṃ hi rajas tadbhāvam anuvartate
a indriyāṇi hi sarvāṇi pradarśayati sā sadā
c prītiḥ sattvaṃ rajaḥ śokas tamo mohaś ca te trayaḥ
a ye ye ca bhāvā loke 'smin sarveṣv eteṣu te triṣu
b sattvaṃ buddhis tamobhāvaḥ prītiyogāt pravartate
c iti buddhigatiḥ sarvā vyākhyātā tava bhārata
a indriyāṇi ca sarvāṇi vijetavyāni dhīmatā
c sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva prāṇināṃ saṃśritāḥ sadā
a trividhā vedanā caiva sarvasattveṣu dṛśyate
c sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti bhārata
a sukhasparśaḥ sattvaguṇo duḥkhasparśo rajoguṇaḥ
c tamoguṇena saṃyuktau bhavato 'vyāvahārikau
a tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
c vartate sāttviko bhāva ity avekṣeta tat tadā
a atha yad duḥkhasaṃyuktam atuṣṭikaram ātmanaḥ
c pravṛttaṃ raja ity eva tann asaṃrabhya cintayet
a atha yan mohasaṃyuktam avyaktam iva yad bhavet
c apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayet
a praharṣaḥ prītir ānandaḥ sukhaṃ saṃśāntacittatā
c kathaṃ cid abhivartanta ity ete sāttvikā guṇāḥ
a atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaś ca śoko lobhas tathākṣamā
c liṅgāni rajasas tāni dṛśyante hetvahetubhiḥ
a abhimānas tathā mohaḥ pramādaḥ svapnatandritā
c kathaṃ cid abhivartante vividhās tāmasā guṇāḥ
a dūragaṃ bahudhāgāmi prārthanāsaṃśayātmakam
c manaḥ suniyataṃ yasya sa sukhī pretya ceha ca
a sattvakṣetrajñayor etad antaraṃ paśya sūkṣmayoḥ
c sṛjate tu guṇān eka eko na sṛjate guṇān
a maśakodumbarau cāpi saṃprayuktau yathā sadā
c anyonyam anyau ca yathā saṃprayogas tathā tayoḥ
a pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau saṃprayuktau ca sarvadā
c yathā matsyo jalaṃ caiva saṃprayuktau tathaiva tau
a na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ sa guṇān vetti sarvaśaḥ
c paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ ca saṃsraṣṭā manyate sadā
a indriyais tu pradīpārthaṃ kurute buddhisaptamaiḥ
c nirviceṣṭair ajānadbhiḥ paramātmā pradīpavat
a sṛjate hi guṇān sattvaṃ kṣetrajñaḥ paripaśyati
c saṃprayogas tayor eṣa sattvakṣetrajñayor dhruvaḥ
a āśrayo nāsti sattvasya kṣetrajñasya ca kaś cana
c sattvaṃ manaḥ saṃsṛjati na guṇān vai kadā cana
a raśmīṃs teṣāṃ sa manasā yadā samyaṅ niyacchati
c tadā prakāśate 'syātmā ghaṭe dīpo jvalann iva
a tyaktvā yaḥ prākṛtaṃ karma nityam ātmaratir muniḥ
c sarvabhūtātmabhūtaḥ syāt sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim
a yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī lipyamāno na lipyate
c evam eva kṛtaprajño bhūteṣu parivartate
a evaṃsvabhāvam evaitat svabuddhyā viharen naraḥ
c aśocann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca cared vigatamatsaraḥ
a svabhāvasiddhyā saṃsiddhān sa nityaṃ sṛjate guṇān
c ūrṇanābhir yathā sraṣṭā vijñeyās tantuvad guṇāḥ
a pradhvastā na nivartante nivṛttir nopalabhyate
c pratyakṣeṇa parokṣaṃ tad anumānena sidhyati
a evam eke vyavasyanti nivṛttir iti cāpare
c ubhayaṃ saṃpradhāryaitad adhyavasyed yathāmati
a itīmaṃ hṛdayagranthiṃ buddhibhedamayaṃ dṛḍham
c vimucya sukham āsīta na śocec chinnasaṃśayaḥ
a malināḥ prāpnuyuḥ śuddhiṃ yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ
c avagāhya suvidvaṃso viddhi jñānam idaṃ tathā
a mahānadīṃ hi pārajñas tapyate na taran yathā
b na tu tapyati tattvajñaḥ phale jñāte taraty uta
c evaṃ ye vidur adhyātmaṃ kaivalyaṃ jñānam uttamam
a etāṃ buddhvā naraḥ sarvāṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
c avekṣya ca śanair buddhyā labhate śaṃ paraṃ tataḥ
a trivargo yasya viditaḥ prāgjyotiḥ sa vimucyate
c anviṣya manasā yuktas tattvadarśī nirutsukaḥ
a na cātmā śakyate draṣṭum indriyeṣu vibhāgaśaḥ
