c tatra tatra visṛṣṭeṣu durjayeṣv akṛtātmabhiḥ
a etad buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam
b pratigṛhya ca nihnoti hy anyathā ca pradṛśyate
b na sarpati ca yaṃ prāhuḥ sarvatra pratihanyate
b dhūmena cāprasanno 'gnir yathārkaṃ na pravartayet
b dhiṣṇyādhipe prasanne tu sthitim etāṃ nirīkṣate
b atidūrāc ca sūkṣmatvāt prasthānaṃ na prakāśate
b prapadya tac chrutāhvāni cinmayaṃ svīkṛtaṃ vinā
c vijñāya tad dhi manyante kṛtakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ
a na bhavati viduṣāṃ tato bhayaṃ
yad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ bhavet
c na hi gatir adhikāsti kasya cit
sati hi guṇe pravadanty atulyatām
a yat karoty anabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ
tac ca nirṇudati yat purā kṛtam
c nāpriyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ kutaḥ priyaṃ
tasya taj janayatīha kurvataḥ
d lokam āturam asūyate janas
d tasya taj janayatīha sarvataḥ
a loka āturajanān virāviṇas
tat tad eva bahu paśya śocataḥ
c tatra paśya kuśalān aśocato
ye vidus tad ubhayaṃ padaṃ sadā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a hanta vakṣyāmi te pārtha dhyānayogaṃ caturvidham
c yaṃ jñātvā śāśvatīṃ siddhiṃ gacchanti paramarṣayaḥ
a yathā svanuṣṭhitaṃ dhyānaṃ tathā kurvanti yoginaḥ
c maharṣayo jñānatṛptā nirvāṇagatamānasāḥ
a nāvartante punaḥ pārtha muktāḥ saṃsāradoṣataḥ
c janmadoṣaparikṣīṇāḥ svabhāve paryavasthitāḥ
a nirdvaṃdvā nityasattvasthā vimuktā nityam āśritāḥ
c asaṅgīny avivādīni manaḥśāntikarāṇi ca
a tatra svādhyāyasaṃśliṣṭam ekāgraṃ dhārayen manaḥ
c piṇḍīkṛtyendriyagrāmam āsīnaḥ kāṣṭhavan muniḥ
a śabdaṃ na vindec chrotreṇa sparśaṃ tvacā na vedayet
c rūpaṃ na cakṣuṣā vidyāj jihvayā na rasāṃs tathā
a ghreyāṇy api ca sarvāṇi jahyād dhyānena yogavit
c pañcavargapramāthīni necchec caitāni vīryavān
a tato manasi saṃsajya pañcavargaṃ vicakṣaṇaḥ
c samādadhyān mano bhrāntam indriyaiḥ saha pañcabhiḥ
a visaṃcāri nirālambaṃ pañcadvāraṃ calācalam
c pūrve dhyānapathe dhīraḥ samādadhyān mano 'ntaram
a indriyāṇi manaś caiva yadā piṇḍīkaroty ayam
c eṣa dhyānapathaḥ pūrvo mayā samanuvarṇitaḥ
a tasya tat pūrvasaṃruddhaṃ manaḥṣaṣṭham anantaram
c sphuriṣyati samudbhrāntaṃ vidyud ambudhare yathā
a jalabindur yathā lolaḥ parṇasthaḥ sarvataś calaḥ
c evam evāsya tac cittaṃ bhavati dhyānavartmani
a samāhitaṃ kṣaṇaṃ kiṃ cid dhyānavartmani tiṣṭhati
c punar vāyupathaṃ bhrāntaṃ mano bhavati vāyuvat
a anirvedo gatakleśo gatatandrīr amatsaraḥ
c samādadhyāt punaś ceto dhyānena dhyānayogavit
a vicāraś ca vitarkaś ca vivekaś copajāyate
c muneḥ samādadhānasya prathamaṃ dhyānam āditaḥ
a manasā kliśyamānas tu samādhānaṃ ca kārayet
c na nirvedaṃ munir gacchet kuryād evātmano hitam
a pāṃsubhasmakarīṣāṇāṃ yathā vai rāśayaś citāḥ
c sahasā vāriṇā siktā na yānti paribhāvanām
a kiṃ cit snigdhaṃ yathā ca syāc chuṣkacūrṇam abhāvitam
c kramaśas tu śanair gacchet sarvaṃ tat paribhāvanam
a evam evendriyagrāmaṃ śanaiḥ saṃparibhāvayet
c saṃharet kramaśaś caiva sa samyak praśamiṣyati
a svayam eva manaś caiva pañcavargaś ca bhārata
c pūrvaṃ dhyānapathaṃ prāpya nityayogena śāmyati
a na tat puruṣakāreṇa na ca daivena kena cit
c sukham eṣyati tat tasya yad evaṃ saṃyatātmanaḥ
a sukhena tena saṃyukto raṃsyate dhyānakarmaṇi
c gacchanti yogino hy evaṃ nirvāṇaṃ tan nirāmayam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a cāturāśramyam uktaṃ te rājadharmās tathaiva ca
c nānāśrayāś ca bahava itihāsāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
a śrutās tvattaḥ kathāś caiva dharmayuktā mahāmate
c saṃdeho 'sti tu kaś cin me tad bhavān vaktum arhati
a jāpakānāṃ phalāvāptiṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
c kiṃ phalaṃ japatām uktaṃ kva vā tiṣṭhanti jāpakāḥ
a japasya ca vidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ vaktum arhasi me 'nagha
c jāpakā iti kiṃ caitat sāṃkhyayogakriyāvidhiḥ
a kiṃ yajñavidhir evaiṣa kim etaj japyam ucyate
c etan me sarvam ācakṣva sarvajño hy asi me mataḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c yamasya yat purā vṛttaṃ kālasya brāhmaṇasya ca
d sāṃkhyayogau tu yāv uktau munibhir mokṣadarśibhiḥ
d ikṣvākoś caiva mṛtyoś ca vivādo dharmakāraṇāt
a saṃnyāsa eva vedānte vartate japanaṃ prati
c vedavādābhinirvṛttā śāntir brahmaṇy avasthitau
e mārgau tāv apy ubhāv etau saṃśritau na ca saṃśritau
a yathā saṃśrūyate rājan kāraṇaṃ cātra vakṣyate
b krameṇa caiṣa vihito japayajñavidhir nṛpa
b sālambanam iti jñeyaṃ japayajñātmakaṃ śubham
c manaḥsamādhir atrāpi tathendriyajayaḥ smṛtaḥ
a satyam agniparīcāro viviktānāṃ ca sevanam
c dhyānaṃ tapo damaḥ kṣāntir anasūyā mitāśanam
a viṣayapratisaṃhāro mitajalpas tathā śamaḥ
c eṣa pravṛttako dharmo nivṛttakam atho śṛṇu
a yathā nivartate karma japato brahmacāriṇaḥ
b na japo na ca vai dhyānaṃ necchā na dveṣaharṣaṇau
b yujyate nṛpaśārdūla susaṃvedyaṃ hi tat kila
b japam āvartayan nityaṃ japan vai brahmacārikam
b tadarthabuddhyā saṃyāti manasā jāpakaḥ param
b yathā saṃśrūyate jāpo yena vai jāpako bhavet
b saṃhitāpraṇavenaiva sāvitrī ca parā matā
b yad anyad ucitaṃ śuddhaṃ vedasmṛty upapāditam
c etat sarvam aśeṣeṇa yathoktaṃ parivarjayet
e trividhaṃ mārgam āsādya vyaktāvyaktam anāśrayam
a kuśoccayaniṣaṇṇaḥ san kuśahastaḥ kuśaiḥ śikhī
c cīraiḥ parivṛtas tasmin madhye channaḥ kuśais tathā
a viṣayebhyo namaskuryād viṣayān na ca bhāvayet
c sāmyam utpādya manaso manasy eva mano dadhat
a tad dhiyā dhyāyati brahma japan vai saṃhitāṃ hitām
c saṃnyasyaty atha vā tāṃ vai samādhau paryavasthitaḥ
a dhyānam utpādayaty atra saṃhitābalasaṃśrayāt
c śuddhātmā tapasā dānto nivṛttadveṣakāmavān
d athābhimatamantreṇa praṇavādyaṃ japet kṛtī
d yasminn evābhipatitaṃ manas tatra niveśayet
d samādhau sa hi mantre tu saṃhitāṃ vā yathāvidhi
a arāgamoho nirdvaṃdvo na śocati na sajjate
c na kartākaraṇīyānāṃ na kāryāṇām iti sthitiḥ
a na cāhaṃkārayogena manaḥ prasthāpayet kva cit
c na cātmagrahaṇe yukto nāvamānī na cākriyaḥ
a dhyānakriyāparo yukto dhyānavān dhyānaniścayaḥ
c dhyāne samādhim utpādya tad api tyajati kramāt
a sa vai tasyām avasthāyāṃ sarvatyāgakṛtaḥ sukhī
c nirīhas tyajati prāṇān brāhmīṃ saṃśrayate tanum
d nirālambo bhavet smṛtvā maraṇāya samādhimān
d sarvāṃl lokān samākramya kramāt prāpnoti vai param
a atha vā necchate tatra brahmakāyaniṣevaṇam
c utkrāmati ca mārgastho naiva kva cana jāyate
a ātmabuddhiṃ samāsthāya śāntībhūto nirāmayaḥ
c amṛtaṃ virajaḥśuddham ātmānaṃ pratipadyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a gatīnām uttamā prāptiḥ kathitā jāpakeṣv iha
c ekaivaiṣā gatis teṣām uta yānty aparām api
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājañ jāpakānāṃ gatiṃ vibho
c yathā gacchanti nirayam anekaṃ puruṣarṣabha
a yathoktam etat pūrvaṃ yo nānutiṣṭhati jāpakaḥ
c ekadeśakriyaś cātra nirayaṃ sa nigacchati
a avajñānena kurute na tuṣyati na śocati
c īdṛśo jāpako yāti nirayaṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
a ahaṃkārakṛtaś caiva sarve nirayagāminaḥ
c parāvamānī puruṣo bhavitā nirayopagaḥ
a abhidhyāpūrvakaṃ japyaṃ kurute yaś ca mohitaḥ
c yatrābhidhyāṃ sa kurute taṃ vai nirayam ṛcchati
a athaiśvaryapravṛttaḥ sañ jāpakas tatra rajyate
c sa eva nirayas tasya nāsau tasmāt pramucyate
a rāgeṇa jāpako japyaṃ kurute tatra mohitaḥ
c yatrāsya rāgaḥ patati tatra tatropajāyate
a durbuddhir akṛtaprajñaś cale manasi tiṣṭhati
c calām eva gatiṃ yāti nirayaṃ vādhigacchati
a akṛtaprajñako bālo mohaṃ gacchati jāpakaḥ
c sa mohān nirayaṃ yāti tatra gatvānuśocati
a dṛḍhagrāhī karomīti japyaṃ japati jāpakaḥ
c na saṃpūrṇo na vā yukto nirayaṃ so 'dhigacchati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a animittaṃ paraṃ yat tad avyaktaṃ brahmaṇi sthitam
c sadbhūto jāpakaḥ kasmāt sa śarīram athāviśet
 bhīṣma uvāca
a duṣprajñānena nirayā bahavaḥ samudāhṛtāḥ
c praśastaṃ jāpakatvaṃ ca doṣāś caite tadātmakāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kīdṛśo jāpako yāti nirayaṃ varṇayasva me
c kautūhalaṃ hi me jātaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a dharmasyāṃśaḥ prasūto 'si dharmiṣṭho 'si svabhāvataḥ
c dharmamūlāśrayaṃ vākyaṃ śṛṇuṣvāvahito 'nagha
a amūni yāni sthānāni devānāṃ paramātmanām
c nānāsaṃsthānavarṇāni nānārūpaphalāni ca
a divyāni kāmacārīṇi vimānāni sabhās tathā
c ākrīḍā vividhā rājan padminyaś cāmalodakāḥ
a caturṇāṃ lokapālānāṃ śukrasyātha bṛhaspateḥ
c marutāṃ viśvadevānāṃ sādhyānām aśvinor api
a rudrādityavasūnāṃ ca tathānyeṣāṃ divaukasām
c ete vai nirayās tāta sthānasya paramātmanaḥ
a abhayaṃ cānimittaṃ ca na ca kleśabhayāvṛtam
c dvābhyāṃ muktaṃ tribhir muktam aṣṭābhis tribhir eva ca
a caturlakṣaṇavarjaṃ tu catuṣkāraṇavarjitam
c apraharṣam anānandam aśokaṃ vigataklamam
a kālaḥ saṃpacyate tatra na kālas tatra vai prabhuḥ
c sa kālasya prabhū rājan svargasyāpi tatheśvaraḥ
d etad vai brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ jāpakasya mahātmanaḥ
d tatrasthaṃ paramātmānaṃ dhyāyan vai susamāhitaḥ
d hiraṇyagarbhasāyujyaṃ prāpnuyād vā nṛpottama
a ātmakevalatāṃ prāptas tatra gatvā na śocati
c īdṛśaṃ paramaṃ sthānaṃ nirayās te ca tādṛśāḥ
a ete te nirayāḥ proktāḥ sarva eva yathātatham
c tasya sthānavarasyeha sarve nirayasaṃjñitāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kālamṛtyuyamānāṃ ca brāhmaṇasya ca sattama
c vivādo vyāhṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c ikṣvākoḥ sūryaputrasya yad vṛttaṃ brāhmaṇasya ca
a kālasya mṛtyoś ca tathā yad vṛttaṃ tan nibodha me
c yathā sa teṣāṃ saṃvādo yasmin sthāne 'pi cābhavat
d yenaiva kāraṇenātra dharmavādasamanvitaḥ
a brāhmaṇo jāpakaḥ kaś cid dharmavṛtto mahāyaśāḥ
c ṣaḍaṅgavin mahāprājñaḥ paippalādiḥ sa kauśikaḥ
a tasyāparokṣaṃ vijñānaṃ ṣaḍaṅgeṣu tathaiva ca
c vedeṣu caiva niṣṇāto himavatpādasaṃśrayaḥ
a so 'ntyaṃ brāhmaṃ tapas tepe saṃhitāṃ saṃyato japan
c tasya varṣasahasraṃ tu niyamena tathā gatam
a sa devyā darśitaḥ sākṣāt prītāsmīti tadā kila
c japyam āvartayaṃs tūṣṇīṃ na ca tāṃ kiṃ cid abravīt
a tasyānukampayā devī prītā samabhavat tadā
c vedamātā tatas tasya taj japyaṃ samapūjayat
d caturbhir akṣarair yuktā somapāne 'kṣarāṣṭakā
d jagadbījasamāyuktā caturviṃśākṣarātmikā
a samāptajapyas tūtthāya śirasā pādayos tathā
c papāta devyā dharmātmā vacanaṃ cedam abravīt
a diṣṭyā devi prasannā tvaṃ darśanaṃ cāgatā mama
c yadi vāpi prasannāsi japye me ramatāṃ manaḥ
 sāvitry uvāca
a kiṃ prārthayasi viprarṣe kiṃ ceṣṭaṃ karavāṇi te
c prabrūhi japatāṃ śreṣṭha sarvaṃ tat te bhaviṣyati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ sa tadā devyā vipraḥ provāca dharmavit
c japyaṃ prati mameccheyaṃ vardhatv iti punaḥ punaḥ
a manasaś ca samādhir me vardhetāhar ahaḥ śubhe
c tat tatheti tato devī madhuraṃ pratyabhāṣata
a idaṃ caivāparaṃ prāha devī tatpriyakāmyayā
c nirayaṃ naiva yātāsi yatra yātā dvijarṣabhāḥ
a yāsyasi brahmaṇaḥ sthānam animittam aninditam
c sādhaye bhavitā caitad yat tvayāham ihārthitā
a niyato japa caikāgro dharmas tvāṃ samupaiṣyati
c kālo mṛtyur yamaś caiva samāyāsyanti te 'ntikam
e bhavitā ca vivādo 'tra tava teṣāṃ ca dharmataḥ
a evam uktvā bhagavatī jagāma bhavanaṃ svakam
c brāhmaṇo 'pi japann āste divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ tadā
d sadā dānto jitakrodhaḥ satyasaṃdho 'nasūyakaḥ
a samāpte niyame tasminn atha viprasya dhīmataḥ
c sākṣāt prītas tadā dharmo darśayām āsa taṃ dvijam
 dharma uvāca
a dvijāte paśya māṃ dharmam ahaṃ tvāṃ draṣṭum āgataḥ
c japyasya ca phalaṃ yat te saṃprāptaṃ tac ca me śṛṇu
a jitā lokās tvayā sarve ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ
c devānāṃ nirayān sādho sarvān utkramya yāsyasi
a prāṇatyāgaṃ kuru mune gaccha lokān yathepsitān
c tyaktvātmanaḥ śarīraṃ ca tato lokān avāpsyasi
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a kṛtaṃ lokair hi me dharma gaccha ca tvaṃ yathāsukham
c bahuduḥkhasukhaṃ dehaṃ notsṛjeyam ahaṃ vibho
d acalaṃ te manaḥ kṛtvā tyaja dehaṃ mahāmate
d anena kiṃ te saṃyogaḥ kathaṃ mohaṃ gamiṣyasi
 dharma uvāca
a avaśyaṃ bhoḥ śarīraṃ te tyaktavyaṃ munipuṃgava
c svarga ārohyatāṃ vipra kiṃ vā te rocate 'nagha
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a na rocaye svargavāsaṃ vinā dehād ahaṃ vibho
c gaccha dharma na me śraddhā svargaṃ gantuṃ vinātmanā
 dharma uvāca
a alaṃ dehe manaḥ kṛtvā tyaktvā dehaṃ sukhī bhava
c gaccha lokān arajaso yatra gatvā na śocasi
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a rame japan mahābhāga kṛtaṃ lokaiḥ sanātanaiḥ
c saśarīreṇa gantavyo mayā svargo na vā vibho
d evaṃ te kāryasaṃprītir vartate munisattama
 dharma uvāca
a yadi tvaṃ necchasi tyaktuṃ śarīraṃ paśya vai dvija
c eṣa kālas tathā mṛtyur yamaś ca tvām upāgatāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atha vaivasvataḥ kālo mṛtyuś ca tritayaṃ vibho
c brāhmaṇaṃ taṃ mahābhāgam upāgamyedam abruvan
a tapaso 'sya sutaptasya tathā sucaritasya ca
c phalaprāptis tava śreṣṭhā yamo 'haṃ tvām upabruve
a yathāvad asya japyasya phalaṃ prāptas tvam uttamam
c kālas te svargam āroḍhuṃ kālo 'haṃ tvām upāgataḥ
a mṛtyuṃ mā viddhi dharmajña rūpiṇaṃ svayam āgatam
c kālena coditaṃ vipra tvām ito netum adya vai
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a svāgataṃ sūryaputrāya kālāya ca mahātmane
c mṛtyave cātha dharmāya kiṃ kāryaṃ karavāṇi vaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a arghyaṃ pādyaṃ ca dattvā sa tebhyas tatra samāgame
c abravīt paramaprītaḥ svaśaktyā kiṃ karomi vaḥ
d svakāryanirbharā yūyaṃ paropadravahetavaḥ
d bhavanto lokasāmānyāḥ kimarthaṃ brūta sattamāḥ
d dharma uvāca
d vayam apy evam avyagrair dhātur ājñāpuraḥsaraiḥ
d bhīṣma uvāca
d coditā dhāvamānā vai karmabhāgam anuvratāḥ
a tasminn evātha kāle tu tīrthayātrām upāgataḥ
c ikṣvākur agamat tatra sametā yatra te vibho
a sarvān eva tu rājarṣiḥ saṃpūjyābhipraṇamya ca
c kuśalapraśnam akarot sarveṣāṃ rājasattamaḥ
a tasmai so 'thāsanaṃ dattvā pādyam arghyaṃ tathaiva ca
c abravīd brāhmaṇo vākyaṃ kṛtvā kuśalasaṃvidam
a svāgataṃ te mahārāja brūhi yad yad ihecchasi
c svaśaktyā kiṃ karomīha tad bhavān prabravītu me
 rājovāca
a rājāhaṃ brāhmaṇaś ca tvaṃ yadi ṣaṭkarmasaṃsthitaḥ
c dadāmi vasu kiṃ cit te prārthitaṃ tad vadasva me
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a dvividhā brāhmaṇā rājan dharmaś ca dvividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
c pravṛttaś ca nivṛttaś ca nivṛtto 'smi pratigrahāt
a tebhyaḥ prayaccha dānāni ye pravṛttā narādhipa
c ahaṃ na pratigṛhṇāmi kim iṣṭaṃ kiṃ dadāni te
e brūhi tvaṃ nṛpatiśreṣṭha tapasā sādhayāmi kim
 rājovāca
a kṣatriyo 'haṃ na jānāmi dehīti vacanaṃ kva cit
c prayaccha yuddham ity evaṃ vādinaḥ smo dvijottama
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a tuṣyasi tvaṃ svadharmeṇa tathā tuṣṭā vayaṃ nṛpa
c anyonyasyottaraṃ nāsti yad iṣṭaṃ tat samācara
 rājovāca
a svaśaktyāhaṃ dadānīti tvayā pūrvaṃ prabhāṣitam
c yāce tvāṃ dīyatāṃ mahyaṃ japyasyāsya phalaṃ dvija
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a yuddhaṃ mama sadā vāṇī yācatīti vikatthase
c na ca yuddhaṃ mayā sārdhaṃ kimarthaṃ yācase punaḥ
 rājovāca
a vāgvajrā brāhmaṇāḥ proktāḥ kṣatriyā bāhujīvinaḥ
c vāgyuddhaṃ tad idaṃ tīvraṃ mama vipra tvayā saha
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a saivādyāpi pratijñā me svaśaktyā kiṃ pradīyatām
c brūhi dāsyāmi rājendra vibhave sati māciram
 rājovāca
a yat tad varṣaśataṃ pūrṇaṃ japyaṃ vai japatā tvayā
c phalaṃ prāptaṃ tat prayaccha mama ditsur bhavān yadi
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a paramaṃ gṛhyatāṃ tasya phalaṃ yaj japitaṃ mayā
c ardhaṃ tvam avicāreṇa phalaṃ tasya samāpnuhi
a atha vā sarvam eveha japyakaṃ māmakaṃ phalam
c rājan prāpnuhi kāmaṃ tvaṃ yadi sarvam ihecchasi
 rājovāca
a kṛtaṃ sarveṇa bhadraṃ te japyaṃ yad yācitaṃ mayā
c svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi kiṃ ca tasya phalaṃ vada
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a phalaprāptiṃ na jānāmi dattaṃ yaj japitaṃ mayā
c ayaṃ dharmaś ca kālaś ca yamo mṛtyuś ca sākṣiṇaḥ
 rājovāca
a ajñātam asya dharmasya phalaṃ me kiṃ kariṣyati
b phalaṃ bravīṣi dharmasya na cej japyakṛtasya mām
c prāpnotu tat phalaṃ vipro nāham icche sasaṃśayam
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a nādade 'paravaktavyaṃ dattaṃ vācā phalaṃ mayā
c vākyaṃ pramāṇaṃ rājarṣe mamāpi tava caiva hi
d sakṛd aṃśo nipatati sakṛt kanyā pradīyate
d sakṛd eva dadānīti trīṇy etāni sakṛt sakṛt
a nābhisaṃdhir mayā japye kṛtapūrvaḥ kathaṃ cana
c japyasya rājaśārdūla kathaṃ jñāsyāmy ahaṃ phalam
a dadasveti tvayā coktaṃ dadāmīti tathā mayā
c na vācaṃ dūṣayiṣyāmi satyaṃ rakṣa sthiro bhava
a athaivaṃ vadato me 'dya vacanaṃ na kariṣyasi
c mahān adharmo bhavitā tava rājan mṛṣākṛtaḥ
a na yuktaṃ tu mṛṣā vāṇī tvayā vaktum ariṃdama
c tathā mayāpy abhyadhikaṃ mṛṣā vaktuṃ na śakyate
a saṃśrutaṃ ca mayā pūrvaṃ dadānīty avicāritam
c tad gṛhṇīṣvāvicāreṇa yadi satye sthito bhavān
a ihāgamya hi māṃ rājañ jāpyaṃ phalam ayācithāḥ
c tan mannisṛṣṭaṃ gṛhṇīṣva bhava satye sthiro 'pi ca
a nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na ca pūrvān sa tārayet
c kuta evāvarān rājan mṛṣāvādaparāyaṇaḥ
a na yajñādhyayane dānaṃ niyamās tārayanti hi
c tathā satyaṃ pare loke yathā vai puruṣarṣabha
a tapāṃsi yāni cīrṇāni cariṣyasi ca yat tapaḥ
c samāḥ śataiḥ sahasraiś ca tat satyān na viśiṣyate
a satyam ekākṣaraṃ brahma satyam ekākṣaraṃ tapaḥ
c satyam ekākṣaro yajñaḥ satyam ekākṣaraṃ śrutam
a satyaṃ vedeṣu jāgarti phalaṃ satye paraṃ smṛtam
c satyād dharmo damaś caiva sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam
a satyaṃ vedās tathāṅgāni satyaṃ yajñas tathā vidhiḥ
c vratacaryās tathā satyam oṃkāraḥ satyam eva ca
a prāṇināṃ jananaṃ satyaṃ satyaṃ saṃtatir eva ca
c satyena vāyur abhyeti satyena tapate raviḥ
a satyena cāgnir dahati svargaḥ satye pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c satyaṃ yajñas tapo vedāḥ stobhā mantrāḥ sarasvatī
a tulām āropito dharmaḥ satyaṃ caiveti naḥ śrutam
c samāṃ kakṣāṃ dhārayato yataḥ satyaṃ tato 'dhikam
a yato dharmas tataḥ satyaṃ sarvaṃ satyena vardhate
c kimartham anṛtaṃ karma kartuṃ rājaṃs tvam icchasi
a satye kuru sthiraṃ bhāvaṃ mā rājann anṛtaṃ kṛthāḥ
c kasmāt tvam anṛtaṃ vākyaṃ dehīti kuruṣe 'śubham
a yadi japyaphalaṃ dattaṃ mayā neṣiṣyase nṛpa
c svadharmebhyaḥ paribhraṣṭo lokān anucariṣyasi
a saṃśrutya yo na ditseta yācitvā yaś ca necchati
c ubhāv ānṛtikāv etau na mṛṣā kartum arhasi
 rājovāca
a yoddhavyaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ ca kṣatradharmaḥ kila dvija
c dātāraḥ kṣatriyāḥ proktā gṛhṇīyāṃ bhavataḥ katham
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a na chandayāmi te rājan nāpi te gṛham āvrajam
c ihāgamya tu yācitvā na gṛhṇīṣe punaḥ katham
 dharma uvāca
a avivādo 'stu yuvayor vittaṃ māṃ dharmam āgatam
c dvijo dānaphalair yukto rājā satyaphalena ca
 svarga uvāca
a svargaṃ māṃ viddhi rājendra rūpiṇaṃ svayam āgatam
c avivādo 'stu yuvayor ubhau tulyaphalau yuvām
 rājovāca
a kṛtaṃ svargeṇa me kāryaṃ gaccha svarga yathāsukham
c vipro yadīcchate dātuṃ pratīcchatu ca me dhanam
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a bālye yadi syād ajñānān mayā hastaḥ prasāritaḥ
c nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmam upāse saṃhitāṃ japan
a nivṛttaṃ māṃ ciraṃ rājan vipraṃ lobhayase katham
c svena kāryaṃ kariṣyāmi tvatto necche phalaṃ nṛpa
e tapaḥsvādhyāyaśīlo 'haṃ nivṛttaś ca pratigrahāt
 rājovāca
a yadi vipra nisṛṣṭaṃ te japyasya phalam uttamam
c āvayor yat phalaṃ kiṃ cit sahitaṃ nau tad astv iha
a dvijāḥ pratigrahe yuktā dātāro rājavaṃśajāḥ
c yadi dharmaḥ śruto vipra sahaiva phalam astu nau
a mā vā bhūt sahabhojyaṃ nau madīyaṃ phalam āpnuhi
c pratīccha matkṛtaṃ dharmaṃ yadi te mayy anugrahaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato vikṛtaceṣṭau dvau puruṣau samupasthitau
c gṛhītvānyonyam āveṣṭya kucelāv ūcatur vacaḥ
a na me dhārayasīty eko dhārayāmīti cāparaḥ
c ihāsti nau vivādo 'yam ayaṃ rājānuśāsakaḥ
a satyaṃ bravīmy aham idaṃ na me dhārayate bhavān
c anṛtaṃ vadasīha tvam ṛṇaṃ te dhārayāmy aham
a tāv ubhau bhṛśasaṃtaptau rājānam idam ūcatuḥ
c parīkṣyatāṃ yathā syāva nāvām iha vigarhitau
 virūpa uvāca
a dhārayāmi naravyāghra vikṛtasyeha goḥ phalam
c dadataś ca na gṛhṇāti vikṛto me mahīpate
 vikṛta uvāca
a na me dhārayate kiṃ cid virūpo 'yaṃ narādhipa
c mithyā bravīty ayaṃ hi tvā mithyābhāsaṃ narādhipa
 rājovāca
a virūpa kiṃ dhārayate bhavān asya vadasva me
c śrutvā tathā kariṣyāmīty evaṃ me dhīyate matiḥ
 virūpa uvāca
a śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan yathaitad dhārayāmy aham
c vikṛtasyāsya rājarṣe nikhilena nararṣabha
a anena dharmaprāptyarthaṃ śubhā dattā purānagha
c dhenur viprāya rājarṣe tapaḥsvādhyāyaśīline
a tasyāś cāyaṃ mayā rājan phalam abhyetya yācitaḥ
c vikṛtena ca me dattaṃ viśūddhenāntarātmanā
a tato me sukṛtaṃ karma kṛtam ātmaviśuddhaye
c gāvau hi kapile krītvā vatsale bahudohane
a te coñchavṛttaye rājan mayā samapavarjite
c yathāvidhi yathāśraddhaṃ tad asyāhaṃ punaḥ prabho
a ihādya vai gṛhītvā tat prayacche dviguṇaṃ phalam
c ekasyāḥ puruṣavyāghra kaḥ śuddhaḥ ko 'tra doṣavān
a evaṃ vivadamānau svas tvām ihābhyāgatau nṛpa
c kuru dharmam adharmaṃ vā vinaye nau samādhaya
a yadi necchati me dānaṃ yathā dattam anena vai
c bhavān atra sthiro bhūtvā mārge sthāpayatu prabhuḥ
 rājovāca
a dīyamānaṃ na gṛhṇāsi ṛṇaṃ kasmāt tvam adya vai
c yathaiva te 'bhyanujñātaṃ tathā gṛhṇīṣva māciram
 vikṛta uvāca
a dīyatām ity anenoktaṃ dadānīti tathā mayā
c nāyaṃ me dhārayaty atra gamyatāṃ yatra vāñchati
 rājovāca
a dadato 'sya na gṛhṇāsi viṣamaṃ pratibhāti me
c daṇḍyo hi tvaṃ mama mato nāsty atra khalu saṃśayaḥ
 vikṛta uvāca
a mayāsya dattaṃ rājarṣe gṛhṇīyāṃ tat kathaṃ punaḥ
c kāmam atrāparādho me daṇḍyam ājñāpaya prabho
 virūpa uvāca
a dīyamānaṃ yadi mayā neṣiṣyasi kathaṃ cana
c niyaṃsyati tvā nṛpatir ayaṃ dharmānuśāsakaḥ
 vikṛta uvāca
a svaṃ mayā yāciteneha dattaṃ katham ihādya tat
c gṛhṇīyāṃ gacchatu bhavān abhyanujñāṃ dadāni te
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a śrutam etat tvayā rājann anayoḥ kathitaṃ dvayoḥ
c pratijñātaṃ mayā yat te tad gṛhāṇāvicāritam
 rājovāca
a prastutaṃ sumahat kāryam āvayor gahvaraṃ yathā
c jāpakasya dṛḍhīkāraḥ katham etad bhaviṣyati
a yadi tāvan na gṛhṇāmi brāhmaṇenāpavarjitam
c kathaṃ na lipyeyam ahaṃ doṣeṇa mahatādya vai
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tau covāca sa rājarṣiḥ kṛtakāryau gamiṣyathaḥ
c nedānīṃ mām ihāsādya rājadharmo bhaven mṛṣā
a svadharmaḥ paripālyaś ca rājñām eṣa viniścayaḥ
c vipradharmaś ca sugurur mām anātmānam āviśat
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a gṛhāṇa dhāraye 'haṃ te yācitaṃ te śrutaṃ mayā
c na ced grahīṣyase rājañ śapiṣye tvāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
 rājovāca
a dhig rājadharmaṃ yasyāyaṃ kāryasyeha viniścayaḥ
c ityarthaṃ me grahītavyaṃ kathaṃ tulyaṃ bhaved iti
a eṣa pāṇir apūrvaṃ bho nikṣepārthaṃ prasāritaḥ
c yan me dhārayase vipra tad idānīṃ pradīyatām
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a saṃhitāṃ japatā yāvān mayā kaś cid guṇaḥ kṛtaḥ
c tat sarvaṃ pratigṛhṇīṣva yadi kiṃ cid ihāsti me
 rājovāca
a jalam etan nipatitaṃ mama pāṇau dvijottama
c samam astu sahaivāstu pratigṛhṇātu vai bhavān
 virūpa uvāca
a kāmakrodhau viddhi nau tvam āvābhyāṃ kārito bhavān
b jijñāsamānau yuvayor manotthaṃ tu dvijottama
c sameti ca yad uktaṃ te samā lokās tavāsya ca
a nāyaṃ dhārayate kiṃ cij jijñāsā tvatkṛte kṛtā
c kālo dharmas tathā mṛtyuḥ kāmakrodhau tathā yuvām
a sarvam anyonyanikaṣe nighṛṣṭaṃ paśyatas tava
b sarveṣām upari sthānaṃ brahmaṇo 'vyaktajanmanaḥ
b yuvayoḥ sthānam atulaṃ nirdvaṃdvam amalātmakam
b sarve gacchāma yatra svān svāṃl lokāṃś ca tathā vayam
c gaccha lokāñ jitān svena karmaṇā yatra vāñchasi
d tato dharmayamādyās te vākyam ūcur nṛpadvijau
d asmākaṃ yaḥ smṛto mūrdhā brahmalokam iti smṛtam
d tatrasthau hi bhavantau hi yuvābhyāṃ nirjitā vayam
d yuvayoḥ kāma āpannas tat kāmyam aviśaṅkayā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a jāpakānāṃ phalāvāptir mayā te saṃprakīrtitā
c gatiḥ sthānaṃ ca lokāś ca jāpakena yathā jitāḥ
a prayāti saṃhitādhyāyī brahmāṇaṃ parameṣṭhinam
c atha vāgniṃ samāyāti sūryam āviśate 'pi vā
a sa taijasena bhāvena yadi tatrāśnute ratim
c guṇāṃs teṣāṃ samādatte rāgeṇa pratimohitaḥ
a evaṃ some tathā vāyau bhūmyākāśaśarīragaḥ
c sarāgas tatra vasati guṇāṃs teṣāṃ samācaran
a atha tatra virāgī sa gacchati tv atha saṃśayam
c param avyayam icchan sa tam evāviśate punaḥ
a amṛtāc cāmṛtaṃ prāptaḥ śītībhūto nirātmavān
c brahmabhūtaḥ sa nirdvaṃdvaḥ sukhī śānto nirāmayaḥ
a brahmasthānam anāvartam ekam akṣarasaṃjñakam
c aduḥkham ajaraṃ śāntaṃ sthānaṃ tat pratipadyate
a caturbhir lakṣaṇair hīnaṃ tathā ṣaḍbhiḥ saṣoḍaśaiḥ
c puruṣaṃ samatikramya ākāśaṃ pratipadyate
a atha vecchati rāgātmā sarvaṃ tad adhitiṣṭhati
c yac ca prārthayate tac ca manasā pratipadyate
a atha vā vīkṣate lokān sarvān nirayasaṃsthitān
c niḥspṛhaḥ sarvato muktas tatraiva ramate sukhī
a evam eṣā mahārāja jāpakasya gatir yathā
c etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kim uttaraṃ tadā tau sma cakratus tena bhāṣite
c brāhmaṇo vātha vā rājā tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a atha vā tau gatau tatra yad etat kīrtitaṃ tvayā
c saṃvādo vā tayoḥ ko 'bhūt kiṃ vā tau tatra cakratuḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tathety evaṃ pratiśrutya dharmaṃ saṃpūjya cābhibho
c yamaṃ kālaṃ ca mṛtyuṃ ca svargaṃ saṃpūjya cārhataḥ
a pūrvaṃ ye cāpare tatra sametā brāhmaṇarṣabhāḥ
c sarvān saṃpūjya śirasā rājānaṃ so 'bravīd vacaḥ
a phalenānena saṃyukto rājarṣe gaccha puṇyatām
c bhavatā cābhyanujñāto japeyaṃ bhūya eva hi
a varaś ca mama pūrvaṃ hi devyā datto mahābala
c śraddhā te japato nityaṃ bhaviteti viśāṃ pate
 rājovāca
a yady evam aphalā siddhiḥ śraddhā ca japituṃ tava
c gaccha vipra mayā sārdhaṃ jāpakaṃ phalam āpnuhi
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a kṛtaḥ prayatnaḥ sumahān sarveṣāṃ saṃnidhāv iha
c saha tulyaphalau cāvāṃ gacchāvo yatra nau gatiḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vyavasāyaṃ tayos tatra viditvā tridaśeśvaraḥ
c saha devair upayayau lokapālais tathaiva ca
a sādhyā viśve 'tha maruto jyotīṃṣi sumahānti ca
c nadyaḥ śailāḥ samudrāś ca tīrthāni vividhāni ca
a tapāṃsi saṃyogavidhir vedāḥ stobhāḥ sarasvatī
c nāradaḥ parvataś caiva viśvāvasur hahā huhūḥ
d tumburupramukhāś caiva hāhā hūhūs tathaiva ca
a gandharvaś citrasenaś ca parivāragaṇair yutaḥ
c nāgāḥ siddhāś ca munayo devadevaḥ prajāpatiḥ
d ājagāma ca deveśo brahmā vedamayo 'vyayaḥ
e viṣṇuḥ sahasraśīrṣaś ca devo 'cintyaḥ samāgamat
a avādyantāntarikṣe ca bheryas tūryāṇi cābhibho
c puṣpavarṣāṇi divyāni tatra teṣāṃ mahātmanām
e nanṛtuś cāpsaraḥsaṃghās tatra tatra samantataḥ
a atha svargas tathā rūpī brāhmaṇaṃ vākyam abravīt
c saṃsiddhas tvaṃ mahābhāga tvaṃ ca siddhas tathā nṛpa
a atha tau sahitau rājann anyonyena vidhānataḥ
c viṣayapratisaṃhāram ubhāv eva pracakratuḥ
a prāṇāpānau tathodānaṃ samānaṃ vyānam eva ca
c evaṃ tān manasi sthāpya dadhatuḥ prāṇayor manaḥ
a upasthitakṛtau tatra nāsikāgram adho bhruvau
c kuṅkuṇyāṃ caiva manasā śanair dhārayataḥ sma tau
a niśceṣṭābhyāṃ śarīrābhyāṃ sthiradṛṣṭī samāhitau
c jitāsanau tathādhāya mūrdhany ātmānam eva ca
a tāludeśam athoddālya brāhmaṇasya mahātmanaḥ
c jyotirjvālā sumahatī jagāma tridivaṃ tadā
a hāhākāras tato dikṣu sarvāsu sumahān abhūt
c taj jyotiḥ stūyamānaṃ sma brahmāṇaṃ prāviśat tadā
a tataḥ svāgatam ity āha tat tejaḥ sa pitāmahaḥ
c prādeśamātraṃ puruṣaṃ pratyudgamya viśāṃ pate
a bhūyaś caivāparaṃ prāha vacanaṃ madhuraṃ sma saḥ
c jāpakais tulyaphalatā yogānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
a yogasya tāvad etebhyaḥ phalaṃ pratyakṣadarśanam
c jāpakānāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tu pratyutthānaṃ samādhikam
a uṣyatāṃ mayi cety uktvācetayat sa tataḥ punaḥ
c athāsya praviveśāsyaṃ brāhmaṇo vigatajvaraḥ
a rājāpy etena vidhinā bhagavantaṃ pitāmaham
c yathaiva dvijaśārdūlas tathaiva prāviśat tadā
a svayaṃbhuvam atho devā abhivādya tato 'bruvan
c jāpakārtham ayaṃ yatnas tadarthaṃ vayam āgatāḥ
a kṛtapūjāv imau tulyaṃ tvayā tulyaphalāv imau
c yogajāpakayor dṛṣṭaṃ phalaṃ sumahad adya vai
e sarvāṃl lokān atītyaitau gacchetāṃ yatra vāñchitam
 brahmovāca
a mahāsmṛtiṃ paṭhed yas tu tathaivānusmṛtiṃ śubhām
c tāv apy etena vidhinā gacchetāṃ matsalokatām
a yaś ca yoge bhaved bhaktaḥ so 'pi nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
c vidhinānena dehānte mama lokān avāpnuyāt
e gamyatāṃ sādhayiṣyāmi yathāsthānāni siddhaye
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktvā sa tadā devas tatraivāntaradhīyata
c āmantrya taṃ tato devā yayuḥ svaṃ svaṃ niveśanam
a te ca sarve mahātmāno dharmaṃ satkṛtya tatra vai
c pṛṣṭhato 'nuyayū rājan sarve suprītamānasāḥ
a etat phalaṃ jāpakānāṃ gatiś caiva prakīrtitā
c yathāśrutaṃ mahārāja kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃ phalaṃ jñānayogasya vedānāṃ niyamasya ca
c bhūtātmā vā kathaṃ jñeyas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c manoḥ prajāpater vādaṃ maharṣeś ca bṛhaspateḥ
a prajāpatiṃ śreṣṭhatamaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
devarṣisaṃghapravaro maharṣiḥ
c bṛhaspatiḥ praśnam imaṃ purāṇaṃ
papraccha śiṣyo 'tha guruṃ praṇamya
a yatkāraṇaṃ mantravidhiḥ pravṛtto
jñāne phalaṃ yat pravadanti viprāḥ
c yan mantraśabdair akṛtaprakāśaṃ
tad ucyatāṃ me bhagavan yathāvat
a yad arthaśāstrāgamamantravidbhir
yajñair anekair varagopradānaiḥ
c phalaṃ mahadbhir yad upāsyate ca
tat kiṃ kathaṃ vā bhavitā kva vā tat
a mahī mahījāḥ pavano 'ntarikṣaṃ
jalaukasaś caiva jalaṃ divaṃ ca
c divaukasaś caiva yataḥ prasūtās
tad ucyatāṃ me bhagavan purāṇam
a jñānaṃ yataḥ prārthayate naro vai
tatas tadarthā bhavati pravṛttiḥ
c na cāpy ahaṃ veda paraṃ purāṇaṃ
mithyāpravṛttiṃ ca kathaṃ nu kuryām
a ṛk sāmasaṃghāṃś ca yajūṃṣi cāhaṃ
chandāṃsi nakṣatragatiṃ niruktam
c adhītya ca vyākaraṇaṃ sakalpaṃ
śikṣāṃ ca bhūtaprakṛtiṃ na vedmi
a sa me bhavāñ śaṃsatu sarvam etaj
jñāne phalaṃ karmaṇi vā yad asti
a sāmānyaśabdaiś ca viśeṣaṇaiś ca
a sa me bhavāñ śaṃsatu tāvad etat
c yathā ca dehāc cyavate śarīrī
punaḥ śarīraṃ ca yathābhyupaiti
 manur uvāca
a yad yat priyaṃ yasya sukhaṃ tad āhus
tad eva duḥkhaṃ pravadanty aniṣṭam
c iṣṭaṃ ca me syād itarac ca na syād
etatkṛte karmavidhiḥ pravṛttaḥ
e iṣṭaṃ tv aniṣṭaṃ ca na māṃ bhajetety
etatkṛte jñānavidhiḥ pravṛttaḥ
a kāmātmakāś chandasi karmayogā
ebhir vimuktaḥ param aśnuvīta
c nānāvidhe karmapathe sukhārthī
naraḥ pravṛtto na paraṃ prayāti
d bṛhaspatir uvāca
d iṣṭaṃ tv aniṣṭaṃ ca sukhāsukhe ca
d manur uvāca
d sāśīs tv avacchandati karmabhiś ca
d ebhir viyuktaḥ param āviveśa
d etatkṛte karmavidhiḥ pravṛttaḥ
d ātmādibhiḥ karmabhir idhyamāno
d dharme pravṛtto dyutimān sukhārthī
e paraṃ hi tat karmapathād apetaṃ
nirāśiṣaṃ brahmaparaṃ hy avaśyam
a prajāḥ sṛṣṭā manasā karmaṇā ca
dvāv apy etau satpathau lokajuṣṭau
c dṛṣṭvā karma śāśvataṃ cāntavac ca
manastyāgaḥ kāraṇaṃ nānyad asti
a svenātmanā cakṣur iva praṇetā
niśātyaye tamasā saṃvṛtātmā
c jñānaṃ tu vijñānaguṇena yuktaṃ
karmāśubhaṃ paśyati varjanīyam
a sarpān kuśāgrāṇi tathodapānaṃ
jñātvā manuṣyāḥ parivarjayanti
c ajñānatas tatra patanti mūḍhā
jñāne phalaṃ paśya yathā viśiṣṭam
a kṛtsnas tu mantro vidhivat prayukto
yajñā yathoktās tv atha dakṣiṇāś ca
c annapradānaṃ manasaḥ samādhiḥ
pañcātmakaṃ karmaphalaṃ vadanti
a guṇātmakaṃ karma vadanti vedās
tasmān mantrā mantramūlaṃ hi karma
c vidhir vidheyaṃ manasopapattiḥ
phalasya bhoktā tu yathā śarīrī
a śabdāś ca rūpāṇi rasāś ca puṇyāḥ
sparśāś ca gandhāś ca śubhās tathaiva
c naro nasaṃsthānagataḥ prabhuḥ syād
etat phalaṃ sidhyati karmaloke
a yad yac charīreṇa karoti karma
śarīrayuktaḥ samupāśnute tat
c śarīram evāyatanaṃ sukhasya
duḥkhasya cāpy āyatanaṃ śarīram
a vācā tu yat karma karoti kiṃ cid
vācaiva sarvaṃ samupāśnute tat
c manas tu yat karma karoti kiṃ cin
manaḥstha evāyam upāśnute tat
a yathāguṇaṃ karmagaṇaṃ phalārthī
karoty ayaṃ karmaphale niviṣṭaḥ
c tathā tathāyaṃ guṇasaṃprayuktaḥ
śubhāśubhaṃ karmaphalaṃ bhunakti
a matsyo yathā srota ivābhipātī
tathā kṛtaṃ pūrvam upaiti karma
c śubhe tv asau tuṣyati duṣkṛte tu
na tuṣyate vai paramaḥ śarīrī
a yato jagat sarvam idaṃ prasūtaṃ
jñātvātmavanto vyatiyānti yat tat
c yan mantraśabdair akṛtaprakāśaṃ
tad ucyamānaṃ śṛṇu me paraṃ yat
a rasair viyuktaṃ vividhaiś ca gandhair
aśabdam asparśam arūpavac ca
c agrāhyam avyaktam avarṇam ekaṃ
pañcaprakāraṃ sasṛje prajānām
a na strī pumān vāpi napuṃsakaṃ ca
na san na cāsat sad asac ca tan na
c paśyanti yad brahmavido manuṣyās
tad akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīti viddhi
 manur uvāca
a akṣarāt khaṃ tato vāyur vāyor jyotis tato jalam
c jalāt prasūtā jagatī jagatyāṃ jāyate jagat
a ime śarīrair jalam eva gatvā
jalāc ca tejaḥ pavano 'ntarikṣam
c khād vai nivartanti nabhāvinas te
ye bhāvinas te param āpnuvanti
a noṣṇaṃ na śītaṃ mṛdu nāpi tīkṣṇaṃ
nāmlaṃ kaṣāyaṃ madhuraṃ na tiktam
c na śabdavan nāpi ca gandhavat tan
na rūpavat tat paramasvabhāvam
a sparśaṃ tanur veda rasaṃ tu jihvā
ghrāṇaṃ ca gandhāñ śravaṇe ca śabdān
c rūpāṇi cakṣur na ca tatparaṃ yad
gṛhṇanty anadhyātmavido manuṣyāḥ
a nivartayitvā rasanaṃ rasebhyo
ghrāṇaṃ ca gandhāc chravaṇe ca śabdāt
c sparśāt tanuṃ rūpaguṇāt tu cakṣus
tataḥ paraṃ paśyati svaṃ svabhāvam
a yato gṛhītvā hi karoti yac ca
yasmiṃś ca tām ārabhate pravṛttim
c yasmiṃś ca yad yena ca yaś ca kartā
tatkāraṇaṃ taṃ samupāyam āhuḥ
a yac cābhibhūḥ sādhakaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca
yan mantravac chaṃsyate caiva loke
c yaḥ sarvahetuḥ paramārthakārī
tat kāraṇaṃ kāryam ato yad anyat
a yathā ca kaś cit sukṛtair manuṣyaḥ
śubhāśubhaṃ prāpnute 'thāvirodhāt
c evaṃ śarīreṣu śubhāśubheṣu
svakarmajair jñānam idaṃ nibaddham
a yathā pradīpaḥ purataḥ pradīptaḥ
prakāśam anyasya karoti dīpyan
c tatheha pañcendriyadīpavṛkṣā
jñānapradīptāḥ paravanta eva
a yathā hi rājño bahavo hy amātyāḥ
pṛthak pramānaṃ pravadanti yuktāḥ
c tadvac charīreṣu bhavanti pañca
jñānaikadeśaḥ paramaḥ sa tebhyaḥ
a yathārciṣo 'gneḥ pavanasya vegā
marīcayo 'rkasya nadīṣu cāpaḥ
c gacchanti cāyānti ca tanyamānās
tadvac charīrāṇi śarīriṇāṃ tu
a yathā ca kaś cit paraśuṃ gṛhītvā
dhūmaṃ na paśyej jvalanaṃ ca kāṣṭhe
c tadvac charīrodarapāṇipādaṃ
chittvā na paśyanti tato yad anyat
a tāny eva kāṣṭhāni yathā vimathya
dhūmaṃ ca paśyej jvalanaṃ ca yogāt
c tadvat subuddhiḥ samam indriyatvād
budhaḥ paraṃ paśyati svaṃ svabhāvam
a yathātmano 'ṅgaṃ patitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
svapnāntare paśyati cātmano 'nyat
c śrotrādiyuktaḥ sumanāḥ subuddhir
liṅgāt tathā gacchati liṅgam anyat
a utpattivṛddhikṣayasaṃnipātair
na yujyate 'sau paramaḥ śarīrī
c anena liṅgena tu liṅgam anyad
gacchaty adṛṣṭaḥ pratisaṃdhiyogāt
a na cakṣuṣā paśyati rūpam ātmano
na cāpi saṃsparśam upaiti kiṃ cit
c na cāpi taiḥ sādhayate 'tha kāryaṃ
te taṃ na paśyanti sa paśyate tān
a yathā pradīpe jvalato 'nalasya
saṃtāpajaṃ rūpam upaiti kiṃ cit
c na cāntaraṃ rūpaguṇaṃ bibharti
tathaiva tad dṛśyate rūpam asya
a yathā manuṣyaḥ parimucya kāyam
adṛśyam anyad viśate śarīram
c visṛjya bhūteṣu mahatsu dehaṃ
tadāśrayaṃ caiva bibharti rūpam
a khaṃ vāyum agniṃ salilaṃ tathorvīṃ
samantato 'bhyāviśate śarīrī
c nānāśrayāḥ karmasu vartamānāḥ
śrotrādayaḥ pañca guṇāñ śrayante
a śrotraṃ khato ghrāṇam atho pṛthivyās
tejomayaṃ rūpam atho vipākaḥ
c jalāśrayaḥ sveda ukto rasaś ca
vāyvātmakaḥ sparśakṛto guṇaś ca
a mahatsu bhūteṣu vasanti pañca
pañcendriyārthāś ca tathendriyeṣu
c sarvāṇi caitāni manonugāni
buddhiṃ mano 'nveti manaḥ svabhāvam
a śubhāśubhaṃ karma kṛtaṃ yad asya
tad eva pratyādadate svadehe
c mano 'nuvartanti parāvarāṇi
jalaukasaḥ srota ivānukūlam
a calaṃ yathā dṛṣṭipathaṃ paraiti
sūkṣmaṃ mahad rūpam ivābhipāti
c svarūpam ālocayate ca rūpaṃ
paraṃ tathā buddhipathaṃ paraiti
 manur uvāca
a yad indriyais tūpakṛtān purastāt
prāptān guṇān saṃsmarate cirāya
c teṣv indriyeṣūpahateṣu paścāt
sa buddhirūpaḥ paramaḥ svabhāvaḥ
a yathendriyārthān yugapat samastān
nāvekṣate kṛtsnam atulyakālam
c yathābalaṃ saṃcarate sa vidvāṃs
tasmāt sa ekaḥ paramaḥ śarīrī
a rajas tamaḥ sattvam atho tṛtīyaṃ
gacchaty asau jñānaguṇān virūpān
b na tair nibaddhaḥ sa tu badhnāti viśvaṃ
b na cānuyātīha guṇān parātmā
c tathendriyāṇy āviśate śarīrī
hutāśanaṃ vāyur ivendhanastham
a na cakṣuṣā paśyati rūpam ātmano
na paśyati sparśam indriyendriyam
c na śrotraliṅgaṃ śravaṇe nidarśanaṃ
tathāgataṃ paśyati tad vinaśyati
a śrotrādīni na paśyanti svaṃ svam ātmānam ātmanā
c sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca kṣetrajñas tāni paśyati
a yathā himavataḥ pārśvaṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ candramaso yathā
c na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ manujair na ca tan nāsti tāvatā
a tadvad bhūteṣu bhūtātmā sūkṣmo jñānātmavān asau
c adṛṣṭapūrvaś cakṣurbhyāṃ na cāsau nāsti tāvatā
a paśyann api yathā lakṣma jagat some na vindati
c evam asti na vety etan na ca tan na parāyaṇam
a rūpavantam arūpatvād udayāstamaye budhāḥ
c dhiyā samanupaśyanti tadgatāḥ savitur gatim
a tathā buddhipradīpena dūrasthaṃ suvipaścitaḥ
c pratyāsannaṃ ninīṣanti jñeyaṃ jñānābhisaṃhitam
a na hi khalv anupāyena kaś cid artho 'bhisidhyati
c sūtrajālair yathā matsyān badhnanti jalajīvinaḥ
a mṛgair mṛgāṇāṃ grahaṇaṃ pakṣiṇāṃ pakṣibhir yathā
c gajānāṃ ca gajair evaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānena gṛhyate
a ahir eva hy aheḥ pādān paśyatīti nidarśanam
c tadvan mūrtiṣu mūrtiṣṭhaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānena paśyati
a notsahante yathā vettum indriyair indriyāṇy api
c tathaiveha parā buddhiḥ paraṃ buddhyā na paśyati
a yathā candro hy amāvāsyām aliṅgatvān na dṛśyate
c na ca nāśo 'sya bhavati tathā viddhi śarīriṇam
a kṣīṇakośo hy amāvāsyāṃ candramā na prakāśate
c tadvan mūrtiviyuktaḥ sañ śarīrī nopalabhyate
a yathā kośāntaraṃ prāpya candramā bhrājate punaḥ
c tadval liṅgāntaraṃ prāpya śarīrī bhrājate punaḥ
a janmavṛddhikṣayaś cāsya pratyakṣeṇopalabhyate
c sā tu candramaso vyaktir na tu tasya śarīriṇaḥ
a utpattivṛddhivyayato yathā sa iti gṛhyate
c candra eva tv amāvāsyāṃ tathā bhavati mūrtimān
a nābhisarpad vimuñcad vā śaśinaṃ dṛśyate tamaḥ
c visṛjaṃś copasarpaṃś ca tadvat paśya śarīriṇam
a yathā candrārkasaṃyuktaṃ tamas tad upalabhyate
c tadvac charīrasaṃyuktaḥ śarīrīty upalabhyate
a yathā candrārkanirmuktaḥ sa rāhur nopalabhyate
c tadvac charīranirmuktaḥ śarīrī nopalabhyate
a yathā candro hy amāvāsyāṃ nakṣatrair yujyate gataḥ
c tadvac charīranirmuktaḥ phalair yujyati karmaṇaḥ
 manur uvāca
a yathā vyaktam idaṃ śete svapne carati cetanam
c jñānam indriyasaṃyuktaṃ tadvat pretya bhavābhavau
a yathāmbhasi prasanne tu rūpaṃ paśyati cakṣuṣā
c tadvat prasannendriyavāñ jñeyaṃ jñānena paśyati
a sa eva lulite tasmin yathā rūpaṃ na paśyati
c tathendriyākulībhāve jñeyaṃ jñāne na paśyati
a abuddhir ajñānakṛtā abuddhyā duṣyate manaḥ
c duṣṭasya manasaḥ pañca saṃpraduṣyanti mānasāḥ
a ajñānatṛpto viṣayeṣv avagāḍho na dṛśyate
c adṛṣṭvaiva tu pūtātmā viṣayebhyo nivartate
a tarṣacchedo na bhavati puruṣasyeha kalmaṣāt
c nivartate tathā tarṣaḥ pāpam antaṃ gataṃ yathā
d antargatena pāpena dahyamānena cetasā
d śubhāśubhavikāreṇa na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate
a viṣayeṣu ca saṃsargāc chāśvatasya nasaṃśrayāt
c manasā cānyad ākāṅkṣan paraṃ na pratipadyate
a jñānam utpadyate puṃsāṃ kṣayāt pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
c athādarśatalaprakhye paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
a prasṛtair indriyair duḥkhī tair eva niyataiḥ sukhī
c tasmād indriyarūpebhyo yacched ātmānam ātmanā
a indriyebhyo manaḥ pūrvaṃ buddhiḥ paratarā tataḥ
c buddheḥ parataraṃ jñānaṃ jñānāt parataraṃ param
a avyaktāt prasṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tato buddhis tato manaḥ
c manaḥ śrotrādibhir yuktaṃ śabdādīn sādhu paśyati
a yas tāṃs tyajati śabdādīn sarvāś ca vyaktayas tathā
b prasṛtānīndriyāṇy eva pratisaṃharati kūrmavat
c vimuñcaty ākṛtigrāmāṃs tān muktvāmṛtam aśnute
a udyan hi savitā yadvat sṛjate raśmimaṇḍalam
b dṛśyate maṇḍalaṃ tasya na ca dṛśyeta maṇḍalī
b tadvad dehas tu saṃdṛśya ātmādṛśyaḥ paraḥ sadā
b grastaṃ hy udgirate nityam udgīthaṃ vetti nityaśaḥ
b bālye rathābhyāṃ yogena tattvajñānaṃ tu saṃmatam
c sa evāstam upāgacchaṃs tad evātmani yacchati
d ādatte sarvabhūtānāṃ rasabhūtaṃ vikāsavān
a antarātmā tathā deham āviśyendriyaraśmibhiḥ
c prāpyendriyaguṇān pañca so 'stam āvṛtya gacchati
d raśmimaṇḍalahīnas tu na cāsau nāsti tāvatā
a praṇītaṃ karmaṇā mārgaṃ nīyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
c prāpnoty ayaṃ karmaphalaṃ pravṛddhaṃ dharmam ātmavān
a viṣayā vinivartante nirāhārasya dehinaḥ
c rasavarjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate
a buddhiḥ karmaguṇair hīnā yadā manasi vartate
c tadā saṃpadyate brahma tatraiva pralayaṃ gatam
a asparśanam aśṛṇvānam anāsvādam adarśanam
c aghrāṇam avitarkaṃ ca sattvaṃ praviśate param
d avyaktāt prasṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tato buddhis tato manaḥ
d ātmanaḥ prasṛtā buddhir avyaktaṃ jñānam ucyate
d tasmād buddhiḥ smṛtā tajjñair manas tasmāt tataḥ smṛtam
d tasmād ākṛtayaḥ pañca manaḥ paramam ucyate
d tasmāt paratarā buddhir jñānaṃ tasmāt paraṃ smṛtam
d tataḥ sūkṣmas tato hy ātmā tasmāt parataraṃ na ca
d indriyāṇi nirīkṣante manasaitāni sarvaśaḥ
a manasy ākṛtayo magnā manas tv atigataṃ matim
c matis tv atigatā jñānaṃ jñānaṃ tv abhigataṃ param
a indriyair manasaḥ siddhir na buddhiṃ budhyate manaḥ
c na buddhir budhyate 'vyaktaṃ sūkṣmas tv etāni paśyati
 manur uvāca
 duḥkhopaghāte śārīre mānase cāpy upasthite
 yasmin na śakyate kartuṃ yatnas taṃ nānucintayet
 bhaiṣajyam etad duḥkhasya yad etan nānucintayet
 cintyamānaṃ hi cābhyeti bhūyaś cāpi pravartate
 prajñayā mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ hanyāc chārīram auṣadhaiḥ
 etad vijñānasāmarthyaṃ na bālaiḥ samatām iyāt
 anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ dravyasaṃcayaḥ
 ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyet tatra na paṇḍitaḥ
 na jānapadikaṃ duḥkham ekaḥ śocitum arhati
 aśocan pratikurvīta yadi paśyed upakramam
 sukhād bahutaraṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvite nāsti saṃśayaḥ
 snigdhasya cendriyārtheṣu mohān maraṇam apriyam
 parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vāpy ubhayaṃ naraḥ
 abhyeti brahma so 'tyantaṃ na te śocanti paṇḍitāḥ
 duḥkham arthā hi yujyante pālane na ca te sukham
 duḥkhena cādhigamyante nāśam eṣāṃ na cintayet
a jñānaṃ jñeyābhinirvṛttaṃ viddhi jñānaguṇaṃ manaḥ
c prajñākaraṇasaṃyuktaṃ tato buddhiḥ pravartate
a yadā karmaguṇopetā buddhir manasi vartate
c tadā prajñāyate brahma dhyānayogasamādhinā
a seyaṃ guṇavatī buddhir guṇeṣv evābhivartate
c avatārābhiniḥsrotaṃ gireḥ śṛṅgād ivodakam
a yadā nirguṇam āpnoti dhyānaṃ manasi pūrvajam
c tadā prajñāyate brahma nikaṣyaṃ nikaṣe yathā
a manas tv apahṛtaṃ buddhim indriyārthanidarśanam
c na samakṣaṃ guṇāvekṣi nirguṇasya nidarśanam
a sarvāṇy etāni saṃvārya dvārāṇi manasi sthitaḥ
c manasy ekāgratāṃ kṛtvā tat paraṃ pratipadyate
a yathā mahānti bhūtāni nivartante guṇakṣaye
c tathendriyāṇy upādāya buddhir manasi vartate
a yadā manasi sā buddhir vartate 'ntaracāriṇī
c vyavasāyaguṇopetā tadā saṃpadyate manaḥ
a guṇavadbhir guṇopetaṃ yadā dhyānaguṇaṃ manaḥ
c tadā sarvaguṇān hitvā nirguṇaṃ pratipadyate
a avyaktasyeha vijñāne nāsti tulyaṃ nidarśanam
c yatra nāsti padanyāsaḥ kas taṃ viṣayam āpnuyāt
a tapasā cānumānena guṇair jātyā śrutena ca
c ninīṣet tat paraṃ brahma viśuddhenāntarātmanā
a guṇahīno hi taṃ mārgaṃ bahiḥ samanuvartate
c guṇābhāvāt prakṛtyā ca nistarkyaṃ jñeyasaṃmitam
a nairguṇyād brahma cāpnoti saguṇatvān nivartate
c guṇaprasāriṇī buddhir hutāśana ivendhane
a yathā pañca vimuktāni indriyāṇi svakarmabhiḥ
c tathā tat paramaṃ brahma vimuktaṃ prakṛteḥ param
a evaṃ prakṛtitaḥ sarve prabhavanti śarīriṇaḥ
c nivartante nivṛttau ca sargaṃ naivopayānti ca
a puruṣaḥ prakṛtir buddhir viśeṣāś cendriyāṇi ca
c ahaṃkāro 'bhimānaś ca saṃbhūto bhūtasaṃjñakaḥ
a ekasyādyā pravṛttis tu pradhānāt saṃpravartate
c dvitīyā mithunavyaktim aviśeṣān niyacchati
a dharmād utkṛṣyate śreyas tathāśreyo 'py adharmataḥ
c rāgavān prakṛtiṃ hy eti virakto jñānavān bhavet
 manur uvāca
 tad eva satataṃ manye na śakyam anuvarṇitum
 yathānidarśanaṃ vastu na śakyam anubodhitum
 yathā hi sāraṃ jānāti na kathaṃ cana saṃsthitam
 parakāyacchavis tadvad dehe 'yaṃ cetanas tathā
 vinā kāyaṃ na sā chāyā tāṃ vinā kāyam asty uta
 tadvad eva vinā nāsti prakṛter iha vartanam
 idaṃ vinā paraṃ nāsti nedam asti paraṃ vinā
 jīvātmanā tv asau chinnas tv eṣa caiva parātmanā
 tat tatheti viduḥ ke cid atathyam iti cāpare
 ubhayaṃ me mataṃ vidvan muktihetau samāhitam
 vimuktaiś ca mṛgaḥ so 'pi dṛśyate saṃyatendriyaḥ
 sarveṣāṃ na hi dṛśyo hi taḍidvat sphurati hy asau
 brāhmaṇasya samādṛśyo vartate so 'pi kiṃ punaḥ
 vidyate paramaḥ śuddhaḥ sākṣibhūto vibhāvasuḥ
 śrutir eṣā tato nityā tasmād ekaḥ paro mataḥ
 na prayojanam uddiśya ceṣṭā tasya mahātmanaḥ
 tādṛśo 'stv iti mantavyas tathā satyaṃ mahātmanā
 nānāsaṃsthena bhedena sadā gativibhedavat
 tasya bhedaḥ samākhyāto bhedo hy asti tathāvidhaḥ
 evaṃ vidvan vijānīhi paramātmānam avyayam
 tattadguṇaviśeṣeṇa saṃjñānām anusaṃyutam
 sarveśvaraḥ sarvamayaḥ sa ca sarvapravartakaḥ
 sarvātmakaḥ sarvaśaktiḥ sarvakāraṇakāraṇam
 sarvasādhāraṇaḥ sarvair upāsyaś ca mahātmabhiḥ
 vāsudeveti vikhyātas taṃ viditvāśnute 'mṛtam
a yadā te pañcabhiḥ pañca vimuktā manasā saha
c atha tad drakṣyase brahma maṇau sūtram ivārpitam
a tad eva ca yathā sūtraṃ suvarṇe vartate punaḥ
c muktāsv atha pravāleṣu mṛnmaye rājate tathā
a tadvad goṣu manuṣyeṣu tadvad dhastimṛgādiṣu
c tadvat kīṭapataṃgeṣu prasaktātmā svakarmabhiḥ
a yena yena śarīreṇa yad yat karma karoty ayam
c tena tena śarīreṇa tat tat phalam upāśnute
a yathā hy ekarasā bhūmir oṣadhyātmānusāriṇī
c tathā karmānugā buddhir antarātmānudarśinī
a jñānapūrvodbhavā lipsā lipsāpūrvābhisaṃdhitā
c abhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ karma karmamūlaṃ tataḥ phalam
a phalaṃ karmātmakaṃ vidyāt karma jñeyātmakaṃ tathā
c jñeyaṃ jñānātmakaṃ vidyāj jñānaṃ sadasadātmakam
d tad evam iṣyate brahma saṃkhyānād vinibhidyate
a jñānānāṃ ca phalānāṃ ca jñeyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ tathā
c kṣayānte tat phalaṃ divyaṃ jñānaṃ jñeyapratiṣṭhitam
a mahad dhi paramaṃ bhūtaṃ yuktāḥ paśyanti yoginaḥ
c abudhās taṃ na paśyanti hy ātmasthā guṇabuddhayaḥ
a pṛthivīrūpato rūpam apām iha mahattaram
c adbhyo mahattaraṃ tejas tejasaḥ pavano mahān
a pavanāc ca mahad vyoma tasmāt parataraṃ manaḥ
c manaso mahatī buddhir buddheḥ kālo mahān smṛtaḥ
a kālāt sa bhagavān viṣṇur yasya sarvam idaṃ jagat
c nādir na madhyaṃ naivāntas tasya devasya vidyate
a anāditvād amadhyatvād anantatvāc ca so 'vyayaḥ
c atyeti sarvaduḥkhāni duḥkhaṃ hy antavad ucyate
a tad brahma paramaṃ proktaṃ tad dhāma paramaṃ smṛtam
c tad gatvā kālaviṣayād vimuktā mokṣam āśritāḥ
a guṇais tv etaiḥ prakāśante nirguṇatvāt tataḥ param
c nivṛttilakṣaṇo dharmas tathānantyāya kalpate
a ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni śarīrāṇi vyapāśritāḥ
c jihvāgreṣu pravartante yatnasādhyā vināśinaḥ
a na caivam iṣyate brahma śarīrāśrayasaṃbhavam
c na yatnasādhyaṃ tad brahma nādimadhyaṃ na cāntavat
a ṛcām ādis tathā sāmnāṃ yajuṣām ādir ucyate
c antaś cādimatāṃ dṛṣṭo na cādir brahmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
a anāditvād anantatvāt tad anantam athāvyayam
c avyayatvāc ca nirdvaṃdvaṃ dvaṃdvābhāvāt tataḥ param
a adṛṣṭato 'nupāyāc ca apy abhisaṃdheś ca karmaṇaḥ
c na tena martyāḥ paśyanti yena gacchanti tat param
a viṣayeṣu ca saṃsargāc chāśvatasya ca darśanāt
c manasā cānyad ākāṅkṣan paraṃ na pratipadyate
a guṇān yad iha paśyanti tad icchanty apare janāḥ
c paraṃ naivābhikāṅkṣanti nirguṇatvād guṇārthinaḥ
a guṇair yas tv avarair yuktaḥ kathaṃ vidyād guṇān imān
c anumānād dhi gantavyaṃ guṇair avayavaiḥ saha
a sūkṣmeṇa manasā vidmo vācā vaktuṃ na śaknumaḥ
c mano hi manasā grāhyaṃ darśanena ca darśanam
a jñānena nirmalīkṛtya buddhiṃ buddhyā tathā manaḥ
c manasā cendriyagrāmam anantaṃ pratipadyate
a buddhiprahīṇo manasāsamṛddhas
tathā nirāśīr guṇatām upaiti
c paraṃ tyajantīha vilobhyamānā
hutāśanaṃ vāyur ivendhanastham
a guṇādāne viprayoge ca teṣāṃ
manaḥ sadā buddhiparāvarābhyām
c anenaiva vidhinā saṃpravṛtto
guṇādāne brahmaśarīram eti
a avyaktātmā puruṣo 'vyaktakarmā
so 'vyaktatvaṃ gacchati hy antakāle
c tair evāyaṃ cendriyair vardhamānair
glāyadbhir vā vartate karmarūpaḥ
a sarvair ayaṃ cendriyaiḥ saṃprayukto
dehaḥ prāptaḥ pañcabhūtāśrayaḥ syāt
c nāsāmarthyād gacchati karmaṇeha
hīnas tena parameṇāvyayena
a pṛthvyā naraḥ paśyati nāntam asyā
hy antaś cāsyā bhavitā ceti viddhi
c paraṃ nayantīha vilobhyamānaṃ
yathā plavaṃ vāyur ivārṇavastham
a divākaro guṇam upalabhya nirguṇo
yathā bhaved vyapagataraśmimaṇḍalaḥ
c tathā hy asau munir iha nirviśeṣavān
sa nirguṇaṃ praviśati brahma cāvyayam
a anāgatiṃ sukṛtimatāṃ parāṃ gatiṃ
svayaṃbhuvaṃ prabhavanidhānam avyayam
c sanātanaṃ yad amṛtam avyayaṃ padaṃ
vicārya taṃ śamam amṛtatvam aśnute
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d pitāmaha mahāprājña duḥkhaśokasamākule
d saṃsāracakre lokānāṃ nirvedo nāsti kiṃ nv idam
d bhīṣma uvāca
d atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
d nibandhanasya saṃvādaṃ bhogavatyā nṛpottama
d muniṃ nibandhanaṃ śuṣkaṃ dhamanīyākṛtiṃ tathā
d nirārambhaṃ nirālambam asajjantaṃ ca karmaṇi
d putraṃ dṛṣṭvāpy uvācārtaṃ mātā bhogavatī tadā
d uttiṣṭha mūḍha kiṃ śeṣe nirapekṣaḥ suhṛjjanaiḥ
d nirālambo dhanopāye paitṛkaṃ tava kiṃ dhanam
d nibandhana uvāca
d paitṛkaṃ me mahan mātaḥ sarvaduḥkhālayaṃ tv iha
d asty etat tadvighātāya yatiṣye tatra mā śucaḥ
d idaṃ śarīram atyugraṃ pitrā dattam asaṃśayam
d tam eva pitaraṃ gatvā dhanaṃ tiṣṭhati śāśvatam
d kaś cin mahati saṃsāre vartamāno dhanecchayā
d vanadurgam abhiprāpto mahat kravyādasaṃkulam
d siṃhavyāghragajākārair atighorair mahāśanaiḥ
d samantāt suparikṣiptaṃ sa dṛṣṭvā vyathate pumān
d sa tad vanaṃ hy anucaran vipradhāvann itas tataḥ
d vīkṣamāṇo diśaḥ sarvāḥ śaraṇārthaṃ pradhāvati
d athāpaśyad vanaṃ rūḍhaṃ samantād vāgurāvṛtam
d vanamadhye ca tatrāsīd udapānaḥ samāvṛtaḥ
d vallibhis tṛṇasaṃchinnair gūḍhābhir abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
d sa papāta dvijas tatra vijane salilāśaye
d vilagnaś cābhavat tasmiṃl latāsaṃtānasaṃkule
d bāhubhyāṃ saṃpariṣvaktas tayā paramasattvayā
d sa tathā lambate tatra ūrdhvapādo hy adhaḥśirāḥ
d adhas tatraiva jātaś ca jambūvṛkṣaḥ sudustaraḥ
d kūpasya tasya velāyā apaśyat sumahāphalam
d vṛkṣaṃ bahuvidhaṃ vyomavallīpuṣpasamākulam
d nānārūpā madhukarās tasmin vṛkṣe 'bhavan kila
d teṣāṃ madhūnāṃ bahudhā dhārā pravavṛte tadā
d vilambamānaḥ sa pumān dhārāṃ pibati sarvadā
d na tasya tṛṣṇā viratā pīyamānasya saṃkaṭe
d parīpsati ca tāṃ nityam atṛptaḥ sa punaḥ punaḥ
d evaṃ sa vasate tatra duḥkhiduḥkhī punaḥ punaḥ
d mayā tu tad dhanaṃ deyaṃ tava dāsyāmi cecchasi
d tasya ca prārthitaḥ so 'tha dattvā muktim avāpa saḥ
d sā ca tyaktvārthasaṃkalpaṃ jagāma paramāṃ gatim
d evaṃ saṃsāracakrasya svarūpajñā nṛpottama
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d paraṃ vairāgyam āgamya gacchanti paramaṃ padam
d evaṃ saṃsāracakrasya svarūpaṃ viditaṃ na me
d paitṛkaṃ tu dhanaṃ proktaṃ kiṃ tad vidvan mahātmanā
d kāntāram iti kiṃ proktaṃ ko hastī sa tu kūpakaḥ
d kiṃsaṃjñiko mahāvṛkṣo madhu vāpi pitāmaha
d etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ viddhi dhanaśabdaṃ kim ucyate
d bhīṣma uvāca
d kathaṃ labdhaṃ dhanaṃ tena tathā ca kim idaṃ tv iha
d upākhyānam idaṃ sarvaṃ mokṣavidbhir udāhṛtam
d sumatiṃ vindate yena bandhanāśaś ca bhārata
d etad uktaṃ hi kāntāraṃ mahān saṃsāra eva saḥ
d ye te pratiṣṭhitā vyālā vyādhayas te prakīrtitāḥ
d yā sā nārī mahāghorā varṇarūpavināśinī
d tām āhuś ca jarāṃ prājñāḥ pariṣvaktaṃ yayā jagat
d yas tatra kūpe vasate mahāhiḥ kāla eva saḥ
d yo vṛkṣaḥ sa ca mṛtyur hi svakṛtaṃ tasya tat phalam
d ye tu kṛṣṇāḥ sitā rājan mūṣikā rātryahāni vai
d dviṣaṭkapadasaṃyukto yo hastī ṣaṇmukhākṛtiḥ
d sa ca saṃvatsaraḥ proktaḥ pādamāsartavo mukhāḥ
d etat saṃsāracakrasya svarūpaṃ vyāhṛtaṃ mayā
d evaṃ labdhadhanaṃ rājaṃs tat svarūpaṃ vināśaya
d etaj jñātvā tu sā rājan paraṃ vairāgyam āsthitā
d yathoktavidhinā bhūyaḥ paraṃ padam avāpa saḥ
d dhatte dhārayate caiva etasmāt kāraṇād dhanam
d tad gaccha cāmṛtaṃ śuddhaṃ hiraṇyam amṛtaṃ tapaḥ
d tatsvarūpo mahādevaḥ kṛṣṇo devakinandanaḥ
d tasya prasādād duḥkhasya nāśaṃ prāpsyasi mānada
d ekaḥ kartā sa kṛṣṇaś ca jñānināṃ paramā gatiḥ
d idam āśritya devendro devā rudrās tathāśvinau
d sve sve pade viviśire bhuktimuktivido janāḥ
d bhūtānām antarātmāsau sa nityapadasaṃvṛtaḥ
d śrūyatām asya sadbhāvaḥ samyag jñānaṃ yathā tava
d bhaved etan nibodha tvaṃ nāradāya purā hariḥ
d darśayitvātmano rūpaṃ yad avocat svayaṃ vibhuḥ
d purā deva ṛṣiḥ śrīmān nāradaḥ paramārthavān
d cacāra pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ tīrthāny anucaran prabhuḥ
d himavatpādam āśritya vicārya ca punaḥ punaḥ
d sa dadarśa hradaṃ tatra padmotpalasamākulam
d dadarśa kanyāṃ tattīre sarvābharaṇabhūṣitām
d śobhamānāṃ śriyā rājan krīḍantīm utpalais tathā
d sā mahātmānam ālokya nāradety āha bhāminī
d tasyāḥ samīpam āsādya tasthau vismitamānasaḥ
d vīkṣamāṇaṃ tam ājñāya sā kanyā cāruhāsinī
d vijajṛmbhe mahābhāgā smayamānā punaḥ punaḥ
d tasmāt samabhavad vaktrāt puruṣākṛtisaṃyutaḥ
d ratnabinducitāṅgas tu sarvābharaṇabhūṣitaḥ
d ādityasadṛśākāraḥ śirasā dhārayan maṇim
d punar eva tadākārasadṛśaḥ samajāyata
d tṛtīyas tu mahārāja vividhābharaṇair yutaḥ
d pradakṣiṇaṃ tu tāṃ kṛtvā vividhadhvanayas tu tām
d tataḥ sarveṇa viprarṣiḥ kanyāṃ papraccha tāṃ śubhām
d kā tvaṃ paramakalyāṇi padmendusadṛśānane
d kanyovāca
d na jāne tvāṃ mahādevi brūhi satyam anindite
d sāvitrī nāma viprarṣe śṛṇu bhadraṃ tavāstu vai
d kiṃ kariṣyāmi tad brūhi tava yac cetasi sthitam
d nārada uvāca
d abhivādaye tvāṃ sāvitri kṛtārtho 'ham anindite
d etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ devi vaktum arhasi śobhane
d yas tu vai prathamotpannaḥ ko 'sau sa puruṣākṛtiḥ
d kanyovāca
d bindavas tu mahādevi mūrdhni jyotirmayākṛtiḥ
d agrajaḥ prathamotpanno yajurvedas tathāparaḥ
d tṛtīyaḥ sāmavedas tu saṃśayo vyetu te mune
d vedāś ca bindusaṃyuktā yajñasya phalasaṃśritāḥ
d yat tad dṛṣṭaṃ mahaj jyotir jyotir ity ucyate budhaiḥ
d ṛṣe jñeyaṃ mayā cāpīty uktvā cāntaradhīyata
d tataḥ sa vismayāviṣṭo nāradaḥ puruṣarṣabha
d dhyānayuktaḥ sa tu ciraṃ na bubodha mahāmatiḥ
d tataḥ snātvā mahātejā vāgyato niyatendriyaḥ
d tuṣṭāva puruṣavyāghro jijñāsuś ca tad adbhutam
d tato varṣaśate pūrṇe bhagavāṃl lokabhāvanaḥ
d prāduś cakāra viśvātmā ṛṣeḥ paramasauhṛdāt
d tam āgataṃ jagannāthaṃ sarvakāraṇakāraṇam
d akhilāmaramaulyaṅgarukmāruṇapadadvayam
d vainateyapadasparśakaṇaśobhitajānukam
d pītāmbaralasatkāñcīdāmabaddhakaṭītaṭam
d śrīvatsavakṣasaṃ cārumaṇikaustubhakaṃdharam
d mandasmitamukhāmbhojaṃ caladāyatalocanam
d namracāpānukaraṇanamrabhrūyugaśobhitam
d nānāratnamaṇīvajrasphuranmakarakuṇḍalam
d indranīlanibhābhaṃ taṃ keyūramakuṭojjvalam
d devair indrapurogaiś ca ṛṣisaṃghair abhiṣṭutam
d nārado jayaśabdena vavande śirasā harim
d tataḥ sa bhagavāñ śrīmān meghagambhīrayā girā
d prāheśaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ nāradaṃ patitaṃ kṣitau
d bhadram astu ṛṣe tubhyaṃ varaṃ varaya suvrata
d yat te manasi suvyaktam asti ca pradadāmi tat
d sa cemaṃ jayaśabdena prasīdety āturo muniḥ
d provāca hṛdi saṃrūḍhaṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam
d vivakṣitaṃ jagannātha mayā jñātaṃ tvayācyuta
d tat prasīda hṛṣīkeśa śrotum icchāmi tad dhare
d tataḥ smayan mahāviṣṇur abhyabhāṣata nāradam
d yad dṛṣṭaṃ mama rūpaṃ tu vedānāṃ śirasi tvayā
d nirdvaṃdvā nirahaṃkārāḥ śucayaḥ śuddhalocanāḥ
d taṃ māṃ paśyanti satataṃ tān pṛccha yad ihecchasi
d ye yogino mahāprājñā madaṃśā ye vyavasthitāḥ
d bhīṣma uvāca
d teṣāṃ prasādaṃ devarṣe matprasādam avaihi tat
d ity uktvā sa jagāmātha bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ
d tasmād vraja hṛṣīkeśaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ devakinandanam
d etam ārādhya govindaṃ gatā muktiṃ maharṣayaḥ
d eṣa kartā vikartā ca sarvakāraṇakāraṇam
d mayāpy etac chrutaṃ rājan nāradāt tu nibodha tat
d svayam eva samācaṣṭa nārado bhagavān muniḥ
d samastasaṃsāravighātakāraṇaṃ
d bhajanti ye viṣṇum ananyamānasāḥ
d te yānti sāyujyam atīvadurlabham
d itīva nityaṃ hṛdi varṇayanti
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pitāmaha mahāprājña puṇḍarīkākṣam acyutam
c kartāram akṛtaṃ viṣṇuṃ bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayam
a nārāyaṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ govindam aparājitam
c tattvena bharataśreṣṭha śrotum icchāmi keśavam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śruto 'yam artho rāmasya jāmadagnyasya jalpataḥ
c nāradasya ca devarṣeḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanasya ca
a asito devalas tāta vālmīkiś ca mahātapāḥ
c mārkaṇḍeyaś ca govinde kathayaty adbhutaṃ mahat
d keśavasya mayā rājan na śakyā varṇituṃ guṇāḥ
d īdṛśo 'sau hṛṣīkeśo vāsudevaḥ parāt paraḥ
a keśavo bharataśreṣṭha bhagavān īśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
c puruṣaḥ sarvam ity eva śrūyate bahudhā vibhuḥ
a kiṃ tu yāni vidur loke brāhmaṇāḥ śārṅgadhanvanaḥ
c māhātmyāni mahābāho śṛṇu tāni yudhiṣṭhira
a yāni cāhur manuṣyendra ye purāṇavido janāḥ
c aśeṣeṇa hi govinde kīrtayiṣyāmi tāny aham
a mahābhūtāni bhūtātmā mahātmā puruṣottamaḥ
c vāyur jyotis tathā cāpaḥ khaṃ gāṃ caivānvakalpayat
a sa dṛṣṭvā pṛthivīṃ caiva sarvabhūteśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
c apsv eva śayanaṃ cakre mahātmā puruṣottamaḥ
a sarvatejomayas tasmiñ śayānaḥ śayane śubhe
c so 'grajaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ saṃkarṣaṇam acintayat
a āśrayaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ manaseti viśuśruma
c sa dhārayati bhūtātmā ubhe bhūtabhaviṣyatī
d pradyumnam asṛjat tasmāt sarvatejaḥprakāśakam
d aniruddhas tato jajñe sarvaśaktir mahādyutiḥ
d apsu vyomagamaḥ śrīmān yoganidrām upeyivān
d tasmāt saṃjajñire devā brahmaviṣṇumaheśvarāḥ
d layasthityantakarmāṇas trayas te sumahaujasaḥ
a tatas tasmin mahābāho prādurbhūte mahātmani
c bhāskarapratimaṃ divyaṃ nābhyāṃ padmam ajāyata
a sa tatra bhagavān devaḥ puṣkare bhāsayan diśaḥ
c brahmā samabhavat tāta sarvabhūtapitāmahaḥ
a tasminn api mahābāho prādurbhūte mahātmani
c tamasaḥ pūrvajo jajñe madhur nāma mahāsuraḥ
a tam ugram ugrakarmāṇam ugrāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthitam
c brahmaṇopacitiṃ kurvañ jaghāna puruṣottamaḥ
a tasya tāta vadhāt sarve devadānavamānavāḥ
c madhusūdanam ity āhur vṛṣabhaṃ sarvasātvatām
a brahmā tu sasṛje putrān mānasān dakṣasaptamān
c marīcim atryaṅgirasau pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum
a marīciḥ kaśyapaṃ tāta putraṃ cāsṛjad agrajam
c mānasaṃ janayām āsa taijasaṃ brahmasattamam
a aṅguṣṭhād asṛjad brahmā marīcer api pūrvajam
c so 'bhavad bharataśreṣṭha dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ
a tasya pūrvam ajāyanta daśa tisraś ca bhārata
c prajāpater duhitaras tāsāṃ jyeṣṭhābhavad ditiḥ
a sarvadharmaviśeṣajñaḥ puṇyakīrtir mahāyaśāḥ
c mārīcaḥ kaśyapas tāta sarvāsām abhavat patiḥ
a utpādya tu mahābhāgas tāsām avarajā daśa
c dadau dharmāya dharmajño dakṣa eva prajāpatiḥ
a dharmasya vasavaḥ putrā rudrāś cāmitatejasaḥ
c viśvedevāś ca sādhyāś ca marutvantaś ca bhārata
a aparās tu yavīyasyas tābhyo 'nyāḥ saptaviṃśatiḥ
c somas tāsāṃ mahābhāgaḥ sarvāsām abhavat patiḥ
a itarās tu vyajāyanta gandharvāṃs turagān dvijān
c gāś ca kiṃpuruṣān matsyān audbhidāṃś ca vanaspatīn
a ādityān aditir jajñe devaśreṣṭhān mahābalān
c teṣāṃ viṣṇur vāmano 'bhūd govindaś cābhavat prabhuḥ
a tasya vikramaṇād eva devānāṃ śrīr vyavardhata
c dānavāś ca parābhūtā daiteyī cāsurī prajā
a vipracittipradhānāṃś ca dānavān asṛjad danuḥ
c ditis tu sarvān asurān mahāsattvān vyajāyata
d tataḥ sasarja bhagavān mṛtyuṃ lokabhayaṃkaram
d hartāraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ sasarja ca janārdanaḥ
a ahorātraṃ ca kālaṃ ca yathartu madhusūdanaḥ
c pūrvāhṇaṃ cāparāhṇaṃ ca sarvam evānvakalpayat
a buddyāpaḥ so 'sṛjan meghāṃs tathā sthāvarajaṅgamān
c pṛthivīṃ so 'sṛjad viśvāṃ sahitāṃ bhūritejasā
a tataḥ kṛṣṇo mahābāhuḥ punar eva yudhiṣṭhira
c brāhmaṇānāṃ śataṃ śreṣṭhaṃ mukhād asṛjata prabhuḥ
a bāhubhyāṃ kṣatriyaśataṃ vaiśyānām ūrutaḥ śatam
c padbhyāṃ śūdraśataṃ caiva keśavo bharatarṣabha
a sa evaṃ caturo varṇān samutpādya mahāyaśāḥ
c adhyakṣaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhātāram akarot prabhuḥ
d vedavidyāvidhātāraṃ brahmāṇam amitadyutim
d bhūtamātṛgaṇādhyakṣaṃ virūpākṣaṃ ca so 'sṛjat
d śāsitāraṃ ca pāpānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ samavartinam
d asṛjat sarvabhūtātmā nidhipaṃ ca dhaneśvaram
d yādasām asṛjan nāthaṃ varuṇaṃ ca jaleśvaram
d vāsavaṃ sarvadevānām adhyakṣam akarot prabhuḥ
a yāvad yāvad abhūc chraddhā dehaṃ dhārayituṃ nṛṇām
c tāvat tāvad ajīvaṃs te nāsīd yamakṛtaṃ bhayam
a na caiṣāṃ maithuno dharmo babhūva bharatarṣabha
c saṃkalpād eva caiteṣām apatyam udapadyata
a tatra tretāyuge kāle saṃkalpāj jāyate prajā
c na hy abhūn maithuno dharmas teṣām api janādhipa
a dvāpare maithuno dharmaḥ prajānām abhavan nṛpa
c tathā kaliyuge rājan dvaṃdvam āpedire janāḥ
a eṣa bhūtapatis tāta svadhyakṣaś ca prakīrtitaḥ
c niradhyakṣāṃs tu kaunteya kīrtayiṣyāmi tān api
a dakṣiṇāpathajanmānaḥ sarve talavarāndhrakāḥ
c utsāḥ pulindāḥ śabarāś cūcupā maṇḍapaiḥ saha
a uttarāpathajanmānaḥ kīrtayiṣyāmi tān api
c yaunakāmbojagāndhārāḥ kirātā barbaraiḥ saha
a ete pāpakṛtas tāta caranti pṛthivīm imām
c śvakākabalagṛdhrāṇāṃ sadharmāṇo narādhipa
a naite kṛtayuge tāta caranti pṛthivīm imām
c tretāprabhṛti vartante te janā bharatarṣabha
a tatas tasmin mahāghore saṃdhyākāle yugāntike
c rājānaḥ samasajjanta samāsādyetaretaram
d aindraṃ rūpaṃ samāsthāya hy asurebhyaś caran mahīm
d sa eva bhagavān devo veditvaṃ ca gatā mahī
d evaṃbhūte bhūtasṛṣṭir nārasiṃhādayaḥ kramāt
d prādurbhāvāḥ smṛtā viṣṇor jagatīrakṣaṇāya vai
d eṣa kṛṣṇo mahāyogī tattatkāryānurūpaṇam
d hiraṇyakaśipuṃ daityaṃ hiraṇyākṣaṃ tathaiva ca
d rāvaṇaṃ ca mahādaityaṃ hatvāsau puruṣottamaḥ
d bhūmer duḥkhopanāśārthaṃ brahmaśakrādibhiḥ stutaḥ
d ātmano 'ṅgān mahātejā udbabarha janārdanaḥ
d sitakṛṣṇau mahārāja keśau harir udāradhīḥ
d vasudevasya devakyām eṣa jāta ihottamaḥ
d dehavān iha viśvātmā saṃbandhī te janārdanaḥ
d āvirbabhūva yogīndro manotīto jagatpatiḥ
d acintyaḥ puruṣavyāghra naiva kevalamānuṣaḥ
d avyaktādiviśeṣāntaṃ parīmāṇārthasaṃyutam
d krīḍā harer idaṃ sarvaṃ kṣaram ity eva dhāryatām
d akṣaraṃ tatparaṃ nityaṃ vairūpyaṃ jagato hareḥ
d tad viddhi rūpam atulam amṛtatvaṃ bhavajjitam
d tad eva kṛṣṇo dāśārhaḥ śrīmāñ śrīvatsalakṣaṇaḥ
d na bhūtasṛṣṭisaṃsthānaṃ deho 'sya paramātmanaḥ
d dehavān iha yo viṣṇur asau māyāmayo hariḥ
d ātmano lokarakṣārthaṃ dhyāhi nityaṃ sanātanam
d aṅgāni caturo vedā mīmāṃsā nyāyavistaraḥ
d itihāsapurāṇāni dharmāḥ svāyaṃbhuvādayaḥ
d ya enaṃ prativartante vedāntāni ca sarvaśaḥ
d bhaktihīnā na tair yānti nityam enaṃ kathaṃ cana
d sarvabhūteṣu bhūtātmā tattadbuddhiṃ samāsthitaḥ
d tasmād buddhas tvam evainaṃ dhyāhi nityam atandritaḥ
a evam eṣa kuruśreṣṭha prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ
c devadevarṣir ācaṣṭa nāradaḥ sarvalokadṛk
a nārado 'py atha kṛṣṇasya paraṃ mene narādhipa
c śāśvatatvaṃ mahābāho yathāvad bharatarṣabha
a evam eṣa mahābāhuḥ keśavaḥ satyavikramaḥ
c acintyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣo naiṣa kevalamānuṣaḥ
d evaṃvidho 'sau puruṣaḥ ko vainaṃ vetti sarvadā
d etat te kathitaṃ rājan bhūyaḥ śrotuṃ kim icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ke pūrvam āsan patayaḥ prajānāṃ bharatarṣabha
c ke carṣayo mahābhāgā dikṣu pratyekaśaḥ smṛtāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śrūyatāṃ bharataśreṣṭha yan mā tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
c prajānāṃ patayo ye sma dikṣu pratyekaśaḥ smṛtāḥ
a ekaḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān ādyo brahmā sanātanaḥ
c brahmaṇaḥ sapta putrā vai mahātmānaḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
a marīcir atryaṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
c vasiṣṭhaś ca mahābhāgaḥ sadṛśā vai svayaṃbhuvā
a sapta brahmāṇa ity eṣa purāṇe niścayo gataḥ
c ata ūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyāmi sarvān eva prajāpatīn
a atrivaṃśasamutpanno brahmayoniḥ sanātanaḥ
c prācīnabarhir bhagavāṃs tasmāt prācetaso daśa
a daśānāṃ tanayas tv eko dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ
c tasya dve nāmanī loke dakṣaḥ ka iti cocyate
a marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putras tasya dve nāmanī śrute
c ariṣṭanemir ity ekaṃ kaśyapety aparaṃ viduḥ
a aṅgaś caivaurasaḥ śrīmān rājā bhaumaś ca vīryavān
c sahasraṃ yaś ca divyānāṃ yugānāṃ paryupāsitā
a aryamā caiva bhagavān ye cānye tanayā vibho
c ete pradeśāḥ kathitā bhuvanānāṃ prabhāvanāḥ
a śaśabindoś ca bhāryāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi daśācyuta
c ekaikasyāṃ sahasraṃ tu tanayānām abhūt tadā
a evaṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ śataṃ tasya mahātmanaḥ
c putrāṇāṃ na ca te kaṃ cid icchanty anyaṃ prajāpatim
a prajām ācakṣate viprāḥ paurāṇīṃ śāśabindavīm
c sa vṛṣṇivaṃśaprabhavo mahān vaṃśaḥ prajāpateḥ
a ete prajānāṃ patayaḥ samuddiṣṭā yaśasvinaḥ
b śaśabindus tu rājarṣir mahāyogī mahāmanāḥ
b adhyātmavit sahasrāṇāṃ bhāryāṇāṃ daśamadhyagaḥ
b sa yogī yogam āpannas tataḥ sāyujyatāṃ gataḥ
c ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi devāṃs tribhuvaneśvarān
a bhago 'ṃśaś cāryamā caiva mitro 'tha varuṇas tathā
c savitā caiva dhātā ca vivasvāṃś ca mahābalaḥ
a pūṣā tvaṣṭā tathaivendro dvādaśo viṣṇur ucyate
c ta ete dvādaśādityāḥ kaśyapasyātmasaṃbhavāḥ
a nāsatyaś caiva dasraś ca smṛtau dvāv aśvināv api
c mārtāṇḍasyātmajāv etāv aṣṭamasya prajāpateḥ
a tvaṣṭuś caivātmajaḥ śrīmān viśvarūpo mahāyaśāḥ
c ajaikapād ahirbudhnyo virūpākṣo 'tha raivataḥ
a haraś ca bahurūpaś ca tryambakaś ca sureśvaraḥ
c sāvitraś ca jayantaś ca pinākī cāparājitaḥ
d ekādaśaite kathitā rudrās tribhuvaneśvarāḥ
d dharo dhruvaś ca somaś ca āpaś caivānilo 'nalaḥ
d pratyūṣaś ca mahābhāgaḥ sāvitraś cāṣṭamaḥ smṛtaḥ
e pūrvam eva mahābhāgā vasavo 'ṣṭau prakīrtitāḥ
a eta evaṃvidhā devā manor eva prajāpateḥ
c te ca pūrve surāś ceti dvividhāḥ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ
a śīlarūparatās tv anye tathānye siddhasādhyayoḥ
c ṛbhavo marutaś caiva devānāṃ coditā gaṇāḥ
a evam ete samāmnātā viśvedevās tathāśvinau
c ādityāḥ kṣatriyās teṣāṃ viśas tu marutas tathā
a aśvinau tu matau śūdrau tapasy ugre samāhitau
c smṛtās tv aṅgiraso devā brāhmaṇā iti niścayaḥ
e ity etat sarvadevānāṃ cāturvarṇyaṃ prakīrtitam
a etān vai prātar utthāya devān yas tu prakīrtayet
c svajād anyakṛtāc caiva sarvapāpāt pramucyate
a yavakrīto 'tha raibhyaś ca arvāvasuparāvasū
c auśijaś caiva kakṣīvān nalaś cāṅgirasaḥ sutāḥ
a ṛṣer medhātitheḥ putraḥ kaṇvo barhiṣadas tathā
c trailokyabhāvanās tāta prācyāṃ saptarṣayas tathā
a unmuco vimucaś caiva svastyātreyaś ca vīryavān
c pramucaś cedhmavāhaś ca bhagavāṃś ca dṛḍhavrataḥ
a mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putras tathāgastyaḥ pratāpavān
c ete brahmarṣayo nityam āśritā dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
a ruṣadguḥ kavaṣo dhaumyaḥ parivyādhaś ca vīryavān
c ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥ
a atreḥ putraś ca bhagavāṃs tathā sārasvataḥ prabhuḥ
c ete nava mahātmānaḥ paścimām āśritā diśam
a ātreyaś ca vasiṣṭhaś ca kaśyapaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ
c gautamaḥ sabharadvājo viśvāmitro 'tha kauśikaḥ
a tathaiva putro bhagavān ṛcīkasya mahātmanaḥ
c jamadagniś ca saptaite udīcīṃ diśam āśritāḥ
a ete pratidiśaṃ sarve kīrtitās tigmatejasaḥ
c sākṣibhūtā mahātmāno bhuvanānāṃ prabhāvanāḥ
a evam ete mahātmānaḥ sthitāḥ pratyekaśo diśaḥ
c eteṣāṃ kīrtanaṃ kṛtvā sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
a yasyāṃ yasyāṃ diśi hy ete tāṃ diśaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ
c mucyate sarvapāpebhyaḥ svastimāṃś ca gṛhān vrajet
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pitāmaha mahāprājña yudhi satyaparākrama
c śrotum icchāmi kārtsnyena kṛṣṇam avyayam īśvaram
a yac cāsya tejaḥ sumahad yac ca karma purātanam
c tan me sarvaṃ yathātattvaṃ prabrūhi bharatarṣabha
a tiryagyonigataṃ rūpaṃ kathaṃ dhāritavān hariḥ
c kena kāryavisargeṇa tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a purāhaṃ mṛgayāṃ yāto mārkaṇḍeyāśrame sthitaḥ
c tatrāpaśyaṃ munigaṇān samāsīnān sahasraśaḥ
a tatas te madhuparkeṇa pūjāṃ cakrur atho mayi
c pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ pratyanandam ṛṣīn aham
a kathaiṣā kathitā tatra kaśyapena maharṣiṇā
c manaḥprahlādinīṃ divyāṃ tām ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
d dharmo hi bhagavān viṣṇur varāho yajñarūpadhṛk
d tanmayaṃ ca jagat sarvam ātmā sarvasya cātmavān
a purā dānavamukhyā hi krodhalobhasamanvitāḥ
c balena mattāḥ śataśo narakādyā mahāsurāḥ
a tathaiva cānye bahavo dānavā yuddhadurmadāḥ
c na sahante sma devānāṃ samṛddhiṃ tām anuttamām
d narakādyā mahāghorā hiraṇyākṣam upāśritāḥ
d udyogaṃ paramaṃ cakrur devānāṃ nigrahe tadā
d niyutaṃ vatsarāṇāṃ tu vāyubhakṣo 'bhavat tadā
d hiraṇyākṣo mahāraudro lebhe devāt pitāmahāt
d varān acintyān atulāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a dānavair ardyamānās tu devā devarṣayas tathā
c na śarma lebhire rājan viśamānās tatas tataḥ
a pṛthivīṃ cārtarūpāṃ te samapaśyan divaukasaḥ
c dānavair abhisaṃkīrṇāṃ ghorarūpair mahābalaiḥ
e bhārārtām apakṛṣṭāṃ ca duḥkhitāṃ saṃnimajjatīm
f gṛhītvā pṛthivī devī pātāle nyavasat tadā
f tatas trailokyam akhilaṃ niroṣadhigaṇānvitam
f niḥsvādhyāyavaṣaṭkāram abhūt sarvaṃ samantataḥ
a athāditeyāḥ saṃtrastā brahmāṇam idam abruvan
c kathaṃ śakyāmahe brahman dānavair upamardanam
d hiraṇyākṣeṇa bhagavan gṛhīteyaṃ vasuṃdharā
d na śakṣyāmo vayaṃ tatra praveṣṭuṃ jaladurgamam
d tān āha bhagavān brahmā munir eva prasādyatām
d agastyo 'sau mahātejāḥ pātu taj jalam añjasā
d tatheti coktvā te devā munim ūcur mudānvitāḥ
d trāyasva lokān viprarṣe jalam etat kṣayaṃ naya
d tatheti coktvā bhagavān kālānalasamadyutiḥ
d dhyāyañ jalādanivahaṃ sa kṣaṇena papau jalam
d śoṣite tu samudre ca devāḥ sarṣipurogamāḥ
d brahmāṇaṃ praṇipatyocur muninā śoṣitaṃ jalam
d iti bhūyaḥ samācakṣva kiṃ kariṣyāmahe vibho
a svayaṃbhūs tān uvācedaṃ nisṛṣṭo 'tra vidhir mayā
c te vareṇābhisaṃmattā balena ca madena ca
a nāvabhotsyanti saṃmūḍhā viṣṇum avyaktadarśanam
c varāharūpiṇaṃ devam adhṛṣyam amarair api
a eṣa vegena gatvā hi yatra te dānavādhamāḥ
c antarbhūmigatā ghorā nivasanti sahasraśaḥ
e śamayiṣyati śrutvā te jahṛṣuḥ surasattamāḥ
a tato viṣṇur mahātejā vārāhaṃ rūpam āśritaḥ
c antarbhūmiṃ saṃpraviśya jagāma ditijān prati
a dṛṣṭvā ca sahitāḥ sarve daityāḥ sattvam amānuṣam
c prasahya sahasā sarve saṃtasthuḥ kālamohitāḥ
a sarve ca samabhidrutya varāhaṃ jagṛhuḥ samam
c saṃkruddhāś ca varāhaṃ taṃ vyakarṣanta samantataḥ
a dānavendrā mahākāyā mahāvīryā balocchritāḥ
c nāśaknuvaṃś ca kiṃ cit te tasya kartuṃ tadā vibho
a tato 'gaman vismayaṃ te dānavendrā bhayāt tadā
c saṃśayaṃ gatam ātmānaṃ menire ca sahasraśaḥ
a tato devādidevaḥ sa yogātmā yogasārathiḥ
c yogam āsthāya bhagavāṃs tadā bharatasattama
a vinanāda mahānādaṃ kṣobhayan daityadānavān
c saṃnāditā yena lokāḥ sarvāś caiva diśo daśa
a tena saṃnādaśabdena lokāḥ saṃkṣobham āgaman
c saṃbhrāntāś ca diśaḥ sarvā devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
a nirviceṣṭaṃ jagac cāpi babhūvātibhṛśaṃ tadā
c sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva tena nādena mohitam
a tatas te dānavāḥ sarve tena śabdena bhīṣitāḥ
c petur gatāsavaś caiva viṣṇutejovimohitāḥ
d trastāṃś ca devān ālokya brahmā prāha pitāmahaḥ
d yogeśvaro 'yaṃ bhagavān vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
d nardamāno 'tra saṃyāti mā bhaiṣṭa surasattamāḥ
d evam uktvā tato brahmā namaścakre pitāmahaḥ
d devatā munayaś caiva viṣṇuṃ vai muktihetave
d tato harir mahātejā brahmāṇam abhinandya ca
a rasātalagatāṃś caiva varāhas tridaśadviṣaḥ
c khuraiḥ saṃdārayām āsa māṃsamedosthisaṃcayam
a nādena tena mahatā sanātana iti smṛtaḥ
c padmanābho mahāyogī bhūtācāryaḥ sa bhūtarāṭ
a tato devagaṇāḥ sarve pitāmaham upābruvan
b tatra gatvā mahātmānam ūcuś caiva jagatpatim
c nādo 'yaṃ kīdṛśo deva nainaṃ vidma vayaṃ vibho
e ko 'sau hi kasya vā nādo yena vihvalitaṃ jagat
f devāś ca dānavāś caiva mohitās tasya tejasā
a etasminn antare viṣṇur vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
c udatiṣṭhan mahādevaḥ stūyamāno maharṣibhiḥ
d pitāmaha uvāca
d divyaṃ       yuddham āsīn mahātmanoḥ
d hiraṇyākṣasya viṣṇoś ca sarvasaṃkṣobhakāraṇam
d jaghāna ca hiraṇyākṣam antarbhūmigataṃ hariḥ
d tad ākarṇya mahātejā brahmā madhuram abravīt
 pitāmaha uvāca
a nihatya dānavapatīn mahāvarṣmā mahābalaḥ
c eṣa devo mahāyogī bhūtātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
a sarvabhūteśvaro yogī yonir ātmā tathātmanaḥ
c sthirībhavata kṛṣṇo 'yaṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśanaḥ
a kṛtvā karmātisādhv etad aśakyam amitaprabhaḥ
c samāyātaḥ svam ātmānaṃ mahābhāgo mahādyutiḥ
e padmanābho mahāyogī bhūtātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
a na saṃtāpo na bhīḥ kāryā śoko vā surasattamāḥ
c vidhir eṣa prabhāvaś ca kālaḥ saṃkṣayakārakaḥ
e lokān dhārayatānena nādo mukto mahātmanā
a sa eva hi mahābhāgaḥ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ
c acyutaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ sarvabhūtasamudbhavaḥ
dA yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
dA pitāmaha mahāprājña keśavasya mahātmanaḥ

dA na tṛpyāmy aham apy enaṃ paśyañ śṛṇvaṃś ca bhārata
dA bhīṣma uvāca
dA evaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ mahābāho tasmād etad bravīhi me
dA śṛṇu rājan kathām etāṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ pāpanāśanīm
dA nārado māṃ purā prāha yām ahaṃ te vadāmi tām
dA devarṣir nāradaḥ pūrvaṃ tattvaṃ vetsyāmi vai hareḥ
dA iti saṃcintya manasā dadhyau brahma sanātanam
dA himālaye śubhe divye divyaṃ varṣaśataṃ kila
dA anucchvasan nirāhāraḥ saṃyatātmā jitendriyaḥ
dA tato 'ntarikṣe vāg āsīt taṃ munipravaraṃ prati

dA kiṃ nu syād iti saṃcintya vākyam āhāparaṃ prati

dA nārada uvāca
dA kīdṛgvidhaṃ tu taj jñānaṃ yena jānāmi te tanum
dA lokapāla uvāca

dA nārada uvāca
dA tvam eva tava tat tattvaṃ brūhi lokaguro mama
dA bhavantaṃ jñātum icchāmi kīdṛgbhūtas tvam avyaya
dA tataḥ prahasya bhagavān meghagambhīrayā girā
dA prāheśaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ na me cāsyaṃ śrutir na ca
dA na ghrāṇajihve dṛk caiva tvacā nāsti tathā mune
dA kathaṃ vakṣyāmi cātmānam aśarīras tathāpy aham
dA taj jñātvā vismayāviṣṭo munir āha praṇamya tam
dA yena tvaṃ pūrvam ātmānam ananto 'haṃ bṛhattaraḥ
dA śakto 'ham iti māṃ prītaḥ proktavān asi tat katham
dA punas tam āha bhagavāṃs tavāpy akṣāṇi santi vai
dA tvam enaṃ brūhi cātmānaṃ yadi śaknoṣi nārada
dA ātmā yathā tava mune viditas tu bhaviṣyati
dA māṃ ca jānāsi tena tvam ekaṃ sādhanam āvayoḥ
dA ity uktvā bhagavān devas tato novāca kiṃ cana

dA sthitvā sa dīrghakālaṃ ca munir vyāmūḍhamānasaḥ
dA āha māṃ bhagavān devas tv ananto 'haṃ bṛhattaraḥ
dA tenāham iti sarvasya ko vānanto bṛhattaraḥ

dA yasyāṃ jānanti bhūtāni vilīnāni tatas tataḥ

dA yogasiddho mahāyogī jñānavijñānapāragaḥ
dA āścaryo 'si ca dhanyo 'si hy ananto 'si bṛhattaraḥ

dB śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan nāradena purā śrutam
dB śrīvatsāṅkaṃ jagadbījam anantaṃ lokasākṣiṇam
dB purā nārāyaṇaṃ devaṃ nāradaḥ paripṛṣṭavān
dB tvām akṣaraṃ paraṃ brahma nirguṇaṃ tamasaḥ param
dB āhur vedyaṃ paraṃ dhāma brahmādikamalodbhavam
dB bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa śraddadhānair jitendriyaiḥ
dB kathaṃ bhaktair vicintyo 'si yogibhir mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ
dB kiṃ japyaṃ kiṃ japen nityaṃ kālyam utthāya mānavaḥ
dB kathaṃ yuñjan sadā dhyāyed brūhi tattvaṃ sanātanam
dB śrutvā ca nāradoktaṃ tu devānām īśvaraḥ svayam
dB provāca bhagavān viṣṇur nāradaṃ varadaḥ prabhuḥ
dB hanta te kathayiṣyāmi imāṃ divyām anusmṛtim
dB yām adhītya prayāṇe tu madbhāvāyopapadyate
dB oṃkāram agrataḥ kṛtvā māṃ namaskṛtya nārada
dB ekāgraḥ prayato bhūtvā imaṃ mantram udīrayet
dB oṃ namo bhagavate vāsudevāya iti
dB ity ukto nāradaḥ prāha prāñjaliḥ praṇataḥ sthitaḥ
dB sarvadeveśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ sarvātmānaṃ hariṃ prabhum
dB avyaktaṃ śāśvataṃ devaṃ prabhavaṃ puruṣottamam
dB prapadye prāñjalir viṣṇum akṣaraṃ paramaṃ padam
dB purāṇaṃ prabhavaṃ nityam akṣayaṃ lokasākṣiṇam
dB prapadye puṇḍarīkākṣam īśaṃ bhaktānukampinam
dB lokanāthaṃ sahasrākṣam adbhutaṃ paramaṃ padam
dB bhagavantaṃ prapanno 'smi bhūtabhavyabhavatprabhum
dB sraṣṭāraṃ sarvalokānām anantaṃ sarvatomukham

dB śrībhagavān uvāca

dB ahaṃ bhagavatas tasya mama cāsau sanātanaḥ
dB tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati

dC atyāścaryam imaṃ deva vapuṣāsmatkulodbhavaḥ
dC svalpaprāṇaḥ svalpakāyaḥ ko 'sau pakṣī ihāgataḥ
dC tac chrutvāhaṃ naṣṭagarvo bhīto lajjāsamanvitaḥ
dC svayaṃ buddhaś ca saṃvignas tato hy aśṛṇavaṃ punaḥ
dC āgaccha garuḍety eva tato 'haṃ yānam āsthitaḥ
dC parārdhyaṃ ca tato gatvā yojanānāṃ śataṃ punaḥ
dC tatrāpaśyam ahaṃ yo vai brahmāṇaṃ parameṣṭhinam
dC tatrāpi cāparaṃ tatra śatakoṭipitāmahān
dC punar ehīty uvācoccair bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
dC mahākulaṃ tato 'paśyaṃ pramāṇāni tam avyayam
dC kapitthaphalasaṃkāśair aṇḍākāraiḥ samāśritam
dC tatra sthito hariḥ śrīmān aṇḍam ekaṃ bibheda ha
dC mahad bhūtaṃ hi māṃ gṛhya dattvā vai prākṣipat punaḥ
dC tanmadhye sāgarān sapta brahmāṇaṃ ca tathā surān
dC paśyāmy ahaṃ yathāyogaṃ mātaraṃ svakulaṃ tathā
dC evaṃ mayānubhūtaṃ hi tattvānveṣaṇakāṅkṣiṇā
dC śibikāsadṛśaṃ māṃ vai paśyadhvaṃ munisattamāḥ
dC ity evam abravaṃ viprān bhīṣma yan me purābhavat
dC tat te sarvaṃ yathānyāyam uktavān asmi sattama
dC yoginas taṃ prapaśyanti jñānaṃ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ harim
dC nānyathā śakyarūpo 'sau jñānagamyaḥ paraḥ pumān
dC ananyayā ca bhaktyā ca prāptuṃ śakyo mahāhariḥ
dC bhīṣma uvāca
dC ity evam uktvā bhagavān suparṇaḥ pakṣirāṭ prabhuḥ
dC āmantrya jananīṃ me vai tatraivāntaradhīyata
dC tasmād rājendra sarvātmā vāsudevaḥ pradhānakṛt
dC jñānena bhaktyā sulabho nānyatheti matir mama
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yogaṃ me paramaṃ tāta mokṣasya vada bhārata
c tam ahaṃ tattvato jñātum icchāmi vadatāṃ vara
d bhūyo 'pi jñānasadbhāve sthityarthaṃ tvāṃ bravīmy aham
d acintyaṃ vāsudevākhyaṃ tasmāt prabrūhi sattama
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c saṃvādaṃ mokṣasaṃyuktaṃ śiṣyasya guruṇā saha
a kaś cid brāhmaṇam āsīnam ācāryam ṛṣisattamam
b tejorāśiṃ mahātmānaṃ satyasaṃdhaṃ jitendriyam
c śiṣyaḥ paramamedhāvī śreyorthī susamāhitaḥ
e caraṇāv upasaṃgṛhya sthitaḥ prāñjalir abravīt
a upāsanāt prasanno 'si yadi vai bhagavan mama
c saṃśayo me mahān kaś cit tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
a kutaś cāhaṃ kutaś ca tvaṃ tat samyag brūhi yat param
c kathaṃ ca sarvabhūteṣu sameṣu dvijasattama
e samyagvṛttā nivartante viparītāḥ kṣayodayāḥ
a vedeṣu cāpi yad vākyaṃ laukikaṃ vyāpakaṃ ca yat
c etad vidvan yathātattvaṃ sarvaṃ vyākhyātum arhasi
 gurur uvāca
a śṛṇu śiṣya mahāprājña brahmaguhyam idaṃ param
c adhyātmaṃ sarvabhūtānām āgamānāṃ ca yad vasu
a vāsudevaḥ sarvam idaṃ viśvasya brahmaṇo mukham
b krīḍate bhagavān devo bālakrīḍanakair iva
c satyaṃ dānam atho yajñas titikṣā dama ārjavam
a puruṣaṃ sanātanaṃ viṣṇuṃ yat tad vedavido viduḥ
c sargapralayakartāram avyaktaṃ brahma śāśvatam
e tad idaṃ brahma vārṣṇeyam itihāsaṃ śṛṇuṣva me
a brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇaiḥ śrāvyo rājanyaḥ kṣatriyais tathā
b vaiśyo vaiśyais tathā śrāvyaḥ śūdraḥ śūdrair mahāmanāḥ
c māhātmyaṃ devadevasya viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ
e arhas tvam asi kalyāṇa vārṣṇeyaṃ śṛṇu yat param
f yam acyutaṃ paraṃ nityaṃ liṅgahīnaṃ ca nirmalam
f nirvāṇam amṛtaṃ śrīmat tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam
f bhave ca bhedavad bhinnaṃ pradānaṃ guṇakārakam
f tasmin na sajjate nityaṃ sa eṣa puruṣo 'paraḥ
f puruṣādhiṣṭhitaṃ nityaṃ pradhānaṃ brahma kāraṇam
f kālasvarūpaṃ rūpeṇa viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā
f kṣobhyamāṇaṃ sṛjaty eva nānābhūtāni bhāgaśaḥ
f tad dṛṣṭvā puruṣo 'tattvaṃ sākṣī bhūtvā pravartate
f tat praviśya yathāyogam abhinno bhinnalakṣaṇaḥ
a kālacakram anādyantaṃ bhāvābhāvasvalakṣaṇam
c trailokyaṃ sarvabhūteṣu cakravat parivartate
a yat tad akṣaram avyaktam amṛtaṃ brahma śāśvatam
c vadanti puruṣavyāghraṃ keśavaṃ puruṣarṣabham
d tad akṣaram acintyaṃ vai bhinnarūpeṇa dṛśyate
d paśya kālākhyam aniśaṃ na coṣṇaṃ nātiśītalam
d na santy ete guṇās tasmiṃs tathā tasmāt pravartate
d śītalo 'yam anuprāptaḥ kālo grīṣmas tathaiva ca
d vakṣyanti sarvabhūtāni hy ete sūryodayaṃ prati
d āgacchanti nivartanti sa kālo guṇarāśayaḥ
d na caiva prakṛtisthena kālayuktena nityaśaḥ
d guṇaiḥ saṃbhogam aratis tattvavijñānakovidam
d puruṣādhiṣṭhitā nityaṃ prakṛtiḥ sūyate parā
a pitṝn devān ṛṣīṃś caiva tathā vai yakṣadānavān
c nāgāsuramanuṣyāṃś ca sṛjate paramo 'vyayaḥ
a tathaiva vedaśāstrāṇi lokadharmāṃś ca śāśvatān
c pralaye prakṛtiṃ prāpya yugādau sṛjate prabhuḥ
a yathartuṣv ṛtuliṅgāni nānārūpāṇi paryaye
c dṛśyante tāni tāny eva tathā brahmāharātriṣu
a atha yad yad yadā bhāvi kālayogād yugādiṣu
c tat tad utpadyate jñānaṃ lokayātrāvidhānajam
d śrutir eṣā samākhyātā tadarthaṃ kāraṇātmanā
d anāmnāyavidhānād vai vedā hy antarhitā yathā
d yugānte hy astabhūtāni śāstrāṇi vividhāni ca
d sarvasattvavināśād vai jīvātmanityayā smṛtāḥ
d anyasminn aṇḍasadbhāve vartamānāni nityaśaḥ
a yugānte 'ntarhitān vedān setihāsān maharṣayaḥ
c lebhire tapasā pūrvam anujñātāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
d niyogād brahmaṇo viprā lokatantrapravartakāḥ
a vedavid veda bhagavān vedāṅgāni bṛhaspatiḥ
c bhārgavo nītiśāstraṃ ca jagāda jagato hitam
a gāndharvaṃ nārado vedaṃ bharadvājo dhanurgraham
c devarṣicaritaṃ gārgyaḥ kṛṣṇātreyaś cikitsitam
d nyāyatantraṃ hi kārtsnyena gautamo veda tattvataḥ
d vedāntakarmayogaṃ ca vedavid brahmavid vibhuḥ
d dvaipāyano nijagrāha śilpaśāstraṃ bhṛguḥ punaḥ
a nyāyatantrāṇy anekāni tais tair uktāni vādibhiḥ
c hetvāgamasadācārair yad uktaṃ tad upāsyate
a anādyaṃ yat paraṃ brahma na devā narṣayo viduḥ
c ekas tad veda bhagavān dhātā nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
a nārāyaṇād ṛṣigaṇās tathā mukhyāḥ surāsurāḥ
c rājarṣayaḥ purāṇāś ca paramaṃ duḥkhabheṣajam
d vakṣye 'haṃ tava yat prāptam ṛṣer dvaipāyanān mayā
a puruṣādhiṣṭhitaṃ bhāvaṃ prakṛtiḥ sūyate sadā
c hetuyuktam ataḥ sarvaṃ jagat saṃparivartate
a dīpād anye yathā dīpāḥ pravartante sahasraśaḥ
c prakṛtiḥ sṛjate tadvad ānantyān nāpacīyate
a avyaktakarmajā buddhir ahaṃkāraṃ prasūyate
c ākāśaṃ cāpy ahaṃkārād vāyur ākāśasaṃbhavaḥ
a vāyos tejas tataś cāpas tv adbhyo hi vasudhodgatā
c mūlaprakṛtayo 'ṣṭau tā jagad etāsv avasthitam
a jñānendriyāṇy ataḥ pañca pañca karmendriyāṇy api
c viṣayāḥ pañca caikaṃ ca vikāre ṣoḍaśaṃ manaḥ
a śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇaṃ pañcendriyāṇy api
c pādau pāyur upasthaś ca hastau vāk karmaṇām api
a śabdaḥ sparśo 'tha rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca
c vijñeyaṃ vyāpakaṃ cittaṃ teṣu sarvagataṃ manaḥ
d buddhīndriyārthā ity uktā daśa saṃsargayonayaḥ
d sadasadbhāvayoge ca mana ity abhidhīyate
d vyavasāyaguṇā buddhir ahaṃkāro 'bhimānakaḥ
d na bījaṃ dehayoge ca karmabījapravartanāt
a rasajñāne tu jihveyaṃ vyāhṛte vāk tathaiva ca
c indriyair vividhair yuktaṃ sarvaṃ vyastaṃ manas tathā
a vidyāt tu ṣoḍaśaitāni daivatāni vibhāgaśaḥ
c deheṣu jñānakartāram upāsīnam upāsate
a tadvat somaguṇā jihvā gandhas tu pṛthivīguṇaḥ
c śrotraṃ śabdaguṇaṃ caiva cakṣur agner guṇas tathā
e sparśaṃ vāyuguṇaṃ vidyāt sarvabhūteṣu sarvadā
a manaḥ sattvaguṇaṃ prāhuḥ sattvam avyaktajaṃ tathā
c sarvabhūtātmabhūtasthaṃ tasmād budhyeta buddhimān
a ete bhāvā jagat sarvaṃ vahanti sacarācaram
c śritā virajasaṃ devaṃ yam āhuḥ paramaṃ padam
a navadvāraṃ puraṃ puṇyam etair bhāvaiḥ samanvitam
c vyāpya śete mahān ātmā tasmāt puruṣa ucyate
a ajaraḥ so 'maraś caiva vyaktāvyaktopadeśavān
c vyāpakaḥ saguṇaḥ sūkṣmaḥ sarvabhūtaguṇāśrayaḥ
a yathā dīpaḥ prakāśātmā hrasvo vā yadi vā mahān
c jñānātmānaṃ tathā vidyāt puruṣaṃ sarvajantuṣu
a so 'tra vedayate vedyaṃ sa śṛṇoti sa paśyati
c kāraṇaṃ tasya deho 'yaṃ sa kartā sarvakarmaṇām
a agnir dārugato yadvad bhinne dārau na dṛśyate
c tathaivātmā śarīrastho yogenaivātra dṛśyate
d agnir yathā hy upāyena mathitvā dāru dṛśyate
d tathaivātmā śarīrastho yogenaivātra dṛśyate
a nadīṣv āpo yathā yuktā yathā sūrye marīcayaḥ
c saṃtanvānā yathā yānti tathā dehāḥ śarīriṇām
a svapnayoge yathaivātmā pañcendriyasamāgataḥ
c deham utsṛjya vai yāti tathaivātropalabhyate
a karmaṇā vyāpyate pūrvaṃ karmaṇā copapadyate
c karmaṇā nīyate 'nyatra svakṛtena balīyasā
a sa tu dehād yathā dehaṃ tyaktvānyaṃ pratipadyate
c tathā taṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi bhūtagrāmaṃ svakarmajam
 gurur uvāca
a caturvidhāni bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
c avyaktaprabhavāny āhur avyaktanidhanāni ca
e avyaktanidhanaṃ vidyād avyaktātmātmakaṃ manaḥ
a yathāśvatthakaṇīkāyām antarbhūto mahādrumaḥ
c niṣpanno dṛśyate vyaktam avyaktāt saṃbhavas tathā
d ātmānam anusaṃyāti buddhir avyaktajā tathā
d tām anveti mano yadval lohavarmaṇi saṃnidhau
a abhidravaty ayaskāntamayo niścetanāv ubhau
c svabhāvahetujā bhāvā yadvad anyad apīdṛśam
a tadvad avyaktajā bhāvāḥ kartuḥ kāraṇalakṣaṇāḥ
c acetanāś cetayituḥ kāraṇād abhisaṃhitāḥ
a na bhūḥ khaṃ dyaur na bhūtāni narṣayo na surāsurāḥ
c nānyad āsīd ṛte jīvam āsedur na tu saṃhitam
a sarvanītyā sarvagataṃ manohetu salakṣaṇam
c ajñānakarma nirdiṣṭam etat kāraṇalakṣaṇam
a tat kāraṇair hi saṃyuktaṃ kāryasaṃgrahakārakam
c yenaitad vartate cakram anādinidhanaṃ mahat
d yena svabhāvasadbhāvaṃ hetubhūtā sakāraṇā
d evaṃ prākṛtavistāro hy āśritya puruṣaṃ param
a avyaktanābhaṃ vyaktāraṃ vikāraparimaṇḍalam
c kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhitaṃ cakraṃ snigdhākṣaṃ vartate dhruvam
a snigdhatvāt tilavat sarvaṃ cakre 'smin pīḍyate jagat
c tilapīḍair ivākramya bhogair ajñānasaṃbhavaiḥ
d prāṇenāyaṃ hi śānte tu virodhāt pratipālanam
d dehasyeṣūn ya āste yaḥ śuddho 'cintya sanātanaḥ
d bhrāmayan neṣato sic
yāti kālacakrasamanvitaḥ
d bhūtāni mohayan nityaṃ cakrasya ca rayaṃ gataḥ
d snehadravyasamāyoge kṣetrapācaṃ na vastuṣu
d tilavat pīḍite cakre hy ādhiyantranipīḍite
d bahiś cādhiṣṭhite yadvaj jñānināṃ karmasaṃbhavam
a karma tat kurute tarṣād ahaṃkāraparigraham
c kāryakāraṇasaṃyoge sa hetur upapāditaḥ
d yathākarṇya ca tac chiṣyas tattvajñānam anuttamam
a nātyeti kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ tathā
c kāryāṇāṃ tūpakaraṇe kālo bhavati hetumān
a hetuyuktāḥ prakṛtayo vikārāś ca parasparam
c anyonyam abhivartante puruṣādhiṣṭhitāḥ sadā
a sarajas tāmasair bhāvaiś cyuto hetubalānvitaḥ
c kṣetrajñam evānuyāti pāṃsur vāterito yathā
e na ca taiḥ spṛśyate bhāvo na te tena mahātmanā
a sarajasko 'rajaskaś ca sa vai vāyur yathā bhavet
c tathaitad antaraṃ vidyāt kṣetrakṣetrajñayor budhaḥ
e abhyāsāt sa tathā yukto na gacchet prakṛtiṃ punaḥ
a saṃdeham etam utpannam acchinad bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
c tathā vārtāṃ samīkṣeta kṛtalakṣaṇasaṃmitām
