a bījāny agnyupadagdhāni na rohanti yathā punaḥ
c jñānadagdhais tathā kleśair nātmā saṃbadhyate punaḥ
 gurur uvāca
a pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo yathāyam upapadyate
c teṣāṃ vijñānaniṣṭhānām anyat tattvaṃ na rocate
a durlabhā vedavidvāṃso vedokteṣu vyavasthitāḥ
c prayojanam atas tv atra mārgam icchanti saṃstutam
d vedasya na vidur bhāvaṃ jñānamārgapratiṣṭhitam
a sadbhir ācaritatvāt tu vṛttam etad agarhitam
c iyaṃ sā buddhir anyeyaṃ yayā yāti parāṃ gatim
a śarīravān upādatte mohāt sarvaparigrahān
c kāmakrodhādibhir bhāvair yukto rājasatāmasaiḥ
a nāśuddham ācaret tasmād abhīpsan dehayāpanam
c karmaṇo vivaraṃ kurvan na lokān āpnuyāc chubhān
a lohayuktaṃ yathā hema vipakvaṃ na virājate
c tathāpakvakaṣāyākhyaṃ vijñānaṃ na prakāśate
d ke cid ātmaguṇaṃ prāptās te muktāś cakrabandhanāt
d itare duḥkhasadvaṃdvās tathā duḥkhaparāyaṇāḥ
d śukākarmānurūpaṃ te jāyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
d krodhalobhamadāviṣṭā mūḍhāntaḥkaraṇāḥ sadā
d yathāsaṃchāyā nāsti nityatayā purā
d guṇān eva tathā cintyā santy eti ca vidur budhāḥ
a yaś cādharmaṃ caren mohāt kāmalobhāv anu plavan
c dharmyaṃ panthānam ākramya sānubandho vinaśyati
d acalaṃ jñānam aprāpya calacittaś calān iyāt
a śandādīn viṣayāṃs tasmād asaṃrāgād anuplavet
c krodhaharṣau viṣādaś ca jāyante hi parasparam
d guṇāḥ kāryāḥ krodhaharṣau sukhaduḥkhe priyāpriye
d dvaṃdvāny athaivamādīni vijayec caiva sarvavit
a pañcabhūtātmake dehe sattvarājasatāmase
c kam abhiṣṭuvate cāyaṃ kaṃ vā krośati kiṃ vadet
a sparśarūparasādyeṣu saṅgaṃ gacchanti bāliśāḥ
c nāvagacchanty avijñānād ātmajaṃ pārthivaṃ guṇam
a mṛnmayaṃ śaraṇaṃ yadvan mṛdaiva parilipyate
c pārthivo 'yaṃ tathā deho mṛdvikārair vilipyate
a madhu tailaṃ payaḥ sarpir māṃsāni lavaṇaṃ guḍaḥ
c dhānyāni phalamūlāni mṛdvikārāḥ sahāmbhasā
a yadvat kāntāram ātiṣṭhan nautsukyaṃ samanuvrajet
c śramād āhāram ādadyād asvādv api hi yāpanam
a tadvat saṃsārakāntāram ātiṣṭhañ śramatatparaḥ
c yātrārtham adyād āhāraṃ vyādhito bheṣajaṃ yathā
d bhakṣaṇe śvāpadair mārgād iti cāraṃ karoti cet
d evaṃ saṃsāramārgeṇa yātrārthaṃ viṣayāṇi ca
d na gacched bhogavijñānād unmārge padyate tadā
d tasmād aduḥkhato mārgam āsthitas tam anusmaret
d nānāparṇaphalā vṛkṣā bahavaḥ santi tatra hi
d bhoktāro munayaś caiva tasmāt parataraṃ vanam
d anumānais tathā śāstrair yaśasā vikrameṇa ca
a satyaśaucārjavatyāgair yaśasā vikrameṇa ca
c kṣāntyā dhṛtyā ca buddhyā ca manasā tapasaiva ca
a bhāvān sarvān yathāvṛttān saṃvaseta yathākramam
c śāntim icchann adīnātmā saṃyacched indriyāṇi ca
a sattvena rajasā caiva tamasā caiva mohitāḥ
c cakravat parivartante hy ajñānāj jantavo bhṛśam
a tasmāt samyak parīkṣeta doṣān ajñānasaṃbhavān
c ajñānaprabhavaṃ nityam ahaṃkāraṃ parityajet
a mahābhūtānīndriyāṇi guṇāḥ sattvaṃ rajas tamaḥ
b dehamūlaṃ vijānīhi naitāni bhagavān ataḥ
b upāyataḥ pravakṣyāmi taṃ ca mṛtyuṃ durāsadam
c trailokyaṃ seśvaraṃ sarvam ahaṃkāre pratiṣṭhitam
a yatheha niyataṃ kālo darśayaty ārtavān guṇān
c tadvad bhūteṣv ahaṃkāraṃ vidyād bhūtapravartakam
a saṃmohakaṃ tamo vidyāt kṛṣṇam ajñānasaṃbhavam
b prakṛter guṇasaṃjāto mahān ahaṃkriyā tataḥ
b ahaṃkārāt punaḥ paścād bhūtagrāmam udāhṛtam
b avyaktasya guṇebhyas tu tadguṇāṃś ca nibodha tān
c prītiduḥkhanibaddhāṃś ca samastāṃs trīn atho guṇān
e sattvasya rajasaś caiva tamasaś ca nibodha tān
a pramoho harṣajaḥ prītir asaṃdeho dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
c etān sattvaguṇān vidyād imān rājasatāmasān
d asaṃtoṣo 'kṣamā dhairyam atṛptir viṣayādiṣu
d rājasāś ca guṇā hy ete tatparaṃ tāmasāñ śṛṇu
d mohas tandrī tathā duḥkhaṃ nidrālasyaṃ pramādatā
d viṣādī dīrghasūtraś ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
a kāmakrodhau pramādaś ca lobhamohau bhayaṃ klamaḥ
c viṣādaśokāv aratir mānadarpāv anāryatā
a doṣāṇām evamādīnāṃ parīkṣya gurulāghavam
c vimṛśed ātmasaṃsthānām ekaikam anusaṃtatam
d yasmin pratiṣṭhitaṃ cedaṃ yasmin sajjñānanirgatiḥ
d sarvabhūtādhikaṃ nityam ahaṃkāraṃ vilokayet
d vilokamānaḥ sa tadā svabuddhyā sūkṣmayā punaḥ
d tad eva bhāti tad rūpam ātmanā yat sunirmalam
 śiṣya uvāca
a ke doṣā manasā tyaktāḥ ke buddhyā śithilīkṛtāḥ
c ke punaḥ punar āyānti ke mohād aphalā iva
a keṣāṃ balābalaṃ buddhyā hetubhir vimṛśed budhaḥ
c etat sarvaṃ samācakṣva yathā vidyām ahaṃ prabho
d mahyaṃ śuśrūṣave vidvan vakṣy etad buddhiniścitam
d śāntatvād aparāntāc ca ārambhād api caikataḥ
d prokto hy atra yathā hetur evam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
 gurur uvāca
 gauravaṃ tu guṇānāṃ syāt taddhetūnāṃ balābalāt
a doṣair mūlād avacchinnair viśuddhātmā vimucyate
c vināśayati saṃbhūtam ayasmayamayo yathā
d sahajair aviśuddhātmā doṣair naśyati rājasaiḥ
e tathākṛtātmā sahajair doṣair naśyati rājasaiḥ
a rājasaṃ tāmasaṃ caiva śuddhātmākarmasaṃbhavam
b śamayet sattvam āsthāya svabuddhyā kevalaṃ dvijaḥ
b tyajec ca manasā caitau śuddhātmā buddhim āsthitaḥ
c tat sarvaṃ dehināṃ bījaṃ sarvam ātmavataḥ samam
a tasmād ātmavatā varjyaṃ rajaś ca tama eva ca
c rajastamobhyāṃ nirmuktaṃ sattvaṃ nirmalatām iyāt
d āhārān varjayen nityaṃ rājasāṃs tāmasān api
d te brahma punar āyānti na mohād acalā iva
a atha vā mantravad brūyur māṃsādānāṃ yajuṣkṛtam
c hetuḥ sa evānādāne śuddhadharmānupālane
a rajasā dharmayuktāni kāryāṇy api samāpnuyāt
c arthayuktāni cātyarthaṃ kāmān sarvāṃś ca sevate
a tamasā lobhayuktāni krodhajāni ca sevate
c hiṃsāvihārābhiratas tandrīnidrāsamanvitaḥ
a sattvasthaḥ sāttvikān bhāvāñ śuddhān paśyati saṃśritaḥ
c sa dehī vimalaḥ śrīmāñ śuddho vidyāsamanvitaḥ
 gurur uvāca
a rajasā sādhyate mohas tamasā ca nararṣabha
c krodhalobhau bhayaṃ darpa eteṣāṃ sādhanāc chuciḥ
a paramaṃ paramātmānaṃ devam akṣayam avyayam
c viṣṇum avyaktasaṃsthānaṃ viśante devasattamam
a tasya māyāvidagdhāṅgā jñānabhraṣṭā nirāśiṣaḥ
c mānavā jñānasaṃmohāt tataḥ kāmaṃ prayānti vai
a kāmāt krodham avāpyātha lobhamohau ca mānavāḥ
c mānadarpād ahaṃkāram ahaṃkārāt tataḥ kriyāḥ
a kriyābhiḥ snehasaṃbandhaḥ snehāc chokam anantaram
c sukhaduḥkhasamārambhāj janmājanmakṛtakṣaṇāḥ
a janmato garbhavāsaṃ tu śukraśoṇitasaṃbhavam
c purīṣamūtravikledaśoṇitaprabhavāvilam
a tṛṣṇābhibhūtas tair baddhas tān evābhipariplavan
b tathā narakagartasthas tṛṣṇārajjubhir ācitaḥ
b puṇyapāpapraṇunnāṅgo jāyate sa yathā kṛmiḥ
b maśakair matkuṇair daṣṭas tathā citravadhārditaḥ
b nānāvyādhibhir ākīrṇaḥ kathaṃ cid yauvanaṃ gataḥ
b kūrmotsṛjati bhūyaś ca rajjuḥ svasvamukhepsayā
b yoṣitaṃ narakaṃ gṛhya janmakarmavaśānugaḥ
b purakṣetranimittaṃ yad duḥkhaṃ vaktuṃ na śakyate
b kas tatra nindakaś caiva narake pacyate bhṛśam
b vārdhakyam anulaṅgheta tatra karmārabhet punaḥ
b bhagavān saṃstutaḥ paścāt kiṃ pravakṣyāmi te bhṛśam
c saṃsāratantravāhinyas tatra budhyeta yoṣitaḥ
a prakṛtyā kṣetrabhūtās tā narāḥ kṣetrajñalakṣaṇāḥ
c tasmād etā viśeṣeṇa naro 'tīyur vipaścitaḥ
a kṛtyā hy etā ghorarūpā mohayanty avicakṣaṇān
c rajasy antarhitā mūrtir indriyāṇāṃ sanātanī
a tasmāt tarṣātmakād rāgād bījāj jāyanti jantavaḥ
c svadehajān asvasaṃjñān yadvad aṅgāt kṛmīṃs tyajet
e svasaṃjñān asvajāṃs tadvat sutasaṃjñān kṛmīṃs tyajet
a śukrato rasataś caiva snehāj jāyanti jantavaḥ
c svabhāvāt karmayogād vā tān upekṣeta buddhimān
a rajas tamasi paryastaṃ sattvaṃ tamasi saṃsthitam
c jñānādhiṣṭhānam ajñānaṃ buddhyahaṃkāralakṣaṇam
a tad bījaṃ dehinām āhus tad bījaṃ jīvasaṃjñitam
c karmaṇā kālayuktena saṃsāraparivartakam
a ramaty ayaṃ yathā svapne manasā dehavān iva
c karmagarbhair guṇair dehī garbhe tad upapadyate
a karmaṇā bījabhūtena codyate yad yad indriyam
c jāyate tad ahaṃkārād rāgayuktena cetasā
a śabdarāgāc chrotram asya jāyate bhāvitātmanaḥ
b sparśarāgāt tvag evāsya jāyate bhāvitātmanaḥ
c rūparāgāt tathā cakṣur ghrāṇaṃ gandhacikīrṣayā
d rasarāgāt tathā jihvā jāyate bhāvitātmanaḥ
a sparśanebhyas tathā vāyuḥ prāṇāpānavyapāśrayaḥ
c vyānodānau samānaś ca pañcadhā dehayāpanā
a saṃjātair jāyate gātraiḥ karmajair brahmaṇā vṛtaḥ
c duḥkhādyantair duḥkhamadhyair naraḥ śārīramānasaiḥ
a duḥkhaṃ vidyād upādānād abhimānāc ca vardhate
c tyāgāt tebhyo nirodhaḥ syān nirodhajño vimucyate
a indriyāṇāṃ rajasy eva prabhavapralayāv ubhau
c parīkṣya saṃcared vidvān yathāvac chāstracakṣuṣā
a jñānendriyāṇīndriyārthān nopasarpanty atarṣulam
c jñātaiś ca kāraṇair dehī na dehaṃ punar arhati
 gurur uvāca
a atropāyaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāvac chāstracakṣuṣā
c tad vijñānāc caran prājñaḥ prāpnuyāt paramāṃ gatim
a sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ puruṣaḥ śreṣṭha ucyate
c puruṣebhyo dvijān āhur dvijebhyo mantravādinaḥ
a sarvabhūtaviśiṣṭās te sarvajñāḥ sarvadarśinaḥ
c brāhmaṇā vedatattvajñās tattvārthagatiniścayāḥ
a netrahīno yathā hy ekaḥ kṛcchrāṇi labhate 'dhvani
c jñānahīnas tathā loke tasmāj jñānavido 'dhikāḥ
a tāṃs tān upāsate dharmān dharmakāmā yathāgamam
c na tv eṣām arthasāmānyam antareṇa guṇān imān
a vāgdehamanasāṃ śaucaṃ kṣamā satyaṃ dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
c sarvadharmeṣu dharmajñā jñāpayanti guṇān imān
a yad idaṃ brahmaṇo rūpaṃ brahmacaryam iti smṛtam
c paraṃ tat sarvabhūtebhyas tena yānti parāṃ gatim
a liṅgasaṃyogahīnaṃ yac charīrasparśavarjitam
c śrotreṇa śravaṇaṃ caiva cakṣuṣā caiva darśanam
d tvacā ca sparśanaṃ yac ca nāsayā ghrāṇam eva ca
a jihvayā rasanaṃ yac ca tad eva parivarjitam
c buddhyā ca vyavasāyena brahmacaryam akalmaṣam
a samyagvṛttir brahmalokaṃ prāpnuyān madhyamaḥ surān
c dvijāgryo jāyate vidvān kanyasīṃ vṛttim āsthitaḥ
a suduṣkaraṃ brahmacaryam upāyaṃ tatra me śṛṇu
c saṃpravṛttam udīrṇaṃ ca nigṛhṇīyād dvijo manaḥ
a yoṣitāṃ na kathāḥ śrāvyā na nirīkṣyā nirambarāḥ
c kadā cid darśanād āsāṃ durbalān āviśed rajaḥ
a rāgotpattau caret kṛcchram ahnas triḥ praviśed apaḥ
c magnaḥ svapne ca manasā trir japed aghamarṣaṇam
a pāpmānaṃ nirdahed evam antarbhūtaṃ rajomayam
c jñānayuktena manasā saṃtatena vicakṣaṇaḥ
a kuṇapāmedhyasaṃyuktaṃ yadvad acchidrabandhanam
c tadvad dehagataṃ vidyād ātmānaṃ dehabandhanam
d amedhyapūrṇaṃ yad bhāṇḍaṃ śleṣmāntakalilāvṛtam
d necchate vīkṣituṃ bhāṇḍaṃ kutaḥ spraṣṭuṃ pravartate
d dehabhāṇḍaṃ malaiḥ pūrṇaṃ bahiḥ svedajalāvṛtam
d bībhatsaṃ naranārīṇāṃ jñānināṃ narakaṃ matam
d chidrakumbho yathā srāvaṃ sṛjate tadgataṃ dṛḍham
d antaḥsthaṃ sraṃsate tadvaj jalaṃ deheṣu dehinām
d śleṣmāśrumūtrakalilaṃ purīṣaṃ śuklam eva ca
d kaphajālaviniryāsaḥ sarasaś citta muñcaya
a vātapittakaphān raktaṃ tvaṅmāṃsaṃ snāyum asthi ca
c majjāṃ caiva sirājālais tarpayanti rasā nṛṇām
a daśa vidyād dhamanyo 'tra pañcendriyaguṇāvahāḥ
c yābhiḥ sūkṣmāḥ pratāyante dhamanyo 'nyāḥ sahasraśaḥ
a evam etāḥ sirānadyo rasodā dehasāgaram
c tarpayanti yathākālam āpagā iva sāgaram
a madhye ca hṛdayasyaikā sirā tv atra manovahā
c śukraṃ saṃkalpajaṃ nṝṇāṃ sarvagātrair vimuñcati
a sarvagātrapratāyinyas tasyā hy anugatāḥ sirāḥ
c netrayoḥ pratipadyante vahantyas taijasaṃ guṇam
a payasy antarhitaṃ sarpir yadvan nirmathyate khajaiḥ
c śukraṃ nirmathyate tadvad dehasaṃkalpajaiḥ khajaiḥ
a svapne 'py evaṃ yathābhyeti manaḥsaṃkalpajaṃ rajaḥ
c śukram asparśajaṃ dehāt sṛjanty asya manovahā
a maharṣir bhagavān atrir veda tac chukrasaṃbhavam
c tribījam indradaivatyaṃ tasmād indriyam ucyate
a ye vai śukragatiṃ vidyur bhūtasaṃkarakārikām
c virāgā dagdhadoṣās te nāpnuyur dehasaṃbhavam
a guṇānāṃ sāmyam āgamya manasaiva manovaham
c dehakarma nudan prāṇān antakāle vimucyate
a bhavitā manaso jñānaṃ mana eva pratāyate
c jyotiṣmad virajo divyam atra siddhaṃ mahātmanām
a tasmāt tad avighātāya karma kuryād akalmaṣam
c rajas tamaś ca hitveha na tiryaggatim āpnuyāt
a taruṇādhigataṃ jñānaṃ jarādurbalatāṃ gatam
c paripakvabuddhiḥ kālena ādatte mānasaṃ balam
d evaṃ putrakalatreṣu jñātisaṃbandhibandhuṣu
d ādatte hṛdaye kāmaṃ vyādhādhyādibhir abhiplutaḥ
d yatas tataḥ paripatann avindan sukham aṇv api
d bahuduḥkhasamāpannaḥ paścān nirvedam āsthitaḥ
d jñānavṛkṣaṃ samāśritya paścān nirvṛtim aśnute
a sudurgam iva panthānam atītya guṇabandhanam
c yadā paśyet tadā doṣān atītyāmṛtam aśnute
 gurur uvāca
a duranteṣv indriyārtheṣu saktāḥ sīdanti jantavaḥ
c ye tv asaktā mahātmānas te yānti paramāṃ gatim
a janmamṛtyujarāduḥkhair vyādhibhir manasaḥ klamaiḥ
c dṛṣṭvemaṃ saṃtataṃ lokaṃ ghaṭen mokṣāya buddhimān
a vāṅmanobhyāṃ śarīreṇa śuciḥ syād anahaṃkṛtaḥ
c praśānto jñānavān bhikṣur nirapekṣaś caret sukham
d vaśā mokṣavatāṃ pāśās tāsāṃ rūpaṃ pradarśakam
d durgrahaṃ paśyamāno 'pi manyate mohitas tadā
d evaṃ paśyantam ātmānam anudhyātaṃ hi bandhuṣu
d ayathātvena jānāmi bhedarūpeṇa saṃsthitam
a atha vā manasaḥ saṅgaṃ paśyed bhūtānukampayā
c atrāpy upekṣāṃ kurvīta jñātvā karmaphalaṃ jagat
a yat kṛtaṃ prāk śubhaṃ karma pāpaṃ vā tad upāśnute
c tasmāc chubhāni karmāṇi kuryād vāgbuddhikarmabhiḥ
a ahiṃsā satyavacanaṃ sarvabhūteṣu cārjavam
c kṣamā caivāpramādaś ca yasyaite sa sukhī bhavet
d anakṣasādhyaṃ tad brahma nirmalaṃ jagataḥ param
d svātmaprakāśam agrāhyam ahetukam acañcalam
d vivekajñānavācistho hy āśurūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ
d vaikārikāt pradṛśyete gairike madhudhāravat
a yaś cainaṃ paramaṃ dharmaṃ sarvabhūtasukhāvaham
c duḥkhān niḥsaraṇaṃ veda sa tattvajñaḥ sukhī bhavet
a tasmāt samāhitaṃ buddhyā mano bhūteṣu dhārayet
c nāpadhyāyen na spṛhayen nābaddhaṃ cintayed asat
a avāgyogaprayogeṇa manojñaṃ saṃpravartate
c vivakṣatā vā sadvākyaṃ dharmaṃ sūkṣmam avekṣatā
e satyāṃ vācam ahiṃsrāṃ ca vaded anapavādinīm
a kalkāpetām aparuṣām anṛśaṃsām apaiśunām
c īdṛg alpaṃ ca vaktavyam avikṣiptena cetasā
a vākprabuddho hi saṃrāgād virāgād vyāhared yadi
c buddhyā hy anigṛhītena manasā karma tāmasam
e rajobhūtair hi karaṇaiḥ karmaṇā pratipadyate
a sa duḥkhaṃ prāpya loke 'smin narakāyopapadyate
c tasmān manovākśarīrair ācared dhairyam ātmanaḥ
a prakīrṇameṣabhāro hi yadvad dhāryeta dasyubhiḥ
c pratilomāṃ diśaṃ buddhvā saṃsāram abudhās tathā
d saṃsāramārgam āpannaḥ pratilomaṃ vivarjayet
a tān eva ca yathā dasyūn kṣiptvā gacchec chivāṃ diśam
c tathā rajastamaḥkarmāṇy utsṛjya prāpnuyāt sukham
a niḥsaṃdigdham anīho vai muktaḥ sarvaparigrahaiḥ
c viviktacārī laghvāśī tapasvī niyatendriyaḥ
a jñānadagdhaparikleśaḥ prayogaratir ātmavān
c niṣpracāreṇa manasā paraṃ tad adhigacchati
a dhṛtimān ātmavān buddhiṃ nigṛhṇīyād asaṃśayam
c mano buddhyā nigṛhṇīyād viṣayān manasātmanaḥ
d yojayitvā manas tatra niścalaṃ paramātmani
d yogābhisaṃdhiyuktasya brahma tat saṃprakāśate
d aikāntyaṃ tad idaṃ viddhi sarvavastvantarasthitiḥ
d viśeṣahīnaṃ gṛhṇanti viśeṣāṃ kāraṇātmikām
d atha vā na prabhus tatra paramātmani vartitum
d āgāmitattvaṃ yogātmā yogatantram upakramet
a nigṛhītendriyasyāsya kurvāṇasya mano vaśe
c devatās tāḥ prakāśante hṛṣṭā yānti tam īśvaram
a tābhiḥ saṃsaktamanaso brahmavat saṃprakāśate
c etaiś cāpagataiḥ sarvair brahmabhūyāya kalpate
a atha vā na pravarteta yogatantrair upakramet
c yena tantramayaṃ tantraṃ vṛttiḥ syāt tat tad ācaret
a kaṇapiṇyākakulmāṣaśākayāvakasaktavaḥ
c tathā mūlaphalaṃ bhaikṣaṃ paryāyeṇopayojayet
a āhāraṃ niyataṃ caiva deśe kāle ca sāttvikam
c tat parīkṣyānuvarteta yat pravṛtty anuvartakam
a pravṛttaṃ noparundheta śanair agnim ivendhayet
c jñānendhitaṃ tato jñānam arkavat saṃprakāśate
a jñānādhiṣṭhānam ajñānaṃ trīṃl lokān adhitiṣṭhati
c vijñānānugataṃ jñānam ajñānād apakṛṣyate
a pṛthaktvāt saṃprayogāc ca nāsūyur veda śāśvatam
c sa tayor apavargajño vītarāgo vimucyate
a vayotīto jarāmṛtyū jitvā brahma sanātanam
c amṛtaṃ tad avāpnoti yat tad akṣaram avyayam
 gurur uvāca
a niṣkalmaṣaṃ brahmacaryam icchatā carituṃ sadā
c nidrā sarvātmanā tyājyā svapnadoṣān avekṣatā
a svapne hi rajasā dehī tamasā cābhibhūyate
c dehāntaram ivāpannaś caraty apagatasmṛtiḥ
a jñānābhyāsāj jāgarato jijñāsārtham anantaram
c vijñānābhiniveśāt tu jāgaraty aniśaṃ sadā
a atrāha ko nv ayaṃ bhāvaḥ svapne viṣayavān iva
c pralīnair indriyair dehī vartate dehavān iva
a atrocyate yathā hy etad veda yogeśvaro hariḥ
c tathaitad upapannārthaṃ varṇayanti maharṣayaḥ
a indriyāṇāṃ śramāt svapnam āhuḥ sarvagataṃ budhāḥ
b tanmayānīndriyāṇy āhus tāvad gacchanti tāni vai
b atrāhus tritayaṃ nityam atathyam iti cec ca na
b prathame vartamāno 'sau tritayaṃ vetti sarvadā
b netarāv upasaṃgamya vijānāti kathaṃ cana
b svapnāvasthāgato hy eṣa svapna ity eva vetti ca
b tad apy asadṛśaṃ yuktyā tritayaṃ mohalakṣaṇam
b yadātmatritayān muktas tadā jānāty asatkṛtaḥ
c manasas tu pralīnatvāt tat tad āhur nidarśanam
a kāryavyāsaktamanasaḥ saṃkalpo jāgrato hy api
c yadvan manorathaiśvaryaṃ svapne tadvan manogatam
a saṃsārāṇām asaṃkhyānāṃ kāmātmā tad avāpnuyāt
c manasy antarhitaṃ sarvaṃ veda sottamapūruṣaḥ
a guṇānām api yad yat tat karma jānāty upasthitam
c tat tac chaṃsanti bhūtāni mano yad bhāvitaṃ yathā
a tatas tam upavartante guṇā rājasatāmasāḥ
c sāttviko vā yathāyogam ānantaryaphalodayaḥ
a tataḥ paśyaty asaṃbaddhān vātapittakaphottarān
c rajastamobhavair bhāvais tad apy āhur duranvayam
a prasannair indriyair yad yat saṃkalpayati mānasam
c tat tat svapne 'py uparate manodṛṣṭir nirīkṣate
a vyāpakaṃ sarvabhūteṣu vartate 'pratighaṃ manaḥ
c manasy antarhitaṃ dvāraṃ deham āsthāya mānasam
a yat tat sadasad avyaktaṃ svapity asmin nidarśanam
b vyaktabhedam atīto 'sau cinmātraṃ paridṛśyate
c sarvabhūtātmabhūtasthaṃ tad adhyātmaguṇaṃ viduḥ
a lipseta manasā yaś ca saṃkalpād aiśvaraṃ guṇam
c ātmaprabhāvāt taṃ vidyāt sarvā hy ātmani devatāḥ
a evaṃ hi tapasā yuktam arkavat tamasaḥ param
c trailokyaprakṛtir dehī tapasā taṃ maheśvaram
a tapo hy adhiṣṭhitaṃ devais tapoghnam asurais tamaḥ
c etad devāsurair guptaṃ tad āhur jñānalakṣaṇam
a sattvaṃ rajas tamaś ceti devāsuraguṇān viduḥ
c sattvaṃ devaguṇaṃ vidyād itarāv āsurau guṇau
d sattvaṃ manas tathā buddhir devā ity abhiśabditāḥ
d tair eva hi vṛtas tasmāj jñātvaivaṃ paramaṃ  
d nidrāvikalpena satāṃ   viśati lokavat
d svastho bhavati gūḍhātmā kaluṣaiḥ parivarjitaḥ
d niśādikā ye kathitā lokānāṃ kaluṣā matāḥ
d tair hīnaṃ yat puraṃ śuddhaṃ bāhyābhyantaravartinam
d sadānandamayaṃ nityaṃ bhūtvā tat param anviyāt
d evam ākhyātam atyarthaṃ brahmacaryam akalmaṣam
d sarvasaṃyogahīnaṃ tad viṣṇvākhyaṃ paramaṃ padam
d acintyam adbhutaṃ loke jñānena parivartate
a brahma tat paramaṃ vedyam amṛtaṃ jyotir akṣaram
c ye vidur bhāvitātmānas te yānti paramāṃ gatim
a hetumac chakyam ākhyātum etāvaj jñānacakṣuṣā
c pratyāhāreṇa vā śakyam avyaktaṃ brahma veditum
 gurur uvāca
a na sa veda paraṃ dharmaṃ yo na veda catuṣṭayam
c vyaktāvyakte ca yat tattvaṃ saṃprāptaṃ paramarṣiṇā
a vyaktaṃ mṛtyumukhaṃ vidyād avyaktam amṛtaṃ padam
c pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmam ṛṣir nārāyaṇo 'bravīt
a atraivāvasthitaṃ sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram
c nivṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmam avyaktaṃ brahma śāśvatam
a pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ prajāpatir athābravīt
c pravṛttiḥ punarāvṛttir nivṛttiḥ paramā gatiḥ
a tāṃ gatiṃ paramām eti nivṛttiparamo muniḥ
c jñānatattvaparo nityaṃ śubhāśubhanidarśakaḥ
a tad evam etau vijñeyāv avyaktapuruṣāv ubhau
c avyaktapuruṣābhyāṃ tu yat syād anyan mahattaram
a taṃ viśeṣam avekṣeta viśeṣeṇa vicakṣaṇaḥ
c anādyantāv ubhāv etāv aliṅgau cāpy ubhāv api
a ubhau nityau sūkṣmatarau mahadbhyaś ca mahattarau
c sāmānyam etad ubhayor evaṃ hy anyad viśeṣaṇam
a prakṛtyā sargadharmiṇyā tathā trividhasattvayā
c viparītam ato vidyāt kṣetrajñasya ca lakṣaṇam
a prakṛteś ca vikārāṇāṃ draṣṭāram aguṇānvitam
b kṣetrajñam āhur jīvaṃ tu kartāraṃ guṇasaṃvṛtam
b agrāhyaṃ yena jānanti taj jñanaṃ daṃśitaś ca tat
b tenaiva daṃśito nityaṃ na guṇaḥ paribhūyate
c agrāhyau puruṣāv etāv aliṅgatvād asaṃhitau
a saṃyogalakṣaṇotpattiḥ karmajā gṛhyate yayā
c karaṇaiḥ karmanirvṛttaiḥ kartā yad yad viceṣṭate
e kīrtyate śabdasaṃjñābhiḥ ko 'ham eṣo 'py asāv iti
f mamāpi kāyam iti ca tad ajño nityasaṃvṛtaḥ
a uṣṇīṣavān yathā vastrais tribhir bhavati saṃvṛtaḥ
c saṃvṛto 'yaṃ tathā dehī sattvarājasatāmasaiḥ
d bhedavastu tv abhedena jānāti sa yadā pumān
d tadā paraṃ parātmāsau bhavaty eva nirañjanaḥ
d kriyāyoge ca bhedākhye bahu saṃkṣipyate kva cit
d vasurudragaṇādyeṣu svānubhogena bhogataḥ
d evam eṣa paraḥ sattvo nānārūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ
d saṃkṣipto dṛśyate paścād ekarūpeṇa viṣṭhitaḥ
a tasmāc catuṣṭayaṃ vedyam etair hetubhir ācitam
c yathāsaṃjño hy ayaṃ samyag antakāle na muhyati
d vāyur vidho yathā bhānur viprakāśaṃ gamiṣyati
a śriyaṃ divyām abhiprepsur brahma vāṅmanasā śuciḥ
c śārīrair niyamair ugraiś caren niṣkalmaṣaṃ tapaḥ
a trailokyaṃ tapasā vyāptam antarbhūtena bhāsvatā
c sūryaś ca candramāś caiva bhāsatas tapasā divi
d anyac ca dharmasāmyaṃ yat tapas tat kīrtyate punaḥ
a pratāpas tapaso jñānaṃ loke saṃśabditaṃ tapaḥ
c rajastamoghnaṃ yat karma tapasas tat svalakṣaṇam
d tritayaṃ hy etad ākhyātaṃ yady asmād bhāsituṃ punaḥ
d svabhāsā bhāsayaṃś cāpi candramā hy atra vartate
d sūryayoge tu yaḥ saṃdhis tapaḥ sarvaṃ pradīpyate
a brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate
c vāṅmanoniyamaḥ sāmyaṃ mānasaṃ tapa ucyate
a vidhijñebhyo dvijātibhyo grāhyam annaṃ viśiṣyate
c āhāraniyamenāsya pāpmā naśyati rājasaḥ
a vaimanasyaṃ ca viṣaye yānty asya karaṇāni ca
c tasmāt tanmātram ādadyād yāvad atra prayojanam
a antakāle vayotkarṣāc chanaiḥ kuryād anāturaḥ
c evaṃ yuktena manasā jñānaṃ tad upapadyate
a rajasā cāpy ayaṃ dehī dehavāñ śabdavac caret
c kāryair avyāhatamatir vairāgyāt prakṛtau sthitaḥ
e ā dehād apramādāc ca dehāntād vipramucyate
a hetuyuktaḥ sadotsargo bhūtānāṃ pralayas tathā
c parapratyayasarge tu niyataṃ nātivartate
a bhavāntaprabhavaprajñā āsate ye viparyayam
c dhṛtyā dehān dhārayanto buddhisaṃkṣiptamānasāḥ
e sthānebhyo dhvaṃsamānāś ca sūkṣmatvāt tān upāsate
a yathāgamaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ buddhyā tan naiva budhyate
c dehāntaṃ kaś cid anvāste bhāvitātmā nirāśrayaḥ
e yukto dhāraṇayā kaś cit sattāṃ ke cid upāsate
a abhyasyanti paraṃ devaṃ vidyutsaṃśabditākṣaram
c antakāle hy upāsannās tapasā dagdhakilbiṣāḥ
a sarva ete mahātmāno gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
c sūkṣmaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ teṣām avekṣec chāstracakṣuṣā
a dehaṃ tu paramaṃ vidyād vimuktam aparigraham
c antarikṣād anyataraṃ dhāraṇāsaktamānasam
a martyalokād vimucyante vidyāsaṃyuktamānasāḥ
c brahmabhūtā virajasas tato yānti parāṃ gatim
d evam ekāyanaṃ dharmam āhur vedavido janāḥ
d yathājñānam upāsantaḥ sarve yānti parāṃ gatim
a kaṣāyavarjitaṃ jñānaṃ yeṣām utpadyate 'calam
c te yānti paramāṃl lokān viśudhyanto yathābalam
a bhagavantam ajaṃ divyaṃ viṣṇum avyaktasaṃjñitam
c bhāvena yānti śuddhā ye jñānatṛptā nirāśiṣaḥ
a jñātvātmasthaṃ hariṃ caiva nivartante na te 'vyayāḥ
c prāpya tat paramaṃ sthānaṃ modante 'kṣaram avyayam
a etāvad etad vijñānam etad asti ca nāsti ca
c tṛṣṇābaddhaṃ jagat sarvaṃ cakravat parivartate
a bisatantur yathaivāyam antaḥsthaḥ sarvato bise
c tṛṣṇātantur anādyantas tathā dehagataḥ sadā
a sūcyā sūtraṃ yathā vastre saṃsārayati vāyakaḥ
c tadvat saṃsārasūtraṃ hi tṛṣṇāsūcyā nibadhyate
d itas tataḥ samāhṛtya rūpaṃ nirvartayiṣyati
a vikāraṃ prakṛtiṃ caiva puruṣaṃ ca sanātanam
c yo yathāvad vijānāti sa vitṛṣṇo vimucyate
a prakāśaṃ bhagavān etad ṛṣir nārāyaṇo 'mṛtam
c bhūtānām anukampārthaṃ jagāda jagato hitam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kena vṛttena vṛttajño janako mithilādhipaḥ
c jagāma mokṣaṃ dharmajño bhogān utsṛjya mānuṣān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c yena vṛttena vṛttajñaḥ sa jagāma mahat sukham
a janako janadevas tu mithilāyāṃ janādhipaḥ
c aurdhvadehikadharmāṇām āsīd yukto vicintane
a tasya sma śatam ācāryā vasanti satataṃ gṛhe
c darśayantaḥ pṛthag dharmān nānāpāṣaṇḍavādinaḥ
a sa teṣāṃ pretyabhāve ca pretyajātau viniścaye
c āgamasthaḥ sa bhūyiṣṭham ātmatattve na tuṣyati
a tatra pañcaśikho nāma kāpileyo mahāmuniḥ
c paridhāvan mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ jagāma mithilām api
a sarvasaṃnyāsadharmāṇāṃ tattvajñānaviniścaye
c suparyavasitārthaś ca nirdvaṃdvo naṣṭasaṃśayaḥ
a ṛṣīṇām āhur ekaṃ yaṃ kāmād avasitaṃ nṛṣu
c śāśvataṃ sukham atyantam anvicchan sa sudurlabham
a yam āhuḥ kapilaṃ sāṃkhyāḥ paramarṣiṃ prajāpatim
c sa manye tena rūpeṇa vismāpayati hi svayam
a āsureḥ prathamaṃ śiṣyaṃ yam āhuś cirajīvinam
c pañcasrotasi yaḥ satram āste varṣasahasrikam
a taṃ samāsīnam āgamya maṇḍalaṃ kāpilaṃ mahat
b pañcasrotasi niṣṇātaḥ pañcarātraviśāradaḥ
b pañcajñaḥ pañcakṛt pañcaguṇaḥ pañcaśikhaḥ smṛtaḥ
c puruṣāvastham avyaktaṃ paramārthaṃ nibodhayat
a iṣṭisatreṇa saṃsiddho bhūyaś ca tapasā muniḥ
c kṣetrakṣetrajñayor vyaktiṃ bubudhe devadarśanaḥ
a yat tad ekākṣaraṃ brahma nānārūpaṃ pradṛśyate
b tan me brūhi dvijaśreṣṭha tvaṃ hi vettāsya tattvataḥ
b evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pañcaśikhaḥ saṃprahṛṣṭatanūruhaḥ
b bodhāyanaparān viprān ṛṣibhāvam upāgataḥ
c āsurir maṇḍale tasmin pratipede tad avyayam
a tasya pañcaśikhaḥ śiṣyo mānuṣyā payasā bhṛtaḥ
c brāhmaṇī kapilā nāma kā cid āsīt kuṭumbinī
a tasyāḥ putratvam āgamya striyāḥ sa pibati stanau
c tataḥ sa kāpileyatvaṃ lebhe buddhiṃ ca naiṣṭhikīm
a etan me bhagavān āha kāpileyāya saṃbhavam
c tasya tat kāpileyatvaṃ sarvavittvam anuttamam
a sāmānyaṃ kapilo jñātvā dharmajñānām anuttamam
c upetya śatam ācāryān mohayām āsa hetubhiḥ
d nirākariṣṇus tān sarvāṃs teṣāṃ hetuguṇān bahūn
d śrāvayām āsa matimān muniḥ pañcaśikho nṛpa
a janakas tv abhisaṃraktaḥ kāpileyānudarśanāt
c utsṛjya śatam ācāryān pṛṣṭhato 'nujagāma tam
a tasmai paramakalpāya praṇatāya ca dharmataḥ
c abravīt paramaṃ mokṣaṃ yat tat sāṃkhyaṃ vidhīyate
a jātinirvedam uktvā hi karmanirvedam abravīt
c karmanirvedam uktvā ca sarvanirvedam abravīt
a yadarthaṃ karmasaṃsargaḥ karmaṇāṃ ca phalodayaḥ
c tad anāśvāsikaṃ moghaṃ vināśi calam adhruvam
a dṛśyamāne vināśe ca pratyakṣe lokasākṣike
c āgamāt param astīti bruvann api parājitaḥ
a anātmā hy ātmano mṛtyuḥ kleśo mṛtyur jarāmayaḥ
c ātmānaṃ manyate mohāt tad asamyak paraṃ matam
a atha ced evam apy asti yal loke nopapadyate
c ajaro 'yam amṛtyuś ca rājāsau manyate tathā
a asti nāstīti cāpy etat tasminn asati lakṣaṇe
c kim adhiṣṭhāya tad brūyāl lokayātrāviniścayam
a pratyakṣaṃ hy etayor mūlaṃ kṛtāntaitihyayor api
c pratyakṣo hy āgamo 'bhinnaḥ kṛtānto vā na kiṃ cana
a yatra tatrānumāne 'sti kṛtaṃ bhāvayate 'pi vā
c anyo jīvaḥ śarīrasya nāstikānāṃ mate smṛtaḥ
a reto vaṭakaṇīkāyāṃ ghṛtapākādhivāsanam
c jātismṛtir ayaskāntaḥ sūryakānto 'mbubhakṣaṇam
a pretya bhūtātyayaś caiva devatābhyupayācanam
c mṛte karmanivṛttiś ca pramāṇam iti niścayaḥ
a na tv ete hetavaḥ santi ye ke cin mūrtisaṃsthitāḥ
c amartyasya hi martyena sāmānyaṃ nopapadyate
a avidyākarmaceṣṭānāṃ ke cid āhuḥ punarbhavam
c kāraṇaṃ lobhamohau tu doṣāṇāṃ ca niṣevaṇam
a avidyāṃ kṣetram āhur hi karma bījaṃ tathā kṛtam
c tṛṣṇāsaṃjananaṃ sneha eṣa teṣāṃ punarbhavaḥ
a tasmin vyūḍhe ca dagdhe ca citte maraṇadharmiṇi
c anyo 'nyāj jāyate dehas tam āhuḥ sattvasaṃkṣayam
a yadā sa rūpataś cānyo jātitaḥ śrutito 'rthataḥ
c katham asmin sa ity eva saṃbandhaḥ syād asaṃhitaḥ
a evaṃ sati ca kā prītir dānavidyātapobalaiḥ
c yad anyācaritaṃ karma sarvam anyaḥ prapadyate
a yadā hy ayam ihaivānyaiḥ prākṛtair duḥkhito bhavet
c sukhitair duḥkhitair vāpi dṛśyo 'py asya vinirṇayaḥ
a tathā hi musalair hanyuḥ śarīraṃ tat punar bhavet
c pṛthag jñānaṃ yad anyac ca yenaitan nopalabhyate
a ṛtuḥ saṃvatsaras tithyaḥ śītoṣṇe ca priyāpriye
c yathātītāni paśyanti tādṛśaḥ sattvasaṃkṣayaḥ
a jarayā hi parītasya mṛtyunā vā vināśinā
c durbalaṃ durbalaṃ pūrvaṃ gṛhasyeva vinaśyati
a indriyāṇi mano vāyuḥ śoṇitaṃ māṃsam asthi ca
c ānupūrvyā vinaśyanti svaṃ dhātum upayānti ca
a lokayātrāvidhānaṃ ca dānadharmaphalāgamaḥ
c yadarthaṃ vedaśabdāś ca vyavahārāś ca laukikāḥ
a iti samyaṅ manasy ete bahavaḥ santi hetavaḥ
c etad astīdam astīti na kiṃ cit pratipadyate
a teṣāṃ vimṛśatām evaṃ tat tat samabhidhāvatām
c kva cin niviśate buddhis tatra jīryati vṛkṣavat
a evam arthair anarthaiś ca duḥkhitāḥ sarvajantavaḥ
c āgamair apakṛṣyante hastipair hastino yathā
d na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati
d haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhate
a arthāṃs tathātyantasukhāvahāṃś ca
lipsanta ete bahavo viśulkāḥ
c mahattaraṃ duḥkham abhiprapannā
hitvāmiṣaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ prayānti
a vināśino hy adhruvajīvitasya
kiṃ bandhubhir mitraparigrahaiś ca
c vihāya yo gacchati sarvam eva
kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate ca
a bhūvyomatoyānalavāyavo hi
sadā śarīraṃ paripālayanti
c itīdam ālakṣya kuto ratir bhaved
vināśino hy asya na śarma vidyate
a idam anupadhi vākyam acchalaṃ
paramanirāmayam ātmasākṣikam
c narapatir abhivīkṣya vismitaḥ
punar anuyoktum idaṃ pracakrame
d bhīṣma uvāca
d janako naradevas tu jñāpitaḥ paramarṣiṇā
d punar evānupapraccha sāṃparāye bhavābhavau
d bhagavan yad idaṃ pretya saṃjñā bhavati kasya cit
d evaṃ sati kim ajñānaṃ jñānaṃ vā kiṃ kariṣyati
d vivādād eva siddho 'sau kāraṇasyeva vedanā
d pañcaśikha uvāca
d cetano vidyate hy atra haitukaṃ ca manogatam
d āgamād eva siddho 'sau svataḥsiddha iti śrutiḥ
d vartate pṛthag anyonyaṃ na hy apāśritya karmasu
d cetano hy aṃśavas tatra svamūrtaṃ dhārayanty ataḥ
d svabhāvaṃ pauruṣaṃ karma hy ātmānaṃ tam upāśritāḥ
d tam āśritya pravartante dehino dehabandhanāḥ
d guṇajñānam abhijñānaṃ yasya liṅgā na śabdavat
d pṛthivyādiṣu bhūteṣu tat tad āhur nidarśanam
d ātmāsau vartate bhinnas tatra tatra samanvitaḥ
d paramātmā tathaivaiko dehe 'sminn iti vai śrutiḥ
d ākāśaṃ vāyur ūṣmā ca sneho yac cāpi pārthivam
d yathā tridhā pravartante tathāsau puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
d payasy antarhitaṃ yadvat tadvad vyāptaṃ mahātmakam
d pūrvaṃ naiśvaryayogena tasmād etan na śeṣavān
d śabdaḥ kālaḥ kriyā deho mamaikasyaiva kalpanā
d svabhāvaṃ tanmayaṃ tv etan māyārūpaṃ tu bhedavat
d nānākhyaṃ paramaṃ śuddhaṃ nirvikalpaṃ parātmakam
d liṅgādi devamadhyās te jñānaṃ devasya tat tathā
d cinmayo 'yaṃ hi nādākhyaḥ śabdaś cāsau mano mahān
d gatimān uta saṃdhatte varṇavat tat padānvitam
d kāyo nāsti ca teṣāṃ vai avakāśas tathā param
d ete noḍhā iti cākhyātāḥ sarve te dharmadūṣakāḥ
d anubandhān na vijñānaṃ jñānato dhruvam avyayam
d nānābhedavikalpena yeṣām ātmā smṛtaḥ sadā
d prakṛter aparas teṣāṃ bahavo hy ātmavādinaḥ
d virodho hy ātmasanmāyāṃ na teṣāṃ siddha eva hi
d anyadā ca gṛhītai vedabāhyās tataḥ smṛtāḥ
d ekānekātmakaṃ teṣāṃ pratiṣedho hi bhedanut
d tasmād vedasya hṛdayam advaidhyam iti viddhi tat
d vedādṛṣṭer ayaṃ lokaḥ sarvārtheṣu pravartate
d tasmāc ca smṛtayo jātāḥ setihāsāḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ
d na yan na sādhyaṃ tad brahma nādimadhyaṃ na cāntavat
d indriyāṇi sabhūtāni parā ca prakṛtir manaḥ
d ātmā ca paramaḥ śuddhaḥ prokto 'sau paramaḥ pumān
d utpattilakṣaṇaṃ cedaṃ viparītam athobhayoḥ
d yo vetti prakṛtiṃ nityaṃ tathā caivātmanas tu tām
d pradahaty eṣa karmākhyaṃ dāvodbhūta ivānalaḥ
d cinmātraparamaḥ śuddhaḥ sarvākṛtiṣu vartate
d ākāśakalpaṃ vimalaṃ nānāśaktisamanvitam
d tāpanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jyotiṣāṃ madhyamasthitim
d duḥkham āste sa nirduḥkhas tad vidvān na ca lipyati
d asāv aśnāti yadvat tad bhramaro 'śnāti yan madhu
d evam eṣa mahān ātmā nātmā tad avabudhyate
d evaṃbhūtas tvam ity atra svādhīto budhyate param
d budhasya bodhanaṃ tatra kriyate sadbhir ity uta
d na budhasyeti vai kaś cin na tathāvac chruṇuṣva me
d śokam asya na gatvā te śāstrāṇāṃ śāstradasyavaḥ
d lokaṃ nighnanti saṃbhinnā jñātino 'tra vadanty uta
d evaṃ tasya vibhoḥ kṛtyaṃ dhātur asya mahātmanaḥ
d kṣamanti te mahātmānaḥ sarvadvaṃdvavivarjitāḥ
d ato 'nyathā mahātmānam anyathā pratipadyate
d kiṃ tena na kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ coreṇātmāpahāriṇā
d tasya saṃyogayogena śucir apy aśucir bhavet
d aśuciś ca śuciś cāpi jñānād dehādayo yathā
d dṛśyaṃ na caiva dṛṣṭaṃ syād dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyaṃ tu naiva ca
d atītatritayaḥ siddho jñānarūpeṇa sarvadā
d evaṃ na pratipadyante rāgamohamadānvitāḥ
d vedabāhyā durātmānaḥ saṃsāre duḥkhabhāginaḥ
d āgamānugatajñānā buddhiyuktā bhavanti te
d buddhyā bhavati buddhyāttaṃ yad buddhaṃ cātmarūpavat
d tamasy andhe na saṃdehāt paraṃ yānti na saṃśayaḥ
d nityanaimittikān kṛtvā pāpahānim avāpya ca
d śuddhasattvā mahātmāno jñānanirdhūtakalmaṣāḥ
d asaktāḥ parivartante saṃsaranty atha vāyuvat
d na yujyante 'tha vā kleśair ahaṃbhāvodbhavaiḥ saha
d itas tataḥ samāhṛtya jñānaṃ nirvarṇayanty uta
d jñānānvitas tamo hanyād arkavat sa mahāmatiḥ
d evam ātmānam anvīkṣya nānāduḥkhasamanvitam
d dehaṃ paṅkamale magnaṃ nirmalaṃ paramārthataḥ
d tam eva sarvaduḥkhāt tu mocayet paramātmavān
d brahmacaryavratopetaḥ sarvasaṅgabahiṣkṛtaḥ
d laghvāhāro viśuddhātmā paraṃ nirvāṇam ṛcchati
d indriyāṇi mano vāyuḥ śoṇitaṃ māṃsam asthi ca
d ānupūrvyād vinaśyanti svaṃ dhātum upayānti ca
d kāraṇānugataṃ kāryaṃ yadi tac ca vinaśyati
d aliṅgasya kathaṃ liṅgaṃ yujyate tan mṛṣā dṛḍham
d na tv eva hetavaḥ santi ye ke cin mūrtisaṃsthitāḥ
d amartyasya ca martyena sāmānyaṃ nopapadyate
d lokadṛṣṭo yathā jāteḥ svedajaḥ puruṣaḥ striyām
d kṛtānusmaraṇāt siddho vedagamyaḥ paraḥ pumān
d pratyakṣānugato vedo nāmahetubhir iṣyate
d yathā śākhā hi vai śākhā taroḥ saṃbadhyate tadā
d śrutyā tathā paro 'py ātmā dṛśyate so 'py aliṅgavān
d aliṅgasādhyaṃ tad brahma bahavaḥ santi hetavaḥ
d lokayātrāvidhānaṃ ca dānadharmaphalāgamaḥ
d tadarthaṃ vedaśabdāś ca vyavahārāś ca laukikāḥ
d iti samyaṅ manasy ete bahavaḥ santi hetavaḥ
d etad astīdam astīti na kiṃ cit pratidṛśyate
d teṣāṃ vimṛśatām evaṃ tat tat samabhidhāvatām
d kva cin niviśate buddhis tatra jīryati vṛkṣavat
d evam arthair anarthaiś ca duḥkhitāḥ sarvajantavaḥ
d āgamair apakṛṣyanti hastino hastipair yathā
d na jātu kāmaḥ kāmānām upabhogena śāmyati
d haviṣā kṛṣṇavartmeva bhūya evābhivardhate
d arthāṃs tathātyantaduḥkhāvahāṃś ca
d lipsanta eke bahavo viśuṣkāḥ
d mahattaraṃ duḥkham abhiprapannā
d hitvā sukhaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ prayānti
d vināśino hy adhruvajīvitasya
d kiṃ bandhubhir mantraparigrahaiś ca
d vihāya yo gacchati sarvam eva
d kṣaṇena gatvā na nivartate ca
d khaṃ bhūmitoyānalavāyavo hi
d sadā śarīraṃ pratipālayanti
d itīdam ālakṣya kuto ratir bhaved
d vināśino hy asya na karma vidyate
d bhīṣma uvāca
d idam anupadhivākyam acchalaṃ
d paramanirāmayam ātmasākṣikam
d narapatir anuvīkṣya vismitaḥ
d punar anuyoktum idaṃ pracakrame
 bhīṣma uvāca
a janako janadevas tu jñāpitaḥ paramarṣiṇā
c punar evānupapraccha sāṃparāye bhavābhavau
a bhagavan yad idaṃ pretya saṃjñā bhavati kasya cit
c evaṃ sati kim ajñānaṃ jñānaṃ vā kiṃ kariṣyati
a sarvam ucchedaniṣṭhaṃ syāt paśya caitad dvijottama
c apramattaḥ pramatto vā kiṃ viśeṣaṃ kariṣyati
a asaṃsargo hi bhūteṣu saṃsargo vā vināśiṣu
c kasmai kriyeta kalpena niścayaḥ ko 'tra tattvataḥ
a tamasā hi praticchannaṃ vibhrāntam iva cāturam
c punaḥ praśamayan vākyaiḥ kaviḥ pañcaśikho 'bravīt
a ucchedaniṣṭhā nehāsti bhāvaniṣṭhā na vidyate
c ayaṃ hy api samāhāraḥ śarīrendriyacetasām
e vartate pṛthag anyonyam apy apāśritya karmasu
a dhātavaḥ pañcaśākho 'yaṃ khaṃ vāyur jyotir ambu bhūḥ
c te svabhāvena tiṣṭhanti viyujyante svabhāvataḥ
a ākāśaṃ vāyur ūṣmā ca sneho yac cāpi pārthivam
c eṣa pañcasamāhāraḥ śarīram iti naikadhā
d ahaṃvācyaṃ dvijānāṃ yad viśiṣṭaṃ buddhirūpavat
d vācām agocaraṃ nityaṃ jñeyam evaṃ bhaviṣyati
d jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ tathājñānaṃ trividhaṃ jñānam ucyate
e jñānam ūṣmā ca vāyuś ca trividhaḥ karmasaṃgrahaḥ
a indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca svabhāvaś cetanā manaḥ
c prāṇāpānau vikāraś ca dhātavaś cātra niḥsṛtāḥ
d prāṇādayas tathā sparśā na saṃbādhagatās tathā
d putrādhīnaṃ bhaviṣyeta cinmātraḥ sa paraḥ pumān
a śravaṇaṃ sparśanaṃ jihvā dṛṣṭir nāsā tathaiva ca
c indriyāṇīti pañcaite cittapūrvaṃgamā guṇāḥ
a tatra vijñānasaṃyuktā trividhā vedanā dhruvā
c sukhaduḥkheti yām āhur aduḥkhety asukheti ca
a śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca mūrty atha
c ete hy āmaraṇāt pañca ṣaḍguṇā jñānasiddhaye
a teṣu karmanisargaś ca sarvatattvārthaniścayaḥ
c tam āhuḥ paramaṃ śukraṃ buddhir ity avyayaṃ mahat
c   pāre ca rajasaḥ prabhum
c virāgād vartate tasmin mano rajasi nityagam
c tasmin prasanne saṃpaśyed
a imaṃ guṇasamāhāram ātmabhāvena paśyataḥ
c asamyag darśanair duḥkham anantaṃ nopaśāmyati
d tasmād eteṣu medhāvī na prasajyeta buddhimān
a anātmeti ca yad dṛṣṭaṃ tenāhaṃ na mamety api
c vartate kim adhiṣṭhānā prasaktā duḥkhasaṃtatiḥ
a tatra samyaṅ mano nāma tyāgaśāstram anuttamam
c śṛṇu yat tava mokṣāya bhāṣyamāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati
a tyāga eva hi sarveṣām uktānām api karmaṇām
c nityaṃ mithyāvinītānāṃ kleśo duḥkhāvaho mataḥ
a dravyatyāge tu karmāṇi bhogatyāge vratāny api
c sukhatyāge tapoyogaḥ sarvatyāge samāpanā
a tasya mārgo 'yam advaidhaḥ sarvatyāgasya darśitaḥ
c viprahāṇāya duḥkhasya durgatir hy anyathā bhavet
d śete jarāmṛtyubhayair vimuktaḥ
d kṣīṇe puṇye vigate ca pāpe
d taponimitte vigate ca niṣṭhe
d phale yathākāśam aliṅga eva
a pañca jñānendriyāṇy uktvā manaḥṣaṣṭhāni cetasi
c manaḥṣaṣṭhāni vakṣyāmi pañca karmendriyāṇi tu
a hastau karmendriyaṃ jñeyam atha pādau gatīndriyam
c prajanānandayoḥ śepho visarge pāyur indriyam
a vāk tu śabdaviśeṣārthaṃ gatiṃ pañcānvitāṃ viduḥ
c evam ekādaśaitāni buddhyā tv avasṛjen manaḥ
a karṇau śabdaś ca cittaṃ ca trayaḥ śravaṇasaṃgrahe
c tathā sparśe tathā rūpe tathaiva rasagandhayoḥ
d cakṣū rūpaṃ tathā cittaṃ trayo darśanasaṃgrahe
d nāsā gandhas tathā cittaṃ trayo ghrāṇasya saṃgrahe
d tvacaḥ sparśaṃ tathā cittaṃ trayaḥ sparśanasaṃgrahe
d jihvā rasas tathā cittaṃ trayo rasanasaṃgrahe
a evaṃ pañcatrikā hy ete guṇās tad upalabdhaye
c yena yas trividho bhāvaḥ paryāyāt samupasthitaḥ
a sāttviko rājasaś caiva tāmasaś caiva te trayaḥ
c trividhā vedanā yeṣu prasūtā sarvasādhanā
a praharṣaḥ prītir ānandaḥ sukhaṃ saṃśāntacittatā
c akutaś cit kutaś cid vā cittataḥ sāttviko guṇaḥ
a atuṣṭiḥ paritāpaś ca śoko lobhas tathākṣamā
c liṅgāni rajasas tāni dṛśyante hetvahetutaḥ
a avivekas tathā mohaḥ pramādaḥ svapnatandritā
c kathaṃ cid api vartante vividhās tāmasā guṇāḥ
a tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
c vartate sāttviko bhāva ity apekṣeta tat tathā
a yat tu saṃtāpasaṃyuktam aprītikaram ātmanaḥ
c pravṛttaṃ raja ity eva tatas tad abhicintayet
a atha yan mohasaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
c apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhārayet
a tad dhi śrotrāśrayaṃ bhūtaṃ śabdaḥ śrotraṃ samāśritaḥ
c nobhayaṃ śabdavijñāne vijñānasyetarasya vā
a evaṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī
c sparśe rūpe rase gandhe tāni ceto manaś ca tat
a svakarmayugapadbhāvo daśasv eteṣu tiṣṭhati
c cittam ekādaśaṃ viddhi buddhir dvādaśamī bhavet
a teṣām ayugapadbhāve ucchedo nāsti tāmasaḥ
c āsthito yugapadbhāve vyavahāraḥ sa laukikaḥ
a indriyāṇy avasṛjyāpi dṛṣṭvā pūrvaṃ śrutāgamam
c cintayan nānuparyeti tribhir evānvito guṇaiḥ
a yat tamopahataṃ cittam āśu saṃcāram adhruvam
c karoty uparamaṃ kāle tad āhus tāmasaṃ sukham
a yad yad āgamasaṃyuktaṃ na kṛtsnam upaśāmyati
c atha tatrāpy upādatte tamo vyaktam ivānṛtam
a evam eṣa prasaṃkhyātaḥ svakarmapratyayī guṇaḥ
c kathaṃ cid vartate samyak keṣāṃ cid vā na vartate
d aham ity eṣa vai bhāvo nānyatra pratitiṣṭhati
d yasya bhāvo dṛḍho nityaṃ sa vai vidvāṃs tathetaraḥ
d dehadharmas tathā nityaṃ sarvabhūteṣu vai dṛḍhaḥ
d etenaivānumānena tyājyo dharmas tathā hy asau
d jñānena mucyate jantur dharmātmā jñānavān bhavet
d dharmeṇa dhāryate lokaḥ sarvaṃ dharme pratiṣṭhitam
d sarvārthajanakaś caiva dharmaḥ sarvasya kāraṇam
d sarvo hi dṛśyate loke na sarvārthaḥ kathaṃ cana
d sarvatyāge kṛte tasmāt paramātmā prasīdati
d vyaktād avyaktam atulaṃ lokeṣu parivartate
a evam āhuḥ samāhāraṃ kṣetram adhyātmacintakāḥ
c sthito manasi yo bhāvaḥ sa vai kṣetrajña ucyate
a evaṃ sati ka ucchedaḥ śāśvato vā kathaṃ bhavet
c svabhāvād vartamāneṣu sarvabhūteṣu hetutaḥ
a yathārṇavagatā nadyo vyaktīr jahati nāma ca
c na ca svatāṃ niyacchanti tādṛśaḥ sattvasaṃkṣayaḥ
a evaṃ sati kutaḥ saṃjñā pretyabhāve punar bhavet
c pratisaṃmiśrite jīve gṛhyamāṇe ca madhyataḥ
a imāṃ tu yo veda vimokṣabuddhim
ātmānam anvicchati cāpramattaḥ
c na lipyate karmaphalair aniṣṭaiḥ
patraṃ bisasyeva jalena siktam
a dṛḍhaiś ca pāśair bahubhir vimuktaḥ
prajānimittair api daivataiś ca
c yadā hy asau sukhaduḥkhe jahāti
muktas tadāgryāṃ gatim ety aliṅgaḥ
e śrutipramāṇāgamamaṅgalaiś ca
śete jarāmṛtyubhayād atītaḥ
a kṣīṇe ca puṇye vigate ca pāpe
tatonimitte ca phale vinaṣṭe
c alepam ākāśam aliṅgam evam
āsthāya paśyanti mahad dhy asaktāḥ
a yathorṇanābhiḥ parivartamānas
tantukṣaye tiṣṭhati pātyamānaḥ
c tathā vimuktaḥ prajahāti duḥkhaṃ
vidhvaṃsate loṣṭa ivādrim arcchan
a yathā ruruḥ śṛṅgam atho purāṇaṃ
hitvā tvacaṃ vāpy urago yathāvat
c vihāya gacchaty anavekṣamāṇas
tathā vimukto vijahāti duḥkham
a drumaṃ yathā vāpy udake patantam
utsṛjya pakṣī prapataty asaktaḥ
c tathā hy asau sukhaduḥkhe vihāya
muktaḥ parārdhyāṃ gatim ety aliṅgaḥ
d imān svalokān anupaśya sarvān
d vrajan yathākāśam ivāptakāmaḥ
d imāṃ hi gāthāṃ pralapan yathāsti
d samastasaṃkalpaviśeṣamuktaḥ
d ahaṃ hi sarvaṃ kila sarvabhāve
d hy ahaṃ tadantar hy aham eva bhoktā
a api ca bhavati maithilena gītaṃ
nagaram upāhitam agninābhivīkṣya
c na khalu mama tuṣo 'pi dahyate 'tra
svayam idam āha kila sma bhūmipālaḥ
a idam amṛtapadaṃ videharājaḥ
svayam iha pañcaśikhena bhāṣyamāṇaḥ
c nikhilam abhisamīkṣya niścitārthaṃ
paramasukhī vijahāra vītaśokaḥ
a imaṃ hi yaḥ paṭhati vimokṣaniścayaṃ
na hīyate satatam avekṣate tathā
c upadravān nānubhavaty aduḥkhitaḥ
pramucyate kapilam ivaitya maithilaḥ
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d kiṃkāraṇaṃ mahāprājña dahyamānaś ca maithilaḥ
d bhīṣma uvāca
d mithilāṃ neha dharmātmā prāha vīkṣya vidāhitām
d śrūyatāṃ nṛpaśārdūla yadarthaṃ dīpitā purā
d vahninā dīpitā sā tu tan me śṛṇu mahāmate
d janako janadevas tu karmāṇy ādhāya cātmani
d sarvabhāvam anuprāpya bhāvena vicacāra saḥ
d yajan dadaṃs tathā juhvan pālayan pṛthivīm imām
d adhyātmavin mahāprājñas tanmayatvena niṣṭhitaḥ
d sa tasya hṛdi saṃkalpaṃ jñātum aicchat svayaṃ prabhuḥ
d sarvalokādhipas tatra dvijarūpeṇa saṃyutaḥ
d mithilāyāṃ mahābuddhir vyalīkaṃ kiṃ cid ācaran
d sa gṛhītvā dvijaśreṣṭhair nṛpāya prativeditaḥ
d aparādhaṃ samuddiśya taṃ rājā pratyabhāṣata
d na tvāṃ brāhmaṇa daṇḍena niyokṣyāmi kathaṃ cana
d mama rājyād vinirgaccha yāvat sīmā bhuvo mama
d tac chrutvā brāhmaṇo gatvā rājānaṃ pratyuvāca ha
d kariṣye vacanaṃ rājan bravīhi mama jānataḥ
d kā sīmā tava bhūmes tu brūhi dharmaṃ mamādya vai
d tac chrutvā maithilo rājā lajjayāvanatānanaḥ
d novāca vacanaṃ vipraṃ tattvabuddhyā samīkṣya tat
d punaḥ punaś ca taṃ vipraś codayām āsa satvaram
d brūhi rājendra gacchāmi tava rājyād vivāsitaḥ
d tato nṛpo vicāryaivam āha brāhmaṇapuṃgavam
d āvāso vā na me 'sty atra sarvā vā pṛthivī mama
d gaccha vā tiṣṭha vā brahmann iti me niścitā matiḥ
d ity uktaḥ sa tathā tena maithilena dvijottamaḥ
d abravīt taṃ mahātmānaṃ rājānaṃ mantribhir vṛtam
d tam evaṃ padmanābhasya nityaṃ pakṣapadāhitam
d aho siddhārtharūpo 'si gamiṣye svasti te 'stu vai
d ity uktvā prayayau vipras taj jijñāsur dvijottamaḥ
d adahac cāgninā tasya mithilāṃ bhagavān svayam
d pradīpyamānāṃ mithilāṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā na kampitaḥ
d janaiḥ sa paripṛṣṭas tu vākyam etad uvāca ha
d anantaṃ bata me vittaṃ bhāvyaṃ me nāsti kiṃ cana
d mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me kiṃ cana dahyate
d tad asya bhāṣamāṇasya śrutvā śrutvā hṛdi sthitam
d punaḥ saṃjīvayām āsa mithilāṃ tāṃ dvijottamaḥ
d ātmānaṃ darśayām āsa varaṃ cāsmai dadau punaḥ
d dharme tiṣṭhatu sadbhāvo buddhis te 'rthe narādhipa
d satye tiṣṭhasva nirviṇṇaḥ svasti te 'stu vrajāmy aham
d ity uktvā bhagavāṃś cainaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata
d etat te kathitaṃ rājan kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d asti kaś cid yadi vibho sadāro niyato gṛhe
d atītasarvasaṃsāraḥ sarvadvaṃdvavivarjitaḥ
d taṃ me brūhi mahāprājña durlabhaḥ puruṣo mahān
d bhīṣma uvāca
d śṛṇu rājan yathāvṛttaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ pṛṣṭavān asi
d itihāsam imaṃ śuddhaṃ saṃsārabhayabheṣajam
d devalo nāma viprarṣiḥ sarvaśāstrārthakovidaḥ
d kriyāvān dhārmiko nityaṃ devabrāhmaṇapūjakaḥ
d sutā suvarcalā nāma tasya kalyāṇalakṣaṇā
d nātihrasvā nātikṛśā nātidīrghā yaśasvinī
d pradānasamayaṃ prāptā pitā tasya hy acintayat
d asyāḥ patiḥ kuto veti brāhmaṇaḥ śrotriyaḥ paraḥ
d vidvān vipro hy akuṭumbaḥ priyavādī mahātapāḥ
d ity evaṃ cintayānaṃ taṃ rahasy āha suvarcalā
d andhāya māṃ mahāprājña dehy anandhāya vai pitaḥ
d pitovāca
d evaṃ smara sadā vidvan mamedaṃ prārthitaṃ mune
d na śakyaṃ prārthitaṃ vatse tvayādya pratibhāti me
d andhatānandhatā ceti vikāro mama jāyate
d suvarcalovāca
d unmattevāśubhaṃ vākyaṃ bhāṣase śubhalocane
d nāham unmattabhūtādya buddhipūrvaṃ bravīmi te
d vidyate cet patis tādṛk sa māṃ bharati vedavit
d yebhyas tvaṃ manyase dātuṃ mām ihānaya tān dvijān
d bhīṣma uvāca
d tādṛśaṃ taṃ patiṃ teṣu varayiṣye yathātatham
d tatheti coktvā tāṃ kanyām ṛṣiḥ śiṣyān uvāca ha
d brāhmaṇān vedasaṃpannān yonigotraviśodhitān
d mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ śuddhāñ śuddhān ācārataḥ śubhān
d arogān buddhisaṃpannāñ śīlasattvaguṇānvitān
d asaṃkīrṇāṃś ca gotreṣu vedavratasamanvitān
d brāhmaṇān snātakāñ śīghraṃ mātāpitṛsamanvitān
d niveṣṭukāmān kanyāṃ me dṛṣṭvānayata śiṣyakāḥ
d tac chrutvā tvaritāḥ śiṣyā hy āśrameṣu tatas tataḥ
d grāmeṣu ca tato gatvā brāhmaṇebhyo nyavedayan
d ṛṣeḥ prabhāvaṃ matvā te kanyāyāś ca dvijottamāḥ
d anekamunayo rājan saṃprāptā devalāśramam
d anumānya yathānyāyaṃ munīn munikumārakān
d abhyarcya vidhivat tatra kanyāṃ prāha pitā mahān
d ete 'pi munayo vatse svaputraikamatā iha
d vedavedāṅgasaṃpannāḥ kulīnāḥ śīlasaṃmatāḥ
d ye 'mī teṣu varaṃ bhadre tvam icchasi mahāvratam
d taṃ kumāraṃ vṛṇīṣvādya tasmai dāsyām ahaṃ śubhe
d tatheti coktvā kalyāṇī taptahemanibhā tadā
d sarvalakṣaṇasaṃpannā vākyam āha yaśasvinī
d viprāṇāṃ samitīr dṛṣṭvā praṇipatya tapodhanān
d yady asti samitau vipro hy andho 'nandhaḥ sa me varaḥ
d tac chrutvā munayas tatra vīkṣamāṇāḥ parasparam
d nocur viprā mahābhāgāḥ kanyāṃ matvā hy avedikām
d kutsayitvā muniṃ tatra manasā munisattamāḥ
d yathāgataṃ yayuḥ kruddhā nānādeśanivāsinaḥ
d kanyā ca saṃsthitā tatra pitṛveśmani bhāminī
d tataḥ kadā cid brahmaṇyo vidvān nyāyaviśāradaḥ
d ūhāpohavidhānajño brahmacaryasamanvitaḥ
d vedavid vedatattvajñaḥ kriyākalpaviśāradaḥ
d ātmatattvavibhāgajñaḥ pitṛmān guṇasāgaraḥ
d śvetaketur iti khyātaḥ śrutvā vṛttāntam ādarāt
d kanyārthaṃ devalaṃ cāpi śīghraṃ tatrāgato 'bhavat
d uddālakasutaṃ dṛṣṭvā śvetaketuṃ mahāvratam
d yathānyāyaṃ ca saṃpūjya devalaḥ pratyabhāṣata
d kanye eṣa mahābhāge prāpto ṛṣikumārakaḥ
d varayainaṃ mahāprājñaṃ vedavedāṅgapāragam
d tac chrutvā kupitā kanyā ṛṣiputram udaikṣata
d tāṃ kanyām āha viprarṣiḥ so 'haṃ bhadre samāgataḥ
d andho 'ham atra tattvaṃ hi tathā manye ca sarvadā
d viśālanayanaṃ viddhi tathā māṃ hīnasaṃśayam
d vṛṇīṣva māṃ varārohe bhaje ca tvām anindite
d yenedaṃ vīkṣate nityaṃ śṛṇoti spṛśate 'tha vā
d ghrāyate vakti satataṃ yenedaṃ rasayate punaḥ
d yenedaṃ manyate tattvaṃ yena budhyati vā punaḥ
d na cakṣur vidyate hy etat sa vai bhūtāndha ucyate
d yasmin pravartate cedaṃ paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśann api
d jighraṃś ca rasayaṃs tadvad vartate yena cakṣuṣā
d tan me nāsti tato hy andho vṛṇu bhadre 'dya mām ataḥ
d lokadṛṣṭyā karomīha nityanaimittikādikam
d ātmadṛṣṭyā ca tat sarvaṃ vilipyāmi ca nityaśaḥ
d sthito 'haṃ nirbharaḥ śāntaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvanaḥ
d avidyayā taran mṛtyuṃ vidyayā taṃ tathāmṛtam
d yathāprāptaṃ tu saṃdṛśya vasāmīha vimatsaraḥ
d bhīṣma uvāca
d krīte vyavasitaṃ bhadre bhartāhaṃ te vṛṇīṣva mām
d tataḥ suvarcalā dṛṣṭvā prāha taṃ dvijasattamam
d manasāsi vṛto vidvañ śeṣakartā pitā mama
d vṛṇīṣva pitaraṃ mahyam eṣa vedavidhikramaḥ
d tad vijñāya pitā tasyā devalo munisattamaḥ
d śvetaketuṃ ca saṃpūjya tathaivoddālakena tam
d munīnām agrataḥ kanyāṃ pradadau jalapūrvakam
d udāharanti vai tatra śvetaketuṃ nirīkṣya tam
d hṛtpuṇḍarīkanilayaḥ sarvabhūtātmako hariḥ
d śvetaketusvarūpeṇa sthito 'sau madhusūdanaḥ
d prīyatāṃ mādhavo devaḥ patnī ceyaṃ sutā mama
d pratipādayāmi te kanyāṃ sahadharmacarīṃ śubhām
d ity uktvā pradadau tasmai devalo munipuṃgavaḥ
d pratigṛhya ca tāṃ kanyāṃ śvetaketur mahāyaśāḥ
d upayamya yathānyāyam atra kṛtvā yathāvidhi
d samāpya tantraṃ munibhir vaivāhikam anuttamam
d sa gārhasthye vasan dhīmān bhāryāṃ tām idam abravīt
d yāni coktāni vedeṣu tat sarvaṃ kuru śobhane
d mayā saha yathānyāyaṃ sahadharmacarī mama
d aham ity eva bhāvena sthito 'haṃ tvaṃ tathaiva ca
d tasmāt karmāṇi kurvīthāḥ kuryāṃ te ca tataḥ param
d na mameti ca bhāvena jñānāgninilayena ca
d anantaraṃ tathā kuryās tāni karmāṇi bhasmasāt
d evaṃ tvayā ca kartavyaṃ sarvadādurbhagā mayā
d yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥ
d tasmāl lokasya siddhyarthaṃ kartavyaṃ cātmasiddhaye
d uktvaivaṃ sa mahāprājñaḥ sarvajñānaikabhājanaḥ
d putrān utpādya tasyāṃ ca yajñaiḥ saṃtarpya devatāḥ
d ātmayogaparo nityaṃ nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ
d bhāryāṃ tāṃ sadṛśīṃ prāpya buddhiṃ kṣetrajñayor iva
d lokam anyam anuprāptau bhāryā bhartā tathaiva ca
d sākṣibhūtau jagaty asmiṃś caramāṇau mudānvitau
d tataḥ kadā cid bhartāraṃ śvetaketuṃ suvarcalā
d papraccha ko bhavān atra brūhi me tad dvijottama
d tām āha bhagavān vāgmī tvayā jñāto na saṃśayaḥ
d dvijottameti mām uktvā punaḥ kam anupṛcchasi
d sā tam āha mahātmānaṃ pṛcchāmi hṛdi śāyinam
d tac chrutvā pratyuvācaināṃ sa na vakṣyati bhāmini
d nāmagotrasamāyuktam ātmānaṃ manyase yadi
d tan mithyāgotrasadbhāve vartate dehabandhanam
d aham ity eṣa bhāvo 'tra tvayi cāpi samāhitaḥ
d tvam apy aham ahaṃ sarvam aham ity eva vartate
d nātra tat paramārthaṃ vai kimartham anupṛcchasi
d tataḥ prahasya sā hṛṣṭā bhartāraṃ dharmacāriṇī
d uvāca vacanaṃ kāle smayamānā tadā nṛpa
d kim anekaprakāreṇa virodhena prayojanam
d kriyākalāpair brahmarṣe jñānanaṣṭo 'si sarvadā
d śvetaketur uvāca
d tan me brūhi mahāprājña yathāhaṃ tvām anuvratā
d yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥ
d vartate tena loko 'yaṃ saṃkīrṇaś ca bhaviṣyati
d saṃkīrṇe ca tathā dharme varṇaḥ saṃkaram eti ca
d saṃkare ca pravṛtte tu mātsyo nyāyaḥ pravartate
d tad aniṣṭaṃ harer bhadre dhātur asya mahātmanaḥ
d parameśvarasaṃkrīḍā lokasṛṣṭir iyaṃ śubhe
d yāvatpāṃsava uddiṣṭās tāvatyo 'sya vibhūtayaḥ
d tāvatyaś caiva māyās tu tāvatyo 'syāś ca śaktayaḥ
d evaṃ sugahvare yukto yatra me tad bhavābhavam
d chittvā jñānāsinā gacchet sa vidvān sa ca me priyaḥ
d so 'ham eva na saṃdehaḥ pratijñā iti tasya vai
d ye mūḍhās te durātmāno dharmasaṃkarakārakāḥ
d maryādābhedakā nīcā narake yānti jantavaḥ
d āsurīṃ yonim āpannā iti devānuśāsanam
d bhagavatyā tathā loke rakṣitavyaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d suvarcalovāca
d maryādālokarakṣārtham evam asmi tathā sthitaḥ
d śabdaḥ ko 'tra iti khyātas tathārthaṃ ca mahāmune
d śvetaketur uvāca
d ākṛtiṃ ca tayor brūhi lakṣaṇena pṛthak pṛthak
d vyatyayena ca varṇānāṃ parivādikṛto hi yaḥ
d sa śabda iti vijñeyas tannipāto 'rtha ucyate
d suvarcalovāca
d śabdārthayor hi saṃbandhas tv anayor asti vā na vā
d śvetaketur uvāca
d tan me brūhi yathātattvaṃ śabdasthāne 'rtha eva cet
d śabdārthayor na caivāsti saṃbandho 'tyanta eva hi
d suvarcalovāca
d puṣkare ca yathā toyaṃ tathāstīti ca vettha tat
d arthe sthitir hi śabdasya nānyathā ca sthitir bhavet
d śvetaketur uvāca
d vidyate cen mahāprājña vinārthaṃ brūhi sattama
d sasaṃsargo 'timātras tu vācakatvena vartate
d asti ced vartate nityaṃ vikāroccāraṇena vai
d suvarcalovāca
d śabdasthāno 'tra ity uktas tathārtha iti me kṛtam
d śvetaketur uvāca
d arthāsthito na tiṣṭhec ca virūḍham iha bhāṣitam
d na vikūlo 'tra kathito nākāśaṃ hi vinā jagat
d suvarcalovāca
d saṃbandhas tatra nāsty eva tadvad ity eṣa manyatām
d sadāhaṃkāraśabdo 'yaṃ vyaktam ātmani saṃśritaḥ
d śvetaketur uvāca
d na vācas tatra vartante iti mithyā bhaviṣyati
d ahaṃśabdo hy ahaṃbhāve nātmabhāve śubhavrate
d suvarcalovāca
d na vartate pare 'cintye vācaḥ saguṇalakṣaṇāḥ
d ahaṃ gātraikataḥ śyāmā bhavān api tathaiva ca
d tan me brūhi yathānyāyam evaṃ cen munisattama
d śvetaketur uvāca
d mṛnmaye hi ghaṭe bhāvas tādṛg bhāva iheṣyate
d ayaṃ bhāvaḥ pare 'cintye hy ātmabhāvo yathā ca mṛt
d ahaṃ tvam etad ity eva pare saṃkalpanāma tat
d tasmād vāco na vartante iti naiva virudhyate
d tasmād vāmena vartante manasā bhīru sarvaśaḥ
d yathākāśagataṃ viśvaṃ saṃsaktam iva lakṣyate
d saṃsarge sati saṃbandhāt tadvikāraṃ bhaviṣyati
d anākāśagataṃ sarvaṃ vikāre ca sadā gatam
d tad brahma paramaṃ śuddham anaupamyaṃ na śakyate
d na dṛśyate tathā tac ca dṛśyate ca matir mama
d suvarcalovāca
d nirvikāraṃ hy amūrtiṃ ca nirayaṃ sarvagaṃ tathā
d śvetaketur uvāca
d dṛśyate ca viyan nityaṃ dṛgātmā tena dṛśyate
d tvacā spṛśati vai vāyum ākāśasthaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
d tatsthaṃ gandhaṃ tathāghrāti jyotiḥ paśyati cakṣuṣā
d tamoraśmiguṇaś caiva meghajālaṃ tathaiva ca
d varṣaṃ tārāgaṇaṃ caiva nākāśaṃ dṛśyate punaḥ
d ākāśasyāpy athākāśaṃ sadrūpam iti niścitam
d tadarthe kalpitā hy ete tatsatyo viṣṇur eva ca
d yāni nāmāni gauṇāni hy upacārāt parātmani
d na cakṣuṣā na manasā na cānyena paro vibhuḥ
d cintyate sūkṣmayā buddhyā vācā vaktuṃ na śakyate
d etat prapannam akhilaṃ tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
d mahāghaṭo 'lpakaś caiva yathā mahyāṃ pratiṣṭhitau
d na ca strī na pumāṃś caiva yathaiva na napuṃsakaḥ
d kevalajñānamātraṃ tat tasmin sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
d bhūmisaṃsthānayogena vastusaṃsthānayogataḥ
d rasabhedā yathā toye prakṛtyām ātmanas tathā
d tadvākyasmaraṇān nityaṃ tṛptiṃ vāri pibann iva
d suvarcalovāca
d prāpnoti jñānam akhilaṃ tena tat sukham edhate
d anena sādhyaṃ kiṃ syād bai śabdeneti matir mama
d vedagamyaḥ paro 'cintya iti paurāṇikā viduḥ
d nirarthako yathā loke tadvat syād iti me matiḥ
d śvetaketur uvāca
d nirīkṣyaivaṃ yathānyāyaṃ vaktum arhasi me 'nagha
d vedagamyaṃ paraṃ śuddham iti satyā parā śrutiḥ
d vyāvṛttyā naitad ity āha upaliṅge ca vartate
d nirarthako na caivāsti śabdo laukika uttame
d ananvayāḥ smṛtāḥ śabdā nirarthā iti laukikaiḥ
d gṛhyante tadvad ity eva na vartante parātmani
d agocaratvaṃ vacasāṃ yuktam evaṃ tathā śubhe
d sādhanasyopadeśāc ca hy upāyasya ca sūcanāt
d upalakṣaṇayogena vyāvṛttyā ca pradarśanāt
d vedagamyaḥ paraḥ śuddha iti me dhīyate matiḥ
d adhyātmadhyānasaṃbhūtam abhūtaṃ bhūtavat sphuṭam
d jñānaṃ viddhi śubhācāre tena yānti parāṃ gatim
d yadi me vyāhṛtaṃ guhyaṃ śrutaṃ na tu tvayā śubhe
d tathyam ity eva vā śuddhe jñānaṃ jñānavilocane
d nānārūpavad asyaivam aiśvaryaṃ dṛśyate śubhe
d na vāyus tan na sūryas tan nāgnis tat tu paraṃ padam
d anena pūrṇam etad dhi hṛdi bhūtam iheṣyate
d etāvad ātmavijñānam etāvad yad ahaṃ smṛtam
d bhīṣma uvāca
d āvayor na ca sattve vai tasmād ajñānabandhanam
d evaṃ suvarcalā hṛṣṭā proktā bhartrā yathārthavat
d paricaryamāṇā hy aniśaṃ tattvabuddhisamanvitā
d bhartā ca tām anuprekṣya nityanaimittikānvitaḥ
d paramātmani govinde vāsudeve mahātmani
d samādhāya ca karmāṇi tanmayatvena bhāvitaḥ
d kālena mahatā rājan prāpnoti paramāṃ gatim
d etat te kathitaṃ rājan yasmāt tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
d gārhasthyaṃ ca samāsthāya gatau jāyāpatī param
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃ kurvan sukham āpnoti kiṃ kurvan duḥkham āpnute
c kiṃ kurvan nirbhayo loke siddhaś carati bhārata
 bhīṣma uvāca
a damam eva praśaṃsanti vṛddhāḥ śrutisamādhayaḥ
c sarveṣām eva varṇānāṃ brāhmaṇasya viśeṣataḥ
a nādāntasya kriyāsiddhir yathāvad upalabhyate
c kriyā tapaś ca vedāś ca dame sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
a damas tejo vardhayati pavitraṃ dama ucyate
c vipāpmā nirbhayo dāntaḥ puruṣo vindate mahat
a sukhaṃ dāntaḥ prasvapiti sukhaṃ ca pratibudhyate
c sukhaṃ loke viparyeti manaś cāsya prasīdati
a tejo damena dhriyate na tat tīkṣṇo 'dhigacchati
c amitrāṃś ca bahūn nityaṃ pṛthag ātmani paśyati
a kravyādbhya iva bhūtānām adāntebhyaḥ sadā bhayam
c teṣāṃ vipratiṣedhārthaṃ rājā sṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃbhuvā
a āśrameṣu ca sarveṣu dama eva viśiṣyate
b dharmaḥ saṃrakṣyate tais tu yatas te dharmasetavaḥ
c yac ca teṣu phalaṃ dharme bhūyo dānte tad ucyate
a teṣāṃ liṅgāni vakṣyāmi yeṣāṃ samudayo damaḥ
c akārpaṇyam asaṃrambhaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ śraddadhānatā
a akrodha ārjavaṃ nityaṃ nātivādo na mānitā
c gurupūjānasūyā ca dayā bhūteṣv apaiśunam
a janavādamṛṣāvādastutinindāvivarjanam
c sādhukāmaś cāspṛhayann āyāti pratyayaṃ nṛṣu
a avairakṛt sūpacāraḥ samo nindāpraśaṃsayoḥ
c suvṛttaḥ śīlasaṃpannaḥ prasannātmātmavān budhaḥ
e prāpya loke ca satkāraṃ svargaṃ vai pretya gacchati
f durgamaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ prāpya yan modate sukhī
a sarvabhūtahite yukto na smayād dveṣṭi vai janam
c mahāhrada ivākṣobhya prajñātṛptaḥ prasīdati
a abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sarveṣām abhayaṃ yataḥ
c namasyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dānto bhavati jñānavān
a na hṛṣyati mahaty arthe vyasane ca na śocati
c sa vai parimitaprajñaḥ sa dānto dvija ucyate
a karmabhiḥ śrutasaṃpannaḥ sadbhir ācaritaiḥ śubhaiḥ
c sadaiva damasaṃyuktas tasya bhuṅkte mahat phalam
a anasūyā kṣamā śāntiḥ saṃtoṣaḥ priyavāditā
c satyaṃ dānam anāyāso naiṣa mārgo durātmanām
d kāmakrodhau ca lobhaś ca parasyerṣyā vikatthanā
d dambho darpaś ca mānaś ca naiṣa mārgo mahātmanām
d atuṣṭir anṛtaṃ moha eṣa mārgo durātmanām
a kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā brahmacārī jitendriyaḥ
c vikramya ghore tapasi brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
e kālākāṅkṣī carel lokān nirapāya ivātmavān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dvijātayo vratopetā yad idaṃ bhuñjate haviḥ
c annaṃ brāhmaṇakāmāya katham etat pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a avedoktavratopetā bhuñjānāḥ kāryakāriṇaḥ
c vedokteṣu ca bhuñjānā vrataluptā yudhiṣṭhira
d upetavrataśaucā ye bhuñjante brāhmaṇāḥ kva cit
d tad annam amṛtaṃ bhūtvā yajamānaṃ prapadyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yad idaṃ tapa ity āhur upavāsaṃ pṛthagjanāḥ
c etat tapo mahārāja utāho kiṃ tapo bhavet
 bhīṣma uvāca
a māsapakṣopavāsena manyante yat tapo janāḥ
c ātmatantropaghātaḥ sa na tapas tat satāṃ matam
e tyāgaś ca sannatiś caiva śiṣyate tapa uttamam
a sadopavāsī ca bhaved brahmacārī sadaiva ca
c muniś ca syāt sadā vipro daivataṃ ca sadā bhajet
a kuṭumbiko dharmakāmaḥ sadāsvapnaś ca bhārata
c amāṃsāśī sadā ca syāt pavitraṃ ca sadā japet
a amṛtāśī sadā ca syān na ca syād viṣabhojanaḥ
c vighasāśī sadā ca syāt sadā caivātithipriyaḥ
d śraddadhānaḥ sadā ca syād daivatadvijapūjakaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ sadopavāsī syād brahmacārī kathaṃ bhavet
c vighasāśī kathaṃ ca syāt sadā caivātithipriyaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a antarā prātarāśaṃ ca sāyamāśaṃ tathaiva ca
c sadopavāsī ca bhaved yo na bhuṅkte kathaṃ cana
a bhāryāṃ gacchan brahmacārī ṛtau bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ
c ṛtavādī sadā ca syāj jñānanityaś ca yo naraḥ
a abhakṣayan vṛthāmāṃsam amāṃsāśī bhavaty uta
c dānanityaḥ pavitraś ca asvapnaś ca divāsvapan
a bhṛtyātithiṣu yo bhuṅkte bhuktavatsu sadā sa ha
c amṛtaṃ sakalaṃ bhuṅkta iti viddhi yudhiṣṭhira
a abhuktavatsu nāśnānaḥ satataṃ yas tu vai dvijaḥ
b adattvā yo 'tithibhyo 'nnaṃ na bhuṅkte so 'tithipriyaḥ
b adattvānnaṃ daivatebhyo yo na bhuṅkte sa daivatam
c abhojanena tenāsya jitaḥ svargo bhavaty uta
a devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca bhṛtyebhyo 'tithibhiḥ saha
c avaśiṣṭaṃ tu yo 'śnāti tam āhur vighasāśinam
a teṣāṃ lokā hy aparyantāḥ sadane brahmaṇā saha
c upasthitāś cāpsarobhiḥ pariyānti divaukasaḥ
a devatābhiś ca ye sārdhaṃ pitṛbhiś copabhuñjate
c ramante putrapautraiś ca teṣāṃ gatir anuttamā
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d ke cid āhur dvidhā loke tridhā rājann anekadhā
d na pratyayo na cānyac ca dṛśyate brahma naiva tat
d nānāvidhāni śāstrāṇi yuktāś caiva pṛthagvidhāḥ
d bhīṣma uvāca
d kim adhiṣṭhāya tiṣṭhāmi tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d sve sve yuktā mahātmānaḥ śāstreṣu prabhaviṣṇavaḥ
d vartante paṇḍitā loke ko vidvān kaś ca paṇḍitaḥ
d sarveṣāṃ tattvam ajñāya yathāruci tathā bhavet
d asminn arthe purābhūtam itihāsaṃ purātanam
d mahāvivādasaṃyuktam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
d himavatpārśva āsīnā ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
d ṣaṇṇāṃ tāni sahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāṃ gaṇam āhitam
d tatra ke cid dhruvaṃ viśvaṃ seśvaraṃ tu nirīśvaram
d prākṛtaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāsti sarvaṃ naivam idaṃ jagat
d anena cāpare viprāḥ svabhāvaṃ karma cāpare
d pauruṣaṃ karma daivaṃ ca yat svabhāvādir eva tam
d nānāhetuśatair yuktā nānāśāstrapravartakāḥ
d svabhāvād brāhmaṇā rājañ jigīṣantaḥ parasparam
d tatas tu mūlam udbhūtaṃ vādipratyarthisaṃyutam
d pātradaṇḍavighātaṃ ca valkalājinavāsasām
d eke manyusamāpannās tataḥ śāntā dvijottamāḥ
d vasiṣṭham abruvan sarve tvaṃ no brūhi sanātanam
d nāhaṃ jānāmi viprendrāḥ pratyuvāca sa tān prabhuḥ
d te sarve sahitā viprā nāradam ṛṣim abruvan
d tvaṃ no brūhi mahābhāga tattvavic ca bhavān asi
d nāhaṃ dvijā vijānāmi kva hi gacchāma saṃgatāḥ
d iti tān āha bhagavāṃs tataḥ prāha ca sa dvijān
d ko vidvān iha loke 'sminn amoho 'mṛtam adbhutam
d tac ca te śuśruvur vākyaṃ brāhmaṇā hy aśarīriṇaḥ
d sanaddhāma dvijā gatvā pṛcchadhvaṃ sa ca vakṣyati
d tam āha kaś cid dvijavaryasattamo
d vibhāṇḍako maṇḍitavedarāśiḥ
d kas tvaṃ bhavān arthavibhedamadhye
d na dṛśyase vākyam udīrayaṃś ca
d athāhedaṃ taṃ bhagavān sanantaṃ
d mahāmune viddhi māṃ paṇḍito 'si
d ṛṣiṃ purāṇaṃ satataikarūpaṃ
d yam akṣayaṃ vedavido vadanti
d punas tam āhedam asau mahātmā
d svarūpasaṃsthaṃ vada āha pārtha
d tvam eko 'smadṛṣipuṃgavādya
d na satsvarūpam atha vā punaḥ kim
d athāha gambhīratarānuvādaṃ
d vākyaṃ mahātmā hy aśarīra ādiḥ
d na te mune śrotramukhe 'pi cāsyaṃ
d na pādahastau prapadātmake na
d bruvan munīn satyam atho nirīkṣya
d svam āha vidvān manasā nigamya
d ṛṣe kathaṃ vākyam idaṃ bravīṣi
d na cāsya mantā na ca vidyate cet
d na śuśruvus tatas tat tu prativākyaṃ dvijottamāḥ
d nirīkṣamāṇā ākāśaṃ prahasantas tatas tataḥ
d āścaryam iti matvā te yayur haimaṃ mahāgirim
d sanatkumārasaṃkāśaṃ sagaṇā munisattamāḥ
d taṃ parvataṃ samāruhya dadṛśur dhyānam āśritāḥ
d kumāraṃ devam arhantaṃ vedapārāvivarjitam
d tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe prakṛtisthaṃ mahāmunim
d sanatkumāraṃ rājendra praṇipatya dvijāḥ sthitāḥ
d āgatān bhagavān āha jñānanirdhūtakalmaṣaḥ
d jñātaṃ mayā munigaṇā vākyaṃ tad aśarīriṇaḥ
d kāryam adya yathākāmaṃ pṛcchadhvaṃ munipuṃgavāḥ
d tam abruvan prāñjalayo mahāmuniṃ
d dvijottamaṃ jñānanidhiṃ sunirmalam
d kathaṃ vayaṃ jñānanidhiṃ vareṇyaṃ
d yakṣyāmahe viśvarūpaṃ kumāra
d prasīda no bhagavañ jñānaleśaṃ
d madhuprayātāya sukhāya santaḥ
d yat tat padaṃ viśvarūpaṃ mahāmune
d tatra brūhi kiṃ kutra mahānubhāva
d sa tair viyukto bhagavān mahātmā
d yo 'saṃgavān satyavit tac chṛṇuṣva
d anekasāhasrakaleṣu caiva
d prasannadhātuṃ ca śubhājñayā sat
d yathāha pūrvaṃ yuṣmāsu hy aśarīrī dvijottamāḥ
d tathaiva vākyaṃ tat satyam ajānantaś ca kīrtitam
d śṛṇudhvaṃ paramaṃ kāraṇam asti 
katham avagamyate 
ahany ahani
d pākaviśeṣo dṛśyate 
tena miśraṃ sarvaṃ miśrayate  yathā
d maṇḍalī dṛśi sarveṣām asti nidarśanam 
asti cakṣuṣmatām asti
d jñāne svarūpaṃ paśyati 
yathā darpaṇāntarnidarśanam 
sa eva sarvaṃ
d vidvān na bibheti na gacchati 
kutrāhaṃ kasya nāhaṃ kenety avartamāno
d vijānāti  sa yugato vyāpī 
sa pṛthak sthitaḥ 
d tad aparamārtham 
yathā vāyur ekaḥ san bahudheritaḥ 
āśrayaviśeṣo
d vā yasyāśrayo vā 
yathāvad dvije mṛge vyāghre ca 
manuje veṇu saṃśrayo
d bhidyate vāyur athaikaḥ 
ātmā tathāsau paramātmāsāv anya
d iva bhāti  evam ātmā sa eva gacchati 
sarvam ātmā paśyañ
d śṛṇoti na jighrati na bhāṣate 
d cakre 'sya taṃ mahātmānaṃ parito daśa raśmayaḥ
d viniṣkramya yathā sūryam anugacchati taṃ prabhum
d dine dine 'stam abhyeti punar udgacchate diśaḥ
d tāv ubhau na ravau cāstāṃ tathā vitta śarīriṇam
d patite vitta viprendrāḥ bhakṣaṇe caraṇe paraḥ
d ūrdhvam ekas tathādhastād ekas tiṣṭhati cāparaḥ
d hiraṇyasadanaṃ jñeyaṃ sametya paramaṃ padam
d ātmanā hy ātmadīpaṃ tam ātmani hy ātmapūruṣam
d saṃcitaṃ saṃcitaṃ pūrvaṃ bhramaro vartate bhraman
d yo 'bhimānīva jānāti na muhyati na hīyate
d na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaś canainaṃ
d hṛdā manīṣā paśyati rūpam asya
d na śuklaṃ na kṛṣṇaṃ paramārthabhāvaṃ
d guhāśayaṃ jñānadevīkarastham
d brāhmaṇasya na sādṛśye vartate so 'pi kiṃ punaḥ
d ijyate yas tu mantreṇa yajamāno dvijottamaḥ
d naiva dharmī na cādharmī dvaṃdvātīto vimatsaraḥ
d jñānatṛptaḥ sukhaṃ śete hy amṛtātmā na saṃśayaḥ
d evam eṣa jagatsṛṣṭiṃ kurute māyayā prabhuḥ
d na jānāti virūḍhātmā kāraṇaṃ cātmano hy asau
d dhyātā draṣṭā tathā mantā boddhā dṛṣṭān sa eva saḥ
d ko vidvān paramātmānam anantaṃ lokabhāvanam
d yat tu śakyaṃ mayā proktaṃ gacchadhvaṃ munipuṃgavāḥ
d bhīṣma uvāca
d evaṃ praṇamya viprendrā jñānasāgarasaṃbhavam
d sanatkumāraṃ saṃdṛṣṭvā jagmus te ruciraṃ punaḥ
d tasmāt tvam api kaunteya jñānayogaparo bhava
d jñānam eva mahārāja sarvaduḥkhavināśanam
d idaṃ mahāduḥkhasamākarāṇāṃ
d nṛṇāṃ paritrāṇavinirmitaṃ purā
d purāṇapuṃsā ṛṣiṇā mahātmanā
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d mahāmunīnāṃ pravareṇa tad dhruvam
d yad idaṃ tapa ity āhuḥ kiṃ tapaḥ saṃprakīrtitam
d upavāsam athānyat tu vedācāram atho nu kim
d bhīṣma uvāca
d śāstraṃ tapo mahāprājña tan me brūhi pitāmaha
d pakṣamāsopavāsādīn manyante vai tapodhanāḥ
d vedavratādīni tapaḥ apare vedapāragāḥ
d vedapārāyaṇaṃ cānye cāhus tattvam athāpare
d yathāvihitam ācāras tapaḥ sarvaṃ vrataṃ gatāḥ
d ātmavidyāvidhānaṃ yat tat tapaḥ parikīrtitam
d tyāgas tapas tathā śāntis tapa indriyanigrahaḥ
d brahmacaryaṃ tapaḥ proktam āhur evaṃ dvijātayaḥ
d sadopavāso yo vidvān brahmacārī sadā bhavet
d yo muniś ca sadā dhīmān vighasāśī vimatsaraḥ
d tatas tv anantam apy āhur yo nityam atithipriyaḥ
d nāntarāśīs tato nityam upavāsī mahāvrataḥ
d ṛtugāmī tathā prokto vighasāśī smṛto budhaiḥ
d bhṛtyaśeṣaṃ tu yo bhuṅkte yajñaśeṣaṃ tathāmṛtam
d evaṃ nānārthasaṃyogaṃ tapaḥ śaśvad udāhṛtam
d keṣāṃ lokā hy aparyantāḥ sarve satyavrate sthitāḥ
d ye 'pi karmamayaṃ prāhus te dvijā brāhmaṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
d ramante divyabhogaiś ca pūjitā hy apsarogaṇaiḥ
d jñānātmakaṃ tapaḥśabdaṃ ye vadanti viniścitāḥ
d te hy antarātmasadbhāvaṃ prapannā nṛpasattama
d etat te nṛpaśārdūla proktaṃ yat pṛṣṭavān asi
d yathāvastūni saṃjñāni vividhāni bhavanty uta
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d pitāmaha mahāprājña rājādhīnā nṛpāḥ punaḥ
d anyāni ca sahasrāṇi nāmāni vividhāni ca
d pratiyogīni vai teṣāṃ channāny astamitāni ca
d dṛḍhaṃ sarvaṃ prākṛtakam idaṃ sarvatra paśya vai
d bhīṣma uvāca
d tasmād yathāgataṃ rājan yathāruci nṛṇāṃ bhavet
d asminn arthe purāvṛttaṃ śṛṇu rājan yudhiṣṭhira
d brāhmaṇānāṃ samūhe tu yad uvāca suvarcalā
d devalasya sutā vidvan sarvalakṣaṇaśobhitā
d kanyā suvarcalā nāma yogabhāvitacetanā
d hetunā kena jātā sā nirdvaṃdvā naṣṭasaṃśayā
d sābravīt pitaraṃ vipraṃ varānveṣaṇatatparā
d andhāya māṃ mahāprājña dehi vīkṣya sulocanam
d pitovāca
d evaṃ sma ca pitaḥ śaśvan mayedaṃ prārthitaṃ mune
d na śakyaṃ prārthituṃ vatse tvayādya pratibhāti me
d andhatānandhatā ceti vicāro mama jāyate
d kanyovāca
d unmatteva sute vākyaṃ bhāṣase pṛthulocane
d nāham unmattabhūtādya buddhipūrvaṃ bravīmi te
d viddhi vai tādṛśaṃ loke sa māṃ bhajati vedavit
d yān yāṃs tvaṃ manyase dātuṃ māṃ dvijottama tān iha
d ānayānyān mahābhāga hy ahaṃ drakṣyāmi teṣu tam
d tatheti coktvā tāṃ vipraḥ preṣayām āsa śiṣyakān
d ṛṣeḥ prabhāvaṃ dṛṣṭvā te kanyāyāś ca dvijottamāḥ
d anekamunayo rājan saṃprāptā devalāśramam
d tān āgatān athābhyarcya kanyām āha pitā mahān
d yadīcchasi varaṃ bhadre taṃ vipraṃ varaya svayam
d tatheti coktvā kalyāṇī taptahemanibhānanā
d karasaṃmitamadhyāṅgī vākyam āha tapodhanāḥ
d yady asti saṃmato vipro hy andho 'nandhaḥ sa me varaḥ
d nocur viprā mahābhāgāṃ prativākyaṃ yayuś ca te
d kanyā ca tiṣṭhatām atra pitur veśmani bhārata
d śvetaketuḥ kahālasya śyālaḥ paramadharmavit
d śrutvā brahmā tadāgamya kanyām āha mahīpate
d so 'haṃ bhadre samāvṛttas tvayokto yaḥ purā dvijaḥ
d suvarcalovāca
d viśālanayanaṃ viddhi mām andho 'haṃ vṛṇīṣva mām
d kathaṃ viśālanetro 'si kathaṃ vā tvam alocanaḥ
d dvija uvāca
d brūhi paścād ahaṃ vidvan parīkṣe tvāṃ dvijottama
d pratiyogīni nāmāni channāny astamitāni ca
d śabde sparśe tathā rūpe rase gandhe sahetukam
d na me pravartate ceto na pratyakṣaṃ hi teṣu me
d alocano 'haṃ tasmād dhi na gatir vidyate yataḥ
d yena paśyati suśroṇi bhāṣate spṛśate punaḥ
d bhujyate ghrāyate nityaṃ śṛṇoti manute tathā
d tac cakṣur vidyate mahyaṃ yena paśyati vai sphuṭam
d sulocano 'haṃ bhadre vai pṛccha vā kiṃ vadāmi te
d sarvam asmin na me 'vidyā vidvān hi paramārthataḥ
d sā viśuddhā tato bhūtvā śvetaketuṃ mahāmunim
d praṇamya pūjayām āsa tāṃ bhāryāṃ sa ca labdhavān
d vairāgyasaṃyutā kanyā tādṛśaṃ patim uttamam
d prāptā rājan mahāprājña tasmād arthaḥ pṛthak pṛthak
d etat te kathitaṃ rājan kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yad idaṃ karma loke 'smiñ śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
c puruṣaṃ yojayaty eva phalayogena bhārata
a kartā svit tasya puruṣa utāho neti saṃśayaḥ
c etad icchāmi tattvena tvattaḥ śrotuṃ pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c prahrādasya ca saṃvādam indrasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
a asaktaṃ dhūtapāpmānaṃ kule jātaṃ bahuśrutam
c astambham anahaṃkāraṃ sattvasthaṃ samaye ratam
a tulyanindāstutiṃ dāntaṃ śūnyāgāraniveśanam
c carācarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ viditaprabhavāpyayam
a akrudhyantam ahṛṣyantam apriyeṣu priyeṣu ca
c kāñcane vātha loṣṭe vā ubhayoḥ samadarśanam
a ātmaniḥśreyasajñāne dhīraṃ niścitaniścayam
c parāvarajñaṃ bhūtānāṃ sarvajñaṃ samadarśanam
d avyaktātmani govinde vāsudeve mahātmani
d hṛdayena samāviṣṭaṃ sarvabhāvapriyaṃkaram
d bhaktaṃ bhāgavataṃ nityaṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇam
d dhyāyantaṃ paramātmānaṃ hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutam
a śakraḥ prahrādam āsīnam ekānte saṃyatendriyam
c bubhutsamānas tat prajñām abhigamyedam abravīt
a yaiḥ kaiś cit saṃmato loke guṇaiḥ syāt puruṣo nṛṣu
c bhavaty anapagān sarvāṃs tān guṇāṃl lakṣayāmahe
a atha te lakṣyate buddhiḥ samā bālajanair iha
c ātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ sañ śreyaḥ kim iha manyase
a baddhaḥ pāśaiś cyutaḥ sthānād dviṣatāṃ vaśam āgataḥ
c śriyā vihīnaḥ prahrāda śocitavye na śocasi
a prajñālābhāt tu daiteya utāho dhṛtimattayā
c prahrāda svastharūpo 'si paśyan vyasanam ātmanaḥ
a iti saṃcoditas tena dhīro niścitaniścayaḥ
c uvāca ślakṣṇayā vācā svāṃ prajñām anuvarṇayan
a pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca bhūtānāṃ yo na budhyate
c tasya stambho bhaved bālyān nāsti stambho 'nupaśyataḥ
d gahanaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhyeyaṃ nityaṃ sanātanam
d anigraham anaupamyaṃ sarvākāraṃ parātparam
d sarvāvaraṇasaṃbhūtaṃ tasmād etat pravartate
d tanmayā api saṃpaśya nānālakṣaṇalakṣitāḥ
d sa vai pāti jagatsraṣṭā viṣṇur ity abhiśabditaḥ
d punar darśati saṃprāpte  sureśvaraḥ sic
a svabhāvāt saṃpravartante nivartante tathaiva ca
c sarve bhāvās tathābhāvāḥ puruṣārtho na vidyate
a puruṣārthasya cābhāve nāsti kaś cit svakārakaḥ
c svayaṃ tu kurvatas tasya jātu māno bhaved iha
a yas tu kartāram ātmānaṃ manyate sādhvasādhunoḥ
c tasya doṣavatī prajñā svamūrtyajñeti me matiḥ
a yadi syāt puruṣaḥ kartā śakrātmaśreyase dhruvam
c ārambhās tasya sidhyeran na ca jātu parābhavet
a aniṣṭasya hi nirvṛttir anivṛttiḥ priyasya ca
c lakṣyate yatamānānāṃ puruṣārthas tataḥ kutaḥ
a aniṣṭasyābhinirvṛttim iṣṭasaṃvṛttim eva ca
c aprayatnena paśyāmaḥ keṣāṃ cit tat svabhāvataḥ
a pratirūpadharāḥ ke cid dṛśyante buddhisattamāḥ
c virūpebhyo 'lpabuddhibhyo lipsamānā dhanāgamam
a svabhāvapreritāḥ sarve niviśante guṇā yadā
c śubhāśubhās tadā tatra tasya kiṃ mānakāraṇam
a svabhāvād eva tat sarvam iti me niścitā matiḥ
c ātmapratiṣṭhitā prajñā mama nāsti tato 'nyathā
a karmajaṃ tv iha manye 'haṃ phalayogaṃ śubhāśubham
c karmaṇāṃ viṣayaṃ kṛtsnam ahaṃ vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
a yathā vedayate kaś cid odanaṃ vāyaso vadan
c evaṃ sarvāṇi karmāṇi svabhāvasyaiva lakṣaṇam
a vikārān eva yo veda na veda prakṛtiṃ parām
c tasya stambho bhaved bālyān nāsti stambho 'nupaśyataḥ
a svabhāvabhāvino bhāvān sarvān eveha niścaye
c budhyamānasya darpo vā māno vā kiṃ kariṣyati
a veda dharmavidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ bhūtānāṃ cāpy anityatām
c tasmāc chakra na śocāmi sarvaṃ hy evedam antavat
a nirmamo nirahaṃkāro nirīho muktabandhanaḥ
c svastho 'vyapetaḥ paśyāmi bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayau
a kṛtaprajñasya dāntasya vitṛṣṇasya nirāśiṣaḥ
c nāyāso vidyate śakra paśyato lokavidyayā
a prakṛtau ca vikāre ca na me prītir na ca dviṣe
c dveṣṭāraṃ na ca paśyāmi yo mamādya mamāyate
a nordhvaṃ nāvāṅ na tiryak ca na kva cic chakra kāmaye
c na vijñāne na vijñeye nājñāne śarma vidyate
 śakra uvāca
a yenaiṣā labhyate prajñā yena śāntir avāpyate
c prabrūhi tam upāyaṃ me samyak prahrāda pṛcchate
 prahrāda uvāca
a ārjavenāpramādena prasādenātmavattayā
c vṛddhaśuśrūṣayā śakra puruṣo labhate mahat
a svabhāvāl labhate prajñāṃ śāntim eti svabhāvataḥ
c svabhāvād eva tat sarvaṃ yat kiṃ cid anupaśyasi
d naivāntaraṃ vijānāti śrutvā gurumukhāt tataḥ
d vākyaṃ vākyārthavijñānam ālokya manasā yatiḥ
d vivekapratyayāpannam ātmānam anupaśyati
d virajyati tato bhītyā parameśvaram ṛcchati
d trātāraṃ sarvaduḥkhānāṃ tat sukhānveṣaṇaṃ yathā
d karoti sadbhiḥ saṃsargamalaṃ santaḥ sukhāya vai
d satāṃ sakāśād ājñāya mārgaṃ lakṣaṇavattayā
d sarvasaṅgavinirmuktaḥ paramātmānam ṛcchati
d viṣayecchākṛto dharmaṃrmaḥ sarajasko bhayāvahaḥ
d dharmahānim avāpnoti kramāt tena naraḥ punaḥ
d bhaktihīno bhavaty eva paramātmani cācyuta
d vācake vāpi ca sthānaṃ na hanty eva vimocitaḥ
d sārkṣye sic
cāsya ratir nityaṃ saṃsāre ca ratir bhavet
d tasya nityam avijñānād ātmā caiva na sidhyati
d unmattavṛttir bhavati kramād evaṃ pravartate
d āśaucaṃ vardhate nityaṃ na śāmyati kathaṃ cana
d viṣaye cānvitasyāsya mokṣavāñchā na jāyate
d hetvābhāseṣu saṃlīnaḥ stauti vaiṣayikān guṇān
d na śāstrāṇi śṛṇoty eva mānadarpasamanvitaḥ
d svataḥsiddhaṃ na bhogas taṃ svataḥsiddhaṃ na vetti ca
d cidrūpadhāraṇaṃ caiva paraṃ vastu athāvyayam
d nānāyonigatas tena bhrāmyamāṇaḥ svakarmabhiḥ
d tīrṇapāraṃ na jānāti mahāmohasamanvitaḥ
d ācāryasaṃśrayād vidyād vinayaṃ samupāgataḥ
d anukūleṣu dharmeṣu cinoty enaṃ tatas tataḥ
d ācārya iti ca khyātas tenāsau balavṛtrahan
d niyatenaiva sadbhāvas tena janmāntarādiṣu
d karmasaṃcayatūlaughaḥ kṣipyate jñānavāyunā
d evaṃ yuktasamācāraḥ saṃsāravinivartakaḥ
d anukūlavṛttiṃ satataṃ chinatty eva bhṛgur yathā
d yena cāyaṃ samāpanno vaitṛṣṇyaṃ nādhigacchati
d abhyantaraḥ smṛtaḥ śakra tatsāmyaṃ parivarjayet
d prathamaṃ tatkṛtenaiva karmaṇā parimṛgacchati
d dvitīyaṃ svapnayogaṃ ca karmaṇā parigacchati
d etair akṣaiḥ samāpannaḥ pratyakṣo 'sau samāsthitaḥ
d suṣuptyākhyas turīyo 'sau na ca hy āvaraṇānvitaḥ
d lokavṛttyā tam īśānaṃ yajañ juhvan yamī bhavet
d ātmany āyāsayogena niṣkriyaḥ sa parāt param
d āyāme tāṃ vijānāti māyaiṣā paramātmanaḥ
d prātibhāsikasāmānyād buddher yā saṃvidātmikā
d sphuliṅgasattvasadṛśād agnibhāvo yathā bhavet
d śiśūnām evam ajñānām ātmabhāvo 'nyathā smṛtaḥ
d sādhye 'py avastubhūtākhye mitrāmitrādayaḥ kutaḥ
d tadabhāve tu śokādyā na vartante sureśvara
d evaṃ budhyasva bhagavan samabuddhiṃ samanviyāt
d upāyam etad ākhyātaṃ mā vakraṃ gaccha devapa
d jñānena paśyate karma jñānināṃ na pravartakam
d yāvad ārabdham asyeha tāvan naivopaśāmyati
d tadante taṃ prayāty eva na vidvān iti me matiḥ
d yad asya vācakaṃ vakṣye tasmād etad bhavet sadā
d tena tena ca bhāvena apāyaṃ tatra paśyati
d sthānabhedeṣu vāg eṣā tālusaṃsthā yathā tathā
d tadvad buddhigatā hy arthā buddhim ātmagataṃ sadā
d samastasaṃkalpaviśeṣamuktaṃ
d paraṃ parāṇāṃ paramaṃ mahātmā
d trayyantavidbhiḥ parigīyate 'sau
d viṣṇur vibhur vāsti guṇo na nityam
d varṇeṣu lokeṣu viśeṣaṇeṣu
d sa vāsudevo vasanān mahātmā
d guṇānurūpaṃ sa ca karmarūpaṃ
d dadāti sarvasya samastarūpam
d na saṃdṛśe tiṣṭhati rūpam asya
d na cakṣuṣā paśyati kaś cid enam
d bhaktyā ca dhṛtyā sa samāhitātmā
d jñānasvarūpaṃ paripaśyatīha
d vadanti tan me bhagavān dadau sa
d sa eva śeṣaṃ maghavān mahātmā
d evaṃ mamopāyam avehi śakra
d tasmāl loko nāsti mahyaṃ sadaiva
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity ukto daityapatinā śakro vismayam āgamat
c prītimāṃś ca tadā rājaṃs tad vākyaṃ pratyapūjayat
a sa tadābhyarcya daityendraṃ trailokyapatir īśvaraḥ
c asurendram upāmantrya jagāma svaṃ niveśanam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yayā buddhyā mahīpālo bhraṣṭaśrīr vicaren mahīm
c kāladaṇḍaviniṣpiṣṭas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c vāsavasya ca saṃvādaṃ baler vairocanasya ca
a pitāmaham upāgatya praṇipatya kṛtāñjaliḥ
c sarvān evāsurāñ jitvā baliṃ papraccha vāsavaḥ
a yasya sma dadato vittaṃ na kadā cana hīyate
c taṃ baliṃ nādhigacchāmi brahmann ācakṣva me balim
a sa eva hy astam ayate sa sma vidyotate diśaḥ
c sa varṣati sma varṣāṇi yathākālam atandritaḥ
e taṃ baliṃ nādhigacchāmi brahmann ācakṣva me balim
a sa vāyur varuṇaś caiva sa raviḥ sa ca candramāḥ
c so 'gnis tapati bhūtāni pṛthivī ca bhavaty uta
e taṃ baliṃ nādhigacchāmi brahmann ācakṣva me balim
 brahmovāca
a naitat te sādhu maghavan yad etad anupṛcchasi
c pṛṣṭas tu nānṛtaṃ brūyāt tasmād vakṣyāmi te balim
a uṣṭreṣu yadi vā goṣu khareṣv aśveṣu vā punaḥ
c variṣṭho bhavitā jantuḥ śūnyāgāre śacīpate
 śakra uvāca
a yadi sma balinā brahmañ śūnyāgāre sameyivān
c hanyām enaṃ na vā hanyāṃ tad brahmann anuśādhi mām
 brahmovāca
a mā sma śakra baliṃ hiṃsīr na balir vadham arhati
c nyāyāṃs tu śakra praṣṭavyas tvayā vāsava kāmyayā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam ukto bhagavatā mahendraḥ pṛthivīṃ tadā
c cacārairāvataskandham adhiruhya śriyā vṛtaḥ
a tato dadarśa sa baliṃ kharaveṣeṇa saṃvṛtam
c yathākhyātaṃ bhagavatā śūnyāgārakṛtālayam
 śakra uvāca
a kharayonim anuprāptas tuṣabhakṣo 'si dānava
c iyaṃ te yonir adhamā śocasy āho na śocasi
a adṛṣṭaṃ bata paśyāmi dviṣatāṃ vaśam āgatam
c śriyā vihīnaṃ mitraiś ca bhraṣṭavīryaparākramam
a yat tad yānasahasreṇa jñātibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
c lokān pratāpayan sarvān yāsy asmān avitarkayan
a tvanmukhāś caiva daiteyā vyatiṣṭhaṃs tava śāsane
c akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī tavaiśvarye babhūva ha
e idaṃ ca te 'dya vyasanaṃ śocasy āho na śocasi
a yadātiṣṭhaḥ samudrasya pūrvakūle vilelihan
c jñātibhyo vibhajan vittaṃ tadāsīt te manaḥ katham
a yat te sahasrasamitā nanṛtur devayoṣitaḥ
c bahūni varṣapūgāni vihāre dīpyataḥ śriyā
a sarvāḥ puṣkaramālinyaḥ sarvāḥ kāñcanasaprabhāḥ
c katham adya tadā caiva manas te dānaveśvara
a chatraṃ tavāsīt sumahat sauvarṇaṃ maṇibhūṣitam
c nanṛtur yatra gandharvāḥ ṣaṭsahasrāṇi saptadhā
a yūpas tavāsīt sumahān yajataḥ sarvakāñcanaḥ
c yatrādadaḥ sahasrāṇām ayutāni gavāṃ daśa
d anantaraṃ sahasreṇa tadāsīd daitya kā matiḥ
a yadā tu pṛthivīṃ sarvāṃ yajamāno 'nuparyayāḥ
c śamyākṣepeṇa vidhinā tadāsīt kiṃ nu te hṛdi
a na te paśyāmi bhṛṅgāraṃ na chatraṃ vyajanaṃ na ca
c brahmadattāṃ ca te mālāṃ na paśyāmy asurādhipa
d bhīṣma uvāca
d tataḥ prahasya sa balir vāsavena samīritam
d niśamya mānagambhīraṃ surarājam athābravīt
d aho hi tava bāliśyam iha devagaṇādhipa
d ayuktaṃ devarājasya tava kaṣṭam idaṃ vacaḥ
 balir uvāca
a na tvaṃ paśyasi bhṛṅgāraṃ na chatraṃ vyajanaṃ na ca
c brahmadattāṃ ca me mālāṃ na tvaṃ drakṣyasi vāsava
a guhāyāṃ nihitāni tvaṃ mama ratnāni pṛcchasi
c yadā me bhavitā kālas tadā tvaṃ tāni drakṣyasi
d na jānīṣe bhavān siddhiṃ śubhāṅgasvarūparūpiṇīm
d kālena bhavitā sarvo nātra gacchati vāsava
a na tv etad anurūpaṃ te yaśaso vā kulasya vā
c samṛddhārtho 'samṛddhārthaṃ yan māṃ katthitum icchasi
a na hi duḥkheṣu śocanti na prahṛṣyanti carddhiṣu
c kṛtaprajñā jñānatṛptāḥ kṣāntāḥ santo manīṣiṇaḥ
a tvaṃ tu prākṛtayā buddhyā puraṃdara vikatthase
c yadāham iva bhāvī tvaṃ tadā naivaṃ vadiṣyasi
d aiśvaryamadamohena sa tvaṃ kiṃ nānubudhyase
d kālena budhyase rājan vinipātena yojitaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a punar eva tu taṃ śakraḥ prahasann idam abravīt
c niḥśvasantaṃ yathā nāgaṃ pravyāhārāya bhārata
a yat tad yānasahasreṇa jñātibhiḥ parivāritaḥ
c lokān pratāpayan sarvān yāsy asmān avitarkayan
a dṛṣṭvā sukṛpaṇāṃ cemām avasthām ātmano bale
c jñātimitraparityaktaḥ śocasy āho na śocasi
a prītiṃ prāpyātulāṃ pūrvaṃ lokāṃś cātmavaśe sthitān
c vinipātam imaṃ cādya śocasy āho na śocasi
 balir uvāca
 garvaṃ hitvā tathā mānaṃ devarāja śṛṇuṣva me
 mayā ca tvānu sadbhāvaṃ pūrvam ācaritaṃ mahat
 avaśyakālaparyāyam ātmanaḥ parivartanam
 avidaṃl lokamāhātmya        
a anityam upalakṣyedaṃ kālaparyāyam ātmanaḥ
c tasmāc chakra na śocāmi sarvaṃ hy evedam antavat
a antavanta ime dehā bhūtānām amarādhipa
c tena śakra na śocāmi nāparādhād idaṃ mama
a jīvitaṃ ca śarīraṃ ca pretya vai saha jāyate
c ubhe saha vivardhete ubhe saha vinaśyataḥ
a tad īdṛśam idaṃ bhāvam avaśaḥ prāpya kevalam
c yady evam abhijānāmi kā vyathā me vijānataḥ
a bhūtānāṃ nidhanaṃ niṣṭhā srotasām iva sāgaraḥ
c naitat samyag vijānanto narā muhyanti vajrabhṛt
a ye tv evaṃ nābhijānanti rajomohaparāyaṇāḥ
c te kṛcchraṃ prāpya sīdanti buddhir yeṣāṃ praṇaśyati
a buddhilābhe hi puruṣaḥ sarvaṃ nudati kilbiṣam
c vipāpmā labhate sattvaṃ sattvasthaḥ saṃprasīdati
a tatas tu ye nivartante jāyante vā punaḥ punaḥ
c kṛpaṇāḥ paritapyante te 'narthaiḥ paricoditāḥ
a arthasiddhim anarthaṃ ca jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā
c sukhaduḥkhaphalaṃ caiva na dveṣmi na ca kāmaye
a hataṃ hanti hato hy eva yo naro hanti kaṃ cana
c ubhau tau na vijānīto yaś ca hanti hataś ca yaḥ
a hatvā jitvā ca maghavan yaḥ kaś cit puruṣāyate
c akartā hy eva bhavati kartā tv eva karoti tat
a ko hi lokasya kurute vināśaprabhavāv ubhau
c kṛtaṃ hi tat kṛtenaiva kartā tasyāpi cāparaḥ
a pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
c etadyonīni bhūtāni tatra kā paridevanā
a mahāvidyo 'lpavidyaś ca balavān durbalaś ca yaḥ
c darśanīyo virūpaś ca subhago durbhagaś ca yaḥ
a sarvaṃ kālaḥ samādatte gambhīraḥ svena tejasā
c tasmin kālavaśaṃ prāpte kā vyathā me vijānataḥ
a dagdham evānudahati hatam evānuhanti ca
c naśyate naṣṭam evāgre labdhavyaṃ labhate naraḥ
a nāsya dvīpaḥ kutaḥ pāraṃ nāvāraḥ saṃpradṛśyate
c nāntam asya prapaśyāmi vidher divyasya cintayan
a yadi me paśyataḥ kālo bhūtāni na vināśayet
c syān me harṣaś ca darpaś ca krodhaś caiva śacīpate
a tuṣabhakṣaṃ tu māṃ jñātvā praviviktajane gṛhe
c bibhrataṃ gārdabhaṃ rūpam ādiśya parigarhase
a icchann ahaṃ vikuryāṃ hi rūpāṇi bahudhātmanaḥ
c vibhīṣaṇāni yānīkṣya palāyethās tvam eva me
a kālaḥ sarvaṃ samādatte kālaḥ sarvaṃ prayacchati
c kālena vidhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ mā kṛthāḥ śakra pauruṣam
a purā sarvaṃ pravyathate mayi kruddhe puraṃdara
b vidravanti tvayā sārdhaṃ sarva eva divaukasaḥ
c avaimi tv asya lokasya dharmaṃ śakra sanātanam
a tvam apy evam apekṣasva mātmanā vismayaṃ gamaḥ
c prabhavaś ca prabhāvaś ca nātmasaṃsthaḥ kadā cana
a kaumāram eva te cittaṃ tathaivādya yathā purā
c samavekṣasva maghavan buddhiṃ vindasva naiṣṭhikīm
a devā manuṣyāḥ pitaro gandharvoragarākṣasāḥ
c āsan sarve mama vaśe tat sarvaṃ vettha vāsava
a namas tasyai diśe 'py astu yasyāṃ vairocano baliḥ
c iti mām abhyapadyanta buddhimātsaryamohitāḥ
a nāhaṃ tad anuśocāmi nātmabhraṃśaṃ śacīpate
c evaṃ me niścitā buddhiḥ śāstus tiṣṭhāmy ahaṃ vaśe
a dṛśyate hi kule jāto darśanīyaḥ pratāpavān
c duḥkhaṃ jīvan sahāmātyo bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
a dauṣkuleyas tathā mūḍho durjātaḥ śakra dṛśyate
c sukhaṃ jīvan sahāmātyo bhavitavyaṃ hi tat tathā
a kalyāṇī rūpasaṃpannā durbhagā śakra dṛśyate
c alakṣaṇā virūpā ca subhagā śakra dṛśyate
a naitad asmatkṛtaṃ śakra naitac chakra tvayā kṛtam
c yat tvam evaṃgato vajrin yad vāpy evaṃgatā vayam
a na karma tava nānyeṣāṃ kuto mama śatakrato
c ṛddhir vāpy atha vā narddhiḥ paryāyakṛtam eva tat
a paśyāmi tvā virājantaṃ devarājam avasthitam
c śrīmantaṃ dyutimantaṃ ca garjantaṃ ca mamopari
a etac caivaṃ na cet kālo mām ākramya sthito bhavet
c pātayeyam ahaṃ tvādya savajram api muṣṭinā
a na tu vikramakālo 'yaṃ kṣamākālo 'yam āgataḥ
c kālaḥ sthāpayate sarvaṃ kālaḥ pacati vai tathā
a māṃ ced abhyāgataḥ kālo dānaveśvaram ūrjitam
c garjantaṃ pratapantaṃ ca kam anyaṃ nāgamiṣyati
a dvādaśānāṃ hi bhavatām ādityānāṃ mahātmanām
