c tejāṃsy ekena sarveṣāṃ devarāja hṛtāni me
a aham evodvahāmy āpo visṛjāmi ca vāsava
c tapāmi caiva trailokyaṃ vidyotāmy aham eva ca
a saṃrakṣāmi vilumpāmi dadāmy aham athādade
c saṃyacchāmi niyacchāmi lokeṣu prabhur īśvaraḥ
a tad adya vinivṛttaṃ me prabhutvam amarādhipa
c kālasainyāvagāḍhasya sarvaṃ na pratibhāti me
a nāhaṃ kartā na caiva tvaṃ nānyaḥ kartā śacīpate
c paryāyeṇa hi bhujyante lokāḥ śakra yadṛcchayā
a māsārdhamāsaveśmānam ahorātrābhisaṃvṛtam
c ṛtudvāraṃ varṣamukham āhur vedavido janāḥ
a āhuḥ sarvam idaṃ cintyaṃ janāḥ ke cin manīṣayā
b anityaṃ pañcavarṣāṇi ṣaṣṭho dṛśyati dehinām
c asyāḥ pañcaiva cintāyāḥ paryeṣyāmi ca pañcadhā
d tatas tāni na paśyāmi kāle tam api vṛtrahan
a gambhīraṃ gahanaṃ brahma mahat toyārṇavaṃ yathā
c anādinidhanaṃ cāhur akṣaraṃ param eva ca
a sattveṣu liṅgam āveśya naliṅgam api tat svayam
c manyante dhruvam evainaṃ ye narās tattvadarśinaḥ
a bhūtānāṃ tu viparyāsaṃ manyate gatavān iti
c na hy etāvad bhaved gamyaṃ na yasmāt prakṛteḥ paraḥ
a gatiṃ hi sarvabhūtānām agatvā kva gamiṣyasi
c yo dhāvatā na hātavyas tiṣṭhann api na hīyate
e tam indriyāṇi sarvāṇi nānupaśyanti pañcadhā
a āhuś cainaṃ ke cid agniṃ ke cid āhuḥ prajāpatim
c ṛtumāsārdhamāsāṃś ca divasāṃs tu kṣaṇāṃs tathā
a pūrvāhṇam aparāhṇaṃ ca madhyāhnam api cāpare
c muhūrtam api caivāhur ekaṃ santam anekadhā
e taṃ kālam avajānīhi yasya sarvam idaṃ vaśe
a bahūnīndrasahasrāṇi samatītāni vāsava
c balavīryopapannāni yathaiva tvaṃ śacīpate
a tvām apy atibalaṃ śakraṃ devarājaṃ balotkaṭam
c prāpte kāle mahāvīryaḥ kālaḥ saṃśamayiṣyati
a ya idaṃ sarvam ādatte tasmāc chakra sthiro bhava
c mayā tvayā ca pūrvaiś ca na sa śakyo 'tivartitum
a yām etāṃ prāpya jānīṣe rājaśriyam anuttamām
c sthitā mayīti tan mithyā naiṣā hy ekatra tiṣṭhati
a sthitā hīndrasahasreṣu tvad viśiṣṭatameṣv iyam
c māṃ ca lolā parityajya tvām agād vibudhādhipa
a maivaṃ śakra punaḥ kārṣīḥ śānto bhavitum arhasi
c tvām apy evaṃgataṃ tyaktvā kṣipram anyaṃ gamiṣyati
d kālena coditā śakra mā te garvaḥ śatakrato
d kṣamasva kālayogaṃ tam āgataṃ viddhi devapa
d nirlajjaś caiva kasmāt tvaṃ devarāja vikatthase
d sarvāsurāṇām adhipaḥ sarvadevabhayaṃkaraḥ
d jitavān brahmaṇo lokaṃ ko vidyād āgataṃ gatim
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śatakratur athāpaśyad baler dīptāṃ mahātmanaḥ
c svarūpiṇīṃ śarīrād dhi tadā niṣkrāmatīṃ śriyam
a tāṃ dīptāṃ prabhayā dṛṣṭvā bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥ
c vismayotphullanayano baliṃ papraccha vāsavaḥ
a bale keyam apakrāntā rocamānā śikhaṇḍinī
c tvattaḥ sthitā sakeyūrā dīpyamānā svatejasā
 balir uvāca
a na hīmām āsurīṃ vedmi na daivīṃ na ca mānuṣīm
c tvam evaināṃ pṛccha mā vā yatheṣṭaṃ kuru vāsava
 śakra uvāca
a kā tvaṃ baler apakrāntā rocamānā śikhaṇḍinī
c ajānato mamācakṣva nāmadheyaṃ śucismite
a kā tvaṃ tiṣṭhasi māyeva dīpyamānā svatejasā
c hitvā daityeśvaraṃ subhru tan mamācakṣva tattvataḥ
 śrīr uvāca
a na mā virocano veda na mā vairocano baliḥ
c āhur māṃ duḥsahety evaṃ vidhitseti ca māṃ viduḥ
a bhūtir lakṣmīti mām āhuḥ śrīr ity evaṃ ca vāsava
c tvaṃ māṃ śakra na jānīṣe sarve devā na māṃ viduḥ
 śakra uvāca
a kim idaṃ tvaṃ mama kṛte utāho balinaḥ kṛte
b yad guṇeṣu ca lubdhāsi baler apanayas tu kaḥ
c duḥsahe vijahāsy enaṃ cirasaṃvāsinī satī
 śrīr uvāca
a na dhātā na vidhātā māṃ vidadhāti kathaṃ cana
c kālas tu śakra paryāyān mainaṃ śakrāvamanyathāḥ
 śakra uvāca
a kathaṃ tvayā balis tyaktaḥ kimarthaṃ vā śikhaṇḍini
c kathaṃ ca māṃ na jahyās tvaṃ tan me brūhi śucismite
 śrīr uvāca
a satye sthitāsmi dāne ca vrate tapasi caiva hi
c parākrame ca dharme ca parācīnas tato baliḥ
a brahmaṇyo 'yaṃ sadā bhūtvā satyavādī jitendriyaḥ
c abhyasūyad brāhmaṇān vai ucchiṣṭaś cāspṛśad ghṛtam
a yajñaśīlaḥ purā bhūtvā mām eva yajatety ayam
c provāca lokān mūḍhātmā kālenopanipīḍitaḥ
a apākṛtā tataḥ śakra tvayi vatsyāmi vāsava
c apramattena dhāryāsmi tapasā vikrameṇa ca
 śakra uvāca
a asti devamanuṣyeṣu sarvabhūteṣu vā pumān
c yas tvām eko viṣahituṃ śaknuyāt kamalālaye
 śrīr uvāca
a naiva devo na gandharvo nāsuro na ca rākṣasaḥ
c yo mām eko viṣahituṃ śaktaḥ kaś cit puraṃdara
 śakra uvāca
a tiṣṭhethā mayi nityaṃ tvaṃ yathā tad brūhi me śubhe
c tat kariṣyāmi te vākyam ṛtaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
 śrīr uvāca
a sthāsyāmi nityaṃ devendra yathā tvayi nibodha tat
c vidhinā vedadṛṣṭena caturdhā vibhajasva mām
 śakra uvāca
a ahaṃ vai tvā nidhāsyāmi yathāśakti yathābalam
c na tu me 'tikramaḥ syād vai sadā lakṣmi tavāntike
a bhūmir eva manuṣyeṣu dhāraṇī bhūtabhāvinī
c sā te pādaṃ titikṣeta samarthā hīti me matiḥ
 śrīr uvāca
a eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo 'yaṃ bhūmau pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c dvitīyaṃ śakra pādaṃ me tasmāt sunihitaṃ kuru
 śakra uvāca
a āpa eva manuṣyeṣu dravantyaḥ paricārikāḥ
c tās te pādaṃ titikṣantām alam āpas titikṣitum
 śrīr uvāca
a eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo 'yam apsu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c tṛtīyaṃ śakra pādaṃ me tasmāt sunihitaṃ kuru
 śakra uvāca
a yasmin devāś ca yajñāś ca yasmin vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
c tṛtīyaṃ pādam agnis te sudhṛtaṃ dhārayiṣyati
 śrīr uvāca
a eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo 'yam agnau pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c caturthaṃ śakra pādaṃ me tasmāt sunihitaṃ kuru
 śakra uvāca
a ye vai santo manuṣyeṣu brahmaṇyāḥ satyavādinaḥ
c te te pādaṃ titikṣantām alaṃ santas titikṣitum
 śrīr uvāca
a eṣa me nihitaḥ pādo yo 'yaṃ satsu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c evaṃ vinihitāṃ śakra bhūteṣu paridhatsva mām
 śakra uvāca
 bhūmiśuddhiṃ tataḥ kṛtvā adbhiḥ saṃtarpayanti ye
 bhūtāni ca yajanty agnau teṣāṃ tvam anapāyinī
 ye kriyābhiḥ suraktābhir hetuyuktāḥ samāhitāḥ
 jñānavanto vivatsāyāṃ labdhā mādyanti yoginaḥ
a bhūtānām iha vai yas tvā mayā vinihitāṃ satīm
c upahanyāt sa me dviṣyāt tathā śṛṇvantu me vacaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
 tatheti coktvā sā bhraṣṭā sarvalokanamaskṛtā
 vāsavaṃ pālayām āsa sā devī kamalālayā
a tatas tyaktaḥ śriyā rājā daityānāṃ balir abravīt
c yāvat purastāt pratapet tāvad vai dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
a paścimāṃ tāvad evāpi tathodīcīṃ divākaraḥ
c tathā madhyaṃdine sūryo astam eti yadā tadā
e punar devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ bhāvi jetāsmi vas tadā
a sarvāṃl lokān yadāditya ekasthas tāpayiṣyati
c tadā devāsure yuddhe jetāhaṃ tvāṃ śatakrato
 śakra uvāca
a brahmaṇāsmi samādiṣṭo na hantavyo bhavān iti
c tena te 'haṃ bale vajraṃ na vimuñcāmi mūrdhani
a yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha daityendra svasti te 'stu mahāsura
c ādityo nāvatapitā kadā cin madhyataḥ sthitaḥ
a sthāpito hy asya samayaḥ pūrvam eva svayaṃbhuvā
c ajasraṃ pariyāty eṣa satyenāvatapan prajāḥ
a ayanaṃ tasya ṣaṇmāsā uttaraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ tathā
c yena saṃyāti lokeṣu śītoṣṇe visṛjan raviḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktas tu daityendro balir indreṇa bhārata
c jagāma dakṣiṇām āśām udīcīṃ tu puraṃdaraḥ
a ity etad balinā gītam anahaṃkārasaṃjñitam
c vākyaṃ śrutvā sahasrākṣaḥ kham evāruruhe tadā
 bhīṣma uvāca
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
 vyasaneṣu nimagnasya kiṃ śreyas tad bravīhi me
 bhūya eva mahābāho sthityarthaṃ taṃ bravīhi me
a atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c śatakratoś ca saṃvādaṃ namuceś ca yudhiṣṭhira
a śriyā vihīnam āsīnam akṣobhyam iva sāgaram
c bhavābhavajñaṃ bhūtānām ity uvāca puraṃdaraḥ
a baddhaḥ pāśaiś cyutaḥ sthānād dviṣatāṃ vaśam āgataḥ
c śriyā vihīno namuce śocasy āho na śocasi
 namucir uvāca
a anavāpyaṃ ca śokena śarīraṃ copatapyate
c amitrāś ca prahṛṣyanti nāsti śoke sahāyatā
a tasmāc chakra na śocāmi sarvaṃ hy evedam antavat
c saṃtāpād bhraśyate rūpaṃ dharmaś caiva sureśvara
c   saṃtāpād bhraśyate śriyaḥ
c saṃtāpād bhraśyate cāyur
a vinīya khalu tad duḥkham āgataṃ vaimanasyajam
c dhyātavyaṃ manasā hṛdyaṃ kalyāṇaṃ saṃvijānatā
a yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe kurute manaḥ
c tadaivāsya prasīdanti sarvārthā nātra saṃśayaḥ
a ekaḥ śāstā na dvitīyo 'sti śāstā
garbhe śayānaṃ puruṣaṃ śāsti śāstā
c tenānuśiṣṭaḥ pravaṇād ivodakaṃ
yathā niyukto 'smi tathā vahāmi
a bhāvābhāvāv abhijānan garīyo
jānāmi śreyo na tu tat karomi
c āśāḥ suśarmyāḥ suhṛdāṃ sukurvan
yathā niyukto 'smi tathā vahāmi
a yathā yathāsya prāptavyaṃ prāpnoty eva tathā tathā
c bhavitavyaṃ yathā yac ca bhavaty eva tathā tathā
a yatra yatraiva saṃyuṅkte dhātā garbhaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
c tatra tatraiva vasati na yatra svayam icchati
a bhāvo yo 'yam anuprāpto bhavitavyam idaṃ mama
c iti yasya sadā bhāvo na sa muhyet kadā cana
a paryāyair hanyamānānām abhiyoktā na vidyate
c duḥkham etat tu yad dveṣṭā kartāham iti manyate
a ṛṣīṃś ca devāṃś ca mahāsurāṃś ca
traividyavṛddhāṃś ca vane munīṃś ca
c kān nāpado nopanamanti loke
parāvarajñās tu na saṃbhramanti
a na paṇḍitaḥ krudhyati nāpi sajjate
na cāpi saṃsīdati na prahṛṣyati
c na cārthakṛcchravyasaneṣu śocati
sthitaḥ prakṛtyā himavān ivācalaḥ
a yam arthasiddhiḥ paramā na harṣayet
tathaiva kāle vyasanaṃ na mohayet
c sukhaṃ ca duḥkhaṃ ca tathaiva madhyamaṃ
niṣevate yaḥ sa dhuraṃdharo naraḥ
a yāṃ yām avasthāṃ puruṣo 'dhigacchet
tasyāṃ rametāparitapyamānaḥ
c evaṃ pravṛddhaṃ praṇuden manojaṃ
saṃtāpam āyāsakaraṃ śarīrāt
a tat sadaḥ sa pariṣatsabhāsadaḥ
prāpya yo na kurute sabhābhayam
c dharmatattvam avagāhya buddhimān
yo 'bhyupaiti sa pumān dhuraṃdharaḥ
a prājñasya karmāṇi duranvayāni
na vai prājño muhyati mohakāle
c sthānāc cyutaś cen na mumoha gautamas
tāvat kṛcchrām āpadaṃ prāpya vṛddhaḥ
a na mantrabalavīryeṇa prajñayā pauruṣeṇa vā
b na śīlena na vṛttena tathā naivārthasaṃpadā
c alabhyaṃ labhate martyas tatra kā paridevanā
a yad evam anujātasya dhātāro vidadhuḥ purā
c tad evānubhaviṣyāmi kiṃ me mṛtyuḥ kariṣyati
a labdhavyāny eva labhate gantavyāny eva gacchati
c prāptavyāny eva prāpnoti duḥkhāni ca sukhāni ca
a etad viditvā kārtsnyena yo na muhyati mānavaḥ
c kuśalaḥ sukhaduḥkheṣu sa vai sarvadhaneśvaraḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a magnasya vyasane kṛcchre kiṃ śreyaḥ puruṣasya hi
c bandhunāśe mahīpāla rājyanāśe 'pi vā punaḥ
a tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo vaktā loke 'smin bharatarṣabha
c etad bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi tan me vaktum ihārhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a putradāraiḥ sukhaiś caiva viyuktasya dhanena ca
c magnasya vyasane kṛcchre dhṛtiḥ śreyaskarī nṛpa
a dhairyeṇa yuktasya sataḥ śarīraṃ na viśīryate
b viśokatā sukhaṃ dhatte dhatte cārogyam uttamam
b vaśyā bhavanti dhairyeṇa na vā rājño na saṃśayaḥ
b dhairyavāñ śriyam āpnoti dhairyād dharmo vivardhate
c ārogyāc ca śarīrasya sa punar vindate śriyam
a yasya rājño narās tāta sāttvikīṃ vṛttim āsthitāḥ
c tasya sthairyaṃ ca dhairyaṃ ca vyavasāyaś ca karmasu
a atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c balivāsavasaṃvādaṃ punar eva yudhiṣṭhira
a vṛtte devāsure yuddhe daityadānavasaṃkṣaye
c viṣṇukrānteṣu lokeṣu devarāje śatakratau
a ijyamāneṣu deveṣu cāturvarṇye vyavasthite
c samṛdhyamāne trailokye prītiyukte svayaṃbhuvi
a rudrair vasubhir ādityair aśvibhyām api carṣibhiḥ
c gandharvair bhujagendraiś ca siddhaiś cānyair vṛtaḥ prabhuḥ
a caturdantaṃ sudāntaṃ ca vāraṇendraṃ śriyā vṛtam
c āruhyairāvataṃ śakras trailokyam anusaṃyayau
a sa kadā cit samudrānte kasmiṃś cid girigahvare
c baliṃ vairocaniṃ vajrī dadarśopasasarpa ca
a tam airāvatamūrdhasthaṃ prekṣya devagaṇair vṛtam
c surendram indraṃ daityendro na śuśoca na vivyathe
a dṛṣṭvā tam avikārasthaṃ tiṣṭhantaṃ nirbhayaṃ balim
c adhirūḍho dvipaśreṣṭham ity uvāca śatakratuḥ
a daitya na vyathase śauryād atha vā vṛddhasevayā
c tapasā bhāvitatvād vā sarvathaitat suduṣkaram
a śatrubhir vaśam ānīto hīnaḥ sthānād anuttamāt
c vairocane kim āśritya śocitavye na śocasi
a śraiṣṭhyaṃ prāpya svajātīnāṃ bhuktvā bhogān anuttamān
c hṛtasvabalarājyas tvaṃ brūhi kasmān na śocasi
a īśvaro hi purā bhūtvā pitṛpaitāmahe pade
c tat tvam adya hṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā sapatnaiḥ kiṃ na śocasi
a baddhaś ca vāruṇaiḥ pāśair vajreṇa ca samāhataḥ
c hṛtadāro hṛtadhano brūhi kasmān na śocasi
a bhraṣṭaśrīr vibhavabhraṣṭo yan na śocasi duṣkaram
c trailokyarājyanāśe hi ko 'nyo jīvitum utsahet
a etac cānyac ca paruṣaṃ bruvantaṃ paribhūya tam
c śrutvā sukham asaṃbhrānto balir vairocano 'bravīt
a nigṛhīte mayi bhṛśaṃ śakra kiṃ katthitena te
c vajram udyamya tiṣṭhantaṃ paśyāmi tvāṃ puraṃdara
a aśaktaḥ pūrvam āsīs tvaṃ kathaṃ cic chaktatāṃ gataḥ
c kas tvad anya imā vācaḥ sukrūrā vaktum arhati
a yas tu śatror vaśasthasya śakto 'pi kurute dayām
c hastaprāptasya vīrasya taṃ caiva puruṣaṃ viduḥ
a aniścayo hi yuddheṣu dvayor vivadamānayoḥ
c ekaḥ prāpnoti vijayam ekaś caiva parābhavam
a mā ca te bhūt svabhāvo 'yaṃ mayā daivatapuṃgava
c īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vikrameṇa jito balāt
a naitad asmatkṛtaṃ śakra naitac chakra tvayā kṛtam
c yat tvam evaṃgato vajrin yad vāpy evaṃgatā vayam
a aham āsaṃ yathādya tvaṃ bhavitā tvaṃ yathā vayam
c māvamaṃsthā mayā karma duṣkṛtaṃ kṛtam ity uta
a sukhaduḥkhe hi puruṣaḥ paryāyeṇādhigacchati
c paryāyeṇāsi śakratvaṃ prāptaḥ śakra na karmaṇā
a kālaḥ kāle nayati māṃ tvāṃ ca kālo nayaty ayam
c tenāhaṃ tvaṃ yathā nādya tvaṃ cāpi na yathā vayam
a na mātṛpitṛśuśrūṣā na ca daivatapūjanam
c nānyo guṇasamācāraḥ puruṣasya sukhāvahaḥ
a na vidyā na tapo dānaṃ na mitrāṇi na bāndhavāḥ
c śaknuvanti paritrātuṃ naraṃ kālena pīḍitam
a nāgāminam anarthaṃ hi pratighātaśatair api
c śaknuvanti prativyoḍhum ṛte buddhibalān narāḥ
a paryāyair hanyamānānāṃ paritrātā na vidyate
c idaṃ tu duḥkhaṃ yac chakra kartāham iti manyate
a yadi kartā bhavet kartā na kriyeta kadā cana
c yasmāt tu kriyate kartā tasmāt kartāpy anīśvaraḥ
a kālena tvāham ajayaṃ kālenāhaṃ jitas tvayā
c gantā gatimatāṃ kālaḥ kālaḥ kalayati prajāḥ
a indra prākṛtayā buddhyā pralapan nāvabudhyase
c ke cit tvāṃ bahu manyante śraiṣṭhyaṃ prāptaṃ svakarmaṇā
a katham asmadvidho nāma jānaṃl lokapravṛttayaḥ
c kālenābhyāhataḥ śocen muhyed vāpy arthasaṃbhrame
a nityaṃ kālaparītasya mama vā madvidhasya vā
c buddhir vyasanam āsādya bhinnā naur iva sīdati
a ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca ye cānye bhaviṣyanti surādhipāḥ
c te sarve śakra yāsyanti mārgam indraśatair gatam
a tvām apy evaṃ sudurdharṣaṃ jvalantaṃ parayā śriyā
c kāle pariṇate kālaḥ kālayiṣyati mām iva
a bahūnīndrasahasrāṇi daiteyānāṃ yuge yuge
c abhyatītāni kālena kālo hi duratikramaḥ
a idaṃ tu labdhvā tvaṃ sthānam ātmānaṃ bahu manyase
c sarvabhūtabhavaṃ devaṃ brahmāṇam iva śāśvatam
a na cedam acalaṃ sthānam anantaṃ vāpi kasya cit
c tvaṃ tu bāliśayā buddhyā mamedam iti manyase
a aviśvāsye viśvasiṣi manyase cādhruvaṃ dhruvam
b nityaṃ kālaparītātmā bhavaty evaṃ sureśvara
c mameyam iti mohāt tvaṃ rājaśriyam abhīpsasi
a neyaṃ tava na cāsmākaṃ na cānyeṣāṃ sthirā matā
c atikramya bahūn anyāṃs tvayi tāvad iyaṃ sthitā
a kaṃ cit kālam iyaṃ sthitvā tvayi vāsava cañcalā
c gaur nipānam ivotsṛjya punar anyaṃ gamiṣyati
a rājalokā hy atikrāntā yān na saṃkhyātum utsahe
c tvatto bahutarāś cānye bhaviṣyanti puraṃdara
a savṛkṣauṣadhiratneyaṃ sasaritparvatākarā
c tān idānīṃ na paśyāmi yair bhukteyaṃ purā mahī
a pṛthur ailo mayo bhaumo narakaḥ śambaras tathā
c aśvagrīvaḥ pulomā ca svarbhānur amitadhvajaḥ
a prahrādo namucir dakṣo vipracittir virocanaḥ
c hrīniṣedhaḥ suhotraś ca bhūrihā puṣpavān vṛṣaḥ
a satyeṣur ṛṣabho rāhuḥ kapilāśvo virūpakaḥ
c bāṇaḥ kārtasvaro vahnir viśvadaṃṣṭro 'tha nairṛtaḥ
a ritthāhutthau vīratāmrau varāhāśvo ruciḥ prabhuḥ
c viśvajit pratiśauriś ca vṛṣāṇḍo viṣkaro madhuḥ
a hiraṇyakaśipuś caiva kaiṭabhaś caiva dānavaḥ
c daityāś ca kālakhañjāś ca sarve te nairṛtaiḥ saha
a ete cānye ca bahavaḥ pūrve pūrvatarāś ca ye
c daityendrā dānavendrāś ca yāṃś cānyān anuśuśruma
a bahavaḥ pūrvadaityendrāḥ saṃtyajya pṛthivīṃ gatāḥ
c kālenābhyāhatāḥ sarve kālo hi balavattaraḥ
a sarvaiḥ kratuśatair iṣṭaṃ na tvam ekaḥ śatakratuḥ
c sarve dharmaparāś cāsan sarve satatasatriṇaḥ
a antarikṣacarāḥ sarve sarve 'bhimukhayodhinaḥ
c sarve saṃhananopetāḥ sarve parighabāhavaḥ
a sarve māyāśatadharāḥ sarve te kāmacāriṇaḥ
c sarve samaram āsādya na śrūyante parājitāḥ
a sarve satyavrataparāḥ sarve kāmavihāriṇaḥ
c sarve vedavrataparāḥ sarve cāsan bahuśrutāḥ
a sarve saṃhatam aiśvaryam īśvarāḥ pratipedire
c na caiśvaryamadas teṣāṃ bhūtapūrvo mahātmanām
a sarve yathārthadātāraḥ sarve vigatamatsarāḥ
c sarve sarveṣu bhūteṣu yathāvat pratipedire
a sarve dākṣāyaṇīputrāḥ prājāpatyā mahābalāḥ
c jvalantaḥ pratapantaś ca kālena pratisaṃhṛtāḥ
a tvaṃ caivemāṃ yadā bhuktvā pṛthivīṃ tyakṣyase punaḥ
c na śakṣyasi tadā śakra niyantuṃ śokam ātmanaḥ
a muñcecchāṃ kāmabhogeṣu muñcemaṃ śrībhavaṃ madam
c evaṃ svarājyanāśe tvaṃ śokaṃ saṃprasahiṣyasi
a śokakāle śuco mā tvaṃ harṣakāle ca mā hṛṣaḥ
c atītānāgate hitvā pratyutpannena vartaya
a māṃ ced abhyāgataḥ kālaḥ sadāyuktam atandritam
c kṣamasva nacirād indra tvām apy upagamiṣyati
a trāsayann iva devendra vāgbhis takṣasi mām iha
c saṃyate mayi nūnaṃ tvam ātmānaṃ bahu manyase
a kālaḥ prathamam āyān māṃ paścāt tvām anudhāvati
c tena garjasi devendra pūrvaṃ kālahate mayi
a ko hi sthātum alaṃ loke kruddhasya mama saṃyuge
c kālas tu balavān prāptas tena tiṣṭhasi vāsava
a yat tad varṣasahasrāntaṃ pūrṇaṃ bhavitum arhati
c yathā me sarvagātrāṇi nasvasthāni hataujasaḥ
a aham aindrac cyutaḥ sthānāt tvam indraḥ prakṛto divi
c sucitre jīvaloke 'sminn upāsyaḥ kālaparyayāt
a kiṃ hi kṛtvā tvam indro 'dya kiṃ hi kṛtvā cyutā vayam
c kālaḥ kartā vikartā ca sarvam anyad akāraṇam
a nāśaṃ vināśam aiśvaryaṃ sukhaduḥkhe bhavābhavau
c vidvān prāpyaivam atyarthaṃ na prahṛṣyen na ca vyathet
a tvam eva hīndra vetthāsmān vedāhaṃ tvāṃ ca vāsava
c vikatthase māṃ kiṃ baddhaṃ kālena nirapatrapa
a tvam eva hi purā vettha yat tadā pauruṣaṃ mama
c samareṣu ca vikrāntaṃ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
a ādityāś caiva rudrāś ca sādhyāś ca vasubhiḥ saha
c mayā vinirjitāḥ sarve marutaś ca śacīpate
a tvam eva śakra jānāsi devāsurasamāgame
c sametā vibudhā bhagnās tarasā samare mayā
a parvatāś cāsakṛt kṣiptāḥ savanāḥ savanaukasaḥ
c saṭaṅkaśikharā ghorāḥ samare mūrdhni te mayā
a kiṃ nu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ yat kālo duratikramaḥ
c na hi tvāṃ notsahe hantuṃ savajram api muṣṭinā
a na tu vikramakālo 'yaṃ kṣamākālo 'yam āgataḥ
c tena tvā marṣaye śakra durmarṣaṇataras tvayā
a tvaṃ mā pariṇate kāle parītaṃ kālavahninā
c niyataṃ kālapāśena baddhaṃ śakra vikatthase
a ayaṃ sa puruṣaḥ śyāmo lokasya duratikramaḥ
c baddhvā tiṣṭhati māṃ raudraḥ paśuṃ raśanayā yathā
a lābhālābhau sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ kāmakrodhau bhavābhavau

a yadā hi śocatāṃ śoko vyasanaṃ nāpakarṣati

a evam uktaḥ sahasrākṣo bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥ

a sā te na vyathate buddhir acalā tattvadarśinī
c bruvan na vyathase sa tvaṃ vākyaṃ satyaparākrama

a ahorātrāṃś ca māsāṃś ca kṣaṇān kāṣṭhāḥ kalā lavān

a idānīṃ tāvad evāsau mayā dṛṣṭaḥ kathaṃ mṛtaḥ

c anityam adhruvaṃ sarvaṃ vyavasāyo hi duṣkaraḥ
d jīvitaṃ jīvalokasya kālenāgamya nīyate

d brāhmaṇāś cāpi śūdrāś ca bhogārthe kalpayanty uta
a viyoniṣu ca bījāni mokṣyante puruṣā yadā

a cāturvarṇyaṃ yadā kṛtsnam unmaryādaṃ bhaviṣyati
c ekaikas te tadā pāśaḥ kramaśaḥ pratimokṣyate

pratiprayāto gajarājavāhanaḥ

a maharṣayas tuṣṭuvur añjasā ca taṃ
vṛṣākapiṃ sarvacarācareśvaram

 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca

d merupādodbhavāṃ gaṅgāṃ nārāyaṇapadacyutām

a striyaḥ puruṣaveṣeṇa puṃsaḥ strīveṣadhāriṇaḥ
c krīḍārativihāreṣu parāṃ mudam avāpnuvan
a prabhavadbhiḥ purā dāyān arhebhyaḥ pratipāditān
c nābhyavartanta nāstikyād vartantaḥ saṃbhaveṣv api
a mitreṇābhyarthitaṃ mitram arthe saṃśayite kva cit
c vālakoṭyagramātreṇa svārthenāghnata tad vasu
a parasvādānarucayo vipaṇyavyavahāriṇaḥ
c adṛśyantāryavarṇeṣu śūdrāś cāpi tapodhanāḥ
a adhīyante 'vratāḥ ke cid vṛthāvratam athāpare
c aśuśrūṣur guroḥ śiṣyaḥ kaś cic chiṣyasakho guruḥ
a pitā caiva janitrī ca śrāntau vṛttotsavāv iva
c aprabhutve sthitau vṛddhāv annaṃ prārthayataḥ sutān
a tatra vedavidaḥ prājñā gāmbhīrye sāgaropamāḥ
c kṛṣyādiṣv abhavan saktā mūrkhāḥ śrāddhāny abhuñjata
a prātaḥ prātaś ca supraśnaṃ kalpanaṃ preṣaṇakriyāḥ
c śiṣyānuprahitās tasminn akurvan guravaś ca ha
a śvaśrūśvaśurayor agre vadhūḥ preṣyān aśāsata
c anvaśāsac ca bhartāraṃ samāhūyābhijalpatī
a prayatnenāpi cārakṣac cittaṃ putrasya vai pitā
c vyabhajaṃś cāpi saṃrambhād duḥkhavāsaṃ tathāvasan
a agnidāhena corair vā rājabhir vā hṛtaṃ dhanam
c dṛṣṭvā dveṣāt prāhasanta suhṛtsaṃbhāvitā hy api
a kṛtaghnā nāstikāḥ pāpā gurudārābhimarśinaḥ
c abhakṣyabhakṣaṇaratā nirmaryādā hatatviṣaḥ
d śvaśurānugatāḥ sarve hy utsṛjya pitarau sutāḥ
d svakarmaṇā ca jāto 'ham ity evaṃvādinas tathā
a teṣv evamādīn ācārān ācaratsu viparyaye
c nāhaṃ devendra vatsyāmi dānaveṣv iti me matiḥ
a tāṃ māṃ svayam anuprāptām abhinanda śacīpate
c tvayārcitāṃ māṃ deveśa purodhāsyanti devatāḥ
a yatrāhaṃ tatra matkāntā madviśiṣṭā madarpaṇāḥ
c sapta devyo mayāṣṭamyo vāsaṃ ceṣyanti me 'ṣṭadhā
a āśā śraddhā dhṛtiḥ kāntir vijitiḥ sannatiḥ kṣamā
c aṣṭamī vṛttir etāsāṃ purogā pākaśāsana
a tāś cāhaṃ cāsurāṃs tyaktvā yuṣmadviṣayam āgatā
c tridaśeṣu nivatsyāmo dharmaniṣṭhāntarātmasu
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktavacanāṃ devīm atyarthaṃ tau nanandatuḥ
c nāradaś ca trilokarṣir vṛtrahantā ca vāsavaḥ
a tato 'nalasakho vāyuḥ pravavau devaveśmasu
c iṣṭagandhaḥ sukhasparśaḥ sarvendriyasukhāvahaḥ
a śucau cābhyarcite deśe tridaśāḥ prāyaśaḥ sthitāḥ
c lakṣmyā sahitam āsīnaṃ maghavantaṃ didṛkṣavaḥ
a tato divaṃ prāpya sahasralocanaḥ
śriyopapannaḥ suhṛdā surarṣiṇā
c rathena haryaśvayujā surarṣabhaḥ
sadaḥ surāṇām abhisatkṛto yayau
a atheṅgitaṃ vajradharasya nāradaḥ
śriyāś ca devyā manasā vicārayan
c śriyai śaśaṃsāmaradṛṣṭapauruṣaḥ
śivena tatrāgamanaṃ maharddhimat
a tato 'mṛtaṃ dyauḥ pravavarṣa bhāsvatī
pitāmahasyāyatane svayaṃbhuvaḥ
c anāhatā dundubhayaś ca nedire
tathā prasannāś ca diśaś cakāśire
a yathartu sasyeṣu vavarṣa vāsavo
na dharmamārgād vicacāla kaś cana
c anekaratnākarabhūṣaṇā ca bhūḥ
sughoṣaghoṣā bhuvanaukasāṃ jaye
a kriyābhirāmā manujā yaśasvino
babhuḥ śubhe puṇyakṛtāṃ pathi sthitāḥ
c narāmarāḥ kiṃnarayakṣarākṣasāḥ
samṛddhimantaḥ sukhino yaśasvinaḥ
a na jātv akāle kusumaṃ kutaḥ phalaṃ
papāta vṛkṣāt pavaneritād api
c rasapradāḥ kāmadughāś ca dhenavo
na dāruṇā vāg vicacāra kasya cit
a imāṃ saparyāṃ saha sarvakāmadaiḥ
śriyāś ca śakrapramukhaiś ca daivataiḥ
c paṭhanti ye viprasadaḥ samāgame
samṛddhakāmāḥ śriyam āpnuvanti te
a tvayā kurūṇāṃ vara yat pracoditaṃ
bhavābhavasyeha paraṃ nidarśanam
c tad adya sarvaṃ parikīrtitaṃ mayā
parīkṣya tattvaṃ parigantum arhasi
d saṃsmṛtya buddhīndriyagocarātigaṃ
d svagocare sarvakṛtālayaṃ tam
d hariṃ mahāpāpaharaṃ janās te
d saṃsmṛtya saṃpūjya vidhūtapāpāḥ
d yamaiś ca nityaṃ niyamaiś ca saṃyatās
d tattvaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ paripaśyamānāḥ
d devānusāreṇa vimuktiyogaṃ
d te gāhamānāḥ param āpnuvanti
d evaṃ rājendra satataṃ japahomaparāyaṇaḥ
d vāsudevaparo nityaṃ jñānadhyānaparāyaṇaḥ
d dānadharmaratir nityaṃ prajās tvaṃ paripālaya
d vāsudevaparo nityaṃ jñānadhyānaparāyaṇān
d viśeṣeṇārcayethās tvaṃ satataṃ paryupāssva ca
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ kiṃvidyaḥ kiṃparāyaṇaḥ
c prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a mokṣadharmeṣu niyato laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ
c prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c jaigīṣavyasya saṃvādam asitasya ca bhārata
d mahādevāntare vṛttaṃ devyāś caivāntare tathā
d yathāvac chṛṇu rājendra jñānadaṃ pāpanāśanam
a jaigīṣavyaṃ mahāprājñaṃ dharmāṇām āgatāgamam
c akrudhyantam ahṛṣyantam asito devalo 'bravīt
a na prīyase vandyamāno nindyamāno na kupyasi
c kā te prajñā kutaś caiṣā kiṃ caitasyāḥ parāyaṇam
a iti tenānuyuktaḥ sa tam uvāca mahātapāḥ
c mahad vākyam asaṃdigdhaṃ puṣkalārthapadaṃ śuci
a yā gatir yā parā niṣṭhā yā śāntiḥ puṇyakarmaṇām
c tāṃ te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yan māṃ pṛcchasi vai dvija
a nindatsu ca samo nityaṃ praśaṃsatsu ca devala
c nihnuvanti ca ye teṣāṃ samayaṃ sukṛtaṃ ca ye
a uktāś ca na vivakṣanti vaktāram ahite ratam
c pratihantuṃ na cecchanti hantāraṃ vai manīṣiṇaḥ
a nāprāptam anuśocanti prāptakālāni kurvate
c na cātītāni śocanti na cainān pratijānate
a saṃprāptānāṃ ca pūjyānāṃ kāmād artheṣu devala
c yathopapattiṃ kurvanti śaktimantaḥ kṛtavratāḥ
a pakvavidyā mahāprājñā jitakrodhā jitendriyāḥ
c manasā karmaṇā vācā nāparādhyanti kasya cit
a anīrṣavo na cānyonyaṃ vihiṃsanti kadā cana
c na ca jātūpatapyante dhīrāḥ parasamṛddhibhiḥ
a nindāpraśaṃse cātyarthaṃ na vadanti parasya ye
c na ca nindāpraśaṃsābhyāṃ vikriyante kadā cana
a sarvataś ca praśāntā ye sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
c na krudhyanti na hṛṣyanti nāparādhyanti kasya cit
e vimucya hṛdayagranthīṃś caṅkamyante yathāsukham
a na yeṣāṃ bāndhavāḥ santi ye cānyeṣāṃ na bāndhavāḥ
c amitrāś ca na santy eṣāṃ ye cāmitrā na kasya cit
a ya evaṃ kurvate martyāḥ sukhaṃ jīvanti sarvadā
c dharmam evānuvartante dharmajñā dvijasattama
e ye hy ato vicyutā mārgāt te hṛṣyanty udvijanti ca
a āsthitas tam ahaṃ mārgam asūyiṣyāmi kaṃ katham
c nindyamānaḥ praśasto vā hṛṣyeyaṃ kena hetunā
a yad yad icchanti tan mārgam abhigacchanti mānavāḥ
c na me nindāpraśaṃsābhyāṃ hrāsavṛddhī bhaviṣyataḥ
a amṛtasyeva saṃtṛpyed avamānasya tattvavit
c viṣasyevodvijen nityaṃ saṃmānasya vicakṣaṇaḥ
a avajñātaḥ sukhaṃ śete iha cāmutra cobhayoḥ
c vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo yo 'vamantā sa badhyate
a parāṃ gatiṃ ca ye ke cit prārthayanti manīṣiṇaḥ
c etad vrataṃ samāśritya sukham edhanti te janāḥ
a sarvataś ca samāhṛtya kratūn sarvāñ jitendriyaḥ
c prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam
a nāsya devā na gandharvā na piśācā na rākṣasāḥ
c padam anvavarohanti prāptasya paramāṃ gatim
d etac chrutvā munes tasya vacanaṃ devalas tathā
d tadadhīno 'bhavac chiṣyaḥ sarvadvaṃdvaviniṣṭhitaḥ
d athānyat tu purā vṛttaṃ jaigīṣavyasya dhīmataḥ
d śṛṇu rājann avahitaḥ sarvajñānasamanvitaḥ
d yam āhuḥ sarvalokeśaṃ sarvalokanamaskṛtam
d aṣṭamūrtiṃ jaganmūrtim iṣṭasaṃdhivibhūṣitam
d yaṃ prāptā na viṣīdanti na śocanty udvijanti ca
d yasya svābhāvikī śaktir idaṃ viśvaṃ carācaram
d yāti sajjati sarvātmā sa devaḥ parameśvaraḥ
d meror uttarapūrve tu sarvaratnavibhūṣite
d acintye vimale sthāne sarvartukusumānvite
d vṛkṣaiś ca śobhate nityaṃ divyavāyusamīrite
d nānābhūtagaṇair yuktaḥ sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥ
d tatra vidyādharagaṇā gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
d lokapālāḥ samudrāś ca nadyaḥ śailāḥ sarāṃsi ca
d ṛṣayo vālakhilyāś ca yajñāḥ stobhāhvayās tathā
d upāsāṃ cakrire devaṃ prajānāṃ patayas tathā
d tatra rudro mahādevo devyā caiva sahomayā
d āste vṛṣadhvajaḥ śrīmān somasūryāgnilocanaḥ
d tatraivaṃ devam ālokya devī dhātrī vibhāvarī
d umā devī pareśānam apṛcchad vinayānvitā
d arthaḥ ko 'thārthaśaktiḥ kā bhagavan brūhi me 'rthitaḥ
d tayaivaṃ paripṛṣṭo 'sau prāha devo maheśvaraḥ
d artho 'ham arthaśaktis tvaṃ bhoktāhaṃ bhojyam eva ca
d rūpaṃ viddhi mahābhāge prakṛtis tvaṃ paro hy aham
d ahaṃ viṣṇur ahaṃ brahmā hy ahaṃ yajñas tathaiva ca
d āvayor na ca bhedo 'sti paramārthas tato 'bale
d tathāpi vidmas te bhedaṃ kiṃ māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
d evam uktā tataḥ prāha hy adhikaṃ hy etayor vada
d śreṣṭhaṃ veda mahādeva nama ity eva bhāminī
d tadantare sthito vidvān vasurūpo mahāmuniḥ
d jaigīṣavyaḥ smayan prāha hy artha ity eva nādayan
d śreṣṭho 'nyo 'smān mahīpiṇḍā tallīnā śaktir āparā
d mudrikādiviśeṣeṇa vistṛtā saṃbhṛteti ca
d tac chrutvā vacanaṃ devī ko 'sāv ity abravīd ruṣā
d vākyam asyādya saṃbhaṅktvā proktavān iti śaṃkaram
d tac chrutvā nirgato dhīmān āśramaṃ svaṃ mahāmuniḥ
d sthānāt svargagaṇe vidvān yogaiśvaryasamanvitaḥ
d tataḥ prahasya bhagavān sarvapāpaharo haraḥ
d prāha devīṃ praśāntātmā jaigīṣavyo mahāmuniḥ
d bhakto mama sakhā caiva śiṣyaś cātra mahāmuniḥ
d jaigīṣavya iti khyātaḥ proktvāsau nirgataḥ śubhe
d tac chrutvā sātha saṃkruddhā na nyāyyaṃ tena vai kṛtam
d vikṛtāhaṃ tvayā deva muninā ca tathā kṛtā
d atajjñād atha deveśa madhye prāptaṃ na tac chrutam
d tac chrutvā bhagavān āha mahādevaḥ pinākabhṛt
d nirapekṣo munir yogī mām upāśritya saṃsthitaḥ
d nirdvaṃdvaḥ satataṃ dhīmān samarūpasvabhāvadhṛt
d tasmāt kṣamasva taṃ devi rakṣitavyas tvayā ca saḥ
d ity uktā prāha sā devī munes tasya mahātmanaḥ
d nirāśatvam ahaṃ draṣṭum icchāmy antakanāśana
d tatheti coktvā tāṃ devo vṛṣam āruhya satvaram
d devagandharvasaṃghaiś ca stūyamāno jagatpatiḥ
d ajarāmaraśuddhātmā yatrāste sa mahāmuniḥ
d itas tataḥ samāhṛtya vīrasaṃghair mahāyaśāḥ
d dehaprāvaraṇārthaṃ vai saṃsaran sa tadā muniḥ
d pratyudgamya mahādevaṃ yathārhaṃ pratipūjya ca
d punaḥ sa pūrvavat kanthāṃ sūcyā sūtreṇa sūcayat
d tam āha bhagavāñ śaṃbhuḥ kiṃ pradāsyāmi te mune
d vṛṇīṣva mattaḥ sarvaṃ tvaṃ jaigīṣavya yadīcchasi
d nāvalokayamānas tu devadevaṃ mahāmunim
d anavāptaṃ na paśyāmi tvatto govṛṣabhadhvaja
d kṛtārthaḥ paripūrṇo 'haṃ yat te kāryaṃ tu gamyatām
d prahasaṃs tu punaḥ śarvo vṛṇīṣveti tam abravīt
d avaśyaṃ hi varo mattaḥ śrāvyaṃ varam anuttamam
d jaigīṣavyas tam āhedaṃ śrotavyaṃ ca tvayā mama
d sūcīm anu mahādeva sūtraṃ samanugacchataḥtu
d tataḥ prahasya bhagavān gaurīm ālokya śaṃkaraḥ
d svasthānaṃ prayayau hṛṣṭaḥ sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥ
d etat te kathitaṃ rājan yasmāt tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
d nirdvaṃdvā yogino nityāḥ sarvaśas te svayaṃbhuvaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a priyaḥ sarvasya lokasya sarvasattvābhinanditā
c guṇaiḥ sarvair upetaś ca ko nv asti bhuvi mānavaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi pṛcchato bharatarṣabha
c ugrasenasya saṃvādaṃ nārade keśavasya ca
 ugrasena uvāca
a paśya saṃkalpate loko nāradasya prakīrtane
c manye sa guṇasaṃpanno brūhi tan mama pṛcchataḥ
 vāsudeva uvāca
a kukurādhipa yān manye śṛṇu tān me vivakṣataḥ
b yac chrutvā pārameṣṭhyena bhavec cāpy amalā matiḥ
c nāradasya guṇān sādhūn saṃkṣepeṇa narādhipa
a na cāritranimitto 'syāhaṃkāro dehapātanaḥ
c abhinnaśrutacāritras tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
d aratiḥ krodhacāpalye bhayaṃ naitāni nārade
d adīrghasūtraḥ śūraś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a tapasvī nārado bāḍhaṃ vāci nāsya vyatikramaḥ
c kāmād vā yadi vā lobhāt tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a adhyātmavidhitattvajñaḥ kṣāntaḥ śakto jitendriyaḥ
c ṛjuś ca satyavādī ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a tejasā yaśasā buddhyā nayena vinayena ca
c janmanā tapasā vṛddhas tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a sukhaśīlaḥ susaṃbhogaḥ subhojyaḥ svādaraḥ śuciḥ
c suvākyaś cāpy anīrṣyaś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a kalyānaṃ kurute bāḍhaṃ pāpam asmin na vidyate
c na prīyate parān arthais tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a vedaśrutibhir ākhyānair arthān abhijigīṣate
c titikṣur anavajñaś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a samatvād dhi priyo nāsti nāpriyaś ca kathaṃ cana
c manonukūlavādī ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a bahuśrutaś caitrakathaḥ paṇḍito 'nalaso 'śaṭhaḥ
c adīno 'krodhano 'lubdhas tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a nārthe na dharme kāme vā bhūtapūrvo 'sya vigrahaḥ
c doṣāś cāsya samucchinnās tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a dṛḍhabhaktir anindyātmā śrutavān anṛśaṃsavān
c vītasaṃmohadoṣaś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a asaktaḥ sarvasaṅgeṣu saktātmeva ca lakṣyate
c adīrghasaṃśayo vāgmī tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a samādhir nāsya mānārthe nātmānaṃ stauti karhi cit
c anīrṣyur dṛḍhasaṃbhāṣas tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a lokasya vividhaṃ vṛttaṃ prakṛteś cāpy akutsayan
c saṃsargavidyākuśalas tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a nāsūyaty āgamaṃ kaṃ cit svaṃ tapo nopajīvati
c avandhyakālo vaśyātmā tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a kṛtaśramaḥ kṛtaprajño na ca tṛptaḥ samādhitaḥ
c niyamastho 'pramattaś ca tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a sāpatrapaś ca yuktaś ca suneyaḥ śreyase paraiḥ
c abhettā paraguhyānāṃ tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a na hṛṣyaty arthalābheṣu nālābheṣu vyathaty api
c sthirabuddhir asaktātmā tasmāt sarvatra pūjitaḥ
a taṃ sarvaguṇasaṃpannaṃ dakṣaṃ śucim akātaram
c kālajñaṃ ca nayajñaṃ ca kaḥ priyaṃ na kariṣyati
d ity uktaḥ saṃpraśasyainam ugraseno gato gṛhāt
d āste kṛṣṇas tathaikānte paryaṅke ratnabhūṣite
d kadā cit tatra bhagavān praviveśa mahāmuniḥ
d tam abhyarcya yathānyāyaṃ tūṣṇīm āste janārdanaḥ
d taṃ khinnam iva saṃlakṣya keśavaṃ vākyam abravīt
d kim idaṃ keśava tava vaimanasyaṃ janārdana
d śrīvāsudeva uvāca
d abhūtapūrvaṃ govinda tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
d nāsuhṛt paramaṃ me 'dya nāpado 'rhati veditum
d apaṇḍito vāpi suhṛt paṇḍito vāpy anātmavān
d sa tvaṃ suhṛc ca vidvāṃś ca jitātmā śrotum arhasi
d apy etad dhṛdi yad duḥkhaṃ tad bhavāñ śrotum arhati
d dāsyam aiśvaryavādena jñātīnāṃ ca karomy aham
d dviṣanti satataṃ kruddhā jñātisaṃbandhibāndhavāḥ
d divyā api tathā bhogā dattās teṣāṃ mayā pṛthak
d nārada uvāca
d tathāpi ca dviṣanto māṃ vartante ca parasparam
d anāyasena śastreṇa parimṛjyānumṛjya ca
d bhagavān uvāca
d jihvām uddhara caiteṣāṃ na vakṣyanti tataḥ param
d anāyasaṃ kathaṃ vindyāṃ śastraṃ munivarottama
d nārada uvāca
d yenaiṣām uddhare jihvāṃ brūhi tan me yathātatham
d gohiraṇyaṃ ca vāsāṃsi ratnādyaṃ yad dhanaṃ bahu
d āsye prakṣipa caiteṣāṃ śastram etad anāyasam
d suhṛtsaṃbandhimitrāṇāṃ gurūṇāṃ svajanasya ca
d ākhyātaṃ śastram etad dhi tena chindhi punaḥ punaḥ
d tavaiśvaryapradānāni ślāghyam eṣāṃ vacāṃsi ca
d bhīṣma uvāca
d samarthaṃ tvām abhijñāya pravadanti ca te narāḥ
d tataḥ prahasya bhagavān saṃpūjya ca mahāmunim
d tathākaron mahātejā munivākyena coditaḥ
d evaṃprabhāvo brahmarṣir nārado munisattamaḥ
d pṛṣṭavān asi yan māṃ tvaṃ tad uktaṃ rājasattama
d sarvadharmahite yuktāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥ
d lokapriyatvaṃ gacchanti jñānavijñānakovidāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ādyantaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śrotum icchāmi kaurava
c dhyānaṃ karma ca kālaṃ ca tathaivāyur yuge yuge
a lokatattvaṃ ca kārtsnyena bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
c sargaś ca nidhanaṃ caiva kuta etat pravartate
d bhedakaṃ bhedatattvaṃ ca tathānyeṣāṃ mataṃ tathā
d avasthātritayaṃ caiva yādṛśaṃ ca pitāmaha
a yadi te 'nugrahe buddhir asmāsv iha satāṃ vara
c etad bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi tad bhavān prabravītu me
a pūrvaṃ hi kathitaṃ śrutvā bhṛgubhāṣitam uttamam
c bharadvājasya viprarṣes tato me buddhir uttamā
a jātā paramadharmiṣṭhā divyasaṃsthānasaṃsthitā
c tato bhūyas tu pṛcchāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣye 'ham itihāsaṃ purātanam
c jagau yad bhagavān vyāsaḥ putrāya paripṛcchate
a adhītya vedān akhilān sāṅgopaniṣadas tathā
c anvicchan naiṣṭhikaṃ karma dharmanaipuṇadarśanāt
a kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsaṃ putro vaiyāsakiḥ śukaḥ
c papraccha saṃdeham imaṃ chinnadharmārthasaṃśayam
a bhūtagrāmasya kartāraṃ kālajñāne ca niścayam
b jñānaṃ brahma ca yogaṃ ca gavātmakam idaṃ jagat
b tritaye tv enam āyāti tathā hy eṣo 'pi vā punaḥ
b kenaiva ca vibhāgaḥ syāt turīyo lakṣaṇair vinā
b jñānajñeyāntare ko 'sau ko 'yaṃ bhāvas tu bhedavat
b yaj jñānaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ caiva teṣāṃ kartāram eva ca
c brāhmaṇasya ca yat kṛtyaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
a tasmai provāca tat sarvaṃ pitā putrāya pṛcchate
c atītānāgate vidvān sarvajñaḥ sarvadharmavit
d pṛcchatas tava satputra yathāvat kīrtayāmy aham
d śṛṇuṣvāvahito bhūtvā yathāvṛtam idaṃ jagat
d kāryādi kāraṇāntaṃ yat kāryāntaṃ kāraṇādikam
d jñānaṃ tad ubhayaṃ vittvā satyaṃ ca paramaṃ śubham
d brahmeti cābhivikhyātaṃ tad vai paśyanti sūrayaḥ
d brahma tejomayaṃ bhūtaṃ bhūtakāraṇam adbhutam
d āsīd ādau tatas tv āhuḥ prādhānyam iti tadvidaḥ
d triguṇāṃ tāṃ mahāmāyāṃ vaiṣṇavīṃ prakṛtiṃ viduḥ
d tad īdṛśam anādyantam avyaktam ajaraṃ dhruvam
d apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ brahmāgre vikṛtaṃ ca tat
d tad vai pradhānam uddiṣṭaṃ trisūkṣmaṃ triguṇātmakam
d samyag yogaguṇaṃ svasthaṃ tad icchākṣobhitaṃ mahat
d śaktitrayātmikā tasya prakṛtiḥ kāraṇātmikā
d asvatantrā ca satataṃ vidadhiṣṭhānasaṃyutā
d svabhāvākhyaṃ samāpannā mohavigrahadhāriṇī
d vividhasyāsya jīvasya bhogārthaṃ samupāgatā
d yathā saṃnidhimātreṇa gandhaḥ kṣobhāya jāyate
d manas tadvad aśeṣasya parāt para iti smṛtaḥ
d sṛṣṭvā praviśya tat tasmin kṣobhayām āsa viṣṭhitaḥ
d sāttviko rājasaś caiva tāmasaś ca tridhā mahān
d pradhānatattvād udbhūto mahattvāc ca mahān smṛtaḥ
d pradhānatattvam udbhūtaṃ mahattattvaṃ samāvṛṇot
d kālātmanābhibhūtaṃ tat kālo 'ṃśaḥ paramātmanaḥ
d puruṣaś cāprameyātmā sa eva iti gīyate
d triguṇo 'sau mahājñātaḥ pradhāna iti vai śrutiḥ
d sāttviko rājasaś caiva tāmasaś ca tridhātmakaḥ
d trividho 'yam ahaṃkāro mahattattvād ajāyata
d tāmaso 'sāv ahaṃkāro bhūtādir iti saṃjñitaḥ
d bhūtānām ādibhūtatvād raktāhis tāmasaḥ smṛtaḥ
d bhūtādiḥ sa vikurvāṇaḥ śiṣṭaṃ tanmātrakaṃ tataḥ
d sasarja śabdaṃ tanmātram ākāśaṃ śabdalakṣaṇam
d śabdalakṣaṇam ākāśaṃ śabdatanmātram āvṛṇot
d tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu sparśamātraṃ sasarja ha
d śabdamātraṃ tadākāśaṃ sparśamātraṃ samāvṛṇot
d sasarja vāyus tenāsau pīḍyamāna iti śrutiḥ
d sparśamātraṃ tadā vāyū rūpamātraṃ samāvṛṇot
d tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu sasarjāgnim iti śrutiḥ
d rūpamātraṃ tato vahniṃ samutsṛjya samāvṛṇot
d tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu rasamātraṃ sasarja ha
d rūpamātragataṃ tejo rasamātraṃ samāvṛṇot
d tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu sasarjāmbha iti śrutiḥ
d rasamātrātmakaṃ bhūyo rasaṃ tanmātram āvṛṇot
d tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu gandhaṃ tanmātrakaṃ tataḥ
d sasarja gandhaṃ tanmātram āvṛṇot karakaṃ tathā
d tena saṃpīḍyamānas tu kāṭhinyaṃ ca sasarja ha
d pṛthivī jāyate tasmād gandhatanmātrajāt tathā
d ammayaṃ sarvam evedam āpas tastambhire punaḥ
d bhūtānīmāni jātāni pṛthivyādīni vai śrutiḥ
d bhūtānāṃ mūrtir evaiṣām annaṃ caiṣāṃ matā budhaiḥ
d tasmiṃs tasmiṃs tu tanmātrā tanmātrā iti te smṛtāḥ
d taijasānīndriyāṇy āhur devā vaikārikā daśa
d ekādaśaṃ manaś cātra devā vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ
d eṣām uddhartakaḥ kālo nānābhedavad āsthitaḥ
d paramātmā ca bhūtātmā guṇabhedena saṃsthitaḥ
d eka eva tridhā bhinnaḥ karoti vividhāḥ kriyāḥ
d brahmā sṛjati bhūtāni pāti nārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ
d rudro hanti jaganmūrtiḥ kāla eṣa kriyābudhaḥ
d kālo 'pi tanmayo 'cintyas triguṇātmā sanātanaḥ
d avyakto 'sāv acintyo 'sau vartate bhinnalakṣaṇaḥ
d kālātmanā tv idaṃ bhinnam abhinnaṃ śrūyate hi yat
a anādyantam ajaṃ divyam ajaraṃ dhruvam avyayam
c apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ brahmāgre samavartata
a kāṣṭhā nimeṣā daśa pañca caiva
triṃśat tu kāṣṭhā gaṇayet kalāṃ tām
c triṃśat kalāś cāpi bhaven muhūrto
bhāgaḥ kalāyā daśamaś ca yaḥ syāt
a triṃśan muhūrtaś ca bhaved ahaś ca
rātriś ca saṃkhyā munibhiḥ praṇītā
c māsaḥ smṛto rātryahanī ca triṃśat
saṃvatsaro dvādaśamāsa uktaḥ
e saṃvatsaraṃ dve ayane vadanti
saṃkhyāvido dakṣiṇam uttaraṃ ca
a ahorātre vibhajate sūryo mānuṣalaukike
c rātriḥ svapnāya bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭāyai karmaṇām ahaḥ
a pitrye rātryahanī māsaḥ pravibhāgas tayoḥ punaḥ
c kṛṣṇo 'haḥ karmaceṣṭāyāṃ śuklaḥ svapnāya śarvarī
a daive rātryahanī varṣaṃ pravibhāgas tayoḥ punaḥ
c ahas tatrodagayanaṃ rātriḥ syād dakṣiṇāyanam
a ye te rātryahanī pūrve kīrtite daivalaukike
c tayoḥ saṃkhyāya varṣāgraṃ brāhme vakṣyāmy ahaḥkṣape
a teṣāṃ saṃvatsarāgrāṇi pravakṣyāmy anupūrvaśaḥ
c kṛte tretāyuge caiva dvāpare ca kalau tathā
a catvāry āhuḥ sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tat kṛtaṃ yugam
c tasya tāvac chatī saṃdhyā saṃdhyāṃśaś ca tathāvidhaḥ
a itareṣu sasaṃdhyeṣu sasaṃdhyāṃśeṣu ca triṣu
c ekāpāyena saṃyānti sahasrāṇi śatāni ca
a etāni śāśvatāṃl lokān dhārayanti sanātanān
c etad brahmavidāṃ tāta viditaṃ brahma śāśvatam
a catuṣpāt sakalo dharmaḥ satyaṃ caiva kṛte yuge
c nādharmeṇāgamaḥ kaś cit paras tasya pravartate
a itareṣv āgamād dharmaḥ pādaśas tv avaropyate
b satyaṃ śaucaṃ tathāyuś ca dharmaś cāpaiti pādaśaḥ
c caurikānṛtamāyābhir adharmaś copacīyate
a arogāḥ sarvasiddhārthāś caturvarṣaśatāyuṣaḥ
c kṛte tretādiṣv eteṣāṃ pādaśo hrasate vayaḥ
a vedavādāś cānuyugaṃ hrasantīti ca naḥ śrutam
c āyūṃṣi cāśiṣaś caiva vedasyaiva ca yat phalam
a anye kṛtayuge dharmās tretāyāṃ dvāpare 'pare
c anye kaliyuge dharmā yathāśaktikṛtā iva
a tapaḥ paraṃ kṛtayuge tretāyāṃ jñānam uttamam
c dvāpare yajñam evāhur dānam eva kalau yuge
a etāṃ dvādaśasāhasrīṃ yugākhyāṃ kavayo viduḥ
c sahasraṃ parivṛttaṃ tad brāhmaṃ divasam ucyate
a rātris tāvat tithī brāhmī tadādau viśvam īśvaraḥ
c pralaye 'dhyātmam āviśya suptvā so 'nte vibudhyate
a sahasrayugaparyantam ahar yad brahmaṇo viduḥ
c rātriṃ yugasahasrāntāṃ te 'horātravido janāḥ
a pratibuddho vikurute brahmākṣayyaṃ kṣapākṣaye
c sṛjate ca mahad bhūtaṃ tasmād vyaktātmakaṃ manaḥ
a brahma tejomayaṃ śukraṃ yasya sarvam idaṃ jagat
c ekasya bhūtaṃ bhūtasya dvayaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
a ahar mukhe vibuddhaḥ san sṛjate vidyayā jagat
c agra eva mahābhūtam āśu vyaktātmakaṃ manaḥ
a abhibhūyeha cārciṣmad vyasṛjat sapta mānasān
c dūragaṃ bahudhāgāmi prārthanāsaṃśayātmakam
a manaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ vikurute codyamānaṃ sisṛkṣayā
c ākāśaṃ jāyate tasmāt tasya śabdo guṇo mataḥ
a ākāśāt tu vikurvāṇāt sarvagandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
c balavāñ jāyate vāyus tasya sparśo guṇo mataḥ
a vāyor api vikurvāṇāj jyotir bhūtaṃ tamonudam
c rociṣṇu jāyate tatra tad rūpaguṇam ucyate
a jyotiṣo 'pi vikurvāṇād bhavanty āpo rasātmikāḥ
c adbhyo gandhaguṇā bhūmiḥ pūrvaiṣā sṛṣṭir ucyate
a guṇāḥ pūrvasya pūrvasya prāpnuvanty uttarottaram
c teṣāṃ yāvat tithaṃ yad yat tat tat tāvad guṇaṃ smṛtam
a upalabhyāpsu ced gandhaṃ ke cid brūyur anaipuṇāt
c pṛthivyām eva taṃ vidyād āpo vāyuṃ ca saṃśritam
a ete tu sapta puruṣā nānāviryāḥ pṛthak pṛthak
c nāśaknuvan prajāḥ sraṣṭum asamāgamya sarvataḥ
a te sametya mahātmānam anyonyam abhisaṃśritāḥ
c śarīrāśrayaṇaṃ prāptās tataḥ puruṣa ucyate
a śrayaṇāc charīraṃ bhavati mūrtimat ṣoḍaśātmakam
c tad āviśanti bhūtāni mahānti saha karmaṇā
a sarvabhūtāni cādāya tapasaś caraṇāya ca
c ādikartā mahābhūtaṃ tam evāhuḥ prajāpatim
a sa vai sṛjati bhūtāni sa eva puruṣaḥ paraḥ
c ajo janayate brahmā devarṣipitṛmānavān
a lokān nadīḥ samudrāṃś ca diśaḥ śailān vanaspatīn
c narakiṃnararakṣāṃsi vayaḥpaśumṛgoragān
e avyayaṃ ca vyayaṃ caiva dvayaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
a teṣāṃ ye yāni karmāṇi prāk sṛṣṭyāṃ pratipedire
c tāny eva pratipadyante sṛjyamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ
a hiṃsrāhiṃsre mṛdukrūre dharmādharme ṛtānṛte
c ato yan manyate dhātā tasmāt tat tasya rocate
a mahābhūteṣu nānātvam indriyārtheṣu mūrtiṣu
c viniyogaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ dhātaiva vidadhāty uta
a ke cit puruṣakāraṃ tu prāhuḥ karmavido janāḥ
c daivam ity apare viprāḥ svabhāvaṃ bhūtacintakāḥ
a pauruṣaṃ karma daivaṃ ca phalavṛttisvabhāvataḥ
c traya ete 'pṛthagbhūtā navivekaṃ tu ke cana
a evam etac ca naivaṃ ca yad bhūtaṃ sṛjate jagat
c karmasthā viṣamaṃ brūyuḥ sattvasthāḥ samadarśinaḥ
a tapo niḥśreyasaṃ jantos tasya mūlaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
c tena sarvān avāpnoti yān kāmān manasecchati
a tapasā tad avāpnoti yad bhūtaṃ sṛjate jagat
c sa tadbhūtaś ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ bhavati prabhuḥ
a ṛṣayas tapasā vedān adhyaiṣanta divāniśam
c anādinidhanā nityā vāg utsṛṣṭā svayaṃbhuvā
d ādau vedamayī divyā yataḥ sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥ
a ṛṣīṇāṃ nāmadheyāni yāś ca vedeṣu sṛṣṭayaḥ
b nānārūpaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca pravartanam
b vedaśabdebhya evādau nirmimīte sa īśvaraḥ
b nāmadheyāni carṣīṇāṃ yāś ca vedeṣu sṛṣṭayaḥ
c śarvaryanteṣu jātānāṃ tāny evaibhyo dadāti saḥ
a nāmabhedas tapaḥkarmayajñākhyā lokasiddhayaḥ
c ātmasiddhis tu vedeṣu procyate daśabhiḥ kramaiḥ
a yad uktaṃ vedavādeṣu gahanaṃ vedadṛṣṭibhiḥ
c tadanteṣu yathāyuktaṃ kramayogena lakṣyate
a karmajo 'yaṃ pṛthagbhāvo dvaṃdvayukto viyoginaḥ
c ātmasiddhis tu vijñātā jahāti prāyaśo balam
a dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat
c śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati
a ārambhayajñāḥ kṣatrasya haviryajñā viśas tathā
c paricārayajñāḥ śūdrās tu tapoyajñā dvijātayaḥ
a tretāyuge vidhis tv eṣāṃ yajñānāṃ na kṛte yuge
c dvāpare viplavaṃ yānti yajñāḥ kaliyuge tathā
a apṛthagdharmiṇo martyā ṛksāmāni yajūṃṣi ca
c kāmyāṃ puṣṭiṃ pṛthag dṛṣṭvā tapobhis tapa eva ca
a tretāyāṃ tu samastās te prādurāsan mahābalāḥ
c saṃyantāraḥ sthāvarāṇāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
a tretāyāṃ saṃhatā hy ete yajñā varṇās tathaiva ca
c saṃrodhād āyuṣas tv ete vyasyante dvāpare yuge
a dṛśyante nāpi dṛśyante vedāḥ kaliyuge 'khilāḥ
c utsīdante sayajñāś ca kevalā dharmasetavaḥ
a kṛte yuge yas tu dharmo brāhmaṇeṣu pradṛśyate
c ātmavatsu tapovatsu śrutavatsu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a adharmavratasaṃyogaṃ yathādharmaṃ yuge yuge
c vikriyante svadharmasthā vedavādā yathāyugam
a yathā viśvāni bhūtāni vṛṣṭyā bhūyāṃsi prāvṛṣi
c sṛjyante jaṅgamasthāni tathā dharmā yuge yuge
a yathartuṣv ṛtuliṅgāni nānārūpāṇi paryaye
c dṛśyante tāni tāny eva tathā brahmāharātriṣu
a vihitaṃ kālanānātvam anādinidhanaṃ tathā
c kīrtitaṃ yat purastāt te tat sūte cātti ca prajāḥ
a dadhāti prabhave sthānaṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃyamo yamaḥ
c svabhāvenaiva vartante dvaṃdvayuktāni bhūriśaḥ
a sargaḥ kālaḥ kriyā vedāḥ kartā kāryaṃ kriyā phalam
c proktaṃ te putra sarvaṃ vai yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
a pratyāhāraṃ tu vakṣyāmi śarvaryādau gate 'hani
c yathedaṃ kurute 'dhyātmaṃ susūkṣmaṃ viśvam īśvaraḥ
a divi sūryās tathā sapta dahanti śikhino 'rciṣā
c sarvam etat tadārcirbhiḥ pūrṇaṃ jājvalyate jagat
 vyāsa uvāca
a pṛthivyāṃ yāni bhūtāni jaṅgamāni dhruvāṇi ca
c tāny evāgre pralīyante bhūmitvam upayānti ca
a tataḥ pralīne sarvasmin sthāvare jaṅgame tathā
c akāṣṭhā nistṛṇā bhūmir dṛśyate kūrmapṛṣṭhavat
a bhūmer api guṇaṃ gandham āpa ādadate yadā
c āttagandhā tadā bhūmiḥ pralayatvāya kalpate
a āpas tataḥ pratiṣṭhanti ūrmimatyo mahāsvanāḥ
c sarvam evedam āpūrya tiṣṭhanti ca caranti ca
a apām api guṇāṃs tāta jyotir ādadate yadā
c āpas tadā āttaguṇā jyotiṣy uparamanti ca
a yadādityaṃ sthitaṃ madhye gūhanti śikhino 'rciṣaḥ
c sarvam evedam arcirbhiḥ pūrṇaṃ jājvalyate nabhaḥ
a jyotiṣo 'pi guṇaṃ rūpaṃ vāyur ādadate yadā
c praśāmyati tadā jyotir vāyur dodhūyate mahān
a tatas tu mūlam āsādya vāyuḥ saṃbhavam ātmanaḥ
c adhaś cordhvaṃ ca tiryak ca dodhavīti diśo daśa
a vāyor api guṇaṃ sparśam ākāśaṃ grasate yadā
c praśāmyati tadā vāyuḥ khaṃ tu tiṣṭhati nānadat
d arūpam arasasparśam agandhaṃ na ca mūrtimat
d sarvalokapraṇaditaṃ svaṃ tu tiṣṭhati nānadat
a ākāśasya guṇaṃ śabdam abhivyaktātmakaṃ manaḥ
b grasate ca yadā so 'pi śāmyati pratisaṃcare
c manaso vyaktam avyaktaṃ brāhmaḥ sa pratisaṃcaraḥ
a tad ātmaguṇam āviśya mano grasati candramāḥ
c manasy uparate 'dhyātmā candramasy avatiṣṭhate
a taṃ tu kālena mahatā saṃkalpaḥ kurute vaśe
c cittaṃ grasati saṃkalpas tac ca jñānam anuttamam
a kālo girati vijñānaṃ kālo balam iti śrutiḥ
c balaṃ kālo grasati tu taṃ vidvān kurute vaśe
a ākāśasya tadā ghoṣaṃ taṃ vidvān kurute ''tmani
c tad avyaktaṃ paraṃ brahma tac chāśvatam anuttamam
e evaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni brahmaiva pratisaṃcaraḥ
a yathāvat kīrtitaṃ samyag evam etad asaṃśayam
c bodhyaṃ vidyāmayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yogibhiḥ paramātmabhiḥ
a evaṃ vistārasaṃkṣepau brahmāvyakte punaḥ punaḥ
c yugasāhasrayor ādāv ahno rātryās tathaiva ca
 vyāsa uvāca
a bhūtagrāme niyuktaṃ yat tad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā
c brāhmaṇasya tu yat kṛtyaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi pṛcchate
a jātakarmaprabhṛty asya karmaṇāṃ dakṣiṇāvatām
c kriyā syād ā samāvṛtter ācārye vedapārage
a adhītya vedān akhilān guruśuśrūṣaṇe rataḥ
c gurūṇām anṛṇo bhūtvā samāvarteta yajñavit
a ācāryeṇābhyanujñātaś caturṇām ekam āśramam
c ā vimokṣāc charīrasya so 'nutiṣṭhed yathāvidhi
a prajāsargeṇa dāraiś ca brahmacaryeṇa vā punaḥ
c vane gurusakāśe vā yatidharmeṇa vā punaḥ
a gṛhasthas tv eva sarveṣāṃ caturṇāṃ mūlam ucyate
c tatra pakvakaṣāyo hi dāntaḥ sarvatra sidhyati
a prajāvāñ śrotriyo yajvā mukto divyais tribhir ṛṇaiḥ
c athānyān āśramān paścāt pūto gacchati karmabhiḥ
a yat pṛthivyāṃ puṇyatamaṃ vidyāsthānaṃ tadāvaset
c yateta tasmin prāmāṇyaṃ gantuṃ yaśasi cottame
a tapasā vā sumahatā vidyānāṃ pāraṇena vā
c ijyayā vā pradānair vā viprāṇāṃ vardhate yaśaḥ
a yāvad asya bhavaty asmiṃl loke kīrtir yaśaskarī
c tāvat puṇyakṛtāṃl lokān anantān puruṣo 'śnute
a adhyāpayed adhīyīta yājayeta yajeta ca
c na vṛthā pratigṛhṇīyān na ca dadyāt kathaṃ cana
a yājyataḥ śiṣyato vāpi kanyayā vā dhanaṃ mahat
c yady āgacched yajed dadyān naiko 'śnīyāt kathaṃ cana
a gṛham āvasato hy asya nānyat tīrthaṃ pratigrahāt
c devarṣipitṛgurvarthaṃ vṛddhāturabubhukṣatām
a antarhitābhitaptānāṃ yathāśakti bubhūṣatām
c dravyāṇām atiśaktyāpi deyam eṣāṃ kṛtād api
a arhatām anurūpāṇāṃ nādeyaṃ hy asti kiṃ cana
c uccaiḥśravasam apy aśvaṃ prāpaṇīyaṃ satāṃ viduḥ
dA dattvā jagāma brahmādau lokān daivair abhiṣṭutān
a anunīya tathā kāvyaḥ satyasaṃdho mahāvrataḥ
c svaiḥ prāṇair brāhmaṇaprāṇān paritrāya divaṃ gataḥ
a rantidevaś ca sāṃkṛtyo vasiṣṭhāya mahātmane
c apaḥ pradāya śītoṣṇā nākapṛṣṭhe mahīyate
a ātreyaś candradamayor arhator vividhaṃ dhanam
c dattvā lokān yayau dhīmān anantān sa mahīpatiḥ
a śibirauśīnaro 'ṅgāni sutaṃ ca priyam aurasam
c brāhmaṇārtham upākṛtya nākapṛṣṭham ito gataḥ
a pratardanaḥ kāśipatiḥ pradāya nayane svake
c brāhmaṇāyātulāṃ kīrtim iha cāmutra cāśnute
a divyaṃ mṛṣṭaśalākaṃ tu sauvarṇaṃ paramarddhimat
c chatraṃ devāvṛdho dattvā sarāṣṭro 'bhyapatad divam
a sāṃkṛtiś ca tathātreyaḥ śiṣyebhyo brahma nirguṇam
c upadiśya mahātejā gato lokān anuttamān
a ambarīṣo gavāṃ dattvā brāhmaṇebhyaḥ pratāpavān
c arbudāni daśaikaṃ ca sarāṣṭro 'bhyapatad divam
a sāvitrī kuṇḍale divye śarīraṃ janamejayaḥ
c brāhmaṇārthe parityajya jagmatur lokam uttamam
a sarvaratnaṃ vṛṣādarbho yuvanāśvaḥ priyāḥ striyaḥ
c ramyam āvasathaṃ caiva dattvāmuṃ lokam āsthitaḥ
a nimī rāṣṭraṃ ca vaideho jāmadagnyo vasuṃdharām
c brāhmaṇebhyo dadau cāpi gayaś corvīṃ sapattanām
a avarṣati ca parjanye sarvabhūtāni cāsakṛt
c vasiṣṭho jīvayām āsa prajāpatir iva prajāḥ
a karaṃdhamasya putras tu marutto nṛpatis tathā
c kanyām aṅgirase dattvā divam āśu jagāma ha
a brahmadattaś ca pāñcālyo rājā buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
c nidhiṃ śaṅkhaṃ dvijāgryebhyo dattvā lokān avāptavān
a rājā mitrasahaś cāpi vasiṣṭhāya mahātmane
c madayantīṃ priyāṃ dattvā tayā saha divaṃ gataḥ
a sahasrajic ca rājarṣiḥ prāṇān iṣṭān mahāyaśāḥ
c brāhmaṇārthe parityajya gato lokān anuttamān
a sarvakāmaiś ca saṃpūrṇaṃ dattvā veśma hiraṇmayam
c mudgalāya gataḥ svargaṃ śatadyumno mahīpatiḥ
a nāmnā ca dyutimān nāma śālvarājaḥ pratāpavān
c dattvā rājyam ṛcīkāya gato lokān anuttamān
a madirāśvaś ca rājarṣir dattvā kanyāṃ sumadhyamām
c hiraṇyahastāya gato lokān devair abhiṣṭutān
a lomapādaś ca rājarṣiḥ śāntāṃ dattvā sutāṃ prabhuḥ
c ṛśyaśṛṅgāya vipulaiḥ sarvakāmair ayujyata
a dattvā śatasahasraṃ tu gavāṃ rājā prasenajit
c savatsānāṃ mahātejā gato lokān anuttamān
a ete cānye ca bahavo dānena tapasā ca ha
c mahātmāno gatāḥ svargaṃ śiṣṭātmāno jitendriyāḥ
a teṣāṃ pratiṣṭhitā kīrtir yāvat sthāsyati medinī
c dānayajñaprajāsargair ete hi divam āpnuvan
 vyāsa uvāca
a trayīvidyām avekṣeta vedeṣūktām athāṅgataḥ
c ṛksāmavarṇākṣarato yajuṣo 'tharvaṇas tathā
d tiṣṭhaty eteṣu bhagavān ṣaṭsu karmasu saṃsthitaḥ
a vedavādeṣu kuśalā hy adhyātmakuśalāś ca ye
c sattvavanto mahābhāgāḥ paśyanti prabhavāpyayau
a evaṃ dharmeṇa varteta kriyāḥ śiṣṭavad ācaret
c asaṃrodhena bhūtānāṃ vṛttiṃ lipseta vai dvijaḥ
a sadbhya āgatavijñānaḥ śiṣṭaḥ śāstravicakṣaṇaḥ
c svadharmeṇa kriyā loke kurvāṇaḥ satyasaṃgaraḥ
a tiṣṭhaty eteṣu gṛhavān ṣaṭsu karmasu sa dvijaḥ
c pañcabhiḥ satataṃ yajñaiḥ śraddadhāno yajeta ca
a dhṛtimān apramattaś ca dānto dharmavid ātmavān
c vītaharṣabhayakrodho brāhmaṇo nāvasīdati
a dānam adhyayanaṃ yajñas tapo hrīr ārjavaṃ damaḥ
c etair vardhayate tejaḥ pāpmānaṃ cāpakarṣati
a dhūtapāpmā tu medhāvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ
c kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā ninīṣed brahmaṇaḥ padam
a agnīṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cārced devatāḥ praṇameta ca
c varjayed ruṣatīṃ vācaṃ hiṃsāṃ cādharmasaṃhitām
a eṣā pūrvatarā vṛttir brāhmaṇasya vidhīyate
c jñānāgamena karmāṇi kurvan karmasu sidhyati
a pañcendriyajalāṃ ghorāṃ lobhakūlāṃ sudustarām
c manyupaṅkām anādhṛṣyāṃ nadīṃ tarati buddhimān
a kāmamanyūddhataṃ yat syān nityam atyantamohitam
c mahatā vidhidṛṣṭena balenāpratighātinā
e svabhāvasrotasā vṛttam uhyate satataṃ jagat
a kālodakena mahatā varṣāvartena saṃtatam
c māsormiṇartuvegena pakṣolapatṛṇena ca
a nimeṣonmeṣaphenena ahorātrajavena ca
c kāmagrāheṇa ghoreṇa vedayajñaplavena ca
a dharmadvīpena bhūtānāṃ cārthakāmaraveṇa ca
c ṛtasopānatīreṇa vihiṃsātaruvāhinā
a yugahradaughamadhyena brahmaprāyabhavena ca
c dhātrā sṛṣṭāni bhūtāni kṛṣyante yamasādanam
a etat prajñāmayair dhīrā nistaranti manīṣiṇaḥ
c plavair aplavavanto hi kiṃ kariṣyanty acetasaḥ
a upapannaṃ hi yat prājño nistaren netaro janaḥ
c dūrato guṇadoṣau hi prājñaḥ sarvatra paśyati
a saṃśayātmā sa kāmātmā calacitto 'lpacetanaḥ
c aprājño na taraty eva yo hy āste na sa gacchati
a aplavo hi mahādoṣam uhyamāno 'dhigacchati
c kāmagrāhagṛhītasya jñānam apy asya na plavaḥ
a tasmād unmajjanasyārthe prayateta vicakṣaṇaḥ
c etad unmajjanaṃ tasya yad ayaṃ brāhmaṇo bhavet
a tryavadāte kule jātas trisaṃdehas trikarmakṛt
c tasmād unmajjanas tiṣṭhen nistaret prajñayā yathā
a saṃskṛtasya hi dāntasya niyatasya kṛtātmanaḥ
c prājñasyānantarā siddhir iha loke paratra ca
a vartate teṣu gṛhavān akrudhyann anasūyakaḥ
c pañcabhiḥ satataṃ yajñair vighasāśī yajeta ca
a satāṃ vṛttena varteta kriyāḥ śiṣṭavad ācaret
c asaṃrodhena dharmasya vṛttiṃ lipsed agarhitām
a śrutivijñānatattvajñaḥ śiṣṭācāro vicakṣaṇaḥ
c svadharmeṇa kriyāvāṃś ca karmaṇā so 'py asaṃkaraḥ
a kriyāvāñ śraddadhānaś ca dātā prājño 'nasūyakaḥ
c dharmādharmaviśeṣajñaḥ sarvaṃ tarati dustaram
a dhṛtimān apramattaś ca dānto dharmavid ātmavān
c vītaharṣabhayakrodho brāhmaṇo nāvasīdati
a eṣā pūrvatarā vṛttir brāhmaṇasya vidhīyate
c jñānavittvena karmāṇi kurvan sarvatra sidhyati
a adharmaṃ dharmakāmo hi karotīhāvicakṣaṇaḥ
c dharmaṃ cādharmasaṃkāśaṃ śocann iva karoti saḥ
a dharmaṃ karomīti karoty adharmam
adharmakāmaś ca karoti dharmam
c ubhe bālaḥ karmaṇī na prajānan
sa jāyate mriyate cāpi dehī
 vyāsa uvāca
a atha ced rocayed etad druhyeta manasā tathā
c unmajjaṃś ca nimajjaṃś ca jñānavān plavavān bhavet
a prajñayā nirmitair dhīrās tārayanty abudhān plavaiḥ
c nābudhās tārayanty anyān ātmānaṃ vā kathaṃ cana
a chinnadoṣo munir yogān yukto yuñjīta dvādaśa
c daśakarmasukhān arthān upāyāpāyanirbhayaḥ
a cakṣur ācāravit prājño manasā darśanena ca
c yacched vāṅmanasī buddhyā ya icchej jñānam uttamam
e jñānena yacched ātmānaṃ ya icchec chāntim ātmanaḥ
a eteṣāṃ ced anudraṣṭā puruṣo 'pi sudāruṇaḥ
c yadi vā sarvavedajño yadi vāpy anṛco 'japaḥ
a yadi vā dhārmiko yajvā yadi vā pāpakṛttamaḥ
c yadi vā puruṣavyāghro yadi vā klaibyadhāritā
a taraty eva mahādurgaṃ jarāmaraṇasāgaram
c evaṃ hy etena yogena yuñjāno 'py ekam antataḥ
e api jijñāsamāno hi śabdabrahmātivartate
a dharmopastho hrīvarūtha upāyāpāyakūbaraḥ
c apānākṣaḥ prāṇayugaḥ prajñāyur jīvabandhanaḥ
a cetanābandhuraś cārur ācāragrahanemivān
c darśanasparśanavaho ghrāṇaśravaṇavāhanaḥ
a prajñānābhiḥ sarvatantrapratodo jñānasārathiḥ
c kṣetrajñādhiṣṭhito dhīraḥ śraddhādamapuraḥsaraḥ
a tyāgavartmānugaḥ kṣemyaḥ śaucago dhyānagocaraḥ
c jīvayukto ratho divyo brahmaloke virājate
a atha saṃtvaramāṇasya ratham etaṃ yuyukṣataḥ
c akṣaraṃ gantumanaso vidhiṃ vakṣyāmi śīghragam
a sapta yo dhāraṇāḥ kṛtsnā vāgyataḥ pratipadyate
c pṛṣṭhataḥ pārśvataś cānyā yāvatyas tāḥ pradhāraṇāḥ
a kramaśaḥ pārthivaṃ yac ca vāyavyaṃ khaṃ tathā payaḥ
c jyotiṣo yat tad aiśvaryam ahaṃkārasya buddhitaḥ
a avyaktasya tathaiśvaryaṃ kramaśaḥ pratipadyate
c vikramāś cāpi yasyaite tathā yuṅkte sa yogataḥ
a athāsya yogayuktasya siddhim ātmani paśyataḥ
c nirmathyamānaḥ sūkṣmatvād rūpāṇīmāni darśayet
a śaiśiras tu yathā dhūmaḥ sūkṣmaḥ saṃśrayate nabhaḥ
c tathā dehād vimuktasya pūrvarūpaṃ bhavaty uta
a atha dhūmasya virame dvitīyaṃ rūpadarśanam
c jalarūpam ivākāśe tatraivātmani paśyati
a apāṃ vyatikrame cāpi vahnirūpaṃ prakāśate
c tasminn uparate cāsya pītavastravad iṣyate
c   vāyavyaṃ sūkṣmam apy atha
c rūpaṃ prakāśate tatra
d tasminn uparate rūpam ākāśasya prakāśate
e ūrṇārūpasavarṇaṃ ca tasya rūpaṃ prakāśate
a atha śvetāṃ gatiṃ gatvā vāyavyaṃ sūkṣmam apy ajaḥ
b tasminn uparate cāsya buddhirūpaṃ prakāśate
c aśuklaṃ cetasaḥ saukṣmyam avyaktaṃ brahmaṇo 'sya vai
a eteṣv api hi jāteṣu phalajātāni me śṛṇu
c jātasya pārthivaiśvarye sṛṣṭir iṣṭā vidhīyate
a prajāpatir ivākṣobhyaḥ śarīrāt sṛjati prajāḥ
c aṅgulyaṅguṣṭhamātreṇa hastapādena vā tathā
a pṛthivīṃ kampayaty eko guṇo vāyor iti smṛtaḥ
c ākāśabhūtaś cākāśe savarṇatvāt praṇaśyati
a varṇato gṛhyate cāpi kāmāt pibati cāśayān
c na cāsya tejasā rūpaṃ dṛśyate śāmyate tathā
a ahaṃkārasya vijiteḥ pañcaite syur vaśānugāḥ
c ṣaṇṇām ātmani buddhau ca jitāyāṃ prabhavaty atha
a nirdoṣā pratibhā hy enaṃ kṛtsnā samabhivartate
c tathaiva vyaktam ātmānam avyaktaṃ pratipadyate
a yato niḥsarate loko bhavati vyaktasaṃjñakaḥ
c tatrāvyaktamayīṃ vyākhyāṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ vistareṇa me
e tathā vyaktamayīṃ caiva saṃkhyāṃ pūrvaṃ nibodha me
a pañcaviṃśatitattvāni tulyāny ubhayataḥ samam
c yoge sāṃkhye 'pi ca tathā viśeṣāṃs tatra me śṛṇu
a proktaṃ tad vyaktam ity eva jāyate vardhate ca yat
c jīryate mriyate caiva caturbhir lakṣaṇair yutam
a viparītam ato yat tu tad avyaktam udāhṛtam
c dvāv ātmānau ca vedeṣu siddhānteṣv apy udāhṛtau
a caturlakṣaṇajaṃ tv anyaṃ caturvargaṃ pracakṣate
c vyaktam avyaktajaṃ caiva tathā buddham athetarat
e sattvaṃ kṣetrajña ity etad dvayam apy anudarśitam
a dvāv ātmānau ca vedeṣu viṣayeṣu ca rajyataḥ
c viṣayāt pratisaṃhāraḥ sāṃkhyānāṃ siddhilakṣaṇam
a nirmamaś cānahaṃkāro nirdvaṃdvaś chinnasaṃśayaḥ
c naiva krudhyati na dveṣṭi nānṛtā bhāṣate giraḥ
a ākruṣṭas tāḍitaś caiva maitreṇa dhyāti nāśubham
c vāgdaṇḍakarmamanasāṃ trayāṇāṃ ca nivartakaḥ
a samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahmāṇam abhivartate
c naivecchati na cāniccho yātrāmātravyavasthitaḥ
a alolupo 'vyatho dānto na kṛtī na nirākṛtiḥ
c nāsyendriyam anekāgraṃ nātikṣiptamanorathaḥ
d sarvabhūtahito maitraḥ samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ
d tulyapriyāpriyo dhīras tulyanindātmasaṃstutiḥ
d aspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyo brahmacarye dṛḍhaś ca yaḥ
e ahiṃsraḥ sarvabhūtānām īdṛk sāṃkhyo vimucyate
a atha yogād vimucyante kāraṇair yair nibodha me
c yogaiśvaryam atikrānto yo 'tikrāmati mucyate
a ity eṣā bhāvajā buddhiḥ kathitā te na saṃśayaḥ
c evaṃ bhavati nirdvaṃdvo brahmāṇaṃ cādhigacchati
 vyāsa uvāca
a atha jñānaplavaṃ dhīro gṛhītvā śāntim āsthitaḥ
c unmajjaṃś ca nimajjaṃś ca jñānam evābhisaṃśrayet
 śuka uvāca
a kiṃ taj jñānam atho vidyā yayā nistarati dvayam
c pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo nivṛttir iti caiva hi
 vyāsa uvāca
a yas tu paśyet svabhāvena vinā bhāvam acetanaḥ
c puṣyate ca punaḥ sarvān prajñayā muktahetukaḥ
a yeṣāṃ caikāntabhāvena svabhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ matam
c pūtvā tṛṇabusīkāṃ vai te labhante na kiṃ cana
a ye cainaṃ pakṣam āśritya vartayanty alpacetasaḥ
c svabhāvaṃ kāraṇaṃ jñātvā na śreyaḥ prāpnuvanti te
a svabhāvo hi vināśāya mohakarmamanobhavaḥ
c niruktam etayor etat svabhāvaparabhāvayoḥ
a kṛṣyādīni hi karmāṇi sasyasaṃharaṇāni ca
c prajñāvadbhiḥ prakḷptāni yānāsanagṛhāṇi ca
a ākrīḍānāṃ gṛhāṇāṃ ca gadānām agadasya ca
c prajñāvantaḥ pravaktāro jñānavadbhir anuṣṭhitāḥ
a prajñā saṃyojayaty arthaiḥ prajñā śreyo 'dhigacchati
c rājāno bhuñjate rājyaṃ prajñayā tulyalakṣaṇāḥ
a pārāvaryaṃ tu bhūtānāṃ jñānenaivopalabhyate
c vidyayā tāta sṛṣṭānāṃ vidyaiva paramā gatiḥ
a bhūtānāṃ janma sarveṣāṃ vividhānāṃ caturvidham
c jarāyvaṇḍam athodbhedaṃ svedaṃ cāpy upalakṣayet
a sthāvarebhyo viśiṣṭāni jaṅgamāny upalakṣayet
c upapannaṃ hi yac ceṣṭā viśiṣyeta viśeṣyayoḥ
a āhur dvibahupādāni jaṅgamāni dvayāni ca
c bahupādbhyo viśiṣṭāni dvipādāni bahūny api
a dvipadāni dvayāny āhuḥ pārthivānītarāṇi ca
c pārthivāni viśiṣṭāni tāni hy annāni bhuñjate
a pārthivāni dvayāny āhur madhyamāny uttamāni ca
c madhyamāni viśiṣṭāni jātidharmopadhāraṇāt
a madhyamāni dvayāny āhur dharmajñānītarāṇi ca
c dharmajñāni viśiṣṭāni kāryākāryopadhāraṇāt
a dharmajñāni dvayāny āhur vedajñānītarāṇi ca
c vedajñāni viśiṣṭāni vedo hy eṣu pratiṣṭhitaḥ
a vedajñāni dvayāny āhuḥ pravaktṝṇītarāṇi ca
c pravaktṝṇi viśiṣṭāni sarvadharmopadhāraṇāt
a vijñāyante hi yair vedāḥ sarvadharmakriyāphalāḥ
c sayajñāḥ sakhilā vedāḥ pravaktṛbhyo viniḥsṛtāḥ
a pravaktṝṇi dvayāny āhur ātmajñānītarāṇi ca
c ātmajñāni viśiṣṭāni janmājanmopadhāraṇāt
a dharmadvayaṃ hi yo veda sa sarvaḥ sarvadharmavid
c sa tyāgī satyasaṃkalpaḥ sa tu kṣāntaḥ sa īśvaraḥ
a dharmajñānapratiṣṭhaṃ hi taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
c śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaṃ pare ca kṛtaniścayam
a antaḥsthaṃ ca bahiṣṭhaṃ ca ye ''dhiyajñādhidaivatam
c jānanti tān namasyāmas te devās tāta te dvijāḥ
a teṣu viśvam idaṃ bhūtaṃ sāgraṃ ca jagad āhitam
c teṣāṃ māhātmyabhāvasya sadṛśaṃ nāsti kiṃ cana
a ādiṃ te nidhanaṃ caiva karma cātītya sarvaśaḥ
c caturvidhasya bhūtasya sarvasyeśāḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
 vyāsa uvāca
a eṣā pūrvatarā vṛttir brāhmaṇasya vidhīyate
c jñānavān eva karmāṇi kurvan sarvatra sidhyati
a tatra cen na bhaved evaṃ saṃśayaḥ karmaniścaye
c kiṃ nu karma svabhāvo 'yaṃ jñānaṃ karmeti vā punaḥ
a tatra ceha vivitsā syāj jñānaṃ cet puruṣaṃ prati
c upapattyupalabdhibhyāṃ varṇayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
a pauruṣaṃ kāraṇaṃ ke cid āhuḥ karmasu mānavāḥ
c daivam eke praśaṃsanti svabhāvaṃ cāpare janāḥ
a pauruṣaṃ karma daivaṃ ca phalavṛttisvabhāvataḥ
c trayam etat pṛthagbhūtam avivekaṃ tu ke cana
a evam etan na cāpy evam ubhe cāpi na cāpy ubhe
c karmasthā viṣamaṃ brūyuḥ sattvasthāḥ samadarśinaḥ
a tretāyāṃ dvāpare caiva kalijāś ca sasaṃśayāḥ
b tretāyuge vidhis tv eṣa dharmāṇāṃ na kṛte yuge
c tapasvinaḥ praśāntāś ca sattvasthāś ca kṛte yuge
a apṛthagdarśinaḥ sarve ṛksāmasu yajuḥṣu ca
c kāmadveṣau pṛthag dṛṣṭvā tapaḥ kṛta upāsate
a tapodharmeṇa saṃyuktas taponityaḥ susaṃśitaḥ
c tena sarvān avāpnoti kāmān yān manasecchati
a tapasā tad avāpnoti yad bhūtvā sṛjate jagat
c tadbhūtaś ca tataḥ sarvo bhūtānāṃ bhavati prabhuḥ
a tad uktaṃ vedavādeṣu gahanaṃ vedadarśibhiḥ
c vedānteṣu punar vyaktaṃ kramayogena lakṣyate
a ārambhayajñāḥ kṣatrasya haviryajñā viśaḥ smṛtāḥ
c paricārayajñāḥ śūdrāś ca japayajñā dvijātayaḥ
a pariniṣṭhitakāryo hi svādhyāyena dvijo bhavet
c kuryād anyan na vā kuryān maitro brāhmaṇa ucyate
a tretādau sakalā vedā yajñā varṇāśramās tathā
c saṃrodhād āyuṣas tv ete vyasyante dvāpare yuge
a dvāpare viplavaṃ yānti vedāḥ kaliyuge tathā
c dṛśyante nāpi dṛśyante kaler ante punaḥ punaḥ
a utsīdanti svadharmāś ca tatrādharmeṇa pīḍitāḥ
c gavāṃ bhūmeś ca ye cāpām oṣadhīnāṃ ca ye rasāḥ
a adharmāntarhitā vedā vedadharmās tathāśramāḥ
c vikriyante svadharmasthāḥ sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
a yathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni vṛṣṭir bhaumāni varṣati
c sṛjate sarvato 'ṅgāni tathā vedā yuge yuge
a visṛtaṃ kālanānātvam anādinidhanaṃ ca yat
c kīrtitaṃ tat purastān me yataḥ saṃyānti yānti ca
a dhātedaṃ prabhavasthānaṃ bhūtānāṃ saṃyamo yamaḥ
c svabhāvena pravartante dvaṃdvasṛṣṭāni bhūriśaḥ
a sargaḥ kālo dhṛtir vedāḥ kartā kāryaṃ kriyā phalam
c etat te kathitaṃ tāta yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity ukto 'bhipraśasyaitat paramarṣes tu śāsanam
c mokṣadharmārthasaṃyuktam idaṃ praṣṭuṃ pracakrame
 śuka uvāca
a prajāvāñ śrotriyo yajvā vṛddhaḥ prajño 'nasūyakaḥ
c anāgatam anaitihyaṃ kathaṃ brahmādhigacchati
a tapasā brahmacaryeṇa sarvatyāgena medhayā
c sāṃkhye vā yadi vā yoge etat pṛṣṭo 'bhidhatsva me
a manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ cāpy aikāgryaṃ samavāpyate
c yenopāyena puruṣais tac ca vyākhyātum arhasi
 vyāsa uvāca
a nānyatra vidyātapasor nānyatrendriyanigrahāt
c nānyatra sarvasaṃtyāgāt siddhiṃ vindati kaś cana
a mahābhūtāni sarvāṇi pūrvasṛṣṭiḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
c bhūyiṣṭhaṃ prāṇabhṛdgrāme niviṣṭāni śarīriṣu
a bhūmer deho jalāt sāro jyotiṣaś cakṣuṣī smṛte
c prāṇāpānāśrayo vāyuḥ kheṣv ākāśaṃ śarīriṇām
a krānte viṣṇur bale śakraḥ koṣṭhe 'gnir bhuktam archati
c karṇayoḥ pradiśaḥ śrotre jihvāyāṃ vāk sarasvatī
a karṇau tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī
c darśanānīndriyoktāni dvārāṇy āhārasiddhaye
a śabdaṃ sparśaṃ tathā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ ca pañcamam
c indriyāṇi pṛthak tv arthān manaso darśayanty uta
a indriyāṇi mano yuṅkte vaśyān yanteva vājinaḥ
c manaś cāpi sadā yuṅkte bhūtātmā hṛdayāśritaḥ
a indriyāṇāṃ tathaiveṣāṃ sarveṣām īśvaraṃ manaḥ
c niyame ca visarge ca bhūtātmā manasas tathā
a indriyāṇīndriyārthāś ca svabhāvaś cetanā manaḥ
c prāṇāpānau ca jīvaś ca nityaṃ deheṣu dehinām
a āśrayo nāsti sattvasya guṇaśabdo na cetanā
c sattvaṃ hi tejaḥ sṛjati na guṇān vai kadā cana
a evaṃ saptadaśaṃ dehe vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ
c manīṣī manasā vipraḥ paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
a na hy ayaṃ cakṣuṣā dṛśyo na ca sarvair apīndriyaiḥ
c manasā saṃpradīptena mahān ātmā prakāśate
a aśabdasparśarūpaṃ tad arasāgandham avyayam
c aśarīraṃ śarīre sve nirīkṣeta nirindriyam
a avyaktaṃ vyaktadeheṣu martyeṣv amaram āśritam
c yo 'nupaśyati sa pretya kalpate brahmabhūyase
a vidyābhijanasaṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastini
c śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ
a sa hi sarveṣu bhūteṣu jaṅgameṣu dhruveṣu ca
c vasaty eko mahān ātmā yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
a sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani
c yadā paśyati bhūtātmā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a yāvān ātmani vedātmā tāvān ātmā parātmani
c ya evaṃ satataṃ veda so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate
a sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya sarvabhūtahitasya ca
c devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ
a śakunīnām ivākāśe jale vāricarasya vā
c yathā gatir na dṛśyeta tathaiva sumahātmanaḥ
a kālaḥ pacati bhūtāni sarvāṇy evātmanātmani
c yasmiṃs tu pacyate kālas taṃ na vedeha kaś cana
a na tad ūrdhvaṃ na tiryak ca nādho na ca tiraḥ punaḥ
b indriyair api buddhyā vā gṛhyate na kadā cana
c na madhye pratigṛhṇīte naiva kaś cit kutaś cana
a sarve 'ntaḥsthā ime lokā bāhyam eṣāṃ na kiṃ cana
c yaḥ sahasraṃ samāgacched yathā bāṇo guṇacyutaḥ
a naivāntaṃ kāraṇasyeyād yady api syān manojavaḥ
c tasmāt sūkṣmāt sūkṣmataraṃ nāsti sthūlataraṃ tataḥ
a sarvataḥpāṇipādāntaṃ sarvatokṣiśiromukham
c sarvataḥśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
a tad evāṇor aṇutaraṃ tan mahadbhyo mahattaram
c tad antaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate
a akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva dvaidhībhāvo 'yam ātmanaḥ
c kṣaraḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu divyaṃ hy amṛtam akṣaram
a navadvāraṃ puraṃ gatvā haṃso hi niyato vaśī
c īśaḥ sarvasya bhūtasya sthāvarasya carasya ca
a hānibhaṅgavikalpānāṃ navānāṃ saṃśrayeṇa ca
c śarīrāṇām ajasyāhur haṃsatvaṃ pāradarśinaḥ
a haṃsoktaṃ cākṣaraṃ caiva kūṭasthaṃ yat tad akṣaram
c tad vidvān akṣaraṃ prāpya jahāti prāṇajanmanī
 vyāsa uvāca
a pṛcchatas tava satputra yathāvad iha tattvataḥ
c sāṃkhyanyāyena saṃyuktaṃ yad etat kīrtitaṃ mayā
a yogakṛtyaṃ tu te kṛtsnaṃ vartayiṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
c ekatvaṃ buddhimanasor indriyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
e ātmano dhyāyinas tāta jñānam etad anuttamam
a tad etad upaśāntena dāntenādhyātmaśīlinā
c ātmārāmeṇa buddhena boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇā
a yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ
c kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam
a krodhaṃ śamena jayati kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt
c sattvasaṃsevanād dhīro nidrām ucchettum arhati
a dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣā
c cakṣuḥ śrotre ca manasā mano vācaṃ ca karmaṇā
a apramādād bhayaṃ jahyāl lobhaṃ prājñopasevanāt
c evam etān yogadoṣāñ jayen nityam atandritaḥ
a agnīṃś ca brāhmaṇāṃś cārced devatāḥ praṇameta ca
c varjayed ruṣitāṃ vācaṃ hiṃsāyuktāṃ manonugām
a brahma tejomayaṃ śukraṃ yasya sarvam idaṃ rasaḥ
c ekasya bhūtaṃ bhūtasya dvayaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
a dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā
c śaucam āhārasaṃśuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca nigrahaḥ
a etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānaṃ cāpakarṣati
c sidhyanti cāsya sarvārthā vijñānaṃ ca pravartate
a samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu labdhālabdhena vartayan
c dhutapāpmā tu tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ
e kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā ninīṣed brahmaṇaḥ padam
a manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca kṛtvaikāgryaṃ samāhitaḥ
c prāg rātrāpararātreṣu dhārayen mana ātmanā
a jantoḥ pañcendriyasyāsya yad ekaṃ chidram indriyam
c tato 'sya sravati prajñā dṛteḥ pādād ivodakam
a manas tu pūrvam ādadyāt kumīnān iva matsyahā
c tataḥ śrotraṃ tataś cakṣur jihvāṃ ghrāṇaṃ ca yogavit
a tata etāni saṃyamya manasi sthāpayed yatiḥ
c tathaivāpohya saṃkalpān mano hy ātmani dhārayet
a pañca jñānena saṃdhāya manasi sthāpayed yatiḥ
c yadaitāny avatiṣṭhante manaḥṣaṣṭhāni cātmani
e prasīdanti ca saṃsthāya tadā brahma prakāśate
a vidhūma iva dīptārcir āditya iva dīptimān
c vaidyuto 'gnir ivākāśe paśyaty ātmānam ātmanā
e sarvaṃ ca tatra sarvatra vyāpakatvāc ca dṛśyate
a taṃ paśyanti mahātmāno brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ
c dhṛtimanto mahāprājñāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
a evaṃ parimitaṃ kālam ācaran saṃśitavrataḥ
c āsīno hi rahasy eko gacched akṣarasātmyatām
a pramoho bhrama āvarto ghrāṇaśravaṇadarśane
c adbhutāni rasasparśe śītoṣṇe mārutākṛtiḥ
a pratibhām upasargāṃś cāpy upasaṃgṛhya yogataḥ
c tāṃs tattvavid anādṛtya svātmanaiva nivartayet
a kuryāt paricayaṃ yoge traikālyaṃ niyato muniḥ
c giriśṛṅge tathā caitye vṛkṣāgreṣu ca yojajet
a saṃniyamyendriyagrāmaṃ goṣṭhe bhāṇḍamanā iva
c ekāgraś cintayen nityaṃ yogān nodvejayen manaḥ
a yenopāyena śakyeta saṃniyantuṃ calaṃ manaḥ
c taṃ taṃ yukto niṣeveta na caiva vicalet tataḥ
a śūnyā giriguhāś caiva devatāyatanāni ca
c śūnyāgārāṇi caikāgro nivāsārtham upakramet
a nābhiṣvajet paraṃ vācā karmaṇā manasāpi vā
c upekṣako yatāhāro labdhālabdhe samo bhavet
a yaś cainam abhinandeta yaś cainam apavādayet
c samas tayoś cāpy ubhayor nābhidhyāyec chubhāśubham
a na prahṛṣyeta lābheṣu nālābheṣu ca cintayet
c samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu sadharmā mātariśvanaḥ
a evaṃ sarvātmanaḥ sādhoḥ sarvatra samadarśinaḥ
c ṣaṇmāsān nityayuktasya śabdabrahmātivartate
a vedanārtāḥ prajā dṛṣṭvā samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ
c etasmin nirato mārge viramen na vimohitaḥ
a api varṇāv akṛṣṭas tu nārī vā dharmakāṅkṣiṇī
c tāv apy etena mārgeṇa gacchetāṃ paramāṃ gatim
a ajaṃ purāṇam ajaraṃ sanātanaṃ
yad indriyair upalabhate naro 'calaḥ
c aṇor aṇīyo mahato mahattaraṃ
tadātmanā paśyati yukta ātmavān
a idaṃ maharṣer vacanaṃ mahātmano
yathāvad uktaṃ manasānudṛśya ca
c avekṣya ceyāt parameṣṭhisātmyatāṃ
prayānti yāṃ bhūtagatiṃ manīṣiṇaḥ
 śuka uvāca
a yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ kuru karma tyajeti ca
c kāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti kāṃ ca gacchanti karmaṇā
a etad vai śrotum icchāmi tad bhavān prabravītu me
c etat tv anyonyavairūpye vartate pratikūlataḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ parāśarasutaḥ sutam
c karmavidyāmayāv etau vyākhyāsyāmi kṣarākṣarau
a yāṃ diśaṃ vidyayā yānti yāṃ ca gacchanti karmaṇā
c śṛṇuṣvaikamanāḥ putra gahvaraṃ hy etad antaram
a asti dharma iti proktaṃ nāstīty atraiva yo vadet
c tasya pakṣasya sadṛśam idaṃ mama bhaved atha
a dvāv imāv atha panthānau yatra vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
c pravṛttilakṣaṇo dharmo nivṛttau ca subhāṣitaḥ
a karmaṇā badhyate jantur vidyayā tu pramucyate
c tasmāt karma na kurvanti yatayaḥ pāradarśinaḥ
a karmaṇā jāyate pretya mūrtimān ṣoḍaśātmakaḥ
c vidyayā jāyate nityam avyayo hy avyayātmakaḥ
a karma tv eke praśaṃsanti svalpabuddhitarā narāḥ
c tena te dehajālāni ramayanta upāsate
a ye tu buddhiṃ parāṃ prāptā dharmanaipuṇyadarśinaḥ
c na te karma praśaṃsanti kūpaṃ nadyāṃ pibann iva
a karmaṇaḥ phalam āpnoti sukhaduḥkhe bhavābhavau
c vidyayā tad avāpnoti yatra gatvā na śocati
a yatra gatvā na mriyate yatra gatvā na jāyate
c na jīryate yatra gatvā yatra gatvā na vardhate
a yatra tad brahma paramam avyaktam ajaraṃ dhruvam
c avyāhatam anāyāsam amṛtaṃ cāviyogi ca
a dvaṃdvair yatra na bādhyante mānasena ca karmaṇā
c samāḥ sarvatra maitrāś ca sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
a vidyāmayo 'nyaḥ puruṣas tāta karmamayo 'paraḥ
c viddhi candramasaṃ darśe sūkṣmayā kalayā sthitam
d vidyāmayaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ nityaṃ jñānaguṇātmakam
a tad etad ṛṣiṇā proktaṃ vistareṇānumīyate
c navajaṃ śaśinaṃ dṛṣṭvā vakraṃ tantum ivāmbare
a ekādaśavikārātmā kalāsaṃbhārasaṃbhṛtaḥ
c mūrtimān iti taṃ viddhi tāta karmaguṇātmakam
d tasmin yaḥ saṃsthito hy agnir nityaṃ sthālyām ivāhitaḥ
d ātmānaṃ taṃ vijānīhi nityaṃ tyāgajitātmakam
a devo yaḥ saṃśritas tasminn abbindur iva puṣkare
c kṣetrajñaṃ taṃ vijānīyān nityaṃ tyāgajitātmakam
a tamo rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi jīvaguṇān imān
c jīvam ātmaguṇaṃ vidyād ātmānaṃ paramātmanaḥ
a sacetanaṃ jīvaguṇaṃ vadanti
sa ceṣṭate ceṣṭayate ca sarvam
c tataḥ paraṃ kṣetravido vadanti
prāvartayad yo bhuvanāni sapta
 śuka uvāca
a kṣarāt prabhṛti yaḥ sargaḥ saguṇānīndriyāṇi ca
c buddhyaiśvaryābhisargārthaṃ yad dhyānaṃ cātmanaḥ śubham
a bhūya eva tu loke 'smin sadvṛttiṃ vṛttihaitukīm
c yayā santaḥ pravartante tad icchāmy anuvarṇitam
a vede vacanam uktaṃ tu kuru karma tyajeti ca
c katham etad vijānīyāṃ tac ca vyākhyātum arhasi
a lokavṛttāntatattvajñaḥ pūto 'haṃ guruśāsanāt
c kṛtvā buddhiṃ viyuktātmā tyakṣyāmy ātmānam avyathaḥ
 vyāsa uvāca
a yaiṣā vai vihitā vṛttiḥ purastād brahmaṇā svayam
c eṣā pūrvataraiḥ sadbhir ācīrṇā paramarṣibhiḥ
a brahmacaryeṇa vai lokāñ jayanti paramarṣayaḥ
c ātmanaś ca hṛdi śreyas tv anviccha manasātmani
a vane mūlaphalāśī ca tapyan suvipulaṃ tapaḥ
c puṇyāyatanacārī ca bhūtānām avihiṃsakaḥ
a vidhūme sannamusale vānaprasthapratiśraye
c kāle prāpte caran bhaikṣaṃ kalpate brahmabhūyase
a niḥstutir nirnamaskāraḥ parityajya śubhāśubhe
c araṇye vicaraikākī yena kena cid āśitaḥ
 śuka uvāca
a yad idaṃ vedavacanaṃ lokavāde virudhyate
c pramāṇe cāpramāṇe ca viruddhe śāstratā kutaḥ
a ity etac chrotum icchāmi bhagavān prabravītu me
c karmaṇām avirodhena katham etat pravartate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ pratyuvācedaṃ gandhavatyāḥ sutaḥ sutam
c ṛṣis tat pūjayan vākyaṃ putrasyāmitatejasaḥ
a gṛhastho brahmacārī ca vānaprastho 'tha bhikṣukaḥ
c yathoktakāriṇaḥ sarve gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
a eko ya āśramān etān anutiṣṭhed yathāvidhi
c akāmadveṣasaṃyuktaḥ sa paratra mahīyate
a catuṣpadī hi niḥśreṇī brahmaṇy eṣā pratiṣṭhitā
c etām āśritya niḥśreṇīṃ brahmaloke mahīyate
a āyuṣas tu caturbhāgaṃ brahmacāryanasūyakaḥ
c gurau vā guruputre vā vased dharmārthakovidaḥ
a karmātirekeṇa guror adhyetavyaṃ bubhūṣatā
c dakṣiṇo nāpavādī syād āhūto gurum āśrayet
a jaghanyaśāyī pūrvaṃ syād utthāyī guruveśmani
c yac ca śiṣyeṇa kartavyaṃ kāryaṃ dāsena vā punaḥ
a kṛtam ity eva tat sarvaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭheta pārśvataḥ
c kiṃkaraḥ sarvakārī ca sarvakarmasu kovidaḥ
a śucir dakṣo guṇopeto brūyād iṣur ivātvaraḥ
c cakṣuṣā gurum avyagro nirīkṣeta jitendriyaḥ
a nābhuktavati cāśnīyād apītavati no pibet
c na tiṣṭhati tathāsīta nāsupte prasvapeta ca
a uttānābhyāṃ ca pāṇibhyāṃ pādāv asya mṛdu spṛśet
c dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇenaiva savyaṃ savyena pīḍayet
a abhivādya guruṃ brūyād adhīṣva bhagavann iti
c idaṃ kariṣye bhagavann idaṃ cāpi kṛtaṃ mayā
d brahmaṃs tad api kartāsmi yad bhavān vakṣyate punaḥ
a iti sarvam anujñāpya nivedya gurave dhanam
c kuryāt kṛtvā ca tat sarvam ākhyeyaṃ gurave punaḥ
a yāṃs tu gandhān rasān vāpi brahmacārī na sevate
c seveta tān samāvṛtta iti dharmeṣu niścayaḥ
a ye ke cid vistareṇoktā niyamā brahmacāriṇaḥ
c tān sarvān anugṛhṇīyād bhavec cānapago guroḥ
a sa evaṃ gurave prītim upahṛtya yathābalam
c āśrameṣv āśrameṣv evaṃ śiṣyo varteta karmaṇā
a vedavratopavāsena caturthe cāyuṣo gate
c gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā samāvarted yathāvidhi
a dharmalabdhair yuto dārair agnīn utpādya dharmataḥ
c dvitīyam āyuṣo bhāgaṃ gṛhamedhivratī bhavet
 vyāsa uvāca
a dvitīyam āyuṣo bhāgaṃ gṛhamedhī gṛhe vaset
c dharmalabdhair yuto dārair agnīn utpādya suvrataḥ
a gṛhasthavṛttayaś caiva catasraḥ kavibhiḥ smṛtāḥ
c kusūladhānyaḥ prathamaḥ kumbhīdhānyas tv anantaram
a aśvastano 'tha kāpotīm āśrito vṛttim āharet
c teṣāṃ paraḥ paro jyāyān dharmato lokajittamaḥ
a ṣaṭkarmā vartayaty ekas tribhir anyaḥ pravartate
c dvābhyām ekaś caturthas tu brahmasatre vyavasthitaḥ
e gṛhamedhivratāny atra mahāntīha pracakṣate
a nātmārthaṃ pācayed annaṃ na vṛthā ghātayet paśūn
c prāṇī vā yadi vāprāṇī saṃskāraṃ yajuṣārhati
a na divā prasvapej jātu na pūrvāpararātrayoḥ
c na bhuñjītāntarākāle nānṛtāv āhvayet striyam
a nāsyānaśnan vased vipro gṛhe kaś cid apūjitaḥ
c tathāsyātithayaḥ pūjyā havyakavyavahāḥ sadā
a vedavidyāvratasnātāḥ śrotriyā vedapāragāḥ
c svadharmajīvino dāntāḥ kriyāvantas tapasvinaḥ
e teṣāṃ havyaṃ ca kavyaṃ cāpy arhaṇārthaṃ vidhīyate
a na kharaiḥ saṃprayātasya svadharmājñānakasya ca
c apaviddhāgnihotrasya guror vālīkakāriṇaḥ
a saṃvibhāgo 'tra bhūtānāṃ sarveṣām eva śiṣyate
c tathaivāpacamānebhyaḥ pradeyaṃ gṛhamedhinā
a vighasāśī bhaven nityaṃ nityaṃ cāmṛtabhojanaḥ
c amṛtaṃ yajñaśeṣaṃ syād bhojanaṃ haviṣā samam
e bhṛtyaśeṣaṃ tu yo 'śnāti tam āhur vighasāśinam
f vighasaṃ bhṛtyaśeṣaṃ tu yajñaśeṣam athāmṛtam
a svadāranirato dānto hy anasūyur jitendriyaḥ
c ṛtvikpurohitācāryair mātulātithisaṃśritaiḥ
a vṛddhabālāturair vaidyair jñātisaṃbandhibāndhavaiḥ
c mātāpitṛbhyāṃ jāmībhir bhrātrā putreṇa bhāryayā
a duhitrā dāsavargeṇa vivādaṃ na samācaret
c etān vimucya saṃvādān sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate
a etair jitais tu jayati sarvāṃl lokān na saṃśayaḥ
c ācāryo brahmalokeśaḥ prājāpatye pitā prabhuḥ
a atithis tv indralokeśo devalokasya cartvijaḥ
c jāmayo 'psarasāṃ loke vaiśvadeve tu jñātayaḥ
a saṃbandhibāndhavā dikṣu pṛthivyāṃ mātṛmātulau
c vṛddhabālāturakṛśās tv ākāśe prabhaviṣṇavaḥ
a bhrātā jyeṣṭhaḥ samaḥ pitrā bhāryā putraḥ svakā tanuḥ
c chāyā svā dāśavargas tu duhitā kṛpaṇaṃ param
a tasmād etair adhikṣiptaḥ sahen nityam asaṃjvaraḥ
c gṛhadharmarato vidvān dharmanityo jitaklamaḥ
a na cārthabaddhaḥ karmāṇi dharmaṃ vā kaṃ cid ācaret
c gṛhasthavṛttayas tisras tāsāṃ niḥśreyasaṃ param
a parasparaṃ tathaivāhuś cāturāśramyam eva tat
c ye coktā niyamās teṣāṃ sarvaṃ kāryaṃ bubhūṣatā
a kumbhīdhānyair uñchaśilaiḥ kāpotīṃ cāsthitais tathā
c yasmiṃś caite vasanty arhās tad rāṣṭram abhivardhate
a daśa pūrvān daśa parān punāti ca pitāmahān
c gṛhasthavṛttayas tv etā vartayed yo gatavyathaḥ
a sa cakracaralokānāṃ sadṛśīṃ prāpnuyād gatim
c yatendriyāṇām atha vā gatir eṣā vidhīyate
a svargaloko gṛhasthānām udāramanasāṃ hitaḥ
c svargo vimānasaṃyukto vedadṛṣṭaḥ supuṣpitaḥ
a svargaloke gṛhasthānāṃ pratiṣṭhā niyatātmanām
c brahmaṇā vihitā śreṇir eṣā yasmāt pramucyate
e dvitīyaṃ kramaśaḥ prāpya svargaloke mahīyate
a ataḥ paraṃ paramam udāram āśramaṃ
tṛtīyam āhus tyajatāṃ kalevaram
c vanaukasāṃ gṛhapatinām anuttamaṃ
śṛṇuṣvaitat kliṣṭaśarīrakāriṇām
 bhīṣma uvāca
a proktā gṛhasthavṛttis te vihitā yā manīṣiṇām
c tadanantaram uktaṃ yat tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
d vyāsena kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ putrāya sumahātmane
a kramaśas tv avadhūyaināṃ tṛtīyāṃ vṛttim uttamām
c saṃyogavratakhinnānāṃ vānaprasthāśramaukasām
a śrūyatāṃ pārtha bhadraṃ te sarvalokāśrayātmanām
c prekṣāpūrvaṃ pravṛttānāṃ puṇyadeśanivāsinām
 vyāsa uvāca
a gṛhasthas tu yadā paśyed valīpalitam ātmanaḥ
c apatyasyaiva cāpatyaṃ vanam eva tadāśrayet
a tṛtīyam āyuṣo bhāgaṃ vānaprasthāśrame vaset
c tān evāgnīn paricared yajamāno divaukasaḥ
a niyato niyatāhāraḥ ṣaṣṭhabhakto 'pramādavān
c tad agnihotraṃ tā gāvo yajñāṅgāni ca sarvaśaḥ
a akṛṣṭaṃ vai vrīhiyavaṃ nīvāraṃ vighasāni ca
c havīṃṣi saṃprayaccheta makheṣv atrāpi pañcasu
a vānaprasthāśrame 'py etāś catasro vṛttayaḥ smṛtāḥ
c sadyaḥprakṣālakāḥ ke cit ke cin māsikasaṃcayāḥ
a vārṣikaṃ saṃcayaṃ ke cit ke cid dvādaśavārṣikam
c kurvanty atithipūjārthaṃ yajñatantrārthasiddhaye
a abhrāvakāśā varṣāsu hemante jalasaṃśrayāḥ
c grīṣme ca pañcatapasaḥ śaśvac ca mitabhojanāḥ
a bhūmau viparivartante tiṣṭhed vā prapadair api
c sthānāsanair vartayanti savaneṣv abhiṣiñcate
a dantolūkhalinaḥ ke cid aśmakuṭṭās tathāpare
c śuklapakṣe pibanty eke yavāgūṃ kvathitāṃ sakṛt
a kṛṣṇapakṣe pibanty eke bhuñjate ca yathākramam
c mūlair eke phalair eke puṣpair eke dṛḍhavratāḥ
a vartayanti yathānyāyaṃ vaikhānasamataṃ śritāḥ
c etāś cānyāś ca vividhā dīkṣās teṣāṃ manīṣiṇām
a caturthaś caupaniṣado dharmaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
c vānaprastho gṛhasthaś ca tato 'nyaḥ saṃpravartate
a asminn eva yuge tāta vipraiḥ sarvārthadarśibhiḥ
c agastyaḥ sapta ṛṣayo madhucchando 'ghamarṣaṇaḥ
a sāṃkṛtiḥ sudivā taṇḍir yavānno 'tha kṛtaśramaḥ
c ahovīryas tathā kāvyas tāṇḍyo medhātithir budhaḥ
a śalo vākaś ca nirvākaḥ śūnyapālaḥ kṛtaśramaḥ
c evaṃdharmasu vidvāṃsas tataḥ svargam upāgaman
a tāta pratyakṣadharmāṇas tathā yāyāvarā gaṇāḥ
c ṛṣīṇām ugratapasāṃ dharmanaipuṇadarśinām
a avācyāparimeyāś ca brāhmaṇā vanam āśritāḥ
c vaikhānasā vālakhilyāḥ sikatāś ca tathāpare
a karmabhis te nirānandā dharmanityā jitendriyāḥ
c gatāḥ pratyakṣadharmāṇas te sarve vanam āśritāḥ
e anakṣatrā anādhṛṣyā dṛśyante jyotiṣāṃ gaṇāḥ
a jarayā ca paridyūno vyādhinā ca prapīḍitaḥ
c caturthe cāyuṣaḥ śeṣe vānaprasthāśramaṃ tyajet
e sadyaskārāṃ nirūpyeṣṭiṃ sarvavedasadakṣiṇām
a ātmayājī so ''tmaratir ātmakrīḍātmasaṃśrayaḥ
c ātmany agnīn samāropya tyaktvā sarvaparigrahān
a sadyaskrāṃś ca yajed yajñān iṣṭīś caiveha sarvadā
c sadaiva yājināṃ yajñād ātmanījyā nivartate
a trīṃś caivāgnīn yajet samyag ātmany evātmamokṣaṇāt
c prāṇebhyo yajuṣā pañca ṣaṭ prāśnīyād akutsayan
a keśalomanakhān vāpya vānaprastho munis tataḥ
c āśramād āśramaṃ sadyaḥ pūto gacchati karmabhiḥ
a abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dattvā pravrajed dvijaḥ
c lokās tejomayās tasya pretya cānantyam aśnute
a suśīlavṛtto vyapanītakalmaṣo
na ceha nāmutra ca kartum īhate
c aroṣamoho gatasaṃdhivigraho
bhaved udāsīnavad ātmavin naraḥ
a yameṣu caivātmagateṣu na vyathet
svaśāstrasūtrāhutimantravikramaḥ
c bhaved yatheṣṭā gatir ātmayājino
na saṃśayo dharmapare jītendriye
a tataḥ paraṃ śreṣṭham atīva sadguṇair
adhiṣṭhitaṃ trīn adhivṛttam uttamam
c caturtham uktaṃ paramāśramaṃ śṛṇu
prakīrtyamānaṃ paramaṃ parāyaṇam
 śuka uvāca
a vartamānas tathaivātra vānaprasthāśrame yathā
c yoktavyo ''tmā yathā śaktyā paraṃ vai kāṅkṣatā padam
 vyāsa uvāca
a prāpya saṃskāram etābhyām āśramābhyāṃ tataḥ param
c yat kāryaṃ paramārthārthaṃ tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
a kaṣāyaṃ pācayitvā tu śreṇisthāneṣu ca triṣu
c pravrajec ca paraṃ sthānaṃ parivrajyām anuttamām
a tad bhavān evam abhyasya vartatāṃ śrūyatāṃ tathā
c eka eva caren nityaṃ siddhyartham asahāyavān
a ekaś carati yaḥ paśyan na jahāti na hīyate
c anagnir aniketaḥ syād grāmam annārtham āśrayet
a aśvastanavidhānaḥ syān munir bhāvasamanvitaḥ
c laghvāśī niyatāhāraḥ sakṛd annaniṣevitā
a kapālaṃ vṛkṣamūlāni kucelam asahāyatā
c upekṣā sarvabhūtānām etāvad bhikṣulakṣaṇam
a yasmin vācaḥ praviśanti kūpe prāptāḥ śilā iva
c na vaktāraṃ punar yānti sa kaivalyāśrame vaset
a naiva paśyen na śṛṇuyād avācyaṃ jātu kasya cit
c brāhmaṇānāṃ viśeṣeṇa naiva brūyāt kathaṃ cana
a yad brāhmaṇasya kuśalaṃ tad eva satataṃ vadet
c tūṣṇīm āsīta nindāyāṃ kurvan bheṣajam ātmanaḥ
a yena pūrṇam ivākāśaṃ bhavaty ekena sarvadā
c śūnyaṃ yena janākīrṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a yena kena cid ācchanno yena kena cid āśitaḥ
c yatrakvacanaśāyī ca taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a aher iva gaṇād bhītaḥ sauhityān narakād iva
c kuṇapād iva ca strībhyas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a na krudhyen na prahṛṣyec ca mānito 'mānitaś ca yaḥ
c sarvabhūteṣv abhayadas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a nābhinandeta maraṇaṃ nābhinandeta jīvitam
c kālam eva pratīkṣeta nideśaṃ bhṛtako yathā
a anabhyāhatacittaḥ syād anabhyāhatavāk tathā
c nirmuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo niramitrasya kiṃ bhayam
a abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo bhūtānām abhayaṃ yataḥ
c tasya dehād vimuktasya bhayaṃ nāsti kutaś cana
a yathā nāgapade 'nyāni padāni padagāminām
c sarvāṇy evāpidhīyante padajātāni kauñjare
a evaṃ sarvam ahiṃsāyāṃ dharmārtham apidhīyate
c amṛtaḥ sa nityaṃ vasati yo 'hiṃsāṃ pratipadyate
a ahiṃsakaḥ samaḥ satyo dhṛtimān niyatendriyaḥ
c śaraṇyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ gatim āpnoty anuttamām
a evaṃ prajñānatṛptasya nirbhayasya manīṣiṇaḥ
c na mṛtyur atigo bhāvaḥ sa mṛtyum adhigacchati
a vimuktaṃ sarvasaṅgebhyo munim ākāśavat sthitam
c asvam ekacaraṃ śāntaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a jīvitaṃ yasya dharmārthaṃ dharmo 'ratyartham eva ca
c ahorātrāś ca puṇyārthaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
