a nirāśiṣam anārambhaṃ nirnamaskāram astutim
c akṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇakarmāṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a sarvāṇi bhūtāni sukhe ramante
sarvāṇi duḥkhasya bhṛśaṃ trasanti
c teṣāṃ bhayotpādanajātakhedaḥ
kuryān na karmāṇi hi śraddadhānaḥ
a dānaṃ hi bhūtābhayadakṣiṇāyāḥ
sarvāṇi dānāny adhitiṣṭhatīha
c tīkṣṇāṃ tanuṃ yaḥ prathamaṃ jahāti
so 'nantam āpnoty abhayaṃ prajābhyaḥ
a uttāna āsyena havir juhoti
lokasya nābhir jagataḥ pratiṣṭhā
c tasyāṅgam aṅgāni kṛtākṛtaṃ ca
vaiśvānaraḥ sarvam eva prapede
a prādeśamātre hṛdi niśritaṃ yat
tasmin prāṇān ātmayājī juhoti
c tasyāgnihotraṃ hutam ātmasaṃsthaṃ
sarveṣu lokeṣu sadaivateṣu
a daivaṃ tridhātuṃ trivṛtaṃ suparṇaṃ
ye vidyur agryaṃ paramārthatāṃ ca
c te sarvalokeṣu mahīyamānā
devāḥ samarthāḥ sukṛtaṃ vrajanti
a vedāṃś ca vedyaṃ ca vidhiṃ ca kṛtsnam
atho niruktaṃ paramārthatāṃ ca
c sarvaṃ śarīrātmani yaḥ praveda
tasmai sma devāḥ spṛhayanti nityam
a bhūmāv asaktaṃ divi cāprameyaṃ
hiraṇmayaṃ yo 'ṇḍajam aṇḍamadhye
c patatriṇaṃ pakṣiṇam antarikṣe
yo veda bhogyātmani dīptaraśmiḥ
a āvartamānam ajaraṃ vivartanaṃ
ṣaṇṇemikaṃ dvādaśāraṃ suparva
c yasyedam āsye pariyāti viśvaṃ
tat kālacakraṃ nihitaṃ guhāyām
a yaḥ saṃprasādaṃ jagataḥ śarīraṃ
sarvān sa lokān adhigacchatīha
c tasmin hutaṃ tarpayatīha devāṃs
te vai tṛptās tarpayanty āsyam asya
a tejomayo nityatanuḥ purāṇo
lokān anantān abhayān upaiti
c bhūtāni yasmān na trasante kadā cit
sa bhūtebhyo na trasate kadā cit
a agarhaṇīyo na ca garhate 'nyān
sa vai vipraḥ paramātmānam īkṣet
c vinītamoho vyapanītakalmaṣo
na ceha nāmutra ca yo 'rtham ṛcchati
a aroṣamohaḥ samaloṣṭakāñcanaḥ
prahīṇaśoko gatasaṃdhivigrahaḥ
c apetanindāstutir apriyāpriyaś
carann udāsīnavad eṣa bhikṣukaḥ
 vyāsa uvāca
a prakṛtes tu vikārā ye kṣetrajñas taiḥ pariśritaḥ
c te cainaṃ na prajānanti sa tu jānāti tān api
a taiś caiṣa kurute kāryaṃ manaḥṣaṣṭhair ihendriyaiḥ
c sudāntair iva saṃyantā dṛḍhaiḥ paramavājibhiḥ
a indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaḥ paramaṃ manaḥ
c manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā mahān paraḥ
a mahataḥ param avyaktam avyaktāt parato 'mṛtam
c amṛtān na paraṃ kiṃ cit sā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ
a evaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍho ''tmā na prakāśate
c dṛśyate tvagryayā buddhyā sūkṣmayā tattvadarśibhiḥ
a antarātmani saṃlīya manaḥṣaṣṭhāni medhayā
c indriyāṇīndriyārthāṃś ca bahu cintyam acintayan
a dhyānoparamaṇaṃ kṛtvā vidyāsaṃpāditaṃ manaḥ
c anīśvaraḥ praśāntātma tato 'rchaty amṛtaṃ padam
a indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ vaśyātmā calitasmṛtiḥ
c ātmanaḥ saṃpradānena martyo mṛtyum upāśnute
a hitvā tu sarvasaṃkalpān sattve cittaṃ niveśayet
c sattve cittaṃ samāveśya tataḥ kālaṃjaro bhavet
a cittaprasādena yatir jahāti hi śubhāśubham
c prasannātmātmani sthitvā sukham ānantyam aśnute
a lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasādasya yathā tṛptaḥ sukhaṃ svapet
c nivāte vā yathā dīpo dīpyamāno na kampate
a evaṃ pūrvāpare rātre yuñjann ātmānam ātmanā
c sattvāhāraviśuddhātmā paśyaty ātmānam ātmani
a rahasyaṃ sarvavedānām anaitihyam anāgamam
c ātmapratyayikaṃ śāstram idaṃ putrānuśāsanam
a dharmākhyāneṣu sarveṣu satyākhyāneṣu yad vasu
c daśedam ṛk sahasrāṇi nirmathyāmṛtam uddhṛtam
a navanītaṃ yathā dadhnaḥ kāṣṭhād agnir yathaiva ca
c tathaiva viduṣāṃ jñānaṃ putrahetoḥ samuddhṛtam
e snātakānām idaṃ śāstraṃ vācyaṃ putrānuśāsanam
a tad idaṃ nāpraśāntāya nādāntāyātapasvine
c nāvedaviduṣe vācyaṃ tathā nānugatāya ca
a nāsūyakāyānṛjave na cānirdiṣṭakāriṇe
c na tarkaśāstradagdhāya tathaiva piśunāya ca
a ślāghate ślāghanīyāya praśāntāya tapasvine
c idaṃ priyāya putrāya śiṣyāyānugatāya ca
e rahasyadharmaṃ vaktavyaṃ nānyasmai tu kathaṃ cana
a yady apy asya mahīṃ dadyād ratnapūrṇām imāṃ naraḥ
c idam eva tataḥ śreya iti manyeta tattvavit
a ato guhyatarārthaṃ tad adhyātmam atimānuṣam
c yat tan maharṣibhir dṛṣṭaṃ vedānteṣu ca gīyate
e tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
f yac ca te manasi vartate paraṃ
f yatra cāsti tava saṃśayaḥ kva cit
f śrūyatām ayam ahaṃ tavāgrataḥ
f putra kiṃ hi kathayāmi te punaḥ
 śuka uvāca
a adhyātmaṃ vistareṇeha punar eva vadasva me
c yad adhyātmaṃ yathā cedaṃ bhagavann ṛṣisattama
 vyāsa uvāca
a adhyātmaṃ yad idaṃ tāta puruṣasyeha vidyate
c tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi tasya vyākhyām imāṃ śṛṇu
a bhūmir āpas tathā jyotir vāyur ākāśam eva ca
c mahābhūtāni bhūtānāṃ sāgarasyormayo yathā
a prasāryeha yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥ
c tadvan mahānti bhūtāni yavīyaḥsu vikurvate
a iti tanmayam evedaṃ sarvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
c sarge ca pralaye caiva tasmān nirdiśyate tathā
a mahābhūtāni pañcaiva sarvabhūteṣu bhūtakṛt
c akarot tāta vaiṣamyaṃ yasmin yad anupaśyati
 śuka uvāca
a akarod yac charīreṣu kathaṃ tad upalakṣayet
c indriyāṇi guṇāḥ ke cit kathaṃ tān upalakṣayet
 vyāsa uvāca
a etat te vartayiṣyāmi yathāvad iha darśanam
c śṛṇu tattvam ihaikāgro yathātattvaṃ yathā ca tat
a śabdaḥ śrotraṃ tathā khāni trayam ākāśasaṃbhavam
c prāṇaś ceṣṭā tathā sparśa ete vāyuguṇās trayaḥ
a rūpaṃ cakṣur vipākaś ca tridhā jyotir vidhīyate
c raso 'tha rasanaṃ sneho guṇās tv ete trayo 'mbhasām
a ghreyaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca bhūmer ete guṇās trayaḥ
b śrotraṃ tvakcakṣuṣī jihvā nāsikā caiva pañcamī
c etāvān indriyagrāmo vyākhyātaḥ pāñcabhautikaḥ
a vāyoḥ sparśo raso 'dbhyaś ca jyotiṣo rūpam ucyate
c ākāśaprabhavaḥ śabdo gandho bhūmiguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
a mano buddhiś ca bhāvaś ca traya ete ''tmayonijāḥ
c na guṇān ativartante guṇebhyaḥ paramā matāḥ
a indriyāṇi nare pañca ṣaṣṭhaṃ tu mana ucyate
c saptamīṃ buddhim evāhuḥ kṣetrajñaṃ punar aṣṭamam
a cakṣur ālocanāyaiva saṃśayaṃ kurute manaḥ
c buddhir adhyavasānāya sākṣī kṣetrajña ucyate
a rajas tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca traya ete svayonijāḥ
c samāḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tadguṇeṣūpalakṣayet
a yathā kūrma ihāṅgāni prasārya viniyacchati
c evam evendriyagrāmaṃ buddhiḥ sṛṣṭvā niyacchati
a yad ūrdhvaṃ pādatalayor avāṅmūrdhnaś ca paśyati
c etasminn eva kṛtye vai vartate buddhir uttamā
a guṇān nenīyate buddhir buddhir evendriyāṇy api
c manaḥṣaṣṭhāni sarvāṇi buddhyabhāve kuto guṇāḥ
a tatra yat prītisaṃyuktaṃ kiṃ cid ātmani lakṣayet
c praśāntam iva saṃśuddhaṃ sattvaṃ tad upadhārayet
a yat tu saṃtāpasaṃyuktaṃ kāye manasi vā bhavet
c rajaḥ pravartakaṃ tat syāt satataṃ hāri dehinām
d pravṛttaṃ raja ity evaṃ tatra cāpy upalakṣayet
a yat tu saṃmohasaṃyuktam avyaktaviṣayaṃ bhavet
c apratarkyam avijñeyaṃ tamas tad upadhāryatām
a praharṣaḥ prītir ānandaḥ sāmyaṃ svasthātmacittatā
c akasmād yadi vā kasmād vartate sāttviko guṇaḥ
a abhimāno mṛṣāvādo lobho mohas tathākṣamā
c liṅgāni rajasas tāni vartante hetvahetutaḥ
a tathā mohaḥ pramādaś ca tandrī nidrāprabodhitā
c kathaṃ cid abhivartante vijñeyās tāmasā guṇāḥ
 vyāsa uvāca
a manaḥ prasṛjate bhāvaṃ buddhir adhyavasāyinī
c hṛdayaṃ priyāpriye veda trividhā karmacodanā
a indriyebhyaḥ parā hy arthā arthebhyaḥ paramaṃ manaḥ
c manasas tu parā buddhir buddher ātmā paro mataḥ
a buddhir ātmā manuṣyasya buddhir evātmano ''tmikā
c yadā vikurute bhāvaṃ tadā bhavati sā manaḥ
a indriyāṇāṃ pṛthagbhāvād buddhir vikriyate hy aṇu
c śṛṇvatī bhavati śrotraṃ spṛśatī sparśa ucyate
a paśyantī bhavate dṛṣṭī rasatī rasanaṃ bhavet
c jighratī bhavati ghrāṇaṃ buddhir vikriyate pṛthak
a indriyāṇīti tāny āhus teṣv adṛśyādhitiṣṭhati
c tiṣṭhatī puruṣe buddhis triṣu bhāveṣu vartate
a kadā cil labhate prītiṃ kadā cid api śocate
c na sukhena na duḥkhena kadā cid iha yujyate
a seyaṃ bhāvātmikā bhāvāṃs trīn etān ativartate
c saritāṃ sāgaro bhartā mahāvelām ivormimān
a yadā prārthayate kiṃ cit tadā bhavati sā manaḥ
c adhiṣṭhānāni vai buddhyā pṛthag etāni saṃsmaret
e indriyāṇy eva medhyāni vijetavyāni kṛtsnaśaḥ
a sarvāṇy evānupūrvyeṇa yad yan nānuvidhīyate
c avibhāgagatā buddhir bhāve manasi vartate
e pravartamānaṃ tu rajaḥ sattvam apy anuvartate
a ye caiva bhāvā vartante sarva eṣv eva te triṣu
c anvarthāḥ saṃpravartante rathanemim arā iva
a pradīpārthaṃ naraḥ kuryād indriyair buddhisattamaiḥ
c niścaradbhir yathāyogam udāsīnair yadṛcchayā
a evaṃsvabhāvam evedam iti vidvān na muhyati
c aśocann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca nityaṃ vigatamatsaraḥ
a na hy ātmā śakyate draṣṭum indriyaiḥ kāmagocaraiḥ
c pravartamānair anaye durdharair akṛtātmabhiḥ
a teṣāṃ tu manasā raśmīn yadā samyaṅ niyacchati
c tadā prakāśate hy ātmā ghaṭe dīpa iva jvalan
e sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ tamasy apagate yathā
f prakāśaṃ bhavate sarvaṃ tathedam upadhāryatām
a yathā vāricaraḥ pakṣī na lipyati jale caran
b vimuktātmā tathā yogī guṇadoṣair na lipyate
c evam eva kṛtaprajño na doṣair viṣayāṃś caran
e asajjamānaḥ sarveṣu na kathaṃ cana lipyate
a tyaktvā pūrvakṛtaṃ karma ratir yasya sadātmani
c sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya guṇamārgeṣv asajjataḥ
a sattvam ātmā prasavati guṇān vāpi kadā ca na
c na guṇā vidur ātmānaṃ guṇān veda sa sarvadā
a paridraṣṭā guṇānāṃ sa sraṣṭā caiva yathātatham
c sattvakṣetrajñayor etad antaraṃ viddhi sūkṣmayoḥ
a sṛjate tu guṇān eka eko na sṛjate guṇān
c pṛthagbhūtau prakṛtyā tau saṃprayuktau ca sarvadā
a yathā matsyo 'dbhir anyaḥ san saṃprayuktau tathaiva tau
c maśakodumbarau cāpi saṃprayuktau yathā saha
a iṣīkā vā yathā muñje pṛthak ca saha caiva ca
c tathaiva sahitāv etāv anyonyasmin pratiṣṭhitau
 vyāsa uvāca
a sṛjate tu guṇān sattvaṃ kṣetrajñas tv anutiṣṭhati
c guṇān vikriyataḥ sarvān udāsīnavad īśvaraḥ
a svabhāvayuktaṃ tat sarvaṃ yad imān sṛjate guṇān
c ūrṇanābhir yathā sūtraṃ sṛjate tantuvad guṇān
a pradhvastā na nivartante pravṛttir nopalabhyate
b pratyakṣeṇa parokṣaṃ tad anumānena sidhyati
c evam eke vyavasyanti nivṛttir iti cāpare
a ubhayaṃ saṃpradhāryaitad adhyavasyed yathāmati
c anenaiva vidhānena bhaved garbhaśayo mahān
a anādinidhanaṃ nityam āsādya vicaren naraḥ
b jayayukto ratho divyo brahmaloke mahīyate
b atha satvaram āsādya ratham evaṃ yuyuṅkṣataḥ
b akṣaraṃ gantumanaso vidhiṃ vakṣyāmi śīghragam
b saptayodhāyanaṃ kṛtsnā vānyataḥ pratipadyate
b pṛṣṭhataḥ pārśvataś cānyā yāvantyāsyāḥ prasāraṇāt
b kramaśaḥ pārthivaṃ yac ca vāyavyaṃ khaṃ tathā payaḥ
b jyotiṣo yat tad aiśvaryam ahaṃkārasya buddhitaḥ
b avyaktasya yad aiśvaryaṃ kramaśaḥ pratipadyate
b vyaktamāś cāpi sic
yasyaite tathā yuktena yogataḥ
b tathāsyaṃ bhavayuktasya vidhim ātmani paśyataḥ
b nirmathyamānaṃ sūkṣmātmā rūpāṇīmāni darśayet
b śaiśiras tu yathā dhūmaḥ sūkṣmaṃ saṃśrayate nabhaḥ
b tathā dehād vimuktasya pūrvarūpaṃ tad apy uta
b atha dhūmasya virame dvitīyaṃ rūpadarśanam
b jalarūpam ivākāśaṃ tatraivātmani paśyati
b aparaṃ vyatikramec cāpi vahnirūpaṃ prakāśate
b tasminn uparate vāsya vāyavyaṃ sūkṣmam apy atha
b rūpaṃ prakāśate tatra pītavarṇavad apy ajaḥ
b tasminn uparate rūpam ākāśasya prakāśate
b ūhyā savarṇarūpaṃ tat tasya rūpaṃ prakāśate
b tasminn uparate vāsya buddhirūpaṃ prakāśate
b suśuklaṃ cetasaḥ samyag avyakte brāhmaṇasya vai
b eteṣv apīha jāteṣu phalajātāni me śṛṇu
b jātasya pārthivaiśvaryaiḥ sṛṣṭir eṣā vidhīyate
b prajāpatir ivākṣobhyaḥ śarīrāt sṛjati prajāḥ
b varṇato gṛhyate vāpsu nāyaṃ pibati cāśayāḥ
b snācāsya sic
tejasā rūpaṃ dahyate śāmyate tathā
b aṅgulyāṅguṣṭhamātreṇa vastapāṭenavat tathā sic
b pṛthivīṃ kampayanty ete guṇāpāyād iti smṛtaḥ
b ākāśabhūtaś cākāśe svarṇastvān na ca dṛśyate
b ahaṃkārasya vijaye pañca te syur vaśānugāḥ
b ṣaṇṇām ātmani buddhau tu nitāyaṃ sic
prabhavaty uta
b nirdoṣaprabhavā hy eṣā kṛtsnā samabhivartate
b tathaiva vyaktam ātmānam avyaktaṃ pratipadyate
b yato niḥsarate loko bhavati vyaktasaṃjñakaḥ
b tatrāsannamayīṃ vyākhyāṃ śṛṇu tvaṃ vistareṇa vai
b tathā vyaktamayīṃ caiva vyākhyāṃ pūrvaṃ nibodha me
b pañcaviṃśatitattvāni tulyāny ubhayataḥ samam
b yoge sāṃkhye 'pi ca tathā viśeṣāṃs tatra me śṛṇu
b proktaṃ tad vyartham ity eva jāyate vartate ca yat
b jīvate mriyate caiva caturbhir lakṣaṇair yutam
b viparītam ato yat tad avyaktaṃ samudāhṛtam
b pāpātmānau ca deveṣu siddhānteṣv apy udāhṛtau
b caturlakṣaṇajantur yaś caturvargaḥ pracakṣate
b vyaktam avyaktajaṃ caiva tathā buddhir athetarat
b sattvaṃ kṣetrajña ity etad dvayam avyaktadarśanam
b dvāv ātmānau ca deveṣu viṣayeṣu ca rājataḥ
b viṣayān pratisaṃhāraḥ sālokaṃ siddhilakṣaṇam
b nirmamaś cānahaṃkāro nirdvaṃdvaś chinnasaṃśayaḥ
b naiva krudhyati na dveṣṭi nātmatā bhavato giraḥ
b ākruṣṭas tāḍitaś cāpi maitraṃ dhyāyati nāśubham
b vāṅmanaḥkāyadaṇḍānāṃ trayāṇāṃ ca nivartakam
b samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahmāṇam ativartate
b naivecchati na cānicchan yātrāmātravyavasthitaḥ
b alolupo 'py atho dānto nākṛtir na nirākṛtiḥ
b nāsyendriyamanaḥprāṇabuddhayaḥ sarvasākṣiṇaḥ
c akrudhyann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca nityaṃ vigatamatsaraḥ
a ity evaṃ hṛdayagranthiṃ buddhicintāmayaṃ dṛḍham
c atītya sukham āsīta aśocaṃś chinnasaṃśayaḥ
a tapyeyuḥ pracyutāḥ pṛthvyā yathā pūrṇāṃ nadīṃ narāḥ
c avagāḍhā hy avidvāṃso viddhi lokam imaṃ tathā
a na tu tāmyati vai vidvān sthale carati tattvavit
c evaṃ yo vindate ''tmānaṃ kevalaṃ jñānam ātmanaḥ
a evaṃ buddhvā naraḥ sarvāṃ bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
c samavekṣya śanaiḥ samyag labhate śamam uttamam
a etad vai janmasāmarthyaṃ brāhmaṇasya viśeṣataḥ
c ātmajñānaṃ śamaś caiva paryāptaṃ tatparāyaṇam
a etad buddhvā bhaved buddhaḥ kim anyad buddhalakṣaṇam
c vijñāyaitad vimucyante kṛtakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ
a na bhavati viduṣāṃ mahad bhayaṃ
yad aviduṣāṃ sumahad bhayaṃ bhavet
c na hi gatir adhikāsti kasya cid
bhavati hi yā viduṣaḥ sanātanī
a lokamāturam asūyate janas
tat tad eva ca nirīkṣya śocate
c tatra paśya kuśalān aśocato
ye vidus tad ubhayaṃ kṛtākṛtam
a yat karoty anabhisaṃdhipūrvakaṃ
tac ca nirṇudati yat purā kṛtam
c na priyaṃ tad ubhayaṃ na cāpriyaṃ
tasya taj janayatīha kurvataḥ
 śuka uvāca
a yasmād dharmāt paro dharmo vidyate neha kaś cana
c yo viśiṣṭaś ca dharmebhyas taṃ bhavān prabravītu me
 vyāsa uvāca
a dharmaṃ te saṃpravakṣyāmi purāṇam ṛṣisaṃstutam
c viśiṣṭaṃ sarvadharmebhyas tam ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
a indriyāṇi pramāthīni buddhyā saṃyamya yatnataḥ
c sarvato niṣpatiṣṇūni pitā bālān ivātmajān
a manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca hy aikāgryaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ
c taj jyāyaḥ sarvadharmebhyaḥ sa dharmaḥ para ucyate
a tāni sarvāṇi saṃdhāya manaḥṣaṣṭhāni medhayā
c ātmatṛpta ivāsīta bahu cintyam acintayan
a gocarebhyo nivṛttāni yadā sthāsyanti veśmani
c tadā tvam ātmanātmānaṃ paraṃ drakṣyasi śāśvatam
a sarvātmānaṃ mahātmānaṃ vidhūmam iva pāvakam
c taṃ paśyanti mahātmāno brāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ
a yathā puṣpaphalopeto bahuśākho mahādrumaḥ
c ātmano nābhijānīte kva me puṣpaṃ kva me phalam
a evam ātmā na jānīte kva gamiṣye kuto nv aham
c anyo hy atrāntar ātmāsti yaḥ sarvam anupaśyati
a jñānadīpena dīptena paśyaty ātmānam ātmanā
c dṛṣṭvā tvam ātmanātmānaṃ nirātmā bhava sarvavit
a vimuktaḥ sarvapāpebhyo muktatvaca ivoragaḥ
c parāṃ buddhim avāpyeha vipāpmā vigatajvaraḥ
a sarvataḥsrotasaṃ ghorāṃ nadīṃ lokapravāhinīm
c pañcendriyagrāhavatīṃ manaḥsaṃkalparodhasam
a lobhamohatṛṇacchannāṃ kāmakrodhasarīsṛpām
c satyatīrthānṛtakṣobhāṃ krodhapaṅkāṃ saridvarām
a avyaktaprabhavāṃ śīghrāṃ dustarām akṛtātmabhiḥ
c pratarasva nadīṃ buddhyā kāmagrāhasamākulām
a saṃsārasāgaragamāṃ yonipātāladustarām
c ātmajanmodbhavāṃ tāta jihvāvartāṃ durāsadām
a yāṃ taranti kṛtaprajñā dhṛtimanto manīṣiṇaḥ
c tāṃ tīrṇaḥ sarvatomukto vipūtātmātmavic chuciḥ
a uttamāṃ buddhim āsthāya brahmabhūyaṃ gamiṣyasi
c saṃtīrṇaḥ sarvasaṃkleśān prasannātmā vikalmaṣaḥ
a bhūmiṣṭhānīva bhūtāni parvatastho niśāmaya
c akrudhyann aprahṛṣyaṃś ca nanṛśaṃsamatis tathā
e tato drakṣyasi bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhavāpyayau
a evaṃ vai sarvadharmebhyo viśiṣṭaṃ menire budhāḥ
c dharmaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha munayas tattvadarśinaḥ
a ātmano 'vyayino jñātvā idaṃ putrānuśāsanam
c prayatāya pravaktavyaṃ hitāyānugatāya ca
a ātmajñānam idaṃ guhyaṃ sarvaguhyatamaṃ mahat
c abruvaṃ yad ahaṃ tāta ātmasākṣikam añjasā
a naiva strī na pumān etan naiva cedaṃ napuṃsakam
c aduḥkham asukhaṃ brahma bhūtabhavyabhavātmakam
a naitaj jñātvā pumān strī vā punarbhavam avāpnuyāt
c abhavapratipattyartham etad vartma vidhīyate
a yathā matāni sarvāṇi na caitāni yathā tathā
c kathitāni mayā putra bhavanti na bhavanti ca
a tat prītiyuktena guṇānvitena
putreṇa satputraguṇānvitena
c pṛṣṭo hīdaṃ prītimatā hitārthaṃ
brūyāt sutasyeha yad uktam etat
 vyāsa uvāca
a gandhān rasān nānurundhyāt sukhaṃ vā
nālaṃkārāṃś cāpnuyāt tasya tasya
c mānaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca yaśaś ca necchet
sa vai pracāraḥ paśyato brāhmaṇasya
a sarvān vedān adhīyīta śuśrūṣur brahmacaryavān
c ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni na tena na sa brāhmaṇaḥ
a jñātivat sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvavit sarvavedavit
c nākāmo mriyate jātu na tena na ca brāhmaṇaḥ
a iṣṭīś ca vividhāḥ prāpya kratūṃś caivāptadakṣiṇān
c naiva prāpnoti brāhmaṇyam abhidhyānāt kathaṃ cana
a yadā cāyaṃ na bibheti yadā cāsmān na bibhyati
c yadā necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a yadā na kurute bhāvaṃ sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
c karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a kāmabandhanam evaikaṃ nānyad astīha bandhanam
c kāmabandhanamukto hi brahmabhūyāya kalpate
a kāmato mucyamānas tu dhūmrābhrād iva candramāḥ
c virajāḥ kālam ākāṅkṣan dhīro dhairyeṇa vartate
a āpūryamāṇam acalapratiṣṭhaṃ
samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat
c sa kāmakānto na tu kāmakāmaḥ
sa vai lokāt svargam upaiti dehī
c tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve
c sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmaḥ
a vedasyopaniṣat satyaṃ satyasyopaniṣad damaḥ
c damasyopaniṣad dānaṃ dānasyopaniṣat tapaḥ
a tapasopaniṣat tyāgas tyāgasyopaniṣat sukham
c sukhasyopaniṣat svargaḥ svargasyopaniṣac chamaḥ
a kledanaṃ śokamanasoḥ saṃtāpaṃ tṛṣṇayā saha
c sattvam icchasi saṃtoṣāc chāntilakṣaṇam uttamam
a viśoko nirmamaḥ śāntaḥ prasannātmātmavittamaḥ
c ṣaḍbhir lakṣaṇavān etaiḥ samagraḥ punar eṣyati
a ṣaḍbhiḥ sattvaguṇopetaiḥ prājñair adhikamantribhiḥ
c ye viduḥ pretya cātmānam ihasthāṃs tāṃs tathā viduḥ
a akṛtrimam asaṃhāryaṃ prākṛtaṃ nirupaskṛtam
c adhyātmaṃ sukṛtaprajñaḥ sukham avyayam aśnute
a niṣpracāraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā pratiṣṭhāpya ca sarvataḥ
c yām ayaṃ labhate tuṣṭiṃ sā na śakyam ato 'nyathā
a yena tṛpyaty abhuñjāno yena tuṣyaty avittavān
c yenāsneho balaṃ dhatte yas taṃ veda sa vedavit
a saṃgopya hy ātmano dvārāṇy apidhāya vicintayan
c yo hy āste brāhmaṇaḥ śiṣṭaḥ sa ātmaratir ucyate
a samāhitaṃ pare tattve kṣīṇakāmam avasthitam
c sarvataḥ sukham anveti vapuś cāndramasaṃ yathā
a saviśeṣāṇi bhūtāni guṇāṃś cābhajato muneḥ
c sukhenāpohyate duḥkhaṃ bhāskareṇa tamo yathā
a tam atikrāntakarmāṇam atikrāntaguṇakṣayam
c brāhmaṇaṃ viṣayāśliṣṭaṃ jarāmṛtyū na vindataḥ
a sa yadā sarvato muktaḥ samaḥ paryavatiṣṭhate
c indriyāṇīndriyārthāṃś ca śarīrastho 'tivartate
a kāraṇaṃ paramaṃ prāpya atikrāntasya kāryatām
c punarāvartanaṃ nāsti saṃprāptasya parāt param
 vyāsa uvāca
a dvaṃdvāni mokṣajijñāsur arthadharmāv anuṣṭhitaḥ
c vaktrā guṇavatā śiṣyaḥ śrāvyaḥ pūrvam idaṃ mahat
a ākāśaṃ māruto jyotir āpaḥ pṛthvī ca pañcamī
c bhāvābhāvau ca kālaś ca sarvabhūteṣu pañcasu
a antarātmakam ākāśaṃ tanmayaṃ śrotram indriyam
c tasya śabdaṃ guṇaṃ vidyān mūrtiśāstravidhānavit
a caraṇaṃ mārutātmeti prāṇāpānau ca tanmayau
c sparśanaṃ cendriyaṃ vidyāt tathā sparśaṃ ca tanmayam
a tataḥ pākaḥ prakāśaś ca jyotiś cakṣuś ca tanmayam
c tasya rūpaṃ guṇaṃ vidyāt tamo 'nvavasitātmakam
a prakledaḥ kṣudratā sneha ity āpo hy upadiśyate
b asṛṅ majjā ca yac cānyat snigdhaṃ vidyāt tadātmakam
c rasanaṃ cendriyaṃ jihvā rasaś cāpāṃ guṇo mataḥ
a saṃghātaḥ pārthivo dhātur asthidantanakhāni ca
c śmaśru loma ca keśāś ca sirāḥ snāyu ca carma ca
a indriyaṃ ghrāṇasaṃjñānaṃ nāsikety abhidhīyate
c gandhaś caivendriyārtho 'yaṃ vijñeyaḥ pṛthivīmayaḥ
a uttareṣu guṇāḥ santi sarve sarveṣu cottarāḥ
c pañcānāṃ bhūtasaṃghānāṃ saṃtatiṃ munayo viduḥ
a mano navamam eṣāṃ tu buddhis tu daśamī smṛtā
c ekādaśo 'ntarātmā ca sarvataḥ para ucyate
a vyavasāyātmikā buddhir mano vyākaraṇātmakam
c karmānumānād vijñeyaḥ sa jīvaḥ kṣetrasaṃjñakaḥ
a ebhiḥ kālāṣṭamair bhāvair yaḥ sarvaiḥ sarvam anvitam
c paśyaty akaluṣaṃ prājñaḥ sa mohaṃ nānuvartate
 vyāsa uvāca
a śarīrād vipramuktaṃ hi sūkṣmabhūtaṃ śarīriṇam
c karmabhiḥ paripaśyanti śāstroktaiḥ śāstracetasaḥ
a yathā marīcyaḥ sahitāś caranti
gacchanti tiṣṭhanti ca dṛśyamānāḥ
c dehair vimuktā vicaranti lokāṃs
tathaiva sattvāny atimānuṣāṇi
a pratirūpaṃ yathaivāpsu tāpaḥ sūryasya lakṣyate
c sattvavāṃs tu tathā sattvaṃ pratirūpaṃ prapaśyati
a tāni sūkṣmāṇi sattvasthā vimuktāni śarīrataḥ
c svena tattvena tattvajñāḥ paśyanti niyatendriyāḥ
a svapatāṃ jāgratāṃ caiva sarveṣām ātmacintitam
c pradhānadvaidhayuktānāṃ jahatāṃ karmajaṃ rajaḥ
a yathāhani tathā rātrau yathā rātrau tathāhani
c vaśe tiṣṭhati sattvātmā satataṃ yogayoginām
a teṣāṃ nityaṃ sadānityo bhūtātmā satataṃ guṇaiḥ
c saptabhis tv anvitaḥ sūkṣmaiś cariṣṇur ajarāmaraḥ
a manobuddhiparābhūtaḥ svadehaparadehavit
c svapneṣv api bhavaty eṣa vijñātā sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
a tatrāpi labhate duḥkhaṃ tatrāpi labhate sukham
c krodhalobhau tu tatrāpi kṛtvā vyasanam archati
a prīṇitaś cāpi bhavati mahato 'rthān avāpya ca
c karoti puṇyaṃ tatrāpi jāgrann iva ca paśyati
d mahoṣmāntargataś cāpi garbhatvaṃ samupeyivān
d daśa māsān vasan kukṣau naiṣo 'nnam iva jīryate
a tam evam atitejoṃśaṃ bhūtātmānaṃ hṛdi sthitam
c tamorajobhyām āviṣṭā nānupaśyanti mūrtiṣu
a śāstrayogaparā bhūtvā svam ātmānaṃ parīpsavaḥ
c anucchvāsāny amūrtīni yāni vajropamāny api
a pṛthagbhūteṣu sṛṣṭeṣu caturṣv āśramakarmasu
c samādhau yogam evaitac chāṇḍilyaḥ śamam abravīt
a viditvā sapta sūkṣmāṇi ṣaḍaṅgaṃ ca maheśvaram
c pradhānaviniyogasthaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati
 vyāsa uvāca
a hṛdi kāmadrumaś citro mohasaṃcayasaṃbhavaḥ
c krodhamānamahāskandho vivitsāparimocanaḥ
a tasya cājñānam ādhāraḥ pramādaḥ pariṣecanam
c so 'bhyasūyāpalāśo hi purāduṣkṛtasāravān
a saṃmohacintāviṭapaḥ śokaśākho bhayaṃkaraḥ
c mohanībhiḥ pipāsābhir latābhiḥ pariveṣṭitaḥ
a upāsate mahāvṛkṣaṃ sulubdhās taṃ phalepsavaḥ
c āyāsaiḥ saṃyataḥ pāśaiḥ phalāni pariveṣṭayan
a yas tān pāśān vaśe kṛtvā taṃ vṛkṣam apakarṣati
c gataḥ sa duḥkhayor antaṃ yatamānas tayor dvayoḥ
a saṃrohaty akṛtaprajñaḥ saṃtāpena hi pādapam
c sa tam eva tato hanti viṣaṃ grastam ivāturam
a tasyānuśayamūlasya mūlam uddhriyate balāt
c tyāgāpramādākṛtinā sāmyena paramāsinā
a evaṃ yo veda kāmasya kevalaṃ parikarṣaṇam
c vadhaṃ vai kāmaśāstrasya sa duḥkhāny ativartate
a śarīraṃ puram ity āhuḥ svāminī buddhir iṣyate
c tatra buddheḥ śarīrasthaṃ mano nāmārthacintakam
a indriyāṇi janāḥ paurās tadarthaṃ tu parā kṛtiḥ
c tatra dvau dāruṇau doṣau tamo nāma rajas tathā
a yadartham upajīvanti paurāḥ sahapureśvarāḥ
c advāreṇa tam evārthaṃ dvau doṣāv upajīvataḥ
a tatra buddhir hi durdharṣā manaḥ sādharmyam ucyate
c paurāś cāpi manas trastās teṣām api calā sthitiḥ
a yadarthaṃ buddhir adhyāste na so 'rthaḥ pariṣīdati
b pauramantraviyuktāyāḥ so 'rthaḥ saṃsīdati kramāt
c yadarthaṃ pṛthag adhyāste manas tat pariṣīdati
a pṛthagbhūtaṃ yadā buddhyā mano bhavati kevalam
c tatrainaṃ vivṛtaṃ śūnyaṃ rajaḥ paryavatiṣṭhate
a tan manaḥ kurute sakhyaṃ rajasā saha saṃgatam
c taṃ cādāya janaṃ pauraṃ rajase saṃprayacchati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a bhūtānāṃ guṇasaṃkhyānaṃ bhūyaḥ putra niśāmaya
c dvaipāyanamukhād bhraṣṭaṃ ślāghayā parayānagha
a dīptānalanibhaḥ prāha bhagavān dhūmravarcase
c tato 'ham api vakṣyāmi bhūyaḥ putra nidarśanam
a bhūmeḥ sthairyaṃ pṛthutvaṃ ca kāṭhinyaṃ prasavātmatā
c gandho gurutvaṃ śaktiś ca saṃghātaḥ sthāpanā dhṛtiḥ
a apāṃ śaityaṃ rasaḥ kledo dravatvaṃ snehasaumyatā
c jihvā viṣyandinī caiva bhaumāpyāsravaṇaṃ tathā
a agner durdharṣatā tejas tāpaḥ pākaḥ prakāśanam
c śaucaṃ rāgo laghus taikṣṇyaṃ daśamaṃ cordhvabhāgitā
a vāyor aniyamaḥ sparśo vādasthānaṃ svatantratā
c balaṃ śaighryaṃ ca mohaś ca ceṣṭā karmakṛtā bhavaḥ
a ākāśasya guṇaḥ śabdo vyāpitvaṃ chidratāpi ca
c anāśrayam anālambam avyaktam avikāritā
a apratīghātatā caiva bhūtatvaṃ vikṛtāni ca
c guṇāḥ pañcāśataṃ proktāḥ pañcabhūtātmabhāvitāḥ
a calopapattir vyaktiś ca visargaḥ kalpanā kṣamā
c sad asac cāśutā caiva manaso nava vai guṇāḥ
a iṣṭāniṣṭavikalpaś ca vyavasāyaḥ samādhitā
c saṃśayaḥ pratipattiś ca buddhau pañceha ye guṇāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ pañcaguṇā buddhiḥ kathaṃ pañcendriyā guṇāḥ
b etebhya ete nirvṛttāḥ svaguṇāyātmanopi vā
c etan me sarvam ācakṣva sūkṣmajñānaṃ pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a āhuḥ ṣaṣṭiṃ bhūtaguṇān vai
bhūtaviśiṣṭā nityaviṣaktāḥ
c bhūtaviṣaktāś cākṣarasṛṣṭāḥ
putra na nityaṃ tad iha vadanti
a tat putra cintākalitaṃ yad uktam
anāgataṃ vai tava saṃpratīha
c bhūtārthatattvaṃ tad avāpya sarvaṃ
bhūtaprabhāvād bhava śāntabuddhiḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ya ime pṛthivīpālāḥ śerate pṛthivītale
c pṛtanāmadhya ete hi gatasattvā mahābalāḥ
a ekaikaśo bhīmabalā nāgāyutabalās tathā
c ete hi nihatāḥ saṃkhye tulyatejobalair naraiḥ
a naiṣāṃ paśyāmi hantāraṃ prāṇināṃ saṃyuge purā
c vikrameṇopasaṃpannās tejobalasamanvitāḥ
a atha ceme mahāprājña śerate hi gatāsavaḥ
c mṛtā iti ca śabdo 'yaṃ vartaty eṣu gatāsuṣu
a ime mṛtā nṛpatayaḥ prāyaśo bhīmavikramāḥ
c tatra me saṃśayo jātaḥ kutaḥ saṃjñā mṛtā iti
a kasya mṛtyuḥ kuto mṛtyuḥ kena mṛtyur iha prajāḥ
c haraty amarasaṃkāśa tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a purā kṛtayuge tāta rājāsīd avikampakaḥ
c sa śatruvaśam āpannaḥ saṃgrāme kṣīṇavāhanaḥ
a tatra putro harir nāma nārāyaṇasamo bale
c sa śatrubhir hataḥ saṃkhye sabalaḥ sapadānugaḥ
a sa rājā śatruvaśagaḥ putraśokasamanvitaḥ
c yadṛcchayāśāntiparo dadarśa bhuvi nāradam
a sa tasmai sarvam ācaṣṭa yathā vṛttaṃ janeśvaraḥ
c śatrubhir grahaṇaṃ saṃkhye putrasya maraṇaṃ tathā
a tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā nārado 'tha tapodhanaḥ
c ākhyānam idam ācaṣṭa putraśokāpahaṃ tadā
a rājañ śṛṇu samākhyānam adyedaṃ bahuvistaram
c yathā vṛttaṃ śrutaṃ caiva mayāpi vasudhādhipa
a prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā mahātejāḥ prajāsarge pitāmahaḥ
c atīva vṛddhā bahulā nāmṛṣyata punaḥ prajāḥ
a na hy antaram abhūt kiṃ cit kva cij jantubhir acyuta
c nirucchvāsam ivonnaddhaṃ trailokyam abhavan nṛpa
a tasya cintā samutpannā saṃhāraṃ prati bhūpate
c cintayan nādhyagacchac ca saṃhāre hetukāraṇam
a tasya roṣān mahārāja khebhyo 'gnir udatiṣṭhata
c tena sarvā diśo rājan dadāha sa pitāmahaḥ
a tato divaṃ bhuvaṃ khaṃ ca jagac ca sacarācaram
c dadāha pāvako rājan bhagavatkopasaṃbhavaḥ
a tatrādahyanta bhūtāni jaṅgamāni dhruvāṇi ca
c mahatā kopavegena kupite prapitāmahe
a tato harijaṭaḥ sthāṇur vedādhvarapatiḥ śivaḥ
c jagāda śaraṇaṃ devo brahmāṇaṃ paravīrahā
a tasminn abhigate sthāṇau prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
c abravīd varado devo jvalann iva tadā śivam
a karavāṇy adya kaṃ kāmaṃ varārho 'si mato mama
c kartā hy asmi priyaṃ śambho tava yad dhṛdi vartate
 sthāṇur uvāca
a prajāsarganimittaṃ me kāryavattām imāṃ prabho
c viddhi sṛṣṭās tvayā hīmā mā kupyāsāṃ pitāmaha
a tava tejogninā deva prajā dahyanti sarvaśaḥ
c tā dṛṣṭvā mama kāruṇyaṃ mā kupyāsāṃ jagatprabho
 prajāpatir uvāca
a na kupye na ca me kāmo na bhaveran prajā iti
c lāghavārthaṃ dharaṇyās tu tataḥ saṃhāra iṣyate
a iyaṃ hi māṃ sadā devī bhārārtā samacodayat
c saṃhārārthaṃ mahādeva bhāreṇāpsu nimajjati
a yadāhaṃ nādhigacchāmi buddhyā bahu vicārayan
c saṃhāram āsāṃ vṛddhānāṃ tato māṃ krodha āviśat
 sthāṇur uvāca
a saṃhārāntaṃ prasīdasva mā krudhas tridaśeśvara
c mā prajāḥ sthāvaraṃ vaica jaṅgamaṃ ca vinīnaśaḥ
a palvalāni ca sarvāṇi sarvaṃ caiva tṛṇolapam
c sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva bhūtagrāmaṃ caturvidham
a tad etad bhasmasād bhūtaṃ jagat sarvam upaplutam
c prasīda bhagavan sādho vara eṣa vṛto mayā
a naṣṭā na punar eṣyanti prajā hy etāḥ kathaṃ cana
c tasmān nivartyatām etat tejaḥ svenaiva tejasā
a upāyam anyaṃ saṃpaśya prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
c yatheme jantavaḥ sarve nivarteran paraṃtapa
a abhāvam abhigaccheyur utsannaprajanāḥ prajāḥ
b paryāyeṇābhyupāyena neyā mṛtyuvaśaṃ tataḥ
b putratvenānusaṃkalpya tvayāhaṃ tapasāpy aja
c adhidaivaniyukto 'smi tvayā lokeṣv iheśvara
a tvad bhavaṃ hi jagannātha jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
c prasādya tvāṃ mahādeva yācāmy āvṛttijāḥ prajāḥ
 nārada uvāca
a śrutvā tu vacanaṃ devaḥ sthāṇor niyatavāṅmanāḥ
c tejas tat svaṃ nijagrāha punar evāntar ātmanā
a tato 'gnim upasaṃgṛhya bhagavāṃl lokapūjitaḥ
c pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kalpayām āsa vai prabhuḥ
a upasaṃharatas tasya tam agniṃ roṣajaṃ tadā
c prādurbabhūva viśvebhyaḥ khebhyo nārī mahātmanaḥ
a kṛṣṇā raktāmbaradharā raktanetratalāntarā
c divyakuṇḍalasaṃpannā divyābharaṇabhūṣitā
a sā viniḥsṛtya vai khebhyo dakṣiṇām āśritā diśam
c dadṛśāte 'tha tau kanyāṃ devau viśveśvarāv ubhau
a tām āhūya tadā devo lokānām ādir īśvaraḥ
c mṛtyo iti mahīpāla jahi cemāḥ prajā iti
a tvaṃ hi saṃhārabuddhyā me cintitā ruṣitena ca
c tasmāt saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajāḥ sajaḍapaṇḍitāḥ
a aviśeṣeṇa caiva tvaṃ prajāḥ saṃhara bhāmini
c mama tvaṃ hi niyogena śreyaḥ param avāpsyasi
a evam uktā tu sā devī mṛtyuḥ kamalamālinī
c pradadhyau duḥkhitā bālā sāśrupātam atīva hi
a pāṇibhyāṃ caiva jagrāha tāny aśrūṇi janeśvaraḥ
c mānavānāṃ hitārthāya yayāce punar eva ca
 nārada uvāca
a vinīya duḥkham abalā sā tv atīvāyatekṣaṇā
c uvāca prāñjalir bhūtvā latevāvarjitā tadā
a tvayā sṛṣṭā kathaṃ nārī mādṛśī vadatāṃ vara
c raudrakarmābhijāyeta sarvaprāṇibhayaṃkarī
a bibhemy aham adharmasya dharmyam ādiśa karma me
c tvaṃ māṃ bhītām avekṣasva śiveneśvara cakṣuṣā
a bālān vṛddhān vayaḥsthāṃś ca na hareyam anāgasaḥ
c prāṇinaḥ prāṇinām īśa namas te 'bhiprasīda me
a priyān putrān vayasyāṃś ca bhrātṝn mātṝḥ pitṝn api
c apadhyāsyanti yad deva mṛtāṃs teṣāṃ bibhemy aham
a kṛpaṇāśruparikledo dahen māṃ śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
c tebhyo 'haṃ balavad bhītā śaraṇaṃ tvām upāgatā
a yamasya bhavane deva yāty ante pāpakarmiṇaḥ
c prasādaye tvā varada prasādaṃ kuru me prabho
a etam icchāmy ahaṃ kāmaṃ tvatto lokapitāmaha
c iccheyaṃ tvatprasādāc ca tapas taptuṃ sureśvara
 pitāmaha uvāca
a mṛtyo saṃkalpitā me tvaṃ prajāsaṃhārahetunā
b tvaṃ hi saṃhārabuddhyā me cintitā ruṣitena ca
c gaccha saṃhara sarvās tvaṃ prajā mā ca vicāraya
a etad evam avaśyaṃ hi bhavitā naitad anyathā
c kriyatām anavadyāṅgi yathoktaṃ madvaco 'naghe
 nārada uvāca
a evam uktā mahābāho mṛtyuḥ parapuraṃjaya
c na vyājahāra tasthau ca prahvā bhagavadunmukhī
a punaḥ punar athoktā sā gatasattveva bhāminī
c tūṣṇīm āsīt tato devo devānām īśvareśvaraḥ
a prasasāda kila brahmā svayam evātmanātmavān
c smayamānaś ca lokeśo lokān sarvān avaikṣata
a nivṛttaroṣe tasmiṃs tu bhagavaty aparājite
c sā kanyāpajagāmāsya samīpād iti naḥ śrutam
a apasṛtyāpratiśrutya prajāsaṃharaṇaṃ tadā
c tvaramāṇeva rājendra mṛtyur dhenukam abhyayāt
a sā tatra paramaṃ devī tapo 'carata duścaram
c samā hy ekapade tasthau daśa padmāni pañca ca
a tāṃ tathā kurvatīṃ tatra tapaḥ paramaduścaram
c punar eva mahātejā brahmā vacanam abravīt
a kuruṣva me vaco mṛtyo tad anādṛtya satvarā
c tathaivaikapade tāta punar anyāni sapta sā
a tasthau padmāni ṣaṭ caiva pañca dve caiva mānada
c bhūyaḥ padmāyutaṃ tāta mṛgaiḥ saha cacāra sā
d dve cāyute naraśreṣṭha vāyvāhārā mahāmate
a punar gatvā tato rājan maunam ātiṣṭhad uttamam
c apsu varṣasahasrāṇi sapta caikaṃ ca pārthiva
a tato jagāma sā kanyā kauśikīṃ bharatarṣabha
c tatra vāyujalāhārā cacāra niyamaṃ punaḥ
a tato yayau mahābhāgā gaṅgāṃ meruṃ ca kevalam
c tasthau dārv iva niśceṣṭā bhūtānāṃ hitakāmyayā
a tato himavato mūrdhni yatra devāḥ samījire
c tatrāṅguṣṭhena rājendra nikharvam aparaṃ tataḥ
e tasthau pitāmahaṃ caiva toṣayām āsa yatnataḥ
a tatas tām abravīt tatra lokānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥ
c kim idaṃ vartate putri kriyatāṃ tad vaco mama
a tato 'bravīt punar mṛtyur bhagavantaṃ pitāmaham
c na hareyaṃ prajā deva punas tvāhaṃ prasādaye
a tām adharmabhayatrastāṃ punar eva ca yācatīm
c tadābravīd devadevo nigṛhyedaṃ vacas tataḥ
a adharmo nāsti te mṛtyo saṃyacchemāḥ prajāḥ śubhe
c mayā hy uktaṃ mṛṣā bhadre bhavitā neha kiṃ cana
a dharmaḥ sanātanaś ca tvām ihaivānupravekṣyate
c ahaṃ ca vibudhāś caiva tvaddhite niratāḥ sadā
a imam anyaṃ ca te kāmaṃ dadāmi manasepsitam
c na tvā doṣeṇa yāsyanti vyādhisaṃpīḍitāḥ prajāḥ
a puruṣeṣu ca rūpeṇa puruṣas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
c strīṣu strīrūpiṇī caiva tṛtīyeṣu napuṃsakam
a saivam uktā mahārāja kṛtāñjalir uvāca ha
c punar eva mahātmānaṃ neti deveśam avyayam
a tām abravīt tadā devo mṛtyo saṃhara mānavān
c adharmas te na bhavitā tathā dhyāsyāmy ahaṃ śubhe
d tvaṃ hi yattā ca yuktā ca pūrvotpannā ca bhāminī
d anuśiṣṭā ca nirdoṣā tasmāt tvaṃ kuru me matam
a yān aśrubindūn patitān apaśyaṃ
ye pāṇibhyāṃ dhāritās te purastāt
c te vyādhayo mānavān ghorarūpāḥ
prāpte kāle pīḍayiṣyanti mṛtyo
a sarveṣāṃ tvaṃ prāṇinām antakāle
kāmakrodhau sahitau yojayethāḥ
c evaṃ dharmas tvām upaiṣyaty ameyo
na cādharmaṃ lapsyase tulyavṛttiḥ
a evaṃ dharmaṃ pālayiṣyasy athoktaṃ
na cātmānaṃ majjayiṣyasy adharme
c tasmāt kāmaṃ rocayābhyāgataṃ tvaṃ
saṃyojyātho saṃharasveha jantūn
a sā vai tadā mṛtyusaṃjñāpadeśāc
chāpād bhītā bāḍham ity abravīt tam
c atho prāṇān prāṇinām antakāle
kāmakrodhau prāpya nirmohya hanti
a mṛtyor ye te vyādhayaś cāśrupātā
manuṣyāṇāṃ rujyate yaiḥ śarīram
c sarveṣāṃ vai prāṇināṃ prāṇanānte
tasmāc chokaṃ mā kṛthā budhya buddhyā
a sarve devāḥ prāṇināṃ prāṇanānte
gatvā vṛttāḥ saṃnivṛttās tathaiva
c evaṃ sarve mānavāḥ prāṇanānte
gatvāvṛttā devavad rājasiṃha
a vāyur bhīmo bhīmanādo mahaujāḥ
sarveṣāṃ ca prāṇināṃ prāṇabhūtaḥ
c nānāvṛttir dehināṃ dehabhede
tasmād vāyur devadevo viśiṣṭaḥ
a sarve devā martyasaṃjñāviśiṣṭāḥ
sarve martyā devasaṃjñāviśiṣṭāḥ
c tasmāt putraṃ mā śuco rājasiṃha
putraḥ svargaṃ prāpya te modate ha
a evaṃ mṛtyur devasṛṣṭā prajānāṃ
prāpte kāle saṃharantī yathāvat
c tasyāś caiva vyādhayas te 'śrupātāḥ
prāpte kāle saṃharantīha jantūn
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ime vai mānavāḥ sarve dharmaṃ prati viśaṅkitāḥ
c ko 'yaṃ dharmaḥ kuto dharmas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a dharmo nv ayam ihārthaḥ kim amutrārtho 'pi vā bhavet
c ubhayārtho 'pi vā dharmas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sadācāraḥ smṛtir vedās trividhaṃ dharmalakṣaṇam
c caturtham artham ity āhuḥ kavayo dharmalakṣaṇam
a api hy uktāni karmāṇi vyavasyanty uttarāvare
c lokayātrārtham eveha dharmasya niyamaḥ kṛtaḥ
e ubhayatra sukhodarka iha caiva paratra ca
a alabdhvā nipuṇaṃ dharmaṃ pāpaḥ pāpe prasajjati
c na ca pāpakṛtaḥ pāpān mucyante ke cid āpadi
a apāpavādī bhavati yadā bhavati dharmavit
c dharmasya niṣṭhā svācāras tam evāśritya bhotsyase
a yadādharmasamāviṣṭo dhanaṃ gṛhṇāti taskaraḥ
c ramate nirharan stenaḥ paravittam arājake
a yadāsya tad dharanty anye tadā rājānam icchati
c tadā teṣāṃ spṛhayate ye vai tuṣṭāḥ svakair dhanaiḥ
a abhītaḥ śucir abhyeti rājadvāram aśaṅkitaḥ
c na hi duścaritaṃ kiṃ cid antarātmani paśyati
a satyasya vacanaṃ sādhu na satyād vidyate param
c satyena vidhṛtaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaṃ satye pratiṣṭhitam
a api pāpakṛto raudrāḥ satyaṃ kṛtvā pṛthak pṛthak
c adroham avisaṃvādaṃ pravartante tadāśrayāḥ
e te cen mitho 'dhṛtiṃ kuryur vinaśyeyur asaṃśayam
a na hartavyaṃ paradhanam iti dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c manyante balavantas taṃ durbalaiḥ saṃpravartitam
e yadā niyatidaurbalyam athaiṣām eva rocate
a na hy atyantaṃ balayutā bhavanti sukhino 'pi vā
c tasmād anārjave buddhir na kāryā te kathaṃ cana
a asādhubhyo 'sya na bhayaṃ na corebhyo na rājataḥ
c na kiṃ cit kasya cit kurvan nirbhayaḥ śucir āvaset
a sarvataḥ śaṅkate steno mṛgo grāmam iveyivān
c bahudhācaritaṃ pāpam anyatraivānupaśyati
a muditaḥ śucir abhyeti sarvato nirbhayaḥ sadā
c na hi duścaritaṃ kiṃ cid ātmano 'nyeṣu paśyati
a dātavyam ity ayaṃ dharma ukto bhūtahite rataiḥ
c taṃ manyante dhanayutāḥ kṛpaṇaiḥ saṃpravartitam
a yadā niyatikārpaṇyam athaiṣām eva rocate
c na hy atyantaṃ dhanavanto bhavanti sukhino 'pi vā
a yad anyair vihitaṃ necched ātmanaḥ karma pūruṣaḥ
c na tat pareṣu kurvīta jānann apriyam ātmanaḥ
a yo 'nyasya syād upapatiḥ sa kaṃ kiṃ vaktum arhati
c yad anyas tasya tat kuryān na mṛṣyed iti me matiḥ
a jīvituṃ yaḥ svayaṃ cecchet kathaṃ so 'nyaṃ praghātayet
c yad yad ātmana iccheta tat parasyāpi cintayet
a atiriktaiḥ saṃvibhajed bhogair anyān akiṃcanān
c etasmāt kāraṇād dhātrā kusīdaṃ saṃpravartitam
a yasmiṃs tu devāḥ samaye saṃtiṣṭheraṃs tathā bhavet
c atha cel lābhasamaye sthitir dharme 'pi śobhanā
a sarvaṃ priyābhyupagataṃ dharmam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c paśyaitaṃ lakṣaṇoddeśaṃ dharmādharme yudhiṣṭhira
a lokasaṃgrahasaṃyuktaṃ vidhātrā vihitaṃ purā
c sūkṣmadharmārthaniyataṃ satāṃ caritam uttamam
a dharmalakṣaṇam ākhyātam etat te kurusattama
c tasmād anārjave buddhir na kāryā te kathaṃ cana
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a sūkṣmaṃ sādhu samādiṣṭaṃ bhavatā dharmalakṣaṇam
c pratibhā tv asti me kā cit tāṃ brūyām anumānataḥ
a bhūyāṃso hṛdaye ye me praśnās te vyāhṛtās tvayā
c imam anyaṃ pravakṣyāmi na rājan vigrahād iva
a imāni hi prāpayanti sṛjanty uttārayanti ca
c na dharmaḥ paripāṭhena śakyo bhārata veditum
a anyo dharmaḥ samasthasya viṣamasthasya cāparaḥ
c āpadas tu kathaṃ śakyāḥ paripāṭhena veditum
a sadācāro mato dharmaḥ santas tv ācāralakṣaṇāḥ
c sādhyāsādhyaṃ kathaṃ śakyaṃ sadācāro hy alakṣaṇam
a dṛśyate dharmarūpeṇa adharmaṃ prākṛtaś caran
c dharmaṃ cādharmarūpeṇa kaś cid aprākṛtaś caran
a punar asya pramāṇaṃ hi nirdiṣṭaṃ śāstrakovidaiḥ
c vedavādāś cānuyugaṃ hrasantīti ha naḥ śrutam
a anye kṛtayuge dharmās tretāyāṃ dvāpare 'pare
c anye kaliyuge dharmā yathāśaktikṛtā iva
a āmnāyavacanaṃ satyam ity ayaṃ lokasaṃgrahaḥ
c āmnāyebhyaḥ paraṃ vedāḥ prasṛtā viśvatomukhāḥ
a te cet sarve pramāṇaṃ vai pramāṇaṃ tan na vidyate
c pramāṇe cāpramāṇe ca viruddhe śāstratā kutaḥ
a dharmasya hriyamāṇasya balavadbhir durātmabhiḥ
c yā yā vikriyate saṃsthā tataḥ sāpi praṇaśyati
a vidma caivaṃ na vā vidma śakyaṃ vā vedituṃ na vā
c aṇīyān kṣuradhārāyā garīyān parvatād api
a gandharvanagarākāraḥ prathamaṃ saṃpradṛśyate
c anvīkṣyamāṇaḥ kavibhiḥ punar gacchaty adarśanam
a nipānānīva gobhyāśe kṣetre kulyeva bhārata
c smṛto 'pi śāśvato dharmo viprahīṇo na dṛśyate
a kāmād anye kṣayād anye kāraṇair aparais tathā
c asanto hi vṛthācāraṃ bhajante bahavo 'pare
a dharmo bhavati sa kṣipraṃ vilīnas tv eva sādhuṣu
c anye tān āhur unmattān api cāvahasanty uta
a mahājanā hy upāvṛttā rājadharmaṃ samāśritāḥ
c na hi sarvahitaḥ kaś cid ācāraḥ saṃpradṛśyate
a tenaivānyaḥ prabhavati so 'paraṃ bādhate punaḥ
c dṛśyate caiva sa punas tulyarūpo yadṛcchayā
a yenaivānyaḥ prabhavati so 'parān api bādhate
c ācārāṇām anaikāgryaṃ sarveṣām eva lakṣayet
a cirābhipannaḥ kavibhiḥ pūrvaṃ dharma udāhṛtaḥ
c tenācāreṇa pūrveṇa saṃsthā bhavati śāśvatī
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c tulādhārasya vākyāni dharme jājalinā saha
a vane vanacaraḥ kaś cij jājalir nāma vai dvijaḥ
c sāgaroddeśam āgamya tapas tepe mahātapāḥ
a niyato niyatāhāraś cīrājinajaṭādharaḥ
c malapaṅkadharo dhīmān bahūn varṣagaṇān muniḥ
a sa kadā cin mahātejā jalavāso mahīpate
c cacāra lokān viprarṣiḥ prekṣamāṇo manojavaḥ
a sa cintayām āsa munir jalamadhye kadā cana
c viprekṣya sāgarāntāṃ vai mahīṃ savanakānanām
a na mayā sadṛśo 'stīha loke sthāvarajaṅgame
c apsu vaihāyasaṃ gacchen mayā yo 'nyaḥ saheti vai
a sa dṛśyamāno rakṣobhir jalamadhye 'vadat tataḥ
c abruvaṃś ca piśācās taṃ naivaṃ tvaṃ vaktum arhasi
a tulādhāro vaṇigdharmā vārāṇasyāṃ mahāyaśāḥ
c so 'py evaṃ nārhate vaktuṃ yathā tvaṃ dvijasattama
a ity ukto jājalir bhūtaiḥ pratyuvāca mahātapāḥ
c paśyeyaṃ tam ahaṃ prājñaṃ tulādhāraṃ yaśasvinam
a iti bruvāṇaṃ tam ṛṣiṃ rakṣāṃsy uddhṛtya sāgarāt
c abruvan gaccha panthānam āsthāyemaṃ dvijottama
a ity ukto jājalir bhūtair jagāma vimanās tadā
c vārāṇasyāṃ tulādhāraṃ samāsādyābravīd vacaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃ kṛtaṃ sukṛtaṃ karma tāta jājalinā purā
c yena siddhiṃ parāṃ prāptas tan no vyākhyātum arhasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atīva tapasā yukto ghoreṇa sa babhūva ha
c nadyupasparśanarataḥ sāyaṃ prātar mahātapāḥ
a agnīn paricaran samyak svādhyāyaparamo dvijaḥ
c vānaprasthavidhānajño jājalir jvalitaḥ śriyā
a satye tapasi tiṣṭhan sa na ca dharmam avaikṣata
c varṣāsv ākāśaśāyī sa hemante jalasaṃśrayaḥ
a vatātapasaho grīṣme na ca dharmam avindata
c duḥkhaśayyāś ca vividhā bhūmau ca parivartanam
a tataḥ kadā cit sa munir varṣāsv ākāśam āsthitaḥ
c antarikṣāj jalaṃ mūrdhnā pratyagṛhṇān muhur muhuḥ
a atha tasya jaṭāḥ klinnā babhūvur grathitāḥ prabho
b klinnā babhūvur grathitā āplutasya jaṭāḥ prabho
c araṇyagamanān nityaṃ malino malasaṃyutāḥ
a sa kadā cin nirāhāro vāyubhakṣo mahātapāḥ
c tasthau kāṣṭhavad avyagro na cacāla ca karhi cit
a tasya sma sthāṇubhūtasya nirviceṣṭasya bhārata
c kuliṅgaśakunau rājan nīḍaṃ śirasi cakratuḥ
a sa tau dayāvān viprarṣir upapraikṣata dampatī
c kurvāṇaṃ nīḍakaṃ tatra jaṭāsu tṛṇatantubhiḥ
a yadā sa na calaty eva sthāṇubhūto mahātapāḥ
c tatas tau pariviśvastau sukhaṃ tatroṣatus tadā
a atītāsv atha varṣāsu śaratkāla upasthite
c prājāpatyena vidhinā viśvāsāt kāmamohitau
a tatrāpātayatāṃ rājañ śirasy aṇḍāni khecarau
c tāny abudhyata tejasvī sa vipraḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
a buddhvā ca sa mahātejā na cacālaiva jājaliḥ
c dharme dhṛtamanā nityaṃ nādharmaṃ sa tv arocayat
a ahany ahani cāgamya tatas tau tasya mūrdhani
c āśvāsitau vai vasataḥ saṃprahṛṣṭau tadā vibho
a aṇḍebhyas tv atha puṣṭebhyaḥ prajāyanta śakuntakāḥ
c vyavardhanta ca tatraiva na cākampata jājaliḥ
a sa rakṣamāṇas tv aṇḍāni kuliṅgānāṃ yatavrataḥ
c tathaiva tasthau dharmātmā nirviceṣṭaḥ samāhitaḥ
a tatas tu kālasamaye babhūvus te 'tha pakṣiṇaḥ
c bubudhe tāṃś ca sa munir jātapakṣāñ śakuntakān
a tataḥ kadā cit tāṃs tatra paśyan pakṣīn yatavrataḥ
c babhūva paramaprītas tadā matimatāṃ varaḥ
a tathā tān abhisaṃvṛddhān dṛṣṭvā cāpnuvatāṃ mudam
c śakunau nirbhayau tatra ūṣatuś cātmajaiḥ saha
a jātapakṣāṃś ca so 'paśyad uḍḍīnān punarāgatān
c sāyaṃ sāyaṃ dvijān vipro na cākampata jājaliḥ
a kadā cit punar abhyetya punar gacchanti saṃtatam
c tyaktā mātṛpitṛbhyāṃ te na cākampata jājaliḥ
a atha te divasaṃ cārīṃ gatvā sāyaṃ punar nṛpa
c upāvartanta tatraiva nivāsārthaṃ śakuntakāḥ
a kadā cid divasān pañca samutpatya vihaṃgamāḥ
c ṣaṣṭhe 'hani samājagmur na cākampata jājaliḥ
a krameṇa ca punaḥ sarve divasāni bahūny api
c nopāvartanta śakunā jātaprāṇāḥ sma te yadā
a kadā cin māsamātreṇa samutpatya vihaṃgamāḥ
c naivāgacchaṃs tato rājan prātiṣṭhata sa jājaliḥ
a tatas teṣu pralīneṣu jājalir jātavismayaḥ
c siddho 'smīti matiṃ cakre tatas taṃ māna āviśat
a sa tathā nirgatān dṛṣṭvā śakuntān niyatavrataḥ
c saṃbhāvitātmā saṃbhāvya bhṛśaṃ prītas tadābhavan
a sa nadyāṃ samupaspṛśya tarpayitvā hutāśanam
c udayantam athādityam abhyagacchan mahātapāḥ
a saṃbhāvya caṭakān mūrdhni jājalir japatāṃ varaḥ
c āsphoṭayat tadākāśe dharmaḥ prāpto mayeti vai
a athāntarikṣe vāg āsīt tāṃ sa śuśrāva jājaliḥ
c dharmeṇa na samas tvaṃ vai tulādhārasya jājale
a vārāṇasyāṃ mahāprājñas tulādhāraḥ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c so 'py evaṃ nārhate vaktuṃ yathā tvaṃ bhāṣase dvija
a so 'marṣavaśam āpannas tulādhāradidṛkṣayā
c pṛthivīm acarad rājan yatrasāyaṃgṛho muniḥ
a kālena mahatāgacchat sa tu vārāṇasīṃ purīm
c vikrīṇantaṃ ca paṇyāni tulādhāraṃ dadarśa saḥ
a so 'pi dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ vipram āyāntaṃ bhāṇḍajīvanaḥ
c samutthāya susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ svāgatenābhyapūjayat
 tulādhāra uvāca
a āyān evāsi vidito mama brahman na saṃśayaḥ
c bravīmi yat tu vacanaṃ tac chṛṇuṣva dvijottama
a sāgarānūpam āśritya tapas taptaṃ tvayā mahat
c na ca dharmasya saṃjñāṃ tvaṃ purā vettha kathaṃ cana
a tataḥ siddhasya tapasā tava vipra śakuntakāḥ
c kṣipraṃ śirasy ajāyanta te ca saṃbhāvitās tvayā
a jātapakṣā yadā te ca gatāś cārīm itas tataḥ
c manyamānas tato dharmaṃ caṭakaprabhavaṃ dvija
e khe vācaṃ tvam athāśrauṣīr māṃ prati dvijasattama
a amarṣavaśam āpannas tataḥ prāpto bhavān iha
c karavāṇi priyaṃ kiṃ te tad brūhi dvijasattama
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ sa tadā tena tulādhāreṇa dhīmatā
c provāca vacanaṃ dhīmāñ jājalir japatāṃ varaḥ
a vikrīṇānaḥ sarvarasān sarvagandhāṃś ca vāṇija
c vanaspatīn oṣadhīś ca teṣāṃ mūlaphalāni ca
a adhyagā naiṣṭhikīṃ buddhiṃ kutas tvām idam āgatam
c etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ nikhilena mahāmate
a evam uktas tulādhāro brāhmaṇena yaśasvinā
c uvāca dharmasūkṣmāṇi vaiśyo dharmārthatattvavit
e jājaliṃ kaṣṭatapasaṃ jñānatṛptas tadā nṛpa
a vedāhaṃ jājale dharmaṃ sarahasyaṃ sanātanam
c sarvabhūtahitaṃ maitraṃ purāṇaṃ yaṃ janā viduḥ
a adroheṇaiva bhūtānām alpadroheṇa vā punaḥ
c yā vṛttiḥ sa paro dharmas tena jīvāmi jājale
a paricchinnaiḥ kāṣṭhatṛṇair mayedaṃ śaraṇaṃ kṛtam
c alaktaṃ padmakaṃ tuṅgaṃ gandhāṃś coccāvacāṃs tathā
a rasāṃś ca tāṃs tān viprarṣe madyavarjān ahaṃ bahūn
c krītvā vai prativikrīṇe parahastād amāyayā
a sarveṣāṃ yaḥ suhṛn nityaṃ sarveṣāṃ ca hite rataḥ
c karmaṇā manasā vācā sa dharmaṃ veda jājale
a nāhaṃ pareṣāṃ karmāṇi praśaṃsāmi śapāmi vā
c ākāśasyeva viprarṣe paśyaṃl lokasya citratām
a nānurudhye virudhye vā na dveṣmi na ca kāmaye
c samo 'smi sarvabhūteṣu paśya me jājale vratam
a iṣṭāniṣṭavimuktasya prītirāgabahiṣkṛtaḥ
c tulā me sarvabhūteṣu samā tiṣṭhati jājale
a iti māṃ tvaṃ vijānīhi sarvalokasya jājale
c samaṃ matimatāṃ śreṣṭha samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanam
a yathāndhabadhironmattā ucchvāsaparamāḥ sadā
c devair apihitadvārāḥ sopamā paśyato mama
a yathā vṛddhāturakṛśā niḥspṛhā viṣayān prati
c tathārthakāmabhogeṣu mamāpi vigatā spṛhā
a yadā cāyaṃ na bibheti yadā cāsmān na bibhyati
c yadā necchati na dveṣṭi tadā sidhyati vai dvijaḥ
a yadā na kurute bhāvaṃ sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
c karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a na bhūto na bhaviṣyaś ca na ca dharmo 'sti kaś cana
c yo 'bhayaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sa prāpnoty abhayaṃ padam
a yasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarvo mṛtyumukhād iva
c vākkrūrād daṇḍapāruṣyāt sa prāpnoti mahad bhayam
a yathāvad vartamānānāṃ vṛddhānāṃ putrapautriṇām
c anuvartāmahe vṛttam ahiṃsrāṇāṃ mahātmanām
a pranaṣṭaḥ śāśvato dharmaḥ sadācāreṇa mohitaḥ
c tena vaidyas tapasvī vā balavān vā vimohyate
a ācārāj jājale prājñaḥ kṣipraṃ dharmam avāpnuyāt
c evaṃ yaḥ sādhubhir dāntaś cared adrohacetasā
a nadyāṃ yathā ceha kāṣṭham uhyamānaṃ yadṛcchayā
c yadṛcchayaiva kāṣṭhena saṃdhiṃ gaccheta kena cit
a tatrāparāṇi dārūṇi saṃsṛjyante tatas tataḥ
c tṛṇakāṣṭhakarīṣāṇi kadā cinn asamīkṣayā
e evam evāyam ācāraḥ prādurbhūto yatas tataḥ
a yasmān nodvijate bhūtaṃ jātu kiṃ cit kathaṃ cana
c abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sa prāpnoti sadā mune
a yasmād udvijate vidvan sarvaloko vṛkād iva
c krośatas tīram āsādya yathā sarve jalecarāḥ
a sahāyavān dravyavān yaḥ subhago 'nyo 'paras tathā
c tatas tān eva kavayaḥ śāstreṣu pravadanty uta
e kīrtyartham alpahṛllekhāḥ paṭavaḥ kṛtsnanirṇayāḥ
a tapobhir yajñadānaiś ca vākyaiḥ prajñāśritais tathā
c prāpnoty abhayadānasya yad yat phalam ihāśnute
a loke yaḥ sarvabhūtebhyo dadāty abhayadakṣiṇām
c sa sarvayajñair ījānaḥ prāpnoty abhayadakṣiṇām
e na bhūtānām ahiṃsāyā jyāyān dharmo 'sti kaś cana
a yasmān nodvijate bhūtaṃ jātu kiṃ cit kathaṃ cana
c so 'bhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ saṃprāpnoti mahāmune
a yasmād udvijate lokaḥ sarpād veśmagatād iva
c na sa dharmam avāpnoti iha loke paratra ca
a sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya samyag bhūtāni paśyataḥ
c devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ
a dānaṃ bhūtābhayasyāhuḥ sarvadānebhya uttamam
c bravīmi te satyam idaṃ śraddadhasva ca jājale
a sa eva subhago bhūtvā punar bhavati durbhagaḥ
c vyāpattiṃ karmaṇāṃ dṛṣṭvā jugupsanti janāḥ sadā
a akāraṇo hi nehāsti dharmaḥ sūkṣmo 'pi jājale
c bhūtabhavyārtham eveha dharmapravacanaṃ kṛtam
a sūkṣmatvān na sa vijñātuṃ śakyate bahunihnavaḥ
c upalabhyāntarā cānyān ācārān avabudhyate
a ye ca chindanti vṛṣaṇān ye ca bhindanti nastakān
c vahanti mahato bhārān badhnanti damayanti ca
a hatvā sattvāni khādanti tān kathaṃ na vigarhase
c mānuṣā mānuṣān eva dāsabhogena buñjate
a vadhabandhavirodhena kārayanti divāniśam
c ātmanā cāpi jānāsi yad duḥkhaṃ vadhatāḍane
a pañcendriyeṣu bhūteṣu sarvaṃ vasati daivatam
c ādityaś candramā vāyur brahmā prāṇaḥ kratur yamaḥ
a tāni jīvāni vikrīya kā mṛteṣu vicāraṇā
b ajo 'gnir varuṇo meṣaḥ sūryo 'śvaḥ pṛthivī virāṭ
b dhenur vatsaś ca somo vai vikrīyaitan na sidhyati
c kā taile kā ghṛte brahman madhuny apsv auṣadheṣu vā
a adaṃśamaśake deśe sukhaṃ saṃvardhitān paśūn
c tāṃś ca mātuḥ priyāñ jānann ākramya bahudhā narāḥ
e bahudaṃśakuśān deśān nayanti bahukardamān
a vāhasaṃpīḍitā dhuryāḥ sīdanty avidhināpare
c na manye bhrūṇahatyāpi viśiṣṭā tena karmaṇā
a kṛṣiṃ sādhv iti manyante sā ca vṛttiḥ sudāruṇā
c bhūmiṃ bhūmiśayāṃś caiva hanti kāṣṭham ayomukham
e tathaivānaḍuho yuktān samavekṣasva jājale
a aghnyā iti gavāṃ nāma ka enān hantum arhati
c mahac cakārākuśalaṃ pṛṣadhro gālabhann iva
a ṛṣayo yatayo hy etan nahuṣe pratyavedayan
c gāṃ mātaraṃ cāpy avadhīr vṛṣabhaṃ ca prajāpatim
e akāryaṃ nahuṣākārṣīr lapsyāmas tvatkṛte bhayam
a śataṃ caikaṃ ca rogāṇāṃ sarvabhūteṣv apātayan
c ṛṣayas te mahābhāgāḥ prajāsv eva hi jājale
e bhrūṇahaṃ nahuṣaṃ tv āhur na te hoṣyāmahe haviḥ
a ity uktvā te mahātmānaḥ sarve tattvārthadarśinaḥ
c ṛṣayo yatayaḥ śāntās tarasā pratyavedayan
a īdṛśān aśivān ghorān ācārān iha jājale
c kevalācaritatvāt tu nipuṇān nāvabudhyase
a kāraṇād dharmam anvicchen na lokacaritaṃ caret
c yo hanyād yaś ca māṃ stauti tatrāpi śṛṇu jājale
a samau tāv api me syātāṃ na hi me staḥ priyāpriye
c etad īdṛśakaṃ dharmaṃ praśaṃsanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a upapattyā hi saṃpanno yatibhiś caiva sevyate
c satataṃ dharmaśīlaiś ca naipuṇyenopalakṣitaḥ
 jājalir uvāca
a yathā pravartito dharmas tulāṃ dhārayatā tvayā
c svargadvāraṃ ca vṛttiṃ ca bhūtānām avarotsyate
a kṛṣyā hy annaṃ prabhavati tatas tvam api jīvasi
c paśubhiś cauṣadhībhiś ca martyā jīvanti vāṇija
a yato yajñaḥ prabhavati nāstikyam api jalpasi
c na hi varted ayaṃ loko vārtām utsṛjya kevalam
 tulādhāra uvāca
a vakṣyāmi jājale vṛttiṃ nāsmi brāhmaṇa nāstikaḥ
c na ca yajñaṃ vinindāmi yajñavit tu sudurlabhaḥ
a namo brāhmaṇayajñāya ye ca yajñavido janāḥ
c svayajñaṃ brāhmaṇā hitvā kṣātraṃ yajñam ihāsthitāḥ
a lubdhair vittaparair brahman nāstikaiḥ saṃpravartitam
c vedavādān avijñāya satyābhāsam ivānṛtam
a idaṃ deyam idaṃ deyam iti nāntaṃ cikīrṣati
b devaiḥ pravartitaṃ hy etaṃ viddhi dharmaṃ ca jājale
b aparā hy anavasthaiṣā nāsmākaṃ buddhir īdṛśī
c ataḥ stainyaṃ prabhavati vikarmāṇi ca jājale
e tad eva sukṛtaṃ havyaṃ yena tuṣyanti devatāḥ
a namaskāreṇa haviṣā svādhyāyair auṣadhais tathā
c pūjā syād devatānāṃ hi yathā śāstranidarśanam
a iṣṭāpūrtād asādhūnāṃ viṣamā jāyate prajā
c lubdhebhyo jāyate lubdhaḥ samebhyo jāyate samaḥ
a yajamāno yathātmānam ṛtvijaś ca tathā prajāḥ
c yajñāt prajā prabhavati nabhaso 'mbha ivāmalam
a agnau prāstāhutir brahmann ādityam upatiṣṭhati
c ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭir vṛṣṭer annaṃ tataḥ prajāḥ
a tasmāt svanuṣṭhitāt pūrve sarvān kāmāṃś ca lebhire
c akṛṣṭapacyā pṛthivī āśīrbhir vīrudho 'bhavan
e na te yajñeṣv ātmasu vā phalaṃ paśyanti kiṃ cana
a śaṅkamānāḥ phalaṃ yajñe ye yajeran kathaṃ cana
c jāyante 'sādhavo dhūrtā lubdhā vittaprayojanāḥ
a sa sma pāpakṛtāṃ lokān gacched aśubhakarmaṇā
c pramāṇam apramāṇena yaḥ kuryād aśubhaṃ naraḥ
e pāpātmā so 'kṛtaprajñaḥ sadaiveha dvijottama
a kartavyam iti kartavyaṃ vetti yo brāhmaṇobhayam
c brahmaiva vartate loke naiti kartavyatāṃ punaḥ
a viguṇaṃ ca punaḥ karma jyāya ity anuśuśruma
c sarvabhūtopaghātaś ca phalabhāve ca saṃyamaḥ
a satyayajñā damayajñā alubdhāś cātmatṛptayaḥ
c utpannatyāginaḥ sarve janā āsannamatsarāḥ
a kṣetrakṣetrajñatattvajñāḥ svayajñapariniṣṭhitāḥ
c brāhmaṃ vedam adhīyantas toṣayanty amarān api
a akhilaṃ daivataṃ sarvaṃ brahma brāhmaṇasaṃśritam
c tṛpyanti tṛpyato devās tṛptās tṛptasya jājale
a yathā sarvarasais tṛpto nābhinandati kiṃ cana
c tathā prajñānatṛptasya nityaṃ tṛptiḥ sukhodayā
a dharmārāmā dharmasukhāḥ kṛtsnavyavasitās tathā
c asti nas tattvato bhūya iti prajñāgaveṣiṇaḥ
a jñānavijñāninaḥ ke cit paraṃ pāraṃ titīrṣavaḥ
c atīva tat sadā puṇyaṃ puṇyābhijanasaṃhitam
a yatra gatvā na śocanti na cyavanti vyathanti ca
c te tu tad brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ prāpnuvantīha sāttvikāḥ
a naiva te svargam icchanti na yajanti yaśodhanaiḥ
c satāṃ vartmānuvartante yathābalam ahiṃsayā
a vanaspatīn oṣadhīś ca phalamūlaṃ ca te viduḥ
c na caitān ṛtvijo lubdhā yājayanti dhanārthinaḥ
a svam eva cārthaṃ kurvāṇā yajñaṃ cakruḥ punar dvijāḥ
c pariniṣṭhitakarmāṇaḥ prajānugrahakāmyayā
d tasmāt tān ṛtvijo lubdhā yājayanty aśubhān narān
a prāpayeyuḥ prajāḥ svargaṃ svadharmacaraṇena vai
c iti me vartate buddhiḥ samā sarvatra jājale
a prayuñjate yāni yajñe sadā prājñā dvijarṣabha
c tena te devayānena pathā yānti mahāmune
a āvṛttis tatra caikasya nāsty āvṛttir manīṣiṇām
c ubhau tau devayānena gacchato jājale pathā
a svayaṃ caiṣām anaḍuho yujyanti ca vahanti ca
c svayam usrāś ca duhyante manaḥsaṃkalpasiddhibhiḥ
a svayaṃ yūpān upādāya yajante svāptadakṣiṇaiḥ
c yas tathābhāvitātmā syāt sa gām ālabdhum arhati
a oṣadhībhis tathā brahman yajeraṃs te natādṛśāḥ
c buddhityāgaṃ puraskṛtya tādṛśaṃ prabravīmi te
a nirāśiṣam anārambhaṃ nirnamaskāram astutim
c akṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇakarmāṇaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a nāśrāvayan na ca yajan na dadad brāhmaṇeṣu ca
c grāmyāṃ vṛttiṃ lipsamānaḥ kāṃ gatiṃ yāti jājale
e idaṃ tu daivataṃ kṛtvā yathā yajñam avāpnuyāt
 jājalir uvāca
a na vai munīnāṃ śṛṇumaḥ sma tattvaṃ
pṛcchāmi tvā vāṇija kaṣṭam etat
c pūrve pūrve cāsya nāvekṣamāṇā
nātaḥ paraṃ tam ṛṣayaḥ sthāpayanti
a asminn evātmatīrthe na paśavaḥ prāpnuyuḥ sukham
c atha svakarmaṇā kena vāṇija prāpnuyāt sukham
e śaṃsa me tan mahāprājña bhṛśaṃ vai śraddadhāmi te
 tulādhāra uvāca
a uta yajñā utāyajñā makhaṃ nārhanti te kva cit
c ājyena payasā dadhnā pūrṇāhutyā viśeṣataḥ
e vālaiḥ śṛṅgeṇa pādena saṃbhavaty eva gaurmakham
a patnīṃ cānena vidhinā prakaroti niyojayan
c puroḍāśo hi sarveṣāṃ paśūnāṃ medhya ucyate
a sarvā nadyaḥ sarasvatyaḥ sarve puṇyāḥ śiloccayāḥ
c jājale tīrtham ātmaiva mā sma deśātithir bhava
a etān īdṛśakān dharmān ācarann iha jājale
c kāraṇair dharmam anvicchan na lokān āpnute śubhān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etān īdṛśakān dharmāṃs tulādhāraḥ praśaṃsati
c upapattyā hi saṃpannān nityaṃ sadbhir niṣevitān
 tulādhāra uvāca
a sadbhir vā yadi vāsadbhir ayaṃ panthāḥ samāśritaḥ
c pratyakṣaṃ kriyatāṃ sādhu tato jñāsyasi tad yathā
a ete śakuntā bahavaḥ samantād vicaranti hi
c tavottamāṅge saṃbhūtāḥ śyenāś cānyāś ca jātayaḥ
a āhvayainān mahābrahman viśamānāṃs tatas tataḥ
c paśyemān hastapādeṣu śliṣṭān dehe ca sarvaśaḥ
a saṃbhāvayanti pitaraṃ tvayā saṃbhāvitāḥ khagāḥ
c asaṃśayaṃ pitā ca tvaṃ putrān āhvaya jājale
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato jājalinā tena samāhūtāḥ patatriṇaḥ
c vācam uccārayan divyāṃ dharmasya vacanāt kila
a ahiṃsādikṛtaṃ karma iha caiva paratra ca
c spardhā nihanti vai brahman sāhatā hanti taṃ naram
a śraddhāvṛddhaṃ vāṅmanasī na yajñas trātum arhati
c atra gāthā brahmagītāḥ kīrtayanti purāvidaḥ
a śucer aśraddadhānasya śraddadhānasya cāśuceḥ
c devāś cittam amanyanta sadṛśaṃ yajñakarmaṇi
a śrotriyasya kadaryasya vadānyasya ca vārdhuṣeḥ
c mīmāṃsitvobhayaṃ devāḥ samam annam akalpayan
a prajāpatis tān uvāca viṣamaṃ kṛtam ity uta
c śraddhāpūtaṃ vadānyasya hatam aśraddhayetarat
e bhojyam annaṃ vadānyasya kadaryasya na vārdhuṣeḥ
a aśraddadhāna evaiko devānāṃ nārhate haviḥ
c tasyaivānnaṃ na bhoktavyam iti dharmavido viduḥ
a aśraddhā paramaṃ pāpaṃ śraddhā pāpapramocanī
c jahāti pāpaṃ śraddhāvān sarpo jīrṇām iva tvacam
a jyāyasī yā pavitrāṇāṃ nivṛttiḥ śraddhayā saha
c nivṛttaśīladoṣo yaḥ śraddhāvān pūta eva saḥ
a kiṃ tasya tapasā kāryaṃ kiṃ vṛttena kim ātmanā
c śraddhāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ
a iti dharmaḥ samākhyātaḥ sadbhir dharmārthadarśibhiḥ
c vayaṃ jijñāsamānās tvā saṃprāptā dharmadarśanāt
a spardhāṃ jahi mahāprājña tataḥ prāpsyasi yat param
c śraddhāvāñ śraddadhānaś ca dharmāṃś caiveha vāṇijaḥ
e svavartmani sthitaś caiva garīyān eṣa jājale
a evaṃ bahumatārthaṃ ca tulādhāreṇa bhāṣitam
c samyak caivam upālabdho dharmaś coktaḥ sanātanaḥ
a tasya vikhyātavīryasya śrutvā vākyāni sa dvijaḥ
c tulādhārasya kaunteya śāntim evānvapadyata
a tato 'cireṇa kālena tulādhāraḥ sa eva ca
c divaṃ gatvā mahāprājñau viharetāṃ yathāsukham
e svaṃ svaṃ sthānam upāgamya svakarmaphalanirjitam
a samānāṃ śraddadhānānāṃ saṃyatānāṃ sucetasām
c kurvatāṃ yajña ity eva na yajño jātu neṣyate
a śraddhā vai sāttvikī devī sūryasya duhitā nṛpa
c sāvitrī prasavitrī ca jīvaviśvāsinī tathā
a vāgvṛddhaṃ trāyate śraddhā manovṛddhaṃ ca bhārata
c yathaupamyopadeśena kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c prajānām anukampārthaṃ gītaṃ rājñā vicakhnunā
a chinnasthūṇaṃ vṛṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā virāvaṃ ca gavāṃ bhṛśam
c gograhe yajñavāṭasya prekṣamāṇaḥ sa pārthivaḥ
a svasti gobhyo 'stu lokeṣu tato nirvacanaṃ kṛtam
c hiṃsāyāṃ hi pravṛttāyām āśīr eṣānukalpitā
a avyavasthitamaryādair vimūḍhair nāstikair naraiḥ
c saṃśayātmabhir avyaktair hiṃsā samanukīrtitā
a sarvakarmasv ahiṃsā hi dharmātmā manur abravīt
c kāmarāgād vihiṃsanti bahir vedyāṃ paśūn narāḥ
a tasmāt pramāṇataḥ kāryo dharmaḥ sūkṣmo vijānatā
c ahiṃsaiva hi sarvebhyo dharmebhyo jyāyasī matā
a upoṣya saṃśito bhūtvā hitvā vedakṛtāḥ śrutīḥ
c ācāra ity anācārāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ phalahetavaḥ
a yadi yajñāṃś ca vṛkṣāṃś ca yūpāṃś coddiśya mānavāḥ
c vṛthā māṃsāni khādanti naiṣa dharmaḥ praśasyate
a māṃsaṃ madhu surā matsyā āsavaṃ kṛsaraudanam
c dhūrtaiḥ pravartitaṃ hy etan naitad vedeṣu kalpitam
a kāmān mohāc ca lobhāc ca laulyam etat pravartitam
c viṣṇum evābhijānanti sarvayajñeṣu brāhmaṇāḥ
e pāyasaiḥ sumanobhiś ca tasyāpi yajanaṃ smṛtam
a yajñiyāś caiva ye vṛkṣā vedeṣu parikalpitāḥ
c yac cāpi kiṃ cit kartavyam anyac cokṣaiḥ susaṃskṛtam
e mahāsattvaiḥ śuddhabhāvaiḥ sarvaṃ devārham eva tat
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śarīram āpadaś cāpi vivadanty avihiṃsataḥ
c kathaṃ yātrā śarīrasya nirārambhasya setsyati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yathā śarīraṃ na glāyen neyān mṛtyuvaśaṃ yathā
c tathā karmasu varteta samartho dharmam ācaret
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ kāryaṃ parīkṣeta śīghraṃ vātha cireṇa vā
c sarvathā kāryadurge 'smin bhavān naḥ paramo guruḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c cirakāres tu yat pūrvaṃ vṛttam āṅgirase kule
a cirakārika bhadraṃ te bhadraṃ te cirakārika
c cirakārī hi medhāvī nāparādhyati karmasu
a cirakārī mahāprājño gautamasyābhavat sutaḥ
c ciraṃ hi sarvakāryāṇi samekṣāvān prapadyate
a ciraṃ saṃcintayann arthāṃś ciraṃ jāgrac ciraṃ svapan
c cirakāryābhisaṃpatteś cirakārī tathocyate
a alasagrahaṇaṃ prāpto durmedhāvī tathocyate
c buddhilāghavayuktena janenādīrghadarśinā
a vyabhicāre tu kasmiṃś cid vyatikramyāparān sutān
c pitroktaḥ kupitenātha jahīmāṃ jananīm iti
d ity uktvā sa tadā vipro gautamas tapatāṃ varaḥ
d avimṛśya mahābhāgo vanam eva jagāma ha
a sa tatheti cireṇoktvā svabhāvāc cirakārikaḥ
c vimṛśya cirakāritvāc cintayām āsa vai ciram
a pitur ājñāṃ kathaṃ kuryāṃ na hanyāṃ mātaraṃ katham
c kathaṃ dharmacchale nāsmin nimajjeyam asādhuvat
a pitur ājñā paro dharmaḥ svadharmo mātṛrakṣaṇam
c asvatantraṃ ca putratvaṃ kiṃ nu māṃ nātra pīḍayet
a striyaṃ hatvā mātaraṃ ca ko hi jātu sukhī bhavet
c pitaraṃ cāpy avajñāya kaḥ pratiṣṭhām avāpnuyāt
a anavajñā pitur yuktā dhāraṇaṃ mātṛrakṣaṇam
c yuktakṣamāv ubhāv etau nātivartetamāṃ katham
a pitā hy ātmānam ādhatte jāyāyāṃ jajñiyām iti
c śīlacāritragotrasya dhāraṇārthaṃ kulasya ca
a so 'ham ātmā svayaṃ pitrā putratve prakṛtaḥ punaḥ
c vijñānaṃ me kathaṃ na syād bubudhe cātmasaṃbhavam
a jātakarmaṇi yat prāha pitā yac copakarmaṇi
c paryāptaḥ sa dṛḍhīkāraḥ pitur gauravaniścaye
a gurur agryaḥ paro dharmaḥ poṣaṇādhyayanād dhitaḥ
c pitā yad āha dharmaḥ sa vedeṣv api suniścitaḥ
a prītimātraṃ pituḥ putraḥ sarvaṃ putrasya vai pitā
c śarīrādīni deyāni pitā tv ekaḥ prayacchati
a tasmāt pitur vacaḥ kāryaṃ na vicāryaṃ kathaṃ cana
c pātakāny api pūyante pitur vacanakāriṇaḥ
a bhoge bhāgye prasavane sarvalokanidarśane
c bhartrā caiva samāyoge sīmantonnayane tathā
a pitā svargaḥ pitā dharmaḥ pitā paramakaṃ tapaḥ
c pitari prītim āpanne sarvāḥ prīyanti devatāḥ
a āśiṣas tā bhajanty enaṃ puruṣaṃ prāha yāḥ pitā
c niṣkṛtiḥ sarvapāpānāṃ pitā yad abhinandati
a mucyate bandhanāt puṣpaṃ phalaṃ vṛntāt pramucyate
c kliśyann api sutasnehaiḥ pitā snehaṃ na muñcati
a etad vicintitaṃ tāvat putrasya pitṛgauravam
c pitā hy alpataraṃ sthānaṃ cintayiṣyāmi mātaram
a yo hy ayaṃ mayi saṃghāto martyatve pāñcabhautikaḥ
c asya me jananī hetuḥ pāvakasya yathāraṇiḥ
e mātā dehāraṇiḥ puṃsāṃ sarvasyārtasya nirvṛtiḥ
f mātṛlābhe sanāthatvam anāthatvaṃ viparyaye
a na ca śocati nāpy enaṃ sthāviryam apakarṣati
c śriyā hīno 'pi yo gehe ambeti pratipadyate
d prāpnuyād eva harṣaṃ sa cintātmā mānuṣaḥ svayam
a putrapautrasamākīrṇo jananīṃ yaḥ samāśritaḥ
c api varṣaśatasyānte sa dvihāyanavac caret
a samarthaṃ vāsamarthaṃ vā kṛśaṃ vāpy akṛśaṃ tathā
c rakṣaty eva sutaṃ mātā nānyaḥ poṣṭā vidhānataḥ
a tadā sa vṛddho bhavati yadā bhavati duḥkhitaḥ
c tadā śūnyaṃ jagat tasya yadā mātrā viyujyate
a nāsti mātṛsamā chāyā nāsti mātṛsamā gatiḥ
c nāsti mātṛsamaṃ trāṇaṃ nāsti mātṛsamā prapā
a kukṣisaṃdhāraṇād dhātrī jananāj jananī smṛtā
c aṅgānāṃ vardhanād ambā vīrasūtvena vīrasūḥ
a śiśoḥ śuśrūṣaṇāc chuśrūr mātā deham anantaram
c cetanāvān naro hanyād yasya nāsuṣiraṃ śiraḥ
a dampatyoḥ prāṇasaṃśleṣe yo 'bhisaṃdhiḥ kṛtaḥ kila
c taṃ mātā vā pitā veda bhūtārtho mātari sthitaḥ
a mātā jānāti yad gotraṃ mātā jānāti yasya saḥ
c mātur bharaṇamātreṇa prītiḥ snehaḥ pituḥ prajāḥ
a pāṇibandhaṃ svayaṃ kṛtvā sahadharmam upetya ca
c yadi yāpyanti puruṣāḥ striyo nārhanti yāpyatām
a bharaṇād dhi striyo bhartā pātyāc caiva striyāḥ patiḥ
c guṇasyāsya nivṛttau tu na bhartā na patiḥ patiḥ
a evaṃ strī nāparādhnoti nara evāparādhyati
c vyuccaraṃś ca mahādoṣaṃ nara evāparādhyati
a striyā hi paramo bhartā daivataṃ paramaṃ smṛtam
c tasyātmanā tu sadṛśam ātmānaṃ paramaṃ dadau
e sarvakāryāparādhyatvān nāparādhyanti cāṅganāḥ
a yaś canokto hi nirdeśaḥ striyā maithunatṛptaye
c tasya smārayato vyaktam adharmo nātra saṃśayaḥ
a yāvan nārīṃ mātaraṃ ca gaurave cādhike sthitām
c avadhyāṃ tu vijānīyuḥ paśavo 'py avicakṣaṇāḥ
a devatānāṃ samāvāyam ekasthaṃ pitaraṃ viduḥ
c martyānāṃ devatānāṃ ca snehād abhyeti mātaram
a evaṃ vimṛśatas tasya cirakāritayā bahu
c dīrghaḥ kālo vyatikrāntas tatas tasyāgamat pitā
a medhātithir mahāprājño gautamas tapasi sthitaḥ
c vimṛśya tena kālena patnyāḥ saṃsthāvyatikramam
a so 'bravīd duḥkhasaṃtapto bhṛśam aśrūṇi vartayan
c śrutadhairyaprasādena paścāttāpam upāgataḥ
a āśramaṃ mama saṃprāptas trilokeśaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
c atithivratam āsthāya brāhmaṇaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
a samayā sāntvito vāgbhiḥ svāgatenābhipūjitaḥ
c arghyaṃ pādyaṃ ca nyāyena tayābhipratipāditaḥ
a paravaty asmi cāpy uktaḥ praṇayiṣye nayena ca
c atra cākuśale jāte striyo nāsti vyatikramaḥ
a evaṃ na strī na caivāhaṃ nādhvagas tridaśeśvaraḥ
c aparādhyati dharmasya pramādas tv aparādhyati
a īrṣyājaṃ vyasanaṃ prāhus tena caivordhvaretasaḥ
c īrṣyayā tv aham ākṣipto magno duṣkṛtasāgare
a hatvā sādhvīṃ ca nārīṃ ca vyasanitvāc ca śāsitām
c bhartavyatvena bhāryāṃ ca ko nu māṃ tārayiṣyati
a antareṇa mayājñaptaś cirakārī hy udāradhīḥ
c yady adya cirakārī syāt sa māṃ trāyeta pātakāt
a cirakārika bhadraṃ te bhadraṃ te cirakārika
c yady adya cirakārī tvaṃ tato 'si cirakārikaḥ
a trāhi māṃ mātaraṃ caiva tapo yac cārjitaṃ mayā
c ātmānaṃ pātakebhyaś ca bhavādya cirakārikaḥ
a sahajaṃ cirakāritvaṃ ciraprājñatayā tava
b āvayoś cittasaṃtāpaḥ na hy asatphalatas tathā
c saphalaṃ tat tavādyāstu bhavādya cirakārikaḥ
a ciram āśaṃsito mātrā ciraṃ garbheṇa dhāritaḥ
c saphalaṃ cirakāritvaṃ kuru tvaṃ cirakārika
a cirāyate ca saṃtāpāc ciraṃ svapiti vāritaḥ
c āvayoś cirasaṃtāpād avekṣya cirakārika
a evaṃ sa duḥkhito rājan maharṣir gautamas tadā
c cirakāriṃ dadarśātha putraṃ sthitam athāntike
a cirakārī tu pitaraṃ dṛṣṭvā paramaduḥkhitaḥ
c śastraṃ tyaktvā tato mūrdhnā prasādāyopacakrame
a gautamas tu sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā śirasā patitaṃ bhuvi
c patnīṃ caiva nirākārāṃ parām abhyagaman mudam
a na hi sā tena saṃbhedaṃ patnī nītā mahātmanā
c vijane cāśramasthena putraś cāpi samāhitaḥ
a hanyāt tv anapavādena śastrapāṇau sute sthite
c vinītaṃ praśnayitvā ca vyavasyed ātmakarmasu
a buddhiś cāsīt sutaṃ dṛṣṭvā pituś caraṇayor natam
c śastragrahaṇacāpalyaṃ saṃvṛṇoti bhayād iti
a tataḥ pitrā ciraṃ stutvā ciraṃ cāghrāya mūrdhani
c ciraṃ dorbhyāṃ pariṣvajya ciraṃ jīvety udāhṛtaḥ
a evaṃ sa gautamaḥ putraṃ prītiharṣasamanvitaḥ
c abhinandya mahāprājña idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a cirakārika bhadraṃ te cirakārī ciraṃ bhava
c cirāyamāṇe tvayi ca ciram asmi suduḥkhitaḥ
a gāthāś cāpy abravīd vidvān gautamo munisattamaḥ
c cirakāriṣu dhīreṣu guṇoddeśasamāśrayāt
a cireṇa mitraṃ badhnīyāc cireṇa ca kṛtaṃ tyajet
c cireṇa hi kṛtaṃ mitraṃ ciraṃ dhāraṇam arhati
a rāge darpe ca māne ca drohe pāpe ca karmaṇi
c apriye caiva kartavye cirakārī praśasyate
a bandhūnāṃ suhṛdāṃ caiva bhṛtyānāṃ strījanasya ca
c avyakteṣv aparādheṣu cirakārī praśasyate
a evaṃ sa gautamas tasya prītaḥ putrasya bhārata
c karmaṇā tena kauravya cirakāritayā tayā
a evaṃ sarveṣu kāryeṣu vimṛśya puruṣas tataḥ
c cireṇa niścayaṃ kṛtvā ciraṃ na paritapyate
a ciraṃ dhārayate roṣaṃ ciraṃ karma niyacchati
c paścāttāpakaraṃ karma na kiṃ cid upapadyate
a ciraṃ vṛddhān upāsīta ciram anvāsya pūjayet
c ciraṃ dharmān niṣeveta kuryāc cānveṣaṇaṃ ciram
a ciram anvāsya viduṣaś ciraṃ śiṣṭān niṣevya ca
c ciraṃ vinīya cātmānaṃ ciraṃ yāty anavajñatām
a bruvataś ca parasyāpi vākyaṃ dharmopasaṃhitam
c ciraṃ pṛcchec ciraṃ brūyāc ciraṃ na paribhūyate
a upāsya bahulās tasminn āśrame sumahātapāḥ
c samāḥ svargaṃ gato vipraḥ putreṇa sahitas tadā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ rājā prajā rakṣen na ca kiṃ cit pratāpayet
c pṛcchāmi tvāṃ satāṃ śreṣṭha tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c dyumatsenasya saṃvādaṃ rājñā satyavatā saha
a avyāhṛtaṃ vyājahāra satyavān iti naḥ śrutam
c vadhāya nīyamāneṣu pitur evānuśāsanāt
a adharmatāṃ yāti dharmo yāty adharmaś ca dharmatām
c vadho nāma bhaved dharmo naitad bhavitum arhati
 dyumatsena uvāca
a atha ced avadho dharmo dharmaḥ ko jātu cid bhavet
c dasyavaś cen na hanyeran satyavan saṃkaro bhavet
a mamedam iti nāsyaitat pravarteta kalau yuge
c lokayātrā na caiva syād atha ced vettha śaṃsa naḥ
 satyavān uvāca
a sarva eva trayo varṇāḥ kāryā brāhmaṇabandhanāḥ
c dharmapāśanibaddhānām alpo vyapacariṣyati
a yo yas teṣām apacaret tam ācakṣīta vai dvijaḥ
c ayaṃ me na śṛṇotīti tasmin rājā pradhārayet
a tattvābhedena yac chāstraṃ tat kāryaṃ nānyathā vadhaḥ
c asamīkṣyaiva karmāṇi nītiśāstraṃ yathāvidhi
a dasyūn hinasti vai rājā bhūyaso vāpy anāgasaḥ
c bhāryā mātā pitā putro hanyate puruṣe hate
e pareṇāpakṛte rājā tasmāt samyak pradhārayet
a asādhuś caiva puruṣo labhate śīlam ekadā
c sādhoś cāpi hy asādhubhyo jāyate 'śobhanā prajā
a na mūlaghātaḥ kartavyo naiṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c api khalv avadhenaiva prāyaścittaṃ vidhīyate
a udvejanena bandhena virūpakaraṇena ca
c vadhadaṇḍena te kleśyā na puro 'hitasaṃpadā
a yadā purohitaṃ vā te paryeyuḥ śaraṇaiṣiṇaḥ
c kariṣyāmaḥ punar brahman na pāpam iti vādinaḥ
a tadā visargam arhāḥ syur itīdaṃ nṛpaśāsanam
c bibhrad daṇḍājinaṃ muṇḍo brāhmaṇo 'rhati vāsasam
a garīyāṃso garīyāṃsam aparādhe punaḥ punaḥ
c tathā visargam arhanti na yathā prathame tathā
 dyumatsena uvāca
a yatra yatraiva śakyeran saṃyantuṃ samaye prajāḥ
c sa tāvat procyate dharmo yāvan na pratilaṅghyate
a ahanyamāneṣu punaḥ sarvam eva parābhavet
c pūrve pūrvatare caiva suśāsyā abhavañ janāḥ
a mṛdavaḥ satyabhūyiṣṭhā alpadrohālpamanyavaḥ
c purā dhigdaṇḍa evāsīd vāgdaṇḍas tadanantaram
a āsīd ādānadaṇḍo 'pi vadhadaṇḍo 'dya vartate
c vadhenāpi na śakyante niyantum apare janāḥ
a naiva dasyur manuṣyāṇāṃ na devānām iti śrutiḥ
c na gandharvapitṝṇāṃ ca kaḥ kasyeha na kaś cana
a padmaṃ śmaśānād ādatte piśācāc cāpi daivatam
c teṣu yaḥ samayaṃ kuryād ajñeṣu hatabuddhiṣu
 satyavān uvāca
a tān na śaknoṣi cet sādhūn paritrātum ahiṃsayā
c kasya cid bhūtabhavyasya lābhenāntaṃ tathā kuru
 dyumatsena uvāca
a rājāno lokayātrārthaṃ tapyante paramaṃ tapaḥ
c apatrapanti tādṛgbhyas tathāvṛttā bhavanti ca
a vitrāsyamānāḥ sukṛto na kāmād ghnanti duṣkṛtīn
c sukṛtenaiva rājāno bhūyiṣṭhaṃ śāsate prajāḥ
a śreyasaḥ śreyasīm evaṃ vṛttiṃ loko 'nuvartate
c sadaiva hi guror vṛttam anuvartanti mānavāḥ
a ātmānam asamādhāya samādhitsati yaḥ parān
c viṣayeṣv indriyavaśaṃ mānavāḥ prahasanti tam
a yo rājño dambhamohena kiṃ cit kuryād asāṃpratam
c sarvopāyair niyamyaḥ sa tathā pāpān nivartate
a ātmaivādau niyantavyo duṣkṛtaṃ saṃniyacchatā
c daṇḍayec ca mahādaṇḍair api bandhūn anantarān
a yatra vai pāpakṛt kleśyo na mahad duḥkham archati
c vardhante tatra pāpāni dharmo hrasati ca dhruvam
e iti kāruṇyaśīlas tu vidvān vai brāhmaṇo 'nvaśāt
a iti caivānuśiṣṭo 'smi pūrvais tāta pitāmahaiḥ
c āśvāsayadbhiḥ subhṛśam anukrośāt tathaiva ca
a etat prathamakalpena rājā kṛtayuge 'bhajat
c pādonenāpi dharmeṇa gacchet tretāyuge tathā
e dvāpare tu dvipādena pādena tv apare yuge
a tathā kaliyuge prāpte rājñāṃ duścaritena ha
c bhavet kālaviśeṣeṇa kalā dharmasya ṣoḍaśī
a atha prathamakalpena satyavan saṃkaro bhavet
c āyuḥ śaktiṃ ca kālaṃ ca nirdiśya tapa ādiśet
a satyāya hi yathā neha jahyād dharmaphalaṃ mahat
c bhūtānām anukampārthaṃ manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvo 'bravīt
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a avirodhena bhūtānāṃ tyāgaḥ ṣāḍguṇyakārakaḥ
c yaḥ syād ubhayabhāg dharmas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a gārhasthyasya ca dharmasya tyāgadharmasya cobhayoḥ
c adūrasaṃprasthitayoḥ kiṃ svic chreyaḥ pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ubhau dharmau mahābhāgāv ubhau paramaduścarau
c ubhau mahāphalau tāta sadbhir ācaritāv ubhau
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi prāmāṇyam ubhayos tayoḥ
c śṛṇuṣvaikamanāḥ pārtha chinnadharmārthasaṃśayam
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c kapilasya goś ca saṃvādaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a āmnāyam anupaśyan hi purāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam
c nahuṣaḥ pūrvam ālebhe tvaṣṭur gām iti naḥ śrutam
a tāṃ niyuktām adīnātmā sattvasthaḥ samaye rataḥ
c jñānavān niyatāhāro dadarśa kapilas tadā
a sa buddhim uttamāṃ prāpto naiṣṭhikīm akutobhayām
c smarāmi śithilaṃ satyaṃ vedā ity abravīt sakṛt
a tāṃ gām ṛṣiḥ syūmaraśmiḥ praviśya yatim abravīt
c haṃho vedā yadi matā dharmāḥ kenāpare matāḥ
a tapasvino dhṛtimataḥ śrutivijñānacakṣuṣaḥ
c sarvam ārṣaṃ hi manyante vyāhṛtaṃ viditātmanaḥ
a tasyaivaṃ gatatṛṣṇasya vijvarasya nirāśiṣaḥ
c kā vivakṣāsti vedeṣu nirārambhasya sarvaśaḥ
 kapila uvāca
a nāhaṃ vedān vinindāmi na vivakṣāmi karhi cit
c pṛthag āśramiṇāṃ karmāṇy ekārthānīti naḥ śrutam
a gacchaty eva parityāgī vānaprasthaś ca gacchati
c gṛhastho brahmacārī ca ubhau tāv api gacchataḥ
a devayānā hi panthānaś catvāraḥ śāśvatā matāḥ
c teṣāṃ jyāyaḥkanīyastvaṃ phaleṣūktaṃ balābalam
a evaṃ viditvā sarvārthān ārabhed iti vaidikam
c nārabhed iti cānyatra naiṣṭhikī śrūyate śrutiḥ
a anārambhe hy adoṣaḥ syād ārambhe 'doṣa uttamaḥ
c evaṃ sthitasya śāstrasya durvijñeyaṃ balābalam
a yady atra kiṃ cit pratyakṣam ahiṃsāyāḥ paraṃ matam
c ṛte tv āgamaśāstrebhyo brūhi tad yadi paśyasi
 syūmaraśmir uvāca
a svargakāmo yajeteti satataṃ śrūyate śrutiḥ
c phalaṃ prakalpya pūrvaṃ hi tato yajñaḥ pratāyate
a ajaś cāśvaś ca meṣaś ca gauś ca pakṣigaṇāś ca ye
c grāmyāraṇyā oṣadhayaḥ prāṇasyānnam iti śrutiḥ
a tathaivānnaṃ hy aharahaḥ sāyaṃ prātar nirupyate
c paśavaś cātha dhānyaṃ ca yajñasyāṅgam iti śrutiḥ
a etāni saha yajñena prajāpatir akalpayat
c tena prajāpatir devān yajñenāyajata prabhuḥ
a te smānyonyaṃcarāḥ sarve prāṇinaḥ sapta sapta ca
b gaurajo manujo meṣaḥ aśvāśvataragardabhāḥ
b ete grāmyāḥ samākhyātāḥ paśavaḥ sapta sādhubhiḥ
b siṃhā vyāghrā varāhāś ca mahiṣā vāraṇās tathā
b mahiṣī vānarāś caiva saptāraṇyās tathā smṛtāḥ
c yajñeṣūpākṛtaṃ viśvaṃ prāhur uttamasaṃjñitam
a etac caivābhyanujñātaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvatarais tathā
c ko jātu na vicinvīta vidvān svāṃ śaktim ātmanaḥ
a paśavaś ca manuṣyāś ca drumāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha
c svargam evābhikāṅkṣante na ca svargas tv ṛte makham
a oṣadhyaḥ paśavo vṛkṣā vīrud ājyaṃ payo dadhi
c havir bhūmir diśaḥ śraddhā kālaś caitāni dvādaśa
a ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni yajamānaś ca ṣoḍaśaḥ
c agnir jñeyo gṛhapatiḥ sa saptadaśa ucyate
e aṅgāny etāni yajñasya yajño mūlam iti śrutiḥ
a ājyena payasā dadhnā śakṛtāmikṣayā tvacā
c vālaiḥ śṛṅgeṇa pādena saṃbhavaty eva gaur makham
e evaṃ pratyekaśaḥ sarvaṃ yad yad asya vidhīyate
a yajñaṃ vahanti saṃbhūya sahartvigbhiḥ sadakṣiṇaiḥ
c saṃhatyaitāni sarvāṇi yajñaṃ nirvartayanty uta
a yajñārthāni hi sṛṣṭāni yathā vai śrūyate śrutiḥ
c evaṃ pūrve pūrvatarāḥ pravṛttāś caiva mānavāḥ
a na hinasti hy ārabhate nābhidruhyati kiṃ cana
c yajño yaṣṭavya ity eva yo yajaty aphalepsayā
a yajñāṅgāny api caitāni yathoktāni nasaṃśayaḥ
c vidhinā vidhiyuktāni tārayanti parasparam
a āmnāyam ārṣaṃ paśyāmi yasmin vedāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
c taṃ vidvāṃso 'nupaśyanti brāhmaṇasyānudarśanāt
a brāhmaṇaprabhavo yajño brāhmaṇārpaṇa eva ca
c anu yajñaṃ jagat sarvaṃ yajñaś cānu jagat sadā
a om iti brahmaṇo yonir namaḥ svāhā svadhā vaṣaṭ
c yasyaitāni prayujyante yathāśakti kṛtāny api
a na tasya triṣu lokeṣu paralokabhayaṃ viduḥ
c iti vedā vadantīha siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ
a ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni stobhāś ca vidhicoditāḥ
c yasminn etāni sarvāṇi bahir eva sa vai dvijaḥ
a agnyādheye yad bhavati yac ca some sute dvija
c yac cetarair mahāyajñair veda tad bhagavān svataḥ
a tasmād brahman yajetaiva yājayec cāvicārayan
c yajataḥ svargavidhinā pretya svargaphalaṃ mahat
a nāyaṃ loko 'sty ayajñānāṃ paraś ceti viniścayaḥ
c vedavādavidaś caiva pramāṇam ubhayaṃ tadā
 kapila uvāca
a etāvad anupaśyanto yatayo yānti mārgagāḥ
c naiṣāṃ sarveṣu lokeṣu kaś cid asti vyatikramaḥ
a nirdvaṃdvā nirnamaskārā nirāśīrbandhanā budhāḥ
c vimuktāḥ sarvapāpebhyaś caranti śucayo 'malāḥ
a apavarge 'tha saṃtyāge buddhau ca kṛtaniścayāḥ
c brahmiṣṭhā brahmabhūtāś ca brahmaṇy eva kṛtālayāḥ
a viśokā naṣṭarajasas teṣāṃ lokāḥ sanātanāḥ
c teṣāṃ gatiṃ parāṃ prāpya gārhasthye kiṃ prayojanam
 syūmaraśmir uvāca
a yady eṣā paramā niṣṭhā yady eṣā paramā gatiḥ
c gṛhasthān avyapāśritya nāśramo 'nyaḥ pravartate
a yathā mātaram āśritya sarve jīvanti jantavaḥ
c evaṃ gṛhastham āśritya vartanta itare ''śramāḥ
a gṛhastha eva yajate gṛhasthas tapyate tapaḥ
c gārhasthyam asya dharmasya mūlaṃ yat kiṃ cid ejate
a prajanād dhy abhinirvṛttāḥ sarve prāṇabhṛto mune
c prajanaṃ cāpy utānyatra na kathaṃ cana vidyate
a yās tāḥ syur bahir oṣadhyo bahv araṇyās tathā dvija
c oṣadhibhyo bahir yasmāt prāṇī kaś cin na vidyate
e kasyaiṣā vāg bhavet satyā mokṣo nāsti gṛhād iti
a aśraddadhānair aprājñaiḥ sūkṣmadarśanavarjitaiḥ
c nirāśair alasaiḥ śrāntais tapyamānaiḥ svakarmabhiḥ
e śramasyoparamo dṛṣṭaḥ pravrajyā nāma paṇḍitaiḥ
a trailokyasyaiva hetur hi maryādā śāśvatī dhruvā
c brāhmaṇo nāma bhagavāñ janmaprabhṛti pūjyate
a prāg garbhādhānān mantrā hi pravartante dvijātiṣu
c aviśrambheṣu vartante viśrambheṣv apy asaṃśayam
a dāhaḥ punaḥ saṃśrayaṇe saṃsthite pātrabhojanam
c dānaṃ gavāṃ paśūnāṃ vā piṇḍānāṃ cāpsu majjanam
a arciṣmanto barhiṣadaḥ kravyādāḥ pitaraḥ smṛtāḥ
c mṛtasyāpy anumanyante mantrā mantrāś ca kāraṇam
a evaṃ krośatsu vedeṣu kuto mokṣo 'sti kasya cit
c ṛṇavanto yadā martyāḥ pitṛdevadvijātiṣu
a śriyā vihīnair alasaiḥ paṇḍitair apalāpitam
c vedavādāparijñānaṃ satyābhāsam ivānṛtam
a na vai pāpair hriyate kṛṣyate vā
yo brāhmaṇo yajate vedaśāstraiḥ
c ūrdhvaṃ yajñaḥ paśubhiḥ sārdham eti
saṃtarpitas tarpayate ca kāmaiḥ
a na vedānāṃ paribhavān na śāṭhyena na māyayā
c mahat prāpnoti puruṣo brahma brahmaṇi vindati
 kapila uvāca
a darśaṃ ca paurṇamāsaṃ ca agnihotraṃ ca dhīmatām
c cāturmāsyāni caivāsaṃs teṣu yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ
a anārambhāḥ sudhṛtayaḥ śucayo brahmasaṃśritāḥ
c brahmaṇaiva sma te devāṃs tarpayanty amṛtaiṣiṇaḥ
a sarvabhūtātmabhūtasya sarvabhūtāni paśyataḥ
c devāpi mārge muhyanti apadasya padaiṣiṇaḥ
a caturdvāraṃ puruṣaṃ caturmukhaṃ
caturdhā cainam upayāti nindā
c bāhubhyāṃ vāca udarād upasthāt
teṣāṃ dvāraṃ dvārapālo bubhūṣet
a nākṣair dīvyen nādadītānyavittaṃ
na vāyonīyasya śṛtaṃ pragṛhṇet
c kruddho na caiva prahareta dhīmāṃs
tathāsya tat pāṇipādaṃ suguptam
a nākrośam archen na mṛṣā vadec ca
na paiśunaṃ janavādaṃ ca kuryāt
c satyavrato mitabhāṣo 'pramattas
tathāsya vāgdvāram atho suguptam
a nānāśanaḥ syān na mahāśanaḥ syād
alolupaḥ sādhubhir āgataḥ syāt
c yātrārtham āhāram ihādadīta
tathāsya syāj jāṭharī dvāraguptiḥ
a na vīrapatnīṃ vihareta nārīṃ
na cāpi nārīm anṛtāv āhvayīta
c bhāryāvrataṃ hy ātmani dhārayīta
tathāsyopasthadvāraguptir bhaveta
a dvārāṇi yasya sarvāṇi suguptāni manīṣiṇaḥ
c upastham udaraṃ bāhū vāk caturthī sa vai dvijaḥ
a moghāny aguptadvārasya sarvāṇy eva bhavanty uta
c kiṃ tasya tapasā kāryaṃ kiṃ yajñena kim ātmanā
a anuttarīyavasanam anupastīrṇaśāyinam
c bāhūpadhānaṃ śāmyantaṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a dvaṃdvārāmeṣu sarveṣu ya eko ramate muniḥ
c pareṣām ananudhyāyaṃs taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a yena sarvam idaṃ buddhaṃ prakṛtir vikṛtiś ca yā
c gatijñaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyaḥ sarveṣām abhayaṃ yataḥ
c sarvabhūtātmabhūto yas taṃ devā brāhmaṇaṃ viduḥ
a nāntareṇānujānanti vedānāṃ yat kriyāphalam
c anujñāya ca tat sarvam anyad rocayate 'phalam
a phalavanti ca karmāṇi vyuṣṭimanti dhruvāṇi ca
c viguṇāni ca paśyanti tathānaikāntikāni ca
a guṇāś cātra sudurjñeyā jñātāś cāpi suduṣkarāḥ
c anuṣṭhitāś cāntavanta iti tvam anupaśyasi
 syūmaraśmir uvāca
a yathā ca vedaprāmāṇyaṃ tyāgaś ca saphalo yathā
c tau panthānāv ubhau vyaktau bhagavaṃs tad bravīhi me
 kapila uvāca
a pratyakṣam iha paśyanti bhavantaḥ satpathe sthitāḥ
c pratyakṣaṃ tu kim atrāsti yad bhavanta upāsate
 syūmaraśmir uvāca
a syūmaraśmir ahaṃ brahmañ jijñāsārtham ihāgataḥ
c śreyaskāmaḥ pratyavocam ārjavān na vivakṣayā
e imaṃ ca saṃśayaṃ ghoraṃ bhagavān prabravītu me
a pratyakṣam iha paśyanto bhavantaḥ satpathe sthitāḥ
c kim atra pratyakṣatamaṃ bhavanto yad upāsate
e anyatra tarkaśāstrebhya āgamāc ca yathāgamam
a āgamo vedavādas tu tarkaśāstrāṇi cāgamaḥ
c yathāgamam upāsīta āgamas tatra sidhyati
e siddhiḥ pratyakṣarūpā ca dṛśyaty āgamaniścayāt
a naur nāvīva nibaddhā hi srotasā sanibandhanā
c hriyamāṇā kathaṃ vipra kubuddhīṃs tārayiṣyati
e etad bravītu bhagavān upapanno 'smy adhīhi bhoḥ
a naiva tyāgī na saṃtuṣṭo nāśoko na nirāmayaḥ
c na nirvivitso nāvṛtto nāpavṛtto 'sti kaś cana
a bhavanto 'pi ca hṛṣyanti śocanti ca yathā vayam
c indriyārthāś ca bhavatāṃ samānāḥ sarvajantuṣu
a evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ pravṛttiṣu
c ekam ālambamānānāṃ nirṇaye kiṃ nirāmayam
 kapila uvāca
a yad yad ācarate śāstram atha sarvapravṛttiṣu
c yasya yatra hy anuṣṭhānaṃ tatra tatra nirāmayam
a sarvaṃ pāvayate jñānaṃ yo jñānaṃ hy anuvartate
c jñānād apetya yā vṛttiḥ sā vināśayati prajāḥ
a bhavanto jñānino nityaṃ sarvataś ca nirāgamāḥ
c aikātmyaṃ nāma kaś cid dhi kadā cid abhipadyate
a śāstraṃ hy abuddhvā tattvena ke cid vādabalā janāḥ
c kāmadveṣābhibhūtatvād ahaṃkāravaśaṃ gatāḥ
a yāthātathyam avijñāya śāstrāṇāṃ śāstradasyavaḥ
c brahmastenā nirārambhā apakvamatayo 'śivāḥ
a vaiguṇyam eva paśyanti na guṇān anuyuñjate
c teṣāṃ tamaḥśarīrāṇāṃ tama eva parāyaṇam
a yo yathāprakṛtir jantuḥ prakṛteḥ syād vaśānugaḥ
c tasya dveṣaś ca kāmaś ca krodho dambho 'nṛtaṃ madaḥ
e nityam evābhivartante guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ
a etad buddhyānupaśyantaḥ saṃtyajeyuḥ śubhāśubham
c parāṃ gatim abhīpsanto yatayaḥ saṃyame ratāḥ
d yataḥ svarūpataś cānyo jātitaḥ śrutito 'rthataḥ
d katham asmin sa ity eva saṃbandhaḥ syād asaṃhitaḥ
 syūmaraśmir uvāca
a sarvam etan mayā brahmañ śāstrataḥ parikīrtitam
c na hy avijñāya śātrārthaṃ pravartante pravṛttayaḥ
a yaḥ kaś cin nyāyya ācāraḥ sarvaṃ śāstram iti śrutiḥ
c yad anyāyyam aśāstraṃ tad ity eṣā śrūyate śrutiḥ
a na pravṛttir ṛte śāstrāt kā cid astīti niścayaḥ
c yad anyad vedavādebhyas tad aśāstram iti śrutiḥ
a śāstrād apetaṃ paśyanti bahavo vyaktamāninaḥ
c śāstradoṣān na paśyanti iha cāmutra cāpare
d indriyārthāś ca bhavatāṃ samānāḥ sarvajantuṣu
d evaṃ caturṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ pravṛttiṣu
d evam ālambamānānāṃ nirṇaye sarvatodiśam
e avijñānahataprajñā hīnaprajñās tamovṛtāḥ
a śakyaṃ tv ekena muktena kṛtakṛtyena sarvaśaḥ
c piṇḍamātraṃ vyapāśritya carituṃ sarvatodiśam
d ānantyaṃ vadamānena śaktena vijitātmanā
e vedavādaṃ vyapāśritya mokṣo 'stīti prabhāṣitum
f apetanyāyaśāstreṇa sarvalokavigarhiṇā
a idaṃ tu duṣkaraṃ karma kuṭumbam abhisaṃśritam
c dānam adhyayanaṃ yajñaḥ prajāsaṃtānam ārjavam
a yady etad evaṃ kṛtvāpi na vimokṣo 'sti kasya cit
c dhik kartāraṃ ca kāryaṃ ca śramaś cāyaṃ nirarthakaḥ
a nāstikyam anyathā ca syād vedānāṃ pṛṣṭhataḥkriyā
c etasyānantyam icchāmi bhagavañ śrotum añjasā
a tathyaṃ vadasva me brahmann upasanno 'smy adhīhi bhoḥ
c yathā te vidito mokṣas tathecchāmy upaśikṣitum
 kapila uvāca
a vedāḥ pramāṇaṃ lokānāṃ na vedāḥ pṛṣṭhataḥkṛtāḥ
c dve brahmaṇī veditavye śabdabrahma paraṃ ca yat
e śabdabrahmaṇi niṣṇātaḥ paraṃ brahmādhigacchati
a śarīram etat kurute yad vede kurute tanum
c kṛtaśuddhaśarīro hi pātraṃ bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ
a ānantyam anuyuṅkte yaḥ karmaṇā tad bravīmi te
c nirāgamam anaitihyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ lokasākṣikam
a dharma ity eva ye yajñān vitanvanti nirāśiṣaḥ
c utpannatyāgino 'lubdhāḥ kṛpāsūyāvivarjitāḥ
e dhanānām eṣa vai panthās tīrtheṣu pratipādanam
a anāśritāḥ pāpakṛtyāḥ kadā cit karmayonitaḥ
c manaḥsaṃkalpasaṃsiddhā viśuddhajñānaniścayāḥ
a akrudhyanto 'nasūyanto nirahaṃkāramatsarāḥ
c jñānaniṣṭhās triśuklāś ca sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
a āsan gṛhasthā bhūyiṣṭham avyutkrāntāḥ svakarmasu
c rājānaś ca tathā yuktā brāhmaṇāś ca yathāvidhi
a samā hy ārjavasaṃpannāḥ saṃtuṣṭā jñānaniścayāḥ
c pratyakṣadharmāḥ śucayaḥ śraddadhānāḥ parāvare
a purastād bhāvitātmāno yathāvac caritavratāḥ
c caranti dharmaṃ kṛcchre 'pi durge caivādhisaṃhatāḥ
a saṃhatya dharmaṃ caratāṃ purāsīt sukham eva tat
c teṣāṃ nāsīd vidhātavyaṃ prāyaścittaṃ kadā cana
a satyaṃ hi dharmam āsthāya durādharṣatamā matāḥ
c na mātrām anurudhyante na dharmacchalam antataḥ
a ya eva prathamaḥ kalpas tam evābhyācaran saha
c asyāṃ sthitau sthitānāṃ hi prāyaścittaṃ na vidyate
e durbalātmana utpannaṃ prāyaścittam iti śrutiḥ
a yata evaṃvidhā viprāḥ purāṇā yajñavāhanāḥ
c traividyavṛddhāḥ śucayo vṛttavanto yaśasvinaḥ
e yajanto 'har ahar yajñair nirāśīrbandhanā budhāḥ
a teṣāṃ yajñāś ca vedāś ca karmāṇi ca yathāgamam
c āgamāś ca yathākālaṃ saṃkalpāś ca yathāvratam
a apetakāmakrodhānāṃ prakṛtyā saṃśitātmanām
c ṛjūnāṃ śamanityānāṃ sthitānāṃ sveṣu karmasu
e sarvam ānantyam evāsīd iti naḥ śāśvatī śrutiḥ
a teṣām adīnasattvānāṃ duścarācārakarmaṇām
c svakarmabhiḥ saṃvṛtānāṃ tapo ghoratvam āgatam
a taṃ sadācāram āścaryaṃ purāṇaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam
c aśaknuvadbhiś carituṃ kiṃ cid dharmeṣu sūcitam
a nirāpaddharma ācāras tv apramādo 'parābhavaḥ
c sarvavarṇeṣu yat teṣu nāsīt kaś cid vyatikramaḥ
a dharmam ekaṃ catuṣpādam āśritās te nararṣabhāḥ
c taṃ santo vidhivat prāpya gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
a gṛhebhya eva niṣkramya vanam anye samāśritāḥ
c gṛham evābhisaṃśritya tato 'nye brahmacāriṇaḥ
a dharmam etaṃ catuṣpādam āśramaṃ brāhmaṇā viduḥ
c ānantyaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ brāhmaṇā nāma niścayaḥ
