a ata evaṃvidhā viprāḥ purāṇā dharmacāriṇaḥ
c ta ete divi dṛśyante jyotirbhūtā dvijātayaḥ
a nakṣatrāṇīva dhiṣṇyeṣu bahavas tārakāgaṇāḥ
c ānantyam upasaṃprāptāḥ saṃtoṣād iti vaidikam
a yady āgacchanti saṃsāraṃ punar yoniṣu tādṛśāḥ
c na lipyante pāpakṛtyaiḥ kadā cit karmayonitaḥ
d ekam eva brahmacārī śuśrūṣur ghoraniścayaḥ
a evaṃ yukto brāhmaṇaḥ syād anyo brāhmaṇako bhavet
c karmaiva puruṣasyāha śubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
a evaṃ pakvakaṣāyāṇām ānantyena śrutena ca
c sarvam ānantyam evāsīd evaṃ naḥ śāśvatī śrutiḥ
a teṣām apetatṛṣṇānāṃ nirṇiktānāṃ śubhātmanām
c caturtha aupaniṣado dharmaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
a sa siddhaiḥ sādhyate nityaṃ brāhmaṇair niyatātmabhiḥ
c saṃtoṣamūlas tyāgātmā jñānādhiṣṭhānam ucyate
a apavargagatir nityo yatidharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c sādhāraṇaḥ kevalo vā yathābalam upāsyate
a gacchato gacchataḥ kṣemaṃ durbalo 'trāvasīdati
c brahmaṇaḥ padam anvicchan saṃsārān mucyate śuciḥ
 syūmaraśmir uvāca
a ye bhuñjate ye dadate yajante 'dhīyate ca ye
c mātrābhir dharmalabdhābhir ye vā tyāgaṃ samāśritāḥ
a eteṣāṃ pretyabhāve tu katamaḥ svargajittamaḥ
c etad ācakṣva me brahman yathātathyena pṛcchataḥ
 kapila uvāca
a parigrahāḥ śubhāḥ sarve guṇato 'bhyudayāś ca ye
c na tu tyāgasukhaṃ prāptā etat tvam api paśyasi
 syūmaraśmir uvāca
a bhavanto jñānaniṣṭhā vai gṛhasthāḥ karmaniścayāḥ
c āśramāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ niṣṭhāyām aikyam ucyate
a ekatve ca pṛthaktve ca viśeṣo nānya ucyate
c tad yathāvad yathānyāyaṃ bhagavān prabravītu me
 kapila uvāca
a śarīrapaktiḥ karmāṇi jñānaṃ tu paramā gatiḥ
c pakve kaṣāye vamanai rasajñāne na tiṣṭhati
a ānṛśaṃsyaṃ kṣamā śāntir ahiṃsā satyam ārjavam
c adroho nābhimānaś ca hrīs titikṣā śamas tathā
a panthāno brahmaṇas tv ete etaiḥ prāpnoti yat param
c tad vidvān anubudhyeta manasā karmaniścayam
a yāṃ viprāḥ sarvataḥ śāntā viśuddhā jñānaniścayāḥ
c gatiṃ gacchanti saṃtuṣṭās tām āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim
a vedāṃś ca veditavyaṃ ca viditvā ca yathāsthiti
c evaṃ vedavid ity āhur ato 'nyo vātareṭakaḥ
a sarvaṃ vidur vedavido vede sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
c vede hi niṣṭhā sarvasya yad yad asti ca nāsti ca
a eṣaiva niṣṭhā sarvasya yad yad asti ca nāsti ca
c etad antaṃ ca madhyaṃ ca sac cāsac ca vijānataḥ
a samastatyāga ity eva śama ity eva niṣṭhitaḥ
c saṃtoṣa ity atra śubham apavarge pratiṣṭhitam
a ṛtaṃ satyaṃ viditaṃ veditavyaṃ
sarvasyātmā jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ ca
c sarvaṃ sukhaṃ yac chivam uttamaṃ ca
brahmāvyaktaṃ prabhavaś cāvyayaś ca
a tejaḥ kṣamā śāntir anāmayaṃ śubhaṃ
tathāvidhaṃ vyoma sanātanaṃ dhruvam
c etaiḥ śabdair gamyate buddhinetrais
tasmai namo brahmaṇe brāhmaṇāya
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dharmam arthaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca vedāḥ śaṃsanti bhārata
c kasya lābho viśiṣṭo 'tra tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam
c kuṇḍadhāreṇa yat prītyā bhaktāyopakṛtaṃ purā
a adhano brāhmaṇaḥ kaś cit kāmād dharmam avaikṣata
c yajñārthaṃ sa tato 'rthārthī tapo 'tapyata dāruṇam
a sa niścayam atho kṛtvā pūjayām āsa devatāḥ
c bhaktyā na caivādhyagacchad dhanaṃ saṃpūjya devatāḥ
a tataś cintāṃ punaḥ prāptaḥ katamad daivataṃ nu tat
c yan me drutaṃ prasīdeta mānuṣair ajaḍīkṛtam
a atha saumyena vapuṣā devānucaram antike
c pratyapaśyaj jaladharaṃ kuṇḍadhāram avasthitam
a dṛṣṭvaiva taṃ mahātmānaṃ tasya bhaktir ajāyata
c ayaṃ me dhāsyati śreyo vapur etad dhi tādṛśam
a saṃnikṛṣṭaś ca devasya na cānyair mānuṣair vṛtaḥ
c eṣa me dāsyati dhanaṃ prabhūtaṃ śīghram eva ca
a tato dhūpaiś ca gandhaiś ca mālyair uccāvacair api
c balibhir vividhaiś cāpi pūjayām āsa taṃ dvijaḥ
a tataḥ svalpena kālena tuṣṭo jaladharas tadā
c tasyopakāre niyatām imāṃ vācam uvāca ha
a brahmaghne ca surāpe ca core bhagnavrate tathā
c niṣkṛtir vihitā sadbhiḥ kṛtaghne nāsti niṣkṛtiḥ
a āśāyās tanayo 'dharmaḥ krodho 'sūyāsutaḥ smṛtaḥ
c putro lobho nikṛtyās tu kṛtaghno nārhati prajām
a tataḥ sa brāhmaṇaḥ svapne kuṇḍadhārasya tejasā
c apaśyat sarvabhūtāni kuśeṣu śayitas tadā
a śamena tapasā caiva bhaktyā ca nirupaskṛtaḥ
c śuddhātmā brāhmaṇo rātrau nidarśanam apaśyata
a maṇibhadraṃ sa tatrasthaṃ devatānāṃ mahādyutim
c apaśyata mahātmānaṃ vyādiśantaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
a tatra devāḥ prayacchanti rājyāni ca dhanāni ca
c śubhaiḥ karmabhir ārabdhāḥ pracchidanty aśubheṣu ca
a paśyatām atha yakṣāṇāṃ kuṇḍadhāro mahādyutiḥ
c niṣpatya patito bhūmau devānāṃ bharatarṣabha
a tatas tu devavacanān maṇibhadro mahāyaśāḥ
c uvāca patitaṃ bhūmau kuṇḍadhāra kim iṣyate
 kuṇḍadhāra uvāca
a yadi prasannā devā me bhakto 'yaṃ brāhmaṇo mama
c asyānugraham icchāmi kṛtaṃ kiṃ cit sukhodayam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tatas taṃ maṇibhadras tu punar vacanam abravīt
c devānām eva vacanāt kuṇḍadhāraṃ mahādyutim
a uttiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhadraṃ te kṛtakāryaḥ sukhī bhava
b dhanārthī yadi vipro 'yaṃ dhanam asmai pradīyatām
c yāvad dhanaṃ prārthayate brāhmaṇo 'yaṃ sakhā tava
e devānāṃ śāsanāt tāvad asaṃkhyeyaṃ dadāmy aham
a vicārya kuṇḍadhāras tu mānuṣyaṃ calam adhruvam
c tapase matim ādhatta brāhmaṇasya yaśasvinaḥ
 kuṇḍadhāra uvāca
a nāhaṃ dhanāni yācāmi brāhmaṇāya dhanaprada
c anyam evāham icchāmi bhaktāyānugrahaṃ kṛtam
a pṛthivīṃ ratnapūrṇāṃ vā mahad vā dhanasaṃcayam
c bhaktāya nāham icchāmi bhaved eṣa tu dhārmikaḥ
a dharme 'sya ramatāṃ buddhir dharmaṃ caivopajīvatu
c dharmapradhāno bhavatu mamaiṣo 'nugraho mataḥ
 maṇibhadra uvāca
a yadā dharmaphalaṃ rājyaṃ sukhāni vividhāni ca
c phalāny evāyam aśnātu kāyakleśavivarjitaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tatas tad eva bahuśaḥ kuṇḍadhāro mahāyaśāḥ
c abhyāsam akarod dharme tatas tuṣṭāsya devatāḥ
 maṇibhadra uvāca
a prītās te devatāḥ sarvā dvijasyāsya tathaiva ca
c bhaviṣyaty eṣa dharmātmā dharme cādhāsyate matiḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ prīto jaladharaḥ kṛtakāryo yudhiṣṭhira
b brāhmaṇaḥ sa ca saṃtapto rājyalobhād ariṃdama
c īpsitaṃ manaso labdhvā varam anyaiḥ sudurlabham
a tato 'paśyata cīrāṇi sūkṣmāṇi dvijasattamaḥ
c pārśvato 'bhyāgato nyastāny atha nirvedam āgataḥ
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a ayaṃ na sukṛtaṃ vetti ko nv anyo vetsyate kṛtam
c gacchāmi vanam evāhaṃ varaṃ dharmeṇa jīvitum
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nirvedād devatānāṃ ca prasādāt sa dvijottamaḥ
c vanaṃ praviśya sumahat tapa ārabdhavāṃs tadā
a devatātithiśeṣeṇa phalamūlāśano dvijaḥ
c dharme cāpi mahārāja ratir asyābhyajāyata
a tyaktvā mūlaphalaṃ sarvaṃ parṇāhāro 'bhavad dvijaḥ
c parṇaṃ tyaktvā jalāhāras tadāsīd dvijasattamaḥ
a vāyubhakṣas tataḥ paścād bahūn varṣagaṇān abhūt
c na cāsya kṣīyate prāṇas tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a dharme ca śraddadhānasya tapasy ugre ca vartataḥ
c kālena mahatā tasya divyā dṛṣṭir ajāyata
a tasya buddhiḥ prādurāsīd yadi dadyāṃ mahad dhanam
a rājyaṃ vā mama saṃtuṣṭo naṣṭo 'haṃ syāṃ na saṃśayaḥ
c tuṣṭaḥ kasmai cid evāhaṃ na mithyā vāg bhaven mama
a tataḥ prahṛṣṭavadano bhūya ārabdhavāṃs tapaḥ
c bhūyaś cācintayat siddho yat paraṃ so 'bhyapadyata
a yadi dadyām ahaṃ rājyaṃ tuṣṭo vai yasya kasya cit
c sa bhaved acirād rājā na mithyā vāg bhaven mama
a tasya sākṣāt kuṇḍadhāro darśayām āsa bhārata
c brāhmaṇasya tapoyogāt sauhṛdenābhicoditaḥ
a samāgamya sa tenātha pūjāṃ cakre yathāvidhi
c brāhmaṇaḥ kuṇḍadhārasya vismitaś cābhavan nṛpa
a tato 'bravīt kuṇḍadhāro divyaṃ te cakṣur uttamam
c paśya rājñāṃ gatiṃ vipra lokāṃś cāvekṣa cakṣuṣā
a tato rājñāṃ sahasrāṇi magnāni niraye tadā
c dūrād apaśyad vipraḥ sa divyayuktena cakṣuṣā
 kuṇḍadhāra uvāca
a māṃ pūjayitvā bhāvena yadi tvaṃ duḥkham āpnuyāḥ
c kṛtaṃ mayā bhavet kiṃ te kaś ca te 'nugraho bhavet
a paśya paśya ca bhūyas tvaṃ kāmān icchet kathaṃ naraḥ
c svargadvāraṃ hi saṃruddhaṃ mānuṣeṣu viśeṣataḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato 'paśyat sa kāmaṃ ca krodhaṃ lobhaṃ bhayaṃ madam
c nidrāṃ tandrīṃ tathālasyam āvṛtya puruṣān sthitān
 kuṇḍadhāra uvāca
a etair lokāḥ susaṃruddhā devānāṃ mānuṣād bhayam
c tathaiva devavacanād vighnaṃ kurvanti sarvaśaḥ
a na devair ananujñātaḥ kaś cid bhavati dhārmikaḥ
c eṣa śakto 'si tapasā rājyaṃ dātuṃ dhanāni ca
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ papāta śirasā brāhmaṇas toyadhāriṇe
c uvāca cainaṃ dharmātmā mahān me 'nugrahaḥ kṛtaḥ
a kāmalobhānubandhena purā te yad asūyitam
c mayā sneham avijñāya tatra me kṣantum arhasi
a kṣāntam eva mayety uktvā kuṇḍadhāro dvijarṣabham
c saṃpariṣvajya bāhubhyāṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata
a tataḥ sarvān imāṃl lokān brāhmaṇo 'nucacāra ha
c kuṇḍadhāraprasādena tapasā yojitaḥ purā
a vihāyasā ca gamanaṃ tathā saṃkalpitārthatā
c dharmāc chaktyā tathā yogād yā caiva paramā gatiḥ
a devatā brāhmaṇāḥ santo yakṣā mānuṣacāraṇāḥ
c dhārmikān pūjayantīha na dhanāḍhyān na kāminaḥ
a suprasannā hi te devā yat te dharme ratā matiḥ
c dhane sukhakalā kā cid dharme tu paramaṃ sukham
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a bahūnāṃ yajñatapasām ekārthānāṃ pitāmaha
c dharmārthaṃ na sukhārthārthaṃ kathaṃ yajñaḥ samāhitaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi nāradenānukīrtitam
c uñchavṛtteḥ purāvṛttaṃ yajñārthe brāhmaṇasya ha
a rāṣṭre dharmottare śreṣṭhe vidarbheṣv abhavad dvijaḥ
c uñchavṛttir ṛṣiḥ kaś cid yajñe yajñaṃ samādadhe
a śyāmākam aśanaṃ tatra sūryapatnī suvarcalā
c tiktaṃ ca virasaṃ śākaṃ tapasā svādutāṃ gatam
a upagamya vane pṛthvīṃ sarvabhūtavihiṃsayā
c api mūlaphalair ijyo yajñaḥ svargyaḥ paraṃtapa
a tasya bhāryā vratakṛśā śuciḥ puṣkaracāriṇī
c yajñapatnītvam ānītā satyenānuvidhīyate
e sā tu śāpaparitrastā na svabhāvānuvartinī
a mayūrajīrṇaparṇānāṃ vastraṃ tasyāś ca parṇinām
c akāmāyāḥ kṛtaṃ tatra yajñe hotrānumārgataḥ
a śukrasya punar ājātir apadhyānād adharmavit
c tasmin vane samīpastho mṛgo 'bhūt sahacārikaḥ
e vacobhir abravīt satyaṃ tvayā duṣkṛtakaṃ kṛtam
a yadi mantrāṅgahīno 'yaṃ yajño bhavati vaikṛtaḥ
c māṃ bhoḥ prakṣipa hotre tvaṃ gaccha svargam atandritaḥ
a tatas tu yajñe sāvitrī sākṣāt taṃ saṃnyamantrayat
c nimantrayantī pratyuktā na hanyāṃ sahavāsinam
a evam uktā nivṛttā sā praviṣṭā yajñapāvakam
c kiṃ nu duścaritaṃ yajñe didṛkṣuḥ sā rasātalam
a sā tu baddhāñjaliṃ satyam ayācad dhariṇaṃ punaḥ
c satyena saṃpariṣvajya saṃdiṣṭo gamyatām iti
a tataḥ sa hariṇo gatvā padāny aṣṭau nyavartata
c sādhu hiṃsaya māṃ satya hato yāsyāmi sadgatim
a paśya hy apsaraso divyā mayā dattena cakṣuṣā
c vimānāni vicitrāṇi gandharvāṇāṃ mahātmanām
a tataḥ suruciraṃ dṛṣṭvā spṛhālagnena cakṣuṣā
c mṛgam ālokya hiṃsāyāṃ svargavāsaṃ samarthayat
a sa tu dharmo mṛgo bhūtvā bahuvarṣoṣito vane
c tasya niṣkṛtim ādhatta na hy asau yajñasaṃvidhiḥ
a tasya tena tu bhāvena mṛgahiṃsātmanas tadā
c tapo mahat samucchinnaṃ tasmād dhiṃsā na yajñiyā
a tatas taṃ bhagavān dharmo yajñaṃ yājayata svayam
c samādhānaṃ ca bhāryāyā lebhe sa tapasā param
a ahiṃsā sakalo dharmo hiṃsā yajñe 'samāhitā
c satyaṃ te 'haṃ pravakṣyāmi yo dharmaḥ satyavādinām
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ bhavati pāpātmā kathaṃ dharmaṃ karoti vā
c kena nirvedam ādatte mokṣaṃ vā kena gacchati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a viditāḥ sarvadharmās te sthityartham anupṛcchasi
c śṛṇu mokṣaṃ sanirvedaṃ pāpaṃ dharmaṃ ca mūlataḥ
a vijñānārthaṃ hi pañcānām icchā pūrvaṃ pravartate
c prāpya tāñ jāyate kāmo dveṣo vā bharatarṣabha
a tatas tadarthaṃ yatate karma cārabhate punaḥ
c iṣṭānāṃ rūpagandhānām abhyāsaṃ ca cikīrṣati
a tato rāgaḥ prabhavati dveṣaś ca tadanantaram
c tato lobhaḥ prabhavati mohaś ca tadanantaram
a lobhamohābhibhūtasya rāgadveṣānvitasya ca
c na dharme jāyate buddhir vyājād dharmaṃ karoti ca
a vyājena carato dharmam arthavyājo 'pi rocate
c vyājena sidhyamāneṣu dhaneṣu kurunandana
a tatraiva kurute buddhiṃ tataḥ pāpaṃ cikīrṣati
c suhṛdbhir vāryamāṇo 'pi paṇḍitaiś cāpi bhārata
a uttaraṃ nyāyasaṃbaddhaṃ bravīti vidhiyojitam
c adharmas trividhas tasya vardhate rāgamohajaḥ
a pāpaṃ cintayate caiva prabravīti karoti ca
c tasyādharmapravṛttasya doṣān paśyanti sādhavaḥ
a ekaśīlāś ca mitratvaṃ bhajante pāpakarmiṇaḥ
c sa neha sukham āpnoti kuta eva paratra vai
a evaṃ bhavati pāpātmā dharmātmānaṃ tu me śṛṇu
c yathā kuśaladharmā sa kuśalaṃ pratipadyate
d kuśalenaiva dharmeṇa gatim iṣṭāṃ prapadyate
a ya etān prajñayā doṣān pūrvam evānupaśyati
c kuśalaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ sādhūṃś cāpy upasevate
a tasya sādhusamācārād abhyāsāc caiva vardhate
c prajñā dharme ca ramate dharmaṃ caivopajīvati
a so 'tha dharmād avāpteṣu dhaneṣu kurute manaḥ
c tasyaiva siñcate mūlaṃ guṇān paśyati yatra vai
a dharmātmā bhavati hy evaṃ mitraṃ ca labhate śubham
c sa mitradhanalābhāt tu pretya ceha ca nandati
a śabde sparśe tathā rūpe rase gandhe ca bhārata
c prabhutvaṃ labhate jantur dharmasyaitat phalaṃ viduḥ
a sa dharmasya phalaṃ labdhvā na tṛpyati yudhiṣṭhira
b dharme sthitānāṃ kaunteya sarvabhogakriyāsu ca
c atṛpyamāṇo nirvedam ādatte jñānacakṣuṣā
a prajñācakṣur yadā kāme doṣam evānupaśyati
c virajyate tadā kāmān na ca dharmaṃ vimuñcati
a sarvatyāge ca yatate dṛṣṭvā lokaṃ kṣayātmakam
c tato mokṣāya yatate nānupāyād upāyataḥ
a śanair nirvedam ādatte pāpaṃ karma jahāti ca
c dharmātmā caiva bhavati mokṣaṃ ca labhate param
a etat te kathitaṃ tāta yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
c pāpaṃ dharmaṃ tathā mokṣaṃ nirvedaṃ caiva bhārata
a tasmād dharme pravartethāḥ sarvāvasthaṃ yudhiṣṭhira
c dharme sthitānāṃ kaunteya siddhir bhavati śāśvatī
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a mokṣaḥ pitāmahenokta upāyān nānupāyataḥ
c tam upāyaṃ yathānyāyaṃ śrotum icchāmi bhārata
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tvayy evaitan mahāprājña yuktaṃ nipuṇadarśanam
c yad upāyena sarvārthān nityaṃ mṛgayase 'nagha
a karaṇe ghaṭasya yā buddhir ghaṭotpattau na sānagha
c evaṃ dharmābhyupāyeṣu nānyad dharmeṣu kāraṇam
a pūrve samudre yaḥ panthā na sa gacchati paścimam
c ekaḥ panthā hi mokṣasya tan me vistarataḥ śṛṇu
a kṣamayā krodham ucchindyāt kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt
c sattvasaṃsevanād dhīro nidrām ucchetum arhati
a apramādād bhayaṃ rakṣec chvāsaṃ kṣetrajñaśīlanāt
c icchāṃ dveṣaṃ ca kāmaṃ ca dhairyeṇa vinivartayet
a bhramaṃ pramoham āvartam abhyāsād vinivartayet
c nidrāṃ ca pratibhāṃ caiva jñānābhyāsena tattvavit
a upadravāṃs tathā rogān hitajīrṇamitāśanāt
c lobhaṃ mohaṃ ca saṃtoṣād viṣayāṃs tattvadarśanāt
a anukrośād adharmaṃ ca jayed dharmam upekṣayā
c āyatyā ca jayed āśām arthaṃ saṅgavivarjanāt
a anityatvena ca snehaṃ kṣudhaṃ yogena paṇḍitaḥ
c kāruṇyenātmano mānaṃ tṛṣṇāṃ ca paritoṣataḥ
a utthānena jayet tandrīṃ vitarkaṃ niścayāj jayet
c maunena bahubhāṣyaṃ ca śauryeṇa ca bhayaṃ jayet
a yacched vāṅmanasī buddhyā tāṃ yacchej jñānacakṣuṣā
c jñānam ātmā mahān yacchet taṃ yacchec chāntir ātmanaḥ
d jñānam ātmāvabodhena yacched ātmānam ātmanā
a tad etad upaśāntena boddhavyaṃ śucikarmaṇā
c yogadoṣān samucchidya pañca yān kavayo viduḥ
a kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca bhayaṃ svapnaṃ ca pañcamam
c parityajya niṣeveta tathemān yogasādhanān
a dhyānam adhyayanaṃ dānaṃ satyaṃ hrīr ārjavaṃ kṣamā
c śaucam āhārataḥ śuddhir indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyamaḥ
a etair vivardhate tejaḥ pāpmānam apahanti ca
c sidhyanti cāsya saṃkalpā vijñānaṃ ca pravartate
a dhūtapāpaḥ sa tejasvī laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ
c kāmakrodhau vaśe kṛtvā ninīṣed brahmaṇaḥ padam
a amūḍhatvam asaṅgitvaṃ kāmakrodhavivarjanam
c adainyam anudīrṇatvam anudvego vyavasthitiḥ
a eṣa mārgo hi mokṣasya prasanno vimalaḥ śuciḥ
c tathā vākkāyamanasāṃ niyamaḥ kāmato 'nyathā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c nāradasya ca saṃvādaṃ devalasyāsitasya ca
a āsīnaṃ devalaṃ vṛddhaṃ buddhvā buddhimatāṃ varaḥ
c nāradaḥ paripapraccha bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayam
a kutaḥ sṛṣṭam idaṃ viśvaṃ brahman sthāvarajaṅgamam
c pralaye ca kam abhyeti tad bhavān prabravītu me
 asita uvāca
a yebhyaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni kālo bhāvapracoditaḥ
c mahābhūtāni pañceti tāny āhur bhūtacintakāḥ
a tebhyaḥ sṛjati bhūtāni kāla ātmapracoditaḥ
c etebhyo yaḥ paraṃ brūyād asad brūyād asaṃśayam
a viddhi nārada pañcaitāñ śāśvatān acalān dhruvān
c mahatas tejaso rāśīn kālaṣaṣṭhān svabhāvataḥ
a āpaś caivāntarikṣaṃ ca pṛthivī vāyupāvakau
c asiddhiḥ param etebhyo bhūtebhyo muktasaṃśayam
a nopapattyā na vā yuktyā tv asad brūyād asaṃśayam
c vettha tān abhinirvṛttān ṣaḍ ete yasya rāśayaḥ
a pañcaiva tāni kālaś ca bhāvābhāvau ca kevalau
c aṣṭau bhūtāni bhūtānāṃ śāśvatāni bhavāpyayau
a abhāvād bhāviteṣv eva tebhyaś ca prabhavanty api
c vinaṣṭo 'pi ca tāny eva jantur bhavati pañcadhā
a tasya bhūmimayo dehaḥ śrotram ākāśasaṃbhavam
c sūryaś cakṣur asur vāyur adbhyas tu khalu śoṇitam
a cakṣuṣī nāsikākarṇau tvag jihveti ca pañcamī
c indriyāṇīndriyārthānāṃ jñānāni kavayo viduḥ
a darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ghrāṇaṃ sparśanaṃ rasanaṃ tathā
c upapattyā guṇān viddhi pañca pañcasu pañcadhā
a rūpaṃ gandho rasaḥ sparśaḥ śabdaś caivātha tadguṇāḥ
c indriyair upalabhyante pañcadhā pañca pañcabhiḥ
a rūpaṃ gandhaṃ rasaṃ sparśaṃ śabdaṃ caitāṃs tu tadguṇān
c indriyāṇi na budhyante kṣetrajñas tais tu budhyate
a cittam indriyasaṃghātāt paraṃ tasmāt paraṃ manaḥ
c manasas tu parā buddhiḥ kṣetrajño buddhitaḥ paraḥ
a pūrvaṃ cetayate jantur indriyair viṣayān pṛthak
c vicārya manasā paścād atha buddhyā vyavasyati
e indriyair upalabdhārthān sarvān yas tv adhyavasyati
a cittam indriyasaṃghātaṃ mano buddhiṃ tathāṣṭamīm
c aṣṭau jñānendriyāṇy āhur etāny adhyātmacintakāḥ
a pāṇipādaṃ ca pāyuś ca mehanaṃ pañcamaṃ mukham
c iti saṃśabdyamānāni śṛṇu karmendriyāṇy api
a jalpanābhyavahārārthaṃ mukham indriyam ucyate
c gamanendriyaṃ tathā pādau karmaṇaḥ karaṇe karau
a pāyūpasthau visargārtham indriye tulyakarmaṇī
c visarge ca purīṣasya visarge cābhikāmike
a balaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ ṣaḍ etāni vācā samyag yathāgamam
c jñānaceṣṭendriyaguṇāḥ sarve saṃśabditā mayā
a indriyāṇāṃ svakarmabhyaḥ śramād uparamo yadā
c bhavatīndriyasaṃnyāsād atha svapiti vai naraḥ
a indriyāṇāṃ vyuparame mano 'nuparataṃ yadi
c sevate viṣayān eva tad vidyāt svapnadarśanam
a sāttvikāś caiva ye bhāvās tathā rājasatāmasāḥ
c karmayuktān praśaṃsanti sāttvikān itarāṃs tathā
a ānandaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiḥ pratipattiḥ parā gatiḥ
c sāttvikasya nimittāni bhāvān saṃśrayate smṛtiḥ
a jantuṣv ekatameṣv evaṃ bhāvā ye vidhim āsthitāḥ
c bhāvayor īpsitaṃ nityaṃ pratyakṣagamanaṃ dvayoḥ
a indriyāṇi ca bhāvāś ca guṇāḥ saptadaśa smṛtāḥ
c teṣām aṣṭādaśo dehī yaḥ śarīre sa śāśvataḥ
a atha vā saśarīrās te guṇāḥ sarve śarīriṇām
c saṃśritās tadviyoge hi saśarīrā na santi te
a atha vā saṃnipāto 'yaṃ śarīraṃ pāñcabhautikam
c ekaś ca daśa cāṣṭau ca guṇāḥ saha śarīriṇām
e ūṣmaṇā saha viṃśo vā saṃghātaḥ pāñcabhautikaḥ
a mahān saṃdhārayaty etac charīraṃ vāyunā saha
c tasyāsya bhāvayuktasya nimittaṃ dehabhedane
a yathaivotpadyate kiṃ cit pañcatvaṃ gacchate tathā
c puṇyapāpavināśānte puṇyapāpasamīritam
e dehaṃ viśati kālena tato 'yaṃ karmasaṃbhavam
a hitvā hitvā hy ayaṃ praiti dehād dehaṃ kṛtāśrayaḥ
c kālasaṃcoditaḥ kṣetrī viśīrṇād vā gṛhād gṛham
a tatra naivānutapyante prājñā niścitaniścayāḥ
c kṛpaṇās tv anutapyante janāḥ saṃbandhimāninaḥ
a na hy ayaṃ kasya cit kaś cin nāsya kaś cana vidyate
c bhavaty eko hy ayaṃ nityaṃ śarīre sukhaduḥkhabhāk
a naiva saṃjāyate jantur na ca jātu vipadyate
c yāti deham ayaṃ bhuktvā kadā cit paramāṃ gatim
a puṇyapāpamayaṃ dehaṃ kṣapayan karmasaṃcayāt
c kṣīṇadehaḥ punar dehī brahmatvam upagacchati
a puṇyapāpakṣayārthaṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ jñānaṃ vidhīyate
c tatkṣaye hy asya paśyanti brahmabhāve parāṃ gatim
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a bhrātaraḥ pitaraḥ putrā jñātayaḥ suhṛdas tathā
c arthahetor hatāḥ krūrair asmābhiḥ pāpabuddhibhiḥ
a yeyam arthodbhavā tṛṣṇā katham etāṃ pitāmaha
c nivartayema pāpaṃ hi tṛṣṇayā kāritā vayam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c gītaṃ videharājena māṇḍavyāyānupṛcchate
a susukhaṃ bata jīvāmi yasya me nāsti kiṃ cana
c mithilāyāṃ pradīptāyāṃ na me dahyati kiṃ cana
a arthāḥ khalu samṛddhā hi bāḍhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vijānatām
c asamṛddhās tv api sadā mohayanty avicakṣaṇān
a yac ca kāmasukhaṃ loke yac ca divyaṃ mahat sukham
c tṛṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṃ kalām
a yathaiva śṛṅgaṃ goḥ kāle vardhamānasya vardhate
c tathaiva tṛṣṇā vittena vardhamānena vardhate
a kiṃ cid eva mamatvena yadā bhavati kalpitam
c tad eva paritāpāya nāśe saṃpadyate punaḥ
a na kāmān anurudhyeta duḥkhaṃ kāmeṣu vai ratiḥ
c prāpyārtham upayuñjīta dharme kāmaṃ vivarjayet
a vidvān sarveṣu bhūteṣu vyāghramāṃsopamo bhavet
c kṛtakṛtyo viśuddhātmā sarvaṃ tyajati vai saha
a ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā śokānandau priyāpriye
c bhayābhaye ca saṃtyajya saṃpraśānto nirāmayaḥ
a yā dustyajā durmatibhir yā na jīryati jīryataḥ
c yo 'sau prāṇāntiko rogas tāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ tyajataḥ sukham
a cāritram ātmanaḥ paśyaṃś candraśuddham anāmayam
c dharmātmā labhate kīrtiṃ pretya ceha yathāsukham
a rājñas tad vacanaṃ śrutvā prītimān abhavad dvijaḥ
c pūjayitvā ca tad vākyaṃ māṇḍavyo mokṣam āśritaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃśīlaḥ kiṃsamācāraḥ kiṃvidyaḥ kiṃparāyaṇaḥ
c prāpnoti brahmaṇaḥ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a mokṣadharmeṣu nirato laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ
c prāpnoti paramaṃ sthānaṃ yat paraṃ prakṛter dhruvam
d atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
d hārītena purā gītaṃ tan nibodha yudhiṣṭhira
a svagṛhād abhiniḥsṛtya lābhālābhe samo muniḥ
c samupoḍheṣu kāmeṣu nirapekṣaḥ parivrajet
a na cakṣuṣā na manasā na vācā dūṣayed api
c na pratyakṣaṃ parokṣaṃ vā dūṣaṇaṃ vyāharet kva cit
a na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni maitrāyaṇagatiś caret
c nedaṃ jīvitam āsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit
a ativādāṃs titikṣeta nābhimanyet kathaṃ cana
c krodhyamānaḥ priyaṃ brūyād ākruṣṭaḥ kuśalaṃ vadet
a pradakṣiṇaṃ prasavyaṃ ca grāmamadhye na cācaret
c bhaikṣacaryām anāpanno na gacchet pūrvaketitaḥ
a avakīrṇaḥ suguptaś ca na vācā hy apriyaṃ vadet
c mṛduḥ syād apratikrūro visrabdhaḥ syād aroṣaṇaḥ
a vidhūme nyastamusale vyaṅgāre bhuktavaj jane
c atīte pātrasaṃcāre bhikṣāṃ lipseta vai muniḥ
a anuyātrikam arthasya mātrālābheṣv anādṛtaḥ
c alābhe na vihanyeta lābhaś cainaṃ na harṣayet
a lābhaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ necchen na bhuñjītābhipūjitaḥ
c abhipūjitalābhaṃ hi jugupsetaiva tādṛśaḥ
a na cānnadoṣān nindeta na guṇān abhipūjayet
c śayyāsane vivikte ca nityam evābhipūjayet
a śūnyāgāraṃ vṛkṣamūlam araṇyam atha vā guhām
c ajñātacaryāṃ gatvānyāṃ tato 'nyatraiva saṃviśet
a anurodhavirodhābhyāṃ samaḥ syād acalo dhruvaḥ
c sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cobhe nānurudhyeta karmaṇi
d nityatṛptaḥ susaṃtuṣṭaḥ prasannavadanendriyaḥ
d dhyānajapyaparo maunī vairāgyaṃ samupāśritaḥ
d asvantaṃ bhautikaṃ sargaṃ paśyan bhūtātmikāṃ gatim
d niḥspṛhaḥ samadarśī ca pakvāpakvena vartayan
d ātmārāmaḥ praśāntātmā laghvāhāro nirāmayaḥ
a vāco vegaṃ manasaḥ krodhavegaṃ
vivitsāvegam udaropasthavegam
c etān vegān vinayed vai tapasvī
nindā cāsya hṛdayaṃ nopahanyāt
a madhyastha eva tiṣṭheta praśaṃsānindayoḥ samaḥ
c etat pavitraṃ paramaṃ parivrājaka āśrame
a mahātmā suvrato dāntaḥ sarvatraivānapāśritaḥ
c apūrvacārakaḥ saumyo aniketaḥ samāhitaḥ
a vānaprasthagṛhasthābhyāṃ na saṃsṛjyeta karhi cit
c ajñātalipsāṃ lipseta na cainaṃ harṣa āviśet
a vijānatāṃ mokṣa eṣa śramaḥ syād avijānatām
c mokṣayānam idaṃ kṛtsnaṃ viduṣāṃ hārito 'bravīt
a abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyo dattvā yaḥ pravrajed gṛhāt
c lokās tejomayās tasya tathānantyāya kalpate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dhanyā dhanyā iti janāḥ sarve 'smān pravadanty uta
c na duḥkhitataraḥ kaś cit pumān asmābhir asti ha
a lokasaṃbhāvitair duḥkhaṃ yat prāptaṃ kurusattama
c prāpya jātiṃ manuṣyeṣu devair api pitāmaha
a kadā vayaṃ kariṣyāmaḥ saṃnyāsaṃ duḥkhasaṃjñakam
c duḥkham etac charīrāṇāṃ dhāraṇaṃ kurusattama
a vimuktāḥ saptadaśabhir hetubhūtaiś ca pañcabhiḥ
c indriyārthair guṇaiś caiva aṣṭābhiḥ prapitāmaha
a na gacchanti punarbhāvaṃ munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
c kadā vayaṃ bhaviṣyāmo rājyaṃ hitvā paraṃtapa
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nāsty anantaṃ mahārāja sarvaṃ saṃkhyānagocaram
c punarbhāvo 'pi saṃkhyāto nāsti kiṃ cid ihācalam
a na cāpi gamyate rājan naiṣa doṣaḥ prasaṅgataḥ
c udyogād eva dharmajña kālenaiva gamiṣyatha
a īśo 'yaṃ satataṃ dehī nṛpate puṇyapāpayoḥ
c tata eva samutthena tamasā rudhyate 'pi ca
a yathāñjanamayo vāyuḥ punar mānaḥśilaṃ rajaḥ
c anupraviśya tadvarṇo dṛśyate rañjayan diśaḥ
a tathā karmaphalair dehī rañjitas tamasāvṛtaḥ
c vivarṇo varṇam āśritya deheṣu parivartate
a jñānena hi yadā jantur ajñānaprabhavaṃ tamaḥ
c vyapohati tadā brahma prakāśeta sanātanam
a ayatnasādhyaṃ munayo vadanti
ye cāpi muktās ta upāsitavyāḥ
c tvayā ca lokena ca sāmareṇa
tasmān na śāmyanti maharṣisaṃghāḥ
a asminn arthe purā gītaṃ śṛṇuṣvaikamanā nṛpa
c yathā daityena vṛtreṇa bhraṣṭaiśvaryeṇa ceṣṭitam
a nirjitenāsahāyena hṛtarājyena bhārata
c aśocatā śatrumadhye buddhim āsthāya kevalām
a bhraṣṭaiśvaryaṃ purā vṛtram uśanā vākyam abravīt
c kaccit parājitasyādya na vyathā te 'sti dānava
 vṛtra uvāca
a satyena tapasā caiva viditvā saṃkṣayaṃ hy aham
c na śocāmi na hṛṣyāmi bhūtānām āgatiṃ gatim
a kālasaṃcoditā jīvā majjanti narake 'vaśāḥ
c paridṛṣṭāni sarvāṇi divyāny āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a kṣapayitvā tu taṃ kālaṃ gaṇitaṃ kālacoditāḥ
c sāvaśeṣeṇa kālena saṃbhavanti punaḥ punaḥ
a tiryagyonisahasrāṇi gatvā narakam eva ca
c nirgacchanty avaśā jīvāḥ kālabandhanabandhanāḥ
a evaṃ saṃsaramāṇāni jīvāny aham adṛṣṭavān
c yathā karma tathā lābha iti śāstranidarśanam
a tiryag gacchanti narakaṃ mānuṣyaṃ daivam eva ca
c sukhaduḥkhe priyadveṣye caritvā pūrvam eva ca
a kṛtāntavidhisaṃyuktaṃ sarvalokaḥ prapadyate
c gataṃ gacchanti cādhvānaṃ sarvabhūtāni sarvadā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a kālasaṃkhyānasaṃkhyātaṃ sṛṣṭisthitiparāyaṇam
c taṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ bhagavān uśanā pratyabhāṣata
e bhīmān duṣṭapralāpāṃs tvaṃ tāta kasmāt prabhāṣase
 vṛtra uvāca
a pratyakṣam etad bhavatas tathānyeṣāṃ manīṣiṇām
c mayā yaj jayalubdhena purā taptaṃ mahat tapaḥ
a gandhān ādāya bhūtānāṃ rasāṃś ca vividhān api
c avardhaṃ trīn samākramya lokān vai svena tejasā
a jvālāmālāparikṣipto vaihāyasacaras tathā
c ajeyaḥ sarvabhūtānām āsaṃ nityam apetabhīḥ
a aiśvaryaṃ tapasā prāptaṃ bhraṣṭaṃ tac ca svakarmabhiḥ
c dhṛtim āsthāya bhagavan na śocāmi tatas tv aham
a yuyutsatā mahendreṇa purā sārdhaṃ mahātmanā
c tato me bhagavān dṛṣṭo harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
a vaikuṇṭhaḥ puruṣo viṣṇuḥ śuklo 'nantaḥ sanātanaḥ
c muñjakeśo hariśmaśruḥ sarvabhūtapitāmahaḥ
a nūnaṃ tu tasya tapasaḥ sāvaśeṣaṃ mamāsti vai
c yad ahaṃ praṣṭum icchāmi bhavantaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
a aiśvaryaṃ vai mahad brahman kasmin varṇe pratiṣṭhitam
c nivartate cāpi punaḥ katham aiśvaryam uttamam
a kasmād bhūtāni jīvanti pravartante 'tha vā punaḥ
c kiṃ vā phalaṃ paraṃ prāpya jīvas tiṣṭhati śāśvataḥ
a kena vā karmaṇā śakyam atha jñānena kena vā
c brahmarṣe tat phalaṃ prāptuṃ tan me vyākhyātum arhasi
a itīdam uktaḥ sa munis tadānīṃ
pratyāha yat tac chṛṇu rājasiṃha
c mayocyamānaṃ puruṣarṣabha tvam
ananyacittaḥ saha sodarīyaiḥ
 uśanovāca
a namas tasmai bhagavate devāya prabhaviṣṇave
c yasya pṛthvītalaṃ tāta sākāśaṃ bāhugocaram
a mūrdhā yasya tv anantaṃ ca sthānaṃ dānavasattama
c tasyāhaṃ te pravakṣyāmi viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tayoḥ saṃvadator evam ājagāma mahāmuniḥ
c sanatkumāro dharmātmā saṃśayacchedanāya vai
a sa pūjito 'surendreṇa muninośanasā tathā
c niṣasādāsane rājan mahārhe munipuṃgavaḥ
a tam āsīnaṃ mahāprājñam uśanā vākyam abravīt
c brūhy asmai dānavendrāya viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamam
a sanatkumāras tu tataḥ śrutvā prāha vaco 'rthavat
c viṣṇor māhātmyasaṃyuktaṃ dānavendrāya dhīmate
a śṛṇu sarvam idaṃ daitya viṣṇor māhātmyam uttamam
c viṣṇau jagat sthitaṃ sarvam iti viddhi paraṃtapa
a sṛjaty eṣa mahābāho bhūtagrāmaṃ carācaram
c eṣa cākṣipate kāle kāle visṛjate punaḥ
e asmin gacchanti vilayam asmāc ca prabhavanty uta
a naiṣa dānavatā śakyas tapasā naiva cejyayā
c saṃprāptum indriyāṇāṃ tu saṃyamenaiva śakyate
a bāhye cābhyantare caiva karmaṇā manasi sthitaḥ
c nirmalīkurute buddhyā so 'mutrānantyam aśnute
a yathā hiraṇyakartā vai rūpyam agnau viśodhayet
c bahuśo 'tiprayatnena mahatātmakṛtena ha
a tadvaj jātiśatair jīvaḥ śudhyate 'lpena karmaṇā
c yatnena mahatā caivāpy ekajātau viśudhyate
a līlayālpaṃ yathā gātrāt pramṛjyād ātmano rajaḥ
c bahu yatnena mahatā doṣanirharaṇaṃ tathā
a yathā cālpena mālyena vāsitaṃ tilasarṣapam
c na muñcati svakaṃ gandhaṃ tadvat sūkṣmasya darśanam
a tad eva bahubhir mālyair vāsyamānaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
c vimuñcati svakaṃ gandhaṃ mālyagandhe 'vatiṣṭhati
a evaṃ jātiśatair yukto guṇair eva prasaṅgiṣu
c buddhyā nivartate doṣo yatnenābhyāsajena vai
a karmaṇā svena raktāni viraktāni ca dānava
c yathā karmaviśeṣāṃś ca prāpnuvanti tathā śṛṇu
a yathā ca saṃpravartante yasmiṃs tiṣṭhanti vā vibho
c tat te 'nupūrvyā vyākhyāsye tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
a anādinidhanaḥ śrīmān harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
c sa vai sṛjati bhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca
a eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca
c ekādaśavikārātmā jagat pibati raśmibhiḥ
a pādau tasya mahīṃ viddhi mūrdhānaṃ divam eva ca
c bāhavas tu diśo daitya śrotram ākāśam eva ca
a tasya tejomayaḥ sūryo manaś candramasi sthitam
c buddhir jñānagatā nityaṃ rasas tv apsu pravartate
a bhruvor anantarās tasya grahā dānavasattama
c nakṣatracakraṃ netrābhyāṃ pādayor bhūś ca dānava
d taṃ viśvabhūtaṃ viśvādiṃ paramaṃ viddhi ceśvaram
d pādayor bhūḥ sapātāḷā hṛtasūryasyaiva maṇḍalam
a rajas tamaś ca sattvaṃ ca viddhi nārāyaṇātmakam
c so ''śramāṇāṃ mukhaṃ tāta karmaṇas tat phalaṃ viduḥ
a akarmaṇaḥ phalaṃ caiva sa eva param avyayaḥ
c chandāṃsi tasya romāṇi akṣaraṃ ca sarasvatī
a bahvāśrayo bahumukho dharmo hṛdi samāśritaḥ
c sa brahmaparamo dharmas tapaś ca sad asac ca saḥ
a śrutiśāstragrahopetaḥ ṣoḍaśartvikkratuś ca saḥ
c pitāmahaś ca viṣṇuś ca so 'śvinau sa puraṃdaraḥ
a mitraś ca varuṇaś caiva yamo 'tha dhanadas tathā
c te pṛthagdarśanās tasya saṃvidanti tathaikatām
e ekasya viddhi devasya sarvaṃ jagad idaṃ vaśe
a nānābhūtasya daityendra tasyaikatvaṃ vadaty ayam
c jantuḥ paśyati jñānena tataḥ sattvaṃ prakāśate
a saṃhāravikṣepasahasrakoṭīs
tiṣṭhanti jīvāḥ pracaranti cānye
c prajāvisargasya ca pārimāṇyaṃ
vāpīsahasrāṇi bahūni daitya
a vāpyaḥ punar yojanavistṛtās tāḥ
krośaṃ ca gambhīratayāvagāḍhāḥ
c āyāmataḥ pañcaśatāś ca sarvāḥ
pratyekaśo yojanataḥ pravṛddhāḥ
a vāpyā jalaṃ kṣipyati vālakoṭyā
tv ahnā sakṛc cāpy atha na dvitīyam
c tāsāṃ kṣaye viddhi kṛtaṃ visargaṃ
saṃhāram ekaṃ ca tathā prajānām
a ṣaḍ jīvavarṇāḥ paramaṃ pramāṇaṃ
kṛṣṇo dhūmro nīlam athāsya madhyam
c raktaṃ punaḥ sahyataraṃ sukhaṃ tu
hāridravarṇaṃ susukhaṃ ca śuklam
a paraṃ tu śuklaṃ vimalaṃ viśokaṃ
gataklamaṃ sidhyati dānavendra
c gatvā tu yoniprabhavāni daitya
sahasraśaḥ siddhim upaiti jīvaḥ
a gatiṃ ca yāṃ darśanam āha devo
gatvā śubhaṃ darśanam eva cāha
c gatiḥ punar varṇakṛtā prajānāṃ
varṇas tathā kālakṛto 'surendra
a śataṃ sahasrāṇi caturdaśeha
parā gatir jīvaguṇasya daitya
b atiprasakto nirayāc ca daitya
b tatas tataḥ saṃparivartate ca
c ārohaṇaṃ tat kṛtam eva viddhi
sthānaṃ tathā niḥsaraṇaṃ ca teṣām
a kṛṣṇasya varṇasya gatir nikṛṣṭā
sa majjate narake pacyamānaḥ
c sthānaṃ tathā durgatibhis tu tasya
prajāvisargān subahūn vadanti
a śataṃ sahasrāṇi tataś caritvā
prāpnoti varṇaṃ haritaṃ tu paścāt
c sa caiva tasmin nivasaty anīśo
yugakṣaye tamasā saṃvṛtātmā
a sa vai yadā sattvaguṇena yuktas
tamo vyapohan ghaṭate svabuddhyā
c sa lohitaṃ varṇam upaiti nīlo
manuṣyaloke parivartate ca
a sa tatra saṃhāravisargam eva
svakarmajair bandhanaiḥ kliśyamānaḥ
c tataḥ sa hāridram upaiti varṇaṃ
saṃhāravikṣepaśate vyatīte
a hāridravarṇas tu prajāvisargān
sahasraśas tiṣṭhati saṃcaran vai
c avipramukto niraye ca daitya
tataḥ sahasrāṇi daśāparāṇi
a gatīḥ sahasrāṇi ca pañca tasya
catvāri saṃvartakṛtāni caiva
c vimuktam enaṃ nirayāc ca viddhi
sarveṣu cānyeṣu ca saṃbhaveṣu
a sa devaloke viharaty abhīkṣṇaṃ
tataś cyuto mānuṣatām upaiti
c saṃhāravikṣepaśatāni cāṣṭau
martyeṣu tiṣṭhann amṛtatvam eti
a so 'smād atha bhraśyati kālayogāt
kṛṣṇe tale tiṣṭhati sarvakaṣṭe
c yathā tv ayaṃ sidhyati jīvalokas
tat te 'bhidhāsyāmy asurapravīra
a daivāni sa vyūhaśatāni sapta
rakto haridro 'tha tathaiva śuklaḥ
c saṃśritya saṃdhāvati śuklam etam
aṣṭāparān arcyatamān sa lokān
a aṣṭau ca ṣaṣṭiṃ ca śatāni yāni
manoviruddhāni mahādyutīnām
c śuklasya varṇasya parā gatir yā
trīṇy eva ruddhāni mahānubhāva
a saṃhāravikṣepam aniṣṭam ekaṃ
catvāri cānyāni vasaty anīśaḥ
c ṣaṣṭhasya varṇasya parā gatir yā
siddhā viśiṣṭasya gataklamasya
a saptottaraṃ teṣu vasaty anīśaḥ
saṃhāravikṣepaśataṃ saśeṣam
c tasmād upāvṛtya manuṣyaloke
tato mahān mānuṣatām upaiti
a tasmād upāvṛtya tataḥ krameṇa
so 'gre sma saṃtiṣṭhati bhūtasargam
c sa saptakṛtvaś ca paraiti lokān
saṃhāravikṣepakṛtapravāsaḥ
a saptaiva saṃhāram upaplavāni
saṃbhāvya saṃtiṣṭhati siddhaloke
c tato 'vyayaṃ sthānam anantam eti
devasya viṣṇor atha brahmaṇaś ca
e śeṣasya caivātha narasya caiva
devasya viṣṇoḥ paramasya caiva
a saṃhārakāle paridagdhakāyā
brahmāṇam āyānti sadā prajā hi
c ceṣṭātmano devagaṇāś ca sarve
ye brahmalokād amarāḥ sma te 'pi
a prajāvisargaṃ tu saśeṣakālaṃ
sthānāni svāny eva saranti jīvāḥ
c niḥśeṣāṇāṃ tat padaṃ yānti cānte
sarvāpadā ye sadṛśā manuṣyāḥ
a ye tu cyutāḥ siddhalokāt krameṇa
teṣāṃ gatiṃ yānti tathānupūrvyā
c jīvāḥ pare tadbalaveṣarūpā
vidhiṃ svakaṃ yānti viparyayeṇa
a sa yāvad evāsti saśeṣabhukte
prajāś ca devyau ca tathaiva śukle
c tāvat tadā teṣu viśuddhabhāvaḥ
saṃyamya pañcendriyarūpam etat
a śuddhāṃ gatiṃ tāṃ paramāṃ paraiti
śuddhena nityaṃ manasā vicinvan
c tato 'vyayaṃ sthānam upaiti brahma
duṣprāpam abhyeti sa śāśvataṃ vai
e ity etad ākhyātam ahīnasattva
nārāyaṇasyeha balaṃ mayā te
 vṛtra uvāca
 evaṃ sa devo bhagavān uvāca
 sanatkumāro madhurābhibhāṣī
a evaṃ gate me na viṣādo 'sti kaś cit
samyak ca paśyāmi vacas tavaitat
c śrutvā ca te vācam adīnasattva
vikalmaṣo 'smy adya tathā vipāpmā
a pravṛttam etad bhagavan maharṣe
mahādyuteś cakram anantavīryam
c viṣṇor anantasya sanātanaṃ tat
sthānaṃ sargā yatra sarve pravṛttāḥ
e sa vai mahātmā puruṣottamo vai
tasmiñ jagat sarvam idaṃ pratiṣṭhitam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktvā sa kaunteya vṛtraḥ prāṇān avāsṛjat
c yojayitvā tathātmānaṃ paraṃ sthānam avāptavān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ayaṃ sa bhagavān devaḥ pitāmaha janārdanaḥ
c sanatkumāro vṛtrāya yat tad ākhyātavān purā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a mūlasthāyī sa bhagavān svenānantena tejasā
c tatsthaḥ sṛjati tān bhāvān nānārūpān mahātapāḥ
a turīyārdhena tasyemaṃ viddhi keśavam acyutam
b turīyārdhena brahmāṇaṃ tasya viddhi mahātmanaḥ
c turīyārdhena lokāṃs trīn bhāvayaty eṣa buddhimān
a arvāk sthitas tu yaḥ sthāyī kalpānte parivartate
c sa śete bhagavān apsu yo 'sāv atibalaḥ prabhuḥ
e tān vidhātā prasannātmā lokāṃś carati śāśvatān
a sarvāṇy aśūnyāni karoty anantaḥ
sanatkumāraḥ saṃcarate ca lokān
c sa cāniruddhaḥ sṛjate mahātmā
tatsthaṃ jagat sarvam idaṃ vicitram
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a vṛtreṇa paramārthajña dṛṣṭā manye ''tmano gatiḥ
c śubhā tasmāt sa sukhito na śocati pitāmaha
a śuklaḥ śuklābhijātīyaḥ sādhyo nāvartate 'nagha
c tiryaggateś ca nirmukto nirayāc ca pitāmaha
a hāridravarṇe rakte vā vartamānas tu pārthiva
c tiryag evānupaśyeta karmabhis tāmasair vṛtaḥ
a vayaṃ tu bhṛśam āpannā raktāḥ kaṣṭamukhe 'sukhe
c kāṃ gatiṃ pratipatsyāmo nīlāṃ kṛṣṇādhamām atha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śuddhābhijanasaṃpannāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ
c vihṛtya devalokeṣu punar mānuṣyam eṣyatha
a prajāvisargaṃ ca sukhena kāle
pratyetya deveṣu sukhāni bhuktvā
c sukhena saṃyāsyatha siddhasaṃkhyāṃ
mā vo bhayaṃ bhūd vimalāḥ stha sarve
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a aho dharmiṣṭhatā tāta vṛtrasyāmitatejasaḥ
c yasya vijñānam atulaṃ viṣṇor bhaktiś ca tādṛśī
a durvijñeyam idaṃ tāta viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ
c kathaṃ vā rājaśārdūla padaṃ taj jñātavān asau
a bhavatā kathitaṃ hy etac chraddadhe cāham acyuta
c bhūyas tu me samutpannā buddhir avyaktadarśanāt
a kathaṃ vinihato vṛtraḥ śakreṇa bharatarṣabha
c dharmiṣṭho viṣṇubhaktaś ca tattvajñaś ca padānvaye
a etan me saṃśayaṃ brūhi pṛcchato bharatarṣabha
c vṛtras tu rājaśārdūla yathā śakreṇa nirjitaḥ
a yathā caivābhavad yuddhaṃ tac cācakṣva pitāmaha
c vistareṇa mahābāho paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a rathenendraḥ prayāto vai sārdhaṃ suragaṇaiḥ purā
c dadarśāthāgrato vṛtraṃ viṣṭhitaṃ parvatopamam
a yojanānāṃ śatāny ūrdhvaṃ pañcocchritam ariṃdama
c śatāni vistareṇātha trīṇy evābhyadhikāni tu
a tat prekṣya tādṛśaṃ rūpaṃ trailokyenāpi durjayam
c vṛtrasya devāḥ saṃtrastā na śāntim upalebhire
a śakrasya tu tadā rājann ūrustambho vyajāyata
c bhayād vṛtrasya sahasā dṛṣṭvā tad rūpam uttamam
a tato nādaḥ samabhavad vāditrāṇāṃ ca nisvanaḥ
c devāsurāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ tasmin yuddha upasthite
a atha vṛtrasya kauravya dṛṣṭvā śakram upasthitam
c na saṃbhramo na bhīḥ kā cid āsthā vā samajāyata
a tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ trailokyasya bhayaṃkaram
c śakrasya ca surendrasya vṛtrasya ca mahātmanaḥ
a asibhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlaiḥ śaktitomaramudgaraiḥ
c śilābhir vividhābhiś ca kārmukaiś ca mahāsvanaiḥ
a astraiś ca vividhair divyaiḥ pāvakolkābhir eva ca
c devāsurais tataḥ sainyaiḥ sarvam āsīt samākulam
a pitāmahapurogāś ca sarve devagaṇās tathā
c ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgās tad yuddhaṃ draṣṭum āgaman
a vimānāgryair mahārāja siddhāś ca bharatarṣabha
c gandharvāś ca vimānāgryair apsarobhiḥ samāgaman
a tato 'ntarikṣam āvṛtya vṛtro dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c aśmavarṣeṇa devendraṃ parvatāt samavākirat
a tato devagaṇāḥ kruddhāḥ sarvataḥ śastravṛṣṭibhiḥ
c aśmavarṣam apohanta vṛtrapreritam āhave
a vṛtraś ca kuruśārdūla mahāmāyo mahābalaḥ
c mohayām āsa devendraṃ māyāyuddhena sarvataḥ
a tasya vṛtrārditasyātha moha āsīc chatakratoḥ
c rathaṃtareṇa taṃ tatra vasiṣṭhaḥ samabodhayat
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a devaśreṣṭho 'si devendra surārivinibarhaṇa
c trailokyabalasaṃyuktaḥ kasmāc chakra viṣīdasi
a eṣa brahmā ca viṣṇuś ca śivaś caiva jagatprabhuḥ
c somaś ca bhagavān devaḥ sarve ca paramarṣayaḥ
d samudvignaṃ samīkṣya tvāṃ svastīty ūcur jayāya te
a mā kārṣīḥ kaśmalaṃ śakra kaś cid evetaro yathā
c āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā jahi śatruṃ sureśvara
a eṣa lokagurus tryakṣaḥ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ
c nirīkṣate tvāṃ bhagavāṃs tyaja mohaṃ sureśvara
a ete brahmarṣayaś caiva bṛhaspatipurogamāḥ
c stavena śakra divyena stuvanti tvāṃ jayāya vai
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evaṃ saṃbodhyamānasya vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
c atīva vāsavasyāsīd balam uttamatejasaḥ
a tato buddhim upāgamya bhagavān pākaśāsanaḥ
c yogena mahatā yuktas tāṃ māyāṃ vyapakarṣata
a tato 'ṅgiraḥsutaḥ śrīmāṃs te caiva paramarṣayaḥ
c dṛṣṭvā vṛtrasya vikrāntam upagamya maheśvaram
e ūcur vṛtravināśārthaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
a tato bhagavatas tejo jvaro bhūtvā jagatpateḥ
c samāviśan mahāraudraṃ vṛtraṃ daityavaraṃ tadā
a viṣṇuś ca bhagavān devaḥ sarvalokābhipūjitaḥ
c aindraṃ samāviśad vajraṃ lokasaṃrakṣaṇe rataḥ
a tato bṛhaspatir dhīmān upāgamya śatakratum
c vasiṣṭhaś ca mahātejāḥ sarve ca paramarṣayaḥ
a te samāsādya varadaṃ vāsavaṃ lokapūjitam
c ūcur ekāgramanaso jahi vṛtram iti prabho
 maheśvara uvāca
a eṣa vṛtro mahāñ śakra balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
c viśvātmā sarvagaś caiva bahumāyaś ca viśrutaḥ
a tad enam asuraśreṣṭhaṃ trailokyenāpi durjayam
c jahi tvaṃ yogam āsthāya māvamaṃsthāḥ sureśvara
a anena hi tapas taptaṃ balārtham amarādhipa
c ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi brahmā cāsmai varaṃ dadau
a mahattvaṃ yogināṃ caiva mahāmāyatvam eva ca
c mahābalatvaṃ ca tathā tejaś cāgryaṃ sureśvara
a etad vai māmakaṃ tejaḥ samāviśati vāsava
c vṛtram enaṃ tvam apy evaṃ jahi vajreṇa dānavam
 śakra uvāca
a bhagavaṃs tvatprasādena ditijaṃ sudurāsadam
c vajreṇa nihaniṣyāmi paśyatas te surarṣabha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a āviśyamāne daitye tu jvareṇātha mahāsure
c devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca harṣān nādo mahān abhūt
a tato dundubhayaś caiva śaṅkhāś ca sumahāsvanāḥ
c murajā ḍiṇḍimāś caiva prāvādyanta sahasraśaḥ
a asurāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ smṛtilopo 'bhavan mahān
c prajñānāśaś ca balavān kṣaṇena samapadyata
a tam āviṣṭam atho jñātvā ṛṣayo devatās tathā
c stuvantaḥ śakram īśānaṃ tathā prācodayann api
a rathasthasya hi śakrasya yuddhakāle mahātmanaḥ
c ṛṣibhiḥ stūyamānasya rūpam āsīt sudurdṛśam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vṛtrasya tu mahārāja jvarāviṣṭasya sarvaśaḥ
c abhavan yāni liṅgāni śarīre tāni me śṛṇu
a jvalitāsyo 'bhavad ghoro vaivarṇyaṃ cāgamat param
c gātrakampaś ca sumahāñ śvāsaś cāpy abhavan mahān
e romaharṣaś ca tīvro 'bhūn niḥśvāsaś ca mahān nṛpa
a śivā cāśivasaṃkāśā tasya vaktrāt sudāruṇā
c niṣpapāta mahāghorā smṛtiḥ sā tasya bhārata
e ulkāś ca jvalitās tasya dīptāḥ pārśve prapedire
a gṛdhrakaṅkavaḍāś caiva vāco 'muñcan sudāruṇāḥ
c vṛtrasyopari saṃhṛṣṭāś cakravat paribabhramuḥ
a tatas taṃ ratham āsthāya devāpyāyitam āhave
c vajrodyatakaraḥ śakras taṃ daityaṃ pratyavaikṣata
a amānuṣam atho nādaṃ sa mumoca mahāsuraḥ
c vyajṛmbhata ca rājendra tīvrajvarasamanvitaḥ
e athāsya jṛmbhataḥ śakras tato vajram avāsṛjat
a sa vajraḥ sumahātejāḥ kālāgnisadṛśopamaḥ
c kṣipram eva mahākāyaṃ vṛtraṃ daityam apātayat
a tato nādaḥ samabhavat punar eva samantataḥ
c vṛtraṃ vinihataṃ dṛṣṭvā devānāṃ bharatarṣabha
a vṛtraṃ tu hatvā bhagavān dānavārir mahāyaśāḥ
c vajreṇa viṣṇuyuktena divam eva samāviśat
a atha vṛtrasya kauravya śarīrād abhiniḥsṛtā
c brahmahatyā mahāghorā raudrā lokabhayāvahā
a karāladaśanā bhīmā vikṛtā kṛṣṇapiṅgalā
c prakīrṇamūrdhajā caiva ghoranetrā ca bhārata
a kapālamālinī caiva kṛśā ca bharatarṣabha
c rudhirārdrā ca dharmajña cīravastranivāsinī
a sābhiniṣkramya rājendra tādṛgrūpā bhayāvahā
c vajriṇaṃ mṛgayām āsa tadā bharatasattama
a kasya cit tv atha kālasya vṛtrahā kurunandana
c svargāyābhimukhaḥ prāyāl lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
a bisān niḥsaramāṇaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā śakraṃ mahaujasam
c kaṇṭhe jagrāha devendraṃ sulagnā cābhavat tadā
a sa hi tasmin samutpanne brahmahatyākṛte bhaye
c nalinyāṃ bisamadhyastho babhūvābdagaṇān bahūn
a anusṛtya tu yatnāt sa tayā vai brahmahatyayā
c tadā gṛhītaḥ kauravya niśceṣṭaḥ samapadyata
a tasyā vyapohane śakraḥ paraṃ yatnaṃ cakāra ha
c na cāśakat tāṃ devendro brahmahatyāṃ vyapohitum
a gṛhīta eva tu tayā devendro bharatarṣabha
c pitāmaham upāgamya śirasā pratyapūjayat
a jñātvā gṛhītaṃ śakraṃ tu dvijapravarahatyayā
c brahmā saṃcintayām āsa tadā bharatasattama
a tām uvāca mahābāho brahmahatyāṃ pitāmahaḥ
c svareṇa madhureṇātha sāntvayann iva bhārata
a mucyatāṃ tridaśendro 'yaṃ matpriyaṃ kuru bhāmini
c brūhi kiṃ te karomy adya kāmaṃ kaṃ tvam ihecchasi
 brahmahatyovāca
a trilokapūjite deve prīte trailokyakartari

a tvayā kṛteyaṃ maryādā lokasaṃrakṣaṇārthinā
c sthāpanā vai sumahatī tvayā deva pravartitā
a prīte tu tvayi dharmajña sarvalokeśvare prabho
c śakrād apagamiṣyāmi nivāsaṃ tu vidhatsva me
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tatheti tāṃ prāha tadā brahmahatyāṃ pitāmahaḥ
c upāyataḥ sa śakrasya brahmahatyāṃ vyapohata
a tataḥ svayaṃbhuvā dhyātas tatra vahnir mahātmanā

 brahmovāca
a bahudhā vibhajiṣyāmi brahmahatyām imām aham

 agnir uvāca
a mama mokṣasya ko 'nto vai brahman dhyāyasva vai prabho

 brahmovāca
a yas tvāṃ jvalantam āsādya svayaṃ vai mānavaḥ kva cit
c bījauṣadhirasair vahne na yakṣyati tamovṛtaḥ
a tam eṣā yāsyati kṣipraṃ tatraiva ca nivatsyati
c brahmahatyā havyavāha vyetu te mānaso jvaraḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity uktaḥ pratijagrāha tad vaco havyakavyabhuk
c pitāmahasya bhagavāṃs tathā ca tad abhūt prabho
a tato vṛkṣauṣadhitṛṇaṃ samāhūya pitāmahaḥ
c imam arthaṃ mahārāja vaktuṃ samupacakrame
d iyaṃ vṛtrād anuprāptā brahmahatyā mahābhayā
d puruhūtaṃ caturthāṃśam asyā yūyaṃ pratīcchata
