 brahmovāca
a parvakāle tu saṃprāpte yo vai chedanabhedanam
c kariṣyati naro mohāt tam eṣānugamiṣyati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato vṛkṣauṣadhitṛṇam evam uktaṃ mahātmanā
c brahmāṇam abhisaṃpūjya jagāmāśu yathāgatam
a āhūyāpsaraso devas tato lokapitāmahaḥ
c vācā madhurayā prāha sāntvayann iva bhārata
a iyam indrād anuprāptā brahmahatyā varāṅganāḥ
c caturtham asyā bhāgaṃ hi mayoktāḥ saṃpratīcchata
 apsarasa ūcuḥ
a grahaṇe kṛtabuddhīnāṃ deveśa tava śāsanāt
c mokṣaṃ samayato 'smākaṃ cintayasva pitāmaha
 brahmovāca
a rajasvalāsu nārīṣu yo vai maithunam ācaret
c tam eṣā yāsyati kṣipraṃ vyetu vo mānaso jvaraḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tatheti hṛṣṭamanasa uktvāthāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
c svāni sthānāni saṃprāpya remire bharatarṣabha
a tatas trilokakṛd devaḥ punar eva mahātapāḥ
c apaḥ saṃcintayām āsa dhyātās tāś cāpy athāgaman
a tās tu sarvāḥ samāgamya brahmāṇam amitaujasam
c idam ūcur vaco rājan praṇipatya pitāmaham
a imāḥ sma deva saṃprāptās tvatsakāśam ariṃdama
c śāsanāt tava deveśa samājñāpaya no vibho
 brahmovāca
a iyaṃ vṛtrād anuprāptā puruhūtaṃ mahābhayā
c brahmahatyā caturthāṃśam asyā yūyaṃ pratīcchata
 āpa ūcuḥ
a evaṃ bhavatu lokeśa yathā vadasi naḥ prabho
c mokṣaṃ samayato 'smākaṃ saṃcintayitum arhasi
a tvaṃ hi deveśa sarvasya jagataḥ paramo guruḥ
c ko 'nyaḥ prasādo hi bhaved yaḥ kṛcchrān naḥ samuddharet
 brahmovāca
a alpā iti matiṃ kṛtvā yo naro buddhimohitaḥ
c śleṣmamūtrapurīṣāṇi yuṣmāsu pratimokṣyati
a tam eṣā yāsyati kṣipraṃ tatraiva ca nivatsyati
c tathā vo bhavitā mokṣa iti satyaṃ bravīmi vaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato vimucya devendraṃ brahmahatyā yudhiṣṭhira
c yathānisṛṣṭaṃ taṃ deśam agacchad devaśāsanāt
a evaṃ śakreṇa saṃprāptā brahmahatyā janādhipa
c pitāmaham anujñāpya so 'śvamedham akalpayat
a śrūyate hi mahārāja saṃprāptā vāsavena vai
c brahmahatyā tataḥ śuddhiṃ hayamedhena labdhavān
a samavāpya śriyaṃ devo hatvārīṃś ca sahasraśaḥ
c praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe vāsavaḥ pṛthivīpate
a vṛtrasya rudhirāc caiva khukhuṇḍāḥ pārtha jajñire
c dvijātibhir abhakṣyās te dīkṣitaiś ca tapodhanaiḥ
a sarvāvasthaṃ tvam apy eṣāṃ dvijātīnāṃ priyaṃ kuru
c ime hi bhūtale devāḥ prathitāḥ kurunandana
a evaṃ śakreṇa kauravya buddhisaukṣmyān mahāsuraḥ
c upāyapūrvaṃ nihato vṛtro 'thāmitatejasā
a evaṃ tvam api kauravya pṛthivyām aparājitaḥ
c bhaviṣyasi yathā devaḥ śatakratur amitrahā
a ye tu śakrakathāṃ divyām imāṃ parvasu parvasu
c vipramadhye paṭhiṣyanti na te prāpsyanti kilbiṣam
a ity etad vṛtram āśritya śakrasyātyadbhutaṃ mahat
c kathitaṃ karma te tāta kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a pitāmaha mahāprājña sarvaśāstraviśārada
c asti vṛtravadhād eva vivakṣā mama jāyate
a jvareṇa mohito vṛtraḥ kathitas te janādhipa
c nihato vāsaveneha vajreṇeti mamānagha
a katham eṣa mahāprājña jvaraḥ prādurabhūt kutaḥ
c jvarotpattiṃ nipuṇataḥ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇu rājañ jvarasyeha saṃbhavaṃ lokaviśrutam
c vistaraṃ cāsya vakṣyāmi yādṛśaṃ caiva bhārata
a purā meror mahārāja śṛṅgaṃ trailokyaviśrutam
c jyotiṣkaṃ nāma sāvitraṃ sarvaratnavibhūṣitam
e aprameyam anādhṛṣyaṃ sarvalokeṣu bhārata
f khyātam āsīt svatejobhir āvāryārkaprabhaṃ sthitam
a tatra devo giritaṭe hemadhātuvibhūṣite
c paryaṅka iva vibhrājann upaviṣṭo babhūva ha
a śailarājasutā cāsya nityaṃ pārśve sthitā babhau
c tathā devā mahātmāno vasavaś ca mahaujasaḥ
a tathaiva ca mahātmānāv aśvinau bhiṣajāṃ varau
c tathā vaiśravaṇo rājā guhyakair abhisaṃvṛtaḥ
a yakṣāṇām adhipaḥ śrīmān kailāsanilayaḥ prabhuḥ
b śaṅkhapadmanidhī cobhau ṛddhyā paramayā saha
b upāsanta mahātmānam uśanā ca mahākaviḥ
b sanatkumārapramukhās tathaiva ca maharṣayaḥ
c aṅgiraḥpramukhāś caiva tathā devarṣayo 'pare
a viśvāvasuś ca gandharvas tathā nāradaparvatau
c apsarogaṇasaṃghāś ca samājagmur anekaśaḥ
a vavau śivaḥ sukho vāyur nānāgandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
c sarvartukusumopetāḥ puṣpavanto mahādrumāḥ
a tathā vidyādharāś caiva siddhāś caiva tapodhanāḥ
c mahādevaṃ paśupatiṃ paryupāsanta bhārata
a bhūtāni ca mahārāja nānārūpadharāṇy atha
c rākṣasāś ca mahāraudrāḥ piśācāś ca mahābalāḥ
a bahurūpadharā hṛṣṭā nānāpraharaṇodyatāḥ
c devasyānucarās tatra tasthire cānalopamāḥ
a nandī ca bhagavāṃs tatra devasyānumate sthitaḥ
c pragṛhya jvalitaṃ śūlaṃ dīpyamānaṃ svatejasā
a gaṅgā ca saritāṃ śreṣṭhā sarvatīrthajalodbhavā
c paryupāsata taṃ devaṃ rūpiṇī kurunandana
a evaṃ sa bhagavāṃs tatra pūjyamānaḥ surarṣibhiḥ
c devaiś ca sumahābhāgair mahādevo vyatiṣṭhata
a kasya cit tv atha kālasya dakṣo nāma prajāpatiḥ
c pūrvoktena vidhānena yakṣyamāṇo 'nvapadyata
a tatas tasya makhaṃ devāḥ sarve śakrapurogamāḥ
c gamanāya samāgamya buddhim āpedire tadā
a te vimānair mahātmāno jvalitair jvalanaprabhāḥ
c devasyānumate 'gacchan gaṅgādvāram iti śrutiḥ
a prasthitā devatā dṛṣṭvā śailarājasutā tadā
c uvāca vacanaṃ sādhvī devaṃ paśupatiṃ patim
a bhagavan kva nu yānty ete devāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ
c brūhi tattvena tattvajña saṃśayo me mahān ayam
 maheśvara uvāca
a dakṣo nāma mahābhāge prajānāṃ patir uttamaḥ
c hayamedhena yajate tatra yānti divaukasaḥ
 umā uvāca
a yajñam etaṃ mahābhāga kimarthaṃ nābhigacchasi
c kena vā pratiṣedhena gamanaṃ te na vidyate
 maheśvara uvāca
a surair eva mahābhāge sarvam etad anuṣṭhitam
c yajñeṣu sarveṣu mama na bhāga upakalpitaḥ
a pūrvopāyopapannena mārgeṇa varavarṇini
c na me surāḥ prayacchanti bhāgaṃ yajñasya dharmataḥ
 umā uvāca
a bhagavan sarvabhūteṣu prabhavābhyadhiko guṇaiḥ
c ajeyaś cāpradhṛṣyaś ca tejasā yaśasā śriyā
a anena te mahābhāga pratiṣedhena bhāgataḥ
c atīva duḥkham utpannaṃ vepathuś ca mamānagha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktvā tu sā devī devaṃ paśupatiṃ patim
c tūṣṇīṃbhūtābhavad rājan dahyamānena cetasā
a atha devyā mataṃ jñātvā hṛdgataṃ yac cikīrṣitam
c sa samājñāpayām āsa tiṣṭha tvam iti nandinam
a tato yogabalaṃ kṛtvā sarvayogeśvareśvaraḥ
c taṃ yajñaṃ sumahātejā bhīmair anucarais tadā
e sahasā ghātayām āsa devadevaḥ pinākadhṛk
a ke cin nādān amuñcanta ke cid dhāsāṃś ca cakrire
c rudhireṇāpare rājaṃs tatrāgniṃ samavākiran
a ke cid yūpān samutpāṭya babhramur vikṛtānanāḥ
c āsyair anye cāgrasanta tathaiva paricārakān
a tataḥ sa yajño nṛpate vadhyamānaḥ samantataḥ
c āsthāya mṛgarūpaṃ vai kham evābhyapatat tadā
a taṃ tu yajñaṃ tathārūpaṃ gacchantam upalabhya saḥ
c dhanur ādāya bāṇaṃ ca tadānvasarata prabhuḥ
a tatas tasya sureśasya krodhād amitatejasaḥ
c lalāṭāt prasṛto ghoraḥ svedabindur babhūva ha
a tasmin patitamātre tu svedabindau tathā bhuvi
c prādurbabhūva sumahān agniḥ kālānalopamaḥ
a tatra cājāyata tadā puruṣaḥ puruṣarṣabha
c hrasvo 'timātraraktākṣo hariśmaśrur vibhīṣaṇaḥ
a ūrdhvakeśo 'tilomāṅgaḥ śyenolūkas tathaiva ca
c karālaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇaś ca raktavāsās tathaiva ca
a taṃ yajñaṃ sa mahāsattvo 'dahat kakṣam ivānalaḥ
b vyacarat sarvato devān prādravat sa ṛṣīṃs tathā
c devāś cāpy adravan sarve tato bhītā diśo daśa
a tena tasmin vicaratā puruṣeṇa viśāṃ pate
c pṛthivī vyacalad rājann atīva bharatarṣabha
a hāhābhūte pravṛtte tu nāde lokabhayaṃkare
b hāhābhūtaṃ jagat sarvam upalakṣya tadā prabhuḥ
c pitāmaho mahādevaṃ darśayan pratyabhāṣata
a bhavato 'pi surāḥ sarve bhāgaṃ dāsyanti vai prabho
c kriyatāṃ pratisaṃhāraḥ sarvadeveśvara tvayā
a imā hi devatāḥ sarvā ṛṣayaś ca paraṃtapa
c tava krodhān mahādeva na śāntim upalebhire
a yaś caiṣa puruṣo jātaḥ svedāt te vibudhottama
c jvaro nāmaiṣa dharmajña lokeṣu pracariṣyati
a ekībhūtasya na hy asya dhāraṇe tejasaḥ prabho
c samarthā sakalā pṛthvī bahudhā sṛjyatām ayam
a ity ukto brahmaṇā devo bhāge cāpi prakalpite
c bhagavantaṃ tathety āha brahmāṇam amitaujasam
a parāṃ ca prītim agamad utsmayaṃś ca pinākadhṛk
c avāpa ca tadā bhāgaṃ yathoktaṃ brahmaṇā bhavaḥ
a jvaraṃ ca sarvadharmajño bahudhā vyasṛjat tadā
c śāntyarthaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ śṛṇu tac cāpi putraka
a śīrṣābhitāpo nāgānāṃ parvatānāṃ śilājatuḥ
c apāṃ tu nīlikāṃ vidyān nirmokaṃ bhujageṣu ca
a khorakaḥ saurabheyāṇām ūṣaraṃ pṛthivītale
c paśūnām api dharmajña dṛṣṭipratyavarodhanam
a randhrāgatam athāśvānāṃ śikhodbhedaś ca barhiṇām
c netrarogaḥ kokilānāṃ jvaraḥ prokto mahātmanā
a abjānāṃ pittabhedaś ca sarveṣām iti naḥ śrutam
c śukānām api sarveṣāṃ hikkikā procyate jvaraḥ
a śārdūleṣv atha dharmajña śramo jvara ihocyate
c mānuṣeṣu tu dharmajña jvaro nāmaiṣa viśrutaḥ
e maraṇe janmani tathā madhye cāviśate naram
a etan māheśvaraṃ tejo jvaro nāma sudāruṇaḥ
c namasyaś caiva mānyaś ca sarvaprāṇibhir īśvaraḥ
a anena hi samāviṣṭo vṛtro dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
c vyajṛmbhata tataḥ śakras tasmai vajram avāsṛjat
a praviśya vajro vṛtraṃ tu dārayām āsa bhārata
c dāritaś ca sa vajreṇa mahāyogī mahāsuraḥ
e jagāma paramaṃ sthānaṃ viṣṇor amitatejasaḥ
a viṣṇubhaktyā hi tenedaṃ jagad vyāptam abhūt purā
c tasmāc ca nihato yuddhe viṣṇoḥ sthānam avāptavān
a ity eṣa vṛtram āśritya jvarasya mahato mayā
c vistaraḥ kathitaḥ putra kim anyat prabravīmi te
a imāṃ jvarotpattim adīnamānasaḥ
paṭhet sadā yaḥ susamāhito naraḥ
c vimuktarogaḥ sa sukhī mudā yuto
labheta kāmān sa yathāmanīṣitān
d janamejaya uvāca
d prācetasasya dakṣasya kathaṃ vaivasvate 'ntare
d vināśam agamad brahman hayamedhaḥ prajāpateḥ
d devyā manyukṛtaṃ matvā kruddhaḥ sarvātmakaḥ prabhuḥ
d prasādāt tasya dakṣeṇa sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitaḥ katham
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d etad veditum icchāmi tan me brūhi yathātatham
d purā himavataḥ pṛṣṭhe dakṣo vai yajñam āharat
d gaṅgādvāre śubhe deśe ṛṣisiddhaniṣevite
d gandharvāpsarasākīrṇe nānādrumalatāvṛte
d ṛṣisaṃghaiḥ parivṛtaṃ dakṣaṃ yajñabhṛtāṃ varam
d pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca ye ca svarlokavāsinaḥ
d sarve prāñjalayo bhūtvā upatasthuḥ prajāpatim
d devadānavagandharvāḥ piśācoragarākṣasāḥ
d hāhā hūhūś ca gandharvau tumburur nāradas tathā
d viśvāvasur viśvaseno gandharvāpsarasas tathā
d ādityā vasavo rudrāḥ sādhyāḥ saha marudgaṇaiḥ
d indreṇa sahitāḥ sarve āgatā yajñabhāginaḥ
d ūṣmapāḥ somapāś caiva dhūmapā ājyapās tathā
d ṛṣayaḥ pitaraś caiva āgatā brahmaṇā saha
d ete cānye ca bahavo bhūtagrāmaś caturvidhaḥ
d jarāyujāṇḍajāś caiva svedajodbhidajās tathā
d āhūtā mantritāḥ sarve devāś ca saha patnibhiḥ
d virājante vimānasthā dīpyamānā ivāgnayaḥ
d tān dṛṣṭvā manyunāviṣṭo dadhīcir vākyam abravīt
d nāyaṃ yajño na vā dharmo yatra rudro na ijyate
d vadhabandhaṃ prapannā vai kiṃ nu kālasya paryayaḥ
d kiṃ nu mohān na paśyanti vināśaṃ paryupasthitam
d upasthitaṃ bhayaṃ ghoraṃ na budhyanti mahādhvare
d ity uktvā sa mahāyogī paśyati dhyānacakṣuṣā
d sa paśyati mahādevaṃ devīṃ ca varadāṃ śubhām
d nāradaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā devyāḥ samīpataḥ
d saṃtoṣaṃ paramaṃ lebhe iti niścitya yogavit
d ekamantrās tu te sarve yeneśo na nimantritaḥ
d tasmād deśād apakramya dadhīcir vākyam abravīt
d apūjyapūjane caiva pūjyānāṃ cāpy apūjane
d tripātakasamaṃ pāpaṃ śaśvat prāpnoti mānavaḥ
d anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me na ca vakṣye kadā cana
d devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca madhye satyaṃ bravīmy aham
d āgataṃ paśubhartāraṃ sraṣṭāraṃ jagataḥ patim
d dakṣa uvāca
d adhvare hy aprabhoktāraṃ sarveṣāṃ paśyata prabhum
d santi no bahavo rudrāḥ śūlahastāḥ kapardinaḥ
d dadhīcir uvāca
d ekādaśasthānagatā nāhaṃ vedmi maheśvaram
d sarveṣām ekamantro 'yaṃ yeneśo na nimantritaḥ
d yathāhaṃ śaṃkarād ūrdhvaṃ nānyaṃ paśyāmi daivatam
d dakṣa uvāca
d tathā dakṣasya vipulo yajño 'yaṃ na bhaviṣyati
d etan makheśāya suvarṇapātre
d haviḥ samastaṃ vidhimantrapūtam
d viṣṇor nayāmy apratimasya bhāgaṃ
d devy uvāca
d prabhur vibhuś cāhavanīya eṣaḥ
d kiṃ nāma dānaṃ niyamaṃ tapo vā
d kuryām ahaṃ yena patir mamādya
d labheta bhāgaṃ bhagavān acintyo
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d bhāgasya cārdham atha vā tṛtīyam
d evaṃ bruvāṇāṃ bhagavān svapatnīṃ
d prahṛṣṭarūpaḥ kṣubhitām uvāca
d na vetsi māṃ devi kṛśodarāṅgi
d kiṃ nāma yuktaṃ mayi yan makheśe
d ahaṃ hi jānāmi viśālanetre
d dhyānena hīnā na vidanty asantaḥ
d tavādya mohena ca sendradevā
d lokās trayaḥ sarvata eva mūḍhāḥ
d mām adhvare śaṃsitāraḥ stuvanti
d rathaṃtaraṃ sāmagāś copagānti
d māṃ brāhmaṇā brahmasatre yajante
d devy uvāca
d mamādhvaryavaḥ kalpayante ca bhāgam
d suprākṛto 'pi bhagavan sarvaḥ strījanasaṃsadi
d bhagavān uvāca
d stauti garvāyate cāpi svam ātmānaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d nātmānaṃ staumi deveśi paśya me tanumadhyame
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d yaṃ srakṣyāmi varārohe tavārthe varavarṇini
d ity uktvā bhagavān patnīm umāṃ prāṇair api priyām
d so 'sṛjad bhagavān vaktrād bhūtaṃ ghoraṃ praharṣaṇam
d tam uvācākṣipa makhaṃ dakṣasyeti maheśvaraḥ
d tasmād vaktrād vimuktena siṃhenaikena līlayā
d devyā manyuvyapohārthaṃ hato dakṣasya vai kratuḥ
d manyunā ca mahābhīmā mahākālī maheśvarī
d ātmanaḥ karmasākṣitve tena sārdhaṃ sahānugā
d devasyānumataṃ matvā praṇamya śirasā tataḥ
d ātmanaḥ sadṛśaḥ śauryād balarūpasamanvitaḥ
d sa eva bhagavān krodhaḥ pratirūpasamanvitaḥ
d anantabalavīryaś ca anantabalapauruṣaḥ
d vīrabhadra iti khyāto devyā manyupramārjakaḥ
d so 'sṛjad romakūpebhyo raumyān nāma gaṇeśvarān
d rudrānugā gaṇā raudrā rudravīryaparākramāḥ
d te nipetus tatas tūrṇaṃ dakṣayajñavihiṃsayā
d bhīmarūpā mahākāyāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
d tataḥ kilakilāśabdair ākāśaṃ pūrayann iva
d tena śabdena mahatā trastās tatra divaukasaḥ
d parvatāś ca vyaśīryanta cakampe ca vasuṃdharā
d mārutāś caiva ghūrṇante cukṣubhe varuṇālayaḥ
d agnayo naiva dīpyante naiva dīpyati bhāskaraḥ
d grahā naiva prakāśante nakṣatrāṇi na candramāḥ
d ṛṣayo na prakāśante na devā na ca mānuṣāḥ
d evaṃ tu timirībhūte nirdahanty avamānitāḥ
d praharanty apare ghorā yūpān utpāṭayanti ca
d pramardanti tathā cānye vimardanti tathā pare
d ādhāvanti pradhāvanti vāyuvegā manojavāḥ
d cūrṇyante yajñapātrāṇi divyāny ābharaṇāni ca
d viśīryamāṇā dṛśyante tārā iva nabhastalāt
d divyānnapānabhakṣyāṇāṃ rāśayaḥ parvatopamāḥ
d kṣīranadyo 'tha dṛśyante ghṛtapāyasakardamāḥ
d dadhimaṇḍodakā divyāḥ khaṇḍaśarkaravālukāḥ
d ṣaḍrasā nivahanty etā guḍakulyā manoramāḥ
d uccāvacāni māṃsāni bhakṣyāṇi vividhāni ca
d pānakāni ca divyāni lehyacoṣyāṇi yāni ca
d bhuñjate vividhair vaktrair vilumpanty ākṣipanti ca
d rudrakopān mahākāyāḥ kālāgnisadṛśopamāḥ
d kṣobhayan surasainyāni bhīṣayantaḥ samantataḥ
d krīḍanti vikṛtākāraiś cikṣipuḥ surayoṣitaḥ
d rudrakrodhāt prayatnena sarvadevaiḥ surakṣitam
d taṃ yajñam adahac chīghraṃ bhadrakālī samantataḥ
d cakāra bhairavaṃ nādaṃ sarvabhūtabhayaṃkaram
d chittvā śiro vai yajñasya nanāda ca mumoda ca
d tato brahmādayo devā dakṣaś caiva prajāpatiḥ
d vīrabhadra uvāca
d ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve kathyatāṃ ko bhavān iti
d nāhaṃ rudro na vā devī naiva bhoktum ihāgataḥ
d devyā manyukṛtaṃ matvā kruddhaḥ sarvātmakaḥ prabhuḥ
d draṣṭuṃ vā naiva viprendrān naiva kautūhalena ca
d tava yajñavināśārthaṃ saṃprāptaṃ viddhi mām iha
d vīrabhadra iti khyāto rudrakopād viniḥsṛtaḥ
d bhadrakālīti vijñeyā devyāḥ kopād viniḥsṛtā
d preṣitau devadevena yajñāntikam ihāgatau
d śaraṇaṃ gaccha viprendra devadevam umāpatim
d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d varaṃ krodho 'pi devasya varadānaṃ na cānyataḥ
d vīrabhadravacaḥ śrutvā dakṣo dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
d toṣayām āsa stotreṇa praṇipatya maheśvaram
d prapadye devam īśānaṃ śāśvataṃ dhruvam avyayam
d mahādevaṃ mahātmānaṃ viśvasya jagataḥ patim
d dakṣaprajāpater yajñe dravyais tu susamāhitaiḥ
d āhūtā devatāḥ sarvā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
d devo nāhūyate tatra viśvakarmā maheśvaraḥ
d tatra kruddhā mahādevī gaṇāṃs tatra vyasarjayat
d pradīpte yajñavāṭe tu vidruteṣu dvijātiṣu
d tārāgaṇam anuprāpte raudre dīpte mahātmani
d śūlanirbhinnahṛdayaiḥ kūjadbhiḥ paricārakaiḥ
d nikhātotpāṭitair yūpair apaviddhair itas tataḥ
d utpatadbhiḥ patadbhiś ca gṛdhrair āmiṣagṛddhibhiḥ
d pakṣavātavinirdhūtaiḥ śivāśatanināditaiḥ
d yakṣagandharvasaṃghaiś ca piśācoragarākṣasaiḥ
d prāṇāpānau saṃnirudhya vaktrasthānena yatnataḥ
d vicārya sarvato dṛṣṭiṃ bahudṛṣṭir amitrajit
d sahasā devadeveśo agnikuṇḍāt samutthitaḥ
d bibhrat sūryasahasrasya tejaḥ saṃvartakopamaḥ
d smitaṃ kṛtvābravīd vākyaṃ brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
d śrāvite ca makhādhyāye devānāṃ guruṇā tataḥ
d tam uvācāñjaliṃ kṛtvā dakṣo devaṃ prajāpatiḥ
d bhītaśaṅkitavitrastaḥ sabāṣpavadanekṣaṇaḥ
d yadi prasanno bhagavān yadi cāhaṃ tava priyaḥ
d yadi vāham anugrāhyo yadi deyo varo mama
d yad dagdhaṃ bhakṣitaṃ pītam aśitaṃ yac ca nāśitam
d cūrṇīkṛtāpaviddhaṃ ca yajñasaṃbhāram īhitam
d dīrghakālena mahatā prayatnena ca saṃcitam
d tan na mithyā bhaven mahyaṃ varam etam ahaṃ vṛṇe
d tathāstv ity āha bhagavān bhaganetraharo haraḥ
d dharmādhyakṣo virūpākṣas tryakṣo devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
d jānubhyām avanīṃ gatvā dakṣo labdhvā bhavād varam
d yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
d nāmnām aṣṭasahasreṇa stutavān vṛṣabhadhvajam
d yair nāmadheyaiḥ stutavān dakṣo devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
d bhīṣma uvāca
d vaktum arhasi me tāta śrotuṃ śraddhā mamānagha
d śrūyatāṃ devadevasya nāmāny adbhutakarmaṇaḥ
d gūḍhavratasya guhyāni prakāśāni ca bhārata
d dakṣa uvāca
d namas te devadeveśa devāribalasūdana
d devendrabalaviṣṭambha devadānavapūjita
d sahasrākṣa virūpākṣa tryakṣa yakṣādhipa priya
d sarvataḥpāṇipādānta sarvatokṣiśiromukha
d sarvataḥśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhasi
d śaṅkukarṇa mahākarṇa kumbhakarṇārṇavālaya
d gajendrakarṇa gokarṇa pāṇikarṇa namo 'stu te
d śatodara śatāvarta śatajihva śatānana
d gāyanti tvāṃ gāyatriṇo arcayanty arkam arkiṇaḥ
d brahmāṇaṃ tvāṃ śatakratum ūrdhvaṃ kham iva menire
d mūrtau hi te mahāmūrte samudrāmbarasaṃnibha
d sarvā vai devatā hy asmin gāvo goṣṭha ivāsate
d bhavaccharīre paśyāmi somam agniṃ jaleśvaram
d ādityam atha vai viṣṇuṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim
d bhagavān kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ kriyā karaṇam eva ca
d asataś ca sataś caiva tathaiva prabhavāpyayau
d namo bhavāya śarvāya rudrāya varadāya ca
d paśūnāṃ pataye caiva namo 'stv andhakaghātine
d trijaṭāya triśīrṣāya triśūlavarapāṇine
d tryambakāya trinetrāya tripuraghnāya vai namaḥ
d namaś caṇḍāya muṇḍāya aṇḍāyāṇḍadharāya ca
d daṇḍine samakarṇāya daṇḍimuṇḍāya vai namaḥ
d namordhvadaṃṣṭrakeśāya śuklāyāvatatāya ca
d vilohitāya dhūmrāya nīlagrīvāya vai namaḥ
d namo 'stv apratirūpāya virūpāya śivāya ca
d sūryāya sūryamālāya sūryadhvajapatākine
d namaḥ pramathanāthāya vṛṣaskandhāya dhanvine
d śatruṃdamāya daṇḍāya parṇacīrapaṭāya ca
d namo hiraṇyagarbhāya hiraṇyakavacāya ca
d hiraṇyakṛtacūḍāya hiraṇyapataye namaḥ
d namaḥ stutāya stutyāya stūyamānāya vai namaḥ
d sarvāya sarvabhakṣāya sarvabhūtāntarātmane
d namo hotre 'tha mantrāya śukladhvajapatākine
d namo nābhāya nābhyāya namaḥ kaṭakaṭāya ca
d namo 'stu kṛśanāsāya kṛśāṅgāya kṛśāya ca
d saṃhṛṣṭāya vihṛṣṭāya namaḥ kilakilāya ca
d namo 'stu śayamānāya śayitāyotthitāya ca
d sthitāya dhāvamānāya muṇḍāya jaṭilāya ca
d namo nartanaśīlāya mukhavāditravādine
d nādyopahāralubdhāya gītavāditraśāline
d namo jyeṣṭhāya śreṣṭhāya balapramathanāya ca
d kālanāthāya kalyāya kṣayāyopakṣayāya ca
d bhīmadundubhihāsāya bhīmavratadharāya ca
d ugrāya ca namo nityaṃ namo 'stu daśabāhave
d namaḥ kapālahastāya citibhasmapriyāya ca
d vibhīṣaṇāya bhīṣmāya bhīmavratadharāya ca
d namo vikṛtavaktrāya khaḍgajihvāya daṃṣṭriṇe
d pakvāmamāṃsalubdhāya tumbīvīṇāpriyāya ca
d namo vṛṣāya vṛṣyāya govṛṣāya vṛṣāya ca
d kaṭaṃkaṭāya caṇḍāya namaḥ pacapacāya ca
d namaḥ sarvavariṣṭhāya varāya varadāya ca
d varamālyagandhavastrāya varātivarade namaḥ
d namo raktaviraktāya bhāvanāyākṣamāline
d saṃbhinnāya vibhinnāya chāyāyātapanāya ca
d aghoraghorarūpāya ghoraghoratarāya ca
d namaḥ śivāya śāntāya namaḥ śāntatamāya ca
d ekapād bahunetrāya ekaśīrṣa namo namaḥ
d namaḥ kṣudrāya lubdhāya saṃvibhāgapriyāya ca
d pañcālāya sitāṅgāya namaḥ śamaśamāya ca
d namaś caṇḍikaghaṇṭāya ghaṇṭāyāghaṇṭaghaṇṭine
d sahasraśataghaṇṭāya ghaṇṭāmālāpriyāya ca
d prāṇaghaṇṭāya gandhāya namaḥ kalakalāya ca
d hūṃhūṃhūṃkārapārāya hūṃhūṃkārapriyāya ca
d namaḥ śamaśame nityaṃ girivṛkṣālayāya ca
d garbhamāṃsaśṛgālāya tārakāya tarāya ca
d namo yajñāya yajine hutāya prahutāya ca
d yajñavāhāya dāntāya tapyāyātapanāya ca
d namas taṭāya taṭyāya taṭānāṃ pataye namaḥ
d annadāyānnapataye namas tv annabhuje tathā
d namaḥ sahasraśīrṣāya sahasracaraṇāya ca
d sahasrodyataśūlāya sahasranayanāya ca
d namo bālārkavarṇāya bālarūpadharāya ca
d bālānucaragoptrāya bālakrīḍanakāya ca
d namo vṛddhāya lubdhāya kṣubdhāya kṣobhaṇāya ca
d taraṅgāṅkitakeśāya muñjakeśāya vai namaḥ
d namaḥ ṣaṭkarṇatuṣṭāya trikarmaniratāya ca
d varṇāśramāṇāṃ vidhivat pṛthakkarmanivartine
d namo ghuṣyāya ghoṣāya namaḥ kalakalāya ca
d śvetapiṅgalanetrāya kṛṣṇaraktekṣaṇāya ca
d prāṇabhagnāya daṇḍāya sphoṭanāya kṛśāya ca
d dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṃ kathyāya kathanāya ca
d sāṃkhyāya sāṃkhyamukhyāya sāṃkhyayogapravartine
d namo rathyavirathyāya catuṣpatharathāya ca
d kṛṣṇājinottarīyāya vyālayajñopavītine
d īśāna vajrasaṃghāta harikeśa namo 'stu te
d tryambakāmbikanāthāya vyaktāvyakta namo 'stu te
d kāma kāmada kāmaghna tṛptātṛptavicāriṇe
d sarva sarvada sarvaghna saṃdhyārāga namo 'stu te
d mahābala mahābāho mahāsattva mahādyute
d mahāmeghacayaprakhya mahākāla namo 'stu te
d sthūlajīrṇāṅgajaṭile valkalājinadhāriṇe
d dīptasūryāgnijaṭile valkalājinavāsase
d sahasrasūryapratima taponitya namo 'stu te
d unmādana śatāvarta gaṅgātoyārdramūrdhaja
d candrāvarta yugāvarta meghāvarta namo 'stu te
d tvam annam annabhoktā ca annado 'nnabhug eva
d annasraṣṭā ca paktā ca pakvabhuk pavano 'nalaḥ
d jarāyujāṇḍajāś caiva svedajāś ca tathodbhijāḥ
d tvam eva devadeveśa bhūtagrāmaś caturvidhaḥ
d carācarasya sraṣṭā tvaṃ pratihartā tathaiva ca
d tvām āhur brahmaviduṣo brahma brahmavidāṃ vara
d manasaḥ paramā yoniḥ khaṃ vāyur jyotiṣāṃ nidhiḥ
d ṛksāmāni tathoṃkāram āhus tvāṃ brahmavādinaḥ
d hāyihāyi huvāhāyi hāvuhāyi tathāsakṛt
d gāyanti tvāṃ suraśreṣṭha sāmagā brahmavādinaḥ
d yajurmayo ṛṅmayaś ca tvām āhutimayas tathā
d paṭhyase stutibhis tvaṃ hi vedopaniṣadāṃ gaṇaiḥ
d brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā varṇāvarāś ca ye
d tvam eva meghasaṃghāś ca vidyutstanitagarjitaḥ
d saṃvatsaras tvam ṛtavo māso māsārdham eva ca
d yugā nimeṣāḥ kāṣṭhās tvaṃ nakṣatrāṇi grahāḥ kalāḥ
d vṛkṣāṇāṃ kakudo 'si tvaṃ girīṇāṃ śikharāṇi ca
d vyāghro mṛgāṇāṃ patatāṃ tārkṣyo 'nantaś ca bhoginām
d kṣīrodo hy udadhīnāṃ ca yantrāṇāṃ dhanur eva ca
d vajraḥ praharaṇānāṃ ca vratānāṃ satyam eva ca
d tvam eva dveṣa icchā ca rāgo mohaḥ kṣamākṣame
d vyavasāyo dhṛtir lobhaḥ kāmakrodhau jayājayau
d tvaṃ gadī tvaṃ śarī cāpī khaṭvāṅgī jharjharī tathā
d chettā bhettā prahartā tvaṃ netā mantā pitā mataḥ
d daśalakṣaṇasaṃyukto dharmo 'rthaḥ kāma eva ca
d gaṅgā samudrāḥ saritaḥ palvalāni sarāṃsi ca
d latā vallyas tṛṇauṣadhyaḥ paśavo mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
d dravyakarmaguṇārambhaḥ kālapuṣpaphalapradaḥ
d ādiś cāntaś ca devānāṃ gāyatry oṃkāra eva ca
d harito lohito nīlaḥ kṛṣṇo raktas tathāruṇaḥ
d kadruś ca kapilaś caiva kapoto mecakas tathā
d avarṇaś ca suvarṇaś ca varṇakāro hy anaupamaḥ
d suvarṇanāmā ca tathā suvarṇapriya eva ca
d tvam indraś ca yamaś caiva varuṇo dhanado 'nalaḥ
d upaplavaś citrabhānuḥ svarbhānur bhānur eva ca
d hotraṃ hotā ca homyaṃ ca hutaṃ caiva tathā prabhuḥ
d trisauparṇaṃ tathā brahma yajuṣāṃ śatarudriyam
d pavitraṃ ca pavitrāṇāṃ maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam
d giriko hiṇḍuko vṛkṣo jīvaḥ pudgala eva ca
d prāṇaḥ sattvaṃ rajaś caiva tamaś cāpramadas tathā
d prāṇo 'pānaḥ samānaś ca udāno vyāna eva ca
d unmeṣaś ca nimeṣaś ca kṣutaṃ jṛmbhitam eva ca
d lohitāntargatā dṛṣṭir mahāvaktro mahodaraḥ
d śuciromā hariśmaśrur ūrdhvakeśaś calācalaḥ
d gītavāditratattvajño gītavādanakapriyaḥ
d matsyo jalacaro jālyo 'kalaḥ kelikalaḥ kaliḥ
d akālaś cātikālaś ca duṣkālaḥ kāla eva ca
d mṛtyuḥ kṣuraś ca kṛtyaś ca pakṣo 'pakṣakṣayaṃkaraḥ
d meghakālo mahādaṃṣṭraḥ saṃvartakabalāhakaḥ
d ghaṇṭo 'ghaṇṭo ghaṭī ghaṇṭī carucelī milīmilī
d brahmakāyikam agnīnāṃ daṇḍī muṇḍas tridaṇḍadhṛk
d caturyugaś caturvedaś cāturhotrapravartakaḥ
d cāturāśramyanetā ca cāturvarṇyakaraś ca yaḥ
d sadā cākṣapriyo dhūrto gaṇādhyakṣo gaṇādhipaḥ
d raktamālyāmbaradharo giriśo girikapriyaḥ
d śilpikaḥ śilpināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvaśilpapravartakaḥ
d bhaganetrāṅkuśaś caṇḍaḥ pūṣṇo dantavināśanaḥ
d svāhā svadhā vaṣaṭkāro namaskāro namo namaḥ
d gūḍhavrato guhyatapās tārakas tārakāmayaḥ
d dhātā vidhātā saṃdhātā vidhātā dhāraṇo 'dharaḥ
d brahmā tapaś ca satyaṃ ca brahmacaryam athārjavam
d bhūtātmā bhūtakṛd bhūto bhūtabhavyabhavodbhavaḥ
d bhūr bhuvaḥ svaritaś caiva dhruvo dānto maheśvaraḥ
d dīkṣito 'dīkṣitaḥ kṣānto durdānto 'dāntanāśanaḥ
d candrāvarto yugāvartaḥ saṃvartaḥ saṃpravartakaḥ
d kāmo bindur aṇuḥ sthūlaḥ karṇikārasrajapriyaḥ
d nandīmukho bhīmamukhaḥ sumukho durmukho 'mukhaḥ
d caturmukho bahumukho raṇeṣv agnimukhas tathā
d hiraṇyagarbhaḥ śakunir mahoragapatir virāṭ
d adharmahā mahāpārśvo daṇḍadhāro raṇapriyaḥ
d gonardo gopratāraś ca govṛṣeśvaravāhanaḥ
d trailokyagoptā govindo gomārgo 'mārga eva ca
d śreṣṭhaḥ sthiraś ca sthāṇuś ca niṣkampaḥ kampa eva ca
d durvāraṇo durviṣaho duḥsaho duratikramaḥ
d durdharṣo duṣprakampaś ca durviṣo durjayo jayaḥ
d śaśaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ śamanaḥ śītoṣṇakṣujjarādhidhṛk
d ādhayo vyādhayaś caiva vyādhihā vyādhir eva ca
d mama yajñamṛgavyādho vyādhīnām āgamo gamaḥ
d śikhaṇḍī puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ puṇḍarīkavanālayaḥ
d daṇḍadhāras tryambakaś ca ugradaṇḍo 'ṇḍanāśanaḥ
d viṣāgnipāḥ suraśreṣṭhaḥ somapās tvaṃ marutpatiḥ
d amṛtapās tvaṃ jagannātha devadeva gaṇeśvaraḥ
d viṣāgnipā mṛtyupāś ca kṣīrapāḥ somapās tathā
d madhuścyutānām agrapās tvam eva tuṣitājyapāḥ
d hiraṇyaretāḥ puruṣas tvam eva
d tvaṃ strī pumāṃs tvaṃ ca napuṃsakaṃ ca
d bālo yuvā sthaviro jīrṇadaṃṣṭro
d nāgendraśatrur viśvakartā vareṇyaḥ
d tvaṃ viśvabāhus tejasvī viśvatomukhaś
d candrādityau hṛdayaṃ ca pitāmahaḥ
d sarasvatī vāgbalam uttamo 'nilaḥ
d ahorātro nimeṣonmeṣakartā
d na brahmā na ca govindaḥ paurāṇā ṛṣayo na te
d māhātmyaṃ vedituṃ śaktā yāthātathyena te śiva
d yā mūrtayaḥ susūkṣmās te na mahyaṃ yānti darśanam
d trāhi māṃ satataṃ rakṣa pitā putram ivaurasam
d rakṣa māṃ rakṣaṇīyo 'haṃ tavānagha namo 'stu te
d bhaktānukampī bhagavān bhaktaś cāhaṃ sadā tvayi
d yaḥ sahasrāṇy anekāni puṃsām āvṛtya durdṛśaḥ
d tiṣṭhaty ekaḥ samudrānte sa me goptās tu nityaśaḥ
d yaṃ vinidrā jitaśvāsāḥ sattvasthāḥ samadarśinaḥ
d jyotiḥ paśyanti yuñjānās tasmai yogātmane namaḥ
d jaṭile daṇḍine nityaṃ lambodaraśarīriṇe
d kamaṇḍaluniṣaṅgāya tasmai rudrātmane namaḥ
d yasya keśeṣu jīmūtā nadyaḥ sarvāṅgasaṃdhiṣu
d kukṣau samudrāś catvāras tasmai toyātmane namaḥ
d saṃbhakṣya sarvabhūtāni yugānte paryupasthite
d yaḥ śete jalamadhyasthas taṃ prapadye 'mbuśāyinam
d praviśya vadanaṃ rāhor yaḥ somaṃ pibate niśi
d grasaty arkaṃ ca svarbhānur bhūtvā māṃ so 'bhirakṣatu
d ye cānupatitā garbhā yathābhāgānupāsate
d namas tebhyaḥ svadhā svāhā prāpnuvantu mudantu te
d ye 'ṅguṣṭhamātrāḥ puruṣā dehasthāḥ sarvadehinām
d rakṣantu te hi māṃ nityaṃ nityaṃ cāpyāyayantu ca
d ye na rodanti dehasthā dehino rodayanti ca
d harṣayanti na hṛṣyanti namas tebhyo 'stu nityaśaḥ
d ye nadīṣu samudreṣu parvateṣu guhāsu ca
d vṛkṣamūleṣu goṣṭheṣu kāntāragahaneṣu ca
d catuṣpatheṣu rathyāsu catvareṣu taṭeṣu ca
d hastyaśvarathaśālāsu jīrṇodyānālayeṣu ca
d ye ca pañcasu bhūteṣu diśāsu vidiśāsu ca
d candrārkayor madhyagatā ye ca candrārkaraśmiṣu
d rasātalagatā ye ca ye ca tasmai paraṃ gatāḥ
d namas tebhyo namas tebhyo namas tebhyo 'stu nityaśaḥ
d yeṣāṃ na vidyate saṃkhyā pramāṇaṃ rūpam eva ca
d asaṃkhyeyaguṇā rudrā namas tebhyo 'stu nityaśaḥ
d sarvabhūtakaro yasmāt sarvabhūtapatir haraḥ
d sarvabhūtāntarātmā ca tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥ
d tvam eva hījyase yasmād yajñair vividhadakṣiṇaiḥ
d tvam eva kartā sarvasya tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥ
d atha vā māyayā deva sūkṣmayā tava mohitaḥ
d etasmāt kāraṇād vāpi tena tvaṃ na nimantritaḥ
d prasīda mama bhadraṃ te tava bhāvagatasya me
d tvayi me hṛdayaṃ deva tvayi buddhir manas tvayi
d stutvaivaṃ sa mahādevaṃ virarāma prajāpatiḥ
d bhagavān api suprītaḥ punar dakṣam abhāṣata
d parituṣṭo 'smi te dakṣa stavenānena suvrata
d bahunātra kim uktena matsamīpe bhaviṣyasi
d aśvamedhasahasrasya vājapeyaśatasya ca
d prajāpate matprasādāt phalabhāgī bhaviṣyasi
d athainam abravīd vākyaṃ trailokyādhipatir bhavaḥ
d āśvāsanakaraṃ vākyaṃ vākyavid vākyasaṃmitam
d dakṣa dakṣa na kartavyo manyur vighnam imaṃ prati
d ahaṃ yajñaharas tubhyaṃ dṛṣṭam etat purātanam
d bhūyaś ca te varaṃ dadmi taṃ tvaṃ gṛhṇīṣva suvrata
d prasannavadano bhūtvā tad ihaikamanāḥ śṛṇu
d vedāt ṣaḍaṅgād uddhṛtya sāṃkhyayogāc ca yuktitaḥ
d tapaḥ sutaptaṃ vipulaṃ duścaraṃ devadānavaiḥ
d apūrvaṃ sarvatobhadraṃ viśvatomukham avyayam
d abdair daśāhasaṃyuktaṃ gūḍham aprājñaninditam
d varṇāśramakṛtair dharmair viparītaṃ kva cit samam
d gatāntair adhyavasitam atyāśramam idaṃ vratam
d mayā pāśupataṃ dakṣa yogam utpāditaṃ purā
d tasya cīrṇasya tat samyak phalaṃ bhavati puṣkalam
d tac cāstu te mahābhāga tyajyatāṃ mānaso jvaraḥ
d evam uktvā mahādevaḥ sapatnīko vṛṣadhvajaḥ
d adarśanam anuprāpto dakṣasyāmitavikramaḥ
d dakṣaproktaṃ stavam imaṃ kīrtayed yaḥ śṛṇoti vā
d nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyāt kiṃ cid dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt
d yathā sarveṣu deveṣu variṣṭho bhagavāñ śivaḥ
d tathā stavo variṣṭho 'yaṃ stavānāṃ brahmasaṃmitaḥ
d yaśorājyasukhaiśvaryakāmārthadhanakāṅkṣibhiḥ
d śrotavyo bhaktim āsthāya vidyākāmaiś ca yatnataḥ
d vyādhito duḥkhito dīnaś coragrasto bhayārditaḥ
d rājakāryābhiyukto vā mucyate mahato bhayāt
d anenaiva tu dehena gaṇānāṃ samatāṃ vrajet
d tejasā yaśasā caiva yukto bhavati nirmalaḥ
d na rākṣasāḥ piśācā vā na bhūtā na vināyakāḥ
d vighnaṃ kuryur gṛhe tasya yatrāyaṃ paṭhyate stavaḥ
d śṛṇuyāc caiva yā nārī tadbhaktā brahmacāriṇī
d pitṛpakṣe mātṛpakṣe pūjyā bhavati devavat
d śṛṇuyād yaḥ stavaṃ kṛtsnaṃ kīrtayed vā samāhitaḥ
d tasya sarvāṇi karmāṇi siddhiṃ gacchanty abhīkṣṇaśaḥ
d manasā cintitaṃ yac ca yac ca vācānukīrtitam
d sarvaṃ saṃpadyate tasya stavasyāsyānukīrtanāt
d devasya ca saguhasya devyā nandīśvarasya ca
d baliṃ suvihitaṃ kṛtvā damena niyamena ca
d tatas tu yukto gṛhṇīyān nāmāny āśu yathākramam
d īpsitāṃl labhate so 'rthān kāmān bhogāṃś ca mānavaḥ
d mṛtaś ca svargam āpnoti tiryakṣu ca na jāyate
d ity āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥ
d katheyaṃ kathitā puṇyā dharmyā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
d kim anyat kathayāmīha tad bhavān vaktum arhati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a śokād duḥkhāc ca mṛtyoś ca trasyanti prāṇinaḥ sadā
c ubhayaṃ me yathā na syāt tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atraivodāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c nāradasya ca saṃvādaṃ samaṅgasya ca bhārata
 nārada uvāca
a uraseva praṇamase bāhubhyāṃ tarasīva ca
c saṃprahṛṣṭamanā nityaṃ viśoka iva lakṣyase
a udvegaṃ neha te kiṃ cit susūkṣmam api lakṣaye
c nityatṛpta iva svastho bālavac ca viceṣṭase
 samaṅga uvāca
a bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca sarvaṃ sattveṣu mānada
c teṣāṃ tattvāni jānāmi tato na vimanā hy aham
a upakramān ahaṃ veda punar eva phalodayān
c loke phalāni citrāṇi tato na vimanā hy aham
a agādhāś cāpratiṣṭhāś ca gatimantaś ca nārada
c andhā jaḍāś ca jīvanti paśyāsmān api jīvataḥ
a vihitenaiva jīvanti arogāṅgā divaukasaḥ
c balavanto 'balāś caiva tadvad asmān sabhājaya
a sahasriṇaś ca jīvanti jīvanti śatinas tathā
c śākena cānye jīvanti paśyāsmān api jīvataḥ
a yadā na śocemahi kiṃ nu na syād
dharmeṇa vā nārada karmaṇā vā
c kṛtāntavaśyāni yadā sukhāni
duḥkhāni vā yan na vidharṣayanti
a yasmai prajñāṃ kathayante manuṣyāḥ
prajñāmūlo hīndriyāṇāṃ prasādaḥ
c muhyanti śocanti yadendriyāṇi
prajñālābho nāsti mūḍhendriyasya
a mūḍhasya darpaḥ sa punar moha eva
mūḍhasya nāyaṃ na paro 'sti lokaḥ
c na hy eva duḥkhāni sadā bhavanti
sukhasya vā nityaśo lābha eva
a bhāvātmakaṃ saṃparivartamānaṃ
na mādṛśaḥ saṃjvaraṃ jātu kuryāt
c iṣṭān bhogān nānurudhyet sukhaṃ vā
na cintayed duḥkham abhyāgataṃ vā
a samāhito na spṛhayet pareṣāṃ
nānāgataṃ nābhinandeta lābham
c na cāpi hṛṣyed vipule 'rthalābhe
tathārthanāśe ca na vai viṣīdet
a na bāndhavā na ca vittaṃ na kaulī
na ca śrutaṃ na ca mantrā na vīryam
c duḥkhāt trātuṃ sarva evotsahante
paratra śīle na tu yānti śāntim
a nāsti buddhir ayuktasya nāyogād vidyate sukham
c dhṛtiś ca duḥkhatyāgaś cāpy ubhayaṃ naḥ sukhodayam
a priyaṃ hi harṣajananaṃ harṣa utsekavardhanaḥ
c utseko narakāyaiva tasmāt taṃ saṃtyajāmy aham
a etāñ śokabhayotsekān mohanān sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
c paśyāmi sākṣival loke dehasyāsya viceṣṭanāt
a arthakāmau parityajya viśoko vigatajvaraḥ
c tṛṣṇāmohau tu saṃtyajya carāmi pṛthivīm imām
a na mṛtyuto na cādharmān na lobhān na kutaś cana
c pītāmṛtasyevātyantam iha cāmutra vā bhayam
a etad brahman vijānāmi mahat kṛtvā tapo 'vyayam
c tena nārada saṃprāpto na māṃ śokaḥ prabādhate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a atattvajñasya śāstrāṇāṃ satataṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ
c akṛtavyavasāyasya śreyo brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a gurupūjā ca satataṃ vṛddhānāṃ paryupāsanam
c śravaṇaṃ caiva vidyānāṃ kūṭasthaṃ śreya ucyate
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c gālavasya ca saṃvādaṃ devarṣer nāradasya ca
d svāśramaṃ samanuprāptaṃ nāradaṃ devavarcasam
a vītamohaklamaṃ vipraṃ jñānatṛptaṃ jitendriyam
c śreyaskāmaṃ jitātmānaṃ nāradaṃ gālavo 'bravīt
a yaiḥ kaiś cit saṃmato loke guṇais tu puruṣo nṛṣu
c bhavaty anapagān sarvāṃs tān guṇāṃl lakṣayāmy aham
a bhavān evaṃvidho 'smākaṃ saṃśayaṃ chettum arhati
c amūḍhaś ciramūḍhānāṃ lokatattvam ajānatām
a jñāne hy evaṃ pravṛttiḥ syāt kāryākārye vijānataḥ
c yat kāryaṃ na vyavasyāmas tad bhavān vaktum arhati
a bhagavann āśramāḥ sarve pṛthagācāradarśinaḥ
c idaṃ śreya idaṃ śreya iti nānāpradhāvitāḥ
a tāṃs tu viprasthitān dṛṣṭvā śāstraiḥ śāstrābhinandinaḥ
c svaśāstraiḥ parituṣṭāṃś ca śreyo nopalabhāmahe
a śāstraṃ yadi bhaved ekaṃ vyaktaṃ śreyo bhavet tadā
c śāstraiś ca bahubhir bhūyaḥ śreyo guhyaṃ praveśitam
a etasmāt kāraṇāc chreyaḥ kalilaṃ pratibhāti mām
c bravītu bhagavāṃs tan me upasanno 'smy adhīhi bhoḥ
 nārada uvāca
a āśramās tāta catvāro yathāsaṃkalpitāḥ pṛthak
c tān sarvān anupaśya tvaṃ samāśrityaiva gālava
a teṣāṃ teṣāṃ tathā hi tvam āśramāṇāṃ tatas tataḥ
c nānārūpaguṇoddeśaṃ paśya viprasthitaṃ pṛthak
e nayanti caiva te samyag abhipretam asaṃśayam
a ṛju paśyaṃs tathā samyag āśramāṇāṃ parāṃ gatim
c yat tu niḥśreyasaṃ samyak tac caivāsaṃśayātmakam
a anugrahaṃ ca mitrāṇām amitrāṇāṃ ca nigraham
c saṃgrahaṃ ca trivargasya śreya āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a nivṛttiḥ karmaṇaḥ pāpāt satataṃ puṇyaśīlatā
c sadbhiś ca samudācāraḥ śreya etad asaṃśayam
a mārdavaṃ sarvabhūteṣu vyavahāreṣu cārjavam
c vāk caiva madhurā proktā śreya etad asaṃśayam
a devatābhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca saṃvibhāgo 'tithiṣv api
c asaṃtyāgaś ca bhṛtyānāṃ śreya etad asaṃśayam
a satyasya vacanaṃ śreyaḥ satyajñānaṃ tu duṣkaram
c yad bhūtahitam atyantam etat satyaṃ bravīmy aham
a ahaṃkārasya ca tyāgaḥ praṇayasya ca nigrahaḥ
c saṃtoṣaś caikacaryā ca kūṭasthaṃ śreya ucyate
a dharmeṇa vedādhyayanaṃ vedāṅgānāṃ tathaiva ca
c vidyārthānāṃ ca jijñāsā śreya etad asaṃśayam
a śabdarūparasasparśān saha gandhena kevalān
c nātyartham upaseveta śreyaso 'rthī paraṃtapa
a naktaṃcaryā divāsvapnam ālasyaṃ paiśunaṃ madam
c atiyogam ayogaṃ ca śreyaso 'rthī parityajet
a karmotkarṣaṃ na mārgeta pareṣāṃ parinindayā
c svaguṇair eva mārgeta viprakarṣaṃ pṛthagjanāt
a nirguṇās tv eva bhūyiṣṭham ātmasaṃbhāvino narāḥ
c doṣair anyān guṇavataḥ kṣipanty ātmaguṇakṣayāt
a anucyamānāś ca punas te manyante mahājanāt
c guṇavattaram ātmānaṃ svena mānena darpitāḥ
a abruvan kasya cin nindām ātmapūjām avarṇayan
c vipaścid guṇasaṃpannaḥ prāpnoty eva mahad yaśaḥ
a abruvan vāti surabhir gandhaḥ sumanasāṃ śuciḥ
c tathaivāvyāharan bhāti vimalo bhānur ambare
a evamādīni cānyāni parityaktāni medhayā
c jvalanti yaśasā loke yāni na vyāharanti ca
a na loke dīpyate mūrkhaḥ kevalātmapraśaṃsayā
c api cāpihitaḥ śvabhre kṛtavidyaḥ prakāśate
a asann uccair api proktaḥ śabdaḥ samupaśāmyati
c dīpyate tv eva lokeṣu śanair api subhāṣitam
a mūḍhānām avaliptānām asāraṃ bhāṣitaṃ bahu
c darśayaty antarātmānaṃ divā rūpam ivāṃśumān
a etasmāt kāraṇāt prajñāṃ mṛgayante pṛthagvidhām
c prajñālābho hi bhūtānām uttamaḥ pratibhāti mām
a nāpṛṣṭaḥ kasya cid brūyān na cānyāyena pṛcchataḥ
c jñānavān api medhāvī jaḍaval lokam ācaret
a tato vāsaṃ parīkṣeta dharmanityeṣu sādhuṣu
c manuṣyeṣu vadānyeṣu svadharmanirateṣu ca
a caturṇāṃ yatra varṇānāṃ dharmavyatikaro bhavet
c na tatra vāsaṃ kurvīta śreyorthī vai kathaṃ cana
a nirārambho 'py ayam iha yathālabdhopajīvanaḥ
c puṇyaṃ puṇyeṣu vimalaṃ pāpaṃ pāpeṣu cāpnuyāt
a apām agnes tathendoś ca sparśaṃ vedayate yathā
c tathā paśyāmahe sparśam ubhayoḥ pāpapuṇyayoḥ
a apaśyanto 'nnaviṣayaṃ bhuñjate vighasāśinaḥ
c bhuñjānaṃ cānnaviṣayān viṣayaṃ viddhi karmaṇām
a yatrāgamayamānānām asatkāreṇa pṛcchatām
c prabrūyād brahmaṇo dharmaṃ tyajet taṃ deśam ātmavān
d durvṛtto 'pi varo vipro na ca śūdro jitendriyaḥ
d kaḥ parityajya gāṃ duṣṭāṃ duhyec chīlavatīṃ kharīm
d paṇḍitasyāpi śūdrasya sarvaśāstraratasya ca
d vacanaṃ tasya na grāhyaṃ śunocchiṣṭaṃ havir yathā
a śiṣyopādhyāyikā vṛttir yatra syāt susamāhitā
c yathāvac chāstrasaṃpannā kas taṃ deśaṃ parityajet
a ākāśasthā dhruvaṃ yatra doṣaṃ brūyur vipaścitām
c ātmapūjābhikāmā vai ko vaset tatra paṇḍitaḥ
a yatra saṃloḍitā lubdhaiḥ prāyaśo dharmasetavaḥ
c pradīptam iva śailāntaṃ kas taṃ deśaṃ na saṃtyajet
a yatra dharmam anāśaṅkāś careyur vītamatsarāḥ
c caret tatra vasec caiva puṇyaśīleṣu sādhuṣu
a dharmam arthanimittaṃ tu careyur yatra mānavāḥ
c na tān anuvasej jātu te hi pāpakṛto janāḥ
a karmaṇā yatra pāpena vartante jīvitespavaḥ
c vyavadhāvet tatas tūrṇaṃ sasarpāc charaṇād iva
a yena khaṭvāṃ samārūḍhaḥ karmaṇānuśayī bhavet
c āditas tan na kartavyam icchatā bhavam ātmanaḥ
a yatra rājā ca rājñaś ca puruṣāḥ pratyanantarāḥ
c kuṭumbinām agrabhujas tyajet tad rāṣṭram ātmavān
a śrotriyās tv agrabhoktāro dharmanityāḥ sanātanāḥ
c yājanādhyāpane yuktā yatra tad rāṣṭram āvaset
a svāhāsvadhāvaṣaṭkārā yatra samyag anuṣṭhitāḥ
c ajasraṃ caiva vartante vaset tatrāvicārayan
a aśucīny atra paśyeta brāhmaṇān vṛttikarśitān
c tyajet tad rāṣṭram āsannam upasṛṣṭam ivāmiṣam
a prīyamāṇā narā yatra prayaccheyur ayācitāḥ
c svasthacitto vaset tatra kṛtakṛtya ivātmavān
a daṇḍo yatrāvinīteṣu satkāraś ca kṛtātmasu
c caret tatra vasec caiva puṇyaśīleṣu sādhuṣu
a upasṛṣṭeṣv adānteṣu durācāreṣv asādhuṣu
c avinīteṣu lubdheṣu sumahad daṇḍadhāraṇam
a yatra rājā dharmanityo rājyaṃ vai paryupāsitā
c apāsya kāmān kāmeśo vaset tatrāvicārayan
a tathāśīlā hi rājānaḥ sarvān viṣayavāsinaḥ
c śreyasā yojayanty āśu śreyasi pratyupasthite
a pṛcchatas te mayā tāta śreya etad udāhṛtam
c na hi śakyaṃ pradhānena śreyaḥ saṃkhyātum ātmanaḥ
a evaṃ pravartamānasya vṛttiṃ praṇihitātmanaḥ
c tapasaiveha bahulaṃ śreyo vyaktaṃ bhaviṣyati
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ nu muktaḥ pṛthivīṃ cared asmadvidho nṛpaḥ
c nityaṃ kaiś ca guṇair yuktaḥ saṅgapāśād vimucyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam
c ariṣṭaneminā proktaṃ sagarāyānupṛcchate
 sagara uvāca
a kiṃ śreyaḥ paramaṃ brahman kṛtveha sukham aśnute
c kathaṃ na śocen na kṣubhyed etad icchāmi veditum
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam uktas tadā tārkṣyaḥ sarvaśāstraviśāradaḥ
c vibudhya saṃpadaṃ cāgryāṃ sad vākyam idam abravīt
a sukhaṃ mokṣasukhaṃ loke na ca loko 'vagacchati
c prasaktaḥ putrapaśuṣu dhanadhānyasamākulaḥ
a saktabuddhir aśāntātmā na sa śakyaś cikitsitum
c snehapāśasito mūḍho na sa mokṣāya kalpate
a snehajān iha te pāśān vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tān mama
c sakarṇakena śirasā śakyāś chettuṃ vijānatā
a saṃbhāvya putrān kālena yauvanasthān niveśya ca
c samarthāñ jīvane jñātvā muktaś cara yathāsukham
a bhāryāṃ putravatīṃ vṛddhāṃ lālitāṃ putravatsalām
c jñātvā prajahi kāle tvaṃ parārtham anudṛśya ca
a sāpatyo nirapatyo vā muktaś cara yathāsukham
c indriyair indriyārthāṃs tvam anubhūya yathāvidhi
a kṛtakautūhalas teṣu muktaś cara yathāsukham
c upapattyopalabdheṣu lābheṣu ca samo bhava
a eṣa tāvat samāsena tava saṃkīrtito mayā
c mokṣārtho vistareṇāpi bhūyo vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
a muktā vītabhayā loke caranti sukhino narāḥ
c saktabhāvā vinaśyanti narās tatra na saṃśayaḥ
a āhārasaṃcayāś caiva tathā kīṭapipīlikāḥ
c asaktāḥ sukhino loke saktāś caiva vināśinaḥ
a svajane na ca te cintā kartavyā mokṣabuddhinā
c ime mayā vinābhūtā bhaviṣyanti kathaṃ tv iti
a svayam utpadyate jantuḥ svayam eva vivardhate
c sukhaduḥkhe tathā mṛtyuṃ svayam evādhigacchati
a bhojanācchādane caiva mātrā pitrā ca saṃgraham
c svakṛtenādhigacchanti loke nāsty akṛtaṃ purā
a dhātrā vihitabhakṣyāṇi sarvabhūtāni medinīm
c loke viparidhāvanti rakṣitāni svakarmabhiḥ
a svayaṃ mṛtpiṇḍabhūtasya paratantrasya sarvadā
c ko hetuḥ svajanaṃ poṣṭuṃ rakṣituṃ vādṛḍhātmanaḥ
a svajanaṃ hi yadā mṛtyur hanty eva tava paśyataḥ
c kṛte 'pi yatne mahati tatra boddhavyam ātmanā
a jīvantam api caivainaṃ bharaṇe rakṣaṇe tathā
c asamāpte parityajya paścād api mariṣyasi
a yadā mṛtaś ca svajanaṃ na jñāsyasi kathaṃ cana
c sukhitaṃ duḥkhitaṃ vāpi nanu boddhavyam ātmanā
a mṛte vā tvayi jīve vā yadi bhokṣyati vai janaḥ
c svakṛtaṃ nanu buddhvaivaṃ kartavyaṃ hitam ātmanaḥ
a evaṃ vijānaṃl loke 'smin kaḥ kasyety abhiniścitaḥ
c mokṣe niveśaya mano bhūyaś cāpy upadhāraya
a kṣutpipāsādayo bhāvā jitā yasyeha dehinaḥ
c krodho lobhas tathā mohaḥ sattvavān mukta eva saḥ
a dyūte pāne tathā strīṣu mṛgayāyāṃ ca yo naraḥ
c na pramādyati saṃmohāt satataṃ mukta eva saḥ
a divase divase nāma rātrau rātrau sadā sadā
c bhoktavyam iti yaḥ khinno doṣabuddhiḥ sa ucyate
a ātmabhāvaṃ tathā strīṣu muktam eva punaḥ punaḥ
c yaḥ paśyati sadā yukto yathāvan mukta eva saḥ
a saṃbhavaṃ ca vināśaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ceṣṭitaṃ tathā
c yas tattvato vijānāti loke 'smin mukta eva saḥ
a prasthaṃ vāhasahasreṣu yātrārthaṃ caiva koṭiṣu
c prāsāde mañcakasthānaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
a mṛtyunābhyāhataṃ lokaṃ vyādhibhiś copapīḍitam
c avṛttikarśitaṃ caiva yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
a yaḥ paśyati sukhī tuṣṭo napaśyaṃś ca vihanyate
c yaś cāpy alpena saṃtuṣṭo loke 'smin mukta eva saḥ
a agnīṣomāv idaṃ sarvam iti yaś cānupaśyati
c na ca saṃspṛśyate bhāvair adbhutair mukta eva saḥ
a paryaṅkaśayyā bhūmiś ca samāne yasya dehinaḥ
c śālayaś ca kadannaṃ ca yasya syān mukta eva saḥ
a kṣaumaṃ ca kuśacīraṃ ca kauśeyaṃ valkalāni ca
c āvikaṃ carma ca samaṃ yasya syān mukta eva saḥ
a pañcabhūtasamudbhūtaṃ lokaṃ yaś cānupaśyati
c tathā ca vartate dṛṣṭvā loke 'smin mukta eva saḥ
a sukhaduḥkhe same yasya lābhālābhau jayājayau
c icchādveṣau bhayodvegau sarvathā mukta eva saḥ
a raktamūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ doṣāṇāṃ saṃcayaṃ tathā
c śarīraṃ doṣabahulaṃ dṛṣṭvā cedaṃ vimucyate
a valīpalitasaṃyogaṃ kārśyaṃ vaivarṇyam eva ca
c kubjabhāvaṃ ca jarayā yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
a puṃstvopaghātaṃ kālena darśanoparamaṃ tathā
c bādhiryaṃ prāṇamandatvaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
a gatān ṛṣīṃs tathā devān asurāṃś ca tathā gatān
c lokād asmāt paraṃ lokaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
a prabhāvair anvitās tais taiḥ pārthivendrāḥ sahasraśaḥ
c ye gatāḥ pṛthivīṃ tyaktvā iti jñātvā vimucyate
a arthāṃś ca durlabhāṃl loke kleśāṃś ca sulabhāṃs tathā
c duḥkhaṃ caiva kuṭumbārthe yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate
a apatyānāṃ ca vaiguṇyaṃ janaṃ viguṇam eva ca
c paśyan bhūyiṣṭhaśo loke ko mokṣaṃ nābhipūjayet
a śāstrāl lokāc ca yo buddhaḥ sarvaṃ paśyati mānavaḥ
c asāram iva mānuṣyaṃ sarvathā mukta eva saḥ
a etac chrutvā mama vaco bhavāṃś caratu muktavat
c gārhasthye yadi te mokṣe kṛtā buddhir aviklavā
a tat tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā samyak sa pṛthivīpatiḥ
c mokṣajaiś ca guṇair yuktaḥ pālayām āsa ca prajāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a tiṣṭhate me sadā tāta kautūhalam idaṃ hṛdi
c tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tvattaḥ kurupitāmaha
a kathaṃ devarṣir uśanā sadā kāvyo mahāmatiḥ
c asurāṇāṃ priyakaraḥ surāṇām apriye rataḥ
a vardhayām āsa tejaś ca kimartham amitaujasām
c nityaṃ vairanibaddhāś ca dānavāḥ surasattamaiḥ
a kathaṃ cāpy uśanā prāpa śukratvam amaradyutiḥ
c ṛddhiṃ ca sa kathaṃ prāptaḥ sarvam etad bravīhi me
a na yāti ca sa tejasvī madhyena nabhasaḥ katham
c etad icchāmi vijñātuṃ nikhilena pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇu rājann avahitaḥ sarvam etad yathātatham
c yathāmati yathā caitac chrutapūrvaṃ mayānagha
a eṣa bhārgavadāyādo muniḥ satyo dṛḍhavrataḥ
c asurāṇāṃ priyakaro nimitte karuṇātmake
a indro 'tha dhanado rājā yakṣarakṣodhipaḥ sa ca
c prabhaviṣṇuś ca kośasya jagataś ca tathā prabhuḥ
a tasyātmānam athāviśya yogasiddho mahāmuniḥ
c ruddhvā dhanapatiṃ devaṃ yogena hṛtavān vasu
a hṛte dhane tataḥ śarma na lebhe dhanadas tathā
c āpannamanyuḥ saṃvignaḥ so 'bhyagāt surasattamam
a nivedayām āsa tadā śivāyāmitatejase
c devaśreṣṭhāya rudrāya saumyāya bahurūpiṇe
 kubera uvāca
a yogātmakenośanasā ruddhvā mama hṛtaṃ vasu
c yogenātmagatiṃ kṛtvā niḥsṛtaś ca mahātapāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etac chrutvā tataḥ kruddho mahāyogī maheśvaraḥ
c saṃraktanayano rājañ śūlam ādāya tasthivān
a kvāsvau kvāsāv iti prāha gṛhītvā paramāyudham
c uśanā dūratas tasya babhau jñātvā cikīrṣitam
a sa mahāyogino buddhvā taṃ roṣaṃ vai mahātmanaḥ
c gatim āgamanaṃ vetti sthānaṃ vetti tataḥ prabhuḥ
a saṃcintyogreṇa tapasā mahātmānaṃ maheśvaram
c uśanā yogasiddhātmā śūlāgre pratyadṛśyata
a vijñātarūpaḥ sa tadā tapaḥsiddhena dhanvinā
c jñātvā śūlaṃ ca deveśaḥ pāṇinā samanāmayat
a ānatenātha śūlena pāṇināmitatejasā
c pinākam iti covāca śūlam ugrāyudhaḥ prabhuḥ
d sa tu praviṣṭa uśanā pāṇiṃ māheśvaraṃ prabhuḥ
a pāṇimadhyagataṃ dṛṣṭvā bhārgavaṃ tam umāpatiḥ
c āsyaṃ vivṛtya kakudī pāṇiṃ saṃprākṣipac chanaiḥ
a sa tu praviṣṭa uśanā koṣṭhaṃ māheśvaraṃ prabhuḥ
c vyacarac cāpi tatrāsau mahātmā bhṛgunandanaḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kimarthaṃ vyacarad rājann uśanā tasya dhīmataḥ
c jaṭhare devadevasya kiṃ cākārṣīn mahādyutiḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a purā so 'ntarjalagataḥ sthāṇubhūto mahāvrataḥ
c varṣāṇām abhavad rājan prayutāny arbudāni ca
a udatiṣṭhat tapas taptvā duścaraṃ sa mahāhradāt
c tato devātidevas taṃ brahmā samupasarpata
a tapovṛddhim apṛcchac ca kuśalaṃ cainam avyayam
c tapaḥ sucīrṇam iti ca provāca vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ
a tatsaṃyogena vṛddhiṃ cāpy apaśyat sa tu śaṃkaraḥ
c mahāmatir acintyātmā satyadharmarataḥ sadā
a sa tenāḍhyo mahāyogī tapasā ca dhanena ca
c vyarājata mahārāja triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
a tataḥ pinākī yogātmā dhyānayogaṃ samāviśat
c uśanā tu samudvigno nililye jaṭhare tataḥ
a tuṣṭāva ca mahāyogī devaṃ tatrastha eva ca
c niḥsāraṃ kāṅkṣamāṇas tu tejasā pratyahanyata
a uśanā tu tadovāca jaṭharastho mahāmuniḥ
c prasādaṃ me kuruṣveti punaḥ punar ariṃdama

c iti srotāṃsi sarvāṇi ruddhvā tridaśapuṃgavaḥ
a apaśyamānaḥ sa dvāraṃ sarvataḥpihito muniḥ
c paryakrāmad dahyamāna itaś cetaś ca tejasā
a sa viniṣkramya śiśnena śukratvam abhipedivān
c kāryeṇa tena nabhaso nāgacchata ca madhyataḥ
d tata eva ca deveṣu sapratiṣṭho mahāmuniḥ
d paurohityaṃ ca daityānāṃ cakre tejovivṛddhaye
a niṣkrāntam atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā jvalantam iva tejasā
c bhavo roṣasamāviṣṭaḥ śūlodyatakaraḥ sthitaḥ
a nyavārayata taṃ devī kruddhaṃ paśupatiṃ patim
c putratvam agamad devyā vārite śaṃkare ca saḥ
 devy uvāca
a hiṃsanīyas tvayā naiṣa mama putratvam āgataḥ
c na hi devodarāt kaś cin niḥsṛto nāśam archati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ prīto 'bhavad devyāḥ prahasaṃś cedam abravīt
c gacchatv eṣa yathākāmam iti rājan punaḥ punaḥ

a etat te kathitaṃ tāta bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ
c caritaṃ bharataśreṣṭha yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a ataḥ paraṃ mahābāho yac chreyas tad vadasva me

a kiṃ karma puruṣaḥ kṛtvā śubhaṃ puruṣasattama
c śreyaḥ param avāpnoti pretya ceha ca tad vada
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi yathā pūrvaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
c parāśaraṃ mahātmānaṃ papraccha janako nṛpaḥ
a kiṃ śreyaḥ sarvabhūtānām asmiṃl loke paratra ca
c yad bhavet pratipattavyaṃ tad bhavān prabravītu me
a tataḥ sa tapasā yuktaḥ sarvadharmavidhānavit
c nṛpāyānugrahamanā munir vākyam athābravīt
a dharma eva kṛtaḥ śreyān iha loke paratra ca
c tasmād dhi paramaṃ nāsti yathā prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a pratipadya naro dharmaṃ svargaloke mahīyate
c dharmātmakaḥ karmavidhir dehināṃ nṛpasattama
e tasminn āśramiṇaḥ santaḥ svakarmāṇīha kurvate

c martyā yatrāvatiṣṭhante sā ca kāmāt pravartate
a sukṛtāsukṛtaṃ karma niṣevya vividhaiḥ kramaiḥ
c daśārdhapravibhaktānāṃ bhūtānāṃ bahudhā gatiḥ
a sauvarṇaṃ rājataṃ vāpi yathā bhāṇḍaṃ niṣicyate
c tathā niṣicyate jantuḥ pūrvakarmavaśānugaḥ
a nābījāj jāyate kiṃ cin nākṛtvā sukham edhate
c sukṛtī vindati sukhaṃ prāpya dehakṣayaṃ naraḥ
a daivaṃ tāta na paśyāmi nāsti daivasya sādhanam
c svabhāvato hi saṃsiddhā devagandharvadānavāḥ
a pretya jātikṛtaṃ karma na smaranti sadā janāḥ
c te vai tasya phalaprāptau karma cāpi caturvidham
a lokayātrāśrayaś caiva śabdo vedāśrayaḥ kṛtaḥ
c śāntyarthaṃ manasas tāta naitad vṛddhānuśāsanam
a cakṣuṣā manasā vācā karmaṇā ca caturvidham
c kurute yādṛśaṃ karma tādṛśaṃ pratipadyate
a nirantaraṃ ca miśraṃ ca phalate karma pārthiva
c kalyāṇaṃ yadi vā pāpaṃ na tu nāśo 'sya vidyate
a kadā cit sukṛtaṃ tāta kūṭastham iva tiṣṭhati
c majjamānasya saṃsāre yāvad duḥkhād vimucyate
a tato duḥkhakṣayaṃ kṛtvā sukṛtaṃ karma sevate
c sukṛtakṣayād duṣkṛtaṃ ca tad viddhi manujādhipa
a damaḥ kṣamā dhṛtis tejaḥ saṃtoṣaḥ satyavāditā
c hrīr ahiṃsāvyasanitā dākṣyaṃ ceti sukhāvahāḥ
a duṣkṛte sukṛte vāpi na jantur ayato bhavet
c nityaṃ manaḥsamādhāne prayateta vicakṣaṇaḥ
a nāyaṃ parasya sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ vāpi sevate
c karoti yādṛśaṃ karma tādṛśaṃ pratipadyate
a sukhaduḥkhe samādhāya pumān anyena gacchati
c anyenaiva janaḥ sarvaḥ saṃgato yaś ca pārthiva
a pareṣāṃ yad asūyeta na tat kuryāt svayaṃ naraḥ
c yo hy asūyus tathāyuktaḥ so 'vahāsaṃ niyacchati

c vidvāṃś cāśīlo vṛttahīnaḥ kulīnaḥ

 parāśara uvāca
a manoratharathaṃ prāpya indriyārthahayaṃ naraḥ

a sevāśritena manasā vṛttihīnasya śasyate

a āyur nasulabhaṃ labdhvā nāvakarṣed viśāṃ pate

a varṇebhyo 'pi paribhraṣṭaḥ sa vai saṃmānam arhati

a varṇotkarṣam avāpnoti naraḥ puṇyena karmaṇā
c durlabhaṃ tam alabdhā hi hanyāt pāpena karmaṇā
a ajñānād dhi kṛtaṃ pāpaṃ tapasaivābhinirṇudet
c pāpaṃ hi karma phalati pāpam eva svayaṃ kṛtam
e tasmāt pāpaṃ na seveta karma duḥkhaphalodayam
a pāpānubandhaṃ yat karma yady api syān mahāphalam
c na tat seveta medhāvī śuciḥ kusalilaṃ yathā
a kiṃkaṣṭam anupaśyāmi phalaṃ pāpasya karmaṇaḥ
c pratyāpannasya hi sato nātmā tāvad virocate
a pratyāpattiś ca yasyeha bāliśasya na jāyate

a viraktaṃ śodhyate vastraṃ na tu kṛṣṇopasaṃhitam
c prayatnena manuṣyendra pāpam evaṃ nibodha me
a svayaṃ kṛtvā tu yaḥ pāpaṃ śubham evānutiṣṭhati
c prāyaścittaṃ naraḥ kartum ubhayaṃ so 'śnute pṛthak

c brāhmaṇāḥ śāstranirdeśād ity āhur brahmavādinaḥ
a tathā kāmakṛtaṃ cāsya vihiṃsaivāpakarṣati
c ity āhur dharmaśāstrajñā brāhmaṇā vedapāragāḥ
a ahaṃ tu tāvat paśyāmi karma yad vartate kṛtam
c guṇayuktaṃ prakāśaṃ ca pāpenānupasaṃhitam
a yathā sūkṣmāṇi karmāṇi phalantīha yathātatham

a bhavaty alpaphalaṃ karma sevitaṃ nityam ulbaṇam
c abuddhipūrvaṃ dharmajña kṛtam ugreṇa karmaṇā
a kṛtāni yāni karmāṇi daivatair munibhis tathā
c nācaret tāni dharmātmā śrutvā cāpi na kutsayet
a saṃcintya manasā rājan viditvā śaktim ātmanaḥ
c karoti yaḥ śubhaṃ karma sa vai bhadrāṇi paśyati

 parāśara uvāca

a anarhāś cārhatāṃ prāptāḥ santaḥ stutvā tam eva ha
c na tu vṛddhim ihānvicchet karma kṛtvā jugupsitam

 parāśara uvāca
a vṛttiḥ sakāśād varṇebhyas tribhyo hīnasya śobhanā
c prītyopanītā nirdiṣṭā dharmiṣṭhān kurute sadā
a vṛttiś cen nāsti śūdrasya pitṛpaitāmahī dhruvā
c na vṛttiṃ parato mārgec chuśrūṣāṃ tu prayojayet
a sadbhis tu saha saṃsargaḥ śobhate dharmadarśibhiḥ
c nityaṃ sarvāsv avasthāsu nāsadbhir iti me matiḥ
a yathodayagirau dravyaṃ saṃnikarṣeṇa dīpyate
c tathā satsaṃnikarṣeṇa hīnavarṇo 'pi dīpyate
a yādṛśena hi varṇena bhāvyate śuklam ambaram

c anityam iha martyānāṃ jīvitaṃ hi calācalam

c yaś cinoti śubhāny eva sa bhadrāṇīha paśyati

c na tat seveta medhāvī na tad dhitam ihocyate
d dharmeṇa sahitaṃ yat tu bhaved alpaphalodayam
d tat kāryam aviśaṅkena karmātyantasukhāvaham

c sa śabdamātraphalabhāg rājā bhavati taskaraḥ
a svayaṃbhūr asṛjac cāgre dhātāraṃ lokapūjitam
c dhātāsṛjat putram ekaṃ prajānāṃ dhāraṇe ratam
a tam arcayitvā vaiśyas tu kuryād atyartham ṛddhimat
c rakṣitavyaṃ tu rājanyair upayojyaṃ dvijātibhiḥ

a apranaṣṭe tato dharme bhavanti sukhitāḥ prajāḥ

c adhīte cāpi yo vipro vaiśyo yaś cārjane rataḥ
a yaś ca śuśrūṣate śūdraḥ satataṃ niyatendriyaḥ

a prāṇasaṃtāpanirdiṣṭāḥ kākiṇyo 'pi mahāphalāḥ
c nyāyenopārjitā dattāḥ kim utānyāḥ sahasraśaḥ
a satkṛtya tu dvijātibhyo yo dadāti narādhipa
c yādṛśaṃ tādṛśaṃ nityam aśnāti phalam ūrjitam
a abhigamya dattaṃ tuṣṭyā yad dhanyam āhur abhiṣṭutam
c yācitena tu yad dattaṃ tad āhur madhyamaṃ budhāḥ
a avajñayā dīyate yat tathaivāśraddhayāpi ca
c tad āhur adhamaṃ dānaṃ munayaḥ satyavādinaḥ
a atikrame majjamāno vividhena naraḥ sadā
c tathā prayatnaṃ kurvīta yathā mucyeta saṃśayāt
a damena śobhate vipraḥ kṣatriyo vijayena tu
c dhanena vaiśyaḥ śūdras tu nityaṃ dākṣyeṇa śobhate
 parāśara uvāca
a pratigrahāgatā vipre kṣatriye śastranirjitāḥ
c vaiśye nyāyārjitāś caiva śūdre śuśrūṣayārjitāḥ
e svalpāpy arthāḥ praśasyante dharmasyārthe mahāphalāḥ

c kva cit kva cid vrataparo vratāny āsthāya pārthiva

c saṃsiddhās tapasā tāta ye cānye svargavāsinaḥ

a kauśikāni ca vastrāṇi śubhāny ābharaṇāni ca

c vāsaḥ prāsādapṛṣṭhe ca tat sarvaṃ tapasaḥ phalam
a śayanāni ca mukhyāni bhojyāni vividhāni ca

 parāśara uvāca

a sukṣetrāc ca subījāc ca puṇyo bhavati saṃbhavaḥ

 janaka uvāca

 parāśara uvāca

a tulyād iha vadhaḥ śreyān viśiṣṭāc ceti niścayaḥ
c nihīnāt kātarāc caiva nṛpāṇāṃ garhito vadhaḥ
a pāpāt pāpasamācārān nihīnāc ca narādhipa
c pāpa eva vadhaḥ prokto narakāyeti niścayaḥ
a na kaś cit trāti vai rājan diṣṭāntavaśam āgatam
c sāvaśeṣāyuṣaṃ cāpi kaś cid evāpakarṣati
a snigdhaiś ca kriyamāṇāni karmāṇīha nivartayet
c hiṃsātmakāni karmāṇi nāyur icchet parāyuṣā
a gṛhasthānāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ vināśam abhikāṅkṣatām
c nidhanaṃ śobhanaṃ tāta pulineṣu kriyāvatām
a āyuṣi kṣayam āpanne pañcatvam upagacchati
c nākāraṇāt tad bhavati kāraṇair upapāditam
a tathā śarīraṃ bhavati dehād yenopapāditam
c adhvānaṃ gatakaś cāyaṃ prāptaś cāyaṃ gṛhād gṛham
a dvitīyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tatra nānyat kiṃ cana vidyate
c tad dehaṃ dehināṃ yuktaṃ mokṣabhūteṣu vartate
a sirāsnāyvasthisaṃghātaṃ bībhatsāmedhyasaṃkulam
c bhūtānām indriyāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca samāgamam
a tvagantaṃ deham ity āhur vidvāṃso 'dhyātmacintakāḥ
c guṇair api parikṣīṇaṃ śarīraṃ martyatāṃ gatam
a śarīriṇā parityaktaṃ niśceṣṭaṃ gatacetanam
c bhūtaiḥ prakṛtim āpannais tato bhūmau nimajjati
a bhāvitaṃ karmayogena jāyate tatra tatra ha
c idaṃ śarīraṃ vaideha mriyate yatra tatra ha
e tatsvabhāvo 'paro dṛṣṭo visargaḥ karmaṇas tathā
a na jāyate tu nṛpate kaṃ cit kālam ayaṃ punaḥ
c paribhramati bhūtātmā dyām ivāmbudharo mahān
a sa punar jāyate rājan prāpyehāyatanaṃ nṛpa
c manasaḥ paramo hy ātmā indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ
a dvividhānāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ jaṅgamāḥ paramā nṛpa
c jaṅgamānām api tathā dvipadāḥ paramā matāḥ
e dvipadānām api tathā dvijā vai paramāḥ smṛtāḥ
a dvijānām api rājendra prajñāvantaḥ parā matāḥ
c prājñānām ātmasaṃbuddhāḥ saṃbuddhānām amāninaḥ
a jātam anveti maraṇaṃ nṛṇām iti viniścayaḥ
c antavanti hi karmāṇi sevante guṇataḥ prajāḥ
a āpanne tūttarāṃ kāṣṭhāṃ sūrye yo nidhanaṃ vrajet
c nakṣatre ca muhūrte ca puṇye rājan sa puṇyakṛt
a ayojayitvā kleśena janaṃ plāvya ca duṣkṛtam
c mṛtyunāprākṛteneha karma kṛtvātmaśaktitaḥ
a viṣam udbandhanaṃ dāho dasyuhastāt tathā vadhaḥ
c daṃṣṭribhyaś ca paśubhyaś ca prākṛto vadha ucyate
a na caibhiḥ puṇyakarmāṇo yujyante nābhisaṃdhijaiḥ
c evaṃvidhaiś ca bahubhir aparaiḥ prākṛtair api
a ūrdhvaṃ hitvā pratiṣṭhante prāṇāḥ puṇyakṛtāṃ nṛpa
c madhyato madhyapuṇyānām adho duṣkṛtakarmaṇām
a ekaḥ śatrur na dvitīyo 'sti śatrur
ajñānatulyaḥ puruṣasya rājan
c yenāvṛtaḥ kurute saṃprayukto
ghorāṇi karmāṇi sudāruṇāni
a prabodhanārthaṃ śrutidharmayuktaṃ
vṛddhān upāsyaṃ ca bhaveta yasya
c prayatnasādhyo hi sa rājaputra
prajñāśareṇonmathitaḥ paraiti
a adhītya vedāṃs tapasā brahmacārī
yajñāñ śaktyā saṃnisṛjyeha pañca
c vanaṃ gacchet puruṣo dharmakāmaḥ
śreyaś citvā sthāpayitvā svavaṃśam
a upabhogair api tyaktaṃ nātmānam avasādayet
c caṇḍālatve 'pi mānuṣyaṃ sarvathā tāta durlabham
a iyaṃ hi yoniḥ prathamā yāṃ prāpya jagatīpate
c ātmā vai śakyate trātuṃ karmabhiḥ śubhalakṣaṇaiḥ
a kathaṃ na vipraṇaśyema yonito 'syā iti prabho
c kurvanti dharmaṃ manujāḥ śrutiprāmāṇyadarśanāt
a yo durlabhataraṃ prāpya mānuṣyam iha vai naraḥ
c dharmāvamantā kāmātmā bhavet sa khalu vañcyate
a yas tu prītipurogeṇa cakṣuṣā tāta paśyati
c dīpopamāni bhūtāni yāvad arcir na naśyati
a sāntvenānupradānena priyavādena cāpy uta
c samaduḥkhasukho bhūtvā sa paratra mahīyate
a dānaṃ tyāgaḥ śobhanā mūrtir adbhyo
bhūyaḥ plāvyaṃ tapasā vai śarīram
c sarasvatīnaimiṣapuṣkareṣu
ye cāpy anye puṇyadeśāḥ pṛthivyām
a gṛheṣu yeṣām asavaḥ patanti
teṣām atho nirharaṇaṃ praśastam
c yānena vai prāpaṇaṃ ca śmaśāne
śaucena nūnaṃ vidhinā caiva dāhaḥ
a iṣṭiḥ puṣṭir yajanaṃ yājanaṃ ca
dānaṃ puṇyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca prayogaḥ
c śaktyā pitryaṃ yac ca kiṃ cit praśastaṃ
sarvāṇy ātmārthe mānavo yaḥ karoti
a dharmaśāstrāṇi vedāś ca ṣaḍaṅgāni narādhipa
c śreyaso 'rthe vidhīyante narasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evad vai sarvam ākhyātaṃ muninā sumahātmanā
c videharājāya purā śreyaso 'rthe narādhipa
 bhīṣma uvāca
a punar eva tu papraccha janako mithilādhipaḥ
c parāśaraṃ mahātmānaṃ dharme paramaniścayam
a kiṃ śreyaḥ kā gatir brahman kiṃ kṛtaṃ na vinaśyati
c kva gato na nivarteta tan me brūhi mahāmune
 parāśara uvāca
a asaṅgaḥ śreyaso mūlaṃ jñānaṃ jñānagatiḥ parā
c cīrṇaṃ tapo na praṇaśyed vāpaḥ kṣetre na naśyati
a chittvādharmamayaṃ pāśaṃ yadā dharme 'bhirajyate
c dattvābhayakṛtaṃ dānaṃ tadā siddhim avāpnuyāt
a yo dadāti sahasrāṇi gavām aśvaśatāni ca
c abhayaṃ sarvabhūtebhyas tad dānam ativartate
a vasan viṣayamadhye 'pi na vasaty eva buddhimān
c saṃvasaty eva durbuddhir asatsu viṣayeṣv api
a nādharmaḥ śliṣyate prājñam āpaḥ puṣkaraparṇavat
c aprājñam adhikaṃ pāpaṃ śliṣyate jatu kāṣṭhavat
a nādharmaḥ kāraṇāpekṣī kartāram abhimuñcati
c kartā khalu yathākālaṃ tat sarvam abhipadyate
e na bhidyante kṛtātmāna ātmapratyayadarśinaḥ
a buddhikarmendriyāṇāṃ hi pramatto yo na budhyate
c śubhāśubheṣu saktātmā prāpnoti sumahad bhayam
a vītarāgo jitakrodhaḥ samyag bhavati yaḥ sadā
c viṣaye vartamāno 'pi na sa pāpena yujyate
a maryādāyāṃ dharmasetur nibaddho naiva sīdati
c puṣṭasrota ivāyattaḥ sphīto bhavati saṃcayaḥ
a yathā bhānugataṃ tejo maṇiḥ śuddhaḥ samādhinā
c ādatte rājaśārdūla tathā yogaḥ pravartate
a yathā tilānām iha puṣpasaṃśrayāt
pṛthak pṛthag yāti guṇo 'tisaumyatām
c tathā narāṇāṃ bhuvi bhāvitātmanāṃ
yathāśrayaṃ sattvaguṇaḥ pravartate
a jahāti dārān ihate na saṃpadaḥ
sadaśvayānaṃ vividhāś ca yāḥ kriyāḥ
c triviṣṭape jātamatir yadā naras
tadāsya buddhir viṣayeṣu bhidyate
a prasaktabuddhir viṣayeṣu yo naro
yo budhyate hy ātmahitaṃ kadā ca na
c sa sarvabhāvānugatena cetasā
nṛpāmiṣeṇeva jhaṣo vikṛṣyate
a saṃghātavān martyalokaḥ parasparam apāśritaḥ
c kadalīgarbhaniḥsāro naur ivāpsu nimajjati
a na dharmakālaḥ puruṣasya niścito
na cāpi mṛtyuḥ puruṣaṃ pratīkṣate
c kriyā hi dharmasya sadaiva śobhanā
yadā naro mṛtyumukhe 'bhivartate
a yathāndhaḥ svagṛhe yukto hy abhyāsād eva gacchati
c tathā yuktena manasā prājño gacchati tāṃ gatim
a maraṇaṃ janmani proktaṃ janma vai maraṇāśritam
c avidvān mokṣadharmeṣu baddho bhramati cakravat
a yathā mṛṇālo 'nugatam āśu muñcati kardamam
c tathātmā puruṣasyeha manasā parimucyate
e manaḥ praṇayate ''tmānaṃ sa enam abhiyuñjati
f yukto yadā sa bhavati tadā tat paśyate param
a parārthe vartamānas tu svakāryaṃ yo 'bhimanyate
c indriyārtheṣu saktaḥ san svakāryāt parihīyate
a adhas tiryaggatiṃ caiva svarge caiva parāṃ gatim
c prāpnoti svakṛtair ātmā prājñasyehetarasya ca
a mṛnmaye bhājane pakve yathā vai nyasyate dravaḥ
c tathā śarīraṃ tapasā taptaṃ viṣayam aśnute
a viṣayān aśnute yas tu na sa bhokṣyaty asaṃśayam
c yas tu bhogāṃs tyajed ātmā sa vai bhoktuṃ vyavasyati
a nīhāreṇa hi saṃvītaḥ śiśnodaraparāyaṇaḥ
c jātyandha iva panthānam āvṛtātmā na budhyate
a vaṇig yathā samudrād vai yathārthaṃ labhate dhanam
c tathā martyārṇave jantoḥ karmavijñānato gatiḥ
a ahorātramaye loke jarārūpeṇa saṃcaran
c mṛtyur grasati bhūtāni pavanaṃ pannago yathā
a svayaṃ kṛtāni karmāṇi jāto jantuḥ prapadyate
c nākṛtaṃ labhate kaś cit kiṃ cid atra priyāpriyam
a śayānaṃ yāntam āsīnaṃ pravṛttaṃ viṣayeṣu ca
c śubhāśubhāni karmāṇi prapadyante naraṃ sadā
a na hy anyat tīram āsādya punas tartuṃ vyavasyati
c durlabho dṛśyate hy asya vinipāto mahārṇave
a yathā bhārāvasaktā hi naur mahāmbhasi tantunā
c tathā mano 'bhiyogād vai śarīraṃ pratikarṣati
a yathā samudram abhitaḥ saṃsyūtāḥ sarito 'parāḥ
c tathādyā prakṛtir yogād abhisaṃsyūyate sadā
a snehapāśair bahuvidhair āsaktamanaso narāḥ
c prakṛtisthā viṣīdanti jale saikataveśmavat
a śarīragṛhasaṃsthasya śaucatīrthasya dehinaḥ
c buddhimārgaprayātasya sukhaṃ tv iha paratra ca
a vistarāḥ kleśasaṃyuktāḥ saṃkṣepās tu sukhāvahāḥ
c parārthaṃ vistarāḥ sarve tyāgam ātmahitaṃ viduḥ
a saṃkalpajo mitravargo jñātayaḥ kāraṇātmakāḥ
c bhāryā dāsāś ca putrāś ca svam artham anuyuñjate
a na mātā na pitā kiṃ cit kasya cit pratipadyate
c dānapathyodano jantuḥ svakarmaphalam aśnute
a mātā putraḥ pitā bhrātā bhāryā mitrajanas tathā
c aṣṭāpadapadasthāne tv akṣamudreva nyasyate
a sarvāṇi karmāṇi purā kṛtāni
śubhāśubhāny ātmano yānti jantoḥ
c upasthitaṃ karmaphalaṃ viditvā
buddhiṃ tathā codayate 'ntarātmā
a vyavasāyaṃ samāśritya sahāyān yo 'dhigacchati
c na tasya kaś cid ārambhaḥ kadā cid avasīdati
a advaidhamanasaṃ yuktaṃ śūraṃ dhīraṃ vipaścitam
c na śrīḥ saṃtyajate nityam ādityam iva raśmayaḥ
a āstikyavyavasāyābhyām upāyād vismayād dhiyā
c yam ārabhaty anindyātmā na so 'rthaḥ parisīdati
a sarvaḥ svāni śubhāśubhāni niyataṃ karmāṇi jantuḥ svayaṃ
garbhāt saṃpratipadyate tad ubhayaṃ yat tena pūrvaṃ kṛtam
c mṛtyuś cāparihāravān samagatiḥ kālena viccheditā
dāroś cūrṇam ivāśmasāravihitaṃ karmāntikaṃ prāpayet
a svarūpatām ātmakṛtaṃ ca vistaraṃ
kulānvayaṃ dravyasamṛddhisaṃcayam
c naro hi sarvo labhate yathākṛtaṃ
śubhāśubhenātmakṛtena karmaṇā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity ukto janako rājan yathātathyaṃ manīṣiṇā
c śrutvā dharmavidāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ parāṃ mudam avāpa ha
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a satyaṃ kṣamāṃ damaṃ prajñāṃ praśaṃsanti pitāmaha
c vidvāṃso manujā loke katham etan mataṃ tava
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣye 'ham itihāsaṃ purātanam
c sādhyānām iha saṃvādaṃ haṃsasya ca yudhiṣṭhira
a haṃso bhūtvātha sauvarṇas tv ajo nityaḥ prajāpatiḥ
c sa vai paryeti lokāṃs trīn atha sādhyān upāgamat
 sādhyā ūcuḥ
a śakune vayaṃ sma devā vai sādhyās tvām anuyujmahe
c pṛcchāmas tvāṃ mokṣadharmaṃ bhavāṃś ca kila mokṣavit
a śruto 'si naḥ paṇḍito dhīravādī
sādhuśabdaḥ patate te patatrin
c kiṃ manyase śreṣṭhatamaṃ dvija tvaṃ
kasmin manas te ramate mahātman
a tan naḥ kāryaṃ pakṣivara praśādhi
yat kāryāṇāṃ manyase śreṣṭham ekam
c yat kṛtvā vai puruṣaḥ sarvabandhair
vimucyate vihagendreha śīghram
 haṃsa uvāca
a idaṃ kāryam amṛtāśāḥ śṛṇomi
tapo damaḥ satyam ātmābhiguptiḥ
c granthīn vimucya hṛdayasya sarvān
priyāpriye svaṃ vaśam ānayīta
a nāruṃtudaḥ syān na nṛśaṃsavādī
na hīnataḥ param abhyādadīta
c yayāsya vācā para udvijeta
na tāṃ vaded ruśatīṃ pāpalokyām
a vāksāyakā vadanān niṣpatanti
yair āhataḥ śocati rātryahāni
c parasya nāmarmasu te patanti
tān paṇḍito nāvasṛjet pareṣu
a paraś ced enam ativādabāṇair
bhṛśaṃ vidhyec chama eveha kāryaḥ
c saṃroṣyamāṇaḥ pratimṛṣyate yaḥ
sa ādatte sukṛtaṃ vai parasya
a kṣepābhimānād abhiṣaṅgavyalīkaṃ
nigṛhṇāti jvalitaṃ yaś ca manyum
c aduṣṭacetā mudito 'nasūyuḥ
sa ādatte sukṛtaṃ vai pareṣām
a ākruśyamāno na vadāmi kiṃ cit
kṣamāmy ahaṃ tāḍyamānaś ca nityam
c śreṣṭhaṃ hy etat kṣamam apy āhur āryāḥ
satyaṃ tathaivārjavam ānṛśaṃsyam
a vedasyopaniṣat satyaṃ satyasyopaniṣad damaḥ
c damasyopaniṣan mokṣa etat sarvānuśāsanam
a vāco vegaṃ manasaḥ krodhavegaṃ
vivitsāvegam udaropasthavegam
c etān vegān yo viṣahaty udīrṇāṃs
taṃ manye 'haṃ brāhmaṇaṃ vai muniṃ ca
a akrodhanaḥ krudhyatāṃ vai viśiṣṭas
tathā titikṣur atitikṣor viśiṣṭaḥ
c amānuṣān mānuṣo vai viśiṣṭas
tathājñānāj jñānavān vai pradhānaḥ
a ākruśyamāno nākrośen manyur eva titikṣataḥ
c ākroṣṭāraṃ nirdahati sukṛtaṃ cāsya vindati
a yo nātyuktaḥ prāha rūkṣaṃ priyaṃ vā
yo vā hato na pratihanti dhairyāt
c pāpaṃ ca yo necchati tasya hantus
tasmai devāḥ spṛhayante sadaiva
a pāpīyasaḥ kṣametaiva śreyasaḥ sadṛśasya ca
c vimānito hato ''kruṣṭa evaṃ siddhiṃ gamiṣyati
a sadāham āryān nibhṛto 'py upāse
na me vivitsā na ca me 'sti roṣaḥ
c na cāpy ahaṃ lipsamānaḥ paraimi
na caiva kiṃ cid viṣameṇa yāmi
a nāhaṃ śaptaḥ pratiśapāmi kiṃ cid
damaṃ dvāraṃ hy amṛtasyeha vedmi
c guhyaṃ brahma tad idaṃ vo bravīmi
na mānuṣāc chreṣṭhataraṃ hi kiṃ cit
a vimucyamānaḥ pāpebhyo dhanebhya iva candramāḥ
c virajāḥ kālam ākāṅkṣan dhīro dhairyeṇa sidhyati
a yaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhavati hy arcanīya
utsecane stambha ivābhijātaḥ
c yasmai vācaṃ supraśastāṃ vadanti
sa vai devān gacchati saṃyatātmā
a na tathā vaktum icchanti kalyāṇān puruṣe guṇān
c yathaiṣāṃ vaktum icchanti nairguṇyam anuyuñjakāḥ
a yasya vāṅmanasī gupte samyak praṇihite sadā
c vedās tapaś ca tyāgaś ca sa idaṃ sarvam āpnuyāt
a ākrośanāvamānābhyām abudhād vardhate budhaḥ
c tasmān na vardhayed anyaṃ na cātmānaṃ vihiṃsayet
a amṛtasyeva saṃtṛpyed avamānasya vai dvijaḥ
c sukhaṃ hy avamataḥ śete yo 'vamantā sa naśyati
a yat krodhano yajate yad dadāti
yad vā tapas tapyati yaj juhoti
c vaivasvatas tad dharate 'sya sarvaṃ
moghaḥ śramo bhavati krodhanasya
a catvāri yasya dvārāṇi suguptāny amarottamāḥ
c upastham udaraṃ hastau vāk caturthī sa dharmavit
a satyaṃ damaṃ hy ārjavam ānṛśaṃsyaṃ
dhṛtiṃ titikṣām abhisevamānaḥ
c svādhyāyanityo 'spṛhayan pareṣām
ekāntaśīly ūrdhvagatir bhavet saḥ
a sarvān etān anucaran vatsavac caturaḥ stanān
c na pāvanatamaṃ kiṃ cit satyād adhyagamaṃ kva cit
a ācakṣe 'haṃ manuṣyebhyo devebhyaḥ pratisaṃcaran
c satyaṃ svargasya sopānaṃ pārāvārasya naur iva
a yādṛśaiḥ saṃnivasati yādṛśāṃś copasevate
c yādṛg icchec ca bhavituṃ tādṛg bhavati pūruṣaḥ
a yadi santaṃ sevate yady asantaṃ
tapasvinaṃ yadi vā stenam eva
c vāso yathā raṅgavaśaṃ prayāti
tathā sa teṣāṃ vaśam abhyupaiti
a sadā devāḥ sādhubhiḥ saṃvadante
na mānuṣaṃ viṣayaṃ yānti draṣṭum
c nenduḥ samaḥ syād asamo hi vāyur
uccāvacaṃ viṣayaṃ yaḥ sa veda
a aduṣṭaṃ vartamāne tu hṛdayāntarapūruṣe
c tenaiva devāḥ prīyante satāṃ mārgasthitena vai
a śiśnodare ye 'bhiratāḥ sadaiva
stenā narā vākparuṣāś ca nityam
c apetadoṣān iti tān viditvā
dūrād devāḥ saṃparivarjayanti
a na vai devā hīnasattvena toṣyāḥ
sarvāśinā duṣkṛtakarmaṇā vā
c satyavratā ye tu narāḥ kṛtajñā
dharme ratās taiḥ saha saṃbhajante
a avyāhṛtaṃ vyāhṛtāc chreya āhuḥ
satyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tad dvitīyam
c dharmaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tat tṛtīyaṃ
priyaṃ vaded vyāhṛtaṃ tac caturtham
 sādhyā ūcuḥ
a kenāyam āvṛto lokaḥ kena vā na prakāśate
c kena tyajati mitrāṇi kena svargaṃ na gacchati
 haṃsa uvāca
a ajñānenāvṛto loko mātsaryān na prakāśate
c lobhāt tyajati mitrāṇi saṅgāt svargaṃ na gacchati
 sādhyā ūcuḥ
a kaḥ svid eko ramate brāhmaṇānāṃ
kaḥ svid eko bahubhir joṣam āste
c kaḥ svid eko balavān durbalo 'pi
kaḥ svid eṣāṃ kalahaṃ nānvavaiti
 haṃsa uvāca
a prājña eko ramate brāhmaṇānāṃ
prājña eko bahubhir joṣam āste
c prājña eko balavān durbalo 'pi
prājña eṣāṃ kalahaṃ nānvavaiti
 sādhyā ūcuḥ
a kiṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ devatvaṃ kiṃ ca sādhutvam ucyate
c asādhutvaṃ ca kiṃ teṣāṃ kim eṣāṃ mānuṣaṃ matam
 haṃsa uvāca
a svādhyāya eṣāṃ devatvaṃ vrataṃ sādhutvam ucyate
c asādhutvaṃ parīvādo mṛtyur mānuṣam ucyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
 ity uktvā varado devo bhagavān nitya avyayaḥ
 sādhyair devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ divam evāruroha saḥ
 etad yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ putryaṃ svargāya tu dhruvam
 darśitaṃ devadevena parameṇāvyayena ca
a saṃvāda ity ayaṃ śreṣṭhaḥ sādhyānāṃ parikīrtitaḥ
c kṣetraṃ vai karmaṇāṃ yoniḥ sadbhāvaḥ satyam ucyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a sāṃkhye yoge ca me tāta viśeṣaṃ vaktum arhasi
c tava sarvajña sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ kurusattama
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sāṃkhyāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ praśaṃsanti yogā yogaṃ dvijātayaḥ
c vadanti kāraṇaiḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ svapakṣodbhāvanāya vai
a anīśvaraḥ kathaṃ mucyed ity evaṃ śatrukarśana
c vadanti kāraṇaiḥ śraiṣṭhyaṃ yogāḥ samyaṅ manīṣiṇaḥ
a vadanti kāraṇaṃ cedaṃ sāṃkhyāḥ samyag dvijātayaḥ
c vijñāyeha gatīḥ sarvā virakto viṣayeṣu yaḥ
a ūrdhvaṃ sa dehāt suvyaktaṃ vimucyed iti nānyathā
c etad āhur mahāprājñāḥ sāṃkhyaṃ vai mokṣadarśanam
a svapakṣe kāraṇaṃ grāhyaṃ samarthaṃ vacanaṃ hitam
c śiṣṭānāṃ hi mataṃ grāhyaṃ tvadvidhaiḥ śiṣṭasaṃmataiḥ
a pratyakṣahetavo yogāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ śāstraviniścayāḥ
c ubhe caite mate tattve mama tāta yudhiṣṭhira
a ubhe caite mate jñāne nṛpate śiṣṭasaṃmate
c anuṣṭhite yathāśāstraṃ nayetāṃ paramāṃ gatim
a tulyaṃ śaucaṃ tayor yuktaṃ dayā bhūteṣu cānagha
c vratānāṃ dhāraṇaṃ tulyaṃ darśanaṃ na samaṃ tayoḥ
d tayos tu darśanaṃ samyak sūkṣme bhāve prasajyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yadi tulyaṃ vrataṃ śaucaṃ dayā cātra pitāmaha
c tulyaṃ na darśanaṃ kasmāt tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a rāgaṃ mohaṃ tathā snehaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca kevalam
c yogāc chittvādito doṣān pañcaitān prāpnuvanti tat
a yathā cānimiṣāḥ sthūlā jālaṃ chittvā punar jalam
c prāpnuvanti tathā yogās tat padaṃ vītakalmaṣāḥ
a tathaiva vāgurāṃ chittvā balavanto yathā mṛgāḥ
c prāpnuyur vimalaṃ mārgaṃ vimuktāḥ sarvabandhanaiḥ
a lobhajāni tathā rājan bandhanāni balānvitāḥ
c chittvā yogāḥ paraṃ mārgaṃ gacchanti vimalāḥ śivam
a abalāś ca mṛgā rājan vāgurāsu tathāpare
c vinaśyanti na saṃdehas tadvad yogabalād ṛte
a balahīnāś ca kaunteya yathā jālagatā jhaṣāḥ
c antaṃ gacchanti rājendra tathā yogāḥ sudurbalāḥ
a yathā ca śakunāḥ sūkṣmāḥ prāpya jālam ariṃdama
c tatra saktā vipadyante mucyante ca balānvitāḥ
a karmajair bandhanair baddhās tadvad yogāḥ paraṃtapa
c abalā vai vinaśyanti mucyante ca balānvitāḥ
a alpakaś ca yathā rājan vahniḥ śāmyati durbalaḥ
c ākrānta indhanaiḥ sthūlais tadvad yogo 'balaḥ prabho
a sa eva ca yadā rājan vahnir jātabalaḥ punaḥ
c samīraṇayutaḥ kṛtsnāṃ dahet kṣipraṃ mahīm api
a tadvaj jātabalo yogī dīptatejā mahābalaḥ
c antakāla ivādityaḥ kṛtsnaṃ saṃśoṣayej jagat
a durbalaś ca yathā rājan srotasā hriyate naraḥ
c balahīnas tathā yogo viṣayair hriyate 'vaśaḥ
a tad eva ca yathā sroto viṣṭambhayati vāraṇaḥ
c tadvad yogabalaṃ labdhvā vyūhate viṣayān bahūn
a viśanti cāvaśāḥ pārtha yogā yogabalānvitāḥ
c prajāpatīn ṛṣīn devān mahābhūtāni ceśvarāḥ
a na yamo nāntakaḥ kruddho na mṛtyur bhīmavikramaḥ
c īśate nṛpate sarve yogasyāmitatejasaḥ
a ātmanāṃ ca sahasrāṇi bahūni bharatarṣabha
c yogaḥ kuryād balaṃ prāpya taiś ca sarvair mahīṃ caret
a prāpnuyād viṣayāṃś caiva punaś cograṃ tapaś caret
c saṃkṣipec ca punaḥ pārtha sūryas tejoguṇān iva
a balasthasya hi yogasya bandhaneśasya pārthiva
c vimokṣaprabhaviṣṇutvam upapannam asaṃśayam
a balāni yoge proktāni mayaitāni viśāṃ pate
c nidarśanārthaṃ sūkṣmāṇi vakṣyāmi ca punas tava
a ātmanaś ca samādhāne dhāraṇāṃ prati cābhibho
c nidarśanāni sūkṣmāṇi śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha
a apramatto yathā dhanvī lakṣyaṃ hanti samāhitaḥ
c yuktaḥ samyak tathā yogī mokṣaṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam
a snehapūrṇe yathā pātre mana ādhāya niścalam
c puruṣo yatta ārohet sopānaṃ yuktamānasaḥ
a yuktvā tathāyam ātmānaṃ yogaḥ pārthiva niścalam
c karoty amalam ātmānaṃ bhāskaropamadarśanam
a yathā ca nāvaṃ kaunteya karṇadhāraḥ samāhitaḥ
c mahārṇavagatāṃ śīghraṃ nayet pārthiva pattanam
a tadvad ātmasamādhānaṃ yuktvā yogena tattvavit
c durgamaṃ sthānam āpnoti hitvā deham imaṃ nṛpa
a sārathiś ca yathā yuktvā sadaśvān susamāhitaḥ
c deśam iṣṭaṃ nayaty āśu dhanvinaṃ puruṣarṣabha
a tathaiva nṛpate yogī dhāraṇāsu samāhitaḥ
c prāpnoty āśu paraṃ sthānaṃ lakṣaṃ mukta ivāśugaḥ
a āveśyātmani cātmānaṃ yogī tiṣṭhati yo 'calaḥ
c pāpaṃ hanteva mīnānāṃ padam āpnoti so 'jaram
a nābhyāṃ kaṇṭhe ca śīrṣe ca hṛdi vakṣasi pārśvayoḥ
c darśane sparśane cāpi ghrāṇe cāmitavikrama
a sthāneṣv eteṣu yo yogī mahāvratasamāhitaḥ
c ātmanā sūkṣmam ātmānaṃ yuṅkte samyag viśāṃ pate
a sa śīghram amalaprajñaḥ karma dagdhvā śubhāśubham
c uttamaṃ yogam āsthāya yadīcchati vimucyate
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a āhārān kīdṛśān kṛtvā kāni jitvā ca bhārata
c yogī balam avāpnoti tad bhavān vaktum arhati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a kaṇānāṃ bhakṣaṇe yuktaḥ piṇyākasya ca bhakṣaṇe
c snehānāṃ varjane yukto yogī balam avāpnuyāt
a bhuñjāno yāvakaṃ rūkṣaṃ dīrghakālam ariṃdama
c ekārāmo viśuddhātmā yogī balam avāpnuyāt
a pakṣān māsān ṛtūṃś citrān saṃcaraṃś ca guhās tathā
c apaḥ pītvā payomiśrā yogī balam avāpnuyāt
a akhaṇḍam api vā māsaṃ satataṃ manujeśvara
c upoṣya samyak śuddhātmā yogī balam avāpnuyāt
a kāmaṃ jitvā tathā krodhaṃ śītoṣṇe varṣam eva ca
c bhayaṃ nidrāṃ tathā śvāsaṃ pauruṣaṃ viṣayāṃs tathā
a aratiṃ durjayāṃ caiva ghorāṃ tṛṣṇāṃ ca pārthiva
c sparśān sarvāṃs tathā tandrīṃ durjayāṃ nṛpasattama
a dīpayanti mahātmānaḥ sūkṣmam ātmānam ātmanā
c vītarāgā mahāprājñā dhyānādhyayanasaṃpadā
a durgas tv eṣa mataḥ panthā brāhmaṇānāṃ vipaścitām
c na kaś cid vrajati hy asmin kṣemeṇa bharatarṣabha
a yathā kaś cid vanaṃ ghoraṃ bahusarpasarīsṛpam
c śvabhravat toyahīnaṃ ca durgamaṃ bahukaṇṭakam
a abhaktam aṭavīprāyaṃ dāvadagdhamahīruham
c panthānaṃ taskarākīrṇaṃ kṣemeṇābhipated yuvā
a yogamārgaṃ tathāsādya yaḥ kaś cid bhajate dvijaḥ
c kṣemeṇoparamen mārgād bahudoṣo hi sa smṛtaḥ
a sustheyaṃ kṣuradhārāsu niśitāsu mahīpate
c dhāraṇāsu tu yogasya duḥstheyam akṛtātmabhiḥ
a vipannā dhāraṇās tāta nayanti naśubhāṃ gatim
c netṛhīnā yathā nāvaḥ puruṣān arṇave nṛpa
a yas tu tiṣṭhati kaunteya dhāraṇāsu yathāvidhi
c maraṇaṃ janma duḥkhaṃ ca sukhaṃ ca sa vimuñcati
a nānāśāstreṣu niṣpannaṃ yogeṣv idam udāhṛtam
c paraṃ yogaṃ tu yat kṛtsnaṃ niścitaṃ tad dvijātiṣu
a paraṃ hi tad brahma mahan mahātman
brahmāṇam īśaṃ varadaṃ ca viṣṇum
c bhavaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca ṣaḍānanaṃ ca
ṣaḍ brahmaputrāṃś ca mahānubhāvān
a tamaś ca kaṣṭaṃ sumahad rajaś ca
sattvaṃ ca śuddhaṃ prakṛtiṃ parāṃ ca
c siddhiṃ ca devīṃ varuṇasya patnīṃ
tejaś ca kṛtsnaṃ sumahac ca dhairyam
a tārādhipaṃ vai vimalaṃ satāraṃ
viśvāṃś ca devān uragān pitṝṃś ca
c śailāṃś ca kṛtsnān udadhīṃś ca ghorān
nadīś ca sarvāḥ savanān ghanāṃś ca
a nāgān nagān yakṣagaṇān diśaś ca
gandharvasaṃghān puruṣān striyaś ca
c parasparaṃ prāpya mahān mahātmā
viśeta yogī nacirād vimuktaḥ
a kathā ca yeyaṃ nṛpate prasaktā
deve mahāvīryamatau śubheyam
c yogān sa sarvān abhibhūya martyān
nārāyaṇātmā kurute mahātmā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a samyak tvayāyaṃ nṛpate varṇitaḥ śiṣṭasaṃmataḥ
c yogamārgo yathānyāyaṃ śiṣyāyeha hitaiṣiṇā
a sāṃkhye tv idānīṃ kārtsnyena vidhiṃ prabrūhi pṛcchate
c triṣu lokeṣu yaj jñānaṃ sarvaṃ tad viditaṃ hi te
 bhīṣma uvāca
a śṛṇu me tvam idaṃ śuddhaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ viditātmanām
c vihitaṃ yatibhir buddhaiḥ kapilādibhir īśvaraiḥ
a yasmin na vibhramāḥ ke cid dṛśyante manujarṣabha
c guṇāś ca yasmin bahavo doṣahāniś ca kevalā
a jñānena parisaṃkhyāya sadoṣān viṣayān nṛpa
c mānuṣān durjayān kṛtsnān paiśācān viṣayāṃs tathā
a rākṣasān viṣayāñ jñātvā yakṣāṇāṃ viṣayāṃs tathā
c viṣayān auragāñ jñātvā gāndharvaviṣayāṃs tathā
a pitṝṇāṃ viṣayāñ jñātvā tiryakṣu caratāṃ nṛpa
c suparṇaviṣayāñ jñātvā marutāṃ viṣayāṃs tathā
a rājarṣiviṣayāñ jñātvā brahmarṣiviṣayāṃs tathā
c āsurān viṣayāñ jñātvā vaiśvadevāṃs tathaiva ca
a devarṣiviṣayāñ jñātvā yogānām api ceśvarān
c viṣayāṃś ca prajeśānāṃ brahmaṇo viṣayāṃs tathā
a āyuṣaś ca paraṃ kālaṃ loke vijñāya tattvataḥ
c sukhasya ca paraṃ tattvaṃ vijñāya vadatāṃ vara
a prāpte kāle ca yad duḥkhaṃ patatāṃ viṣayaiṣiṇām
c tiryak ca patatāṃ duḥkhaṃ patatāṃ narake ca yat
a svargasya ca guṇān kṛtsnān doṣān sarvāṃś ca bhārata
c vedavāde ca ye doṣā guṇā ye cāpi vaidikāḥ
a jñānayoge ca ye doṣā guṇā yoge ca ye nṛpa
c sāṃkhyajñāne ca ye doṣās tathaiva ca guṇā nṛpa
d itareṣu ca ye doṣā guṇās teṣu ca bhārata
d parisaṃkhyāya saṃkhyānaṃ matvā sāṃkhyaṃ guṇādhikam
a sattvaṃ daśaguṇaṃ jñātvā rajo navaguṇaṃ tathā
c tamaś cāṣṭaguṇaṃ jñātvā buddhiṃ saptaguṇāṃ tathā
a ṣaḍguṇaṃ ca nabho jñātvā manaḥ pañcaguṇaṃ tathā
c buddhiṃ caturguṇāṃ jñātvā tamaś ca triguṇaṃ mahat
a dviguṇaṃ ca rajo jñātvā sattvam ekaguṇaṃ punaḥ
c mārgaṃ vijñāya tattvena pralaye prekṣaṇaṃ tathā
a jñānavijñānasaṃpannāḥ kāraṇair bhāvitāḥ śubhaiḥ
c prāpnuvanti śubhaṃ mokṣaṃ sūkṣmā iha nabhaḥ param
a rūpeṇa dṛṣṭiṃ saṃyuktāṃ ghrāṇaṃ gandhaguṇena ca
c śabde saktaṃ tathā śrotraṃ jihvāṃ rasaguṇeṣu ca
a tanuṃ sparśe tathā saktāṃ vāyuṃ nabhasi cāśritam
c mohaṃ tamasi saṃsaktaṃ lobham artheṣu saṃśritam
a viṣṇuṃ krānte bale śakraṃ koṣṭhe saktaṃ tathānalam
c apsu devīṃ tathā saktām apas tejasi cāśritāḥ
a tejo vāyau tu saṃsaktaṃ vāyuṃ nabhasi cāśritam
c nabho mahati saṃyuktaṃ mahad buddhau ca saṃśritam
a buddhiṃ tamasi saṃsaktāṃ tamo rajasi cāśritam
c rajaḥ sattve tathā saktaṃ sattvaṃ saktaṃ tathātmani
a saktam ātmānam īśe ca deve nārāyaṇe tathā
c devaṃ mokṣe ca saṃsaktaṃ mokṣaṃ saktaṃ tu na kva cit
a jñātvā sattvayutaṃ dehaṃ vṛtaṃ ṣoḍaśabhir guṇaiḥ
c svabhāvaṃ cetanāṃ caiva jñātvā vai deham āśrite
a madhyastham ekam ātmānaṃ pāpaṃ yasmin na vidyate
c dvitīyaṃ karma vijñāya nṛpate viṣayaiṣiṇām
a indriyāṇīndriyārthāṃś ca sarvān ātmani saṃśritān
b durlabhatvaṃ ca mokṣasya vijñāya śrutipūrvakam
c prāṇāpānau samānaṃ ca vyānodānau ca tattvataḥ
a avāk caivānilaṃ jñātvā pravahaṃ cānilaṃ punaḥ
c sapta vātāṃs tathā śeṣān saptadhā vidhivat punaḥ
a prajāpatīn ṛṣīṃś caiva mārgāṃś ca subahūn varān
c saptarṣīṃś ca bahūñ jñātvā rājarṣīṃś ca paraṃtapa
a surarṣīn mahataś cānyān maharṣīn sūryasaṃnibhān
c aiśvaryāc cyāvitāñ jñātvā kālena mahatā nṛpa
a mahatāṃ bhūtasaṃghānāṃ śrutvā nāśaṃ ca pārthiva
c gatiṃ cāpy aśubhāṃ jñātvā nṛpate pāpakarmaṇām
a vaitaraṇyāṃ ca yad duḥkhaṃ patitānāṃ yamakṣaye
c yonīṣu ca vicitrāsu saṃsārān aśubhāṃs tathā
a jaṭhare cāśubhe vāsaṃ śoṇitodakabhājane
c śleṣmamūtrapurīṣe ca tīvragandhasamanvite
a śukraśoṇitasaṃghāte majjāsnāyuparigrahe
c sirāśatasamākīrṇe navadvāre pure 'śucau
a vijñāyāhitam ātmānaṃ yogāṃś ca vividhān nṛpa
c tāmasānāṃ ca jantūnāṃ ramaṇīyāvṛtātmanām
a sāttvikānāṃ ca jantūnāṃ kutsitaṃ bharatarṣabha
c garhitaṃ mahatām arthe sāṃkhyānāṃ viditātmanām
a upaplavāṃs tathā ghorāñ śaśinas tejasas tathā
c tārāṇāṃ patanaṃ dṛṣṭvā nakṣatrāṇāṃ ca paryayam
a dvaṃdvānāṃ viprayogaṃ ca vijñāya kṛpaṇaṃ nṛpa
c anyonyabhakṣaṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhūtānām api cāśubham
a bālye mohaṃ ca vijñāya kṣayaṃ dehasya cāśubham
c rāge mohe ca saṃprāpte kva cit sattvaṃ samāśritam
a sahasreṣu naraḥ kaś cin mokṣabuddhiṃ samāśritaḥ
c durlabhatvaṃ ca mokṣasya vijñāya śrutipūrvakam
a bahumānam alabdheṣu labdhe madhyasthatāṃ punaḥ
c viṣayāṇāṃ ca daurātmyaṃ vijñāya nṛpate punaḥ
a gatāsūnāṃ ca kaunteya dehān dṛṣṭvā tathāśubhān
c vāsaṃ kuleṣu jantūnāṃ duḥkhaṃ vijñāya bhārata
a brahmaghnānāṃ gatiṃ jñātvā patitānāṃ sudāruṇām
c surāpāne ca saktānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ durātmanām
e gurudāraprasaktānāṃ gatiṃ vijñāya cāśubhām
a jananīṣu ca vartante ye na samyag yudhiṣṭhira
c sadevakeṣu lokeṣu ye na vartanti mānavāḥ
a tena jñānena vijñāya gatiṃ cāśubhakarmaṇām
c tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca vijñāya gatayaḥ pṛthak
a vedavādāṃs tathā citrān ṛtūnāṃ paryayāṃs tathā
c kṣayaṃ saṃvatsarāṇāṃ ca māsānāṃ prakṣayaṃ tathā
a pakṣakṣayaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā divasānāṃ ca saṃkṣayam
c kṣayaṃ vṛddhiṃ ca candrasya dṛṣṭvā pratyakṣatas tathā
a vṛddhiṃ dṛṣṭvā samudrāṇāṃ kṣayaṃ teṣāṃ tathā punaḥ
c kṣayaṃ dhanānāṃ ca tathā punar vṛddhiṃ tathaiva ca
a saṃyogānāṃ kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā yugānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
c kṣayaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā śailānāṃ kṣayaṃ ca saritāṃ tathā
a varṇānāṃ ca kṣayaṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣayāntaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ
c jarāmṛtyuṃ tathā janma dṛṣṭvā duḥkhāni caiva ha
a dehadoṣāṃs tathā jñātvā teṣāṃ duḥkhaṃ ca tattvataḥ
c dehaviklavatāṃ caiva samyag vijñāya bhārata
a ātmadoṣāṃś ca vijñāya sarvān ātmani saṃśritān
c svadehād utthitān gandhāṃs tathā vijñāya cāśubhān
d mūtraśleṣmapurīṣādīn svedajāṃś ca sukutsitān
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kān svagātrodbhavān doṣān paśyasy amitavikrama
c etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛtsnaṃ vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a pañca doṣān prabho dehe pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
c mārgajñāḥ kāpilāḥ sāṃkhyāḥ śṛṇu tān arisūdana
a kāmakrodhau bhayaṃ nidrā pañcamaḥ śvāsa ucyate
c ete doṣāḥ śarīreṣu dṛśyante sarvadehinām
a chindanti kṣamayā krodhaṃ kāmaṃ saṃkalpavarjanāt
c sattvasaṃśīlanān nidrām apramādād bhayaṃ tathā
e chindanti pañcamaṃ śvāsaṃ laghvāhāratayā nṛpa
a guṇān guṇaśatair jñātvā doṣān doṣaśatair api
c hetūn hetuśataiś citraiś citrān vijñāya tattvataḥ
a apāṃ phenopamaṃ lokaṃ viṣṇor māyāśatair vṛtam
c cittabhittipratīkāśaṃ nalasāram anarthakam
a tamaḥ śvabhranibhaṃ dṛṣṭvā varṣabudbudasaṃnibham
c nāśaprāyaṃ sukhād dhīnaṃ nāśottaram abhāvagam
e rajas tamasi saṃmagnaṃ paṅke dvipam ivāvaśam
a sāṃkhyā rājan mahāprājñās tyaktvā dehaṃ prajākṛtam
c jñānajñeyena sāṃkhyena vyāpinā mahatā nṛpa
a rājasān aśubhān gandhāṃs tāmasāṃś ca tathāvidhān
c puṇyāṃś ca sāttvikān gandhān sparśajān dehasaṃśritān
e chittvāśu jñānaśastreṇa tapodaṇḍena bhārata
a tato duḥkhodakaṃ ghoraṃ cintāśokamahāhradam
c vyādhimṛtyumahāgrāhaṃ mahābhayamahoragam
a tamaḥkūrmaṃ rajomīnaṃ prajñayā saṃtaranty uta
c snehapaṅkaṃ jarādurgaṃ sparśadvīpam ariṃdama
a karmāgādhaṃ satyatīraṃ sthitavratam idaṃ nṛpa
c hiṃsāśīghramahāvegaṃ nānārasamahākaram
a nānāprītimahāratnaṃ duḥkhajvarasamīraṇam
c śokatṛṣṇāmahāvartaṃ tīkṣṇavyādhimahāgajam
a asthisaṃghātasaṃghāṭaṃ śleṣmaphenam ariṃdama
c dānamuktākaraṃ bhīmaṃ śoṇitahradavidrumam
a hasitotkruṣṭanirghoṣaṃ nānājñānasudustaram
c rodanāśrumalakṣāraṃ saṅgatyāgaparāyaṇam
a punar ājanmalokaughaṃ putrabāndhavapattanam
c ahiṃsāsatyamaryādaṃ prāṇatyāgamahormiṇam
a vedāntagamanadvīpaṃ sarvabhūtadayodadhim
c mokṣaduṣprāpaviṣayaṃ vaḍavāmukhasāgaram
a taranti munayaḥ siddhā jñānayogena bhārata
c tīrtvā ca dustaraṃ janma viśanti vimalaṃ nabhaḥ
a tatas tān sukṛtīn sāṃkhyān sūryo vahati raśmibhiḥ
c padmatantuvad āviśya pravahan viṣayān nṛpa
a tatra tān pravaho vāyuḥ pratigṛhṇāti bhārata
c vītarāgān yatīn siddhān vīryayuktāṃs tapodhanān
a sūkṣmaḥ śītaḥ sugandhī ca sukhasparśaś ca bhārata
c saptānāṃ marutāṃ śreṣṭho lokān gacchati yaḥ śubhān
e sa tān vahati kaunteya nabhasaḥ paramāṃ gatim
a nabho vahati lokeśa rajasaḥ paramāṃ gatim
b tamo vahati rājendra rajasaḥ paramāṃ gatim
c rajo vahati rājendra sattvasya paramāṃ gatim
a sattvaṃ vahati śuddhātman paraṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
c prabhur vahati śuddhātmā paramātmānam ātmanā
a paramātmānam āsādya tadbhūtāyatanāmalāḥ
c amṛtatvāya kalpante na nivartanti cābhibho
e paramā sā gatiḥ pārtha nirdvaṃdvānāṃ mahātmanām
f satyārjavaratānāṃ vai sarvabhūtadayāvatām
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a sthānam uttamam āsādya bhagavantaṃ sthiravratāḥ
c ājanmamaraṇaṃ vā te smaranty uta na vānagha
a yad atra tathyaṃ tan me tvaṃ yathāvad vaktum arhasi
c tvad ṛte mānavaṃ nānyaṃ praṣṭum arhāmi kaurava
a mokṣadoṣo mahān eṣa prāpya siddhiṃ gatān ṛṣīn
c yadi tatraiva vijñāne vartante yatayaḥ pare
