a pravṛttilakṣaṇaṃ dharmaṃ paśyāmi paramaṃ nṛpa
c magnasya hi pare jñāne kiṃ nu duḥkhataraṃ bhavet
 bhīṣma uvāca
a yathānyāyaṃ tvayā tāta praśnaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ susaṃkaṭaḥ
c buddhānām api saṃmohaḥ praśne 'smin bharatarṣabha
e atrāpi tattvaṃ paramaṃ śṛṇu samyaṅ mayeritam
a buddhiś ca paramā yatra kāpilānāṃ mahātmanām
c indriyāṇy api budhyante svadehaṃ dehino nṛpa
e kāraṇāny ātmanas tāni sūkṣmaḥ paśyati tais tu saḥ
a ātmanā viprahīṇāni kāṣṭhakuḍyasamāni tu
c vinaśyanti na saṃdehaḥ phenā iva mahārṇave
a indriyaiḥ saha suptasya dehinaḥ śatrutāpana
c sūkṣmaś carati sarvatra nabhasīva samīraṇaḥ
a sa paśyati yathānyāyaṃ sparśān spṛśati cābhibho
c budhyamāno yathāpūrvam akhileneha bhārata
a indriyāṇīha sarvāṇi sve sve sthāne yathāvidhi
c anīśatvāt pralīyante sarpā hataviṣā iva
a indriyāṇāṃ tu sarveṣāṃ svasthāneṣv eva sarvaśaḥ
c ākramya gatayaḥ sūkṣmāś caraty ātmā na saṃśayaḥ
a sattvasya ca guṇān kṛtsnān rajasaś ca guṇān punaḥ
c guṇāṃś ca tamasaḥ sarvān guṇān buddheś ca bhārata
a guṇāṃś ca manasas tadvan nabhasaś ca guṇāṃs tathā
c guṇān vāyoś ca dharmātmaṃs tejasaś ca guṇān punaḥ
a apāṃ guṇāṃs tathā pārtha pārthivāṃś ca guṇān api
c sarvātmanā guṇair vyāpya kṣetrajñaḥ sa yudhiṣṭhira
a ātmā ca yāti kṣetrajñaṃ karmaṇī ca śubhāśubhe
c śiṣyā iva mahātmānam indriyāṇi ca taṃ vibho
a prakṛtiṃ cāpy atikramya gacchaty ātmānam avyayam
c paraṃ nārāyaṇātmānaṃ nirdvaṃdvaṃ prakṛteḥ param
a vimuktaḥ puṇyapāpebhyaḥ praviṣṭas tam anāmayam
c paramātmānam aguṇaṃ na nivartati bhārata
a śiṣṭaṃ tv atra manas tāta indriyāṇi ca bhārata
c āgacchanti yathākālaṃ guroḥ saṃdeśakāriṇaḥ
a śakyaṃ cālpena kālena śāntiṃ prāptuṃ guṇārthinā
c evaṃ yuktena kaunteya yuktajñānena mokṣiṇā
a sāṃkhyā rājan mahāprājñā gacchanti paramāṃ gatim
c jñānenānena kaunteya tulyaṃ jñānaṃ na vidyate
a atra te saṃśayo mā bhūj jñānaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ paraṃ matam
c akṣaraṃ dhruvam avyaktaṃ pūrvaṃ brahma sanātanam
a anādimadhyanidhanaṃ nirdvaṃdvaṃ kartṛ śāśvatam
c kūṭasthaṃ caiva nityaṃ ca yad vadanti śamātmakāḥ
a yataḥ sarvāḥ pravartante sargapralayavikriyāḥ
c yac ca śaṃsanti śāstreṣu vadanti paramarṣayaḥ
a sarve viprāś ca devāś ca tathāgamavido janāḥ
c brahmaṇyaṃ paramaṃ devam anantaṃ parato 'cyutam
a prārthayantaś ca taṃ viprā vadanti guṇabuddhayaḥ
c samyag yuktās tathā yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś cāmitadarśanāḥ
a amūrtes tasya kaunteya sāṃkhyaṃ mūrtir iti śrutiḥ
c abhijñānāni tasyāhur mataṃ hi bharatarṣabha
a dvividhānīha bhūtāni pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpate
c jaṅgamāgamasaṃjñāni jaṅgamaṃ tu viśiṣyate
a jñānaṃ mahad yad dhi mahatsu rājan
vedeṣu sāṃkhyeṣu tathaiva yoge
c yac cāpi dṛṣṭaṃ vividhaṃ purāṇaṃ
sāṃkhyāgataṃ tan nikhilaṃ narendra
a yac cetihāseṣu mahatsu dṛṣṭaṃ
yac cārthaśāstre nṛpa śiṣṭajuṣṭe
c jñānaṃ ca loke yad ihāsti kiṃ cit
sāṃkhyāgataṃ tac ca mahan mahātman
a śamaś ca dṛṣṭaḥ paramaṃ balaṃ ca
jñānaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca yathāvad uktam
c tapāṃsi sūkṣmāṇi sukhāni caiva
sāṃkhye yathāvad vihitāni rājan
a viparyaye tasya hi pārtha devān
gacchanti sāṃkhyāḥ satataṃ sukhena
c tāṃś cānusaṃcārya tataḥ kṛtārthāḥ
patanti vipreṣu yateṣu bhūyaḥ
a hitvā ca dehaṃ praviśanti mokṣaṃ
divaukaso dyām iva pārtha sāṃkhyāḥ
c tato 'dhikaṃ te 'bhiratā mahārhe
sāṃkhye dvijāḥ pārthiva śiṣṭajuṣṭe
a teṣāṃ na tiryag gamanaṃ hi dṛṣṭaṃ
nāvāg gatiḥ pāpakṛtāṃ nivāsaḥ
c na cābudhānām api te dvijātayo
ye jñānam etan nṛpate 'nuraktāḥ
a sāṃkyaṃ viśālaṃ paramaṃ purāṇaṃ
mahārṇavaṃ vimalam udārakāntam
c kṛtsnaṃ ca sāṃkhyaṃ nṛpate mahātmā
nārāyaṇo dhārayate 'prameyam
a etan mayoktaṃ naradeva tattvaṃ
nārāyaṇo viśvam idaṃ purāṇam
c sa sargakāle ca karoti sargaṃ
saṃhārakāle ca tad atti bhūyaḥ
d saṃhṛtya sarvaṃ nijadehasaṃsthaṃ
d kṛtvāpsu śete jagadantarātmā
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kiṃ tad akṣaram ity uktaṃ yasmān nāvartate punaḥ
c kiṃ ca tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yasmād āvartate punaḥ
a akṣarakṣarayor vyaktim icchāmy ariniṣūdana
c upalabdhuṃ mahābāho tattvena kurunandana
a tvaṃ hi jñānanidhir viprair ucyase vedapāragaiḥ
c ṛṣibhiś ca mahābhāgair yatibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
a śeṣam alpaṃ dinānāṃ te dakṣiṇāyanabhāskare
c āvṛtte bhagavaty arke gantāsi paramāṃ gatim
a tvayi pratigate śreyaḥ kutaḥ śroṣyāmahe vayam
c kuruvaṃśapradīpas tvaṃ jñānadravyeṇa dīpyase
a tad etac chrotum icchāmi tvattaḥ kurukulodvaha
c na tṛpyāmīha rājendra śṛṇvann amṛtam īdṛśam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣye 'ham itihāsaṃ purātanam
c vasiṣṭhasya ca saṃvādaṃ karālajanakasya ca
a vasiṣṭhaṃ śreṣṭham āsīnam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāskaradyutim
c papraccha janako rājā jñānaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ param
a param adhyātmakuśalam adhyātmagatiniścayam
c maitrāvaruṇim āsīnam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ
a svakṣaraṃ praśritaṃ vākyaṃ madhuraṃ cāpy anulbaṇam
c papraccharṣivaraṃ rājā karālajanakaḥ purā
a bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi paraṃ brahma sanātanam
c yasmān na punarāvṛttim āpnuvanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a yac ca tat kṣaram ity uktaṃ yatredaṃ kṣarate jagat
c yac cākṣaram iti proktaṃ śivaṃ kṣemyam anāmayam
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a śrūyatāṃ pṛthivīpāla kṣaratīdaṃ yathā jagat
c yan na kṣarati pūrveṇa yāvat kālena cāpy atha
a yugaṃ dvādaśasāhasraṃ kalpaṃ viddhi caturguṇam
c daśakalpaśatāvṛttaṃ tad ahar brāhmam ucyate
e rātriś caitāvatī rājan yasyānte pratibudhyate
a sṛjaty anantakarmāṇaṃ mahāntaṃ bhūtam agrajam
c mūrtimantam amūrtātmā viśvaṃ śaṃbhuḥ svayaṃbhuvaḥ
e aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśānaṃ jyotir avyayam
a sarvataḥpāṇipādāntaṃ sarvatokṣiśiromukham
c sarvataḥśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
a hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān eṣa buddhir iti smṛtaḥ
c mahān iti ca yogeṣu viriñca iti cāpy uta
a sāṃkhye ca paṭhyate śāstre nāmabhir bahudhātmakaḥ
c vicitrarūpo viśvātmā ekākṣara iti smṛtaḥ
a vṛtaṃ naikātmakaṃ yena kṛtsnaṃ trailokyam ātmanā
c tathaiva bahurūpatvād viśvarūpa iti smṛtaḥ
a eṣa vai vikriyāpannaḥ sṛjaty ātmānam ātmanā
c ahaṃkāraṃ mahātejāḥ prajāpatim ahaṃkṛtam
a avyaktād vyaktam utpannaṃ vidyāsargaṃ vadanti tam
c mahāntaṃ cāpy ahaṃkāram avidyāsargam eva ca
a avidhiś ca vidhiś caiva samutpannau tathaikataḥ
c vidyāvidyeti vikhyāte śrutiśāstrārthacintakaiḥ
a bhūtasargam ahaṃkārāt tṛtīyaṃ viddhi pārthiva
c ahaṃkāreṣu bhūteṣu caturthaṃ viddhi vaikṛtam
a vāyur jyotir athākāśam āpo 'tha pṛthivī tathā
c śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca
a evaṃ yugapad utpannaṃ daśavargam asaṃśayam
c pañcamaṃ viddhi rājendra bhautikaṃ sargam arthavat
a śrotraṃ tvak cakṣuṣī jihvā ghrāṇam eva ca pañcamam
c vāk ca hastau ca pādau ca pāyur meḍhraṃ tathaiva ca
a buddhīndriyāṇi caitāni tathā karmendriyāṇi ca
c saṃbhūtānīha yugapan manasā saha pārthiva
a eṣā tattvacaturviṃśā sarvākṛtiṣu vartate
c yāṃ jñātvā nābhiśocanti brāhmaṇās tattvadarśinaḥ
a etad dehaṃ samākhyātaṃ trailokye sarvadehiṣu
c veditavyaṃ naraśreṣṭha sadevanaradānave
a sayakṣabhūtagandharve sakiṃnaramahorage
c sacāraṇapiśāce vai sadevarṣiniśācare
a sadaṃśakīṭamaśake sapūtikṛmimūṣake
c śuni śvapāke vaiṇeye sacaṇḍāle sapulkase
a hastyaśvakharaśārdūle savṛkṣe gavi caiva ha
b sahastyaśve saśārdūle saṛkṣagavi caiva hi
c yac ca mūrtimayaṃ kiṃ cit sarvatraitan nidarśanam
a jale bhuvi tathākāśe nānyatreti viniścayaḥ
c sthānaṃ dehavatām asti ity evam anuśuśruma
a kṛtsnam etāvatas tāta kṣarate vyaktasaṃjñakam
c ahany ahani bhūtātmā tataḥ kṣara iti smṛtaḥ
a etad akṣaram ity uktaṃ kṣaratīdaṃ yathā jagat
c jagan mohātmakaṃ prāhur avyaktaṃ vyaktasaṃjñakam
a mahāṃś caivāgrajo nityam etat kṣaranidarśanam
c kathitaṃ te mahārāja yasmān nāvartate punaḥ
a pañcaviṃśatimo viṣṇur nistattvas tattvasaṃjñakaḥ
c tattvasaṃśrayaṇād etat tattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a yad amūrty asṛjad vyaktaṃ tat tan mūrty adhitiṣṭhati
c caturviṃśatimo vyakto hy amūrtaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
a sa eva hṛdi sarvāsu mūrtiṣv ātiṣṭhate ''tmavān
c cetayaṃś cetano nityaḥ sarvamūrtir amūrtimān
a sargapralayadharmiṇyā asargapralayātmakaḥ
c gocare vartate nityaṃ nirguṇo guṇasaṃjñakaḥ
a evam eṣa mahān ātmā sargapralayakovidaḥ
c vikurvāṇaḥ prakṛtimān abhimanyaty abuddhimān
a tamaḥsattvarajoyuktas tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu
c līyate 'pratibuddhatvād abuddhajanasevanāt
a sahavāso nivāsātmā nānyo 'ham iti manyate
c yo 'haṃ so 'ham iti hy uktvā guṇān anu nivartate
a tamasā tāmasān bhāvān vividhān pratipadyate
c rajasā rājasāṃś caiva sāttvikān sattvasaṃśrayāt
a śuklalohitakṛṣṇāni rūpāṇy etāni trīṇi tu
c sarvāṇy etāni rūpāṇi jānīhi prākṛtāni vai
a tāmasā nirayaṃ yānti rājasā mānuṣāṃs tathā
c sāttvikā devalokāya gacchanti sukhabhāginaḥ
a niṣkaivalyena pāpena tiryagyonim avāpnuyāt
c puṇyapāpena mānuṣyaṃ puṇyenaikena devatāḥ
a evam avyaktaviṣayaṃ kṣaram āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c pañcaviṃśatimo yo 'yaṃ jñānād eva pravartate
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a evam apratibuddhatvād abuddham anuvartate
c dehād dehasahasrāṇi tathā samabhipadyate
a tiryagyonisahasreṣu kadā cid devatāsv api
c upapadyati saṃyogād guṇaiḥ saha guṇakṣayāt
a mānuṣatvād divaṃ yāti divo mānuṣyam eva ca
c mānuṣyān nirayasthānam ānantyaṃ pratipadyate
a kośakāro yathātmānaṃ kīṭaḥ samanurundhati
c sūtratantuguṇair nityaṃ tathāyam aguṇo guṇaiḥ
a dvaṃdvam eti ca nirdvaṃdvas tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu
c śīrṣaroge 'kṣiroge ca dantaśūle galagrahe
a jalodare 'rśasāṃ roge jvaragaṇḍaviṣūcike
c śvitre kuṣṭhe 'gnidāhe ca sidhmāpasmārayor api
a yāni cānyāni dvaṃdvāni prākṛtāni śarīriṣu
c utpadyante vicitrāṇi tāny eṣo 'py abhimanyate
d tiryagyonisahasreṣu kadā cid devatāsv api
e abhimanyaty abhīmānāt tathaiva sukṛtāny api
a ekavāsāś ca durvāsāḥ śāyī nityam adhas tathā
c maṇḍūkaśāyī ca tathā vīrāsanagatas tathā
a cīradhāraṇam ākāśe śayanaṃ sthānam eva ca
c iṣṭakāprastare caiva kaṇṭakaprastare tathā
a bhasmaprastaraśāyī ca bhūmiśayyānulepanaḥ
c vīrasthānāmbupaṅke ca śayanaṃ phalakeṣu ca
a vividhāsu ca śayyāsu phalagṛddhyānvito 'phalaḥ
c muñjamekhalanagnatvaṃ kṣaumakṛṣṇājināni ca
a śāṇīvālaparīdhāno vyāghracarmaparicchadaḥ
c siṃhacarmaparīdhānaḥ paṭṭavāsās tathaiva ca
d phalakaṃ paridhānaś ca tathā kaṇṭakavastradhṛk
a kīṭakāvasanaś caiva cīravāsās tathaiva ca
c vastrāṇi cānyāni bahūny abhimanyaty abuddhimān
a bhojanāni vicitrāṇi ratnāni vividhāni ca
c ekavastrāntarāśitvam ekakālikabhojanam
a caturthāṣṭamakālaś ca ṣaṣṭhakālika eva ca
c ṣaḍrātrabhojanaś caiva tathaivāṣṭāhabhojanaḥ
a saptarātradaśāhāro dvādaśāhāra eva ca
c māsopavāsī mūlāśī phalāhāras tathaiva ca
a vāyubhakṣo 'mbupiṇyākagomayādana eva ca
c gomūtrabhojanaś caiva śākapuṣpāda eva ca
a śaivālabhojanaś caiva tathācāmena vartayan
c vartayañ śīrṇaparṇaiś ca prakīrṇaphalabhojanaḥ
a vividhāni ca kṛcchrāṇi sevate sukhakāṅkṣayā
c cāndrāyaṇāni vidhival liṅgāni vividhāni ca
a cāturāśramyapanthānam āśrayaty āśramān api
c upāsīnaś ca pāṣaṇḍān guhāḥ śailāṃs tathaiva ca
a viviktāś ca śilāchāyās tathā prasravaṇāni ca
b pulināni viviktāni viviktāni vanāni ca
b devasthānāni puṇyāni viviktāni sarāṃsi ca
b viviktāś cāpi śailānāṃ guhā gṛhanibhopamāḥ
c vividhāni ca japyāni vividhāni vratāni ca
a niyamān suvicitrāṃś ca vividhāni tapāṃsi ca
c yajñāṃś ca vividhākārān vidhīṃś ca vividhāṃs tathā
a vaṇikpathaṃ dvijakṣatraṃ vaiśyaśūdraṃ tathaiva ca
c dānaṃ ca vividhākāraṃ dīnāndhakṛpaṇeṣv api
a abhimanyaty asaṃbodhāt tathaiva trividhān guṇān
c sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva dharmārthau kāma eva ca
e prakṛtyātmānam evātmā evaṃ pravibhajaty uta
a svadhākāravaṣaṭkārau svāhākāranamaskriyāḥ
c yājanādhyāpanaṃ dānaṃ tathaivāhuḥ pratigraham
e yajanādhyayane caiva yac cānyad api kiṃ cana
a janmamṛtyuvivāde ca tathā viśasane 'pi ca
c śubhāśubhamayaṃ sarvam etad āhuḥ kriyāpatham
a prakṛtiḥ kurute devī mahāpralayam eva ca
c divasānte guṇān etān abhyetyaiko 'vatiṣṭhati
a raśmijālam ivādityas tatkālena niyacchati
c evam eṣo 'sakṛt sarvaṃ krīḍārtham abhimanyate
a ātmarūpaguṇān etān vividhān hṛdayapriyān
c evam eva vikurvāṇaḥ sargapralayakarmaṇī
a kriyākriyā pathe raktas triguṇas triguṇātigaḥ
c kriyākriyāpathopetas tathā tad iti manyate
d prakṛtyā sarvam evedaṃ jagad andhīkṛtaṃ vibho
d rajasā tamasā caiva vyāptaṃ sarvam anekadhā
a evaṃ dvaṃdvāny athaitāni vartante mama nityaśaḥ
c mamaivaitāni jāyante bādhante tāni mām iti
a nistartavyāny athaitāni sarvāṇīti narādhipa
c manyate 'yaṃ hy abuddhitvāt tathaiva sukṛtāny api
a bhoktavyāni mayaitāni devalokagatena vai
c ihaiva cainaṃ bhokṣyāmi śubhāśubhaphalodayam
a sukham eva ca kartavyaṃ sakṛt kṛtvā sukhaṃ mama
b sukhārthī ca tyajed duḥkhaṃ sukhaduḥkhaviparyayam
c yāvadantaṃ ca me saukhyaṃ jātyāṃ jātyāṃ bhaviṣyati
a bhaviṣyati ca me duḥkhaṃ kṛtenehāpy anantakam
c mahad duḥkhaṃ hi mānuṣyaṃ niraye cāpi majjanam
a nirayāc cāpi mānuṣyaṃ kālenaiṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ
c manuṣyatvāc ca devatvaṃ devatvāt pauruṣaṃ punaḥ
e manuṣyatvāc ca nirayaṃ paryāyeṇopagacchati
f evaṃ paryāyaśo duḥkhaṃ punar eṣyāmy ahaṃ sukham
a ya evaṃ vetti vai nityaṃ nirātmātmaguṇair vṛtaḥ
c tena devamanuṣyeṣu niraye copapadyate
a mamatvenāvṛto nityaṃ tatraiva parivartate
c sargakoṭisahasrāṇi maraṇāntāsu mūrtiṣu
a ya evaṃ kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalātmakam
c sa eva phalam aśnāti triṣu lokeṣu mūrtimān
a prakṛtiḥ kurute karma śubhāśubhaphalātmakam
c prakṛtiś ca tad aśnāti triṣu lokeṣu kāmagā
a tiryagyonau manuṣyatve devaloke tathaiva ca
c trīṇi sthānāni caitāni jānīyāt prākṛtāni ha
a aliṅgāṃ prakṛtiṃ tv āhur liṅgair anumimīmahe
c tathaiva pauruṣaṃ liṅgam anumānād dhi paśyati
a sa liṅgāntaram āsādya prākṛtaṃ liṅgam avraṇam
c vraṇadvārāṇy adhiṣṭhāya karmāṇy ātmani manyate
a śrotrādīni tu sarvāṇi pañca karmendriyāṇi ca
c vāg ādīni pravartante guṇeṣv eva guṇaiḥ saha
e aham etāni vai kurvan mamaitānīndriyāṇi ca
a nirindriyo 'bhimanyeta vraṇavān asmi nirvraṇaḥ
c aliṅgo liṅgam ātmānam akālaḥ kālam ātmanaḥ
a asattvaṃ sattvam ātmānam atattvaṃ tattvam ātmanaḥ
c amṛtyur mṛtyum ātmānam acaraś caram ātmanaḥ
a akṣetraḥ kṣetram ātmānam asargaḥ sargam ātmanaḥ
c atapās tapa ātmānam agatir gatim ātmanaḥ
a abhavo bhavam ātmānam abhayo bhayam ātmanaḥ
b akartā kartṛ cātmānam abījo bījam ātmanaḥ
c akṣaraḥ kṣaram ātmānam abuddhis tv abhimanyate
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a evam apratibuddhatvād abuddhajanasevanāt
c sargakoṭisahasrāṇi patanāntāni gacchati
a dhāmnā dhāmasahasrāṇi maraṇāntāni gacchati
c tiryagyonau manuṣyatve devaloke tathaiva ca
a candramā iva kośānāṃ punas tatra sahasraśaḥ
c līyate 'pratibuddhatvād evam eṣa hy abuddhimān
a kalāḥ pañcadaśā yonis tad dhāma iti paṭhyate
c nityam etad vijānīhi somaḥ ṣoḍaśamī kalā
a kalāyāṃ jāyate 'jasraṃ punaḥ punar abuddhimān
c dhāma tasyopayuñjanti bhūya eva tu jāyate
a ṣoḍaśī tu kalā sūkṣmā sa soma upadhāryatām
c na tūpayujyate devair devān upayunakti sā
a evaṃ tāṃ kṣapayitvā hi jāyate nṛpasattama
c sā hy asya prakṛtir dṛṣṭā tatkṣayān mokṣa ucyate
a tad evaṃ ṣoḍaśakalaṃ deham avyaktasaṃjñakam
c mamāyam iti manvānas tatraiva parivartate
a pañcaviṃśas tathaivātmā tasyaivā pratibodhanāt
c vimalasya viśuddhasya śuddhānilaniṣevaṇāt
a aśuddha eva śuddhātmā tādṛg bhavati pārthiva
c abuddhasevanāc cāpi buddho 'py abudhatāṃ vrajet
a tathaivāpratibuddho 'pi jñeyo nṛpatisattama
c prakṛtes triguṇāyās tu sevanāt prākṛto bhavet
 karālajanaka uvāca
a akṣarakṣarayor eṣa dvayoḥ saṃbandha iṣyate
c strīpuṃsor vāpi bhagavan saṃbandhas tadvad ucyate
a ṛte na puruṣeṇeha strī garbhaṃ dhārayaty uta
c ṛte striyaṃ na puruṣo rūpaṃ nirvartayet tathā
a anyonyasyābhisaṃbandhād anyonyaguṇasaṃśrayāt
c rūpaṃ nirvartayaty etad evaṃ sarvāsu yoniṣu
a ratyartham abhisaṃrodhād anyonyaguṇasaṃśrayāt
c ṛtau nirvartate rūpaṃ tad vakṣyāmi nidarśanam
a ye guṇāḥ puruṣasyeha ye ca mātṛguṇās tathā
c asthi snāyu ca majjā ca jānīmaḥ pitṛto dvija
a tvaṅ māṃsaṃ śoṇitaṃ caiva mātṛjāny api śuśruma
c evam etad dvijaśreṣṭha vedaśāstreṣu paṭhyate
a pramāṇaṃ yac ca vedoktaṃ śāstroktaṃ yac ca paṭhyate
c vedaśāstrapramāṇaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ tat sanātanam
a evam evābhisaṃbaddhau nityaṃ prakṛtipūruṣau
c paśyāmi bhagavaṃs tasmān mokṣadharmo na vidyate
a atha vānantarakṛtaṃ kiṃ cid eva nidarśanam
c tan mamācakṣva tattvena pratyakṣo hy asi sarvathā
a mokṣakāmā vayaṃ cāpi kāṅkṣāmo yad anāmayam
c adeham ajaraṃ divyam atīndriyam anīśvaram
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a yad etad uktaṃ bhavatā vedaśāstranidarśanam
c evam etad yathā caitan na gṛhṇāti tathā bhavān
a dhāryate hi tvayā grantha ubhayor vedaśāstrayoḥ
c na tu granthasya tattvajño yathāvat tvaṃ nareśvara
a yo hi vede ca śāstre ca granthadhāraṇatatparaḥ
c na ca granthārthatattvajñas tasya tad dhāraṇaṃ vṛthā
a bhāraṃ sa vahate tasya granthasyārthaṃ na vetti yaḥ
c yas tu granthārthatattvajño nāsya granthāgamo vṛthā
a granthasyārthaṃ ca pṛṣṭaḥ saṃs tādṛśo vaktum arhati
c yathā tattvābhigamanād arthaṃ tasya sa vindati
a yas tu saṃsatsu kathayed granthārthaṃ sthūlabuddhimān
c sa kathaṃ mandavijñāno granthaṃ vakṣyati nirṇayāt
a nirṇayaṃ cāpi chidrātmā na taṃ vakṣyati tattvataḥ
c sopahāsātmatām eti yasmāc caivātmavān api
a tasmāt tvaṃ śṛṇu rājendra yathaitad anudṛśyate
c yāthātathyena sāṃkhyeṣu yogeṣu ca mahātmasu
a yad eva yogāḥ paśyanti sāṃkhyais tad anugamyate
c ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa buddhimān
a tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu ca
c etad aindriyakaṃ tāta yad bhavān idam āha vai
a dravyād dravyasya niṣpattir indriyād indriyaṃ tathā
c dehād deham avāpnoti bījād bījaṃ tathaiva ca
d sūkṣmadehagatā mātrā bījāpyāyitavṛddhikāḥ
a nirindriyasyābījasya nirdravyasyāsya dehinaḥ
c kathaṃ guṇā bhaviṣyanti nirguṇatvān mahātmanaḥ
a guṇā guṇeṣu jāyante tatraiva niviśanti ca
c evaṃ guṇāḥ prakṛtito jāyante ca na santi ca
a tvaṅ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ medaḥ pittaṃ majjāsthi snāyu ca
c aṣṭau tāny atha śukreṇa jānīhi prākṛtāni vai
a pumāṃś caivāpumāṃś caiva trailiṅgyaṃ prākṛtaṃ smṛtam
c naiva pumān pumāṃś caiva sa liṅgīty abhidhīyate
a aliṅgā prakṛtir liṅgair upalabhyati sātmajaiḥ
c yathā puṣpaphalair nityam ṛtavo mūrtayas tathā
a evam apy anumānena hy aliṅgam upalabhyate
c pañcaviṃśatimas tāta liṅgeṣv aniyatātmakaḥ
a anādinidhano 'nantaḥ sarvadarśī nirāmayaḥ
c kevalaṃ tv abhimānitvād guṇeṣv aguṇa ucyate
a guṇā guṇavataḥ santi nirguṇasya kuto guṇāḥ
c tasmād evaṃ vijānanti ye janā guṇadarśinaḥ
a yadā tv eṣa guṇān sarvān prākṛtān abhimanyate
c tadā sa guṇavān eva parameṇānupaśyati
a yat tad buddheḥ paraṃ prāhuḥ sāṃkhyā yogāś ca sarvaśaḥ
c budhyamānaṃ mahāprājñam abuddhaparivarjanāt
a aprabuddham athāvyaktaṃ saguṇaṃ prāhur īśvaram
c nirguṇaṃ ceśvaraṃ nityam adhiṣṭhātāram eva ca
a prakṛteś ca guṇānāṃ ca pañcaviṃśatikaṃ budhāḥ
c sāṃkhyayoge ca kuśalā budhyante paramaiṣiṇaḥ
a yadā prabuddhās tv avyaktam avasthājanmabhīravaḥ
c budhyamānaṃ prabudhyanti gamayanti samaṃ tadā
a etan nidarśanaṃ samyag asamyag anudarśanam
c budhyamānāprabuddhābhyāṃ pṛthak pṛthag ariṃdama
a paraspareṇaitad uktaṃ kṣarākṣaranidarśanam
c ekatvam akṣaraṃ prāhur nānātvaṃ kṣaram ucyate
a pañcaviṃśatiniṣṭho 'yaṃ yadāsamyak pravartate
c ekatvaṃ darśanaṃ cāsya nānātvaṃ cāpy adarśanam
a tattvanistattvayor etat pṛthag eva nidarśanam
c pañcaviṃśatisargaṃ tu tattvam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a nistattvaṃ pañcaviṃśasya param āhur nidarśanam
c vargasya vargam ācāraṃ tattvaṃ tattvāt sanātanam
 karālajanaka uvāca
a nānātvaikatvam ity uktaṃ tvayaitad ṛṣisattama
c paśyāmi cābhisaṃdigdham etayor vai nidarśanam
a tathāprabuddhabuddhābhyāṃ budhyamānasya cānagha
c sthūlabuddhyā na paśyāmi tattvam etan na saṃśayaḥ
a akṣarakṣarayor uktaṃ tvayā yad api kāraṇam
c tad apy asthirabuddhitvāt pranaṣṭam iva me 'nagha
a tad etac chrotum icchāmi nānātvaikatvadarśanam
c buddham apratibuddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ
a vidyāvidye ca bhagavann akṣaraṃ kṣaram eva ca
c sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca kārtsnyena pṛthak caivāpṛthak ca ha
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a hanta te saṃpravakṣyāmi yad etad anupṛcchasi
c yogakṛtyaṃ mahārāja pṛthag eva śṛṇuṣva me
a yogakṛtyaṃ tu yogānāṃ dhyānam eva paraṃ balam
c tac cāpi dvividhaṃ dhyānam āhur vedavido janāḥ
a ekāgratā ca manasaḥ prāṇāyāmas tathaiva ca
c prāṇāyāmas tu saguṇo nirguṇo manasas tathā
a mūtrotsarge purīṣe ca bhojane ca narādhipa
c trikālaṃ nābhiyuñjīta śeṣaṃ yuñjīta tatparaḥ
a indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyo nivartya manasā muniḥ
c daśadvādaśabhir vāpi caturviṃśāt paraṃ tataḥ
a taṃ codanābhir matimān ātmānaṃ codayed atha
c tiṣṭhantam ajaraṃ taṃ tu yat tad uktaṃ manīṣibhiḥ
a taiś cātmā satataṃ jñeya ity evam anuśuśruma
c dravyaṃ hy ahīnamanaso nānyatheti viniścayaḥ
a vimuktaḥ sarvasaṅgebhyo laghvāhāro jitendriyaḥ
c pūrvarātre pare caiva dhārayeta mano ''tmani
a sthirīkṛtyendriyagrāmaṃ manasā mithileśvara
c mano buddhyā sthiraṃ kṛtvā pāṣāṇa iva niścalaḥ
a sthāṇuvac cāpy akampaḥ syād girivac cāpi niścalaḥ
c budhā vidhividhānajñās tadā yuktaṃ pracakṣate
a na śṛṇoti na cāghrāti na rasyati na paśyati
c na ca sparśaṃ vijānāti na saṃkalpayate manaḥ
a na cābhimanyate kiṃ cin na ca budhyati kāṣṭhavat
c tadā prakṛtim āpannaṃ yuktam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a nivāte ca yathā dīpyan dīpas tadvat sa dṛśyate
c niriṅgaś cācalaś cordhvaṃ na tiryaggatim āpnuyāt
a tadā tam anupaśyeta yasmin dṛṣṭe tu kathyate
c hṛdayastho 'ntarātmeti jñeyo jñas tāta madvidhaiḥ
a vidhūma iva saptārcir āditya iva raśmimān
c vaidyuto 'gnir ivākāśe dṛśyate ''tmā tathātmani
a yaṃ paśyanti mahātmāno dhṛtimanto manīṣiṇaḥ
c brāhmaṇā brahmayoniṣṭhā hy ayonim amṛtātmakam
a tad evāhur aṇubhyo 'ṇu tan mahadbhyo mahattaram
c tadantaḥ sarvabhūteṣu dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhan na dṛśyate
a buddhidravyeṇa dṛśyeta manodīpena lokakṛt
c mahatas tamasas tāta pāre tiṣṭhann atāmasaḥ
a sa tamonuda ity uktas tattvajñair vedapāragaiḥ
c vimalo vitamaskaś ca nirliṅgo 'liṅgasaṃjñitaḥ
a yogam etad dhi yogānāṃ manye yogasya lakṣaṇam
c evaṃ paśyaṃ prapaśyanti ātmānam ajaraṃ param
a yogadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te tattvato mayā
c sāṃkhyajñānaṃ pravakṣyāmi parisaṃkhyānidarśanam
a avyaktam āhuḥ prakṛtiṃ parāṃ prakṛtivādinaḥ
c tasmān mahat samutpannaṃ dvitīyaṃ rājasattama
a ahaṃkāras tu mahatas tṛtīyam iti naḥ śrutam
c pañca bhūtāny ahaṃkārād āhuḥ sāṃkhyānudarśinaḥ
a etāḥ prakṛtayas tv aṣṭau vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśa
c pañca caiva viśeṣā vai tathā pañcendriyāṇi ca
a etāvad eva tattvānāṃ sāṃkhyam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c sāṃkhye vidhividhānajñā nityaṃ sāṃkhyapathe ratāḥ
a yasmād yad abhijāyeta tat tatraiva pralīyate
c līyante pratilomāni sṛjyante cāntarātmanā
a anulomena jāyante līyante pratilomataḥ
c guṇā guṇeṣu satataṃ sāgarasyormayo yathā
a sargapralaya etāvān prakṛter nṛpasattama
c ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca yadāsṛjat
e evam eva ca rājendra vijñeyaṃ jñeyacintakaiḥ
a adhiṣṭhātāram avyaktam asyāpy etan nidarśanam
c ekatvaṃ ca bahutvaṃ ca prakṛter anu tattvavān
e ekatvaṃ pralaye cāsya bahutvaṃ ca pravartanāt
a bahudhātmā prakurvīta prakṛtiṃ prasavātmikām
c tac ca kṣetraṃ mahān ātmā pañcaviṃśo 'dhitiṣṭhati
a adhiṣṭhāteti rājendra procyate yatisattamaiḥ
c adhiṣṭhānād adhiṣṭhātā kṣetrāṇām iti naḥ śrutam
a kṣetraṃ jānāti cāvyaktaṃ kṣetrajña iti cocyate
c avyaktike pure śete puruṣaś ceti kathyate
a anyad eva ca kṣetraṃ syād anyaḥ kṣetrajña ucyate
c kṣetram avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñātā vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ
a anyad eva ca jñānaṃ syād anyaj jñeyaṃ tad ucyate
c jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyo vai pañcaviṃśakaḥ
a avyaktaṃ kṣetram ity uktaṃ tathā sattvaṃ tatheśvaram
c anīśvaram atattvaṃ ca tattvaṃ tat pañcaviṃśakam
a sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvat parisaṃkhyānadarśanam
c sāṃkhyaṃ prakurute caiva prakṛtiṃ ca pracakṣate
a tattvāni ca caturviṃśat parisaṃkhyāya tattvataḥ
c sāṃkhyāḥ saha prakṛtyā tu nistattvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
a pañcaviṃśo 'prabuddhātmā budhyamāna iti smṛtaḥ
c yadā tu budhyate ''tmānaṃ tadā bhavati kevalaḥ
a samyag darśanam etāvad bhāṣitaṃ tava tattvataḥ
c evam etad vijānantaḥ sāmyatāṃ pratiyānty uta
a samyaṅ nidarśanaṃ nāma pratyakṣaṃ prakṛtes tathā
c guṇatattvāny athaitāni nirguṇo 'nyas tathā bhavet
a na tv evaṃ vartamānānām āvṛttir vidyate punaḥ
c vidyate 'kṣarabhāvatvād aparasparam avyayam
a paśyerann ekamatayo na samyak teṣu darśanam
c te 'vyaktaṃ pratipadyante punaḥ punar ariṃdama
a sarvam etad vijānanto na sarvasya prabodhanāt
c vyaktībhūtā bhaviṣyanti vyaktasya vaśavartinaḥ
a sarvam avyaktam ity uktam asarvaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
c ya enam abhijānanti na bhayaṃ teṣu vidyate
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a sāṃkhyadarśanam etāvad uktaṃ te nṛpasattama
c vidyāvidye tv idānīṃ me tvaṃ nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ
a avidyām āhur avyaktaṃ sargapralayadharmi vai
c sargapralayanirmuktaṃ vidyāṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam
a parasparam avidyāṃ vai tan nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ
c yathoktam ṛṣibhis tāta sāṃkhyasyāsya nidarśanam
a karmendriyāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ vidyā buddhīndriyaṃ smṛtam
c buddhīndriyāṇāṃ ca tathā viśeṣā iti naḥ śrutam
a viśeṣāṇāṃ manas teṣāṃ vidyām āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c manasaḥ pañcabhūtāni vidyā ity abhicakṣate
a ahaṃkāras tu bhūtānāṃ pañcānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ
c ahaṃkārasya ca tathā buddhir vidyā nareśvara
a buddheḥ prakṛtir avyaktaṃ tattvānāṃ parameśvaram
c vidyā jñeyā naraśreṣṭha vidhiś ca paramaḥ smṛtaḥ
a avyaktasya paraṃ prāhur vidyāṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam
c sarvasya sarvam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānasya pārthiva
a jñānam avyaktam ity uktaṃ jñeyaṃ vai pañcaviṃśakam
c tathaiva jñānam avyaktaṃ vijñātā pañcaviṃśakaḥ
a vidyāvidyārthatattvena mayoktaṃ te viśeṣataḥ
c akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yad uktaṃ tan nibodha me
a ubhāv etau kṣarāv uktāv ubhāv etau ca nakṣarau
c kāraṇaṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathā khyātau tu tattvataḥ
a anādinidhanāv etāv ubhāv eveśvarau matau
c tattvasaṃjñāv ubhāv etau procyete jñānacintakaiḥ
a sargapralayadharmitvād avyaktaṃ prāhur akṣaram
c tad etad guṇasargāya vikurvāṇaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
a guṇānāṃ mahadādīnām utpadyati parasparam
c adhiṣṭhānāt kṣetram āhur etat tat pañcaviṃśakam
a yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tad avyaktātmani saṃkṣipet
c tadā saha guṇais tais tu pañcaviṃśo vilīyate
a guṇā guṇeṣu līyante tadaikā prakṛtir bhavet
c kṣetrajño 'pi yadā tāta tatkṣetre saṃpralīyate
a tadākṣaratvaṃ prakṛtir gacchate guṇasaṃjñitā
c nirguṇatvaṃ ca vaideha guṇeṣu prativartanāt
a evam eva ca kṣetrajñaḥ kṣetrajñānaparikṣaye
c prakṛtyā nirguṇas tv eṣa ity evam anuśuśruma
a kṣaro bhavaty eṣa yadā tadā guṇavatīm atha
c prakṛtiṃ tv abhijānāti nirguṇatvaṃ tathātmanaḥ
a tadā viśuddho bhavati prakṛteḥ parivarjanāt
c anyo 'ham anyeyam iti yadā budhyati buddhimān
a tadaiṣo 'nyatvatām eti na ca miśratvam āvrajet
c prakṛtyā caiva rājendra namiśro 'nyaś ca dṛśyate
a yadā tu guṇajālaṃ tat prākṛtaṃ vijugupsate
c paśyate cāparaṃ paśyaṃ tadā paśyan na saṃjvaret
a kiṃ mayā kṛtam etāvad yo 'haṃ kālam imaṃ janam
c matsyo jālaṃ hy avijñānād anuvartitavāṃs tathā
a aham eva hi saṃmohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam
c matsyo yathodakajñānād anuvartitavān iha
a matsyo 'nyatvaṃ yathājñānād udakān nābhimanyate
c ātmānaṃ tadvad ajñānād anyatvaṃ caiva vedmy aham
a mamāstu dhig abuddhasya yo 'haṃ magnam imaṃ punaḥ
c anuvartitavān mohād anyam anyaṃ janāj janam
a ayam atra bhaved bandhur anena saha mokṣaṇam
c sāmyam ekatvam āyāto yādṛśas tādṛśas tv aham
a tulyatām iha paśyāmi sadṛśo 'ham anena vai
c ayaṃ hi vimalo vyaktam aham īdṛśakas tathā
a yo 'ham ajñānasaṃmohād ajñayā saṃpravṛttavān
c sasaṅgayāhaṃ niḥsaṅgaḥ sthitaḥ kālam imaṃ tv aham
a anayāhaṃ vaśībhūtaḥ kālam etaṃ na buddhavān
c uccamadhyamanīcānāṃ tām ahaṃ katham āvase
a samānayānayā ceha sahavāsam ahaṃ katham
c gacchāmy abuddhabhāvatvād eṣedānīṃ sthiro bhave
a sahavāsaṃ na yāsyāmi kālam etad dhi vañcanāt
c vañcito 'smy anayā yad dhi nirvikāro vikārayā
a na cāyam aparādho 'syā aparādho hy ayaṃ mama
c yo 'ham atrābhavaṃ saktaḥ parāṅmukham upasthitaḥ
a tato 'smi bahurūpāsu sthito mūrtiṣv amūrtimān
c amūrtaś cāpi mūrtātmā mamatvena pradharṣitaḥ
a prakṛter anayatvena tāsu tāsv iha yoniṣu
c nirmamasya mamatvena kiṃ kṛtaṃ tāsu tāsu ca
e yonīṣu vartamānena naṣṭasaṃjñena cetasā
a na mamātrānayā kāryam ahaṃkārakṛtātmayā
c ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā yeyaṃ bhūyo yunakti mām
e idānīm eṣa buddho 'smi nirmamo nirahaṃkṛtaḥ
a mamatvam anayā nityam ahaṃkārakṛtātmakam
c apetyāham imāṃ hitvā saṃśrayiṣye nirāmayam
a anena sāmyaṃ yāsyāmi nānayāham acetasā
c kṣamaṃ mama sahānena naikatvam anayā saha
e evaṃ paramasaṃbodhāt pañcaviṃśo 'nubuddhavān
a akṣaratvaṃ niyaccheta tyaktvā kṣaram anāmayam
c avyaktaṃ vyaktadharmāṇaṃ saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ tathā
e nirguṇaṃ prathamaṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛg bhavati maithila
a akṣarakṣarayor etad uktaṃ tava nidarśanam
c mayeha jñānasaṃpannaṃ yathāśrutinidarśanāt
a niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ ca sūkṣmaṃ ca vibuddhaṃ vimalaṃ tathā
c pravakṣyāmi tu te bhūyas tan nibodha yathāśrutam
a sāṃkhyayogau mayā proktau śāstradvayanidarśanāt
c yad eva śāstraṃ sāṃkhyoktaṃ yogadarśanam eva tat
a prabodhanakaraṃ jñānaṃ sāṃkhyānām avanīpate
c vispaṣṭaṃ procyate tatra śiṣyāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā
a bṛhac caiva hi tac chāstram ity āhuḥ kuśalā janāḥ
c asmiṃś ca śāstre yogānāṃ punar dadhi punaḥ śaraḥ
a pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ tattvaṃ na paśyati narādhipa
c sāṃkhyānāṃ tu paraṃ tatra yathāvad anuvarṇitam
a buddham apratibuddhaṃ ca budhyamānaṃ ca tattvataḥ
c budhyamānaṃ ca buddhaṃ ca prāhur yoganidarśanam
 vasiṣṭha uvāca
a aprabuddham athāvyaktam imaṃ guṇavidhiṃ śṛṇu
c guṇān dhārayate hy eṣā sṛjaty ākṣipate tathā
a ajasraṃ tv iha krīḍārthaṃ vikurvantī narādhipa
c ātmānaṃ bahudhā kṛtvā tāny eva ca vicakṣate
a etad evaṃ vikurvāṇāṃ budhyamāno na budhyate
c avyaktabodhanāc caiva budhyamānaṃ vadanty api
a na tv eva budhyate 'vyaktaṃ saguṇaṃ vātha nirguṇam
c kadā cit tv eva khalv etad āhur apratibuddhakam
a budhyate yadi vāvyaktam etad vai pañcaviṃśakam
c budhyamāno bhavaty eṣa saṅgātmaka iti śrutiḥ
a anenāpratibuddheti vadanty avyaktam acyutam
c avyaktabodhanāc caiva budhyamānaṃ vadanty uta
a pañcaviṃśaṃ mahātmānaṃ na cāsāv api budhyate
c ṣaḍviṃśaṃ vimalaṃ buddham aprameyaṃ sanātanam
a satataṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ ca caturviṃśaṃ ca budhyate
c dṛśyādṛśye hy anugatam ubhāv eva mahādyutī
a avyaktaṃ na tu tad brahma budhyate tāta kevalam
c kevalaṃ pañcaviṃśaṃ ca caturviṃśaṃ na paśyati
a budhyamāno yadātmānam anyo 'ham iti manyate
c tadā prakṛtimān eṣa bhavaty avyaktalocanaḥ
a budhyate ca parāṃ buddhiṃ viśuddhām amalāṃ yadā
c ṣaḍviṃśo rājaśārdūla tadā buddhatvam āvrajet
a tatas tyajati so 'vyaktaṃ sargapralayadharmiṇam
c nirguṇaḥ prakṛtiṃ veda guṇayuktām acetanām
a tataḥ kevaladharmāsau bhavaty avyaktadarśanāt
c kevalena samāgamya vimukto ''tmānam āpnuyāt
a etat tat tattvam ity āhur nistattvam ajarāmaram
c tattvasaṃśrayaṇād etat tattvavan na ca mānada
e pañcaviṃśatitattvāni pravadanti manīṣiṇaḥ
a na caiṣa tattvavāṃs tāta nistattvas tv eṣa buddhimān
c eṣa muñcati tattvaṃ hi kṣipraṃ buddhasya lakṣaṇam
a ṣaḍviṃśo 'ham iti prājño gṛhyamāṇo 'jarāmaraḥ
c kevalena balenaiva samatāṃ yāty asaṃśayam
a ṣaḍviṃśena prabuddhena budhyamāno 'py abuddhimān
c etan nānātvam ity uktaṃ sāṃkhyaśrutinidarśanāt
a cetanena sametasya pañcaviṃśatikasya ca
c ekatvaṃ vai bhavaty asya yadā buddhyā na budhyate
a budhyamāno 'prabuddhena samatāṃ yāti maithila
c saṅgadharmā bhavaty eṣa niḥsaṅgātmā narādhipa
a niḥsaṅgātmānam āsādya ṣaḍviṃśakam ajaṃ viduḥ
c vibhus tyajati cāvyaktaṃ yadā tv etad vibudhyate
e caturviṃśam agādhaṃ ca ṣaḍviṃśasya prabodhanāt
a eṣa hy apratibuddhaś ca budhyamānaś ca te 'nagha
c prokto buddhaś ca tattvena yathāśrutinidarśanāt
e nānātvaikatvam etāvad draṣṭavyaṃ śāstradṛṣṭibhiḥ
a maśakodumbare yadvad anyatvaṃ tadvad etayoḥ
c matsyo 'mbhasi yathā tadvad anyatvam upalabhyate
a evam evāvagantavyaṃ nānātvaikatvam etayoḥ
c etad vimokṣa ity uktam avyaktajñānasaṃhitam
a pañcaviṃśatikasyāsya yo 'yaṃ deheṣu vartate
c eṣa mokṣayitavyeti prāhur avyaktagocarāt
a so 'yam evaṃ vimucyeta nānyatheti viniścayaḥ
c pareṇa paradharmā ca bhavaty eṣa sametya vai
a viśuddhadharmā śuddhena buddhena ca sa buddhimān
c vimuktadharmā muktena sametya puruṣarṣabha
a niyogadharmiṇā caiva niyogātmā bhavaty api
c vimokṣiṇā vimokṣaś ca sametyeha tathā bhavet
a śucikarmā śuciś caiva bhavaty amitadīptimān
c vimalātmā ca bhavati sametya vimalātmanā
a kevalātmā tathā caiva kevalena sametya vai
c svatantraś ca svatantreṇa svatantratvam avāpnute
a etāvad etat kathitaṃ mayā te
tathyaṃ mahārāja yathārthatattvam
c amatsaratvaṃ pratigṛhya cārthaṃ
sanātanaṃ brahma viśuddham ādyam
a na vedaniṣṭhasya janasya rājan
pradeyam etat paramaṃ tvayā bhavet
c vivitsamānāya vibodhakārakaṃ
prabodhahetoḥ praṇatasya śāsanam
a na deyam etac ca tathānṛtātmane
śaṭhāya klībāya na jihmabuddhaye
c na paṇḍitajñānaparopatāpine
deyaṃ tvayedaṃ vinibodha yādṛśe
a śraddhānvitāyātha guṇānvitāya
parāpavādād viratāya nityam
c viśuddhayogāya budhāya caiva
kriyāvate 'tha kṣamiṇe hitāya
a viviktaśīlāya vidhipriyāya
vivādahīnāya bahuśrutāya
c vijānate caiva na cāhitakṣame
dame ca śaktāya śame ca dehinām
a etair guṇair hīnatame na deyam
etat paraṃ brahma viśuddham āhuḥ
c na śreyasā yokṣyati tādṛśe kṛtaṃ
dharmapravaktāram apātradānāt
a pṛthvīm imāṃ yady api ratnapūrṇāṃ
dadyān nadeyaṃ tv idam avratāya
c jitendriyāyaitad asaṃśayaṃ te
bhavet pradeyaṃ paramaṃ narendra
a karāla mā te bhayam astu kiṃ cid
etac chrutaṃ brahma paraṃ tvayādya
c yathāvad uktaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ
niḥśokam atyantam anādimadhyam
a agādhajanmāmaraṇaṃ ca rājan
nirāmayaṃ vītabhayaṃ śivaṃ ca
c samīkṣya mohaṃ tyaja cādya sarvaṃ
jñānasya tattvārtham idaṃ viditvā
a avāptam etad dhi purā sanātanād
dhiraṇyagarbhād gadato narādhipa
c prasādya yatnena tam ugratejasaṃ
sanātanaṃ brahma yathādya vai tvayā
a pṛṣṭas tvayā cāsmi yathā narendra
tathā mayedaṃ tvayi coktam adya
c tathāvāptaṃ brahmaṇo me narendra
mahaj jñānaṃ mokṣavidāṃ purāṇam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etad uktaṃ paraṃ brahma yasmān nāvartate punaḥ
c pañcaviṃśo mahārāja paramarṣinidarśanāt
a punarāvṛttim āpnoti paraṃ jñānam avāpya ca
c nāvabudhyati tattvena budhyamāno 'jarāmaraḥ
a etan niḥśreyasakaraṃ jñānānāṃ te paraṃ mayā
c kathitaṃ tattvatas tāta śrutvā devarṣito nṛpa
a hiraṇyagarbhād ṛṣiṇā vasiṣṭhena mahātmanā
c vasiṣṭhād ṛṣiśārdūlān nārado 'vāptavān idam
a nāradād viditaṃ mahyam etad brahma sanātanam
c mā śucaḥ kauravendra tvaṃ śrutvaitat paramaṃ padam
a yena kṣarākṣare vitte na bhayaṃ tasya vidyate
c vidyate tu bhayaṃ tasya yo naitad vetti pārthiva
a avijñānāc ca mūḍhātmā punaḥ punar upadravan
c pretya jātisahasrāṇi maraṇāntāny upāśnute
a devalokaṃ tathā tiryaṅ mānuṣyam api cāśnute
c yadi śudhyati kālena tasmād ajñānasāgarāt
d uttīrṇo 'smād agādhāt sa param āpnoti śobhanam
a ajñānasāgaro ghoro hy avyakto 'gādha ucyate
c ahany ahani majjanti yatra bhūtāni bhārata
a yasmād agādhād avyaktād uttīrṇas tvaṃ sanātanāt
c tasmāt tvaṃ virajāś caiva vitamaskaś ca pārthiva
 bhīṣma uvāca
a mṛgayāṃ vicaran kaś cid vijane janakātmajaḥ
c vane dadarśa viprendram ṛṣiṃ vaṃśadharaṃ bhṛgoḥ
a tam āsīnam upāsīnaḥ praṇamya śirasā munim
c paścād anumatas tena papraccha vasumān idam
a bhagavan kim idaṃ śreyaḥ pretya vāpīha vā bhavet
c puruṣasyādhruve dehe kāmasya vaśavartinaḥ
a satkṛtya paripṛṣṭaḥ san sumahātmā mahātapāḥ
c nijagāda tatas tasmai śreyaskaram idaṃ vacaḥ
a manaso 'pratikūlāni pretya ceha ca vāñchasi
c bhūtānāṃ pratikūlebhyo nivartasva yatendriyaḥ
a dharmaḥ satāṃ hitaḥ puṃsāṃ dharmaś caivāśrayaḥ satām
c dharmāl lokās trayas tāta pravṛttāḥ sacarācarāḥ
a svādukāmuka kāmānāṃ vaitṛṣṇyaṃ kiṃ na gacchasi
c madhu paśyasi durbuddhe prapātaṃ nānupaśyasi
a yathā jñāne paricayaḥ kartavyas tatphalārthinā
c tathā dharme paricayaḥ kartavyas tatphalārthinā
a asatā dharmakāmena viśuddhaṃ karma duṣkaram
c satā tu dharmakāmena sukaraṃ karma duṣkaram
a vane grāmyasukhācāro yathā grāmyas tathaiva saḥ
c grāme vanasukhācāro yathā vanacaras tathā
a manovākkarmake dharme kuru śraddhāṃ samāhitaḥ
c nivṛttau vā pravṛttau vā saṃpradhārya guṇāguṇān
a nityaṃ ca bahu dātavyaṃ sādhubhyaś cānasūyatā
c prārthitaṃ vrataśaucābhyāṃ satkṛtaṃ deśakālayoḥ
a śubhena vidhinā labdham arhāya pratipādayet
c krodham utsṛjya dattvā ca nānutapyen na kīrtayet
a anṛśaṃsaḥ śucir dāntaḥ satyavāg ārjave sthitaḥ
c yonikarmaviśuddhaś ca pātraṃ syād vedavid dvijaḥ
a satkṛtā caikapatnī ca jātyā yonir iheṣyate
c ṛgyajuḥsāmago vidvān ṣaṭkarmā pātram ucyate
a sa eva dharmaḥ so 'dharmas taṃ taṃ pratinaraṃ bhavet
c pātrakarmaviśeṣeṇa deśakālāv avekṣya ca
a līlayālpaṃ yathā gātrāt pramṛjyād rajasaḥ pumān
c bahuyatnena mahatā pāpanirharaṇaṃ tathā
a viriktasya yathā samyag ghṛtaṃ bhavati bheṣajam
c tathā nirhṛtadoṣasya pretyadharmaḥ sukhāvahaḥ
a mānasaṃ sarvabhūteṣu vartate vai śubhāśubhe
c aśubhebhyaḥ samākṣipya śubheṣv evāvatārayet
d mānasaṃ vṛddhasevābhir duḥkhaṃ śārīram auṣadhaiḥ
d vācikaṃ mantrajāpyena vidvān yatnād vināśayet
a sarvaṃ sarveṇa sarvatra kriyamāṇaṃ ca pūjaya
c svadharme yatra rāgas te kāmaṃ dharmo vidhīyatām
a adhṛtātman dhṛtau tiṣṭha durbuddhe buddhimān bhava
c apraśānta praśāmya tvam aprājña prājñavac cara
a tejasā śakyate prāptum upāyasahacāriṇā
c iha ca pretya ca śreyas tasya mūlaṃ dhṛtiḥ parā
a rājarṣir adhṛtiḥ svargāt patito hi mahābhiṣaḥ
c yayātiḥ kṣīṇapuṇyaś ca dhṛtyā lokān avāptavān
a tapasvināṃ dharmavatāṃ viduṣāṃ copasevanāt
c prāpsyase vipulāṃ buddhiṃ tathā śreyo 'bhipatsyase
d sa tu vipras tathā pṛṣṭo rājñā jānakinā vane
d proktavān akhilaṃ dharmaṃ mokṣāśramam anuttamam
a sa tu svabhāvasaṃpannas tac chrutvā munibhāṣitam
c vinivartya manaḥ kāmād dharme buddhiṃ cakāra ha
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dharmādharmavimuktaṃ yad vimuktaṃ sarvasaṃśrayāt
c janmamṛtyuvimuktaṃ ca vimuktaṃ puṇyapāpayoḥ
a yac chivaṃ nityam abhayaṃ nityaṃ cākṣaram avyayam
c śuci nityam anāyāsaṃ tad bhavān vaktum arhati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atra te vartayiṣye 'ham itihāsaṃ purātanam
c yājñavalkyasya saṃvādaṃ janakasya ca bhārata
a yājñavalkyam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ daivarātir mahāyaśāḥ
c papraccha janako rājā praśnaṃ praśnavidāṃ varaḥ
a katīndriyāṇi viprarṣe kati prakṛtayaḥ smṛtāḥ
c kim avyaktaṃ paraṃ brahma tasmāc ca paratas tu kim
a prabhavaṃ cāpyayaṃ caiva kālasaṃkhyāṃ tathaiva ca
c vaktum arhasi viprendra tvadanugrahakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
a ajñānāt paripṛcchāmi tvaṃ hi jñānamayo nidhiḥ
c tad ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi sarvam etad asaṃśayam
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a śrūyatām avanīpāla yad etad anupṛcchasi
c yogānāṃ paramaṃ jñānaṃ sāṃkhyānāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ
a na tavāviditaṃ kiṃ cin māṃ tu jijñāsate bhavān
c pṛṣṭena cāpi vaktavyam eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
a aṣṭau prakṛtayaḥ proktā vikārāś cāpi ṣoḍaśa
c atha sapta tu vyaktāni prāhur adhyātmacintakāḥ
a avyaktaṃ ca mahāṃś caiva tathāhaṃkāra eva ca
c pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
a etāḥ prakṛtayas tv aṣṭau vikārān api me śṛṇu
c śrotraṃ tvak caiva cakṣuś ca jihvā ghrāṇaṃ ca pañcamam
a śabdasparśau ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca
c vāk ca hastau ca pādau ca pāyur meḍhraṃ tathaiva ca
a ete viśeṣā rājendra mahābhūteṣu pañcasu
c buddhīndriyāṇy athaitāni saviśeṣāṇi maithila
a manaḥ ṣoḍaśakaṃ prāhur adhyātmagaticintakāḥ
c tvaṃ caivānye ca vidvāṃsas tattvabuddhiviśāradāḥ
a avyaktāc ca mahān ātmā samutpadyati pārthiva
c prathamaṃ sargam ity etad āhuḥ prādhānikaṃ budhāḥ
a mahataś cāpy ahaṃkāra utpadyati narādhipa
c dvitīyaṃ sargam ity āhur etad buddhyātmakaṃ smṛtam
a ahaṃkārāc ca saṃbhūtaṃ mano bhūtaguṇātmakam
c tṛtīyaḥ sarga ity eṣa āhaṃkārika ucyate
a manasas tu samudbhūtā mahābhūtā narādhipa
b samudbhūtāni manaso mahābhūtāni pārthiva
c caturthaṃ sargam ity etan mānasaṃ paricakṣate
a śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhas tathaiva ca
c pañcamaṃ sargam ity āhur bhautikaṃ bhūtacintakāḥ
a śrotraṃ tvak caiva cakṣuś ca jihvā ghrāṇaṃ ca pañcamam
c sargaṃ tu ṣaṣṭham ity āhur bahucintātmakaṃ smṛtam
a adhaḥ śrotrendriyagrāma utpadyati narādhipa
c saptamaṃ sargam ity āhur etad aindriyakaṃ smṛtam
a ūrdhvasrotas tathā tiryag utpadyati narādhipa
c aṣṭamaṃ sargam ity āhur etad ārjavakaṃ budhāḥ
a tiryak srotas tv adhaḥsrota utpadyati narādhipa
c navamaṃ sargam ity āhur etad ārjavakaṃ budhāḥ
a etāni nava sargāṇi tattvāni ca narādhipa
c caturviṃśatir uktāni yathāśruti nidarśanāt
a ata ūrdhvaṃ mahārāja guṇasyaitasya tattvataḥ
c mahātmabhir anuproktāṃ kālasaṃkhyāṃ nibodha me
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a avyaktasya naraśreṣṭha kālasaṃkhyāṃ nibodha me
c pañca kalpasahasrāṇi dviguṇāny ahar ucyate
a rātrir etāvatī cāsya pratibuddho narādhipa
c sṛjaty oṣadhim evāgre jīvanaṃ sarvadehinām
a tato brahmāṇam asṛjad dhairaṇyāṇḍasamudbhavam
c sā mūrtiḥ sarvabhūtānām ity evam anuśuśruma
a saṃvatsaram uṣitvāṇḍe niṣkramya ca mahāmuniḥ
c saṃdadhe 'rdhaṃ mahīṃ kṛtsnāṃ divam ardhaṃ prajāpatiḥ
a dyāvāpṛthivyor ity eṣa rājan vedeṣu paṭhyate
c tayoḥ śakalayor madhyam ākāśam akarot prabhuḥ
a etasyāpi ca saṃkhyānaṃ vedavedāṅgapāragaiḥ
c daśa kalpasahasrāṇi pādonāny ahar ucyate
e rātrim etāvatīṃ cāsya prāhur adhyātmacintakāḥ
a sṛjaty ahaṃkāram ṛṣir bhūtaṃ divyātmakaṃ tathā
c caturaś cāparān putrān dehāt pūrvaṃ mahān ṛṣiḥ
d maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā
e te vai pitṛbhyaḥ pitaraḥ śrūyante rājasattama
a devāḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca sutā devair lokāḥ samāvṛtāḥ
c carācarā naraśreṣṭha ity evam anuśuśruma
a parameṣṭhī tv ahaṃkāro 'sṛjad bhūtāni pañcadhā
c pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
a etasyāpi niśām āhus tṛtīyam iha kurvataḥ
c pañca kalpasahasrāṇi tāvad evāhar ucyate
a śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
c ete viśeṣā rājendra mahābhūteṣu pañcasu
e yair āviṣṭāni bhūtāni ahany ahani pārthiva
a anyonyaṃ spṛhayanty ete anyonyasya hite ratāḥ
c anyonyam abhimanyante anyonyaspardhinas tathā
a te vadhyamānā anyonyaṃ guṇair hāribhir avyayāḥ
c ihaiva parivartante tiryagyonipraveśinaḥ
a trīṇi kalpasahasrāṇi eteṣām ahar ucyate
c ratrir etāvatī caiva manasaś ca narādhipa
a manaś carati rājendra caritaṃ sarvam indriyaiḥ
c na cendriyāṇi paśyanti mana evātra paśyati
a cakṣuḥ paśyati rūpāṇi manasā tu na cakṣuṣā
c manasi vyākule cakṣuḥ paśyann api na paśyati
e tathendriyāṇi sarvāṇi paśyantīty abhicakṣate
a manasy uparate rājann indriyoparamo bhavet
c na cendriyavyuparame manasy uparamo bhavet
e evaṃ manaḥpradhānāni indriyāṇi vibhāvayet
a indriyāṇāṃ hi sarveṣām īśvaraṃ mana ucyate
c etad viśanti bhūtāni sarvāṇīha mahāyaśāḥ
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a tattvānāṃ sargasaṃkhyā ca kālasaṃkhyā tathaiva ca
c mayā proktānupūrvyeṇa saṃhāram api me śṛṇu
a yathā saṃharate jantūn sasarja ca punaḥ punaḥ
c anādinidhano brahmā nityaś cākṣara eva ca
a ahaḥkṣayam atho buddhvā niśi svapnamanās tathā
c codayām āsa bhagavān avyakto 'haṃkṛtaṃ naram
a tataḥ śatasahasrāṃśur avyaktenābhicoditaḥ
c kṛtvā dvādaśadhātmānam ādityo jvaladagnivat
a caturvidhaṃ prajājālaṃ nirdahaty āśu tejasā
c jarāyvaṇḍasvedajātam udbhijjaṃ ca narādhipa
a etad unmeṣamātreṇa viniṣṭaṃ sthāṇujaṅgamam
c kūrmapṛṣṭhasamā bhūmir bhavaty atha samantataḥ
a jagad dagdhvāmitabalaḥ kevalaṃ jagatīṃ tataḥ
c ambhasā balinā kṣipram āpūryata samantataḥ
a tataḥ kālāgnim āsādya tad ambho yāti saṃkṣayam
c vinaṣṭe 'mbhasi rājendra jājvalīty analo mahān
a tam aprameyo 'tibalaṃ jvalamānaṃ vibhāvasum
c ūṣmāṇaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ saptārciṣam athāñjasā
a bhakṣayām āsa balavān vāyur aṣṭātmako balī
c vicarann amitaprāṇas tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā
a tam apratibalaṃ bhīmam ākāśaṃ grasate ''tmanā
c ākāśam apy atinadan mano grasati cārikam
a mano grasati sarvātmā so 'haṃkāraḥ prajāpatiḥ
c ahaṃkāraṃ mahān ātmā bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyavit
a tam apy anupamātmānaṃ viśvaṃ śaṃbhuḥ prajāpatiḥ
c aṇimā laghimā prāptir īśāno jyotir avyayaḥ
a sarvataḥpāṇipādāntaḥ sarvatokṣiśiromukhaḥ
c sarvataḥśrutimāṃl loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
a hṛdayaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ parvaṇo 'ṅguṣṭhamātrakaḥ
c anugrasaty anantaṃ hi mahātmā viśvam īśvaraḥ
a tataḥ samabhavat sarvam akṣayāvyayam avraṇam
c bhūtabhavyamanuṣyāṇāṃ sraṣṭāram anaghaṃ tathā
a eṣo 'pyayas te rājendra yathāvat paribhāṣitaḥ
c adhyātmam adhibhūtaṃ ca adhidaivaṃ ca śrūyatām
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a pādāv adhyātmam ity āhur brāhmaṇās tattvadarśinaḥ
c gantavyam adhibhūtaṃ ca viṣṇus tatrādhidaivatam
a pāyur adhyātmam ity āhur yathātattvārthadarśinaḥ
c visargam adhibhūtaṃ ca mitras tatrādhidaivatam
a upastho 'dhyātmam ity āhur yathāyoganidarśanam
c adhibhūtaṃ tathānando daivataṃ ca prajāpatiḥ
a hastāv adhyātmam ity āhur yathāsāṃkhyanidarśanam
c kartavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu indras tatrādhidaivatam
a vāg adhyātmam iti prāhur yathāśrutinidarśanam
c vaktavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu vahnis tatrādhidaivatam
a cakṣur adhyātmam ity āhur yathāśrutinidarśanam
c rūpam atrādhibhūtaṃ tu sūryas tatrādhidaivatam
a śrotram adhyātmam ity āhur yathāśrutinidarśanam
b karṇāv adhyātmakaṃ jñeyaṃ prāhuḥ sāṃkhyanidarśanāḥ
c śabdas tatrādhibhūtaṃ tu diśas tatrādhidaivatam
a jihvām adhyātmam ity āhur yathātattvanidarśanam
c rasa evādhibhūtaṃ tu āpas tatrādhidaivatam
a ghrāṇam adhyātmam ity āhur yathāśrutinidarśanam
c gandha evādhibhūtaṃ tu pṛthivī cādhidaivatam
a tvag adhyātmam iti prāhus tattvabuddhiviśāradāḥ
c sparśa evādhibhūtaṃ tu pavanaś cādhidaivatam
a mano 'dhyātmam iti prāhur yathāśrutinidarśanam
c mantavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu candramāś cādhidaivatam
a ahaṃkārikam adhyātmam āhus tattvanidarśanam
c abhimāno 'dhibhūtaṃ tu bhavas tatrādhidaivatam
a buddhir adhyātmam ity āhur yathāvedanidarśanam
c boddhavyam adhibhūtaṃ tu kṣetrajño 'trādhidaivatam
d cittam adhyātmam ity āhur yoginaḥ sūkṣmadṛṣṭayaḥ
d adhibhūtaṃ caityam āhū rudras tatrādhidaivatam
a eṣā te vyaktato rājan vibhūtir anuvarṇitā
c ādau madhye tathā cānte yathātattvena tattvavit
a prakṛtir guṇān vikurute svacchandenātmakāmyayā
c krīḍārthaṃ tu mahārāja śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
a yathā dīpasahasrāṇi dīpān martyāḥ prakurvate
c prakṛtis tathā vikurute puruṣasya guṇān bahūn
a sattvam ānanda udrekaḥ prītiḥ prākāśyam eva ca
c sukhaṃ śuddhitvam ārogyaṃ saṃtoṣaḥ śraddadhānatā
a akārpaṇyam asaṃrambhaḥ kṣamā dhṛtir ahiṃsatā
c samatā satyam ānṛṇyaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
a śaucam ārjavam ācāram alaulyaṃ hṛdyasaṃbhramaḥ
c iṣṭāniṣṭaviyogānāṃ kṛtānām avikatthanam
a dānena cānugrahaṇam aspṛhārthe parārthatā
c sarvabhūtadayā caiva sattvasyaite guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ
a rajoguṇānāṃ saṃghāto rūpam aiśvaryavigrahe
c atyāśitvam akāruṇyaṃ sukhaduḥkhopasevanam
a parāpavādeṣu ratir vivādānāṃ ca sevanam
c ahaṃkāras tv asatkāraś cintā vairopasevanam
a paritāpo 'paharaṇaṃ hrīnāśo 'nārjavaṃ tathā
c bhedaḥ paruṣatā caiva kāmakrodhau madas tathā
e darpo dveṣo 'tivādaś ca ete proktā rajoguṇāḥ
a tāmasānāṃ tu saṃghātaṃ pravakṣyāmy upadhāryatām
c moho 'prakāśas tāmisram andhatāmisrasaṃjñitam
a maraṇaṃ cāndhatāmisraṃ tāmisraṃ krodha ucyate
c tamaso lakṣaṇānīha bhakṣāṇām abhirocanam
a bhojanānām aparyāptis tathā peyeṣv atṛptatā
c gandhavāso vihāreṣu śayaneṣv āsaneṣu ca
a divāsvapne vivāde ca pramādeṣu ca vai ratiḥ
c nṛtyavāditragītānām ajñānāc chraddadhānatā
e dveṣo dharmaviśeṣāṇām ete vai tāmasā guṇāḥ
f ity evaṃ saptadaśako rāśir avyaktasaṃjñakaḥ
f sarvair ihendriyārthaiś ca vyaktāvyaktaiś ca saṃhatāḥ
f pañcaviṃśaka ity eṣa vyaktāvyaktamayo gaṇaḥ
f etaiḥ sarvaiḥ samāyuktāḥ pumān ity abhidhīyate
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a ete pradhānasya guṇās trayaḥ puruṣasattama
c kṛtsnasya caiva jagatas tiṣṭhanty anapagāḥ sadā
d avyaktarūpo bhagavāñ śatadhā ca sahasraśaḥ
a śatadhā sahasradhā caiva tathā śatasahasradhā
c koṭiśaś ca karoty eṣa pratyagātmānam ātmanā
a sāttvikasyottamaṃ sthānaṃ rājasasyeha madhyamam
c tāmasasyādhamaṃ sthānaṃ prāhur adhyātmacintakāḥ
a kevaleneha puṇyena gatim ūrdhvām avāpnuyāt
c puṇyapāpena mānuṣyam adharmeṇāpy adhogatim
a dvaṃdvam eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ tu saṃnipātaṃ ca tattvataḥ
c sattvasya rajasaś caiva tamasaś ca śṛṇuṣva me
a sattvasya tu rajo dṛṣṭaṃ rajasaś ca tamas tathā
c tamasaś ca tathā sattvaṃ sattvasyāvyaktam eva ca
d sattvaṃ prapadyate sattvād avyaktād vyaktam eva ca
a avyaktasattvasaṃyukto devalokam avāpnuyāt
c rajaḥsattvasamāyukto manuṣyeṣūpapadyate
a rajastamobhyāṃ saṃyuktas tiryagyoniṣu jāyate
c rajastāmasasattvaiś ca yukto mānuṣyam āpnuyāt
a puṇyapāpaviyuktānāṃ sthānam āhur manīṣiṇām
c śāsvataṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva akṣaraṃ cābhayaṃ ca yat
a jñānināṃ saṃbhavaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ sthānam avraṇam acyutam
c atīndriyam abījaṃ ca janmamṛtyutamonudam
a avyaktasthaṃ paraṃ yat tat pṛṣṭas te 'haṃ narādhipa
c sa eṣa prakṛtiṣṭho hi tasthur ity abhidhīyate
a acetanaś caiṣa mataḥ prakṛtisthaś ca pārthiva
c etenādhiṣṭhitaś caiva sṛjate saṃharaty api
 janaka uvāca
a anādinidhanāv etāv ubhāv eva mahāmune
c amūrtimantāv acalāv aprakampyau ca nirvraṇau
a agrāhyāv ṛṣiśārdūla katham eko hy acetanaḥ
c cetanāvāṃs tathā caikaḥ kṣetrajña iti bhāṣitaḥ
a tvaṃ hi viprendra kārtsnyena mokṣadharmam upāsase
c sākalyaṃ mokṣadharmasya śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
a astitvaṃ kevalatvaṃ ca vinābhāvaṃ tathaiva ca
b daivatāni ca me brūhi dehaṃ yāny āśritāni vai
c tathaivotkramaṇasthānaṃ dehino 'pi viyujyataḥ
a kālena yad dhi prāpnoti sthānaṃ tad brūhi me dvija
c sāṃkhyajñānaṃ ca tattvena pṛthag yogaṃ tathaiva ca
a ariṣṭāni ca tattvena vaktum arhasi sattama
c viditaṃ sarvam etat te pāṇāv āmalakaṃ yathā
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a na śakyo nirguṇas tāta guṇīkartuṃ viśāṃ pate
c guṇavāṃś cāpy aguṇavān yathātattvaṃ nibodha me
a guṇair hi guṇavān eva nirguṇaś cāguṇas tathā
c prāhur evaṃ mahātmāno munayas tattvadarśinaḥ
a guṇasvabhāvas tv avyakto guṇān evābhivartate
c upayuṅkte ca tān eva sa caivājñaḥ svabhāvataḥ
a avyaktas tu na jānīte puruṣo jñaḥ svabhāvataḥ
c na mattaḥ param astīti nityam evābhimanyate
a anena kāraṇenaitad avyaktaṃ syād acetanam
c nityatvād akṣaratvāc ca kṣarāṇāṃ tattvato 'nyathā
a yadājñānena kurvīta guṇasargaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
c yadātmānaṃ na jānīte tadāvyaktam ihocyate
a kartṛtvāc cāpi tattvānāṃ tattvadharmī tathocyate
c kartṛtvāc caiva yonīnāṃ yonidharmā tathocyate
a kartṛtvāt prakṛtīnāṃ tu tathā prakṛtidharmitā
c kartṛtvāc cāpi bījānāṃ bījadharmī tathocyate
a guṇānāṃ prasavatvāc ca tathā prasavadharmavān
c kartṛtvāt pralayānāṃ ca tathā pralayadharmitā
d kartṛtvāt prasavānāṃ ca tathā prabhavadharmitā
a bījatvāt prakṛtitvāc ca pralayatvāt tathaiva ca
c upekṣakatvād anyatvād abhimānāc ca kevalam
a manyante yatayaḥ śuddhā adhyātmavigatajvarāḥ
c anityaṃ nityam avyaktam evam etad dhi śuśruma
a avyaktaikatvam ity āhur nānātvaṃ puruṣas tathā
c sarvabhūtadayāvantaḥ kevalaṃ jñānam āsthitāḥ
a anyaḥ sa puruṣo 'vyaktas tv adhruvo dhruvasaṃjñakaḥ
c yathā muñja iṣīkāyās tathaivaitad dhi jāyate
d na caiva muñjasaṃyogād iṣīkā kartṛ budhyate
a anyaṃ ca maśakaṃ vidyād anyac codumbaraṃ tathā
c na codumbarasaṃyogair maśakas tatra lipyate
a anya eva tathā matsyas tathānyad udakaṃ smṛtam
c na codakasya sparśena matsyo lipyati sarvaśaḥ
a anyo hy agnir ukhāpy anyā nityam evam avaihi bhoḥ
c na copalipyate so 'gnir ukhāsaṃsparśanena vai
a puṣkaraṃ tv anyad evātra tathānyad udakaṃ smṛtam
c na codakasya sparśena lipyate tatra puṣkaram
a eteṣāṃ saha saṃvāsaṃ vivāsaṃ caiva nityaśaḥ
c yathā tathainaṃ paśyanti na nityaṃ prākṛtā janāḥ
a ye tv anyathaiva paśyanti na samyak teṣu darśanam
c te vyaktaṃ nirayaṃ ghoraṃ praviśanti punaḥ punaḥ
a sāṃkhyadarśanam etat te parisaṃkhyātam uttamam
c evaṃ hi parisaṃkhyāya sāṃkhyāḥ kevalatāṃ gatāḥ
a ye tv anye tattvakuśalās teṣām etan nidarśanam
c ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi yogānām api darśanam
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a sāṃkhyajñānaṃ mayā proktaṃ yogajñānaṃ nibodha me
c yathāśrutaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ tattvena nṛpasattama
a nāsti sāṃkhyasamaṃ jñānaṃ nāsti yogasamaṃ balam
c tāv ubhāv ekacaryau tu ubhāv anidhanau smṛtau
a pṛthak pṛthak tu paśyanti ye 'lpabuddhiratā narāḥ
c vayaṃ tu rājan paśyāma ekam eva tu niścayāt
a yad eva yogāḥ paśyanti tat sāṃkhyair api dṛśyate
c ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa tattvavit
a rudrapradhānān aparān viddhi yogān paraṃtapa
c tenaiva cātha dehena vicaranti diśo daśa
a yāvad dhi pralayas tāta sūkṣmeṇāṣṭaguṇena vai
c yogena lokān vicaran sukhaṃ saṃnyasya cānagha
a vedeṣu cāṣṭaguṇitaṃ yogam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
c sūkṣmam aṣṭaguṇaṃ prāhur netaraṃ nṛpasattama
a dviguṇaṃ yogakṛtyaṃ tu yogānāṃ prāhur uttamam
c saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ caiva yathāśāstranidarśanam
d ataḥ paraṃ pravakṣyāmi prāṇāyāmaṃ ca pārthiva
a dhāraṇā caiva manasaḥ prāṇāyāmaś ca pārthiva
b ekāgratā ca manasaḥ prāṇāyāmas tathaiva ca
c prāṇāyāmo hi saguṇo nirguṇaṃ dhāraṇaṃ manaḥ
a yatra dṛśyeta muñcan vai prāṇān maithilasattama
c vātādhikyaṃ bhavaty eva tasmād dhi na samācaret
a niśāyāḥ prathame yāme codanā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ
c madhye suptvā pare yāme dvādaśaiva tu codanāḥ
a tad evam upaśāntena dāntenaikāntaśīlinā
c ātmārāmeṇa buddhena yoktavyo ''tmā na saṃśayaḥ
a pañcānām indriyāṇāṃ tu doṣān ākṣipya pañcadhā
c śabdaṃ sparśaṃ tathā rūpaṃ rasaṃ gandhaṃ tathaiva ca
a pratibhām apavargaṃ ca pratisaṃhṛtya maithila
c indriyagrāmam akhilaṃ manasy abhiniveśya ha
a manas tathaivāhaṃkāre pratiṣṭhāpya narādhipa
c ahaṃkāraṃ tathā buddhau buddhiṃ ca prakṛtāv api
a evaṃ hi parisaṃkhyāya tato dhyāyeta kevalam
c virajaskamalaṃ nityam anantaṃ śuddham avraṇam
a tasthuṣaṃ puruṣaṃ sattvam abhedyam ajarāmaram
c śāśvataṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva īśānaṃ brahma cāvyayam
a yuktasya tu mahārāja lakṣaṇāny upadhārayet
c lakṣaṇaṃ tu prasādasya yathā tṛptaḥ sukhaṃ svapet
a nivāte tu yathā dīpo jvalet snehasamanvitaḥ
c niścalordhvaśikhas tadvad yuktam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
a pāṣāṇa iva meghotthair yathā bindubhir āhataḥ
c nālaṃ cālayituṃ śakyas tathā yuktasya lakṣaṇam
a śaṅkhadundubhinirghoṣair vividhair gītavāditaiḥ
c kriyamāṇair na kampeta yuktasyaitan nidarśanam
a tailapātraṃ yathā pūrṇaṃ karābhyāṃ gṛhya pūruṣaḥ
c sopānam āruhed bhītas tarjyamāno 'sipāṇibhiḥ
a saṃyatātmā bhayāt teṣāṃ na pātrād bindum utsṛjet
c tathaivottaramāṇasya ekāgramanasas tathā
a sthiratvād indriyāṇāṃ tu niścalatvāt tathaiva ca
c evaṃ yuktasya tu muner lakṣaṇāny upadhārayet
a sa yuktaḥ paśyati brahma yat tat paramam avyayam
c mahatas tamaso madhye sthitaṃ jvalanasaṃnibham
a etena kevalaṃ yāti tyaktvā deham asākṣikam
c kālena mahatā rājañ śrutir eṣā sanātanī
a etad dhi yogaṃ yogānāṃ kim anyad yogalakṣaṇam
c vijñāya tad dhi manyante kṛtakṛtyā manīṣiṇaḥ
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a tathaivotkramamāṇaṃ tu śṛṇuṣvāvahito nṛpa
c padbhyām utkramamāṇasya vaiṣṇavaṃ sthānam ucyate
a jaṅghābhyāṃ tu vasūn devān āpnuyād iti naḥ śrutam
c jānubhyāṃ ca mahābhāgān devān sādhyān avāpnuyāt
a pāyunotkramamāṇas tu maitraṃ sthānam avāpnuyāt
c pṛthivīṃ jaghanenātha ūrubhyāṃ tu prajāpatim
a pārśvābhyāṃ maruto devān nāsābhyām indum eva ca
c bāhubhyām indram ity āhur urasā rudram eva ca
a grīvāyās tam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ naram āpnoty anuttamam
c viśvedevān mukhenātha diśaḥ śrotreṇa cāpnuyāt
a ghrāṇena gandhavahanaṃ netrābhyāṃ sūryam eva ca
c bhrūbhyāṃ caivāśvinau devau lalāṭena pitṝn atha
a brahmāṇam āpnoti vibhuṃ mūrdhnā devāgrajaṃ tathā
c etāny utkramaṇasthānāny uktāni mithileśvara
a ariṣṭāni tu vakṣyāmi vihitāni manīṣibhiḥ
c saṃvatsaraviyogasya saṃbhaveyuḥ śarīriṇaḥ
a yo 'rundhatīṃ na paśyeta dṛṣṭapūrvāṃ kadā cana
c tathaiva dhruvam ity āhuḥ pūrṇenduṃ dīpam eva ca
e khaṇḍābhāsaṃ dakṣiṇatas te 'pi saṃvatsarāyuṣaḥ
a paracakṣuṣi cātmānaṃ ye na paśyanti pārthiva
c ātmacchāyākṛtībhūtaṃ te 'pi saṃvatsarāyuṣaḥ
a atidyutir atiprajñā aprajñā cādyutis tathā
c prakṛter vikriyāpattiḥ ṣaṇmāsān mṛtyulakṣaṇam
a daivatāny avajānāti brāhmaṇaiś ca virudhyate
c kṛṣṇaśyāvacchavicchāyaḥ ṣaṇmāsān mṛtyulakṣaṇam
a śīrṇanābhi yathā cakraṃ chidraṃ somaṃ prapaśyati
c tathaiva ca sahasrāṃśuṃ saptarātreṇa mṛtyubhāk
a śavagandham upāghrāti surabhiṃ prāpya yo naraḥ
c devatāyatanasthas tu ṣaḍrātreṇa sa mṛtyubhāk
a karṇanāsāvanamanaṃ dantadṛṣṭivirāgitā
c saṃjñālopo nirūṣmatvaṃ sadyomṛtyunidarśanam
a akasmāc ca sravedyasya vāmam akṣi narādhipa
c mūrdhataś cotpated dhūmaḥ sadyomṛtyunidarśanam
a etāvanti tv ariṣṭāni viditvā mānavo ''tmavān
c niśi cāhani cātmānaṃ yojayet paramātmani
a pratīkṣamāṇas tat kālaṃ yat kālaṃ prati tad bhavet
c athāsya neṣṭaṃ maraṇaṃ sthātum icched imāṃ kriyām
a sarvagandhān rasāṃś caiva dhārayeta samāhitaḥ
c tathā hi mṛtyuṃ jayati tatpareṇāntarātmanā
a sasāṃkhyadhāraṇaṃ caiva viditvā manujarṣabha
c jayec ca mṛtyuṃ yogena tatpareṇāntarātmanā
a gacchet prāpyākṣayaṃ kṛtsnam ajanma śivam avyayam
c śāśvataṃ sthānam acalaṃ duṣprāpam akṛtātmabhiḥ
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a avyaktasthaṃ paraṃ yat tat pṛṣṭas te 'haṃ narādhipa
c paraṃ guhyam imaṃ praśnaṃ śṛṇuṣvāvahito nṛpa
a yathārṣeṇeha vidhinā caratāvamatena ha
c mayādityād avāptāni yajūṃṣi mithilādhipa
a mahatā tapasā devas tapiṣṭhaḥ sevito mayā
c prītena cāhaṃ vibhunā sūryeṇoktas tadānagha
a varaṃ vṛṇīṣva viprarṣe yad iṣṭaṃ te sudurlabham
c tat te dāsyāmi prītātmā matprasādo hi durlabhaḥ
a tataḥ praṇamya śirasā mayoktas tapatāṃ varaḥ
c yajūṃṣi nopayuktāni kṣipram icchāmi veditum
a tato māṃ bhagavān āha vitariṣyāmi te dvija
c sarasvatīha vāgbhūtā śarīraṃ te pravekṣyati
a tato mām āha bhagavān āsyaṃ svaṃ vivṛtaṃ kuru
c vivṛtaṃ ca tato me ''syaṃ praviṣṭā ca sarasvatī
a tato vidahyamāno 'haṃ praviṣṭo 'mbhas tadānagha
c avijñānād amarṣāc ca bhāskarasya mahātmanaḥ
d vaiśaṃpāyananāmāsau mātulo me mahāmuniḥ
d mucyatāṃ yad adhītaṃ te matta ity eva so 'bravīt
d tenāmarṣeṇa tapto 'haṃ mātulasya mahātmanaḥ
a tato vidahyamānaṃ mām uvāca bhagavān raviḥ
c muhūrtaṃ sahyatāṃ dāhas tataḥ śītībhaviṣyasi
a śītībhūtaṃ ca māṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān āha bhāskaraḥ
c pratiṣṭhāsyati te vedaḥ sottaraḥ sakhilo dvija
a kṛtsnaṃ śatapathaṃ caiva praṇeṣyasi dvijarṣabha
c tasyānte cāpunarbhāve buddhis tava bhaviṣyati
a prāpsyase ca yad iṣṭaṃ tat sāṃkhyayogepsitaṃ padam
c etāvad uktvā bhagavān astam evābhyavartata
a tato 'nuvyāhṛtaṃ śrutvā gate deve vibhāvasau
c gṛham āgatya saṃhṛṣṭo 'cintayaṃ vai sarasvatīm
a tataḥ pravṛttātiśubhā svaravyañjanabhūṣitā
c oṃkāram āditaḥ kṛtvā mama devī sarasvatī
a tato 'ham arghyaṃ vidhivat sarasvatyai nyavedayam
c tapatāṃ ca variṣṭhāya niṣaṇṇas tatparāyaṇaḥ
a tataḥ śatapathaṃ kṛtsnaṃ sarahasyaṃ sasaṃgraham
c cakre sapariśeṣaṃ ca harṣeṇa parameṇa ha
a kṛtvā cādhyayanaṃ teṣāṃ śiṣyāṇāṃ śatam uttamam
c vipriyārthaṃ saśiṣyasya mātulasya mahātmanaḥ
a tataḥ saśiṣyeṇa mayā sūryeṇeva gabhastibhiḥ
c vyāpto yajño mahārāja pitus tava mahātmanaḥ
a miṣato devalasyāpi tato 'rdhaṃ hṛtavān aham
c svavedadakṣiṇāyātha vimarde mātulena ha
a sumantunātha pailena tathā jaimininā ca vai
c pitrā te munibhiś caiva tato 'ham anumānitaḥ
a daśa pañca ca prāptāni yajūṃṣy arkān mayānagha
c tathaiva lomaharṣāc ca purāṇam avadhāritam
d upadhāritaṃ tathā vāpi purāṇaṃ romaharṣaṇāt
a bījam etat puraskṛtya devīṃ caiva sarasvatīm
c sūryasya cānubhāvena pravṛtto 'haṃ narādhipa
a kartuṃ śatapathaṃ vedam apūrvaṃ kāritaṃ ca me
c yathābhilaṣitaṃ mārgaṃ tathā tac copapāditam
a śiṣyāṇām akhilaṃ kṛtsnam anujñātaṃ sasaṃgraham
c sarve ca śiṣyāḥ śucayo gatāḥ paramaharṣitāḥ
a śākhāḥ pañcadaśemās tu vidyā bhāskaradarśitāḥ
c pratiṣṭhāpya yathākāmaṃ vedyaṃ tad anucintayam
a kim atra brahmaṇyam ṛtaṃ kiṃ ca vedyam anuttamam
c cintaye tatra cāgatya gandharvo mām apṛcchata
a viśvāvasus tato rājan vedāntajñānakovidaḥ
c caturviṃśatikān praśnān pṛṣṭvā vedasya pārthiva
e pañcaviṃśatimaṃ praśnaṃ papracchānvīkṣikīṃ tathā
a viśvāviśvaṃ tathāśvāśvaṃ mitraṃ varuṇam eva ca
a   puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ tathā
a tathaiva puruṣavyāghra
c jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ tathājño jñaḥ kas tapā atapās tathā
e sūryādaḥ sūrya iti ca vidyāvidye tathaiva ca
a vedyāvedyaṃ tathā rājann acalaṃ calam eva ca
c apūrvam akṣayaṃ kṣayyam etat praśnam anuttamam
a athoktaś ca mayā rājan rājā gandharvasattamaḥ
c pṛṣṭavān anupūrveṇa praśnam uttamam arthavat
a muhūrtaṃ mṛṣyatāṃ tāvad yāvad enaṃ vicintaye
c bāḍham ity eva kṛtvā sa tūṣṇīṃ gandharva āsthitaḥ
a tato 'nvacintayam ahaṃ bhūyo devīṃ sarasvatīm
c manasā sa ca me praśno dadhno ghṛtam ivoddhṛtam
a tatropaniṣadaṃ caiva pariśeṣaṃ ca pārthiva
c mathnāmi manasā tāta dṛṣṭvā cānvīkṣikīṃ parām
a caturthī rājaśārdūla vidyaiṣā sāṃparāyikī
c udīritā mayā tubhyaṃ pañcaviṃśe 'dhi dhiṣṭhitā
a athoktas tu mayā rājan rājā viśvāvasus tadā
c śrūyatāṃ yad bhavān asmān praśnaṃ saṃpṛṣṭavān iha
a viśvāviśveti yad idaṃ gandharvendrānupṛcchasi
c viśvāvyaktaṃ paraṃ vidyād bhūtabhavyabhayaṃkaram
a triguṇaṃ guṇakartṛtvād aviśvo niṣkalas tathā
c aśvas tathaiva mithunam evam evānudṛśyate
a avyaktaṃ prakṛtiṃ prāhuḥ puruṣeti ca nirguṇam
c tathaiva mitraṃ puruṣaṃ varuṇaṃ prakṛtiṃ tathā
a jñānaṃ tu prakṛtiṃ prāhur jñeyaṃ niṣkalam eva ca
c ajñaś ca jñaś ca puruṣas tasmān niṣkala ucyate
a kas tapā atapāḥ proktaḥ ko 'sau puruṣa ucyate
c tapāḥ prakṛtir ity āhur atapā niṣkalaḥ smṛtaḥ
d sūryam avyaktam ity uktam atisūryas tu niṣkalam
d avidyā prakṛtir jñeyā vidyā puruṣa ucyate
d sūryāṃ ca prakṛtiṃ vidyād asūryā niṣphalaḥ smṛtaḥ
d vidyeti puruṣaṃ vidyād avidyā prakṛtiḥ parā
a tathaivāvedyam avyaktaṃ vedyaḥ puruṣa ucyate
c calācalam iti proktaṃ tvayā tad api me śṛṇu
a calāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ prāhuḥ kāraṇaṃ kṣepasargayoḥ
c akṣepasargayoḥkartā niścalaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
a ajāv ubhāv aprajau ca akṣayau cāpy ubhāv api
c ajau nityāv ubhau prāhur adhyātmagatiniścayāḥ
a akṣayatvāt prajanane ajam atrāhur avyayam
c akṣayaṃ puruṣaṃ prāhuḥ kṣayo hy asya na vidyate
a guṇakṣayatvāt prakṛtiḥ kartṛtvād akṣayaṃ budhāḥ
c eṣā te ''nvīkṣikī vidyā caturthī sāṃparāyikī
a vidyopetaṃ dhanaṃ kṛtvā karmaṇā nityakarmaṇi
c ekāntadarśanā vedāḥ sarve viśvāvaso smṛtāḥ
a jāyante ca mriyante ca yasminn ete yataś cyutāḥ
c vedārthaṃ ye na jānanti vedyaṃ gandharvasattama
a sāṅgopāṅgān api yadi pañca vedān adhīyate
c vedavedyaṃ na jānīte vedabhāravaho hi saḥ
a yo ghṛtārthī kharīkṣīraṃ mathed gandharvasattama
c viṣṭhāṃ tatrānupaśyeta na maṇḍaṃ nāpi vā ghṛtam
a tathā vedyam avedyaṃ ca vedavidyo na vindati
c sa kevalaṃ mūḍhamatir jñānabhāravahaḥ smṛtaḥ
a draṣṭavyau nityam evaitau tatpareṇāntarātmanā
c yathāsya janmanidhane na bhavetāṃ punaḥ punaḥ
a ajasraṃ janmanidhanaṃ cintayitvā trayīm imām
c parityajya kṣayam iha akṣayaṃ dharmam āsthitaḥ
a yadā tu paśyate 'tyantam ahany ahani kāśyapa
c tadā sa kevalībhūtaḥ ṣaḍviṃśam anupaśyati
a anyaś ca śaśvad avyaktas tathānyaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
c tasya dvāv anupaśyeta tam ekam iti sādhavaḥ
a tenaitan nābhijānanti pañcaviṃśakam acyutam
c janmamṛtyubhayād yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś ca paramaiṣiṇaḥ
 viśvāvasur uvāca
a pañcaviṃśaṃ yad etat te proktaṃ brāhmaṇasattama
c tathā tan na tathā veti tad bhavān vaktum arhati
a jaigīṣavyasyāsitasya devalasya ca me śrutam
c parāśarasya viprarṣer vārṣagaṇyasya dhīmataḥ
a bhikṣoḥ pañcaśikhasyātha kapilasya śukasya ca
c gautamasyārṣṭiṣeṇasya gargasya ca mahātmanaḥ
a nāradasyāsureś caiva pulastyasya ca dhīmataḥ
c sanatkumārasya tataḥ śukrasya ca mahātmanaḥ
a kaśyapasya pituś caiva pūrvam eva mayā śrutam
c tadanantaraṃ ca rudrasya viśvarūpasya dhīmataḥ
a daivatebhyaḥ pitṛbhyaś ca daityebhyaś ca tatas tataḥ
c prāptam etan mayā kṛtsnaṃ vedyaṃ nityaṃ vadanty uta
a tasmāt tad vai bhavadbuddhyā śrotum icchāmi brāhmaṇa
c bhavān prabarhaḥ śāstrāṇāṃ pragalbhaś cātibuddhimān
a na tavāviditaṃ kiṃ cid bhavāñ śrutinidhiḥ smṛtaḥ
c kathyate devaloke ca pitṛloke ca brāhmaṇa
a brahmalokagatāś caiva kathayanti maharṣayaḥ
c patiś ca tapatāṃ śaśvad ādityas tava bhāṣate
a sāṃkhyajñānaṃ tvayā brahmann avāptaṃ kṛtsnam eva ca
c tathaiva yogajñānaṃ ca yājñavalkya viśeṣataḥ
a niḥsaṃdigdhaṃ prabuddhas tvaṃ budhyamānaś carācaram
c śrotum icchāmi taj jñānaṃ ghṛtaṃ maṇḍamayaṃ yathā
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a kṛtsnadhāriṇam eva tvāṃ manye gandharvasattama
c jijñāsasi ca māṃ rājaṃs tan nibodha yathāśrutam
a abudhyamānāṃ prakṛtiṃ budhyate pañcaviṃśakaḥ
c na tu budhyati gandharva prakṛtiḥ pañcaviṃśakam
a anenāpratibodhena pradhānaṃ pravadanti tam
c sāṃkhyayogāś ca tattvajñā yathāśrutinidarśanāt
a paśyaṃs tathaivāpaśyaṃś ca paśyaty anyas tathānagha
c ṣaḍviṃśaḥ pañcaviṃśaṃ ca caturviṃśaṃ ca paśyati
e na tu paśyati paśyaṃs tu yaś cainam anupaśyati
a pañcaviṃśo 'bhimanyeta nānyo 'sti paramo mama
c na caturviṃśako 'grāhyo manujair jñānadarśibhiḥ
a matsyevodakam anveti pravartati pravartanāt
c yathaiva budhyate matsyas tathaiṣo 'py anubudhyate
e sasnehaḥ sahavāsāc ca sābhimānaś ca nityaśaḥ
a sa nimajjati kālasya yadaikatvaṃ na budhyate
c unmajjati hi kālasya mamatvenābhisaṃvṛtaḥ
a yadā tu manyate 'nyo 'ham anya eṣa iti dvijaḥ
c tadā sa kevalībhūtaḥ ṣaḍviṃśam anupaśyati
a anyaś ca rājann avaras tathānyaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
c tatsthatvād anupaśyanti eka eveti sādhavaḥ
a tenaitan nābhinandanti pañcaviṃśakam acyutam
c janmamṛtyubhayād bhītā yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś ca kāśyapa
e ṣaḍviṃśam anupaśyanti śucayas tatparāyaṇāḥ
a yadā sa kevalībhūtaḥ ṣaḍviṃśam anupaśyati
c tadā sa sarvavid vidvān na punarjanma vindati
a evam apratibuddhaś ca budhyamānaś ca te 'nagha
c buddhaś cokto yathātattvaṃ mayā śrutinidarśanāt
a paśyāpaśyaṃ yo 'nupaśyet kṣemaṃ tattvaṃ ca kāśyapa
c kevalākevalaṃ cādyaṃ pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ ca yat
 viśvāvasur uvāca
a tathyaṃ śubhaṃ caitad uktaṃ tvayā bhoḥ
samyak kṣemyaṃ devatādyaṃ yathāvat
c svasty akṣayaṃ bhavataś cāstu nityaṃ
buddhyā sadā buddhiyuktaṃ namas te
 yājñavalkya uvāca
a evam uktvā saṃprayāto divaṃ sa
vibhrājan vai śrīmatā darśanena
c tuṣṭaś ca tuṣṭyā parayābhinandya
pradakṣiṇaṃ mama kṛtvā mahātmā
a brahmādīnāṃ khecarāṇāṃ kṣitau ca
ye cādhastāt saṃvasante narendra
c tatraiva tad darśanaṃ darśayan vai
samyak kṣemyaṃ ye pathaṃ saṃśritā vai
a sāṃkhyāḥ sarve sāṃkhyadharme ratāś ca
tadvad yogā yogadharme ratāś ca
c ye cāpy anye mokṣakāmā manuṣyās
teṣām etad darśanaṃ jñānadṛṣṭam
a jñānān mokṣo jāyate pūruṣāṇāṃ
nāsty ajñānād evam āhur narendra
c tasmāj jñānaṃ tattvato 'nveṣitavyaṃ
yenātmānaṃ mokṣayej janmamṛtyoḥ
a prāpya jñānaṃ brāhmaṇāt kṣatriyād vā
vaiśyāc chūdrād api nīcād abhīkṣṇam
c śraddhātavyaṃ śraddadhānena nityaṃ
na śraddhinaṃ janmamṛtyū viśetām
a sarve varṇā brāhmaṇā brahmajāś ca
sarve nityaṃ vyāharante ca brahma
c tattvaṃ śāstraṃ brahmabuddhyā bravīmi
sarvaṃ viśvaṃ brahma caitat samastam
a brahmāsyato brāhmaṇāḥ saṃprasūtā
bāhubhyāṃ vai kṣatriyāḥ saṃprasūtāḥ
c nābhyāṃ vaiśyāḥ pādataś cāpi śūdrāḥ
sarve varṇā nānyathā veditavyāḥ
a ajñānataḥ karmayoniṃ bhajante
tāṃ tāṃ rājaṃs te yathā yānty abhāvam
c tathā varṇā jñānahīnāḥ patante
ghorād ajñānāt prākṛtaṃ yonijālam
a tasmāj jñānaṃ sarvato mārgitavyaṃ
sarvatrasthaṃ caitad uktaṃ mayā te
c tasthau brahmā tasthivāṃś cāparo yas
tasmai nityaṃ mokṣam āhur dvijendrāḥ
a yat te pṛṣṭaṃ tan mayā copadiṣṭaṃ
yāthātathyaṃ tad viśoko bhavasva
c rājan gacchasvaitadarthasya pāraṃ
samyak proktaṃ svasti te 'stv atra nityam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa evam anuśāstas tu yājñavalkyena dhīmatā
c prītimān abhavad rājā mithilādhipatis tadā
a gate munivare tasmin kṛte cāpi pradakṣiṇe
c daivarātir narapatir āsīnas tatra mokṣavit
a gokoṭiṃ sparśayām āsa hiraṇyasya tathaiva ca
c ratnāñjalim athaikaṃ ca brāhmaṇebhyo dadau tadā
a videharājyaṃ ca tathā pratiṣṭhāpya sutasya vai
c yatidharmam upāsaṃś cāpy avasan mithilādhipaḥ
a sāṃkhyajñānam adhīyāno yogaśāstraṃ ca kṛtsnaśaḥ
c dharmādharmau ca rājendra prākṛtaṃ parigarhayan
a anantam iti kṛtvā sa nityaṃ kevalam eva ca
c dharmādharmau puṇyapāpe satyāsatye tathaiva ca
a janmamṛtyū ca rājendra prākṛtaṃ tad acintayat
c brahmāvyaktasya karmedam iti nityaṃ narādhipa
a paśyanti yogāḥ sāṃkhyāś ca svaśāstrakṛtalakṣaṇāḥ
c iṣṭāniṣṭaviyuktaṃ hi tasthau brahma parātparam
e nityaṃ tam āhur vidvāṃsaḥ śucis tasmāc chucir bhava
a dīyate yac ca labhate dattaṃ yac cānumanyate
b avyakteneti tac cintyam anyathā mā vicintaya
c dadāti ca naraśreṣṭha pratigṛhṇāti yac ca ha
e dadāty avyaktam evaitat pratigṛhṇāti tac ca vai
a ātmā hy evātmano hy ekaḥ ko 'nyas tvatto 'dhiko bhavet
c evaṃ manyasva satatam anyathā mā vicintaya
a yasyāvyaktaṃ na viditaṃ saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ punaḥ
c tena tīrthāni yajñāś ca sevitavyāvipaścitā
a na svādhyāyais tapobhir vā yajñair vā kurunandana
c labhate 'vyaktasaṃsthānaṃ jñātvāvyaktaṃ mahīpate
a tathaiva mahataḥ sthānam āhaṃkārikam eva ca
c ahaṃkārāt paraṃ cāpi sthānāni samavāpnuyāt
a ye tv avyaktāt paraṃ nityaṃ jānate śāstratatparāḥ
c janmamṛtyuviyuktaṃ ca viyuktaṃ sad asac ca yat
a etan mayāptaṃ janakāt purastāt
tenāpi cāptaṃ nṛpa yājñavalkyāt
c jñānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ na tathā hi yajñā
jñānena durgaṃ tarate na yajñaiḥ
a durgaṃ janma nidhanaṃ cāpi rājan
na bhūtikaṃ jñānavido vadanti
c yajñais tapobhir niyamair vrataiś ca
divaṃ samāsādya patanti bhūmau
a tasmād upāsasva paraṃ mahac chuci
śivaṃ vimokṣaṃ vimalaṃ pavitram
c kṣetrajñavit pārthiva jñānayajñam
upāsya vai tattvam ṛṣir bhaviṣyasi
a upaniṣadam upākarot tadā vai
janakanṛpasya purā hi yājñavalkyaḥ
c yad upagaṇitaśāśvatāvyayaṃ tac
chubham amṛtatvam aśokam ṛcchatīti
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a aiśvaryaṃ vā mahat prāpya dhanaṃ vā bharatarṣabha
c dīrgham āyur avāpyātha kathaṃ mṛtyum atikramet
a tapasā vā sumahatā karmaṇā vā śrutena vā
c rasāyanaprayogair vā kair nopaiti jarāntakau
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c bhikṣoḥ pañcaśikhasyeha saṃvādaṃ janakasya ca
a vaideho janako rājā maharṣiṃ vedavittamam
c paryapṛcchat pañcaśikhaṃ chinnadharmārthasaṃśayam
a kena vṛttena bhagavann atikrāmej jarāntakau
c tapasā vātha buddhyā vā karmaṇā vā śrutena vā
a evam uktaḥ sa vaidehaṃ pratyuvāca parokṣavit
c nivṛttir naitayor asti nānivṛttiḥ kathaṃ cana
a na hy ahāni nivartante na māsā na punaḥ kṣapāḥ
c so 'yaṃ prapadyate 'dhvānaṃ cirāya dhruvam adhruvaḥ
a sarvabhūtasamucchedaḥ srotasevohyate sadā
c uhyamānaṃ nimajjantam aplave kālasāgare
e jarāmṛtyumahāgrāhe na kaś cid abhipadyate
a naivāsya bhavitā kaś cin nāsau bhavati kasya cit
c pathi saṃgatam evedaṃ dārair anyaiś ca bandhubhiḥ
e nāyam atyantasaṃvāso labdhapūrvo hi kena cit
a kṣipyante tena tenaiva niṣṭanantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
c kālena jātā jātā hi vāyunevābhrasaṃcayāḥ
a jarāmṛtyū hi bhūtānāṃ khāditārau vṛkāv iva
c balināṃ durbalānāṃ ca hrasvānāṃ mahatām api
a evaṃbhūteṣu bhūteṣu nityabhūtādhruveṣu ca
c kathaṃ hṛṣyeta jāteṣu mṛteṣu ca kathaṃ jvaret
a kuto 'ham āgataḥ ko 'smi kva gamiṣyāmi kasya vā
c kasmin sthitaḥ kva bhavitā kasmāt kim anuśocasi
d satyaś ca te yathātmā ca tyaktaḥ syāt kim anena ca
a draṣṭā svargasya na hy asti tathaiva narakasya ca
c āgamāṃs tv anatikramya dadyāc caiva yajeta ca
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a aparityajya gārhasthyaṃ kururājarṣisattama
c kaḥ prāpto vinayaṃ buddhyā mokṣatattvaṃ vadasva me
a saṃnyasyate yathātmāyaṃ saṃnyastātmā yathā ca yaḥ
c paraṃ mokṣasya yac cāpi tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c janakasya ca saṃvādaṃ sulabhāyāś ca bhārata
a saṃnyāsaphalikaḥ kaś cid babhūva nṛpatiḥ purā
c maithilo janako nāma dharmadhvaja iti śrutaḥ
a sa vede mokṣaśāstre ca sve ca śāstre kṛtāgamaḥ
c indriyāṇi samādhāya śaśāsa vasudhām imām
a tasya vedavidaḥ prājñāḥ śrutvā tāṃ sādhuvṛttatām
c lokeṣu spṛhayanty anye puruṣāḥ puruṣeśvara
a atha dharmayuge tasmin yogadharmam anuṣṭhitā
c mahīm anucacāraikā sulabhā nāma bhikṣukī
a tayā jagad idaṃ sarvam aṭantyā mithileśvaraḥ
c tatra tatra śruto mokṣe kathyamānas tridaṇḍibhiḥ
a sā susūkṣmāṃ kathāṃ śrutvā tathyaṃ neti sasaṃśayā
c darśane jātasaṃkalpā janakasya babhūva ha
a tataḥ sā viprahāyātha pūrvarūpaṃ hi yogataḥ
c abibhrad anavadyāṅgī rūpam anyad anuttamam
a cakṣur nimeṣamātreṇa laghvastragatigāminī
c videhānāṃ purīṃ subhrūr jagāma kamalekṣaṇā
a sā prāpya mithilāṃ ramyāṃ samṛddhajanasaṃkulām
c bhaikṣacaryāpadeśena dadarśa mithileśvaram
a rājā tasyāḥ paraṃ dṛṣṭvā saukumāryaṃ vapus tathā
c keyaṃ kasya kuto veti babhūvāgatavismayaḥ
a tato 'syāḥ svāgataṃ kṛtvā vyādiśya ca varāsanam
c pūjitāṃ pādaśaucena varānnenāpy atarpayat
a atha bhuktavatī prītā rājānaṃ mantribhir vṛtam
c sarvabhāṣyavidāṃ madhye codayām āsa bhikṣukī
a sulabhā tv asya dharmeṣu mukto neti sasaṃśayā
c sattvaṃ sattvena yogajñā praviveśa mahīpate
a netrābhyāṃ netrayor asya raśmīn saṃyojya raśmibhiḥ
c sā sma saṃcodayiṣyantaṃ yogabandhair babandha ha
a janako 'py utsmayan rājā bhāvam asyā viśeṣayan
c pratijagrāha bhāvena bhāvam asyā nṛpottamaḥ
a tad ekasminn adhiṣṭhāne saṃvādaḥ śrūyatām ayam
c chatrādiṣu vimuktasya muktāyāś ca tridaṇḍake
a bhagavatyāḥ kva caryeyaṃ kṛtā kva ca gamiṣyasi
c kasya ca tvaṃ kuto veti papracchaināṃ mahīpatiḥ
a śrute vayasi jātau ca sadbhāvo nādhigamyate
c eṣv artheṣūttaraṃ tasmāt pravedyaṃ satsamāgame
a chatrādiṣu viśeṣeṣu muktaṃ māṃ viddhi sarvaśaḥ
c sa tvāṃ saṃmantum icchāmi mānārhāsi matā hi me
a yasmāc caitan mayā prāptaṃ jñānaṃ vaiśeṣikaṃ purā
c yasya nānyaḥ pravaktāsti mokṣe tam api me śṛṇu
a pārāśaryasagotrasya vṛddhasya sumahātmanaḥ
c bhikṣoḥ pañcaśikhasyāhaṃ śiṣyaḥ paramasaṃmataḥ
a sāṃkhyajñāne tathā yoge mahīpālavidhau tathā
c trividhe mokṣadharme 'smin gatādhvā chinnasaṃśayaḥ
a sa yathāśāstradṛṣṭena mārgeṇeha parivrajan
c vārṣikāṃś caturo māsān purā mayi sukhoṣitaḥ
a tenāhaṃ sāṃkhyamukhyena sudṛṣṭārthena tattvataḥ
c śrāvitas trividhaṃ mokṣaṃ na ca rājyād vicālitaḥ
a so 'haṃ tām akhilāṃ vṛttiṃ trividhāṃ mokṣasaṃhitām
c muktarāgaś carāmy ekaḥ pade paramake sthitaḥ
a vairāgyaṃ punar etasya mokṣasya paramo vidhiḥ
c jñānād eva ca vairāgyaṃ jāyate yena mucyate
a jñānena kurute yatnaṃ yatnena prāpyate mahat
c mahad dvaṃdvapramokṣāya sā siddhir yā vayotigā
a seyaṃ paramikā buddhiḥ prāptā nirdvaṃdvatā mayā
c ihaiva gatamohena caratā muktasaṅginā
a yathā kṣetraṃ mṛdūbhūtam adbhir āplāvitaṃ tathā
c janayaty aṅkuraṃ karma nṛṇāṃ tadvat punarbhavam
a yathā cottāpitaṃ bījaṃ kapāle yatra tatra vā
c prāpyāpy aṅkurahetutvam abījatvān na jāyate
c kṣīṇavāsanayā buddhyā karma yat kriyate 'nagha
c tad dagdhabījavad bhūyo nāṅkuraṃ pravimuñcati
a tadvad bhagavatā tena śikhāproktena bhikṣuṇā
c jñānaṃ kṛtam abījaṃ me viṣayeṣu na jāyate
a nābhiṣajjati kasmiṃś cin nānarthe na parigrahe
c nābhirajyati caiteṣu vyarthatvād rāgadoṣayoḥ
a yaś ca me dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ candanena samukṣayet
c savyaṃ vāsyā ca yas takṣet samāv etāv ubhau mama
a sukhī so 'ham avāptārthaḥ samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ
c muktasaṅgaḥ sthito rājye viśiṣṭo 'nyais tridaṇḍibhiḥ
a mokṣe hi trividhā niṣṭhā dṛṣṭā pūrvair maharṣibhiḥ
c jñānaṃ lokottaraṃ yac ca sarvatyāgaś ca karmaṇām
a jñānaniṣṭhāṃ vadanty eke mokṣaśāstravido janāḥ
c karmaniṣṭhāṃ tathaivānye yatayaḥ sūkṣmadarśinaḥ
a prahāyobhayam apy etaj jñānaṃ karma ca kevalam
c tṛtīyeyaṃ samākhyātā niṣṭhā tena mahātmanā
a yame ca niyame caiva dveṣe kāme parigrahe
c māne dambhe tathā snehe sadṛśās te kuṭumbibhiḥ
a tridaṇḍādiṣu yady asti mokṣo jñānena kena cit
c chatrādiṣu kathaṃ na syāt tulyahetau parigrahe
a yena yena hi yasyārthaḥ kāraṇeneha kasya cit
c tat tad ālambate dravyaṃ sarvaḥ sve sve parigrahe
a doṣadarśī tu gārhasthye yo vrajaty āśramāntaram
c utsṛjan parigṛhṇaṃś ca so 'pi saṅgān na mucyate
a ādhipatye tathā tulye nigrahānugrahātmani
c rājarṣibhikṣukācāryā mucyante kena hetunā
a atha satyādhipatye 'pi jñānenaiveha kevalam
c mucyante kiṃ na mucyante pade paramake sthitāḥ
a kāṣāyadhāraṇaṃ mauṇḍyaṃ triviṣṭabdhaḥ kamaṇḍaluḥ
c liṅgāny atyartham etāni na mokṣāyeti me matiḥ
a yadi saty api liṅge 'smiñ jñānam evātra kāraṇam
c nirmokṣāyeha duḥkhasya liṅgamātraṃ nirarthakam
a atha vā duḥkhaśaithilyaṃ vīkṣya liṅge kṛtā matiḥ
c kiṃ tad evārthasāmānyaṃ chatrādiṣu na lakṣyate
a ākiṃcanye na mokṣo 'sti kaiṃcanye nāsti bandhanam
c kaiṃcanye cetare caiva jantur jñānena mucyate
a tasmād dharmārthakāmeṣu tathā rājyaparigrahe
c bandhanāyataneṣv eṣu viddhy abandhe pade sthitam
a rājyaiśvaryamayaḥ pāśaḥ snehāyatanabandhanaḥ
c mokṣāśmaniśiteneha chinnas tyāgāsinā mayā
a so 'ham evaṃgato mukto jātāsthas tvayi bhikṣuki
c ayathārtho hi te varṇo vakṣyāmi śṛṇu tan mama
a saukumāryaṃ tathā rūpaṃ vapur agryaṃ tathā vayaḥ
c tavaitāni samastāni niyamaś ceti saṃśayaḥ
a yac cāpy ananurūpaṃ te liṅgasyāsya viceṣṭitam
c mukto 'yaṃ syān na vety asmād dharṣito matparigrahaḥ
a na ca kāmasamāyukte mukte 'py asti tridaṇḍakam
c na rakṣyate tvayā cedaṃ na muktasyāsti gopanā
a matpakṣasaṃśrayāc cāyaṃ śṛṇu yas te vyatikramaḥ
c āśrayantyāḥ svabhāvena mama pūrvaparigraham
a praveśas te kṛtaḥ kena mama rāṣṭre pure tathā
c kasya vā saṃnisargāt tvaṃ praviṣṭā hṛdayaṃ mama
a varṇapravaramukhyāsi brāhmaṇī kṣatriyo hy aham
c nāvayor ekayogo 'sti mā kṛthā varṇasaṃkaram
a vartase mokṣadharmeṣu gārhasthye tv aham āśrame
c ayaṃ cāpi sukaṣṭas te dvitīyo ''śramasaṃkaraḥ
a sagotrāṃ vāsagotrāṃ vā na veda tvāṃ na vettha mām
c sagotram āviśantyās te tṛtīyo gotrasaṃkaraḥ
a atha jīvati te bhartā proṣito 'py atha vā kva cit
c agamyā parabhāryeti caturtho dharmasaṃkaraḥ
a sā tvam etāny akāryāṇi kāryāpekṣā vyavasyasi
c avijñānena vā yuktā mithyājñānena vā punaḥ
a atha vāpi svatantrāsi svadoṣeṇeha kena cit
c yadi kiṃ cic chrutaṃ te 'sti sarvaṃ kṛtam anarthakam
a idam anyat tṛtīyaṃ te bhāvasparśavighātakam
c duṣṭāyā lakṣyate liṅgaṃ pravaktavyaṃ prakāśitam
a na mayy evābhisaṃdhis te jayaiṣiṇyā jaye kṛtaḥ
c yeyaṃ matpariṣat kṛtsnā jetum icchasi tām api
a tathā hy evaṃ punaś ca tvaṃ dṛṣṭiṃ svāṃ pratimuñcasi
c matpakṣapratighātāya svapakṣodbhāvanāya ca
a sā svenāmarṣajena tvam ṛddhimohena mohitā
c bhūyaḥ sṛjasi yogāstraṃ viṣāmṛtam ivaikadhā
a icchator hi dvayor lābhaḥ strīpuṃsor amṛtopamaḥ
c alābhaś cāpy araktasya so 'tra doṣo viṣopamaḥ
a mā sprākṣīḥ sadhu jānīṣva svaśāstram anupālaya
c kṛteyaṃ hi vijijñāsā mukto neti tvayā mama
e etat sarvaṃ praticchannaṃ mayi nārhasi gūhitum
a sā yadi tvaṃ svakāryeṇa yady anyasya mahīpateḥ
c tattvaṃ satrapraticchannā mayi nārhasi gūhitum
a na rājānaṃ mṛṣā gacchen na dvijātiṃ kathaṃ cana
c na striyaṃ strīguṇopetāṃ hanyur hy ete mṛṣāgatāḥ
a rājñāṃ hi balam aiśvaryaṃ brahma brahmavidāṃ balam
c rūpayauvanasaubhāgyaṃ strīṇāṃ balam anuttamam
a ata etair balair ete balinaḥ svārtham icchatā
c ārjavenābhigantavyā vināśāya hy anārjavam
a sā tvaṃ jātiṃ śrutaṃ vṛttaṃ bhāvaṃ prakṛtim ātmanaḥ
c kṛtyam āgamane caiva vaktum arhasi tattvataḥ
a ity etair asukhair vākyair ayuktair asamañjasaiḥ
c pratyādiṣṭā narendreṇa sulabhā na vyakampata
a uktavākye tu nṛpatau sulabhā cārudarśanā
c tataś cārutaraṃ vākyaṃ pracakrāmātha bhāṣitum
a navabhir navabhiś caiva doṣair vāgbuddhidūṣaṇaiḥ
c apetam upapannārtham aṣṭādaśaguṇānvitam
a saukṣmyaṃ saṃkhyākramau cobhau nirṇayaḥ saprayojanaḥ
c pañcaitāny arthajātāni vākyam ity ucyate nṛpa
a eṣām ekaikaśo 'rthānāṃ saukṣmyādīnāṃ sulakṣaṇam
c śṛṇu saṃsāryamāṇānāṃ padārthaiḥ padavākyataḥ
a jñānaṃ jñeyeṣu bhinneṣu yathābhedena vartate
c tatrātiśayinī buddhis tat saukṣmyam iti vartate
a doṣāṇāṃ ca guṇānāṃ ca pramāṇaṃ pravibhāgaśaḥ
c kaṃ cid artham abhipretya sā saṃkhyety upadhāryatām
a idaṃ pūrvam idaṃ paścād vaktavyaṃ yad vivakṣitam
c kramayogaṃ tam apy āhur vākyaṃ vākyavido janāḥ
a dharmārthakāmamokṣeṣu pratijñāya viśeṣataḥ
c idaṃ tad iti vākyānte procyate sa vinirṇayaḥ
a icchādveṣabhavair duḥkhaiḥ prakarṣo yatra jāyate
c tatra yā nṛpate vṛttis tat prayojanam iṣyate
a tāny etāni yathoktāni saukṣmyādīni janādhipa
c ekārthasamavetāni vākyaṃ mama niśāmaya
a upetārtham abhinnārthaṃ nāpavṛttaṃ na cādhikam
c nāślakṣṇaṃ na ca saṃdigdhaṃ vakṣyāmi paramaṃ tava
a na gurvakṣarasaṃbaddhaṃ parāṅmukhamukhaṃ na ca
c nānṛtaṃ na trivargeṇa viruddhaṃ nāpy asaṃskṛtam
a na nyūnaṃ kaṣṭaśabdaṃ vā vyutkramābhihitaṃ na ca
c na śeṣaṃ nānukalpena niṣkāraṇam ahetukam
a kāmāt krodhād bhayāl lobhād dainyād ānāryakāt tathā
c hrīto 'nukrośato mānān na vakṣyāmi kathaṃ cana
a vaktā śrotā ca vākyaṃ ca yadā tv avikalaṃ nṛpa
c samam eti vivakṣāyāṃ tadā so 'rthaḥ prakāśate
a vaktavye tu yadā vaktā śrotāram avamanyate
c svārtham āha parārthaṃ vā tadā vākyaṃ na rohati
a atha yaḥ svārtham utsṛjya parārthaṃ prāha mānavaḥ
c viśaṅkā jāyate tasmin vākyaṃ tad api doṣavat
a yas tu vaktā dvayor artham aviruddhaṃ prabhāṣate
c śrotuś caivātmanaś caiva sa vaktā netaro nṛpa
a tad arthavad idaṃ vākyam upetaṃ vākyasaṃpadā
c avikṣiptamanā rājann ekāgraḥ śrotum arhasi
a kāsi kasya kuto veti tvayāham abhicoditā
c tatrottaram idaṃ vākyaṃ rājann ekamanāḥ śṛṇu
a yathā jatu ca kāṣṭhaṃ ca pāṃsavaś codabindubhiḥ
c suśliṣṭāni tathā rājan prāṇinām iha saṃbhavaḥ
a śabdaḥ sparśo raso rūpaṃ gandhaḥ pañcendriyāṇi ca
c pṛthag ātmā daśātmānaḥ saṃśliṣṭā jatukāṣṭhavat
a na caiṣāṃ codanā kā cid astīty eṣa viniścayaḥ
c ekaikasyeha vijñānaṃ nāsty ātmani tathā pare
a na veda cakṣuś cakṣuṣṭvaṃ śrotraṃ nātmani vartate
c tathaiva vyabhicāreṇa na vartante parasparam
e saṃśliṣṭā nābhijāyante yathāpa iha pāṃsavaḥ
a bāhyān anyān apekṣante guṇāṃs tān api me śṛṇu
c rūpaṃ cakṣuḥ prakāśaś ca darśane hetavas trayaḥ
e yathaivātra tathānyeṣu jñānajñeyeṣu hetavaḥ
a jñānajñeyāntare tasmin mano nāmāparo guṇaḥ
c vicārayati yenāyaṃ niścaye sādhvasādhunī
a dvādaśas tv aparas tatra buddhir nāma guṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
c yena saṃśayapūrveṣu boddhavyeṣu vyavasyati
a atha dvādaśake tasmin sattvaṃ nāmāparo guṇaḥ
c mahāsattvo 'lpasattvo vā jantur yenānumīyate
a kṣetrajña iti cāpy anyo guṇas tatra caturdaśaḥ
c mamāyam iti yenāyaṃ manyate na ca manyate
a atha pañcadaśo rājan guṇas tatrāparaḥ smṛtaḥ
c pṛthak kalāsamūhasya sāmagryaṃ tad ihocyate
a guṇas tv evāparas tatra saṃghāta iti ṣoḍaśaḥ
c ākṛtir vyaktir ity etau guṇau yasmin samāśritau
a sukhaduḥkhe jarāmṛtyū lābhālābhau priyāpriye
c iti caikonaviṃśo 'yaṃ dvaṃdvayoga iti smṛtaḥ
a ūrdhvam ekonaviṃśatyāḥ kālo nāmāparo guṇaḥ
c itīmaṃ viddhi viṃśatyā bhūtānāṃ prabhavāpyayam
a viṃśakaś caiṣa saṃghāto mahābhūtāni pañca ca
c sadasadbhāvayogau ca guṇāv anyau prakāśakau
a ity evaṃ viṃśatiś caiva guṇāḥ sapta ca ye smṛtāḥ
c vidhiḥ śukraṃ balaṃ ceti traya ete guṇāḥ pare
a ekaviṃśaś ca daśa ca kalāḥ saṃkhyānataḥ smṛtāḥ
c samagrā yatra vartante tac charīram iti smṛtam
a avyaktaṃ prakṛtiṃ tv āsāṃ kalānāṃ kaś cid icchati
c vyaktaṃ cāsāṃ tathaivānyaḥ sthūladarśī prapaśyati
a avyaktaṃ yadi vā vyaktaṃ dvayīm atha catuṣṭayīm
c prakṛtiṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ paśyanty adhyātmacintakāḥ
a seyaṃ prakṛtir avyaktā kalābhir vyaktatāṃ gatā
c ahaṃ ca tvaṃ ca rājendra ye cāpy anye śarīriṇaḥ
a bindunyāsādayo 'vasthāḥ śukraśoṇitasaṃbhavāḥ
c yāsām eva nipātena kalalaṃ nāma jāyate
a kalalād arbudotpattiḥ peśī cāpy arbudodbhavā
c peśyās tv aṅgābhinirvṛttir nakharomāṇi cāṅgataḥ
a saṃpūrṇe navame māse jantor jātasya maithila
b evaṃ hi jantuḥ saṃpūrṇo navame māsi maithila
c jāyate nāmarūpatvaṃ strī pumān veti liṅgataḥ
a jātamātraṃ tu tad rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāmranakhāṅguli
c kaumārarūpam āpannaṃ rūpato nopalabhyate
a kaumārād yauvanaṃ cāpi sthāviryaṃ cāpi yauvanāt
c anena kramayogena pūrvaṃ pūrvaṃ na labhyate
a kalānāṃ pṛthagarthānāṃ pratibhedaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe
c vartate sarvabhūteṣu saukṣmyāt tu na vibhāvyate
a na caiṣām apyayo rājaṃl lakṣyate prabhavo na ca
c avasthāyām avasthāyāṃ dīpasyevārciṣo gatiḥ
a tasyāpy evaṃprabhāvasya sadaśvasyeva dhāvataḥ
c ajasraṃ sarvalokasya kaḥ kuto vā na vā kutaḥ
a kasyedaṃ kasya vā nedaṃ kuto vedaṃ na vā kutaḥ
c saṃbandhaḥ ko 'sti bhūtānāṃ svair apy avayavair iha
a yathādityān maṇeś caiva vīrudbhyaś caiva pāvakaḥ
c bhavaty evaṃ samudayāt kalānām api jantavaḥ
a ātmany evātmanātmānaṃ yathā tvam anupaśyasi
c evam evātmanātmānam anyasmin kiṃ na paśyasi
e yady ātmani parasmiṃś ca samatām adhyavasyasi
a atha māṃ kāsi kasyeti kimartham anupṛcchasi
c idaṃ me syād idaṃ neti dvaṃdvair muktasya maithila
e kāsi kasya kuto veti vacane kiṃ prayojanam
