a ripau mitre 'tha madhyasthe vijaye saṃdhivigrahe
c kṛtavān yo mahīpāla kiṃ tasmin muktalakṣaṇam
a trivarge saptadhā vyaktaṃ yo na vedeha karmasu
c saṅgavān yas trivarge ca kiṃ tasmin muktalakṣaṇam
a priye caivāpriye caiva durbale balavaty api
c yasya nāsti samaṃ cakṣuḥ kiṃ tasmin muktalakṣaṇam
a tad amuktasya te mokṣe yo 'bhimāno bhaven nṛpa
c suhṛdbhiḥ sa nivāryas te vicittasyeva bheṣajaiḥ
a tāni tāny anusaṃdṛśya saṅgasthānāny ariṃdama
c ātmanātmani saṃpaśyet kiṃ tasmin muktalakṣaṇam
a imāny anyāni sūkṣmāṇi mokṣam āśritya kāni cit
c caturaṅgapravṛttāni saṅgasthānāni me śṛṇu
a ya imāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnām ekacchatrāṃ praśāsti ha
c ekam eva sa vai rājā puram adhyāvasaty uta
a tatpure caikam evāsya gṛhaṃ yad adhitiṣṭhati
c gṛhe śayanam apy ekaṃ niśāyāṃ yatra līyate
a śayyārdhaṃ tasya cāpy atra strīpūrvam adhitiṣṭhati
c tad anena prasaṅgena phalenaiveha yujyate
a evam evopabhogeṣu bhojanācchādaneṣu ca
c guṇeṣu parimeyeṣu nigrahānugrahau prati
a paratantraḥ sadā rājā svalpe so 'pi prasajjate
c saṃdhivigrahayoge ca kuto rājñaḥ svatantratā
a strīṣu krīḍāvihāreṣu nityam asyāsvatantratā
c mantre cāmātyasamitau kuta eva svatantratā
a yadā tv ājñāpayaty anyāṃs tadāsyoktā svatantratā
c avaśaḥ kāryate tatra tasmiṃs tasmin guṇe sthitaḥ
a svaptukāmo na labhate svaptuṃ kāryārthibhir janaiḥ
c śayane cāpy anujñātaḥ supta utthāpyate 'vaśaḥ
a snāhy ālabha piba prāśa juhudhy agnīn yajeti ca
c vadasva śṛṇu cāpīti vivaśaḥ kāryate paraiḥ
a abhigamyābhigamyainaṃ yācante satataṃ narāḥ
c na cāpy utsahate dātuṃ vittarakṣī mahājanāt
a dāne kośakṣayo hy asya vairaṃ cāpy aprayacchataḥ
c kṣaṇenāsyopavartante doṣā vairāgyakārakāḥ
a prājñāñ śūrāṃs tathaivāḍhyān ekasthāne 'pi śaṅkate
c bhayam apy abhaye rājño yaiś ca nityam upāsyate
a yadā caite praduṣyanti rājan ye kīrtitā mayā
c tadaivāsya bhayaṃ tebhyo jāyate paśya yādṛśam
a sarvaḥ sve sve gṛhe rājā sarvaḥ sve sve gṛhe gṛhī
c nigrahānugrahau kurvaṃs tulyo janaka rājabhiḥ
a putrā dārās tathaivātmā kośo mitrāṇi saṃcayaḥ
c paraiḥ sādhāraṇā hy ete tais tair evāsya hetubhiḥ
a hato deśaḥ puraṃ dagdhaṃ pradhānaḥ kuñjaro mṛtaḥ
c lokasādhāraṇeṣv eṣu mithyājñānena tapyate
a amukto mānasair duḥkhair icchādveṣapriyodbhavaiḥ
c śirorogādibhī rogais tathaiva vinipātibhiḥ
a dvaṃdvais tais tair upahataḥ sarvataḥ pariśaṅkitaḥ
c bahupratyarthikaṃ rājyam upāste gaṇayan niśāḥ
a tad alpasukham atyarthaṃ bahuduḥkham asāravat
b tṛṇāgnijvalanaprakhyaṃ phenabudbudasaṃnibham
c ko rājyam abhipadyeta prāpya copaśamaṃ labhet
a mamedam iti yac cedaṃ puraṃ rāṣṭraṃ ca manyase
c balaṃ kośam amātyāṃś ca kasyaitāni na vā nṛpa
a mitrāmātyaṃ puraṃ rāṣṭraṃ daṇḍaḥ kośo mahīpatiḥ
c saptāṅgaś cakrasaṃghāto rājyam ity ucyate nṛpa
a saptāṅgasyāsya rājyasya tridaṇḍasyeva tiṣṭhataḥ
c anyonyaguṇayuktasya kaḥ kena guṇato 'dhikaḥ
a teṣu teṣu hi kāleṣu tat tad aṅgaṃ viśiṣyate
c yena yat sidhyate kāryaṃ tat prādhānyāya kalpate
a saptāṅgaś cāpi saṃghātas trayaś cānye nṛpottama
c saṃbhūya daśavargo 'yaṃ bhuṅkte rājyaṃ hi rājavat
a yaś ca rājā mahotsāhaḥ kṣatradharmarato bhavet
c sa tuṣyed daśabhāgena tatas tv anyo daśāvaraiḥ
a nāsty asādhāraṇo rājā nāsti rājyam arājakam
c rājye 'sati kuto dharmo dharme 'sati kutaḥ param
a yo 'py atra paramo dharmaḥ pavitraṃ rājarājyayoḥ
c pṛthivī dakṣiṇā yasya so 'śvamedho na vidyate
a sāham etāni karmāṇi rājyaduḥkhāni maithila
c samarthā śataśo vaktum atha vāpi sahasraśaḥ
a svadehe nābhiṣaṅgo me kutaḥ paraparigrahe
c na mām evaṃvidhāṃ muktām īdṛśaṃ vaktum arhasi
a nanu nāma tvayā mokṣaḥ kṛtsnaḥ pañcaśikhāc chrutaḥ
c sopāyaḥ sopaniṣadaḥ sopāsaṅgaḥ saniścayaḥ
a tasya te muktasaṅgasya pāśān ākramya tiṣṭhataḥ
c chatrādiṣu viśeṣeṣu kathaṃ saṅgaḥ punar nṛpa
a śrutaṃ te na śrutaṃ manye mithyā vāpi śrutaṃ śrutam
c atha vā śrutasaṃkāśaṃ śrutam anyac chrutaṃ tvayā
a athāpīmāsu saṃjñāsu laukikīṣu pratiṣṭhasi
c abhiṣaṅgāvarodhābhyāṃ baddhas tvaṃ prākṛto mayā
a sattvenānupraveśo hi yo 'yaṃ tvayi kṛto mayā
c kiṃ tavāpakṛtaṃ tatra yadi mukto 'si sarvataḥ
a niyamo hy eṣa dharmeṣu yatīnāṃ śūnyavāsitā
c śūnyam āvāsayantyā ca mayā kiṃ kasya dūṣitam
a na pāṇibhyāṃ na bāhubhyāṃ pādorubhyāṃ na cānagha
c na gātrāvayavair anyaiḥ spṛśāmi tvā narādhipa
a kule mahati jātena hrīmatā dīrghadarśinā
c naitat sadasi vaktavyaṃ sad vāsad vā mithaḥ kṛtam
a brāhmaṇā guravaś ceme tathāmātyā gurūttamāḥ
c tvaṃ cātha gurur apy eṣām evam anyonyagauravam
a tad evam anusaṃdṛśya vācyāvācyaṃ parīkṣatā
c strīpuṃsoḥ samavāyo 'yaṃ tvayā vācyo na saṃsadi
a yathā puṣkaraparṇasthaṃ jalaṃ tatparṇasaṃsthitam
c tiṣṭhaty aspṛśatī tadvat tvayi vatsyāmi maithila
a yadi vāpy aspṛśantyā me sparśaṃ jānāsi kaṃ cana
c jñānaṃ kṛtam abījaṃ te kathaṃ teneha bhikṣuṇā
a sa gārhasthyāc cyutaś ca tvaṃ mokṣaṃ nāvāpya durvidam
c ubhayor antarāle ca vartase mokṣavātikaḥ
a na hi muktasya muktena jñasyaikatvapṛthaktvayoḥ
c bhāvābhāvasamāyoge jāyate varṇasaṃkaraḥ
a varṇāśramapṛthaktve ca dṛṣṭārthasyāpṛthaktvinaḥ
c nānyad anyad iti jñātvā nānyad anyat pravartate
a pāṇau kuṇḍaṃ tathā kuṇḍe payaḥ payasi makṣikāḥ
c āśritāśrayayogena pṛthaktvenāśrayā vayam
a na tu kuṇḍe payobhāvaḥ payaś cāpi na makṣikāḥ
c svayam evāśrayanty ete bhāvā na tu parāśrayam
a pṛthaktvād āśramāṇāṃ ca varṇānyatve tathaiva ca
c parasparapṛthaktvāc ca kathaṃ te varṇasaṃkaraḥ
a nāsmi varṇottamā jātyā na vaiśyā nāvarā tathā
c tava rājan savarṇāsmi śuddhayonir aviplutā
a pradhāno nāma rājarṣir vyaktaṃ te śrotram āgataḥ
c kule tasya samutpannāṃ sulabhāṃ nāma viddhi mām
a droṇaś ca śataśṛṅgaś ca vakradvāraś ca parvataḥ
c mama satreṣu pūrveṣāṃ citā maghavatā saha
a sāhaṃ tasmin kule jātā bhartary asati madvidhe
c vinītā mokṣadharmeṣu carāmy ekā munivratam
a nāsmi satrapraticchannā na parasvābhimāninī
c na dharmasaṃkarakarī svadharme 'smi dhṛtavratā
a nāsthirā svapratijñāyāṃ nāsamīkṣyapravādinī
c nāsamīkṣyāgatā cāhaṃ tvatsakāśaṃ janādhipa
a mokṣe te bhāvitāṃ buddhiṃ śrutvāhaṃ kuśalaiṣiṇī
c tava mokṣasya cāpy asya jijñāsārtham ihāgatā
a na vargasthā bravīmy etat svapakṣaparapakṣayoḥ
c mukto na mucyate yaś ca śānto yaś ca na śāmyati
a yathā śūnye purāgāre bhikṣur ekāṃ niśāṃ vaset
c tathā hi tvaccharīre 'sminn imāṃ vatsyāmi śarvarīm
a sāham āsanadānena vāgātithyena cārcitā
c suptā suśaraṇā prītā śvo gamiṣyāmi maithila
a ity etāni sa vākyāni hetumanty arthavanti ca
c śrutvā nādhijagau rājā kiṃ cid anyad ataḥ param

dD nānātvāt kṣemyād akṣemyaḥ syād akṣemyād avyaktāt  bhavanti
dD cātra ślokāḥ 
dD kṣemyākṣemyaṃ nānupaśyeta nityaṃ
dD kṣemyas tv anyas taṃ tu naivānupaśyet
dD ṣaḍviṃśo vā pañcaviṃśo nu rājann
dD avyaktaś ca prāhur evaṃ vidhijñāḥ
dD yo 'yaṃ boddhā pañcaviṃśaḥ parasya
dD sa manyate īdṛśo 'smīti rājan
dD buddhasya vai bodhanāt tena samyag
dD gacchaty ayaṃ na calo nācalas tvam
dD evaṃ boddhā kevalāt kevalaḥ san
dD sa syād vyaktaḥ kiṃ ca saṃjñānasaṃjñaḥ
dD nirdvaṃdvasya dvaṃdvabhāvātmakasya
dD bhāvān na syān na prabhāvaḥ śuciḥ syāt
dD śuciprabodhād aśucitvaṃ tadā syāt
dD trilokasadbhāvaguṇapravartakam
dD bhavaty ayaṃ kevala eva kevalaḥ
dD sametya nityām amalām alaṃ śucim
dD śuciprabodhanasya bhoḥ saṃyamana budhyamānasya pañcaviṃśasya
dD buddhāt ṣaḍviṃśabodhanatvam upadiśanti 
boddhāraṃ budhyamānasya vyatiriktasya
dD vyatiriktatvam upapadyate 
kevalaṃ nāham asyāḥ
dD kaś cin neyaṃ mama kā cana ṣaḍviṃśasyāham anena mama saha caikatvam iti 
dD tatra ślokaḥ 
dD sāmyaḥ sāmyaṃ śuciṃ dṛṣṭvā śucim āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
dD bahiḥ kṛtvā tamisrālam avyaktāc cetanaṃ param
dD iti 
dD tad etad bhagavatā buddham avāpya mahat tattvaṃ paramarṣiṇā paramaguruṇā
dD mama kapilena guruṇā ca mamāsuriṇā jātiśatair bahubhir avāptaṃ
dD kṛtsnakṣayaṃ kapilāt 
mamāpy evam eva śiṣyadaśakatvam upagamya
dD jātiśatair bahubhir avāptaṃ bhagavata āsureḥ sakāśāt 
mattaś ca kātyāyanenāptam 
dD gautamena kātyāyanād avāptam 
gautamāc ca
dD gārgyeṇāvāptam 
tad etat paraṃparayā bahubhir ācāryair avāptaṃ kṛtsnakṣayam amṛtārthatattvaṃ
dD vimalam amalajñānam 
atyagādham acetanam akevalam avyaktam
dD apāsya nityaṃ cetanaṃ kevalaṃ jñānaṃ pratibuddhaṃ budhyamānena pañcaviṃśakena
dD ṣaḍviṃśakam 
atra ślokā bhavanti 
dD sutasyaitad varṇitaṃ manniyogād
dD vārāṇasyāṃ krīḍamānena rājñā
dD tattvajñānaṃ pṛcchataḥ prāñjaliḥ syāt
dD pṛcchaṃs tasya granthataś cārthataś ca
dD proktaṃ hy etat ṣoḍaśapraśnam ugraṃ
dD nistattvākhyaṃ viṃśat ṣaṭ caiva rājan
dD yaṃ vai buddhvā bālakāya praṇamya
dD mūrdhnābhyarṇaṃ pādayor hṛṣyamāṇaḥ
dD padbhyāṃ gatas tattvam avāpya kṛtsnaṃ
dD sanatkumārād amṛtaṃ paraṃ vai
dD sanatkumāreṇa mamopadiṣṭam
dD etan mahad brahma yathāvad adya
dD tat te śrutaṃ tad bhava vītaśoka
dD etaṃ mahāpraśnam avāpya cārtham
dD tulyaṃ bhavān paśyatu brahmaṇaś ced
dD indrasya sthāṇor maśakasya caiva
dD pataṃgakīṭe śuni ca śvapāke
dD sarvaṃ hi sarvatra narendrasiṃha
dD yas tv anyathā paśyati hy alpabuddhir
dD avyaktaniṣṭhaḥ sa bhaveta rājan
dD sattvasya sarvasya hy apaśyamāno
dD abuddhimān duḥkham upaiti nityam
dD na cāsya duḥkhaṃ sa tu duḥkham eti
dD vaiṣamyabuddhitvam avāpya mohāt
dD tad gaccha rājan svapurīṃ viśālāṃ
dD vārāṇasīm aśvarathena śīghram
dD etāvad etat paramaṃ rahasyam
dD uktaṃ mayā te 'tividhāya sarvam
dD jñānī bhavān na tvam abuddhabuddhir
dD buddhir hi te jyāyasī rājasiṃha
dD buddhaṃ tvayāgryaṃ paramaṃ pavitraṃ
dD ṣaḍviṃśakaṃ pañcaviṃśāt paraṃ yat
dD na pañcaviṃśakāt punaḥ prajāyate narottamaḥ
dD sa yatra tatra saṃvasaṃs trivargavic chucir bhavet
dD śucir hi pañcaviṃśakas tathaiva ṣaḍviṃśaka
dD tvam avabudhyati yadā tadā śucir bhaved iti
dE vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
dE purā yudhiṣṭhiro rājā prayatenāntarātmanā
dE dvaipāyanam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ papracchātha kṛtāñjaliḥ
dE sahito bhrātṛbhiḥ sarvair udāramatibhiḥ śubhaiḥ
dE pṛthivyām upaviṣṭais tu vinītair uttamaujasaiḥ
dE bhagavān sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśivān
dE viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu dharmeṇa ca damena ca
dE tad icchāma upaśrotuṃ maṅgalyam ṛṣisattama
dE kathāṃ bhagavatā proktāṃ sarvapāpapraṇāśinīm
dE vayaṃ ca yady anugrāhyāḥ sarve bhagavato matāḥ
dE brūhi satyavatāṃ śreṣṭha śṛṇumopahitā vayam
dE evaṃ saṃpraśrayād uktaḥ satyātmā satyavādinā
dE yudhiṣṭhireṇa satkṛtya kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'bravīt
dE yudhiṣṭhira mahāprājña kurūṇāṃ vaṃśavardhana
dE śrotum icchasi kaunteya bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ śubhām
dE imāṃ kathām upaśrutya narāṇām arthasiddhaye
dE vijayaś ca narendrāṇām iha pārtha na durlabhaḥ
dE śāntikī pauṣṭikī rakṣā sarvaduḥsvapnanāśinī
dE katheyam amarākārā daivatair api kathyate
dE atra te vartayiṣyāmi itihāsaṃ purātanam
dE bālye 'vāptaṃ tu yad vīra agastyena mahātmanā
dE purā kṛtayuge rājan maharṣiḥ kumbhasaṃbhavaḥ
dE mitrāvaruṇayoḥ putraḥ śrīmān atitapāḥ prabhuḥ
dE sa cāśramapade puṇye puṇyakarmā mahātapāḥ
dE samā dvādaśako rājan vayasā bharatarṣabha
dE sva āvasatha ekākī hy abhrākāśakṛtavrataḥ
dE mitrāvaruṇayoḥ svargaṃ gatayoḥ sukṛtātmanoḥ
dE puṣkarasyottare tīre sarvadevanamaskṛtaḥ
dE parvato bhāskaro nāma bhāskarābhaḥ svatejasā
dE ataḥ prabhavate rājan puṇyasrotā mahānadī
dE varadā vitamā nāma siddhacāraṇasevitā
dE tasmin girivare tasyāgasteḥ paitṛka āśramaḥ
dE puṇyapuṣpaphalopetaiḥ pādapair upaśobhitaḥ
dE tapyate śiśur ekākī tapo dvādaśavārṣikam
dE yan na taptaṃ purā vatsa divyair anyais tapodhanaiḥ
dE neśvareṇa na cendreṇa yamena varuṇena vā
dE nityordhvabāhur ādityaṃ bhāskare tasthivān muniḥ
dE ūrdhvamukho nirālambo jitātmā pavanopamaḥ
dE nirāvṛto nirālambo niyatātmā jitendriyaḥ
dE nirdvaṃdvo nirahaṃkāro nirāśo niḥspṛhaḥ kva cit
dE kāṣṭhabhūtas tapas tepe sarvabhūtahite rataḥ
dE nirvṛto nistamā dhīro nivṛttaḥ sarvataḥ samaḥ
dE tam evam upasaṃpannam udāramanasaṃ śucim
dE bhāskare vartate nityaṃ tapyamānam atīva ca
dE avardhata mahāpuṇye sa hi dharmeṇa bhārata
dE atha kaunteya kālena kena cid bharatarṣabha
dE aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi yatīnāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
dE ānupūrvyeṇa yātāni mahīṃ kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
dE saparvatavanoddeśāṃ sanadīnadasāgarām
dE dvaipāyana uvāca
dE tatra tatra mahāpuṇyāḥ puṇyatīrthābhilāṣiṇaḥ
dE etasminn antare pārtha ṛṣisaṃghaḥ sa vai mahān
dE pradakṣiṇaṃ mahīṃ kṛtvā bhāskaraṃ girim abhyayāt
dE te taṃ girivaraṃ puṇyam atha kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam
dE tato girinadīṃ puṇyāṃ tīrthahetor upāgaman
dE aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi tatra nadyāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
dE vigāhya taj jalaṃ rājan prahṛṣṭā munayo 'bhavan
dE ke cit sasnur yathākāmaṃ ke cid atra upaspṛśan
dE ke cit puṇyena toyena pitṝn devān atarpayan
dE ke cit prakrīḍitās tatra japanty anye tapodhanāḥ
dE adhyātmaṃ cintayanty anye ke cid vedān adhīyire
dE kathāḥ śuśruvur anye ca proktā anyais tapodhanaiḥ
dE dhyānam anye hy upāsanta niṣeduś ca tathā pare
dE evaṃ tair ṛṣibhiḥ siddhair vitamā puṇyavardhanī
dE nadī sā puruṣavyāghra dyotate tais tapodhanaiḥ
dE etasminn antare pārtha devarājaḥ puraṃdaraḥ
dE pitāmahaṃ puraskṛtya saha devaiḥ sameyivān
dE vitamāyāṃ tad ekānte tasyāṃ nadyāṃ yudhiṣṭhira
dE athābravīt puṣkarajaḥ sureśvaram ariṃdamam
dE vijñāya munisaṃghasya dharme rāgam upasthitam
dE puraṃdara mahābāho sarvathā śrotum arhasi
dE ṛṣīṇām amaraśreṣṭha dharme rāgam upasthitam
dE imaṃ muhūrtam eteṣām ahaṃkāraḥ sureśvara
dE prabhaviṣyati sarveṣām asvargīyo na saṃśayaḥ
dE sa bhavān deśam utsṛjya imaṃ suravareśvara
dE gantum arhasi dharmātman draṣṭum etan na te kṣamam
dE sa tatas tad vacaḥ śrutvā devarājaḥ pitāmahāt
dE jagāma bharataśreṣṭha saha devair ariṃdama
dE gate deveśvare śakre pitāmahapurogame
dE aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi paramaṃ harṣam abhyayuḥ
dE te pranṛttāḥ pragītāś ca tathā prahasitā api
dE vitamāyā jale puṇye tasmin prakrīḍitāḥ pare
dE ekānte ca mahāprājño nāradaḥ kalahapriyaḥ
dE tantrīyuktakam ādāya munir vedān adhītavān
dE saṃvarto 'py atha kaunteya jalād utthāya bhārata
dE uvāca tān ṛṣīn sarvān harṣeṇa mahatā yutaḥ
dE śrūyatām ṛṣibhiḥ sarvair idaṃ mama vaco dvijāḥ
dE rocate yadi sarveṣāṃ kriyatāṃ munisattamāḥ
dE aham ugratapā viprā bhavanto 'pi tathaiva ca
dE na tulyo 'smatprabhāveṇa dharmeṇa ca tathā paraḥ
dE dīrghakālapracīrṇasya yamasya niyamasya ca
dE tapobalaṃ na paśyāmi kim apy etat kathaṃ cana
dE saṃvartavacanaṃ śrutvā sarvaṃ tad ṛṣimaṇḍalam
dE ahaṃkāravaśaṃ prāptaṃ tad vākyam abhinandati
dE ahaṃkṛtvā tataḥ sarve ṛṣayaḥ kuntinandana
dE parasparam avajñāya tatra te 'thāmitaujasaḥ
dE bhṛgus tato mahārāja sarvarṣigaṇapūjitaḥ
dE saṃvartavacanaṃ tatra sa satkṛtyedam abravīt
dE evam etan na saṃdeho yat tvayoktaṃ dhṛtavrata
dE tasmāt prabhāvaṃ tapaso draṣṭum arhāma sarvaśaḥ
dE ṛṣayaḥ śrūyatāṃ tāvan mama vākyaṃ dhṛtavratāḥ
dE ahaṃ śucir ahaṃ śreṣṭhaḥ aham ugratapodhanaḥ
dE ahaṃ pradhāna ity evaṃ yaj jalpatha tapodhanāḥ
dE kim etat kathayitvā vo hy ahaṃkārāt punaḥ punaḥ
dE pratyakṣaṃ draṣṭum icchāma iha dharmasya naḥ phalam
dE na tapo vidyate yatra sarvabhūteṣv asaṃśayam
dE upaspṛśya tatas toyaṃ punar abhyupagamyatām
dE dṛśyatāṃ suprataptasya dharmasya mahataḥ phalam
dE yatra yena tapas taptaṃ tathā daśadaśātmakam
dE tad darśayadhvaṃ saṃgamya tapo yasya yathā kṛtam
dE tato bhṛguvacaḥ śrutvā sarvaṃ tad ṛṣimaṇḍalam
dE bhṛgor vacaḥ puraskṛtya tathety ūcur maharṣayaḥ
dE te tu krodhād ahaṃkāraṃ prāpya sarve maharṣayaḥ
dE nadīṃ tāṃ vitamāṃ puṇyām upaspraṣṭuṃ vicakramuḥ
dE te tatra bhraṣṭatapaso vitamāyāṃ jalaṃ śubham
dE upaspṛśya mahārāja japyam āvartayaṃs tadā
dE tatas tad gaganaṃ ruddhaṃ sarvais tair ṛṣisattamaiḥ
dE tapobalaṃ naraśreṣṭha darśayadbhir asaṃśayam
dE kaś cid ākāśam āviśya jvalad dharmeṇa kevalam
dE apsarobhis tathā cānye pūtāḥ svargagatā dvijāḥ
dE puṣpavarṣais tathā cānyaiḥ pūjyante guhyakair api
dE ke cid ākāśam āviśya divyāṃ ceṣṭām akurvata
dE tathāsīt sumahān nādo harṣāt teṣām ariṃdama
dE anyonyaṃ paśyatāṃ tatra hasatāṃ ca yudhiṣṭhira
dE te dṛṣṭvā balam anyonyaṃ dharmasya bharatarṣabha
dE tad evaṃ kathayantas te tīre nadyās tathā vibho
dE taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā viditvā ca dharmalopaṃ mahātmanām
dE nāradaḥ kuruśārdūla ghaṭṭayaṃs tantriyuktakam
dE atha te ṛṣayaḥ sarve gantukāmā nabhastalam
dE yathāpūrvam amitraghna aśaktā gamanāya hi
dE aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām
dE aśaktā gamane rājaṃs tato 'nyonyam apaśyata
dE te nirastā nirutsāhā nirāśā gamanaṃ prati
dE tatraivāsan mahābhāga bhraṣṭapakṣāḥ khagā iva
dE parasparam udaikṣanta evam uktvā maharṣayaḥ
dE kim idaṃ kiṃ nv idam iti dhik kaṣṭam iti cāpare
dE te vīkṣamāṇāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ svarge vigatacetasaḥ
dE ahaṃkāreṇa mahatā vasudhāyāṃ nipātitāḥ
dE mohasya vaśam āgamya sarva eva vicetasaḥ
dE na kiṃ cid abhijānanti dharmasya gamanasya vā
dE yadā vimanasaḥ sarve khagāḥ khāt patitā iva
dE athaitān nāradovāca harṣād idam atho vacaḥ
dE kim udīkṣatha mohasthā nākapṛṣṭhaṃ yiyāsavaḥ
dE durlabho 'yaṃ guṇo bhūyo bhavatāṃ naṣṭadharmiṇām
dE ahaṃkāreṇa mahatā naṣṭo dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
dE evaṃ gate na paśyāmi svargaṃ gantuṃ yathā purā
dE ete stha ṛṣayaḥ sarve pakṣahīnāḥ khagā iva
dE tena dharmātilopena cintitena durātmanā
dE ete stha sarve saṃvṛttā nirāśā gamanaṃ prati
dE dvaipāyana uvāca
dE nadyās tīre śubhe puṇye dharmaṃ kuruta yatnataḥ
dE tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā ṛṣayo dīnacetasaḥ
dE taṃ nāradam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ prahvā bhūtvātha te 'bruvan
dE punar asmadvidhair bhūyo nākapṛṣṭhaṃ tapodhana
dE adhiṣṭhātuṃ kathaṃ vāpi na bhaved dharmasaṃkaraḥ
dE teṣāṃ tu vacanaṃ śrutvā nāradaḥ punar abravīt
dE muhūrtaṃ dhyānam āsthāya yogam āgamya vai śubham
dE ahaṃkārasya jānīdhvam ṛṣayo dāruṇaṃ balam
dE kim āśāsya tu pāpasya karmaṇaś caritasya vai
dE aho phalam anāryasya duṣkṛtasya mahat tv idam
dE yad evaṃ prāpyate doṣas tv ahaṃkāro maharṣibhiḥ
dE kva tad varṣasahasrāṇi taptasya tapasaḥ phalam
dE kva tan naṣṭaṃ purā tv iṣṭaṃ niyamaḥ kva ca vai damaḥ
dE yad ūrdhvabāhubhiḥ śāntaiḥ kva nu tasya phalaṃ gatam
dE yadarthaṃ cārcitā devāḥ pitaraś ca tapodhanāḥ
dE kva nu tasya phalaṃ viprāḥ tapaso 'gryasya vai gatam
dE ete kartavyadharmāḥ stha punar eva yathā purā
dE evaṃ gate na paśyāmi gamanaṃ vas triviṣṭapam
dE ahaṃkāraprabhāveṇa tena saṃśayitā gatiḥ
dE aham apy anugantā vai kevalena tu karmaṇā
dE anena kāraṇenāptam evaṃ saṃśayam ātmani
dE tad iyaṃ pravarasrotā nadī puṇyajalā śubhā
dE kartavyo dharma iha tu yadi nāsti nabhogatiḥ
dE vāyubhakṣā nirāhārā niyatā vijitendriyāḥ
dE iha dharmaṃ sunibhṛtā bhavantaḥ kartum arhatha
dE iha deveśvareṇāpi vāsavena mahātmanā
dE dharma ugraḥ sucarito vitamāyāḥ puropari
dE iha devena devyā ca rudreṇa sumahat tapaḥ
dE taptaṃ varṣasahasrāṇi divyena vidhinā purā
dE imāṃ saridvarāṃ prāpya viṣṇunāpi mahātmanā
dE śubhaṃ jalam upaspṛśya prāpto dustarasaṃkṣayaḥ
dE eṣa prabhāvo dharmajñā nadyā asyā na saṃśayaḥ
dE caritveha tataḥ puṇyaṃ gamiṣyatha śubhāṃ gatim
dE yadā vimanasaḥ sarve paraṃ dainyam upāgatāḥ
dE sarva eva mahātmānaḥ tatas tān nārado 'bravīt
dE dainyam etat parityajya sarvakāryāvasādakam
dE śrotum arhatha vai sarve prayatenāntarātmanā
dE yac ca vakṣyāmi tat kāryaṃ bhavadbhiḥ kāryasādhanam
dE sarvathā mānam utsṛjya vinayena damena ca
dE yad idaṃ vacanaṃ me 'dya kariṣyatha tapodhanāḥ
dE idaṃ muhūrtam ākāśaṃ yathāpūrvaṃ gamiṣyatha
dE yadi madvacanaṃ sarve yathoktam anutiṣṭhatha
dE asmin muhūrte sarveṣāṃ kalmaṣaṃ nāśam eṣyati
dE anṛtaṃ noktapūrvaṃ me munir asmi dhṛtavratāḥ
dE madvacaḥ śrūyatāṃ sādhu nārado 'smi tapodhanāḥ
dE dharmo vas tyaktamānānāṃ svargaś caiva bhaviṣyati
dE idaṃ muhūrtaṃ sarveṣāṃ madvākyaṃ parigṛhya tu
dE bhāvajñeyāni dharmyāṇi vākyāni suhṛdāṃ sadā
dE kriyatām avicāreṇa mamedaṃ vacanaṃ hitam
dE saṃvartasya hitārthāya yathāvad iha lapsyatha
dE kathayiṣyāmi vaḥ samyak sarveṣām eva sādhuṣu
dE śrutvā kṣamākṣamaṃ jñātvā yad dhitaṃ tat kariṣyatha
dE dvaipāyana uvāca
dE śāśvataṃ ca dhruvaṃ caiva yathāsthānaṃ gamiṣyatha
dE te tasya vacanaṃ śrutvā tadā ṛṣivarā nṛpa
dE harṣeṇotphullanayanāḥ sarva eva tadābhavan
dE taṃ bhṛguḥ prayato bhūtvā devarṣiṃ nāradaṃ tadā
dE uvāca puruṣaśreṣṭha vismayād ruciraṃ vacaḥ
dE kiṃ nu tad daivataṃ brahman vrataṃ vā niyamo 'pi vā
dE yat kṛtvā khecaraśreṣṭha nākapṛṣṭhaṃ labhemahi
dE sarvathā naitad āścaryaṃ devarṣe tava yan matam
dE asmākam anukampārthaṃ yat tvaṃ vadasi dhārmika
dE tato vada hitaṃ vākyaṃ pāpam etat pramārjitam
dE ko vā sa niyamo vipra samādheyo hi naḥ punaḥ
dE tad ete vai vayaṃ sarve ṛṣayo munisattama
dE baddhāñjalipuṭāḥ prahvās tava sādho prasādane
dE tat tu dharmātmanaḥ śrutvā bhṛgor vākyaṃ mahāyaśāḥ
dE kṛtāñjalipuṭāṃs tāṃś ca ṛṣīn dṛṣṭvā mahāmuniḥ
dE tataḥ prahasya tad vākyaṃ nārado munisattamaḥ
dE sarvān eva samāsīnān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
dE hanta vaḥ kathayiṣyāmi sarva eva nibodhata
dE kṣamaṃ cāpy anukūlaṃ ca svargāya ca hitāya ca
dE eṣa śailavare bālo mitrāvaruṇasaṃbhavaḥ
dE agastyo nāma dharmātmā bhāskare tapa āsthitaḥ
dE dhairyeṇa tapasā caiva dharmeṇa ca damena ca
dE na tulyo vidyate yasya sarveṣāṃ bhavatām api
dE taṃ bālam ugratapasaṃ dharmātmānam aninditam
dE abhigacchata saṃhṛtya ṛṣayo mānam ātmanaḥ
dE yadi mānaṃ ca mohaṃ ca tyaktvā darpaṃ ca kevalam
dE abhigacchata taṃ bālaṃ gamiṣyatha yathā purā
dE sa hy arka iva tejasvī bhāskare parvatottame
dE tapaś carati lokasya svastihetor dhṛtavrataḥ
dE na tulyas tejasā tasya dharmeṇa ca damena ca
dE upatiṣṭhata taṃ sarve varadaṃ munipuṃgavam
dE tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā nāradasya mahātmanaḥ
dE hṛṣṭena manasā sarve tasya vākyam adhiṣṭhitāḥ
dE nāradaṃ te tathety uktvā sarve kṛtvā pradakṣiṇam

dE upary upari dharmātmā caraty ugraṃ tapaḥ śuciḥ
dE taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve ṛṣayaḥ śatrusūdana
dE tasmān nātarkayaṃs te tad yad uktaṃ nāradena vai
dE tatas tv abhigatāḥ sarve taṃ bālam ṛṣisattamāḥ
dE aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi prayatāni yatāni ca
dE sarveṣāṃ vacanāt teṣāṃ bhṛgus tatra yatavrataḥ
dE abravīt taṃ mahātmānaṃ dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā
dE agastya śreṣṭha sādhūnāṃ nityaṃ sucaritavrata
dE śrotum arhasi dharmajña vaco munivarātmaja
dE vayaṃ daivatasṛṣṭena ahaṃkāreṇa mohitāḥ
dE damam utsṛjya dharmeṇa rāgaspṛṣṭā vimohitāḥ
dE bhavatprasādād icchāmo gantum iṣṭāṃ śubhāṃ gatim
dE ahaṃkārādidagdhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaraṇaṃ bhava

dE kalmaṣād atidharmeṇa śaśval lokān avāpsyasi
dE dānenānena dharmasya maharṣe munisattama
dE ātmānaṃ ca pitṝṃś caiva jīvalokaṃ ca tāraya
dE vayaṃ tvā prayatāḥ sarve svargahetor upasthitāḥ
dE aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi tārayemāni tejasā
dE vayaṃ tv abhigatāḥ sarve bhavataḥ svargakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
dE āśayā tvatsakāśāc ca kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ śivaṃ padam
dE yathārthaṃ kuru dharmajña ṛṣīṇām iha cāgamam
dE dvaipāyana uvāca
dE arhase tejasā svena rakṣituṃ śaraṇāgatān
dE sa tān ṛṣigaṇān dṛṣṭvā agastyaḥ śaraṇāgatān
dE baddhāñjalipuṭān sarvān prahṛṣṭavadano 'bhavat
dE pratyarcayitvā sarvān vai vinayenopagamya ca
dE kṛtāñjalir uvācedaṃ sarvān sa ṛṣisattamān

dE tatas teṣv arhataḥ kṛtvā sa cātithividhiṃ dvijaḥ
dE upaviśya yathānyāyaṃ praśrayāvanataḥ sthitaḥ

dE yena dadyām ahaṃ dharmaṃ bhavatāṃ svargakāṅkṣiṇām
dE prasīdata na me roṣaṃ yūyaṃ vai kartum arhatha
dE saṃbhāvayāmi nātmānaṃ yena dadyām aho 'bhayam

dE cakrus te gamane buddhiṃ tām eva vitamāṃ tadā

dE aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
dE śirasy añjalinā bālaḥ praṇamya śirasā hy api
dE idaṃ vacanam iṣṭātmā sarvān eva tadābravīt
dE na gantavyam alaṃ tāvat sarvair ṛṣigaṇair itaḥ
dE dāsyāmi yadi śakṣyāmi svargīyaṃ bhavatāṃ vacaḥ
dE gamiṣyatha yathāpūrvaṃ yadi dharmo bhaviṣyati
dE muhūrtaṃ sthīyatāṃ tāvad yāvat tāvad upaspṛśe
dE sa gatvā vitamāṃ puṇyām ṛṣis tvaritam ātmavān
dE yathāvidhi upaspṛśya tatas tv abhyājagāma ha
dE tataḥ pūrvāṃ diśaṃ dhīmān adhiṣṭhāya kṛtāñjaliḥ
dE hṛṣṭena manasovāca sthito hy ūrdhvam udaṅmukhaḥ
dE yady asti sukṛtaṃ kiṃ cid devatā vā supūjitāḥ
dE aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi yāntv etāni yathā purā
dE dhruvāya cāstu sarveṣāṃ svargaṃ sthānaṃ mahātmanām
dE mama satyena tapasā niyamena damena ca
dE etasya vacanasyānte tatas tu bharatarṣabha
dE aṣṭāśītisahasrāṇi munīnāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
dE svargam āruruhus tāni muditāni yathā purā
dE vacanaṃ śrūyate tatra sādhu sādhv ity anantaram
dE sādhu putra suputras tvaṃ mitrasya sudhṛtavrata
dE sādhu sattvavatāṃ śreṣṭha sādhu satyavatāṃ vara
dE sādhu dānam idaṃ puṇyaṃ sādhu brahmaṇyatā ca te
dE tvatprasādād vayaṃ sarve nākapṛṣṭham idaṃ kṣaṇāt
dE prāptavanto yathāpūrvam aho dānaṃ tavākṣayam
dE nedur dundubhayaḥ svarge aho dānaphalasya vai
dE ghuṣyate cāpy aho dānaṃ tribhir lokair mahāmune
dE devā mahoragā yakṣā gandharvāḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ
dE agastyaṃ puruṣaśreṣṭhaṃ puṣpavarṣair avākiran
dE gandharvā gītaghoṣeṇa vicitrair vāditais tathā
dE aho dānaṃ ghoṣayanto agastyaṃ pūjayanti vai
dE ūrvaśī menakā rambhā śyāmā kālī tathaiva ca
dE rāmā yojanagandhā ca gandhakālī tathaiva ca
dE varāpsarā hy anṛtyanta agastyaṃ bharatarṣabha
dE aho dānaṃ ghoṣayanti śataśaś caiva mānada
dE manoramaṃ susaṃhṛṣṭā devagandharvapannagāḥ
dE ghoṣayanto mahānādam agaster muditās tadā
dE tiṣṭhanty abhimukhāḥ svargaṃ sādhu sādhv ity atho 'bruvan

dE divyapuṣpadharā meghāḥ sarvataḥ samupasthitāḥ

dE dvaipāyana uvāca
dE ghuṣyate cāpy aho dānaṃ sarvato bharatarṣabha
dE aho dāne ghuṣyamāṇe brahmarṣes tasya vai tadā
dE nāradaḥ paramāścaryam adbhutaṃ prativīkṣya tat
dE sa tasmād vitamātīrād utthāya munipuṃgavaḥ
dE harṣeṇa mahatā yukto bhāskaraṃ girim āruhat
dE so 'dhiruhya mahāprājña paśyate bālakaṃ munim
dE nirvikāraṃ tadāsīnaṃ dhairyeṇa mahatānvitam
dE taṃ dṛṣṭvā nārado bālam agastyaṃ munisattamam

dE agastya uvāca

 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ nirvedam āpannaḥ śuko vaiyāsakiḥ purā
c etad icchāmi kauravya śrotuṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
d avyaktavyaktatattvānāṃ niścayaṃ buddhiniścayam
d vaktum arhasi kauravya devasyājasya yā kṛtiḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a prākṛtena suvṛttena carantam akutobhayam
c adhyāpya kṛtsnaṃ svādhyāyam anvaśād vai pitā sutam
a dharmaṃ putra niṣevasva sutīkṣṇau hi himātapau
c kṣutpipāse ca vāyuṃ ca jaya nityaṃ jitendriyaḥ
a satyam ārjavam akrodham anasūyāṃ damaṃ tapaḥ
c ahiṃsāṃ cānṛśaṃsyaṃ ca vidhivat paripālaya
a satye tiṣṭha rato dharme hitvā sarvam anārjavam
c devatātithiśeṣeṇa yātrāṃ prāṇasya saṃśraya
a phenapātropame dehe jīve śakunivat sthite
c anitye priyasaṃvāse kathaṃ svapiṣi putraka
a apramatteṣu jāgratsu nityayukteṣu śatruṣu
c antaraṃ lipsamāneṣu bālas tvaṃ nāvabudhyase
a gaṇyamāneṣu varṣeṣu kṣīyamāṇe tathāyuṣi
c jīvite śiṣyamāṇe ca kim utthāya na dhāvasi
a aihalaukikam īhante māṃsaśoṇitavardhanam
c pāralaukikakāryeṣu prasuptā bhṛśanāstikāḥ
a dharmāya ye 'bhyasūyanti buddhimohānvitā narāḥ
c apathā gacchatāṃ teṣām anuyātāpi pīḍyate
a ye tu tuṣṭāḥ suniyatāḥ satyāgamaparāyaṇāḥ
c dharmyaṃ panthānam ārūḍhās tān upāssva ca pṛccha ca
a upadhārya mataṃ teṣāṃ vṛddhānāṃ dharmadarśinām
c niyaccha parayā buddhyā cittam utpathagāmi vai
a adyakālikayā buddhyā dūre śva iti nirbhayāḥ
c sarvabhakṣā na paśyanti karmabhūmiṃ vicetasaḥ
a dharmaniḥśreṇim āsthāya kiṃ cit kiṃ cit samāruha
c kośakāravad ātmānaṃ veṣṭayan nāvabudhyase
a nāstikaṃ bhinnamaryādaṃ kūlapātam ivāsthiram
c vāmataḥ kuru visrabdho naraṃ veṇum ivoddhatam
a kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca mṛtyuṃ ca pañcendriyajalāṃ nadīm
c nāvaṃ dhṛtimayīṃ kṛtvā janmadurgāṇi saṃtara
a mṛtyunābhyāhate loke jarayā paripīḍite
c amoghāsu patantīṣu dharmayānena saṃtara
a tiṣṭhantaṃ ca śayānaṃ ca mṛtyur anveṣate yadā
c nirvṛtiṃ labhase kasmād akasmān mṛtyunāśitaḥ
a saṃcinvānakam evainaṃ kāmānām avitṛptakam
c vṛkīvoraṇam āsādya mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
a kramaśaḥ saṃcitaśikho dharmabuddhimayo mahān
c andhakāre praveṣṭavye dīpo yatnena dhāryatām
a saṃpatan dehajālāni kadā cid iha mānuṣe
c brāhmaṇyaṃ labhate jantus tat putra paripālaya
a brāhmaṇasya hi deho 'yaṃ na kāmārthāya jāyate
c iha kleśāya tapase pretya tv anupamaṃ sukham
a brāhmaṇyaṃ bahubhir avāpyate tapobhis
tal labdhvā na paripaṇena heḍitavyam
c svādhyāye tapasi dame ca nityayuktaḥ
kṣemārthī kuśalaparaḥ sadā yatasva
a avyaktaprakṛtir ayaṃ kalāśarīraḥ
sūkṣmātmā kṣaṇatruṭiśo nimeṣaromā
c ṛtvāsyaḥ samabalaśuklakṛṣṇanetro
māṃsāṅgo dravati vayohayo narāṇām
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā prasṛtam ajasram ugravegaṃ
gacchantaṃ satatam ihāvyapekṣamāṇam
c cakṣus te yadi na parapraṇetṛneyaṃ
dharme te bhavatu manaḥ paraṃ niśamya
a ye 'mī tu pracalitadharmakāmavṛttāḥ
krośantaḥ satatam aniṣṭasaṃprayogāḥ
c kliśyante parigatavedanāśarīrā
bahvībhiḥ subhṛśam adharmavāsanābhiḥ
a rājā dharmaparaḥ sadā śubhagoptā
samīkṣya sukṛtināṃ dadhāti lokān
c bahuvidham api carataḥ pradiśati
