a śvāno bhīṣaṇāyomukhāni vayāṃsi
vaḍagṛdhrakulapakṣiṇāṃ ca saṃghāḥ
c narāṃ kadane rudhirapā guruvacana
nudam uparataṃ viśasanti
a maryādā niyatāḥ svayaṃbhuvā ya ihemāḥ
prabhinatti daśaguṇā manonugatvāt
c nivasati bhṛśam asukhaṃ pitṛviṣaya
vipinam avagāhya sa pāpaḥ
a yo lubdhaḥ subhṛśaṃ priyānṛtaś ca manuṣyaḥ
satatanikṛtivañcanāratiḥ syāt
c upanidhibhir asukhakṛt sa paramanirayago
bhṛśam asukham anubhavati duṣkṛtakarmā
a uṣṇāṃ vaitaraṇīṃ mahānadīm
avagāḍho 'sipatravanabhinnagātraḥ
c paraśuvanaśayo nipatito
vasati ca mahāniraye bhṛśārtaḥ
a mahāpadāni katthase na cāpy avekṣase param
c cirasya mṛtyukārikām anāgatāṃ na budhyase
a prayāsyatāṃ kim āsyate samutthitaṃ mahad bhayam
c atipramāthi dāruṇaṃ sukhasya saṃvidhīyatām
a purā mṛtaḥ praṇīyase yamasya mṛtyuśāsanāt
c tad antikāya dāruṇaiḥ prayatnam ārjave kuru
a purā samūlabāndhavaṃ prabhur haraty aduḥkhavit
c taveha jīvitaṃ yamo na cāsti tasya vārakaḥ
a purā vivāti māruto yamasya yaḥ puraḥsaraḥ
c puraika eva nīyase kuruṣva sāṃparāyikam
a purā sahikka eva te pravāti māruto 'ntakaḥ
c purā ca vibhramanti te diśo mahābhayāgame
a smṛtiś ca saṃnirudhyate purā taveha putraka
c samākulasya gacchataḥ samādhim uttamaṃ kuru
a kṛtākṛte śubhāśubhe pramādakarmaviplute
c smaran purā na tapyase nidhatsva kevalaṃ nidhim
a purā jarā kalevaraṃ vijarjarīkaroti te
c balāṅgarūpahāriṇī nidhatsva kevalaṃ nidhim
a purā śarīram antako bhinatti rogasāyakaiḥ
c prasahya jīvitakṣaye tapo mahat samācara
a purā vṛkā bhayaṃkarā manuṣyadehagocarāḥ
c abhidravanti sarvato yatasva puṇyaśīlane
a purāndhakāram ekako 'nupaśyasi tvarasva vai
c purā hiraṇmayān nagān nirīkṣase 'drimūrdhani
a purā kusaṃgatāni te suhṛnmukhāś ca śatravaḥ
c vicālayanti darśanād ghaṭasva putra yat param
a dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṃ na cāsti caurataḥ
c mṛtaṃ ca yan na muñcati samarjayasva tad dhanam
a na tatra saṃvibhajyate svakarmabhiḥ parasparam
c yad eva yasya yautakaṃ tad eva tatra so 'śnute
a paratra yena jīvyate tad eva putra dīyatām
c dhanaṃ yad akṣayaṃ dhruvaṃ samarjayasva tat svayam
a na yāvad eva pacyate mahājanasya yāvakam
c apakva eva yāvake purā praṇīyase tvara
a na mātṛpitṛbāndhavā na saṃstutaḥ priyo janaḥ
c anuvrajanti saṃkaṭe vrajantam ekapātinam
a yad eva karma kevalaṃ svayaṃ kṛtaṃ śubhāśubham
c tad eva tasya yautakaṃ bhavaty amutra gacchataḥ
a hiraṇyaratnasaṃcayāḥ śubhāśubhena saṃcitāḥ
c na tasya dehasaṃkṣaye bhavanti kāryasādhakāḥ
a paratragāmikasya te kṛtākṛtasya karmaṇaḥ
c na sākṣir ātmanā samo nṛṇām ihāsti kaś cana
a manuṣyadehaśūnyakaṃ bhavaty amutra gacchataḥ
c prapaśya buddhicakṣuṣā pradṛśyate hi sarvataḥ
a ihāgnisūryavāyavaḥ śarīram āśritās trayaḥ
c ta eva tasya sākṣiṇo bhavanti dharmadarśinaḥ
a yathāniśeṣu sarvataḥspṛśatsu sarvadāriṣu
c prakāśagūḍhavṛttiṣu svadharmam eva pālaya
a anekapāripanthike virūparaudrarakṣite
c svam eva karma rakṣyatāṃ svakarma tatra gacchati
a na tatra saṃvibhajyate svakarmaṇā parasparam
c yathākṛtaṃ svakarmajaṃ tad eva bhujyate phalam
a yathāpsarogaṇāḥ phalaṃ sukhaṃ maharṣibhiḥ saha
c tathāpnuvanti karmato vimānakāmagāminaḥ
a yatheha yat kṛtaṃ śubhaṃ vipāpmabhiḥ kṛtātmabhiḥ
c tad āpnuvanti mānavās tathā viśuddhayonayaḥ
a prajāpateḥ salokatāṃ bṛhaspateḥ śatakratoḥ
c vrajanti te parāṃ gatiṃ gṛhasthadharmasetubhiḥ
a sahasraśo 'py anekaśaḥ pravaktum utsahāmahe
c abuddhimohanaṃ punaḥ prabhur vinā na yāvakam
a gatā dviraṣṭavarṣatā dhruvo 'si pañcaviṃśakaḥ
c kuruṣva dharmasaṃcayaṃ vayo hi te 'tivartate
a purā karoti so 'ntakaḥ pramādagomukhaṃ damam
c yathāgṛhītam utthitaṃ tvarasva dharmapālane
a yadā tvam eva pṛṣṭhatas tvam agrato gamiṣyasi
c tathā gatiṃ gamiṣyataḥ kim ātmanā pareṇa vā
a yad ekapātināṃ satāṃ bhavaty amutra gacchatām
c bhayeṣu sāṃparāyikaṃ nidhatsva taṃ mahānidhim
a sakūlamūlabāndhavaṃ prabhur haraty asaṅgavān
c na santi yasya vārakāḥ kuruṣva dharmasaṃnidhim
a idaṃ nidarśanaṃ mayā taveha putra saṃmatam
c svadarśanānumānataḥ pravarṇitaṃ kuruṣva tat
a dadhāti yaḥ svakarmaṇā dhanāni yasya kasya cit
c abuddhimohajair guṇaiḥ śataika eva yujyate
a śrutaṃ samartham astu te prakurvataḥ śubhāḥ kriyāḥ
c tad eva tatra darśanaṃ kṛtajñam arthasaṃhitam
a nibandhanī rajjur eṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥ
c chittvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥ
a kiṃ te dhanena kiṃ bandhubhis te
kiṃ te putraiḥ putraka yo mariṣyasi
c ātmānam anviccha guhāṃ praviṣṭaṃ
pitāmahās te kva gatāś ca sarve
a śvaḥkāryam adya kurvīta pūrvāhṇe cāparāhṇikam
b na hi pratīkṣate mṛtyuḥ kṛtaṃ vāsya na vā kṛtam
c ko hi tad veda kasyādya mṛtyusenā nivekṣyate
a anugamya śmaśānāntaṃ nivartantīha bāndhavāḥ
c agnau prakṣipya puruṣaṃ jñātayaḥ suhṛdas tathā
a nāstikān niranukrośān narān pāpamatau sthitān
c vāmataḥ kuru viśrabdhaṃ paraṃ prepsur atandritaḥ
a evam abhyāhate loke kālenopanipīḍite
c sumahad dhairyam ālambya dharmaṃ sarvātmanā kuru
a athemaṃ darśanopāyaṃ samyag yo vetti mānavaḥ
c samyak sa dharmaṃ kṛtveha paratra sukham edhate
a na dehabhede maraṇaṃ vijānatāṃ
na ca praṇāśaḥ svanupālite pathi
c dharmaṃ hi yo vardhayate sa paṇḍito
ya eva dharmāc cyavate sa muhyati
a prayuktayoḥ karmapathi svakarmaṇoḥ
phalaṃ prayoktā labhate yathāvidhi
c nihīnakarmā nirayaṃ prapadyate
triviṣṭapaṃ gacchati dharmapāragaḥ
a sopānabhūtaṃ svargasya mānuṣyaṃ prāpya durlabham
c tathātmānaṃ samādadhyād bhraśyeta na punar yathā
a yasya notkrāmati matiḥ svargamārgānusāriṇī
c tam āhuḥ puṇyakarmāṇam aśocyaṃ mitrabāndhavaiḥ
a yasya nopahatā buddhir niścayeṣv avalambate
c svarge kṛtāvakāśasya tasya nāsti mahad bhayam
a tapovaneṣu ye jātās tatraiva nidhanaṃ gatāḥ
c teṣām alpataro dharmaḥ kāmabhogam ajānatām
a yas tu bhogān parityajya śarīreṇa tapaś caret
c na tena kiṃ cin na prāptaṃ tan me bahumataṃ phalam
a mātāpitṛsahasrāṇi putradāraśatāni ca
c anāgatāny atītāni kasya te kasya vā vayam
d aham eko na me kaś cid ahaṃ vāpi na kasya cit
d taṃ na paśyāmi yasyāhaṃ taṃ na paśyāmi yo mama
a na teṣāṃ bhavatā kāryaṃ na kāryaṃ tava tair api
c svakṛtais tāni yātāni bhavāṃś caiva gamiṣyati
a iha loke hi dhaninaḥ paro 'pi svajanāyate
c svajanas tu daridrāṇāṃ jīvatām eva naśyati
a saṃcinoty aśubhaṃ karma kalatrāpekṣayā naraḥ
c tataḥ kleśam avāpnoti paratreha tathaiva ca
a paśya tvaṃ chidrabhūtaṃ hi jīvalokaṃ svakarmaṇā
c tat kuruṣva tathā putra kṛtsnaṃ yat samudāhṛtam
a tad etat saṃpradṛśyaiva karmabhūmiṃ praviśya tām
c śubhāny ācaritavyāni paralokam abhīpsatā
a māsartusaṃjñāparivartakena
sūryāgninā rātridivendhanena
c svakarmaniṣṭhāphalasākṣikeṇa
bhūtāni kālaḥ pacati prasahya
a dhanena kiṃ yan na dadāti nāśnute
balena kiṃ yena ripūn na bādhate
c śrutena kiṃ yena na dharmam ācaret
kim ātmanā yo na jitendriyo vaśī
a idaṃ dvaipāyanavaco hitam uktaṃ niśamya tu
c śuko gataḥ parityajya pitaraṃ mokṣadeśikam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a kathaṃ vyāsasya dharmātmā śuko jajñe mahātapāḥ
c siddhiṃ ca paramāṃ prāptas tan me brūhi pitāmaha
a kasyāṃ cotpādayām āsa śukaṃ vyāsas tapodhanaḥ
c na hy asya jananīṃ vidma janma cāgryaṃ mahātmanaḥ
a kathaṃ ca bālasya sataḥ sūkṣmajñāne gatā matiḥ
c yathā nānyasya loke 'smin dvitīyasyeha kasya cit
a etad icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ vistareṇa mahādyute
c na hi me tṛptir astīha śṛṇvato 'mṛtam uttamam
a māhātmyam ātmayogaṃ ca vijñānaṃ ca śukasya ha
c yathāvad ānupūrvyeṇa tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a na hāyanair na palitair na vittena na bandhubhiḥ
c ṛṣayaś cakrire dharmaṃ yo 'nūcānaḥ sa no mahān
a tapomūlam idaṃ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi pāṇḍava
c tad indriyāṇi saṃyamya tapo bhavati nānyathā
a indriyāṇāṃ prasaṅgena doṣam ṛcchaty asaṃśayam
c saṃniyamya tu tāny eva siddhiṃ prāpnoti mānavaḥ
a aśvamedhasahasrasya vājapeyaśatasya ca
c yogasya kalayā tāta na tulyaṃ vidyate phalam
a atra te vartayiṣyāmi janmayogaphalaṃ yathā
c śukasyāgryāṃ gatiṃ caiva durvidām akṛtātmabhiḥ
a meruśṛṅge kila purā karṇikāravanāyute
c vijahāra mahādevo bhīmair bhūtagaṇair vṛtaḥ
a śailarājasutā caiva devī tatrābhavat purā
c tatra divyaṃ tapas tepe kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ prabhuḥ
a yogenātmānam āviśya yogadharmaparāyaṇaḥ
c dhārayan sa tapas tepe putrārthaṃ kurusattama
a agner bhūmer apāṃ vāyor antarikṣasya cābhibho
c vīryeṇa saṃmitaḥ putro mama bhūyād iti sma ha
a saṃkalpenātha so 'nena duṣprāpeṇākṛtātmabhiḥ
c varayām āsa deveśam āsthitas tapa uttamam
a atiṣṭhan mārutāhāraḥ śataṃ kila samāḥ prabhuḥ
c ārādhayan mahādevaṃ bahurūpam umāpatim
a tatra brahmarṣayaś caiva sarve devarṣayas tathā
c lokapālāś ca lokeśaṃ sādhyāś ca vasubhiḥ saha
a ādityāś caiva rudrāś ca divākaraniśākarau
c maruto mārutaś caiva sāgarāḥ saritas tathā
a aśvinau devagandharvās tathā nāradaparvatau
c viśvāvasuś ca gandharvaḥ siddhāś cāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
a tatra rudro mahādevaḥ karṇikāramayīṃ śubhām
c dhārayāṇaḥ srajaṃ bhāti jyotsnām iva niśākaraḥ
a tasmin divye vane ramye devadevarṣisaṃkule
c āsthitaḥ paramaṃ yogam ṛṣiḥ putrārtham udyataḥ
a na cāsya hīyate varṇo na glānir upajāyate
c trayāṇām api lokānāṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a jaṭāś ca tejasā tasya vaiśvānaraśikhopamāḥ
c prajvalantyaḥ sma dṛśyante yuktasyāmitatejasaḥ
a mārkaṇḍeyo hi bhagavān etad ākhyātavān mama
c sa devacaritānīha kathayām āsa me sadā
a tā etādyāpi kṛṣṇasya tapasā tena dīpitāḥ
c agnivarṇā jaṭās tāta prakāśante mahātmanaḥ
a evaṃvidhena tapasā tasya bhaktyā ca bhārata
c maheśvaraḥ prasannātmā cakāra manasā matim
d tatas tasya mahādevo darśayām āsa sāmbikaḥ
a uvāca cainaṃ bhagavāṃs tryambakaḥ prahasann iva
c evaṃvidhas te tanayo dvaipāyana bhaviṣyati
a yathā hy agnir yathā vāyur yathā bhūmir yathā jalam
c yathā ca khaṃ tathā śuddho bhaviṣyati suto mahān
a tadbhāvabhāvī tadbuddhis tadātmā tadapāśrayaḥ
c tejasāvṛtya lokāṃs trīn yaśaḥ prāpsyati kevalam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa labdhvā paramaṃ devād varaṃ satyavatīsutaḥ
c araṇīṃ tv atha saṃgṛhya mamanthāgnicikīrṣayā
a atha rūpaṃ paraṃ rājan bibhratīṃ svena tejasā
c ghṛtācīṃ nāmāpsarasam apaśyad bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
a ṛṣir apsarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasā kāmamohitaḥ
c abhavad bhagavān vyāso vane tasmin yudhiṣṭhira
a sā ca kṛtvā tadā vyāsaṃ kāmasaṃvignamānasam
c śukī bhūtvā mahārāja ghṛtācī samupāgamat
a sa tām apsarasaṃ dṛṣṭvā rūpeṇānyena saṃvṛtām
c śarīrajenānugataḥ sarvagātrātigena ha
a sa tu dhairyeṇa mahatā nigṛhṇan hṛcchayaṃ muniḥ
c na śaśāka niyantuṃ tad vyāsaḥ pravisṛtaṃ manaḥ
e bhāvitvāc caiva bhāvasya ghṛtācyā vapuṣā hṛtaḥ
a yatnān niyacchatas tasya muner agnicikīrṣayā
c araṇyām eva sahasā tasya śukram avāpatat
a so 'viśaṅkena manasā tathaiva dvijasattamaḥ
c araṇīṃ mamantha brahmarṣis tasyāṃ jajñe śuko nṛpa
a śukre nirmathyamāne tu śuko jajñe mahātapāḥ
c paramarṣir mahāyogī araṇīgarbhasaṃbhavaḥ
a yathādhvare samiddho 'gnir bhāti havyam upāttavān
c tathārūpaḥ śuko jajñe prajvalann iva tejasā
a bibhrat pituś ca kauravya rūpavarṇam anuttamam
c babhau tadā bhāvitātmā vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
a taṃ gaṅgā saritāṃ śreṣṭhā merupṛṣṭhe janeśvara
c svarūpiṇī tadābhyetya snāpayām āsa vāriṇā
a antarikṣāc ca kauravya daṇḍaḥ kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca ha
c papāta bhuvi rājendra śukasyārthe mahātmanaḥ
a jegīyante sma gandharvā nanṛtuś cāpsarogaṇāḥ
c devadundubhayaś caiva prāvādyanta mahāsvanāḥ
a viśvāvasuś ca gandharvas tathā tumburunāradau
c hāhāhūhū ca gandharvau tuṣṭuvuḥ śukasaṃbhavam
a tatra śakrapurogāś ca lokapālāḥ samāgatāḥ
c devā devarṣayaś caiva tathā brahmarṣayo 'pi ca
a divyāni sarvapuṣpāṇi pravavarṣātra mārutaḥ
c jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ caiva prahṛṣṭam abhavaj jagat
a taṃ mahātmā svayaṃ prītyā devyā saha mahādyutiḥ
c jātamātraṃ muneḥ putraṃ vidhinopānayat tadā
a tasya deveśvaraḥ śakro divyam adbhutadarśanam
c dadau kamaṇḍaluṃ prītyā devavāsāṃsi cābhibho
a haṃsāś ca śatapatrāś ca sārasāś ca sahasraśaḥ
c pradakṣiṇam avartanta śukāś cāṣāś ca bhārata
a āraṇeyas tathā divyaṃ prāpya janma mahādyutiḥ
c tatraivovāsa medhāvī vratacārī samāhitaḥ
a utpannamātraṃ taṃ vedāḥ sarahasyāḥ sasaṃgrahāḥ
c upatasthur mahārāja yathāsya pitaraṃ tathā
a bṛhaspatiṃ tu vavre sa vedavedāṅgabhāṣyavit
c upādhyāyaṃ mahārāja dharmam evānucintayan
a so 'dhītya vedān akhilān sarahasyān sasaṃgrahān
c itihāsaṃ ca kārtsnyena rājaśāstrāṇi cābhibho
a gurave dakṣiṇāṃ dattvā samāvṛtto mahāmuniḥ
c ugraṃ tapaḥ samārebhe brahmacārī samāhitaḥ
a devatānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca bālye 'pi sa mahātapāḥ
c saṃmantraṇīyo mānyaś ca jñānena tapasā tathā
a na tv asya ramate buddhir āśrameṣu narādhipa
c triṣu gārhasthyamūleṣu mokṣadharmānudarśinaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa mokṣam anucintyaiva śukaḥ pitaram abhyagāt
c prāhābhivādya ca guruṃ śreyorthī vinayānvitaḥ
a mokṣadharmeṣu kuśalo bhagavān prabravītu me
c yathā me manasaḥ śāntiḥ paramā saṃbhavet prabho
a śrutvā putrasya vacanaṃ paramarṣir uvāca tam
c adhīṣva putra mokṣaṃ vai dharmāṃś ca vividhān api
a pitur niyogāj jagrāha śuko brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
c yogaśāstraṃ ca nikhilaṃ kāpilaṃ caiva bhārata
a sa taṃ brāhmyā śriyā yuktaṃ brahmatulyaparākramam
c mene putraṃ yadā vyāso mokṣavidyāviśāradam
a uvāca gaccheti tadā janakaṃ mithileśvaram
c sa te vakṣyati mokṣārthaṃ nikhilena viśeṣataḥ
a pitur niyogād agaman maithilaṃ janakaṃ nṛpam
c praṣṭuṃ dharmasya niṣṭhāṃ vai mokṣasya ca parāyaṇam
a uktaś ca mānuṣeṇa tvaṃ pathā gacchety avismitaḥ
c na prabhāveṇa gantavyam antarikṣacareṇa vai
a ārjaveṇaiva gantavyaṃ na sukhānveṣiṇā pathā
c nānveṣṭavyā viśeṣās tu viśeṣā hi prasaṅginaḥ
a ahaṃkāro na kartavyo yājye tasmin narādhipe
c sthātavyaṃ ca vaśe tasya sa te chetsyati saṃśayam
a sa dharmakuśalo rājā mokṣaśāstraviśāradaḥ
c yājyo mama sa yad brūyāt tat kāryam aviśaṅkayā
a evam uktaḥ sa dharmātmā jagāma mithilāṃ muniḥ
c padbhyāṃ śakto 'ntarikṣeṇa krāntuṃ bhūmiṃ sasāgarām
a sa girīṃś cāpy atikramya nadīs tīrtvā sarāṃsi ca
c bahuvyālamṛgākīrṇā vividhāś cāṭavīs tathā
a meror hareś ca dve varṣe varṣaṃ haimavataṃ tathā
c krameṇaiva vyatikramya bhārataṃ varṣam āsadat
a sa deśān vividhān paśyaṃś cīnahūṇaniṣevitān
c āryāvartam imaṃ deśam ājagāma mahāmuniḥ
a pitur vacanam ājñāya tam evārthaṃ vicintayan
c adhvānaṃ so 'ticakrāma khe 'caraḥ khe carann iva
a pattanāni ca ramyāṇi sphītāni nagarāṇi ca
c ratnāni ca vicitrāṇi śukaḥ paśyan na paśyati
a udyānāni ca ramyāṇi tathaivāyatanāni ca
c puṇyāni caiva tīrthāni so 'tikramya tathādhvanaḥ
a so 'cireṇaiva kālena videhān āsasāda ha
c rakṣitān dharmarājena janakena mahātmanā
a tatra grāmān bahūn paśyan bahvannarasabhojanān
c pallīghoṣān samṛddhāṃś ca bahugokulasaṃkulān
a sphītāṃś ca śāliyavasair haṃsasārasasevitān
c padminībhiś ca śataśaḥ śrīmatībhir alaṃkṛtān
a sa videhān atikramya samṛddhajanasevitān
c mithilopavanaṃ ramyam āsasāda maharddhimat
a hastyaśvarathasaṃkīrṇaṃ naranārīsamākulam
c paśyann apaśyann iva tat samatikrāmad acyutaḥ
a manasā taṃ vahan bhāraṃ tam evārthaṃ vicintayan
c ātmārāmaḥ prasannātmā mithilām āsasāda ha
a tasyā dvāraṃ samāsādya dvārapālair nivāritaḥ
c sthito dhyānaparo mukto viditaḥ praviveśa ha
a sa rājamārgam āsādya samṛddhajanasaṃkulam
c pārthivakṣayam āsādya niḥśaṅkaḥ praviveśa ha
a tatrāpi dvārapālās tam ugravāco nyaṣedhayan
c tathaiva ca śukas tatra nirmanyuḥ samatiṣṭhata
a na cātapādhvasaṃtaptaḥ kṣutpipāsāśramānvitaḥ
c pratāmyati glāyati vā nāpaiti ca tathātapāt
a teṣāṃ tu dvārapālānām ekaḥ śokasamanvitaḥ
c madhyaṃgatam ivādityaṃ dṛṣṭvā śukam avasthitam
a pūjayitvā yathānyāyam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ
c prāveśayat tataḥ kakṣyāṃ dvitīyāṃ rājaveśmanaḥ
a tatrāsīnaḥ śukas tāta mokṣam evānucintayan
c chāyāyām ātape caiva samadarśī mahādyutiḥ
a taṃ muhūrtād ivāgamya rājño mantrī kṛtāñjaliḥ
c prāveśayat tataḥ kakṣyāṃ tṛtīyāṃ rājaveśmanaḥ
a tatrāntaḥpurasaṃbaddhaṃ mahac caitrarathopamam
c suvibhaktajalākrīḍaṃ ramyaṃ puṣpitapādapam
a tad darśayitvā sa śukaṃ mantrī kānanam uttamam
b śukaṃ prāveśayan mantrī pramadāvanam uttamam
c arham āsanam ādiśya niścakrāma tataḥ punaḥ
a taṃ cāruveṣāḥ suśroṇyas taruṇyaḥ priyadarśanāḥ
c sūkṣmaraktāmbaradharās taptakāñcanabhūṣaṇāḥ
a saṃlāpollāpakuśalā nṛttagītaviśāradāḥ
c smitapūrvābhibhāṣiṇyo rūpeṇāpsarasāṃ samāḥ
a kāmopacārakuśalā bhāvajñāḥ sarvakovidāḥ
c paraṃ pañcāśato nāryo vāramukhyāḥ samādravan
a pādyādīni pratigrāhya pūjayā parayārcya ca
c deśakālopapannena sādhvannenāpy atarpayan
a tasya bhuktavatas tāta tad antaḥpurakānanam
c suramyaṃ darśayām āsur ekaikaśyena bhārata
a krīḍantyaś ca hasantyaś ca gāyantyaś caiva tāḥ śukam
c udārasattvaṃ sattvajñāḥ sarvāḥ paryacaraṃs tadā
a āraṇeyas tu śuddhātmā trisaṃdehas trikarmakṛt
c vaśyendriyo jitakrodho na hṛṣyati na kupyati
a tasmai śayyāsanaṃ divyaṃ varārhaṃ ratnabhūṣitam
c spardhyāstaraṇasaṃstīrṇaṃ dadus tāḥ paramastriyaḥ
a pādaśaucaṃ tu kṛtvaiva śukaḥ saṃdhyām upāsya ca
c niṣasādāsane puṇye tam evārthaṃ vicintayan
a pūrvarātre tu tatrāsau bhūtvā dhyānaparāyaṇaḥ
c madhyarātre yathānyāyaṃ nidrām āhārayat prabhuḥ
a tato muhūrtād utthāya kṛtvā śaucam anantaram
c strībhiḥ parivṛto dhīmān dhyānam evānvapadyata
a anena vidhinā kārṣṇis tad ahaḥśeṣam acyutaḥ
c tāṃ ca rātriṃ nṛpakule vartayām āsa bhārata
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ sa rājā janako mantribhiḥ saha bhārata
c puraḥ purohitaṃ kṛtvā sarvāṇy antaḥpurāṇi ca
a āsanaṃ ca puraskṛtya ratnāni vividhāni ca
c śirasā cārghyam ādāya guruputraṃ samabhyagāt
a sa tad āsanam ādāya bahuratnavibhūṣitam
c spardhyāstaraṇasaṃstīrṇaṃ sarvatobhadram ṛddhimat
a purodhasā saṃgṛhītaṃ hastenālabhya pārthivaḥ
c pradadau guruputrāya śukāya paramārcitam
a tatropaviṣṭaṃ taṃ kārṣṇiṃ śāstrataḥ pratyapūjayat
c pādyaṃ nivedya prathamam arghyaṃ gāṃ ca nyavedayat
e sa ca tāṃ mantravat pūjāṃ pratyagṛhṇād yathāvidhi
a pratigṛhya ca tāṃ pūjāṃ janakād dvijasattamaḥ
c gāṃ caiva samanujñāya rājānam anumānya ca
a paryapṛcchan mahātejā rājñaḥ kuśalam avyayam
c anāmayaṃ ca rājendra śukaḥ sānucarasya ha
a anujñātaḥ sa tenātha niṣasāda sahānugaḥ
c udārasattvābhijano bhūmau rājā kṛtāñjaliḥ
a kuśalaṃ cāvyayaṃ caiva pṛṣṭvā vaiyāsakiṃ nṛpaḥ
c kim āgamanam ity eva paryapṛcchata pārthivaḥ
 śuka uvāca
a pitrāham ukto bhadraṃ te mokṣadharmārthakovidaḥ
c videharājo yājyo me janako nāma viśrutaḥ
a tatra gacchasva vai tūrṇaṃ yadi te hṛdi saṃśayaḥ
c pravṛttau vā nivṛttau vā sa te chetsyati saṃśayam
a so 'haṃ pitur niyogāt tvām upapraṣṭum ihāgataḥ
c tan me dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha yathāvad vaktum arhasi
a kiṃ kāryaṃ brāhmaṇeneha mokṣārthaś ca kim ātmakaḥ
c kathaṃ ca mokṣaḥ kartavyo jñānena tapasāpi vā
 janaka uvāca
a yat kāryaṃ brāhmaṇeneha janmaprabhṛti tac chṛṇu
c kṛtopanayanas tāta bhaved vedaparāyaṇaḥ
a tapasā guruvṛttyā ca brahmacaryeṇa cābhibho
c devatānāṃ pitṝṇāṃ cāpy anṛṇaś cānasūyakaḥ
a vedān adhītya niyato dakṣiṇām apavarjya ca
c abhyanujñām atha prāpya samāvarteta vai dvijaḥ
a samāvṛttas tu gārhasthye sadāro niyato vaset
c anasūyur yathānyāyam āhitāgnis tathaiva ca
a utpādya putrapautraṃ tu vanyāśramapade vaset
c tān evāgnīn yathāśāstram arcayann atithipriyaḥ
a sa vane 'gnīn yathānyāyam ātmany āropya dharmavit
c nirdvaṃdvo vītarāgātmā brahmāśramapade vaset
 śuka uvāca
a utpanne jñānavijñāne pratyakṣe hṛdi śāśvate
c kim avaśyaṃ nivastavyam āśrameṣu vaneṣu ca
a etad bhavantaṃ pṛcchāmi tad bhavān vaktum arhati
c yathāvedārthatattvena brūhi me tvaṃ janādhipa
 janaka uvāca
a na vinā jñānavijñānaṃ mokṣasyādhigamo bhavet
c na vinā gurusaṃbandhaṃ jñānasyādhigamaḥ smṛtaḥ
a ācāryaḥ plāvitā tasya jñānaṃ plava ihocyate
c vijñāya kṛtakṛtyas tu tīrṇas tad ubhayaṃ tyajet
a anucchedāya lokānām anucchedāya karmaṇām
c pūrvair ācarito dharmaś cāturāśramyasaṃkathaḥ
a anena kramayogena bahujātiṣu karmaṇā
c kṛtvā śubhāśubhaṃ karma mokṣo nāmeha labhyate
a bhavitaiḥ kāraṇaiś cāyaṃ bahusaṃsārayoniṣu
c āsādayati śuddhātmā mokṣaṃ vai prathamāśrame
a tam āsādya tu muktasya dṛṣṭārthasya vipaścitaḥ
c triṣv āśrameṣu ko nv artho bhavet param abhīpsataḥ
a rājasāṃs tāmasāṃś caiva nityaṃ doṣān vivarjayet
c sāttvikaṃ mārgam āsthāya paśyed ātmānam ātmanā
a sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani
c saṃpaśyan nopalipyeta jale vāricaro yathā
a pakṣīva plavanād ūrdhvam amutrānantyam aśnute
c vihāya dehaṃ nirmukto nirdvaṃdvaḥ praśamaṃ gataḥ
a atra gāthāḥ purā gītāḥ śṛṇu rājñā yayātinā
c dhāryante yā dvijais tāta mokṣaśāstraviśāradaiḥ
a jyotir ātmani nānyatra rataṃ tatraiva caiva tat
c svayaṃ ca śakyaṃ tad draṣṭuṃ susamāhitacetasā
a na bibheti paro yasmān na bibheti parāc ca yaḥ
c yaś ca necchati na dveṣṭi brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a yadā bhāvaṃ na kurute sarvabhūteṣu pāpakam
c karmaṇā manasā vācā brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a saṃyojya tapasātmānam īrṣyām utsṛjya mohinīm
c tyaktvā kāmaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca tato brahmatvam aśnute
a yadā śravye ca dṛśye ca sarvabhūteṣu cāpyayam
c samo bhavati nirdvaṃdvo brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a yadā stutiṃ ca nindāṃ ca samatvenaiva paśyati
c kāñcanaṃ cāyasaṃ caiva sukhaduḥkhe tathaiva ca
a śītam uṣṇaṃ tathaivārtham anarthaṃ priyam apriyam
c jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ caiva brahma saṃpadyate tadā
a prasāryeha yathāṅgāni kūrmaḥ saṃharate punaḥ
c tathendriyāṇi manasā saṃyantavyāni bhikṣuṇā
a tamaḥparigataṃ veśma yathā dīpena dṛśyate
c tathā buddhipradīpena śakya ātmā nirīkṣitum
a etat sarvaṃ prapaśyāmi tvayi buddhimatāṃ vara
c yac cānyad api vettavyaṃ tattvato veda tad bhavān
a brahmarṣe viditaś cāsi viṣayāntam upāgataḥ
c guros tava prasādena tava caivopaśikṣayā
a tasyaiva ca prasādena prādurbhūtaṃ mahāmune
c jñānaṃ divyaṃ mamāpīdaṃ tenāsi vidito mama
a adhikaṃ tava vijñānam adhikā ca gatis tava
c adhikaṃ ca tavaiśvaryaṃ tac ca tvaṃ nāvabudhyase
a bālyād vā saṃśayād vāpi bhayād vāpy avimokṣajāt
c utpanne cāpi vijñāne nādhigacchati tāṃ gatim
a vyavasāyena śuddhena madvidhaiś chinnasaṃśayaḥ
c vimucya hṛdayagranthīn āsādayati tāṃ gatim
a bhavāṃś cotpannavijñānaḥ sthirabuddhir alolupaḥ
c vyavasāyād ṛte brahmann āsādayati tatparam
a nāsti te sukhaduḥkheṣu viśeṣo nāsti lolupā
c nautsukyaṃ nṛttagīteṣu na rāga upajāyate
a na bandhuṣu nibandhas te na bhayeṣv asti te bhayam
c paśyāmi tvāṃ mahābhāga tulyaloṣṭāśmakāñcanam
a ahaṃ ca tvānupaśyāmi ye cāpy anye manīṣiṇaḥ
c āsthitaṃ paramaṃ mārgam akṣayaṃ tam anāmayam
a yat phalaṃ brāhmaṇasyeha mokṣārthaś ca yad ātmakaḥ
c tasmin vai vartase vipra kim anyat paripṛcchasi
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ kṛtātmā kṛtaniścayaḥ
c ātmanātmānam āsthāya dṛṣṭvā cātmānam ātmanā
a kṛtakāryaḥ sukhī śāntas tūṣṇīṃ prāyād udaṅmukhaḥ
b prayayau yogam āsthāya tuṣṭo diśam athottarām
c śaiśiraṃ girim uddiśya sadharmā mātariśvanaḥ
a etasminn eva kāle tu devarṣir nāradas tadā
c himavantam iyād draṣṭuṃ siddhacāraṇasevitam
a tam apsarogaṇākīrṇaṃ gītasvananināditam
c kiṃnarāṇāṃ samūhaiś ca bhṛṅgarājais tathaiva ca
a madgubhiḥ khañjarīṭaiś ca vicitrair jīvajīvakaiḥ
c citravarṇair mayūraiś ca kekāśatavirājitaiḥ
e rājahaṃsasamūhaiś ca hṛṣṭaiḥ parabhṛtais tathā
a pakṣirājo garutmāṃś ca yaṃ nityam adhigacchati
c catvāro lokapālāś ca devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathā
e yatra nityaṃ samāyānti lokasya hitakāmyayā
a viṣṇunā yatra putrārthe tapas taptaṃ mahātmanā
c yatraiva ca kumāreṇa bālye kṣiptā divaukasaḥ
a śaktir nyastā kṣititale trailokyam avamanya vai
c yatrovāca jagatskandaḥ kṣipan vākyam idaṃ tadā
a yo 'nyo 'sti matto 'bhyadhiko viprā yasyādhikaṃ priyāḥ
c yo brahmaṇyo dvitīyo 'sti triṣu lokeṣu vīryavān
a so 'bhyuddharatv imāṃ śaktim atha vā kampayatv iti
c tac chrutvā vyathitā lokāḥ ka imām uddhared iti
a atha devagaṇaṃ sarvaṃ saṃbhrāntendriyamānasam
c apaśyad bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kṣiptaṃ sāsurarākṣasam
e kiṃ nv atra sukṛtaṃ kāryaṃ bhaved iti vicintayan
a sa nāmṛṣyata taṃ kṣepam avaikṣata ca pāvakim
c sa prahasya viśuddhātmā śaktiṃ prajvalitāṃ tadā
e kampayām āsa savyena pāṇinā puruṣottamaḥ
a śaktyāṃ tu kampamānāyāṃ viṣṇunā balinā tadā
c medinī kampitā sarvā saśailavanakānanā
a śaktenāpi samuddhartuṃ kampitā sā na tūddhṛtā
c rakṣatā skandarājasya dharṣaṇāṃ prabhaviṣṇunā
a tāṃ kampayitvā bhagavān prahrādam idam abravīt
c paśya vīryaṃ kumārasya naitad anyaḥ kariṣyati
a so 'mṛṣyamāṇas tad vākyaṃ samuddharaṇaniścitaḥ
c jagrāha tāṃ tasya śaktiṃ na cainām apy akampayat
a nādaṃ mahāntaṃ muktvā sa mūrchito girimūrdhani
c vihvalaḥ prāpatad bhūmau hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutaḥ
a yatrottarāṃ diśaṃ gatvā śailarājasya pārśvataḥ
c tapo 'tapyata durdharṣas tāta nityaṃ vṛṣadhvajaḥ
a pāvakena parikṣipto dīpyatā tasya cāśramaḥ
c ādityabandhanaṃ nāma durdharṣam akṛtātmabhiḥ
a na tatra śakyate gantuṃ yakṣarākṣasadānavaiḥ
c daśayojanavistāram agnijvālāsamāvṛtam
a bhagavān pāvakas tatra svayaṃ tiṣṭhati vīryavān
c sarvavighnān praśamayan mahādevasya dhīmataḥ
a divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi pādenaikena tiṣṭhataḥ
c devān saṃtāpayaṃs tatra mahādevo dhṛtavrataḥ
a aindrīṃ tu diśam āsthāya śailarājasya dhīmataḥ
c vivikte parvatataṭe pārāśaryo mahātapāḥ
e vedān adhyāpayām āsa vyāsaḥ śiṣyān mahātapāḥ
a sumantuṃ ca mahābhāgaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanam eva ca
c jaiminiṃ ca mahāprājñaṃ pailaṃ cāpi tapasvinam
a ebhiḥ śiṣyaiḥ parivṛto vyāsa āste mahātapāḥ
c tatrāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ dadarśa pitur uttamam
e āraṇeyo viśuddhātmā nabhasīva divākaraḥ
a atha vyāsaḥ parikṣiptaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam
c dadarśa sutam āyāntaṃ divākarasamaprabham
a asajjamānaṃ vṛkṣeṣu śaileṣu viṣameṣu ca
c yogayuktaṃ mahātmānaṃ yathā bāṇaṃ guṇacyutam
a so 'bhigamya pituḥ pādāv agṛhṇād araṇīsutaḥ
c yathopajoṣaṃ taiś cāpi samāgacchan mahāmuniḥ
a tato nivedayām āsa pitre sarvam aśeṣataḥ
c śuko janakarājena saṃvādaṃ prītamānasaḥ
a evam adhyāpayañ śiṣyān vyāsaḥ putraṃ ca vīryavān
c uvāsa himavatpṛṣṭhe pārāśaryo mahāmuniḥ
a tataḥ kadā cic chiṣyās taṃ parivāryāvatasthire
c vedādhyayanasaṃpannāḥ śāntātmāno jitendriyāḥ
a vedeṣu niṣṭhāṃ saṃprāpya sāṅgeṣv atitapasvinaḥ
c athocus te tadā vyāsaṃ śiṣyāḥ prāñjalayo gurum
a mahatā śreyasā yuktā yaśasā ca sma vardhitāḥ
c ekaṃ tv idānīm icchāmo guruṇānugrahaṃ kṛtam
a iti teṣāṃ vacaḥ śrutvā brahmarṣis tān uvāca ha
c ucyatām iti tad vatsā yad vaḥ kāryaṃ priyaṃ mayā
a etad vākyaṃ guroḥ śrutvā śiṣyās te hṛṣṭamānasāḥ
c punaḥ prāñjalayo bhūtvā praṇamya śirasā gurum
a ūcus te sahitā rājann idaṃ vacanam uttamam
c yadi prīta upādhyāyo dhanyāḥ smo munisattama
a kāṅkṣāmas tu vayaṃ sarve varaṃ dattaṃ maharṣiṇā
c ṣaṣṭhaḥ śiṣyo na te khyātiṃ gacched atra prasīda naḥ
a catvāras te vayaṃ śiṣyā guruputraś ca pañcamaḥ
c iha vedāḥ pratiṣṭherann eṣa naḥ kāṅkṣito varaḥ
a śiṣyāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā vyāso vedārthatattvavit
c parāśarātmajo dhīmān paralokārthacintakaḥ
e uvāca śiṣyān dharmātmā dharmyaṃ naiḥśreyasaṃ vacaḥ
a brāhmaṇāya sadā deyaṃ brahma śuśrūṣave bhavet
c brahmaloke nivāsaṃ yo dhruvaṃ samabhikāṅkṣati
a bhavanto bahulāḥ santu vedo vistāryatām ayam
c nāśiṣye saṃpradātavyo nāvrate nākṛtātmani
a ete śiṣyaguṇāḥ sarve vijñātavyā yathārthataḥ
c nāparīkṣitacāritre vidyā deyā kathaṃ cana
a yathā hi kanakaṃ śuddhaṃ tāpacchedanigharṣaṇaiḥ
c parīkṣeta tathā śiṣyān īkṣet kulaguṇādibhiḥ
a na niyojyāś ca vaḥ śiṣyā aniyoge mahābhaye
c yathāmati yathāpāṭhaṃ tathā vidyā phaliṣyati
a sarvas taratu durgāṇi sarvo bhadrāṇi paśyatu
c śrāvayec caturo varṇān kṛtvā brāhmaṇam agrataḥ
a vedasyādhyayanaṃ hīdaṃ tac ca kāryaṃ mahat smṛtam
c stutyartham iha devānāṃ vedāḥ sṛṣṭāḥ svayaṃbhuvā
a yo nirvadeta saṃmohād brāhmaṇaṃ vedapāragam
c so 'padhyānād brāhmaṇasya parābhūyād asaṃśayam
a yaś cādharmeṇa vibrūyād yaś cādharmeṇa pṛcchati
c tayor anyataraḥ praiti vidveṣaṃ vādhigacchati
a etad vaḥ sarvam ākhyātaṃ svādhyāyasya vidhiṃ prati
c upakuryāc ca śiṣyāṇām etac ca hṛdi vo bhavet
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etac chrutvā guror vākyaṃ vyāsaśiṣyā mahaujasaḥ
c anyonyaṃ hṛṣṭamanasaḥ pariṣasvajire tadā
a uktāḥ smo yad bhagavatā tadātvāyatisaṃhitam
c tan no manasi saṃrūḍhaṃ kariṣyāmas tathā ca tat
a anyonyaṃ ca sabhājyaivaṃ suprītamanasaḥ punaḥ
c vijñāpayanti sma guruṃ punar vākyaviśāradāḥ
a śailād asmān mahīṃ gantuṃ kāṅkṣitaṃ no mahāmune
c vedān anekadhā kartuṃ yadi te rucitaṃ vibho
a śiṣyāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥ
c pratyuvāca tato vākyaṃ dharmārthasahitaṃ hitam
a kṣitiṃ vā devalokaṃ vā gamyatāṃ yadi rocate
c apramādaś ca vaḥ kāryo brahma hi pracuracchalam
a te 'nujñātās tataḥ sarve guruṇā satyavādinā
c jagmuḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā vyāsaṃ mūrdhnābhivādya ca
a avatīrya mahīṃ te 'tha cāturhotram akalpayan
c saṃyājayanto viprāṃś ca rājanyāṃś ca viśas tathā
a pūjyamānā dvijair nityaṃ modamānā gṛhe ratāḥ
c yājanādhyāpanaratāḥ śrīmanto lokaviśrutāḥ
a avatīrṇeṣu śiṣyeṣu vyāsaḥ putrasahāyavān
c tūṣṇīṃ dhyānaparo dhīmān ekānte samupāviśat
a taṃ dadarśāśramapade nāradaḥ sumahātapāḥ
c athainam abravīt kāle madhurākṣarayā girā
a bho bho maharṣe vāsiṣṭha brahmaghoṣo na vartate
c eko dhyānaparas tūṣṇīṃ kim āsse cintayann iva
a brahmaghoṣair virahitaḥ parvato 'yaṃ na śobhate
c rajasā tamasā caiva somaḥ sopaplavo yathā
a na bhrājate yathāpūrvaṃ niṣādānām ivālayaḥ
c devarṣigaṇajuṣṭo 'pi vedadhvaninirākṛtaḥ
a ṛṣayaś ca hi devāś ca gandharvāś ca mahaujasaḥ
c vimuktā brahmaghoṣeṇa na bhrājante yathā purā
a nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā kṛṣṇadvaipāyano 'bravīt
c maharṣe yat tvayā proktaṃ vedavādavicakṣaṇa
a etan manonukūlaṃ me bhavān arhati bhāṣitum
c sarvajñaḥ sarvadarśī ca sarvatra ca kutūhalī
a triṣu lokeṣu yad vṛttaṃ sarvaṃ tava mate sthitam
c tad ājñāpaya viprarṣe brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te
a yan mayā samanuṣṭheyaṃ brahmarṣe tad udāhara
c viyuktasyeha śiṣyair me nātihṛṣṭam idaṃ manaḥ
 nārada uvāca
a anāmnāyamalā vedā brāhmaṇasyāvrataṃ malam
c malaṃ pṛthivyā vāhīkāḥ strīṇāṃ kautūhalaṃ malam
a adhīyatāṃ bhavān vedān sārdhaṃ putreṇa dhīmatā
c vidhunvan brahmaghoṣeṇa rakṣobhayakṛtaṃ tamaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā vyāsaḥ paramadharmavit
c tathety uvāca saṃhṛṣṭo vedābhyāse dṛḍhavrataḥ
d uvāca ca mahāprājñaṃ nāradaṃ punar eva hi
d malaṃ pṛthivyā bāhlīkā ity uktam adhunā tvayā
d nārada uvāca
d kīdṛśāś caiva bāhlīkā brūhi me vadatāṃ vara
d asyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ catvāro deśāḥ pāpajanair vṛtāḥ
d yugaṃdharas tu prathamas tathā bhūtilakaḥ smṛtaḥ
d acyutacchala ity uktas tṛtīyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ
d caturthas tu mahāpāpo bāhlīka iti saṃjñitaḥ
d mṛgoṣṭragardabhakṣīraṃ pibanty asya yugaṃdhare
d ekavarṇās tu dṛśyante janā vai hy acyutasthale
d mehanti ca malaṃ pāpā visṛjanti jaleṣu vai
d nityaṃ bhūtilake 'tyannaṃ taj jalaṃ ca pibanti ca
d haribāhyās tu vāhīkā na smaranti hariṃ kva cit
d aihalaukikamokṣaṃ te māṃsaśoṇitavardhanāḥ
d vṛthā jātā bhaviṣyanti bāhlīkā iti viśrutāḥ
d puṣkarāhāraniratāḥ piśācā yad abhāṣata
d musuṇṭhīṃ parigṛhyogrāṃ tac chṛṇuṣva mahāmune
d brāhmaṇīṃ bahuputrāṃ tāṃ puṣkare snātum āgatām
d yugaṃdhare payaḥ pītvā hy ucitā hy acyutasthale
d tathā bhūtilake snātvā bāhlīkāṃś ca nirīkṣya vai
d āgatāsi tathā snātuṃ kathaṃ svargaṃ na gacchasi
d ity uktvā brāhmaṇībhāṇḍaṃ pothayitvā musuṇṭhinā
d uvāca krodhatāmrākṣī piśācī tīrthapālikā
d etat tu te divā vṛttaṃ rātrau vṛttam athānyathā
d gaccha bāhlīkasaṃsargād aśucitvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d yad dviṣanti mahātmānaṃ na smaranti janārdanam
d na teṣāṃ puṇyatīrtheṣu gatiḥ saṃsargiṇām api
d udyuktā brāhmaṇī bhītā pratiyātā sutaiḥ saha
d svadehasthā jajāpaivaṃ saputrā dhyānatatparā
d anantasya hareḥ śuddhaṃ nāma vai dvādaśākṣaram
d vatsaratritaye pūrṇe brāhmaṇī punar āgatā
d saputrā puṣkaradvāraṃ piśācy āha tathāgatam
d namas te brāhmaṇi śubhe pūtāhaṃ tava darśanāt
d kuru tīrthābhiṣekaṃ ca saputrā pāpavarjitā
d harer nāmnā ca māṃ sādhvī jalena spraṣṭum arhasi
d ity uktā brāhmaṇī hṛṣṭā putraiḥ saha śubhavratā
d jalena prokṣayām āsa dvādaśākṣarasaṃyutam
d tatkṣaṇād abhavac chuddhā piśācī divyarūpiṇī
d apsarā hy abhavad divyā gatā svarlokam uttamam
d brāhmaṇī caiva kālena vāsudevaparāyaṇā
d saputrā cāgatā sthānam acyutasya paraṃ śubham
d etat te kathitaṃ vidvan mune kālo 'yam āgataḥ
d gamiṣye 'haṃ mahāprājña āgamiṣyāmi vai punaḥ
d ity uktvā sa jagāmātha nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ
d dvaipāyanas tu bhagavāṃs tac chrutvā munisattamāt
a śukena saha putreṇa vedābhyāsam athākarot
c svareṇoccaiḥ sa śaikṣeṇa lokān āpūrayann iva
a tayor abhyasator evaṃ nānādharmapravādinoḥ
c vāto 'timātraṃ pravavau samudrānilavejitaḥ
a tato 'nadhyāya iti taṃ vyāsaḥ putram avārayat
c śuko vāritamātras tu kautūhalasamanvitaḥ
a apṛcchat pitaraṃ brahman kuto vāyur abhūd ayam
c ākhyātum arhati bhavān vāyoḥ sarvaṃ viceṣṭitam
a śukasyaitad vacaḥ śrutvā vyāsaḥ paramavismitaḥ
c anadhyāyanimitte 'sminn idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a divyaṃ te cakṣur utpannaṃ svasthaṃ te nirmalaṃ manaḥ
c tamasā rajasā cāpi tyaktaḥ sattve vyavasthitaḥ
a ādarśe svām iva chāyāṃ paśyasy ātmānam ātmanā
c nyasyātmani svayaṃ vedān buddhyā samanucintaya
a devayānacaro viṣṇoḥ pitṛyānaś ca tāmasaḥ
c dvāv etau pretya panthānau divaṃ cādhaś ca gacchataḥ
a pṛthivyām antarikṣe ca yatra saṃvānti vāyavaḥ
c saptaite vāyumārgā vai tān nibodhānupūrvaśaḥ
a tatra devagaṇāḥ sādhyāḥ samabhūvan mahābalāḥ
c teṣām apy abhavat putraḥ samāno nāma durjayaḥ
a udānas tasya putro 'bhūd vyānas tasyābhavat sutaḥ
c apānaś ca tato jñeyaḥ prāṇaś cāpi tataḥ param
a anapatyo 'bhavat prāṇo durdharṣaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
c pṛthak karmāṇi teṣāṃ tu pravakṣyāmi yathātatham
a prāṇināṃ sarvato vāyuś ceṣṭā vartayate pṛthak
c prāṇanāc caiva bhūtānāṃ prāṇa ity abhidhīyate
a prerayaty abhrasaṃghātān dhūmajāṃś coṣmajāṃś ca yaḥ
c prathamaḥ prathame mārge pravaho nāma so 'nilaḥ
a ambare sneham abhrebhyas taḍidbhyaś cottamadyutiḥ
c āvaho nāma saṃvāti dvitīyaḥ śvasano nadan
a udayaṃ jyotiṣāṃ śaśvat somādīnāṃ karoti yaḥ
c antardeheṣu codānaṃ yaṃ vadanti maharṣayaḥ
a yaś caturbhyaḥ samudrebhyo vāyur dhārayate jalam
c uddhṛtyādadate cāpo jīmūtebhyo 'mbare 'nilaḥ
a yo 'dbhiḥ saṃyojya jīmūtān parjanyāya prayacchati
c udvaho nāma varṣiṣṭhas tritīyaḥ sa sadāgatiḥ
a samuhyamānā bahudhā yena nīlāḥ pṛthag ghanāḥ
c varṣamokṣakṛtārambhās te bhavanti ghanāghanāḥ
a saṃhatā yena cāviddhā bhavanti nadatāṃ nadāḥ
c rakṣaṇārthāya saṃbhūtā meghatvam upayānti ca
a yo 'sau vahati devānāṃ vimānāni vihāyasā
c caturthaḥ saṃvaho nāma vāyuḥ sa girimardanaḥ
a yena vegavatā rugṇā rūkṣeṇārujatā rasān
c vāyunā vihatā meghā na bhavanti balāhakāḥ
a dāruṇotpātasaṃcāro nabhasaḥ stanayitnumān
c pañcamaḥ sa mahāvego vivaho nāma mārutaḥ
a yasmin pāriplave divyā vahanty āpo vihāyasā
c puṇyaṃ cākāśagaṅgāyās toyaṃ viṣṭabhya tiṣṭhati
a dūrāt pratihato yasminn ekaraśmir divākaraḥ
c yonir aṃśusahasrasya yena bhāti vasuṃdharā
a yasmād āpyāyate somo nidhir divyo 'mṛtasya ca
c ṣaṣṭhaḥ parivaho nāma sa vāyur javatāṃ varaḥ
a sarvaprāṇabhṛtāṃ prāṇān yo 'ntakāle nirasyati
c yasya vartmānuvartete mṛtyuvaivasvatāv ubhau
a samyag anvīkṣatāṃ buddhyā śāntayādhyātmanityayā
c dhyānābhyāsābhirāmāṇāṃ yo 'mṛtatvāya kalpate
a yaṃ samāsādya vegena diśām antaṃ prapedire
c dakṣasya daśa putrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi prajāpateḥ
a yena sṛṣṭaḥ parābhūto yāty eva na nivartate
c parāvaho nāma paro vāyuḥ sa duratikramaḥ
a evam ete 'diteḥ putrā mārutāḥ paramādbhutāḥ
c anāramantaḥ saṃvānti sarvagāḥ sarvadhāriṇaḥ
a etat tu mahad āścaryaṃ yad ayaṃ parvatottamaḥ
c kampitaḥ sahasā tena vāyunābhipravāyatā
a viṣṇor niḥśvāsavāto 'yaṃ yadā vegasamīritaḥ
c sahasodīryate tāta jagat pravyathate tadā
a tasmād brahmavido brahma nādhīyante 'tivāyati
c vāyor vāyubhayaṃ hy uktaṃ brahma tat pīḍitaṃ bhavet
a etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥ
c uktvā putram adhīṣveti vyomagaṅgām ayāt tadā
 bhīṣma uvāca
a etasminn antare śūnye nāradaḥ samupāgamat
c śukaṃ svādhyāyanirataṃ vedārthān vaktum īpsitān
d mokṣopāyān bahuvidhāñ śukasyādeṣṭum īpsitān
a devarṣiṃ tu śuko dṛṣṭvā nāradaṃ samupasthitam
c arghyapūrveṇa vidhinā vedoktenābhyapūjayat
a nārado 'thābravīt prīto brūhi brahmavidāṃ vara
c kena tvāṃ śreyasā tāta yojayāmīti hṛṣṭavat
a nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā śukaḥ provāca bhārata
c asmiṃl loke hitaṃ yat syāt tena māṃ yoktum arhasi
 nārada uvāca
a tattvaṃ jijñāsatāṃ pūrvam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
c sanatkumāro bhagavān idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a nāsti vidyāsamaṃ cakṣur nāsti vidyāsamaṃ tapaḥ
c nāsti rāgasamaṃ duḥkhaṃ nāsti tyāgasamaṃ sukham
a nivṛttiḥ karmaṇaḥ pāpāt satataṃ puṇyaśīlatā
c sadvṛttiḥ samudācāraḥ śreya etad anuttamam
a mānuṣyam asukhaṃ prāpya yaḥ sajjati sa muhyati
c nālaṃ sa duḥkhamokṣāya saṅgo vai duḥkhalakṣaṇam
a saktasya buddhiś calati mohajālavivardhinī
c mohajālāvṛto duḥkham iha cāmutra cāśnute
a sarvopāyena kāmasya krodhasya ca vinigrahaḥ
c kāryaḥ śreyorthinā tau hi śreyoghātārtham udyatau
a nityaṃ krodhāt tapo rakṣec chriyaṃ rakṣeta matsarāt
c vidyāṃ mānāvamānābhyām ātmānaṃ tu pramādataḥ
a ānṛśaṃsyaṃ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṃ balam
c ātmajñānaṃ paraṃ jñānaṃ na satyād vidyate param
a satyasya vacanaṃ śreyaḥ satyād api hitaṃ bhavet
c yad bhūtahitam atyantam etat satyaṃ mataṃ mama
a sarvārambhaphalatyāgī nirāśīr niṣparigrahaḥ
c yena sarvaṃ parityaktaṃ sa vidvān sa ca paṇḍitaḥ
a indriyair indriyārthebhyaś caraty ātmavaśair iha
c asajjamānaḥ śāntātmā nirvikāraḥ samāhitaḥ
a ātmabhūtair atadbhūtaḥ saha caiva vinaiva ca
c sa vimuktaḥ paraṃ śreyo nacireṇādhigacchati
a adarśanam asaṃsparśas tathāsaṃbhāṣaṇaṃ sadā
c yasya bhūtaiḥ saha mune sa śreyo vindate param
a na hiṃsyāt sarvabhūtāni maitrāyaṇagataś caret
c nedaṃ janma samāsādya vairaṃ kurvīta kena cit
a ākiṃcanyaṃ susaṃtoṣo nirāśīṣṭvam acāpalam
c etad āhuḥ paraṃ śreya ātmajñasya jitātmanaḥ
a parigrahaṃ parityajya bhava tāta jitendriyaḥ
c aśokaṃ sthānam ātiṣṭha iha cāmutra cābhayam
a nirāmiṣā na śocanti tyajehāmiṣam ātmanaḥ
c parityajyāmiṣaṃ saumya duḥkhatāpād vimokṣyase
a taponityena dāntena muninā saṃyatātmanā
c ajitaṃ jetukāmena bhāvyaṃ saṅgeṣv asaṅginā
a guṇasaṅgeṣv anāsakta ekacaryārataḥ sadā
c brāhmaṇe nacirād eva sukham āyāty anuttamam
a dvaṃdvārāmeṣu bhūteṣu ya eko ramate muniḥ
c viddhi prajñānatṛptaṃ taṃ jñānatṛpto na śocati
a śubhair labhati devatvaṃ vyāmiśrair janma mānuṣam
c aśubhaiś cāpy adhojanma karmabhir labhate 'vaśaḥ
a tatra mṛtyujarāduḥkhaiḥ satataṃ samabhidrutaḥ
c saṃsāre pacyate jantus tat kathaṃ nāvabudhyase
a ahite hitasaṃjñas tvam adhruve dhruvasaṃjñakaḥ
c anarthe cārthasaṃjñas tvaṃ kimarthaṃ nāvabudhyase
a saṃveṣṭyamānaṃ bahubhir mohatantubhir ātmajaiḥ
c kośakāravad ātmānaṃ veṣṭayan nāvabudhyase
a alaṃ parigraheṇeha doṣavān hi parigrahaḥ
c kṛmir hi kośakāras tu badhyate svaparigrahāt
a putradārakuṭumbeṣu saktāḥ sīdanti jantavaḥ
c saraḥpaṅkārṇave magnā jīrṇā vanagajā iva
a mahājālasamākṛṣṭān sthale matsyān ivoddhṛtān
c snehajālasamākṛṣṭān paśya jantūn suduḥkhitān
a kuṭumbaṃ putradāraṃ ca śarīraṃ dravyasaṃcayāḥ
c pārakyam adhruvaṃ sarvaṃ kiṃ svaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtam
a yadā sarvaṃ parityajya gantavyam avaśena te
c anarthe kiṃ prasaktas tvaṃ svam arthaṃ nānutiṣṭhasi
a aviśrāntam anālambam apātheyam adaiśikam
c tamaḥkāntāram adhvānaṃ katham eko gamiṣyasi
a na hi tvā prasthitaṃ kaś cit pṛṣṭhato 'nugamiṣyati
c sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ ca tvā yāsyantam anuyāsyati
a vidyā karma ca śauryaṃ ca jñānaṃ ca bahuvistaram
c arthārtham anusāryante siddhārthas tu vimucyate
a nibandhanī rajjur eṣā yā grāme vasato ratiḥ
c chittvaināṃ sukṛto yānti naināṃ chindanti duṣkṛtaḥ
d tulyajātivayorūpān hutān paśyasi mṛtyunā
d na ca nāmāsti nirvedo lauhaṃ hi hṛdayaṃ tava
a rūpakūlāṃ manaḥsrotāṃ sparśadvīpāṃ rasāvahām
c gandhapaṅkāṃ śabdajalāṃ svargamārgadurāvahām
a kṣamāritrāṃ satyamayīṃ dharmasthairyavaṭākarām
c tyāgavātādhvagāṃ śīghrāṃ buddhināvā nadīṃ taret
a tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja
c ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi taṃ tyaja
a tyaja dharmam asaṃkalpād adharmaṃ cāpy ahiṃsayā
c ubhe satyānṛte buddhyā buddhiṃ paramaniścayāt
a asthisthūṇaṃ snāyuyutaṃ māṃsaśoṇitalepanam
c carmāvanaddhaṃ durgandhi pūrṇaṃ mūtrapurīṣayoḥ
a jarāśokasamāviṣṭaṃ rogāyatanam āturam
c rajasvalam anityaṃ ca bhūtāvāsaṃ samutsṛja
a idaṃ viśvaṃ jagat sarvam ajagac cāpi yad bhavet
c mahābhūtātmakaṃ sarvaṃ mahad yat paramāṇu yat
d mahābhūtāni khaṃ vāyur agnir āpas tathā mahī
d ṣaṣṭhas tu cetanā yā tu ātmā saptama ucyate
d aṣṭamaṃ tu mano jñeyaṃ buddhis tu navamī smṛtā
a indriyāṇi ca pañcaiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā
c ity eṣa saptadaśako rāśir avyaktasaṃjñakaḥ
a sarvair ihendriyārthaiś ca vyaktāvyaktair hi saṃhitaḥ
c pañcaviṃśaka ity eṣa vyaktāvyaktamayo guṇaḥ
a etaiḥ sarvaiḥ samāyuktaḥ pumān ity abhidhīyate
c trivargo 'tra sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvitaṃ maraṇaṃ tathā
a ya idaṃ veda tattvena sa veda prabhavāpyayau
c pārāśaryeha boddhavyaṃ jñānānāṃ yac ca kiṃ cana
a indriyair gṛhyate yad yat tat tad vyaktam iti sthitiḥ
c avyaktam iti vijñeyaṃ liṅgagrāhyam atīndriyam
a indriyair niyatair dehī dhārābhir iva tarpyate
c loke vitatam ātmānaṃ lokaṃ cātmani paśyati
a parāvaradṛśaḥ śaktir jñānavelāṃ na paśyati
c paśyataḥ sarvabhūtāni sarvāvasthāsu sarvadā
a brahmabhūtasya saṃyogo nāśubhenopapadyate
c jñānena vividhān kleśān ativṛttasya mohajān
e loke buddhiprakāśena lokamārgo na riṣyate
a anādinidhanaṃ jantum ātmani sthitam avyayam
c akartāram amūrtaṃ ca bhagavān āha tīrthavit
a yo jantuḥ svakṛtais tais taiḥ karmabhir nityaduḥkhitaḥ
c sa duḥkhapratighātārthaṃ hanti jantūn anekadhā
a tataḥ karma samādatte punar anyan navaṃ bahu
c tapyate 'tha punas tena bhuktvāpathyam ivāturaḥ
a ajasram eva mohārto duḥkheṣu sukhasaṃjñitaḥ
c badhyate mathyate caiva karmabhir manthavat sadā
a tato nivṛtto bandhāt svāt karmaṇām udayād iha
c paribhramati saṃsāraṃ cakravad bahuvedanaḥ
a sa tvaṃ nivṛttabandhas tu nivṛttaś cāpi karmataḥ
c sarvavit sarvajit siddho bhava bhāvavivarjitaḥ
a saṃyamena navaṃ bandhaṃ nivartya tapaso balāt
c saṃprāptā bahavaḥ siddhim apy abādhāṃ sukhodayām
 nārada uvāca
a aśokaṃ śokanāśārthaṃ śāstraṃ śāntikaraṃ śivam
c niśamya labhate buddhiṃ tāṃ labdhvā sukham edhate
a śokasthānasahasrāṇi bhayasthānaśatāni ca
c divase divase mūḍham āviśanti na paṇḍitam
a tasmād aniṣṭanāśārtham itihāsaṃ nibodha me
c tiṣṭhate ced vaśe buddhir labhate śokanāśanam
a aniṣṭasaṃprayogāc ca viprayogāt priyasya ca
c manuṣyā mānasair duḥkhair yujyante alpabuddhayaḥ
a dravyeṣu samatīteṣu ye guṇās tān na cintayet
c tān anādriyamāṇasya snehabandhaḥ pramucyate
a doṣadarśī bhavet tatra yatra rāgaḥ pravartate
c aniṣṭavad dhitaṃ paśyet tathā kṣipraṃ virajyate
a nārtho na dharmo na yaśo yo 'tītam anuśocati
c apy abhāvena yujyeta tac cāsya na nivartate
a guṇair bhūtāni yujyante viyujyante tathaiva ca
c sarvāṇi naitad ekasya śokasthānaṃ hi vidyate
a mṛtaṃ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṃ yo 'tītam anuśocati
c duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṃ dvāv anarthau prapadyate
a nāśru kurvanti ye buddhyā dṛṣṭvā lokeṣu saṃtatim
c samyak prapaśyataḥ sarvaṃ nāśrukarmopapadyate
a duḥkhopaghāte śārīre mānase vāpy upasthite
c yasmin na śakyate kartuṃ yatnas tan nānucintayet
a bhaiṣajyam etad duḥkhasya yad etan nānucintayet
c cintyamānaṃ hi na vyeti bhūyaś cāpi pravardhate
a prajñayā mānasaṃ duḥkhaṃ hanyāc chārīram auṣadhaiḥ
c etad vijñānasāmarthyaṃ na bālaiḥ samatām iyāt
a anityaṃ yauvanaṃ rūpaṃ jīvitaṃ dravyasaṃcayaḥ
c ārogyaṃ priyasaṃvāso gṛdhyet tatra na paṇḍitaḥ
a na jānapadikaṃ duḥkham ekaḥ śocitum arhati
c aśocan pratikurvīta yadi paśyed upakramam
a sukhād bahutaraṃ duḥkhaṃ jīvite nātra saṃśayaḥ
c snigdhatvaṃ cendriyārtheṣu mohān maraṇam apriyam
a parityajati yo duḥkhaṃ sukhaṃ vāpy ubhayaṃ naraḥ
c abhyeti brahma so 'tyantaṃ na taṃ śocanti paṇḍitāḥ
a duḥkham arthā hi tyajyante pālane na ca te sukhāḥ
c duḥkhena cādhigamyante nāśam eṣāṃ na cintayet
a anyām anyāṃ dhanāvasthāṃ prāpya vaiśeṣikīṃ narāḥ
c atṛptā yānti vidhvaṃsaṃ saṃtoṣaṃ yānti paṇḍitāḥ
a sarve kṣayāntā nicayāḥ patanāntāḥ samucchrayāḥ
c saṃyogā viprayogāntā maraṇāntaṃ hi jīvitam
a anto nāsti pipāsāyās tuṣṭis tu paramaṃ sukham
c tasmāt saṃtoṣam eveha dhanaṃ paśyanti paṇḍitāḥ
a nimeṣamātram api hi vayo gacchan na tiṣṭhati
c svaśarīreṣv anityeṣu nityaṃ kim anucintayet
a bhūteṣv abhāvaṃ saṃcintya ye buddhvā tamasaḥ param
c na śocanti gatādhvānaḥ paśyantaḥ paramāṃ gatim
a saṃcinvānakam evainaṃ kāmānām avitṛptakam
c vyāghraḥ paśum ivāsādya mṛtyur ādāya gacchati
a athāpy upāyaṃ saṃpaśyed duḥkhasya parimokṣaṇe
c aśocann ārabhetaiva yuktaś cāvyasanī bhavet
a śabde sparśe ca rūpe ca gandheṣu ca raseṣu ca
c nopabhogāt paraṃ kiṃ cid dhanino vādhanasya vā
a prāk saṃprayogād bhūtānāṃ nāsti duḥkham anāmayam
c viprayogāt tu sarvasya na śocet prakṛtisthitaḥ
a dhṛtyā śiśnodaraṃ rakṣet pāṇipādaṃ ca cakṣuṣā
c cakṣuḥśrotre ca manasā mano vācaṃ ca vidyayā
a praṇayaṃ pratisaṃhṛtya saṃstuteṣv itareṣu ca
c vicared asamunnaddhaḥ sa sukhī sa ca paṇḍitaḥ
a adhyātmaratir āsīno nirapekṣo nirāmiṣaḥ
c ātmanaiva sahāyena yaś caret sa sukhī bhavet
 nārada uvāca
a sukhaduḥkhaviparyāso yadā samupapadyate
c nainaṃ prajñā sunītaṃ vā trāyate nāpi pauruṣam
a svabhāvād yatnam ātiṣṭhed yatnavān nāvasīdati
c jarāmaraṇarogebhyaḥ priyam ātmānam uddharet
a rujanti hi śarīrāṇi rogāḥ śārīramānasāḥ
c sāyakā iva tīkṣṇāgrāḥ prayuktā dṛḍhadhanvibhiḥ
a vyādhitasya vivitsābhis trasyato jīvitaiṣiṇaḥ
c avaśasya vināśāya śarīram apakṛṣyate
a sravanti na nivartante srotāṃsi saritām iva
c āyur ādāya martyānāṃ rātryahāni punaḥ punaḥ
a vyatyayo hy ayam atyantaṃ pakṣayoḥ śuklakṛṣṇayoḥ
c jātaṃ martyaṃ jarayati nimeṣaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate
a sukhaduḥkhāni bhūtānām ajaro jarayann asau
c ādityo hy astam abhyeti punaḥ punar udeti ca
a adṛṣṭapūrvān ādāya bhāvān apariśaṅkitān
c iṣṭāniṣṭān manuṣyāṇām astaṃ gacchanti rātrayaḥ
a yo yam icched yathākāmaṃ kāmānāṃ tat tad āpnuyāt
c yadi syān na parādhīnaṃ puruṣasya kriyāphalam
a saṃyatāś ca hi dakṣāś ca matimantaś ca mānavāḥ
c dṛśyante niṣphalāḥ santaḥ prahīṇāś ca svakarmabhiḥ
a apare bāliśāḥ santo nirguṇāḥ puruṣādhamāḥ
c āśīrbhir apy asaṃyuktā dṛśyante sarvakāminaḥ
a bhūtānām aparaḥ kaś cid dhiṃsāyāṃ satatotthitaḥ
c vañcanāyāṃ ca lokasya sa sukheṣv eva jīryate
a aceṣṭamānam āsīnaṃ śrīḥ kaṃ cid upatiṣṭhati
c kaś cit karmānusṛtyānyo na prāpyam adhigacchati
a aparādhaṃ samācakṣva puruṣasya svabhāvataḥ
c śukram anyatra saṃbhūtaṃ punar anyatra gacchati
a tasya yonau prasaktasya garbho bhavati vā na vā
c āmrapuṣpopamā yasya nivṛttir upalabhyate
a keṣāṃ cit putrakāmānām anusaṃtānam icchatām
c siddhau prayatamānānāṃ naivāṇḍam upajāyate
a garbhāc codvijamānānāṃ kruddhād āśīviṣād iva
c āyuṣmāñ jāyate putraḥ kathaṃ pretaḥ pitaiva saḥ
a devān iṣṭvā tapas taptvā kṛpaṇaiḥ putragṛddhibhiḥ
c daśa māsān paridhṛtā jāyante kulapāṃsanāḥ
a apare dhanadhānyāni bhogāṃś ca pitṛsaṃcitān
c vipulān abhijāyante labdhās tair eva maṅgalaiḥ
a anyonyaṃ samabhipretya maithunasya samāgame
c upadrava ivāviṣṭo yoniṃ garbhaḥ prapadyate
a śīrṇaṃ paraśarīreṇa nicchavīkaṃ śarīriṇam
c prāṇināṃ prāṇasaṃrodhe māṃsaśleṣmaviceṣṭitam
a nirdagdhaṃ paradehena paradehaṃ calācalam
c vinaśyantaṃ vināśānte nāvi nāvam ivāhitam
a saṃgatyā jaṭhare nyastaṃ retobindum acetanam
c kena yatnena jīvantaṃ garbhaṃ tvam iha paśyasi
a annapānāni jīryante yatra bhakṣāś ca bhakṣitāḥ
c tasminn evodare garbhaḥ kiṃ nānnam iva jīryate
a garbhamūtrapurīṣāṇāṃ svabhāvaniyatā gatiḥ
c dhāraṇe vā visarge vā na kartur vidyate vaśaḥ
a sravanti hy udarād garbhā jāyamānās tathāpare
c āgamena sahānyeṣāṃ vināśa upapadyate
a etasmād yonisaṃbandhād yo jīvan parimucyate
c prajāṃ ca labhate kāṃ cit punar dvaṃdveṣu majjati
a śatasya sahajātasya saptamīṃ daśamīṃ daśām
c prāpnuvanti tataḥ pañca na bhavanti śatāyuṣaḥ
a nābhyutthāne manuṣyāṇāṃ yogāḥ syur nātra saṃśayaḥ
c vyādhibhiś ca vimathyante vyālaiḥ kṣudramṛgā iva
a vyādhibhir bhakṣyamāṇānāṃ tyajatāṃ vipulaṃ dhanam
c vedanāṃ nāpakarṣanti yatamānāś cikitsakāḥ
a te cāpi nipuṇā vaidyāḥ kuśalāḥ saṃbhṛtauṣadhāḥ
c vyādhibhiḥ parikṛṣyante mṛgā vyādhair ivārditāḥ
a te pibantaḥ kaṣāyāṃś ca sarpīṃṣi vividhāni ca
c dṛśyante jarayā bhagnā nāgā nāgair ivottamaiḥ
a ke vā bhuvi cikitsante rogārtān mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ
c śvāpadāni daridrāṃś ca prāyo nārtā bhavanti te
a ghorān api durādharṣān nṛpatīn ugratejasaḥ
c ākramya roga ādatte paśūn paśupaco yathā
a iti lokam anākrandaṃ mohaśokapariplutam
c srotasā sahasā kṣiptaṃ hriyamāṇaṃ balīyasā
a na dhanena na rājyena nogreṇa tapasā tathā
c svabhāvā vyativartante ye niyuktāḥ śarīriṣu
a na mriyeran na jīryeran sarve syuḥ sarvakāmikāḥ
c nāpriyaṃ pratipaśyeyur utthānasya phalaṃ prati
a upary upari lokasya sarvo bhavitum icchati
c yatate ca yathāśakti na ca tad vartate tathā
a aiśvaryamadamattāṃś ca mattān madyamadena ca
c apramattāḥ śaṭhāḥ krūrā vikrāntāḥ paryupāsate
a kleśāḥ pratinivartante keṣāṃ cid asamīkṣitāḥ
c svaṃ svaṃ ca punar anyeṣāṃ na kiṃ cid abhigamyate
a mahac ca phalavaiṣamyaṃ dṛśyate karmasaṃdhiṣu
c vahanti śibikām anye yānty anye śibikāgatāḥ
a sarveṣām ṛddhikāmānām anye rathapuraḥsarāḥ
c manujāś ca śatastrīkāḥ śataśo vidhavāḥ striyaḥ
a dvaṃdvārāmeṣu bhūteṣu gacchanty ekaikaśo narāḥ
c idam anyat paraṃ paśya mātra mohaṃ kariṣyasi
a tyaja dharmam adharmaṃ ca ubhe satyānṛte tyaja
c ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā yena tyajasi taṃ tyaja
a etat te paramaṃ guhyam ākhyātam ṛṣisattama
c yena devāḥ parityajya martyalokaṃ divaṃ gatāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā śukaḥ paramabuddhimān
c saṃcintya manasā dhīro niścayaṃ nādhyagacchata
a putradārair mahān kleśo vidyāmnāye mahāñ śramaḥ
c kiṃ nu syāc chāśvataṃ sthānam alpakleśaṃ mahodayam
a tato muhūrtaṃ saṃcintya niścitāṃ gatim ātmanaḥ
c parāvarajño dharmasya parāṃ naiḥśreyasīṃ gatim
a kathaṃ tv aham asaṃkliṣṭo gaccheyaṃ paramāṃ gatim
c nāvarteyaṃ yathā bhūyo yonisaṃsārasāgare
a paraṃ bhāvaṃ hi kāṅkṣāmi yatra nāvartate punaḥ
c sarvasaṅgān parityajya niścitāṃ manaso gatim
a tatra yāsyāmi yatrātmā śamaṃ me 'dhigamiṣyati
c akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva yatra sthāsyāmi śāśvataḥ
a na tu yogam ṛte śakyā prāptuṃ sā paramā gatiḥ
c avabandho hi muktasya karmabhir nopapadyate
a tasmād yogaṃ samāsthāya tyaktvā gṛhakalevaram
c vāyubhūtaḥ pravekṣyāmi tejorāśiṃ divākaram
a na hy eṣa kṣayam āpnoti somaḥ suragaṇair yathā
c kampitaḥ patate bhūmiṃ punaś caivādhirohati
e kṣīyate hi sadā somaḥ punaś caivābhipūryate
f necchāmy evaṃ viditvaite hrāsavṛddhī punaḥ punaḥ
a ravis tu saṃtāpayati lokān raśmibhir ulbaṇaiḥ
c sarvatas teja ādatte nityam akṣayamaṇḍalaḥ
a ato me rocate gantum ādityaṃ dīptatejasam
c atra vatsyāmi durdharṣo niḥsaṅgenāntarātmanā
d sūryasya tapataś cāhaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
a sūryasya sadane cāhaṃ nikṣipyedaṃ kalevaram
c ṛṣibhiḥ saha yāsyāmi sauraṃ tejo 'tiduḥsaham
a āpṛcchāmi nagān nāgān girīn urvīṃ diśo divam
c devadānavagandharvān piśācoragarākṣasān
a lokeṣu sarvabhūtāni pravekṣyāmi nasaṃśayaḥ
c paśyantu yogavīryaṃ me sarve devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
a athānujñāpya tam ṛṣiṃ nāradaṃ lokaviśrutam
c tasmād anujñāṃ saṃprāpya jagāma pitaraṃ prati
a so 'bhivādya mahātmānam ṛṣiṃ dvaipāyanaṃ munim
c śukaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya kṛṣṇam āpṛṣṭavān muniḥ
a śrutvā ṛṣis tad vacanaṃ śukasya
prīto mahātmā punar āha cainam
c bho bhoḥ putra sthīyatāṃ tāvad adya
yāvac cakṣuḥ prīṇayāmi tvadartham
d evam uktaḥ pitus tena snehayuktena cetasā
d naivecchām akarot tasya niḥsaṅgenāntarātmanā
a nirapekṣaḥ śuko bhūtvā niḥsneho muktabandhanaḥ
c mokṣam evānusaṃcintya gamanāya mano dadhe
e pitaraṃ saṃparityajya jagāma dvijasattamaḥ
f kailāsapṛṣṭhaṃ vipulaṃ siddhasaṃghair niṣevitam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a giripṛṣṭhaṃ samāruhya suto vyāsasya bhārata
c same deśe vivikte ca niḥśalāka upāviśat
a dhārayām āsa cātmānaṃ yathāśāstraṃ mahāmuniḥ
c pādāt prabhṛtigātreṣu krameṇa kramayogavit
a tataḥ sa prāṅmukho vidvān āditye nacirodite
c pāṇipādaṃ samādhāya vinītavad upāviśat
a na tatra pakṣisaṃghāto na śabdo nāpi darśanam
c yatra vaiyāsakir dhīmān yoktuṃ samupacakrame
a sa dadarśa tadātmānaṃ sarvasaṅgaviniḥsṛtam
c prajahāsa tato hāsaṃ śukaḥ saṃprekṣya bhāskaram
a sa punar yogam āsthāya mokṣamārgopalabdhaye
c mahāyogīśvaro bhūtvā so 'tyakrāmad vihāyasam
a tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā devarṣiṃ nāradaṃ tadā
c nivedayām āsa tadā svaṃ yogaṃ paramarṣaye
a dṛṣṭo mārgaḥ pravṛtto 'smi svasti te 'stu tapodhana
c tvatprasādād gamiṣyāmi gatim iṣṭāṃ mahādyute
a nāradenābhyanujñātas tato dvaipāyanātmajaḥ
c abhivādya punar yogam āsthāyākāśam āviśat
a kailāsapṛṣṭhād utpatya sa papāta divaṃ tadā
c antarikṣacaraḥ śrīmān vyāsaputraḥ suniścitaḥ
a tam udyantaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ vainateyasamadyutim
c dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni manomārutaraṃhasam
a vyavasāyena lokāṃs trīn sarvān so 'tha vicintayan
c āsthito divyam adhvānaṃ pāvakārkasamaprabhaḥ
a tam ekamanasaṃ yāntam avyagram akutobhayam
c dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni jaṅgamānītarāṇi ca
a yathāśakti yathānyāyaṃ pūjayāṃ cakrire tadā
c puṣpavarṣaiś ca divyais tam avacakrur divaukasaḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā vismitāḥ sarve gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
c ṛṣayaś caiva saṃsiddhāḥ paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ
a antarikṣacaraḥ ko 'yaṃ tapasā siddhim āgataḥ
c adhaḥkāyordhvavaktraś ca netraiḥ samabhivāhyate
a tataḥ paramadhīrātmā triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ
c bhāskaraṃ samudīkṣan sa prāṅmukho vāgyato 'gamat
e śabdenākāśam akhilaṃ pūrayann iva sarvataḥ
a tam āpatantaṃ sahasā dṛṣṭvā sarvāpsarogaṇāḥ
c saṃbhrāntamanaso rājann āsan paramavismitāḥ
e pañcacūḍāprabhṛtayo bhṛśam utphullalocanāḥ
a daivataṃ katamaṃ hy etad uttamāṃ gatim āsthitam
c suniścitam ihāyāti vimuktam iva niḥspṛham
a tataḥ samaticakrāma malayaṃ nāma parvatam
c urvaśī pūrvacittiś ca yaṃ nityam upasevate
e te sma brahmarṣiputrasya vismayaṃ yayatuḥ param
a aho buddhisamādhānaṃ vedābhyāsarate dvije
c acireṇaiva kālena nabhaś carati candravat
e pitṛśuśrūṣayā siddhiṃ saṃprāpto 'yam anuttamām
a pitṛbhakto dṛḍhatapāḥ pituḥ sudayitaḥ sutaḥ
b kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sarve tuṣṭuvur hṛṣṭamānasāḥ
c ananyamanasā tena kathaṃ pitrā vivarjitaḥ
a urvaśyā vacanaṃ śrutvā śukaḥ paramadharmavit
c udaikṣata diśaḥ sarvā vacane gatamānasaḥ
a so 'ntarikṣaṃ mahīṃ caiva saśailavanakānanām
c ālokayām āsa tadā sarāṃsi saritas tathā
a tato dvaipāyanasutaṃ bahumānapuraḥsaram
c kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sarvā nirīkṣante sma devatāḥ
a abravīt tās tadā vākyaṃ śukaḥ paramadharmavit
c pitā yady anugacchen māṃ krośamānaḥ śuketi vai
a tataḥ prativaco deyaṃ sarvair eva samāhitaiḥ
c etan me snehataḥ sarve vacanaṃ kartum arhatha
a śukasya vacanaṃ śrutvā diśaḥ savanakānanāḥ
c samudrāḥ saritaḥ śailāḥ pratyūcus taṃ samantataḥ
a yathājñāpayase vipra bāḍham evaṃ bhaviṣyati
c ṛṣer vyāharato vākyaṃ prativakṣyāmahe vayam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ brahmarṣiḥ sumahātapāḥ
c prātiṣṭhata śukaḥ siddhiṃ hitvā lokāṃś caturvidhān
a tamo hy aṣṭavidhaṃ hitvā jahau pañcavidhaṃ rajaḥ
c tataḥ sattvaṃ jahau dhīmāṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tatas tasmin pade nitye nirguṇe liṅgavarjite
c brahmaṇi pratyatiṣṭhat sa vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
a ulkāpātā diśāṃ dāhā bhūmikampās tathaiva ca
c prādurbhūtāḥ kṣaṇe tasmiṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a drumāḥ śākhāś ca mumucuḥ śikharāṇi ca parvatāḥ
c nirghātaśabdaiś ca girir himavān dīryatīva ha
a na babhāse sahasrāṃśur na jajvāla ca pāvakaḥ
c hradāś ca saritaś caiva cukṣubhuḥ sāgarās tathā
a vavarṣa vāsavas toyaṃ rasavac ca sugandhi ca
c vavau samīraṇaś cāpi divyagandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
a sa śṛṅge 'pratime divye himavan merusaṃbhave
c saṃśliṣṭe śvetapīte dve rukmarūpyamaye śubhe
a śatayojanavistāre tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca bhārata
c udīcīṃ diśam āśritya rucire saṃdadarśa ha
a so 'viśaṅkena manasā tathaivābhyapatac chukaḥ
c tataḥ parvataśṛṅge dve sahasaiva dvidhākṛte
e adṛśyetāṃ mahārāja tad adbhutam ivābhavat
a tataḥ parvataśṛṅgābhyāṃ sahasaiva viniḥsṛtaḥ
c na ca pratijaghānāsya sa gatiṃ parvatottamaḥ
a tato mahān abhūc chabdo divi sarvadivaukasām
c gandharvāṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca ye ca śailanivāsinaḥ
a dṛṣṭvā śukam atikrāntaṃ parvataṃ ca dvidhākṛtam
c sādhu sādhv iti tatrāsīn nādaḥ sarvatra bhārata
a sa pūjyamāno devaiś ca gandharvair ṛṣibhis tathā
c yakṣarākṣasasaṃghaiś ca vidyādharagaṇais tathā
a divyaiḥ puṣpaiḥ samākīrṇam antarikṣaṃ samantataḥ
c āsīt kila mahārāja śukābhipatane tadā
a tato mandākinīṃ ramyām upariṣṭād abhivrajan
c śuko dadarśa dharmātmā puṣpitadrumakānanām
a tasyāṃ krīḍanty abhiratāḥ snānti caivāpsarogaṇāḥ
c śūnyākāraṃ nirākārāḥ śukaṃ dṛṣṭvā vivāsasaḥ
a taṃ prakramantam ājñāya pitā snehasamanvitaḥ
c uttamāṃ gatim āsthāya pṛṣṭhato 'nusasāra ha
a śukas tu mārutād ūrdhvaṃ gatiṃ kṛtvāntarikṣagām
c darśayitvā prabhāvaṃ svaṃ sarvabhūto 'bhavat tadā
a mahāyogagatiṃ tv agryāṃ vyāsotthāya mahātapāḥ
c nimeṣāntaramātreṇa śukābhipatanaṃ yayau
a sa dadarśa dvidhā kṛtvā parvatāgraṃ śukaṃ gatam
c śaśaṃsur ṛṣayas tasmai karma putrasya tat tadā
a tataḥ śuketi dīrgheṇa śaikṣeṇākranditas tadā
c svayaṃ pitrā svareṇoccais trīṃl lokān anunādya vai
a śukaḥ sarvagato bhūtvā sarvātmā sarvatomukhaḥ
c pratyabhāṣata dharmātmā bhoḥśabdenānunādayan
a tata ekākṣaraṃ nādaṃ bho ity eva samīrayan
c pratyāharaj jagat sarvam uccaiḥ sthāvarajaṅgamam
a tataḥ prabhṛti cādyāpi śabdān uccāritān pṛthak
c girigahvarapṛṣṭheṣu vyājahāra śukaṃ prati
a antarhitaḥ prabhāvaṃ tu darśayitvā śukas tadā
c guṇān saṃtyajya śabdādīn padam adhyagamat param
a mahimānaṃ tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā putrasyāmitatejasaḥ
c niṣasāda giriprasthe putram evānucintayan
a tato mandākinītīre krīḍanto 'psarasāṃ gaṇāḥ
c āsādya tam ṛṣiṃ sarvāḥ saṃbhrāntā gatacetasaḥ
a jale nililyire kāś cit kāś cid gulmān prapedire
c vasanāny ādaduḥ kāś cid dṛṣṭvā taṃ munisattamam
a tāṃ muktatāṃ tu vijñāya muniḥ putrasya vai tadā
c saktatām ātmanaś caiva prīto 'bhūd vrīḍitaś ca ha
a taṃ devagandharvavṛto maharṣigaṇapūjitaḥ
c pinākahasto bhagavān abhyāgacchata śaṃkaraḥ
a tam uvāca mahādevaḥ sāntvapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
c putraśokābhisaṃtaptaṃ kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ tadā
a agner bhūmer apāṃ vāyor antarikṣasya caiva ha
c vīryeṇa sadṛśaḥ putras tvayā mattaḥ purā vṛtaḥ
a sa tathālakṣaṇo jātas tapasā tava saṃbhṛtaḥ
c mama caiva prabhāvena brahmatejomayaḥ śuciḥ
a sa gatiṃ paramāṃ prāpto duṣprāpām ajitendriyaiḥ
c daivatair api viprarṣe taṃ tvaṃ kim anuśocasi
a yāvat sthāsyanti girayo yāvat sthāsyanti sāgarāḥ
c tāvat tavākṣayā kīrtiḥ saputrasya bhaviṣyati
a chāyāṃ svaputrasadṛśīṃ sarvato 'napagāṃ sadā
c drakṣyase tvaṃ ca loke 'smin matprasādān mahāmune
a so 'nunīto bhagavatā svayaṃ rudreṇa bhārata
c chāyāṃ paśyan samāvṛttaḥ sa muniḥ parayā mudā
a iti janma gatiś caiva śukasya bharatarṣabha
c vistareṇa mayākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
a etad ācaṣṭa me rājan devarṣir nāradaḥ purā
c vyāsaś caiva mahāyogī saṃjalpeṣu pade pade
a itihāsam imaṃ puṇyaṃ mokṣadharmārthasaṃhitam
c dhārayed yaḥ śamaparaḥ sa gacchet paramāṃ gatim
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a gṛhastho brahmacārī vā vānaprastho 'tha bhikṣukaḥ
c ya icchet siddhim āsthātuṃ devatāṃ kāṃ yajeta saḥ
a kuto hy asya dhruvaḥ svargaḥ kuto niḥśreyasaṃ param
c vidhinā kena juhuyād daivaṃ pitryaṃ tathaiva ca
a muktaś ca kāṃ gatiṃ gacchen mokṣaś caiva kimātmakaḥ
c svargataś caiva kiṃ kuryād yena na cyavate divaḥ
a devatānāṃ ca ko devaḥ pitṝṇāṃ ca tathā pitā
c tasmāt parataraṃ yac ca tan me brūhi pitāmaha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a gūḍhaṃ māṃ praśnavit praśnaṃ pṛcchase tvam ihānagha
c na hy eṣa tarkayā śakyo vaktuṃ varṣaśatair api
a ṛte devaprasādād vā rājañ jñānāgamena vā
c gahanaṃ hy etad ākhyānaṃ vyākhyātavyaṃ tavārihan
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c nāradasya ca saṃvādam ṛṣer nārāyaṇasya ca
a nārāyaṇo hi viśvātmā caturmūrtiḥ sanātanaḥ
c dharmātmajaḥ saṃbabhūva pitaivaṃ me 'bhyabhāṣata
a kṛte yuge mahārāja purā svāyaṃbhuve 'ntare
c naro nārāyaṇaś caiva hariḥ kṛṣṇas tathaiva ca
a tebhyo nārāyaṇanarau tapas tepatur avyayau
c badaryāśramam āsādya śakaṭe kanakāmaye
a aṣṭacakraṃ hi tad yānaṃ bhūtayuktaṃ manoramam
c tatrādyau lokanāthau tau kṛśau dhamanisaṃtatau
a tapasā tejasā caiva durnirīkṣau surair api
c yasya prasādaṃ kurvāte sa devau draṣṭum arhati
a nūnaṃ tayor anumate hṛdi hṛcchayacoditaḥ
c mahāmeror gireḥ śṛṅgāt pracyuto gandhamādanam
a nāradaḥ sumahad bhūtaṃ lokān sarvān acīcarat
c taṃ deśam agamad rājan badaryāśramam āśugaḥ
a tayor āhnikavelāyāṃ tasya kautūhalaṃ tv abhūt
c idaṃ tad āspadaṃ kṛtsnaṃ yasmiṃl lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
a sadevāsuragandharvāḥ sarṣikiṃnaralelihāḥ
c ekā mūrtir iyaṃ pūrvaṃ jātā bhūyaś caturvidhā
a dharmasya kulasaṃtāno mahān ebhir vivardhitaḥ
c aho hy anugṛhīto 'dya dharma ebhiḥ surair iha
e naranārāyaṇābhyāṃ ca kṛṣṇena hariṇā tathā
a tatra kṛṣṇo hariś caiva kasmiṃś cit kāraṇāntare
c sthitau dharmottarau hy etau tathā tapasi dhiṣṭhitau
a etau hi paramaṃ dhāma kānayor āhnikakriyā
c pitarau sarvabhūtānāṃ daivataṃ ca yaśasvinau
e kāṃ devatāṃ nu yajataḥ pitṝn vā kān mahāmatī
a iti saṃcintya manasā bhaktyā nārāyaṇasya ha
c sahasā prādurabhavat samīpe devayos tadā
a kṛte daive ca pitrye ca tatas tābhyāṃ nirīkṣitaḥ
c pūjitaś caiva vidhinā yathāproktena śāstrataḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahad āścaryam apūrvaṃ vidhivistaram
c upopaviṣṭaḥ suprīto nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
a nārāyaṇaṃ saṃnirīkṣya prasannenāntarātmanā
c namaskṛtvā mahādevam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
a vedeṣu sapurāṇeṣu sāṅgopāṅgeṣu gīyase
c tvam ajaḥ śāśvato dhātā mato 'mṛtam anuttamam
e pratiṣṭhitaṃ bhūtabhavyaṃ tvayi sarvam idaṃ jagat
a catvāro hy āśramā deva sarve gārhasthyamūlakāḥ
c yajante tvām aharahar nānāmūrtisamāsthitam
a pitā mātā ca sarvasya jagataḥ śāśvato guruḥ
c kaṃ tv adya yajase devaṃ pitaraṃ kaṃ na vidmahe
d kam arcasi mahābhāga tan me brūhīha pṛcchataḥ
 śrībhagavān uvāca
a avācyam etad vaktavyam ātmaguhyaṃ sanātanam
c tava bhaktimato brahman vakṣyāmi tu yathātatham
a yat tat sūkṣmam avijñeyam avyaktam acalaṃ dhruvam
c indriyair indriyārthaiś ca sarvabhūtaiś ca varjitam
a sa hy antarātmā bhūtānāṃ kṣetrajñaś ceti kathyate
c triguṇavyatirikto 'sau puruṣaś ceti kalpitaḥ
e tasmād avyaktam utpannaṃ triguṇaṃ dvijasattama
a avyaktā vyaktabhāvasthā yā sā prakṛtir avyayā
c tāṃ yonim āvayor viddhi yo 'sau sadasadātmakaḥ
e āvābhyāṃ pūjyate 'sau hi daive pitrye ca kalpite
a nāsti tasmāt paro 'nyo hi pitā devo 'tha vā dvijaḥ
c ātmā hi nau sa vijñeyas tatas taṃ pūjayāvahe
a tenaiṣā prathitā brahman maryādā lokabhāvinī
c daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca kartavyam iti tasyānuśāsanam
a brahmā sthāṇur manur dakṣo bhṛgur dharmas tapo damaḥ
c marīcir aṅgirātriś ca pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
a vasiṣṭhaḥ parameṣṭhī ca vivasvān soma eva ca
c kardamaś cāpi yaḥ proktaḥ krodho vikrīta eva ca
a ekaviṃśatir utpannās te prajāpatayaḥ smṛtāḥ
c tasya devasya maryādāṃ pūjayanti sanātanīm
a daivaṃ pitryaṃ ca satataṃ tasya vijñāya tattvataḥ
c ātmaprāptāni ca tato jānanti dvijasattamāḥ
a svargasthā api ye ke cit taṃ namasyanti dehinaḥ
c te tatprasādād gacchanti tenādiṣṭaphalāṃ gatim
a ye hīnāḥ saptadaśabhir guṇaiḥ karmabhir eva ca
c kalāḥ pañcadaśa tyaktvā te muktā iti niścayaḥ
a muktānāṃ tu gatir brahman kṣetrajña iti kalpitaḥ
c sa hi sarvagataś caiva nirguṇaś caiva kathyate
a dṛśyate jñānayogena āvāṃ ca prasṛtau tataḥ
c evaṃ jñātvā tam ātmānaṃ pūjayāvaḥ sanātanam
a taṃ vedāś cāśramāś caiva nānātanusamāsthitāḥ
c bhaktyā saṃpūjayanty ādyaṃ gatiṃ caiṣāṃ dadāti saḥ
a ye tu tadbhāvitā loke ekāntitvaṃ samāsthitāḥ
c etad abhyadhikaṃ teṣāṃ yat te taṃ praviśanty uta
a iti guhyasamuddeśas tava nārada kīrtitaḥ
c bhaktyā premṇā ca viprarṣe asmadbhaktyā ca te śrutaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa evam ukto dvipadāṃ variṣṭho
nārāyaṇenottamapūruṣeṇa
c jagāda vākyaṃ dvipadāṃ variṣṭhaṃ
nārāyaṇaṃ lokahitādhivāsam
a yadartham ātmaprabhaveha janma
tavottamaṃ dharmagṛhe caturdhā
c tat sādhyatāṃ lokahitārtham adya
gacchāmi draṣṭuṃ prakṛtiṃ tavādyām
a vedāḥ svadhītā mama lokanātha
taptaṃ tapo nānṛtam uktapūrvam
c pūjāṃ gurūṇāṃ satataṃ karomi
parasya guhyaṃ na ca bhinnapūrvam
a guptāni catvāri yathāgamaṃ me
śatrau ca mitre ca samo 'smi nityam
c taṃ cādidevaṃ satataṃ prapanna
ekāntabhāvena vṛṇomy ajasram
e ebhir viśeṣaiḥ pariśuddhasattvaḥ
kasmān na paśyeyam anantam īśam
a tat pārameṣṭhyasya vaco niśamya
nārāyaṇaḥ sātvatadharmagoptā
b tasmād anujñāṃ mama dehi deva
b taṃ vai dṛṣṭvā kṛtakṛtyo bhavāmi
c gaccheti taṃ nāradam uktavān sa
saṃpūjayitvātmavidhikriyābhiḥ
a tato visṛṣṭaḥ parameṣṭhiputraḥ
so 'bhyarcayitvā tam ṛṣiṃ purāṇam
c kham utpapātottamavegayuktas
tato 'dhimerau sahasā nililye
a tatrāvatasthe ca munir muhūrtam
ekāntam āsādya gireḥ sa śṛṅge
c ālokayann uttarapaścimena
dadarśa cātyadbhutarūpayuktam
a kṣīrodadher uttarato hi dvīpaḥ
śvetaḥ sa nāmnā prathito viśālaḥ
c meroḥ sahasraiḥ sa hi yojanānāṃ
dvātriṃśatordhvaṃ kavibhir niruktaḥ
a atīndriyāś cānaśanāś ca tatra
niṣpandahīnāḥ susugandhinaś ca
c śvetāḥ pumāṃso gatasarvapāpāś
cakṣurmuṣaḥ pāpakṛtāṃ narāṇām
a vajrāsthikāyāḥ samamānonmānā
divyānvayarūpāḥ śubhasāropetāḥ
c chatrākṛtiśīrṣā meghaughaninādāḥ
satpuṣkaracatuṣkā rājīvaśatapādāḥ
a ṣaṣṭyā dantair yuktāḥ śuklair
aṣṭābhir daṃṣṭrābhir ye
c jihvābhir ye viṣvagvaktraṃ
lelihyante sūryaprakhyam
a bhaktyā devaṃ viśvotpannaṃ
yasmāt sarve lokāḥ sūtāḥ
c vedā dharmā munayaḥ śāntā
devāḥ sarve tasya visargāḥ
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a atīndriyā nirāhārā aniṣpandāḥ sugandhinaḥ
c kathaṃ te puruṣā jātāḥ kā teṣāṃ gatir uttamā
a ye vimuktā bhavantīha narā bharatasattama
c teṣāṃ lakṣaṇam etad dhi yac chvetadvīpavāsinām
a tasmān me saṃśayaṃ chindhi paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
c tvaṃ hi sarvakathārāmas tvāṃ caivopāśritā vayam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a vistīrṇaiṣā kathā rājañ śrutā me pitṛsaṃnidhau
c saiṣā tava hi vaktavyā kathāsāro hi sa smṛtaḥ
d śaṃtanoḥ kathayām āsa nārado munisattamaḥ
d rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ purā prāha tatrāhaṃ śrutavān purā
a rājoparicaro nāma babhūvādhipatir bhuvaḥ
c ākhaṇḍalasakhaḥ khyāto bhakto nārāyaṇaṃ harim
a dhārmiko nityabhaktaś ca pitṝn nityam atandritaḥ
c sāmrājyaṃ tena saṃprāptaṃ nārāyaṇavarāt purā
a sātvataṃ vidhim āsthāya prāk sūryamukhaniḥsṛtam
c pūjayām āsa deveśaṃ taccheṣeṇa pitāmahān
a pitṛśeṣeṇa viprāṃś ca saṃvibhajyāśritāṃś ca saḥ
c śeṣānnabhuk satyaparaḥ sarvabhūteṣv ahiṃsakaḥ
e sarvabhāvena bhaktaḥ sa devadevaṃ janārdanam
f anādimadhyanidhanaṃ lokakartāram avyayam
a tasya nārāyaṇe bhaktiṃ vahato 'mitrakarśana
c ekaśayyāsanaṃ śakro dattavān devarāṭ svayam
a ātmā rājyaṃ dhanaṃ caiva kalatraṃ vāhanāni ca
c etad bhagavate sarvam iti tat prekṣitaṃ sadā
a kāmyanaimittikājasraṃ yajñiyāḥ paramakriyāḥ
c sarvāḥ sātvatam āsthāya vidhiṃ cakre samāhitaḥ
a pañcarātravido mukhyās tasya gehe mahātmanaḥ
c prāyaṇaṃ bhagavatproktaṃ bhuñjate cāgrabhojanam
a tasya praśāsato rājyaṃ dharmeṇāmitraghātinaḥ
c nānṛtā vāk samabhavan mano duṣṭaṃ na cābhavat
e na ca kāyena kṛtavān sa pāpaṃ param aṇv api
a ye hi te munayaḥ khyātāḥ sapta citraśikhaṇḍinaḥ
c tair ekamatibhir bhūtvā yat proktaṃ śāstram uttamam
d vedaiś caturbhiḥ samitaṃ kṛtaṃ merau mahāgirau
d āsyaiḥ saptabhir udgīrṇaṃ lokadharmam anuttamam
a marīcir atryaṅgirasau pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
c vasiṣṭhaś ca mahātejā ete citraśikhaṇḍinaḥ
a sapta prakṛtayo hy etās tathā svāyaṃbhuvo 'ṣṭamaḥ
c etābhir dhāryate lokas tābhyaḥ śāstraṃ viniḥsṛtam
a ekāgramanaso dāntā munayaḥ saṃyame ratāḥ
b bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyajñāḥ satyadharmaparāyaṇāḥ
c idaṃ śreya idaṃ brahma idaṃ hitam anuttamam
e lokān saṃcintya manasā tataḥ śāstraṃ pracakrire
a tatra dharmārthakāmā hi mokṣaḥ paścāc ca kīrtitaḥ
c maryādā vividhāś caiva divi bhūmau ca saṃsthitāḥ
a ārādhya tapasā devaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
c divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ vai sarve te ṛṣibhiḥ saha
a nārāyaṇānuśāstā hi tadā devī sarasvatī
c viveśa tān ṛṣīn sarvāṃl lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
a tataḥ pravartitā samyak tapovidbhir dvijātibhiḥ
c śabde cārthe ca hetau ca eṣā prathamasargajā
a ādāv eva hi tac chāstram oṃkārasvarabhūṣitam
c ṛṣibhir bhāvitaṃ tatra yatra kāruṇiko hy asau
a tataḥ prasanno bhagavān anirdiṣṭaśarīragaḥ
c ṛṣīn uvāca tān sarvān adṛśyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
a kṛtaṃ śatasahasraṃ hi ślokānām idam uttamam
c lokatantrasya kṛtsnasya yasmād dharmaḥ pravartate
a pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca yonir etad bhaviṣyati
c ṛgyajuḥsāmabhir juṣṭam atharvāṅgirasais tathā
a tathā pramāṇaṃ hi mayā kṛto brahmā prasādajaḥ
c rudraś ca krodhajo viprā yūyaṃ prakṛtayas tathā
a sūryācandramasau vāyur bhūmir āpo 'gnir eva ca
c sarve ca nakṣatragaṇā yac ca bhūtābhiśabditam
a adhikāreṣu vartante yathāsvaṃ brahmavādinaḥ
c sarve pramāṇaṃ hi yathā tathaitac chāstram uttamam
a bhaviṣyati pramāṇaṃ vai etan madanuśāsanam
c asmāt pravakṣyate dharmān manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvaḥ svayam
a uśanā bṛhaspatiś caiva yadotpannau bhaviṣyataḥ
c tadā pravakṣyataḥ śāstraṃ yuṣmanmatibhir uddhṛtam
a svāyaṃbhuveṣu dharmeṣu śāstre cośanasā kṛte
c bṛhaspatimate caiva lokeṣu pravicārite
a yuṣmatkṛtam idaṃ śāstraṃ prajāpālo vasus tataḥ
c bṛhaspatisakāśād vai prāpsyate dvijasattamāḥ
a sa hi madbhāvito rājā madbhaktaś ca bhaviṣyati
c tena śāstreṇa lokeṣu kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kariṣyati
a etad dhi sarvaśāstrāṇāṃ śāstram uttamasaṃjñitam
c etad arthyaṃ ca dharmyaṃ ca yaśasyaṃ caitad uttamam
a asya pravartanāc caiva prajāvanto bhaviṣyatha
c sa ca rājā śriyā yukto bhaviṣyati mahān vasuḥ
a saṃsthite tu nṛpe tasmiñ śāstram etat sanātanam
c antardhāsyati tat satyam etad vaḥ kathitaṃ mayā
a etāvad uktvā vacanam adṛśyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
c visṛjya tān ṛṣīn sarvān kām api prasthito diśam
a tatas te lokapitaraḥ sarvalokārthacintakāḥ
c prāvartayanta tac chāstraṃ dharmayoniṃ sanātanam
a utpanne ''ṅgirase caiva yuge prathamakalpite
c sāṅgopaniṣadaṃ śāstraṃ sthāpayitvā bṛhaspatau
a jagmur yathepsitaṃ deśaṃ tapase kṛtaniścayāḥ
c dhāraṇāt sarvalokānāṃ sarvadharmapravartakāḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tato 'tīte mahākalpe utpanne 'ṅgirasaḥ sute
c babhūvur nirvṛtā devā jāte devapurohite
a bṛhad brahma mahac ceti śabdāḥ paryāyavācakāḥ
c ebhiḥ samanvito rājan guṇair vidvān bṛhaspatiḥ
a tasya śiṣyo babhūvāgryo rājoparicaro vasuḥ
c adhītavāṃs tadā śāstraṃ samyak citraśikhaṇḍijam
a sa rājā bhāvitaḥ pūrvaṃ daivena vidhinā vasuḥ
c pālayām āsa pṛthivīṃ divam ākhaṇḍalo yathā
a tasya yajño mahān āsīd aśvamedho mahātmanaḥ
c bṛhaspatir upādhyāyas tatra hotā babhūva ha
a prajāpatisutāś cātra sadasyās tv abhavaṃs trayaḥ
c ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥ
a dhanuṣākṣo 'tha raibhyaś ca arvāvasuparāvasū
c ṛṣir medhātithiś caiva tāṇḍyaś caiva mahān ṛṣiḥ
a ṛṣiḥ śaktir mahābhāgas tathā vedaśirāś ca yaḥ
c kapilaś ca ṛṣiśreṣṭhaḥ śālihotrapitāmahaḥ
a ādyaḥ kaṭhas taittiriś ca vaiśaṃpāyanapūrvajaḥ
c kaṇvo 'tha devahotraś ca ete ṣoḍaśa kīrtitāḥ
e saṃbhṛtāḥ sarvasaṃbhārās tasmin rājan mahākratau
a na tatra paśughāto 'bhūt sa rājaivaṃ sthito 'bhavat
c ahiṃsraḥ śucir akṣudro nirāśīḥ karmasaṃstutaḥ
e āraṇyakapadodgītā bhāgās tatropakalpitāḥ
a prītas tato 'sya bhagavān devadevaḥ purātanaḥ
c sākṣāt taṃ darśayām āsa so 'dṛśyo 'nyena kena cit
a svayaṃ bhāgam upāghrāya puroḍāśaṃ gṛhītavān
c adṛśyena hṛto bhāgo devena harimedhasā
a bṛhaspatis tataḥ kruddhaḥ sruvam udyamya vegitaḥ
c ākāśaṃ ghnan sruvaḥ pātai roṣād aśrūṇy avartayat
a uvāca coparicaraṃ mayā bhāgo 'yam udyataḥ
c grāhyaḥ svayaṃ hi devena matpratyakṣaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
a udyatā yajñabhāgā hi sākṣāt prāptāḥ surair iha
c kimartham iha na prāpto darśanaṃ sa harir vibhuḥ
a tataḥ sa taṃ samuddhūtaṃ bhūmipālo mahān vasuḥ
c prasādayām āsa muniṃ sadasyās te ca sarvaśaḥ
d uparicaravasur uvāca
d hutaṃ tvayāvadānīha puroḍāśasya yāvatī
d gṛhītā devadevena matpratyakṣaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
d ity evam ukto vasunā saroṣaś cābravīd guruḥ
d na yajeyam ahaṃ cātra paribhūtas tvayānagha
d tvayā paśur vāritaś ca kṛtaḥ piṣṭamayaḥ paśuḥ
d vasur uvāca
d tvaṃ devaṃ paśyase nityaṃ na paśyeyam ahaṃ katham
d paśuhiṃsā vāritā ca yajurvedādimantrataḥ
d ahaṃ na vāraye hiṃsāṃ drakṣyāmy ekāntiko harim
d bhīṣma uvāca
d tasmāt kopo na kartavyo bhavatā guruṇā mayi
d vasum evaṃ bruvāṇaṃ tu kruddha eva bṛhaspatiḥ
d uvāca ṛtvijaś caiva kiṃ naḥ karmeti vārayan
d athaikato dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥ
a ūcuś cainam asaṃbhrāntā na roṣaṃ kartum arhasi
b śṛṇu tvaṃ vacanaṃ putra asmābhiḥ samudāhṛtam
c naiṣa dharmaḥ kṛtayuge yas tvaṃ roṣam acīkṛthāḥ
a aroṣaṇo hy asau devo yasya bhāgo 'yam udyataḥ
c na sa śakyas tvayā draṣṭum asmābhir vā bṛhaspate
e yasya prasādaṃ kurute sa vai taṃ draṣṭum arhati
 ekatadvitatritā ūcuḥ
 ekatadvitatritaś cocus tataś citraśikhaṇḍinaḥ
a vayaṃ hi brahmaṇaḥ putrā mānasāḥ parikīrtitāḥ
c gatā niḥśreyasārthaṃ hi kadā cid diśam uttarām
a taptvā varṣasahasrāṇi catvāri tapa uttamam
c ekapādasthitāḥ samyak kāṣṭhabhūtāḥ samāhitāḥ
a meror uttarabhāge tu kṣīrodasyānukūlataḥ
c sa deśo yatra nas taptaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇam
e kathaṃ paśyemahi vayaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ tv iti
f vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ taṃ vai devadevaṃ sanātanam
a tato vratasyāvabhṛthe vāg uvācāśarīriṇī
b snigdhagambhīrayā vācā praharṣaṇakarī vibho
c sutaptaṃ vas tapo viprāḥ prasannenāntarātmanā
a yūyaṃ jijñāsavo bhaktāḥ kathaṃ drakṣyatha taṃ prabhum
c kṣīrodadher uttarataḥ śvetadvīpo mahāprabhaḥ
a tatra nārāyaṇaparā mānavāś candravarcasaḥ
c ekāntabhāvopagatās te bhaktāḥ puruṣottamam
a te sahasrārciṣaṃ devaṃ praviśanti sanātanam
c atīndriyā nirāhārā aniṣpandāḥ sugandhinaḥ
a ekāntinas te puruṣāḥ śvetadvīpanivāsinaḥ
c gacchadhvaṃ tatra munayas tatrātmā me prakāśitaḥ
a atha śrutvā vayaṃ sarve vācaṃ tām aśarīriṇīm
c yathākhyātena mārgeṇa taṃ deśaṃ pratipedire
a prāpya śvetaṃ mahādvīpaṃ taccittās taddidṛkṣavaḥ
b sahasābhihatāḥ sarve tejasā tasya mohitāḥ
c tato no dṛṣṭiviṣayas tadā pratihato 'bhavat
a na ca paśyāma puruṣaṃ tattejohṛtadarśanāḥ
c tato naḥ prādurabhavad vijñānaṃ devayogajam
a na kilātaptatapasā śakyate draṣṭum añjasā
c tataḥ punar varṣaśataṃ taptvā tātkālikaṃ mahat
a vratāvasāne suśubhān narān dadṛśire vayam
c śvetāṃś candrapratīkāśān sarvalakṣaṇalakṣitān
a nityāñjalikṛtān brahma japataḥ prāgudaṅmukhān
c mānaso nāma sa japo japyate tair mahātmabhiḥ
e tenaikāgramanastvena prīto bhavati vai hariḥ
a yā bhaven muniśārdūla bhāḥ sūryasya yugakṣaye
c ekaikasya prabhā tādṛk sābhavan mānavasya ha
a tejonivāsaḥ sa dvīpa iti vai menire vayam
c na tatrābhyadhikaḥ kaś cit sarve te samatejasaḥ
a atha sūryasahasrasya prabhāṃ yugapad utthitām
c sahasā dṛṣṭavantaḥ sma punar eva bṛhaspate
a sahitāś cābhyadhāvanta tatas te mānavā drutam
c kṛtāñjalipuṭā hṛṣṭā nama ity eva vādinaḥ
a tato 'bhivadatāṃ teṣām aśrauṣma vipulaṃ dhvanim
c baliḥ kilopahriyate tasya devasya tair naraiḥ
a vayaṃ tu tejasā tasya sahasā hṛtacetasaḥ
c na kiṃ cid api paśyāmo hṛtadṛṣṭibalendriyāḥ
a ekas tu śabdo 'virataḥ śruto 'smābhir udīritaḥ
b ākāśaṃ pūrayan sarvaṃ śikṣākṣarasamanvitaḥ
c jitaṃ te puṇḍarīkākṣa namas te viśvabhāvana
a namas te 'stu hṛṣīkeśa mahāpuruṣapūrvaja
c iti śabdaḥ śruto 'smābhiḥ śikṣākṣarasamīritaḥ
a etasminn antare vāyuḥ sarvagandhavahaḥ śuciḥ
c divyāny uvāha puṣpāṇi karmaṇyāś cauṣadhīs tathā
a tair iṣṭaḥ pañcakālajñair harir ekāntibhir naraiḥ
b bhaktyā paramayā yuktair manovākkarmabhis tadā
c nūnaṃ tatrāgato devo yathā tair vāg udīritā
e vayaṃ tv enaṃ na paśyāmo mohitās tasya māyayā
a mārute saṃnivṛtte ca balau ca pratipādite
c cintāvyākulitātmāno jātāḥ smo 'ṅgirasāṃ vara
a mānavānāṃ sahasreṣu teṣu vai śuddhayoniṣu
c asmān na kaś cin manasā cakṣuṣā vāpy apūjayat
a te 'pi svasthā munigaṇā ekabhāvam anuvratāḥ
c nāsmāsu dadhire bhāvaṃ brahmabhāvam anuṣṭhitāḥ
a tato 'smān supariśrāntāṃs tapasā cāpi karśitān
c uvāca khasthaṃ kim api bhūtaṃ tatrāśarīrakam
a dṛṣṭā vaḥ puruṣāḥ śvetāḥ sarvendriyavivarjitāḥ
c dṛṣṭo bhavati deveśa ebhir dṛṣṭair dvijottamāḥ
a gacchadhvaṃ munayaḥ sarve yathāgatam ito 'cirāt
c na sa śakyo abhaktena draṣṭuṃ devaḥ kathaṃ cana
a kāmaṃ kālena mahatā ekāntitvaṃ samāgataiḥ
c śakyo draṣṭuṃ sa bhagavān prabhāmaṇḍaladurdṛśaḥ
a mahat kāryaṃ tu kartavyaṃ yuṣmābhir dvijasattamāḥ
c itaḥ kṛtayuge 'tīte viparyāsaṃ gate 'pi ca
a vaivasvate 'ntare viprāḥ prāpte tretāyuge tataḥ
c surāṇāṃ kāryasiddhyarthaṃ sahāyā vai bhaviṣyatha
a tatas tad adbhutaṃ vākyaṃ niśamyaivaṃ sma somapa
c tasya prasādāt prāptāḥ smo deśam īpsitam añjasā
a evaṃ sutapasā caiva havyakavyais tathaiva ca
c devo 'smābhir na dṛṣṭaḥ sa kathaṃ tvaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
e nārāyaṇo mahad bhūtaṃ viśvasṛg ghavyakavyabhuk
f anādinidhano 'vyakto devadānavapūjitaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evam ekatavākyena dvitatritamatena ca
c anunītaḥ sadasyaiś ca bṛhaspatir udāradhīḥ
e samānīya tato yajñaṃ daivataṃ samapūjayat
a samāptayajño rājāpi prajāḥ pālitavān vasuḥ
c brahmaśāpād divo bhraṣṭaḥ praviveśa mahīṃ tataḥ
d sa rājā rājaśārdūla satyadharmaparāyaṇaḥ
a antarbhūmigataś caiva satataṃ dharmavatsalaḥ

 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a yadā bhakto bhagavata āsīd rājā mahāvasuḥ
c kimarthaṃ sa paribhraṣṭo viveśa vivaraṃ bhuvaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atrāpy udāharantīmam itihāsaṃ purātanam
c ṛṣīṇāṃ caiva saṃvādaṃ tridaśānāṃ ca bhārata
d iyaṃ vai karmabhūmir hi svargo bhogāya kalpitaḥ
d tasmād indro mahīṃ prāpya yajamānas tu dīkṣitaḥ
d savanīyapaśoḥ kāla āgate tu bṛhaspatiḥ
d piṣṭam ānīyatām atra paśvartha iti bhāṣata
d tac chrutvā devatāḥ sarvā idam ūcur dvijottamam
d bṛhaspatiṃ māṃsagṛdhnāḥ pṛthak pṛthag ariṃdama

c sa ca chāgo hy ajo jñeyo nānyaḥ paśur iti sthitiḥ
 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a bījair yajñeṣu yaṣṭavyam iti vai vaidikī śrutiḥ
c ajasaṃjñāni bījāni chāgaṃ na ghnantum arhatha
a naiṣa dharmaḥ satāṃ devā yatra vadhyeta vai paśuḥ
c idaṃ kṛtayugaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kathaṃ vadhyeta vai paśuḥ
d yuṣmākam ajabuddhir hi ajo bījaṃ tad ucyate
 bhīṣma uvāca
a teṣāṃ saṃvadatām evam ṛṣīṇāṃ vibudhaiḥ saha
c mārgāgato nṛpaśreṣṭhas taṃ deśaṃ prāptavān vasuḥ
e antarikṣacaraḥ śrīmān samagrabalavāhanaḥ
a taṃ dṛṣṭvā sahasāyāntaṃ vasuṃ te tv antarikṣagam

a yajvā dānapatiḥ śreṣṭhaḥ sarvabhūtahitapriyaḥ
c kathaṃ svid anyathā brūyād vākyam eṣa mahān vasuḥ
a evaṃ te saṃvidaṃ kṛtvā vibudhā ṛṣayas tathā
c apṛcchan sahasābhyetya vasuṃ rājānam antikāt

c etan naḥ saṃśayaṃ chindhi pramāṇaṃ no bhavān mataḥ

 ṛṣaya ūcuḥ
a dhānyair yaṣṭavyam ity eṣa pakṣo 'smākaṃ narādhipa

 bhīṣma uvāca

a iti buddhyā vyavasyāśu gatvā niścayam īśvarāḥ

a brahmaṇyadevaṃ tvaṃ bhaktaḥ surāsuraguruṃ harim
c kāmaṃ sa tava tuṣṭātmā kuryāc chāpavimokṣaṇam
a mānanā tu dvijātīnāṃ kartavyā vai mahātmanām
c avaśyaṃ tapasā teṣāṃ phalitavyaṃ nṛpottama
d viruddhaṃ vedaśāstrāṇāṃ na vaktavyaṃ hitārthinā
a yatas tvaṃ sahasā bhraṣṭa ākāśān medinītalam
b asmatpakṣanimittaṃ te vyasanaṃ prāptam īdṛśam

a prāpsyase 'smadanudhyānān mā ca tvāṃ glānir āspṛśet
c na kṣutpipāse rājendra bhūmeś chidre bhaviṣyataḥ

a evaṃ dattvā varaṃ rājñe sarve tatra divaukasaḥ
b kratuṃ samāpya piṣṭena munīnāṃ vacanāt tadā
c gatāḥ svabhavanaṃ devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
d gṛhītvā dakṣiṇāṃ sarve gatāḥ svān āśramān punaḥ
d vasuṃ vicintya śakraś ca praviveśāmarāvatīm
d vasur vivaragas tatra vyalīkasya phalād guroḥ
a cakre ca satataṃ pūjāṃ viṣvaksenāya bhārata

c ayajad dhariṃ surapatiṃ bhūmer vivarago 'pi san
a tato 'sya tuṣṭo bhagavān bhaktyā nārāyaṇo hariḥ
c ananyabhaktasya satas tatparasya jitātmanaḥ
a varado bhagavān viṣṇuḥ samīpasthaṃ dvijottamam
c garutmantaṃ mahāvegam ābabhāṣe smayann iva
a dvijottama mahābhāga gamyatāṃ vacanān mama

a brāhmaṇānāṃ prakopena praviṣṭo vasudhātalam

a garutmān atha vikṣipya pakṣau mārutavegavān
c viveśa vivaraṃ bhūmer yatrāste vāgyato vasuḥ
a tata enaṃ samutkṣipya sahasā vinatāsutaḥ
b gṛhītvā taṃ vasuṃ bhaktaṃ sahasā vasudhātalāt
c utpapāta nabhas tūrṇaṃ tatra cainam amuñcata
a tasmin muhūrte saṃjajñe rājoparicaraḥ punaḥ
c saśarīro gataś caiva brahmalokaṃ nṛpottamaḥ
a evaṃ tenāpi kaunteya vāgdoṣād devatājñayā

 bhīṣma uvāca
a evaṃ stutaḥ sa bhagavān guhyais tathyaiś ca nāmabhiḥ

a ekataś ca dvitaś caiva tritaś caiva maharṣayaḥ
c imaṃ deśam anuprāptā mama darśanalālasāḥ
a na ca māṃ te dadṛśire na ca drakṣyati kaś cana

 nārada uvāca
a adya me tapaso deva yamasya niyamasya ca

c bhagavān viśvadṛk siṃhaḥ sarvamūrtir mahāprabhuḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a evaṃ saṃdarśayitvā tu nāradaṃ parameṣṭhijam
c uvāca vacanaṃ bhūyo gaccha nārada māciram
a ime hy anindriyāhārā madbhaktāś candravarcasaḥ
c ekāgrāś cintayeyur māṃ naiṣāṃ vighno bhaved iti
a siddhāś caite mahābhāgāḥ purā hy ekāntino 'bhavan
c tamorajovinirmuktā māṃ pravekṣyanty asaṃśayam
a na dṛśyaś cakṣuṣā yo 'sau na spṛśyaḥ sparśanena ca
c na ghreyaś caiva gandhena rasena ca vivarjitaḥ
a sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva na guṇās taṃ bhajanti vai
c yaś ca sarvagataḥ sākṣī lokasyātmeti kathyate
a bhūtagrāmaśarīreṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati
c ajo nityaḥ śāśvataś ca nirguṇo niṣkalas tathā
a dvirdvādaśebhyas tattvebhyaḥ khyāto yaḥ pañcaviṃśakaḥ
c puruṣo niṣkriyaś caiva jñānadṛśyaś ca kathyate
a yaṃ praviśya bhavantīha muktā vai dvijasattama

a paśya devasya māhātmyaṃ mahimānaṃ ca nārada
b na vidur munayaś caiva yāthārthyaṃ munipuṃgava

a sattvaṃ rajas tamaś caiva guṇān etān pracakṣate
c ete sarvaśarīreṣu tiṣṭhanti vicaranti ca
a etān guṇāṃs tu kṣetrajño bhuṅkte naibhiḥ sa bhujyate
b paśya jīvasya māhātmyaṃ ya evaṃ guṇabhojakaḥ
b īṣal laghuparikrānto na guṇās tasya bhojakāḥ
b sarvasthaḥ sarvago viśvaṃ guṇabhuṅ nirguṇo 'pi ca
b bhojyo 'haṃ bhojako bhoktā paktāhaṃ jaṭhare 'nalaḥ
b bhūtagrāmam imaṃ kṛtsnaṃ pṛthak karma pṛthaṅmukham
b prakṛtistho 'vatiṣṭhāmi na ca tiṣṭhāmi mūrtimān

b aham eva hi jaṃtūnāṃ nimeṣonmeṣakṛd dvija
b māṃ tu jānīhi viprarṣe puruṣaṃ sarvagaṃ prabhum
c nirguṇo guṇabhuk caiva guṇasraṣṭā guṇādhikaḥ
