a bāhuvīryayuto rāmo
c kṣatraṃ cotsādayiṣyāmi samṛddhabalavāhanam
a saṃdhau tu samanuprāpte tretāyāṃ dvāparasya ca
c rāmo dāśarathir bhūtvā bhaviṣyāmi jagatpatiḥ
a tritopaghātād vairūpyam ekato 'tha dvitas tathā
c prāpsyato vānaratvaṃ hi prajāpatisutāv ṛṣī
a tayor ye tv anvaye jātā bhaviṣyanti vanaukasaḥ
b mahābalā mahāvīryāḥ śakratulyaparākramāḥ
c te sahāyā bhaviṣyanti surakārye mama dvija
a tato rakṣaḥpatiṃ ghoraṃ pulastyakulapāṃsanam
c haniṣye rāvaṇaṃ saṃkhye sagaṇaṃ lokakaṇṭakam
d tadrājye sthāpayiṣyāmi vibhīṣaṇam akalmaṣam
d ayodhyāvāsinaḥ sarvān neṣye 'haṃ lokam avyayam
d vibhīṣaṇāya dāsyāmi rājyaṃ tasya yathākramam
a dvāparasya kaleś caiva saṃdhau paryavasānike
c prādurbhāvaḥ kaṃsahetor mathurāyāṃ bhaviṣyati
d kalidvāparayoḥ saṃdhāv aṣṭāviṃśe caturyuge
d prādurbhāvaṃ kariṣyāmi bhūyo vṛṣṇikulodvahaḥ
d madhurāyāṃ kaṃsahetor vāsudeveti nāmataḥ
d tṛtīyo rāma ity eva vasudevasuto balī
a tatrāhaṃ dānavān hatvā subahūn devakaṇṭakān
c kuśasthalīṃ kariṣyāmi nivāsaṃ dvārakāṃ purīm
a vasānas tatra vai puryām aditer vipriyaṃkaram
c haniṣye narakaṃ bhaumaṃ muraṃ pīṭhaṃ ca dānavam
a prāgjyotiṣapuraṃ ramyaṃ nānādhanasamanvitam
c kuśasthalīṃ nayiṣyāmi hatvā vai dānavottamān
d kṛkalāsabhūtaṃ ca nṛgaṃ mocayiṣye ca vai punaḥ
d tataḥ pautranimittena gatvā vai śoṇitaṃ puram
d bāṇasya ca puraṃ gatvā kariṣye kadanaṃ mahat
a śaṃkaraṃ ca mahāsenaṃ bāṇapriyahitaiṣiṇam
c parājeṣyāmy athodyuktau devalokanamaskṛtau
a tataḥ sutaṃ baler jitvā bāṇaṃ bāhusahasriṇam
c vināśayiṣyāmi tataḥ sarvān saubhanivāsinaḥ
d kaṃsaṃ keśiṃ tathā krūram ariṣṭaṃ ca mahāsuram
d cāṇūraṃ ca mahāvīryaṃ muṣṭikaṃ ca mahābalam
d pralambaṃ dhenukaṃ caiva ariṣṭaṃ vṛṣarūpiṇam
d kālīyaṃ ca vaśe kṛtvā yamunāyā mahāhrade
d gokuleṣu tataḥ paścād gavārthe tu mahāgirim
d saptarātraṃ dhariṣyāmi varṣamāṇe tu vāsave
d apakrānte tato varṣe girimūrdhany avasthitaḥ
d indreṇa saha saṃvādaṃ kariṣyāmi tadā dvija
a yaḥ kālayavanaḥ khyāto gargatejobhisaṃvṛtaḥ
c bhaviṣyati vadhas tasya matta eva dvijottama
d laghvācchidya dhanaṃ sarvaṃ vāsudevaṃ ca pauṇḍrakam
a jarāsaṃdhaś ca balavān sarvarājavirodhakaḥ
c bhaviṣyaty asuraḥ sphīto bhūmipālo girivraje
e mama buddhiparispandād vadhas tasya bhaviṣyati
f śiśupālaṃ vadhiṣyāmi yajñe dharmasutasya vai
f duryodhanāparādhena yudhiṣṭhiraguṇena ca
a samāgateṣu baliṣu pṛthivyāṃ sarvarājasu
c vāsaviḥ susahāyo vai mama hy eko bhaviṣyati
d yudhiṣṭhiraṃ sthāpayiṣye svarājye bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
a evaṃ lokā vadiṣyanti naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
c udyuktau dahataḥ kṣatraṃ lokakāryārtham īśvarau
d śastrair nipatitāḥ sarve nṛpā yāsyanti vai divam
a kṛtvā bhārāvataraṇaṃ vasudhāyā yathepsitam
b rājyaṃ praśāsati punaḥ kuntīputre yudhiṣṭhire
c sarvasātvatamukhyānāṃ dvārakāyāś ca sattama
e kariṣye pralayaṃ ghoram ātmajñātivināśanam
a karmāṇy aparimeyāni caturmūrtidharo hy aham
c kṛtvā lokān gamiṣyāmi svān ahaṃ brahmasatkṛtān
d tataḥ kaliyugasyādau bhūtvā rājataruṃ śritaḥ
d bhāṣayā māgadhenaiva dharmarājagṛhe vadan
d kāṣāyavastrasaṃvīto muṇḍitaḥ śukladantavān
d śuddhodanasuto buddho mohayiṣyāmi mānavān
d śūdrāḥ śrāddheṣu bhojyante mayi buddhatvam āgate
d bhaviṣyanti narāḥ sarve muṇḍāḥ kāṣāyasaṃvṛtāḥ
d anadhyāyā bhaviṣyanti viprāś cāgnivivarjitāḥ
d agnihotrāṇi sīdanti gurupūjā ca naśyati
d na śṛṇvanti pituḥ putrā na snuṣā naiva mātaraḥ
d na mitraṃ na kalatraṃ vā vartate hy adharottamam
d evaṃ bhūtaṃ jagat sarvaṃ śrutismṛtivivarjitam
d bhaviṣyati kalau nagno hy aśuddho varṇasaṃkaraḥ
d teṣāṃ sakāśād dharmajñā devabrahmadviṣo narāḥ
d bhaviṣyanti hy aśuddhāś ca nyāyacchalavibhāṣiṇaḥ
d ye nagnadharmaśrotāras te samāḥ pāpaniścayaiḥ
d tasmād ete na saṃbhāṣyā na spraṣṭavyā hitārthibhiḥ
d upavāsatrayaṃ kuryāt tatsaṃsargaviśuddhaye
d tataḥ kaliyugasyānte brāhmaṇo haripiṅgalaḥ
d kalkir viṣṇuyaśaḥputro yājñavalkyapurohitaḥ
d sahāyā brāhmaṇāḥ sarve tair ahaṃ sahitaḥ punaḥ
d mlecchān utsādayiṣyāmi pāṣaṇḍāṃś caiva sarvaśaḥ
d pāṣaṇḍiṣaṭkān hatvā vai tatrāntaḥpralaye tataḥ
d ahaṃ paścād bhaviṣyāmi yajñeṣu nirataḥ sadā
a haṃso hayaśirāś caiva prādurbhāvā dvijottama
b vārāho nārasiṃhaś ca vāmano rāma eva ca
b rāmo dāśarathiś caiva sātvataḥ kalkir eva ca
c yadā vedaśrutir naṣṭā mayā pratyāhṛtā tadā
e savedāḥ saśrutīkāś ca kṛtāḥ pūrvaṃ kṛte yuge
a atikrāntāḥ purāṇeṣu śrutās te yadi vā kva cit
c atikrāntāś ca bahavaḥ prādurbhāvā mamottamāḥ
d puruṣaḥ sarvam evedam akṣayaś cāvyayaś ca ha
e lokakāryāṇi kṛtvā ca punaḥ svāṃ prakṛtiṃ gatāḥ
a na hy etad brahmaṇā prāptam īdṛśaṃ mama darśanam
c yat tvayā prāptam adyeha ekāntagatabuddhinā
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ brahman bhaktimato mayā
c purāṇaṃ ca bhaviṣyaṃ ca sarahasyaṃ ca sattama
a evaṃ sa bhagavān devo viśvamūrtidharo 'vyayaḥ
c etāvad uktvā vacanaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata
a nārado 'pi mahātejāḥ prāpyānugraham īpsitam
c naranārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ prādravad badarāśramam
a idaṃ mahopaniṣadaṃ caturvedasamanvitam
c sāṃkhyayogakṛtaṃ tena pañcarātrānuśabditam
a nārāyaṇamukhodgītaṃ nārado 'śrāvayat punaḥ
c brahmaṇaḥ sadane tāta yathā dṛṣṭaṃ yathā śrutam
d śrutvā brahmamukhād rudraḥ sa devyai kathayat punaḥ
d evaṃ paraṃparākhyātam idaṃ śaṃtanunā śrutam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a etad āścaryabhūtaṃ hi māhātmyaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ
c kiṃ brahmā na vijānīte yataḥ śuśrāva nāradāt
a pitāmaho hi bhagavāṃs tasmād devād anantaraḥ
c kathaṃ sa na vijānīyāt prabhāvam amitaujasaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a mahākalpasahasrāṇi mahākalpaśatāni ca
c samatītāni rājendra sargāś ca pralayāś ca ha
a sargasyādau smṛto brahmā prajāsargakaraḥ prabhuḥ
c jānāti devapravaraṃ bhūyaś cāto 'dhikaṃ nṛpa
e paramātmānam īśānam ātmanaḥ prabhavaṃ tathā
a ye tv anye brahmasadane siddhasaṃghāḥ samāgatāḥ
c tebhyas tac chrāvayām āsa purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam
a teṣāṃ sakāśāt sūryaś ca śrutvā vai bhāvitātmanām
c ātmānugāmināṃ brahma śrāvayām āsa bhārata
a ṣaṭṣaṣṭir hi sahasrāṇi ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
c sūryasya tapato lokān nirmitā ye puraḥsarāḥ
e teṣām akathayat sūryaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhāvitātmanām
a sūryānugāmibhis tāta ṛṣibhis tair mahātmabhiḥ
c merau samāgatā devāḥ śrāvitāś cedam uttamam
a devānāṃ tu sakāśād vai tataḥ śrutvāsito dvijaḥ
c śrāvayām āsa rājendra pitṝṇāṃ munisattamaḥ
a mama cāpi pitā tāta kathayām āsa śaṃtanuḥ
c tato mayaitac chrutvā ca kīrtitaṃ tava bhārata
d nāradāc caiva devarṣeḥ purāṇam aham āptavān
a surair vā munibhir vāpi purāṇaṃ yair idaṃ śrutam
c sarve te paramātmānaṃ pūjayanti punaḥ punaḥ
a idam ākhyānam ārṣeyaṃ pāraṃparyāgataṃ nṛpa
c nāvāsudevabhaktāya tvayā deyaṃ kathaṃ cana
d ākhyānam uttamaṃ cedaṃ śrāvayed yaḥ sadā nṛpa
d sadaiva manujo bhaktaḥ śucir bhūtvā samāhitaḥ
d prāpnuyād acirād rājan viṣṇulokaṃ sanātanam
a matto 'nyāni ca te rājann upākhyānaśatāni vai
c yāni śrutāni dharmyāṇi teṣāṃ sāro 'yam uddhṛtaḥ
a surāsurair yathā rājan nirmathyāmṛtam uddhṛtam
c evam etat purā vipraiḥ kathāmṛtam ihoddhṛtam
a yaś cedaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ
c ekāntabhāvopagata ekānte susamāhitaḥ
a prāpya śvetaṃ mahādvīpaṃ bhūtvā candraprabho naraḥ
c sa sahasrārciṣaṃ devaṃ praviśen nātra saṃśayaḥ
a mucyed ārtas tathā rogāc chrutvemām āditaḥ kathām
c jijñāsur labhate kāmān bhakto bhaktagatiṃ vrajet
a tvayāpi satataṃ rājann abhyarcyaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
b vāsudevaṃ mahātmānaṃ śrotavyaṃ vidhipūrvakam
c sa hi mātā pitā caiva kṛtsnasya jagato guruḥ
a brahmaṇyadevo bhagavān prīyatāṃ te sanātanaḥ
c yudhiṣṭhira mahābāho mahābāhur janārdanaḥ
d pūjanīyo sadāvyagro munibhir vedapāragaiḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śrutvaitad ākhyānavaraṃ dharmarāḍ janamejaya
c bhrātaraś cāsya te sarve nārāyaṇaparābhavan
a jitaṃ bhagavatā tena puruṣeṇeti bhārata
c nityaṃ japyaparā bhūtvā sarasvatīm udīrayan
a yo hy asmākaṃ guruḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano muniḥ
c sa jagau paramaṃ japyaṃ nārāyaṇam udīrayan
a gatvāntarikṣāt satataṃ kṣīrodam amṛtāśayam
c pūjayitvā ca deveśaṃ punar āyāt svam āśramam
d bhīṣma uvāca
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ nāradoktaṃ mayeritam
d pāraṃparyāgataṃ hy etat pitrā me kathitaṃ purā
d sūta uvāca
d etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanakīrtitam
d janamejayena yac chrutvā kṛtaṃ samyag yathāvidhi
d yūyaṃ hi taptatapasaḥ sarve ca caritavratāḥ
d sarve vedavido mukhyā naimiṣāraṇyavāsinaḥ
d śaunakasya mahāsatraṃ prāptāḥ sarve dvijottamāḥ
d yajadhvaṃ suhutair yajñair ātmānaṃ parameśvaram
 janamejaya uvāca
a kathaṃ sa bhagavān devo yajñeṣv agraharaḥ prabhuḥ
c yajñadhārī ca satataṃ vedavedāṅgavit tathā
a nivṛttaṃ cāsthito dharmaṃ kṣemī bhāgavatapriyaḥ
c pravṛttidharmān vidadhe sa eva bhagavān prabhuḥ
a kathaṃ pravṛttidharmeṣu bhāgārhā devatāḥ kṛtāḥ
c kathaṃ nivṛttidharmāś ca kṛtā vyāvṛttabuddhayaḥ
a etaṃ naḥ saṃśayaṃ vipra chindhi guhyaṃ sanātanam
c tvayā nārāyaṇakathā śrutā vai dharmasaṃhitā
d sūta uvāca
d janamejayena yat pṛṣṭaḥ śiṣyo vyāsasya dhīmataḥ
d tat te 'haṃ kīrtayiṣyāmi paurāṇaṃ śaunakottama
d śrutvā māhātmyam etasya dehināṃ paramātmanaḥ
d janamejayo mahāprājño vaiśaṃpāyanam abravīt
a ime sabrahmakā lokāḥ sasurāsuramānavāḥ
c kriyāsv abhyudayoktāsu saktā dṛśyanti sarvaśaḥ
e mokṣaś coktas tvayā brahman nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ sukham
a ye ca muktā bhavantīha puṇyapāpavivarjitāḥ
c te sahasrārciṣaṃ devaṃ praviśantīti śuśrumaḥ
a aho hi duranuṣṭheyo mokṣadharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
c yaṃ hitvā devatāḥ sarvā havyakavyabhujo 'bhavan
a kiṃ nu brahmā ca rudraś ca śakraś ca balabhit prabhuḥ
c sūryas tārādhipo vāyur agnir varuṇa eva ca
e ākāśaṃ jagatī caiva ye ca śeṣā divaukasaḥ
a pralayaṃ na vijānanti ātmanaḥ parinirmitam
c tatas te nāsthitā mārgaṃ dhruvam akṣayam avyayam
a smṛtvā kālaparīmāṇaṃ pravṛttiṃ ye samāsthitāḥ
c doṣaḥ kālaparīmāṇe mahān eṣa kriyāvatām
a etan me saṃśayaṃ vipra hṛdi śalyam ivārpitam
c chindhītihāsakathanāt paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me
a kathaṃ bhāgaharāḥ proktā devatāḥ kratuṣu dvija
c kimarthaṃ cādhvare brahmann ijyante tridivaukasaḥ
a ye ca bhāgaṃ pragṛhṇanti yajñeṣu dvijasattama
c te yajanto mahāyajñaiḥ kasya bhāgaṃ dadanti vai
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a aho gūḍhatamaḥ praśnas tvayā pṛṣṭo janeśvara
c nātaptatapasā hy eṣa nāvedaviduṣā tathā
e nāpurāṇavidā cāpi śakyo vyāhartum añjasā
a hanta te kathayiṣyāmi yan me pṛṣṭaḥ purā guruḥ
c kṛṣṇadvaipāyano vyāso vedavyāso mahān ṛṣiḥ
a sumantur jaiminiś caiva pailaś ca sudṛḍhavrataḥ
c ahaṃ caturthaḥ śiṣyo vai pañcamaś ca śukaḥ smṛtaḥ
a etān samāgatān sarvān pañca śiṣyān damānvitān
c śaucācārasamāyuktāñ jitakrodhāñ jitendriyān
a vedān adhyāpayām āsa mahābhāratapañcamān
c merau girivare ramye siddhacāraṇasevite
a teṣām abhyasyatāṃ vedān kadā cit saṃśayo 'bhavat
b kiṃ tu brahmātha rudro vā devatā ṛṣayas tathā
b prāyaḥ pravṛttimārgasthāḥ kasya devasya śāsanāt
b ke vai nivṛttimārgasthāḥ kasya devasya śāsanāt
b ke vai yajante sarve 'pi ka eṣām īśvaraḥ paraḥ
c eṣa vai yas tvayā pṛṣṭas tena teṣāṃ prakīrtitaḥ
e tataḥ śruto mayā cāpi tavākhyeyo 'dya bhārata
a śiṣyāṇāṃ vacanaṃ śrutvā sarvājñānatamonudaḥ
c parāśarasutaḥ śrīmān vyāso vākyam uvāca ha
a mayā hi sumahat taptaṃ tapaḥ paramadāruṇam
c bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca jānīyām iti sattamāḥ
a tasya me taptatapaso nigṛhītendriyasya ca
c nārāyaṇaprasādena kṣīrodasyānukūlataḥ
a traikālikam idaṃ jñānaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ yathepsitam
c tac chṛṇudhvaṃ yathājñānaṃ vakṣye saṃśayam uttamam
e yathā vṛttaṃ hi kalpādau dṛṣṭaṃ me jñānacakṣuṣā
a paramātmeti yaṃ prāhuḥ sāṃkhyayogavido janāḥ
c mahāpuruṣasaṃjñāṃ sa labhate svena karmaṇā
a tasmāt prasūtam avyaktaṃ pradhānaṃ tad vidur budhāḥ
c avyaktād vyaktam utpannaṃ lokasṛṣṭyartham īśvarāt
a aniruddho hi lokeṣu mahān ātmeti kathyate
c yo 'sau vyaktatvam āpanno nirmame ca pitāmaham
e so 'haṃkāra iti proktaḥ sarvatejomayo hi saḥ
a pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam
c ahaṃkāraprasūtāni mahābhūtāni bhārata
a mahābhūtāni sṛṣṭvātha tadguṇān nirmame punaḥ
c bhūtebhyaś caiva niṣpannā mūrtimanto 'ṣṭa tāñ śṛṇu
a marīcir aṅgirāś cātriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
c vasiṣṭhaś ca mahātmā vai manuḥ svāyaṃbhuvas tathā
e jñeyāḥ prakṛtayo 'ṣṭau tā yāsu lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
a vedān vedāṅgasaṃyuktān yajñān yajñāṅgasaṃyutān
b etān vai sumahābhāgān ṛṣīṃl lokapitāmahān
c nirmame lokasiddhyarthaṃ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
e aṣṭābhyaḥ prakṛtibhyaś ca jātaṃ viśvam idaṃ jagat
a rudro roṣātmako jāto daśānyān so 'sṛjat svayam
c ekādaśaite rudrās tu vikārāḥ puruṣāḥ smṛtāḥ
a te rudrāḥ prakṛtiś caiva sarve caiva surarṣayaḥ
c utpannā lokasiddhyarthaṃ brahmāṇaṃ samupasthitāḥ
a vayaṃ hi sṛṣṭā bhagavaṃs tvayā vai prabhaviṣṇunā
c yena yasminn adhīkāre vartitavyaṃ pitāmaha
a yo 'sau tvayā vinirdiṣṭo adhikāro 'rthacintakaḥ
c paripālyaḥ kathaṃ tena so 'dhikāro 'dhikāriṇā
a pradiśasva balaṃ tasya yo 'dhikārārthacintakaḥ
c evam ukto mahādevo devāṃs tān idam abravīt
a sādhv ahaṃ jñāpito devā yuṣmābhir bhadram astu vaḥ
c mamāpy eṣā samutpannā cintā yā bhavatāṃ matā
a lokatantrasya kṛtsnasya kathaṃ kāryaḥ parigrahaḥ
c kathaṃ balakṣayo na syād yuṣmākaṃ hy ātmanaś ca me
a itaḥ sarve 'pi gacchāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ lokasākṣiṇam
c mahāpuruṣam avyaktaṃ sa no vakṣyati yad dhitam
a tatas te brahmaṇā sārdham ṛṣayo vibudhās tathā
c kṣīrodasyottaraṃ kūlaṃ jagmur lokahitārthinaḥ
a te tapaḥ samupātiṣṭhan brahmoktaṃ vedakalpitam
c sa mahāniyamo nāma tapaścaryā sudāruṇā
a ūrdhvaṃ dṛṣṭir bāhavaś ca ekāgraṃ ca mano 'bhavat
c ekapādasthitāḥ samyak kāṣṭhabhūtāḥ samāhitāḥ
a divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ te tapas taptvā tad uttamam
c śuśruvur madhurāṃ vāṇīṃ vedavedāṅgabhūṣitām
a bho bhoḥ sabrahmakā devā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
c svāgatenārcya vaḥ sarvāñ śrāvaye vākyam uttamam
a vijñātaṃ vo mayā kāryaṃ tac ca lokahitaṃ mahat
c pravṛttiyuktaṃ kartavyaṃ yuṣmatprāṇopabṛṃhaṇam
a sutaptaṃ vas tapo devā mamārādhanakāmyayā
c bhokṣyathāsya mahāsattvās tapasaḥ phalam uttamam
a eṣa brahmā lokaguruḥ sarvalokapitāmahaḥ
c yūyaṃ ca vibudhaśreṣṭhā māṃ yajadhvaṃ samāhitāḥ
a sarve bhāgān kalpayadhvaṃ yajñeṣu mama nityaśaḥ
c tathā śreyo vidhāsyāmi yathādhīkāram īśvarāḥ
a śrutvaitad devadevasya vākyaṃ hṛṣṭatanūruhāḥ
c tatas te vibudhāḥ sarve brahmā te ca maharṣayaḥ
a vedadṛṣṭena vidhinā vaiṣṇavaṃ kratum āharan
c tasmin satre tadā brahmā svayaṃ bhāgam akalpayat
e devā devarṣayaś caiva sarve bhāgān akalpayan
a te kārtayugadharmāṇo bhāgāḥ paramasatkṛtāḥ
c prāpur ādityavarṇaṃ taṃ puruṣaṃ tamasaḥ param
e bṛhantaṃ sarvagaṃ devam īśānaṃ varadaṃ prabhum
a tato 'tha varado devas tān sarvān amarān sthitān
c aśarīro babhāṣedaṃ vākyaṃ khastho maheśvaraḥ
a yena yaḥ kalpito bhāgaḥ sa tathā samupāgataḥ
c prīto 'haṃ pradiśāmy adya phalam āvṛttilakṣaṇam
a etad vo lakṣaṇaṃ devā matprasādasamudbhavam
c yūyaṃ yajñair ijyamānāḥ samāptavaradakṣiṇaiḥ
e yuge yuge bhaviṣyadhvaṃ pravṛttiphalabhoginaḥ
a yajñair ye cāpi yakṣyanti sarvalokeṣu vai surāḥ
c kalpayiṣyanti vo bhāgāṃs te narā vedakalpitān
a yo me yathā kalpitavān bhāgam asmin mahākratau
c sa tathā yajñabhāgārho vedasūtre mayā kṛtaḥ
a yūyaṃ lokān dhārayadhvaṃ yajñabhāgaphaloditāḥ
c sarvārthacintakā loke yathādhīkāranirmitāḥ
a yāḥ kriyāḥ pracariṣyanti pravṛttiphalasatkṛtāḥ
c tābhir āpyāyitabalā lokān vai dhārayiṣyatha
a yūyaṃ hi bhāvitā loke sarvayajñeṣu mānavaiḥ
c māṃ tato bhāvayiṣyadhvam eṣā vo bhāvanā mama
a ityarthaṃ nirmitā vedā yajñāś cauṣadhibhiḥ saha
c ebhiḥ samyak prayuktair hi prīyante devatāḥ kṣitau
a nirmāṇam etad yuṣmākaṃ pravṛttiguṇakalpitam
c mayā kṛtaṃ suraśreṣṭhā yāvat kalpakṣayād iti
e cintayadhvaṃ lokahitaṃ yathādhīkāram īśvarāḥ
a marīcir aṅgirāś cātriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ
c vasiṣṭha iti saptaite mānasā nirmitā hi vai
a ete vedavido mukhyā vedācāryāś ca kalpitāḥ
c pravṛttidharmiṇaś caiva prājāpatyena kalpitāḥ
a ayaṃ kriyāvatāṃ panthā vyaktībhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ
c aniruddha iti prokto lokasargakaraḥ prabhuḥ
a sanaḥ sanatsujātaś ca sanakaḥ sasanandanaḥ
c sanatkumāraḥ kapilaḥ saptamaś ca sanātanaḥ
a saptaite mānasāḥ proktā ṛṣayo brahmaṇaḥ sutāḥ
c svayamāgatavijñānā nivṛttaṃ dharmam āsthitāḥ
a ete yogavido mukhyāḥ sāṃkhyadharmavidas tathā
c ācāryā mokṣaśāstre ca mokṣadharmapravartakāḥ
a yato 'haṃ prasṛtaḥ pūrvam avyaktāt triguṇo mahān
c tasmāt parataro yo 'sau kṣetrajña iti kalpitaḥ
e so 'haṃ kriyāvatāṃ panthāḥ punarāvṛttidurlabhaḥ
a yo yathā nirmito jantur yasmin yasmiṃś ca karmaṇi
c pravṛttau vā nivṛttau vā tatphalaṃ so 'śnute 'vaśaḥ
a eṣa lokagurur brahmā jagadādikaraḥ prabhuḥ
c eṣa mātā pitā caiva yuṣmākaṃ ca pitāmahaḥ
e mayānuśiṣṭo bhavitā sarvabhūtavarapradaḥ
a asya caivānujo rudro lalāṭād yaḥ samutthitaḥ
c brahmānuśiṣṭo bhavitā sarvatrasavarapradaḥ
a gacchadhvaṃ svān adhīkārāṃś cintayadhvaṃ yathāvidhi
c pravartantāṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ sarvalokeṣu māciram
a pradṛśyantāṃ ca karmāṇi prāṇināṃ gatayas tathā
c parinirmitakālāni āyūṃṣi ca surottamāḥ
a idaṃ kṛtayugaṃ nāma kālaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ pravartate
b tripādahīno dharmaś ca yuge tasmin bhaviṣyati
c ahiṃsyā yajñapaśavo yuge 'smin naitad anyathā
e catuṣpāt sakalo dharmo bhaviṣyaty atra vai surāḥ
a tatas tretāyugaṃ nāma trayī yatra bhaviṣyati
c prokṣitā yatra paśavo vadhaṃ prāpsyanti vai makhe
e tatra pādacaturtho vai dharmasya na bhaviṣyati
a tato vai dvāparaṃ nāma miśraḥ kālo bhaviṣyati
c dvipādahīno dharmaś ca yuge tasmin bhaviṣyati
d tatra vadhyanti paśavo yūpeṣv atra nibadhyate
a tatas tiṣye 'tha saṃprāpte yuge kalipuraskṛte
c ekapādasthito dharmo yatra tatra bhaviṣyati
d devā devarṣayaś cocus tam evaṃvādinaṃ gurum
 devā ūcuḥ
a ekapādasthite dharme yatrakvacanagāmini
c kathaṃ kartavyam asmābhir bhagavaṃs tad vadasva naḥ
 śrībhagavān uvāca
 guravo yatra pūjyante sādhuvṛttāḥ śamānvitāḥ
 vastavyaṃ tatra yuṣmābhir yatra dharmo na hīyate
a yatra vedāś ca yajñāś ca tapaḥ satyaṃ damas tathā
c ahiṃsādharmasaṃyuktāḥ pracareyuḥ surottamāḥ
e sa vai deśaḥ sevitavyo mā vo 'dharmaḥ padā spṛśet
 vyāsa uvāca
a te 'nuśiṣṭā bhagavatā devāḥ sarṣigaṇās tathā
c namaskṛtvā bhagavate jagmur deśān yathepsitān
a gateṣu tridivaukaḥsu brahmaikaḥ paryavasthitaḥ
c didṛkṣur bhagavantaṃ tam aniruddhatanau sthitam
a taṃ devo darśayām āsa kṛtvā hayaśiro mahat
c sāṅgān āvartayan vedān kamaṇḍalugaṇitradhṛk
a tato 'śvaśirasaṃ dṛṣṭvā taṃ devam amitaujasam
c lokakartā prabhur brahmā lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā
a mūrdhnā praṇamya varadaṃ tasthau prāñjalir agrataḥ
c sa pariṣvajya devena vacanaṃ śrāvitas tadā
a lokakāryagatīḥ sarvās tvaṃ cintaya yathāvidhi
c dhātā tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ prabhur jagato guruḥ
e tvayy āveśitabhāro 'haṃ dhṛtiṃ prāpsyāmy athāñjasā
a yadā ca surakāryaṃ te aviṣahyaṃ bhaviṣyati
c prādurbhāvaṃ gamiṣyāmi tadātmajñānadeśikaḥ
a evam uktvā hayaśirās tatraivāntaradhīyata
c tenānuśiṣṭo brahmāpi svaṃ lokam acirād gataḥ
a evam eṣa mahābhāgaḥ padmanābhaḥ sanātanaḥ
c yajñeṣv agraharaḥ prokto yajñadhārī ca nityadā
a nivṛttiṃ cāsthito dharmaṃ gatim akṣayadharmiṇām
c pravṛttidharmān vidadhe kṛtvā lokasya citratām
a sa ādiḥ sa madhyaḥ sa cāntaḥ prajānāṃ
sa dhātā sa dheyaḥ sa kartā sa kāryam
c yugānte sa suptaḥ susaṃkṣipya lokān
yugādau prabuddho jagad dhy utsasarja
d sa ādiḥ sa ca madhyaṃ vai buddhaḥ sṛjati vai jagat
a tasmai namadhvaṃ devāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane
c ajāya viśvarūpāya dhāmne sarvadivaukasām
a mahābhūtādhipataye rudrāṇāṃ pataye tathā
c ādityapataye caiva vasūnāṃ pataye tathā
a aśvibhyāṃ pataye caiva marutāṃ pataye tathā
c vedayajñādhipataye vedāṅgapataye 'pi ca
a samudravāsine nityaṃ haraye muñjakeśine
c śāntaye sarvabhūtānāṃ mokṣadharmānubhāṣiṇe
a tapasāṃ tejasāṃ caiva pataye yaśaso 'pi ca
c vācaś ca pataye nityaṃ saritāṃ pataye tathā
a kapardine varāhāya ekaśṛṅgāya dhīmate
c vivasvate 'śvaśirase caturmūrtidhṛte sadā
a guhyāya jñānadṛśyāya akṣarāya kṣarāya ca
c eṣa devaḥ saṃcarati sarvatragatir avyayaḥ
a evam etat purā dṛṣṭaṃ mayā vai jñānacakṣuṣā
c kathitaṃ tac ca vaḥ sarvaṃ mayā pṛṣṭena tattvataḥ
a kriyatāṃ madvacaḥ śiṣyāḥ sevyatāṃ harir īśvaraḥ
c gīyatāṃ vedaśabdaiś ca pūjyatāṃ ca yathāvidhi
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a ity uktās tu vayaṃ tena vedavyāsena dhīmatā
c sarve śiṣyāḥ sutaś cāsya śukaḥ paramadharmavit
a sa cāsmākam upādhyāyaḥ sahāsmābhir viśāṃ pate
c caturvedodgatābhiś ca ṛgbhis tam abhituṣṭuve
a etat te sarvam ākhyātaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
c evaṃ me 'kathayad rājan purā dvaipāyano guruḥ
a yaś cedaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ yaś cedaṃ parikīrtayet
c namo bhagavate kṛtvā samāhitamanā naraḥ
a bhavaty arogo dyutimān balarūpasamanvitaḥ
c āturo mucyate rogād baddho mucyeta bandhanāt
a kāmakāmī labhet kāmaṃ dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt
c brāhmaṇaḥ sarvavedī syāt kṣatriyo vijayī bhavet
e vaiśyo vipulalābhaḥ syāc chūdraḥ sukham avāpnuyāt
a aputro labhate putraṃ kanyā caivepsitaṃ patim
c lagnagarbhā vimucyeta garbhiṇī janayet sutam
e vandhyā prasavam āpnoti putrapautrasamṛddhimat
a kṣemeṇa gacched adhvānam idaṃ yaḥ paṭhate pathi
c yo yaṃ kāmaṃ kāmayate sa tam āpnoti ca dhruvam
d ity āha bhagavān vyāsaḥ parāśarasutaḥ prabhuḥ
a idaṃ maharṣer vacanaṃ viniścitaṃ
mahātmanaḥ puruṣavarasya kīrtanam
c samāgamaṃ carṣidivaukasām imaṃ
niśamya bhaktāḥ susukhaṃ labhante
 janamejaya uvāca
a astauṣīd yair imaṃ vyāsaḥ saśiṣyo madhusūdanam
c nāmabhir vividhair eṣāṃ niruktaṃ bhagavan mama
a vaktum arhasi śuśrūṣoḥ prajāpatipater hareḥ
c śrutvā bhaveyaṃ yat pūtaḥ śaraccandra ivāmalaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śṛṇu rājan yathācaṣṭa phalgunasya harir vibhuḥ
c prasannātmātmano nāmnāṃ niruktaṃ guṇakarmajam
a nāmabhiḥ kīrtitais tasya keśavasya mahātmanaḥ
c pṛṣṭavān keśavaṃ rājan phalgunaḥ paravīrahā
 arjuna uvāca
a bhagavan bhūtabhavyeśa sarvabhūtasṛg avyaya
c lokadhāma jagannātha lokānām abhayaprada
a yāni nāmāni te deva kīrtitāni maharṣibhiḥ
c vedeṣu sapurāṇeṣu yāni guhyāni karmabhiḥ
a teṣāṃ niruktaṃ tvatto 'haṃ śrotum icchāmi keśava
c na hy anyo vartayen nāmnāṃ niruktaṃ tvām ṛte prabho
 śrībhagavān uvāca
a ṛgvede sayajurvede tathaivātharvasāmasu
c purāṇe sopaniṣade tathaiva jyotiṣe 'rjuna
a sāṃkhye ca yogaśāstre ca āyurvede tathaiva ca
c bahūni mama nāmāni kīrtitāni maharṣibhiḥ
a gauṇāni tatra nāmāni karmajāni ca kāni cit
c niruktaṃ karmajānāṃ ca śṛṇuṣva prayato 'nagha
e kathyamānaṃ mayā tāta tvaṃ hi me 'rdhaṃ smṛtaḥ purā
a namo 'tiyaśase tasmai dehināṃ paramātmane
c nārāyaṇāya viśvāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane
a yasya prasādajo brahmā rudraś ca krodhasaṃbhavaḥ
c yo 'sau yonir hi sarvasya sthāvarasya carasya ca
a aṣṭādaśaguṇaṃ yat tat sattvaṃ sattvavatāṃ vara
c prakṛtiḥ sā parā mahyaṃ rodasī yogadhāriṇī
e ṛtā satyāmarājayyā lokānām ātmasaṃjñitā
a tasmāt sarvāḥ pravartante sargapralayavikriyāḥ
c tato yajñaś ca yaṣṭā ca purāṇaḥ puruṣo virāṭ
e aniruddha iti prokto lokānāṃ prabhavāpyayaḥ
a brāhme rātrikṣaye prāpte tasya hy amitatejasaḥ
c prasādāt prādurabhavat padmaṃ padmanibhekṣaṇa
e tatra brahmā samabhavat sa tasyaiva prasādajaḥ
a ahnaḥ kṣaye lalāṭāc ca suto devasya vai tathā
c krodhāviṣṭasya saṃjajñe rudraḥ saṃhārakārakaḥ
a etau dvau vibudhaśreṣṭhau prasādakrodhajau smṛtau
c tadādeśitapanthānau sṛṣṭisaṃhārakārakau
e nimittamātraṃ tāv atra sarvaprāṇivarapradau
a kapardī jaṭilo muṇḍaḥ śmaśānagṛhasevakaḥ
c ugravratadharo rudro yogī tripuradāruṇaḥ
a dakṣakratuharaś caiva bhaganetraharas tathā
c nārāyaṇātmako jñeyaḥ pāṇḍaveya yuge yuge
d yo 'sau rudraḥ so 'ham asmi yo 'ham asmi śivaḥ paraḥ
d yathā rudras tathāhaṃ ca nāvayor antaraṃ tathā
a tasmin hi pūjyamāne vai devadeve maheśvare
c saṃpūjito bhavet pārtha devo nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
a aham ātmā hi lokānāṃ viśvānāṃ pāṇḍunandana
c tasmād ātmānam evāgre rudraṃ saṃpūjayāmy aham
a yady ahaṃ nārcayeyaṃ vai īśānaṃ varadaṃ śivam
c ātmānaṃ nārcayet kaś cid iti me bhāvitaṃ manaḥ
e mayā pramāṇaṃ hi kṛtaṃ lokaḥ samanuvartate
a pramāṇāni hi pūjyāni tatas taṃ pūjayāmy aham
c yas taṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti yo 'nu taṃ sa hi mām anu
a rudro nārāyaṇaś caiva sattvam ekaṃ dvidhākṛtam
c loke carati kaunteya vyaktisthaṃ sarvakarmasu
a na hi me kena cid deyo varaḥ pāṇḍavanandana
c iti saṃcintya manasā purāṇaṃ viśvam īśvaram
e putrārtham ārādhitavān ātmānam aham ātmanā
a na hi viṣṇuḥ praṇamati kasmai cid vibudhāya tu
c ṛta ātmānam eveti tato rudraṃ bhajāmy aham
a sabrahmakāḥ sarudrāś ca sendrā devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
c arcayanti suraśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim
a bhaviṣyatāṃ vartatāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ caiva bhārata
c sarveṣām agraṇīr viṣṇuḥ sevyaḥ pūjyaś ca nityaśaḥ
a namasva havyadaṃ viṣṇuṃ tathā śaraṇadaṃ nama
c varadaṃ namasva kaunteya havyakavyabhujaṃ nama
a caturvidhā mama janā bhaktā evaṃ hi te śrutam
c teṣām ekāntinaḥ śreṣṭhās te caivānanyadevatāḥ
e aham eva gatis teṣāṃ nirāśīḥkarmakāriṇām
a ye ca śiṣṭās trayo bhaktāḥ phalakāmā hi te matāḥ
c sarve cyavanadharmāṇaḥ pratibuddhas tu śreṣṭhabhāk
a brahmāṇaṃ śitikaṇṭhaṃ ca yāś cānyā devatāḥ smṛtāḥ
c prabuddhavaryāḥ sevante mām evaiṣyanti yat param
e bhaktaṃ prati viśeṣas te eṣa pārthānukīrtitaḥ
a tvaṃ caivāhaṃ ca kaunteya naranārāyaṇau smṛtau
c bhārāvataraṇārthaṃ hi praviṣṭau mānuṣīṃ tanum
a jānāmy adhyātmayogāṃś ca yo 'haṃ yasmāc ca bhārata
c nivṛttilakṣaṇo dharmas tathābhyudayiko 'pi ca
a narāṇām ayanaṃ khyātam aham ekaḥ sanātanaḥ
c āpo nārā iti proktā āpo vai narasūnavaḥ
e ayanaṃ mama tat pūrvam ato nārāyaṇo hy aham
a chādayāmi jagad viśvaṃ bhūtvā sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ
c sarvabhūtādhivāsaś ca vāsudevas tato hy aham
a gatiś ca sarvabhūtānāṃ prajānāṃ cāpi bhārata
c vyāptā me rodasī pārtha kāntiś cābhyadhikā mama
a adhibhūtāni cānte 'haṃ tad icchaṃś cāsmi bhārata
c kramaṇāc cāpy ahaṃ pārtha viṣṇur ity abhisaṃjñitaḥ
a damāt siddhiṃ parīpsanto māṃ janāḥ kāmayanti hi
c divaṃ corvīṃ ca madhyaṃ ca tasmād dāmodaro hy aham
a pṛśnir ity ucyate cānnaṃ vedā āpo 'mṛtaṃ tathā
c mamaitāni sadā garbhe pṛśnigarbhas tato hy aham
a ṛṣayaḥ prāhur evaṃ māṃ tritakūpābhipātitam
c pṛśnigarbha tritaṃ pāhīty ekatadvitapātitam
a tataḥ sa brahmaṇaḥ putra ādyo ṛṣivaras tritaḥ
c uttatārodapānād vai pṛśnigarbhānukīrtanāt
a sūryasya tapato lokān agneḥ somasya cāpy uta
c aṃśavo ye prakāśante mama te keśasaṃjñitāḥ
e sarvajñāḥ keśavaṃ tasmān mām āhur dvijasattamāḥ
a svapatnyām āhito garbha utathyena mahātmanā
c utathye 'ntarhite caiva kadā cid devamāyayā
e bṛhaspatir athāvindat tāṃ patnīṃ tasya bhārata
a tato vai tam ṛṣiśreṣṭhaṃ maithunopagataṃ tathā
c uvāca garbhaḥ kaunteya pañcabhūtasamanvitaḥ
a pūrvāgato 'haṃ varada nārhasy ambāṃ prabādhitum
c etad bṛhaspatiḥ śrutvā cukrodha ca śaśāpa ca
a maithunopagato yasmāt tvayāhaṃ vinivāritaḥ
c tasmād andho jāsyasi tvaṃ macchāpān nātra saṃśayaḥ
a sa śāpād ṛṣimukhyasya dīrghaṃ tama upeyivān
c sa hi dīrghatamā nāma nāmnā hy āsīd ṛṣiḥ purā
a vedān avāpya caturaḥ sāṅgopāṅgān sanātanān
c prayojayām āsa tadā nāma guhyam idaṃ mama
a ānupūrvyeṇa vidhinā keśaveti punaḥ punaḥ
c sa cakṣuṣmān samabhavad gautamaś cābhavat punaḥ
a evaṃ hi varadaṃ nāma keśaveti mamārjuna
c devānām atha sarveṣām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām
a agniḥ somena saṃyukta ekayoni mukhaṃ kṛtam
c agnīṣomātmakaṃ tasmāj jagat kṛtsnaṃ carācaram
A api hi purāṇe bhavati
B ekayonyātmakāv agnīṣomau
C devāś cāgnimukhā iti
D ekayonitvāc ca parasparaṃ mahayanto lokān dhārayata iti
 arjuna uvāca
a agnīṣomau kathaṃ pūrvam ekayonī pravartitau
c eṣa me saṃśayo jātas taṃ chindhi madhusūdana
 śrībhagavān uvāca
a hanta te vartayiṣyāmi purāṇaṃ pāṇḍunandana
c ātmatejodbhavaṃ pārtha śṛṇuṣvaikamanā mama
A saṃprakṣālanakāle 'tikrānte caturthe yugasahasrānte
B avyakte sarvabhūtapralaye sthāvarajaṅgame
C jyotirdharaṇivāyurahite 'ndhe tamasi jalaikārṇave loke
D tama ity evābhibhūte 'saṃjñake 'dvitīye pratiṣṭhite
E naiva rātryāṃ na divase na sati nāsati na vyakte nāvyakte vyavasthite
 F etasyām avasthāyāṃ nārāyaṇaguṇāśrayād akṣayād ajarād anindriyād agrāhyād asaṃbhavāt satyād ahiṃsrāl lalāmād vividhapravṛttiviśeṣāt 
G akṣayād ajarāmarād amūrtitaḥ sarvavyāpinaḥ sarvakartuḥ śāśvatāt tamasaḥ puruṣaḥ prādurbhūto harir avyayaḥ
A nidarśanam api hy atra bhavati
B nāsīd aho na rātrir āsīt
C na sad āsīn nāsad āsīt
D tama eva purastād abhavad viśvarūpam
E sā viśvasya jananīty evam asyārtho 'nubhāṣyate
 A tasyedānīṃ tamaḥsaṃbhavasya puruṣasya padmayoner brahmaṇaḥ prādurbhāve sa puruṣaḥ prajāḥ sisṛkṣamāṇo netrābhyām agnīṣomau sasarja 
B tato bhūtasarge pravṛtte prajākramavaśād brahmakṣatram upātiṣṭhat
C yaḥ somas tad brahma yad brahma te brāhmaṇāḥ
D yo 'gnis tat kṣatraṃ kṣatrād brahma balavattaram
E kasmād iti lokapratyakṣaguṇam etat tad yathā
F brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃ bhūtaṃ notpannapūrvam
G dīpyamāne 'gnau juhotīti kṛtvā bravīmi
H bhūtasargaḥ kṛto brahmaṇā bhūtāni ca pratiṣṭhāpya trailokyaṃ dhāryata iti
A mantravādo 'pi hi bhavati
B tvam agne yajñānāṃ hotā viśveṣām
C hito devebhir mānuṣe jane iti
D nidarśanaṃ cātra bhavati
E viśveṣām agne yajñānāṃ hoteti
F hito devair mānuṣair jagata iti
G agnir hi yajñānāṃ hotā kartā
H sa cāgnir brahma
A na hy ṛte mantrād dhavanam asti
B na vinā puruṣaṃ tapaḥ saṃbhavati
C havir mantrāṇāṃ saṃpūjā vidyate devamanuṣyāṇām anena tvaṃ hoteti niyuktaḥ
D ye ca mānuṣā hotrādhikārās te ca
E brāhmaṇasya hi yājanaṃ vidhīyate na kṣatravaiśyayor dvijātyoḥ
F tasmād brāhmaṇā hy agnibhūtā yajñān udvahanti
G yajñā devāṃs tarpayanti devāḥ pṛthivīṃ bhāvayanti
A śatapathe hi brāhmaṇaṃ bhavati
B agnau samiddhe sa juhoti yo vidvān brāhmaṇamukhe dānāhutiṃ juhoti
C evam apy agnibhūtā brāhmaṇā vidvāṃso 'gniṃ bhāvayanti
D agnir viṣṇuḥ sarvabhūtāny anupraviśya prāṇān dhārayati
E api cātra sanatkumāragītāḥ ślokā bhavanti
a viśvaṃ brahmāsṛjat pūrvaṃ sarvādir niravaskaram
c brahmaghoṣair divaṃ tiṣṭhanty amarā brahmayonayaḥ
a brāhmaṇānāṃ matir vākyaṃ karma śraddhā tapāṃsi ca
c dhārayanti mahīṃ dyāṃ ca śaityād vāry amṛtaṃ yathā
a nāsti satyāt paro dharmo nāsti mātṛsamo guruḥ
c brāhmaṇebhyaḥ paraṃ nāsti pretya ceha ca bhūtaye
a naiṣām ukṣā vardhate nota vāhā
na gargaro mathyate saṃpradāne
c apadhvastā dasyubhūtā bhavanti
yeṣāṃ rāṣṭre brāhmaṇā vṛttihīnāḥ
A vedapurāṇetihāsaprāmāṇyān nārāyaṇamukhodgatāḥ sarvātmānaḥ sarvakartāraḥ sarvabhāvanāś ca brāhmaṇāḥ
B vāksamakālaṃ hi tasya devasya varapradasya brāhmaṇāḥ prathamaṃ prādurbhūtā brāhmaṇebhyaś ca śeṣā varṇāḥ prādurbhūtāḥ
 C itthaṃ ca surāsuraviśiṣṭā brāhmaṇā yadā mayā brahmabhūtena purā svayam evotpāditāḥ surāsuramaharṣayo bhūtaviśeṣāḥ sthāpitā nigṛhītāś 
A ahalyādharṣaṇanimittaṃ hi gautamād dhariśmaśrutām indraḥ prāptaḥ
B kauśikanimittaṃ cendro muṣkaviyogaṃ meṣavṛṣaṇatvaṃ cāvāpa
C aśvinor grahapratiṣedhodyatavajrasya puraṃdarasya cyavanena stambhito bāhuḥ
D kratuvadhaprāptamanyunā ca dakṣeṇa bhūyas tapasā cātmānaṃ saṃyojya netrākṛtir anyā lalāṭe rudrasyotpāditā
A tripuravadhārthaṃ dīkṣām abhyupagatasya rudrasyośanasā śiraso jaṭā utkṛtya prayuktāḥ
B tataḥ prādurbhūtā bhujagāḥ
C tair asya bhujagaiḥ pīḍyamānaḥ kaṇṭho nīlatām upanītaḥ
D pūrve ca manvantare svāyaṃbhuve nārāyaṇahastabandhagrahaṇān nīlakaṇṭhatvam eva vā
A amṛtotpādane puraścaraṇatām upagatasyāṅgiraso bṛhaspater upaspṛśato na prasādaṃ gatavatyaḥ kilāpaḥ
B atha bṛhaspatir apāṃ cukrodha
 C yasmān mamopaspṛśataḥ kaluṣībhūtā na prasādam upagatās tasmād adyaprabhṛti jhaṣamakaramatsyakacchapajantusaṃkīrṇāḥ kaluṣībhavateti 
D tadāprabhṛty āpo yādobhiḥ saṃkīrṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ
A viśvarūpo vai tvāṣṭraḥ purohito devānām āsīt svasrīyo 'surāṇām
B sa pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat parokṣam asurebhyaḥ
A atha hiraṇyakaśipuṃ puraskṛtya viśvarūpamātaraṃ svasāram asurā varam ayācanta
B he svasar ayaṃ te putras tvāṣṭro viśvarūpas triśirā devānāṃ purohitaḥ pratyakṣaṃ devebhyo bhāgam adadat parokṣam asmākam
C tato devā vardhante vayaṃ kṣīyāmaḥ
D tad enaṃ tvaṃ vārayitum arhasi tathā yathāsmān bhajed iti
A atha viśvarūpaṃ nandanavanam upagataṃ mātovāca
B putra kiṃ parapakṣavardhanas tvaṃ mātulapakṣaṃ nāśayasi
C nārhasy evaṃ kartum iti
D sa viśvarūpo mātur vākyam anatikramaṇīyam iti matvā saṃpūjya hiraṇyakaśipum agāt
A hairaṇyagarbhāc ca vasiṣṭhād dhiraṇyakaśipuḥ śāpaṃ prāptavān
B yasmāt tvayānyo vṛto hotā tasmād asamāptayajñas tvam apūrvāt sattvajātād vadhaṃ prāpsyasīti
C tacchāpadānād dhiraṇyakaśipuḥ prāptavān vadham
A viśvarūpo mātṛpakṣavardhano 'tyarthaṃ tapasy abhavat
B tasya vratabhaṅgārtham indro bahvīḥ śrīmatyo 'psaraso niyuyoja
C tāś ca dṛṣṭvā manaḥ kṣubhitaṃ tasyābhavat tāsu cāpsaraḥsu nacirād eva sakto 'bhavat
D saktaṃ cainaṃ jñātvāpsarasa ūcur gacchāmahe vayaṃ yathāgatam iti
A tās tvāṣṭra uvāca
B kva gamiṣyatha āsyatāṃ tāvan mayā saha śreyo bhaviṣyatīti
C tās tam abruvan
D vayaṃ devastriyo 'psarasa indraṃ varadaṃ purā prabhaviṣṇuṃ vṛṇīmaha iti
A atha tā viśvarūpo 'bravīd adyaiva sendrā devā na bhaviṣyantīti
B tato mantrāñ jajāpa
C tair mantraiḥ prāvardhata triśirāḥ
D ekenāsyena sarvalokeṣu dvijaiḥ kriyāvadbhir yajñeṣu suhutaṃ somaṃ papāv ekenāpa ekena sendrān devān
E athendras taṃ vivardhamānaṃ somapānāpyāyitasarvagātraṃ dṛṣṭvā cintām āpede
A devāś ca te sahendreṇa brahmāṇam abhijagmur ūcuś ca
B viśvarūpeṇa sarvayajñeṣu suhutaḥ somaḥ pīyate
C vayam abhāgāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ
D asurapakṣo vardhate vayaṃ kṣīyāmaḥ
E tad arhasi no vidhātuṃ śreyo yad anantaram iti
A tān brahmovāca ṛṣir bhārgavas tapas tapyate dadhīcaḥ
B sa yācyatāṃ varaṃ yathā kalevaraṃ jahyāt
C tasyāsthibhir vajraṃ kriyatām iti
A devās tatrāgacchan yatra dadhīco bhagavān ṛṣis tapas tepe
B sendrā devās tam abhigamyocur bhagavaṃs tapasaḥ kuśalam avighnaṃ ceti
C tān dadhīca uvāca svāgataṃ bhavadbhyaḥ kiṃ kriyatām
D yad vakṣyatha tat kariṣyāmīti
E te tam abruvañ śarīraparityāgaṃ lokahitārthaṃ bhagavān kartum arhatīti
F atha dadhīcas tathaivāvimanāḥ sukhaduḥkhasamo mahāyogī ātmānaṃ samādhāya śarīraparityāgaṃ cakāra
 evam ukto dadhīcas tān abravīt  
sahasraṃ varṣāṇām
 aindraṃ padam avāpyate mayā yadi jahyām  
tathety uktvendraḥ
 svasthānaṃ dattvā tapasvy abhavat  
indro dadhīco 'bhavat 
 tāvat pūrṇe sendrā devā āgaman kālo 'yaṃ dehanyāsāyeti 
 śrutir apy atra bhavati 
indro dadhīco 'sthibhiḥ kṛtam
 Ṛv a iti 
A tasya paramātmany avasṛte tāny asthīni dhātā saṃgṛhya vajram akarot
B tena vajreṇābhedyenāpradhṛṣyeṇa brahmāsthisaṃbhūtena viṣṇupraviṣṭenendro viśvarūpaṃ jaghāna
C śirasāṃ cāsya chedanam akarot
D tasmād anantaraṃ viśvarūpagātramathanasaṃbhavaṃ tvaṣṭrotpāditam evāriṃ vṛtram indro jaghāna
 takṣṇā yajñapaśoḥ śiras te dadāmīty uktvā
 A tasyāṃ dvaidhībhūtāyāṃ brahmavadhyāyāṃ bhayād indro devarājyaṃ parityajya apsu saṃbhavāṃ śītalāṃ mānasasarogatāṃ nalinīṃ prapede 
B tatra caiśvaryayogād aṇumātro bhūtvā bisagranthiṃ praviveśa
A atha brahmavadhyābhayapranaṣṭe trailokyanāthe śacīpatau jagad anīśvaraṃ babhūva
B devān rajas tamaś cāviveśa
C mantrā na prāvartanta maharṣīṇām
D rakṣāṃsi prādurabhavan
E brahma cotsādanaṃ jagāma
F anindrāś cābalā lokāḥ supradhṛṣyā babhūvuḥ
A atha devā ṛṣayaś cāyuṣaḥ putraṃ nahuṣaṃ nāma devarājatve 'bhiṣiṣicuḥ
B nahuṣaḥ pañcabhiḥ śatair jyotiṣāṃ lalāṭe jvaladbhiḥ sarvatejoharais triviṣṭapaṃ pālayāṃ babhūva
C atha lokāḥ prakṛtim āpedire svasthāś ca babhūvuḥ
A athovāca nahuṣaḥ
B sarvaṃ māṃ śakropabhuktam upasthitam ṛte śacīm iti
C sa evam uktvā śacīsamīpam agamad uvāca cainām
D subhage 'ham indro devānāṃ bhajasva mām iti
E taṃ śacī pratyuvāca
F prakṛtyā tvaṃ dharmavatsalaḥ somavaṃśodbhavaś ca
G nārhasi parapatnīdharṣaṇaṃ kartum iti
A tām athovāca nahuṣaḥ
B aindraṃ padam adhyāsyate mayā
C aham indrasya rājyaratnaharo nātrādharmaḥ kaś cit tvam indrabhukteti
D sā tam uvāca
E asti mama kiṃ cid vratam aparyavasitam
F tasyāvabhṛthe tvām upagamiṣyāmi kaiś cid evāhobhir iti
G sa śacyaivam abhihito nahuṣo jagāma
A atha śacī duḥkhaśokārtā bhartṛdarśanalālasā nahuṣabhayagṛhītā bṛhaspatim upāgacchat
B sa ca tām abhigatāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva dhyānaṃ praviśya bhartṛkāryatatparāṃ jñātvā bṛhaspatir uvāca
C anenaiva vratena tapasā cānvitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutim āhvaya
D sā tavendraṃ darśayiṣyatīti
A sātha mahāniyamam āsthitā devīṃ varadām upaśrutiṃ mantrair āhvayat
B sopaśrutiḥ śacīsamīpam agāt
C uvāca cainām iyam asmi tvayopahūtopasthitā
D kiṃ te priyaṃ karavāṇīti
E tāṃ mūrdhnā praṇamyovāca śacī bhagavaty arhasi me bhartāraṃ darśayituṃ tvaṃ satyā matā ceti
F saināṃ mānasaṃ saro 'nayat
G tatrendraṃ bisagranthigatam adarśayat
A tām indraḥ patnīṃ kṛśāṃ glānāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā cintayāṃ babhūva
B aho mama mahad duḥkham idam adyopagatam
C naṣṭaṃ hi mām iyam anviṣyopāgamad duḥkhārteti
D tām indra uvāca kathaṃ vartayasīti
E sā tam uvāca
F nahuṣo mām āhvayati
G kālaś cāsya mayā kṛta iti
A tām indra uvāca
B gaccha
C nahuṣas tvayā vācyo 'pūrveṇa mām ṛṣiyuktena yānena tvam adhirūḍha udvahasva
D indrasya hi mahānti vāhanāni manasaḥ priyāṇy adhirūḍhāni mayā
E tvam anyenopayātum arhasīti
F saivam uktā hṛṣṭā jagāma
G indro 'pi bisagranthim evāviveśa bhūyaḥ
A athendrāṇīm abhyāgatāṃ dṛṣṭvovāca nahuṣaḥ pūrṇaḥ sa kāla iti
B taṃ śacy abravīc chakreṇa yathoktam
C sa maharṣiyuktaṃ vāhanam adhirūḍhaḥ śacīsamīpam upāgacchat
A atha maitrāvaruṇiḥ kumbhayonir agastyo maharṣīn vikriyamāṇāṃs tān nahuṣeṇāpaśyat
B padbhyāṃ ca tenāspṛśyata
C tataḥ sa nahuṣam abravīd akāryapravṛtta pāpa patasva mahīm
D sarpo bhava yāvad bhūmir girayaś ca tiṣṭheyus tāvad iti
E sa maharṣivākyasamakālam eva tasmād yānād avāpatat
A athānindraṃ punas trailokyam abhavat
B tato devā ṛṣayaś ca bhagavantaṃ viṣṇuṃ śaraṇam indrārthe 'bhijagmuḥ
C ūcuś cainaṃ bhagavann indraṃ brahmavadhyābhibhūtaṃ trātum arhasīti
D tataḥ sa varadas tān abravīd aśvamedhaṃ yajñaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ śakro 'bhiyajatu
E tataḥ svaṃ sthānaṃ prāpsyatīti
A tato devā ṛṣayaś cendraṃ nāpaśyan yadā tadā śacīm ūcur gaccha subhage indram ānayasveti
B sā punas tat saraḥ samabhyagacchat
C indraś ca tasmāt sarasaḥ samutthāya bṛhaspatim abhijagāma
D bṛhaspatiś cāśvamedhaṃ mahākratuṃ śakrāyāharat
E tataḥ kṛṣṇasāraṅgaṃ medhyam aśvam utsṛjya vāhanaṃ tam eva kṛtvā indraṃ marutpatiṃ bṛhaspatiḥ svasthānaṃ prāpayām āsa
A tataḥ sa devarāḍ devair ṛṣibhiḥ stūyamānas triviṣṭapastho niṣkalmaṣo babhūva
B brahmavadhyāṃ caturṣu sthāneṣu vanitāgnivanaspatigoṣu vyabhajat

vṛkṣeṣu niryāsaḥ

B sa bharadvājena sasalilena pāṇinorasi tāḍitaḥ salakṣaṇoraskaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ
A bhṛguṇā maharṣiṇā śapto 'gniḥ sarvabhakṣatvam upanītaḥ
A aditir vai devānām annam apacad etad bhuktvāsurān haniṣyantīti
B tatra budho vratacaryāsamāptāv āgacchat
C aditiṃ cāvocad bhikṣāṃ dehīti
D tatra devaiḥ pūrvam etat prāśyaṃ nānyenety aditir bhikṣāṃ nādāt
E atha bhikṣāpratyākhyānaruṣitena budhena brahmabhūtena vivasvato dvitīye janmany aṇḍasaṃjñitasyāṇḍaṃ māritam adityāḥ
F sa mārtaṇḍo vivasvān abhavac chrāddhadevaḥ
 aditiḥ śaptā aditer udare bhaviṣyati vyathā
A dakṣasya vai duhitaraḥ ṣaṣṭir āsan
B tābhyaḥ kaśyapāya trayodaśa prādād daśa dharmāya daśa manave saptaviṃśatim indave
C tāsu tulyāsu nakṣatrākhyāṃ gatāsu somo rohiṇyām abhyadhikāṃ prītim akarot
D tatas tāḥ śeṣāḥ patnya īrṣyāvatyaḥ pituḥ samīpaṃ gatvemam arthaṃ śaśaṃsuḥ
E bhagavann asmāsu tulyaprabhāvāsu somo rohiṇīm adhikaṃ bhajatīti
F so 'bravīd yakṣmainam āvekṣyatīti
A dakṣaśāpāt somaṃ rājānaṃ yakṣmāviveśa
B sa yakṣmaṇāviṣṭo dakṣam agamat
C dakṣaś cainam abravīn na samaṃ vartasa iti
D tatrarṣayaḥ somam abruvan kṣīyase yakṣmaṇā
E paścimasyāṃ diśi samudre hiraṇyasarastīrtham
F tatra gatvātmānam abhiṣecayasveti
G athāgacchat somas tatra hiraṇyasarastīrtham
H gatvā cātmanaḥ snapanam akarot
I snātvā cātmānaṃ pāpmano mokṣayām āsa
J tatra cāvabhāsitas tīrthe yadā somas tadāprabhṛti tīrthaṃ tat prabhāsam iti nāmnā khyātaṃ babhūva
K tacchāpād adyāpi kṣīyate somo 'māvāsyāntarasthaḥ
L paurṇamāsīmātre 'dhiṣṭhito meghalekhāpraticchannaṃ vapur darśayati
M meghasadṛśaṃ varṇam agamat tad asya śaśalakṣma vimalam abhavat
A sthūlaśirā maharṣir meroḥ prāguttare digbhāge tapas tepe
B tasya tapas tapyamānasya sarvagandhavahaḥ śucir vāyur vivāyamānaḥ śarīram aspṛśat
C sa tapasā tāpitaśarīraḥ kṛśo vāyunopavījyamāno hṛdayaparitoṣam agamat
 D tatra tasyānilavyajanakṛtaparitoṣasya sadyo vanaspatayaḥ puṣpaśobhāṃ na darśitavanta iti sa etāñ śaśāpa na sarvakālaṃ puṣpavanto 
A nārāyaṇo lokahitārthaṃ vaḍavāmukho nāma maharṣiḥ purābhavat
B tasya merau tapas tapyataḥ samudra āhūto nāgataḥ
C tenāmarṣitenātmagātroṣmaṇā samudraḥ stimitajalaḥ kṛtaḥ
D svedaprasyandanasadṛśaś cāsya lavaṇabhāvo janitaḥ
E uktaś cāpeyo bhaviṣyasi
F etac ca te toyaṃ vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitena pīyamānaṃ madhuraṃ bhaviṣyati
G tad etad adyāpi vaḍavāmukhasaṃjñitenānuvartinā toyaṃ sāmudraṃ pīyate
 punar umā dakṣakopād dhimavato girer duhitā babhūva
A himavato girer duhitaram umāṃ rudraś cakame
B bhṛgur api ca maharṣir himavantam āgamyābravīt kanyām umāṃ me dehīti
C tam abravīd dhimavān abhilaṣito varo rudra iti
D tam abravīd bhṛgur yasmāt tvayāhaṃ kanyāvaraṇakṛtabhāvaḥ pratyākhyātas tasmān na ratnānāṃ bhavān bhājanaṃ bhaviṣyatīti
E adyaprabhṛty etad avasthitam ṛṣivacanam
A tad evaṃvidhaṃ māhātmyaṃ brāhmaṇānām
B kṣatram api śāśvatīm avyayāṃ pṛthivīṃ patnīm abhigamya bubhuje
C tad etad brahmāgnīṣomīyam
D tena jagad dhāryate
 śrībhagavān uvāca
a sūryācandramasau śaśvat keśair me aṃśusaṃjñitaiḥ
b nāmnāṃ niruktaṃ vakṣyāmi śṛṇuṣvaikāgramānasaḥ
c bodhayaṃs tāpayaṃś caiva jagad uttiṣṭhataḥ pṛthak
a bodhanāt tāpanāc caiva jagato harṣaṇaṃ bhavet
c agnīṣomakṛtair ebhiḥ karmabhiḥ pāṇḍunandana
e hṛṣīkeśo 'ham īśāno varado lokabhāvanaḥ
a iḍopahūtayogena hare bhāgaṃ kratuṣv aham
c varṇaś ca me hariśreṣṭhas tasmād dharir ahaṃ smṛtaḥ
a dhāma sāro hi lokānām ṛtaṃ caiva vicāritam
c ṛtadhāmā tato vipraiḥ satyaś cāhaṃ prakīrtitaḥ
a naṣṭāṃ ca dharaṇīṃ pūrvam avindaṃ vai guhāgatām
c govinda iti māṃ devā vāgbhiḥ samabhituṣṭuvuḥ
a śipiviṣṭeti cākhyāyāṃ hīnaromā ca yo bhavet
c tenāviṣṭaṃ hi yat kiṃ cic chipiviṣṭaṃ hi tat smṛtam
a yāsko mām ṛṣir avyagro naikayajñeṣu gītavān
c śipiviṣṭa iti hy asmād guhyanāmadharo hy aham
a stutvā māṃ śipiviṣṭeti yāsko ṛṣir udāradhīḥ
c matprasādād adho naṣṭaṃ niruktam abhijagmivān
a na hi jāto na jāye 'haṃ na janiṣye kadā cana
c kṣetrajñaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tasmād aham ajaḥ smṛtaḥ
a noktapūrvaṃ mayā kṣudram aślīlaṃ vā kadā cana
c ṛtā brahmasutā sā me satyā devī sarasvatī
a sac cāsac caiva kaunteya mayāveśitam ātmani
c pauṣkare brahmasadane satyaṃ mām ṛṣayo viduḥ
a sattvān na cyutapūrvo 'haṃ sattvaṃ vai viddhi matkṛtam
c janmanīhābhavat sattvaṃ paurvikaṃ me dhanaṃjaya
a nirāśīḥkarmasaṃyuktaṃ sātvataṃ māṃ prakalpaya
c sātvatajñānadṛṣṭo 'haṃ sātvataḥ sātvatāṃ patiḥ
a kṛṣāmi medinīṃ pārtha bhūtvā kārṣṇāyaso mahān
c kṛṣṇo varṇaś ca me yasmāt tasmāt kṛṣṇo 'ham arjuna
a mayā saṃśleṣitā bhūmir adbhir vyoma ca vāyunā
c vāyuś ca tejasā sārdhaṃ vaikuṇṭhatvaṃ tato mama
a nirvāṇaṃ paramaṃ saukhyaṃ dharmo 'sau para ucyate
c tasmān na cyutapūrvo 'ham acyutas tena karmaṇā
a pṛthivīnabhasī cobhe viśrute viśvalaukike
c tayoḥ saṃdhāraṇārthaṃ hi mām adhokṣajam añjasā
a niruktaṃ vedaviduṣo ye ca śabdārthacintakāḥ
c te māṃ gāyanti prāgvaṃśe adhokṣaja iti sthitiḥ
d adho na kṣīyate yasmād vadanty anye 'py adhokṣajam
a śabda ekamatair eṣa vyāhṛtaḥ paramarṣibhiḥ
c nānyo hy adhokṣajo loke ṛte nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
a ghṛtaṃ mamārciṣo loke jantūnāṃ prāṇadhāraṇam
c ghṛtārcir aham avyagrair vedajñaiḥ parikīrtitaḥ
a trayo hi dhātavaḥ khyātāḥ karmajā iti ca smṛtāḥ
c pittaṃ śleṣmā ca vāyuś ca eṣa saṃghāta ucyate
a etaiś ca dhāryate jantur etaiḥ kṣīṇaiś ca kṣīyate
c āyurvedavidas tasmāt tridhātuṃ māṃ pracakṣate
a vṛṣo hi bhagavān dharmaḥ khyāto lokeṣu bhārata
c naighaṇṭukapadākhyātaṃ viddhi māṃ vṛṣam uttamam
a kapir varāhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca dharmaś ca vṛṣa ucyate
c tasmād vṛṣākapiṃ prāha kaśyapo māṃ prajāpatiḥ
d nādimantaṃ na cāntaṃ ca kadā cid vidyate surāḥ
a na cādiṃ na madhyaṃ tathā naiva cāntaṃ
kadā cid vidante surāś cāsurāś ca
c anādyo hy amadhyas tathā cāpy anantaḥ
pragīto 'ham īśo vibhur lokasākṣī
a śucīni śravaṇīyāni śṛṇomīha dhanaṃjaya
c na ca pāpāni gṛhṇāmi tato 'haṃ vai śuciśravāḥ
a ekaśṛṅgaḥ purā bhūtvā varāho divyadarśanaḥ
c imām uddhṛtavān bhūmim ekaśṛṅgas tato hy aham
a tathaivāsaṃ trikakudo vārāhaṃ rūpam āsthitaḥ
c trikakut tena vikhyātaḥ śarīrasya tu māpanāt
a viriñca iti yaḥ proktaḥ kapilajñānacintakaiḥ
c sa prajāpatir evāhaṃ cetanāt sarvalokakṛt
a vidyāsahāyavantaṃ mām ādityasthaṃ sanātanam
c kapilaṃ prāhur ācāryāḥ sāṃkhyā niścitaniścayāḥ
a hiraṇyagarbho dyutimān eṣa yaś chandasi stutaḥ
c yogaiḥ saṃpūjyate nityaṃ sa evāhaṃ vibhuḥ smṛtaḥ
a ekaviṃśatiśākhaṃ ca ṛgvedaṃ māṃ pracakṣate
c sahasraśākhaṃ yat sāma ye vai vedavido janāḥ
e gāyanty āraṇyake viprā madbhaktās te 'pi durlabhāḥ
a ṣaṭpañcāśatam aṣṭau ca saptatriṃśatam ity uta
c yasmiñ śākhā yajurvede so 'ham ādhvaryave smṛtaḥ
a pañcakalpam atharvāṇaṃ kṛtyābhiḥ paribṛṃhitam
c kalpayanti hi māṃ viprā atharvāṇavidas tathā
a śākhābhedāś ca ye ke cid yāś ca śākhāsu gītayaḥ
c svaravarṇasamuccārāḥ sarvāṃs tān viddhi matkṛtān
a yat tad dhayaśiraḥ pārtha samudeti varapradam
c so 'ham evottare bhāge kramākṣaravibhāgavit
a rāmādeśitamārgeṇa matprasādān mahātmanā
c pāñcālena kramaḥ prāptas tasmād bhūtāt sanātanāt
e bābhravyagotraḥ sa babhau prathamaḥ kramapāragaḥ
a nārāyaṇād varaṃ labdhvā prāpya yogam anuttamam
c kramaṃ praṇīya śikṣāṃ ca praṇayitvā sa gālavaḥ
a kaṇḍarīko 'tha rājā ca brahmadattaḥ pratāpavān
c jātīmaraṇajaṃ duḥkhaṃ smṛtvā smṛtvā punaḥ punaḥ
e saptajātiṣu mukhyatvād yogānāṃ saṃpadaṃ gataḥ
a purāham ātmajaḥ pārtha prathitaḥ kāraṇāntare
c dharmasya kuruśārdūla tato 'haṃ dharmajaḥ smṛtaḥ
a naranārāyaṇau pūrvaṃ tapas tepatur avyayam
c dharmayānaṃ samārūḍhau parvate gandhamādane
a tatkālasamayaṃ caiva dakṣayajño babhūva ha
c na caivākalpayad bhāgaṃ dakṣo rudrasya bhārata
a tato dadhīcivacanād dakṣayajñam apāharat
c sasarja śūlaṃ krodhena prajvalantaṃ muhur muhuḥ
a tac chūlaṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā dakṣayajñaṃ savistaram
c āvayoḥ sahasāgacchad badaryāśramam antikāt
e vegena mahatā pārtha patan nārāyaṇorasi
a tataḥ svatejasāviṣṭāḥ keśā nārāyaṇasya ha
c babhūvur muñjavarṇās tu tato 'haṃ muñjakeśavān
a tac ca śūlaṃ vinirdhūtaṃ huṃkāreṇa mahātmanā
c jagāma śaṃkarakaraṃ nārāyaṇasamāhatam
a atha rudra upādhāvat tāv ṛṣī tapasānvitau
c tata enaṃ samuddhūtaṃ kaṇṭhe jagrāha pāṇinā
e nārāyaṇaḥ sa viśvātmā tenāsya śitikaṇṭhatā
a atha rudravighātārtham iṣīkāṃ jagṛhe naraḥ
c mantraiś ca saṃyuyojāśu so 'bhavat paraśur mahān
a kṣiptaś ca sahasā rudre khaṇḍanaṃ prāptavāṃs tadā
c tato 'haṃ khaṇḍaparaśuḥ smṛtaḥ paraśukhaṇḍanāt
d rudrasya bhāgaṃ pradadur bhāgam uccheṣaṇaṃ punaḥ
d śrutir apy atra bhavati vedair uktas tathā punaḥ
d uccheṣaṇabhāgo vai rudras tasyoccheṣaṇena hotavyam iti sarve
d gamyarūpeṇa tadā 
 arjuna uvāca
a asmin yuddhe tu vārṣṇeya trailokyamathane tadā
c jayaṃ kaḥ prāptavāṃs tatra śaṃsaitan me janārdana
 śrībhagavān uvāca
a tayoḥ saṃlagnayor yuddhe rudranārāyaṇātmanoḥ
c udvignāḥ sahasā kṛtsnā lokāḥ sarve 'bhavaṃs tadā
a nāgṛhṇāt pāvakaḥ śubhraṃ makheṣu suhutaṃ haviḥ
c vedā na pratibhānti sma ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
a devān rajas tamaś caiva samāviviśatus tadā
c vasudhā saṃcakampe 'tha nabhaś ca vipaphāla ha
a niṣprabhāṇi ca tejāṃsi brahmā caivāsanāc cyutaḥ
c agāc choṣaṃ samudraś ca himavāṃś ca vyaśīryata
a tasminn evaṃ samutpanne nimitte pāṇḍunandana
c brahmā vṛto devagaṇair ṛṣibhiś ca mahātmabhiḥ
e ājagāmāśu taṃ deśaṃ yatra yuddham avartata
a sāñjalipragraho bhūtvā caturvaktro niruktagaḥ
c uvāca vacanaṃ rudraṃ lokānām astu vai śivam
e nyasyāyudhāni viśveśa jagato hitakāmyayā
a yad akṣaram athāvyaktam īśaṃ lokasya bhāvanam
c kūṭasthaṃ kartṛnirdvaṃdvam akarteti ca yaṃ viduḥ
a vyaktibhāvagatasyāsya ekā mūrtir iyaṃ śivā
c naro nārāyaṇaś caiva jātau dharmakulodvahau
a tapasā mahatā yuktau devaśreṣṭhau mahāvratau
c ahaṃ prasādajas tasya kasmiṃś cit kāraṇāntare
e tvaṃ caiva krodhajas tāta pūrvasarge sanātanaḥ
a mayā ca sārdhaṃ varadaṃ vibudhaiś ca maharṣibhiḥ
c prasādayāśu lokānāṃ śāntir bhavatu māciram
a brahmaṇā tv evam uktas tu rudraḥ krodhāgnim utsṛjan
c prasādayām āsa tato devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
e śaraṇaṃ ca jagāmādyaṃ vareṇyaṃ varadaṃ harim
a tato 'tha varado devo jitakrodho jitendriyaḥ
c prītimān abhavat tatra rudreṇa saha saṃgataḥ
a ṛṣibhir brahmaṇā caiva vibudhaiś ca supūjitaḥ
c uvāca devam īśānam īśaḥ sa jagato hariḥ
a yas tvāṃ vetti sa māṃ vetti yas tvām anu sa mām anu
c nāvayor antaraṃ kiṃ cin mā te bhūd buddhir anyathā
a adya prabhṛti śrīvatsaḥ śūlāṅko 'yaṃ bhavatv ayam
c mama pāṇyaṅkitaś cāpi śrīkaṇṭhas tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi
a evaṃ lakṣaṇam utpādya parasparakṛtaṃ tadā
c sakhyaṃ caivātulaṃ kṛtvā rudreṇa sahitāv ṛṣī
e tapas tepatur avyagrau visṛjya tridivaukasaḥ
a eṣa te kathitaḥ pārtha nārāyaṇajayo mṛdhe
c nāmāni caiva guhyāni niruktāni ca bhārata
e ṛṣibhiḥ kathitānīha yāni saṃkīrtitāni te
a evaṃ bahuvidhai rūpaiś carāmīha vasuṃdharām
c brahmalokaṃ ca kaunteya golokaṃ ca sanātanam
e mayā tvaṃ rakṣito yuddhe mahāntaṃ prāptavāñ jayam
a yas tu te so 'grato yāti yuddhe saṃpraty upasthite
c taṃ viddhi rudraṃ kaunteya devadevaṃ kapardinam
a kālaḥ sa eva kathitaḥ krodhajeti mayā tava
c nihatāṃs tena vai pūrvaṃ hatavān asi vai ripūn
a aprameyaprabhāvaṃ taṃ devadevam umāpatim
c namasva devaṃ prayato viśveśaṃ haram avyayam
d yaḥ sa te kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ krodhajeti punaḥ punaḥ
d tasya prabhāvam evāgryaṃ yac chrutaṃ te dhanaṃjaya
 janamejaya uvāca
a brahman sumahad ākhyānaṃ bhavatā parikīrtitam
c yac chrutvā munayaḥ sarve vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ
d sarvāśramābhigamanaṃ sarvatīrthāvagāhanam
d na tathā phaladaṃ saute nārāyaṇakathā yathā
d pāvitāṅgāḥ sma saṃvṛttāḥ śrutvemam āditaḥ kathām
d nārāyaṇāśrayāṃ puṇyāṃ sarvapāpapramocanīm
d durdarśo bhagavān devaḥ sarvalokanamaskṛtaḥ
d devaiḥ sabrahmakaiḥ kṛtsnair anyaiś caiva maharṣibhiḥ
d dṛṣṭavān nārado yatra devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim
d nūnam etad dhy anumataṃ tasya devasya sūtaja
d yad dṛṣṭavāñ jagannātham aniruddhatanau sthitam
d yat prādravat punar bhūyo nārado devasattamau
d sūta uvāca
d naranārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ kāraṇaṃ tad bravīhi me
d tasmin yajñe vartamāne rājñaḥ pārikṣitasya vai
d karmāntareṣu vidhivad vartamāneṣu śaunaka
d kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsam ṛṣiṃ vedanidhiṃ prabhum
d janamejaya uvāca
d paripapraccha rājendraḥ pitāmahapitāmaham
d śvetadvīpān nivṛttena nāradena surarṣiṇā
d dhyāyatā bhagavadvākyaṃ ceṣṭitaṃ kim ataḥ param
d badaryāśramam āgamya samāgamya ca tāv ṛṣī
d kiyantaṃ kālam avasat kāṃ kathāṃ pṛṣṭavāṃś ca saḥ
a idaṃ śatasahasrād dhi bhāratākhyānavistarāt
c āmathya matimanthena jñānodadhim anuttamam
a navanītaṃ yathā dadhno malayāc candanaṃ yathā
c āraṇyakaṃ ca vedebhya oṣadhibhyo 'mṛtaṃ yathā
a samuddhṛtam idaṃ brahman kathāmṛtam anuttamam
c taponidhe tvayoktaṃ hi nārāyaṇakathāśrayam
a sa hīśo bhagavān devaḥ sarvabhūtātmabhāvanaḥ
c aho nārāyaṇaṃ tejo durdarśaṃ dvijasattama
a yatrāviśanti kalpānte sarve brahmādayaḥ surāḥ
c ṛṣayaś ca sagandharvā yac ca kiṃ cic carācaram
e na tato 'sti paraṃ manye pāvanaṃ divi ceha ca
a sarvāśramābhigamanaṃ sarvatīrthāvagāhanam
c na tathā phaladaṃ cāpi nārāyaṇakathā yathā
a sarvathā pāvitāḥ smeha śrutvemām āditaḥ kathām
c harer viśveśvarasyeha sarvapāpapraṇāśanīm
a na citraṃ kṛtavāṃs tatra yad āryo me dhanaṃjayaḥ
c vāsudevasahāyo yaḥ prāptavāñ jayam uttamam
a na cāsya kiṃ cid aprāpyaṃ manye lokeṣv api triṣu
c trailokyanātho viṣṇuḥ sa yasyāsīt sāhyakṛt sakhā
a dhanyāś ca sarva evāsan brahmaṃs te mama pūrvakāḥ
c hitāya śreyase caiva yeṣām āsīj janārdanaḥ
a tapasāpi na dṛśyo hi bhagavāṃl lokapūjitaḥ
c yaṃ dṛṣṭavantas te sākṣāc chrīvatsāṅkavibhūṣaṇam
a tebhyo dhanyataraś caiva nāradaḥ parameṣṭhijaḥ
c na cālpatejasam ṛṣiṃ vedmi nāradam avyayam
d dṛṣṭavān yo hariṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇam ajaṃ vibhum
e śvetadvīpaṃ samāsādya yena dṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ hariḥ
a devaprasādānugataṃ vyaktaṃ tat tasya darśanam
c yad dṛṣṭavāṃs tadā devam aniruddhatanau sthitam
a badarīm āśramaṃ yat tu nāradaḥ prādravat punaḥ
c naranārāyaṇau draṣṭuṃ kiṃ nu tatkāraṇaṃ mune
a śvetadvīpān nivṛttaś ca nāradaḥ parameṣṭhijaḥ
c badarīm āśramaṃ prāpya samāgamya ca tāv ṛṣī
a kiyantaṃ kālam avasat kāḥ kathāḥ pṛṣṭavāṃś ca saḥ
c śvetadvīpād upāvṛtte tasmin vā sumahātmani
a kim abrūtāṃ mahātmānau naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
c tad etan me yathātattvaṃ sarvam ākhyātum arhasi
d sūta uvāca
d evaṃ pṛṣṭas tadā rājñā parāśaryo mahāmuniḥ
d samīpasthaṃ tataḥ śiṣyaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanam abravīt
d brūhy asmai sarvam akhilaṃ yad vṛttaṃ nāradasya ha
d tayoḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā ca yathā sa kṛtavān punaḥ
d sūta uvāca
d tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā kṛṣṇadvaipāyanas tadā
d śaśāsa śiṣyam āsīnaṃ vaiśaṃpāyanam antike
d tad asmai sarvam ācakṣva yan mattaḥ śrutavān asi
d guror vacanam ājñāya sa tu viprarṣabhas tadā
d ācacakṣe tataḥ sarvam itihāsaṃ purātanam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a namo bhagavate tasmai vyāsāyāmitatejase
c yasya prasādād vakṣyāmi nārāyaṇakathām imām
d nāsti nārāyaṇasamaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
d etena satyavākyena sarvārthān sādhayāmy aham
d nāradena purā yā me gurave viniveditā
d ṛṣīṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca śṛṇvatoḥ kṛṣṇabhīṣmayoḥ
a prāpya śvetaṃ mahādvīpaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca harim avyayam
c nivṛtto nārado rājaṃs tarasā merum āgamat
e hṛdayenodvahan bhāraṃ yad uktaṃ paramātmanā
a paścād asyābhavad rājann ātmanaḥ sādhvasaṃ mahat
c yad gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ kṣemī punar ihāgataḥ
a tato meroḥ pracakrāma parvataṃ gandhamādanam
c nipapāta ca khāt tūrṇaṃ viśālāṃ badarīm anu
a tataḥ sa dadṛśe devau purāṇāv ṛṣisattamau
c tapaś carantau sumahad ātmaniṣṭhau mahāvratau
a tejasābhyadhikau sūryāt sarvalokavirocanāt
c śrīvatsalakṣaṇau pūjyau jaṭāmaṇḍaladhāriṇau
a jālapādabhujau tau tu pādayoś cakralakṣaṇau
c vyūḍhoraskau dīrghabhujau tathā muṣkacatuṣkiṇau
a ṣaṣṭidantāv aṣṭadaṃṣṭrau meghaughasadṛśasvanau
c svāsyau pṛthulalāṭau ca suhanū subhrunāsikau
a ātapatreṇa sadṛśe śirasī devayos tayoḥ
c evaṃ lakṣaṇasaṃpannau mahāpuruṣasaṃjñitau
a tau dṛṣṭvā nārado hṛṣṭas tābhyāṃ ca pratipūjitaḥ
c svāgatenābhibhāṣyātha pṛṣṭaś cānāmayaṃ tadā
a babhūvāntargatamatir nirīkṣya puruṣottamau
c sadogatās tatra ye vai sarvabhūtanamaskṛtāḥ
a śvetadvīpe mayā dṛṣṭās tādṛśāv ṛṣisattamau
c iti saṃcintya manasā kṛtvā cābhipradakṣiṇam
e upopaviviśe tatra pīṭhe kuśamaye śubhe
a tatas tau tapasāṃ vāsau yaśasāṃ tejasām api
c ṛṣī śamadamopetau kṛtvā pūrvāhṇikaṃ vidhim
a paścān nāradam avyagrau pādyārghyābhyāṃ prapūjya ca
c pīṭhayoś copaviṣṭau tau kṛtātithyāhnikau nṛpa
a teṣu tatropaviṣṭeṣu sa deśo 'bhivyarājata
c ājyāhutimahājvālair yajñavāṭo 'gnibhir yathā
a atha nārāyaṇas tatra nāradaṃ vākyam abravīt
c sukhopaviṣṭaṃ viśrāntaṃ kṛtātithyaṃ sukhasthitam
a apīdānīṃ sa bhagavān paramātmā sanātanaḥ
c śvetadvīpe tvayā dṛṣṭa āvayoḥ prakṛtiḥ parā
 nārada uvāca
a dṛṣṭo me puruṣaḥ śrīmān viśvarūpadharo 'vyayaḥ
c sarve hi lokās tatrasthās tathā devāḥ saharṣibhiḥ
e adyāpi cainaṃ paśyāmi yuvāṃ paśyan sanātanau
a yair lakṣaṇair upetaḥ sa harir avyaktarūpadhṛk
c tair lakṣaṇair upetau hi vyaktarūpadharau yuvām
a dṛṣṭau mayā yuvāṃ tatra tasya devasya pārśvataḥ
c iha caivāgato 'smy adya visṛṣṭaḥ paramātmanā
a ko hi nāma bhavet tasya tejasā yaśasā śriyā
c sadṛśas triṣu lokeṣu ṛte dharmātmajau yuvām
a tena me kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ nāma kṣetrajñasaṃjñitam
c prādurbhāvāś ca kathitā bhaviṣyanti hi ye yathā
a tatra ye puruṣāḥ śvetāḥ pañcendriyavivarjitāḥ
c pratibuddhāś ca te sarve bhaktāś ca puruṣottamam
a te 'rcayanti sadā devaṃ taiḥ sārdhaṃ ramate ca saḥ
c priyabhakto hi bhagavān paramātmā dvijapriyaḥ
a ramate so 'rcyamāno hi sadā bhāgavatapriyaḥ
c viśvabhuk sarvago devo bāndhavo bhaktavatsalaḥ
e sa kartā kāraṇaṃ caiva kāryaṃ cātibaladyutiḥ
f hetuś cājñāvidhānaṃ ca tattvaṃ caiva mahāyaśāḥ
a tapasā yojya so ''tmānaṃ śvetadvīpāt paraṃ hi yat
c teja ity abhivikhyātaṃ svayaṃbhāsāvabhāsitam
a śāntiḥ sā triṣu lokeṣu siddhānāṃ bhāvitātmanām
c etayā śubhayā buddhyā naiṣṭhikaṃ vratam āsthitaḥ
a na tatra sūryas tapati na somo 'bhivirājate
c na vāyur vāti deveśe tapaś carati duścaram
a vedīm aṣṭatalotsedhāṃ bhūmāv āsthāya viśvabhuk
c ekapādasthito deva ūrdhvabāhur udaṅmukhaḥ
e sāṅgān āvartayan vedāṃs tapas tepe suduścaram
a yad brahmā ṛṣayaś caiva svayaṃ paśupatiś ca yat
c śeṣāś ca vibudhaśreṣṭhā daityadānavarākṣasāḥ
a nāgāḥ suparṇā gandharvāḥ siddhā rājarṣayaś ca ye
c havyaṃ kavyaṃ ca satataṃ vidhipūrvaṃ prayuñjate
e kṛtsnaṃ tat tasya devasya caraṇāv upatiṣṭhati
a yāḥ kriyāḥ saṃprayuktās tu ekāntagatabuddhibhiḥ
c tāḥ sarvāḥ śirasā devaḥ pratigṛhṇāti vai svayam
a na tasyānyaḥ priyataraḥ pratibuddhair mahātmabhiḥ
c vidyate triṣu lokeṣu tato 'smy aikāntikaṃ gataḥ
e iha caivāgatas tena visṛṣṭaḥ paramātmanā
f ananyadevatābhaktir ananyamanutā hareḥ
f ananyasevyatā viṣṇor ananyārcyatvam eva ca
f brahmarudrādisāmyatvaṃ buddhirāhityam eva ca
f ananyadevālayagatir ananyabhaktādyavīkṣaṇam
f tathā karmaphalāsaṅgo hy ekāntitvam idaṃ matam
a evaṃ me bhagavān devaḥ svayam ākhyātavān hariḥ
c āsiṣye tatparo bhūtvā yuvābhyāṃ saha nityaśaḥ
 naranārāyaṇāv ūcatuḥ
a dhanyo 'sy anugṛhīto 'si yat te dṛṣṭaḥ svayaṃ prabhuḥ
c na hi taṃ dṛṣṭavān kaś cit padmayonir api svayam
a avyaktayonir bhagavān durdarśaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
c nāradaitad dhi te satyaṃ vacanaṃ samudāhṛtam
a nāsya bhaktaiḥ priyataro loke kaś cana vidyate
c tataḥ svayaṃ darśitavān svam ātmānaṃ dvijottama
a tapo hi tapyatas tasya yat sthānaṃ paramātmanaḥ
c na tat saṃprāpnute kaś cid ṛte hy āvāṃ dvijottama
a yā hi sūryasahasrasya samastasya bhaved dyutiḥ
c sthānasya sā bhavet tasya svayaṃ tena virājatā
a tasmād uttiṣṭhate vipra devād viśvabhuvaḥ pateḥ
c kṣamā kṣamāvatāṃ śreṣṭha yayā bhūmis tu yujyate
a tasmāc cottiṣṭhate devāt sarvabhūtahito rasaḥ
c āpo yena hi yujyante dravatvaṃ prāpnuvanti ca
a tasmād eva samudbhūtaṃ tejo rūpaguṇātmakam
c yena sma yujyate sūryas tato lokān virājate
a tasmād devāt samudbhūtaḥ sparśas tu puruṣottamāt
c yena sma yujyate vāyus tato lokān vivāty asau
a tasmāc cottiṣṭhate śabdaḥ sarvalokeśvarāt prabhoḥ
c ākāśaṃ yujyate yena tatas tiṣṭhaty asaṃvṛtam
a tasmāc cottiṣṭhate devāt sarvabhūtagataṃ manaḥ
c candramā yena saṃyuktaḥ prakāśaguṇadhāraṇaḥ
a ṣaḍbhūtotpādakaṃ nāma tat sthānaṃ vedasaṃjñitam
c vidyāsahāyo yatrāste bhagavān havyakavyabhuk
a ye hi niṣkalmaṣā loke puṇyapāpavivarjitāḥ
c teṣāṃ vai kṣemam adhvānaṃ gacchatāṃ dvijasattama
e sarvalokatamohantā ādityo dvāram ucyate
f jvālāmālī mahātejā yenedaṃ dhāryate jagat
a ādityadagdhasarvāṅgā adṛśyāḥ kena cit kva cit
c paramāṇubhūtā bhūtvā tu taṃ devaṃ praviśanty uta
a tasmād api vinirmuktā aniruddhatanau sthitāḥ
c manobhūtās tato bhūyaḥ pradyumnaṃ praviśanty uta
a pradyumnāc cāpi nirmuktā jīvaṃ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ tathā
c viśanti viprapravarāḥ sāṃkhyā bhāgavataiḥ saha
a tatas traiguṇyahīnās te paramātmānam añjasā
c praviśanti dvijaśreṣṭha kṣetrajñaṃ nirguṇātmakam
e sarvāvāsaṃ vāsudevaṃ kṣetrajñaṃ viddhi tattvataḥ
a samāhitamanaskāś ca niyatāḥ saṃyatendriyāḥ
c ekāntabhāvopagatā vāsudevaṃ viśanti te
a āvām api ca dharmasya gṛhe jātau dvijottama
c ramyāṃ viśālām āśritya tapa ugraṃ samāsthitau
a ye tu tasyaiva devasya prādurbhāvāḥ surapriyāḥ
c bhaviṣyanti trilokasthās teṣāṃ svastīty ato dvija
a vidhinā svena yuktābhyāṃ yathāpūrvaṃ dvijottama
c āsthitābhyāṃ sarvakṛcchraṃ vrataṃ samyak tad uttamam
d svārthena vidhinā yuktaḥ sarvakṛcchravrate sthitaḥ
a āvābhyām api dṛṣṭas tvaṃ śvetadvīpe tapodhana
c samāgato bhagavatā saṃjalpaṃ kṛtavān yathā
a sarvaṃ hi nau saṃviditaṃ trailokye sacarācare
c yad bhaviṣyati vṛttaṃ vā vartate vā śubhāśubham
d sarvaṃ sa te kathitavān devadevo mahāmune
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a etac chrutvā tayor vākyaṃ tapasy ugre 'bhyavartata
c nāradaḥ prāñjalir bhūtvā nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ
a jajāpa vidhivan mantrān nārāyaṇagatān bahūn
c divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ hi naranārāyaṇāśrame
a avasat sa mahātejā nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
c tam evābhyarcayan devaṃ naranārāyaṇau ca tau
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a kasya cit tv atha kālasya nāradaḥ parameṣṭhijaḥ
c daivaṃ kṛtvā yathānyāyaṃ pitryaṃ cakre tataḥ param
a tatas taṃ vacanaṃ prāha jyeṣṭho dharmātmajaḥ prabhuḥ
c ka ijyate dvijaśreṣṭha daive pitrye ca kalpite
a tvayā matimatāṃ śreṣṭha tan me śaṃsa yathāgamam
c kim etat kriyate karma phalaṃ cāsya kim iṣyate
 nārada uvāca
a tvayaitat kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ daivaṃ kartavyam ity api
c daivataṃ ca paro yajñaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ
a tatas tadbhāvito nityaṃ yaje vaikuṇṭham avyayam
c tasmāc ca prasṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
a mama vai pitaraṃ prītaḥ parameṣṭhy apy ajījanat
c ahaṃ saṃkalpajas tasya putraḥ prathamakalpitaḥ
a yajāmy ahaṃ pitṝn sādho nārāyaṇavidhau kṛte
c evaṃ sa eva bhagavān pitā mātā pitāmahaḥ
e ijyate pitṛyajñeṣu mayā nityaṃ jagatpatiḥ
a śrutiś cāpy aparā deva putrān hi pitaro 'yajan
c vedaśrutiḥ praṇaṣṭā ca punar adhyāpitā sutaiḥ
e tatas te mantradāḥ putrāḥ pitṛtvam upapedire
a nūnaṃ puraitad viditaṃ yuvayor bhāvitātmanoḥ
c putrāś ca pitaraś caiva parasparam apūjayan
a trīn piṇḍān nyasya vai pṛthvyāṃ pūrvaṃ dattvā kuśān iti
c kathaṃ tu piṇḍasaṃjñāṃ te pitaro lebhire purā
 naranārāyaṇāv ūcatuḥ
a imāṃ hi dharaṇīṃ pūrvaṃ naṣṭāṃ sāgaramekhalām
c govinda ujjahārāśu vārāhaṃ rūpam āśritaḥ
a sthāpayitvā tu dharaṇīṃ sve sthāne puruṣottamaḥ
c jalakardamaliptāṅgo lokakāryārtham udyataḥ
a prāpte cāhnikakāle sa madhyaṃdinagate ravau
c daṃṣṭrāvilagnān mṛtpiṇḍān vidhūya sahasā prabhuḥ
e sthāpayām āsa vai pṛthvyāṃ kuśān āstīrya nārada
a sa teṣv ātmānam uddiśya pitryaṃ cakre yathāvidhi
c saṃkalpayitvā trīn piṇḍān svenaiva vidhinā prabhuḥ
a ātmagātroṣmasaṃbhūtaiḥ snehagarbhais tilair api
c prokṣyāpavargaṃ deveśaḥ prāṅmukhaḥ kṛtavān svayam
a maryādāsthāpanārthaṃ ca tato vacanam uktavān
c ahaṃ hi pitaraḥ sraṣṭum udyato lokakṛt svayam
a tasya cintayataḥ sadyaḥ pitṛkāryavidhiṃ param
c daṃṣṭrābhyāṃ pravinirdhūtā mamaite dakṣiṇāṃ diśam
e āśritā dharaṇīṃ piṇḍās tasmāt pitara eva te
a trayo mūrtivihīnā vai piṇḍamūrtidharās tv ime
c bhavantu pitaro loke mayā sṛṣṭāḥ sanātanāḥ
a pitā pitāmahaś caiva tathaiva prapitāmahaḥ
c aham evātra vijñeyas triṣu piṇḍeṣu saṃsthitaḥ
a nāsti matto 'dhikaḥ kaś cit ko vābhyarcyo mayā svayam
c ko vā mama pitā loke aham eva pitāmahaḥ
a pitāmahapitā caiva aham evātra kāraṇam
c ity evam uktvā vacanaṃ devadevo vṛṣākapiḥ
a varāhaparvate vipra dattvā piṇḍān savistarān
c ātmānaṃ pūjayitvaiva tatraivādarśanaṃ gataḥ
a etadarthaṃ śubhamate pitaraḥ piṇḍasaṃjñitāḥ
c labhante satataṃ pūjāṃ vṛṣākapivaco yathā
a ye yajanti pitṝn devān gurūṃś caivātithīṃs tathā
c gāś caiva dvijamukhyāṃś ca pṛthivīṃ mātaraṃ tathā
e karmaṇā manasā vācā viṣṇum eva yajanti te
a antargataḥ sa bhagavān sarvasattvaśarīragaḥ
c samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu īśvaraḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
e mahān mahātmā sarvātmā nārāyaṇa iti śrutaḥ
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a śrutvaitan nārado vākyaṃ naranārāyaṇeritam
c atyantabhaktimān deve ekāntitvam upeyivān
a proṣya varṣasahasraṃ tu naranārāyaṇāśrame
c śrutvā bhagavadākhyānaṃ dṛṣṭvā ca harim avyayam
e himavantaṃ jagāmāśu yatrāsya svaka āśramaḥ
a tāv api khyātatapasau naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
c tasminn evāśrame ramye tepatus tapa uttamam
a tvam apy amitavikrāntaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ kulodvahaḥ
c pāvitātmādya saṃvṛttaḥ śrutvemām āditaḥ kathām
a naiva tasya paro loko nāyaṃ pārthivasattama
c karmaṇā manasā vācā yo dviṣyād viṣṇum avyayam
a majjanti pitaras tasya narake śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
c yo dviṣyād vibudhaśreṣṭhaṃ devaṃ nārāyaṇaṃ harim
a kathaṃ nāma bhaved dveṣya ātmā lokasya kasya cit
c ātmā hi puruṣavyāghra jñeyo viṣṇur iti sthitiḥ
a ya eṣa gurur asmākam ṛṣir gandhavatīsutaḥ
c tenaitat kathitaṃ tāta māhātmyaṃ paramātmanaḥ
e tasmāc chrutaṃ mayā cedaṃ kathitaṃ ca tavānagha
a kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsaṃ viddhi nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum
c ko hy anyaḥ puruṣavyāghra mahābhāratakṛd bhavet
e dharmān nānāvidhāṃś caiva ko brūyāt tam ṛte prabhum
a vartatāṃ te mahāyajño yathā saṃkalpitas tvayā
c saṃkalpitāśvamedhas tvaṃ śrutadharmaś ca tattvataḥ
a etat tu mahad ākhyānaṃ śrutvā pārikṣito nṛpaḥ
c tato yajñasamāptyarthaṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ samārabhat
a nārāyaṇīyam ākhyānam etat te kathitaṃ mayā
b pṛṣṭena śaunakādyeha naimiṣāraṇyavāsiṣu
c nāradena purā rājan gurave me niveditam
e ṛṣīṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca śṛṇvatoḥ kṛṣṇabhīṣmayoḥ
a sa hi paramagurur bhuvanapatir
dharaṇidharaḥ śamaniyamanidhiḥ
c śrutivinayanidhir dvijaparamahitas
tava bhavatu gatir harir amarahitaḥ
a tapasāṃ nidhiḥ sumahatāṃ mahato
yaśasaś ca bhājanam ariṣṭakahā
c ekāntināṃ śaraṇado 'bhayado
gatido 'stu vaḥ sa makhabhāgaharaḥ
a triguṇātigaś catuṣpañcadharaḥ
pūrteṣṭayoś ca phalabhāgaharaḥ
c vidadhāti nityam ajito 'tibalo
gatim ātmagāṃ sukṛtinām ṛṣiṇām
a taṃ lokasākṣiṇam ajaṃ puruṣaṃ
ravivarṇam īśvaragatiṃ bahuśaḥ
c praṇamadhvam ekamatayo yatayaḥ
salilodbhavo 'pi tam ṛṣiṃ praṇataḥ
a sa hi lokayonir amṛtasya padaṃ
sūkṣmaṃ purāṇam acalaṃ paramam
c tat sāṃkhyayogibhir udāradhṛtaṃ
buddhyā yatātmabhir viditaṃ satatam
 janamejaya uvāca
a śrutaṃ bhagavatas tasya māhātmyaṃ paramātmanaḥ
c janma dharmagṛhe caiva naranārāyaṇātmakam
e mahāvarāhasṛṣṭā ca piṇḍotpattiḥ purātanī
a pravṛttau ca nivṛttau ca yo yathā parikalpitaḥ
c sa tathā naḥ śruto brahman kathyamānas tvayānagha
a yac ca tat kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ tvayā hayaśiro mahat
c havyakavyabhujo viṣṇor udakpūrve mahodadhau
e tac ca dṛṣṭaṃ bhagavatā brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā
a kiṃ tad utpāditaṃ pūrvaṃ hariṇā lokadhāriṇā
c rūpaṃ prabhāvamahatām apūrvaṃ dhīmatāṃ vara
a dṛṣṭvā hi vibudhaśreṣṭham apūrvam amitaujasam
c tad aśvaśirasaṃ puṇyaṃ brahmā kim akaron mune
a etan naḥ saṃśayaṃ brahman purāṇajñānasaṃbhavam
c kathayasvottamamate mahāpuruṣanirmitam
e pāvitāḥ sma tvayā brahman puṇyāṃ kathayatā kathām
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a kathayiṣyāmi te sarvaṃ purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam
c jagau yad bhagavān vyāso rājño dharmasutasya vai
d tat te 'haṃ saṃpravakṣyāmi sarvaṃ tac chṛṇu śaunaka
d kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaṃ vyāsam ṛṣiṃ vedanidhiṃ prabhum
d paripapraccha rājendraḥ pārīkṣita yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
a śrutvāśvaśiraso mūrtiṃ devasya harimedhasaḥ

c kimarthaṃ tat samabhavad vapur devopakalpitam
 vyāsa uvāca
a yat kiṃ cid iha loke vai dehabaddhaṃ viśāṃ pate

a īśvaro hi jagatsraṣṭā prabhur nārāyaṇo virāṭ
c bhūtāntarātmā varadaḥ saguṇo nirguṇo 'pi ca
e bhūtapralayam avyaktaṃ śṛṇuṣva nṛpasattama
a dharaṇyām atha līnāyām apsu caikārṇave purā
c jyotirbhūte jale cāpi līne jyotiṣi cānile
a vāyau cākāśasaṃlīne ākāśe ca manonuge

b ādikarmā sa bhūtānām aprameyo hariḥ prabhuḥ

a tasya cintayataḥ sṛṣṭiṃ mahān ātmaguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
c ahaṃkāras tato jāto brahmā śubhacaturmukhaḥ
e hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān sarvalokapitāmahaḥ
a padme 'niruddhāt saṃbhūtas tadā padmanibhekṣaṇaḥ
c sahasrapatre dyutimān upaviṣṭaḥ sanātanaḥ
a dadṛśe 'dbhutasaṃkāśe lokān āpomayān prabhuḥ
c sattvasthaḥ parameṣṭhī sa tato bhūtagaṇān sṛjat
a pūrvam eva ca padmasya patre sūryāṃśusaprabhe
c nārāyaṇakṛtau bindū apām āstāṃ guṇottarau
a tāv apaśyat sa bhagavān anādinidhano 'cyutaḥ
c ekas tatrābhavad bindur madhvābho ruciraprabhaḥ
a sa tāmaso madhur jātas tadā nārāyaṇājñayā
c kaṭhinas tv aparo binduḥ kaiṭabho rājasas tu saḥ
a tāv abhyadhāvatāṃ śreṣṭhau tamorajaguṇānvitau
c balavantau gadāhastau padmanālānusāriṇau
a dadṛśāte 'ravindasthaṃ brahmāṇam amitaprabham
c sṛjantaṃ prathamaṃ vedāṃś caturaś cāruvigrahān
a tato vigrahavantau tau vedān dṛṣṭvāsurottamau
c sahasā jagṛhatur vedān brahmaṇaḥ paśyatas tadā

d vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
d evaṃ sa bhagavān vyāso gurur mama viśāṃ pate
d kathayām āsa dharmajño dharmarājñe dvijottamaḥ
a evam eṣa mahābhāgo babhūvāśvaśirā hariḥ

a pravṛttilakṣaṇaś caiva dharmo nārāyaṇātmakaḥ

a apāṃ caiva guṇo rājan raso nārāyaṇātmakaḥ
c jyotiṣāṃ ca guṇo rūpaṃ smṛtaṃ nārāyaṇātmakam
a nārāyaṇātmakaś cāpi sparśo vāyuguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ

a manaś cāpi tato bhūtam avyaktaguṇalakṣaṇam

c nārāyaṇaparaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ yogo nārāyaṇātmakaḥ
a kāraṇaṃ puruṣo yeṣāṃ pradhānaṃ cāpi kāraṇam
c svabhāvaś caiva karmāṇi daivaṃ yeṣāṃ ca kāraṇam
d adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham
d vividhā ca tathā ceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam
a pañcakāraṇasaṃkhyāto niṣṭhā sarvatra vai hariḥ
c tattvaṃ jijñāsamānānāṃ hetubhiḥ sarvatomukhaiḥ
a tattvam eko mahāyogī harir nārāyaṇaḥ prabhuḥ
c sabrahmakānāṃ lokānām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca mahātmanām

a tṛtīyaṃ brahmaṇo janma yadāsīd vācikaṃ mahat

c na kurvanti kathaṃ viprā anye nānāvrate sthitāḥ

a tisraḥ prakṛtayo rājan dehabandheṣu nirmitāḥ
c sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti bhārata
a dehabandheṣu puruṣaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ kurukulodvaha
c sāttvikaḥ puruṣavyāghra bhaven mokṣārthaniścitaḥ
a atrāpi sa vijānāti puruṣaṃ brahmavartinam
c nārāyaṇaparo mokṣas tato vai sāttvikaḥ smṛtaḥ
a manīṣitaṃ ca prāpnoti cintayan puruṣottamam
c ekāntabhaktiḥ satataṃ nārāyaṇaparāyaṇaḥ
a manīṣiṇo hi ye ke cid yatayo mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
c teṣāṃ vai chinnatṛṣṇānāṃ yogakṣemavaho hariḥ
a jāyamānaṃ hi puruṣaṃ yaṃ paśyen madhusūdanaḥ
c sāttvikas tu sa vijñeyo bhaven mokṣe ca niścitaḥ
a sāṃkhyayogena tulyo hi dharma ekāntasevitaḥ
c nārāyaṇātmake mokṣe tato yānti parāṃ gatim
a nārāyaṇena dṛṣṭaś ca pratibuddho bhavet pumān
c evam ātmecchayā rājan pratibuddho na jāyate
a rājasī tāmasī caiva vyāmiśre prakṛtī smṛte
c tadātmakaṃ hi puruṣaṃ jāyamānaṃ viśāṃ pate
e pravṛttilakṣaṇair yuktaṃ nāvekṣati hariḥ svayam
a paśyaty enaṃ jāyamānaṃ brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
c rajasā tamasā caiva mānuṣaṃ samabhiplutam
a kāmaṃ devāś ca ṛṣayaḥ sattvasthā nṛpasattama
c hīnāḥ sattvena sūkṣmeṇa tato vaikārikāḥ smṛtāḥ
 janamejaya uvāca
a kathaṃ vaikāriko gacchet puruṣaḥ puruṣottamam
b vada sarvaṃ yathādṛṣṭaṃ pravṛttiṃ ca yathākramam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a susūkṣmasattvasaṃyuktaṃ saṃyuktaṃ tribhir akṣaraiḥ

c parasparāṅgāny etāni pañcarātraṃ ca kathyate

a yathā samudrāt prasṛtā jalaughās

c ime tathā jñānamahājalaughā
nārāyaṇaṃ vai punar āviśanti
a eṣa te kathito dharmaḥ sātvato yadubāndhava

a evaṃ hi sumahābhāgo nārado gurave mama

a kṛṣṇa eva hi lokānāṃ bhāvano mohanas tathā
c saṃhārakārakaś caiva kāraṇaṃ ca viśāṃ pate
 janamejaya uvāca
a sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ pañcarātraṃ vedāraṇyakam eva ca
c jñānāny etāni brahmarṣe lokeṣu pracaranti ha
a kim etāny ekaniṣṭhāni pṛthaṅniṣṭhāni vā mune

 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a jajñe bahujñaṃ param atyudāraṃ
yaṃ dvīpamadhye sutam ātmavantam
c parāśarād gandhavatī maharṣiṃ
tasmai namo 'jñānatamonudāya
a pitāmahādyaṃ pravadanti ṣaṣṭhaṃ
maharṣim ārṣeyavibhūtiyuktam

dvaipāyanaṃ vedamahānidhānam
a tam ādikāleṣu mahāvibhūtir

 janamejaya uvāca
a tvayaiva kathitaḥ pūrvaṃ saṃbhavo dvijasattama
c vasiṣṭhasya sutaḥ śaktiḥ śakteḥ putraḥ parāśaraḥ
a parāśarasya dāyādaḥ kṛṣṇadvaipāyano muniḥ
c bhūyo nārāyaṇasutaṃ tvam evainaṃ prabhāṣase
a kim ataḥ pūrvajaṃ janma vyāsasyāmitatejasaḥ
c kathayasvottamamate janma nārāyaṇodbhavam
 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
a vedārthān vettukāmasya dharmiṣṭhasya taponidheḥ

a kṛtvā bhāratam ākhyānaṃ tapaḥśrāntasya dhīmataḥ

c ahaṃ caturthaḥ śiṣyo vai śuko vyāsātmajas tathā

a sasṛje nābhitaḥ putraṃ brahmāṇam amitaprabham
c tataḥ sa prādurabhavad athainaṃ vākyam abravīt
a mama tvaṃ nābhito jātaḥ prajāsargakaraḥ prabhuḥ
c sṛja prajās tvaṃ vividhā brahman sajaḍapaṇḍitāḥ
a sa evam ukto vimukhaś cintāvyākulamānasaḥ
c praṇamya varadaṃ devam uvāca harim īśvaram
a kā śaktir mama deveśa prajāḥ sraṣṭuṃ namo 'stu te
c aprajñāvān ahaṃ deva vidhatsva yad anantaram
a sa evam ukto bhagavān bhūtvāthāntarhitas tataḥ
c cintayām āsa deveśo buddhiṃ buddhimatāṃ varaḥ

a sa tām aiśvaryayogasthāṃ buddhiṃ śaktimatīṃ satīm
c uvāca vacanaṃ devo buddhiṃ vai prabhur avyayaḥ
a brahmāṇaṃ praviśasveti lokasṛṣṭyarthasiddhaye

a athainaṃ buddhisaṃyuktaṃ punaḥ sa dadṛśe hariḥ
c bhūyaś cainaṃ vacaḥ prāha sṛjemā vividhāḥ prajāḥ
d bāḍham ity eva kṛtvā sa yathājñāṃ śirasā hareḥ
d tathākaroc ca dharmātmā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ
a evam uktvā sa bhagavāṃs tatraivāntaradhīyata

a tāṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ prāpya ekībhāvagato 'bhavat

a sṛṣṭā imāḥ prajāḥ sarvā brahmaṇā parameṣṭhinā
c daityadānavagandharvarakṣogaṇasamākulāḥ
e jātā hīyaṃ vasumatī bhārākrāntā tapasvinī
a bahavo balinaḥ pṛthvyāṃ daityadānavarākṣasāḥ
c bhaviṣyanti tapoyuktā varān prāpsyanti cottamān
a avaśyam eva taiḥ sarvair varadānena darpitaiḥ
c bādhitavyāḥ suragaṇā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ
e tatra nyāyyam idaṃ kartuṃ bhārāvataraṇaṃ mayā
a atha nānāsamudbhūtair vasudhāyāṃ yathākramam
c nigraheṇa ca pāpānāṃ sādhūnāṃ pragraheṇa ca
a imāṃ tapasvinīṃ satyāṃ dhārayiṣyāmi medinīm

a mayā dhṛtā dhārayati jagad dhi sacarācaram
c tasmāt pṛthvyāḥ paritrāṇaṃ kariṣye saṃbhavaṃ gataḥ
a evaṃ sa cintayitvā tu bhagavān madhusūdanaḥ
c rūpāṇy anekāny asṛjat prādurbhāvabhavāya saḥ
a vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca vāmanaṃ mānuṣaṃ tathā
c ebhir mayā nihantavyā durvinītāḥ surārayaḥ
a atha bhūyo jagatsraṣṭā bhoḥśabdenānunādayan
c sarasvatīm uccacāra tatra sārasvato 'bhavat
a apāntaratamā nāma suto vāksaṃbhavo vibhoḥ
c bhūtabhavyabhaviṣyajñaḥ satyavādī dṛḍhavrataḥ
a tam uvāca nataṃ mūrdhnā devānām ādir avyayaḥ
c vedākhyāne śrutiḥ kāryā tvayā matimatāṃ vara
e tasmāt kuru yathājñaptaṃ mayaitad vacanaṃ mune
a tena bhinnās tadā vedā manoḥ svāyaṃbhuve 'ntare
c tatas tutoṣa bhagavān haris tenāsya karmaṇā
e tapasā ca sutaptena yamena niyamena ca
 śrībhagavān uvāca
a manvantareṣu putra tvam evaṃ lokapravartakaḥ
c bhaviṣyasy acalo brahmann apradhṛṣyaś ca nityaśaḥ
a punas tiṣye ca saṃprāpte kuravo nāma bhāratāḥ
c bhaviṣyanti mahātmāno rājānaḥ prathitā bhuvi
a teṣāṃ tvattaḥ prasūtānāṃ kulabhedo bhaviṣyati
c parasparavināśārthaṃ tvām ṛte dvijasattama
a tatrāpy anekadhā vedān bhetsyase tapasānvitaḥ
c kṛṣṇe yuge ca saṃprāpte kṛṣṇavarṇo bhaviṣyasi
a dharmāṇāṃ vividhānāṃ ca kartā jñānakaras tathā

parāśaro nāma mahāprabhāvaḥ

c tasmin manvantare caiva saptarṣigaṇapūrvakaḥ

 vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca

 brahmovāca
a bahavaḥ puruṣāḥ putra ye tvayā samudāhṛtāḥ
c evam etad atikrāntaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ naivam ity api

a bahūnāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ sa yathaikā yonir ucyate
c tathā taṃ puruṣaṃ viśvaṃ paramaṃ sumahattamam
e nirguṇaṃ nirguṇā bhūtvā praviśanti sanātanam
 brahmovāca
a śṛṇu putra yathā hy eṣa puruṣaḥ śāśvato 'vyayaḥ
c akṣayaś cāprameyaś ca sarvagaś ca nirucyate
a na sa śakyas tvayā draṣṭuṃ mayānyair vāpi sattama
c saguṇo nirguṇo viśvo jñānadṛśyo hy asau smṛtaḥ
a aśarīraḥ śarīreṣu sarveṣu nivasaty asau
c vasann api śarīreṣu na sa lipyati karmabhiḥ
a mamāntarātmā tava ca ye cānye dehasaṃjñitāḥ
c sarveṣāṃ sākṣibhūto 'sau na grāhyaḥ kena cit kva cit
a viśvamūrdhā viśvabhujo viśvapādākṣināsikaḥ

c yathājñānaṃ tu vakṣyāmi puruṣaṃ taṃ sanātanam
a tasyaikatvaṃ mahattvaṃ hi sa caikaḥ puruṣaḥ smṛtaḥ
c mahāpuruṣaśabdaṃ sa bibharty ekaḥ sanātanaḥ
a eko hutāśo bahudhā samidhyate
