mahodadhiś cāmbhasāṃ yonir ekaḥ
e puruṣaś caiko nirguṇo viśvarūpas
taṃ nirguṇaṃ puruṣaṃ cāviśanti
a hitvā guṇamayaṃ sarvaṃ karma hitvā śubhāśubham
c ubhe satyānṛte tyaktvā evaṃ bhavati nirguṇaḥ
a acintyaṃ cāpi taṃ jñātvā bhāvasūkṣmaṃ catuṣṭayam
c vicared yo yatir yattaḥ sa gacchet puruṣaṃ prabhum
a evaṃ hi paramātmānaṃ ke cid icchanti paṇḍitāḥ
c ekātmānaṃ tathātmānam apare 'dhyātmacintakāḥ
a tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi sa nityaṃ nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ
c sa hi nārāyaṇo jñeyaḥ sarvātmā puruṣo hi saḥ
e na lipyate phalaiś cāpi padmapatram ivāmbhasā
a karmātmā tv aparo yo 'sau mokṣabandhaiḥ sa yujyate
c sasaptadaśakenāpi rāśinā yujyate hi saḥ
e evaṃ bahuvidhaḥ proktaḥ puruṣas te yathākramam
a yat tat kṛtsnaṃ lokatantrasya dhāma
vedyaṃ paraṃ bodhanīyaṃ saboddhṛ
c mantā mantavyaṃ prāśitā prāśitavyaṃ
ghrātā ghreyaṃ sparśitā sparśanīyam
a draṣṭā draṣṭavyaṃ śrāvitā śrāvaṇīyaṃ
jñātā jñeyaṃ saguṇaṃ nirguṇaṃ ca
c yad vai proktaṃ guṇasāmyaṃ pradhānaṃ
nityaṃ caitac chāśvataṃ cāvyayaṃ ca
a yad vai sūte dhātur ādyaṃ nidhānaṃ
tad vai viprāḥ pravadante 'niruddham
c yad vai loke vaidikaṃ karma sādhu
āśīryuktaṃ tad dhi tasyopabhojyam
a devāḥ sarve munayaḥ sādhu dāntās
taṃ prāg yajñair yajñabhāgaṃ yajante
c ahaṃ brahmā ādya īśaḥ prajānāṃ
tasmāj jātas tvaṃ ca mattaḥ prasūtaḥ
e matto jagaj jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ ca
sarve vedāḥ sarahasyā hi putra
a caturvibhaktaḥ puruṣaḥ sa krīḍati yathecchati
c evaṃ sa eva bhagavāñ jñānena pratibodhitaḥ
a etat te kathitaṃ putra yathāvad anupṛcchataḥ
c sāṃkhyajñāne tathā yoge yathāvad anuvarṇitam
 yudhiṣṭhira uvāca
a dharmāḥ pitāmahenoktā mokṣadharmāśritāḥ śubhāḥ
c dharmam āśramiṇāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vaktum arhati me bhavān
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sarvatra vihito dharmaḥ svargyaḥ satyaphalodayaḥ
c bahudvārasya dharmasya nehāsti viphalā kriyā
a yasmin yasmiṃs tu viṣaye yo yo yāti viniścayam
c sa tam evābhijānāti nānyaṃ bharatasattama
a api ca tvaṃ naravyāghra śrotum arhasi me kathām
c purā śakrasya kathitāṃ nāradena surarṣiṇā
a surarṣir nārado rājan siddhas trailokyasaṃmataḥ
c paryeti kramaśo lokān vāyur avyāhato yathā
a sa kadā cin maheṣvāsa devarājālayaṃ gataḥ
c satkṛtaś ca mahendreṇa pratyāsannagato 'bhavat
a taṃ kṛtakṣaṇam āsīnaṃ paryapṛcchac chacīpatiḥ
c brahmarṣe kiṃ cid āścaryam asti dṛṣṭaṃ tvayānagha
a yathā tvam api viprarṣe trailokyaṃ sacarācaram
c jātakautūhalo nityaṃ siddhaś carasi sākṣivat
a na hy asty aviditaṃ loke devarṣe tava kiṃ cana
c śrutaṃ vāpy anubhūtaṃ vā dṛṣṭaṃ vā kathayasva me
a tasmai rājan surendrāya nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ
c āsīnāyopapannāya proktavān vipulāṃ kathām
a yathā yena ca kalpena sa tasmai dvijasattamaḥ
c kathāṃ kathitavān pṛṣṭas tathā tvam api me śṛṇu
 bhīṣma uvāca
a āsīt kila kuruśreṣṭha mahāpadme purottame
c gaṅgāyā dakṣiṇe tīre kaś cid vipraḥ samāhitaḥ
a saumyaḥ somānvaye vede gatādhvā chinnasaṃśayaḥ
c dharmanityo jitakrodho nityatṛpto jitendriyaḥ
a ahiṃsānirato nityaṃ satyaḥ sajjanasaṃmataḥ
c nyāyaprāptena vittena svena śīlena cānvitaḥ
a jñātisaṃbandhivipule mitrāpāśrayasaṃmate
c kule mahati vikhyāte viśiṣṭāṃ vṛttim āsthitaḥ
a sa putrān bahulān dṛṣṭvā vipule karmaṇi sthitaḥ
c kuladharmāśrito rājan dharmacaryāparo 'bhavat
a tataḥ sa dharmaṃ vedoktaṃ yathāśāstroktam eva ca
c śiṣṭācīrṇaṃ ca dharmaṃ ca trividhaṃ cintya cetasā
a kiṃ nu me syāc chubhaṃ kṛtvā kiṃ kṣamaṃ kiṃ parāyaṇam
c ity evaṃ khidyate nityaṃ na ca yāti viniścayam
a tasyaivaṃ khidyamānasya dharmaṃ paramam āsthitaḥ
c kadā cid atithiḥ prāpto brāhmaṇaḥ susamāhitaḥ
a sa tasmai satkriyāṃ cakre kriyāyuktena hetunā
c viśrāntaṃ cainam āsīnam idaṃ vacanam abravīt
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a samutpannābhidhāno 'smi vāṅmādhuryeṇa te 'nagha
c mitratām abhipannas tvāṃ kiṃ cid vakṣyāmi tac chṛṇu
a gṛhasthadharmaṃ viprendra kṛtvā putragataṃ tv aham
c dharmaṃ paramakaṃ kuryāṃ ko hi mārgo bhaved dvija
a aham ātmānam ātmastham eka evātmani sthitaḥ
c kartuṃ kāṅkṣāmi necchāmi baddhaḥ sādhāraṇair guṇaiḥ
a yāvad evānatītaṃ me vayaḥ putraphalāśritam
c tāvad icchāmi pātheyam ādātuṃ pāralaukikam
a asmin hi lokasaṃtāne paraṃ pāram abhīpsataḥ
c utpannā me matir iyaṃ kuto dharmamayaḥ plavaḥ
a samuhyamānāni niśamya loke
niryātyamānāni ca sāttvikāni
c dṛṣṭvā ca dharmadhvajaketumālāṃ
prakīryamāṇām upari prajānām
a na me mano rajyati bhogakāle
dṛṣṭvā yatīn prārthayataḥ paratra
c tenātithe buddhibalāśrayeṇa
dharmārthatattve viniyuṅkṣva māṃ tvam
 bhīṣma uvāca
a so 'tithir vacanaṃ tasya śrutvā dharmābhilāṣiṇaḥ
c provāca vacanaṃ ślakṣṇaṃ prājño madhurayā girā
a aham apy atra muhyāmi mamāpy eṣa manorathaḥ
c na ca saṃniścayaṃ yāmi bahudvāre triviṣṭape
a ke cin mokṣaṃ praśaṃsanti ke cid yajñaphalaṃ dvijāḥ
c vānaprasthāśramaṃ ke cid gārhasthyaṃ ke cid āśritāḥ
a rājadharmāśrayaṃ ke cit ke cid ātmaphalāśrayam
c gurucaryāśrayaṃ ke cit ke cid vākyaṃ yam āśrayam
a mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ke cic chuśrūṣanto divaṃ gatāḥ
c ahiṃsayā pare svargaṃ satyena ca tathā pare
a āhave 'bhimukhāḥ ke cin nihatāḥ svid divaṃ gatāḥ
c ke cid uñchavrataiḥ siddhāḥ svargamārgasamāśritāḥ
a ke cid adhyayane yuktā vedavrataparāḥ śubhāḥ
c buddhimanto gatāḥ svargaṃ tuṣṭātmāno jitendriyāḥ
a ārjavenāpare yuktā nihatānārjavair janaiḥ
c ṛjavo nākapṛṣṭhe vai śuddhātmānaḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ
a evaṃ bahuvidhair loke dharmadvārair anāvṛtaiḥ
c mamāpi matir āvignā meghalekheva vāyunā
 atithir uvāca
a upadeśaṃ tu te vipra kariṣye 'haṃ yathāgamam
c guruṇā me yathākhyātam arthatas tac ca me śṛṇu
d tathaitām eva guruṇā yathākhyātaṃ gatārthataḥ
a yatra pūrvābhisargeṇa dharmacakraṃ pravartitam
c naimiṣe gomatītīre tatra nāgāhvayaṃ puram
a samagrais tridaśais tatra iṣṭam āsīd dvijarṣabha
c yatrendrātikramaṃ cakre māndhātā rājasattamaḥ
a kṛtādhivāso dharmātmā tatra cakṣuḥśravā mahān
c padmanābho mahābhāgaḥ padma ity eva viśrutaḥ
a sa vācā karmaṇā caiva manasā ca dvijarṣabha
c prasādayati bhūtāni trividhe vartmani sthitaḥ
a sāmnā dānena bhedena daṇḍeneti caturvidham
c viṣamasthaṃ janaṃ svaṃ ca cakṣurdhyānena rakṣati
a tam abhikramya vidhinā praṣṭum arhasi kāṅkṣitam
c sa te paramakaṃ dharmaṃ namithyā darśayiṣyati
a sa hi sarvātithir nāgo buddhiśāstraviśāradaḥ
c guṇair anavamair yuktaḥ samastair ābhikāmikaiḥ
a prakṛtyā nityasalilo nityam adhyayane rataḥ
c tapodamābhyāṃ saṃyukto vṛttenānavareṇa ca
a yajvā dānaruciḥ kṣānto vṛtte ca parame sthitaḥ
c satyavāg anasūyuś ca śīlavān abhisaṃśritaḥ
a śeṣānnabhoktā vacanānukūlo
hitārjavotkṛṣṭakṛtākṛtajñaḥ
c avairakṛd bhūtahite niyukto
gaṅgāhradāmbho 'bhijanopapannaḥ
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a atibhārodyatasyaiva bhārāpanayanaṃ mahat
c parāśvāsakaraṃ vākyam idaṃ me bhavataḥ śrutam
a adhvaklāntasya śayanaṃ sthānaklāntasya cāsanam
c tṛṣitasya ca pānīyaṃ kṣudhārtasya ca bhojanam
a īpsitasyeva saṃprāptir annasya samaye 'titheḥ
c eṣitasyātmanaḥ kāle vṛddhasyeva suto yathā
a manasā cintitasyeva prītisnigdhasya darśanam
c prahrādayati māṃ vākyaṃ bhavatā yad udīritam
a dattacakṣur ivākāśe paśyāmi vimṛśāmi ca
c prajñānavacanād yo 'yam upadeśo hi me kṛtaḥ
e bāḍham evaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā māṃ bhāṣate bhavān
a ihemāṃ rajanīṃ sādho nivasasva mayā saha
c prabhāte yāsyati bhavān paryāśvastaḥ sukhoṣitaḥ
e asau hi bhagavān sūryo mandaraśmir avāṅmukhaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tatas tena kṛtātithyaḥ so 'tithiḥ śatrusūdana
c uvāsa kila tāṃ rātriṃ saha tena dvijena vai
a tat tac ca dharmasaṃyuktaṃ tayoḥ kathayatos tadā
c vyatītā sā niśā kṛtsnā sukhena divasopamā
d tasya brāhmaṇavaryasya atitheś cāpi bhārata
a tataḥ prabhātasamaye so 'tithis tena pūjitaḥ
c brāhmaṇena yathāśaktyā svakāryam abhikāṅkṣatā
a tataḥ sa vipraḥ kṛtadharmaniścayaḥ
kṛtābhyanujñaḥ svajanena dharmavit
c yathopadiṣṭaṃ bhujagendrasaṃśrayaṃ
jagāma kāle sukṛtaikaniścayaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa vanāni vicitrāṇi tīrthāni ca sarāṃsi ca
c abhigacchan krameṇa sma kaṃ cin munim upasthitaḥ
a taṃ sa tena yathoddiṣṭaṃ nāgaṃ vipreṇa brāhmaṇaḥ
c paryapṛcchad yathānyāyaṃ śrutvaiva ca jagāma saḥ
a so 'bhigamya yathākhyātaṃ nāgāyatanam arthavit
c proktavān aham asmīti bhoḥśabdālaṃkṛtaṃ vacaḥ
a tatas tasya vacaḥ śrutvā rūpiṇī dharmavatsalā
c darśayām āsa taṃ vipraṃ nāgapatnī pativratā
a sā tasmai vidhivat pūjāṃ cakre dharmaparāyaṇā
c svāgatenāgataṃ kṛtvā kiṃ karomīti cābravīt
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a viśrānto 'bhyarcitaś cāsmi bhavatyā ślakṣṇayā girā
c draṣṭum icchāmi bhavati taṃ devaṃ nāgam uttamam
a etad dhi paramaṃ kāryam etan me phalam īpsitam
c anenārthena cāsmy adya saṃprāptaḥ pannagālayam
 nāgabhāryovāca
a ārya sūryarathaṃ voḍhuṃ gato 'sau māsacārikaḥ
c saptāṣṭabhir dinair vipra darśayiṣyaty asaṃśayam
a etad viditam āryasya vivāsakaraṇaṃ mama
c bhartur bhavatu kiṃ cānyat kriyatāṃ tad vadasva me
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a anena niścayenāhaṃ sādhvi saṃprāptavān iha
c pratīkṣann āgamaṃ devi vatsyāmy asmin mahāvane
a saṃprāptasyaiva cāvyagram āvedyo 'ham ihāgataḥ
c mamābhigamanaṃ prāpto vācyaś ca vacanaṃ tvayā
a aham apy atra vatsyāmi gomatyāḥ puline śubhe
c kālaṃ parimitāhāro yathoktaṃ paripālayan
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tataḥ sa vipras tāṃ nāgīṃ samādhāya punaḥ punaḥ
c tad eva pulinaṃ nadyāḥ prayayau brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥ
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atha tena naraśreṣṭha brāhmaṇena tapasvinā
c nirāhāreṇa vasatā duḥkhitās te bhujaṃgamāḥ
a sarve saṃbhūya sahitās tasya nāgasya bāndhavāḥ
c bhrātaras tanayā bhāryā yayus taṃ brāhmaṇaṃ prati
a te 'paśyan puline taṃ vai vivikte niyatavratam
c samāsīnaṃ nirāhāraṃ dvijaṃ japyaparāyaṇam
a te sarve samabhikramya vipram abhyarcya cāsakṛt
c ūcur vākyam asaṃdigdham ātitheyasya bāndhavāḥ
a ṣaṣṭho hi divasas te 'dya prāptasyeha tapodhana
c na cābhilaṣase kiṃ cid āhāraṃ dharmavatsala
a asmān abhigataś cāsi vayaṃ ca tvām upasthitāḥ
c kāryaṃ cātithyam asmābhir vayaṃ sarve kuṭumbinaḥ
a mūlaṃ phalaṃ vā parṇaṃ vā payo vā dvijasattama
c āhārahetor annaṃ vā bhoktum arhasi brāhmaṇa
a tyaktāhāreṇa bhavatā vane nivasatā satā
c bālavṛddham idaṃ sarvaṃ pīḍyate dharmasaṃkaṭāt
d anugrahārtham asmākam āhāraṃ kartum arhasi
d anaśnati tvayi brahman gacchema narakaṃ vayam
a na hi no bhrūṇahā kaś cid rājāpathyo 'nṛto 'pi vā
c pūrvāśī vā kule hy asmin devatātithibandhuṣu
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a upadeśena yuṣmākam āhāro 'yaṃ mayā vṛtaḥ
c dvirūnaṃ daśarātraṃ vai nāgasyāgamanaṃ prati
a yady aṣṭarātre niryāte nāgamiṣyati pannagaḥ
c tadāhāraṃ kariṣyāmi tannimittam idaṃ vratam
a kartavyo na ca saṃtāpo gamyatāṃ ca yathāgatam
c tannimittaṃ vrataṃ mahyaṃ naitad bhettum ihārhatha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a tena te samanujñātā brāhmaṇena bhujaṃgamāḥ
c svam eva bhavanaṃ jagmur akṛtārthā nararṣabha
 bhīṣma uvāca
a atha kāle bahutithe pūrṇe prāpto bhujaṃgamaḥ
c dattābhyanujñaḥ svaṃ veśma kṛtakarmā vivasvataḥ
a taṃ bhāryā samabhikrāmat pādaśaucādibhir guṇaiḥ
c upapannāṃ ca tāṃ sādhvīṃ pannagaḥ paryapṛcchata
a api tvam asi kalyāṇi devatātithipūjane
c pūrvam uktena vidhinā yuktā yuktena matsamam
a na khalv asy akṛtārthena strībuddhyā mārdavīkṛtā
c madviyogena suśroṇi viyuktā dharmasetunā
 nāgabhāryovāca
a śiṣyāṇāṃ guruśuśrūṣā viprāṇāṃ vedapāraṇam
c bhṛtyānāṃ svāmivacanaṃ rājñāṃ lokānupālanam
a sarvabhūtaparitrāṇaṃ kṣatradharma ihocyate
c vaiśyānāṃ yajñasaṃvṛttir ātitheyasamanvitā
a viprakṣatriyavaiśyānāṃ śuśrūṣā śūdrakarma tat
c gṛhasthadharmo nāgendra sarvabhūtahitaiṣitā
a niyatāhāratā nityaṃ vratacaryā yathākramam
c dharmo hi dharmasaṃbandhād indriyāṇāṃ viśeṣaṇam
a ahaṃ kasya kuto vāhaṃ kaḥ ko me ha bhaved iti
c prayojanamatir nityam evaṃ mokṣāśramī bhavet
a pativratātvaṃ bhāryāyāḥ paramo dharma ucyate
c tavopadeśān nāgendra tac ca tattvena vedmi vai
a sāhaṃ dharmaṃ vijānantī dharmanitye tvayi sthite
c satpathaṃ katham utsṛjya yāsyāmi viṣame pathi
a devatānāṃ mahābhāga dharmacaryā na hīyate
c atithīnāṃ ca satkāre nityayuktāsmy atandritā
a saptāṣṭadivasās tv adya viprasyehāgatasya vai
c sa ca kāryaṃ na me khyāti darśanaṃ tava kāṅkṣati
a gomatyās tv eṣa puline tvaddarśanasamutsukaḥ
c āsīno ''vartayan brahma brāhmaṇaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ
d tapodhyānaparo nityaṃ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ
a ahaṃ tv anena nāgendra sāmapūrvaṃ samāhitā
c prasthāpyo matsakāśaṃ sa saṃprāpto bhujagottamaḥ
a etac chrutvā mahāprājña tatra gantuṃ tvam arhasi
c dātum arhasi vā tasya darśanaṃ darśanaśravaḥ
 nāga uvāca
a atha brāhmaṇarūpeṇa kaṃ taṃ samanupaśyasi
c mānuṣaṃ kevalaṃ vipraṃ devaṃ vātha śucismite
a ko hi māṃ mānuṣaḥ śakto draṣṭukāmo yaśasvini
c saṃdarśanarucir vākyam ājñāpūrvaṃ vadiṣyati
a surāsuragaṇānāṃ ca devarṣīṇāṃ ca bhāmini
c nanu nāgā mahāvīryāḥ sauraseyās tarasvinaḥ
a vandanīyāś ca varadā vayam apy anuyāyinaḥ
c manuṣyāṇāṃ viśeṣeṇa dhanādhyakṣā iti śrutiḥ
 nāgabhāryovāca
a ārjavenābhijānāmi nāsau devo 'nilāśana
c ekaṃ tv asya vijānāmi bhaktimān atiroṣaṇaḥ
d dvijānām iha bhaktaḥ sa kālavit kaliroṣaṇaḥ
d saṃkalpavihitaṃ tv arthaṃ pūrayitvānilāśana
d arthināṃ paramaṃ lokaṃ yaśaś cāgryaṃ samaśnute
d prārthitārthābhihantā te mā bhūt kaś cit kule 'nagha
d sāmarthye sati nāgendra narake sa hi majjati
a sa hi kāryāntarākāṅkṣī jalepsuḥ stokako yathā
c varṣaṃ varṣapriyaḥ pakṣī darśanaṃ tava kāṅkṣati
a na hi tvā daivataṃ kiṃ cid vivignaṃ pratipālayet
c tulye hy abhijane jāto na kaś cit paryupāsate
a tad roṣaṃ sahajaṃ tyaktvā tvam enaṃ draṣṭum arhasi
c āśāchedena tasyādya nātmānaṃ dagdhum arhasi
a āśayā tv abhipannānām akṛtvāśrupramārjanam
c rājā vā rājaputro vā bhrūṇahatyaiva yujyate
a maunāj jñānaphalāvāptir dānena ca yaśo mahat
c vāgmitvaṃ satyavākyena paratra ca mahīyate
a bhūmipradānena gatiṃ labhaty āśramasaṃmitām
c naṣṭasyārthasya saṃprāptiṃ kṛtvā phalam upāśnute
a abhipretām asaṃkliṣṭāṃ kṛtvākāmavatīṃ kriyām
c na yāti nirayaṃ kaś cid iti dharmavido viduḥ
 nāga uvāca
a abhimānena māno me jātidoṣeṇa vai mahān
c roṣaḥ saṃkalpajaḥ sādhvi dagdho vācāgninā tvayā
a na ca roṣād ahaṃ sādhvi paśyeyam adhikaṃ tamaḥ
c yasya vaktavyatāṃ yānti viśeṣeṇa bhujaṃgamāḥ
a doṣasya hi vaśaṃ gatvā daśagrīvaḥ pratāpavān
c tathā śakrapratispardhī hato rāmeṇa saṃyuge
a antaḥpuragataṃ vatsaṃ śrutvā rāmeṇa nirhṛtam
c dharṣaṇād roṣasaṃvignāḥ kārtavīryasutā hatāḥ
a jāmadagnyena rāmeṇa sahasranayanopamaḥ
c saṃyuge nihato roṣāt kārtavīryo mahābalaḥ
d tathā śakrapratispardhī roṣasya vaśam āgataḥ
d māndhātā nihato yuddhe lavaṇeneha rakṣasā
a tad eṣa tapasāṃ śatruḥ śreyasaś ca nipātanaḥ
c nigṛhīto mayā roṣaḥ śrutvaiva vacanaṃ tava
a ātmānaṃ ca viśeṣeṇa praśaṃsāmy anapāyini
c yasya me tvaṃ viśālākṣi bhāryā sarvaguṇānvitā
a eṣa tatraiva gacchāmi yatra tiṣṭhaty asau dvijaḥ
c sarvathā coktavān vākyaṃ nākṛtārthaḥ prayāsyati
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa pannagapatis tatra prayayau brāhmaṇaṃ prati
c tam eva manasā dhyāyan kāryavattāṃ vicārayan
a tam abhikramya nāgendro matimān sa nareśvara
c provāca madhuraṃ vākyaṃ prakṛtyā dharmavatsalaḥ
a bho bho kṣāmyābhibhāṣe tvāṃ na roṣaṃ kartum arhasi
c iha tvam abhisaṃprāptaḥ kasyārthe kiṃ prayojanam
a ābhimukhyād abhikramya snehāt pṛcchāmi te dvija
c vivikte gomatītīre kiṃ vā tvaṃ paryupāsase
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a dharmāraṇyaṃ hi māṃ viddhi nāgaṃ draṣṭum ihāgatam
c padmanābhaṃ dvijaśreṣṭhaṃ tatra me kāryam āhitam
a tasya cāham asāṃnidhyaṃ śrutavān asmi taṃ gatam
c svajanaṃ taṃ pratīkṣāmi parjanyam iva karṣakaḥ
a tasya cākleśakaraṇaṃ svastikārasamāhitam
c vartayāmy ayutaṃ brahma yogayukto nirāmayaḥ
 nāga uvāca
a aho kalyāṇavṛttas tvaṃ sādhu sajjanavatsalaḥ
c śravāḍhyas tvaṃ mahābhāga paraṃ snehena paśyasi
a ahaṃ sa nāgo viprarṣe yathā māṃ vindate bhavān
c ājñāpaya yathā svairaṃ kiṃ karomi priyaṃ tava
a bhavantaṃ svajanād asmi saṃprāptaṃ śrutavān iha
c atas tvāṃ svayam evāhaṃ draṣṭum abhyāgato dvija
a saṃprāptaś ca bhavān adya kṛtārthaḥ pratiyāsyati
c visrabdho māṃ dvijaśreṣṭha viṣaye yoktum arhasi
a vayaṃ hi bhavatā sarve guṇakrītā viśeṣataḥ
c yas tvam ātmahitaṃ tyaktvā mām evehānurudhyase
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a āgato 'haṃ mahābhāga tava darśanalālasaḥ
c kaṃ cid artham anarthajñaḥ praṣṭukāmo bhujaṃgama
a aham ātmānam ātmastho mārgamāṇo ''tmano hitam
c vāsārthinaṃ mahāprājña balavantam upāsmi ha
a prakāśitas tvaṃ svaguṇair yaśogarbhagabhastibhiḥ
c śaśāṅkakarasaṃsparśair hṛdyair ātmaprakāśitaiḥ
a tasya me praśnam utpannaṃ chindhi tvam anilāśana
c paścāt kāryaṃ vadiṣyāmi śrotum arhati me bhavān
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a vivasvato gacchati paryayeṇa
voḍhuṃ bhavāṃs taṃ ratham ekacakram
c āścaryabhūtaṃ yadi tatra kiṃ cid
dṛṣṭaṃ tvayā śaṃsitum arhasi tvam
 nāga uvāca
 āścaryāṇām anekānāṃ pratiṣṭhā bhagavān raviḥ
 yato bhūtāḥ pravartante sarve trailokyasaṃmatāḥ
a yasya raśmisahasreṣu śākhāsv iva vihaṃgamāḥ
c vasanty āśritya munayaḥ saṃsiddhā daivataiḥ saha
a yato vāyur viniḥsṛtya sūryaraśmyāśrito mahān
c vijṛmbhaty ambare vipra kim āścaryataraṃ tataḥ
d vibhajyatāṃ tu viprarṣe prajānāṃ hitakāmyayā
d toyaṃ sṛjati varṣāsu kim āścaryam ataḥ param
d yasya maṇḍalamadhyastho mahātmā paramatviṣā
d dīptaḥ samīkṣate lokān kim āścaryam ataḥ param
d śakracāpāṅkitaghaṭaiḥ yaḥ sa vārighaṭodaraiḥ
a śukro nāmāsitaḥ pādo yasya vāridharo 'mbare
c toyaṃ sṛjati varṣāsu kim āścaryam ataḥ param
a yo 'ṣṭamāsāṃs tu śucinā kiraṇenojjhitaṃ payaḥ
c paryādatte punaḥ kāle kim āścaryam ataḥ param
a yasya tejoviśeṣeṣu nityam ātmā pratiṣṭhitaḥ
c yato bījaṃ mahī ceyaṃ dhāryate sacarācaram
a yatra devo mahābāhuḥ śāśvataḥ paramo 'kṣaraḥ
c anādinidhano vipra kim āścaryam ataḥ param
d devo mantramayo 'nādiḥ kālātmā tejasāṃ nidhiḥ
d jaganmayasya kṣetrajñaḥ kim āścaryataraṃ tataḥ
a āścaryāṇām ivāścaryam idam ekaṃ tu me śṛṇu
c vimale yan mayā dṛṣṭam ambare sūryasaṃśrayāt
a purā madhyāhnasamaye lokāṃs tapati bhāskare
c pratyādityapratīkāśaḥ sarvataḥ pratyadṛśyata
a sa lokāṃs tejasā sarvān svabhāsā nirvibhāsayan
c ādityābhimukho 'bhyeti gaganaṃ pāṭayann iva
a hutāhutir iva jyotir vyāpya tejomarīcibhiḥ
c anirdeśyena rūpeṇa dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ
a tasyābhigamanaprāptau hasto datto vivasvatā
c tenāpi dakṣiṇo hasto dattaḥ pratyarcanārthinā
a tato bhittvaiva gaganaṃ praviṣṭo ravimaṇḍalam
c ekībhūtaṃ ca tat tejaḥ kṣaṇenādityatāṃ gatam
a tatra naḥ saṃśayo jātas tayos tejaḥsamāgame
c anayoḥ ko bhavet sūryo rathastho yo 'yam āgataḥ
a te vayaṃ jātasaṃdehāḥ paryapṛcchāmahe ravim
c ka eṣa divam ākramya gataḥ sūrya ivāparaḥ
 sūrya uvāca
a naiṣa devo 'nilasakho nāsuro na ca pannagaḥ
c uñchavṛttivrate siddho munir eṣa divaṃ gataḥ
a eṣa mūlaphalāhāraḥ śīrṇaparṇāśanas tathā
c abbhakṣo vāyubhakṣaś ca āsīd vipraḥ samāhitaḥ
a ṛcaś cānena vipreṇa saṃhitāntarabhiṣṭutāḥ
c svargadvārakṛtodyogo yenāsau tridivaṃ gataḥ
a asannadhīranākāṅkṣī nityam uñchaśilāśanaḥ
c sarvabhūtahite yukta eṣa vipro bhujaṃgama
d eṣa svena prabhāvena saṃprāpto nirmalāṃ gatim
d sukṛtenāsya yatnena spṛhayante bhavadvidhāḥ
a na hi devā na gandharvā nāsurā na ca pannagāḥ
c prabhavantīha bhūtānāṃ prāptānāṃ paramāṃ gatim
 nāga uvāca
a etad evaṃvidhaṃ dṛṣṭam āścaryaṃ tatra me dvija
c saṃsiddho mānuṣaḥ kāyo yo 'sau siddhagatiṃ gataḥ
e sūryeṇa sahito brahman pṛthivīṃ parivartate
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a āścaryaṃ nātra saṃdehaḥ suprīto 'smi bhujaṃgama
c anvarthopagatair vākyaiḥ panthānaṃ cāsmi darśitaḥ
a svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmi sādho bhujagasattama
c smaraṇīyo 'smi bhavatā saṃpreṣaṇaniyojanaiḥ
 nāga uvāca
a anuktvā madgataṃ kāryaṃ kvedānīṃ prasthito bhavān
c ucyatāṃ dvija yat kāryaṃ yadarthaṃ tvam ihāgataḥ
a uktānukte kṛte kārye mām āmantrya dvijarṣabha
c mayā pratyabhyanujñātas tato yāsyasi brāhmaṇa
a na hi māṃ kevalaṃ dṛṣṭvā tyaktvā praṇayavān iha
c gantum arhasi viprarṣe vṛkṣamūlagato yathā
a tvayi cāhaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha bhavān mayi na saṃśayaḥ
c loko 'yaṃ bhavataḥ sarvaḥ kā cintā mayi te 'nagha
 brāhmaṇa uvāca
a evam etan mahāprājña vijñātārtha bhujaṃgama
c nātiriktās tvayā devāḥ sarvathaiva yathātatham
a ya evāhaṃ sa eva tvam evam etad bhujaṃgama
c ahaṃ bhavāṃś ca bhūtāni sarve sarvatragāḥ sadā
a āsīt tu me bhogapate saṃśayaḥ puṇyasaṃcaye
c so 'ham uñchavrataṃ sādho cariṣyāmy arthadarśanam
a eṣa me niścayaḥ sādho kṛtaḥ kāraṇavattaraḥ
c āmantrayāmi bhadraṃ te kṛtārtho 'smi bhujaṃgama
 bhīṣma uvāca
a sa cāmantryoragaśreṣṭhaṃ brāhmaṇaḥ kṛtaniścayaḥ
c dīkṣākāṅkṣī tadā rājaṃś cyavanaṃ bhārgavaṃ śritaḥ
a sa tena kṛtasaṃskāro dharmam evopatasthivān
c tathaiva ca kathām etāṃ rājan kathitavāṃs tadā
a bhārgaveṇāpi rājendra janakasya niveśane
c kathaiṣā kathitā puṇyā nāradāya mahātmane
a nāradenāpi rājendra devendrasya niveśane
c kathitā bharataśreṣṭha pṛṣṭenākliṣṭakarmaṇā
a devarājena ca purā kathaiṣā kathitā śubhā
c samastebhyaḥ praśastebhyo vasubhyo vasudhādhipa
a yadā ca mama rāmeṇa yuddham āsīt sudāruṇam
c vasubhiś ca tadā rājan katheyaṃ kathitā mama
a pṛcchamānāya tattvena mayā tubhyaṃ viśāṃ pate
c katheyaṃ kathitā puṇyā dharmyā dharmabhṛtāṃ vara
a tad eṣa paramo dharmo yan māṃ pṛcchasi bhārata
c asannadhīr anākāṅkṣī dharmārthakaraṇe nṛpa
a sa ca kila kṛtaniścayo dvijāgryo
bhujagapatipratideśitārthakṛtyaḥ
c yamaniyamasamāhito vanāntaṃ
parigaṇitoñchaśilāśanaḥ praviṣṭaḥ
